40026024	Mii Chapa avah Mma' leiyi, mdokjit dok ava'jik ki kchet chrah. Pdainu Mii Chapa kyur kcha' mii ava' 'leenni suwthitna' ka'am a! Mii ava' ki thenvah tqouqou vih mqou chaakma daatple bih kqha rangnga.”
40026025	Audilli Mma' kyur chrang Judas tih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Rabbi, avah nei ngaal mowi?” Ungta Mma ngi theda: “Nang ngi anto ngi athethut chaak dok a.”
40026026	Ungta mmaan nih mmaal meekin arlaan nih Jisu ngi thenpen avah louda ungta panpaak chthida khuida ungta sikhu rek hinni piilam thida hanto'theda: “Arlaangin, a chaan, havah Nei ksadak ava'.”
40026027	Audilli Mma ngi tong avah louda ungta panpaak chda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda, pii lamda: “naan akheng inni hava' thungki aneen.
40026028	Mleiya havah mii knempok rekki pnu rek toptlot piikna' rang ki thenni kthuwk pauqum renki, Nei kihii ava'.
40026029	Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, Neiyi Kpa kruwngpaalna' thung ngi naan tu' ren ava' kdoneekna' nit ava' marvanduh khimkheiyi hava' riithlumdii avah veikhat nee nimaang.
40026030	Ungta mmaan nih laa khat mthe dokin dilli, mmaan nih vangthuwk lamda kruwn lown thah hang chlamda.”
40026031	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Tuwngkluw kat tih naan akhengin avah Nei kleiyi khuhsiir pirthiter chnaandi'. Mleiya havah mdokjit dok ksa. ‘Neiyi Yaukqhipa avah kvet nikdih Ungta yaulop rek thungki yau rek avah kerjeiter chlam rah.’ (Jkh. 13:7)
40026032	Pdainu Nei mteperdel dok dilli, Neiyi naan aduhthaan nih, Galily thah junikdi'.”
40026033	Pitar rih arthaangda ungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang aleiyi mii mkheng ngi khuhsiir pirthiter chyoso, neiya teden rukku khuhsiir pirthivot nimaang.”
40026034	Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. Tuwngkluw kat tih, harkhuwn duh ngi nang ngi Neiya veikdum mmat nadi'.”
40026035	Ungta Pitar rih Mma' hinni theda: “Neiyi, Nang tu' diyou chdaat rangyow ringngi, Nang nga amatvot nimaang.” Ungta anto' heppi sikhu morson rek mkhengin rukku the lamda.
40026036	Audilli Jisu ngi Gethsamany tidit mun thung ngi mmaan tu' hang lamda ungta sikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi wva' thuh rinkaktham chrah kehei arlaan nih, naanna hava' thuh iko'ong daatin.”
40026037	Ungta Mma ngi Pitar le' Jebedi chapa 'knii rek qhida vada ungta Mmah kdung ngi yachda ungta muplung kdungreen nih jiing chda.
40026038	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Kapthlarin avah kdung reen nih, kdiyou chrang pang ngi kya kcha' a. Hava' thuh i'am daatin rang ngi Nei tu' iharsap daat inche.”
40026039	Ungta Mma ngi mruk vakorsownda ungta Mmai thah tluwda rinktham chda ungta hanto'theda: “O, Apa, mrow rang cheentung ngi hava' tong avah Nei kihin ki ikorsown daatsowi, anto'daat yoso Nei kuplungbin hep daat mso, pdainu Nah aplungbin daatso.”
40026040	Audilli Mma ngi sikhu rek hinni arvangda ungta mmaan avah ki'iip chdaat tih arvanpha lamda ungta Pitar hinni Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Taluda naan nih qhang khatpang daat rukka Nei tu' harsap pchaang chmaanti a?
40026041	Naan nih kepthleem athung inni mluwmana' rah ikilrindei chaan ungta rin'iktham dei chaan. Apthlarin invah dakat tih mbin chaak a pdainu adaksaan nah aruhn kdowng kcha' a.”
40026042	Ungta Mma ngi mvei'knitna' vanowlda rinktham chda ungta hanto'theda: “O, Apa, hava' tong avah Neiyi kdoneekma donni korsown pchaang kma' rang mkurthuh cheentung ngi, Nah aplungbin ava' ikurthuwk chdaatso.”
40026043	Ungta Mma ngi marvan kerheel thungta veikhat ki'iip dok kcha'lam mih arvanpha nowl lamda. Mleiya mmaan nah mmikkhutin kdimat tih ki'iip kcha' lam.
40026044	Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan avah mapthinowl lam thida mveikdumna' rinkaktham chrah chet nowlda ungta mdothe ava'jik ki the nowlda.
40026045	Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni arvangda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Tunnu i'iipin, ikarnga chaan. Asuwn mpha avah kvei dok kcha' a. Ungta Mii Chapa avah pnu kervei rek khut thung ngi myur dok meeksli a.
40026046	Ikerdelin isun dokin cheh, Asuwn Nei mukyur kcha' mma' avah knaitek ki karva'a.”
40026047	Ungta Mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih, Asuwn, sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat, Judas ava ngi thimpu kenreel rekle' mii rekki kver rek hinki karva, raal'kaang le' kchung ksin miipiipa rektu' arva lamda.
40026048	'Tunnu Mma' kyur kcha' mma' ava ngi titinna' khat mdothe piik doklam. Mleiya ‘Neiyi kdoput avah Mma' rah ungta Mma' avah akyowngin,’ mdodit dok.
40026049	Audilli mma ngi m'tunkat daat tih Jisu avah phatengda ungta hanto'theda: “Rabbi,” dida arvuwi leekda ungta Mma' avah putda.
40026050	Ungta kornowl kornowl lih Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Plap taluleiyi mmun hava' thung ngi kthleng inpti?” Audilli mmaan nih pha lamda Jisu 'leenni khut ptla lamda, ungta Mma' avah kyowng lamda.
40026051	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Jisu tu' kilqhi khat tih mbaan thlaanda mraal'kaang turthuhda, thimpu kenreelsi suwk khat avah duda ungta makna sellotda.
40026052	Audilli Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Araal'kaang avah mkokthuh adaal perheel dok. Mleiya raal'kaang ksin kcha' rek mkheng avah raal'kaang 'leenni kenvei chlam rah.
40026053	Mditmata nang ngi, Neiyi Kpa hinni avah kqhil pchaang kma' rah atbin daat mow? Neiyi rinkaktham bih Mma ngi 'tunkat daat tih Nei kthen nih vaantamsi legion sowm lei'knii hinni knem myuk kapthlat piik rah.
40026054	Anto' mkurthuh u, taluhep pih Kchiir laika ngi mdothe avah kurtlum pchaang daat rang ngoh?”
40026055	Mpha ava' thung ngi Jisu ngi miipii rek hinni theda: “Naan nih Nei moklou rang ngi raanqhul kupru khat kokyowng rang heppi raal'kaang rekle' kchungpa sinin tinu karvaan imptih? Neiyi mniiktaiyi naan tu' ko'ongsap in minnu, Luwbuk'inn thung ngi apurchuk innu ungta ava' thung ngu naan nih mokyowng maan tinu.
40026056	Pdainu hava' dow mkheng avah Khulpu rekki Kchiir laika thung ngi mdokjit dokin ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni mdotlot.” Audilli sikhu rek mkheng ngi Mma' avah mapthi ter lam thida chen chlamda.
40026057	Ungta Jisu kokyowng rek mmaan ava ngi nowlam chukpu rekle' mii rekki kver rek, kunpunna' thimpu kenreelsi Kaiaphas hinni Mma' avah heiqhi lamda.
40026058	Pdainu Pitar vah leer rih thimpu kenreelsi innkhulown kpha qowi chda. Ungta mma ngi vangluwtda mqutna' ksuw rang ngi suwk rektu' ko'owngsap lamda.
40026059	'Tunnu thimpu kenreel rekle' kver ungta kunpun mkheng rek ava ngi Mma' mdo'eyowna' raan ki thenni Jisu 'leenni mlangkma' rinpaumin tpiikna' rah thlaam lamda.
40026060	Pdainu khadaat ruk phang lam mda. Mmaan nih mlangkma' rinpaumin knempok ki piichleek lam yoso mmaan nih khadaat ruk phang chlammeh. Pdainu mqutna' thung ngi mlangkma' rinpaumin kpii mii 'knii thleng lamda.
40026061	Ungta mmaanve ngi hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava ngi, ‘Neiyi hava' Isowr Luwbuk'inn avah te'ekre kapchaan, ungta nii kdum daat thung ngi sanikdi',’ mdodit,” dilamda.
40026062	Ungta thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi ripda Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga dow khatleh arthaang mtinuh? Hava' mii rekki a'leen nih rinpaumin mdopiik pokin avah taluluda?”
40026063	Pdainu Jisu a rimkdi am chda. Mthungta thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi kring Isowr miing thamnu ahin nih pau akkheel chaak a, mheithe piik chaan. Nang nga Isowr Chapa, Mesaiah ava' pti?”
40026064	Mthungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiya nang ngi adothe ava' ping. Ungta anto'daat mda Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, 'tun dilli nang ngi Mii Chapa avah Ruhtan ki machang thah ko'ongdon ungta parvaan ki armei 'leenni arjung kqum amik ki deinadi'.”
40026065	Audilli thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi mbuwmdiir jenda kqet thida hanto'theda: “Mma ngi pthitda kpau dok a! Hava' heihin nih talu rinpaumin morson tolowpom raan msit ka'am a? Asuwn, naan nih 'tunkat tih Mma ngi pthitda mpau avah arjaak dok inna!
40026066	Naan nih talu abin inna?” Mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mmah mdiyow rang kat thah ktla a.”
40026067	Audilli mmaan nih Mmai thah ptilkbal lih pthot lamda ungta bun lamda. Ungta aangqhe rekki mkhutpyaan nih tpeeng lamda.
40026068	Ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mesaiah 'tunnu apurphuwng ngo, kuwda aktpeeng nga?”
40026069	'Tunnu Pitar rah duwn thah innkhulown nih kok'ong chdaat. Ungta snunau suwk khat tih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang rukka Galily ki Jisu tu' kilqhi ptih.”
40026070	Pdainu mma ngi mmaan mkhengin maiyi avah mat chda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi adothe avah neiya deimaang.”
40026071	Ungta mma ngi paltong hinni mhei chaak thungta snunau khat nowl lih mma' avah deida ungta ava' thuh ka'am mii rek hinni theda: “Hava' miilai rukka Najareth ki Jisu tu' kilqhi kchok lam.”
40026072	Pdainu mma ngi veikhat paureel tu' kilqhi ngi theda: “Neiya hava' mii avah deimaang!”
40026073	Ungta ambong thida, ava' arveel lih krip rek ava ngi mhin nih pha lamda ungta Pitar hinni hanto' the lamda: “Nang rukka mmaan arlak ki khat mun nadi'. Mleiya apau pau vih kuryur kcha' imptih.”
40026074	Audilli mma ngi kthi karthamda paureel tu' kilqhi ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi Mii avah deiliit maang!” Ungta m'tunkat daat tih har khuwngda.
40026075	Ungta Pitar rih Jisu pauna avah binphaak chda. Mleiya Mma ngi mhin nih hanto' mdothe: “Harkhuwn duh ngi, nang ngi Neiya veikdumtet thuh mmat chnadi'.” Audilli mma ngi duwn thah vangthuwkda mningksiin dok ki qap chda.
40027001	Jiingsun mve thungta thimpu kenreel rekle' mii rekki kver rek mkheng inni Jisu te'eyowna' rang ki thenni lop kerseel lamda.
40027002	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mbowl dokin dilli heiqhi lamda paamkpu Pontias ki Pilaat hinni Mma' avah parlaan lamda.
40027003	Audilli Mma' kyur kcha' Judas tih Mma' avah mupsul inna tidit mmik ki mdeh thungta mthina ngi plung perthleng chda. Ungta mma ngi Jiipowl sumqiit chai somkdum rek avah arheisinda thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rek hinni perheel pthida.
40027004	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Dow khatleh kdei kcha' kma' ava' kdoyur chaak leiyi, neiyi pnu kerve chaak a,” dida. Pdainu mmaan nih the lamda: “Neen nih avah talu portlow nikaandi? Nang ngi avah akilrinqhi cha',” dilamda.
40027005	Ungta mma ngi jiipowl sumqiit rek avah Luwbuk'inn thung ngi varpthi thida mapthida. Ungta mmah sun chda ungta chetda kurhuwk you chda.
40027006	Ungta thimpu kenreel rekki jiipowl sumqiit rek avah lou lam thida hanto' the lamda: “Sumbuwr thung ngi hava' tadaal penlet rang avah nowlam mih mdorot pemeh. Mleiya hava'le' avah hii trenna' mkhon pah.”
40027007	Ungta mmaan nih lop kerseel lam thida sum ava ngi beelksapa loupaam khat ren lamda. Mleiya avah mal rek kdiyou tulruwlna' mun purthuh lamda.
40027008	Avaleiyi, ava' paam avah tuni kpha thung ngi, ‘Hii loupaam’ tidit tih ka'am kcha'.
40027009	Audilli khulpu Jeremaiah ngi mdokjit dok avah anto ngi kurkhumda. Mleiya mma ngi hanto'theda: “Ungta mmaan nih, Mma' khon rah mdopqum dokin Jiipowl sumqiit chai somkdum avah lou lamda. Hava' mkhon avah Isreel nau rekki mdopqum dokin ava'.
40027010	‘Ungta Kruwng ngi nei kihin nih mdotsi chaak heppi Mmaan nih beelksa rek loupaam ki thenni avah pii lamda,’ ” mdodit. (Jer. 32:6-9 Jkh. 11:12-13)
40027011	'Tunnu Jisu ngi paamkpu aang ngi ripda ungta paamkpu ava ngi Mma' hinni hanto'theda kheelda: “Nang nga Jihudi rekki Kruwng pti?” dida. Mthungta Jisu ngi mhin nih theda: “Neiya nang ngi hava' adothe ava' ping.”
40027012	Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rekki mraal mpiiklam thung vah, Mma ngi dow khatleh mdo'arthaan pemeh.
40027013	Audilli Pilaat tih Mhin nih theda: “Nang ngi a'leen nih rinpaumin knempok ki mdopiikin avah arja mtimow?”
40027014	Ungta Mma ngi avah pauna khadaat rukku arthaang mda. Mthungta Paamkpu avah kdung ngi ngakyou chda.
40027015	'Tunnu kmaal ava' thung ngi miipii rek hinni paamkpu ava ngi mmaan nih mdongeiyin rowngmii khat mdopthlat piik lam rang avah mnowpa khat kurthuwk ki am chda.
40027016	Ungta mii mkheng ngi mdodeh mmiing Barabbas tidit rowngmii khat avah mmaan nih thlowi daat lamda.
40027017	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih kurtuwl lamda ma'am daatin arlaan nih Pilaat tih mmaan hinni kheel lamda: “Naan nih, athen inni kuw adokapthlat piik raan angei inna? Barabbas mow, Khrista mdodit Jisu ava' rang?”
40027018	Mleiya tepnerna' leiyi, mmaan nih Mma' avah mdotparlaan lam tidit avah mma ngi mdodeh.
40027019	Mma ngi pau tpinditna' longkhom 'leenni mko'on daat arlaan nih mnuwn nih hanto'theda pau arheipthlada: “Nang ngi hava' mii kindit ava' 'leenni dow khatleh tlowma', Mleiya tuni kmer rih Mma' leiyi, dow knempok 'leenni suwk kthuwk kcha' ping.”
40027020	Pdainu thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rekki miipii rek ava' hinni mmaan nih Barabbas mdoqhilna' raan ungta Jisu avah tpenvei rah adiin rang ngi aqhilin, tidit tih siinchaak dok lamda.
40027021	Paamkpu ava ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' 'knii rek arlak ki kuw adokapthlat piik raan angei inna?” dida. Mthungta mmaan nih ‘Barabbas,’ dilamda.
40027022	Pilaat tih mmaan hinni theda: “Mdittu' Khrista mdodit Jisu avah talu pirditnikdi?” Mthungta mmaan mkheng inni mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Mma' avah topthowiyow rah.”
40027023	Audilli paamkpu ava ngi hanto'theda: “Talulei, talu kthikat mdotlot ma'amna ngi?” Pdainu mmaan nih kerkheel seset tih owng lamda, ‘Mma' avah topthowiyow rah,’ dilamda.
40027024	Ungta Pilaat tih mma ngi dow khatleh pqu pchaang rang maang ungta raal kthuwk rah mthe a tidit deida. Audilli mma ngi dii louda ungta miipii rek dodeh ngi mkhut alqhuthida hanto'theda: “Hava' mraal ktaak Mii hava' hii leivah neiya dow khatleh deimaang. Havah naan nih akilrinqhi chaan,” dida.
40027025	Ungta mii mkheng ngi arthaang lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mma' hii avah neen k'leenin nih ungta knau'leen 'leenni itla chdaatso.”
40027026	Audilli mma ngi mmaan thenni Barabbas avah pthlatpiik lamda ungta mma ngi khuikin kchung ngi Jisu a bunthida mdopthowiyow raan ki thenni Mma' avah parlaan pthi lamda.
40027027	Audilli paamkpu ava' raalmii rekki Mma' avah Paamkpu inn, tidit tah paamkpu amna'inn ava' thah qhi lamda. Ungta raalmiilop mkheng ava ngi Mma' avah tkhulsap lamda.
40027028	Ungta mmaan nih mbuwmdiir avah suwtpthi lamda ungta phriktluwn, mipdit kning ngi ksen pnaak lamda.
40027029	Ungta mmaan nih tirling penher lam thida avah laar luwkhum mih mluw thah pkhum lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mkhut machang thah piipe kuwng psin lam thida ma'aang ngi pkhup pih tirdiil chleek lamda. Ungta hanto' the lamda pnichaak lamda: “Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng, akurvuwi chaak inna,” dileek lamda.
40027030	Ungta mmaan nih m'leen nih ptil pthot lamda ungta piipe kuwng chom lamda mluwchai thah prei lamda.
40027031	Ungta mmaan nih mipnichaak dokin dilli m'leen ki mbuwmdiir khowk lamda ungta Mma' buwdiir ava' pnaak lamda ungta mdopthowiyow raanni Mma' avah hanqhi lamda.
40027032	Ungta mmaan nih marvanthuwn thungta mmiing Simon mdoditin, Sairen khuw ki miikhat kurdutqhi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' khros avah mma' hinni topdom lamda.
40027033	Ungta mmaan nih Golgotha tidit mun mphaakin thungta tidit tah luwruh mun mdoditnaan.
40027034	Mmaan nih saasingkha tu' tporchou thowldii kdor avah mdoneek rah pii lamda. Pdainu Mma ngi ava' mpertem dilli, Mma ngi avah neemda.
40027035	Audilli mmaan nih Mma' avah pthowiyou lamda ungta mbuwdiir avah mmaan nih pchalpiik sutna' lam thida penthem chlamda. Mleiya khulpu rek dothe ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni havah anto'kat tih thuwkda. Mleiya hanto'theda: “Mmaan nih Nei kbuwdiir rekka penthem chlamda ungta Nei kiphriktluwn 'leenni pchalpiik sutna' lamda.” (Luw. 22:18)
40027036	Ungta mmaan nih ko'ong lamda Mma' avah sutpqowi lamda.
40027037	Ungta mluwqhun nih m'raal mdopiiknaan paukjit rek avah hanto' kjit lamda, mdodaarin. ‘HAVAH JIHUDI REKKI PAAMKRUWNG, JISU’ ava'.
40027038	Audilli mmaan nih raanqhul kupru rek 'knii rukka ava' thuh Mma' tu' pthowiyousap lamda. Mleiya khat tih machang thah ungta morson khat tih maleh thah pthowi lamda.
40027039	Ungta ava' thuh kthleng mii rekki Mma' 'leenni pthitda pau lamda ungta mluwn ksuk lamda.
40027040	Ungta hanto' the lamda: “Luwbuk'inn penvei pthithida niikdum thung ngi ksa rang, Nang nga athina ikarsan cha'low. Nang ngi Isowr Chapa akurthuh cheentung ngi khros 'leenki arjungqum low,” dilamda.
40027041	Anto'hep daat tih, thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta kver rek rukku hanto' the lamda Mmah pnichaak lamda.
40027042	“Mma ngi mii morsonna san pchaang thida mdakka karsan pchaang chemow! Mma ngi Isreel rekki Paamkruwng mkurthuh cheentung ngi khros 'leenki arjung qumsolow, neen rukku Mma' lam'trin chaakna' raanni.
40027043	Mma ngi Isowr lammdorin chaakpda, 'tunnu Mma ngi Mma' avah changmaptlaak cheentung ngi aktlan chso. Mleiya Mma ngi ‘Neiya Isowr Chapa ping’ mdodit pda.”
40027044	Ungta Mma' tu' mdopthowi yowsapin raanqhul kupru rek kpha rukku anto' heppi ar'ow ngi bi chlamda.
40027045	'Tunnu mutrukna' qhang thungki kupqhun nih mutkutna' qhang kpha thung ngi paam mkheng avah jiingnu ngi pkhumda.
40027046	Ungta mutkutna' qhang arveel lih Jisu ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Eli Eli lama Sabakthani?” Mleiya “Neiki Isowr Neiki Isowr, taluleiyi Nang ngi Neiya atmaak pthi a?” mdoditna.' (Luw. 22:1)
40027047	Ungta ava' thuh krip mii aangqhe rekki ava' mdothe marjaakin thungta hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava ngi Elaijah mo'own chaak a.”
40027048	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mmaan arlak ki khat tih heichenda, buwphown khat louda thowldii kdor thung ngi phuwmda ungta piipe kuwng 'leenni daar thida Mma' hinni avah mdoneek rah piida.
40027049	Mqhe rekki hanto' the lamda: “Anto ngi mthina i'am chdaatso, Elaijah thlengdon ksansik rang mow, isuwn cheh.”
40027050	Ungta Jisu ngi mveiknitna' kdung ngi mo'own dilli Mma' pthlarin avah sun chda.
40027051	Ungta Asuwn, Luwbuk'inn kenje thungki buwkhaar avah mtun ki ngi mtii kphadek ki laak 'knii kthuwk ki kerjen chda. Ungta dulti kunchuwnda ungta lung rek avah kuida.
40027052	Ungta thlaan rek avah parvangda ungta ki'iip dok kcha' miikenje rek daksa knempok rek avah kerdel lamda.
40027053	Ungta Mma ngi mrinkerheel dok dilli thlaan rek thungki arvang thuwk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih khuwpii kchiir thung ngi luwt chlamda ungta mii knempok rek hinni kandang chlamda.
40027054	'Tunnu raalmii arja khat kpupa avale' mma' tu' amsapda Jisu ksutpqowi rekki ringnaang kthuwk ungta ava' thuh mdotlot dow rek avah dei lamda ungta kdung ngi mninginkqi ngi hanto' the lamda. “Dakat tih havah Isowr Chapa kat thideh,” dilamda.
40027055	Ungta Galily ki kupqhun nih Jisu dil qowida Mma' sopklow kcha' snu rek rukka ava' thuh lamkla ngi leer rih Mma' sutpqowi lamda ka'am daat lam.
40027056	Mmaan arlak ki Magdala ki Mary ungta James le' Joses nuh Mary ungta Jebedi chapa rek nuh le' rukka ka'amsap daat lam.
40027057	'Tunnu kluhpha mve thungta Arimathia ki mmiing Joseph mdodit svangpa khat thlengda. Ungta mma' mdakkat rukka Jisu sikhu kurthuwk dok kcha'.
40027058	Mma ngi Pilaat hinni thlengda ungta Jisu kluwng avah qhil chda. Audilli Pilaat tih mukluwng avah mdopiikna' raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda.
40027059	Ungta Joseph pih mukluwng ava' mupqum chaak dilli buw kperneem kertleu deek khat tih perjeel deekda.
40027060	Ungta mma ngi mma' mdak thlaan rang ngi lung vuwtda mdothiik thlaan ren ava' thung ngi pi'iip chda. Ungta mma ngi lung klinpa khat purlupda, thlaankhor nehr avah arkam thida sun chda.
40027061	Ungta ava' thung ngu Magdala ki Mary le' morson Mary le' avah thlaan ava' raalpha thah kok'ong chdaat lam.
40027062	'Tunnu mupduknii ngi, tidit tah tporthlonna' nit ava' dilli thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rekki Pilaat hinni kurkuwk lamda.
40027063	Ungta hanto' the lamda: “Ocha, neen nih hava' mikuhuwng kcha' mii ava ngi mrindaat thung ngi hanto' mdothe avah kbinphaak inna. Mleiya, ‘Neiyi niikdum dil thah ringkerheel nikdi' mdodit.
40027064	Avaleiyi, thlaan avah 'tun ki kupqhun nih niikdum kpha thung ngi kqhajik ki trunna' rah paupiik khat mheiptlaak piik chaan. Mditma bih, Msikhu rekki jaan nih chet lamdon mukluwng avah kupru dok lam ruk krow. Ungta audillu mmaan nih mii rek hinni, ‘Mma' avah kdiyou thungki kring kerheel dok a’ kdi lamrah. Ungta mqutna' ki mihuwn chaakna' ava ngi rukri ki hinni mmeel kthisi rah,” dilamda.
40027065	Ungta Pilaat tih mmaan hinni theda: “Naan nih arung chaan. Vangin rang ngi naan nih taluhep pih totlot tih kqha rang tidit adodeh chaakinya ngi arung chaan.”
40027066	Mthungta mmaan nih hang lamda thlaan avah pnet lamda ungta lung avah kbihjiik lot lamda ungta krung rah mii thi lamda.
40028001	'Tunnu tkarngatnit dilki, arveen ki mkhatna' nit ki khu ktlei rah mthe arlaan nih Magdala ki Mary ungta morson Mary le' avah thlaan ksuw rah hang lamda.
40028002	Ungta asuwn, ava' thuh ringnaang kdung ngi thuwkda. Mleiya parvaan ki vaantamsi khat arjung qumda ungta thurngut thungki lung avah purlup pthida ungta m'leen nih ko'ongda.
40028003	Ungta mmai ruwngchen avah kowl keplek hep daat tih ungta mbuwdiir avah tbur heppi kchiirdang ngi kpowl.
40028004	Ungta mukrung rek ava ngi mma' mdoqit chaak inni kunchuwn lamda ungta kdiyou heppi plowm chlamda.
40028005	Pdainu vaantamsi ava ngi arthaangda ungta snu rek ava' hinni theda: “Aningin pqitmaan. Mleiya naanve a mdopthowi yown, Jisu kthlaamin ptih tidit akdehn a.
40028006	Ungta Mmah hava' thuh ammeh. Mleiya Mma ngi mdothe dok heppi Mmah kring kerheel dok kcha'. Arvang luwtin rang ngi, Kruwng mdo'pi'iinaan mmun avah, arheisuwn.
40028007	Ungta naanve ngi kbeisek ki vangin rang ngi Msikhu rek hinni, ‘Mmah kdiyou thungki kring kerheel dok', adiin rang ngi pau asonpiikin. Ungta dakat tih Mmah aduh thaan nih Galily thah kyudok, ava' thah naanve ngi Mmah kurdutqhi naandi'. Asuwn, neiyi havah akthepiik inna.”
40028008	Mthungta snu rek ava ngi kbeiyi thlaan thungki mningqitin le' kdung ngi mkanpat chaak inni yungsun lamda. Ungta Msikhu rek hinni pau ava' kthe rang ngi yungchen lamda.
40028009	Ungta mmaanve ngi Msikhu rek hinni pauksong rah mvanmeekin arlaan nih asuwn, Jisu ngi 'lam thuh mmaanve avah kurdutqhi lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Ikanpa chaan!” Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' avah dei chlamda mkhuh kyowng lamda ungta luwbuk chlamda.
40028010	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni theda: “Aningin pqitmaan, ungta naan nih chetin rang ngi ku'uknau rek hinni Galily paamkuwl thah myukna' raan athepiikin. Mleiya mmaan nih ava' thah Neiya mekdei chlam rah.”
40028011	Ungta mmaanve mheimeekin arlaan nih thlaankrung mii aangqhe rekki khuwpii thah chet lamda. Ungta mmaan nih thimpu kenreel rek hinni kthuwk dow mkheng avah song lamda.
40028012	Ungta mmaan nih kver rektu' lop mkerseel dokin dilli raalmii rek hinni sum knempok ki pii lamda.
40028013	Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Naan nih hanto' atheen, tidit tah ‘neen nih ki'ii chaak dokin arlaan nih Msikhu rekki jaan nih thleng lamda neen kihin ki mdoprut dokin,’ adiin.
40028014	Ungta hanto' heppi paamkpu kna mtlun dok bih, neen nih mma' avah siinchaak pchaang nikaandi', ungta naan a'leen nih tyatna' takhat am nimeh,”
40028015	Ungta thlaankrung rek ava ngi sum avah lou chlamda ungta mmaan nih mdoperseel dokin ava'jik ki tlow lamda. Ungta hava' pau avah tuni kpha rukku Jihudi rek arlak ki tparjaam tlit daat tih ka'am kcha.
40028016	Ungta audilli sikhu sowm leikhat rek avah Galily paamkuwl thah chet lamda, Jisu ngi mmaan hinni mdokchol dok lown ava' thah hang lamda.
40028017	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' mdeh chaakin thungta Mma' avah luwbuk chlamda pdainu aangqhe rekvah muplungin porkohei chlamda.
40028018	Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni thlengda ungta hanto'theda: “Parvaan le' dultipaam ki ruhtanna' mkheng avah Nei kihin nih mtipiik chaak dok a.
40028019	Avaleiyi, naan nih ichetin rang ngi chaat mkheng rek thung ngi sikhu apqhangin ungta Pa ungta Chapa ungta Pthla Kchiir ava' miing 'leenni mmaan avah dii apluwtin.
40028020	Neiyi naan ahin nih paupiik adokpiik dokin khimkhei rek avah mmaan nih mdodanna' raan ki thenni naan nih mmaan hin rukku apurchukin. Ungta asuwn, dultipaam mqut kpha thung ngi Neiya naan ahin nih mpha ktai thung ngi ka'am imping.” Amen.
41001001	Isowr Chapa Jisu Khrista ki kqhapaumin ki mdopqhunna' avah,
41001002	Khulpu rek laika thung ngi hanto ngi mdokjit dok heppi: “Asuw, Neiyi Kpausikhu avah, Nang aduh thah, Nang a'lam kporthlong rah, Nang a'aang ngi pthla nikdi'.” (Mal. 3:1)
41001003	“Paamkbiik laiyi ko'owng khat krowl ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Kruwng thenni 'lam aporthlongin! Mma' 'lam avah kirji deek ki aportlotin.’ ” (Is. 40:3)
41001004	Johon thlengda paamkbiik laiyi diipluwtda ungta pnu rek kertleuna' rang ki thenni plung kerthlenna' ki diiluwna' avah parjaamda.
41001005	Ungta Judia paam mkheng thungki ungta Jerusalem thungki rek mmaan avah mma' hinni va lamda. Ungta mmaan mkheng inni mupnu arve rekin ava' mthethut chaakin dilli, mma ngi mmaan avah Jordon kreng thung ngi dii pluwt chlamda.
41001006	'Tunnu Johon nah uwtmul dona nada ungta morkowl thah saavun arkowlke pkehda ungta khausor rekle' nowm pkhuidii chada.
41001007	Ungta mma ngi hanto ngi, parjaam chda: “Nei kdil thah karvang meek Khat avah nei kihin nih mruh ktangset, neiya kuwnda ungta Mma' khuhkokrii kperthlet rah mtik kcha pmaang.
41001008	Dakat tih neivah naan avah diisik daat tih dii adokupluw chaakin, pdainu Mma ngi naan avah Pthla Kchiir rih dii akupluwt chraan.”
41001009	Mpha ava' thung ngi hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Jisu a Galily paamkuwl ki Najareth khuw thung ngi thlengda ungta Johon nih Jordon kreng thung ngi diipluwt chda.
41001010	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih, Mma ngi dii thungki murhunkal daat le' Mma ngi parvaan rek kparvang deida ungta Mma' 'leenni Pthla avah uqhu heppi arjung kqum deida.
41001011	Audilli parvaan ki krowl khat arjuda: “Nang nga Nei kvonsat low chaak Kchapa ptih, Nang athung ngi Neiya kdung ngi kuplung kngam kcha' a,” dida.
41001012	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Pthla ava ngi Mma' avah paamkbiik lai thah qhidokda.
41001013	Ungta Mma' avah paamkbiik laiyi nii somplii thung ngi Seitan dopthleem mih am chda. Ungta Mma' avah nowmsaa rektu' amsap lamda ungta vaantamsi rekki Mma' avah soplow chlamda.
41001014	'Tunnu Johon avah rowng thuh mdaal dokin dilli Jisu a Galily paamkuwl thung ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki kqhapaumin kparjaam mih thlengda.
41001015	Ungta hanto'theda: “Mpha avah kvei kcha' a. Ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah knaitek kcha' a. Plung aperthleng chaan ungta kqhapaumin avah lam'arin chaan,” dida.
41001016	Ungta Mma ngi Galily truwnpii biing ngi mehei thung ngi Mma ngi Simon le' mnaupa Andria avah truwnpii thung ngi leen kdeeng meek dei khot lamda mleiya mmaanve a tuwlvah kse mii reklam.
41001017	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Nei mheiqowiyin, ungta Neiyi mii kokyowng rek ayupthuh inni,” dida.
41001018	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mmaanve ngi mleen rekin avah mapthi lam thida Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
41001019	Mma ngi ava' thung ki mruk klaset tih mehei thungta Jebedi chapa James le' mnaupa Johon avah Mma ngi dei lamda. Mmaanve ava' rukka arkuwng thung ngi mleenin tphut lamda ka'am daat lam.
41001020	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Mma ngi mo'own daat lam le' mmaanve ngi m'paan Jebedi avah ardaman suwk rektu' arkuwng thuh mapthi lamda ungta Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
41001021	Audilli mmaan nih Kapernaum thah chet lamda ungta m'tunkat daat tih Tkarngatnit tih Mma ngi Sinegog thuh luwtda ungta purchuk lamda.
41001022	Ungta mmaan nah Mma' dopurchuhna' 'leenni ngakyou chlamda tidit tah Mma ngi mpurchuh lam thung ngi nowlam chukpu rek hep daat kmah ngi ruhtan kpukat heppi purchuk lamda.
41001023	'Tunnu mmaan ki sinegog ava' thung ngi tarnam ktobor khat doqhi miikhat amda ungta mma ngi owngda,
41001024	Hanto ngi theda: “Neenna mthong chmaan, Najareth ki Jisu, neen nih Nang tu' talu kdotlot raan ka'am plih? Nang nga neen mke'ekrep raanni kthleng ptimowi? Isowr hinki Kchiir Khat Nang, neiyi Nang nga kuw ptih tidit akdeh.”
41001025	Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto'theda, raida: “Rimkdi i'am ungta mma' thungki arvang thuwkdok.”
41001026	Ungta tarnam ktobor ava ngi mma' avah arngol tperveda ungta krowl kparthaang ngi owng thida mma' thungki arvang thuwk chda.
41001027	Audilli mmaan nah, mkheng inni kdung ngi ngak chlamda, mthungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' the lamda, kerkheel chlamda: “Havah talulu daat toh? Havah taluhep kduh ki tpurchuhna' ren khat daat toh? Tidit tah Mma ngi, ruhtanna' ava ngi tarnam ktobor rek kpha rukka paupiik pii lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma' dothe avah pqowi chlamda.”
41001028	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Mma' laarneena' avah Galily kpervel lih ka'am paamklek mkheng thung ngi koryouda.
41001029	'Tunnu mmaan nih sinegog thungki marvan thuh daatin le' Simon le' Andria inn thung ngi mmaan nih James le' Johon le' tu' luwtsap lamda.
41001030	Ungta Simon ktarnu avah riiphaak kperveda, kkowiyi iip daatda ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni mma' lei avah m'tunkat daat tih song lamda.
41001031	Mthungta Mma ngi arvangda mma' avah mkhut thah kyowngda ungta tipripda ungta m'tunkat daat tih riiphaak ava ngi mma' avah mapthida. Ungta mma ngi kerdelda mmaan avah soplow chlamda.
41001032	'Tunnu kluh thah kni mtlaak dok thungta mmaan nih kkowi rek mkheng ungta ram kervei rek mkheng avah Mma' paphaak lamda.
41001033	Ungta khuwpii thungki mii mkheng avah thurngut bulli kurtuwl lamda.
41001034	Audilli Mma ngi mdetmdet ki omlaiyi kkowi rek knempok avah pdam lamda ungta tarnam ruk knempok ki reipthida ungta Mma ngi tarnam rek avah mpau raan rotpiik lam mda mleiya mmaan nih Mma' avah mdodeh dokin.
41001035	'Tunnu jiingsun nih khu mvaar duh ngi, kparma ngi Jisu a kerdelda, Mma ngi vangthuwkda mmun kekneeng khat thung ngi chetda ungta Mma ngi ava' thuh rinktham chda.
41001036	Ungta Simon le' Mma' tu' kilqhi rek mmaan ava ngi Mma' avah thlaam lamda.
41001037	Mmaan nih Mma' mdeh khotin thungta Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Mii khimkheiyi Nang adokthlaamin,” dilamda.
41001038	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Leen, Neiyi avale' thung rukku kdoparjaamna' rah neheihinin ki khuwklin rek thah neenna ichetin cheh. Mleiya hava' lei kat tih Neiya kthuwk dok ping.”
41001039	Ungta Mma ngi Galily paamkuwl mkheng thung ngi kirkhil lih mmaan ki sinegog rek thung ngi parjaamda ungta tarnam rek avah reipthida.
41001040	Audilli Mma' hinni raichi ktong miikhat thlengda ungta Mma' hinni kdung ngi ktham chda, Mma' hinni mupkhup pih tirdiil chda ungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi abin bih, neiya Nang ngi adotpertleu pchaan,” dida.
41001041	Ungta Jisu ngi plung mdopkham chaak ki, Mma ngi mkhut heikhiingda mma' avah kmeida ungta mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Ou Neiyi kbinna, ikertleu cha',” dida.
41001042	Mma ngi ava' mthe dok daat le' m'tunkat daat tih raichi ava ngi mma' avah mapthida ungta mmah kertleu chda.
41001043	Ungta Mma ngi kdung ngi pilqhit thida mma' avah m'tunkat daat tih psun pthida.
41001044	Ungta Mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Asuw, nang ngi kuwkhat leh hinni havah the nimtih, pdainu isun rang ngi thimpu hinni ikterdet cha'. Ungta mmaan hinni rinpaumin khat kurthuwk ki nang ngi akertleu chaak leiyi, Moses tih paupiik mdopiik dok dow rek avah aparlaan cha',” dida.
41001045	Pdainu mma ngi vangthuwkda ungta chang karngam mih purphuwngda ungta pau avah parjaam chda. Mthungta ava ngi Jisu a khuwpii ava' thung ngi kurphuwng ngi luwt porson pchaang mda. Pdainu Mma ngi duwn thah, miiphaakma mun rek thung ngi am chda. Anto'daat yoso, mmaan nih Mma' hinni mmun ktai thungki thuwk kurbuk lamda.
41002001	Ungta veikhat Mma ngi nit mruk dilli Kapernaum khuwpii thuh luwtda ungta Mma' avah inn ava' thuh ka'am tidit dei lamda.
41002002	M'tunkat daat tih mii knempok mkurtuwl inni, inn ava' thung ngi mmaan tupluwna' rah mmun avah thurngutbul kphadek thung ngi ammda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni pau parjaam chda.
41002003	Audilli mmaan nih kyengrii ktong miikhat avah miilai plii ngi kdom lamda Mma' hinni paphaak lamda.
41002004	Ungta mmaan nih miipii rek leiyi, Mma' hinni naiqhi pchaang lam mda, mthungta mmaan nih Mma' amna' inntun avah khokpthi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mupkui dokin dilli, kyengrii ktong iina' kowm avah mdak tu' arjukptla lamda.
41002005	Jisu ngi mmaan lamrin ava' mdeh thungta, Mma ngi kyengrii ktong mii ava' hinni, “Kchapa, apnu rek avah atoptlot piik dok a,” dida.
41002006	Pdainu nowlam chukpu rek aangqhe avah ava' thung ngi ko'ong lamda ungta muplungril inni mninglei avah thlaam lamda.
41002007	Mleiya,” taluleiyi hava' mii ava' vah hanto ngi pthitda kpau daat toh, pnu koptlot piik pchaang nga Isowr daat pemeh mow?” dilamda.
41002008	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Jisu ngi, mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto ngi mninglei mthlaam inna tidit deithida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naan nih aplungrilin thung ngi mlei athlaam inna?
41002009	Atheen, kyengrii ktong kcha' mii ava' hinni: ‘Apnu rek avah atoptlot piik dok a, tidit mow, mditmata Ikerdel, a'iina' akdom rang ngi ichet, tidit avah tva ngi ko'ol betta?’
41002010	Pdainu naan nih dultipaam thung ngi Mii Chapa ava ngi pnu rek toptlot piikna' ki ruhtan mthlowi tidit adodeh chaakna' raanni,” Mma ngi kyengrii ktong ava' hinni hanto'theda:
41002011	“Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, Ikerdel rang ngi a'iina' achom rah ungta a'inn thah ikorlou rah isun cha',” dida.
41002012	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma ngi ripda mi'iina' chomda ungta mmaan mkheng dodeh ngi vangthuwkda. Mthungta mmaan mkhengin avah ngakyou chlamda ungta Isowr ponlor chlamda hanto ngi the lamda: “Neen nih teden rukku hava' hep avah tedeh mlaiyin,” dilamda.
41002013	Audilli Mma ngi veikhat truwn biing thah vada ungta miipii rek mkheng avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah purchuk lamda.
41002014	Ungta Mma ngi anto ngi mehei thungta Alphius chapa Levi avah sum tqhaina'inn thung ngi kok'ong daat deida ungta Mma ngi mhin nih: “Nei mheiqowi,” dida. Ungta mma ngi ripda Mma'dil qowi chda.
41002015	'Tunnu Mma ngi Levi inn thuh mmaal arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rek knempok rukka Jisu le' Msikhu rektu' kmaalsap lam, tidit tah Mma' dilkqowi rek avah mii knempok lam.
41002016	Ungta nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki, Mma ngi sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rektu' mmaalsapin mdehn thungta mmaan nih Msikhu rek hinni hanto' the lamda: “Taluhep pih Mma ngi sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rektu' chasap neesapda ka'am mow?” dilamda.
41002017	Jisu ngi ava' marjaak thungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mruh ktang ngi ka'am rekki thenvah riipu a msit ka'am pemeh, pdainu kkowi rekki thennu msit ka'am. Neiya mrinkindit ko'own rah kurjung pmaang pdainu plung tperthlenna' thuh pnu kervei rek ko'own chrah kurjung ping,” dida.
41002018	Ungta Johon le' Pharisy rekki tamsi rekvah then ngowl kchok lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni thleng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi Johon le' Pharisy rekki tamsi rekvah then ngowl kchok lamda pdainu Nang asikhu rekvah then mdongowlin pemeh o?”
41002019	Mthungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kmoukpu ava ngi mmaan tu' ma'am daat arlaan nih, Kmoukpu plap rek avah then mdongowlin krow rang mow? Mmaan hinni kmoukpu ma'am daat khimkhei thung ngu mmaan nih then ngowl pchaang lam nimeh.
41002020	Pdainu kmoukpu avah mmaan hinki mdolow pthina' mpha karvang rah ungta ava'dil row ngi, nit rek ava' thung ngi mmaan nih then kngowl row lamrah.
41002021	Kuwkhat leh ngi kkerqen mlai buwlaak avah buwpli 'leenni lot kchok meh, mditma bih, buwlaak ren ava ngi buwpli avah kekqetpom rah ungta mkilqit avah mmeel mdopthitset.
41002022	Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi thowldii ren avah saavun thowldiibeel pli thung ngi daal kchok meh. Mditma bih thowldii ren ava ngi saavun thowldiibeel avah kepqe rah, mdit bih thowldii avah kyaan chrah ungta saavun thowldiibeel avah kelqet chrah. Pdainu thowldii ren avah saavun thowldiibeel ren thung ngi tadaal rah.”
41002023	'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah tkarngatnit tih Mma ngi loulai rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chetda ungta mmaan nih anto ngi meheiyin thungta Msikhu rek ava ngi cha paar avah tyau pqhun lamda.
41002024	Ungta Pharisy rekki Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Asuw o, taluleiyi mmaan nih nowlam mih tkarngatnit tih totlot krow kma' avah mdotlot inno?”
41002025	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih David tih mikriin thuh ungta mpowi mtham thung ngi, mma' daat kma' mma' tu' kilqhi rektu' talu mtlot, tidit avah parcham vot maan timow?
41002026	Mleiya mma ngi taluhep pih thimpu kenreel Abiather amthung ngi Isowr inn thuh luwtda, nowlam mih thimpu rek kma'don nih tchaak krow kma' tetdet thenpen avah mdochaak ko, ungta aangqhe avah mma' tu' kilqhi rek hin rukku mdopiik koh?”
41002027	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Tkarngatnit avah dultimii ki thenni mdoseem ungta mii avah Tkarngatnit ki thenni mdoseem pemeh.
41002028	Ava'leiyi Mii Chapa avah Tkarngatnit ki Kruwng rukka Mma'.”
41003001	Ungta Mma ngi sinegog thung ngi luwt nowlda ungta ava' thung ngi mkhut paang khat kqong kcha' miikhat ka'am.
41003002	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mdotepmenna' raan ki thenni, Mma ngi Tkarngatnit tih mma' avah pdam mow pdam nimeh tidit kmin nih sutpqowi lamda.
41003003	Audilli Mma ngi mkhut paang khat kqong kcha' mii ava' hinni theda: “Mningqim mih irip,” dida.
41003004	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto ngi theda: “Tkarngatnit tih nowlam dorot avah, kqha totlot mow, mditmata kthi totlotto', mmow rinkum tsan mow, te'eyow o,” dida? Pdainu mmaan nah rimkdi am chlamda.
41003005	Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan avah plungthit tih msutporloi lam dilli, muplung pchaiyin ava'leiyi muplungyat tih mii ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Akhut arhei arji,” dida. Ungta mma ngi mkhut avah arji chda ungta mkhut avah mpaang khat ki heppi pumqhat tapqhatpiik chda.
41003006	Audilli Pharisy rekki Herod mii rektu' Mma' kepteng ngi, Mma' avah taluhep pih tpenvei rang tidit leiyi, mdotepmenna' raan tlow lamda.
41003007	Pdainu Jisu ngi, Msikhu rektu' truwnpii thah kekneeng chlamda. Ungta Galily le' Judia paamkuwl ki miipiipa rekki Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
41003008	Mleiya Mma ngi dow knempok mdotlot marjaakin thungta, Judia ki Jerusalem ki, Idumia ki ungta Jordon raalpha ki ungta Tair le' Sidon ki miipii knempa rek avah Mma' hinni kthleng lam.
41003009	Ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni, miipiipa rek leiyi, arkuwng kdil khat avah Mma' thenni mdothiik daatna' raan perseel lamda. Mditma bih miipiipa rekki Mma' avah kperdel lamrah.
41003010	Mleiya Mma ngi mii knempok pdamda mthungta kdungksaan knempok rekki Mma' mdokmei chaakna' raan ki thenni mduh thah heikurduwlsom lamda.
41003011	Ungta tarnam ktobor rek ava ngi, mmaan nih Mma' mdodehnaan khimkhei thung ngi Mma' aang ngi tluw chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Nang nga Isowr Chapa ptih,” dilamda ko'owng kchok lam.
41003012	Pdainu Mma ngi, mmaan nih Mma' avah mdopandan dokmana' raan ki thenni kdung ngi mdopilqhit lam.
41003013	Ungta Mma ngi lown thah hangda ungta Mma ngi mdongei reklim avah Mma' hinni own chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni thleng lamda.
41003014	Audilli Mma ngi Mma' tu' ka'amsap rah ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah pau kparjaam rang ngi mdopthlat lam rang ki thenni Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rek avah kchol chlamda.
41003015	Ungta omlai rek tapdamna' ungta tarnam rek treipthina' ruhtan kthlowi chrang ki thenni, sowm lei'knii rek avah kthlang chlamda.
41003016	Mmaan avah, Mma ngi Pitar tidit miing mdopiik Simon,
41003017	Ungta Mma ngi Boarnege dida mdophuwk, tidit tah pqeek hep daat mii mdoditna', Jebedi chapa rek James le' mnaupa Johon,
41003018	Andria, Philip, Bartholomio, Metthiu, Thomas, Alphius chapa James, Thadias, Jealot mdoditin Simon,
41003019	Ungta Mma' ruk Kerioth ki Judas le'lim lam. Ungta mmaan nih inn khat thuh luwt lamda.
41003020	Ungta miipiipa rek avah ava' thuh kurtuwl nowl lamda mthungta mmaan nah tmaal kpha ruk maal pchaang lam mda.
41003021	Pdainu Mma' mi'innkhor rekkat tih ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nih, ‘Mma' avah muplung karmak kcha' a,’ mdoditin leiyi, Mma' kokyowng rah chet lamda
41003022	Ungta Jerusalem ki kurju nowlam chukpu rek ava ngi hanto' the lamda: “Mma ngi Beeljibub mthlowi a, ungta tarnampii ava' ar'aang ngi tarnam rek avah mdorei pthi,” dilamda.
41003023	Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan avah Mhin nih own lam thida, mmaan hinni pauportol rekki hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih Seitan nih Seitan avah kreipthi rang?
41003024	Kruwngpaalna' khat ava ngi mthina mkurkhui chaak kuh taluhep pih ava' kruwngpaalna' avah krip pchaang rang.
41003025	Ungta inn khat ava ngi mthina mkurkhui chaak kuh taluhep pih ava' inn avah krip pchaang rang.
41003026	Ungta Seitan nih mthina ngi mkilrisan chaak bih ungta mkurkhui chaak bih, mmah rip pchaang nimeh.
41003027	Mleiya mma ngi mruh ktang miikhat avah choduhrep pih mdobowl pthijap kma'don nih, kuwkhat leh ngi mruh ktang miikhat inn thuh luwtda mdomna avah alrowt pchaang nimeh. Ungta ava' dilrow ngi mma ngi mma' inn avah kolrowt chrow rah.
41003028	Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah dultimii rekki pnu arve rek mkheng ungta mmaan nih talutalu yoso pthitda mpaunaan mkheng avah koptlotpiik rah.
41003029	Pdainu talutalu yoso Pthla Kchiir kepteng ngi pthitda kpau mma' avah toptlot piikna' m'lam amliit meh pdainu avah ktlangknai kma' tupsulna' thung ngi ktla chrang ngi ka'am kcha' a.”
41003030	Mleiya havah mmaan nih: “Mma ngi tarnam ktobor mthlowi a,” mdoditin lei.
41003031	Audilli Mnaupa rekle' Mnuh avah arva lamda ungta duwn thah ripdaat lam thida Mma' ko'own rah heipthla lamda.
41003032	Ungta miipiipa khat avah Mma' ktukhul lih ka'am daat lam ungta mmaan ava ngi Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Asuw o, anuh le' anaupa rekka Nang akthlaam mih duwn thah krip daat lam a,” dilamda.
41003033	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan karthaang ngi hanto ngi theda: “Kuw le'da knuh le' ku'uknau rekka?”
41003034	Ungta Mma ngi Mma' kloiyi kok'ong rek avah sutporloijik lam thida hanto'theda: “Knuh le' knaupa rek avah hava'le'!
41003035	Mleiya kuwku yoso, Isowr plungbin ktlow kcha' rek mmaan avah Nei ku'uknau ungta kcharkyur ungta knuh,” dida.
41004001	Ungta Mma ngi veikhat truwnpii biing ngi tpurchuh pqhun nowlda ungta miipii knempa rek avah Mma' hinni kurtuwl chlamda mthungta Mma ngi arkuwng khat thuh kalda ungta truwnpii thung ngi ko'ongda ungta miipiipa rek mkheng avah truwnpii ktarngatsap pih laan thah rip lamda.
41004002	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan avah dow knempok 'leenni pauportol lih purchuk lamda ungta Mma ngi mdopurchuh lamna' ava' thung ngi hanto ngi theda:
41004003	“Arjaan, ungta asuwn! Chiimuw kapqau miikhat tih chii kapqau chrah chetda.
41004004	Ungta hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah anto ngi mma ngi chii mapqau thungta chiimuw aangqhe avah 'lamsiir rih tlada ungta parvaan ki pva rekki thuwk lamda avah chom dok chlamda.
41004005	Chiimuw aangqhe rek avah duldak knem mih ka'am kma', dulchelre thung ngi tlada. Ungta avah dul kder pda m'tunkat daat tih arhanmowng tengda.
41004006	Pdainu kni tangda msat thungta chiibul rek avah murjungin mtlumma leiyi, qong chlamda.
41004007	Ungta chiimuw aangqhe a tirling arlak ki tlada ungta tirling ava ngi linda ungta ava ngi kchipkrepda ungta avah chei pchaang mda.
41004008	Pdainu chiimuw morson avah duldak thung ngi tlada ungta avah pqhangda nemthangda mchei mpaar pthuwkda. Aangqhe ngi tum somkdum ungta aangqhe ngi somtruk ungta aangqhe ngi arja khat pthuwk chlamda.”
41004009	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Maknapum mma' ava ngi arja chdeiso.”
41004010	Pdainu Mma ngi mthina ngi ma'am arlaan nih sowm lei'knii rektu' Mma' hinni ka'am rekki pauportol ava' ki mlei avah kheel chlamda.
41004011	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan ahinnu havah Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki paukordowl ava' tedeh pinditna ngi mdopiik pdainu duwn thah ka'am rek hinvah hava' dow mkheng avah pauportolna' rekki kthuwk kcha'.
41004012	Mleiya, ‘Mmaan nih mmikin nih mdeh chunin nih mdodeh dakdakmana' raan, Marjaak chunin nih mdo'arjaak pinditmana' raan, Mditma bih mmaan nih kerheel chlamdon, Ungta mupnu arve rekin avah mmaan hinni toptlot piik thutdok rah.” (Is. 6:9-10)
41004013	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih hava' pauportol mkheng rek avah deipindih maan timow?
41004014	Chii kapqau ava ngi Pauna ava' mdopqau.
41004015	Ungta hava'le' ava ngi 'lamsiir rih tapqau pauna rek ava'. Mleiya mmaan nih muplungril rekin thung ngi tapqau pauna avah marjaak daatin le' m'tunkat daat tih Seitan thuwkda mdolow pthidok.
41004016	Hava' hep daat rek avah dulchelre thung ngi tapqau rek ava'. Mmaan avah, pauna avah marjaak daat le' m'tunkat daat tih kanpa ngi karlaang kcha' rek ava'.
41004017	Ungta mmaan avah mthung inni murjung knet tih ka'am pemeh ungta ava'leiyi mpha mruk ki then daat tih kchet. Ungta ava' dilli pauna ava'leiyi kdung ngi tyatna' mditmata suwkthuh chiireelna' marvan cheu m'tunkat daat tih mmaan nih khuhsiir mdopirthit chaakin.
41004018	'Tunnu hava'le' avah tirling arlak ki tapqau rek ava', mmaan avah kqhapaumin rek ava'.
41004019	Pdainu hava' dultipaam ki tkilrin chaakna' dow rek, mlangkma' alrou tngeina' ungta dow morson morson tngeina' ava ngi pauna avah kchoukrepda ungta mchei tepchei mda.
41004020	Pdainu 'tunnu hava'le' avah duldak thung ngi tapqau rek ava', tidit tah pauna ava' karja kcha' rek ava ngi avah arlaang chlamda ungta chei chlamda, aangqhe ngi tum somkdum, aangqhe ngi somtruk ungta aangqhe ngi arja khat chei chlamda.”
41004021	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih meila avah tomkal lih tkhumpthi rah mditmata kowm tii ngi tithiikpthi rang ngi ado'arvansinin mow? Meila avah meilakuwng 'leenni teplen rang ki pemeh mow?
41004022	Mleiya kandang kmah ngi todowl pthi tlit tih ka'am rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh mditmata todowl pthidok ki ka'am kcha' dow khatleh ka'am pemeh, pdainu mar'aang thung ngi avah kandang rah.
41004023	Maknapum mma' ava ngi havah arja chdeiso.”
41004024	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih ado'arjaakin ava' thuh ikilrin chaan. Nang ngi adopertetna' kat ava ngi ahin nih akpertet piik purlup rah ungta karja kcha' mma' hinni morson rukka kpiikpom rah.
41004025	‘Mleiya kthlowi kcha' mma' hinni morson rukka kpiikpom rah pdainu kthlowi kma' mma' hinki avah mma ngi mdothlowi chaak ksa kpha ruk kloupthi rah.”
41004026	Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah miikhat tih dulti thuh chiimuw mdopqau ava' hep daat.
41004027	Ungta mmah jaanvah iip chda, khuvaar rih kerdelda ungta chiimuw ava ngi pkheuda mowngda pdainu mma' mdak vah, taluhep pih kmowng tidit avah mdodeh pemeh.
41004028	Mleiya dulti ava ngi chapaar avah mdopermet chaak. Mkhatna' thung ngi chakau audilli chapaar audilli mchakau 'leenni chapaar dakdak avah mdopermet chaak.
41004029	Ungta chapaar ava ngi mmincheu, mma ngi m'tunkat daat tih tangkep mdoptlaak mleiya tkunpha avah kvei kcha'.”
41004030	Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah talu tu' tportol raan? Mditmata talu tikjitpthla ngi havah tetdet raan?
41004031	Mleiya dulti thuh napqau thung ngu dultipaam thungki chiimuw rek mkheng arlak ki kdilsi anruwng muw ava' hep daat.
41004032	Pdainu napqau dok cheu mowngda ungta anthithowlnu mkheng rek arlak ki klinsi ungta ava ngi mbaak rek varda ungta parvaanlai ki pva rekki ava' arlim tingi mthlat chaakin krow.”
41004033	Ungta Mma ngi hanto' hep daat pauportol knempok avah mmaan nih mdodeh pindit inya ngi mmaan hinni thepiik lamda.
41004034	Pdainu Mma ngi pauportol lih mdothe kma'don mmaan hinni dow khatleh the meh. Ungta mmaan nih mthinaan nih ma'amin thung ngi Mma ngi dow mkheng avah Msikhu rek hinni thepindit piik lamda.
41004035	Nit ava'kat thung ngi kluhpha mve thungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Leen, raalpha khat thah heiklaan inche,” dida.
41004036	'Tunnu mmaan nih miipiipa rek ava' mmaak pthi dokin thungta mmaan nih anto ngi ma'am daatjapna' arkuwng ava' thung ngi Mma' avah vanqhi lamda. Ungta Mma' tu' kilqhi ngi arkuwng kdil morson rek rukka ka'am daat lam.
41004037	Ungta 'tunnu tchangkhu kdungyou kcha' khat raangda ungta diinuk rek ava ngi arkuwng avah deengda mthungta mthung ngi dii kdim mih luwt chda.
41004038	Pdainu Mmah arkuwng armei ktong ki mirkilli luwkam detda ki'iip chdaat. Mthungta mmaan nih Mma' avah perdel lamda ungta Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu, neen tkenvei raan avah tuksut mtimow?”
41004039	Audilli Mma ngi kerdelda ungta tirthli avah raida ungta truwnpii ava' hinni, “Idaidok, rimkdi i'am,” dida. Ungta tirthli avah raang mda ungta ava' thung ngi kdung ngi kdairimsi khat am chda.
41004040	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi aninginkqi a? Taluhepluwda havah, alamrinin ka'am kma' daat mow?”
41004041	Ungta mmaan nah kdung ngi mningin qida ungta mmaan nih khat le' khat hinni hanto ngi kerthe lamda: “Hava' tirthli le' truwnpii kpha rukku mpauthe mdopqowi Mma' havah kuw rang ngoh” kirdi lamda?
41005001	Audilli mmaan nih truwnpii raalpha khat ki Gadara mii rek khuwpaam thah arvang lamda.
41005002	Ungta Mma ngi arkuwng thungki marvan thuh daat le' m'tunkat daat tih tarnam ktobor doqhi miikhat tih Mma' avah kurdut qhida.
41005003	Mma' avah thlaan rek thung ngi ka'am kcha' ungta mma' avah kuwkhat tih mdobowl pchaan pemeh, thiirrii rek kpha ngi mdobowl pchaan pemeh.
41005004	Mleiya mma' avah mkhuh le' mkhut thah khuhke le' thiirrii ngi mdoporkol tlit kchown pdainu thiirrii rek avah kpotda ungta thiir rek avah mthum thum mih mdokrum pthi kchow, mditmata kuwkhat leh ngi mdopthlai pchaan pemeh.
41005005	Ungta mpha ktaiyi suwn le' jaan nih lown rekle' thlaan rek thung ngi am chda, owng pervelda ungta lung ngi mthina kpirlim kcha' kchoklu.
41005006	Pdainu mma ngi Jisu avah lamkla ngi mheideh daat le' heichenda ungta Mma' avah luwbu chda.
41005007	Ungta mma ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Kparthaangsi Isowr Chapa, Jisu, Nang tu' neiyi talu kdotlot rah ka'am pli? Neiyi, adoto'owr rah, Isowr miing ngi Ahin nih akupnuwm chaak a.”
41005008	Mleiya Mma ngi mma' hinni: “tarnam ktobor nang, mii ava' thung ki arvang thuwk dok,” mdodit.
41005009	Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda kheelda: “Amiing nga taluda?” Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda arthaangda: “Nei kmiing nga Legion, mleiya neenna knempok inping,” dida.
41005010	Ungta mma ngi Mma' hinni plung kurthlut dok ki, Mma ngi mmaan avah khuwpaam ava' thung ki mdorei pthi mana' raan ktham chlamda.
41005011	'Tunnu mmun ava' thung ngi vakluwng rekpa avah lownjaar rih kmaal pok daat lam.
41005012	Ungta tarnam rek mkheng ava ngi Mma' hinni: “Neen nih vak rek thung ngi kluw chaakna' raanni, neenna mmaan hinni mheipthla chaan,” dilamda, ktham chlamda.
41005013	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Jisu ngi mmaan avah rotpiik lamda. Audilli tarnam ktobor rek ava ngi arvang thuwk lamda ungta vakluwng, pun 'knii arveel rek thung ngi luwt chlamda. Mthungta vakluwng rek avah ram kerveiter rih truwnpii khamkuwk thah jukchen ter chlamda ungta truwnpii thuh dii porlowter chlamda.
41005014	'Tunnu mmaan kapmaal rek avah chen chlamda ungta mmaan nih kthuwk avah khuwpii thuh ungta khuwpaam rek thung ngi vansong lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kthuwk dow ava' ksuw rang ngi chet lamda.
41005015	Audilli mmaan nih Jisu hinni thleng lamda ungta mmaan nih choduh ngi ram kervei ungta legion kthlowi mii ava ngi dona nada plung kindit tih mko'on daat ava' dei lamda ungta mmaan nah ava ngi mningin qi chda.
41005016	Ungta ava' kdei rek mmaan ava ngi choduh ram kervei mii ava' hinni talu kthuwk ungta vakluwng rek hinni talu kthuwk tidit avah mmaan hinni thepiik lamda.
41005017	Audilli mmaan nih, Mma ngi mmaan paamklek ava' thung ki mkorlow dokna' rah pnuwm chlamda.
41005018	Ungta Mma ngi korlouda arkuwng 'leenni mkal thungta choduh ram kervei mma' ava ngi, mma' rukku Mma' tu' mkilqhina' rah Mma' hinni ktham chda.
41005019	Anto'daat yoso Jisu ngi avah rotpiik mda pdainu mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi Kruwng ngi athenni dow klin adototlot piik ava'leiyi ungta Mma ngi taluhep pih nang a'leen nih plung adotapkham chaak tidit leiyi, a'inn thah aplap rek hinni vang rang ngi avah vanson piiklam,” dida.
41005020	Ungta mma ngi anto' korlouda ungta Dekapolis thung ngi Jisu ngi mma' thenni mdotlot piik mkheng avah tparjaam pqhunda ungta ava' karja kcha' mii mkheng avah ngak chlamda.
41005021	'Tunnu Jisu ngi arkuwng 'leenni raalpha khat thah mheiklaan nowl thungta miipiipa rek avah Mma' hinni kurtuwl chlamda ungta Mmah truwnpii thung ngi ka'am chdaat.
41005022	Ungta asuwn, Jairas tidit sinegog kpupa rek arlak ki khat ava' thlengda ungta mma ngi Mma' mdeh thungta Mma' khuhther rih tluw chda.
41005023	Ungta mma ngi Mma' hinni plung kurthlut tih hanto'theda: “Kchanu 'suwn avah kdiyou rah kthe ngi kowida ki'iip chdaat. Arvalap rang ngi akhut avah mdam chaakna' rang ki thenni m'leen nih mheikhiin piikcha',” dida.
41005024	Mthungta Jisu ngi mma' tu' vangkilqhi lamda. Ungta miipiipa rekki Mma' avah mdilqowi lamda ungta mii mnemreen inni Mma' avah per'del lamda.
41005025	'Tunnu ava' thung ngi kum sowm lei'knii thung ngi hii ngi kyaan kcha' snu khat avah marlak inni amda.
41005026	Ungta mma' avah dow knempok 'leenni riipu knempok rek hinni suwk kthuwk kcha'. Mma ngi mdothlowi chaak dow mkheng avah ava'leen nih mdoptlan chaak dok pdainu kqhathang kmah ngi kowithang setsetda.
41005027	Mma ngi Jisu ki mlei marjaak thungta miipii arlak ki, mdilpang ktong thah phada mdona avah kmei chda.
41005028	Mleiya mma ngi, “Neiyi mdona chreldaat yoso kthown chaak daat bih, dam chnikdi',” mdodit chaak.
41005029	Mthungta m'tunkat daat tih mihii kyaan avah kankhaam chda ungta mma ngi mdaksa thung ngi mdun msaanna' thungki mdam chaak avah karja chda.
41005030	Ungta Jisu ngi ava'kat thung ngi Mma' thungki ruhtan mche chaak dok avah mdak ki kerdei chthida, miipiipa rek arlak ki kerheelda sutporloijik lam thida hanto'theda: “Kuwda kdokna kekmeiya,” dida?
41005031	Pdainu Msikhu rekki Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi miipiipa rekki adotper'del lam avah deidaat tinu ungta Nangvah ‘kuwda mokthong nga,’ adodit tah,” dilamda?
41005032	Pdainu Mma ngi ava' ktlow snunau ava' mdosut thlaam mih mmaan avah sutporloi lamda.
41005033	Mthungta snu ava ngi, mma' thung ngi talu kthuwk a tidit mdodeh chaak leiyi, mma ngi mningqit le' mkunchuwn tu' korthlop pih thuwkda, Mma' khuhther rih tluw chda ungta Mma' hinni mkindit mkheng avah thethuh chda.
41005034	Ungta Mma ngi snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Kchanu, alamrin nih atapdam chaak dok a. Nang nga plung kdaiyi isun cha' ungta adun asaanna' thungki idam cha',” dida.
41005035	Anto ngi Mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih sinegog rek kpupa ava' inn ki karhang mii aangqhe rek thleng khot lamda ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Achanu a kdiyou dok kcha' a, taluleiyi Chukpu a pyat porson nadi o” dilamda?
41005036	Ungta Jisu ngi mdotheen pau ava' marjaak daat le', Mma ngi sinegog kpupa ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Aning pqitma', lam arincha' hehe daat,” dida.
41005037	Ungta Mma ngi Pitar, James ungta James tu' unau kthuwk Johon kma'don morson rek ava ngi mdil mdoqowi raan avah rotpiik lam mda.
41005038	Audilli Mma ngi sinegog kpupa ava' inn thah mthlen thungta Mma ngi vaangklum you kcha' khat ungta kdung ngi kqap le' archam klou rek mmaan ka'am daat avah kurdutqhi lamda.
41005039	Mma ngi marvanluw thung ngi Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi hanto ngi vaangklum dok ki kqap inptih, nau havah kdiyou pemeh ki'iip chngaal,” dida.
41005040	Mthungta mmaan nih Mma' avah ningqhuwm mih pni chaak lamda. Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan mkhengin avah duwn thah mupthuh pthidok lam dilli, nau ava' nuh le' mpa ungta Mma' tu' kilqhi rek ava' qhida nau ava' iina' thung ngi vangluwt lamda.
41005041	Audilli Mma ngi nau avah mkhut thah kyowng thida hanto'theda: “Talitha kumi,” dida, tidit tah Snunau, Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, ikerdel, mdoditna'.
41005042	Mthungta m'tunkat daat tih snunau avah kerdelda ungta chetda mleiya snunau avah kum sowm lei'knii mdophaak dok. Ungta mmaan mkhengin avah ngakyou chlamda.
41005043	Pdainu Mma ngi kuwkhat hinni mdopdeh mana' raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda ungta snunau ava' hinni mdochaak rah then mruk mdopiikna' raan thepiik lamda.
41006001	Audilli Mma ngi mmun ava' thung ki sunda ungta Mma' mdak khuwpaam thung ngi arvangda ungta Msikhu rekki Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
41006002	Ungta tkarngatnit marvan phaak thungta Mma ngi sinegog thung ngi tpurchuh pqhunda. Ungta Mma' dothe karja kcha' mii knempok rekki mngajow chaak inni hanto' the lamda. “Hava' mii ava ngi hava' dow rek avah toki mdophanno? Ungta Mma' hinni mdopiik luwkinritna' avah talu daat toh. Mleiya hanto'hep daat ruhtannong rek avah Mma' khut thung ngi mdoptlot daat a.
41006003	Ungta havah ding dimklou, ungta Mary Chapa ungta James le' Joses le' Judah ungta Simon le' upa ava' pemeh mow? Ungta mcharnu rek, hava' thuh neen tu' ka'amsap rek ava' pemeh mow” dilamda? Ungta mmaan avah Mma' leiyi, muplungin kparkhaan chlamda.
41006004	Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Khulpu khat avah mma' mdakkat ki khuwpaam thuh, mma' mdakkat ki mri mlam rek ungta mma' mdakkat inn thung kma'don nih takyat chaak mana' ka'am pemeh,” dida.
41006005	'Tunnu kkowi mii rek mruk avale' 'leenni Mma ngi mkhut khiingda mdopdam chaak lam kma'don nih, Mma ngi ava' thung ngu ruhtannong rek avah chmeh.
41006006	Ungta mmaan lamrinma leiyi, Mmah ngak chda.
41006007	Ungta Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rek avah own lamda ungta 'kniinii ngi tapthlat pqhun lamda ungta mmaan hinni tarnam ktobor rek 'leenni ruhtan pii lamda.
41006008	Mma ngi mmaan nih mipjiinin thung ngi kchungqhun kma'don dow khatleh mdohor mana' raan paupiik pii lamda. Mleiya thongya, thenpen ungta msumbuwr rekin thung ngi sum mdohor raan pemeh.
41006009	Pdainu kholkhaang mdonaak raan ungta phriktluwn 'knii mdonaak raan pemeh.
41006010	Mma ngi mmaan hinni hava' rukka theda: “Naan nih talutalu yoso aluwnaan inn khat ava' thung ngi, naan nih mmun ava' thung ki asunduhn khimkheiyi ava' thuh i'am daatin.
41006011	Ungta kuwku yoso naan akarlaang kcha' kmaan mditmata akarja kcha' kmaan mmaan avah, naan nih asunin thung ngi, mmaan thenni rinpaumin khat kurthuwk ki akhuhn 'leenki akhuh arbaatin avah akqhipsukin. Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, pau tpinditna' nit tu' khuwpii ava' hinvah Sodom le' Gomorah pleh ngi ko'olbet tih kdiil chlam rah.”
41006012	Mthungta mmaan nih chet lamda ungta mii rekki plung mdoperthlen chaak raan, tidit parjaam chlamda.
41006013	Ungta mmaan nih tarnam knempok reipthi lamda ungta kkowi rek knempok avah reidii pubul chlamda ungta pdam chlamda.
41006014	'Tunnu paamkruwng Herod tih Mma' dang avah arjada mleiya Mma' miing avah kdung ngi kontownda. Mthungta Herod tih hanto'theda: “Dii kupluwt Johon avah kdiyou thungki kring kerheel a, ava'leiyi hava' ruhtannong rek avah mma' thung ngi kthuwk.”
41006015	Pdainu morson rekvah hanto' the lamda: “Havah Elaijah” dilamda. Ungta aangqhe rekvah havah: “Khulpu ava' mditmata khulpu rek arlak ki khat,” dilamda.
41006016	Pdainu Herod tih ava' marjaak thungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Havah neiyi mluw kdoreen Johon ava', mma' avah kdiyou thungki kring kerheel,” dida.
41006017	Mleiya Herod mdakkat tih mma ngi mnaupa Philip snu Herodias ava' mdoko'onqhi leiyi, Johon avah mii pthlada kokyowng rah mdosi ungta bowlda rowng'inn thuh mdothiik.
41006018	Mleiya Johon nih Herod hinni hanto' mdothe: “Nang ngi a'uanau khat snu adoko'onqhi avah nowlam mih mdorot pemeh,” mdodit.
41006019	Ava'leiyi Herodias tih mma' avah mdohal chaak ungta mma ngi Johon avah te'eyow rah mdongei pdainu mdopchaan pemeh.
41006020	Mleiya Herod tih Johon avah mdoqit chaak tidit tah mma' avah mrinkindit ungta mii kchiir khat tidit mdodeh ungta mma ngi Johon avah parkhaalda mdothiik daat. Ungta Herod tih mma' pau marjaak thung ngi dow knempok mdotlot chaak ungta mma' avah kanpa ngi mdo'arjaak chaak kchow.
41006021	Audilli chang qhatna' nit khat arvangda tidit tah Herod tih mqouna' nit tih klin ksaang rek, nongmii klin rek ungta Galily paamkuwl thungki miikoprol rek ava' ki thenni tmaalna' khat porthlong chda.
41006022	Ungta Herodias chanu mdakkat thlengda ungta kardaamda. Herod le' mma' tu' kok'ong rek plung pngam chda. Mthungta paamkruwng ava ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Talutalu yoso adongei avah mheiqhil ungta neiyi avah apii nikdi',” dida.
41006023	Ungta mma ngi snunau ava' hinni paureeltham mih hanto'theda: “Talutalu yoso, nang ngi adotqhil avah neiyi, neiki kruwngpaalna' mqim kphadaat yoso apii nikdi',” dida.
41006024	Mthungta mma ngi vangthuwkda mnuh hinni: “talu qhil nikdih,” dida, kheelda? Ungta mnuh ngi: “Dii kupluwt Johon luw chai aqhil,” dida.
41006025	M'tunkat daat tih mma ngi, koknot tih, paamkruwng ava' hinni vangluwtda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi 'tunkat tih dii kupluwt Johon avah arkuwsin thung ngi adotpiik rah kngei a,” dida.
41006026	Mthungta paamkruwng avah kdung ngi kpursul chda, anto'daat yoso, mma ngi paureeltham leiyi, ungta mma' tu' kok'ongsap rek leiyi, mma ngi snunau doqhil avah mat pchaang mda.
41006027	Mthungta paamkruwng ava ngi m'tunkat daat tih khutksenpa ava' heipthlada mma' luw chai avah mdo'arvansinna' rah paupiik piida. Ungta mma ngi vangda Johon luw chai avah rowng'inn thung ngi reenda.
41006028	Ungta mma ngi Johon luw chai avah arkuwsin thung ngi arvansinda ungta snunau ava' hinni piida ungta snunau ava ngi mnuh hinni avah vanpiida.
41006029	Ungta Johon sikhu rekki ava' marjaakin thungta mma' kluwng avah lou chlamda ungta thlaan thung ngi pi'iip chlamda.
41006030	'Tunnu ava' dilli tamsi rekki Jisu hinni kurkuwk lamda ungta mmaan nih mdotlotin ungta mdopurchuh chaakin mkheng avah Mma' hinni song chlamda.
41006031	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan adak inni paamkbiik lai thah arvaan rang ngi ikarnga chaan,” dida. Mleiya mmun ava' thung ngi arvang kluwt le' vangkthuwk mii knempok ki ma'am leiyi mmaan nah tmaal kpha ruk mmaal chaakna' raan mpha ka'am pemeh.
41006032	Mthungta mmaan mthinaan nih, arkuwng 'leenni kal lamda paamkbiik mmun khat thah sun chlamda.
41006033	Pdainu miipiipa rekki mmaan msunin avah dei lamda ungta mii knempok ki Mma' avah mdodeh chaak dokin, mthungta mmaan nih khuwpii mkheng thungki thuwk lamda ava' thah mkhuhn nih heichen pqowi lamda. Ungta mmaan pleh ngi mmaan duh thah heitlung lamda ungta Mma' hinni kurbuk chlamda.
41006034	Ungta Jisu ngi marvan thuh thungta miipiipa rek ka'am daat avah deida ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah plung pkham chlamda mleiya mmaan avah kqhi chrah ktaak yau rek hep daat lam. Anto ngi Mma ngi mmaan hinni dow knempok tpurchuh pqhunda.
41006035	Ungta 'tunnu nit avah meknem mche dok thungta, Msikhu rekki Mma' hinni thleng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mun avah paamkbiik lai ungta mpha avah kokto kcha' a.
41006036	Miipiipa rek havah apsunpthi doklam, tidit tah mmaan nih ichet lamso mekpervel khuwpaam rekle' khuw rek thah mthen inni thenpen aren chlamso, tidit tah mmaan nah tchaak rah dow khatleh mdothlowi in pemeh,” dilamda.
41006037	Pdainu Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih mmaan hinni mdochaak raan dow mruk apii chaan.” Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih chetda mmaan thenni denarii arja 'knii ki thenpen renda mdochaak raan dow mrukka tpiik rang mow,” dilamda.
41006038	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanvah thenpen a tyakat athlowi inna? Vangin rang ngi asuwn,” dida. Ungta mmaan nih msutin dilli: “thenpen parnga le' tuwlvah 'knii ka'am a,” dilamda.
41006039	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni, mii rek avah loplop pih nowm 'leenni mkheng inni mdopko'onna' raan paupiik pii lamda.
41006040	Audilli mmaan nih kintiingjik ki arja khat ki ungta somparnga ki loplop pih ko'ong lamda.
41006041	Ungta Mma ngi thenpen parnga avale' tuwlvah 'knii rek ava' msin dilli Mma ngi parvaan hansuwda panpaak chda ungta thenpen rek avah khuida ungta miipii rek hinni mdodown piikna' raan nih, Msikhu rek hinni avah pii lamda ungta tuwlvah 'knii rek avah Mma ngi mmaan mkhengin hinni thempiik lamda.
41006042	Anto ngi mmaan mkheng inni avah chasap lamda ungta mpowiyin paada.
41006043	Ungta mmaan nih thenpen kqiik le' tuwlvah rek avah tomkal sowm lei'knii kdim mih chom lamda.
41006044	'Tunnu thenpen ava' kcha mii rek avah pun parnga arveel lam.
41006045	M'tunkat daat tih Mma ngi miipii rek mupsun lam chunni Mma ngi Msikhu rek avah arkuwng 'leenni pkal lamda ungta raalpha khat thah, tidit tah Bethsaida thah, Mma' duh ngi heipthla lamda.
41006046	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan mapthlat doklam dilli, Mma ngi rinkaktham chrah lown khat thah kalda.
41006047	'Tunnu kluhpha mve thungta arkuwng avah truwnpii ningqim vanpha chda ungta Mmah mthina ngi laan thah am chdaatda.
41006048	Audilli Mma ngi sikhu rekki arkuwng avah kparsa dok ki mdothaan avah heideida mleiya tirthli avah mmaan kepteng ngi raangda. Ungta jaan ava' ki qhang plii mtlaak arveel lih Mma ngi truwnpii 'leenni mkhuh ngi chetda mmaan hin thah arvada ungta mmaan avah heikkheelsou lamrah theda.
41006049	Pdainu mmaan nih, Mma ngi truwnpii 'leenni mkhuh ngi mche ava' mdehn thungta tarnampakda dilamda ungta owng lamda.
41006050	Mleiya mmaan mkheng inni Mma' avah mdodehn ungta muplungin kya kcha'. Mthungta m'tunkat daat tih Mma ngi mmaan avah bi lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Aplungin apngam chaan, Nei ping, Aningin pqitmaan,” dida.
41006051	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni arkuwng thung ngi kalda ungta tirthli avah dai chda. Ungta mmaan nah msingreelin thung ngi mningin ngak chda ungta ngakyou chlamda.
41006052	Mleiya muplungin mdotapchaiyin leiyi, mmaan nih thenpen rekki mlei avah mdodeh pindit chaak dokin pemeh.
41006053	Ungta mmaan nih truwn maklaan dokin dilli mmaan nih Genesaret paam heitlung lamda ungta arkuwng khuikin ptla lamda.
41006054	Ungta mmaan nih arkuwngpii thungki mqum daatin le' mmaan nih Mma' avah deipindih teng lamda.
41006055	Ungta mmaan nih paamkuwl ava' thuh chenkervel teng lamda, mmaan nih Mma' amna' mun mdo'arjaakin ava' thuh kkowi rek avah mkowm rekin tu' kdom lamda tapphaak pqhun lamda.
41006056	Ungta tva'tva' thung yoso Mma ngi mluh mluhna' khuw rek mditmata khuwpii rek mditmata loupaam rek thung ngi mmaan nih kkowi rek avah kyurkren mun rek thung ngi pi'iip chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mbuwdiir mowr chreldaat yoso mdokmei chaakna' raan, Mma' hinni ktham chlamda. Ungta kekmei kcha' rek khimkhei avah pumdam dam chlamda.
41007001	Audilli Jerusalem ki kurju Pharisy rekle' nowlam chukpu rek aangqhe avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda.
41007002	'Tunnu mmaan ava ngi Msikhu rek aangqhe ngi ktobor rih thenpen mdochaakin mdehn thungta, tidit tah khut tulqhutmah ava'leiyi mmaan nih mraalin pii lamda.
41007003	Mleiya Pharisy rekle' Jihudi rek mkheng ngi kver rekki mnowpa ava' mdosinton chaak inni, mrit khattih mkhutin tulqhutjap kma'don nih mmaan nah then kcha kchoklu lam pemeh.
41007004	Mleiya mmaan nih kyurkren mun thungki marvanin thuh mkhutin kulqhuhjap kma'don then kchalam pemeh. Ungta anto' heppi mmaan nih arlaang chlamda ungta mdosinton chaakin dow morson knempok ki ka'am, tidit tah tong rekle' beel rek ungta jii chai dona rek ungta khaan rek tulqhutna' ki mrit ka'am.
41007005	Audilli Pharisy rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki Mma' hinni hanto ngi kheel lamda: “Taluleiyi Nah asikhu rekvah kver rek nowpa ava' dilkqowiyi kchet kma'pa ngi, mkhutin kulqhuh kmah thenpen mdochaak inno?”
41007006	Mma ngi mmaan hinni arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Isaiah ngi, kqha kpurhuwi rek naan aleiyi kqhajik ki mdopurphuwn dok ksa, tidit tah hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: ‘Hava' mii rekki, Neiya mnehr inni makyat chlamda. Pdainu muplung chaiyin avah Nei kihin ki lamkla kcha'.
41007007	Ungta mmaan nih, Neiya msit ktaak ki luwmbuk Lamda, Ungta mmaan dopurchuhna' Avah, Dultimii rekki paupiik rek ava'.’ (Is. 29:13)
41007008	Mleiya naan nih Isowr paupiik rek avah knengpthiin tinu dultimii rekki nowpa rek ava' pqowi intinu. Mleiya naan nih beel rekle' tong rek tulqhutna' ungta morson anto'hep daat dow knempok rek 'leenni avah adopqowiyin.”
41007009	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih naanki anowpa rekin ava' adopqowi chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr paupiik avah teknenpthi ngi kqha ngi binin tinu.
41007010	Mleiya Moses tih hanto'theda: ‘Anuh apa akyat chaan,’(Mpk. 20:12 Mnl. 5:16) ungta ‘mnuh mditmata mpa pauhor kbuk mma' avah te'eyow rah,’ dida. (Mpk. 21:17)
41007011	Pdainu naanvah hanto' theen tinu: ‘Kuwmiikhat tih mnuh mditmata mpa hinni, Naanve ngi nei kihin ki adolow chaak rang dow avah neiyi kurban kpurthuh pthidok a,’ tidit tah luwbuk'inn thah kparlaan pthidok, mdit cheu,
41007012	Naan nih mma' avah mnuh mditmata mpa thenni dow khatleh rukka toptlot porson maantinu.
41007013	Ungta naan nih anowpaan adosintonin ava ngi Isowr pauna avah msit ktaak purthuhn tinu. Ungta naan nih ava' hep daat dow knempok adoptlotin,” dida.
41007014	Ungta 'tunnu Mma ngi miipii rek mkheng avah Mma' hinni mo'own purkuw lam dilli, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih, mii khimkheiyi mhei'arjaan ungta adeipindih chaan.
41007015	Mleiya dultimii thung ngi duwn ki jungkluwt ava ngi mii ava' ktopbor pchaang dow khatleh ruk ka'am pemeh. Pdainu mma' thungki arhang kthuwk dow rek tidit tah ava' dow rek ava ngi miikhat avah mdotopbor pchaan.
41007016	Kuwmiikhat maknapum mma' ava ngi havah arja chdeiso,” dida.
41007017	Ungta Mma ngi miipii rek hinki kneengda inn khat thung ngi mluw chaak dilli Msikhu rekki pauportol ava'leiyi Mma' hinni kmin nih kheel chlamda.
41007018	Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan rukka hanto ngi kdeipindih kma'pa ngi ka'am daatin ptimow? Naan nih talutalu yoso duwn ki kluwt dow ava ngi miikhat avah topbor pchaang meh tidit avah deipindih pchaang maan timow?
41007019	Mleiya avah muplungchai thuh kluwt pemeh pdainu mpowibuwr thuh kluwt kcha' ungta avah mdaksa thungki kthuwk kcha' ungta anto ngi thendam rek mkheng avah mdopertleu.”
41007020	Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Miikhat thungki arhang kthuwk ava ngi miikhat avah mdotopbor.
41007021	Mleiya mthung ki, tidit tah dultimii rek plungchai thungki kthuwk ava ngi mdopthuh avah plungbin kqha kma'. Lowsang tkilqhina', jowltpurjutna', mii te'eyowna',
41007022	tuprutna', tpunjuwrna', tqhatmana', tkurhuwnna', tekterdeuna', tepnerna', pthitda tpauna', tpirlinna', tokmowna'.
41007023	Hava' kqha kma' dow mkheng avah mthung ki kthuwk ungta ava ngi miikhat avah mdotopbor.”
41007024	Ungta Mma ngi mmun ava' thung ki korlouda Tair le' Sidon paamklek thah vada ungta Mma ngi inn khat thuh luwtda ungta Mma ngi avah kuwkhat leh ngi mdodeh rah ngei mda pdainu Mma' avah kordowl pchaang mda.
41007025	Mleiya tarnam ktobor kthlowi, mchanu kmow khat kthlowi snu khat ava ngi Mma' ma'am avah arjada ungta mma ngi thlengda Mkhuhther rih tlu chda.
41007026	Snu avah Grik mii, mqou thung ngi Siria ki Phiniks mii ngi kqou kcha' ungta mma ngi Mma' hinni mchanu 'leenki tarnam avah mdorei pthipiikna' rang ki thenni ktham chda.
41007027	Pdainu Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nau rek powi ipadokso, tidit tah nau rek thenpen ava' louda uisuwn rek hinni tvarpiik avah kqha pemeh.”
41007028	Ungta snu ava ngi arthaangda, Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Ong ngi Kruwng, anto'daat yoso, uisuwn rek kpha rukku nau rek thenkqiik khaan 'leenki jungktla avah mdochaak chaak daat inna,” dida.
41007029	Audilli Mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Hava'kat adothe ava ngi isun chdaat, achanu thungki tarnam avah ksun kcha' a,” dida.
41007030	Ungta mma ngi mi'inn thah marvan thungta tarnam ksun kcha' avah deida ungta mchanu avah kowm 'leenni iip daatda.
41007031	Ungta Mma ngi Tair le' Sidon paamklek thungki sunda, Mma ngi Dekapolis paamklek ningqim kthleng ngi arvangda Galily truwnpii thah arvangda.
41007032	Audilli Mma' hinni makna kbeeng ungta mpau kaklak miikhat avah paphaak lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma ngi mma' 'leenni mkhut mdokhiin piikna' rah Mma' hinni ktham chlamda.
41007033	Mthungta Mma ngi mma' avah miipiipa rek hinki ktliing ngi qhithida Mma ngi makna thung ngi mkhut chal lih thunda ungta Mma ngi ptil pthot thida meplei avah kmeipiikda.
41007034	Audilli parvaan hansuwda Mma ngi mtadaal krik ki qen thida mma' hinni “Ephatha,” dida, tidit tah “Ikparvang,” mdoditna'.
41007035	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih makna avah kparvangda ungta mma ngi kindit tih pau chda.
41007036	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan nih kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe mana' raan paupiik pii lamda. Pdainu Mma ngi paupiik kdungset tih mpiiklam le' koryou thang setset tih avah parjaam chlamda.
41007037	Ungta mmaan nah tethena' ktaak ki ngakyou chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mma ngi dow mkheng avah kqha dok ki mtlotta. Mma ngi knakbeeng avah khu tparjaakda ungta mpau kthuwk kma' rukka tappauda,” dilamda.
41008001	Nit rek ava' thung ngi miipii rek avah mnemreen inni ungta mdochaak raan dow khatleh ma'amma thungta Jisu ngi Msikhu rek avah own lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda:
41008002	“Neiyi hava' miipii rek avah plung kapkham chaak lam a. Mleiya mmaan nih hava' thuh Nei tu' niikdum ka'am doklam a ungta mdochaak raan dow khatleh thlowilam meh.
41008003	Ungta Neiyi mmaan avah mpowiyin ktham mih mi'inn thaan nih kupsun lambi, 'lam thuh powrthlowk ki klou lamrah, tidit tah mmaan aangqhe rek avah 'lamkla ki kthleng lam.”
41008004	Audilli Msikhu rekki Mma' hinni hanto ngi arthaang lamda: “Taluhep pih hava' paamkbiik laiyu kuw ngi hava'ya mii rek avah thenpen nih kapmaal pchaang daat rangplih?”
41008005	Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto' kheel lamda: “Naan nih thenpen tyakat athlowi inna?” Ungta mmaan nih: “Tikhiu,” dilamda.
41008006	Ungta Mma ngi miipii rek avah dulti thah mko'onna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Ungta Mma ngi thenpen tikhiu rek avah louda ungta panpaak chda ungta avah khuida ungta Mma ngi avah miipii rek hinni mdodown piik lamna' rah Msikhu rek hinni pii lamda ungta sikhu rekki avah miipii rek hinni downpiik lamda.
41008007	Ungta mmaan nih tuwlvah mruk rukka thlowi lamda ungta Mma ngi mpanpaak chaak dilli ava' rukka mmaan hinni mdodown piik lamna' rah theda.
41008008	Mthungta anto ngi mmaan nih avah cha lamda ungta mpowiyin paada ungta mmaan nih mdochaak donin mikqiik rek avah tomkal klin tikhiu kdim mih chom lamda.
41008009	'Tunnu ava' kcha mii rek avah pun plii arveel lamrah. Ungta ava' dilli Mma ngi mmaan avah psunpthi lamda.
41008010	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Mma ngi arkuwng thung ngi kalda Msikhu rek tung ngi Dalmanutha paamklek thah arvang chlamda.
41008011	Ungta Pharisy rek thuwk lamda ungta mdoperteel naan nih, Mma' hinni parvaan ki titinna' mdothlaam inni Mma' avah kalraiqhi lamda.
41008012	Pdainu Mma ngi kdung ngi krik ki tadaal thida hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi hava' suruwl ava' vah titinna' mdothlaam inno? Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, hava' suruwl hinnu titinna' khatleh piinimeh.”
41008013	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah mapthi lam thida veikhat arkuwng 'leenni kalnowlda, mraalpha khat thah sun chda.
41008014	'Tunnu sikhu rek ava ngi thenpen mdohor raan avah perngeelpthi lamda mthungta mmaan nih arkuwng 'leen vah thenpen khat kkheel lih thlowilam mda.
41008015	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Pharisy rekle' Herod thowl thungki ikilrindei chaan.”
41008016	Mthungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto ngi mlei avah kerthe lamda: “Havah neen nih thenpen tothlowi maan leiyi, mdothe,” dilamda.
41008017	Ungta Jisu ngi ava' mdeh thungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naan nih, havah naan nih thenpen adothlowi maan ava'lei tidit tih atheenna? Naanna kloudei mlai mditmata kdeipindih mlaiyin ptimow?
41008018	Amikin ma'am chunni deimaan timow? Ungta aknaan ma'am chunni arja maan timow? Ungta naan nih binphaakliit maan timow?
41008019	Neiyi mii pun parnga ki thenni thenpen parnga kukhui thung ngi mikqiik rek avah tomkal tya kdim mih achom inno?” Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni: “Sowm lei'knii,” dilamda.
41008020	“Ungta Neiyi mii pun plii ki thenni thenpen tikhiu kukhui thung ngu mikqiik rek avah tomkal klin tya kdim mih achom inno?” Ungta mmaan nih “tikhiu,” dilamda.
41008021	Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Tunnu taluheppa, naan nih taluhep pih deipindih maanti?”
41008022	Audilli Mma ngi Bethsaida thah arvangda ungta mmaan nih, Mma' hinni mmikktot miikhat avah paphaak lamda ungta mma' avah mdokmeina' rah Mhin nih ktham chlamda.
41008023	Mthungta Mma ngi mmikktot mii avah mkhut thah kyowngda khuwpii thungki duwn thah qhi pthuwkda ungta Mma ngi mmik thuh ptil mopthot dilli ungta Mma ngi mma' 'leenni mkhut mthiikpiik dilli, Mma ngi mma' hinni khu mdeh mow, tidit kheelda.
41008024	Ungta mma ngi tun thah hansuwda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi mii rek avah ding kchet heppi kchet kdeh a,” dida.
41008025	Audilli Mma ngi mmik 'leenni veikhat mkhut thida tun thah ksuw rah sida. Ungta mma' avah ren nih pqhatda ungta mma ngi mii khimkhei avah kindit chel lih dei chda.
41008026	Ungta Mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi khuwpii thung rukku luwtma' ungta khuwpii thungki miikhat leh hin rukku thema',” dida, mi'inn thah psun pthida.
41008027	'Tunnu Jisu le' Msikhu rek avah Sijaria Philip pih khuwpii rek thah chet lamda ungta 'lam thung ngi Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda pau kheel lamda: “Mii rekvah Neiya kuwpi'ii mtidit lam mow?”
41008028	Ungta mmaan nih hanto ngi arthaang lamda: “Dii kupluwt Johon pi'ii, atidit lam pdainu aangqhe rekvah Elaijah ungta morson rekvah khulpu rek arlak ki khatpi'ii atidit lam.”
41008029	Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Pdainu naanvah Neiya kuwpi'ii atidit inno?” Ungta Pitar rih arthaangda ungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang nga Mesaiah ptih,” dida.
41008030	Audilli Mma ngi, Mma' lei avah kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe mana' raan ki thenni mmaan avah pilqhit lamda.
41008031	Mma ngi mmaan avah hanto ngi tpurchuh pqhun lamda, tidit tah ‘Mii Chapa avah dow mkheng 'leenni suwk kthuwk chrah ungta Mma' avah kver rekle' thimpu kenreel rek ungta nowlam chukpu rekki kikthitna' lamrah ungta Mma' avah ke'eyou lamrah ungta mnii kdumna' dilli kring kerheel rah.’
41008032	Mma ngi hava' pau avah kurphuwng ngi theda. Mthungta Pitar rih Mma' avah qhi ptliing thida trai pqhunda.
41008033	Pdainu Mma ngi sutporloijik lam thida kerheelda Msikhu rek avah suwrim lamda ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Seitan, nang nga kihin ki ikorsown dok. Mleiya nang nga Isowr then kurthuwk dow rek 'leenni aplungbin ammeh pdainu dultimii rekki then kurthuwk dow rek 'leenni ka'am kcha' a,” dida, Pitar avah rai chda.
41008034	Ungta Mma ngi mii rek avah Msikhu rektu' Mma' hinni mo'own purkuw lam dilli, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwku yoso, Nei kdil tqowi rah kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi mdaksa mthina ikarmat chso ungta mma ngi mdaksa ki khros ahor chthiso rang ngi Nei kdil avah aqowi chso.
41008035	Mleiya kuwku yoso, mrinkum tsan rah kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi kpenvei chrah pdainu kuwku yoso, Nei kthen nih ungta kqhapaumin ki thenni mrinkum kpenvei kcha' mma' ava ngi mrinkum avah ksan chrah.
41008036	Mleiya miikhat tih dultipaam mkheng tang chyoso, mdaksa ki muplungrin mpenvei chaak kuh mthen nih talu msit amna' ka'am a?
41008037	Mleiya miikhat tih muplungrin tu' kerthleng ngi talu kpii rang?
41008038	Mleiya kuwku yoso, Nei k'leen nih ungta kpauna leiyi, hava' lowsangkqhi ungta pnu kervei suruwl arlak ki ningmapya chaak bih, Mii Chapa ava' rukku, Mma ngi Mpa konlorna' thung ngi vaantamsi kchiir rektu' murjun thung ngi mma' ava' hinnu ningkapyak rah,” dida.
41009001	Ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah mmaan nih Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah ruhtan tu' kilqhi ngi ma'am mmikin nih mdeh duhn kpha ngi kdiyou kpertem kma' rang mii aangqhe rek avah hava' thuh krip daat lam a.”
41009002	'Tunnu niitruk dilli Jisu ngi Pitar, James ungta Johon le' avah qhi lamda mthinaan nih korlou lamda lown kchuwng khat thah, mmaan avah hanqhi lamda ungta mmaan aang ngi Mma' avah mruwngchen kerthlengda.
41009003	Mma' buwdiir rek avah pleudangda, kdung ngi tbur heppi powlda tidit tah ava' hep daat tih dultipaam ki buwkursu kuwkhat leh ngi mdoppowl pchaan pemeh.
41009004	Ungta mmaan hinni, Elaijah ngi Moses tu' thuwk lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Jisu tu' pau saam lamda.
41009005	Audilli Pitar rih arthaangda ungta Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Rabbi, neen nthennu hava' thuh ta'am chaak inni kqha rah. Ungta neen nih Nah athenni khat, Moses thenni khat ungta Elaijah thenni khat, buw'inn kdum isaan cheh,” dida.
41009006	Mleiya mma ngi talu tethe rang tidit mdodeh pemeh tidit tah mmaan nah kdung ngi mningin kqi kcha'.
41009007	Ungta armei khat arjuda mmaan avah pkhum lamda ungta armei thungki krowl khat ava ngi hanto'theda: “Havah Nei kvonsat'low Kchapa Mma' pau avah arjaan,” dida.
41009008	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mmaan nih porloijik lamda msutin thungta kuwkhat leh ruk deiporson lam mda pdainu mmaan tungngu Jisu daat chrel ka'am dei lamda.
41009009	'Tunnu mmaan nih lown 'leenki murjunqumin chunni Mma ngi mmaan hinni paupiik pii lamda tidit tah mmaan nih, ‘Mii Chapa avah kdiyou thungki mperdel dokduh kpha ngi mmaan nih mdodehn dow rek avah kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe raan pemeh,’ dida.
41009010	Mthungta mmaan nih hava' kdiyou thungki kring kerheel avah talu tethena tidit mkerkheelin chunni, hava' pau avah mthung inni arkhi chlamda.
41009011	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' kheel lamda: “Taluleiyi nowlam chukpu rekvah Elaijah choduh kurjung rah, mdodit inno?”
41009012	Audilli Mma ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Elaijah a choduh kurjung dok ungta dow mkheng avah ren nih mdoparman dok.
