Ungta Mii Chapa ava'leiyi taluhep pih hanto ngi mdokjitto', tidit tah ‘Mma' avah dow knempok 'leenni suwk kthuwk rah ungta Mma' avah kikthitna' lamrah,’ mdoditto'?
41009013	Pdainu Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a, tidit tah Elaijah rukka kurjung dok ungta mma' leiyi, mdokjit dok ava' heppi mmaan nih mma' 'leenni mdobinin khimkhei avah mdotlot dokin.”
41009014	Ungta Mma ngi sikhu rek hinni marvan thungta Mma ngi mmaan kutkhul lih miipiipa rek ka'am daat ungta nowlam chukpu rek avah mmaan tu' mkerteen meekin ava' deida.
41009015	Mmaan nih Mma' mdeh daatin le' mii mkheng avah ngakyou chlamda ungta Mma' hinni heichen lamda Mma' avah arvuwi chlamda.
41009016	Ungta Mma ngi nowlam chukpu rek ava' hinni: “Naanna mmaan tu' hava' thuh akerteen inna, taluda?”
41009017	Audilli miipii rek arlak ki miikhat tih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Chukpu, neiyi mpau kthuw kma' pthla ngi mdoqhi knau avah Nang ahin nih kdo'arheiqhi chaak.
41009018	Mleiya tva'tva' thung yoso, mma ngi mdokyownna' mun thung ngi mma' avah dulti deenna'da, mnehr thah muhuwn qhutda, mahaa kriilda ungta kkarbor kcha' kchok. Avaleiyi, neiyi Nah asikhu rek hinni, mmaan nih mma' avah mdorei pthina' raan ki thenni kdothe chaak lam pdainu mmaan vah pchaang lam mda.”
41009019	Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “O mlamrin ktaak suruwl rek, trek ksowt tih Neiya naan ahin nih am rangnu o? Neiyi naanna trek ksowt tih adiil raannu o? tu'uda, mma' avah Nei kihin nih arheiqhiin.”
41009020	Audilli mmaan nih mma' avah Mma' hinni arheiqhi lamda. Ungta mma ngi Jisu mdeh daat le' m'tunkat daat tih tarnam ktobor ava ngi mma' avah knok dik'ardikda ungta mma' avah dulti thah tluwda ungta kurlup pervelda mnehr thah muhuwn qhutda.
41009021	Mthungta Mma ngi nau ava' pa ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Hanto ngi mdotlotna' avah trek ksowtta?” Ungta mpa ngi: “Mqou daat ki kupqhun nih mdotlot, dida.
41009022	Ungta ava ngi mma' avah ke'eyou rang ngi, veityaveitya thung ngi dii thung ruk ungta mei thung rukku varda. Pdainu Nang ngi talutalu yoso atlot pchaan cheentung ngi plung mheipkham chaan rang ngi neenveya mheibom chaan,” dida.
41009023	Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi lam'arin chaak pchaan bih, lamkrin kcha' mma' hinvah dow mkheng avah kkurthuwk pchaang,” dida.
41009024	M'tunkat daat tih nau ava' pa ava ngi owngda mqachun nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, neiyi lamkrin chaak a ungta klamrinma avah mheibom cha',” dida.
41009025	Jisu ngi, mii rekki merheichen sapin mdeh thungta, Mma ngi tarnam ktobor avah hanto'theda, raida: “Makna kbeeng ungta mpau kaklak pthla nang, Neiyi ahin nih paupiik akpiik a, mma' thungki arvang thuwk dok ungta 'tun veikhat mma' thung ngi luwt porsonma',” dida.
41009026	Audilli pthla ava ngi owngda mma' avah kdung ngi knok pervelthida mma' thungki arvang thuwk chda. Ungta mma' avah kdiyou kcha' heppi plowm chda, mthungta miipiipa rek ava' vah “mma' avah kdiyou kcha' a,” dilamda.
41009027	Pdainu Jisu ngi mma' avah mkhut thah kyowng thida pripda ungta mmah kerdelda.
41009028	Ungta Mma ngi inn thuh mvanluw thungta Msikhu rekki mthinaan nih, Mma' hinni hanto ngi kheel chlamda: “Neen nih taluleiyi mma' avah kdorei pchaanin pemeh o?”
41009029	Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava'lu hep daat avah dow morson khatleh thuh kthuwk pchaang pemeh pdainu rinkthamna' le' then tngowlna' daat thung ngi kthuwklu.”
41009030	Audilli mmaan nih mmun ava' thung ki sun lamda ungta Galily paamkuwl kthleng ngi chet lamda ungta Mma ngi avah kuwkhat leh ngi mdodeh rah ngei mda.
41009031	Mleiya Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni purchuk lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii Chapa avah dultimii rek khut thung ngi mparlaan meeksli a ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah ke'eyou lamrah. Ungta Mma' me'eyown dilli Mma' avah mnii kdumna' nit tih kperdel rah,” dida.
41009032	Pdainu mmaan nih, Mma ngi hava' mdothe avah deipindih lam mda ungta Mma' hinni ava' tkheel rang avah mningin pqit lamda.
41009033	Audilli mmaan nih Kapernaum thah arvang lamda ungta Mma ngi inn thuh ma'am thung ngi Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto ngi kheel lamda: “Naan nih 'lampii thuh asingreelin thung ngi akerteenin avah taluda?”
41009034	Pdainu mmaan nih rimkdi am chlamda tidit tah mmaan nih 'lampii thung vah msingreelin thung ngi, klinsi a kuw rang tidit leiyi, kkerteen lam.
41009035	Ungta Mma ngi ko'ong thida sowm lei'knii rek avah own lamda ungta mmaan ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih mkhatna' tkurthuh rah mngei chaak bih, mma' avah mqutna'rel mkurthuh rah ungta mkheng ki suwk'owr mkurthuh chaak rah,” dida.
41009036	Audilli Mma ngi nau 'suwn khat louda mmaan arlakphin nih nau avah pa'amda ungta Mma ngi nau avah morpom dilli, mmaan ahin nih hanto'theda:
41009037	“Kuwku yoso, Nei kmiing 'leenni hava' hep nau 'suwn khat ava' karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Neiya mtarlaan chaak a ungta kuwku yoso, Nei mkarlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei mdotarlaan pemeh pdainu Nei myuksi Mma' ava' mdo'arlaan chaak.”
41009038	'Tunnu Johon nih arthaangda Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Chukpu, neen nih neen mikepteng kma' kuwmiikhat tih Nang amiing ngi tarnam mdorei pthi dei innu, mthungta neen nih mma' avah kdopkhaanin mleiya mmah neen mikopqowi in pemeh.”
41009039	Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Mma' avah pkhaan maan, tidit tah Nei kmiing ngi ruhtannong khat ktlow kuwkhat leh ngi mdil thah kbeisek ki Nei kleiyi kthi the nimeh.
41009040	Mleiya neen mikepteng kma' mma' avah neen noktong ki.
41009041	Mleiya kuwku yoso, naan nih Khrista hinni a'amin leiyi, Nei kmiing ngi tneek rah dii tong khatpang daat yoso, ahinin nih akpiik chaan mma' avah, Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat kthe a, tidit tah mma ngi teden rukku mma' ki mnongqhat'lot avah penveivot chnimeh.
41009042	Ungta kuwku yoso, Nei kihinn, hava' hep kdil'suwn rek arlak ki khatpang ava' khuhsiir ktippirthi mma' ava' thenvah buhsuklung khat mlowl thah pirsi thida truwnpii thung ngi tvarpthi ngi kqha rah.
41009043	Ungta akhut tih nang nga pnu atperve cheentung ngi avah areen pthi. Mleiya akhut 'knii puda Simmei thuh atlaak rang, kqiim kma' rah mei thuh atlaak rang hinvah, akhut kurhum kmah ngi rinkum thuh aluw chaak ki nang athen vah kqha.
41009044	Mmun ava' thung vah pden rek avah kdiyou lam pemeh ungta mei avah kqiim vot pemeh.
41009045	Pdainu akhuh ngi nang nga pnu atperve cheentung ngi avah areen pthi. Mleiya akhuh 'knii pum mih Simmei thuh atvarpthi rang, kqiim kma' rah mei thuh atvarpthi rang hinvah akhuh kyeng ngi rinkum thuh aluw chaak ki nang athen vah kqha.
41009046	Mmun ava' thung vah, ‘pden rek avah kdiyou lam pemeh ungta mei avah kqiim vot pemeh.’ (Is. 66:24)
41009047	Ungta amik ki nang nga pnu atperve cheentung ngi avah akhorpthi. Mleiya amik 'knii pum mih Simmei thuh atvarpthi rang hinvah amik khadaat tih Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi aluw chaak ki nang athen vah kqha.
41009048	Mmun ava' thung vah, Pden rek avah kdiyou lam Pemeh. Ungta mei avah kqiim vot pemeh.
41009049	Mleiya mii khimkhei avah meiyi kpa'al rah ungta rintparlaan khimkhei avah pti ngi kpa'al rah.
41009050	Pti a kqha pdainu pti ava ngi ma'al ava' mkartlai chaakku taluhep pih pa'al naan? Naan adak inni athung inni pti avah apa'alin ungta naan nih khat le' khat hinni plung kdai kthlowi dei ikurthuwkin.”
41010001	Audilli Mma ngi mmun ava' thung ki korlouda Jordon raalpha khat ki Judia paamklek thah arvangda. Ungta mii rek avah Mma' hinni veikhat kurtuwl nowl lamda ungta Mma ngi, Mma' ki mnowpa dilkqowiyi mmaan avah veikhat purchuk nowl lamda.
41010002	Ungta Pharisy rekki thleng lamda ungta Mma' hinni hanto' kheel lamda: “Miikhat tih mnuwn mdokenqhenqhi avah nowlam vah mrot mow?”, dilamda, mdoperteel naan nih kheel lamda.
41010003	Ungta Mma ngi arthaang lamda, mmaan hinni hanto ngi theda: “Moses vah naan ahin innu talu paupiik atpiik inno?”
41010004	Mmaan nih hanto ngi the lamda: “Moses vah miikhat tih tkenqhenna' ki paukjit mikjit bih snu avah mdomaakpthi krow, mdit,” dilamda.
41010005	Ungta Jisu ngi arthaang lamda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mleiya naan aplung pchaiyin deithida mma ngi hava' paupiik avah mdokjit.
41010006	Pdainu dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih Isowr rih, ‘snu le' psel avah mdoseemvet.’ (Rnp. 1:27, 5:2)
41010007	Hava' leiyi pselpa ngi mnuhmpa avah mdomaak pthi rah ungta mnuwn tu' mkirchin chaak rah.
41010008	Ungta 'knii rek avah daksa khadaat mkurthuh rah.(Rnp. 2:24) Anto ngi mmaanve avah 'knii kurthuwk porson lam nimeh pdainu daksa khadaat kurthuwk kcha'.
41010009	Avaleiyi, Isowr rih khadaat mdopthut dok ksa avah kuwkhat leh ngi qhenpthi mso.”
41010010	Ungta inn thung ngi Msikhu rekki ava' ki mlei avah Mma' hinni veikhat kheel chnowl lamda.
41010011	Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwku yoso mnuwn kenqhenqhi thida snu morson khat kok'onqhi mma' ava ngi lowsang mqhi a.
41010012	Ungta snu ngi mi'innpu kenqhenqhi thida innpu morson kok'onqhi mma' ava' rukku lowsang mqhi a.”
41010013	Audilli mmaan nih Mma' hinni nausisi rek avah Mma ngi mdokmei lamna' rang ki thenni paphaak lamda pdainu sikhu rekki mmaan arheikqhi rek avah rai chlamda.
41010014	Pdainu Jisu ngi ava' mdeh thungta kdung ngi Mmah muplung thida ungta mmaan hinni hanto ngi theda: “Nausisi rek avah Nei kihin nih arva chdaat lamso, mmaan avah pkhaanmaan, tidit tah Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah hava'le' hep daat rekki then.
41010015	Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna kuwku yoso, nausisi rek ava' heppi, Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' karlaang kcha' kma' mma' avah teden rukku ava' thuh luwt nimeh.”
41010016	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah morpom lam dilli Mma ngi mmaan 'leenni mkhut khiinpiik lamda ungta mmaan avah suwqhat pii chlamda.
41010017	'Tunnu Mma ngi 'lampii thuh mehei meek arlaan nih miikhat arheichenda Mma' aang ngi pkhup pih ktirdiil chthida hanto'theda, kheel chda: “Kqha Chukpu, neiyi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah alrouchom mih kdochom chaakna' rah talu tlow chnikli?” dida.
41010018	Mthungta Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi nang ngi, Neiya kqha atidit tah? Kqha Khatpang ka'am, Mma' avah Isowr ava' kma'don kqha kuwkhat leh ka'am pemeh.
41010019	Nang ngi paupiik rek avah adeh: ‘Lowsang qhima'. Mii eyouma'. Pruma'. Mlangkma' sakhi piima'. Mii huwng chma'. anuh le' apa akyat cha'.”
41010020	Ungta mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Chukpu neiyi hava'le' mkheng avah kmotki kupqhun nih kdo'arvandan chaak,” dida.
41010021	Audilli Jisu ngi mma' avah kbihrimda, vonpsatda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi dow khatpang aptat daat tah, vang rang ngi adothlowi dow mkheng avah ayurpthi ungta avah srah rek hinni apiipthi mdit bih, nang ngi parvaan thah alrou purtuwl chna ungta nang nga arva rang ngi akhros ava' achom rah Nei mheiqowi,” dida.
41010022	Pdainu hava' pau ava' 'leenni mmah muplung kdung ngi yada ungta muplung kdung ngi sun chda, tidit tah mmah alrou knempok ki mdothlowi.
41010023	Audilli Jisu ngi sutporloijik lam thida Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Alrou kthlowi rekki Isowr kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw raan avah tya kparsa chdaat a.”
41010024	Ungta sikhu rek avah Mma' pauna rek 'leenni mningin ngak chda. Pdainu Jisu ngi veikhat arthaangda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nau rek, alrou lamkrin kcha' rekki Isowr kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw raan avah tya thuh kparsa chdaat a.
41010025	Svangpa khat tih Isowr kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw rang hinvah uwt tih preukna thung ngi mluw chaak pleh ngi ko'olbet rah.”
41010026	Ungta mmaan avah kerkheelset tih mningin ngakyou chda, msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: “Mdittu' kuw rang ngoh, karsan kcha' rangnga?”
41010027	Pdainu mmaan avah suwrim lam thida Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Dultimii hinvah havah kurthuwk pchaang lupemeh pdainu Isowr hin pemeh, tidit tah Isowr hinvah dow mkheng avah kkurthuwk pchaang.”
41010028	Audilli Pitar rih Mma' hinni hanto' tethe pqhunda: “Asuw o, neenna dow mkheng mapthi dok thiin nuh Nah adil kdoqowi chaak dokin.”
41010029	Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah Nei kthen nih ungta kqhapaumin ki thenni mi'inn rek mditmata mu'umnau rek mditmata mchar myur rek mditmata mpa mditmata mnuh mditmata mnuwn mditmata mnaumsuwn mditmata mpaam rek kmapthi ammlai.
41010030	Mmaan avah hava' 'tunki mpha thung vah mtumin arja khat avah arlaang lam nimeh. Mmaan avah mi'inn rekin ungta mu'umnau rekin ungta mchar myur rekin ungta mnuh rekin ungta mnaumsuwn rekin ungta mpaam rekin am nimeh ungta tyat chiireelna' kperteel chlam rah pdainu karvang rang mpha thung vah ktlangknai kma' rinkum karlaang chlam rah.
41010031	Pdainu mrukri knempok rek avah dilknau chlam rah ungta mdilknau ava ngi rukri chrah.”
41010032	'Tunnu mmaan nah 'lam thuh Jerusalem thah hang meek lamda ungta Jisu a mduh thaan nih chetda ungta mmaan nah ngak chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mdil mqowiyin chunnu mningin qida. Audilli Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rek avah veikhat qhi ptliing lamda ungta Mma' 'leenni kthuwk bei rang dow rek avah mmaan hinni tethe pqhunda.
41010033	“Asuwn, neenna Jerusalem thah kahang meekin impimin ungta Mii Chapa avah thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek hinni kparlaan pthi rah ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah kdiyou kpha ngi kupsul lamrah ungta Mma' avah Chaatktlei rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthi lamrah.
41010034	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah kipni chaak lamrah ungta Mma' avah khuikin kchung ngi kbun lamrah. Ungta mnii kdumna' nit tih Mma' avah kring kerheel rah,” dida.
41010035	Audilli Jebedi chapa rek James le' Johon avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu, neenve ngi talutalu yoso, adokqhilin avah adottlot piik raan kngei inna,” dilamda.
41010036	Mthungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naanve athen inni, talu adoktlot piik raan angei inna?”
41010037	Mmaanve ngi Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Neenve a Nang akonlorna' thung ngi khat tih achang thah ungta ktlok khat ava ngi Amaleh thah mheipkong chaan,” dilamda.
41010038	Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi adoqhilin avah talu tidit dei maantih. Naanve ngi Neiyi kdoneek tong avah nee pchaang naandih, ungta Neiyi kluwna' diiluwna' thung ngi luwt pchaang naandi?”
41010039	Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Ou pchaang nikaan.” Ungta Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi dakat tih Neiyi kdoneek tong avah nee naandi' ungta Neiyi kluwna' thung ngi luwt naandi'.
41010040	Pdainu Nei kmachang thah kok'ong rang ungta Nei kmaleh thah kok'ong rang avah Neiyi kdopiik rang ava' pemeh, pdainu avah mmaan thenni mmun mdoporthlon piikdok ksa mmaan avale' ki then,” dida.
41010041	Ungta sowm rek ava ngi ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nih James le' Johon 'leenni kdung ngi muplungin thida.
41010042	Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan avah Mhin nih own purkuwk lam thida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih adehn tidit tah Chaatktlei rek 'leenni paamkpu kurthuwk rek mmaan ava ngi mmaan 'leenni kruwng kurthuwk lamda ungta mmaan arlak ki klin rek ava ngi mmaan 'leenni ruhtanna' avah mdosintonin.
41010043	Anto' pdainu naan arlak innu avah kurthuwk mso, pdainu kuwku yoso a'arlak inni tilin rah kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi asuwkin mkurthuh rah.
41010044	Ungta kuwku yoso mkhatna' tkurthuh rah kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi mii mkheng ki suwk mkurthuh rah.
41010045	Mleiya Mii Chapa ava' kpha rukka soptolowpsuk rang ngi kurjung pemeh pdainu sopklow chrah kurjung ungta mii knempok mdoktlanna' rang ki thenni Mrinkum ava' kpii rah kurjung.”
41010046	Audilli mmaanna Jerikho thah arjulamda ungta Mma ngi Msikhurek le' miipiipa rektu' Jerikho duwnthah meheiin thungta Timius chapa Bartimius avah ktlam kqhilli lampii thuh ko'ongdaatda.
41010047	Ungta mma ngi Najareth ki Jisu tidit marjaak thungta owngda hantotheda: “David Chapa Jisu, neiya plung mheipneecha',” dida.
41010048	Audilli mii knempok ki rimkdi ma'amna' rah pilqhit lamda pdainu mma ngi kerkheel set set tih owngda: “David Chapa Jisu, neiya plung mheipnee cha',” dida.
41010049	Mthungta Jisu ngi ripda ungta mma' avah mdo'ownna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Audilli mmaan nih mmikktot mii ava' hinni: “Arda aprokcha'. Hangrip. Mma ngi nang nga ato'own chaak a,” dilamda mma' avah own lamda.
41010050	Ungta mma ngi mbuwmdiir varpthi thida ripda ungta Jisu hinni arvada.
41010051	Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi nang athenni talu adoktlot piik rah angei a?” Mmikktot mii ava ngi Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Rabboni, neiya kmik mheipa'har piikchau,” dida.
41010052	Audilli Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Isun cha', alamrin chaak ki nang nga atapdam chaak dok a,” dida. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma' avah mmik har chda ungta 'lam thuh Jisu dil qowi chda.
41011001	'Tunnu mmaan nih Jerusalem behki kruwn lown thungki Bethphage le' Bethany khuw rek mphaakin thungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek chai'knii avah hanpthla lamda
41011002	Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Wvah aheiraalin ki khuw thah vaan ungta naanve ngi aheiluw daatin le' skowlraam suwn khat tbowldaat deinaandi'. Naanve ngi aperthletin rah avah arvanqhiin.
41011003	Ungta kuwmiikhat tih ahinin nih: ‘Naanve ngi taluki havah adotlotin?’ mdit cheentung ngi hanto ngi atheen: ‘Kruwng ava ngi avah dow mdopsit rah ka'am a,’ adiin, mdit bih mma ngi kbeisek ki avah arhei kapthla rah,” dida.
41011004	Mthungta mmaanve ngi va lamda ungta skowlraam suwn avah paltong duwn thah 'lambeh ngi kpursuk daat kurdutqhi lamda ungta mmaanve ngi avah perthlet lamda.
41011005	Ungta ava' thuh krip daat rek mmaan ava ngi mmaanve hinni: “Taluda adotlot inna, skowlraam suwn aperthle daatin mow?” dilamda.
41011006	Mthungta mmaanve ngi Jisu ngi mmaanve hinni paupiik mdopiik lam heppi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan nih mmaanve avah arvanpsun lamda.
41011007	Audilli mmaanve ngi skowlraam suwn avah Jisu hinni arvanqhi lamda ungta m'leen nih mbuwdiirin phat lamda audilli Mma ngi ava' 'leenni ko'ongda.
41011008	Ungta mii knempok ki 'lampii thuh mbuwdiirin phat lamda ungta morson rekki dingbaak thlang lamda marna avah 'lam thuh phat lamda.
41011009	Audilli mduh le' mdil lih kchet rek mmaan ava ngi owng lamda, hanto' the lamda: “Hosanna! Kruwng miing 'leenni kthleng, Mma' avah msuwkqha a! (Luw. 118:26)
41011010	Kruwng miing 'leenni kthleng neenki n'paan, David kruwngpaalna' avah msuwkqha a! Kparthaangsi ngi Hosanna.”
41011011	Ungta Jisu ngi Jerusalem thuh hangluwtda ungta luwbuk'inn thuh luwtda. Ungta Mma ngi mthung ki dow mkheng avah sutporloijikda pdainu mpha moktot chaak dok thungta Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rektu' Bethany thah jungkerheel chlamda.
41011012	'Tunnu mupduknii ngi mmaan nih Bethany ki marhanin thungta Mmah mpowi tham chda.
41011013	Ungta Mma ngi marna kqha dok kduwtbul khat leer thah mheideh thungta Mma ngi m'leen nih mchei mrukmram ka'am daat ngaal mow, dida ksuw rah vada. Ungta Mma ngi mbul merhei phaak thungta Mma ngi marna kma'don nih dow khatleh phangmda, tidit tah mpha avah kduwt cheina' mpha pemeh.
41011014	Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ava hinni hanto'theda: “'Tun veikhat, kuwkhat leh ngi nang a'leenki achei avah cha mso,” dida. Ungta mdothe pau avah Msikhu rekki arja lamda.
41011015	Audilli anto ngi mmaan nih Jerusalem arhantlung lamda. Ungta Jisu ngi Jerusalem thuh luwtda luwbuk'inn thuh kyur le' kren rek avah treipthi pqhunda ungta sum kpertlek rek khaan ungta uqhu kyur rek longkhom avah purlup pthida.
41011016	Ungta Mma ngi luwbuk'inn kthleng ngi kuwkhat leh ngi dona rek mdosunqhi rah rotpiik lam mda.
41011017	Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda tpurchuh lam pqhunda: “Nei ki'inn avah chaat mkheng rekki thenni, Rinkthamna' inn mkurthuh rah,” (Is. 56:7) dida, kjitmeh mow? Pdainu naanvah, ‘havah raanqhul kupru rek khor apthut inna,’ dida. (Jer. 7:11)
41011018	Ungta nowlam chukpu rekle' thimpu rekki avah arja lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah taluhep pih tpenveipthi rang tidit ki, mlei thlaam lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih Mma' avah mdoqit chaakin, mleiya mii mkheng ngi Mma' dopurchuhna' thuh mningin ngakyou chda.
41011019	Ungta kluhpha mve thungta Mmah khuwpii ava' thung ki sun chda.
41011020	'Tunnu jiingsun nih mmaan nih anto ngi marvan chun inni, mmaan nih kduwtbul avah murjung kphadek ki mpurvuwi chaak avah dei lamda.
41011021	Ungta Pitar rih mbinphaak thungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Rabbi, asuw o, Nang ngi pauhor adobuk kduwtbul avah kpurvuwi kcha' a.”
41011022	Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Isowr hinni lam'arin chaan.
41011023	Mleiya mkindit kat tih Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a: ‘Hava' lown ava' hinni, Ikurphui rah truwnpii thuh ikarvardok,’ dida kthe mma' ava ngi muplung thuh kpelqen ktaak liit tih pdainu ava' dow rek avah anto'kat tih kthuwk rah tidit lamkrin kcha' mma' hinni avah kpurthuh piik rah.
41011024	Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, talutalu yoso, rinktham mih adoqhilin dow mkheng rek avah naan nih karlaan chaak inna tidit lam'arin chaan mdit bih naan nih avah thlowi chnaandi'.
41011025	Ungta naan nih rinkaktham chrang ngi ariin thung ngi, parvaan ki A'paan nih, naan rukka adoparmana' rekin ava' adotoptlot piikna' raan, naan nih kuwmiikhat tih ahinin nih mdoparmana' ma'am cheentung ngi, mma' avah adoptlot piik raan.
41011026	Pdainu naanni aptlotpiik maan bih, parvaan ki A'paan rukku naan nih adoparmana' rekin avah aptlot piikin nimeh.”
41011027	Audilli mmaan nih Jerusalem thah arhang nowl lamda ungta Mma ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi mchesli arlaan nih thimpu kenreel rek, nowlam chukpu rek ungta kver rek avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda.
41011028	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Taluhep kduh ki ruhtanna' ngi, Nang ngi havah adotlotto'? Ungta hava' dow rek totlot pchaanna' ki ruhtanna' avah kuw ngi adotpiikko?” dilamda.
41011029	Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kqha a, Nei rukku naan ahin nih paukheel khat ayukheel inni, mhei'arthaangin ungta Nei rukku taluhep kduh ki ruhtanna' ava ngi hava' dow rek avah kdotlot tidit ayuthepiikin nih.
41011030	Mleiya dii kupluwt Johon diipluwna' avah parvaan kimow, mditmata dultimii hinki o? Mhei'arthaangin.”
41011031	Mthungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto ngi kerthe lamda: “Neen nih parvaan ki nditin bih, Mma ngi ‘mdittu' taluleiyi mma' avah lam'rin chmaan tih’ kdi rah?
41011032	Pdainu neen nih ‘dultimii hinki ndit bih,’” tidit tah mmaan nih mii rek avah mdoqit chaakin, mleiya mii mkheng ngi Johon avah khulpu dakdak khat tidit tih mdotai chaakin.
41011033	Mthungta mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta Jisu hinni hanto' the lamda: “Neenna deimaan ring,” dilamda. Mthungta Jisu rukku arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nei rukku taluhep kduh ki ruhtanna' ava ngi hava' dow rek avah kdotlot tidit avah ahinin nih the nimaang,” dida.
41012001	Ava' dilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni pauportol lih tpau rah pqhunda: “Miikhat tih riithlumbil khat pqhangda ungta ava' kloijik ki rowng tkhulda ungta riithlumdii tsunna' khor khat touda ungta trunna' rah arka khat sada. Audilli mma ngi louknum rek hinni avah turpuwk ki piipthithida ungta mdakka khuwpaam lamkla thah pjiin chda.
41012002	'Tunnu turkunpha mve thungta mma ngi msuwk khat tah riithlumbil knum rek hinni heipthlada. Mleiya mma ngi riithlumbil knum rek hinni, riithlumbil thungki mchei mruk klou rah mma' avah mdoheisi.
41012003	Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah kyowng lamda, bun lamda ungta dow khatleh kipsin kmah ngi arheipthla pthi lamda.
41012004	Veikhat mma ngi msuwk morson khat arheipthla nowlda ungta mmaan nih mma' avah lung ngi deeng lamda ungta mluwchai thah tiplim lamda, mmeel kthi ngi ptlot lam thida arheipthla pthi lamda.
41012005	Ungta mma ngi veikhat morson khat arheipthla nowlda ungta mmaan nih mma' avah eyou lamda ungta morson knempok rek avah, aangqhe a bun lamda ungta aangqhe a eyou lamda.
41012006	Avaleiyi, ava' kpha thung ngi chapa khatpang mdothlowi, mvonsat'lowsi avah mma ngi mmaan hinni mqutna'rel lih hanto' binchda heipthlada: ‘Mleiya mmaan nih kchapa kat tah kakyat chlam rah.’
41012007	Pdainu riithlumbil knum rek ava ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: ‘Havah piipa ava'. Arvaan, neen nih mma' avah eyou' incheh ungta malrou chom rang avah neen ndow kurthuwk chrah,’ dilamda.
41012008	Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah kyowng lamda ungta eyou lamda ungta riithlumbil ava' duwn thah varpthi lamda.
41012009	Avaleiyi, 'tunnu riithlumbil kpupa ava' vah talu ktlow rang ngoh? Mma ngi arvadon nih riithlumbil knum rek avah kpenvei pthi lamrah ungta riithlumbil avah morson rek hinni kpiipthi rah.
41012010	Naan nih, hava' Kchiir laika thung ngi hanto ngi mdokjit avah parcham maan timow: ‘Innksa rekki mdoknen pthi dokin lungkat ava ngi, Innbul lung, lung kenreel ava' kurthuwk kcha' a.
41012011	Havah ktlangknai kma' Kruwng ava' nongtlot Ungta neen nmiksutin thung ngi havah tngana'.” (Luw. 118:22-23)
41012012	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mdokyownna' raan tlow lamda pdainu miipiipa rek mdoqit chaakin, tidit tah mmaan nih pauportol avah Mma ngi mmaan kepteng ngi mthe a tidit mdodehn. Mthungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mapthi lam thida sun chlamda.
41012013	Audilli mmaan nih, Pharisy rekle' Herod mii aangqhe rek avah Mpauna' thuh, Mma' kokyowng rang ngi Mma' hinni arheipthla lamda.
41012014	Ungta mmaan ava ngi merheitlunin thungta Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu, Nang nga kindit ptih ungta kuwkhat leh ruk tuk'adosut pemeh pdainu Isowr 'lam ava' daat kindit tih adopurchuh chaak tidit neen nih kdehn. Ava' vah Siijar hinni miichai sumqhai tpiik avah nowlam dorot mow, dorotma pli?
41012015	Neen nih kdopiik inni kqha mow, kdopiikmaan nih kqha pli?” dilamda. Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan nih kqha mpurhuwi chaakin ava' deithida, mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih taluleiyi Neiya atperteel inna? tu'u Nei kihin nih denarii khat mheipdhen noh, isuw nih,” dida.
41012016	Mthungta mmaan nih denarii khat arvansin piik lamda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' m'leenki pthla ungta jiiktikrii avah kuwda?” Ungta mmaan nih, Mma' hinni: “Havah Siijar dow,” dilamda.
41012017	Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Siijar dow rek avah Siijar hinni apiin ungta Isowr dow rek avah Isowr hinni apiin,” dida. Mthungta mmaan nah Mma' 'leenni ngak chlamda.
41012018	Audilli trin kerheelna' ka'am pemeh kdi, Saddusy aangqhe rek avah Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda, Mma' hinni kheel chlamda:
41012019	“Chukpu, Moses vah neen kihin innu hanto' kjitda: ‘Unau kuwmiikhat tih mnuwn mapthi thida mdiyow chaak bih, ungta mnaumsuwn ma'amma bih, mnaupa ava ngi mnuwn avah ko'onqhidon, mma' thenni mnaumsuwn mdopqhan piik rah,’ dida.
41012020	'Tunnu unau chai tikhiu ka'am rek khat am lamda. Mekver ava ngi snu khat theda ungta mdiyow chaak thungta mnaumsuwn khatleh mamda.
41012021	Ungta miknitna' ava ngi mnuwn avah ko'onqhi nowlda ungta diyou chda ungta mma' rukku mnaumsuwn khatleh mamda. Ungta mukdumna' ava' rukku anto ngi tlowda.
41012022	Anto ngi mtikhiuna' kphadek ki snu avah mnuwn purthuh lamda pdainu mnaumsuwn khatleh thlowi lam mda. Mqutna'rel lih snu ava' rukka diyou chda.
41012023	Avaleiyi, trin kerheelna' thuh, mmaan nih mrinkerheel sapin thung vah mmah kuw nuwn kurthuwk rang ngoh? Mleiya mma' avah mtikhiu khiunni mnuwn mdopthut sapin,” dilamda.
41012024	Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Kchiir laika rek ungta Isowr ruhtan ava' adodeh maan leiyi, naanna parmak maan timow?
41012025	Mleiya mmaan nih kdiyou thungki mrinkerheelin thung vah, mmaan nih innknei ruk am nimeh ungta innkpernee ruk am nimeh pdainu mmaan avah parvaan ki vaantamsi rek hep daat lamrah.
41012026	Pdainu kdiyou rinkerheelna' ki mlei avah Moses laika thungki chaan chim kka ki paumin thung ngi taluhep pih, Isowr rih mma' hinni mthe tidit avah naan nih parcham maan timow? Hanto ngi mdothe ‘Neiya Abraham ki Isowr ping, Aijek ki Isowr ping.’ ungta Jakob ki Isowr ping, mdodit. (Mpk. 3:6,15)
41012027	Mma' avah kdiyou ki Isowr pemeh pdainu kring ki Isowr. Hava' leiyi naanna kdung ngi aparma chaak inna.”
41012028	Audilli nowlam chukpu rek arlak ki khat thlengda ungta mma ngi mmaan kerteenna' avah arjada ungta Mma ngi kqhajik ki marthaan lam a, tidit deithida, Mma' hinni hanto' kheelda: “Hava' mkheng arlak ki paupiik mkhatna' avah tva o?” dida.
41012029	Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto' arthaangda: “Hava' mkheng arlak ki paupiik mkhatna' avah, Arjaan, O Isreel rek, neenki ktlangknai kma' Kruwng Isowr, ktlangknai kma' Kruwng avah khadaat.
41012030	Ungta nang ngi nangki Kruwng, nangki Isowr avah aplungchai mkheng ngi, apthlarin mkheng ngi, aplungrin mkheng ngi ungta aruhtan mkheng ngi vonsat adolow chaak rah. (Knl. 6:4-5) Havah mkhatna' paupiik ava'.
41012031	Ungta miknitna' ava' hep daat avah hava': ‘Nang ngi a'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah.’ (Lev. 19:18) Hava'le' han'tun nih klin paupiik morson ka'am pemeh,” dida.
41012032	Mthungta nowlam chukpu ava ngi Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Chukpu kqhajik ki athe a, Nang ngi mkindit kat athe a, tidit tah Isowr khadaat ka'am ungta morson ka'am pemeh pdainu Mma' daat.
41012033	Ungta plungchai mkheng ngi, tedehpindit chaak mkheng ngi, pthlarin mkheng ngi ungta ruhtan mkheng ngi Mma' vonsat tolow chaak ungta mdaksa katheppi mi'innveen vonsat klow kcha' ava ngi, meirinparlaan le' rintparlaanna' mkheng ki mkarthak,” dida.
41012034	Jisu ngi mma ngi kindit dok ki mdo'arthaan mdeh thungta Mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang nga Isowr kruwngpaalna' thungki 'lam lapa mtih,” dida. Audilli kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' hinni paukheel morson kheel pchaang lam mda.
41012035	Ava' dilli Jisu ngi luwbuk'inn thuh mpurchuh meek lam chunni arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Hava' nowlam chukpu rek ava ngi Mesaiah avah David Chapa, mdoditin avah taluhep pih abin inna?
41012036	Mleiya Pthla Kchiir ar'aang ngi, David mdakkat tih hanto'theda: “Kruwng ngi neiki Kruwng hinni: ‘Neiyi Nang amiihal rek avah Akhuhther rih akthiik piikduh khimkheiyi, Nei kma chang thah iko'ong daat’, dida, mdodit. (Luw. 110:1)
41012037	Avaleiyi, David mdakkat tih Mma' avah, ‘neiki Kruwng,’ mdodit Mma' avah taluhep pih mma' chapa kurthuwk rang ngoh?” Ungta miithlaang thlaang rekvah Mma' pau avah plung kngam mih arja chlamda.
41012038	Audilli Mma ngi mpurchuh lam chunni mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih, phriktluwn hilnada tkorlon tkorlon rah kngei kcha' rek ungta kyurkren mun thung ngi mido'arvuwi rah kngei kcha' nowlam chukpu rek hinki ikilrindei chaan.
41012039	Mmaan nih sinegog thung ngi longkhom kqha ngeen lamda ungta tchaak tneekna' mun rek thung ngi mmunkqha ngeen chlamda.
41012040	Mmaan nih ksowt ksowt tih rinmaktham chaak leekin ava ngi meikhunu rek inn avah mdochaak dokin. Hava'le' ava ngi klin nih tupsulna' avah karlaang chlam rah.”
41012041	'Tunnu Jisu a sumbuwr raalpha ngi ko'ongda ungta mii rekki taluhep pih sumbuwr ava' thuh sum mapthlat chaak inna tidit avah deida. Ungta svang knempok rekki musvangthuhn avah knem mih pthla chlamda.
41012042	Audilli meikhunu srah khat thlengda jiisen sumqiit 'kniisisi, tidit tah penny plii ki khatpang, ava' pthla chda.
41012043	Mthungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek avah Mhin nih own lam thida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, hava' meikhunu srah ava ngi sumbuwr ava' thuh kdaal kcha' rek khimkhei arlak ki knemsi ngi mapthlat chaak a.
41012044	Mleiya mmaan mkhengin ava' vah kepleet tih mdothlowi chaakin thungki mdopthlatin pdainu hava' snu ava' vah masraht thuh chaak thungki, mrinkhu mkheng thung ngi mrin chaakna' rang ava' mdopthlat chaak dok.”
41013001	Ava' dilli Mma ngi luwbuk'inn thungki mvanthuh thungta Msikhu rek arlak ki khat tih Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Chukpu, asuw o, lung rek havah tya kqha chdaat a ungta hava' innsak avah tya thuh kqha chdaat ane!” dida.
41013002	Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi hava' innsak klinpa avah adeh a? Hava' 'leenki lung khadaat rukka lung morson khat 'leenni tvarpthima ngi amdaat nimeh.”
41013003	'Tunnu Mma ngi luwbuk'inn heiraal ki kruwn lown thah mko'on arlaan nih, Pitar, James, Johon ungta Andria leh ngi Mma' hinni tuprut tih pau kheel chlamda.
41013004	“Mheithe piik inno, hava'le' avah teden thung ngi kthuwk rang? Ungta hava' mkheng ava' mkurkhumna' rang ki thenni titinna' talu kthuwk rang?” dilamda.
41013005	Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan karthaang ngi hanto ngi tethe pqhunda: “Naan nih, kuwkhat leh ngi adotuhuwn chaak mana' raan ikilrin chaan.
41013006	Mleiya Nei kmiing 'leenni mii knempok thlengdon nih, ‘neiya Mesaiah ping,’ kdi rah ungta mii knempok kuhuwng chrah.
41013007	Ungta naan nih raal rek kthuwk arjaakin ungta raalkho arjaakin thuh aplungin pyamaan, tidit tah hava' dow rek avah kthuwk rah pdainu mqutna' avah thuwk mlai.
41013008	Mleiya chaat khat tih chaat khat 'leenni krip rah ungta kruwngpaalna' khat tih kruwngpaalna' khat 'leenni krip rah. Ungta mmun knempok thung ngi ringnaang rek kthuwk rah. Hava'le' avah plungyatna' rekki mdopqhunna' ngaal.
41013009	Pdainu naan nih athen inni ikilrin dei chaan, tidit tah mmaan nih naan avah kunpun rek hin kpha ngi akparlaan raan ungta sinegog rek thung ngi naanna akbun raan. Ungta naan avah Nei kmiing leiyi, paamkpu rekle' paamkruwng rek hinni, tidit tah mmaan ki rinpaumin ki thenni akqhi raan.
41013010	Ungta kqhapaumin avah rukrirep pih chaat mkheng rek hinni tparjaam dok ki ma'am rah.
41013011	Pdainu mmaan nih naan atokyownin ungta atyur chaakin thung ngi, taluhep pih arthaang nikaan tidit leiyi mduh thah bin purthunmaan. Pdainu mpha ava' thung ngi talutalu yoso adotpiikin ava' atheen, tidit tah kpau avah nang pemeh pdainu Pthla Kchiir ava'.
41013012	'Tunnu mu'umnau khat tih mu'umnau khat avah kdiyou kpha ngi kyur chrah ungta mpa ngi mnau ungta nau rekki mnuhmpa rek kepteng ngi krip lam rah.
41013013	Ungta Nei kmiing leiyi, naan avah mii mkheng ngi akahal chraan. Pdainu mqutna' kpha ngi kdiil pchaang kcha' mma' avah ksan chrah.
41013014	Pdainu naan nih khulpu Daniel lih mdothe: ‘tepder kurhuwiyi tkenveina',’ (Dn. 11:31, 12:11) ava ngi mrimana' rang thung ngi mri adehn thung ngi, hava' kpa kcha' mma' ava ngi havah adeipindih chso. Audilli Judia thung ngi ka'am rek mmaan ava ngi lown rek thah ichen chlamso.
41013015	Ungta inntun thah ka'am dok kcha' mma' ava ngi inn thuh kluwt rang ngi junqum mso, mditmata mi'inn thungki doklou rah vangluwt mso.
41013016	Ungta loulaiyi ka'am mma' ava ngi mdomna klou rah kerheel mso.
41013017	Pdainu nit rek ava' thung ngi mii'pum rek ungta naukkai rek mmaan ki thenni suwthitna'a.
41013018	Ungta naan nih achenna' raan mpha avah phalbi thuh mkurthuh mana' rah rin'iktham chaan.
41013019	Mleiya Isowr rih dultipaam mpurthuh daat ki kupqhun nih hava' 'tunki mpha arvankpha thung ngi mdopurthuh dok rek ava' thung ngi kthuwk mlailiit mditmata teden rukku kthuwk kma' rang, kdung ngi tyattraanna' avah mpha ava' thung ngi kthuwk rah.
41013020	Ungta Kruwng ngi mpha avah mdoptowi kma'don nih, daksa khatleh ruk karsan pchaang nimeh, pdainu taktlan ksadok rekki thenni, tidit tah Mma ngi mdokchol ksadok rekki thenni Mma ngi nit rek avah moptowi pthipiik doklam a.
41013021	Audilli naan ahin nih kuwmiikhat tih, ‘Asuwn, Mesaiah avah hava' thuh ka'am a, mditmata Asuwn, wvah thah ka'am a, mditna, naan nih avah lam'rin chmaan.
41013022	Mleiya mlangkma' Mesaiah rekle' mlangkma' khulpu rek avah kthuwkpok lamrah ungta tuhuwn chaakna' rang leiyi, titinna' rekle' tngana' rekpa ktlow lamrah, mkirsit bih, mdokthlan ksa rek kpha ruk kuhuwng chlam rah.
41013023	Pdainu asuwn, dow mkheng avah mthuhduh ngi akthepiik inna, ikilrin chaan.
41013024	Pdainu mpha ava' thung ngi, kdung ngi tyattraanna' ava' dilli, Kni a kjiing chrah ungta thla ngi mar'aang piinimeh.
41013025	Parvaan ki bursi rek avah kqu chlam rah ungta parvaan ki ruhtan rek avah kakna chrah.
41013026	Audilli mmaan nih Mii Chapa avah armei thung ngi ruhtanna' le' tkonlorna' tu' kilqhi ngi arjung kqum kdei lamrah.
41013027	Ungta ava' dilli Mma ngi Mma' vaantamsi rek arjupthla donni tirthli mirkil plii thungki ungta dultipaam mqutna' thungki ngi parvaan mqutna' kpha thungki Mma' dokthlan ksa rek avah kpurkuwk lamrah.
41013028	'Tunnu hava' kduwtbul 'leenki pau tportolna' avah ikurchuk chaan. Mleiya mbaak rek ava ngi downgda ungta marna rek muksun dokcheu naan nih khulum kpha chrah mthe a tidit adodehn.
41013029	Ava' vah naan rukku hava' dow rek ava' kthuwk adehn thung ngi Mma' avah knai kcha' a, thurngutbul lih krip daat a tidit adeiyin.
41013030	Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, hava' dow rek ava' mthuthut duh khimkheiyi, hava' suruwl avah teden rukku qudokvot nimeh.
41013031	Dulti le' parvaan avah kqu chrah pdainu Nei kpauna rek avah teden rukku kenvei dok vot nimeh.
41013032	Pdainu nit avah ungta qhang avah kuwkhat leh ngi deimeh, parvaan ki vaantamsi rek rukku mditmata Chapa ava' rukku deimeh, pdainu Pa ava' daat chrel lih mdodeh.
41013033	Naan nih ikilrin chaan, ungta rin'iktham chaan tidit tah naan nih mpha avah teden rang tidit adodehn pemeh.
41013034	Havah miikhat tih mi'inn mapthida ungta msuwk khat hinni ruhtanna' parlaan pthithida mnong mnong rah piithida ungta thurngut krung ava' hinni, ihardei, dithida lamkla thah kipjiin kcha' ava' hep daat.
41013035	Ava'leiyi ihardei chaan, tidit tah naan nih innkpupa avah teden thung ngi ktlung kerheel rang tidit adodehn pemeh. Mma' avah kjiing mow, thanqim mow, harkhuwn mow, mditmata jiingsun rang mow, tidit adodehn pemeh.
41013036	Mditma bih tedeh dokmah ngi mtlunkhot bih, a'iidaatin arlaan nih aktlun phaak raan.
41013037	Ungta Neiyi naan ahin nih kdothe avah mii mkheng hinni kdothe, ‘ihardei chaan’.”
41014001	'Tunnu Taplaanna' ungta Thowldii ktaak thenpen tchaakna' rah nit ava' mdophaakna' rangnga nii'knii daat vaat chda. Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki Mma' avah taluhep pih tepmenda tokyown rang ungta Mma' avah te'eyow rang tidit leiyi, kdung ngi mdosut thlaamin.
41014002	Pdainu mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Hava' tmaalna' ki mpha thung mso mditma bih mii vaangklum chuh rah.”
41014003	Ungta Bethany thuh raichi ktong Simon inn thuh ma'amin thung ngi, Mma ngi khaan tor'owida mko'on arlaan nih, mkhon knemyou kcha' ki spikenard reidii avah alabaster khuwng khat thung ngi sinda snu khat thlengda. Ungta mma ngi mkhuwng ava' pkuida ungta reidii avah Jisu luwchai thah letda.
41014004	Pdainu marlakin ki aangqhe rek ava ngi muplungin kthi ngi msingreelin thung ngi, “taluleiyi hava' mikrimkdi reidii avah mpartlai pthidaat a?
41014005	Mleiya havah denarii arja kdum kkheel lih jur chthida srah rek hinpleh ngi npiik chaak daat bih,” dilamda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah kdung ngi kerteenqhi lamda.
41014006	Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Mthina amaapthiin, taluleiyi naan nih mmah apyat inna? Mma ngi kthen nih nong kqha khat mdotlot chaak.
41014007	Mleiya naan nih srah rek avah mpha ktai amqhi naandi' ungta naan nih mmaan hinni kqha totlot rah angei chaakin khimkhei thung ngi tlow chdaat naandi', pdainu Neiya mpha ktai thuh mthlowi tlit daat nimaan tih
41014008	Mma ngi mdotlot pchaan ava' mdotlot chaak. Mma ngi mduh thah thuwkda Nei kdaksa avah tulruwlna' rang ki thenni reidii mdotupbul chaak.
41014009	Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna: ‘Mleiya dultipaam mkheng thung ngi tva'tva' thung yoso, hava' kqhapaumin ava' tparjaamna' mkheng thung ngi, hava' snu ava ngi mdotlot ava' rukka mma' tbinphaakna ngi tethe tlit tih ka'am rah.’ ”
41014010	Audilli sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat, Kerioth ki Judas ava ngi, mmaan hinni Mma' kyur chrang ngi thimpu kenreel rek hinni vada.
41014011	Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta muplungin ngamda ungta mma' hinni sum tpiikna' rah paureel reel lamda. Ungta mma ngi taluhep pih Mma' avah tyur chaak rang tidit tih mlam sutthlaamda.
41014012	'Tunnu Thowldii ktaak Thenpen tchaakna' ki mkhatna' nit tih mmaan nih Taplaanna' Yausuwn me'eyown thung ngi, Msikhu rekki Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Mleiya Nang ngi Taplaanna' ava' adochaakna' rang ki thenni, neenve ngi tva'thuh chetda kdoporthlon raan angei a?” dilamda.
41014013	Mthungta Mma ngi, Msikhu chai'knii rek avah hanto'theda mmaanve avah heipthla lamda: “Naanve ngi khuwpii thah vaan rang ngi ungta beeldak khat thung ngi dii kokdom pselpa khat kurdutqhi naandi', naanve ngi mma'dil aqowiyin.
41014014	Ungta mma ngi mluwna' innkpupa ava' hinni hanto ngi atheen: ‘Neiyi ksikhu rektu' Taplaanna' ava' kdochaakna' rah maltlun'inn avah tva rangda?,’ dida, Chukpu ngi mthe a, adiin.
41014015	Audilli mma ngi karthak ki innkhaar klinpa khat aktedet raan, ava' thuh naanve ngi aportlotin rah aporthlongin ungta ava' thuh naanve ngi neen nthen inni aporthlong jikin,” dida.
41014016	Ungta Msikhu 'knii rek ava ngi anto ngi chet lamda ungta khuwpii ava' thuh luwt lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Mma ngi mdothe ava'jik ki kurdutqhi lamda ungta mmaanve ngi mmun ava' thuh Taplaanna' avah porthlong chlamda.
41014017	Ungta kluhpha mve thungta Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rektu' ava' thuh thleng lamda.
41014018	'Tunnu mmaan nih ko'ong lamda ungta mchaakin thungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah naan arlak ki, Nei tu' then kchasap khat tih Neiya mukyur chrah,” dida.
41014019	Ungta ava ngi mmaan avah muplungin yatna' pqhunda ungta Mma' hinni khatkhat tih hanto' tethe pqhun lamda: “Avah nei ngaal mowi?” dilamda. Ungta morson khat tih, “avah nei ngaal mowi?” dida.
41014020	Audilli Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mma' avah sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat, Nei tu' arkuw khatsap thung ngi kdophuwm qhive mma' ava' rah.
41014021	Mii Chapa avah Mma' leiyi, mdokjit dok ava'jik ki kchet chrah pdainu Mii Chapa kyur kcha' mii avah msuwkthi kcha' a! Mii ava' ki thenvah tqouqou rukku mqou chaakma daatple bih, kqha rangnga!” dida.
41014022	Ungta mmaan nih mmaal meekin chunni, Jisu ngi thenpen khat louda, suwqhat piida ungta avah khuida ungta mmaan hinni pii lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Havah Nei kdaksa, Arlaangin, Achaan,” dida.
41014023	Audilli Mma ngi tong ava' chomda ungta Mma ngi mpanpaak chaak dilli Mma ngi avah mmaan hinni pii lamda ungta mmaan mkheng inni avah neesap lamda.
41014024	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Havah mii knempok ki thenni toptlon dok pauqum renki, Nei kihii ava'.
41014025	Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, Neiyi Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi ren ava' kneekduh kpha thung ngi hava' riithlumdii avah neeporson nimaang.”
41014026	Ungta mmaan nih tpanpaakna' laa khat the dok lam thida mmaan nih Kruwn lown thah hang lamda.
41014027	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan akhengin avah tuwngkluw jaankat tih Nei kleiyi khuhsiir pirthiter chnaandi', tidit tah hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: ‘Neiyi Yaukqhi avah sornikdi' Ungta yau rek avah kerjeiter chlam rah,’ (Jkh. 13:7) mdodit.
41014028	Pdainu Nei mteperdel dok dilli, Neiya naan duh thah Galily thah yunikdi',” dida.
41014029	Pdainu Pitar rih Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Mii mkheng ngi khuhsiir pirthiter chdaat yoso, neiya pirthi nimaang,” dida.
41014030	Mthungta Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a, tidit tah tuwngkluw jaankat tih, har vei'knii mkhuwn duh ngi nang ngi Neiya veikdum mmat nadi',” dida.
41014031	Pdainu mma ngi kdungset tih plung kluwt tih, “Neiyi Nang tu' kdiyouve rang kpha thung rukku, neiyi Nang nga amat nimaang,” dida. Ungta mmaan mkhengin rukku anto'sap pih the lamda.
41014032	Audilli mmaan nih mmiing Gethsamany mdoditin mmun khat thuh thleng lamda ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni: “Neiyi rinkaktham chaak arlaan nih naanna hava' thuh iko'ong daatin,” dida.
41014033	Ungta Mma ngi Pitar, James ungta Johon le' avah qhi lamda ungta Mmah kdung ngi muplung dungda ungta muplung yachda.
41014034	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya kapthlarin kdung reen nih, kdiyou rang kpha ngi kya kcha' a. Hava' thuh naanna i'am daatin rah ihardei chaan,” dida.
41014035	Ungta Mma ngi 'lamkla heiyi heikorsownda ungta dulti thah tluwda ungta mrow rang cheentung ngi, qhang avah Mma' hinki mkorsown dokna' rah rinktham chda.
41014036	Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Abba, Apa, Nang athennu dow mkheng avah kurthuwk pchaang! Hava' tong avah Nei kihin ki mheilow pthi piikcha', anto' pdainu Nei kuplungbin mso, Nah aplungbin daatso,” dida.
41014037	Audilli arvangda ungta mmaan avah ki'iip kcha'ter rih arvanpha lamda ungta Mma ngi Pitar hinni hanto'theda: “Simon nang nga ki'iip kchaampti? Nang ngi qhang khatpang daat ruk har pchaang mtimow?
41014038	Ihardei cha' ungta rin'iktham dei cha', mditma bih kepthleem thuh tla chnadi'. Dakat tih apthlarin vah mbin a pdainu adaksa a kdowng kcha' a,” dida.
41014039	Veikhat Mma ngi vanowlda rinktham chnowlda ungta mdothe dok ksa pauna rek ava' the nowlda.
41014040	Ungta Mma ngi marvan kerheel thungta mmaan avah veikhat ki'iip dok kcha ngi arvanpha nowl lamda, tidit tah mmaan nah kdung ngi mmikin khuh chda ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni talu tarthaan rang tidit dei lam mda.
41014041	Audilli Mma ngi mveikdumna' arvang nowlda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanna tunkpha thuh iip chdaat intinu karnga kchaan na? 'Tunnu kkhom a! Qhang avah kvei dok kcha' a, asuwn, Mii Chapa avah pnu kervei rek khut thung ngi myur pthi dok a.
41014042	Ikerdelin, isunin cheh. Asuwn Nei mukyur kcha' mma' avah karva a,” dida.
41014043	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih Mma ngi mpaumeek arlaan nih sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat Judas avah, raal'kaang le' kchung ksin miipiipa khat tu' thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta kver rek hinki arvada.
41014044	'Tunnu Mma' kyur kcha' ava ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda, mkerdehnaan khat mdopiik doklam: “Mleiya kuwku yoso, neiyi kdoput Mma' avah ava', naan nih Mma' avah akyowngin ungta Mma' avah kqha ngi vanqhi chaan,” mdodit.
41014045	Ungta Mma ngi marvan thuh daat le' mma ngi Mma' avah phatengda ungta Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Rabbi, Rabbi!” dida ungta Mma' avah putda.
41014046	Audilli mmaan nih mkhutin avah Mma' 'leenni ptla lamda ungta Mma' avah kyowng lamda.
41014047	Ungta ava' thuh krip daat rek arlak ki khat tih mraal'kaang turthuhda ungta thimpu kenreel suwk khat avah duda ungta makna sellotda.
41014048	Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih, Nei mikqhi rang ngi raal'kaang rekle' kchung rek sinin tinu raanqhul kupru khat kepteng heppi karvaan imptih?
41014049	Neiyi mniiktaiyi naan tu' amnu luwbuk'inn thuh apurchuk innu ungta naanvah mokyowng maantinu. Pdainu Kchiir laika rek avah mkurtluwm rang thah ktla,” dida.
41014050	Audilli mmaan mkheng inni Mma' avah mapthi lamda ungta chen chlamda.
41014051	'Tunnu Mma' avah ksetnau kuwvarleh khat tih mdak chaiyi buw kperneem khat kperjeelda mdil qowi chda. Ungta mma' avah ksetnau rekki kyowng lamda.
41014052	Ungta mma ngi mbuw kperneem avah mapthi thida mmaan khut thungki mdak chaiyi chen chda.
41014053	Ungta mmaan nih Jisu avah thimpu kenreelsi ava' hinni vanqhi lamda ungta mma' hinni thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rek ungta nowlam chukpu rek mkheng avah kurtuwl lamda ka'am daat lam.
41014054	Pdainu Pitar rih leer thah thimpu kenreelsi ava' khuwlown kpha ngi Mma'dil avah qowi chda. Ungta mma ngi suwk rektu' mei owsap lamda mdakin kpurlum chlamda.
41014055	Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' kunpun mkheng ava ngi Mma' avah mdo'eyowna' raan ki thenni Jisu kepteng ngi sakhi thlaam lamda pdainu khadaat ruk phang lam mda.
41014056	Mleiya mii knempok ki sakhi avah pii lamda pdainu msakhi piik rekin avah khadaat ruk kilqhi mda.
41014057	Ungta aangqhe ngi rip lamda Mma' kepteng ngi hanto' the lamda:
41014058	“Maanve ngi, Mma ngi, ‘Neiyi hava' khut tih tsak luwbuk'inn avah ekrep nikdi' ungta niikdum thung ngi khut tih tsakmah morson khat sanikdi',’ mdodit, kdo'arjaakin,” dilamda.
41014059	Pdainu msakhipiik rekin avah khadaat ruk kilqhidei mda.
41014060	Ungta thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi marlak inni ripda ungta hanto'theda, Jisu hinni pau kheelda: “Nang nga takhatleh arthaang mtinuh? Hava' mii rekki Nang akepteng ngi sakhi mdopiik rekin avah taluda,” dida?
41014061	Pdainu Mmah rimkdi am chda ungta dow khatleh arthaang mda. Veikhat thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi Mma' hinni hanto'theda, pau kheel nowlda: “Nang nga suwqhat Chapa Mesaiah ava'pti?” dida.
41014062	Ungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Ou ava' ping. Ungta nang ngi Mii Chapa avah Ruhtan ki machang thah ko'ongdon parvaan ki armei rek 'leenni arjung kqum deinadi',” dida.
41014063	Audilli thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi mbuwdiir jenda ungta hanto'theda: “Neen nih hava' heihin nih talu sakhi morson tpiikpom rah ka'am a?
41014064	Naan nih pthitda mpau avah arja thuhn tinu! Talu abin inna?” dida. Ungta mmaan mkheng inni Mma' avah mdiyow rah tidit tih psulsap lamda.
41014065	Ava' dilli morson aangqhe ngi Mma' avah ptil lih pthot lamda ungta Mma' avah mmik klumpthi lamda ungta bun lamda ungta Mma' hinni “Eh Pau kpurphuwng!” dilamda. Ungta nongmii klin rekki mapyaan nih Mma' avah tpeeng lamda.
41014066	'Tunnu Pitar rah khuwlown thah ma'am daat arlaan nih thimpu kenreelsi suwk'owr snunau khat arvada.
41014067	Ungta mma ngi Pitar avah mei owda ka'am daat mdeh thungta mma ngi suwrim thida hanto'theda: “Nang rukka Najareth ki Jisu tu' kilqhi kchokptida?” dida.
41014068	Pdainu mma ngi hanto'theda matda: “Nang ngi adothe avah neiya tedeh ruk deimaang ungta deipindih maang,” dida. Ungta mmah dulbuk thah vangthuwk chda arlaan nih har khuwngda.
41014069	Ungta suwk'owr snunau ava ngi mma' avah veikhat dei nowlda ungta mma ngi mbeh ngi krip rek ava' hinni hanto ngi tethe pqhunda: “Havah mmaan arlak ki khat,” dida.
41014070	Pdainu mma ngi matnowlda. Ungta ambong thida ava' thuh krip rek mmaan ava ngi veikhat Pitar hinni hanto' the nowl lamda: “Dakat tih nang nga mmaan arlak ki khat mun nadi', nang nga Galily ki mii ptih, apaupau vih kandang kcha' imptih,” dilamda.
41014071	Pdainu mma ngi kthi karthamda: “Naan nih adotheen mii avah neiya deimaang,” dida.
41014072	Ungta arlaan kat tih mveiknitna' har khuwngda. Mthungta Pitar rih, Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto ngi mdothe pau avah binphaakda: “Har vei'knii mkhuwn duh ngi, nang ngi Neiya veikdum mmat nadi',” mdodit ava' binphaakda. Ungta mma ngi ava' mbin thungta mmah qap chda.
41015001	M'tunkat daat tih, mjiingsun nih thimpu kenreel rek ava ngi kver rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta kunpun mkheng tu' kerseel lam thida Jisu avah bowl lamda, vanqhi lamda ungta Pilaat hinni hanparlaan lamda.
41015002	Audilli Pilaat tih Mma' hinni hanto ngi pau kheelda: “Nang nga Jihudi rekki paamkruwng pti?” Ungta Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto ngi theda: “Neiya nang ngi adothe ava' ping,” dida.
41015003	Ungta thimpu kenreel rek ava ngi dow knempok 'leenni Mma' avah mraal pii lamda pdainu Mma ngi dow khatleh arthaang mda.
41015004	Audilli Pilaat tih Mma' hinni veikhat hanto ngi kheelda: “Nang nga takhatleh arthaang mtinuh? Asuw o, mmaan nih, Nang akepteng ngi tya thuh sakhi mpiik inna?”
41015005	Pdainu ava' kpha thung ngi Jisu ngi dow khatleh arthaang mda mthungta Pilaat tah ngak chda.
41015006	'Tunnu kmaal ava' thung ngi, kuwku yoso, mmaan nih mdongeiyin, rowngmii khat mmaan thenni tapthlatpiik avah mma' nowpa kurthuwk chda.
41015007	Ungta mpha ava' thung ngi sarka 'leenni nih raal mnakin thuh, maplap rektu' miike'eyou mmiing Barabbas, mdoditin sarka 'tunnu raalkna miikhat avah rowng'inn thuh ka'am daat.
41015008	Mthungta miipii rekki kdung ngi owng lamda mma ngi mpha ktai thuh mmaan thenni mdotlot kcho ava' mdotlotna' rah mma' hinni tiqhil pqhun lamda.
41015009	Pdainu Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda, arthaang lamda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih, Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng ava' adokapthlat piik raan angei inna?” dida.
41015010	Mleiya thimpu kenreel rekki mdopner inni Mma' avah mma' hinni mdotparlaan lam tidit avah mdodeh.
41015011	Pdainu thimpu kenreel rek ava ngi, mma ngi mmaan hinni Barabbas mdopthlat piik lamna' rah, miipii rek avah siinchaak dok lamda.
41015012	Ungta Pilaat tih arthaang nowl lamda ungta veikhat hanto'theda: “Mdittu' naan nih Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng adoditin Mma' avah talu kdoporlow rah angei inna?” dida.
41015013	Mthungta mmaan nih veikhat owng lamda: “Mma' avah apthowiyou!” dilamda.
41015014	Audilli Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi, Mma ngi talu kqha kma' mdotlot ma'amna ngi?” dida. Pdainu mmaan nih kerkheelset tih, “Mma' avah apthowiyou!” dilamda.
41015015	Mthungta Pilaat tih miipii rek plung ngamna' rah Barabbas avah pthlatpiik lamda ungta mma ngi Jisu avah khuikin kchung ngi mbun dilli topthowiyow rang ngi, mmaan hinni parlaan pthi lamda.
41015016	Audilli raalmii rekki Mma' avah Pritoriam, mdoditin paamkpu'inn thung ngi luwqhi lamda ungta mmaan nih raalmiilop mkheng avah own purkuwk lamda.
41015017	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah kning ngi ksen dona pnaak lamda ungta tirling laar luwkhum khat her lamda ungta avah Mma' luwchai 'leenni pkhum lamda.
41015018	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah luwbu leek lamda: “Akurvuwi chaak inna, Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng,” dilamda.
41015019	Audilli mmaan nih mupkhup inni tirdiil leek lamda Mma' avah luwbuk chlamda.
41015020	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mipnichaak dokin dilli kning ngi ksen dona avah khowk pthi lamda ungta Mma' mdak dona rek ava' pnaak lamda ungta mdopthowi yowna' raan ki thenni, Mma' avah qhi lamda.
41015021	'Tunnu mmaan nih khros avah Alekjender le' Ruphus pa Sairen ki Simon, mkhuwpaam thungki thuwkda kipjiin kcha' ungta ava' thuh kthleng khot kcha' mma' ava' topdom lamda.
41015022	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah Golgotha, mdoditin, luwruh mun kdi ngi tperheel, mmun khat thang ngi hanqhi lamda.
41015023	Audilli mmaan nih Mma' hinni mdoneek rang ngi myrrh reidii tu' tporchou thowldii pii lamda pdainu Mma ngi avah neemda.
41015024	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' mopthowiyown thung ngi, mmaan nih Mma' buwdiir rek 'leenni, mii khatkhat tih talu ktang chrang a tidit leiyi, mthen inni pchalpiik sutna' lamda.
41015025	'Tunnu mukdumna' qhang ava' thung ngi mmaan nih Mma' avah pthowiyou lamda.
41015026	Ungta Mma' mdopsulnaan jiiktikrii khat avah hanto ngi kjit lamda mkarthak ki daar lamda: “JIHUDI REKKI PAAMKRUWNG.”
41015027	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' tu' raanqhul kupru 'knii rek avah khat tih machang thah ungta morson khat ava ngi Mmaleh thah pthowiyou lamda.
41015028	Anto ngi Kchiir laika ngi hanto ngi: “Ungta Mma' avah nowlam tukksut kma' rektu' taipinqimsap lamda” (Is. 53:12) mdodit avah kurtluwmda.
41015029	Ungta ava' thuh kthleng rek mkheng ava ngi Mma' avah pthitda paupsukna' lamda, mmaan nih mluwn ksuk lamda hanto' the lamda: “Oho, Luwbuk'inn ekrep thida, niikdum thung ngi ksa rang Nang nga,
41015030	Athina ngi ikarsan rah khros 'leenki arjunqum low,” dilamda.
41015031	Anto' heppi thimpu kenreel rek rukku, nowlam chukpu rektung ngi pni chaak lamda ungta msingreelin thung ngi hanto ngi the lamda: “Mma ngi mii morsonna san chda pdainu Mma' mdakka karsan pchaang chmeh.
41015032	Isreel rekki Paamkruwng, hava' Mesaiah avah khros 'leenki arjungqumso, tidit tah neen rukku ava' deithida lam'trin chaakna' rah,” dilamda. Ungta Mma' tu' mdopthowiyow mmaanve rukku Mma' avah rai chlamda.
41015033	'Tunnu qhang truk mtlaak thungta paam mkheng thung ngi qhang tku kphadek ki jiingnu tlungda.
41015034	Ungta qhang tku thung vah Jisu ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Eloi, Eloi lama sabakthani?” dida. Ava' avah, “Neiki Isowr, Neiki Isowr, taluleiyi, Nang ngi Neiya atmaak pthi a?” (Luw. 22:1) mdoditna' kdi ngi perheel lamda.
41015035	Ava' thung ngi krip rek aangqhe ngi, ava' marjaakin thungta hanto' the lamda: “Asuwn, Mma ngi Elaijah mo'own nah,” dilamda.
41015036	Audilli kuwmiikhat tih heichenda buwphown khat avah thowldii kdor thung ngi plupthida piipe kuwng 'leenni daarda ungta mdoneek rang ngi, Mma' hinni parlaan chda. Ungta mma ngi: “Mma' avah bimaan, Elaijah ngi Mma' kupqum rah kthuwksik rang mow, isuwn cheh,” dida.
41015037	Ungta Jisu ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda ungta Mma ngi mqutna' mtadaal qen chda.
41015038	Audilli luwbuk'inn kenje thungki buwjaar avah mtun ki ngi mtii kphadek ki laak 'knii ngi kerjen chda.
41015039	'Tunnu ava' thung ngi krip raalmii arja khat kpupa ava ngi, Mma ngi hanto ngi owng thida mqutna' mtadaal mdoqen chaak mdeh thungta, mma ngi: “Dakat tih hava' Mii avah Isowr Chapa kat thideh,” dida.
41015040	Ungta ava' thung ngi leer rih ksutpqowi snu rek ka'am lam, mmaan ava' arlak ki, Magdala ki Mary, James kdil le' Joses nuh Mary ungta Solomi le' kyaulam.
41015041	Hava' snu rek ava ngi, Mma ngi Galily thuh ma'am thung ngi Mma' avah soplow chlamda mdil mdoqowi chaakin. Ungta Mma' tu' Jerusalem ki arhang kilqhisap snu rekpa rukka kyaulam.
41015042	'Tunnu kluhpha mphaak thungta, tidit tah nit avah tporthlonna' nit mkurthuh leiyi, tidit tah Tkarngatnit mphaak duh ki nit kurthuwkda.
41015043	Mthungta Arimathia ki Joseph, kunpun ava' thung ki, miikenreel khat kurthuwk ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' ningkakraal lih karda kcha' mma' thlengda ungta mningqit ktaak ki Pilaat hinni hangda, Jisu kluwng avah qhil chda.
41015044	Mthungta Pilaat tah Mma ngi kbeiyi mdiyow dok ava'leiyi ngak chda ungta mma ngi raalmii arja khat kpupa ownda, Mma' avah mpha mruk duh thah kdiyou dok kcha' mow, tidit kheelda.
41015045	Ungta mma ngi raalmii arja khat kpupa hinki mkindit mdeh dok dilli, kluwng avah Joseph hinni tpiik rah rotpiikda.
41015046	Audilli mma ngi buw kperneem kqha renda, Mma' avah pqumda ungta buw kperneem ava ngi Mma' avah klumda. Ungta mma ngi, Mma' avah lung khorda mdotlot dok ksa thlaan khat thung ngi pi'iip chda ungta mma ngi thlaankhor nehr ava' thung ngi lung khat purlupda, arkam pthida.
41015047	Ungta Magdala ki Mary le' Joses nuh Mary ngi Mma' mdopi'iina' mmun avah sutpqowi lamda.
41016001	'Tunnu tkarngatnit mthlen dok thungta Magdala ki Mary le' James nuh Mary ungta Solomi leh ngi Mma' mdopubul chaak raan ki thenni reidii renkilring chdok lamda.
41016002	Ungta mmaan nih kparma dok ki arveen ki mkhatna' nit ava' thung ngi, kni mthuh daat le' thlaan ava' thah hang lamda.
41016003	Ungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi: “Kuw ngi neen nthen innu thlaan thungki lung avah mikpurlupiik raanno,” kirdi lamda.
41016004	Pdainu mmaan nih mahansutin thungta lung avah tpurludok ksa ngi handei lamda, tidit tah mlung avah kdung ngi klin.
41016005	Ungta thlaan ava' thuh mluwchun inni mmaan nih ksetnau khat phriktluwn kpowldang kna khat avah machang ktong thah kok'ong daat dei lamda ungta ava ngi muplungin pngakyou chlamda.
41016006	Pdainu mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Aplungin pngakyou chmaan. Naan nih, mdopthowi yown, Najareth ki Jisu athlaam inna, pdainu Mma' avah kkerdel dok! Mmah hava' thuh ammeh. Mmaan nih Mma' mdopi'iinaan mmun avah asuwn.
41016007	Pdainu naan nih vangin rah Msikhu rek hinni ungta Pitar hinni vansongin, tidit tah Mmah naan aduhn nih Galily thah kahangdok, Mma ngi naan ahinin nih mdothe dok ava' heppi, naan nih, Mma' avah ava' thah deinaandi',” dida.
41016008	Audilli mmaan nih kbeiyi yungsun lamda ungta thlaan ava' thung ki yungchen lamda, tidit tah mmaan nah kunchuwn kcha'lam ungta kngakyou kcha'lam. Ungta mmaan nih kuwkhat hinni, dow khatleh ruk thelam mda mleiya mningin kqi kcha'.
41016009	'Tunnu Mma ngi mkerdel thung ngi, kparma ngi arveen ki mkhatna' nit tih, Mma ngi rukrirep pih, Mma ngi mthung ki tarnam tikhiutet mdorei pthipiikna', Magdala ki Mary hinni kterdetda.
41016010	Mma ngi vangda Mma' tu' kilqhi kcha' rek, 'tun'tun nih kurnung karbaangda ungta kqap kcha' rek avale' hinni vansongda.
41016011	Ungta mmaan ava ngi Mma' avah kring kerheel dok kcha' a ungta snu ava ngi Mma' avah mmik ki mdeh tidit marjaakin thungta avah lam'rin chlam mda.
41016012	Ava' dilli Mma ngi, khuwpaam thah kchet rek mmaan arlak ki chai'knii rek hinni mruwngchen msik ki kterdetda.
41016013	Ungta mmaanve ngi mdosonin ava' rukka lamrin chlam mda.
41016014	Ava' dilli Mma ngi mmaan nih khaan thuh mko'onin arlaan nih sowm leikhat rek hinni kterdetda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah mlamrinmaan ungta muplungin kap chai ava'leiyi rai chlamda. Mleiya mmaan nih, Mma ngi mrinkerheel dilli Mma' kdei rek dothe avah lam'mdorin chaakin pemeh.
41016015	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih dultipaam mkheng thung ngi chetin rah kqhapaumin avah mii mkheng hinni aparjaamin.
41016016	Lam'rin chda dii kluwt kcha' mma' avah ksan chrah pdainu lam'krin kma' mma' avah kupsul rah.
41016017	Ungta lam'krin kcha' rek avah hava' titinna' rek ava ngi mdilin kqowi rah. Nei kmiing ngi mmaan nih tarnam rek kreipthi lamrah, mmaan nih pauren rekki kpau lamrah.
41016018	Mmaan nih mkhut inni pruwl rek avah kchom lamrah ungta mmaan nih tidiyowna' kru needok daat lam yoso, ava ngi mmaan avah taluruk pthe lam nimeh, mmaan nih kkowi rek 'leenni mkhutin khiing chlamdon ungta kkowi rek avah kdam chlam rah,” dida.
41016019	Anto ngi Kruwng ngi mmaan hinni mdothe rah mthe dok dilli, Mma' avah Isowr machang thah ko'ong chda.
41016020	Ungta mmaan nih chet lamda ungta mmun ktai thung ngi parjaam chlamda ungta Kruwng ngi mmaan tu' nong tlowsapda ungta titinna' rek ar'aang ngi pauna ava' 'leenni ruhtan pii chlamda. Amen.
42001001	Neen narlak inni mkinditsi tidit tih knet tih lamtrin chaakin dow rek ava' ki paumin avah mii knempok ki kparnaakjik rang ngi kjit thuh dok lamda.
42001002	Avale' avah mupqhun daat ki ngi mmikin nih kdei rek ungta pauna ava' sopklow kcha' rekki mdodehn ava' heppi neen nihin nih avah miparlaan chaanda.
42001003	Avaleiyi, nei rukku dow mkheng avah kurkhumjik ki kdeh chaak dok dilli, mkhatna' ki ngi pqhunda karnaakjik ki, kparthaangsi Thiophilas, nang ahin nih tikjit chaak ava ngi kqha rah tidit tih bin chnuh.
42001004	Mleiya nang ngi ahin nih adotpurchuh doklam dow rek ava' ki mkindit kat ava' adodeh kcha' rang ki thenni havah kdokjit.
42001005	Judia paamkuwl thungki paamkruwng Herod mpaal thung ngi, Abijah lop thungki, mmiing Jakhariah tidit thimpu khat ka'am ungta mnuwn avah Aaron chanu rek thungki ungta mmiing nga Elijabeth tu' mdit.
42001006	Ungta mmaanve avah mikniing inni Isowr miing ngi mrinkindit tih am chlamda. Ungta Kruwng paupiik rekle' nowparit mkheng rek thung ngi tupsulna' ktaak ki kchet kcha'lam.
42001007	Pdainu Elijabeth vonchowima leiyi, nau thlowi chlam mda ungta mmaanve avah mikniing inni kder dok kcha'lam.
42001008	Mleiya mma' lopkarnaak ava' dilkqowiyi mma ngi Isowr aang ngi thimpu khat kurthuwk ki nong mtlot chaak arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda.
42001009	Mleiya mma ngi Kruwng luwbuk'inn thuh mvanluw thungta thimpu kurthuwk ki nowpa dilkqowiyi namreng kapka rang ki pchalpiik avah mma' 'leenni tlada.
42001010	Ungta namreng tapkaakna' mpha ava' thung ngi miipii rek mkheng avah khulown thah rinktham chlamda.
42001011	Audilli Kruwng vaantamsi khat avah namreng tapkaakna' khaan ava' machang thah ripda mhin nih kperdehda.
42001012	Ungta Jakhariah ngi mma' mdeh thungta muplung yada ungta m'leen nih ningqitna' thuwkda.
42001013	Pdainu vaantamsi ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Jakhariah aningpqitma' mleiya arinktham chaak avah atarjaak piik a, tidit tah anuwn Elijabeth tih chapa khat kuplu rah ungta nang ngi mmiing avah ‘Johon’ dinadi'.
42001014	Ungta nang nga kanpa le' plung kngam mih am chnadi' ungta mma' qou thung ngi mii rek kanpa rah.
42001015	Mleiya mma' avah Kruwng miksut thung ngi klin rah ungta mmah thowldii ruk pertem nimeh mditmata mjaakpum dii ruk nee nimeh. Mma' rukka mnuhpowi kpha thungki kupqhun nih Pthla Kchiir rih kdim rah.
42001016	Ungta mma ngi Isreel nau knempok rek avah mmaan ki Isowr, Kruwng ava' hinni kperheel chlam rah.
42001017	Ungta mpa rekki plung rek avah mnau rekin hinni, (Mal. 4:5-6) ungta tethe kopqowi kma’ avah kindit luwkinritna' thung ngi kperheel rang ngi, Kruwng ki thenni mii rek kporthlong chrang ki thenni, Mma' aang ngi pthla thung ngi ungta Elaijah ruhtanna' thung ngi mmah kchet chrah.”
42001018	Ungta Jakhariah ngi vaantamsi ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih neiyu havah deinikli? Mleiya neiya kder dok kcha' ping ungta knuwn rukka kqhajik ki mkum rek avah kerkheel dok kcha'.”
42001019	Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiya nang ahin nih hava' plung ngamna' pau ava' ksong rang ngi mdotsi dok Isowr aang ngi krip kcha' Gabriel ping.
42001020	Pdainu asuw, nang nga hava' dow rek mthuh dokna' nit ava' kpha ngi apau thuwk nimeh ungta pau pchaang nimtih, mleiya mma' mma' ki mpha thung ngi kthuwk chrang nei kpauna rek avah nang ngi lam'adorin chaak pemeh,” dida.
42001021	Ungta mii rekki Jakhariah avah mdo'ardat daatin ungta mma ngi mpha rowiksowt tih luwbuk'inn thuh ma'am dok leiyi, mmaan nah ngak chlamda.
42001022	Pdainu mma ngi marvan thuh thungta mmaan hinnu pau the pchaang mda, ungta mmaan nih luwbuk'inn kenje thung ngi mma ngi rinmer khat mdeh a tidit deisap lamda. Mleiya mma ngi tpartam daat tih partam thida kpau pchaang kmah ngi rimkdi am chda.
42001023	Ungta hanto' thuwkda tidit tah mma ngi msoplow chaakna' mpha ava' mqut daat le' anto ngi mi'inn thah sun chda.
42001024	'Tunnu nit rek ava' dilli mnuwn Elijabeth avah kurmuwngda ungta mma ngi thla parnga thung ngu mthina ngi kordowlda am chda, ungta mma ngi hanto'theda:
42001025	“Mleiya mii rek arlak ki kningkya mdotodowl piikna' rah, Mma ngi vonsat mdotolow chaakna' mpha thuh Kruwng ngi havah nei kihin nih mdotpurthuh piik,” dida.
42001026	'Tunnu mthla trukna' thung ngi Galily paamkuwl ki khuwpii Najareth thung ngi Isowr rih Gabriel tidit vaantamsi avah pthlada.
42001027	Mma ngi mmiing Joseph mdodit David innkhor thungki miikhat tih pau mdopthlen dok ksa nlakinrim khat ava' hinni pthlada. Ungta nlakinrim miing avah Mary, mdit.
42001028	Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi thleng thida mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng ngi plung mdopo'owi chaak nang, ikanpa cha', Kruwng avah nang tu' ka'am a, nang nga snu rek arlak ki msuwkqhasi kcha' imptih.”
42001029	Pdainu Mary ngi mma' mdeh thungta mma ngi mdothe pau rek 'leenni muplung yachda. Ungta mma ngi hava' pau'arvuwi avah talu rangnga tidit binda.
42001030	Audilli vaantamsi ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Aningpqitma' Mary, mleiya nang nga Isowr plungnee tu' kilqhi kcha' imptih.
42001031	Ungta asuw, nang ngi kurmuwng tidon Chapa khat pluwchnadi', ungta nang ngi mmiing avah ‘JISU’ dinadi'.
42001032	Mmah koprol rah ungta Mma' avah Kparthaangsi Chapa kdi lamrah, ungta Kruwng ngi Mhin nih Mpa David kruwng longkhom avah kpii rah.
42001033	Ungta Mma ngi Jakob innkhor thung ngi ktlangknai kmah kpaal rah ungta Mma' kruwngpaalna' avah mqutna' am nimeh.”
42001034	Audilli Mary ngi vaantamsi ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih havah kthuwk daat rangplih, tidit tah neiya pselpa kdodehmapa a?”
42001035	Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Pthla Kchiir avah nang a'leen nih kurjung rah ungta Kparthaangsi ruhtan ava ngi arlim akepnee chrah. Avaleiyi, nang ngi adopluk rang Kchiir Khat ava' rukka Isowr Chapa tidit rah.
42001036	'Tunnu nang ari'alam kthuwk Elijabeth rukku mder chaak arlaan nih chapa khat kurmuwng slida ka'am. Ungta 'tunnu kokhong kcha' mdoditin ava ngi mkurmuwn avah hava ngi thla truk mphaak a.
42001037	Mleiya Isowr hinvah kurthuwk kma' rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.”
42001038	Audilli Mary ngi hanto'theda: “Asuw neiya Kruwng suwknu khat ping, nang ngi adothe apau ava' heppi nei kihin nih kthuwk ikurthuwkso,” dida. Ungta anto ngi vaantamsi avah mma' hinki sun chda.
42001039	'Tunnu mpha ava' thung ngi Mary ngi korlouda ungta koknot tih Judah tidit mulpaam ki khuwpii thah chetda.
42001040	Ungta mma ngi Jakhariah inn thuh luwtda Elijabeth avah arvuwi chda.
42001041	Ungta hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Elijabeth tih Mary hinki pau'arvuwi marjaak daat le' mpowi thungki mnauhor avah konchokda ungta Elijabeth avah Pthla Kchiir rih dim chda.
42001042	Audilli mma ngi kparthaang ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Nang nga snu rek arlak ki asuwkqhasi a ungta adohor rang nau avah msuwkqhasi a.
42001043	Pdainu taluleida neiki Kruwng ava' nuh ava ngi kihin nih mthlen rang havah mdotrot piik daat a?
42001044	Mleiya dakat tih kakna ngi nang ngi adoturvuwi chaak archaang karjaak chaak daat le' kpowi thungki knauhor avah mkanpat chaak ki konchok kcha' a.
42001045	Mleiya Kruwng ngi mhin nih mdothe dow rek avah kpurtluwm rah tidit lamkrin kcha' snu avah msuwkqha a,” dida.
42001046	Ungta Mary ngi hanto'theda: “Nei kapthlarin nih Kruwng nga kponlor chaak a.
42001047	Ungta kapthla ngi Maksan kcha' Isowr ava' hinni kanpa kcha' a.
42001048	Mleiya Mma ngi msuwknu plungdil chaak avah mdeh piik chaak a, Tidit tah asuwn, 'tunki kupqhun nih suruwl mkheng ngi, Neiya msuwkqha mikdi chrah.
42001049	Mleiya Mruhktangsi Mma' ava ngi, Nei kthen nih dow klin mtlotpiik chda, Ungta Mma' miing avah kchiir ava'.
42001050	Ungta Mma' plungnee avah, Mma' kqi kcha' rek hinni suruwl suruwl thung ngi, m'leenin nih avah ka'am chrah.
42001051	Mma ngi, ruhtan nong rekki, Mbaan ruhtan avah pandangda, Ungta Mma ngi, muplungril ki plungbin rek thung ngi, Kpirlin kcha' rek avah arjei pthi lamda.
42001052	Mma ngi mruh ktang rek avah mukruwng longkhomin rek thungki loupthi lamda. Ungta kpirdil kcha avah tparthaan chda.
42001053	Mma ngi mpowiktham avah dow kqha rekki pdimpiik chda. Ungta svang avah Mma ngi mdakden nih mupsun pthi a.
42001054	Mma ngi msuwk Isreel rek avah, Mma' plungqhat mdobinphaak chaak ki bom chlamda.
42001055	Mleiya Mma ngi npa'leen, Abraham le' mnaumsuwn rek hinni mdothe dok ava' heppi ktlangknai kmah binphaak chlamda.”
42001056	Ungta Mary ngi mma' tu' thla kdum arveel kcheengda ungta mma ngi mi'inn thah sunkerheel chda.
42001057	'Tunnu Elijabeth tah mnauplukna' rah mpha avah veidokda ungta mma ngi chapa khat pluw chda.
42001058	Ungta mi'innveen rekle' mrilam rekki, Kruwng ngi mhin nih plungqhat klin nih mtedet chaak a, tidit marjaakin thungta mmaan nih mma' tu' kanpasap chlamda.
42001059	'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah mmaan nih mnii trehtna' nit tih nau avah mvun kreen rang ngi thleng lamda ungta mmaan nih mmiing avah mpa Jakhariah ava' dilkqowiyi mdophuwk raan thah tlada.
42001060	Pdainu mnuh ngi hanto ngi arthaangda ungta theda: “Immeh, mmah ‘Johon’ tidit rah.”
42001061	Pdainu mmaan nih mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ari'alam thung ngi hava' miing tphuwk kuwkhat leh ruk ka'am pemeh.”
42001062	Mthungta mmaan nih mmiing avah talu dida kphuwk rang tidit leiyi, mpa hinni titinna' rekki kheel lamda.
42001063	Ungta mma ngi tikjitna' phel khat qhil lamda ungta ava' 'leenni hanto' kjitda: “Mma' mmiing nga Johon,” dida. Ungta mmaan nah mkheng inni ngak chlamda.
42001064	Mthungta m'tunkat daat tih mnehr avah kparvangda ungta meplei avah kerthletda ungta mma ngi pauda Isowr panpaak chda.
42001065	Audilli mmaan tu' kpervel lih ka'am mkheng rek 'leenni ningqitna' thuwkda. Ungta hava' pau mkheng avah Judia ki mulpaam mkheng kirkhil lih kerseel psuk lamda.
42001066	Ungta ava' karja rek mkheng ava ngi: “Hava' nau avah taluhep kdusik rangnga?” dilamda, muplungrilin thung ngi arkhi chlamda. Ungta Kruwng khut avah mma' 'leenni am chda.
42001067	'Tunnu mpa Jakhariah avah Pthla Kchiir rih dim chda ungta pau purphuwngda, hanto'theda:
42001068	“Isreel rekki Isowr, Kruwng avah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso, Mleiya Mma ngi mmii rek avah vel chlamda. Ungta maktlan chaak lam a.
42001069	Ungta Mma' suwk David inn thung ngi, Neen nthen inni tkirliinna' arki khat mitapqhan piik inna.
42001070	Mma ngi dultipaam mupqhun daat le' ka'am, Mma' khulpu kchiir rek nehr rih mdothe dok ava' heppi,
42001071	Mleiya neen avah nmiihal rekin hinki, Ungta neen mikahal kcha' mkheng rek khut thungki midotsan chaakna' raan ki thenni,
42001072	Mleiya neen npa'leen hinni pau mdoreel dok lungnee ava' mdopurthuhna' rah. Ungta Mma' pauqum kchiir ava' kbinphaak rang ngi,
42001073	Neen npa Abraham hinni mdotham paureeltham ava' kbinphaak rang ngi,
42001074	Neen avah nmiihal rekin khut thungki midotaktlan chaakin nih, Ningqit ktaak ki Mma' soptolow chaakna' avah mirotpiikinda.
42001075	Mleiya havah neen nih Mma' aang ngi kchiir rih, Ungta rinkindit tih nrimkum mkheng thuh ta'am chaakna' rang kithen.
42001076	Ungta nau, nang avah Kparthaangsi ava' khulpu akdi lamrah, Mleiya nang nga Mma' 'lam rek kporthlong rang ngi, Kruwng aang ngi chet chnadi'.
42001077	Ungta mmaan pnu arve rek ava' tuknuwl piik ki, Mma' mii rek hinni tkirliinna' ki luwkinritna' avah pii chlamnadi'.
42001078	Neenki Isowr plungqhat kperneem ava ngi, Parvaan ki Kni kthuwk ava ngi neenna mitvel chaak inna.
42001079	Mleiya ava ngi kjiingnu thuh kok'ong rek, Ungta kdiyou arlim thung ngi kok'ong rek hinni mar'aang kpii rang ngi, Ungta neen kkalin avah plungdaina' 'lam thuh mikqhi chraanpti',” dida.
42001080	Anto ngi nau avah linda ungta pthla thung ngi mruh tangda ungta Isreel mii rek hinni mkandanna' nit kpha thung ngi paamkbiik laiyi am chda.
42002001	Ungta mpha ava' thung ngi hanto' thuwkda tidit tah dultipaam mkheng thungki mii rek avah mmiingin tikjit rah tidit ki paureen khat avah Agastas Siijar hinki thuwkda.
42002002	Hava' miing tikjitna' avah Kurinas tih Siria paamkuwl ki paamkpu mkurthuh arlaan nih rukrithok ki kthuwk.
42002003	Mthungta mii khimkhei avah mma' mma' ki mkhuwpii thung ngi mmiingin kikjit chrah chet lamda.
42002004	Ungta Joseph rukka Galily paamkuwl ki Najareth khuwpii thungki korlouda Judia paamkuwl ki David khuwpii Bethlehem mdodit ava' thung ngi hangda. Mleiya mma' avah phung ava' thung ki ungta David rilam thungki.
42002005	Mma ngi pau mdopthlen dok ksa mnuwn Mary, miipum meek ava' tu' mmiingin kikjit rang ngi chetve lamda.
42002006	Mthungta hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah mmaanve ngi ava' thah ma'am daatin arlaan nih mnauplukna' rah mpha avah veidok chda.
42002007	Ungta mma ngi mvonchowi mkhatna' Chapa khat avah pluwda ungta buwlaak ki klumda ungta inn ava' thung ngi mmaan thenni mmun ma'amma leiyi, Mma' avah sil'arkuwng thung ngi pi'iip chda.
42002008	'Tunnu khuwpaam khatsap thung ngi jaan nih yau luwng khat sutpqowida ka'am yaukqhi rek avah paamlaiyi ka'am lam.
42002009	Ungta asuwn, Kruwng vaantamsi khat avah mmaan aang ngi ripda ungta avah Kruwng konlorna' mar'aang ava ngi mmaan 'leenni lengda ungta mmaan avah kdung ngi mningin qida.
42002010	Audilli vaantamsi ava ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Aningin pqitmaan, tidit tah asuwn, neiyi dultipaam ki mii mkheng ki thenni kdung ngi kqhapauna rek avah akohorpiik inna.
42002011	Mleiya tuni ngi David khuwpii thung ngi naan athen inni Miksan khat kqou a Mma' avah Kruwng Khrista ava'.
42002012	Ungta havah naan athen inni bitinna'. Naan nih Nau kdowng khat avah buwlaak ki klumda sil'arkuwng khat thung ngi tpi'iidaat kurdutqhi naandi',” dida.
42002013	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih vaantamsi ava' tu' kilqhi ngi vaandown rekki hanto' the lamda Isowr ponlor chlamda.
42002014	“Kparthaangsi ngi Isowr rah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso! Ungta dultipaam thung ngi Plung kdai, Ungta mii rek hinni plungbin kqha avah ka'am ikurthuwkso.”
42002015	'Tunnu vaantamsi rek ava ngi mmaan hinki korlou lamda parvaan thah muhun chaak dokin thungta yaukqhi rek ava ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: “'Leen neen nih Bethlehem thah hangin cheh rang ngi hava' Kruwng ngi neen nihin nih midotparjaakin, kthuwk rang hava' dow rek ava' ksuw rah ichet incheh,” dilamda,
42002016	Ungta mmaan nih koknot tih hang lamda Mary le' Joseph ungta sil'arkuwng thung ngi ki'iip daat Nau kdowng avah dei lamda.
42002017	'Tunnu mmaan nih Mma' mdeh chaakin thungta, vaantamsi ngi mmaan hinni mdothe Nau ava' ki mlei avah mmaan nih theporyou chlamda.
42002018	Ungta yaukqhi rekki mdotheen karja kcha' rek mmaan mkheng avah dow rek ava'leiyi ngak chlamda.
42002019	Pdainu Mary ngi hava' dow mkheng rek avah muplungril thung ngi arkhi chda ungta bintuprut tlit chda.
42002020	Audilli yaukqhi rek ava ngi Isowr mponlor chaak chunin nih ungta mpanpaak chaak chunin nih jungkerheel chlamda tidit tah mmaan hinni mdothe piik doklam dow mkheng avah ava'jik ki mmaan nih arja chlamda ungta mmikin nih dei chlamda.
42002021	Ungta Nau ava' vuntreenna' rah niitreht ava' mphaak dok thungta mmaanve ngi Mma' miing avah ‘JISU’ dilamda phuwk lamda, tidit tah mmiing avah mnuhpowi thung ngi mkurmuwn duduh ngi vaantamsi ngi mdopiik dok ksa.
42002022	'Tunnu Moses nowlam ki dilkqowiyi mmaanve kertleuna' nit rek ava' mqut thungta mmaanve ngi Mma' avah Kruwng hinni ktedet chrang ngi Jerusalem thah hanqhi lamda.
42002023	Kruwng nowlam thung ngi tikjit ksadok ava' heppi, ‘Mreichulna' chapa khimkhei avah Kruwng hinni kchiir tidit rah mdodit.’ (Mpk. 13:2,12,15)
42002024	Ungta Kruwng nowlam thung ngi hanto'theda: ‘Uqhu sik khat mditmata khukhu suwn sikkhat rintparlaan rah.’ mdodit.’ Avaleiyi, mmaanve ngi Mma' avah Jerusalem thah hanqhi lamda. Ungta rinparlaan chlamda. (Lev. 12:8)
42002025	Ungta asuwn Jerusalem thung ngi mmiing Simeon tidit miikhat ka'am. Ungta hava' mii avah Isreel mii rek plung ngamna' karda kcha' mrinkindit ungta rinko'owi kcha' miikhat ungta Pthla Kchiir avah m'leen nih am chda.
42002026	Ungta mma ngi Kruwng ki Mesaiah ava' mmik ki mdehduh khimkheiyi mmah diyou nimeh, tidit avah Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mhin nih mdopandan piikdok.
42002027	Mthungta mma ngi Pthla ar'aang ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi thleng chda. Ungta mnuh le' mpa ngi Nau Jisu avah Mma' thenni nowlam nowpa dilkqowiyi ktlotpiik rang ki thenni marhanqhiin thungta,
42002028	Mma ngi Nau avah arpom chda ungta Isowr panpaak chda ungta hanto'theda:
42002029	“Mukpu Kruwng, 'Tunnu Nah apauna dilkqowiyi asuwk neiya plung kdaiyi mheipsun cha'.
42002030	Mleiya kmik ki Nah ahinki, Tkirliinna' avah kdeh chaak dok a.
42002031	Nang ngi havah mii mkheng rek maiyi adoporthlon dok ksa.
42002032	Ungta havah Chaat ktlei rek kpandang rang mar'aang khat, Ungta Nah amii Isreel rek konlor chaakna',” dida.
42002033	Ungta Joseph le' Mnuh avah Nau ava'leiyi mdothe dow rek leiyi, ngak chlamda.
42002034	Audilli Simeon nih mmaan avah suwqhat pii lamda ungta Mnuh Mary ngi hanto'theda: “Asuw, hava' Nau avah Isreel thungki miiknem pok rek kerdelna' ungta mtlukna' mdopurthuh dok ksa ungta Mma' avah titinna' khat kurthuwk rah ungta mii rekki Mma' kikthitna ngi kpaulam rah.
42002035	Anto ngi plungchai knempok rekki plungbin rek ava' kpandang rang ngi raal'kaang ngi nang apthlarin rukka kthun pthleng rah,” dida.
42002036	'Tunnu ava' thung ngi Asher phung thungki Phanuel chanu mmiing Anna mdoditin snu thimpu khat ka'am. Ungta mmah kdung ngi der chda ungta mma' avah innmne dilli mi'innpu tu' kum tikhiu ka'amve doklam.
42002037	Ungta hava' snu avah kum somtreht leiplii ki meikhunu. Ungta mma' avah luwbuk'inn thungki ksunliit kmah ngi suwn le' jaan nih then ngowlda ungta rinktham chda ungta Isowr sopklow kcha' snu khat.
42002038	Ungta mpha ava'kat thung ngi mma' rukka thlengda Kruwng avah panpaak chda ungta mma ngi, Isowr rih Jerusalem avah kaktlan rah tidit kbin kcha' mkheng rek hinni, Nau ava' ki mlei avah mdothe dok.
42002039	Anto ngi mmaan nih Kruwng nowlam dilkqowiyi dow mkheng avah mtlot chaak dokin dilli Galily paamkuwl ki mkhuwpiin Najareth thah jungkerheel chlamda.
42002040	Ungta Nau avah linda ungta pthla thung ngi mruh tang chda ungta luwkinritna' ngi dim chda ungta Isowr plungnee avah Mma' thung ngi amda.
42002041	Jisu nuh le'pa avah mkumktaiyi Taplaanna' ki Kmaal ava' thung vah Jerusalem thah kahang tlit kchok lam.
42002042	Ungta Mma ngi kum sowm lei'knii mphaak dok thungta kmaal ava' ki nowpa dilkqowiyi mmaan nih Jerusalem thah hang lamda.
42002043	Ungta mmaanve ngi nit rek ava' mqut dilli murjun kerheelin thungta Nau Jisu avah dilnauda Jerusalem thah am chdaatda. Joseph le' Mnuh ava' vah avah dei lam mda.
42002044	Pdainu mmaanve vah marlak inni Mmah ampakda dilamda, niikhat 'lamqowi lik thuh kchet doklam ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' avah mrilam rekin le' maplap rekin hinni thlaam lamda.
42002045	Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' avah mdehmaan thungta Mma' kthlaam mih Jerusalem thah hang kerheel lamda.
42002046	'Tunnu anto ngi Mma' avah niikdum dilli luwbuk'inn thuh chukpu rek arlak ki ko'ongda mpautheen arjada ungta paukheel kheel lamda ka'am daat maanve ngi dei lamda.
42002047	Ungta Mma' karja rek mkheng inni Mma ngi mdodeh pindit le' mpau'arthaan leiyi, ngakyou chlamda.
42002048	Anto ngi mmaanve ngi Mma' avah mdehn thungta ngakyou chlamda. Ungta Mnuh ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kchapa, taluleiyi Nang ngi neen kihinin nih havah adotlotda? Asuw o, Apa le' neiyi plung kparvaiyi adokthlaamin kmah.”
42002049	Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naanve vah Neiya adotthlaam inplih? Neiyi Kpa nong thung ngi plung kdopluw chaak rah tidit avah naanve vah deimaan timow?”
42002050	Pdainu mmaanve vah Mma ngi mmaanve hinni mdothe paulam avah deipindih chlam mda.
42002051	Audilli Mma ngi mmaanve tu' arjungda Najareth tlung lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaanve kurduh ngi am chda. Pdainu Mnuh ava' vah hava' dow mkheng rek avah muplungril thung ngi arkhi chda.
42002052	Ungta Jisu a luwkinritna' 'leenni ungta mdaksa 'leen linthang setsetda, ungta Isowr le' dultimii plungngam kurthuwkda.
42003001	'Tunnu Taiberia ki Siijar mpaalna' kum msowm lei parngatna' mphaak thung ngi Pontias ki Pilaat tih Judia paamkpu kurthuwkda, Herod tih Galily paamkuwl plii ki khat ki paamkpu kurthuwkda, ungta mu'upa Philip pih Ituria paamkuwl plii ki khat ki ungta Trakoniti paamklek rek thung ngi paamkpu kurthuwkda.
