Ungta Lisanias tih Abilene paamkuwl plii ki khat ki paamkpu kurthuwkda.
42003002	Ungta Anna le' Kaiaphas tih thimpu kenreelsi mkurthuhn arlaan nih paamkbiik laiyi Isowr pauna avah Jakhariah chapa Johon hinni arjuda.
42003003	Ungta mma ngi Jordon biing ngi ka'am khuwpaam mkheng rek thung ngi chetda pnu toptlot piikna' rang ki thenni plung kerthlenna' ki pau parjaam chda.
42003004	Khulpu Isaiah laika thung ngi kjitda ka'am pauna rek ava' hep pih: “Paamkbiik laiyi ko'owng krowl ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Kruwng thenni 'lam aporthlongin, Mma' 'lam rek avah kirji deek ki aportlotin.
42003005	Kturkuwng rek khimkhei avah kipdim rah, Ungta lown rekle' mul rek khimkhei avah kopchowm rah. Ungta 'lam konkowi rek avah kpirji rah ungta 'lam kotrot rek avah kparnaal rah.
42003006	Ungta daksa mkheng ngi Isowr hinki Tkirliinna' avah mmikin nih kdei chlam rah. ’” (Is. 40:3-5)
42003007	Audilli mma ngi dii mdopluw chaak lam rang ki thenni kthleng miipii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Kruknei pruwl suruwl thungki rek naan, karvang bei rang plungthit mei kquwng thungki achen chaakna' raan ki thenni kuw ngi atpilqhit inda?
42003008	Avaleiyi, naan nih plung kperthleng dok kcha' khat ki mtik kcha ngi achei raan. Ungta naan nih arilin thung ngi: ‘Neenna k'paan Abraham ka'am’ dichmaan, mleiya neiyi kthe a. Isowr rih Abraham thenni nau rek avah hava' lung rek thungki ruk mdopqhan pchaan.
42003009	Ungta 'tun 'tun rukku qhii avah ding ava' arjung 'leenni plot pthi dokda ka'am daat ah. Avaleiyi, mchei kqha kchei kma' dingbul khimkhei avah tphurpthilu ungta mei thung ngi tvarpthilu.”
42003010	Mthungta mii rekki mhin nih hanto' kheel lamda: “Mdittu' neen nih talu tlow chni kaandi?”
42003011	Mthungta mma ngi arthaang lamda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Buwtluwn 'knii kthlowi mma' ava ngi kthlowi liit kma' ava' hinni apii chso ungta thendam kthlowi kcha' mma' rukku anto' heppi atlow chso.”
42003012	Audilli sumkqhai rek rukku mhin nih dii kluwt chrah thleng chlamda ungta mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu neenna talu tlow chni kaandi?”
42003013	Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih adoqhai raankat ava' kkheel lih qhaimaan.”
42003014	Anto' heppi raalmii rek rukku mhin nih hanto ngi kheel chlamda: “Ungta neenna talu tlow chni kaandi?” dilamda. Mthungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwkhat leh ruk pqitmaan mditmata karmak ki miiraal piimaan ungta ardamanin ava ngi ikhomin.”
42003015	'Tunnu mii rekki Mesaiah avah ningkakraal lih mdo'ardat chaakin, ungta mii mkheng ngi muplungrilin thung ngi Johon avah Mesaiah ava' mow mditmata ava' pemeh tidit bin lamda.
42003016	Mthungta Johon nih mmaan mkhengin hinni hanto'theda arthaang lamda: “Dakat tih neiyu naan avah diisik daat tih dii adokupluwn, pdainu nei kihin nih mruh ktangset Khat avah karvang meeksli a, neiya Mma' khuhkokrii kperthlet ki mtikkcha pmaang. Mma ngi naan avah Pthla Kchiir tu' ungta mei tu' dii'akupluwt chraan.
42003017	Mma ngi msikthi avah kchaidang ngi mdoyana' rah maiyaab klin avah mkhut tih sinda ungta Mma ngi chavui avah Moktom thung ngi purkuwk chda pdainu Mma ngi mpirvi rek avah kqiim kma' rah mei thung ngi kapka pthi rah.”
42003018	Ungta mma ngi morson tkorsowna' knempok tung ngi mii rek hinni parjaam chda.
42003019	Pdainu paamklek plii ki khat ki paamkpu Herod avah Johon nih mnaupa Philip nuwn Herodias mdoko'onqhi leiyi, ungta Herod tih kqha kma' mdotlot mkheng ki thenni Johon nih mma' avah rai chda.
42003020	Ungta hava'le' mkheng ava'leiyi mma ngi Johon avah rowng thuh khum pthida.
42003021	'Tunnu mii mkheng ngi dii mluw dokin thungta hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Jisu rukka dii luwt chda. ungta Mma ngi rinmaktham chaak meek arlaan nih parvaan avah kparvangda.
42003022	Ungta Pthla Kchiir avah daksa ngi uqhu khat heppi Mma' 'leenni arjung qumda ungta parvaan ki kurju krowl khat ava ngi hanto'theda: “Nang nga, Nei kvonsat'low chaak Kchapa ptih. Neiya, Nang athung ngi kdung ngi kuplung kuplung kngam kcha' a,” dida.
42003023	'Tunnu Jisu mdakkat tih Mma' ki nongtlotna' mupqhun thung vah Mdak avah kum somkdum arveel mdophaak dok. Mii rekki Mma' avah Joseph chapa tidit tih mdobinin ungta Joseph avah Heli chapa.
42003024	Mleiya Heli a Matthat chapa, Matthat tah Levi chapa, Levi a Melkai chapa, Melkai a Janna chapa, Janna a Joseph chapa,
42003025	Joseph a Matathiah chapa, Matathiah a Amos chapa, Amos tah Nahum chapa, Nahum a Eslai chapa, Eslai a Naggai chapa,
42003026	Naggai a Maath chapa, Maath tah Matathiah chapa, Matathiah a Semei chapa, Semei a Joseph chapa, Joseph a Judah chapa,
42003027	Judah a Johanan chapa, Johanan a Rhesa chapa, Rhesa a Jerubbabel chapa, Jerubbabel lah Shealtiel chapa, Shealtiel lah Neri chapa,
42003028	Neri a Melkai chapa, Melkai a Addi chapa, Addi a Kosam chapa, Kosam a Elmodam chapa, Elmodam a Er chapa,
42003029	Er a Joshuah chapa, Joshuah tah Eliejer chapa, Eliejer rah Jorim chapa, Jorim a Matthat chapa, Matthat tah Levi chapa,
42003030	Levi a Simeon chapa, Simeon nah Judah chapa, Judah a Joseph chapa, Joseph a Jonan chapa, Jonan a Eliakim chapa,
42003031	Eliakim a Melea chapa, Melea a Menan chapa, Menan a Mattathah chapa, Mattathah a Nathan chapa, Nathan a David chapa,
42003032	David tah Jessi chapa, Jessi a Obed chapa, Obed tah Boaj chapa, Boaj tah Salmon chapa, Salmon a Nahshon chapa,
42003033	Nahshon a Aminadab chapa, Aminadab a Aram chapa, Aram a Hejron chapa, Hejron a Perej chapa, Perej tah Judah chapa,
42003034	Judah a Jakob chapa, Jakob a Aijek chapa, Aijek ka Abraham chapa, Abraham a Terah chapa, Terah a Nahor chapa,
42003035	Nahor rah Saruk chapa, Saruk ka Reu chapa, Reu a Peleg chapa, Peleg ka Heber chapa, Heber rah Shelah chapa,
42003036	Shelah a Kainaan chapa, Kainaan nah Arphasad chapa Arphasad tah Shem chapa, Shem a Noah chapa, Noah a Lamek chapa,
42003037	Lamek ka Methuselah chapa, Methuselah a Enok chapa, Enok ka Jared chapa, Jared tah Mahalalel chapa, Mahalalel a Kainaan chapa,
42003038	Kainaan nah Enos chapa, Enos tah Seth chapa, Seth tah Adam chapa, Adam a Isowr chapa.
42004001	Audilli Jisu avah Pthla Kchiir rih kdim mih Jordon kreng ki arhung kerheelda ungta Pthla ngi paamkbiik lai thah qhidokda.
42004002	Nii somplii thung ngi tarnampii ngi pthleemda. Ungta nit rek ava' thung ngu Mma ngi dow khatleh chamda ungta ava' dillu, nit rek ava' mqut dilli Mmah mmpowi tham chda.
42004003	Ungta tarnampii ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga Isowr Chapa akurthuh cheentung ngi hava' lung avah thenpen mkurthuhna' rah paupiik apii,” dida.
42004004	Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: ‘Dultimii a thenpen daat chrel lih mrinrang pemeh, Pdainu Isowr hinki pauna khimkheiyi mrin chaak rah,’ ” dida. (Knl. 8:3)
42004005	Audilli tarnampii ngi Mma' avah lown kparthaang khat 'leenni hanqhi thida mpha mruk thung daat tih dultipaam thung ngi ka'am kruwngpaalna' rek mkheng avah tedetda.
42004006	Ungta tarnampii ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Hava' ruhtanna' mkheng rekle' mmaan ki konlorna' avah Nang ahin nih apii nikdi', tidit tah havah nei kihin nih mdotpiik dok ungta neiyi avah kuwku yoso kdopiik nuwm hinni pii nikdi',
42004007	Avaleiyi, Nang ngi ka'aang ngi luw'atbuk bih, hava' mkheng avah Nang adow kurthuwk chrah,” dida.
42004008	Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Seitan kdilpang thah ikorsown dok, Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: ‘Nang ngi nangki Kruwng Isowr avah luw'adobuk chaak rah. Ungta nang ngi Mma' daat chrel sop'adolow chaak rah,’ ” mdodit, dida. (Knl. 6:13)
42004009	Audilli mma ngi Mma' avah Jerusalem thah hanqhida ungta luwbuk'inn, mdown thah pkalthida Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga Isowr Chapa akurthuh cheentung ngi hava' 'leenki athina ngi jungkarvar cha',
42004010	Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: ‘Nang akrung rang ki thenni, Mma ngi Mma', vaantamsi rek avah, Nang aleiyi paupiik kpiilam rah.
42004011	Ungta Nang ngi lung 'leenni akhuh ado'etmana' rah, Mmaan nih mkhutin thung ngi akarlaang chlam rah.’” (Luw. 91:11-12)
42004012	Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Hanto ngi theda ka'am dok: ‘Nang ngi nangki a Isowr, Kruwng avah adoperten rang pemeh,’ ” dida. (Knl. 6:16)
42004013	'Tunnu tarnampii ngi tepthleemna' khimkhei avale' ava' mupqut dilli mpha kqha khat ma'am duh kpha ngi Mma' avah mapthida sun chda.
42004014	Audilli Jisu a Pthla ruhtan thung ngi Galily paamkuwl thah kerheelda ungta Mma' leiki pauren avah mokloiyi ka'am paamklek rek mkheng thung ngi karjaamda.
42004015	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan ki sinegog rek thung ngi purchuk lamda ungta mii khimkheiyi Mmah ponlor chlamda.
42004016	Mthungta Mma ngi marvanverna' Najareth thah arvangda. Ungta Mma' nowpa dilkqowiyi Tkarngatnit tih Mma ngi sinegog thung ngi luwtda ungta kpa rang ngi ripda.
42004017	Ungta Mhin nih khulpu Isaiah laika avah parlaan lamda. Ungta Mma ngi Laika avah mpavan thungta Mma ngi hanto ngi kjitda ka'am ava kurdutqhida.
42004018	“Kruwng Pthla avah Nei k'leen nih amda, Mleiya Mma ngi Neiya srah hinni kqhapaumin kparjaam rang ki thenni, Reidii mpubul chda. Mma ngi Neiya muplungbin kertlei kcha' rek kapdam chrah, Ungta paamsuwk ki ka'am rek hinni taktlanpiikna' ki pau kparjaam rah, Ungta mmikktot rek mik kpaharpiik rah, Ungta tyat chiireelna' kphang kcha' rek hinni to'ol chaakna' kpii chrang ki thenni, Neiya msida.
42004019	Kruwng ngi mdorot piikna' ki mpha ava' kparjaam chrang ki thenni Neiya msi chda,” dida. (Is. 61:1-2)
42004020	Audilli Mma ngi laika avah pkhum pthida ungta ava' sopklow kcha' ava' hinni veikhat pii perheelda ungta ko'ongda. Ungta sinegog thung ngi ka'am mii mkheng rekki mik avah Mma' 'leenni chuda.
42004021	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Tuni ngi hava' Kchiir laika avah naan nih ado'arjaakin thung ngi aplungin thuh mpurkhum dok a,” dida.
42004022	Mthungta mii mkheng ngi Mhin nih sakhi pii lamda ungta plung knei dok ki pauna rek avah Mma' nehr thungki mthuh leiyi ngak chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Havah Joseph chapa ava' pemeh mow?” dilamda.
42004023	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih, ‘Riipu, athina ikpardam cha', talutalu yoso, neen nih Kapernaum thah adotlot kdo'arjaakin avah hava' akhuwpaam thung rukku atlow’, mdodit pauril avah kihin nih themun naandi',” dida.
42004024	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat kthe a. ‘Khulpu khadaat ruk mdaksa ki mkhuwpaam thung ngi trot chaak a ka'amlu pemeh.’
42004025	Pdainu Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, Elaijah ki mpha thung ngi, parvaan avah kum kdum thla truk thung ngi karkamda ma'am thung ngi Isreel rek arlak ki meikhunu knempok ki ka'am lam ungta mpha ava' thung ngi paam mkheng thung ngi powitham klin khat thuwkda.
42004026	Pdainu Sidon paamklek thung ngi ka'am snu khat, meikhunu Jarephath modit ava'hin kma'don kuw morson khatleh hinni Elaijah avah pthla meh.
42004027	Ungta khulpu Elaisah ki mpha thung ngi Isreel rek arlak ki raichi kervei knempok ki ka'am lam pdainu Siria ki Namaan kma'don kuwkhat leh rukka pertleu meh.”
42004028	Audilli sinegog thung ngi ka'am mii mkheng rek ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' marjaakin thungta mei kquwng ngi muplungin thida.
42004029	Ungta mmaan nih rip lamda Mma' avah khuwpii duwn thah rei lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah qeenlung khuikham thung ngi kvarpthi rang ngi Mma' avah mkhuwpiin ko'onna' lown down thah hanqhi lamda.
42004030	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan arlak ki mchethlen dok ava ngi Mmah mchena' rang thah anto' chet chda.
42004031	Audilli Mma ngi Galily paamkuwl ki khuwpii Kapernaum thah juda ungta Mma ngi tkarngatnit rek thung ngi mmaan avah purchuk chlamda.
42004032	Ungta Mma ngi ruhtanna' tu' mpau ava'leiyi mmaan nih Mma' dopurchuhna' 'leenni ngakyou chlamda.
42004033	'Tunnu sinegog ava' thung ngi tarnam ktobor pthla khat tih mdoqhi miikhat ka'am. Ungta mma ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda.
42004034	Hanto ngi theda: “Neenna mthowng chmaan! Najareth ki Jisu, neen nih Nang tu' talu kdotlot raan ka'am plih? Nang nga neen mke'ekrep raan ki kthuwk ptimow? Isowr ki Kchiir khat Nang! Neiyi Nang nga kuw ptih tidit adokdeh.”
42004035	Pdainu Jisu ngi mma' avah hanto'theda raida: “Rimkdi i'am, ungta mma' thungki arvang thuwk dok!” Ungta tarnam ava ngi mma' avah mmaan arlak ki mvarpthi dilli mma ngi mma' thungki arvang thuwkda ungta mma' avah tiplim meh.
42004036	Mthungta mmaan mkhengin avah ngak chlamda ungta msingreelin thung ngi hanto' the lamda: “Hava' pauna avah taluluda? Mleiya Mma ngi ruhtanna' le' ruhtan ava ngi tarnam ktobor rek hinni paupiik pii lamda ungta mmaan avah arvang thuwk lamda,” dilamda.
42004037	Ungta Mma' dang avah mekpervel lih ka'am paamklek rek khimkhei thung ngi kervelda.
42004038	'Tunnu Mma ngi sinegog thungki korlouda Simon inn thung ngi luwtda. Pdainu Simon ktarnuh avah kdungyou kcha' riiphaak khat tih phada kowida mthungta mmaan nih mma' leiyi, Mhin nih ktham chlamda.
42004039	Mthungta Mma ngi mma' 'leenni rikhum thida riiphaak avah raida ungta riiphaak ava ngi mma' avah mapthida. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma ngi kerdelda mmaan avah soplow chlamda.
42004040	'Tunnu kni mtlaak thang ngi mdetmdet ki omlai rekki kkowi kthlowi rek mmaan mkheng inni kkowi rek mmaan avah Mma' paphaak lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan khatkhat 'leenni mkhut thiikpiik lamda ungta mmaan avah pdam chlamda.
42004041	Ungta mmaan knempok rek thungki tarnam rek ava ngi hanto' the lamda arvang thuwk lamda: “Nang nga Isowr Chapa Mesaiah ptih!” Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah rai lamda ungta mpau raan avah rotpiik lam mda, tidit tah mmaan nih Mma' avah Mesaiah tidit mdodehn.
42004042	'Tunnu khu mvaar thungta Mma ngi sunda mmun ktliing khat thah chetda. Ungta miiloppii rekki Mma' avah thlaam lamda ungta Mma' avah pha lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma ngi mmaan avah mdomaak mana' raan thlot chlamda.
42004043	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah khuwpii morson rek thung rukku kdoparjaam rah mleiya hava' ktlow rang ki thenni Neiya mdotapthlat chaak dok,” dida.
42004044	Ungta Mma ngi Galily paamkuwl ki sinegog rek thung ngi parjaam chda.
42005001	'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi Genesaret duwmpii biing ngi mridaat arlaan nih miiloppii rekki Isowr pauna karja chrang ki thenni Mma' avah tkhul lamda.
42005002	Ungta Mma ngi duwmpii biing ngi arkuwng 'knii ka'am daat deida, pdainu tuwlvah kse rek avah mthung ki thuwk dok lamda mleenin mdo'alqhut meekin.
42005003	Audilli Mma ngi arkuwng rek arlak ki khat, Simon arkuwng thung ngi kalthida laanki ngi mruk kporsown rah sida. Ungta Mma ngi ko'ong thida arkuwng thungki ngi miiloppii rek avah tpurchuh pqhunda.
42005004	'Tunnu Mma ngi tpau mdown thungta Simon hinni hanto'theda: “Arkuwng avah lii thuh heithap ungta tuwlvah adokyownna' rah a'leen rek avah avarlam,” dida.
42005005	Pdainu Simon nih arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mukpu neen nih jaan khat tih arvanvar innu dow khatleh kyowng maanring, anto'daat yoso Nang adothe leiyi, neiyi leen avah var daat nih,” dida.
42005006	Ungta mmaan nih hava' mtlotin thungta mmaan nih tuwlvah knempa ngi kyowng lamda ungta mleenin avah kelqet rah theda.
42005007	Mthungta mmaan nih arkuwng morson thuh ka'am mmiqhi rek inni arva lamdon nih mdobomna' raan ki thenni karjaab lamda. Ungta mmaan nih arva lamda arkuwng avah mikniing ngi tipdim lamda mthungta mmaan nah kuplup chrah the lamda.
42005008	Simon Pitar rih ava' mdeh thungta mma ngi Jisu khuhther rih tluwda hanto'theda: “O Kruwng, nei kihin ki mheikorlow piikcha' mleiya neiya pnu kervei mii ping,” dida.
42005009	Mleiya mma' le' mma' tu' kilqhi mkheng rek avah mmaan nih mdopirsim dokin tuwlvah mdokjownin ava'leiyi ngak kchlam.
42005010	Ungta anto' heppi Simon miqhi rek, Jebedi chapa rek James le' Johon le' rukka ngak chlamda. Audilli Jisu ngi Simon hinni hanto'theda: “Aningpqitma' tidit tah 'tunki kupqhun nih nang nga mii kokyowng kurthuwk chnadi',” dida.
42005011	Anto ngi mmaan nih murkuw ngin avah laan mapphaak dokin dilli, mmaanve ngi dow mkheng avah mapthi lam thida Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
42005012	Ungta hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah Mma ngi khuwpii khat thuh ma'am thung ngi, asuwn, raichi ngi kdim kcha' miikhat tih Jisu avah deikhot chda. Ungta mma ngi khupktulup pih tluda ungta Mhin nih hanto ngi theda pnuwm chda: “Kruwng Nang ngi abin bih, Nang ngi neiya mpertleu pchaang nadi',” dida.
42005013	Audilli Mma ngi mkhut heikhiingda mdak kmei thida hanto'theda: “Neiyi kngei a, ikertleu cha',” dida, ungta m'tunkat daat tih raichi ava ngi mma' avah mapthida.
42005014	Ungta Mma ngi kuwkhat leh hin rukku mdothe mana' rah paupiik piida, hanto'theda: “Pdainu chet rang ngi thimpu hinni adak ikterdet cha' ungta Moses tih paupiik mdopiik heppi mmaan thenni sakhi kurthuwk ki akertleu chaak leiyi, chla khat aparlaan cha',” dida.
42005015	Audilli Mma' leiki pauson avah kerkheel setset tih karjaam thangda ungta miiloppii knempa avah Mma' karja chrang ngi ungta mo'omlai rekin thungki Mma ngi mdopdam chaakna' raan ki thenni thlengpok lamda.
42005016	Anto ngi Mma ngi korlou tlit kchokda paamkbiik lai thah chetda rinktham kchok tlitda.
42005017	'Tunnu niikhat tih hanto ngi thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi mpurchuh lam thung ngi Pharisy rekle' nowlam chukpu rek avah ava' thuh kok'ong daat lam. Ungta mmaan avah Galily, Judia ungta Jerusalem thungki khuwklin rek khimkhei thungki kthleng lam. Ungta mmaan tapdamna' rah Kruwng ruhtan avah Mma' 'leenni amda.
42005018	Audilli asuwn, mii rekki kyengrii ktong kcha' miikhat avah mi'iina' tung ngi klum lamda ava' thuh thuhqhi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih arvanplutda Mma' aang ngi tpi'iina' rah mlaam thlaam lamda.
42005019	Ungta mmaan nih miipii rekpa leiyi, mthung thah mupluw pchaan maan thungta mmaan nih inntun thah hangkal lamda ungta mma' avah mekpher tung ngi kowmphel arlak ki mningqim inni Jisu aangkat tih arjuptla lamda.
42005020	Anto ngi Mma ngi mmaan lamrin ava' mdeh thungta Mma ngi kkowi ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Plap apnu rek avah atoptlot piik dok a,” dida.
42005021	Mthungta nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki hanto ngi the lamda mlei tathlaam pqhun lamda: “Hava' pthitda kpau a kuwda? Isowr chreldaat kma'don kuwda pnu rek koptlotpiik pchaang nga?”
42005022	Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan nih mninglei mdothlaamin ava' mdeh thungta Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naan nih aplungin thung ngi mninglei rek avah athlaam inna?
42005023	Tva ngi tethe ko'olbet tah, ‘Apnu rek avah atoptlot piik dok a,’ tidit ava' mow, Hangrip ungta ichet tidit ava ngi ko'olbet tah?’
42005024	Pdainu naan nih hava' dultipaam thung ngu Mii Chapa ava ngi pnu rek toptlot piikna' ki ruhtan avah mdothlowi tidit adodehna' raan,” Mma ngi kyeng kcha' mii ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, ikerdel, a'iina' akyul rang ngi, a'inn thah isun cha',” dida.
42005025	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma ngi mmaan dodeh ngi kerdelda ungta mma ngi mi'iina' kyulda ungta Isowr kponlor rih mi'inn thah sun chda.
42005026	Ungta mmaan mkhengin avah ngakyou chlamda, ungta Isowr ponlor chlamda ungta mninginqi chda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih tuniyu dow ktlei liklik ndeh chaak inna,” dilamda.
42005027	Hava'le' dilli Mma ngi vangthuwkda ungta mmiing Levi mdodit sumkqhai miikhat avah sum tqhaina'inn thung ngi kok'ong daat deida. Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei mheiqowi,” dida.
42005028	Ungta mma ngi dow mkheng mapthida ungta ripda Mma'dil qowi chda.
42005029	Audilli Levi ngi mma' mdak inn thung ngi tmaalna' klin khat avah Mma' thenni porthlong chda. Ungta ava' thung ngi sumkqhai rekle' morson rek knempok avah mmaan tu' ko'ongsap lamda.
42005030	Pdainu mmaan ki nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki Mma' sikhu rek kepteng ngi nurnur kdi ngi hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi naan nih sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rek tung ngi adochaak adoneeksap inno?”
42005031	Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaang lamda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kdam mih rekki thenvah riipu a msit ka'am pemeh pdainu kkowi rekki thennu msit ka'am.
42005032	Neiya mrinkindit dok rek ko'own rah kurjung pmaang pdainu plung tperthlenna' thung ngi pnu kervei rek ko'own rah kurjung ping,” dida.
42005033	Audilli mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Johon sikhu rekvah kdet kmah then ngowl lamda ungta rinktham chlamda ungta Pharisy rekki sikhu rek rukku anto' tlow lamda pdainu taluleiyi, Nang asikhu rekka mdochaak mdoneek tlit inno?”
42005034	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Kmoukpu plap rek avah, mmaan hinni Mma' ma'am daat arlaan nih then pngowl pchaang naandih?
42005035	Pdainu Kmoukpu avah mmaan hinki mdolow pthina' nit karvang rah, audilrow ngi mmaan nih nit rek ava' thung ngi then kngowlrow lamrah.”
42005036	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni pauportol khat tih hanto'theda: “Kuwkhat leh ngi buwren thungki mlaak louda buwpli 'leenni lot kchok meh, mditma bih ren ava ngi kekqetkrep rah ungta ren thungki mlaakren tolow ava ngi mlaakplii avah mdokorlot pemeh.
42005037	Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi thowldii ren avah saavun thowldiibeel pli thung ngi daal kchok meh mditma bih thowldii ren ava ngi saavun thowldiibeel avah kpelqet rah ungta thowldii avah kyaan chrah ungta saavun thowldiibeel avah kartlai chrah.
42005038	Pdainu thowldii ren avah saavun thowldiibeel ren thung ngi tadaal rah, mdit bih, mikniing ngi karkhaal rah.
42005039	Ungta thowldii pli knee dok ksa kuwkhat leh ngi m'tunkat daat tih thowldii ren tneek rah ngei nimeh. Mleiya, Pli ava ngi mikdibet, mdodit.”
42006001	'Tunnu mkhatna' dilli miknitna' tkarngatnit tih hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi loulai kthleng ngi chetda. Ungta Msikhu rekki chapaar avah yau lamda ungta mapya thuwn nih knuwr lamda cha lamda.
42006002	Ungta Pharisy aangqhe rekki mmaan hinni hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi naan nih, nowlam mih tkarngatnit tih totlot krow kma' avah adotlot inno?”
42006003	Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan karthaang ngi hanto'theda: “David mdakkat tih ungta mma' tu' kilqhi mmaan rek ava ngi mpowiyin mtham thung ngi talu mtlotin tidit avah naan nih parcham vot maan timow?
42006004	Mma ngi taluhep pih Isowr inn thuh luwtda ungta tetdet thenpen ava' louda ungta mchaak ungta mma ngi mma' tu' kilqhi rek mmaan hin rukku avah mpiiklam mow? Thenpen avah thimpu rek kma'don mii morson khatleh ngi mdochaak krow pemeh.”
42006005	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii Chapa avah Tkarngatnit ki Kruwng rukka Mma'.”
42006006	'Tunnu Tkarngatnit ktlei khat thung ngi hanto ngi thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi sinegog thung ngi luwtda ungta purchuk lamda. Ungta mmun ava' thung ngi machang ki mkhut kqong kcha' miikhat amda.
42006007	Ungta nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki Mma' kepteng ngi mraal mdotepmenna' raan ki thenni, tidit tah Mma ngi Tkarngatnit tih pdam mow, pdam nimeh tidit leiyi, kmin nih sutpqowi lamda.
42006008	Pdainu Mma ngi muplungbin rekin ava' deithida mkhut paang khat kqong kcha' mii ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Ikerdel rang ngi hava' mningqim inni irip.” Ungta mma ngi kerdelda ungta ripda.
42006009	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih dow khat ayukheel inni: ‘Tkarngatnit tih kqha totlot ava' mow, kthi totlotto', mditmata rinkum tsan mow te'ekreo nowlam dorot tah?’ ”
42006010	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan mkheng avah sutporloijik lam thida mii ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Akhut arji,” dida. Ungta mma ngi anto'tlowda, ungta mkhut avah mpaang khat ki heppi pumqhat qha chda.
42006011	Pdainu mmaan nah kmok chlamda ungta mmaan nih Jisu 'leenni talu totlot rang tidit leiyi, khat le' khat kerseel lamda.
42006012	'Tunnu mpha ava' thung ngi hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah Mma ngi lown thah rinkaktham chrah chetda ungta Mma ngi jaan khat tih Isowr hinni rinktham chda.
42006013	Ungta khu mvaar thungta Mma ngi Mhin nih Msikhu rek avah own chlamda ungta mmaan thungki Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rek avah kchol lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah tamsi rek dilamda.
42006014	Mmaan avah Mma ngi Pitar mdodit Simon ungta mnaupa Andria, James le' Johon, Philip le' Bartholomio.
42006015	Metthiu le' Thomas, Alphius chapa James le' Jealot mdoditin Simon,
42006016	James chapa Judah ungta mikyur kurthuwk kcha' Kerioth ki Judas.
42006017	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan tu' arjungsap lamda mmun kponjowl khat thung ngi Mma' sikhu rektu' miilop khat le' miiloppii khat tung ngi rip lamda. Ungta mmaan avah Judia paamkuwl mkheng thungki ungta Jerusalem ki ungta duwmpii biingki Tair le' Sidon paam rek thungki ngi Mma' karja chrah ungta mmaan mmaan ki mo'omlai rekin thungki mdopdam chaak lamna' rah kthleng lam.
42006018	Ungta tarnam ktobor rekki mdo'owr chaak rek rukka kthleng lam ungta mmaan avah dam chlamda.
42006019	Ungta miiloppii mkheng ava ngi Mma' avah kekmei chrang ngi thlaam lamda mleiya Mma' thungki ruhtan avah thuwkda ungta mmaan mkheng avah pdam lamda.
42006020	Audilli Mma ngi mmik phelda Msikhu rek ktong thah suwthida hanto'theda: “Srah rek naanna asuwkin kqha, Tidit tah Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah naan athen.
42006021	'Tun powiktham dolow rek naan avah asuwkin kqha, Tidit tah naanna apowiyin kappaa rah. 'Tun kqap rek naanna asuwkin kqha, Tidit tah naanna pni chnaandi'.
42006022	Mleiya Mii Chapa ava'leiyi, Mii rekki atahal chaakin thuh, ateknen pthiin thuh, Ungta ningkya atpiikin thuh ungta amiingin pthitda atvar pthiin thuh, Naanna asuwkin kqha.
42006023	Naan nih nit ava' thuh ikanpa chaan ungta akanpat inni ikonchowm chaan. Mleiya dakat tih naan anongqhat'lotin avah parvaan thah klin nih ka'am. Mleiya mmaan nah mpa'leen rukku khulpu rek avah anto'jik ki mdoptlotin.
42006024	Pdainu svang rek naan a'leennu suwthitna' ka'am a, Mleiya naan nih naanki plung ngamna' avah ado'arlaan chaak dokin.
42006025	Mpowi kpa dok kcha' rek naan a'leen nih, suwthitna' ka'am a, Mleiya naanna apowiyin ktham rah. 'Tun kipni kcha' rek naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naanna archam louda qap chnaandi'.
42006026	Mii mkheng ngi naan adangin mapqhatin thung ngi Naanna asuwkin kthi kcha' a. Mleiya mpa'leen rukku khulpu dakkma' rek hinni anto'jik ki mdangin mdopqhatin.
42006027	Pdainu hava' karja kcha' rek naan ahinin nih kthe a. Amiihal rekin avah von'apsatin ungta aksunum kma' mma' ava' hinni kqha atlow cha'.
42006028	Pauhor akbuk rek avah suwqhat apii chaan ungta akipthit rekin ki thenni rin'iktham piikin.
42006029	Abiing paang khat thah aktpeeng mma' hinni mpaang khat ruk adowipiik. Ungta abuwdiir klou dok kcha' mma' hinni aphrikklum mdolow chaak rang kpha rukka thlotma'.
42006030	Akqhil kcha' mii khimkhei rek hinni apii cha' ungta ado'ana rek klou dok kcha' mma' hinki avah veikhat qhil perheelma'.
42006031	Ungta mii rekki ahinin nih mdotlot raan adongeiyin heppi naan rukku mmaan hinni atlown.
42006032	Pdainu naan nih vonsat aklow kcha' rekin daat alown nuh, ava ngi naan athenni talu tpanpaakna' ka'am a? Mleiya pnu kervei kcha' rek kpha rukku mmaan vonsat klow kcha' rek avah vonsat mdolow chaakin.
42006033	Ungta naan nih ahinin nih kqha ktlow kcha' rek mmaan hindaat tih kqha atlot chaak innu ava ngi naan athen inni talu tpanpaakna' ka'am a? Mleiya pnu kervei kcha' rek kpha rukku ava' hepjik ki mdotlotin.
42006034	Ungta naan nih arlaang perheel nikaandi' tidit ki plungbinpsuk adothlowi naan rek hindaat tih apthow chaak innu, ava ngi naan athen inni talu tpanpaakna' ka'am a? Mleiya pnu kervei kcha' rek kpha rukku pnu kervei rek hinni mdopiikinya knem mih mdo'arlaan perheelna' raan ki thennu mdopiikin.
42006035	Pdainu naan nih amiihal rekin avah vonsat alow chaan, kqha atlow chaan ungta kerheel rah tidit ki plungbinpsuk khat le' ktaak ki apthow chaan, mdit bih naan anongqhat'lotin avah klin rah ungta naanna Kparthaangsi ava' nau rek kurthuwk chnaandi'. Mleiya Mmah kpanpaak dei kma' rekle' kqha kma' avale' hinni muplung knei.
42006036	Avaleiyi, A'paan plungnee heppi naan rukka plung knei ikurthuwkin.
42006037	Mii 'leenni pau pinditmaan ungta mii rukku a'leenin nih pau pindit nimeh. Mii psulmaan ungta mii rukku apsulin nimeh. Mii aptlotpiikin ungta naan rukka akoptlotpiik raan.
42006038	Apiin, ungta naan ahin nih avah akpii raan. Kqha ngi tpertet, tyuknam ungta totnol deek ungta kepleet tih a'aang inni akoptlon piik raan. Mleiya naan nih adopertet naankat ava ngi naan ahinin rukku apertet perheel raan.”
42006039	Ungta Mma ngi pauportol khat mmaan hinni theda: “Mmikktot tih mmikktot tah kqhi pchaang rang mow? Mmaanve avah mikniing inni khor thuh tla chlam nimeh mow?
42006040	Sikhu khat avah mma' chukpu ava' karthak ki pemeh pdainu kurkhum deek ki kurchuk cha' mii khimkhei avah mma' chukpu ava' hep daat rah.
42006041	Ungta taluleiyi amikin thungki siktu ka'am ava' kdei kma'pa ngi a'uanau rek mik thungki ktobor avah adosutto?
42006042	Mditmata nang amik thungki siktu ka'am ava' adak ki kdei kma'pa ngi taluhep pih, nang ngi, ‘ku'uknau, amik thungki ktobor avah ayulow piik nih’, dida, a'uanau hinni the pchaang nadio? Kqha kpurhuwi kcha' nang! Rukrirep pih nang adak ki amik thungki siktu avah aloupthi ungta audilrow ngi a'uanau rek mik thungki ktobor tolowpthi rang avah kindit chel lih deirownadi'.
42006043	Mleiya dingbul kqha khat ava ngi mchei kqha kma' kcheilu pemeh ungta dingbul kqhakmah ngi mchei kqha ruk kcheilu pemeh.
42006044	Mleiya dingbul khimkhei avah mchei ava ngi tedehpinditlu. Mleiya mii rekki liingkhu 'leenki kduwt yau kchok lammeh mditmata turmuw tirling 'leenki riithlum chei yau kchok lammeh.
42006045	Kqha miikhat ava ngi muplungril thung ngi kqha mdo'arkhiik thungki kqha ava' mdopthuh ungta kqha kma' mii ava' rukku muplungril thungki kqha kma' mdo'arkhiik thungki kqha kma' ava' mdopthuh. Mleiya muplungril thung ngi kepleet tih ka'am ava' thung ki ngi mnehr rih avah mdothe.
42006046	Pdainu naan nih taluleiyi kdothe ava' ktlow liit kma'pa vah ‘Kruwng, Kruwng, adotiditin?
42006047	Kuwku yoso, kihin nih thlengda ungta Neiyi kdothe rek ava' karja kcha' mma' avah kuw kduh tidit avah Neiyi ayupdehn nih.
42006048	Mma' avah ktlum mih khorda lung 'leenni innmun prip thida inn ksa kcha' mii ava' hep daat. Ungta dii linda ungta dii kluwng ava ngi inn avah kdung ngi deengda pdainu avah tapna pchaang meh. Mleiya inn avah lung 'leenni mdopri chaak dok.
42006049	Pdainu tarjaakka arja thida dow khatleh ktlow kma' mma' avah mi'innmun ktaak ki dulti 'leenni inn ksa kcha' ava' hep daat. Dii kluwng ava ngi kdung ngi inn ava' 'leenni deengda ungta avah kbeisek ki tluw chda. Ungta ava' inn ava' kenvei chaak avah kdung ngi mmeel kthi ngi kenvei chda.”
42007001	'Tunnu Mma ngi miipiipa rek do'arjaak ki mpauna' mkheng ava' mqut dilli, Mma ngi korlouda Kapernaum thuh luwtda.
42007002	Ungta raalmii arja khat kpupa khat suwk, mukpupa nungditsi avah kowida ungta kdiyou chrah theda.
42007003	Hanto ngi mma ngi Jisu ki mlei marjaak thungta mma ngi Jisu ngi arvalap donni msuwk avah mdopdam piikna' rang ki thenni Jihudi rekki kver rek avah Mhin nih kupnuwm chrah heipthla lamda.
42007004	Ungta mmaan nih Jisu hinni merheitlun dokin thungta mmaan nih plung kluwt tih Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava' hinni havah adotlotpiik ki mtik kcha.
42007005	Mleiya mma ngi neen kchaatin avah vonsat mlow chaanda ungta kthen inni sinegog khat msakpiik inda,” dilamda Mhin nih ktham chlamda.
42007006	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan tu' vasap lamda. Ungta Mma ngi inn ava' thung ki klapa kmah ngi mehei meek arlaan nih, raalmii arja khat kpupa ava ngi Mhin nih maplap rek arheipthlada hanto ngi theda: “Kruwng athina kparja'own chma', tidit tah neiya ki'inn thuh Nang akupluwt chrah mtik kcha pmaang.
42007007	Nei kdak ruh Nah ahin nih kthleng rah mtik kcha kmah ngi kkirbin leiyi, karva pmaang. Pdainu pau hehe daat tih mheithe piik chdaat mdit bih ksuwk avah kdam chrah.
42007008	Mleiya nei rukka ruhtanna' ksin nih ka'am kcha' miikhat ping ungta nei kkur duh ngi raalmii rek kdothlowi lam. Ungta neiyi khat hinni ‘Vah’ kdit cheu kvah ungta morson khat hinni ‘Arvang’ kdit cheu karvang ungta ksuwk hinni ‘Hava' atlow’ kdit cheu, mma ngi avah mdotlot chaak,” dida.
42007009	Jisu ngi hava' dow rek ava' marjaak thungta Mma ngi mma' leiyi, ngakda ungta Mma ngi kerheelda ungta Mma' dilkqowi miipiipa rek hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a hanto'hep daat tih mlamrin klin avah Neiyi Isreel mii rek hin kpha rukku ka'am deimaang!”
42007010	Ungta mdoheipthlat rek mmaan ava ngi inn ava' thung ngi mvan kerheelin thungta suwk kkowi avah kdam kcha ngi dei lamda.
42007011	'Tunnu hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah mupduknii ngi Mma ngi Nain mdodit khuwpii khat thah chetda ungta Msikhu knempok rekle' miipii knempa rek rukka Mma' tu' chetsap lamda.
42007012	Ungta Mma ngi khuwpii ava' paltong mheiphaak thungta asuwn, kdiyou miikhat avah vankdom meeksli lamda. Ungta mma' avah mnuh meikhunu chapa mkhatchlet ava'. Ungta khuwpii ava' thung ki miiloppii khat avah mma' tu' ka'amsap daat lam.
42007013	Kruwng ngi mma' mdeh thungta Mma ngi meikhunu avah plung pkham chda ungta mhin nih: “Qapma',” dida.
42007014	Audilli Mma ngi arvada ungta kdiyou kluwng avah kmeida ungta mma' kokdom rek avah rip lamda. Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kseetnau, Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, ‘Ikerdel.’”
42007015	Ungta kdiyou kcha' mma' ava ngi ko'ongda ungta tpau rah pqhunda ungta Jisu ngi mma' avah mnuh hinni parlaan chda.
42007016	Audilli mii mkheng rek hinni ningqitna' thuwkda ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda Isowr ponlor chlamda. “Neen narlak inni khulpu klin khat mitupthuh piik inna, ungta Isowr rih Mma' mii rek avah mvel chaak lam a,” dilamda.
42007017	Ungta hava' Mma' leiki pauson avah Judia paamkuwl mkheng thung ngi ungta ava' kloiyi ka'am paamklek rek mkheng thung ngi koryou chda.
42007018	Audilli Johon sikhu rekki hava' dow mkheng reklei avah mhin nih vansong lamda.
42007019	Ungta Johon nih mhin nih msikhu 'knii rek avah own lam thida mmaanve avah hanto'theda, Jisu hinni heipthla lamda: “Nang nga kurjung rang Khat ava' ptimow, mditmata neen nih morson khat sutthlaam nikaandi o?” dida.
42007020	'Tunnu mmaanve ava ngi Mhin nih valamda ungta mmaanve ngi hanto' the lamda: “Dii kupluwt Johon nih neenna hanto ngi theda, mdotapthlatin. ‘Mleiya Nang nga kurjung rang Khat ava' ptimow, mditmata neen nih morson khat sutthlaam nikaandi o?’ dida. ”
42007021	Ungta mpha ava'kat thung ngi Mma ngi mii knempok rek avah mmaan ki mo'omlai rekin thungki, mdun msaannaan thungki ungta tarnam kqha kma' rek thungki pdam chlamda ungta mmikktot knempok rek avah Mma ngi mmikin paharpiik chlamda.
42007022	Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih vangin rang ngi Johon hinni: ‘Amikin nih adodeh rekin ungta ado'arjaak rekin dow rek avah vansongin. Mleiya mmikktot rekki khudei chlamda, mkhuh kyeng rekki chet chlamda, raichi ktong kcha' rekki kertleu chlamda, knakbeeng rekki khu arja chlamda, kdiyou kcha' ava' kerdelda, ungta srah rek hinni kqhapaumin avah karjaamda.
42007023	Ungta Nei kleiyi khuhsiir kpirthi kcha' kma' mma' avah msuwkqha a,’ ” dida.
42007024	Ungta Johon pausikhu rek msun dokin thungta Mma ngi miiloppii ava' hinni Johon leiyi, tpau pqhunda: “Naan nih paamkbiik lai thah talulu ksuw rah kchet inpti? Tirthli ngi mdoknow piipe ksuw rah kchet inpti?
42007025	Pdainu naan nih talulu ksuw rah kchet inpti? Naan nih buwdiir kperneem mih korthlong miikhat ksuw rah kchet inpti? Dakat tih svangpulraang ngi korthlong ungta kenthle kparnaak ki ka'am kcha' rek avah paamkruwng rek inn thuh ka'am lam.
42007026	Pdainu naan nih talulu ksuw rah kchet inpti? Khulpu khat mow? Ou, Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a ungta avah khulpu khat kekheel ava' ksuw rah kchet inptih.
42007027	Mleiya havah mma' leiyi, hanto ngi mdokjit dok mma' ava': ‘Asuw, Neiyi Adusuk thah Nei kpausikhu khat avah kapthlat a. Mma ngi Nang a'lam avah akporthlon piik rah,’ mdodit. (Mal. 3:1)
42007028	Mleiya Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a: ‘Snu rekki mdopluk rekin arlak ki dii kupluwt Johon han'tun nih klin khulpu morson ka'am pemeh. Pdainu Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi kdil mma' avah mma' hinni klin.’ ”
42007029	Ungta mii mkheng ngi, sumkqhai rek kpha rukku Mma' pauthe marjaak chaakin thungta, mmaan nih Johon diipluwna' thung ngi dii mluw chaakin leiyi, Isowr rah kindit tidit pandang chlamda.
42007030	Pdainu Pharisy rekki, nowlam kdei rekki, Johon diipluwna' thung ngi mluwmaan ava ngi Isowr plungbin avah mthen inni pthlei chlamda.
42007031	Ungta Kruwng ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Neiyi hava' 'tunpha ki suruwl avah talu tu' portol lam nikdi' ungta mmaan nah talu mdut inna?
42007032	Mmaan avah kyurkren mun thung ngi ko'ongda khat le' khat kor'ownda ka'am nau rek hep daat lam. Mmaan nih hanto ngi the lamda: ‘Neen nih, naan athen inni spirthiil 'dumin nuh, Ungta naanna kardaam maanti'. Neen nih naan ahinin nih archam lou innu, Ungta naanna qap maantih.’
42007033	Mleiya dii kupluwt Johon ava ngi thendam ruk kcha kma' ungta thowldii ruk knee kmah ngi thlengda ungta naan nih, ‘Mmah tarnampii mthlowi a,’ diin tinu.
42007034	Ungta Mii Chapa ava ngi thlengda tchaak ruk chada ungta tneek ruk needa ungta naan nih hanto' theen tinu: ‘Asuwn, mpowibuwr kparja miikhat ungta thowldiibuwr, sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rek plap, diin tinu.’
42007035	Pdainu luwkinritna' avah kindit tidit tih mnau le' mkheng ngi mdopandan chaak.”
42007036	Audilli Pharisy rek arlak ki khat tih Mma' avah kmaalqhi chrang ngi own chda. Ungta Mma ngi Pharisy ava' inn thung ngi luwtda ungta kmaal rang ngi ko'ongda.
42007037	Ungta asuwn, khuwpii ava' thung ki pnu kervei kcha' snu khat ava ngi Jisu a Pharisy ava' inn thung ngi kmaal rang ngi khaan 'leenni ko'ongda ka'am a tidit marjaak thungta mma ngi mikrimkdih reidii, alabaster lung khuwng khat sinda ava' thung ngi thlengda.
42007038	Ungta mma ngi Mma' khuhther rih mdilpang thah ripda ungta qapda ungta mma ngi mirthli ngi Mkhuh avah tulqhut pqhunda ungta mluw chai 'leenki msam ava ngi avah knuwlda ungta mma ngi Mma' khuh rek avah put chda ungta mikrimkdih reidii ava ngi Mkhuh avah pubul chda.
42007039	'Tunnu Mma' ko'own kcha' Pharisy ava ngi hava' mdeh thungta mma ngi mdak mthina thung ngi hanto ngi theda: “Hava' mii ava ngi khulpu khat mkurthuh bih, Mma' kthowng snu avah taluhep kduh ki mii tidit avah kdei rah, tidit tah mma' avah pnu kervei kcha' khat.”
42007040	Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Simon, Neiyi ahin nih kdothe rah dow mruk ka'am a.” Ungta mma ngi, ‘chukpu atheu,’ dida.
42007041	“Mpha khat thung ngi mii'knii rek hinni sumkopthow miikhat amda. Miikhat tih denarii arja parnga lei arveida ungta morson khat ava ngi somparnga arveida.
42007042	Ungta mmaanve ngi mdopiik perheelna' raan dow khatleh mthlowi maan thungta mma ngi mikniing inni mkhon ktaak ki mleituwlin avah ptlotpiik lamda. Avaleiyi, 'tunnu athe o, mmaanve 'knii thungki kuw ngi mma' avah vonsat klowbet lam rang ngoh?”
42007043	Simon nih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiya mma ngi knembet tih mdoptlot piik ava' rah kbinna.” Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi kinditjik ki apindit a,” dida.
42007044	Audilli Mma ngi snu ava' hinni kerheel thida Simon hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi snu havah adeh a? Neiyi nang a'inn thung ngi thleng nuh, nang ngi kukhuh kdo'alqhutna' rah dii mpii mtih, pdainu hava' mma' ava ngi mirthli rekki kukhuh avah alqhuhda ungta mluw 'leenki msam mih avah knuwlda.
42007045	Nang ngi Neiya mput mtih pdainu snu hava ngi inn thuh karvanluw daat ki kukhuh mdoput avah 'tun kpha thuh down liit meh.
42007046	Nang ngi kluw avah reidii mpubulpiik mtih pdainu snu hava ngi kukhuh avah mikrimkdih reidii ngi mtulqhut piik a.
42007047	Avaleiyi, Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, mma ngi kdung ngi vonsat mdotolow leiyi, mma' pnu knempa rek avah koptlotpiik dok a. Pdainu mruk daat toptlot piik mma' ava ngi mruk daat vonsat mdolow.”
42007048	Ungta Mma ngi snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang apnu arve rek avah atoptlot piik dok a.”
42007049	Ungta Mma' tu' khaan thung ngi kok'ongsap rek ava ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto ngi tkerthe pqhun lamda: “Hava' pnu rek kpha rukka koptlotpiik pchaang Mma' avah kuw daatda,” dilamda?
42007050	Audilli Mma ngi snu ava' hinni hanto ngi theda: “Alamrin chaak ki nang nga atsan chaak dok a, plung kdaiyi isun cha',” dida.
42008001	'Tunnu hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah ava' dilli Jisu ngi khuwpii ungta khuw khimkhei thung ngi kthleng ngi chetda kqhapaumin avah parjaam chda ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki kqhapauna avah horpiik chlamda. Ungta sowm lei'knii rek avah Mma' tu' ka'amsap daat lam.
42008002	Ungta snu khat mo'omlai rek ungta tarnam kqha kma' rek thungki mdopdam, mmiing Magdala ki Mary mdodit, mma' thungki tarnam chai tikhiutet rek thuhdokna' avale'.
42008003	Herod suwkkenreel Chuja nuwn Joanna ungta Susanna ungta morson snu knempok rekki mmaan mmaan ki mdothlowi chaakin ava ngi Jisu a bom chlamda.
42008004	Ungta miiloppii klin khat le' morson rek, khuwpii khimkhei thungki kthleng rek mmaan ava ngi Mhin nih mkurku dok chaakin thungta Mma ngi pauportol khat tih hanto ngi theda:
42008005	“Chiimuw kapqau miikhat tih mchiimuw kapqau rah chetda. Ungta mma ngi anto ngi mapqau thungta, aangqhe rek avah 'lamsiir thah tlada, ungta avah tetherkre ngi am chda ungta parvaan laiki pva rekki avah chom chlamda.
42008006	Ungta aangqhe rekki lung 'leenni tla chda ungta ava ngi mahanmown daat le' avah purvuwi chda mleiya mdulti avah kchor pemeh.
42008007	Ungta aangqhe rekki tirling rek arlak ki tla chda ungta tirling ava ngi chiimuw ava' tu' mowngsap lamda ungta tirling ava ngi avah kchipkrepda.
42008008	Pdainu aangqhe rekka duldak thung ngi tlada ungta ava ngi mowngda ungta mpaar avah tum arja khat pthuwkda.” Ungta Mma ngi hava'le' mthe dok thungta Mma ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Maknapum mma' ava ngi arja chdeiso.”
42008009	Audilli Msikhu rekki hanto' the lamda Mhin nih kheel chlamda: “Hava' pauportol avah talu mdothena?” dilamda.
42008010	Ungta Mma ngi hanto ngi theda: “Naan ahinnu havah Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki paukordowl ava' tedeh pinditna' rah mdopiik dok pdainu mqhe rek hinvah havah: ‘Mmaan nih mmikin nih deilam yoso mdodeh pchukmana' raan, Ungta arja lam yoso mdodeh pinditmana' raan ki thenni’ pauportol rekki mdopiik. (Is. 6:9)
42008011	'Tunnu pauportol avah hava'. Chiimuw avah Isowr pauna ava'.
42008012	'Lamsiir ki rek ava ngi, karja kcha' rek mmaan ava' pdainu mmaan nih marjaak chaakin dilli, tarnampii ava ngi arvada muplungril rekin thungki pauna avah mdolow chaak, mditma bih mmaan nih lam'rin chlamdon ungta karsan dok chlam rah.
42008013	Pdainu lung 'leenki rek mmaan avah, pauna avah marjaakin thung ngu kanpa ngi karlaang kcha' rek ava' ungta hava'le' avah murjungin ktaak, mpha mruk ki thenni lamkrin kcha' ungta kepthleem marvan ki mpha thung ngi ktluw kcha' rek ava' lam.
42008014	Ungta tirling rek arlak ki ktla kcha' rek mmaan avah, pauna ava' marjaak dokin dilli vangkthuwk chda ungta tkilrinna' rek, svang tuthuhna' rek ungta rinkum ki plung ngamna' rekki mdokchikre ungta mchei kaptang pchaang kma' rek mmaan ava'.
42008015	Pdainu duldak thung ngi ktla rek mmaan avah, pauna ava plung kluwt tih ungta plung kindit tih karja kcha' ungta kirkhi kcha' ungta tidiil chaak tu' kilqhi ngi mchei kepchei kcha' rek mmaan ava'.
42008016	Kuwkhat leh ngi meila avah meplen dok dilli arkuw khat tih khum kchok meh mditmata kowm tii thah thipthi meh. Pdainu arvang kluwt rek ava ngi mar'aang ava' mdodehna' rah meilakuwng 'leenni meila avah mdothiiklu.
42008017	Mleiya kandang kmah ngi, kordowl tlit tih ka'am chdaat rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh. Mditmata tedeh liitma rah ungta mar'aang thuh kthuwk liit kmah ngi kordowl tlit daat rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.
42008018	Avaleiyi, naan nih taluhep pih arjaak inna tidit leiyi, ikilrin chaan. Mleiya kuwku yoso kthlowi kcha' mma' hinni kpiikpom rah ungta kuwku yoso kthlowi kma' mma' avah mma ngi kthlowi heppi mkarjaak ava' kpha thungki rukka, mma' hinki kloupthi rah.”
42008019	Audilli Mnuh le' mnaupa rek avah Mhin nih thleng lamda, pdainu miipiipa rek leiyi, mmaan nih Mma' avah pha pchaang lam mda.
42008020	Ungta hanto ngi kthe mii aangqhe ngi Mhin nih avah song lamda: “Nang anuh le' anaupa rekki Nang nga adeinuwm lamda, duwn thah krip daat lam a.”
42008021	Pdainu Mma ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto ngi theda: “Nei knuh le' ungta ku'uknau rek avah, Isowr pauna karja kcha' rek ungta ava' ktlow kcha' rek hava'le' ava'.”
42008022	'Tunnu niikhat tih hanto ngi thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi Msikhu rektu' arkuwng khat thung ngi kalda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Leen neen nih duwmpii raalpha khat thah vaanche,” dida. Ungta mmaan nih anto ngi vangkorlou lamda.
42008023	Pdainu anto ngi mheithah meekin arlaan nih Mmah iip chda. Ungta tchangkhu avah duwmpii thung ngi arjukraangda ungta murkuw ngin avah diiluwtda ungta tidina' thung ngi am chlamda.
42008024	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah vanpha lamda ungta perdel lam thida Mhin nih hanto ngi the lamda: “Mukpu, Mukpu, neenna kenvei chrah ktheen a!” dilamda. Audilli Mma ngi kerdelda tirthli avale' diinuk avah raida ungta avale' avah dai chda mthungta ava' thuh kdairimsi khat amda.
42008025	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Tva' thungda alamrin inna?” Ungta mmaan nah mningin qida ungta ngak lamda khat le' khat hinni hanto ngi kerthe lamda: “Hava' mii avah kuw rang nga? Mleiya Mma ngi tirthli le' dii kpha rukka paupiik pii lamda ungta mmaan ava' rukku Mma' dothe mdopqowi inna!” dilamda.
42008026	Audilli mmaan nih Galily tu' raal kerdeen Gadara mii rek khuwpaam khat thah heithap lamda.
42008027	Ungta Mma ngi laan thah mkal mheikhiin daatle' mpha rowiksowt tih tarnam rekki mdoqhiin, khuwpii ava' thung ki miikhat avah Mma ngi kurdutqhida. Ungta mma' avah dona kna pemeh ungta inn thung rukku ka'am pemeh pdainu thlaan rek thung ngi ka'am kcha'.
42008028	Mma' ava ngi Jisu mdeh thungta owngda ungta Mma' aang ngi tlu chda ungta krowl kparthaang ngi hanto'theda: “Kparthaangsi Isowr Chapa Jisu, neiyi Nang tu' talu kdotlot rah ka'am plih? Neiyi ahin nih akqhil chaak a, neiya suwk mupthuwk chma'.”
42008029	Mleiya Mma ngi tarnam ktobor ava' hinni mii ava' thung ki marvan thuhna' rah paupiik mdopiik dok. Mleiya ava ngi mma' avah kyowng tlit kchokda ungta mma' avah rung lamda ungta thiirrii le' mkhuh 'leenni chungkamke pkeh lamda mdobowlin pdainu mma ngi thiirrii ngi mdobowlin avah kpotda ungta mma' avah ram ava ngi paamkbiik lai thah mdoqhi dok kcho.
42008030	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto ngi theda kheelda: “Nang amiing nga talu?” Ungta mma ngi, ‘Legion,’ dida arthaangda, mleiya mma' thung ngi tarnam knempok kluwt dok.
42008031	Ungta mmaan ava ngi Mma' hinni, Mma ngi mmaan avah mdonna' ktaak khor thung ngi mchena' raan ki thenni paupiik mdopiik mana' raan ktham chlamda.
42008032	'Tunnu lown ava' thung ngi vakluwng knempok khat avah maal daat lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih vak rek thung ngi mluw chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi mdorot piik lamna' rah ktham chlamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah rotpiik lamda.
42008033	Audilli tarnam rek ava ngi mii ava' thung ki thuwk lamda ungta vak rek thung ngi luwt chlamda. Mthungta vak rek avah kaptrak lamda, khamkuwk thah chen lamda duwmpii thung ngi tla lamda ungta dii ngi lou chlamda.
42008034	Vak kapmaal rek ava ngi kthuwk dow ava' mdehn thungta mmaan nih chen chlam thida khuwpii ava' thuh ungta khuwpaam ava' thuh pau avah song lamda.
42008035	Audilli mmaan nih kthuwk dow ava' ksuw rah chet lamda ungta Jisu hinni va lamda. Mthungta mmaan nih, mthung ki tarnam rek sundokna' mii avah Jisu khuhther rih ko'ongda, dona nada ungta plung kindit tih ka'am daat dei lamda, ungta mmaan nah mninginqi chda.
42008036	Ungta mmikin nih kdei rek mmaan ava' rukku ram kervei mii ava ngi taluhep kat tih kdam tidit avah mmaan hinni thepiik lamda.
42008037	Audilli Gadara kloiyi ka'am paamkuwl thungki miiloppii mkheng ava ngi Mma' avah mmaan hinki msundokna' rah kheel chlamda mleiya mmaan nah ningqitna' klin khat thung ngi kekmen kcha'lam. Ungta Mma ngi arkuwng thung ngi kalda anto ngi vangkerheel chda.
42008038	'Tunnu mthung ki tarnam rek sundokna' mii ava ngi mma' rukka Mma' tu' mkilqhi chaakna' rah ktham chda. Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto ngi theda psun pthida.
42008039	“Nang nga a'inn thah vangkerheel rang ngi Isowr rih athenni nong klin adottlot piik avah vansong.” Ungta mma ngi anto ngi vangda khuwpii mpumpum thung ngi kirkhil lih, Jisu ngi mma' thenni nong klin mdotlot piik avah purphuwng chda.
42008040	'Tunnu Jisu ngi mvan kerheel thungta miipii rekki Mma' avah arlaang chlamda, tidit tah mmaan mkheng inni Mma' avah mdo'ardat chaakin.
42008041	Ungta asuwn mmiing Jairas mdodit miikhat thlengda ungta mma' avah sinegog ava' kpupa. Ungta mma ngi Jisu khuhther rih tlu chda ungta Mma ngi mi'inn thah merheina' rah ktham chda.
42008042	Mleiya mma ngi kum sowm lei'knii arveel ki rah mchanu khat mdothlowi ungta mma' avah kdiyou rah theda. Ungta Mma ngi anto ngi mehei thungta miipii rek ava ngi Mma' avah per'del lamda.
42008043	'Tunnu kum sowm lei'knii thung ngi hii ngi kyaan kcha' snu khat avah ava' thuh ka'am daat. Ungta mma ngi mdothlowi chaak mkheng avah riipu rek 'leenni ptlang chda pdainu kuwkhat leh ngi mma' avah pdam pchaang mda.
42008044	Snu ava ngi mdilpang ktong thah arvangda Mma' buwdiir mowr avah kmei chda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mihii kyaan meek avah kankhaam chda.
42008045	Ungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Kuwda mokthowng nga?” dida. Mii mkheng ngi mmat thungta Pitar rih ungta mma' tu' ka'am rek ava ngi hanto' the lamda: “Mukpu, miipiipa rekki aper'del lamda adotikchi lam ungta Nang ngi, ‘Kuwda mokthowng nga,’ adodit tah?”
42008046	Pdainu Jisu ngi hanto ngi theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih Neiya mdotthown mleiya Neiyi Nei kthung ki ruhtan kthuwk dok ava' kdo'arjaak,” dida.
42008047	'Tunnu snu ava ngi mmah kordowl pchaang rang maang tidit mkerdeh thungta mma ngi mkunchuwn chunni arvada ungta Mma' aang ngi tlu chda ungta mma ngi mii mkheng avale' maiyi mma ngi Mma' mdothownna' ki mlei, ungta mma ngi m'tunkat daat tih taluhep pih kdam ping tidit avah Mhin nih purphuwng chda.
42008048	Ungta Mma ngi snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Kchanu aningpqitma' alamrin nih nang nga atapdam chaak a. Plung kdaiyi isun cha'.”
42008049	Ungta Mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih sinegog kpupa inn ki miikhat thlengda mhin nih hanto ngi theda: “Achanu avah kdiyou dok kcha' a Chukpu a tapya ktlow kma',” dida.
42008050	Pdainu Jisu ngi ava' marjaak thungta Mma ngi mma' avah hanto ngi theda, arthaangda: “Aning pqitma', lam hehe arincha' achanu a kqha chdaat rah.”
42008051	Ungta Mma ngi inn ava' thung ngi mthlen thungta Mma ngi Pitar le' James ungta Johon ungta snunau ava' nuh le'pa ava' kma'don kuw morson khatleh rukku mluw raan avah rotpiik lam mda.
42008052	'Tunnu mkheng inni qap lamda ungta mma' thenni archam lou lamda, pdainu Mma ngi hanto ngi theda: “Qapmaan mma' avah kdiyou pemeh pdainu ki'iip chngaal,” dida.
42008053	Ungta mmaan nih kdiyou dok kcha' tidit mdodehn leiyi, Mma' avah pni chaak lamda.
42008054	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan mkhengin avah duwn thah pthuwk pthi lamda ungta Mma ngi snunau avah mkhut thah kyowng thida hanto'theda ownda: “Snunau'suwn, ikerdel,” dida.
42008055	Audilli mma' pthlarin avah kerheelda ungta m'tunkat daat tih kerdelda. Ungta Mma ngi snunau ava' hinni mdochaak rah dow mruk mdopiikna' raan paupiik pii lamda.
42008056	Ungta mnuh le' mpa avah ngakyou chlamda pdainu Mma ngi mmaanve hinni kthuwk dow ava'leiyi kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe mana' raan paupiik pii lamda.
42009001	Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu sowm lei'knii rek avah own purkuwk lamda ungta tarnam rek mkheng 'leenni ungta omlai rek tapdamna' ruhtan ungta ruhtanna' mkheng avah pii lamda.
42009002	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah Isowr kruwngpaalna' kparjaam rah ungta kkowi rek kapdam chrang ngi pthla lamda.
42009003	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih apjiin 'lamqowiyin ki thenni dow khatleh ruk hormaan, kchung ruk sinmaan, mditmata thowngya hormaan, mditmata thenpen hormaan, mditmata jiipowl ruk hormaan ungta phriktluwn 'knii karsak ki thlowi maan.
42009004	Ungta naan nih talutalu yoso aluwnaan inn ava' thung ngi asunduhn khimkheiyi ava' thuh i'am daatin.
42009005	Ungta kuwku yoso, naan akarlaang kma' rekin mmaan avah naan nih khuwpii ava' thung ki asunin thung ngi, mmaan 'leenni rinpaumin kurthuwk ki, akhuh arbaatin avah akqhot psukin.”
42009006	Mthungta mmaan nih anto ngi korlou lamda khuwklin rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chet lamda kqhapaumin avah parjaam chlamda ungta mmun ktai thung ngi pdam chlamda.
42009007	'Tunnu paamkuwl plii ki khat ki paamkpu Herod tih Mma ngi mdotlot dow mkheng avah arjada ungta mii aangqhe ngi Johon avah kdiyou thungki kring kerheel nowl a mdoditin leiyi, mmah muplung karmak lik chda.
42009008	Ungta aangqhe ngi Elaijah kthuwk a ungta morson aangqhe ngi alraang ki khulpu rek arlak ki khat kthuwk nowl a, dilamda.
42009009	Ungta Herod vah hanto ngi theda: “Johon nah neiyi mluw kdoreen pthi dok pdainu neiyi hava' kdo'arjaak mii avah kuw rang ngoh?” dida. Ungta mma ngi Mma' avah mdodehna' rah thlaamda.
42009010	Ungta tamsi rek ava ngi mvan kerheel dokin thungta mmaan nih mdotlotin mkheng avah Mhin nih song chlamda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah qhi lamda msik inni ktliing ngi Bethsaida khuwpii thungki paamkbiik mmun khat thah cheqhi lamda.
42009011	Pdainu miipii rek ava ngi ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nih Mma'dil qowi chlamda ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah arlaang chlamda ungta mmaan hinni Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki mlei thepiik lamda ungta tadam chaakna' kngeen rek mmaan avah pdam chlamda.
42009012	'Tunnu kluhpha mve chaak thungta sowm lei'knii rek ava ngi thleng lamda ungta Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Miipii rek avah apsun dok lam, tidit tah mmaan nih kpervel lih ka'am khuw rekle' khuwpaam rek thung ngi chet lamso mprii chaakna' raan ungta thendam athlaam chlamso, mleiya hava' ta'amnaan mmun havah paamkbiik laiyi ta'amin,” dilamda.
42009013	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih mdochaak raan dow mruk apii chaan,” dida. Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih chetda hava' mii mkheng ki thenni thendam trenma donle, neen nih thenpen parnga le' tuwlvah 'knii kma'don morson thlowi maanmin,” dilamda.
42009014	Mleiya ava' thuh ka'am mii rek avah pun parnga arveel lam. Pdainu Mma ngi Msikhu rek ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Mii rek avah mii somparnga nga ki loplop pih apkongin,” dida.
42009015	Ungta mmaan nih anto ngi tlow lamda ungta mmaan mkhengin avah topkong lamda.
42009016	Audilli Mma ngi thenpen parnga avale' tuwlvah 'knii avah louda ungta parvaan hansuwda ungta Mma ngi avah suwqhat piithida khuida ungta avale' avah miipii rek aang ngi todown piik laam rang ki thenni sikhu rek ava' hinni pii lamda.
42009017	Mthungta anto ngi mmaan mkheng inni avah cha lamda ungta mpowiyin paada ungta mmaan nih mdochaakdon rekin avah tomkal sowm lei'knii ngi chompurkuwk lamda.
42009018	Ungta Mma ngi mthina ngi rinmaktham chaak arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Mma' avah Msikhu rek ava ngi pha lamda ungta Mma ngi hanto ngi theda, kheel lamda: “Miiloppii rekvah Neiya kuwpi'ii mheitidit lam mow?” dida.
42009019	Mthungta mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Dii kupluwt Johon pi'ii, atidit lam, pdainu morson rekvah Elaijah ungta aangqhe rekki alraang ki khulpu rek arlak ki khat kerdel nowl a, mditin,” dilamda.
42009020	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Pdainu naanvah Neiya kuwpi'ii atidit inno?” dida. Pitar rih arthaangda ungta hanto ngi theda: “Nang nga Isowr ki Mesaiah ptih,” dida.
42009021	Ungta mmaan nih hava' avah kuwkhat leh hinni mdothe mana' raan, Mma ngi mmaan avah kdung ngi pilqhit lamda ungta paupiik pii lamda.
42009022	Ungta hanto ngi theda: “Mii Chapa avah dow knempok 'leenni suwk mthuh chaak rang thah tlada ungta kver rekle' thimpu kenreel rekki ungta nowlam chukpu rekki kikthitna' lamrah ungta ke'eyou lamrah ungta Mma' avah mnii kdumna' nit tih kperdel rah,” dida.
42009023	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan mkhengin hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih Neikdil toqowi rah mngei chaak cheentung ngi mma ngi mthina ikarmat chso, ungta mniiktaiyi mdaksa ki khros avah ahor chso ungta Neikdil aqowi chso.
42009024	Mleiya kuwku yoso mrinkum tsan chaak rah kngei kcha' khimkhei rekki mrinkumin avah kpenvei chrah pdainu kuwku yoso Nei kthen nih mrinkum kpenvei kcha' mma' ava ngi mrinkum avah ksan chrah.
42009025	Mleiya miikhat tih dultipaam avah mpumpum mih tang chyoso, mma' mdak mker'ekre chaakku mditmata mkenvei chaakku talu msit amna' ka'am a?
42009026	Mleiya kuwku yoso Nei kleiyi ungta Nei kpauna rek leiyi, ningkya korsowi kcha' mma' ava' hinni Mii Chapa ava ngi Mma' ki mkonlorna' le' Mpa konlorna' ungta kchiir vaantamsi rek konlorna' tu' murjun thung ngi mhin nih ningkya korsowi psuk rah.
42009027	Pdainu Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat kthe a. Mleiya Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' mmikin nih mdehduwn kpha ngi kdiyou kpertem liit kma' rah mii aangqhe avah hava' thuh krip daat lam a,” dida.
42009028	Ungta 'tunnu hava' mdothena' dilki, mnii trehtna' arveel lih hanto' thuwkda: Tidit tah Mma ngi Pitar le' Johon ungta James le'lim qhi lamda lown thah rinkaktham chrah chet lamda.
42009029	Ungta Mma ngi rinmaktham chaak thung ngi Mmai ruwngchen avah kerthlengda ungta Mma' buwdiir rek avah kpowldang ngi pleudangda.
42009030	Audilli asuwn, mii'knii ngi Mma' avah kirbiikqhi lamda, mmaanve avah Moses le' Elaijah lam.
42009031	Mmaanve ngi konlor dok ki kandang lamda ungta Mma ngi Jerusalem khuwpii thung ngi mdopurkhum bei rang, Mma' diyow chaakna' rang ki pau ava' the lamda.
42009032	Pdainu Pitar le' mma' tu' kilqhi rek mmaan avah iipdok chlamda ungta mmaan nih mkerdel dokin thungta mmaan nih Mma' konlorna' avale' Mma' tu' mii'knii krip daat rek konlorna' avah dei lamda.
42009033	Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' hinki msunin thungta hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Pitar rih Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Mukpu, neenna hava' thuh ta'am chaak ki kqha rah, ungta neen nih buw'inn kdum isaan cheh, khat tah Nang athen rah, khat tah Moses then rah ungta khat tah Elaijah then rah,” dida. Ungta Pitar rih mdothe avah talu tidit mdodeh pemeh.
42009034	Pitar rih hava' mthe meeksli arlaan nih armei khat arjunqumda mmaan avah pkhum dok lamda ungta mmaan nah armei thuh mluw dokin leiyi, mningin qida.
42009035	Audilli armei thungki ngi krowl khat arjuda hanto'theda: “Havah Nei kvonsat'low Kchapa, Mma' pauthe arja chaan!”
42009036	Ungta krowl ava' mtowdok thungta Jisu a mthina daat tih am chda. Pdainu mmaan nah rimkdi am chlamda ungta mpha mruk thung ngi mmaan nih mmikin nih mdodehn dow rek avah kuwkhat leh hinni thesi lam mda.
42009037	'Tunnu mupduknii ngi mmaan nih 'lown 'leenki murjunqumin thungta hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah miiloppii klinpa khat tih Mma' avah kurdutqhi lamda.
42009038	Ungta asuwn, miiloppii arlak ki miikhat tih owngda hanto ngi theda: “Chukpu, Ahin nih akaktham chaak a kchapa a mheisut piikcha', mleiya mma' avah kchapa mkhatchlet ava'.
42009039	Ungta mheisut piikcha', pthla khat tih mma' avah mdokyown ungta mma ngi tbinphaakmah ngi owngda ungta ava ngi mma' avah arngol tperveda ungta mnehr thah muhuwn tupqhutda ungta mma' avah tiplimda ungta kparsa dok ki mma' thungki kthuwk kchoklu.
42009040	Avaleiyi, Nah asikhu rek avah ava' kreipthi rang ki thenni ktham chlam nuh pdainu mmaan vah pchaang lam mda.”
42009041	Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto ngi theda: “O mlamrin ktaak ungta kpenher rih kchet suruwl rek naan, trek ksowt tih Neiya naan tu' am rangnu, ungta trek ksowt tih adiil raannu? Achapa avah hava' thuh arheiqhi,” dida.
42009042	Ungta mma ngi merhei meeksli arlaan nih tarnam ktobor rih mma' avah dul deenna'da ungta arngol tperveda. Audilli Jisu ngi tarnam ktobor avah raida, nau avah pdamda ungta mpa hinni nau avah pii perheelda.
42009043	Ungta mmaan mkheng inni Isowr ki ruhtanna' ava' 'leenni ngakyou chlamda. Pdainu mii mkheng ngi Jisu ngi mdotlot dow mkheng rek ava' thung ngi ngak lamda ma'amin arlaan nih Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda.
42009044	“Hava' pauna rek avah naan akna rekin thung ngi idong chso, tidit tah Mii Chapa avah mii rek khut thung ngi kparlaan bei rah mthe a.”
42009045	Pdainu mmaan nih hava' paulam avah deipindih lam mda ungta mmaan nih ava' mdodeh mana' raanni ava' avah mmaan hinki mdodowlpthi, ungta mmaan nih hava' paulam avah Mma' hinnu tkheel rah ningpqit lamda.
42009046	Audilli mmaan thung ngi, marlak inni kuw ngi miklinsi rang tidit leiyi, mkolrotma naan khat thuwkda.
42009047	Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan plungril ki muplungbin rekin avah deithida nau kmow khat louda mma' avah Mhin nih pripda.
42009048	Ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwku yoso, Nei kmiing ngi hava' nau ava' karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Neiya mtarlaan chaak a ungta kuwku yoso, Nei mkarlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei myuksi kcha' Mma' avah marlaan chaak a. Mleiya naan akhengin arlakin ki mikdilsi ava ngi miklin ava' rah,” dida.
42009049	Audilli Johon nih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Mukpu, neen nih miikhat tih Nah amiing ngi tarnam mdorei pthi deiyin nuh, ungta neen nih mma' avah thlot innu mleiya mma' avah neen ndilkqowi pemeh.”
42009050	Pdainu Jisu ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Mma' avah thlotmaan tidit tah neen mikepteng kma' mma' avah neen noktong ki.”
42009051	'Tunnu Mma' mdo’arjuk loww chaakna' rah mpha marvanve dok thungta hanto' thuwkda tidit tah Mma ngi knet tih Jerusalem ktong thah kchet rang ngi mmai tarngat chda.
42009052	Ungta Mma ngi pausikhu rek avah mduh thah heipthla lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' thenni kporthlong rah meheiyin thung ngi Samaria mii rek khuw khat thung ngi luwt lamda.
42009053	Pdainu mmaan nih Mma' avah arlaang chlam mda, mleiya Mma ngi mmai avah Jerusalem thah kchet rang ngi mdotarngai dok.
42009054	Ungta Mma' sikhu rek James le' Johon nih hava' mdehn thungta mmaanve ngi hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng, Elaijah ngi mdotlot heppi, Nang ngi hava'le' 'leenni parvaan ki mei arjudon mdobunpthi lamna' rah paupiik kdopiik raan, angei a?” dilamda.
42009055	Pdainu Mma ngi kerheelda mmaanve avah rai lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Naanve a taluhep kduh ki pthla thung ngi ka'am inptih, tidit dei maantih.
42009056	‘Mleiya Mii Chapa avah dultimii rek rinkum kpenvei rah kurjung pemeh pdainu mmaan ava' ksan chrah kurjung.” Audilli, mmaan nih khuw morson khat thah chet lamda
42009057	'Tunnu mmaan nih 'lampii thung ngi meheiyin thung ngi hanto ngi thuwkda tidit tah kuwmiikhat tih, “Kruwng tva'tva' thang yoso Nah achena' thuh Adilqowi chnikdi',” dida.
42009058	Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Tkei rekka mkhor rekin ka'am ungta parvaan laiki pva rek rukka mbuwn ka'am, pdainu Mii Chapa avah mluwchai mdothiikna' rah mmun ka'am pemeh,” dida.
42009059	Audilli Mma ngi morson khat hinni theda: “Nei mheiqowi,” dida. Pdainu mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng, neiyi rukri ngi vang nih rang ngi kpa avah alruwl chdoklap nih,” dida.
42009060	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kdiyou ava ngi mikdiyou avah kulruwl chrah, pdainu nang nga chet rang ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah aparjaam cha',” dida.
42009061	Ungta morson khat rukku theda: “Kruwng, Nah adilqowi chnikdi', pdainu vang nih rang ngi ki'inn thuh ka'am rek mmaan avah vanthaan chlap lam nih,” dida.
42009062	Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mukdusin kyowng daat thida mdilpang thah kerheel kuwkhat leh rukka Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki thenni mtik kcha pemeh,” dida.
42010001	Hava'le' dilli Kruwng ngi morson somtikhiu rek rukka kchol lamda. Mma ngi 'kniinii ngi Mduh thah tidit tah Mma' thlenbeina' rah khuwpii ungta mmun rek khimkhei thung ngi mmaan avah pthla lamda.
42010002	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Dakat tih, turkun rang avah knempok a pdainu nong klou rang mii avah ktlowm 'suwnna. Avaleiyi, turkun rang lou ava' kpupa hinni, Mma ngi turkun rang lou ava' thung ngi nong klou rah mii mdosina' rah rin'iktham chaan.
42010003	Naan nih anto ngi ichetin ungta asuwn! Neiyi naan avah yausuwn rek heppi tkeikraang rek arlak ki akapthlat inna.
42010004	Naan nih sumbuwr hormaan ungta thowngya hormaan mditmata khuhkok namaan. Ungta naan nih 'lampii thung ngi mii rek arvuwi maan.
42010005	Ungta naan nih tva'tva' thung yoso aluwnaan inn ava' thung ngi rukrirep pih ‘Inn hava' thuh plung kdai i'amso’, adiin.
42010006	Ungta ava' thuh muplung kdai mii ma'am bih, naan aplungdaiyin avah mhin nih ka'am chrah mditma bih naan ahin nih avah kerheel chrah.
42010007	Ungta naanna inn ava' thuh a'am chaak daat raan. Talutalu yoso mmaan nih naan ahin nih adotpiikin ava' achaan ungta ava' aneen. Mleiya nong klou kcha' mii avah mardaman karlaang kcha' ki thenni mtik kcha'. Ungta naan nih inn khat ki ngi inn khat thah konthot maan.
42010008	Ungta tva'tva' ki khuwpii thung daat yoso naan nih aluwn thung ngi mmaan nih naan adotarlaan chaak naan khuwpii ava' thung ngi a'aang inni adotodown piikin dow rek avah naan nih achaan.
42010009	Ungta ava' thung ngi ka'am kkowi rek avah apdamin ungta mmaan hinni, Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah naan ahin nih arjung knai kcha' a, adiin rang ngi, athepiikin.
42010010	Pdainu tva'tva' ki khuwpii thung daat yoso naan nih aluwn thung ngi mmaan nih atarlaan chaakmaan cheentung ngi hanto' atheen.
42010011	‘naan akhuwpiin kat thungki vaiphul kukhuhn 'leenni kpop rek avah titinna' khat tih naan a'leenin nih kokqhot inna. Anto'daat yoso naan nih havah adeiyin, tidit tah Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah naan ahin nih arjung knai dok kcha' a,’ adiin.
42010012	Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Nit ava' thung ngi Sodom mih khuwpii ava' hinni ko'olbet tih kdiil pchaang chrah.
42010013	Korasin, nang a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a! Bethsaida nang a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan ahin nih ruhtan nong rek totlot avah Tair le' Sidon hinni totlot mkurthuh tlaang bih mmaan nih choduduh ngi muplungin perthleng chlamdon buwdiir kthi hilna chlamdon nih purvuwt thuh kok'ong chdok lamrah.
42010014	Pdainu pau tpinditna' thung vah Tair le' Sidon nih naan ahinvah ko'olbet tih kdiil pchaang chrah.
42010015	Ungta parvaan kpha ngi kakparthaang kcha' Kapernaum nang avah Kdikhuw thah ktla daat tih akaptla pthi rah.
42010016	naan akarja kcha' rek ava ngi Neiya mtarjaak chaak lam a ungta naan akmat kcha' mma' ava ngi Neiya mtamat chaak a ungta Nei makmat kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei myuksi ava' rukka mmat chaak a.”
42010017	Audilli somtikhiu rek avah kanpa ngi tlung kerheel lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng neen nih tarnam rek kpha rukka Nah amiing ngi kdosin pchaanin.”
42010018	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi Seitan avah kowl keplek heppi parvaan ki arjung ktla deinu.
42010019	Asuwn! Neiyi naan ahin nih pruwl rekle' silthum'artham rek tether pchaanna' ki ruhtanna' akpiik inna. Ungta miihal ava' ki ruhtan mkheng tapchaanna' ki ruhtanna' avah naan ahin nih akpiik inna. Ungta taluhep kduh yoso naan avah dow khatleh ngi aplimin nimeh.
42010020	Anto'daat yoso naan nih pthla rek adosin pchaanin leiyi, kanpa chmaan pdainu naan amingin avah parvaan thah mdokjit dok leiyi, ikanpa chaan.”
42010021	Mpha ava' thung ngi Jisu a Pthla thung ngi kanpa chda ungta hanto'theda: “Dultipaam le' parvaan ki Kruwng Apa! Akpanpaak chaak a mleiya Nang ngi hava'le' avah mii kinrit rekle' kdeipindih rek hinni dowlpthi thi tih nau kdowng rek hinni purphuwn piik lam tinu. Kqha'a Apa Nang amiksut thung ngi aplung kngam mih adobin ava' hep ikurthuwkso!”
42010022	Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni kerheelda hanto'theda: “Dow mkheng avah Kpa ngi Nei kihin nih mparlaan dok chda ungta Pa ava' kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi Chapa avah kuw tidit deimeh. Ungta Chapa ava' kma'don Pa avah kuw tidit deimeh ungta Chapa ava ngi mdopurphuwn nuwmna' mmaan ava' hinni Mma' avah mdopurphuwn.”
42010023	Ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni kerheelda ungta msikindaat thung ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih adodehn ava' kdei kcha' rek mik avah msuwkin kqha a.
42010024	Mleiya Neiyi kthe a, khulpu rek knempok ki ungta paamkruwng rekki naan nih amik inni adodehn avah mdodeh nuwm chaakin pdainu dei chlammeh. Ungta naan nih ado'arjaakin avah mdo'arjaak nuwm chaakin pdainu mdo'arjaak chaakin pemeh.”
42010025	Ungta asuwn, nowlam kdei miikhat tih ripda Mma' mdoperteelna ngi hanto'theda: “Chukpu, neiyi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah alrouchom mih kdo'arlaan chaakna' rah talu tlow nikdi' o?”
42010026	Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nowlam thung ngu talu dida mikjitto'? Ungta nangvah avah taluhep pih aparcham lam o?”
42010027	Mthungta mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi nangki Kruwng Isowr avah aplungchai mkheng ngi, Apthlarin mkheng ngi, aruhtan mkheng ngi, Ungta aplungbin mkheng ngi vonsat adolow chaak rah. (Knl. 6:5) Ungta, A'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah, mdit.” (Lev. 19:18)
42010028	Ungta Mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi kindit deek ki arthaan a, nang ngi hava'le' avah atlow cha' ungta ring chnadi'.”
42010029	Pdainu mma ngi mthina tikpindit chaak rah mdongei chaak ki Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwda, nei ki'innveenna?”
42010030	Audilli Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Miikhat avah Jerusalem ki ngi Jerikho thah arjuda ungta raanqhul kupru rek khut thung ngi tla chda. Ungta mmaan nih mbuwmdiir khowkpet chlamda ungta mma' avah plim lamda ungta kdisum'arsam mih mapthi lam thida sun chlamda.
42010031	'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah thimpu khat tah 'lampii ava' thuh thleng khotda. mma ngi mma' mdeh thungta loida 'lamsiir khat thah sun chda.
42010032	Ungta anto' heppi Levi khat rukka mmun ava' thung ngi thleng nowlda, mma' avah deida. Ungta mma ngi 'lam lepda 'lamsiir khat thah sun chnowlda.
42010033	Pdainu 'lam ava' thuh kchet Samaria ki miikhat ava ngi mhin nih thleng khotda ungta mma ngi mii avah mdeh thungta plung pnee chda.
42010034	Mma ngi mma' avah heiphada reidii le' thowldii pubulpiik thida mlimna' rek avah klumpiikda. Ungta mma ngi mtuwnna' saa ava' 'leenni pkalda ungta miitlun'inn khat thung ngi ptlung chda ungta soplow chda.
42010035	Ungta mupduknii ngi, mma ngi msun rang thang ngi jiipowl sumqiit 'knii turthuhda innkrungpa ava' hinni piida. Ungta mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Mma' avah mheisut pqowi piikcha'. Nang ngi talutalu yoso mma' 'leenni hava' kkheel lih adopche dok avah karvang kerheel thung ngi neiyi avah achowi nikdi', dida.
42010036	Hava'le' kdum arlak ki kuw ngi raanqhul kupru rek khut thung ngi ktla kcha' mii ava' ki mi'innveen kurthuwk rah abinna?”
42010037	Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mma' hinni plungnee ktedet kcha' khat ava',” dida. Ungta Jisu hanto'theda: “Nang ngi vang rang ngi anto ngi atlow cha',” dida.
42010038	'Tunnu mmaan nih anto ngi mcheen thungta khuw khat pha lamda. Ungta Martha tidit snu khat ava ngi mi'inn thuh ptlung chlamda.
42010039	Martha a mnaunuh Mary tidit khat ka'am. Mary ngi Jisu khuhther rih ko'ongda Mma' dothe avah arja chda.
42010040	Pdainu Martha vah mnongtlot rang mkheng ava ngi muplung tpenqheekda. Ungta mma ngi Mhin nih arvada hanto'theda: “Kruwng, knaunuh ngi nong totlot rang mkheng avah nei kihin daat tih mdotmaak psuk avah dei mtimow? Avaleiyi, mdotbomna' rah mhin nih mheithe piikcha',” dida.
42010041	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Martha, Martha, nang nga dow knempok leiyi, tparsat tinu aplung apyat lik.
42010042	Pdainu msit ka'am avah dow khatpang daat. Mary ngi makqhabet ungta mma' hinki tolow penletma rang avah mokchol chaak a.”
42011001	Mma ngi mmun khat thuh rinmaktham chaak arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya Mma ngi mupqut dok le' Msikhu rek khat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Johon nih msikhu rek hinni rinkthamna' mdopurchuh lam heppi, neen rukka rintakthamna' mheipurchuk chaan.”
42011002	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih rin'aktham chaakin thung ngi hanto ngi atheen: ‘Parvaan thah ka'am Apa, Nah amiing nga kchiir ikurthuwkso! Nah akruwngpaalna' kurjung ikurthuwkso! Parvaan thah Nah aplungbin mdotlotin heppi dultipaam thung rukku ikurthuwkso!
42011003	Mni ktai ki kthen chaak raan avah nitnit ki mheipii chaan.
42011004	Ungta neen nih kleenleiyin kervei rek khimkhei kdoptlot piikin heppi, Neen kupnu arve rekin avah mheiptlot piik chaan. Ungta neenna kepthleem thuh maptla chmaan, Pdainu kqha kma' khat ava' hinki mheiqenthuh chaan! Adiin,’’ dida.
42011005	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan arlakin ki plap kthlowi kcha' kuwmiikhat tih maplap khat hinni thanqim laiyi vadon, ‘Plap, thenpen kdum pang arpu chnih.
42011006	Mleiya kaplap khat kipjiin nih mphakhotda ungta neiyi mma' aang ngi kdodown chaak rang dow khatleh thlowi chma nuh’, dida, kthe rah kuw ka'am inpti?
42011007	Ungta mma ngi mthung thangki ngi arhei'arthaang donni hanto' kthe rah: ‘Kmikkhut kriilma', neiya inn arkam doknu knau le' tu' ki'iip dok kcha' ping, kerdelda apii pchaang nimaang.’’
42011008	Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Mma ngi plap khat mkurthuhn lei mda, mma ngi ningkya ktaak ki kornowl kornowl lih mdoqhil chaak leiyi, mma ngi kerdel donni, mma' dokriinya ngi thenpen avah kpii rah.
42011009	Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Aqhil chaan, ungta avah naan ahin nih akpii chraan. Athlaam chaan, ungta naan nih avah phang chnaandi'. Inn aqhil chaan, ungta thurngut avah naan athen inni akapvanpiik chraan.
42011010	Mleiya kqhil kcha' rek khimkheiyi mdo'arlaan chaakin. Kthlaam kcha' mma' ava ngi kphang chrah. Inn kqhil kcha' mma' hinni thurngut avah kapvan piik rah.
42011011	naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tih, mchapa ngi thenpen mqhil thung ngi mhin nih lung kpiidaat ka'am rang? Mditmata, mma ngi tuwlvah khat mqhilna ava' kchang ngi mma ngi mhin nih pruwl khat kpii rang?
42011012	Mditmata, mma ngi harpirdii khat mqhil chaakna, mhin nih silthum'artham khat kpii rang?
42011013	Mdittu' kqha kma' naan maklu ngi anau'leen hinni talu chla kqha rek tpiik chaak rang, tidit adehn nuh, parvaan thah ka'am A'paan ngaalvah kqhil kcha' rek hinni tya knem mih Pthla Kchiir avah kpiilam rang ngoh?”
42011014	Ungta mma ngi mpau kthuwk kma' tarnam khat avah reipthida. Ungta tarnam ava ngi msun chaak thungta, mpau kthuwk kma' mii avah pauda. Ungta ava ngi miipii rek avah ngak chlamda.
42011015	Pdainu mmaan aangqhe ngi hanto' the lamda: “Beeljibub, tarnampii ava' ar'aang ngi, Mma ngi tarnam rek avah mdorei pchaan.”
42011016	Ungta morson aangqhe rekki mdoperteel naan nih Mhin nih, parvaan ki titinna' khat mheitedetin, dilamda, kheel lamda.
42011017	Pdainu Mma ngi muplungbinin avah deithida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Msingreel lih kurkhui kcha' kruwngpaalna' khimkhei avah kenvei chrah. Ungta msingreel lih kurkhui kcha' inn avah ktlu chrah.
42011018	Ungta Seitan rukka mthina mkurkhui chaakku, taluhep pih mma' kruwngpaalna' avah ka'am pchaang rang ngo? Naan nih tarnam rek avah Neiyi Beeljibub ar'aang ngi mreipthi a, mdiin tinu.
42011019	Ungta Neiyi Beeljibub ar'aang ngi tarnam rek kreiyu, naan achapa rekin vah kuw ar'aang ngi mmaan avah mrei'inna? Hava' leiyi, mmaan nih naan a'leenin nih pau kpinditpa rek kurthuwk lamrah.
42011020	Pdainu Neiyi tarnam rek avah Isowr khutpna ngi kdorei mkurthuh bih, kruwngpaalna' avah naan ahin nih knaitek ki kurjung a.
42011021	Mruh ktang miikhat tih raaldona ngi korthlong jikda mi'inn mrun chaak thung ngu msum'alrou rek avah kuhuiyi ka'am.
42011022	Pdainu mma' hinni mruh ktangbet kuwmiikhat tih mkarnaakqhi cheu, mma' avah pchaang chda ungta mma ngi mma' kilrin chaakna' raaldona avah lou chda. Ungta mma ngi mdolown dona rek avah vanpenqheekda.
42011023	Nei tu' kilqhi kma' mma' avah Nei mkepteng ungta Nei tu' kpurkuwkve kma' mma' ava ngi mdo'arjei pthi.
42011024	Ungta tarnam ktobor ava ngi miikhat thungki mthuh dokcheu ava ngi paamkbiik laiyi kthleng ngi chetda ungta mkarngatna' rah mun thlaamda. Pdainu mma ngi mun khatleh ruk mphanma thungta, mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi karvanthuhna' ki'inn ava' thung ngi veikhat vangkerheel nikdi',’ dida.
42011025	Ungta marvan kerheel thungta avah truw deek ki ungta tportlot deek ki arvanphada.
42011026	Audilli mma' ava ngi vangda mma' hinni kqha kma'set morson pthla tikhiu rek qhipom lamda. Ungta mmaan nih ava' thuh luwt lamda ungta ava' thuh am chlamda. Ungta mii ava' ki mqutna' avah choduh ki hinni kdungbet tih qhaset mda.”
42011027	Jisu ngi hava' mthesli arlaan nih miipii rek arlak ki snu khat tih owngda, Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang akuplu kcha' ungta murnu adoyown chaak snu avah msuwkqha a.”
42011028	Pdainu Mma ngi hanto ngi arthaangda: “Ava' han'tun nih, Isowr pau karja kcha' ungta ava' kopqowi kcha' mmaan rek avah msuwkin kqhaset.”
42011029	Ungta miipii rek avah nemthang lamda, ungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Havah kqha kma' suruwl ava'. Hava' mii rekki titinna' chreldaat thlaam lamda, pdainu khulpu Jonah ki titinna' kma'don titinna' khatleh piinimeh.
42011030	Mleiya Jonah avah Ninevah khuwpii ki mii rek thenni titinna' khat. Ava' heppi Mii Chapa avah hava' suruwl rekki mii rek hinni titinna' khat kurthuwk rah.
42011031	Kurduh ki paamkruwngnu ava ngi pau tpinditna' nit tih hava' suruwl ki mii rektu' krip rah ungta mmaan avah kupsul lamrah. Mleiya mmah Solomon luwkinritna' ava' karja chrang ki thenni dultipaam mdonna' ki kthleng. Ungta asuwn, hava' thuh Solomon hinni klin khat avah ka'am daat a.
42011032	Ninevah khuwpii ki mii rekki, pau tpinditna' nit tih hava' suruwl thungki mii rektu' krip lamrah. Ungta mmaan avah kupsul lamrah mleiya mmaan nah Jonah pau parjaamna' thung ngi plung mdoperthlen chaakin. Ungta asuwn, hava' thuh Jonah hinni klinbet khat tah ka'am daat a.
42011033	Kuwkhat leh ngi meila avah plengthida mmun kordowl thung ngi thikchok meh. Ungta tomkal lih khumpthi kchok meh pdainu arvang kluwt mii rekki mdodehna' rah, mma ngi meila avah meilakuwng 'leenni mdoplen.
42011034	Mikka daksa ki meila. Avaleiyi, amik rinchan mqhat bih adaksa mkheng avah mar'aang ngi kdim kcha' a. Pdainu amik rinchan mqhatma bih adaksa mkheng avah kjiingnu ngi kdim kcha' imptih.
42011035	Avaleiyi, nang ngi adaksa thung ngi ka'am mar'aang avah mjiinmana' rah ikilrindei cha'.
42011036	Audilli naan adakin mkheng thung ngi mar'aang ngi mdim chaak bih, ungta mjiinna' khatleh ma'amma bih, mar'aang ngi a'leenin nih mlen thung ngi dow mkheng avah kleng chrah.”
42011037	Jisu ngi mpau mupqut dok dilli, Pharisy miikhat tih kmaalqhi rang ngi Mma' avah own chda. Ungta Mma ngi vangluwtda kmaal rang ngi ko'ongda.
42011038	Pharisypa ava ngi, Mma ngi then mchaak rang thang ngi mkhut mdo'alqhutma mdeh thungta ngakda.
42011039	Ungta Kruwng ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “'Tunnu Pharisy rek naan, naan nih tong le' arkuw avah mduwn daat alqhuhn tinu. Pdainu arilin avah mii'alrou tngeina' le' mrilkqha kmah ngi kdim daat inptih.
42011040	Kokmok rek naan, mduwn kseem Mma' ava ngi mthung rukka mdoseem pemeh mow?
42011041	Pdainu naan nih arilin nih tkorbom chaakna' avah atlow chaan. Ungta asuwn, dow mkheng avah naan athenni kertleu chrah.
42011042	Pharisy rek naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih rihiing le' jelikhaat ungta innbil thungki mdetmdet ki anbul mkheng rek khoa, sowm ki khat tah piin tinu. Pdainu naan nih kindit le' Isowr vonsat avah tuksut maantih. Naan nih mrukri ki ruk kmapthi kmah ngi mdilknau ki avah adotlot chaak raan.
42011043	Pharisy rek naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih sinegog rek thung ngi longkhom kenreel ngeenin tinu ungta kyurkren mun rek thung ngi mii rekki adoturvuwi chaak raan ngeiyin tinu.
42011044	Kqha kpurhuwi, nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rek naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naanna, mtun nih kchet mii rekki mdodeh chaak maan, m'leen nih ber tadaarma thlaan rek hep daat inptih.”
42011045	Audilli nowlam kdei rek arlak ki khat tih arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Chukpu, Nang ngi hava' adothe ava ngi neen rukka kdangin apthitta.”
42011046	Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nowlam kdei rek naan a'leenin rukku suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih mii rek 'leenni tohor kparsa bowrkrik adopohorin. Ungta naan adak innu bowrkrik avah akhutchalin khadaat rukku adokmeiyin pemeh.
42011047	Naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naanki apu'apa rek inni mdo'eyown khulpu rek thlaan'inn avah naan nih adotlotin.
42011048	Ungta mkindit kat daat tih naan nih apu'apa rekin ki nongtlot avah naan nih adopandan chaakin ungta avah adorot chaakin. Mleiya, langlang kat tih mmaan nih khulpu rek avah mdo'eyown ungta naan nih mmaan thlaan'inn rek avah adotlotin.
42011049	Avaleiyi, Isowr rih Mma' ki luwkinritna' ava' rukku hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi mmaan hinni khulpu rekle' tamsi rek pthla nikdi' ungta mmaan nih aangqhe rek avah ke'eyou lamrah ungta morson rek avah chiikepreel lamrah.
42011050	Mleiya dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih mii rekki mdo'eyow rekin khulpu rek mkheng ki hii buwkna' ki phuw lowna' avah hava' suruwl thungki mii rek 'leenni ktla rah.
42011051	Abel hii buwkna' ki kupqhun nih rintparlaanna' khaan le' Mmun Kenjesi arlak ki mdo'eyown Jakhariah hii buwkna' kpha ki avah mmaan nih mdo'arthaan raan. ‘Ou, Neiyi kthe a, hava' suruwl rekki avah mdo'arthaan raan.’
42011052	Nowlam kdei rek naan a'leen nih suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya naan nih luwkinritna' ki chungkamke avah adolowpthi dokin. Naan nih naan adakin ruk luwtmaan tih ungta kluwt nuwm kcha' rek mmaan rukka pkhaanin tinu.”
42011053	Mma ngi, mmaan hinni avale' mthe dok dilli, nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki Mma' avah plungkthi ngi kerteenqhi lamda. Ungta dow knempok 'leenni mdotepmenna' raanni pau kheelpok lamda.
