42011054	Mmaan nih Mma' avah kmin nih sutpqowi lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih Mma' nehr kat thungki pau rekkat tih Mma' avah mdokyownna' raan ki thenni mdosut pqowiyin.
42012001	Mpha ava' thung ngi ttai pchaanmah miipii rekpa avah ava' thuh kurkuwk lamda. Ungta mii mnemreenin leiyi, khat le' khat kerther lamda. Ungta rukrirep pih Jisu ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto' tethe pqhunda: “Naan nih Pharisy rekki thowl, tidit tah kqha tpurhuwina' thungki ikilrin chaan.
42012002	Mleiya kurphuwng kmah ngi kurkhum tlit daat rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh. Ungta kandang kmah ngi kordowl tlit daat rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.
42012003	Avaleiyi, talutalu yoso, naan nih kjiingnu thung ngi adotheen avah mar'aang thung ngi tarjaak rah. Ungta naan nih mthung ki innkhaar rek thung ngi kna thuh adotheen avah inntun thah kurphuwng rah.
42012004	Kaplap rek, Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a: Naan nih daksa ke'eyou rek mmaan avah qi chmaan, tidit tah mmaan nih ava' mtlot dokin dilli morson mdotlot pchaan raan ka'am pemeh.
42012005	Pdainu, Neiyi adoqit chaak raan avah kuw tidit tah ayupdehn nih. Naan nih daksa ava' me'eyow dilli Simmei thung ngi tvarpthina' ki ruhtanna' kthlowi, Mma' avah aqi chaan. Ou, Neiyi kthe a, Mma' avah aqichaan.
42012006	Mii rekki chaichvi chai parnga 'leenni jiisen sumqiit 'knii ngi mdoyur chaak inpda? Ungta mmaan khadaat rukka Isowr aang ngi tperngeel pthi dok ka'am pemeh.
42012007	Anto'kat tih Isowr rih aluw chaiyin 'leenki asam rekin avah khatkhat tih mdotai dok. Avaleiyi, ningpqit maan, naanna chaichvi knempok rek hinni akhonin knem.
42012008	Ungta Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a: Kuwmiikhat tih mii rek aang ngi, Nei mek kthe thuh kcha' mma' avah, Mii Chapa ava ngi Isowr vaantamsi rek aang ngi kthe thuh chrah.
42012009	Pdainu mii rek aang ngi Nei makmat kcha' mma' avah Isowr vaantamsi rek aang ngi kmat chrah.
42012010	Ungta kuwku yoso, Mii Chapa ava' kepteng ngi kpau kcha' mma' avah Isowr rih koptlot piik rah. Pdainu Pthla Kchiir 'leenni pthitda kpau mma' avah ptlotpiik nimeh.
42012011	Mii rekki naan avah sinegog rek thuh, paamkpu rek hinni ungta ruhtanna' ksin rek hinni akqhi raan. Pdainu naan nih taluhep pih kerthlet nikdi' mditmata taluhep pih arthaang nikdi', tidit leiyi, aplungin pyamaan.
42012012	Mleiya mpha ava' thung ngi naan nih talu thenaan tidit avah Pthla Kchiir ava ngi akpurchuk raan.”
42012013	Miipii rek arlak ki kuwmiikhat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Chukpu, ku'upa hinni, alrou kdochom raan avah nei tu' kdopenthem sapna' raan mheithe piikcha'.”
42012014	Pdainu Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: Plap “naanve ki thenni paukpinditpa mditmata alrou kukhuipa khat kurthuwk ki, kuw ngi Neiya mdotokcholda?”
42012015	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Naan nih tpunjuwrna' thungki ikilrindei chaan ungta khu asuwdei chaan. Mleiya hava' miikhat tih kokhop kerdeiyi sum'alrou mdothlowi chaak ava' thung ngi mrinkum avah ka'am pemeh.”
42012016	Audilli Mma ngi hava' pauportolna' avah mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Svangpa khat lou thung ngi chasowm avah kepleet tih thuwkda.
42012017	Mma ngi mthina plung parngam chda ungta mthina ngi hanto' kirbin chda: ‘Neiyi kchasowm rek kdothiikna' rah inn ammeh, talu tlow nikdi' o?”
42012018	Audilli mma ngi hanto'theda: “'Tunnu hanto' tlow nih. Ktompli rek avah qhit dok thini rang ngi klinbet tih isa lam nih. Ungta ava' thung ngi neiyi kchasowm mkheng rekle' kdokna rek avah ithi nih.
42012019	Ungta neiyi kapthlarin hinni hanto' the nikdi': ‘Kapthlarin nang ngi kum tyatya ki thenni alrou knempok ki apurtuwl chaak dok a. Nang nga ikarnga cha', acha'anee rang ngi ikanpa cha'.”
42012020	Pdainu Isowr rih mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Nang nga kokmok kcha imptih. Tuni ki jaankat tih, Neiyi apthlarin avah loupthi nikdi'. Ungta nang ngi athen rang ngi adopurtuwl chaak dow rek avah kuw dow kurthuwk chrang ngo?’
42012021	Avaleiyi, Isowr hinni svang tuthuhna' kmah ngi mthina ki thenni alrou kpurtuwl kcha' mma' avah hava' hep daat rah.”
42012022	Audilli Jisu ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a: ‘Naan nih arinkumin ki thenni, ‘talu chani kaan,’ mditmata adaksaan ki thenni ‘talu hilna nikaan,’ dida aplungin pyamaan.
42012023	Rinkum avah thendam han'tun ki ungta daksa avah buwdiir han'tun ki.
42012024	Naan nih pa'aa rek rinkum avah abinphaakin. Mmaan nih chiimuw ruk pqau lammeh mditmata chasowm ruk arkun lammeh. Ungta tpurtuwlna' inn ruk thlowi lammeh mditmata ktom ruk thlowi lammeh. Anto'daat yoso, Isowr rih mmaan avah mdopmaal lam. Ava' vah naanna pva rek han'tun nih tya knem mih asit'in ka'am o?
42012025	Ungta naan arlakin ki kuwda, muplungyat chaak ki mdung khutup khatpang daat yoso kapsaang pchaang nga?
42012026	Naan nih mikdil'suwn ava'maklu tlow pchaang maantih, mdittu' taluleiyi naan nih morson rekki thenni plung apyat inna.
42012027	Naan nih duwmrei rek avah taluhep pih kmowng lam tidit abinphaakin. Mmaan nih nong ruk lou lammeh ungta plaa ruk qen lammeh. Anto'daat yoso, Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a. Solomon kpha rukku mma' ki mkonlorna' mkheng rek thung ngi hava'le' khatpang hep daat tih mkorthlon chaakna' ka'am pemeh.
42012028	O, mlamrin kdil'suwn rek naan, 'tun 'tunnu paamlaiyi mowngda ka'am a ungta pdukniu meiqhuwm thuh tvarpthi rang nowm rek maklu a, Isowr rih dona mapnaak chaak lam u, naan ngaalla tya knem mih akapnaak chdaat raanno?
42012029	Ungta naan nih talu tchaak rang mditmata ‘talu tneek rang’ tidit leiyi, thlaammaan? Ungta ava'leiyi plung ruk pyamaan.
42012030	Mleiya dultipaam ki chaat rekki hava' dow mkheng rek avah mdothlaamin. Ungta naan A'paan nih hava' dow rek ava' akriin inna tidit avah mdodeh.
42012031	Pdainu naan nih Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' athlaam chaan, ungta hava' dow mkheng rek avah naan ahin nih akthlolpiik chraan.
42012032	Lopkdil rek naan, aningin pqitmaan, tidit tah naan ahin nih kruwngpaalna' adotpiik raan avah A'paan plungngam ava'.
42012033	Naan nih adothlowi chaakin avah ayurin rang ngi srah rek hinni abom chaaknaan. Ungta naan nih asumbuwrin avah kqi kma' rang thung ngi arkhi chaan. Parvaan ki sum'inn avah kenvei tidit am nimeh ungta kupru rukku pha pchaang nimeh mditmata mnu dosuk ki kenvei kcha' tidit ruk am nimeh.
42012034	Mleiya asum'alrouin amna' thung ngi nang aplungrin rukka ka'am rah.
42012035	Naan nih, dona nada korthlongda ungta arkowlin ajeelin rang ngi, nong klou rah ikorthlong chaan. Ungta ameila rekin avah apquwng tlitin.
42012036	Naan nih kchiir innee maalna' thah kchet mukpupa arvang kerheel rah karda kcha' mii rek ava' hep ikurthuwkin. Mmaan nah, mma ngi arvang kerheel donni inn mqhil ki mpha thung ngi kbeisek ki thurngut mdopvan piikna' raan ki thenni kilring kcha'lam.
42012037	Mma ngi marvan kerheel thung ngi, kilrinda kahar daat tih mdophaak suwk rek avah msuwkqha a. Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, mma ngi dona nadon, morkowljeel pnet thidon nih, suwk rek avah khaan 'leenni topkong lamdon ungta mma ngi mmaan avah sopklow chlam rah.
42012038	Mma ngi qhang miknitna' thung ngi arjung yoso mditmata qhang mukdumna' thung ngi arjung yoso kilrinda kahar tlit tih mdophaak suwk rek avah msuwkqha kcha' a.
42012039	Pdainu naan nih havah adeiyin. Mleiya innkpupa ava ngi kupru thlenna' rang mpha avah mma ngi mdeh chaak daat tlaang bih, mma ngi har kilring chdon nih mma ngi mi'inn mdopkui rang avah ptlot lam nimeh.
42012040	Avaleiyi, naan rukku ikilrin chaan rang ngi i'amin. Mleiya Mii Chapa avah naan nih adobin psukmanaan mpha thung ngi kurjung rah.”
42012041	Audilli Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi hava' pauportolna' avah neen kihin daat chrel lih adothe mow mditmata mii mkheng rek hinni adothe plih?”
42012042	Ungta Kruwng ngi hanto'theda: “Mdittu' mukpupa ngi mi'innsuwk mkheng rek ksutpqowi rah mdosi rah ungta mphakatkat thung ngi thendam kpii rang, trinchaak krow ungta kinrit suwkkenreel kurthuwk rang avah kuw rang a?
42012043	Mukpupa mtlun thung ngi, anto ngi ktlow meek ki mdotlun phaak suwk avah msuwkqha a.
42012044	Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah mma ngi mma' avah mdomna mkheng ksutpqowi rah ksi chrah.
42012045	Pdainu suwk ava ngi muplungril lih hanto ngi: ‘Kukpupa avah kbeiyok ki tlungkhot nimeh’ adiso ungta mma ngi pselsuwk rekle' snusuwk rek avah te'e mupqhun chaak bih, ungta chaso neeso ungta miprit chaak bih,
42012046	Suwk ava' kpupa avah mma ngi m'lam mdosut mana' nit ungta mma ngi mdorin qhang thung ngi ktlung rah. Ungta mma ngi mma' avah thum 'knii ngi kpunthum rah ungta mma' avah lamkrin kma' rek tung ngi mthen kpurtum pthirah.
42012047	Ungta mukpupa plungbin deithida totlot rah kbin kma' ungta mma' plungbin dilkqowiyi ktlow kma' suwk avah kchung knempok ki keprei rah.
42012048	Pdainu ava' kdei kcha' kma' mma' ava ngi kchung tohorna' ki mtik kcha ngi parmak chdaat yoso mma' avah ktlowm 'suwn nih kchung kohor rah. Mleiya kuwku yoso mukpupa ngi mhin nih knempok ki mdopiikna' mma' hinki knem mih karngai chrah. Ungta mii rekki knempa ksutpqowi rah mdosiin mma' hinki knem mih kqhil lamrah.
42012049	Neiya dultipaam thung ngi mei kopchok rah kurjung ping ungta Neiyi kdongei chaak avah mei topchow dok rang ava'.
42012050	Pdainu Neiyi diiluwna' khat thuh dii kluw rah ka'am daat ungta ava' mkurthuh dok duh kpha thung ngu Neiya tya thuh kuplung nga kya kcha' daat a!
42012051	Naan nih, Neiya dultipaam thung ngi plung kdai kpii rang ngi kurjung rah atbin inna? Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a anto'liit pemeh, pdainu ava' mda tkenqheena' kpii rah kurjung ping.
42012052	Mleiya 'tunki kupqhun nih inn khat thuh miilai parnga ka'am avah kenqheek rah. Mleiya kdum rekki 'knii rek 'leen ungta 'knii rekki kdum rek 'leenni kperteng ngi krip lamrah.
42012053	Mpa ngi mchapa 'leen ungta mchapa ngi mpa 'leen, mnuh ngi mchanu 'leen ungta mchanu ngi mnuh 'leen ungta maktarnuh ngi mokmounu 'leen ungta mokmounu ngi maktarnuh 'leen kenqheek ki krip lamrah.”
42012054	Audilli Mma ngi miipii rek hin rukku hanto'theda: “Naan nih knitlaak ki armei karhang adehncheu, naan nih kbeisek ki hanto' theen tinu, ‘Khu kra rah mthe a,’ ungta avah anto'kat tih rahda.
42012055	Ungta naan nih kurduh ki tirthli mraancheu kni kdung ngi ksa rangnga, diin tinu ungta anto ngi sada.
42012056	Kqha kpurhuwi rek naan, naan nih dulti le' parvaan ki ruwngchen avah dei pchaang thiin tinu taluhep pih hava' 'tunpha ki mpha ruwngchen avah adodeh pchaan maanno?
42012057	Ungta taluleiyi naan nih kindit avah talu tidit ava ngi adakin avah kpindit chmaanti?
42012058	Nang ngi, adokarnaakqhi mii ava' tung ngi paukpinditpa hinki rah 'lam thuh aheimeek sliin arlaan nih mma' tu' akalqhat dokna' raan kdung ngi atlow cha'. Mditma bih, mma ngi nang avah paukpinditpa hinni aqendon ungta paukpinditpa ava ngi nang nga nongmii klin hinni aparlaandon ungta nongmii klin ava ngi nang nga rowng'inn thuh akdaalpthi rah.
42012059	Neiyi nang ahin nih kthe a. Nang ngi mqutna'dek ki jiisen sumqiit ava' apiik dok duh khimkheiyi nang ngi ava' thung ki arvanthuhna' rah m'lam amvot meh.”
42013001	Audilli mpha ava'kat thung ngi ava' thuh ka'am mii rekki Galily ki mii rek leiyi, Mhin nih pau song lamda. Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: ‘Mleiya mmaan nih rinmparlaan chaakin arlaan nih, Pilaat tih mmaan avah eyou lamda.’
42013002	Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan akheng inni hava' Galily ki mii mkheng rek avah mmaan nih hava' suwkthuhna' mdoperteelin leiyi, mmaan avah Galily ki mii morson rek hinni mmeel kthi ngi pnu kervei kcha' heppi abin inna?
42013003	Neiyi naan ahinin nih kthe a: ‘Naan nih plung aperthlen chaak maanbi, naan rukka mmaan heppi kenveiter chnaandi'.
42013004	Mditmata Siloam thung ngi arka'inn tluda mdonenyow mii sowm leitreht rek mmaan avah, naanvah Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am mii mkheng rek hinni pnu kerveisi rah abin inna?’
42013005	Neiyi kthe a anto'liit pemeh. Pdainu naan nih plung aperthlen chaak maanbi, anto' heppi naan akhengin avah kenvei chnaandi'.”
42013006	Audilli Mma ngi hava' pauportol ava' rukka theda: “Miikhat tih mrithlumbil thung ngi kduwtbul khat phunda ungta mma ngi ava'leen ki mchei ksuw rah arvada pdainu khadaat ruk phangmda.
42013007	Audilli mma ngi mrithlumbil krungpa ava' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Asuw o, kum kdum thung ngi neiyi arvanu hava' kduwtbul 'leenki mchei avah kdosut thlaam pdainu khadaat ruk phangmaang. Avah aphuwr pthi, taluleida dulti mdopartlaiya?’
42013008	Pdainu mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: ‘Mukpu tunkum pang ngu i'am daatso, neiyi mbul iploi nih rang ngi ikhorni ungta dulqhatna' ibuk nih.
42013009	Ava ngi kchei chdaat ruk krow. Pdainu mcheima cheentung ngi nang ngi avah phuwr pthi teng daatlai.’ ”
42013010	'Tunnu Mma ngi tkarngatnit khat thung ngi sinegog rek thung ngi purchuk lamda.
42013011	Ungta asuwn ava' thung ngi kum sowm leitreht thung ngi choitroina' pthla ngi kkowi kcha' snu khat ka'am. Ungta snu avah ktorkon khak kcha' ungta mthina ngi kinding pchaang vot pemeh.
42013012	Pdainu Jisu ngi mma' mdeh thungta, Mma ngi, Mhin nih ownda ungta snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Snu, achoitroi chaakna' thungki nang nga kerthlet dok kcha' imptih.”
42013013	Ungta Mma ngi mma' 'leenni mkhut khiinpiik chda ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma' avah pdamda ungta Isowr ponlor chda.
42013014	Pdainu sinegog kpupa ava ngi plungkthi ngi arthaangda, mleiya Jisu ngi tkarngatnit tih mdopdam ungta mma ngi miipii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Dultimii rekki nong mdolow chaakna' raan niitruk ka'am, avaleiyi naan nih nit rek ava' thung ngi ithlengin rang ngi idam chaan pdainu tkarngatnit rang pemeh.”
42013015	Audilli Kruwng ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Kqha kpurhuwi rek! Naan khimkheiyi, tkarngatnit tih mma' mma' ki, sil mditmata skowlraam rek avah mi'innin thungki perthletin tinu dii adopneekin kmeh mow?
42013016	Ava' vah, abinno, Abraham chanu khat avah Seitan nih kum sowm leitreht thung ngi bowlpthida ka'am snu avah tkarngatnit tih tperthlepiik rang pemeh mow?”
42013017	Mma ngi hava' mdothe ava ngi, Mma' krow kma' rek mkheng avah ningkya pii lamda. Ungta miipii rek mkheng ngi Mma ngi tkonlorna' nong rek mdotlot mkheng ava' 'leenni kanpa chlamda.
42013018	Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah talu tu' tpinqim rang? Ungta Neiyi avah talu tu' portol nikdi?
42013019	Havah miikhat tih louda mi'innbil thung ngi mdopqau anruwng muw khat ava' hep daat. Ungta ava ngi mowngda linda ding klin khat kurthuwkda ungta parvaanlai ki pva rekki mbaak rek 'leenni kthla lamda.”
42013020	Ungta veikhat Mma ngi theda: “Neiyi Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah talu tu' portol nikdi o?
42013021	Mleiya havah snu khat tih saikan tomkal kdum thung ngi pertetda mkerdel duh kpha ngi mdochou thowl ava' hep daat.”
42013022	Ungta Mma ngi Jerusalem thah mahanthang chunni khuwpii rekle' khuw rek thah kthleng ngi chetda purchuk lamda.
42013023	Audilli miikhat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng mii mruk'suwn daat rang mow mdosan chaak rang nga?” Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda:
42013024	“Paltong ktirbik thung ngi aluw chaakna' raan atlow chaan. Mleiya Neiyi kthe a, mii knempok ki tuluw chaakna' rah ktlow rah pdainu luwt pchaang lam nimeh.
42013025	Innkpupa ava ngi ripdon ungta thurngut markam dok dilthang vah naan nih duwn thah ripda inn tiqhil pqhunin tidon: ‘Kruwng, Kruwng, neen kthenin nih mheipvan piik chaan,’ dinaandi'. Ungta Mma ngi, ‘Neiyi naan avah adei maan ring, naanna tva'kiin ptih,’ adiindon nih akarthaang raan.
42013026	Audilli naan nih hanto' tethe pqhunnaandi': ‘Neen nih, Nang tu' chasap innu ungta Nang ngi neenki khuwpii 'lam rek thung ngi mpurchuk intinu.’
42013027	Pdainu Mma ngi hanto' kther rah: ‘Neiyi kthe a, neiyi naanna tva'kiin ptih tidit adei maanring, nowlam tukksut kma' nong ktlow rek naan akheng inni, Nei kihin ki isun dokin.’
42013028	Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi naan nih Abraham le' Aijek le' Jakob le' ungta khulpu rek mkheng adehn thung ngi, naan avah athinaan nih akarvar chaakin leiyi, ava' thuh kqapkqei le' haa tikriilna' kthuwk chrah.
42013029	Mmaan nih knithuh ki ungta knitlaak ki ungta karthak ki ungta kurduh ki kthleng lamrah ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi kok'ong lamrah.
42013030	Ungta dakat tih ava' thung ngi rukri chrah dilknau ka'am rah ungta dilknau chrah rukri ka'am rah.”
42013031	Nit ava' thung ngi Pharisy rek aangqhe avah Mhin nih thleng lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Ikorlou rang ngi mmun hava' thungki isun dok, mleiya Herod tih Nang nga te'eyow rah atbinna.”
42013032	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Vangin rang ngi tkei ava' hinni hanto' vantheen: ‘Asuwn, tuni le' pduknii vah Neiyi tarnam reipthida ungta tapdamna' nong tlow nikdi' ungta mnii kdumna' nit tu', Neiya mukpurkhum chrah’, mdit', aditpiikin.
42013033	Anto'daat yoso, Neiyi tuni le' pduknii ungta adainii lim thung vah k'lamqowi rang ava' qowida chet chnikdi'. Mleiya khulpu khat tah Jerusalem duwn thang ngi mkenvei chaak daatna' kqha pemeh.
42013034	O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, khulpu rek ke'eyou nang ungta ahin nih tapthlat rek mmaan avah lung ngi deeng lam tinu. Neiyi veityaveitya thung ngi nang anau le' avah harnuh ngi mapthlatii ngi msuwn rek mdopurku chaak lam heppi tpurkuh rah kdongei chaak pdainu nangvah avah ngei mtinu'.
42013035	Asuw! nang a'inn avah ahin nih ktlong dang ngi mmaak pthi a. Neiyi mkindit kat kthe a nang ngi: ‘Kruwng miing 'leenni karva Mma' avah msuw kqha a,’ (Luw. 118:26) adoditna' mpha marvan duh khimkheiyi, nang ngi Neiya mdeiliit nimtih.”
42014001	'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah tkarngatnit tih Mma ngi Pharisy rekki, paamkpu khat inn thuh kmaal rah mhei thung ngi mmaan nih Mma' avah kmin nih sutpqowi lamda.
42014002	Ungta asuwn, ava' thung ngi ktirthlingrii ktong miikhat avah Mma' aang ngi amdaatda.
42014003	Ungta Jisu ngi nowlam kdei rek ungta Pharisy rek karthaang ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Tkarngatnit tih tapdam avah nowlam vah mrot mow, rowmeh o?”
42014004	Pdainu mmaan nih rimkdi am chlamda. Ungta Mma ngi mma' avah kmeida ungta pdamda ungta mma' avah anto ngi psun chda.
42014005	Audilli Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta hanto'theda: “naan arlak inni kuwmiikhat mma ngi mdothlowi skowlraam khat mditmata silpa khat avah tkarngatnit tih khor thuh mtlaak dokku kbeisek ki ava' thung ki kturthuh kma' rah kuw ka'am rang ngo?”
42014006	Ungta mmaan nih hava' dow rek leivah Mhin nih dow khatleh arthaang pchaang lam mda.
42014007	Mma ngi mmaan nih taluhep pih mmun kqhasi avah makthlanin tidit mdeh dilli, kowllat kphang kcha' rek hinni Mma ngi pauportolna' khat thepiik lamda.
42014008	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih kuwmiikhat tih kchiir innnee maalna' thung ngi atalat chaakin cheentung ngi, naan nih mmun kqhasi thung ngi ko'ongmaan. Mleiya mma ngi naan ahin nih takyat chaakbet krow mii morson mdolat chaak ruk ka'am krow.
42014009	Ungta nang akla kcha' ava ngi mma' tu' kilqhi ngi arvangso ahin nih ‘hava' mii ava' hinni mmun apii cha', kdi rah.’ Ava' dilli nang ngi ningkya tu' kilqhi ngi mmun kchowmsi thah tko'on pqhunnadi'.
42014010	Pdainu mii ngi atalat chaakin thung ngi naan nih mmun kchowm thuh vaan rang ngi iko'ongin. Mdit bih, nang akla kcha' mma' arvangdon nih ahin nih hanto' kthe krow, ‘Plap, mmun kparthaang thah vang.’ Audilli nang nga, nang ngi khaan 'leenni adoko'onqhi rek aang ngi tkonlor chaakna' phang chnadi'.
42014011	Mleiya kuwku yoso mdak ki katparthaan kcha' khimkhei rek avah kopchowm pthirah. Ungta mdak ki kporchowm kcha' mii khimkhei rek avah katparthaan piik lamrah.”
42014012	Audilli Mma ngi Mma' kla kcha' ava'hin rukku hanto'theda: “Nang ngi kluh ki von yoso mditmata jiingsun ki von yoso aporthlon chaak thung ngi aplap rek, mditmata a'uanau rek, mditmata ari'alam rek mditmata a'innveen svang rek lalamma'. Mleiya mmaan nih aklapurthuwl lamrah ungta nang nga akchowi dok lamrah.
42014013	Pdainu nang ngi tmaalna' khat aporthlon thung vah srah ungta arda korsowi ungta mkhuh kyeng ungta mmikktot mii rek alahcha'.
42014014	Ungta ava ngi nang nga suwqhat phang chnadi', mleiya mmaan vah achowi pchaang lam nimeh. Mleiya mrinkindit rek rinkerheelna' thung ngi nang nga akpurthuwl piik chrah.”
42014015	'Tunnu mmaan arlak ki kok'ong khat tih hava' dow rek ava' marjaak thungta mma ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi thenpen ava' kcha chrang mma' avah msuwkqha a.”
42014016	Audilli Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih tmaalna' klin khat porthlong chda ungta mma ngi mii knempok ki lah chda.
42014017	Ungta kmaal rang ki mpha thung ngi mma ngi msuwk rek avah mkowllat chaak rek hinni, ‘Arvaan, dow mkheng avah 'tunnu kurchuwl dok a,’ dida kther rah pthla lamda.
42014018	Pdainu mmaan mkheng inni kinqimsap pih hanto ngi mthlenmana' raan ki mlei tethe pqhun lamda. Mrukri ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi loupaam khat ren chnuh ungta neiya ava' ksuw rah chetnikdi' Neiyi adotoptlot piikna' rah akaktham chaak a.’
42014019	Ungta morson khat ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi silpa sikparnga ren chnuh ungta neiyi mmaan avah perteel lam nikdi'. Neiyi adotoptlot piikna' rah akaktham chaak a.’
42014020	Ungta morson khat nowl rukku hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi snu khat the chnuh ungta avaleiyi neiya arva pchaang nimaang.’
42014021	Mthungta suwk ava ngi arvang kerheelda ungta innkpupa hinni hava' pauna rek avah song chda. Audilli innkpupa ava ngi muplungthit tih suwk ava' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nang ngi kbeisek ki khuwpii 'lam rek thuh ungta 'lamqhuwm rek thuh va rang ngi, srah rek, kyeng kkhowi rek, mmikktot rek ungta mkhuh kyeng rek avah hava' thuh arvanqhi lam.’
42014022	Ungta suwk ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Mukpu, nang ngi paupiik adotpiik heppi ktlot chaak dok a ungta arlaan kpha rukku mmunna ka'am daat a.’
42014023	Audilli mukpupa ava ngi suwk ava' hinni theda: ‘Nang ngi 'lampii rekle' 'lamqhuwm rek thung ngi va rang ngi ka'am rek mmaan avah ki'inn mdimna' khimkhei arvanqhi lam.
42014024	Mleiya neiyi nang ahin nih kthe a, tidit tah kowllat mii kuwkhat leh ngi nei kvonsum ki mdit avah pertem lam nimeh.’ ” dida.
42014025	Ungta miipiipa rek avah Mma' tu' kilqhi ngi chetsap lamda. Ungta Mma ngi mdilkerheel thida hanto'theda:
42014026	“Kuwmiikhat tih Nei kihin nih arvathida, mnuh le' mpa, mnuwn le' mnau, mu'umnau le' mcharmyur, Ou ungta mdaksa ki mrinkum ruk kahal kcha' kma' mma' ava ngi Nei ksikhu kurthuwk pchaang nimeh.
42014027	Ungta mdaksa ki khros kohor kcha' kmah ngi kdilkqowi kcha' mma' avah Nei ksikhu kurthuwk pchaang nimeh.
42014028	Mleiya naan arlakin ki kuwn pti, arka'inn khat tsak rah kbin kcha' khat tih choduh ngi ko'ongda mma ngi ava' tupqutna' krow kimkhon rah thlowi mow thlowi maang tidit ktaijap kma' rangnga?
42014029	Mditma bih, mma ngi innmun mphun dok dilli ungta ava' mupqut pchaanmah bih, kdei mii khimkheiyi mma' avah tipni chaak kupqhun lamrah.
42014030	Mmaan nih, ‘hava' mii ava ngi tsakka pqhun pthida, tupqut tah pqu pchaang meh,’ kdi lamrah.
42014031	Mditmata talu paamkruwng khatda, morson paamkruwng khat tu' raal karna rang ngi, choduh ko'ongda kbinjap kma' rang nga? Mleiya mma ngi mma' mii pun sowm ava ngi mma' kepteng ngi karva rang pun som'knii avah tkurdukqhi kapchaang rang mow, tidit kbinjap kma' rang nga?
42014032	Mditma rang bih, morson khat ava ngi 'lamkla ngi ma'am arlaan nih, mma ngi pausikhu pthladon nih tkalqhatna' ki mrit rek mdoqhil chaak rah.
42014033	Anto' heppi, naan arlakin ki kuwku yoso, mma ngi mdothlowi dow mkheng kmapthi kma' mma' ava ngi Nei ksikhu kurthuwk pchaang nimeh.
42014034	Pti a kqha pdainu pti ava ngi ma'al mse chaakku taluhep pih avah veikhat tpa'al daat rang ngo?
42014035	Havah dulti ki then rukku mqhatna' ammeh ungta dulqhatna' ngi tpurtuwl ki then rukku msit ammeh, pdainu mii rekki avah mdovar pthi. Maknapum mma' ava ngi arja chdeiso.”
42015001	Audilli sumkqhai rekle' pnu kervei rek avah Mma' karja chrang ngi Mhin nih nai chlamda.
42015002	Ungta Pharisy rekle' nowlam chukpu rek mkheng ngi nurnur kdi ngi, ‘hava' mii ava ngi pnu kervei rek arlaang chlamda ungta mmaan tu' chasap lamda,’ dilamda.
42015003	Mthungta Mma ngi hanto'theda mmaan hinni hava' pauportol ava' theda:
42015004	“naan arlak inni yau arja khat kthlowi khat ka'am a, ungta marlakin ki khat tah kmaang kcha' a. Mdittu' mma ngi paamkbiik laiyi morson somtku leitku mapthidon ungta kmaang kcha' khat ava' mphanduh khimkheiyi chetda thlaam nimeh mow?
42015005	Ungta mma ngi ava' mphan chaak thung ngi, mkanpat chaak ki yau avah mluwkou 'leenni pko'ongda.
42015006	Ungta mma ngi inn mtlun thungta maplap rekle' mi'innveen rek avah own purkuwk lamda ungta hanto'theda: ‘Ikanpasap inche, mleiya neiyi kmaang kcha' kyau avah kphan chaak a.’
42015007	Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, anto' heppi, plung kperthleng dok kcha' mii kindit somtku leitku rek leiyi, tkanpat ava' han'tun nuh, plung kperthleng kcha' khatpang ava'leiyi parvaan thah kerkheelset tih tkanpatna' ka'am rah.
42015008	Mditmata snu khat tih jiipowl sumqiit sowm thlowi chda ungta sumqiit khat tah pmaang pthida. Mdittu' mma ngi meila plengdon khat ava' mphanduh khimkheiyi ktipnek ki thlaam nimeh mow?
42015009	Ungta mma ngi ava' mphan chaak thung ngi maplap rekle' mi'innveen rek owndon hanto' kther rah, ‘Ikanpasap inche, mleiya neiyi kdopmaan sumqiit avah kphan chaak a.’
42015010	Anto' heppi Neiyi kthe a, Isowr vaantamsi rek aang ngi plung kperthleng kcha' khat ava'leiyi tkanpatna' ka'am rah.”
42015011	Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Miikhat tih chapa 'knii thlowi chda.
42015012	Ungta mokmow ava ngi mpa hinni hanto'theda: ‘Apa nei kthen rah alrou avah mheipii dok.’ Mthungta mma ngi mmaanve hinni sum'alrou avah penthem piik lamda.
42015013	Ungta mnit trek kma' daat thung ngi mchapa kmow ava ngi mkheng ngi purkuwkda. Ungta mma ngi horda khuwpaam 'lamkla khat thah pjiinda ungta mma ngi msum'alrou rek avah ktirki kmah ptlang pthida.
42015014	Pdainu mma ngi mdothlowi mkheng ava' maptlan dok le' mpaam ava' thung ngi powitham kdungyou kchang ngi thuwkda. Ungta mma ngi dow tikriin rah pqhunda.
42015015	Audilli mma ngi chetda khuwpaam ava' thung ki svangpu khat hinni thamlow chda. Ungta mma ngi vakluwng rek kapmaal rah mlou thah mma' avah sida.
42015016	Mma ngi vakluwng rek dochaak vakthen ava ngi kpowi tappaa chrang paknu dida, pdainu kuwkhat leh ngi dow khatleh ruk pii chlam mda.
42015017	Pdainu mma ngi mkirbin pthuhhowl thungta, mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Kpa hinni thamklow kcha' suwk rekka thenpen kkhop kkhop pih thlowi lamda ungta karsak ki thlowi lamda, ungta neiya hava' thuh powitham mih kdi rah kthe a.
42015018	Neiyi korlou nih kpa ngeng ngeng, pha chdaat nih ungta mhin nih hanto' the chnih: ‘Apa, neiyi parvaan kepteng ngi ungta nang a'aang ngi pnu kerve chaak a.
42015019	Ungta neiya nang achapa kurthuwk ki mtik chaporson maang. Neiya tham klow kcha', asuwk rek khat mheipthut cha',’ dinikdi'.”
42015020	Audilli mma ngi ripda mpa hinni kerheel chda. Pdainu mma ngi 'lamkla dok ki murhun arlaan nih, mpa ngi avah deida ungta plung pkham chda. Ungta mma ngi juchenda mlowl thah arpomda ungta put chda.
42015021	Ungta mchapa ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Apa! Neiyi parvaan kepteng ngi ungta nang amiksut thung ngi pnu kerve chaak a. Ungta neiya achapa kurthuwk ki mtik chaporson chmaang,’ dida.
42015022	Pdainu mpa ngi msuwk rek hinni hanto'theda: ‘Buwdiir makqhasi arvansinin rang ngi apnaakin ungta mkhut 'leenni khutpaar apnaakin ungta mkhuh 'leenni khuhkok apnaakin.
42015023	Ungta tapmar silsuwn avah arvanqhiin ungta a'eyou'in ungta neen nih ava' ichaan cheh rah ikporchong inche.
42015024	Mleiya hava' kchapa avah kmaang kcha' thungki tphan chaakin.’ Ungta anto ngi mmaan nih kporchong chlamda.
42015025	'Tunnu mma' upa avah lou thah ka'am chdaat. Ungta mma ngi arhungda inn murhunnai thungta mma ngi laakrowl le' kardaam archaang arjada.
42015026	Mthungta mma ngi msuwk rek khat ownda ungta hava'le' avah talu tidit kheelda.
42015027	Ungta mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Anaupa tlung kerheelda ungta apa ngi anaupa avah kchun kahaam mih mdo'arlaan chaak leiyi, tapmar silsuwn avah mdo’eyow piik.’
42015028	Pdainu mmah muplung thida ungta tvanluw rah row mda. Avaleiyi, mpa ngi arvang thuwkda mma' avah pnuwm chda.
42015029	Mthungta mma ngi mpa pau avah arthaangda hanto'theda: ‘Asuw o, hava' kum tya thung ngi neiyi nang nga sop'alow chnuh, neiyi teden rukku apaupiik rek avah tukksut kma' tlowmaang. Pdainu nang ngi, neiyi kaplap rektu' kporchon chaakna' raan ki thenni keelsuwn khadaat ruk mpii mtih.
42015030	Ungta hava' achapa, asum'alrou dakkurjur snu rektu, kcha dok ava' mtlun daat le' nang ngi tapmar silsuwn avah eyowpiik tinu,’ dida.
42015031	Ungta mpa ngi mchapa hinni hanto'theda: ‘Kchapa, nang nga mpha ktai thung ngi nei tu' amve minnu ungta neiyi kdothlowi mkheng avah nang adoyesang.
42015032	Havah hanto'kat rah, tidit tah neen nih porchongda tkanpat chaak rah. Mleiya anaupa avah kdiyou dok kcha' thungki kring kerheel ungta mmah kmaang kcha' thungki tphan chaakin,” dida.
42016001	Ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Svangpa khat amda ungta mma ngi suwkkenreel khat thlowida. Ungta suwkkenreel ava ngi mma' sum'alrou rek avah mpartlai a tidit ki mraal avah mhin nih song lamda.
42016002	Mthungta mma ngi suwkkenreel avah ownda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi hava' kdo'arjaak avah taluda? Kihin nih anongtlotna' rekki mleikindit avah mheipii dok, mleiya 'tunnu nang nga suwkkenreel kurthuwk porson nimtih.’
42016003	Audilli suwkkenreel ava ngi mdak mthina ngi, neiya talu tlow nikdi'? Mleiya kukpupa ngi neiki suwkkenreel kkurthuhna' avah kihin ki kloupthi rangnga. Neiya khor ktoulow pchaang maang ungta kthamda tiqhil chaak rang ruk kning kakyak a.
42016004	Kqha a kukpupa ngi suwkkenreel tkurthuhna' thungki nei avah mtolowpthi thung ngu talu tlow nikdi', tidit neiyi kdeh a. Mmaan nih neiya mi'innin thung ngi mdotarlaan chaak lamna' rah neiyi havah tlow nikdi'.
42016005	Mthungta mma ngi mma' kpupa ava' hinni leenlei kervei rek khimkhei avah mhin nih own purkuwk lamda ungta mkhatna' ava' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nang nga nei kukpupa hinni leenlei tya arve o?’
42016006	Ungta mma ngi, ‘kruwn reidii til arja khat kdo' arve daat,’ dida. Mthungta mma ngi mhin nih theda: ‘Nang ngi nangki aleenlei tikjitna' chena hava' alou rang ngi kbeisek ki iko'ong rah somparnga akjit.’
42016007	Audilli mma ngi morson khat ava' hinni theda: ‘Ungta nangvah tya ado'arve o?’ Mthungta mma ngi: ‘Chavui til arja khat kdo'arve daat,’ dida. Ungta mma ngi mhin nih theda: ‘Nang ngi nangki aleenlei tikjitna' che hava' alou rang ngi somtreht akjit,’ dida.
42016008	Mthungta mukpu ava ngi mrinkindit kma' suwkkenreel avah mma ngi kinrit dok ki nong mdotlot leiyi, panpaak chda. Mleiya hava' dultipaam ki mii rekka mmaan ki mdomna rekin tsintonna' 'leen vah mar'aang ki nau rek hinni kinrit lam.
42016009	Ungta Neiyi kthe a, naan nih mrinkindit kma' sum'alrou rek avah naan adaksaan ki thenni plap apthut chaan. Mleiya naan nih athlowi maan thung ngi mmaan nih naan avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ta'amna' thuh akarlaang chraan.
42016010	Mnau'suwn thung ngi trinchaak krow mma' avah knempa thung rukku trinchaak krow. Ungta mnau'suwn thung ngi ktobor mma' avah knempa thung rukku ktobor.
42016011	Avaleiyi, naan nih mrinkindit kma' sum'alrou 'leenni trinchaak krow kma' akurthuhn nuh, kindit svangthuhna' thung ngi kuw ngi naanna lam'akrin chdaat raanno?
42016012	Ungta naan nih mii morson dona rek 'leenni trinchaak krow kma' akurthuhn nuh kuw ngi naan adow rekin avah akpii raanno?
42016013	Suwk kuwkhat leh ngi mukpu 'knii soplow pchaang meh mleiya mma ngi khat haldon ungta ktlok khat avah vonsat klow chrah. Mditma bih mma ngi khat 'leenni popdon ktlok khat avah tuksut nimeh. Naan nih Isowr le' sum'alrou avah soplowve pchaang nimaan tih.”
42016014	'Tunnu sum kngei Pharisy rek rukku hava'le' mkheng avah arja lamda, ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah pni chaak lamda.
42016015	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanna mii rek maiyi mdak kpindit kcha' mii rek inptih. Pdainu Isowr rih aplung rekin avah mdeh. Mleiya dultimii rek arlak ki kparthaang dok ki tbinpsuk avah Isowr miksut thung ngi tepder chaak kurhuwi.
42016016	Johon mthlen duh kpha thung ngi mii rekki Nowlam le' Khulpu rek dothe ava' mdoparjaamin. Mpha ava' ki kupqhun nih mii rekki Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah parjaam lamda ungta mii khimkheiyi ava' thung daat tih kluwt rah korlown lamda.
42016017	Ungta parvaan le' dultipaam mqut chaak rang ava' hinvah nowlam thungki kbih'suwn khat mkertlei rang ava ngi kparsabet.
42016018	Kuwku yoso mnuwn kenqhenqhi thida snu morson khat kok'onqhi mma' ava ngi lowsang mqhi a ungta kuwku yoso tkenqhenqhi snu ava' kok'onqhi mma' rukku lowsang mqhi a.
42016019	Svangpa khat amda ungta mma ngi kning ngi ksen buwdiir le' buw kperneem kqha hilnada mniiktaiyi kporchong dok ki am kchokda.
42016020	Pdainu kthamkqhil kcha' ungta mdak mkheng kheng ngi paanda ka'am kcha' mmiing Lajaras tidit khat ruk amda ungta mii rekki mma' avah svangpa ava' thurngut bulli pko'ong lamda.
42016021	Mma ngi svangpa maalna' khaan 'leenki ktla thenkri ava' chomda mpowi tappat chaak rah bin chda, ava' daat kma' ui rekki m'leen ki kpaan rek avah pha lamda pliik kchok lamda.
42016022	Mthungta anto ngi kthamkqhil kcha' mii avah diyou chda ungta mma' avah vaantamsi rekki Abraham aang thah hunqhi chlamda. Ungta svangpa ava' rukka diyouda ungta alruwl lamda.
42016023	Ungta mmah Kdikhuw thah chiikreel lih am chda ungta mma ngi knaanda khu mahansut thungta 'lamkla ngi Abraham handeida ungta Lajaras avah mma' aang ngi ka'am daat handeida.
42016024	Audilli mma ngi owngda hanto' hantheda: ‘Apa Abraham, plung mheipnee cha', ungta Lajaras arjupthla rang ngi dii thuh mkhutchal mowr aphuwm thiso rang ngi keplei avah mheipdai piik chso. Mleiya neiya hava' mei thung ngi suwk kthuwk kchaam ping.
42016025	Pdainu Abraham mih theda: ‘Kchapa, nang ngi dultipaam ki arinkhu avah abinphaak, nang nga dow kqha rek avah kurkhum mih arlaang dok chtinu, ungta Lajaras tah dow kqha kma' mdo'arlaan chaak. Pdainu 'tunvah mmah plung ngamna' phang chda ungta nang nga chiitreelna' adophan chaak.
42016026	Ungta hava'le' mkheng ava' han'tun nih, neen kihin ki ngi naan ahin nih kyunuwm rekki myukmana' ungta naan ahinki ngi neen kihin nih marhan mana' rang ki thenni nang le' neen narlak ki laikarkhaan klin khat mdothiik dok.’
42016027	Mma ngi hanto'theda qhil chda, ‘Mdit cheentung ngi, Apa nang ngi mma' avah kpa inn thah mheipthlat piikcha'.
42016028	Mleiya neiya ku'uknau parnga ka'am lam, tidit tah mmaan rukka hava' chiitreelna' mun thung ngi merheimana' raan ki thenni mma ngi mmaan avah apilqhit chlamso.’
42016029	Abraham mih mhin nih theda: ‘Mmaan nih Moses le' Khulpu rekki laika rek ava' mdothlowi chaakin, mmaan nih mmaan pauthe ava' karja chdaat lamrah.’
42016030	Ungta mma ngi theda: ‘Immeh apa Abraham, mmaan nih kdiyou dok ksa thungki miikhat mvan bih, plung kperthleng chlam rah.’
42016031	Pdainu mma ngi mhin nih theda: ‘Mmaan nih Moses le' Khulpu rek dothe marjaak chaak maanbi, kdiyou thungki khat kerdelda vangkerheel yoso mmaan pau avah lam'rinlam nimeh,’ dida.”
42017001	Audilli Mma ngi sikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Khuhsiir tpirthitna' avah marvanmana' qhaliit nimeh. Pdainu mmaan ava' kthuhqhi mma' 'leenni suwthitna' ka'am a.
42017002	Mleiya hava' kdil'suwn rek khuhsiir ktipirthih mma' avah mlowl 'leenni buhsuk lung khat pirsi thida truwnpii thuh taptlaak pthipleh ngi mma' thenvah kqha rah.
42017003	Naan nih ikilrindei chaan’. A'uanau vih a'leen nih pnu merve chaak dok cheentung ngi mma' avah arai ungta plung mperthlen chaak cheentung ngi mma' avah aptlot piikcha'.
42017004	Ungta mma ngi niikhat thuh a'leen nih veitikhiu pnu aterve psuk dok a ungta mma ngi niikhat thuh veitikhiu kenleso ahin nih plung kperthlen chaak a mdit chaak cheentung ngi mma' avah nang ngi adoptlot piik rah.”
42017005	Ungta tamsi rekki Kruwng hinni: “Neen klamrinin mheipkheel piik chaan,” dilamda.
42017006	Mthungta Kruwng ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih anruwng muwpang daat yoso alamrinin ma'am bih, naan nih hava' beempqhi dingbul ava' hinni, ‘Arjung jung ngi ikurphui rang ngi truwnpii thuh imowng cha'’ dipchaang naandi' ungta ava ngi naan apautheen avah kopqowi rah.
42017007	Ungta naan arlakin ki suwk kthlowi khat tih, msuwk khat tih lou kikriit mditmata yaukqhi ava ngi louki mtlun le' ardada, ‘arvang rang ngi iko'ong rah imaal dok’ kdi rah kuw am naandi?
42017008	Pdainu ava' kchang ngi mma ngi msuwk ava' hinni, ‘Nei kthen nih kluh ki von avaidok ungta arkowl ajeel rang ngi then kchaak kneek dokduh khimkheiyi sopmheilow ungta kmaal dok dilli nang nga charow neerownadi',’ dinimeh mow?
42017009	Ungta mma' paupiik khimkhei rek ava' mdotlot leiyi, mma ngi suwk avah kpanpaak rang? Neiya kpanpaak rah binmaang.
42017010	Anto' heppi naan rukku, naan ahin nih adotlot raan ki thenni paupiik adotpiikin dow rek mkheng ava' atlot dokin dilli hanto' atheen, ‘neenna trinchaak krow kma' suwk inping, neen nih kdotlot raan knongin avah ktlot dok inna.’ ”
42017011	'Tunnu Mma ngi Jerusalem ki rah mahan thung ngi Mma ngi Samaria le' Galily paamkuwl rek kthleng ngi chetda.
42017012	Audilli Mma ngi khuw khat thuh luwtda ungta ava' thuh 'lamkla ngi krip raichi ktong miilai sowm rek ava ngi Mma' avah kurdutqhi chlamda.
42017013	Ungta mmaan nih owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Jisu, Mukpu, neenna plung mheipnee chaan.”
42017014	Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan mheideh thungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Vaan rang ngi adakin avah thimpu rek hinni ikterdet chaan,” dida. Ungta hanto' thuwkda tidit tah mmaan nih anto' mvan inni mraichiitonin thungki mmaan avah kertleu chlamda.
42017015	'Tunnu mmaan arlak ki khat tih mma ngi kdam kchaam ping tidit mdeh thungta kerheelda krowl kparthaang ngi owngda Isowr panpaak chda.
42017016	Ungta mma ngi Mma' khuhther rih tluw chda ungta Mma' avah panpaak chda. Ungta mma' avah Samaria ki mii.
42017017	Mthungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Kertleu kcha' rekka chaisowm lam pemeh mow? Tu'uwng lamda tku rekka?
42017018	Hava' khuwveen ki mal ava' kma'don kerheelda Isowr kpanpaak chrah kuwkhat leh ammeh mow?”
42017019	Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ikerdel rang ngi a'lamqowi thah isun cha', alamrin chaak ki nang nga atapdam chaak a.”
42017020	'Tunnu Pharisy rekki Mhin nih, Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah teden kurjung rang, tidit kheel lamda? Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda arthaangda: “Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah mik ki tedeh daat tih arjung nuwm meh.
42017021	Mditmata, hithah asuwn mditmata wvih thah asuwn aditpiikin nimeh. Mleiya asuwn dakkat tih Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah naan arlak inni ka'am daat a.”
42017022	Audilli Mma ngi sikhu rek hinni theda: “Naan nih Mii Chapa amna' nit rek amikin nih tedeh chaak rah adongeinaan mpha avah karvang rah pdainu naan nih avah dei chnih maantih.
42017023	Ungta mmaan nih naan ahin nih, ‘asuwn hithah ka'am a, ungta asuwn wvih thah ka'am a,’ kdi lamrah. Ava' thuh naanna chetmaan ungta mmaandil qowimaan.
42017024	Mleiya kowl keplek ki paang khat ki mepleh ava ngi parvaan kurduh ki morson paang khat ki kpha ngi mlen ava' heppi Mii Chapa ava' rukka Mma' nit ava' thung vah anto'hep daat rah.
42017025	Pdainu rukrirep pih Mma ngi tyattraanna' avah kperteel rah ungta hava' suruwl ki mii rekki Mma' avah kepthlei lamrah.
42017026	Ungta Noah amthung ki mpha heppi Mii Chapa amthung ki mpha ava' rukka kthuwk rah.
42017027	Noah ngi arkuwngpii thung ngi mluwnit kpha ngi mmaan nih chanee lamda snu the lamda inn'kperne lamda ka'am lam. Ungta diipa kenleda ungta mmaan mkheng avah tpenveipet pthi lamda.
42017028	Anto'hep daat tih Lot ki mpha thung rukvah mmaan nih chanee lamda, ren lamda yur lamda, pqau lamda ungta inn sa lamda ka'am lam.
42017029	Pdainu Lot tih Sodom khuwpii thungki mvanthuh nit tih parvaan ki mei le' kantuk khu ngi rahda ungta ava ngi mmaan mkheng avah tpenveipet pthi lamda.
42017030	Anto' heppi Mii Chapa ava' mpurphuwn thung rukku kthuwk rah.
42017031	Nit ava' thung ngi inntun thah ka'am dok kcha' mma' ava ngi inn thung thah mdomna ka'am daat klou rah arjungqum mso. Ungta anto' heppi loulaiyi ka'am mma' ava ngi mdil thah ka'am kcha' rek klou rah arvang kerheel mso.
42017032	Lot snu avah abinphaakin.
42017033	Kuwku yoso mdaksa ki mrinkum tsanna' rah kthlaam kcha' mma' ava ngi avah kpenvei chrah ungta kuwku yoso mdaksa ki mrinkum kpenvei kcha' mma' ava ngi avah kparkhaal chrah.
42017034	Neiyi akthepiik inna, jaan nih kowm khat 'leenni mii'knii ki'iipve rah, khat tah klou chrah ungta morson khat tah kmapthi rah.
42017035	Snu 'knii ngi buhsuk lung thuh buh ksuwve lamrah, khat tah klou chrah ungta morson khat tah kmapthi rah.
42017036	Pselpa 'knii avah louthuh ka'amve lamrah khat tah klou rah ungta morson khat tah kmapthi rah.”
42017037	Ungta mmaan nih arthaang lamda Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng tva'thung rangda adohunqhi lamna' rang nga?” Mthungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Daksa amna' thung ngi laangkya rek avah kurkuwk lamrah.”
42018001	Audilli Mma ngi, mpha ktai thung ngi rinmaktham chaakna' raan ungta muplungin mkenlet votmana' rah mii rek hinni hava' pau tportolna' khat tih hanto'theda:
42018002	“Khuwpii khat thung ngi Isowr ruk kqi kma' ungta dultimii ruk kakyat kma' paukpinditpa khat amda.
42018003	Ungta meikhunu khat ruk khuwpii ava' thung ngi ka'am. Ungta mma ngi paukpinditpa ava' hinni thlengda, mma' kepteng mii ava' 'leenni pau mheipindit piikcha' dida ktham chda.
42018004	Ungta mma ngi mpha mruk thung ngu avah tlow nimeh pdainu mdil thah mma ngi mthina hanto' kerthe rah, ‘Neiyi Isowr qimyow rih ungta dultimii ruk kyatmyow ringngi,
42018005	Neiyi pau a pinditpiik dok daatnih mleiya mma ngi mtapyat likka, mditma bih kornowl reen nih mthlen ava ngi mkapya ktlok rah,’ dida.”
42018006	Audilli Kruwng ngi theda: “Mlangkma' paukpinditpa ava ngi pau mdothe avah arjaan.
42018007	Mleiya mmaan nih suwn le' jaan nih mo'own chaakin leiyi, ungta Isowr rih mmaan avah tidiil chaak tu' kilqhi ngi mdo'arjaak chaak lam leiyi, Isowr rih, Mma ngi mdokchol chaak rek ava' 'leenni kindit pau tpinditna' avah tpurthuh piik nimeh mow?
42018008	Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Mma ngi kbeisek ki mmaan thenni kindit tih paukpindit piik rah. Anto'daat yoso, Mii Chapa murjun thung ngu, dultipaam thuh dakat tih lamkrin kcha' mii kphang rang mow?”
42018009	Ungta Mma ngi, mdak mthinaan nih mrinkindit rekin ping kdi kcha' ungta lamkilrin kcha' ungta mii morson tukksut kma' mii aangqhe rek hinni hava' pauportol ava' theda:
42018010	“Luwbuk'inn thah rinkaktham chrang ngi mii'knii hang lamda. Khat avah Pharisy ungta ktlok khat avah sumkqhaipa khat.
42018011	Pharisypa ava ngi mthina ripda hanto ngi rinktham chda. ‘Isowr neiya mii morson rek hepkma' kkurthuh chaak leiyi, akpanpaak chaak a. Mleiya mmaan nah miidona 'leen changtlaak kthlowi lam, kindit lam pemeh, ungta lowsang kqhi lam. Ungta neiya hava' sumkqhaipa ava' hep daat pmaang.
42018012	Neiyi arveen khat thung ngi vei'knii then ngowl chnuh ungta neiyi kdophan chaak rek mkheng ki sowm ki khat tah kdopiik chaak,’ dida.
42018013	Pdainu sumkqhaipa avah 'lamkla ngi rip chda ungta mma ngi parvaan ruk hansuw meh. Mma ngi muplung tpeengda ungta hanto'theda: ‘Isowr pnu kervei kcha' neiya plung mheipnee cha',’ dida.
42018014	Neiyi, naan ahin nih kthe a: Isowr rih hava' mii avah ktlok khat ava' hinni mpindit chaak dilli anto ngi mmah mi'inn thah ksun kcha'. Mleiya mthina kpirlin kcha' mma' avah kipdil pthirah, ungta mthina kpirdil kcha' mma' avah kiplin chrah.’ ”
42018015	Audilli mmaan nih Jisu hinni nausisi rek avah Mma ngi mdokmei chaak lam rang ki thenni arvanqhi lamda. Pdainu Msikhu rekki ava' mdehn thungta mmaan avah rai lamda.
42018016	Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan avah Mhin nih own lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Nausisi rek avah Nei kihin nih arva lamso, mmaan avah pkhaanmaan. Mleiya Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah hava' hep daat mii rekki then.”
42018017	Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna: “Kuwku yoso hava' nau khat heppi Isowr Kruwngpaalna' ava' karlaang kma' avah talu hepkduh yoso ava' thuh luwtvot nimeh.”
42018018	'Tunnu svangpa paamkpu khat ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda, kheel chda: “Kqha Chukpu ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah alrouchom mih kdochom chaakna' rah neiyi talu tlow nikdi' o?”
42018019	Mthungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi nang ngi Neiya kqha atidit tah? Kqha Khat ka'am Isowr ava' kma'don kqha kuwkhat leh ka'am pemeh.
42018020	‘Nang ngi lowsang qhima, Mii eyouma', Miidona pruma', Mlangkma' sakhi piima', Anuh le' apa akyatcha', Tidit paupiik rek avah nang ngi deitinu,’ ” dida. (Mpk. 20:12-16 Knl. 5:16-20)
42018021	Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Hava' mkheng avah neiyi kmotki kupqhun nih kdopqowi chaak.”
42018022	Mthungta Jisu ngi hava'le' marjaak thungta. Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “'Tun rukku nang ngi dow khat aptat daat a. Nang ngi adothlowi mkheng avah ayurpthi rang ngi srah rek hinni athem piiklam. Ungta ava ngi nang nga parvaan thah asum'alrou ka'am chrah. Ava' dilli arva rang ngi Neikdil aqowi cha',” dida.
42018023	Pdainu mma ngi hava' marjaak thungta muplung kdung ngi kya pqhunda mleiya mmah kdung ngi svang.
42018024	Ungta Jisu ngi mma' plungyat ava' mdeh thungta hanto'theda: “Sum'alrou knem mih kthlowi kcha' rekki Isowr Kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw raan avah tya thung ngi kparsa chdaat a!
42018025	Mleiya svangpa khat tih Isowr Kruwngpaalna' thuh mluw rang hinvah uwt khat tih preukna thung ngi mluw chaak pleh ngi ko'olbet rah.”
42018026	Ungta ava' karja rekki. “Mdittu' kuwda karsan chrang a,” dilamda?
42018027	Pdainu Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Dultimii hinni kurthuwk kma' dow rek avah Isowr hinvah kurthuwk pchaang.”
42018028	Audilli Pitar rih theda: “Asuw o, neen nih dow mkheng mapthi dok thiin nuh Nang adokqowi chaakin.”
42018029	Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna: ‘Kuwkhat leh rukku, Isowr Kruwngpaalna' ki thenni mi'inn mlou, mditmata mnuhmpa mditmata mu'umnau, mditmata mnuwn, mditmata mnaumsuwn kmapthi ka'am pemeh.
42018030	Ma'am bih, mma ngi hava' 'tunki mpha thung ngi mtum kerkheelset tih karlaang chrah ungta karvang meek mpha ava' thung ngi mma ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah karlaang chrah.”
42018031	Audilli Mma ngi sowm lei'knii rek avah qhi ptliing lam thida hanto'theda: “Asuwn! neenna Jerusalem thah kahang thangin pimin. Ungta Mii Chapa ava'leiyi Khulpu rekki mdokjit dokin dow mkheng avah mkurtluwm rah.
42018032	Mleiya Mma' avah Chaatktlei rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthi rah ungta kipni chaak lamrah ungta ningkya kpiilam rah ungta M'leen nih ptil kopthotpsuk lamrah.
42018033	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah rii kchung ngi kbun lamrah ungta ke'eyou lamrah. Pdainu mnii kdumna' thung ngi Mmah veikhat kerdel nowl rah.”
42018034	Pdainu mmaan nih hava'le' avah khadaat ruk deipindih lam mda. Mleiya hava' paulam rek avah mmaan hinvah kordowl kcha' ungta Mma ngi mdothe pauna rek avah mdodeh chaakin pemeh.
42018035	Audilli hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya Mma ngi Jerikho beh ngi merhei meek arlaan nih mmikktot miikhat avah 'lambeh ngi ko'ongda qhiltham chda.
42018036	Ungta mma ngi miipii rekpa kchet marjaak thungta talulu ka'am plih tidit kheel chlamda.
42018037	Mthungta mmaan nih: “Najareth ki Jisu kthleng nga,” ditpiik lamda.
42018038	Ungta mma ngi owngda hanto'theda: “David Chapa Jisu neiya plung mheipnee cha'.”,
42018039	Mthungta mduh thah kchet rek ava ngi rim ma'amna' rah rai lamda. Pdainu mma ngi kerkheel set tih owngda, “David Chapa neiya plung mheipnee cha',” dida.
42018040	Mthungta Jisu ngi ripda ungta mma' avah Mhin nih mdo'arvan qhina' raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda. Ungta mma ngi Mhin nih merheinai thungta Mma ngi kheelda.
42018041	Hanto'theda: “Neiyi nang athenni talu adoktlot piik rah angeiya?” Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng! kmik ki khu dei chni'ii!”
42018042	Audilli Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Amik ki kvaar adeicha', alamrin chaak ki nang nga atapdam chaak a.”
42018043	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma ngi khu dei chda ungta Mma'dil qowida Isowr ponlor chda. Ungta mii mkheng ngi ava' mdehn thungta Isowr panpaak chlamda.
42019001	Audilli Jisu ngi Jerikho khuwpii thuh luwtda ungta kthleng ngi chetda.
42019002	'Tunnu asuwn, ava' thuh mmiing Jakhayas tidit sumkqhai rekki kruwng khat ka'am ungta mmah svang.
42019003	Ungta mma ngi Jisu avah kuw tidit ksuw chrang ngi thlaam chda. Pdainu mdung mtowi chaak vah miipii rek leiyi, dei pchaang mda.
42019004	Mthungta mma ngi mduh thah heichenda Mma' ksuw rang ngi bungkba ding khat 'leenni kalda. Mleiya Mma' avah ava' 'lam qowidon nih karva beirah.
42019005	Ungta Jisu ngi ava' mun mphaak thungta knaanda hansuwda ungta mma' avah handeida, ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Jakhayas, kbeisek ki arjungqum, mleiya tuniyu nang a'inn thuh tlung nikdi'.”
42019006	Mthungta mma ngi kbeisek ki arjung qumda ungta Mma' avah kanpa ngi arlaang chda.
42019007	Pdainu mmaan nih ava' mdehn thungta mkheng inni nurnur kdi ngi hanto' the lamda: “Mmah pnu kervei mii ava' hinni, mi'innmal khat tih ktlung daat a,” dilamda.
42019008	Audilli Jakhayas tih ripda Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Asuw o, Kruwng neiyi kdothlowi chaak kdokna mqim avah srah rek hinni kdopiik chaak lam. Ungta neiyi karmak dok ki kuwmiikhat hinki mlangkmah ngi mraal piida kuwku hinki yoso klow dokcheu, neiyi avah tum plii thlolnu kdopenlet chaak.”
42019009	Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Tuniyu tkirliinna' avah hava' inn thung ngi ktlung a, mleiya mma' rukka Abraham chapa.
42019010	Mleiya Mii Chapa avah kmaang kcha' ava' kthlaam rang ki ungta ksan rang ki thenni kurjung.” sowm ki mleiyi pauportol
42019011	'Tunnu mmaan nih ava' marjaakin arlaan nih Mma ngi pauportol morson khat ruk theda. Mleiya mmaan nah Jerusalem ktlung chrah mdotheen ungta mmaan nih Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah kbeisek ki tlung rang pakda tidit tih mdobinin.
42019012	Avaleiyi, Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Takyat kurhuwi miikhat ava ngi mthen nih kruwngpaalna' khat karlaang chrang ki thenni khuwpaam 'lamkla khat thah veikhat ktlung kerheel rang ki ngi pjiin chda.
42019013	Mthungta mma ngi msuwk sowm rek avah own lamda ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni mina sowm avah thempiik lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: ‘Naan nih nei ktlun duh khimkheiyi hava ngi sumnong atlotnaan.’
42019014	Pdainu mma' avah mpaam ki mii rekki mdohal chaakin ungta mmaan nih mdilpqowi lamda pau kthe rah mii pthlatpsuk lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: ‘Neen nih hava' mii ava ngi k'leenin nih mukpu tupthuh rah ngeimaan ring,’ dilamda.
42019015	Ungta 'tunnu mma ngi kruwngpaalna' ava' arlaangda marvan kerheel mpha thung ngi mma ngi miikhat khat tih sum tyaya mlot naanna tidit mdodehna' rang ki thenni, mma ngi mhin nih sum mdopiik suwk rek avah mthlenna' raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda.
42019016	Audilli mkhatna' ava ngi thlengda hanto'theda: ‘Mukpu, neiyi nang amina ava ngi mina sowm klot chaak a.’
42019017	Ungta mma ngi suwk ava' hinni theda: ‘Suwk kqha, nang nga nong kqha ngi atlotta. Nang ngi mnau'suwn thung ngi trin chaak krow nong adotlot leiyi, nang nga khuwpii sowm tsutpqowina' ki ruhtanna' akpiik a.’
42019018	Ungta miknitna' thleng nowlda hanto'theda: ‘Mukpu nang amina ava ngi mina parnga klot chaak a.’
42019019	Anto' heppi mma ngi suwk ava' hinni theda: ‘Nang rukka khuwpii parnga 'leenni mukpu ikurthuwk.’
42019020	Ungta morson khat thlengda hanto'theda: ‘Mukpu amina a, hithah ka'am daat a, neiyi buwlaak 'suwn khat thung ngi klumnu kdothiik daat.
42019021	Mleiya nang nga raanqhul mii akurthuh leiyi, adokqit chaak. Nang nga ado'purtuwlma ava' kqhai ptih ungta adopqauma ava' kurkun ptih.’
42019022	Ungta mma ngi suwk ava' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Suwk kqha kma', nang anehr kat thungki apau ava ngi neiyi a'leen nih pau'apindit nikdi'. Nang ngi neiya raanqhul mii ping ungta kdopurtuwl mana' thungki klou ungta kdopqau mana' thungki kurkun ping tidit deitinu.
42019023	Mdittu' neiyi ktlun kerheel thung ngi m'leenki kpop tu' kilqhi ngi kdolow chaakna' rah taluleiyi nang ngi nei ksum avah sum'inn thung ngi adothikma?’
42019024	Ungta mma ngi ava' thuh krip rek hinni hanto'theda: ‘Mma' hinki mina avah alouin rang ngi mina sowm kthlowi hinni apiin.’
42019025	Pdainu mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: ‘Mukpu, mmah mina sowm mdothlowi daat,’ dilamda.
42019026	Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. ‘Mleiya kthlowi kcha' khimkhei rek hinni kpiikpom rah ungta kthlowi kma' mma' hinki avah mma ngi mdothlowi chaak kpha thungki rukka kloupthi rah.
42019027	'Tunnu nei kmiihal rek, tidit tah neiyi mmaan 'tun nih mukpu kkurthuh rah kngei kma' mii rek avah arvanqhiin. Ungta mmaan avah nei kmaiyi a'eyou'in,” dida.
42019028	Mma ngi hava' mthe dok dilli Mma ngi Jerusalem ktong thah hang thangda.
42019029	Audilli 'tunnu Mmah Bethphage le' Bethany khuw tidit tah Kruwn lown hankpha rah theda. Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu 'knii rek avah heipthla lamda.
42019030	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Naanve ngi wva' raal kerdeen khuw ava' thung ngi vaan ungta naanve ngi avanluwnaan thung ngi kuwkhat leh doko'onna' mlai skowlraam suwn khat kpursuk daat deinaandi'. Naanve ngi avah apethletin rang ngi arvanqhiin.
42019031	Ungta kuwmiikhat tih taluleiyi avah aperthleen a, atiditin cheentung ngi? Naanve ngi, ‘Mleiya Kruwng ngi mdopsit rah amda.’ adiin.”
42019032	Mthungta teheisi dok rek avah valamda ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni mdothe ava'jik ki ka'am dei lamda.
42019033	Pdainu mmaanve ngi skowlraam suwn ava' mperthlemeekin arlaan nih ava' kpupa ava ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naanve ngi skowlraam suwn avah aperthleen a?”
42019034	Mthungta mmaanve ngi hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng ngi dow mdopsit rah amda,” dilamda.
42019035	Audilli mmaanve ngi avah Jisu hinni arvanqhi lamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi mmaan ki mdomna rekin avah skowlraam suwn ava' 'leenni var lamda ungta mmaan nih m'leen nih Jisu avah pko'ong lamda.
42019036	Ungta Mma ngi anto ngi mahan thungta mmaan nih mdomnaan avah 'lampii thung ngi phat lamda.
42019037	Audilli Mma ngi Kruwn lown, jowl mahan phaak sousou thung ngi sikhu kurthuwk miipii rek mkheng inni kanpa lamda ungta Isowr ponlor chlamda. Mleiya mmaan nih ruhtan nong rek kthuwk avah mmikin nih mdodeh chaak dokin.
42019038	Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng miing 'leenni kthleng paamkruwng avah msuwkqha a! (Luw. 118:26) Parvaan thah plung kdai ikurthuwkso ungta kparthaangsi ngi Konlor kcha' ikurthuwkso!”
42019039	Ungta miipii rek arlak ki Pharisy rek aangqhe ngi, “Chukpu Asikhu rek avah arailam,” dilamda.
42019040	Pdainu Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, hava'le' ava ngi rimkdi ma'am daatin bih lung rek ko'owng lamrah.”
42019041	'Tunnu Mma ngi mhannai thungta Mma ngi khuwpii avah handeida ungta ava' 'leenni qap chda.
42019042	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi tuni ngi, tidit tah nang athenni plungdaina' aktlotpiik dow rek avah nang adak kat tih adeh chaak daat bih. Pdainu 'tunnu mmaan avah nang amiksut thungki kordowl kcha' a.
42019043	Mleiya nang amiihal rekki akloijik ki dulti bang adotutkhul psuk lamna' rah ungta mmaan nih nang avah mmun mkheng thung ngi aloijik lamdon nih adotkhum lamna' rah nit rek avah karvang rah.
42019044	Ungta mmaan nih nang le' anau le' avah nang arowng thung ngi dulti tu' kinqim mih akporlow pthi lamrah. Mmaan nih nang athungki lung khadaat ruk kurtuwn daat tih mapthi daat lam nimeh. Mleiya nang ngi Isowr rih adotvel chaakna' mpha avah adodeh pindit chaak pemeh.”
42019045	Audilli Mma ngi luwbuk'inn thuh luwtda ungta ava' thung ngi kyur le' kren rek avah treipthi pqhunda.
42019046	Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “‘Nei ki'inn avah rinkthamna' inn,’ dida mdokjit dok. (Is. 56:7) Pdainu naan nih avah, ‘Raanqhul kupru rek khor’ apthut inna.” (Jer. 7:11)
42019047	Ungta Mma ngi mniiktai luwbuk'inn thung ngi purchuk tlit lamda. Pdainu thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta mii rekki luwkqhi rekki Mma' avah te'eyow rang ngi thlaam lamda.
42019048	Pdainu mmaan nih Mma' 'leenni dow khatleh tlow pchaang lam mda, mleiya mii mkheng avah Mma' dothe karja chrang ngi muplungin kluwtsap kcha'.
42020001	'Tunnu Mma ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi mii rek purchukda ungta kqhapaumin parjaamda ma'amna' nit rek thung ngi niikhat tih hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rek ungta kver rekki Mma' avah pha lamda.
42020002	Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi hava' dow rek avah talu ruhtanna' ngi adotlot tidit mheithe piikin? Mditmata hava' ruhtanna' avah kuw ngi Nang ahin nuh adotpiikko?”
42020003	Pdainu Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nei rukku naan ahin nih paukhat ayukheel inni, mhei'arthaangin.
42020004	Johon diipluwna' avah parvaan ki mow mditmata dultimii hinki o?”
42020005	Mthungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: “Neen nih parvaan ki nditin bih, Mma ngi, ‘Mdittu' taluleiyi naan nih mmah lam'rin chmaantio?’ mikdi raan.
42020006	Pdainu neen nih dultimii hinki, ndit bih, mii mkheng ngi lung ngi mikdeeng raan. Mleiya mmaan nih Johon avah khulpu khat tidit tih mdobin chaak dokin.”
42020007	Mthungta mmaan nih, neenna tva'ki tidit deimaan ring’ dilamda, arthaang lamda.
42020008	Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nei rukku talu ruhtanna' ngi kdotlot tidit avah athepiik nimaanring.”
42020009	Audilli Mma ngi hava' pauportolna' avah mii rek hinni tethe pqhunda: ‘Miikhat tih riithlumbil khat thlowi chda. Ungta mma ngi avah riithlumbil knum mii rek hinni mandown nih piilam thida mpha rowiksowt ki thenni khuwpaam 'lamkla thah pjiin chda.
42020010	'Tunnu riithlum minna' mpha thung ngi mma ngi msuwk'owr khat avah riithlum knum rek hinni riithlumbil ava' thung ki mchei mruk klou rah heipthlada. Pdainu riithlum knum rek ava ngi mma' avah bun lam thida mdakden nih heipthla pthi lamda.
42020011	Veikhat mma ngi suwk'owr morson khat arheipthla nowlda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' rukka bun lamda ungta ningkya pii lamda ungta mdakden nih heisi pthi nowl lamda.
42020012	Ungta mma ngi mukdumna' arhei pthlada. Ungta mmaan nih mma' rukka plim lamda ungta rowng duwn thah varpthi lamda.’
42020013	Audilli riithlumbil kpupa ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘'Tunnu neiyi talu tlow nikdi' o? Neiyi kvonsat'low kchapa ava' ipthla nih. Mmaan nih mma'kat tah mdehn bih kakyat kcha'lam krow,’ dida.
42020014	Pdainu riithlumbil knum rek ava ngi mma' mdehn thungta, mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: ‘Havah piipa kat ava'. Arvaan, neen nih alrouchom avah neen nthen mkurthuhna' rah neen nih mma' avah eyoudok incheh.’
42020015	Mthungta mmaan nih riithlumbil duwn thah mmah varpthi lamda ungta mma' avah eyou lamda. 'Tunnu avaleiyi riithlumbil kpupa ava ngi mmaan hinni talu ktlow rang ngo?
42020016	Mma ngi arvang donni ava' riithlumbil knum rek avah ke'eyou lamrah ungta mma ngi riithlumbil avah ktlok rek hinni kpiipthi rah.” Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta hanto' the lamda: “Avah hanto' kurthuwk liit mso.”
42020017	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah suwrim lam thida hanto'theda: “Mdittu' ‘Innksa rekki mdoknen pthi dokin lungkat ava ngi innbul lung, Lung kenreel ava' kurthuwk kcha' a.’ (Luw. 118:22) dida, mdokjit avah talu mdothena o?
42020018	Kuwku yoso lung ava' 'leenni ktla kcha' mma' avah kkui chrah pdainu kuwku yoso m'leen nih lung ava' tlaakna' mma' avah, ava ngi purvuwt heppi kokrowi pthirah.”
42020019	Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki ava' mphakat thung ngi Mma' avah kokyowng rang ngi mdotlotin. Mleiya mmaan nih pauportol avah mmaan kepteng ngi mdothe tidit mdodehn. Pdainu mmaan nih mii rek avah qi chlamda.
42020020	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah sutpqowi lamda ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mpau 'leenni mdokyownna' raan ki thenni mrinkindit kpurhuwi kcha' rekki tuprut pausikhu rek avah pthla lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih paamkpu ava' ki ruhtan le' ruhtanna' ava' thung ngi Mma' avah mdoparlaanna' raan ki thenni havah mdotlotin.
42020021	Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' kheel lamda: “Chukpu neen nih Nang nga kindit ava' adothe ungta kindit ava' adopurchuh, tidit kdehn. Ungta Nang ngi kuwkhat leh mikmai suw mtih, pdainu Nang ngi kindit ava' tu' kilqhi ngi Isowr 'lam ava' adopurchuh lam.
42020022	Ava' vah, neen kthen vah Siijar hinni paammii sumqhai kdopiikin avah nowlam mih rowmow rowmeh?”
42020023	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan plungril qhatma avah deithida, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih taluleiyi Neiya atperteel inna?
42020024	tu'u denarii khat Mheitedet inno! Hava' m'leen ki pthla'arlim ungta jiiktikrii avah kuwda?” Ungta mmaan nih, ‘havah Siijar pthla'arlim ungta mma' jiiktikrii’ dilamda, arthaang lamda.
42020025	Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mdit bih, Siijar dow rek avah Siijar hinni apiin ungta Isowr dow rek avah Isowr hinni apiin.”
42020026	Ungta mmaan nih Mma ngi mii rek maiyi mdothe pau ava' 'leenni Mma' avah tepmen pchaang lam mda. Ungta mmaan nah Mma ngi hanto' mdo'arthaan 'leenni ngak chlamda ungta rimkdi am chlamda.
42020027	Audilli trin kerheelna' krow kma' Saddusy rek arlak ki mii aangqhe rekki Mhin nih thleng lamda ungta Mhin nih hanto' kheel lamda.
42020028	“Chukpu, Moses vah neen kihin nih hanto' kjitda, ‘tidit tah kuwmiikhat mu'upa khat ava ngi snu thedok thida mnau kthlowi mlaiyi mdiyow chaak bih mnaupa ngi mnuwn avah ko'onqhi donni mu'upa ki thenni nau mdotupluk piik rah,’ dida.
42020029	'Tunnu mu'umnau tikhiutet rek khat am lamda, ungta mkhatna' ava ngi snu the chda pdainu nau kthlowi kmah ngi diyou chda.
42020030	Ungta miknitna' ava ngi snu avah ko'onqhi nowlda ungta mma' rukka nau ktaak ki diyou chda.
42020031	Audilli mukdumna' ava ngi mmah ko'onqhida ungta anto' heppi mitkhiutna' kpha rukku ko'onqhida pdainu mmaan nih nau khatleh kthlowi lam kmah diyouter chlamda.
42020032	Mqutna'rel lih snu ava' rukka diyou chda.
42020033	Avaleiyi, trin kerheelna' nit tu' snu avah kuw nuwn kurthuwk chrang ngo? Mleiya mmah tikhiu rek mkheng kheng inni mnuwn mdopthut sapin.”
42020034	Ungta Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' tunpha ki mii rekki inn nei lamda ungta innkpernee lamda.
42020035	Pdainu karvang rang mpha ava' thung vah ungta kdiyou rinkerheelna' thung ngi kyau chrang ki thenni mtik kcha ngi mdotai rek avale' avah inn neilam nimeh ungta inn ruk kpernee lam nimeh.
42020036	Mditmata, mmaan nah tidiyow ruk diyou pchaang lam nimeh. Mleiya mmaan nah vaantamsi rek hep daat lam. Ungta kring kerheel mii rek mkurthuhn leiyi, mmaan nah Isowr nau reklam.
42020037	'Tunnu Moses hin kpha rukku ding'arbuw kaakna' ava' thung ngi kdiyou rek kerdel avah tedet chda. Ungta mma ngi Kruwng avah, ‘Abraham ki Isowr, Aijek ki Isowr ungta Jakob ki Isowr,’ dida. (Mpk. 3:6,15)
42020038	Mleiya Mma' avah kdiyou rekki Isowr pemeh pdainu kring rekki Isowr ungta mkheng avah Mma' amleiyi kring.”
42020039	Ungta nowlam chukpu aangqhe rekki arthaang lamda Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu, Nang nga kqha dok ki kpau imptih.”
42020040	Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih dow khatleh leiyi, paukheel morson kheel porson pchaang lam mda.
42020041	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Taluhep pih mii rekki Mesaiah avah David chapa mdodit pchaan inno?
42020042	Mleiya David mdakkat tih Luwbuklaa laika thung ngi: ‘Kruwng ngi neiki Kruwng hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nei kmachang thah iko'ong daat.
42020043	Neiyi Nang amiihal rek avah, Akhuhther rih akthiikpiik duh kpha thung ngi iko'ong daat,’ dida. (Luw. 110:1)
42020044	Avaleiyi, David tih Mma' avah ‘Kruwng’ mdodit, mdittu' taluhep pih Mma' avah David Chapa rang ngoh?”
42020045	Audilli Mma ngi mii mkheng ngi mdo'arjaak ki Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda.
42020046	“Naan nih phriktluwn hilnada tche rah kngei, kyurkren mun rek thung ngi mii rekki mdo'arvuwi chaak rah kngei, ungta sinegog thung ngi longkhom kenreel rek kngei ungta kchaknee thung ngi mmun kqhasi kngei nowlam chukpu rek hinki ikilrin deichaan.
42020047	Mmaan nih ksowt ksowt tih rinmaktham chaak leek inni meikhunu inn rek avah pyol dok lamda. Hava'le' ava ngi tupsulna' klin avah karlaang chlam rah.”
42021001	Audilli Mma ngi svang rekki sumbuwr thung ngi mmaan ki chla rek mdodaal chaakin avah deida.
42021002	Ungta Mma ngi meikhunu srah khat tih jiisen sumqiit 'kniipang mdodaal chaak ava' rukka deida.
42021003	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah hava' meikhunu srah ava ngi mkheng arlak ki knemsi ngi mpiik chaak a.
42021004	Mleiya hava' mkheng rek ava' vah mmaan nih kepleet tih mdothlowi chaakin ava' thung ki ngi Isowr hinni tparlaan chaakna' avah mdodaal chaakin. Pdainu meikhunu ava' vah masraht thuh thungki mma ngi mdothlowi mrin chaakna' rang mkheng avah sumbuwr ava' thuh mdodaal chaak dok.”
42021005	Ungta mii aangqhe rekki luwbuk'inn ava' ki mleiyi pau the lamda. ‘Hava' lungrek ruwngchen ungta m'leenki chla rek tportlot avah tya thung ngi kqha chdaat a,’ dilamda.
42021006	Audilli Jisu ngi theda: “Naan nih adosut meekin dow rek avah lung khat 'leenni lung khat kurtuwn daat tih tvarpthima ngi, ma'ammana' mpha karvang chrah.”
42021007	Mthungta mmaan nih, Mhin nih kheel lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu, hava'le' avah teden thung ngi kthuwk rangda? Ungta avale' kthuwk rah mthe thung vah talu titinna' kthuwk rang ngoh?”
42021008	Ungta Mma ngi theda: “Naan nih kuwkhat leh ngi naan avah adotuhuwn chaakmana' raan ki thenni ikilrin chaan. Mleiya mii knempok ki Nei kmiing 'leenni, ‘Neiya Mesaiah ping,’ didon nih kthleng rah, ungta mmaan nih, ‘mpha avah knai kcha' a,’ kdi lamrah. Ava' thung ngi naan nih mmaandil qowida chetmaan.
42021009	Ungta naan nih raal kthuwk rek archaang ungta raal kkarna rek arjaakin thung ngi aningin pqitmaan. Mleiya hava' dow rek avah rukri ngi mthuh rang thah ktla. Pdainu mqutna' avah kbeisek ki arvang teng nimeh.”
42021010	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto ngi the nowlda. “Chaat khat tih chaat khat 'leenni krip rah ungta kruwngpaalna' khat tih kruwngpaalna' khat 'leenni krip rah.
42021011	Ungta mmun knempok thung ngi ringnaang kdungyou kcha' kthuwk rah, ungta powitham le' omlai kdungyou kcha' avah mmun knempok thung ngi kthuwk rah. Ungta tsut thuh tiqit kervei rek ungta titinna' klinklin rek avah parvaan ki kthuwk rah.
42021012	Pdainu hava' dow mkheng rek mthuhduh ngi mmaan nih naan avah akokyowng raan ungta naan avah chii'akpreel raan. Ungta naan avah sinegog rek thung ngi ungta rowng'inn rek thung kpha ngi akparlaan pthi raan. Ungta naan avah paamkruwng rekle' paamkpu rek hinni Nei kmiing leiyi, akqhipsuk raan.
42021013	Pdainu avah naan athenni rinpaumin adopiik chaak naan kurthuwk rah.
42021014	Avaleiyi, naan nih mpha marvanduh ngi naan nih athinaan nih akparkhaan chaakmana' raan, aplungin avah aporthlong chaan.
42021015	Mleiya Neiyi naan ahin nih kqha ngi tpaudehna' ungta luwkinritna' avah apii nikaandi'. Ungta naan akepteng rek mkheng inni avah klek pchaang nimeh ungta mat pchaang lam nimeh.
42021016	Naan avah anuh le' apa rek inni, a'uanau rek inni ungta ari'alam rek inni ungta aplap rek inni akyur chraan, ungta naan arlak ki aangqhe rekka mmaan nih ke'eyou lamrah.
42021017	Ungta Nei kmiing leiyi, naan avah mii mkheng ngi akahal chraan.
42021018	Pdainu aluwchaiyin 'leenki asamin khadaat ruk kenvei nimeh.
42021019	Naan nih knet tih ari chaakin ava ngi naan nih arinkumin avah phang chnaandi'.
42021020	Pdainu naan nih raalmii rekki Jerusalem mdotkhul dokin amikin nih adeh chaakin thung ngi naan nih mma' kenvei chaakna' rah avah knai kcha' a tidit adeiyin.
42021021	Audilli Judia paamkuwl thung ngi ka'am mma' ava ngi lown rek thah ichen chso. Ungta khuwpii ava' thung ngi ka'am kcha' rekki avah mdomaak pthi raan. Ungta khuwpaam thah ka'am rek mmaan ava ngi khuwpii ava' thuh mluw raan pemeh.
42021022	Mleiya hava'le' avah phuwlow nit. Mleiya tikjit dok dow mkheng avah mkurtluwm dokrah.
42021023	Mpha ava' thung ngi miipum snu rekle' naukkai rekki thenni suwthitna' ka'am a! Mleiya paam ava' thung ngi kdung ngi plungyatna' ungta Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah hava' mii rek 'leenni ktla rah.
42021024	Ungta mmaan nah raal'kaanghaa 'leenni ktla chlam rah ungta mmaan nih chaat mkheng rek avah paamsuwk ki kqhi chlam rah. Ungta Jerusalem avah Chaatktlei rekki mpha ava' mtlan dokduh kpha ngi, Chaatktlei rekki khuhther kupthut lamrah.
42021025	Ungta kni 'leenni, thla 'leenni ungta bursi rek 'leenni titinna' rek kthuwk rah. Ungta dultipaam thung ngi chaat rek avah kdung ngi muplungin kya ngi krip chlam rah. Ungta truwnpii archaang kdung le' diinuk ava ngi mii rek plung rek avah ktaparvai rah.
42021026	Ungta ningqit le' dultipaam thung ngi karvang rang dow rek tbinpsukna' ava ngi dultimii rek plung avah kirpil chrah. Mleiya parvaan ki ruhtan rek avah kakna chrah.
42021027	Audilli mmaan nih Mii Chapa ava ngi ruhtan tu' ungta tkonlorna' klin ava' tung ngi armei thung ngi arjung kqum kdei lamrah.
42021028	'Tunnu hava' dow rek ava ngi tuthuh mupqhun thung ngi naan nih aluwn akhiingin rang ngi hansuwn, mleiya naan akartlanna' raan mpha avah knai kcha' a.”
42021029	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni pauportol khat tih hanto'theda: “Naan nih kduwtbul ava' asuwn, ungta dingbul mkheng avah asuwn.
42021030	Naan nih mmaan ava ngi muksun dokin adehn thung ngi naan nih khulum avah knai kcha' a tidit adodeh chaakin.
42021031	Anto' heppi naan nih hava' kthuwk meek meek dow rek adehn thung ngi, naan nih Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah knai kcha' a tidit adei chaan.
42021032	Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna hava' dow rek mkheng ava' mkurtluwm dokduh kpha ngi hava' suruwl ki mii rek avah talu hepkduh yoso thleng dokvot lam nimeh.
42021033	Dulti le' parvaan avah kthleng dok chrah pdainu Nei kpauna rek avah talu hepkduh yoso ngi thleng dokvot nimeh.
42021034	Pdainu naan nih ikilrindei chaan! Mditma bih, thowldii knee ungta thowldii needa kipri ungta hava' dultipaam rinkum ki tkilrinna' rek ava' thung ngi aplung rekin avah kluwt chrah. Ungta naan nih adobin phaakmanaan mpha thung ngi Nit avah kurjung khot rah.
42021035	Mleiya dultipaam thuh ka'am mkheng rek 'leenni Nit avah ktaang khat heppi kurjung rah.
42021036	Avaleiyi, naan nih mpha ktai ikilrin chaan. Mleiya, naan avah hava' kthuwk beirang dow mkheng thungki kloi pchaang ki mtik kcha ngi adottai chaakna' raan ungta Mii Chapa ava' aang ngi arichaak pchaanna' raan rin'ktham chaan.”
42021037	Ungta mpha ava' thung ngi Mma ngi kunthun nih luwbuk'inn thuh mii rek avah purchuk kchok lamda ungta jaanvah Kruwn lown mdoditin ava' thah hangda kipriik kchoklu.
42021038	Audilli jiingsun kparma ngi mii mkheng ngi Mma' pau karja chrang ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi thleng lamda.
42022001	'Tunnu Taplaanna' mdoditin, Thowl ktaak Thenpen tchaakna' ki kmaal avah nai chda.
42022002	Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki taluhep pih Mma' avah te'eyow rang tidit ki m'lam thlaam lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih mii rek avah mdoqit chaakin.
42022003	Audilli sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat mmiing Kerioth ki mii mdoditin Judas ava' plung thung ngi Seitan luwt chda.
42022004	Mthungta mma ngi anto'chetda thimpu kenreel rekle' luwbuk'inn krung rekki koprol rek tung ngi mma ngi Mma' avah taluhep pih yur chnikdi, tidit leiyi, kurdutqhi lamda.
42022005	Ungta mmaan nah kanpa chlamda ungta mhin nih sum tpiik rang avah row chlamda.
42022006	Audilli mma ngi miipii rek armadil lih Mma' mdoyur chaakna' rah mpha kqha sutpqowi chda.
42022007	Audilli Taplaanna' Yausuwn te'eyowna' rah Thowl ktaak thenpen tchaakna' Nit avah arvanpha chda.
42022008	Ungta Pitar le' Johon avah hanto'theda, heipthla lamda: “Naanve ngi vaan rang ngi, neen nih tchaak raan ki thenni Taplaanna' ki vonsum avah aporthlongin.”
42022009	Mthungta mmaanve ngi Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi tva thung ngi kdoporthlon raan angeiya?”
42022010	Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Asuwn, naanve ngi khuwpii aheiluwn le' diibeel kokdom pselpa khat kurdutqhi naandi', naanve ngi mma' luwna' inn ava' thung ngi aluw pqowiyin.
42022011	Audilli naanve ngi innkpupa ava' hinni hanto' the naandi': ‘Neiyi Ksikhu rek tung ngi Taplaanna' ki tmaalna' kdochaakna' raan maltlun innkhaar avah tva'rangda? dida, Chukpu ngi ahin nih theda’ adiin.
42022012	Audilli mma ngi karthak ki innkhaar klinpa khat, kqhajik ki tportlot ksa avah akepdeh raan naanve ngi ava' thung ngi aporthlongin.”
42022013	Ungta mmaanve ngi anto ngi chet lamda ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni mdothejik ki ka'am dei lamda ungta Taplaanna' ki tmaalna' avah ava' thung ngi porthlong chlamda.
42022014	Ungta mpha avah mvedok thungta, Mma ngi tamsi sowm lei 'knii rektu' ko'ongsap lamda.
42022015	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi tyattraan kperteel duh ngi naan tu' Taplaanna' vonsum havah tchaak rah kdung ngi kdongei chaak.
42022016	Mleiya Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a: ‘Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi mkurtluwm dokduh khimkheiyu Neiyi hava' Taplaanna' avah chaporson vot nimaang.’ ”
42022017	Audilli Mma ngi tong avah chomda ungta panpaak chthida hanto'theda: “Havah arlaangin rang ngi naan arlak inni athemin.
42022018	Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, tidit tah Neiyi Isowr kruwngpaalna' murjun duh khimkheiyi riithlumdii avah nee nimaang.”
42022019	Ungta Mma ngi thenpen avah chomda ungta avah panpaak chda ungta avah khuida ungta mmaan hinni avah pii lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Havah naan athenni mdopiik dok ksa Nei ksadak ava', naan nih havah Nei adotbin phaakna' raan ki thenni atlown.”
42022020	Anto' heppi, Mma ngi kluh ki buh mchaak dokin dilli tong ava' rukka chomda ungta hanto'theda: “Havah naan athen inni kthuwk dok Nei kihii thungki ngi tapqhan pauqum ren ki tong ava'.
42022021	Pdainu asuwn, Nei mukyur chrang khut avah Nei tu' khaan 'leenni ka'amve daat a.
42022022	Ungta dakat tih Mii Chapa avah mdopurtum dok ksa heppi kchet kcha' a. Pdainu Mma' kyur chrang mii ava' 'leennu suwthitna' ka'am a.”
42022023	Audilli mmaan nih marlakin ki kuw ngi havah ktlow teng rang, tidit leiyi, msingreelin thung ngi kerkheel chlamda.
42022024	Ungta mmaan arlak ki kuw ngi klinsi tkurthuh raan tidit lei rukku tkerteenna' khat thuwkda.
42022025	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Chaatktlei rekki paamkruwng rek ava ngi mmaan 'tun nih kruwng kurthuwk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih ruhtanna' sinda m'leenin nih mukpu kurthuwkda raanqhul nong ktlow rek avah msit karlaang kcha' mii rek kirdi lamda.
42022026	Pdainu naan arlak innu avah kurthuwk mso. Ava' kchang ngi naan arlakin ki klinsi ava ngi naan arlakin ki mokmowsi hep daat ikurthuwkso. Ungta mkenreelsi mma' ava ngi sopklow kcha' khat hep daat ikurthuwkso.
42022027	Mleiya miklinbet avah kuw o? Khaan 'leenni kok'ong mma' ava' mow, sopklow kcha' ava o? Khaan 'leenni kok'ong mma' ava' pemeh mow? Anto'daat yoso Neiyi naan arlak inni sopklow kcha' Khat ava' hep daat tih ka'am ping.
42022028	Pdainu naanna Neiki tperteelna' rek ava' thung ngi ka'am kcha' tlit rekin ptih.
42022029	Ungta Kpa ngi Nei kihin nih kruwngpaalna' khat mdotpiik heppi, Neiyi naan ahin nih kruwngpaalna' avah akpiik inna.
42022030	Mleiya naan nih Neiki kruwngpaalna' thung ngi adochaak adoneek chaakna' raan ungta kruwng longkhom 'leenni ko'ongin tidon Isreel rekki phung sowm lei'knii rek 'leenni pau adopinditna' raan ki thenni havah adokpiikin.”
42022031	Ungta Kruwng ava ngi hanto'theda: “Simon, Simon dakat tih chavui svai tupkhui heppi adotupkhuina' raan ki thenni, Seitan nih nang nga angeenda.
42022032	Pdainu Neiyi alamrin mkertleimana' rang ki thenni nang athenni rinkaktham kcha' ping. Ungta nang ngi Nei kihin nih akerheel thung ngi a'uanau rek avah ruhtan apii lam.”
42022033	Pdainu mma ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, rowng'inn thuh ungta kdiyou rang ki then rukku, neiya Nang tu' kilqhi rang ngi korthlong dok kcha' ping.”
42022034	Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Pitar, Neiyi ahin nih kthe a, tuwngkluw kat tih nang ngi Nei adotedeh avah veikdum atmatduh kpha thung ngi, har khuwng nimeh.”
42022035	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan avah sumbuwr ktaak ki, thowngya ktaak ki ungta khuhkok ktaak ki akapthlatin thung ngi adoptatin dow ka'am mow?” Mthungta mmaan nih, ‘immeh dow khatleh ptamaanring,’ dilamda.
42022036	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Pdainu 'tunnu sumbuwr khat kthlowi kcha' mma' ava ngi avah ahor chso ungta anto' heppi thowngya kthlowi kcha' mma' rukku ahor chso ungta raal'kaang kthlowi kma' mma' ava ngi mbuwdiir ayurso rang ngi khat aren chso.
42022037	Mleiya Neiyi ahinin nih kthe a, tidit tah, ‘Mma' avah nowlam ko'owi kma' rektu' taipinqimsap lamda,’ dida tikjit dok avah kurkhum rang thah tlada. Mleiya Nei kleiyi mdokjit dok rekki mqutna' avah mphaak dok a.” (Is. 53:12)
42022038	Audilli mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng asuw o hava' thuh raal'kaang 'knii ka'am daat tah.” Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni, “'Tunnu kokhom kcha' a,” dida.
42022039	Ungta Mma ngi ava' thung ki arvang thuwkda ungta mahan tlit kcho heppi Mma ngi Kruwn lown thah hangda. Ungta Msikhu rek rukku Mma'dil hanqowi lamda.
42022040	Mma ngi mmun ava' mphaak thungta, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih kepthleem thuh atlaak mana' raan ki thenni rin'iktham chaan.”
42022041	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinki lungdeen klapang 'lamkla ngi heikorsown thida, Mma ngi tirdiilda rinktham chda.
42022042	Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Apa, havah Nah aplungbin mkurthuh cheentung ngi hava' tong avah Nei kihin ki mheilow pthi piikcha'. Anto'daat yoso, Nei kuplungbin rang pemeh pdainu Nah aplungbin ikurthuwkso.”
42022043	Audilli parvaan ki vaantamsi khat avah Mhin nih kandangda, Mma' avah mruh taptanpiik chda.
42022044	Ungta kdungreen nih muplung myat chaak ki, Mma ngi kdungset tih rinktham chda. Ungta Mparthlan avah hii ngi marchai knempok ki dulti thah chaida.
42022045	Mma ngi rinmaktham chaak thungki ripda marvan kerheel thungta Msikhu rek avah muplungyat chaak inni ki'iip dok kcha'lam mih arvanpha lamda.
42022046	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi ki'iip inna? Naan nih kepthleem thuh atlaak mana' raan ki thenni, Ikerdelin ungta rin'iktham chaan.”
42022047	Ungta Mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih, asuwn, miiloppii khat arhei tlungda. Ungta sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat, Judas mdoditin ava ngi mmaan duh thah chetda ungta mma ngi Jisu kput rang ngi Mhin nih arheinaida.
42022048	Pdainu Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Judas, nang ngi Mii Chapa avah putda yur chna mow?”
42022049	Mma' kpervel lih ka'am rek ava ngi talu kthuwk rang nga tidit mmikin nih mdehn thungta, mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng, neen nih raal'kaang ngi duwn nikmow?”
42022050	Ungta marlakin ki khat tih thimpu kenreelsi suwk'owr avah duda ungta machang ki makna avah sellotda.
42022051	Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Havalu tlowma'.” Ungta Mma ngi makna avah kmeida ungta pdam piikda.
42022052	Audilli Jisu ngi Mma' kepteng ngi karva, thimpu kenreel rekle' luwbuk'inn krung rekki koprol rekle' ungta kver rek ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih raanqhul kupru khat kokyowng heppi raal'kaang rekle' kchung rek sinin tinu karvaan ptine?
42022053	Neiyi luwbuk'inn thuh mniiktaiyi ka'am thung ngu naan nih Nei k'leen nih khut khiing maantih. Pdainu 'tunnu havah naanki mpha ungta kjiingnu ki ruhtanna' ava'.”
42022054	Audilli mmaan nih Jisu a kyowng lamda ungta Mma' avah thimpu kenreelsi inn thah vanqhi lamda. Ungta Pitar rih 'lam karlat heiyi mdilin qowi lamda.
42022055	'Tunnu mmaan nih inn ava' khulown nih mei pchok lamda ungta mko'onsapin thungta Pitar rukka mmaan arlak ki ko'ongda.
42022056	Ungta snu suwk khat tih mei ar'aang ngi mma' mdeh thungta kmin nih suwrim thida hanto'theda: “Hava' mii ava' rukka Mma' tu' kilqhi.”
42022057	Pdainu mma ngi hanto'theda Mma' avah matda: “Snu neiyi Mma' avah deimaang.”
42022058	Ungta mpha mruk dilli morson khat tih mma' avah dei nowlda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang rukka mmaan arlak ki khat ptih.” Pdainu Pitar rih hanto'theda: “Miilai, neiya ava' pmaang.”
42022059	Audilli qhang khat arveel dilli morson khat tih kdung ngi hanto'theda: “Dakat tih hava' miilai rukka Mma' tu' kilqhi, mleiya mmah Galily ki mii.”
42022060	Pdainu Pitar rih theda: “Miilai, nang ngi adothe avah neiya deimaang.” Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma ngi mpau meeksli arlaan nih har khuwngda.
42022061	Ungta Kruwng ava ngi kerheelda Pitar avah arheisuw rimda. Ungta Pitar rih Kruwng pauna ungta Mma ngi mhin nih taluhep pih mthe, tidit tah, “Har mkhuwnduh ngi nang ngi Neiya veikdum mmat nadi',” mdodit avah binphaakda.
42022062	Audilli Pitar rih duwn thah vangthuwkda mning ksiin dok ki qap chda.
42022063	'Tunnu Jisu kokyowng mii rek ava ngi Mma' avah pni chaak lamda ungta rii kchung ngi bun lamda.
42022064	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah mmik mbowl dokin dilli tpeeng lamda ungta ‘kuwda aktpeeng nga? Athethuh o,’ dilamda.
42022065	Ungta dow morson morson knempok 'leenni mmaan nih Mma' avah pauthit tih bi chlamda.
42022066	Ungta khu mvaardaat le' kver rekle' thimpu kenreelsi le' nowlam chukpu rek avah kurbuk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah luwsang thung ngi heiqhi lamda.
42022067	Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang nga Mesaiah akurthuh cheentung ngi mheithe piikin.” Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi akthepiikin rukku, naan nih Neiya lam'mrin nimaan tih.
42022068	Ungta Neiyi paukheel khat akkheelin rukku naan nih avah adotarthaan pchaanna' raan ammeh mditmata Neiya tapthlat ruk mapthla nimaan tih.
