42022069	Ungta 'tundil ki kupqhun nih Mii Chapa avah Isowr ruhtan ki machang thah kok'ong chrah.”
42022070	Audilli mmaan mkheng inni, “Nang nga Isowr Chapa pti,” dilamda? Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya naan nih kindit kat tih adotheen ava' ping.”
42022071	Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih hava' heihin nih talu sakhi tarjaakpom raan morson ka'am a? Mleiya neen ndakkat inni Mma' nehr kat thungki narjaak dok inna.”
42023001	Audilli miipii rek mkheng inni rip lamda ungta Mma' avah Pilaat hinni vanqhi lamda.
42023002	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah hanto' the lamda, mraal tpiik pqhun lamda: “Neen nih hava' miilai ava ngi mii rek avah 'lamleh thang ngi mdoqhi meeksli deiyin nuh ungta Siijar hinni paammii sumqhai tpiik rang avah pkhaanda. Ungta Mma ngi mthina ngi Neiya Mesaiah ping ungta paamkruwng khat ping kirdi chda.”
42023003	Mthungta Pilaat tih Mma' hinni hanto'theda, pau kheelda: “Talu, Nang nga Jihudi rekki paamkruwng pti?” Ungta Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiya nang ngi adothe ava' ping.”
42023004	Audilli Pilaat tih thimpu kenreel rekle' miipii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi hava' Mii 'leenni mraal ka'am deimaang.”
42023005	Pdainu mmaan nih kerkheelset tih kdung ngi the lamda: “Mma ngi Galily ki kupqhun nih hava' kpha thung ngi Judia paam mkheng thuh chetda purchuk lamda ava ngi mii rek avah mdokchou terlam.”
42023006	Pilaat tih Galily tidit marjaak thungta, mma ngi Miilai avah Galily ki mii mow tidit kheel lamda.
42023007	Ungta mma ngi Mma' avah Herod paampuwk thungki tidit marjaak daat le' mma ngi Herod hinni Mma' avah heipthlada. Mleiya mpha ava' thung ngi mma' rukka Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am.
42023008	'Tunnu Herod tih Jisu mdeh thungta kdung ngi mmah kanpa chda. Mleiya mma ngi Jisu tedeh rah mdongeina' avah rowiksowt. Mleiya mma ngi Jisu ki mlei avah knempok ki mdo'arjaak dok ungta mma ngi Jisu dotlot ruhtan nong rek avah tsut rah mdobin.
42023009	Audilli mma ngi Jisu hinni pau knempok kheelda pdainu Mma ngi khatleh ruk arthaang mda.
42023010	Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' nowlam chukpu rekki rip lamda kdung ngi Mma' 'leenni mraal pii lamda.
42023011	Audilli Herod tih mma' mii, raalmii rek tung ngi mmeel kthidok ki bi chlamda ungta pni chaak lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kenthle kparnaak ki dona pnaak lam thida Pilaat hinni veikhat heipthla nowl lamda.
42023012	Nit ava'kat thung ngi Pilaat le' Herod avah khat le' khat plap kurthuwk chlamda. Mleiya ava'duh vah mmaanve avah khat le' khat karhal kcha'lam.
42023013	Ungta Pilaat rih thimpu kenreel rekle' paamkpu rek ungta miipii rek avah own purkuwksap lamda.
42023014	Audilli mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih hava' mii avah 'lamleh thah mii kqhi diin tinu, nei kihin nih arheiqhi inna. Asuwn, Neiyi naan amai inni Mma' avah kperteel dok a. Ungta neiyi hava' Mii ava' 'leenni naan nih mraal adopiik rekin 'leenni mraal khatleh ruk ka'am deimaang.
42023015	Herod rukku mraal phang meh tidit tah neiyi naan avah mma' hin rukku adoheiksi dokin. Ungta asuwn, Herod rukku Mma' avah tidiyow ki mtik kcha mraal khatleh ruk Mma' 'leenni phang meh.
42023016	Avaleiyi, neiyi Mma' avah mraal suwkthuhna' kpiik dilli pthlapthi nikdi'.”
42023017	Mleiya Pilaat tih kmaal ava' thung ngi mmaan thenni miikhat mdopthlat piiklam rang thah tlada.
42023018	Pdainu miipii rek mkheng inni veikhadaat tih owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Mii avah a'eyou, ungta neen kthenin nih Barabbas mheipthlat piikin.”
42023019	Barabbas tidit mii avah khuwpii ava' thung ngi sarka 'leenni raal ktlow arlak ki yauda mii ke'eyou leiyi, mmaan nih mma' avah rowng'inn thuh mdodaalin.
42023020	Audilli Pilaat tih Jisu tapthlat rah mdobin leiyi, mmaan avah veikhat own nowl lamda.
42023021	Pdainu mmaan nih owng owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Mma' avah apthowiyou'in, Mma' avah apthowiyou'in,” dilamda.
42023022	Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni mveikdumna' hanto ngi theda: “Talulei, Mma ngi talu kthikat mtlotplih? Neiyi Mma' thung ngi tidiyowna' krow mraal khatleh phangmaang. Avaleiyi, neiyi Mma' avah bunthida pthlapthi nikdi'.”
42023023	Pdainu mmaan nih kerkheelset tih krowl kdung ngi owng lamda hanto' the lamda: ‘Mma' avah topthowiyow rah.’ Ungta mmaan krowl le' thimpu kenreel rek krowl ava ngi mma' pau avah pchaang chda.
42023024	Mthungta Pilaat tih mmaan doqhil heppi pauqut avah pqu pthida.
42023025	Ungta mma ngi mmaan nih mdoqhilin khat avah pthlatpiik lamda. Mma' avah sarka kepteng ngi raal ktlow ungta mii ke'eyou leiyi, rowng'inn thung ngi mdothiikin ava'. Ungta Pilaat tih mmaan nih mdobin inni, mdoporlow chaakna' raan ki thenni Jisu avah mmaan hinni parlaan pthi lamda.
42023026	'Tunnu mmaan nih anto ngi Mma' avah mvanqhiin thungta Sairen ki Simon mdoditin khuwpaam khat ki kthleng kcha' miikhat kyowng lamda ungta Jisu khros avah mma' topdom lamda ungta Jisu dil topqowi lamda.
42023027	Ungta miipii knempa ngi Mma'dil qowi chlamda. Ungta marlak inni Mma' thenni plungkya ngi archam louda kqap kcha' snu rek rukka kyaulam.
42023028	Pdainu Jisu ngi mdil kerheelda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Jion chanu rek naan nih Nei kleiyi qapmaan pdainu naan, athen inni ungta anau'leen ki thenni iqap chaan.
42023029	Asuwn, naan nih: ‘Von kchowi kma' rekka msuwkin kqha a, mlung'om kerthlet kma' rek ungta nau kkai kma' arnu rek avah msuwkin kqha a, adoditna' raan nit rek avah karvang meeksli a.’
42023030	Mpha ava' thung ngi mii rekki, lown rek hinni hanto ngi tethe kupqhun lamrah: ‘Neen k'leen nih mheichim piik chaan.’ Ungta mul rek hinni, ‘neenna mheipkhum chaan,’ kdi lamrah. (Hos. 10:8)
42023031	Mleiya, mmaan nih avale' avah ding kring khat 'leenni mtlot innu kqong 'leen ngaallu talu ktlow lam rang ngoh?”
42023032	Audilli ava' thung ngi kqha kma' ktlow mii 'knii rukka ka'am lam ungta mmaan nih mdo'eyow raan ki thenni mmaanve avah Mma' tu' hanqhi lamda.
42023033	Ungta mmaan nih luwruh mun mphaakin thungta Mma' avah mmaan nih pthowiyou lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kqha kma' ktlow mii rek avah khat tih machang thah ungta morson khat ava ngi Mmaleh thah pthowiyou lamda.
42023034	Audilli Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Apa, mmaan avah aptlotpiik chlam, mleiya mmaan nih mdotlotin avah talu tidit deipindih chlammeh.” Ungta mmaan nih Mma' buwdiir rek avah penthem chlamda ungta pchalpiik sutna' lamda.
42023035	Ungta mii rekki Mma' avah sutpqowi lamda. Pdainu paamkpu rek kpha rukku mmaan tung ngi mmeel kthi ngi hanto' the lamda Mma' avah kdung ngi ningqhuwm mih pni chaak lamda: “Mma ngi mii morsonna san chlamda. Mma ngi, Isowr rih mdokchol dok Mesaiah mkurthuh cheentung ngi Mthina ngi ikarsan chso,” dilamda.
42023036	Ungta raalmii rek rukku Mma' avah pni chaak lamda ungta Mhin nih arva lamda ungta thowldii kdor parlaan chlamda.
42023037	Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi Jihudi rekki paamkruwng akurthuh cheentung ngi, athina ngi ikarsan cha' low,” dilamda.
42023038	Ungta HAVAH JIHUDI REKKI PAAMKRUWNG, tidit ki kbih tikjit khat avah Grik pau vih, Latin pau vih ungta Hibriu pau vih kjit lamda Mma' karthak ki daar lamda.
42023039	Audilli kqha kma' ktlow rek thungki khat ava ngi Mma' kipthit tih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi Mesaiah akurthuh cheentung ngi athina ngi ikarsan chthi rang ngi neenve rukka mheisanin low,” dida.
42023040	Pdainu ktlok khat tih arthaangda mma' avah raithida hanto'theda: “Nang ngi hanto'hep daat tupsulna' thung ngi a'am arlaan rukku Isowr rah qicha' mtimow?
42023041	Ungta kindit kat tih neenve a nnongtlot chaak rek ava' ki mtik cha ava'kat tarlaan chaak. Pdainu hava' Mii avah karmak mdotlot khatleh ka'am pemeh.”
42023042	Audilli mma ngi Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi Nangki akruwngpaalna' atlun chaak thung vah, neiya mheibin phaak cha'.”
42023043	Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. Tuni kat tih nang nga Nei tu' Kanpamun thah tlung chnadi.”
42023044	Ungta 'tunnu mutrukna' qhang arveel ki kupqhun nih mutkutna' qhang kpha ngi dultipaam mkheng avah jiingnu ngi pkhumda.
42023045	Audilli kni avah pjiing pthida luwbuk'inn kenje thungki buwyaar avah mmalaiyi 'knii kthuwk ki kerjen chda.
42023046	Ungta Jisu ngi krowl kparthaang ngi mo'own dilli, Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Apa, Nah akhut thung ngi Nei kapthla avah akparlaan chaak a.” (Luw. 31:5) Ungta Mma ngi hava' mthe dok le' Mma ngi mqutna' mtadaal qen chda.
42023047	'Tunnu raalmii arja khat kpupa ava ngi kthuwk dow rek ava' mdeh thungta mma ngi Isowr ponlor chda ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Dakat tih hava' Mii, avah mrinkindit miikhat thideh,” dida.
42023048	Ungta ava' thuh thlengda mmik ki kthuwk dow ava' kdei miipii rek mkheng ava ngi, muplungin tpeeng lamda ungta mmun ava' thung ki sunkerheel chlamda.
42023049	Pdainu Mma' dokilqhiqhi mkheng rekle' Galily ki kupqhun nih Mma'dil kqowi kcha' rekvah leer rih rip lamda kthuwk dow mkheng rek avah sutpqowi chlamda.
42023050	Ungta asuwn, kunpun ava' ki miichai khat kurthuwk ungta mii kqha ungta mii kindit khat mmiing Joseph mdoditin khat ka'am.
42023051	Mma ngi mmiqhi rek dokerseel le' mnongtlotin avah pqowimda. Ungta mma' avah Jihudi rek khuwpii Arimathia ki ungta mma' mdak avah Isowr kruwngpaalna' karda kcha' miikhat.
42023052	Hava' mii ava ngi, Pilaat hinni hangda Jisu kluwng avah qhil chda.
42023053	Audilli mma ngi kluwng avah pqumda ungta buw kperneem mih k'lum deekda ungta kuwkhat leh tpi'iina' mlai, lungkhor thlaan ava' thung ngi Mma' avah pi'iip chda.
42023054	Ava' nit avah tkorthlonna' nit ungta tkarngatnit avah knai kcha'.
42023055	Ungta Jisu tu' kilqhi ngi Galily ki karhangsap snu rekki mdilin qowi chlamda ungta mmaan nih thlaan avah dei lamda ungta taluhep pih Mma' avah mirkhiik a tidit suwjik lamda.
42023056	Audilli mmaan nih sunkerheel lamda namreng le' reidii mikrimkdi rek avah porthlong chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih paupiik ki dilkqowiyi tkarngatnit avah dan chlamda.
42024001	'Tunnu arveen ki mkhatna' nit tih, jiingsun kparma ngi mmaan le' snu morson rek aangqhe tu' kilqhi ngi mdoporthlon dok ksaan namreng rek ava' sin lamda thlaan thah arhang lamda.
42024002	Pdainu mmaan nih thlaan nehr 'leenki lung kurlup dok kcha' avah dei lamda.
42024003	Audilli mmaan nih mthung ngi vangluwt lamda pdainu Kruwng Jisu kluwng avah deilam mda.
42024004	Ungta mmaan nih kdung ngi muplungin kelqen nih ma'amin arlaan nih hanto' thuwkda: Mleiya asuwn, mmaanve hinni dona kepleu dang kihilkna mii'knii ripdaat lamda.
42024005	Audilli mmaan nih mningqit inni mmaiyin dulti suw lamda ma'amin arlaan nih, mmaanve ngi mmaan hinni hanto' the lamda: “Taluleiyi naan nih kring avah kdiyou arlak ki athlaam inna?
42024006	Mma' avah hava' thuh ammeh kerdel dok. Mma ngi Galily thung ngi ma'am daat thung ngi naan ahin nih mdothe avah abinphaakin.
42024007	Mma ngi hanto' mdothe: ‘Mii Chapa avah pnu kervei rek khut thung ngi kparlaan pthi rah ungta kopthowiyou lamrah ungta mnii kdumna' nit tih veikhat kerdel rah,’ mdodit.”
42024008	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' pauthe rek avah binphaak lamda.
42024009	Audilli mmaan nih thlaan ava' thung ki jungkerheel lamda ungta kthuwk dow mkheng rek avah sowm leikhat rek hinni ungta morson mkheng rek hinni avah song chlamda.
42024010	Avale' avah Magdala ki Mary le' Joanna ungta James nuh Mary le' mmaan tu' kilqhi snu rek ava ngi tamsi rek hinni avah song chlamda.
42024011	Ungta tamsi rekki mmaan dothe pau avah kthesusu kcha'lam heppi bin lamda ungta mmaan nih avah lam'rin chlam mda.
42024012	Pdainu Pitar rah ripda thlaan thah hangchenda ungta tpeda heisuwda. Ungta mma ngi buw kperneem rek ava' daat chrel ka'am deida. Ungta mma ngi kthuwk ava' 'leenni mthina ngak chda ungta anto ngi jungkerheel chda.
42024013	'Tunnu asuwn, ava' nit kat tih mii'knii rek avah Jerusalem thungki kilomitar sowm leikhat arveel kla, Immaus tidit khuw thah pjiin lamda.
42024014	Ungta mmaanve ngi kthuwk dow mkheng rek leiyi, pau avah saam lamda.
42024015	Anto ngi mmaanve ngi ava' ki mlei rek ava' the lamda meheiyin arlaan nih, Jisu mdakkat tih mmaanve avah heipha lamda anto ngi mmaan tu' kilqhi ngi chetsap lamda.
42024016	Pdainu mmaanve ngi Mma' avah mdodeh pinditmana' raan ki thenni Isowr rih mmikin avah purlup pthida.
42024017	Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Talulu pau plih naanve ngi achechun inni adosaam inna, ungta aplungin myat tah?”
42024018	Audilli mmiing Kleopas mdodit ava ngi arthaangda, Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Jerusalem thung ngi mal khat tih amda, harvai ki kthuwk rek kdei kma' avah nang daat heppa?”
42024019	Ungta Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Talulu kat kthuwk plih?” Ungta mmaanve ngi Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Najareth ki Jisu ki mlei. Mma' avah Isowr aang ngi ungta mii mkheng rek aang ngi mruh ktang ngi nong ktlow kcha' ungta kpau kcha' khulpu khat.
42024020	Ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' neenki paamkpu rekki Mma' avah Pilaat hinni parlaan lamda ungta mma ngi Mma' avah te'eyowna' rah pauqut theda ungta raalmii rekki Mma' avah mdopthowi yown.
42024021	Pdainu neenvah Mma' avah Isreel rek kaktlanbei rang ava' tidit tih kdobinin. Ungta hava' han'tun nih dakat tih ava' khimkhei mthuhna' avah tuni ngi niikdum mphaak dok a.
42024022	Ungta neen karlakin ki jiingsun nih thlaan thah kahang snu rek aangqhe ngi neenna mapngakyou chaanda.
42024023	Mleiya mmaan nih Mma' kluwng avah mdehmaan thungta arjung kerheel lamda hanto ngi the lamda: “Mmaan nih mrinmer inni, ‘Mma' avah kring kerheel dok,’” dida kthe vaantamsi rek dei lamda.
42024024	Ungta neen karlakin ki aangqhe rekki thlaan thah hang lamda snu rek dothejik nowl lih handei lamda. Pdainu mmaanve ngi Mma' avah deilam meh.”
42024025	Audilli Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “O kokmok rek ungta Khulpu rekki mdothe rek mkheng 'leenni lamtrin chaak rang 'leenni muplung ktomowl rek.
42024026	Mesaiah ava ngi hava' tyatna' rek avah perteel donni ungta Mma' ki mkonlorna' ava' thuh mluw chaak rangkat pemeh mow?”
42024027	Ungta Mma ngi Mma' ki mlei avah, Moses ki kupqhun nih khulpu rek laika mkheng rekle' Kchiir laika rek mkheng ava ngi mdothe rekki mlei avah mmaanve hinni thepindit piik lamda.
42024028	Audilli mmaan nih mmaanve ngi mdophaak raan khuw avah heipha lamda. Ungta Mma ngi khuw ava' hinni kla ngi heppi tlowda.
42024029	Pdainu mmaanve ngi hanto ngi the lamda, Mma' avah thlot lamda: “Neen tu' amdaat inche, mleiya kluhpha kvei kcha' a, ungta khu kjiing chrah mthe a,” dilamda. Ungta Mma ngi ka'am daat rang ngi mmaanve hinni tlung chda.
42024030	'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi mmaanve tu' kmaal rang ngi khaan 'leen mko'onin thung ngi Mma ngi thenpen avah chomda ungta panpaak chda ungta khuida mmaanve hinni pii lamda.
42024031	Audilli mmaanve mik avah kparvangda ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' avah deipindih chlamda pdainu Mma ngi mmaanve mikdeh thungki korlou chdokda.
42024032	Ungta mmaanve ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda: “Mma ngi 'lam thuh nihin nih pau msaam thuh ungta Mma ngi nihin nih Kchiir laika rek, mitthepindit piik thung ngi neenve nuplungril avah kkapda?”
42024033	Mthungta mmaanve ngi mpha ava'kat thung ngi korlou lamda Jerusalem thah veikhat dil hang kerheel lamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi sowm leikhat rekle' mmaan tu' ka'am rek avah kurtuwl sap lamda ma'am daatin arlaan nih hanpha khot lamda.
42024034	Ungta mmaan nih, ‘Kruwng avah dakat tih kring kerheel dok a ungta Simon hinni kperdehda,’ tidit song chlamda.
42024035	Ungta mmaanve ngi, 'lam thung ngi kthuwk dow rek avah song chlamda ungta taluhep pih Mma ngi mmaanve hinni thenpen tkhuina' thung ngi kandang, tidit song chlamda.
42024036	'Tunnu mmaanve ngi hava' the lamda ma'amin arlaan nih Jisu mdakkat tih mmalai inkat tih ripda ungta “naan aplungin avah kdai ikurthuwkso,” dida, mmaan hinni theda.
42024037	Pdainu mmaan vah pthla kdeihep pih kirbin lamda piir lamda ungta mningin kdung ngi qi chda.
42024038	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi naanna aplunginkya a? Ungta taluleiyi aplungin thung ngi plung kelqenna' apthuhnna?
42024039	Naan nih kukhuh le' kukhut asuwn, Nei ping, Nei kat ping! Mheikmeiyin ungta adeiyin tidit tah pthla vah, Neiyi kdothlowi adodehn ava' heppi sadak le' ruh mdothlowi pemeh.”
42024040	Mma ngi hava' mthe thung ngi, Mma ngi mkhut le' mkhuh avah mmaan hinni tepdeh lamda.
42024041	Pdainu ava' kpha thung ngi mmaan nih mkanpatin le' mnga chaakin ava ngi lam'krin kmah ngi ma'amin arlaan nih, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih hava' thuh thendam athlowi ngaalin mowi?” dida.
42024042	Mthungta mmaan nih Mhin nih klum daat tuwlvah klek khat le' pkhuithlaar mruk pii lamda.
42024043	Ungta Mma ngi avah arlaangda ungta mmaan dodeh ngi avah chadokda.
42024044	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Hava'le' avah Neiyi naan tu' na'amsapin thung ngi kdothe pauna rek ava'. Mleiya Moses ki Nowlam thung ngi ungta Khulpu rek laika thung ngi ungta Luwbuklaa thung ngi Nei kleiyi tikjit dok mkheng avah mkurkhum rah,” kdodit.
42024045	Ungta mmaan nih, Kchiir laika rek ava' mdodeh pindit chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi muplungrilin rek avah pvanpiik lamda.
42024046	Audilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Tikjit dok ava' heppi Mesaiah ki thennu tyattraanna' mdoperteel rang ungta mnii kdumna' thung ngi mdiyow thungki mrinkerheel rang avah msit amda.
42024047	Mleiya Jerusalem thungki pqhunda Mma' miing 'leenni chaat mkheng rek hinni pnu rek tuknuwl piikna' rang ki thenni plung kerthlenna' pau avah tparjaam rah.
42024048	Ungta hava' dow rek 'leenni naanna Neiki ksakhi rekin ptih.
42024049	Asuwn, Neiyi, Kpa paureel avah naan ahin nih, kapthlat a. Pdainu naan ahin nih kparthaang hinki ruhtan ava ngi atipdimduhn kpha thung ngi naan nih Jerusalem khuwpii thung ngi i'am daatin.”
42024050	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan avah Bethany kpha klangi qhilam thida Mma ngi m'leenin nih Mkhut khiingda mmaan avah suwqhat pii chlamda.
42024051	'Tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Mma ngi mmaan suwqhat mpiikmeek arlaan nih Mma ngi mmaan hinki sun chda ungta Mma' avah parvaan thah arjuklou chda.
42024052	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah luwbu chlamda ungta kdung ngi kanpa ngi Jerusalem thah arjung kerheel chlamda.
42024053	Ungta mmaan nih kdet liit kmah ngi luwbuk'inn thuh Isowr panpaak chlamda ungta suwqhat piichtlit kchok lamda. Amen.
43001001	Mupqhun thok thuh Pauna ava' amda ungta Pauna avah Isowr tu' amda ungta Pauna avah Isowr kurthuwkda.
43001002	Mupqhun thok thuh Mma' avah Isowr tu' amda.
43001003	Mma' arlim mih dow mkheng avah seemda ungta mdopurthuh dow mkheng avah Mma' ktaak ki dow khatleh seem meh.
43001004	Mma' hinni rinkum avah ka'am ungta rinkum ava ngi dultimii ki mar'aang kurthuwkda.
43001005	Mar'aang ava ngi kjiingnu thung ngi lengda ungta kjiingnu vah mar'aang avah deipindih pchaang meh.
43001006	Isowr dopthlat mmiing Johon tidit miikhat ka'am.
43001007	Mii avah rinpaumin kpii rang ki thenni kurjung, tidit tah mma' arlim mih mii mkheng ngi lammdorin chaakna' rah mma ngi Mar'aang ava' ki rinpaumin avah mdopiik.
43001008	Mma' avah Mar'aang ava' pemeh pdainu Mar'aang ava' ki rinpaumin kpii rah kurjung.
43001009	Dultipaam thuh kurjung khimkhei rek hinni mar'aang kpii kindit Mar'aang avah Mma'kat hava'.
43001010	Dultipaam thuh Mmah ka'am doksa ungta dultipaam avah Mma' arlim mih mdopurthuh pdainu dultimii ngi Mma' avah deipindih pchaang meh.
43001011	Mma ngi Mma' dow rek hinni arjungda ungta Mma' mii rekki Mma' avah arlaang chlammeh.
43001012	Pdainu Mma' arlaang chda Mma, miing 'leenni lam'krin kcha' khimkhei rek hinni, Isowr nau tkurthuhna' ruhtan avah mdopiik lam.
43001013	Mmaan avah hii thungki kqou mditmata daksa ki dilkqowiyi kqou mditmata dultimii plungbin dilkqowiyi kqoulam pemeh pdainu Isowr hinki kqou kcha'lam.
43001014	Ungta Pauna ava ngi daksa kurthuwkda neen narlak inni amda. Ungta neen nih Mma' konlorna' tidit tah Pa ava' hinki Chapa khatpak ki konlor chaakna' avah nmikkat inni ndeh chaak dok inna. Ungta Mma' avah plungnee le' kindit tih kdim.
43001015	Johon nih Mma' ki rinpaumin avah hanto ngi owngda, mdopiik: “Neiyi, ‘Nei kdil thah karvang rang Mma' avah nei kduh ki rah, mleiya Mmah nei kduh thah ka'am dok ksa,’ kdodit Mma' avah hava'.
43001016	Ungta neen nkheng inni Mma' pleetna' ki plungnee 'leenni plungnee avah narlaan chaak dok inna.
43001017	Mleiya Isowr rih Moses arlim mih nowlam avah piida pdainu plungnee le' kindit avah Jisu Khrista arlim thung ngi karvang.
43001018	Kuwkhat leh ngi Isowr avah teden rukku mmik ki deimeh. Pa ava' thungthiik Chapa khatpak ava ngi Mma' avah mpurphuwn a”.
43001019	'Tunnu Jihudi rekki, ‘nang nga kuw ptih’ tidit kekheel rang ngi, Jerusalem ki thimpu rekle' Levi rek merheisi thuwnki Johon rinpaumin avah hava'.
43001020	Mma ngi thethuh chda ungta kmat kmah, “Neiya Mesaiah ava' pmaang,” tidit kerthethuh chda.
43001021	Ungta mmaan nih kheel lamda: “Mdittu' talu pti, Nang nga Elaijah pti?” Ungta mma ngi, “neiya ava' pmaang,” dida. “Nang nga khulpu khat pti?” di lamda. Ungta mma ngi, “Immeh,” dida.
43001022	Audilli mmaan nih mhin nih the lamda: “Nang nga kuw ptih? Mleiya neen nih mheiksi rekin hinni kdovanson chaakna' raanni, nang nga kuw ping ngi kirdi kcha' ptil lih?”
43001023	Mma ngi hanto'theda: Khulpu Isaiah ngi, “ ‘Kruwng 'lam avah arjiin,’dida mdothehep pih, ‘Neiya paamkbiik laiyi ko'owng krowl ava' ngaal ping.’ ” (Is. 40:3)
43001024	Ungta mdo'arheisi rekin avah Pharisy rek thungki lam.
43001025	Ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih hanto' kheel lamda: “Nang nga Mesaiah akurthuhma mditmata Elaijah ruk akurthuhma mditmata khulpu ruk akurthuhma u, taluleiyi dii adopluw o?”
43001026	Johon nih hanto'theda arthaang lamda: “Nei vah diisi ki daat tih dii kdopluw lam. Pdainu naan nih adodeh maan Khat avah naan arlak ki krip daat a.
43001027	Hava' Mma' avah nei kdil thah karvang meek ava'. Mmah nei kduh ki rah ungta neiya Mma' khuhkok rii kperthlet ki mtik kcha pmaang.”
43001028	Ungta hava' dow mkheng rek avah Johon nih dii mdopluw lamna' Jordon kreng raalpha ki Bethabera tidit mun thung ngi kthuwk.
43001029	Mupduknii ngi Johon nih Jisu avah mma' ktong thah karva mdeh thungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Dultipaam pnu kloupthi Isowr Yausuwn avah, asuwn.
43001030	Neiyi, ‘kdil thah karva Miikhat avah kduh ki rah,’ kdodit Mma' avah hava'. Mleiya Mmah nei kduh thah ka'am dok ksa.
43001031	Neiyi Mma' avah deidok chmaang. Pdainu Mma ngi Isreel mii rek hinni mkurphuwnna' rang leiyi, neiya diisik ki dii kupluwt rang ngi kthleng ping.”
43001032	Ungta Johon nih hanto' rinpaumin avah mdopiik theda “Neiyi Pthla avah uqhu heppi parvaan ki arjungda ungta Mma' 'leenni kchuw deinu.
43001033	Neiyi Mma' avah deidok chmaang. Pdainu neiyi diisik ki dii kupluwt rang ki thenni myuksi Mma' ava ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: ‘Nang ngi m'leen nih Pthla arjungda ungta m'leen nih kchuw adodehna' Mma' avah Pthla Kchiir rih dii kupluwt rang ava'.’
43001034	Ungta neiyi kmikkat tih kdeh chaak a tidit tah havah Isowr Chapa kat ava' tidit kpandan chaak a.”
43001035	Veikhat mupduknii ngi Johon nah msikhu 'knii rek tung ngi ripda lamda.
43001036	Ungta mma ngi Jisu kchet meek heidei thida hanto'theda: “Isowr Yausuwn avah asuwn!”
43001037	Ungta sikhu 'knii rek ava ngi mma' dothe marjaakin thungta mmaanve ngi Jisu dil qowi chlamda.
43001038	Audilli Jisu ngi mdil mkerheel thungta mmaanve ngi mdil mdoqowi meek lam ava' mdeh thungta suwrim lam thida, mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Taluda naanve ngi adothlaam inna?” Mmaanve ngi Mhin nih the lamda: “Rabbi, tidit tah chukpu mdoditna'. Nang nga tva thah ka'am ptil lih?”
43001039	Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Arvaan rang ngi arheisuwn.” Ungta mmaanve ngi va lamda Mma' amna' avah heidei chlamda ungta mmaanve ngi mnit avah ava' thah Mma' hinni kcheeng chlamda. Mleiya mpha avah qhang sowm arveel ktla kcha'.
43001040	Johon pauthe arjada Jisu dil kqowi kcha' 'knii rek arlak ki khat tah Simon Pitar tu' unau kthuwk Andria.
43001041	Mma ngi rukrirep pih mma' tu' unau kthuwk Simon kurdutqhida ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neenve ngi Mesaiah, tidit tah Khrista avah kdeh chaak dok inna.”
43001042	Ungta Andria ngi Simon avah Jisu hinni arheiqhida. Jisu ngi mma' avah suwrim thida hanto'theda: “Nang nga Jonah chapa Simon ptih, nang amiing nga Siphas tidit rah,” tidit tah npurlu bih lung mdoditna'.
43001043	Mupduknii ngi Jisu ngi Galily paam thah tyuk rah binda ungta Mma ngi Philip kurdutqhida ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei mheiqowi.”
43001044	'Tunnu Philip avah Andria le' Pitar amna' khuwpii, Bethsaida ki.
43001045	Philip pih Nathanel kurdutqhida ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neen nih Moses nowlam thuh ungta khulpu rekki mdokjit psukin, Najareth khuw ki Joseph chapa Jisu avah kdeh chaak dok inna.”
43001046	Nathanel lih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Najareth khuw thung vah dow kqha kthuwk pchaang lumow?” Philip pih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Arva rang ngi asuw.”
43001047	Jisu ngi Nathanel avah Mma' ktong thah karva deida ungta mma' leiyi, hanto'theda: “Mthung ngi tkurhuwnna' ktaak, Isreel miidakdak avah, asuwn!”
43001048	Nathanel lih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Teden thung ngi adotedehda?” Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Philip pih ato'own duduh ngi kduwtbul lih a'amdaat arlaan nih adokdeh dok.”
43001049	Nathanel lih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Rabbi, Nang nga Isowr Chapa kat ptih, Nang nga Isreel rekki paamkruwng ptih.”
43001050	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mleiya Neiyi ahin nih, kduwtbul lih adokdeh dok kdodit leiyi, nang ngi lam'atrin chaak a ne? Nang ngi hava' han'tun nih klinklin dow rek dei chnadi'.”
43001051	Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih the nowlda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. 'tundil thah nang ngi parvaan kparvangdon, Isowr vaantamsi rek avah Mii Chapa ava' 'leenni arjung kqum ungta hangkkal amikkat tih deinadi'.”
43002001	Ungta mnii kdumna' nit thung ngi Galily paam ki kana tidit khuw thung ngi kchiir inneena' khat amda. Jisu nuh rukka ava' thuh jauda.
43002002	Ungta kchiir inneena' ava' thung ngi Jisu le' Msikhu rek rukka own chlamda.
43002003	Ungta thowldii mtlan dok thungta Jisu nuh ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mmaan nah thowldii morson thlowi lammeh.”
43002004	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Snu, nang ngi Nei k'leennu talu adotlot rah ka'am plih? Neiki mpha avah arvang mlaiya.”
43002005	Mnuh ngi suwk rek ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Talutalu yoso Mma ngi atlown mdodit avah atlown.”
43002006	Jihudi rekki tekpertleuna' nowpa dilkqowiyi ava' thung ngi lung ksowr truk, khat thung ngi khoubum somtreht thungki ngi arja khat arveel kluwt rang rek avah pkong daat lamda.
43002007	Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Ksowr rek thung ngi dii apdimin.” Ungta mmaan nih ksowr rek avah dii kirkhi tih pdim lamda.
43002008	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Tunnu asunin rang ngi vansinin, ungta sikhupa ava' hinni vanpiin,” ungta mmaan nih avah vansin lamda.
43002009	Sikhupa ava ngi diisik thowldii tpurthuh dok avah pertemda, pdainu mma ngi tva'ki tidit tah deimeh. Pdainu mdii ksuwk kcha' suwk rek daat tih avah mdehn. Ungta sikhupa ava ngi kmoukpu avah ownda.
43002010	Ungta mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mii khimkheiyi mthowldiimai avah rukrirep pih mdopthuh ungta mal rekki mningin kchim mih mneek chaakin dilli meksep avah mdpthuh rotlu. Pdainu nangvah athowldiimai avah 'tun kpha thung ngi athiik tlit daat ane.”
43002011	Jisu ngi hava' titinna' rekki tupqhunna' avah Galily paam ki kana tidit khuw thung ngi tlowda mkonlorna' avah pandangda ungta Msikhu rekki Mma' hinni lam'rin chlamda.
43002012	Hava' dilli Mma ngi mnuh, mnaupa rek ungta Msikhu rek tung ngi Kapernaum khuwpii thah julamda. Pdainu mmaan nih ava' thah nit knempa ngi kcheeng lammeh.
43002013	'Tunnu Jihudi rekki Taplaanna' nit avah arvangnai chda, mthungta Jisu a Jerusalem khuwpii thah hangda.
43002014	Ungta Mma ngi Luwbuk'inn thung ngi sil le' yau le' uqhu kyur rek ungta sum kpertlek rekki ko'ong lamda sum mdolotin avah deida.
43002015	Ungta Mma ngi rii kchung sinda yau rekle' silpa kyur rek mkheng avah luwbuk'inn thungki reipthi lamda. Ungta sum kpertlek rek sum avah leipthida ungta khaan rek avah purlup pthida.
43002016	Ungta Mma ngi uqhu kyur rek hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' dow rek avah aloupthi dokin. Naan nih Kpa Inn avah sum tolotna'inn purthuhmaan.!”
43002017	Audilli Msikhu rekki: “Nang a'inn leiyi, kdung ngi kdongeen chaak ava ngi neiya mtapkaak a,” dida, mdokjit avah binphaak lamda. (Luw. 69:9)
43002018	Ungta Jihudi rekki arthaang lamda Mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang ngi hava' dow rek adotlot pchaanna' ki, neen kihinin nih adotetdet raan talulu titinna' athlowi?”
43002019	Jisu ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' Isowr Inn kenje avah a'ekrep dokin. Ava' dilli mnii kdumna' thung ngi Neiyi avah perdel nikdi'.”
43002020	Mthungta Jihudi rekki the lamda: “Hava' Isowr Inn kenje avah kum somplii leitruk kluwt tih tsak ungta Nang ngi niikdum daat thung ngi adoperdel rah?”
43002021	Pdainu Mma ngi hava' Isowr Inn kenje avah mdaksa mkerthena'.
43002022	Avaleiyi, Mma ngi kdiyou thungki mkerdel thung ngi mmaan hinni hava' mdothe avah Msikhu rekki binphaak lamda ungta mmaan nih Kchiir laika le' Jisu ngi mdothe pauna rek avah lam'rin chlamda.
43002023	'Tunnu Taplaanna' ki kmaal ava' thung ngi Mma ngi Jerusalem thuh ma'am daat thung ngi, Mma ngi mdotlot titinna' rek ava' mdehn thungta mii knempok ki Mma' miing 'leenni lam'rin chlamda.
43002024	Pdainu Jisu ngi mii mkheng avah mdodeh doklam leiyi, mdaksa avah mmaan hinni kparlaan chmeh.
43002025	Ungta Mma ngi kuwmiikhat tih miikhat leiyi, mdothe pindit piik rah ngei meh. Mleiya Mma ngi mii thung ngi talu ka'am tidit avah mdodeh dok ksa.
43003001	Pharisy rek arlak ki Jihudi rekki kver, mmiing Nikodimas tidit khat ka'am.
43003002	Hava' mii ava ngi jaan nih Jisu hinni thlengda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Rabbi, Nang nga Isowr hinki kurjung Chukpu ptih tidit neen nih kdehn. Mleiya Isowr doqhi kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi hava' titinna', Nang ngi adotlot avah tlow pchaang nimeh.”
43003003	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a, miikhat tih ren nih mqou chaak kma'don, mma ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah mmik ki dei pchaang nimeh.”
43003004	Nikodimas tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih kver dok kcha' miikhat ava ngi ren nih kqou pchaang rang plih? Mma ngi mvei'knitna' mnuhpowi thung ngi luwt thidon kqou kerheel pchaang rang mow?”
43003005	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a, kuwmiikhat tih dii ngi ungta Pthla ngi mqou chaakma bih mma ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi luwt pchaang nimeh.
43003006	Talutalu yoso daksa ngi kqou kcha' mma' avah daksa ungta Pthla ngi kqou kcha' mma' avah pthla.
43003007	Neiyi ahin nih, ‘Nang ngi ren nih aqou chaak rah kdodit leiyi, ngakma'.
43003008	Tirthli ngi mraanna' thah raang chda ungta naanvah marchaang daat ado'arjaakin. Pdainu naan nih tva'ki thuwkda tva'lam mqowi a tidit tah the pchaang maantih. Ava' vah Pthla ngi kqou kcha' rek khimkhei avah ava' hep daat lam.”
43003009	Nikodimas tih arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih hava'le' avah kurthuwk pchaang rang plih?”
43003010	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga Isreel rekki chukpu khat kurthuwk daat thi tih, taluhep pih hava'le' avah adodehma daat toh?
43003011	Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a, Neenna kdodehn ava' kdotheen ungta kmikdeh katin ava' kdopandanin. Pdainu neen nih kdopiikin rinpaumin avah naan nih lam'rin chmaan tih.
43003012	Neiyi dultipaam thung ngi kthuwk dow rek leiyi, adokthepiikin lam'arin chaak maannu parvaan thah kthuwk dow rek leiyi, adokthepiikin avah taluhep pih lam'rin pchaang raan tinu o?
43003013	Parvaan ki arjung kqum, tidit tah parvaan thah ka'am Mii Chapa ava' kma'don, kuwkhat leh rukka parvaan hangkkal dok ammlai.
43003014	Moses tih paamkbiik laiyi pruwl mdokhiin heppi Mii Chapa avah tikhiin chaak rang thah ktla.
43003015	Mleiya kuwku yoso Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rek avah kenvei lam nimeh pdainu ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah kthlowi chlam rah.
43003016	Mleiya Isowr rih dultimii avah hanto'ya vonsat low chda, tidit tah Mma ngi Mchapa mkhat chlet daat ava' piida. Tiditta kuwku yoso Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rek avah kenvei lam nimeh pdainu ktlangknai kma' rinkum kthlowi chlam rah.
43003017	Isowr rih Mchapa avah dultimii kupsul rah mdo'arjuksi pemeh pdainu dultimii ngi Mma' arlim mih mkarsan chaakna' raan ki thenni mdo'arjuksi.
43003018	Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' Mma' avah psul meh pdainu lamkrin kma' mma' avah choduduh ngi mdopsul dok. Mleiya mma ngi Isowr Chapa mkhat chlet ava' miing 'leenni lam'mdorin chaak pemeh.
43003019	Ungta havah tupsulna' ava' tidit tah mar'aang avah dultipaam thung ngi arjung dokda, pdainu dultimii rekki mar'aang hinvah kjiingnu avah kdung ngi ngei chlamda. Mleiya mnongtlotin avah kqha pemeh.
43003020	Mleiya mnowpa ngi kqha kma' nong ktlow khimkhei rekki mar'aang avah mdohal chaakin ungta mar'aang thung ngi kthlenglu lam pemeh, mleiya kqha kma' mdotlotin ava' kandang rah.
43003021	Pdainu kinditnong ktlow kcha' mma' ava ngi Isowr rih mdongei heppi nong kqha mdotlot avah kindit tih mkandanna' rah, mar'aang thung ngi kthleng kcha'lu.”
43003022	Hava'le' dilli Jisu ngi Msikhu rek tung ngi Judia paam thung ngi chet lamda. Mma ngi ava' thuh mmaan tu' amsap lamda ungta ava' thuh diipluwt pluwt chlamda.
43003023	Ungta 'tunnu Johon rukvah Salim khuw behki Aenon thung ngi, dii mtlum bet leiyi, ava' thuh diipluwt chlamda. Ungta mii rekki ava' thah va lamda ungta dii luwt chlamda.
43003024	Mleiya mpha ava' thung vah Johon nah rowng thuh khum mlailam.
43003025	Audilli Johon sikhu rek aangqhe le' Jihudi rek arlak ki, tekpertleuna' leiyi, kdung ngi kerteenna' lamda.
43003026	Ungta mmaan nih Johon hinni arva lamda hanto' the lamda: “Rabbi, asuw o, Jordon kreng raalpha thah ahin nih kthleng, Mrinpaumin adopiik Mma' ava ngi diipluwt meekda. Ungta mii mkheng nga Mma' hinni kvachlam a,” dilamda.
43003027	Johon nih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Parvaan nih mhin nih mdopiik dok kma'don nih kuwkhat leh ngi dow khatleh ruk arlaang pchaang nimeh.
43003028	naan adak kat inni neiyi rinpaumin kdopiik avah arjaan tinu, tidit tah, ‘neiya Mesaiah ava' pmaang, pdainu neiya Mma' duh thah mdotsi ngaal.
43003029	Kmou kthlowi mma' avah kmoukpu, pdainu Mhin nih krip kcha' kmoukpu plap mma' ava ngi kmoukpu krowl mdo'arjaak chaak leiyi, kdung ngi kanpa kcha' a. Avaleiyi, nei kkanpat avah hava ngi kurkhum kcha' a.
43003030	Mmah mkoryou thang chaakkat rah. Pdainu neiya ksiinthang chrang ping.
43003031	Tunki kurjung Mma' avah mkheng ki mkarthak pdainu dulti ki kthleng mma' avah dulti ki ungta dulti ki heppi kpau. Parvaan ki kurjung Mma' avah mkheng ki mkarthak.
43003032	Ungta Mma ngi mmikdeh kat le' makna arjaak kat rek ava' ki rinpaumin mdopiik. Pdainu Mma' rinpauminpiik avah kuwkhat leh ngi arlaang chmeh.
43003033	Mma' rinpaumin karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Isowr avah kindit kat tidit ki kbihjiik mlot chaak a.
43003034	Mleiya Isowr rih mdopthlat Mma' ava ngi Isowr pauna rek ava' mdothe ungta Isowr rih Mma' hinvah Pthla avah pertetetda piimeh.
43003035	Pa ava ngi Chapa avah vonsat lowda ungta dow mkheng avah Mma' khut thung ngi mdopiik.
43003036	Chapa ava' hinni lamkrin kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah mthlowi chaak a. Ungta Chapa ava' hinni lamkrin kma' mma' ava ngi rinkum avah mmik ki dei nimeh. Pdainu Isowr plungthit avah mma' 'leenni ka'am kcha' a.”
43004001	Ungta Jisu ngi Johon hinvah kerkheelsi ngi sikhu pqhangda ungta dii mupluw lam a tidit tih Pharisy rekki marjaak inna tidit avah Kruwng ava ngi deida.
43004002	Anto'daat yoso Jisu mdakkat tih diipluwt lammeh pdainu Msikhu rekki mdopluwn.
43004003	Avaleiyi, Mma ngi Judia paam mada veikhat Galily paam thah chet nowlda.
43004004	Ungta Mma ngi Samaria paam heikheel donle mche rang thah tlada.
43004005	Ungta Mma ngi Samaria paam ki khuwpii, Jakob pih mchapa Joseph hinni mdopiik mmun ava' behki Saikhar tidit khuw thung ngi thlengda.
43004006	'Tunnu Jakob diirum avah ava' thuh ka'am. Ungta Jisu a m'lamqowina ngi kham chda, avaleiyi diirum ava'beh ngi ko'ong chda. Mpha avah qhang truk arveel rah.
43004007	Ava' thung ngi Samaria ki snu khat dii ksuwk rah arvada. Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Dii mheipneek cha'low.!”
43004008	Mleiya Msikhu rekka thendam kren rah khuwpii thah kchet doklam.
43004009	Audilli Samaria ki snu ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Taluhep pih Jihudi nangvah Samaria ki snu nei kihin nih, adoneek rah dii atqhil a?” Mleiya Jihudi rekle' Samaria rekka khut karcha lam pemeh.
43004010	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi Isowr chla avah adeh chaak daat bih ungta ahin nih dii mheipneek cha' kdiya, kuw tidit adeh chaak daat bih, nang ngi Mhin nih qhil chtidon ungta Mma ngi kringdii adotpiik chaak rangnga!”
43004011	Snu ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ocha, Nang nga adiisuwna' rah dow khatleh ksin kma'pa vah, ungta hava' diirum avah ktlumpa kmah, mdittu' toki adosuw chaak plih kringdiiya?
43004012	Hava' diirum avah k'paan Jakob pih mdotpiik chaakin. Ungta mma' mdak rukku, mnaumsuwn rek rukku ungta mdownkhaal rek rukku hava' thungki dii mdoneekin. Mdittu' nang nga k'paan Jakob hin rukku klinbet daat ptimow?”
43004013	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwku yoso hava' dii knee kcha' rekka mningin kakraal chdaat nowl rah.
43004014	Pdainu Neiyi mhin nih kdopiik rang dii knee kcha' rek khimkheiya teden rukku mningin kraal nimeh, Pdainu Neiyi mhin nih kdopiik rang dii ava ngi mma' thung ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum kpii diitlaang ki diirum kurthuwkdon kphul rah.”
43004015	Snu ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ocha, neiyi kning makraal mana' rah ungta hava' thuh dii ksuwk rah kerhei mana' rah ava'dii avah mheipiicha' low!”
43004016	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Vang rang ngi a'innpu aqhi rah arva.”
43004017	Snu ava ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiya ki'innpu ka'am pemeh.” Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi ki'innpu ka'am ‘pemeh, adodit avah mkindit kat athethut a.
43004018	Mleiya nang nga a'innpu parnga ka'am dok ksa ungta 'tun 'tun nih ado'amqhi meek pselpa avah a'innpu pemeh. Avaleiyi, nang ngi mkindit kat athethut a.”
43004019	Ungta snu ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ocha, Nang nga khulpu khat ptimow tidit tih akbin chaak a.
43004020	Neen kpa'leen vah hava' lown 'leenni luwbu kchok lamda pdainu Jihudi rek naanvah, mii rekki luw mdobukna' raan mun avah Jerusalem thung rah diin tinu.”
43004021	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Snu, Nei kpauthe lam'arin cha'. Mleiya hava' lown'leen daat kma' ungta Jerusalem thung daat kma' Pa avah naan nih luw adobuk chaakmana' raan mpha avah karvang meeksli a.
43004022	Naanvah adodeh mapaan ava' luwbuk intinu pdainu neenna kdodehn ava' luw kdobukin, tidit tah tkirliinna' avah Jihudi rek hinki.
43004023	Pdainu kindit tih rekki pthla ngi ungta kindit tih Pa ava' hinni luwmdobuk chaakna' raan ki mpha avah karvang meeksli a ungta 'tun hava' thuh ka'am daat a. Mleiya Pa ava ngi anto' heppi luwkbuk cha' rek avah mdongei.
43004024	Isowr rah Pthla ungta Mma' hinni luwkbu chrangvah pthla ngi ungta kindit tih luwmdobuk chaak rah.”
43004025	Ungta snu ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi Mesaiah kurjung rah tidit tah kdeh Mma' avah Khrista mdoditin, Mma' murjun thung ngi, Mma ngi dow mkheng avah mekthepiik raan.”
43004026	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang akbimeek sli, Nei avah Mma' ping.”
43004027	Ungta Msikhu rek avah arlaan kat tih arvang tlung lamda. Mma ngi snu khat tu' mkirbiikin leiyi, mmaan nah ngak lamda. Pdainu mmaan kuwkhat leh ngi, ‘talu adongeida,’ mditmata ‘taluleiyi hava' snu tung ngi pau adosaamin,’ tidit tah kheel lammeh.
43004028	Audillu snu ava ngi mbeelsin mapthi thida, khuwpii thah vangchenda mii rek hinni hanto'theda:
43004029	“Arvaan, neiyi kdotlot dow mkheng kthe thuh dok pchaang miikhat avah arheisuwn. Mmah Mesaiah ava' ngaalmow?”
43004030	Audilli mmaan nih khuwpii thungki thuwk lamda, Mma' hinni va lamda.
43004031	Marlak ava' thung ngi Msikhu rekki: “Rabbi, imaal dok,” dilamda.
43004032	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan nih mlei adodeh pinditmaan tchaak rah thendam kthlowi a.”
43004033	Avaleiyi, Msikhu rekki, ‘kuwmiikhat tih mdochaak rah thendam kdakpiik ka'am ngaal mow?’ Tidit khat le' khat hinni kerkheel lamda.
43004034	Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nei kthendam rang avah Nei myuksi Mma' plungbin totlot chaak ungta Mma' nong tupqut rang ava'.
43004035	Naan nih buh turkunpha mdophaakna' rah thla plii ka'am daat a adit kchown pda? Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a ikindingin rang ngi lou rek avah heisuwn, minda turkunpha veidokda ka'am a.
43004036	Ungta kurkun kcha' mma' ava ngi mardaman kphang chrah ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum kpii mchei mpaar avah kurkun chrah. Mleiya havah kapqau kcha' ungta kurkun kcha' mmaanve ngi kinqimsap pih mkanpatveh chaakna' raan ki then.
43004037	Mleiya paulam mih, ‘khat tih pqauda ungta ktlok khat tih arkunda’, mdodit avah anto'kat.
43004038	Neiyi naan avah anonglow manaan thung ngi kurkun chrah aksi inna. Ungta naanna mii nonglow chaakksa thung ngi ktang chrah heikluwt dokin imptih.”
43004039	Ungta snu ava ngi: “Neiyi kdotlot dow mkheng Mma ngi kihin nih mthethuht tah,” dida, rinpaumin mdopiik leiyi, khuwpii ava' thungki Samaria mii knempok ki Mhin nih lam'rin chlamda.
43004040	Ungta Samaria ki mii rekki Mma' merhei phaak chaakin dilli Mhin nih mmaan tu' ma'am sapna' raan ktham chlamda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan tu' ava' thuh nii'knii kcheenqhisap lamda.
43004041	Ungta morson mii knempok ki Mma' pauna mdo'arjaak chaakin leiyi, lam'rin chlamda.
43004042	Audilli snu ava' hinni hanto' the lamda: “'Tunnu neen nih nang adothe leiyi, lam kdorin chaakin pemeh, pdainu kdak inni kdo'arjaak chaakin ungta neen nih Mesaiah ava'kat ungta dultipaam ksan kcha' ava' tidit kdeh chaak inna.”
43004043	'Tunnu nii'knii dil thah, Mma ngi ava' thung ki sunda, Galily paam thah chetda.
43004044	Jisu ngi mdakkat tih thepinditda, tidit tah ‘khulpu khat avah mpaamkat thung ngu mii ngi kyat chmeh’.
43004045	Audilli Mma ngi Galily mphaak thungta Galily mii rekvah Mmah arlaang chlamda mleiya mmaan rukka kmaal ava' thung ngi kahang lam. Ungta mmaan nih Jerusalem thah kmaal ava' thuh mahan thuwn nih, Mma ngi mdotlot dow mkheng avah mdodeh chaakin.
43004046	Ungta Jisu ngi veikhat, Mma ngi diisik thowldii mdopurthuhna', Galily ki Kana tidit khuw thung ngi thleng nowlda. Ungta Kapernaum thah mchapa kowida ka'am chdaat miikanthang khat avah ava' thuh amdaatda.
43004047	Mma ngi Jisu a Judia paam ki galily thah karvang a tidit marjaak thungta, Mhin nih vada ungta mma ngi mchapa avah kdikat rah kthe ngi mkowi leiyi, julapdon mchapa avah mdopdam piikna' rang ki thenni Jisu hinni ktham chda.
43004048	Audilli Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Naan nih titinna' rekle' tngana' rek adehmaan bih, teden rukku lam'rin chni maantih.”
43004049	Miikanthang ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ocha, knau mdiyow duh ngi arjulap daat tu'!”
43004050	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Isun chdaat, achapa a kring dok kcha' a.” Ungta mii ava ngi, Jisu ngi mhin nih mdothe pau avah lam'rin chda ungta mma ngi mmun ava' thung ki korlouda sun chda.
43004051	Ungta mma ngi sunda, myunmeek arlaan nih, 'lam thung ngi msuwk rek karhang ngi kurdutqhi lamda ungta mhin nih: ‘Achapa a kring dok a’, dilamda.
43004052	Avaleiyi, mma ngi mdambetna' mphakat avah kheel lamda. Ungta mmaan nih, ‘jani ki mtikhiuna' qhangkat thung ngi rii doknow avah mdodown dok’, dilamda.
43004053	Mthungta mpa ngi qhang avah, Jisu ngi, mhin nih: ‘Achapa avah kring dok a’, mdoditna' mphakat ava' a tidit deida. Ungta mma' mdakkat le' mi'inn thungki mii mkheng ngi lam'rin chlamda.
43004054	Havah Jisu ngi Judia paam ki galily paamkuwl thah marvan thuh le' mdotlot titinna' rekki miknitna' nowl.
43005001	Hava' dilli Jihudi rekki kmaal khat amda ungta ava' thuh Jisu rukka Jerusalem thah hangda.
43005002	'Tunnu Jerusalem thung ngi yaupaltong hinni diirum khat ka'am. Ungta mdulbuk parnga ma'am leiyi, Hibriu pauvi avah ‘Bethesda’ mdoditin.
43005003	Hava' thung ngi kkowi rek, mmikktot rek ungta mkhuh kyeng rekle' mdakkyeng rek, mii knempok avah ava' thuh dii kakna rah karda ngi iippok daat lamda.
43005004	Mleiya diirum ava' thung ngi vaantamsi khat arjungqum kchokda, dii avah mdotapnatna' mpha ka'am kchoklu. Vaantamsi ava ngi dii mtapnat daat le' rukrirep pih jungkqum teng kcha' mma' avah taluhep kduh ki omlai tong chyoso kdam kcha'lu.
43005005	'Tunnu ava' thung ngi kum somkdum leitreht thung ngi kyeng kcha' miikhat ka'am.
43005006	Jisu ngi mma' ki'iip daat avah deida ungta mpha rowiksowt tih anto ngi ava' thuh mmah ka'am chdaat tidit mdeh thungta, Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga tdam chaak rah angeiya?”
43005007	Kkowi ava ngi arthaangda: “Ocha, neiya vaantamsi ngi dii mtapnat daat le' diirum thung ngi myukkqhi teng chrah mii ammda. Ungta neiyi, kyuk chaak meeksli arlaan nih morson khat tih myukkheel dok kchokda.”
43005008	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ikerdel, a'iina' asin rang ngi isun cha'.”
43005009	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mii avah dam chda. Mma ngi mi'iina' sinda ungta sun chda. Ungta mnit avah tkarngatnit kurthuwkda.
43005010	Avaleiyi, kdam dok kcha' mma' hinni Jihudi rekki hanto' the lamda: “Tuni vah tkarngatnit, a'iina' kdom tih ache avah’ nowlam mih mdorot pemeh.”
43005011	Mma ngi arthaang lamda: “Nei mkapdam Mma' ava ngi kihin nih: ‘A'iina' asin rah isun,’ mdida, dida.”
43005012	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih, nang ahin nih: ‘A'iina' asin rah isun,’ akdi mii avah kuwkatda, tidit kheel lamda.
43005013	Pdainu Jisu ngi mdopdam mii ava ngi Mmah kuw tidit deimda. Mleiya Jisu a ava' thuh ka'am miipii rek arlak ki luwt dok chda.
43005014	Mdilthang row ngi Jisu ngi mma' avah luwbuk'inn thung ngi kurdutqhi nowlda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Asuw o, nang nga kdam dok kchaam ptih. Pnu veikhat arvei kchokma' mditma bih a'leen nih kqhaset kma' dow kthuwk rah.”
43005015	Mii ava ngi sunda ungta Jihudi rek hinni, mma' kapdam mii avah Jisu tidit thepiik lamda.
43005016	Ungta hava' leiyi Jihudi rekki Jisu a chiipreel lamda ungta ke'eyou rang ngi thlaam lamda. Mleiya Mma ngi hava' dow rek avah tkarngatnit tih mdotlot.
43005017	Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan hinni, arthaang lamda: “Kpa ngi 'tun kpha nong avah tlow tlit daatda ungta Nei rukku nong avah kdotlot.”
43005018	Avaleiyi, Jihudi rekki kerkheelset set tih Mma' mdo'eyowna' raan thlaam lamda. Mleiya Mma ngi tkarngatnit mdopkui daat kma' Isowr avah Mpa tpurthuhda, Mdak ruk Isowr tu' kpinqim leekda, dilamda.
43005019	Audilli Jisu ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Pa ava ngi mdotlot mdodeh ava' kma'don nih, Chapa ava ngi mthina thungki daat tih mdotlot pchaan dow khatleh ka'am pemeh. Mleiya Mma ngi mdotlot dow khimkhei avah Chapa ava' rukku ava' heppi mdotlot.
43005020	Mleiya Pa ava ngi Chapa avah vonsat mdolow chaak ungta Mma ngi mdotlot dow mkheng avah Mhin nih mdotedet ungta naan anga chaakna' raan ki thenni, Mma ngi Mma' hinni hava' heihin nih nong klin avah ktedet rah.
43005021	Mleiya Pa ava ngi kdiyou perdelda ungta rinkum mdopiik lam heppi Chapa ava ngi mdopiik nuwm chaak hinni rinkum avah mdopiik.
43005022	Mleiya Pa ava ngi miikhat leh hinni pau pindit meh, pdainu Chapa ava' hinni pau tpinditna' mkheng avah mdoparlaan dok.
43005023	Mleiya havah mii mkheng ngi Pa ava' mdokyat chaakin heppi Chapa avah mdokyat chaakna' raan ki then. Ungta Chapa ava' kakyat kcha' kma' mma' ava ngi Mma' arjuksi Pa ava' rukka kyat chmeh.
43005024	Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah Nei kpauna karja kcha' ungta Nei myuksi Mma' hinni lam'krin kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah mthlowi chaak a. Ungta mma’avah pau tpinditna' thung ngi arva nimeh. Pdainu mmah tidiyowna' thungki ngi rinkum thah maklaan chaak dok a.
43005025	Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, kdiyou rekki Isowr Chapa krowl arja lamdon ungta karja kcha' rek mmaan khimkheiyi mrin chaakna' raan mpha avah karvang meeksli a ungta 'tunkat ki qhang hava'.
43005026	Mleiya Pa ava ngi mdak thuh rinkum mdothlowi heppi Chapa ava'hin rukku mdak thung ngi rinkum tothlowina' avah piida.
43005027	Ungta Mma ngi Mhin nih pau tpindit pchaanna' rang ki ruhtanna' ava' rukka piida. Mleiya Mmah Mii Chapa ava'.
43005028	Naanna hava ngi ngakmaan. Mleiya diyouda thlaan thung ngi ka'am mkheng rekki Mma' krowl mdo'arjaak chaakna' raan mpha qhang avah karvang meeksli a.
43005029	Ungta kqhanong ktlow kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi kring kerheel rinkum thung ngi karva lamrah. Ungta mrilqhatma ngi nong ktlow kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi tupsulna' thung ngi kring kerheel lamrah.
43005030	Neiyi dow khatleh ruk kthina daat tih kdotlot pchaan ka'am pemeh. Neiyi kdo'arjaak heppi pau kdopindit ungta Nei kpaupindit avah mrinkindit mleiya Nei kuplungbin daat tih kdotlot pemeh. Pdainu Nei myuksi Pa ava' plungbin nih kdotlot.
43005031	Neiyi krinpaumin avah kthina ngi kthe chaak bih Nei krinpaumin avah kindit ava' pemeh.
43005032	Nei kthen nih rinpaumin kpii kcha' miiktlok khat ka'am. Ungta Mma ngi Neiki krinpaumin leiyi, rinpaumin mdopiik avah kindit, tidit Neiyi kdeh.
43005033	Naan nih Johon hinni kkheel rah mii pthlaan tinu ungta ava'leiyi mma ngi kindit deek ki rinpaumin avah piida.
43005034	Mleiya Neiyi dultimii hinki rinpaumin arlaang chmaang. Pdainu hava' dow rek avah Isowr rih naan adotsan chaakna' raan ki thenni kdothe.
43005035	Mmah kquwngmeek ungta kleng meeksli mar'aang ava' ungta naan nih mpha mruk ki thenni mma' ar'aang thung ngi tkanpat rah ngeiyin tinu.
43005036	Pdainu Neiyi Johon rinpaumin hinni klin rinpaumin avah kthlowi. Mleiya Pa ava ngi mdotpiik dok nong rek ava' kupqu rah Neiya myuksida. Ava' nongkat rek avah Neiyi kdotlot meek, tidit tah havah ngi Pa ava ngi Neiya mdoyuktsi tidit ki rinpaumin avah mdopandan.
43005037	Ungta Nei myuksi Pa ava' kat tih Nei kleiyi rinpaumin avah piida. Naan nih Mma' krowl avah teden rukku arja chmaan tih ungta mruwngchen ruk dei chmaan tih.
43005038	Ungta naan athung inni Mma' pauna avah amdei meh. Mleiya Mma ngi mdo'arjuksi Mma' avah naan nih lam'adorin chaakin pemeh.
43005039	Naan nih mmaan thung ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah ka'am tidit adobin chaakin leiyi, Kchiir laika rek ava' thlaamin tinu. Ungta avaleh ngi Neiki krinpaumin avah mdopiikin.
43005040	Pdainu naan nih rinkum adothlowi chaakna' raan ki thenni Nei kihin vah arvanuwm maantih.
43005041	Neiyi tkaryat chaakna' avah dultimii hinki arlaang chmaang.
43005042	Pdainu Neiyi akdehn a tidit tah naan athung ngi Isowr vonsat avah ammeh.
43005043	Neiya Kpa miing ngi kurjung ping pdainu naan nih Neiya marlaang chmaan tih. Ungta ktlok khat tih mdaksa miing ngi mthlen bih, naan nih mmah arlaang chnaandi'.
43005044	Isowr kat hinki kurjung tkaryat chaakna' kthlaam kmah, khat le' khat hinki tkaryat chaakna' karlaang kcha' naanvah taluhep pih lam'rin pchaang naanno?
43005045	Neiyi naan avah Pa ava' hinni akupsul raan mbinmaan. Pdainu akupsul raan khat ka'am, naan nih adorin chaakin Moses tih naan avah akupsul raan.
43005046	Naan nih Moses lamkrin kcha' akurthuh tlaangin bih, Nei rukka lam'mrin naandi'. Mleiya mma ngi Nei kleiyi mdokjit dok.
43005047	Pdainu naan nih mma' dokjit rek lam'arin chaakmaan bih taluhep pih Nei kpauna rek avah lam'rin chnaanno?”
43006001	Hava'le' dilli Jisu ngi Galily truwnpii, Taiberia truwn mdoditin klaanda vada.
43006002	Ungta omlai ktong rek 'leenni titinna' nong tyatya mdotlot kdei rek mii knempok ki Mma'dil qowi chlamda.
43006003	Ungta Jisu ngi lown khat 'leenni kalda ungta Mma ngi ava' thuh Msikhu rek tung ngi ko'ong lamda.
43006004	'Tunnu Jihudi rek maalna', Taplaanna' avah naitek chda.
43006005	Jisu ngi mluw parkhaapda khu msut thungta, Mhin nih miilop knempok karva deida. Mthungta Mma ngi Philip hinni hanto'theda: “Neen nih hava' miipii rek dochaak kho rah thenpen avah tva'ki tren raanno?”
43006006	Mma ngi havah Philip mdoleuna' ngaal lih mdothe mleiya talu totlot rang tidit avah Mma ngi mdodeh dok ksa.
43006007	Philip pih arthaangda: “Hava' mmaan ava ngi mruksisi ngi achasap lamso ndit bih denarii arja 'knii khoki rukvah khom nimeh,” dida.
43006008	Msikhu rek arlak ki khat Simon Pitar tu' unau kthuwk Andria ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda:
43006009	“Rukowl thenpen parnga le' tuwlvah kdil 'knii kthlowi kmow khat hava' thuh ka'am daat a. Pdainu avale' vah hanto'ya knem mii rekki thenvah talu ksirang ngo?”
43006010	Ungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Mii rek avah kok'ongsap rah asiin.” 'Tunnu mmun ava' thung ngi nowm mowngpokda. Mthungta mii rekka ko'ong lamda ungta miichai avah pun parnga arveel rah.
43006011	Jisu ngi thenpen rek avah louda ungta Mma ngi mpanpaak chaak dilli Msikhu rek hinni the mda. Ungta sikhu rekki kok'ong mii rek hinni them lamda. Ungta ava' heppi tuwlvah ava' rukka mningchimin ya ngi thempiik lamda.
43006012	Ungta mmaan nih kokhop pih mchaakin dilli, Jisu ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Khadaat ruk mkartlaimana' rah mikri ka'am daat rek avah apurbukin.”
43006013	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mikri rek avah purbuk lamda ungta rukowl thenpen parnga daat thungki mikri tidit tah kcha rekki mdochaak donin avah tomkal sowm lei'knii dimda.
43006014	Audilli mii rek ava ngi Jisu ngi tngana' mdotlot mdehn thungta hanto' the lamda: “Kindit kat tih havah dultipaam thung ngi kurjung rang khulpu ava' a.”
43006015	Audilli Jisu ngi mii rekki arva lamdon nih paamkruwng mdopurthuh raan ki thenni raanni mvankqhi lamrah tidit mdeh thungta, veikhat sunda Mthina ngi lown thah hangkal chda.
43006016	Ungta kluwki mpha mveh thungta, Msikhu rekka truwnpii thah yu lamda.
43006017	Ungta mmaan nih arkuwng thung ngi luwt lamda ungta truwnpii 'leenni Kapernaum ktong thah va lamda. Ungta 'tunnu khu jiing chda, ava' kpha thung ngi mmaan hinni Jisu a yumlaida.
43006018	Ungta tchangkhu kdung ngi kraang ava ngi truwnpii avah purlupda.
43006019	Mmaan nih kilomitar parnga mditmata truk arveel mvanthaan dilli, mmaan nih arkuwng ktong thah Jisu ngi truwnpii 'leenni mkhuh ngi chetda karvang mdehn thungta mningin pqit lamda.
43006020	Pdainu Mma ngi mhinin nih hanto'theda: “Nei ping ngi, aningin pqitmaan.”
43006021	Audilli mmaan nih plung korkhol lih Mma' avah arkuwng thung ngi arlaang chlamda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih arkuwng avah mheitlunna' raan laan ava' heitlungda.
43006022	Mupduknii ngi truwnpii ava' raalpha khat thah krip miipii rekki Msikhu rek kalna' arkuwngte ava' kma'don morson ammeh ungta Jisu a Msikhu rektu' kalsap lammeh. Pdainu Msikhu rek daat chrel kal lamda kvanglam tidit dei lamda.
43006023	Anto'daat yoso, Kruwng ava ngi mpanpaak chaak dilli thenpen mdochaak naan mun ava' beh ngi Taiberia ki arkuwngte morson rek avah arva lamda.
43006024	Ungta miipii rek ava ngi mmun ava' thuh Jisu daat kma' Msikhu rek rukka ma'ammaan dei lam thida mmaan rukka arkuwngte thung ngi kal lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Jisu kthlaam mih Kapernaum thah arva lamda.
43006025	Ungta mmaan nih truwnpii raalpha khat thah Mma' mkurdutqhiin thungta mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Rabbi, teden thung ngi hava' thangvah karva dok ptil lih?”
43006026	Jisu ngi arthaang lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya naan nih titinna' adodehn leiyi adotthlaamin pemeh, pdainu naan nih apowiyin kpa ngi thenpen ava' adochaakin leiyi, adotthlaamin.
43006027	Naan nih kenvei chrah thendam ava' ki then daat tih nong loumaan. Pdainu Mii Chapa ava ngi naan ahin nih adotpiik raan ktlangknai kma' rinkum ki thenni ka'am rang thendam leiyi, nong alouchaan. Mleiya Pa Isowr ava ngi Mma' 'leenni kbihjiik mdolot chaak dok.”
43006028	Audilli mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Neen nih Isowr nong kdotlot chaakna' raan, talu tlow nikaanli?”
43006029	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Havah Isowr nong ava' tidit tah naan nih Mma ngi mdo'arjuksi Mma' hinni lam'arin chaan.”
43006030	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Mdittu' neen nih kmikin nih deida lam'adokrin chaakna' raan ki thenni adotetdet raan titinna' talu adotlot pchaan ka'am a? Ungta talu nongda, Nang ngi adotlot rangnga?
43006031	Neen kpa leenni paamkbiik laiyi manna cha lamda. Tikjit dok ava' heppi, ‘Mma ngi parvaan ki tchaak rah thenpen mmaan hinni pii lamda.’ ” (Mpk. 16:4 Neh. 9:15 Luw. 78:24)
43006032	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, Moses tih thenpen avah parvaan ki adotpiikin pemeh. Pdainu Kpa ngi naan ahin nih parvaan ki kindit thenpen ava' adotpiikin.
43006033	Isowr thenpen avah parvaan ki kurjung Mma' ava'. Ungta Mma ngi dultipaam thung ngi rinkum avah mdopiik.”
43006034	Audilli mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Kruwng mpha ktai thung ngi hava' thenpen avah mheipii chaan.”
43006035	Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya rinkum ki thenpen ava' ping. Nei kihin nih kthleng kcha' mma' avah teden rukku mpowi tham nimeh. Ungta Nei lam'mikrin kcha' mma' ava ngi teden rukku mningkraal nimeh.
43006036	Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a, tidit tah naan nih Neiya mdei dokin tinu pdainu lam'mrin chmaan tih.
43006037	Pa ava ngi Kihin nih mdotpiik dok rek mkheng avah Kihin nih kthleng chlam rah. Ungta Nei Kihin nih kthleng kcha' mma' avah teden thung rukku Neiyi kneng pthivot nimaang.
43006038	Mleiya Neiya kthina ki kuplungbin ktlow rah kurjung pmaang. Nei myuksi Mma' plungbin ava' ktlow rah parvaan ki kurjung ping.
43006039	Ungta havah Nei myuksi Pa ava' plungbin ava'. Mleiya Mma ngi mdotpiik dok rek mkheng avah Neiyi khadaat preu kdopenvei lamna' rang ki then pemeh, pdainu mqutna' nit ava' thung ngi veikhat kdoperdel lamna' rang ki then.
43006040	Ungta havah Nei myuksi Mma' plungbin ava'. Mleiya Chapa ava' mmik ki dei chda ungta lamkrin kcha' khimkhei rekki ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah kphang chrah. Ungta Neiyi mqutna' nit ava' thung ngi mmah perdel nikdi'.”
43006041	‘Neiya parvaan ki kurjung thenpen ava' ping’, mdodit leiyi, Jihudi rekki Mma' leiyi, nurnur kdi ngi kerteenna' lamda.
43006042	Ungta mmaan nih the lamda: “Havah neen nih mnuh le' mpa tedehksaan Joseph chapa Jisu ava' pemeh mow? Mdittu' taluhep pih Mma ngi, ‘Neiya parvaan ki kurjung ping’, mdoditto'?”
43006043	Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi arthaangda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih asingreelin thung ngi nurnur kdi ngi kerteen maan.
43006044	Nei myuksi Pa ava ngi mdoqen thuh kma'don leh kuwkhat leh ruk Nei kihin nih thleng pchaang nimeh. Ungta Neiyi mma' avah mqutna' nit ava' thung ngi perdel nikdi'.
43006045	Havah Khulpu rek laika thung ngi tikjit ksa dok: ‘Ungta mmaan mkheng avah Isowr rih kpurchuk dok rah.’ (Is. 54:13) Avaleiyi, ava' karja dok kcha' ungta Pa ava' hinki kurchuk dok kcha' mii khimkheiyi Nei kihin nih karva kcha'lam.
43006046	Isowr tu' ka'am Mma' daat kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi Pa avah mmik ki deidok mlai. Mma' daat chrel lih Pa avah mmik ki mdodeh chaak.
43006047	Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah Nei kihin nih lamkrin kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah mthlowi chaak a.
43006048	Neiya rinkum ki thenpen ava' ping.
43006049	Naan apa'leen nih paamkbiik laiyi manna cha lamda ungta diyou chlamda.
43006050	Havah parvaan ki kurjung thenpen ava'. Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih ava' thungki kcha chrah, ungta diyou nimeh.
43006051	Neiya parvaan ki kurjung kring thenpen ava' ping. Kuwmiikhat tih hava' thungki thenpen mchaak chaak bih, mmah ktlangknai kmah ngi kring chrah. Ungta Neiyi kdopiik rang thenpen avah dultipaam rinkum ki thenni kdopiik rang Neiki kdaksa ava'.”
43006052	Avaleiyi, Jihudi rekki msingreelin thung ngi kalraina' lamda. “Mleiya taluhep pih hava' mii ava ngi mdaksa avah neen nthenni tchaak raanni mikpiidaat raanno,” dilamda?
43006053	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Naan nih Mii Chapa daksa chada ungta Mma' hii ava' aneek chaakmaan bih naan athung inni kring ka'am pemeh.
43006054	Nei kdaksa kcha kcha' ungta Nei kihii knee kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah mthlowi chaak a. Ungta Neiyi mqutna' nit ava' thung ngi mmah perdel nikdi'.
43006055	Mleiya Nei kdaksa avah tchaak rangkat thendam ungta kihii avah teneek rangkat ava'.
43006056	Nei kdaksa kcha kcha' ungta Nei kihii knee kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei kthung ngi ka'am a ungta mma' thung ngi Neiya ka'am ping.
43006057	Kring Pa ava ngi, Neiya myuksida ungta Neiyi Pa ava' amleiyi ring nuh. Ava' heppi Nei makcha kcha' mma' ava ngi trin rukka Nei ka'am leiyi, kring chrah.
43006058	Havah parvaan ki kurjung thenpen ava'. Naan apa 'leenni paamkbiik laiyi manna chalam thida mdiyow chaakin ava'lu pemeh. Hava' thenpen kcha kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kmah kring chrah.”
43006059	Hava' dow khimkhei rek avah Mma ngi Kapernaum ki Jihudi rek sinegog thuh mpurchuh lam thung ngi mdothe.
43006060	Msikhu knempok rekki hava' marjaakin thungta, ‘havah tarjaak pchaanmah pau a, kuw ngi kdeipindih pchaang daat rang’? dilamda.
43006061	Jisu ngi Msikhu rekki ava'leiyi mkerteenna' nurnur inna tidit muplungril lih mdeh thungta, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava ngi atulut inna?
43006062	Mdittu' naan nih Mii Chapa avah choduh ki ma'amna' mun thah muhungkal amikin nih adeh thung innu talu dinaandi o?
43006063	Pthla ava ngi rinkum avah mdopiik pdainu daksa ngi dow khatleh mdotan chaak rah ka'am pemeh. Neiyi naan ahin nih kdothe pauna rek avah pthla ungta mmaan avah rinkum.
43006064	Pdainu arlak inni lamkrin kma' aangqhe ka'am a.” Mleiya mupqhun daat ki Jisu ngi lamkrin kma' rek mmaan avah kuwle ungta kuw ngi Mmah kyur chrang tidit avah mdodeh dok ksa.
43006065	Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahin nih kthe a. Kpa ngi mma' hinni mdopiik dok kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi Nei kihin nih thleng pchaang nimeh.”
43006066	Mpha ava' ki kupqhun nih Msikhu rek knempok ki dil mkerheel chlamda ungta Mma' tu' veikhat chetsap lammeh.
43006067	Audilli Jisu ngi sowm lei'knii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Naan rukka tsun chaak rah abin inna?”
43006068	Audilli Simon Pitar rih arthaangda: “Kruwng, neenna kuw hinni sundaat nikaanli? Nang ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum ki pauna rek adothlowi a.
43006069	Ungta neen nih, Nang nga Kindit Isowr Chapa, Mesaiah ava' ptih, tidit lamkrin chaak inna ungta kdeh chaak inna.”
43006070	Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Sowm lei'knii rek naan avah Neiyi adokokcholin ungta arlakin ki khat tah tarnampii khat kurthuwk kcha' a.”
43006071	Mma ngi havah Kerioth ki Simon chapa Judas leiyi, mdothe. Mleiya mmah sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat kurthuwk thida mma ngi Mma' avah kyur chbei rah.
43007001	Hava'le' dilli Jisu a Galily thah vada. Mleiya Jihudi rekki ke'eyou rang ngi mdothlaamin leiyi, Mma ngi Judia paam thung ngu korlon nuwm pemeh.
43007002	'Tunnu Jihudi rekki buw'inn ki tmaalna' avah naitek chda.
43007003	Avaleiyi, mnaupa leh ngi Mhin nih the lamda: “Mmun hava' ama rang ngi Judia paam thah vangsun dok. Mleiya asikhu rek rukku Nang ngi adotlot nong rek avah mmikin nih adei chlamso.
43007004	Mleiya mdak mthina ngi mii rek hinni tkurphuwn rah kngei kcha' kuwkhat leh ngi tuprut tih dow khatleh mdotlotlu pemeh. Nang ngi hava' dow rek avah atlot cheentung ngi, dultipaam thuh adak athina ikpandang cha'.”
43007005	Mleiya mnaupa le' kpha rukku Mhin nih lam'mdorin chaakin pemeh.
43007006	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiki mpha arvang mlai. Pdainu naanki mpha avah mpha ktai thung ngi ka'am tlit daat.
43007007	Dultimii ngi naanna ahal pchaang inmeh, pdainu Neiyi dultipaam thungki nong rek avah kqha pemeh tidit ki rinpaumin kdopiik leiyi, ava ngi Neiya mdotahal chaak lam.
43007008	Naanna hava' kmaal ava' thung ngi hangin, Neiya hava' kmaal ava' thung ngu hangkhot nimaang. Mleiya Neiki mpha avah kurkhum mlai.”
43007009	Mma ngi hava' pauna avah mmaan hinni mthe dok dilli, mdakka Galily paam thung ngi ka'am chdaat.
43007010	Pdainu mnaupa leh’ mahan dokin dilli, Mma' rukka kmaal ava' thung ngi hangda. Pdainu Mma ngi kurphuwng vah hang meh, tuprut heiyi hangda.
43007011	Audilli Jihudi rekki kmaal ava' thung ngi, ‘Mmah tu'uwng thangda,’ dilamda, thlaam lamda.
43007012	Ungta miipii rekki Mma' leiyi, kdung ngi kerteenna' nurnur lamda. Mleiya aangqhe ngi, ‘Mmah miikqha’, dilamda ungta morson rekki, ‘Immeh, anto' mda Mma ngi mii rek mdohuwn chaakbeh’, dilamda.
43007013	Anto'daat yoso Jihudi rek mdoqit chaakin leiyi, kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' leiyi, kandang ngi dow khatleh the pchaang lammeh.
43007014	'Tunnu kmaal avah mqimmlai mphaak arlaan nih, Jisu ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi hangda purchuk lamda.
43007015	Ungta Jihudi rekka ngak chlamda. “Taluhep pih kurchuk liit kma'pa mii hava ngi jiik rek avah mdodeh pindit pchaanno,” dilamda?
43007016	Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Nei kihin ki tkurchuhna' avah Nei kdow pemeh pdainu Nei myuksi Mma'dow.
43007017	Kuwmiikhat tih Mma' plungbin ktlow nuwm ma'am bih, mma ngi tkurchuhna' avah kdei chrah. Mma ngi tkurchuhna' avah Isowr hinki mow, mditmata Nei kdobin nih kdothe mow tidit avah kdei chrah.
43007018	Mdak thungki ngi kpau mma' ava ngi mthina ki mkonlorna' mdothlaam chaak. Pdainu Mma' arjuksi khat ava' konlorna' kthlaam kcha' Mma' avah kindit ungta Mma' thung ngi rinkinditmana' ammeh.
43007019	Moses tih naan ahin nih nowlam avah adotpiikin kmah? Ungta naan khadaat rukku nowlam avah pqowi maantih kmah? Taluleiyi naan nih Neiya mke'eyou rang ngi atthlaam inna?”
43007020	Mii rekki arthaang lamda ungta the lamda: “Nang nga tarnam khat athlowi chaak a. Kuw ngi Nang nga ake'eyou rah atthlaam a?”
43007021	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda:” Neiyi nong khat ktlotcheu, naan akheng inna ngakin tinu.
43007022	Avaleiyi, Moses tih naan ahin nih vuntreenna' avah adotpiikin. Havah Moses hinki pemeh pdainu apa'leen hinki. Ungta naan nih tkarngatnit tih miikhat avah mvun reenin tinu.
43007023	Moses nowlam ava' adopkui mana' raan ki thenni tkarngatnit tih miikhat tih vuntreenna' avah arlaang chda. Mdittu', Neiyi tkarngatnit tih miikhat changkarngam mih kdopdam deek leivah, taluleiyi naan nih Nei k'leen nih aplungin kthi a?
43007024	Naan nih mikmai suwda pau pindit maan. Pdainu rinkindit ki paupinditna' ava ngi pau apinditin.”
43007025	Audilli Jerusalem ki mii aangqhe rekki the lamda: “Havah mmaan nih mdo'eyow raanni mdothlaamin Mma' ava' pemeh mow?
43007026	Pdainu asuwn, Mma ngi kurphuwng ngi pauda ungta mmaan nih dow khatleh ruk Mhin nih the pchaang lam mda. Paamkpu rekki havah Mesaiah ava'kat tidit mdeh daatin mow?
43007027	Neen nih hava' mii avah tva'ki tidit tah ndehn. Pdainu Mesaiah ava' murjun thung ngu kuwkhat leh ngi Mmah tva'ki kthuwk tidit dei nimeh.”
43007028	Audilli luwbuk'inn thuh Jisu ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Naan nih Neiya mdeiyin tih ungta tva'ki kthuwk ping tidit ruk adotedehn, anto'daat yoso Neiya kdobin nih kurjung pmaang. Pdainu Naan nih adodeh maan, Nei myuksi Mma' avah kindit.
43007029	Ungta Neiyi Mma' avah kdeh, tidit tah Neiya Mma' hinki ping ungta Mma ngi Neiya mdoyuktsi.”
43007030	Audilli mmaan nih Mma' kokyowng rang ngi owng lamda pdainu kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' 'leenni khut khiing pchaang lammeh. Mleiya Mma' ki mpha avah veimlai.
43007031	Ungta mii meknem mih Mhin nih lam'rin chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mesaiah murjun thung vah hava' mii ava ngi mdotlot kkheel lih titinna' rek avah ktlow rang mow?”
43007032	Audilli miipii rekki Mma' leiyi, mkerteenna' inna tidit avah Pharisy rekki arja lamda. Mthungta Pharisy rekle' thimpu kenreel rekki Mma' kokyowng rah koprol rek heipthla lamda.
43007033	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya mpha mruk ki thenni a'amqhi thiin nikdon, Nei myuksi Mma' hinni hung chnikdi'.’
43007034	Naan nih Neiya mthlaam naandi' pdainu naan nih Neiya mdei nimaan tih ungta Nei ka'amna' mun ava' thung ngu naanna arhung pchaang nimaan tih.”
43007035	Audilli Jihudi rekki msingreelin thung ngi the lamda: “Mma ngi tva thah mche rangna, neen nih tedeh pchaanmah rangplih? Mma ngi kerjeida ka'am ter kcha' Grik mii rek arlak ki chetda Grik mii rek mpurchuh chaak rangna ava'mow?
43007036	Taluhep pih, ‘Naan nih Neiya mthlaam naandi' pdainu naan nih Neiya mdei nimaan tih ungta Nei ka'amna' mun ava' thung ngu naanna arhung pchaang nimaan tih,’ dida, mdothe avah talu mdothena o?”
43007037	Kmaal ava' ki mqutna' nit klinsi ava' nit tih Jisu ngi ripda ungta owngda hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat mning kakraal ma'am cheentung ngi, Nei kihin nih arvaso rang ngi anee chso.
43007038	Kchiir laika ngi mdothe heppi, Nei kihin nih lamkrin kcha' mma' avah muplungril thungki kringdii kreng ngi kluwng rah,” dida.
43007039	Pdainu Mma ngi havah Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rekki mdo’arlaan bei chaak raan Pthla ava'leiyi mdothe. Mleiya Pthla Kchiir avah piidok mlai, mleiya Jisu avah ponlor dok mlai.
43007040	Avaleiyi, miipii rek meknem mih hava' mdothe marjaakin thungta, ‘kindit kat tih havah khulpu ava' amda’, dilamda.
43007041	Morson rekki the lamda: “Havah Mesaiah ava',” pdainu aangqhe rekki, ‘Khrista avah Galily ki kthuwk rangmuh’? dilamda.
43007042	Kchiir laika ngi mdothe, ‘Mesaiah avah David amna' Bethlehem khuwpii thung ngi David suruwl thungki kthuwk rah mdodit pda’, dilamda?
43007043	Mthungta Mma' leiyi, mii rek arlak ki lopkenqhenna' khat thuwkda.
43007044	Ungta mii aangqhe rekki Mmah kyowng nuwm lamda, pdainu kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' 'leenni khut khiing lammeh.
43007045	Audilli koprol rek avah thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rek hinni vangkerheel lamda. Ungta mmaan nih, ‘taluleiyi naan nih Mmah arvanqhi maantih,’ dilamda?
43007046	Koprol rek ava ngi arthaang lamda: “Teden rukku kuwkhat leh ngi hava' mii ava' pau heppi kpau ammeh.”
43007047	Avaleiyi, Pharisy rekki arthaang lamda: “Naan rukka Mma ngi atuhuwn chaakin neh?
43007048	Naan nih paamkpu rek mditmata Pharisy rekki Mma' hinni lammdorin chaakin adeh kchown mow?
43007049	Pdainu nowlam kdei kma' hava' miipii rek avah kuhu kurbuk kcha'lam a.”
43007050	Jaan nih Jisu hinni kthleng Nikodimas, mmaan arlak ki khat ava ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda:
43007051	“Neenki nowlam ava ngi miikhat avah rukri ngi mhin ki karjajap mlaiyi ungta talu mtlot tidit kdei kmah ngi paukpindit khot rang mow?”
43007052	Mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang rukka Galily paam ki ptimow? Athlaam rang ngi asuw tidit tah Galily paam ki khulpu kthuwk ka'am pemeh.”
43007053	Ungta mii khimkheiya, mi'inn mi'inn thah sunter chlamda.
43008001	Pdainu Jisu ngi kruwn lown thah hangda.
43008002	Ungta Mma ngi jiingsun kparma ngi luwbuk'inn thah veikhat thleng nowlda. Ungta mii mkheng ngah Mma' hinni thleng lamda ungta mma ngi ko'ong thida mii rek avah purchuk lamda.
43008003	Ungta nowlam chukpu rekle' Pharisy rekki lowsangkqhi 'leenni mdokyownin snu khat avah Mma' hinni arheiqhi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih snu avah mmalai inni pkong lamda.
43008004	Mmaan nih Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Chukpu hava' snu avah lowsang mqhimeek kat arlaan nih, mdokyownin.
43008005	'Tunnu nowlam dilkqowiyi, Moses vah havalu hep daat avah lung ngi tedeenyow rah tidit ki paupiik mdotpiikin. Pdainu Nangvah talu aditta,” dilamda?
43008006	Havah mmaan nih Mma' mdopsulna' raan ki thenni mdotheen. Pdainu Jisu ngi mmaan dothe karja kma' heppi kuwnda dulti leenni mkhutchal lih kjitda.
43008007	Mmaan nih kornowl lih Mhin nih mkheel mkheelin thungta, Mma ngi mthina kindingda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan arlakin ki pnu kervei liit kma' mma' ava ngi snu avah rukrirep pih adeengso.”
43008008	Ungta Mma ngi veikhat kuwn nowlda dulti 'leenni kjitda.
43008009	Audilli ava' karja rek mmaan ava ngi mma' mma' ki muplungril inni mkerdeh chaakin dilkqowiyi, kversi ki kupqhun nih mqutna'dek kpha ngi khatkhat tih vanthuwk chlamda. Ungta mmalai inni krip snu avale' Jisu mthina daat chrel mapthi lamda.
43008010	Ungta Jisu ngi mkarkha thungta snu ava' kma'don mii morson khatleh ka'am kma' mdeh thungta, Mma ngi snu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Snu tu'uwng lamda nang akokyowng rekka? Kuwkhat leh ngi nang nga apsul lam meh mow?”
43008011	Ungta snu ava ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng, kuwkhat leh am lammeh,” Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei rukku apsul maang. Isun cha' ungta pnu lamchi' veikhat arveima'.”
43008012	Audilli Jisu ngi veikhat mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya dultipaam ki mar'aang ava' ping. Nei kdil kqowi kcha' mma' ava ngi kjiingnu thung ngi chet nimeh, pdainu rinkum ki mar'aang avah mma ngi kthlowi chrah,” dida.
43008013	Avaleiyi, Pharisy rekki Mhin nih the lamda: “Nang nga athina ngi adaksa ki rinpaumin apiik chaak a. Avaleiyi, Nang arinpaumin avah kindit ava' pemeh.”
43008014	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi kthina ki rinpaumin pii chdaat yow ringngi Neiki krinpaumin avah kindit. Mleiya Neiyi, Neiya tva'ki kthuwk ping ungta tva thah qowi nikdi tidit avah kdeh. Pdainu naan nih Neiya tva'ki kthuwk ping ungta tva thah qowi nikdi tidit avah dei maantih.
43008015	Naanna daksa ‘lam thah pau pinditin tinu pdainu Neiya kuwkhat ruk pau pindit maang.
43008016	Ungta Neiyi paukpindit bih, Nei kpaupindit avah kindit. Mleiya Neiya kthina daat pmaang pdainu Nei myuksi Kpa ava' tung ping.
43008017	Ungta naan anowlamin thung rukku ‘Mii 'knii dopiik rinpaumin avah kindit, dida mdokjit dok.
43008018	Neiya kthina ki rinpaumin kpii kcha' khat ping. Ungta Nei myuksi Pa ava ngi Neiki krinpaumin avah mdopiik.”
43008019	Audilli mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Apa a tva thah ka'am?” Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Naan nih Nei ruk, Kpa ruk mdei maantih. Naan nih Nei atedeh chaak tlaangin bih, Kpa rukka adodeh chaak tlaang raanna.”
43008020	Jisu ngi luwbuk'inn thung ngi mpurchuh meek lam chunni, hava' pau rek avah sumbuwrinn aang ngi mdothe. Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' 'leenni khut khiing lammeh. Mleiya Mma' ki mpha avah veimlai.
43008021	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni veikhat the nowlda: “Neiya sun chnikdi' ungta naan nih Neiya mthlaamnaan. Ungta naanna apnuwn thung ngi diyou chnaandi' ungta Nei kchena' ava' thung ngu naanna thleng pchaang nimaan tih.”
43008022	Avaleiyi, Jihudi rekki the lamda: “Hava' mdothe avah mthina mker'eyow chaak rangna ava' mow? ‘Nei kchena' thung ngu naanna thleng pchaang nimaan tih,’ midotidit inna?”
43008023	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanna kurduh kiin ptih. Neiya karthak ki ping. Naanna hava' dultipaam thung kiin ptih. Neiya hava' dultipaam ki pmaang.
43008024	Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahin nih, ‘Naanna apnuwn thung ngi diyou chnaandi', kdodit. Mleiya naan nih Nei avah Mma' tidit lam'arin chaak maanbi, naanna apnuwn thung ngi diyou chnaandi',” dida.
43008025	Audilli mmaan nih Mma' hinni the lamda: “Nang nga kuw ptih?” Ungta Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih ahinin nih kdothe tlit ava' ping.
43008026	Neiyi naan aleiyi dow knempok kdothe rah ka'am ungta pau kdopindit rah ka'am, pdainu Nei myuksi Mma' avah kindit. Ungta Neiyi dultipaam thung ngi Mma' hinki kdo'arjaak dow rek ava' kdothe.”
43008027	Mma ngi Pa ava' ki mlei mmaan hinni mdothe avah mmaan vah deipindih lam mda.
43008028	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Mii Chapa avah akhiin chaakin thungrow ngi naan nih Nei avah Mma' tidit deirow naandi'. Ungta Neiyi kthina thungki ngi dow khatleh tlowmaang pdainu Kpa ngi mdotpurchuh heppi, Neiyi hava'le' avah kdothe.
43008029	Ungta Nei myuksi Mma' avah Nei kihin nih ka'am. Kpa ngi Neiya kthina ngi mmameh. Mleiya Neiyi mpha ktai thung ngi Mma' plung ngamna' chrel daat kdotlot chaak.”
43008030	Mma ngi hava' pauna rek mthe thungta mii knempok ki Mma' hinni lam'rin chlamda.
43008031	Audilli Jisu ngi mhin nih lamkrin kcha' Jihudi rek hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Nei kpauthe thuh a'am chaak tlitin bih, dakkat tih naanna Nei ksikhu rekin ptih.
43008032	Ungta naan nih kindit avah dei chnaandi' ungta kindit ava ngi naanna ayukpo'ol chraan.”
43008033	Mmaan nih Mhin nih arthaang lamda: “Neenna Abraham suruwl thungki inping ungta neenna kuwkhat leh hinni suwk ki arvang amvot maanring. Taluhep pih Nang ngi, ‘Naanna ol chnaandi' atidit inna?”
43008034	Jisu ngi mmaan nah arthaang lamda: “Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya kuwku yoso pnu kervei kcha' mma' ava ngi pnu suwk'owr kurthuwk kcha' a.
43008035	Ungta suwk'owr ava ngi inn ava' thah ktlangknai kmah ka'amlu pemeh. Pdainu Chapa avah ktlangknai kmah inn ava' thung ngi ka'amlu.
43008036	Avaleiyi, Chapa ava ngi naanna atpo'ol chaakin bih, naanna dodak kat tih ol chnaandi'.
43008037	Neiyi naan avah Abraham suruwl thungki inptih tidit kdeh. Pdainu naan athung inni Nei kpauna amna' rah mun ma'amma leiyi, naan nih Neiya mke'eyou rang ngi adotthlaamin.
43008038	Neiya Kpa hinki kmik ki kdodeh ava ngi kpau ping ungta naan rukka a'paan hinki amikin nih adodehn ava ngi adotlotin.”
43008039	Mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta Mhin nih the lamda: “Abraham avah neen kpa.” Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Abraham nau rek akurthuh innu, naan nih Abraham nongtlot rek ava' tlow raan imptih.
43008040	Pdainu Isowr hinki, kdo'arjaak kindit ava' ahinin nih akthepiikin Nei avah naan nih mke'eyou rang ngi mthlaamin tinu. Ava'lu avah Abraham vah mdotlot pemeh.
43008041	Naanna a'paan dotlot ava' adotlotin.” Audilli mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Neenna chlamin pmaan ring, K'paan khat ka'am, avah Isowr.”
43008042	Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Isowr avah A'paan mkurthuh tlaang bih, naan nih Neiya vonsat mlow raan imptih. Mleiya Neiya Isowr hinki thuwknu dultipaam thung ngi kurjung ping. Neiya Nei kuplungbin nih kurjung pmaang pdainu Mma ngi mdoyuktsi.
43008043	Taluleiyi naan nih Nei kpauthe avah deipindih maanti o? Mleiya naan nih Nei kpauna avah ado'arjaak pchaanin pemeh.
43008044	Naanna a'paan tarnampii ava' hinkiin ptih. Ungta naan nih a'paan nih kdung ngi mdongei ava' totlot rah adobinin. Mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih mmah miike'eyou ungta kindit thung ngi mmah ka'am pemeh. Mleiya mma' thung ngi kindit avah ka'am pemeh. Ungta pleimnee thung ngi mma ngi mdaksa thungki ngi kpau kcha'lu. Mleiya mmah pleiknei ungta pleiknei ki mpa.
43008045	Ungta Neiyi ahinin nih kindit ava' kdothe leiyi, naan nih Neiya lam'mrin chmaan tih.
43008046	Arlakin ki kuwn pti, Nei pnu kervei mukpurthuh a? Ungta Neiyi kindit ava' ktheu, taluleiyi naan nih Neiya lam'mrin chmaan tih?
43008047	Isowr hinki Mma' ava ngi Isowr pauna rek avah mdo'arjaak. Naanna ava' arja maantih, mleiya naanna Isowr hinkiin ptipmeh.”
43008048	Audilli Jihudi rekki arthaang lamda ungta Mhin nih the lamda: “Neen nih, ‘Nang nga Samaria ki mii ptih ungta ram arve a,’ kdoditin avah anto'kat tah?”
43008049	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiya ram arvei maang. Pdainu Neiyi Kpa avah kdokyat chaak ungta naannu Neiya makyat chmaan tih.
43008050	Ungta Neiya kthina ki kkonlor chaakna' rah thlaammaang. Kthlaam kcha' ungta kpindit kcha' khat ka'am.
43008051	Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Kuwmiikhat tih, Nei kpauna mopqowi chaak bih, mma ngi teden rukku kdiyou tidit avah mmik ki deiliit nimeh.”
43008052	Audilli Jihudi rekki Mhin nih the lamda: “'Tunnu neen nih, Nang nga tarnam athlowi a tidit kdehn a. Mleiya Abraham ruk ungta khulpu rek rukka kdiyou kcha'lam. Pdainu nangvah, ‘kuwmiikhat tih Nei kpauna mopqowi chaak bih, mma ngi teden rukku kdiyou tidit avah pertem liit nimeh’ aditta.
43008053	Nang nga neen k'paan Abraham kdiyou kcha' ava' hinni klinbet ptimow? Ungta khulpu rek rukka kdiyou lam. Nang nga athina vah kuw ping ngi kirdi kcha' ptil lih?”
43008054	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi kthina ngi kokponlor chaak bih, Nei kokponlor chaakna' avah doksi pemeh. Pdainu Nei mokponlor kcha' khat avah naan nih naanki Isowr pii'i adoditin avah, Kpa ava'.
43008055	Naan nih Mmah deipindih mlai inptih pdainu Neivah kdehpindit chaak. Ungta Neiyi Mma' avah deipindih maang kdit bih, Nei rukka naan ahep inni pleiknei chrang ping. Pdainu Neiyi Mmah kdeh ungta Mma' pauna avah Neiyi kdopqowi.
43008056	Naan a'paan Abraham mih Neiki knit avah tedeh rah mdobin chaak ki kanpa chda ungta mma ngi mmik ki tedeh ruk mdeh chaak dok ungta kanpa dok kcha'.”
43008057	Audilli Jihudi rekki Mhin nih the lamda: “Nang nga kum somparnga kpha mlai ptih ungta ava ngi Abraham avah amik ki adodeh?”
43008058	Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi mkindit kat akthepiik inna, Abraham amduduh ngi Neiya ka'am dok ping.”
43008059	Audilli mmaan nih Mma' mdodeenna' raan ki lung chomsap lamda, pdainu Jisu a kordowl chda. Ungta luwbuk'inn thungki thuwkda mmaan arlak ki luwt dok thida anto' sun chda.
43009001	Ungta Jisu ngi anto' mvan chaakna ngi, mqou daat ki mmikktot kcha' miikhat deida.
43009002	Ungta Msikhu rekki Mhin nih kheel chlamda: “Rabbi hava' mmikktot tih kqou mii avah mmii ava' pnu arvemow, mnuhmpa pnu arve leiki o?”
43009003	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Hava' mii ava ngi pnu mdo'arvelei pemeh ungta mnuhmpa pnu arvelei ruk pemeh. Pdainu Isowr nong rek avah mma' hinni mkandanna' ranglei.
43009004	Khu mvaardaat arlaan nih Nei myuksi Mma' nong rek avah Neiyi kdotlot rah. Mleiya kuwkhat leh ngi nong mdosuk pchaanmana' jaan avah karvang chrah.
43009005	Neiyi dultipaam thung ngi ka'am khimkhei thung ngi, Neiya dultipaam ki mar'aang ava' ping.”
43009006	Mma ngi hava' dow khimkhei mthe dok le' dulti thah ptil pthotda, ptil lih bul klomda. Ungta Mma ngi bul ava ngi mii ava' mik 'leenni pubul piikda.
