43009007	Ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Vang rang ngi Siloam, ‘tidit tah tapthlat dok' mdoditna', diirum ava' thung ngi alqhucha'. Mthungta mma ngi vangda ungta alqhu chda ungta mma ngi khu dei chda.”
43009008	Avaleiyi, mi'innveen rek ungta mmikktot tidit kdeiksa rekki the lamda: “Hava' mii avah ko'ong kchokda mii rek hinni kthamkqhil kcha' kchok ava' pemeh mow?”
43009009	Mii aangqhe ngi hanto'theda: “Havah mma'kat', ungta morson rekki, ‘havah mma'hep daat a’, dilamda.” Mthungta mma ngi, ‘neiya mma'kat ava' ping’, dida.
43009010	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mhin nih the lamda: “Taluhep pih amikka kahar kchada?”
43009011	Mma ngi arthaang lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Jisu mdoditin miikhat ava ngi bul klomthida kmik mpubul piikda ungta kihin nih hanto'theda: ‘Vang rang ngi Siloam diirum thung ngi alqhucha'’, mdida. Ungta neiyi vanu kulqhut chaak thungta khu kdodeh chaak.”
43009012	Audilli mmaan nih mhin nih the lamda: “Mmah tva thah kqowi?” Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiya dei maang.”
43009013	Mmaan nih Pharisy rek hinni, mduh ngi mmikktot mii avah arheiqhi lamda.
43009014	Jisu ngi bul klomda, mmikktot mdopahar piikna'nit avah tkarngatnit kurthuwkda.
43009015	Audilli Pharisy rekki taluhep pih mma ngi khu mdodeh tidit avah veikhat kheel nowl lamda. Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mma ngi kmik thung ngi bul pubulda ungta neiyi alqhunu, ungta neiyi khu kdodeh chaak.”
43009016	Avaleiyi, Pharisy aangqhe rekki the lamda: “Hava' mii avah Isowr hinki pemeh, mleiya Mma ngi tkarngatnit avah danmeh. Pdainu aangqhe rekki taluhep pih pnu kervei miikhat tih havalu tngana' nong avah ktlow pchaang rangplih?” dilamda. Ungta ava ngi marlak inni lop kenqhenna' khat thuwkda.
43009017	Mmaan nih mmikktot ava' hinni veikhat the nowl lamda: “Nang ngi amik akpaharpiik Mma' avah kuw pii aditto?” Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mmah khulpu khat.”
43009018	Pdainu Jihudi rekki mma' avah mmikktot thungki ngi khu mdodeh chaak tidit ki mlei avah, khu kdei kcha' mii ava' nuh le' mpa own lamda mkheelduhn kpha thung ngi lam'rin lammeh.
43009019	Ungta mmaan nih mmaanve hinni kheel lamda: “Havah mmikktot tih kdoplukin adoditin acha'paan avah hava' mow? Mdittu' taluhep pih khu mdodeh chaak koh?”
43009020	Mnuh le' mpa ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni the lamda: “Neenve vah havah, neen kchapa tidit tah kdehn a ungta mmah mmikktot tih kqou.
43009021	Pdainu taluhep pih khu mdeh chaak tidit tah naanve vah deimaan ring, mditmata kuw ngi mmikka mpaharpiik tidit deimaan ring. Mmah kokhop pih verimdau. Mdak akheelin mdaksa 'leenki a karthaang chdaat rah,” mmaanve ngi dida.
43009022	Mnuh le' mpa leh ngi hava' pau rek avah, Jihudi rek mdoqit chaakin leiyi, mdotheen. Mleiya Jihudi rekki mduh thah hanto' mdokolrotna' dokin: ‘Kuwmiikhat tih Mma' ava Mesaiah ava' tidit kthe thuh kcha' ma'am bih, mmah sinegog thungki teknen pthirah.’
43009023	Avaleiyi, mnuh le' mpa ngi, “Mmah kokhop pih ver'imda mdak akheelin,” mdoditin.
43009024	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mmikktot mii avah mveiknitna' own nowl lamda ungta kheelnowl lamda: “Isowr apanpaak cha', tidit tah hava' mii avah pnu kervei khat tidit tah neen nih kdehn a.”
43009025	Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiya Mma ngi pnu mdo'arve mditmata mdo'arvema avah deimaang. Pdainu neiyi kdodeh chaak khat tah, neiya kmikktot ungta 'tunnu khu kdeh chaak a.”
43009026	Audilli mmaan nih mhin nih veikhat the nowl lamda: “Mma ngi ahin nih talukat atotlot piik ungta taluhep pih amikka atpahar piikko?”
43009027	Mma ngi arthaang lamda: “Neiya adokthepiik dokin, naan nih arja chmaan tinu ava'. Taluleiyi naan nih veikhat tarjaak rah abin inna? Naan rukka Mma' sikhu rek tkurthuh chaak rah abin inna?”
43009028	Audilli mmaan nih mmah kdung ngi rai lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Nang kho a Mma' sikhu ptih, pdainu neenna Moses sikhu rekin ping.
43009029	Neen nih Moses hinni Isowr rih pau mdothe tidit tah kdehn. Pdainu hava' mii avah tva'ki kthuwk tidit neen nih dei maanring.”
43009030	Mii ava ngi arthaangda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Havah tngana' khat tah, tidit tah naan nih Mmah tva'ki kthuwk tidit dei maantih ungta Mma' vah nei kmikka mpahar piikda.
43009031	'Tunnu neen nih Isowr rih pnu kervei kcha' rekka arjaak piik meh tidit tah ndehn. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih Isowr luwkbuk cha' mkurthuh bih ungta Mma' plungbin mtlot chaak bih, Mma ngi avah mdo'arjaak piik.
43009032	Dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kuwkhat tih mmikktot tih kqou kcha' mii avah pahar piikda tidit tah tarjaak mlai.
43009033	Hava' mii ava ngi Isowr hinki mkurthuhma bih, Mma ngi dow khatleh tlow pchaang nimeh.”
43009034	Mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta mhin nih the lamda: “Nang nga aqou thung thung ngi pnu thung ngi kqou kcha' ava ngi neen mukpurchuk raan athe a?” Ungta mma' avah duwn thah knengpthi lamda.
43009035	Jisu ngi mmaan nih mma' avah duwn thah mdoknen pthi dokin avah arjada. Ungta Mma ngi mma' mkurdutqhi thungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga Isowr Chapa hinni lam'arin chaak a?”
43009036	Mma ngi arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Mma' avah kuw plih, neiyi Mma' hinni lam'kdorin chaakna' rah mheithe piikcha'.”
43009037	Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi Mma' avah amik ki adodeh chaak dok ksa ungta 'tun'tun nih nang ahin nih kpau meeksli Mma' ava'.”
43009038	Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng, neiyi lamkrin chaak a.” Ungta mma ngi Mhin nih luwbu chda.
43009039	Ungta Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Neiya paukpindit rang ki thenni hava' dultipaam thung ngi kurjung ping. Mleiya khu kdei kma' rekki khu mdodeh chaakna' rah ungta khu kdei kcha' rek mik koptot rang ngi, Neiya kurjung ping.”
43009040	Ungta mma' tu' kilqhi Pharisy aangqhe rekki hava' mdothe pauna rek avah arja lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hinni, ‘neen rukka kmikin ktotmow’ dilamda?
43009041	Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih amikin ktot akurthuh chaak tlaangin bih, pnu ado'arve chaakma tlaang raanna. Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih, ‘neenna kmikin kahar’ adit inna. Avaleiyi, naan apnu arve rekin avah ka'am tlit chdaat a.”
43010001	Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Yau'inn thurngut thung ngi kluwt kma' 'lam morson thlaamda hangkkal mma' avah kupru ungta raanqhul kupru kat ava'.
43010002	Pdainu thurngut thung ngi kluwt mma' avah yaukqhi ava'.
43010003	Mma' hinni thurngut krungpa ava ngi thurngut pvan piikda ungta yau rek ava ngi mma' krowl avah arjapindit chlamda. Ungta mma ngi myau rek avah mmiing mmiing inni own lamda ungta duwn thah qhi pthuwk lamda.
43010004	Ungta mma ngi myau rek avah duwn mupthuh doklam dilli, mma ngi mmaanduh qowida ungta yau rek ava ngi mma'dil ava' mdoqowiyin. Mleiya mmaan nih mma' krowl avah mdo'arjaak pinditin.
43010005	Ungta miiktlok khat tah qowilam nimeh ungta mma' hinkiya kchen chlam rah. Mleiya mmaan nih mal ktlei krowl avah mdodehpinditin pemeh.”
43010006	Jisu ngi havah pau tportolna' khat tih theda. Pdainu mmaan nih talu mdoditna' tidit deipindih pchaang lam mda.
43010007	Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi mmaan hinni veikhat the nowlda: “Neiyi ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Neiya yau thurngut ava' ping.
43010008	Nei kduh thah kthleng rek mkheng avah kupru rek ungta raanqhul kupru reklam. Pdainu yau rek ava ngi mmaan dothe avah arjaakpiik lammeh.
43010009	Neiya thurngut ava' ping, kuwmiikhat tih Nei ka'am leiyi, mluw chaak bih, mmah kirling chrah. Ungta mma ngi ava' thuh luwtdon ungta thuwkdon leh mmaalna' kqha mun avah kphang chrah.
43010010	Kupru rekvah mdoprutna' raan le' mdo'eyowna' raan le' mdopenvei pthina' raan ki then kma'don nih kthlenglu lam pemeh. Pdainu Neiya mmaan nih rinkum mdothlowi chaakna' raan ungta kepleet tih mdothlowi chaakna' raan ki thenni kurjung ping.
43010011	Neiya kqha yaukqhi ava' ping. Kqha yaukqhi ava ngi mrinkum avah yau rekki thenni parlaanda.
43010012	Pdainu ardaman suwk avah yaukqhi ava' pemeh ungta mma' avah yaukpupa ava' ruk pemeh. Mma ngi tkeikraang karva mdehcheu, yau rek avah mapthida kchen kcha'lu. Ungta tkeikraang ava ngi yau rek avah kyowng chlamda ungta mdorei penqhen pthipet lu.
43010013	Ardaman suwk avah kchen kcha', mleiya mmah mardaman klow kcha' ungta mma ngi yau rekki thenni tukmdosut piik pemeh.
43010014	Neiya kqha yaukqhi ava' ping. Ungta Neiyi kyau rek avah kdodeh pindit chaak lam ungta Nei kdow rek ava ngi Neiya mdotedeh pindit chaak lam.
43010015	Pa ava ngi Nei mdotedeh chaak heppi, Neiyi Pa avah kdodeh chaak, Ungta Neiyi krinkum avah kyau rekki thenni kdoparlaan chaak.
43010016	Ungta hava' yau'inn thungki kma' yau morson Neiyi kdothlowi rekki Nei kokrowl avah karja chlam rah. Ungta mmaan avah yaulop khatsap kurthuwk lamrah ungta yaukqhi khat kurthuwk lamrah.
43010017	Avaleiyi, Kpa ngi Nei vonsat mdotolow, mleiya Neiyi veikhat kdolow penlet chaakna' rah krinkum avah kdoparlaan chaak.
43010018	Kuwkhat leh ngi kihin ki mdolow pemeh pdainu Neiyi, kuplungbin nih kdoparlaan chaak. Neiyi tpiikna' ki ruhtan avah kthlowi ungta veikhat tolow penletna' ki ruhtan ruk kthlowi. Hava' paupiik avah Neiyi Kpa hinki kdo'arlaan chaak.”
43010019	Hava' pau rek avaleiyi Jihudi rek arlak ki veikhat lopkenqhenna' khat thuwk nowlda.
43010020	Ungta mmaan knempok ki the lamda: “Mmah tarnam mthlowi a ungta ka'aak kcha' a taluleiyi Mma' pauthe avah arjaak inna?”
43010021	Morson rekki the lamda: “Hava' pauna rek avah tarnam kthlowi mii ngi mdothelu pemeh. tarnam vah mmikktot mik mpahar pchaan mow?”
43010022	'Tunnu Jerusalem thung ngi tparlaan chaakna' ki kmaal ava' amda ungta mpha avah phalbi kurthuwkda.
43010023	Ungta Jisu a luwbuk'inn thungki Solomon inndulbuk, mdoditin thung ngi tlowngda.
43010024	Audilli Jihudi rekki tkhul lam thida Mhin nih the lamda: “Trek ksowt tih Nang ngi neenna plung kpelqen tlit tih mthi naandi? Nang nga Mesaiah akurthuh dakat cheentung ngi kindit tih mheithe piik dokin.”
43010025	Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Neiyi adokthe piik dokin, pdainu naan nih lam'rin chmaan tih. Neiyi Kpa miing ngi nong rek kdotlot ava ngi Neiki krinpaumin rek avah pandang chlamda.
43010026	Pdainu naan nih avah lam'rin chmaan tih, mleiya Neiyi ahinin nih kdothe dok heppi, naanna Nei kyau rek inptipmeh.
43010027	Nei kyau rekki Nei kokrowl avah mdo'arjaakin ungta Neiyi mmaan avah kdehpindit lam ungta mmaan nih kdil mdoqowi chaakin.
43010028	Ungta Neiyi mmaan hinni ktlangknai kma' rinkum kdopiik chaak lam. Ungta mmaan nah teden rukku kenvei lam nimeh ungta kuwkhat leh ngi Nei kukhut thungki mlowng lam nimeh.
43010029	Nei kihin nih mmaan mikpii kcha' Kpa avah mkheng rek hinni klinsi. Ungta kuwkhat leh rukku mmaan avah Kpa khut thungki lowng pchaang meh.
43010030	Nei le' Kpa avah khadaat inping.”
43010031	Avaleiyi, Jihudi rekki Mma' kdeeng rang ngi veikhat lung chomsap nowl lamda.
43010032	Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Neiyi Kpa hinki nong kqha knempok ki naan ahin nih atedet innu. Naan nih tva' nongkat, leiyi, lung ngi mdeeng naandi?”
43010033	Jihudi rekki arthaang lamda: “Neen nih nong kqha adotlot leiyi, adeeng inni dimaan ring, pdainu Nang ngi pthitda apau lei. Mleiya dultimii khat nang ava ngi Isowr ping akirdit lei.”
43010034	Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Neiyi kthe a: ‘Naanna isowr rekin ptih,’ dida, (Luw. 82:6) naanki anowlamin thung ngi mdokjit pda?
43010035	Mma ngi Isowr pauna arjukna' rek avah isowr rek, mdit bih. Ungta Laikajiik avah kertlei pchaang nimeh.
43010036	Neiyi, ‘Neiya Isowr Chapa ping kdodit leiyi, naan nih, Pa ava ngi penjeda dultipaam thung ngi mdo'arjuk pthlat dok Mma' avah pthitda kpau, adit inna?
43010037	Neiyi Kpa nong rek ava' ktlotma cheentung ngi lam'mrin maan.
43010038	Pdainu Neiyi ktlot cheentung ngi, Nei lam'mrin cha' myown tih nong rek avah lam'arin chaan. Mleiya Pa avah Nei kihin nih ka'am ungta Neiya Mma' hinni ka'am ping tidit adodehna' raan ungta lam adorin chaakna' raan,” dida.
43010039	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mdokyownna' raan ki thenni veikhat thlaam nowl lamda. Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan khut thungki kerthlet chda.
43010040	Ungta Mma ngi veikhat, choduh Johon nih dii mdopluwna' Jordon kreng raalpha ki mmun thah chetda ungta Mma ngi ava' thuh amda.
43010041	Ungta mii knempok Mhin nih thlengda ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Johon nih tngana' khatleh tlowmeh pdainu hava' mii ava'leiyi Johon nih mdothe dow mkheng avah mkindit kat ava',” dilamda.
43010042	Ungta mii knempok ki ava' thuh Mma' hinni lam'rin chlamda.
43011001	'Tunnu Mary le' mu'unuh Martha amna' khuwpii Bethany thungki mmiing Lajaras, tidit miikhat avah kowida.
43011002	Hava' Mary avah Kruwng ava' hinni mikrimkdi reidii pubul thida msam mih mkhuh kuknuwl piik ava'. Ungta kkowi avah mma' naupa Lajaras.
43011003	Avaleiyi, mu'unuh le' knii ngi Mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Kruwng, asuw o! Nang ngi von'adopsat chaak mma' avah kowi chda,” dida, kthe rah mii heipthlada.
43011004	Ungta Jisu ngi ava' marjaak thungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Hava' kkowi avah mdiyowna' rang ki pemeh, pdainu Isowr konlorna' rang ki then. Mleiya Isowr Chapa avah ava' thung ngi konlor kcha' krow.”
43011005	'Tunnu Jisu ngi Martha le' mnaunuh Mary ungta Lajaras avah vonsat mdolow chaak lam.
43011006	Jisu ngi mmah kkowi kcha' a tidit marjaak dilli, Mma ngi ma'amna' mmun ava' thung ngi nii'knii nii tuwngda.
43011007	Audilli Mma ngi Msikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “Neen nih veikhat Judia paam thah junowl inche.”
43011008	Sikhu rek ava ngi Mhin nih the lamda: “Rabbi, 'tunkat tih Jihudi rekki lung ngi akdeeng rang ngi adotthlaam lam. Avah Nangvah veikhat ava' thah kju rah athe nowl a?”
43011009	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Kunthun niikhat thung vah qhang sowm lei'knii ka'am pemeh mow? Kuwmiikhat tih kunthun nih mche bih, mma ngi khuhsiir pirthi nimeh. Mleiya mma ngi hava' dultipaam ki mar'aang avah mdodeh.
43011010	Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih jaan nih mche bih, mma ngi khuhsiir kpirthi rah. Mleiya mma' thung ngi mar'aang ka'am pemeh,” dida.
43011011	Hava'le', ava' mthe dok dilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naplapin Lajaras avah ki'iip dok kcha' a. Pdainu Neiyi mma' kperdel rah vanikdi'.”
43011012	Audilli Msikhu rekki the lamda: “Kruwng, mma ngi ki'iip kcha' mkurthuh bih, dam chrang imda.”
43011013	Pdainu Jisu vah mdiyow chaak dok ava' mdothena'. Ungta mmaan dobin vah iipda karnga mdothena' pakda, mdoditin.
43011014	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni kurphuwng ngi: “Lajaras tah kdiyou kcha’ a.
43011015	Ungta naan athenni, Neiyi ava' thuh ka'amma leiyi, kanpa kcha' ping. Mleiya havah naan nih lam'adotrin chaakna', raan ki then. Anto'daat yoso 'leen neen nih mma' phaanche,” dida.
43011016	Audilli kinphiir mdoditin Thomas tih mmiqhi, sikhu rek hinni hanto'theda: “'Leen, neen rukka mma' tu' tidiyow sapna' raan, vaanche'” dida.
43011017	Ungta Jisu meheitlun thungta, mma' avah thlaan thuh mdo'alruwlnaan nii plii mphaak dok a tidit avah Mna ngi deida,
43011018	'Tunnu Bethany avah Jerusalem tungngu karnai tek lam, marlakin avah kilomitar kdum arveel daat rah.
43011019	Ungta Jihudi mii knempok ki Martha le' Mary hinni, mnau'paan leiyi, plungngam kpii chrah thlengpok lamda.
43011020	Audilli Martha ngi Jisu karva a tidit marjaak daat le' Mma' kduh rah heithuwkda. Pdainu Mary a inn thung ngi kok'ong chdaat.
43011021	Audilli Martha ngi Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi hava' thuh a'am daat tlaang bih, knaupa avah mdiyowma rangnga!
43011022	Pdainu 'tun kpha rukku, talutalu yoso, Nang ngi adoqhil avah Isowr rih akpii rah tidit neiyi kdeh.”
43011023	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Anaupa avah kerdel chdaat rah.”
43011024	Martha ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi mma' avah mqutna' nit ki trin kerheelna' nit ava' thung ngi kerdel rah, tidit tah kdeh.”
43011025	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiya kring kerheel ungta rinkum ava' ping. Nei lam'mikrin kcha' mma' ava ngi diyou dok chdaat yoso kring chdaat rah.
43011026	Ungta kuwku yoso kring kcha' ungta kihin nih lamkrin kcha' mma' avah teden rukku diyou nimeh. Nang ngi havah lam'arin chaak a?”
43011027	Mma ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ou Kruwng, neiyi lamkrin chaak a tidit tah Nang nga dultipaam thung ngi kurjung rang Isowr Chapa, Mesaiah ptih.”
43011028	Ungta mma ngi anto ngi ava' mthe dok le' vangluwtda mnaunuh Mary avah tuprut tih ownda, ‘Chukpu a arva dokda, nang nga ato'own a, dida.
43011029	Ungta mma ngi ava' marjaak daat le' rip tengda Mma' avah heiphada.
43011030	'Tunnu Jisu a khu thung ngi arvang luwt mlai. Mleiya Martha ngi mdoheidutna' mmun ava' thung ngi ka'am chdaat.
43011031	Inn thung ngi Mary plungngam piida ka'am daat Jihudi rekki Mary ngi koknot tih ripda mvanthuh mdehn thungta mdil qowi lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Thlaan thah kqap rah kvanowl a.”
43011032	Audilli Mary ngi Jisu amna' merhei phaak thungta mma ngi Jisu ka'am daat ava' deida. Mma ngi Mkhuh ther rih tluw chda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi hava' thuh a'amdaat tlaang bih, knaupa avah mdiyowma rangnga!
43011033	Jisu ngi mma' kqap ungta Jihudi rek kqap mdeh thungta, Mma ngi kdung ngi muplung pkhamda ungta yada.
43011034	Ungta Mma ngi tva'thungda ado'alruwl naanna?” dida. Mmaan nih Mhin nih the lamda: “Kruwng arva rah arheisuw!”
43011035	Jisu qapda.
43011036	Audilli Jihudi rekki the lamda: “Asuwn, Mma ngi tya thuh vonmapsat chaak daat a.”
43011037	Ungta mmaan aangqhe ngi the lamda: “Hava' mmikktot mikkpahar pchaang ava' vah hava' mii ava' rukka mdiyow mana’ tlow pchaang meh mow?”
43011038	Jisu ngi mdaksa thung ngi kdung ngi muplung mapkham chunni thlaan thah vada. Ungta thlaan avah lungkhor ungta m'leen nih lung khat tih mdo'artlunin.
43011039	Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih lung avah aloupthi dokin.” Pdainu kdiyou unuh Martha ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, 'tunvah kqop thuh dokrah, mleiya mdina' nii plii mdophaak dok.”
43011040	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi ahin nih kthe dok kmah, ‘tidit tah nang ngi lam'arin chaak bih, nang ngi Isowr konlorna' avah amik ki deinadi'’, Kdodit beh?”
43011041	Audilli mmaan nih kdiyou mdothiiknaan mmun ava' thung ki lung avah loupthi lamda. Ungta Jisu ngi knaanda karthak thah hansuwda ungta hanto'theda: “Apa, Nang ngi adotarjaak chaak leiyi, akpanpaak chaak a.
43011042	Ungta Neiyi kdeh tidit tah Nang ngi mpha ktai thung ngi adotarjaak chaak. Pdainu mmaan nih Neiya Nang ngi adoyuktsi tidit lam'mdorin chaakna' raan Neiyi havah hava' krip daat miipii rekki thenni kdothe,” dida.
43011043	Ungta Mma ngi hava' mthe dok dilli, Mma ngi kdung ngi owngda, “Lajaras arvang thuwk,” dida.
43011044	Ungta kdiyou dok kcha' mma' avah mkhutmkhuh kluwngjeel buw ngi tuklum ungta mmai avah parthlandau vih tuklum daat tih arvang thuwkda. Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Aperthletin, vangsunso!”
43011045	Audilli Mary hinni kthleng Jihudi rek knempok ki Jisu ngi mdotlot dow rek avah dei lamda ungta mmaan nih Mhin nih lam'rin chlamda.
43011046	Pdainu mmaan arlak ki aangqhe rek avah Pharisy rek hinni vangsun lamda ungta Jisu ngi mdotlot rek avah mmaan hinni vansong lamda.
43011047	Audilli thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rekki kunpun lusang khat purkuwk lamda. Ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neenna talu tlow chenaan? Hava' mii ava ngi tngana' knempok ki mtlotta.
43011048	Neen nih hanto' noptlot tlit daatin bih, mii mkheng ngi Mma' hinni lamkrinter chrang a. Ungta Rome mii arjudon, neenki nmunin ruk ungta nchaatin ruk kloupthi rangnga,” dilamda.
43011049	Ungta mmaan arlak ki khat, mmiing Kaiaphas mdoditin mkum ava' ki thenni thimpu kenreelsi kurthuwk ava ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanna dow khatleh ruk deipindih maantih.
43011050	Ungta hava ngi neen nthen inni kqha rah tidit ruk binmaan tih. Mleiya chaat mkheng kenvei mana' rang ki thenni miikhat tih mii mkheng ki thenni mdiyow ngi kqha,” dida.
43011051	Ungta mma ngi hava' mdothe avah mthina ki ngi mdothe pemeh. Pdainu mkum ava' ki thenni thimpu kenreelsi mkurthuh leiyi, mma ngi Jisu ngi chaat ava' ki thenni mdiyow rah tidit mdopurphuwn.
43011052	Ungta chaat ava' ki then daat kma' mlown mlown thah kerjeida ka'am kcha' Isowr mii rek avah Mma ngi mmun khadaat thung ngi mdopurku lamna' rang ki then rukku mdiyow rah.
43011053	Audilli mmaan nih ava' nit ki kupqhun nih, Mma' mdo'eyowna' raanni khadaat tih kerseel dok lamda.
43011054	Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi Jihudi rek arlak ki kurphuwng ngi chetporson meh pdainu Mma ngi paamkbiik behki khuwpaam Ephrim tidit khuwpii thah yu chda. Ungta ava' thuh Mma ngi Msikhu rektu' am lamda.
43011055	Ungta 'tunnu Jihudi rekki Taplaanna' avah arvangnai chda. Ungta mii knempok ki mkhuwpaam mkhuwpaam thungki korlouda Jerusalem thah mkertleu chaakna' raan ki thenni Taplaanna' nit mphaakduh ngi hang lamda.
43011056	Audilli mmaan nih Jisu a thlaam lamda ungta luwbuk'inn thung ngi krip daat tih msingreel inni hanto' the lamda: “Talu abin inna, Mmah kmaal hava' thung vah thlengmow thleng nime?”
43011057	'Tunnu thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rekki pauqum khat mdothiikin. Mleiya mmaan nih mdokyown chaakna' raan ki thenni, ‘Kuwmiikhat tih Mma' amna' mdeh cheentung ngi, midotthe piik rah,’ mdoditin.
43012001	Audilli Jisu ngi Bethany thah Taplaanna' nit mdophaakna' rah niitruk mvadaat arlaan nih thlengda. Mmun avah Mma ngi kdiyou kcha' Lajaras, kdiyou thungki mdoperdelna' ava'.
43012002	Ava' thung ngi mmaan nih kluwki buh pchaak lamda ungta Martha ngi soplow chlamda. Pdainu Lajaras rukka, Mma' tu' khaan 'leenni kmaal rah kok'ong rek mmaan arlak ki ko'ongda.
43012003	Audilli Mary ngi mkhon knem langlang nard kenje reidii khuwng khat louda, Jisu khuh avah pubulda. Ungta mma ngi mkhuh avah msam mih knuwl piikda. Ungta inn avah reidii krimkdi ava ngi pum kervel kervelda.
43012004	Avaleiyi, Msikhu rek arlak ki Simon chapa khat Kerioth ki Judas, Mma' kyur chbei rang khat ava ngi hanto'theda:
43012005	“Taluleiyi hava' reidii avah denarii arja kdum mih yur chthida, srah rek hinni mdopiik chaakma daat toh?”
43012006	Mma ngi hava' mdothe avah srah rekki thenni mbinpiik rekrekna', mdothe pemeh. Pdainu mmah kupru tidit tah mma ngi sumbuwr avah mdosin. Ungta ava' thung ngi kluwt sum khimkhei avah mdolow chaak kchow.
43012007	Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “Mdobin atlow chdaatso. Mma ngi havah Nei mdotulruwlna' nit ki thenni mdo'arkhiik chaak ava'.
43012008	Srah rekka naan nih mpha ktai ado'amqhi tlitin, pdainu Neiya mpha ktai thung ngi ma'amqhi nimaan tih.”
43012009	Avaleiyi, Jihudi mii rek knempok ki Mma' avah ava' thuh ka'am tidit dei lamda. Ungta mmaan nah Jisu lei daat tih kthleng lam pemeh, pdainu Mma ngi kdiyou kcha' thungki mdoperdel Lajaras ksuw rang ki rukku kthleng lam.
43012010	Pdainu thimpu kenreel rekki Lajaras rukka te'eyow rah kdi ngi kerseel lamda.
43012011	Mleiya mma' leiyi, Jihudi mii knempok rek avah mmaan hinki sun chlamda, Jisu hinni lam'mdorin chaakin.
43012012	Mupduknii ngi Jisu rukka Jerusalem thah karhang rah tidit mmaan nih marjaakin thungta, mii knempok ki kmaal ava' thung ngi thleng lamda.
43012013	Mmaan nih spra arna sin lamda, Mma' kurdutqhi chrah hang lamda. Ungta mmaan nih owng lamda, “Hosanna! Isreel rekki Paamkruwng! ‘Kruwng miing 'leenni karhang Mma' avah msuwkqha a!’ ” dilamda. (Luw. 118:26)
43012014	Audilli tikjit dok ava' heppi, Jisu ngi skowlraam suwn khat mphan thungta Mma ngi ava' 'leenni ko'ongda.
43012015	“Jion, chanu rek, ningpqit maan. Asuwn, naanki Paamkruwng avah skowlraam suwn khat 'leenni ko'ongda karhang nga.” (Jkh. 9:9)
43012016	Hava' dow rek avah Msikhu rekki rukri vah deipindih lam mda. Pdainu Isowr rih Jisu avah mponlor chaak dilli, mmaan nih hava'le' avah Mma' leiyi, tikjit dok ungta hava'le' avah mmaan nih Mma' hinni mdotlotin tidit binphaak lamda.
43012017	Avaleiyi, Mma ngi thlaan thungki Lajaras own pthuwkda, kdiyou thungki mperdel thung ngi Mma' tu' ka'amsap miipii rekki rinpaumin avah pii chlamda.
43012018	Hava' leiyi miipii rek rukku Mma' avah kurdutqhi chlamda.
43012019	Avaleiyi, Pharisy rekki msingreelin thung ngi hanto' the lamda. “Asuwn o, anong tlotin dow khatleh ksi kma' avah adehnna? Asuwn, dultipaam mkheng ngi Mma'dil mqowi chaak inna.”
43012020	Ungta kmaal ava' thung ngi luwkbu chrah karhang rek arlak ki Grikmii aangqhe yau lamda.
43012021	Mmaan ava'kat tih Galily paamkuwl thungki Bethsaida khuw ki Philip hinni arva lamda ungta mdongeen chaakin avah the lamda: “Ocha, neenna Jisu tkurdutqhi rah kbin chaak inna.”
43012022	Philip pih vangda Andria hinni theda ungta Andria le' Philip pih Jisu hinni the lamda.
43012023	Ungta Jisu ngi arthaang lamda: “Mii Chapa konlor chaakna' rah mpha avah kvei dok a.
43012024	Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Chavui chiimuw ava ngi dulti thuh tlada mdiyowma bih avah mthina daat rah, koryou nimeh. Pdainu mdiyow chaak bih, ava ngi mchei knempok ki kchei rah.
43012025	Mrinkum vonsat klow kcha' mma' ava ngi kpenvei pthirah. Ungta hava' dultipaam thung ngi mrinkum kahal kcha' mma' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum kpha ngi kirkhi chrah.
43012026	Kuwmiikhat tih Nei sopmtolow chaak cheentung ngi, Nei kdil aqowi chso. Ungta Nei ka'amna' ava' thung ngi Nei ksuwk ava' rukka ma'am rah ungta kuwmiikhat tih Nei sopmtolow chaak bih, Kpa ngi mma' avah kakyat chrah.
43012027	'Tunnu Neiya kapthlarin kparvai kcha' a. Ungta Neiya talu the nikdi'? Apa mpha hava' thungki mheisan cha', pdainu hava' leiyi, Neiya hava' mpha kpha thung ngi karvang ping.’
43012028	Apa, Amiing aponlor cha',” dida. Audilli parvaan ki krowl khat arjuda hanto'theda: “Neiyi, kponlor chaak dok a, ungta ponlornowl nikdi'.”
43012029	Avaleiyi, ava' thuh ripda ka'am miipii rekki krowl avah arja lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Khu kipri a, ungta morson rekki vaantamsi ngi mkirbiikqhi a” dilamda
43012030	Jisu ngi arthaang lamda ungta hanto'theda: “Hava' krowl avah Nei kthen nih kurju pemeh, pdainu naan athenni kurju.
43012031	'Tunnu hava' dultipaam ki pau tpinditna' mpha. 'Tunnu hava' dultipaam ki paamkpu avah kreipthirah.
43012032	Ungta Neiya hava' dulti thungki mtikhiin chaak bih, Neiyi mii mkheng avah kihin kat tih qen lam nikdi',” dida.
43012033	Havah Mma ngi taluhep kduh ngi diyou nikdi', tidit mdopandanna' ngi mdothe.
43012034	Mii rekki Mhin nih hanto' arthaang lamda: “Neen nih nowlam thungki kdo'arjaakin avah, ‘Mesaiah avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ka'am rah,’ dida. Ungta taluhep pih Nang ngi, ‘Mii Chapa avah tikhiin chaak rah,’ adoditto? Hava' Mii Chapa avah kuwda?”
43012035	Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mpha mruk'suwn daat ki, thenni mar'aang avah naan tu' ka'am a. Naan nih mar'aang athlowi chaaklimin thung ngi ichet chaan, mditma bih kjiingnu ngi akphakhot raan. Mleiya kjingnu thung ngi kchet mma' ava ngi tva'lam kqowi a tidit mdodeh pemeh.
43012036	Naan nih mar'aang athlowi chaakin thung ngi Mar'aang mii rek akurthuh chaakna' raanni mar'aang avah lam'arin chaan.” Jisu ngi hava'le' mthe dok dilli sun chda ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinki kordowl chdokda.
43012037	Pdainu Mma ngi mmaiqhuwm inni tngana' knempok ki mtlot arlaan kpha rukku mmaan nih Mhin nih lam'rin chlam mda.
43012038	Havah khulpu Isaiah pauthe ava' mkurkhumna'. Mleiya mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng, kuw ngi neen kpausonin avah lam'mrin chaak inna? Ungta kuw hinni Kruwng baanruhtan avah mpandan a?” dida. (Is. 53:1)
43012039	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih lam'mdorin chaak pchaanin pemeh. Mleiya Isaiah ngi veikhat hanto'theda:
43012040	“Mma ngi mmaan avah mmik inni khu mdodeh mana' raan ki thenni mmikin toptotdah. Ungta muplungril inni mdodeh pinditmana' raan ki thenni muplungrilin avah tapchaida. Mditma bih,mmaan nih plungren hor chlamdon, Neiyi pdam chdok thuh lam nikdi'.” (Is. 6:10)
43012041	Hava' dow khimkhei avah Isaiah ngi Jisu konlorna' ava' mdeh thungta mdothe ungta Mma' leiyi, mdothe.
43012042	Anto'jik ki kenreel paamkpu rek arlak rukku knempok ki Mma' hinni lam'rin chlamda. Pdainu Pharisy rek leiyi, mmaan nih Mhin nih kerthethuh kcha'lam pemeh. Mditma bih mmaan nih sinegog thungki mmaan avah kreipthi lamrah.
43012043	Mleiya mmaan nih dultimii dopanpaak avah Isowr dopanpaak hinni mdongei chaakin.
43012044	Jisu ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Nei kihin nih lamkrin kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei lammdotrin chaak pemeh, pdainu Nei myuksi Mma' hinni lammdorin chaak.
43012045	Ungta mmik ki Nei mekdei kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei myuksi Mma' avah mmik ki mdeh chaak a.
43012046	Neiya dultipaam thung ngi mar'aang ngi kurjung ping. Mleiya kuwku yoso Nei kihin nih lamkrin kcha' rek avah kjiingnu thung ngi am lam nimeh.
43012047	Ungta kuwmiikhat tih Nei kpauna rek arja thida lamkrin kcha' kma' mma' avah Neiyi m'leen nih pau pindit maang. Mleiya Neiya dultipaam thung ngi paukpindit rah kurjung pmaang, pdainu dultipaam ksan chrah kurjung ping.
43012048	Nei mepthleida Kpauthe karlaang kma' rek hinni paukpindit rah khat ka'am. Mqutna' nit ava' thung ngi Neiyi kdothe dok pau ava'kat tih mma' 'leenni paukpindit rah.
43012049	Neiyi pau avah kthina ki kruhtanna' ava ngi kdothe pemeh, pdainu Nei mkapthla Pa ava ngi Neiyi talu the nikdi', ungta talu saamnikdi', tidit ki pauqum mdotpiik.
43012050	Ungta Mma' paupiik avah ktlangknai kma' rinkum ava' tidit Neiyi kdeh. Avaleiyi, Neiyi kdothe khimkhei avah Pa ava ngi kihin nih mdothe ava'jik ki kdothe.”
43013001	'Tunnu Taplaanna' ki kmaal ava' mphaakduh ngi, Jisu ngi hava' dultipaam thungki korlouda Mma ngi Pa ava' hinni muhun chaakna' rah, Mma' ki mpha avah kvei dok a tidit deida. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi dultipaam ki mvonsat'low, Mma' mii rek avah mqutna' kpha ngi vonsat low chlamda.
43013002	Ungta mmaan nih kluwki buh chadok lamda. Ungta 'tunnu Simon chapa Kerioth ki Judas plung thung ngi Mma' mdoyur chaakna' rah tarnampii avah luwt chda.
43013003	Pa ava ngi dow mkheng nga Mma' khut thung ngi mpiik dok a ungta Mma' avah Isowr hinki kurjung ungta Isowr hinni kuhung rang ping tidit avah Jisu ngi deida.
43013004	Mma ngi kmaal ava' thung ki ripda, mtun ki mdona avah khowkda ungta Mma ngi tkurnuwlna' buwkhat louda kperjeelda.
43013005	Audilli Mma ngi kulqhut arkuw khat louda ungta sikhu rek khuh tulqhut pqhunda. Ungta tkurnuwlna' buw mekperjeel ava ngi knuwlpiik lamda.
43013006	Audilli Mma ngi Simon Pitar arvanphada. Ungta Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi nei kukhuh mulqhut piiknadih?”
43013007	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi kdotlot avah 'tunnu nang ngi deipindih nimtih, pdainu dil thah deipindihrow nadi'.”
43013008	Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi Nei kukhuh ado'alqhut roliit nimeh.” Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi nang akhuh kulqhutma bih, nang nga Nei tu' khadaat tkurthuhna' ammeh.”
43013009	Mthungta Simon Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng mdit cheentung ngi kukhuh daatmda, kukhut le' kluw ruk mhei'alqhut piikcha'.”
43013010	Jisu ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kulqhu dok kcha' mii avah mkhuh daat tulqhut rah, mleiya mdak mkheng avah kertleu dok ksa. Naanna kertleu dok kcha'in ptih pdainu naan akheng khengin pemeh.”
43013011	Mleiya Mma ngi kuw ngi mukyur chrang tidit mdodeh dok. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi, ‘naan akheng khengin pemeh’, mdodit.
43013012	Ungta Mma ngi mkhuhn mulqhut piiklam dilli, dona nadok thida veikhat mko'on dilli Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan athenni hava' kdotlot avah adehpindit inna?
43013013	Naan nih Neiya chukpu ungta Kruwng, adotiditin avah mkindit kat, tidit tah Neiya ava'kat ping.
43013014	Mdit bih, naanki Chukpu ungta Kruwng Neiyi naan akhuhn avah kulqhut a. Ava' vah naan rukku khat le' khat khuh akulqhutpiik kcho raan thah ktla a.
43013015	Mleiya Neiyi mirmik khat adokpiikin ava' heppi, tidit tah Neiyi ahinin nih kdotlot ava' heppi naan rukku adotlot raan.
43013016	Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya suwk avah mukpupa ava' hinni klin pemeh, Ungta mdo'arjuksi Mma' avah arjuksi ava' hinni klin pemeh,
43013017	Naan nih hava' dow khimkhei avah adeh chaakin bih, ungta avale' ava' atlot chaakin bih, suwqhat aphan chaak inna.
43013018	Neiyi naan akhengngin athemaan ring. Neiyi kdokchol chaak mma' avah kdeh chaak. Pdainu Kchiir laika ava' kurkhumna ngi, ‘Nei tu' thenpen kchaveh mma' ava ngi, Mkhuhpkhong mikkhiin Psuk rah.’ (Luw. 41:9)
43013019	'Tunnu Neiyi hava' avah marvan thuh duh ngi, tidit tah naan nih ava' marvan thuh thung ngi Neiya Mma'kat tidit lam'adotrin chaakna' raan ki thenni akthepiik inna.
43013020	Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Kuwku yoso Neiyi kdosi ava' karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei mtarlaan chaak a ungta Nei mkarlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi Nei myuksi Mma' avah marlaan chaak a.”
43013021	Jisu ngi ava' mthe thung ngi Mmah mapthla parvai chda, ungta Mma ngi rinpaumin piida ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna, tidit tah naan arlak ki khat tih Neiya myur chnaandi'.”
43013022	Audilli sikhu rekki khat le' khat kursuw lamda ungta Mma ngi kuw mdothena tidit leiyi, plung tpelqen lamda.
43013023	'Tunnu Jisu vonsat'low Msikhu rek arlak ki khat tah Jisu plung 'leenni kikbiu daat.
43013024	Avaleiyi, Simon Pitar rih mma' hinni, mdothe avah kuw mdothena tidit mdokheelna' rah kchapda.
43013025	Audilli mma ngi Jisu plung 'leenni mikbiu daat chunni hanto'theda: “Kruwng, avah kuw plih?”
43013026	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Mma' avah Neiyi thenpenlek mdii thuh phuwm thida kdopiik rang ava' rah.” Ungta Mma ngi thenpen avah phuwm thida Simon chapa Kerioth ki Judas hinni piida.
43013027	Ungta thenpenlek ava' mchaak dilli mma' thung ngi Seitan luwt chda. Audilli Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi adotlot rang avah kbeisek ki atlow.”
43013028	'Tunnu khaan ava' thung ngi kok'ong kuwmiikhat leh ngi Mma ngi talu binda mhin nih havah mdothe tidit tah deilam meh.
43013029	Mleiya marlakin ki aangqhe rekvah ‘Judas tih sumbuwr mdosin leiyi, Jisu ngi mhin nih kmaal ava' thung ki rah dow tikriin rekin ava' aren dok, mditmata mma ngi srah rek hinni dow mruk mdopiikna' rah thepakda,’ dilamda.
43013030	Audilli mma ngi thenpenlek ava' marlaan dok le', m'tunkat daat tih vanthuwk chda ungta mpha avah jaan.
43013031	Avaleiyi, mma' mvanthuh dok dilli Jisu ngi hanto'theda: “'Tunnu Mii Chapa avah mponlor chaak a ungta Isowr rah Mma' thung ngi konlor kcha' a.
43013032	Isowr avah Mma' thung ngi mkonlor chaak bih, Isowr rukku Mma' avah mdak thung ngi kponlor chrah ungta Mmah kbeisek ki kponlor chrah.
43013033	Nausisi rek naan, Neiyi mpha mruk'suwn daat ki thenni naan tu' amnikdi'. Naan nih, Neiya mthlaam naandi', ungta Neiyi Jihudi rek hinni kdothe heppi, Nei kchena' thung ngu naanna arhang pchaang nimaan tih, avaleiyi, Neiyi naan ahin nih tun kdothe.
43013034	Neiyi naan ahin nih paupiik ren khat akpiik inna. Mleiya naan nih khat le' khat vonsat akorlow chaak raan. Neiyi naan vonsat adoklow chaakin heppi naan nih khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaan.
43013035	Naan nih khat le', khat vonsat akorlow chaakin bih, ava ngi mii mkheng ngi naan avah Nei ksikhu reklam tidit akdei raan.”
43013036	Simon Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng tva'lam, qowi chnali?” Jisu ngi mhin nih arthaangda: “Neiyi kchena' rang thung vah nang ngi 'tunnu mqowi pchaang nimtih. Pdainu dil thah nang ngi Nei kdil lah mqowirow nadi'.”
43013037	Pitar rih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng taluleida 'tun neiyi Nang adil kdoqowi pchaanmana' rangnga? Neiyi Nang athenni krinkum avah pii nikdi'.”
43013038	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Nang ngi Nei kthen nih arinkum kpha rukka piinadi? Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. Nang ngi veikdum atmatduh kpha ngi har khuwng nimeh.”
43014001	“Naan aplungin avah dow khatleh ngi pya mso. Isowr hinni lam'arin chaan ungta Nei kihin rukku lam'mheirin chaan.
43014002	Mleiya Kpa inn thung ngi ta'amna' rah mun knempok ki ka'am. Ava' mkurthuhma bih, Neiyi naan ahin nih athepiik dok nikaandi'. Neiya naan athenni mmun khat kporthlong rah kuhung imping.
43014003	Neiyi naan athen inni mmun khat ava' kporthlon dok bih, arjung kenle nowl nikdi'. Ungta naan avah Nei kihin nih ahunqhi nikaandi'. Mleiya Nei ka'amna' ava' thung ngi naan rukka am naandi'.
43014004	Ungta Nei kchena' avah naan nih adehn ungta lam avah adodehn.”
43014005	Thomas tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, neen nih Nang achena' avah deimaan ring ungta taluhep pih lam avah dei nikaandi'?”
43014006	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiya 'lam ava' ping, kindit ava' ping ungta rinkum ava' ping. Kuwkhat leh ruk Nei kar'aang kma'don Pa ava' hinni thleng pchaang nimeh.
43014007	Naan nih Nei atedeh chaak tlaangin bih, Kpa rukka adodeh chaak tlaang raanna. Ungta 'tunnu naan nih Mma' avah adeh chaak dok inna ungta amikin nih Mma' avah adeh chaak dok inna.”
43014008	Philip pih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng Pa avah neen kihin nih mheitedet chaan, ava ngi neen kthen nih kuplungin kngamrah”
43014009	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan ahinin nih mpha ksowt tih amnu, ava' kpha thung ngi Neiya mdeimlaitine, Philip? Nei mekdei dok kcha' mma' ava ngi Pa avah mmik ki mdeh chaak dok a. Taluhep pih nang ngi Pa avah mheitedetin, aditta?
43014010	Nang ngi Neiya Pa ava' hinni ka'am ping ungta Pa ava ngi Nei kihin nih ka'am tidit avah lam'mrin mtine? Neiyi nang ahin nih kdothe pau avah Nei kthung ki pemeh. Pdainu Nei kthung ngi ka'am Pa ava ngi nong rek avah mdotlot.
43014011	Neiya Pa ava' hinni ka'am ping ungta Pa ava ngi Nei kihin nih ka'am tidit avah lam'arin cha'. Mditma cheentung ngi nong rek ava'kat ki thenni lam'mheirin cha'.
43014012	Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. Nei lam'mikrin kcha' mma' ava ngi Neiyi kdotlot nong rek avah ktlow rah. Ungta hava' heihin nih klinklin nong rek avah mma ngi ktlow rah. Mleiya Neiya Pa ava' hinni kuhung imping.
43014013	Ungta talutalu yoso naan nih Nei kmiing 'leenni adoqhilin avah Neiyi tlow nikdi'? Mleiya Pa ava ngi Chapa thung ngi kponlor chrah.
43014014	Naan nih Nei kmiing 'leenni talutalu yoso aqhil chaakin bih, Neiyi avah tlow nikdi'?
43014015	Naan nih Nei von'atapsat chaakin cheentung ngi Nei kpaupiik rek avah apqowiyin.
43014016	Ungta Neiyi Pa ava' hinni qhil nikdon ungta Mma ngi morson Kbom kcha' khat akpii chraan. Ungta Mmah naan ahin nih ktlangknai kmah ka'am rah.
43014017	Kindit ki Pthla avah dultipaam mih mdo'arlaan pchaan pemeh. Mleiya dultipaam mih Mma' avah mmik rukku deimeh ungta tedeh rukku deipindih meh. Pdainu Mmah naan nih adodeh chaakin, mleiya Mma ngi naan tu' amsapda ungta Mmah naan athung ngi ka'am rah.
43014018	Neiyi naan avah nuhmataak pamataak ki ama nimaanring. Neiya naan ahin nih arjung nikdi.
43014019	Mpha mruk dil thah, dultipaam mih Neiya mmikin nih mdeiporson nimeh. Pdainu naanvah amikin nih mdeinaandi', mleiya Nei krin leiyi, naan rukka ring naandi'.
43014020	Nit ava' thung ngi, Neiyi Kpa hinni ungta naan nih Nei kihin nih ungta Neiyi naan ahin nih ka'am ping tidit naan nih deinaandi'.
43014021	Nei kpaupiik rek avale' kirkhi kcha' ungta ava' kopqowi kcha' mma' avah Nei vonsat moklow kcha'. Ungta Nei vonsat moklow kcha' avah Kpa vonsat'low kurthuwk rah. Ungta Neiyi vonsat low nikdi' ungta Neiyi mma' hinni kandanpiik nikdi,” dida.
43014022	Kerioth ki Judah kma', ava ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, taluhep luplih, Nang ngi neen kihin nih adaksa akandan rangnga ungta dultipaam hin kma' rangnga?”
43014023	Jisu ngi arthaangda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih Nei vonsat mtolow chaak bih, mma ngi Nei Kpauna rek avah kopqowi chrah. Ungta Kpa ngi mmah vonsat klow chrah ungta Neenve ngi mma' hinni tlungda ki'innin pthutda mma' tu' amsap nikaandi'.
43014024	Ungta Nei vonsat moklow kma' mma' ava ngi Nei kpauna rek avah pqowi meh. Ungta naan nih ado'arjaakin pauna havah Nei kihin ki pemeh pdainu Nei myuksi Kpa ava' hinki.
43014025	Neiyi hava' dow rek avah naan ahin nih ka'am lim thung ngi kdothe dok.
43014026	Pdainu Pa ava ngi Nei kmiing 'leenni mdopthlat rang Kbom kcha' Pthla Kchiir ava ngi naan ahin nih dow mkheng avah akpurchuk raan. Ungta Neiyi naan ahin nih kdothe dow mkheng avah ayuktipbin phaak raan.
43014027	Plung kdai avah Neiyi naan ahinin nih akmaakpiik inna. Ungta Nei kuplung kdai avah naan ahin nih akpiik inna. Dultimii ngi mdopiik heppi Neivah adokpiikin pemeh. naan aplungin avah dow khatleh ngi pya mso ungta aningin ruk qi mso.
43014028	Naan ahin nih Neiyi, ‘Neiya sun chnikdi, ungta veikhat arjung nowl nikdi' kdodit avah naan nih ado'arjaak dokin. Naan nih Nei vonsat atolow chaakin bih, akanpat chaak tlaang raanna. Mleiya Neiyi Kpa hinni kuhung imping, kdodit. Mleiya Kpa a Nei kihin nih klin.
43014029	Ungta 'tunnu ava' marvan thuh thung ngi naan nih Nei lam'adotrin chaakna' raan, Neiyi ava' avah marvan thuh duh ngi adokthepiik dokin.
43014030	'Tun dilli Neiyi naan ahin nih knempok ki pau porson nimaang tidit tah hava' dultipaam ki paamkpu avah karvang a. Ungta mma ngi Nei k'leen nih mdotlot rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.
43014031	Pdainu dultimii ngi Pa avah Neiyi vonsat kdolow chaak tidit mdodehna' rah, Neiyi, Pa ava ngi mdotpiik paupiik avah Neiyi anto'jik ki kdotlot. 'Leen, iripin hava' thungki isun dokin cheh.
43015001	Neiya riithlumnu kat ava' ping ungta Kpa ngi riithlumbil knumpa ava'.
43015002	Pa ava ngi Nei k'leenki mchei ktaak mbaak rek khimkhei avah kloupthi irah. Ungta Mma ngi mcheipum mbaak khimkhei avah knem betbet tih mcheina' rah ardi deekda.
43015003	Neiyi naan ahin nih kdothe dok pauna ava ngi naanna kertleu dok inptih.
43015004	Nei kihin nih mpha ktai i'amin ungta Neiyi naan ahin nih i'am nih. Mbaak ava ngi riithlumnu ktaak ki mthina ngi mchei pchaanmah heppi, naan nih Nei kihin nih a'amin kma'don chei pchaang nimaan tih.
43015005	Neiya riithlumnu ava' ping ungta naanna mbaak rekin ptih. Nei kihin nih ka'am kcha' ungta Neiyi mhin nih ka'amna' mma' ava ngi knempok ki kchei chrah. Mleiya Nei ktaak ki naan nih dow khatleh tlow pchaang nimaan tih.
43015006	Kuwmiikhat, Nei kihin nih ka'am kma' mma' avah mbaak heppi kvarpthi rah ungta kqong chrah. Ungta mii rekki purkuwk lamda ungta mmaan avah mei thung ngi varpthi lamda ungta mmaan avah kukbung kcha'lam.
43015007	Naan nih Nei kihin nih a'amin bih ungta Nei kpauna rek avah naan athung inni ma'am chaak bih, naan nih adobinin adoqhil chaakin avah naan ahin nih aktlot piik raan.
43015008	Naan nih knem mih achei chaakin bih, Kpa avah aponlor chaak inna ungta naanna Nei ksikhu rek kurthuwk chnaandi'.
43015009	Pa ava ngi vonsat mdotolow chaak heppi, Neiyi naan avah vonsat adoklow chaakin. Naan nih Nei kvonsat thung ngi mpha ktai i'amin.
43015010	Neiyi Kpa paupiik rek ava' pqowi nuh, Mma' vonsat thung ngi ka'am heppi, naan nih Nei kpaupiik rek avah apqowi chaakin bih, Nei kvonsat thung ngi am chnaandi'.
43015011	Neiyi hava' pauna rek avah naan athung inni Nei kkanpatna' ava' ma'amna' rah ungta naan akanpatin mkurkhumna' rah Neiyi hava'le' avah ahinin nih kdothe dok.
43015012	Havah Nei kpaupiik, tidit tah Neiyi naan vonsat adoklow chaakin heppi naan nih khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaan.
43015013	Miikhat tih maplap rekki thenni mrinkum kpii pchaang tidit heihin nih klin vonsat avah dultimii kuwkhat tih thlowi meh.
43015014	Naan nih talutalu yoso Nei kpaupiik ava' atlot chaakin bih, naanna Nei kaplap rekin ptih.
43015015	'Tunnu Neiyi naan avah suwk rek adiporson maan ring tidit tah suwk ava ngi mukpupa nongtlot avah mdodeh pemeh. Pdainu Neiyi naan avah plap rek, akdit inna. Mleiya Neiyi Kpa hinki kdo'arjaak dow mkheng avah naan ahin nih adokepdeh chaak dokin.
43015016	Naan nih Nei adotokcholin pemeh pdainu Neiyi naan avah adokokchol chaak dokin ungta adokakthlan dokin. Mleiya naan nih chetda knem mih achei chaakna' raan ungta acheiyin avah ma'am tlitna' rah adokakthlan chaak dokin. Ungta naan nih talutalu yoso, Nei kmiing 'leenni adoqhil chaakin avah Pa ava ngi adotpiikna' raanni, adokakthlan dokin.
43015017	Neiyi hava'le' avah paupiik ki akpiik inna, tidit tah naan nih khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaan.
43015018	Dultimii ngi naan avah atahal chaakin bih, naan atahalin duduhn nih, Nei mtahal chaak lam a tidit naan nih adeiyin.
43015019	Naan avah dultipaam ki akurthuh tlaangin bih, dultipaam mih mdakdow avah vonsat klow chrah. Pdainu Neiyi naan avah dultipaam thungki adokokchol dokin leiyi, naanna dultipaam kiin ptipmeh. Avaleiyi, dultipaam mih naan avah adotahal chaakin.
43015020	Neiyi ‘suwk avah mukpupa hinni klin pemeh’, dinuh kdothe pauna avah abinphaakin. Mmaan nih Nei tyat chiireelna' mtipiik dok lam bih, naan rukka chii akepreel raan. Ungta mmaan nih Nei kpauthe mopqowi chaakin bih, naan ruk akopqowi raan.
43015021	Pdainu hava' dow khimkhei avah mmaan nih naan ahin nih, Nei kmiing 'leen ktlow lamrah, mleiya mmaan nih Nei myuksi Mma' avah mdodeh pindit in pemeh.
43015022	Neiyi kurjunma ungta mmaan hinni pau kthe dok kma' kkurthuh tlaang bih, mmaan nih pnu mdo'arvema raanna. Pdainu 'tunvah mmaan nih pnu arvei maan ring tidit ki mlei pii pchaang lam nimeh.
43015023	Nei mkahal kcha' mma' ava ngi Kpa rukka mahal chaak a'.
43015024	Neiyi mii morson nih mdotlot liitma nong rek avah mmaan hinni ktlotma tlaang bih, mmaan nih pnu mdo'arve chaakma raanna. Pdainu 'tunnu mmaan nih tedeh ruk dei lamda ungta Nei ruk ungta Kpa ruk mtahal chaak inna.
43015025	Pdainu havah mmaan ki nowlam thung ngi mdokjit dok: ‘Mmaan nih Neiya mlei ktaak ki mdotahal chaak lam', mdodit ava' kurkhumna' rang kithen. (Luw. 69:4)
43015026	Pdainu Neiyi Pa ava' hinki naan athenni kdopthlat rang Kbom kcha', Pa ava' hinki kthuwk kindit pthla ava' murjun thung ngi Mma ngi Nei kleiyi rinpaumin avah kpii chdaat rah.
43015027	Ungta naan rukku rinpaumin avah piinaandi'. Mleiya naanna mupqhun daat ki Nei tu' ta'amsapin.
43016001	Hava'le' khimkhei rek avah, naan nih khuhsiir adopirthiht mana' raan ki thenni Neiyi naan ahinin nih kdothe.
43016002	Mmaan nih sinegog thungki naan avah akekneng pthi raan. Ungta kuwku yoso, naan ake'eyou rek inni Isowr nong ktlow kcha' heppi mkirbin chaakna' raan ki mpha avah karvang nga.
43016003	Mmaan nih hava' dow rek avah naan ahinin nih ktlow lamrah. Mleiya mmaan nih Pa ava' ruk ungta Nei ruk mdotedeh chaakin pemeh.
43016004	Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih hava' dow rek avah adokthepiik dokin. Mleiya mpha marvan thung ngi, Neiyi adokthe piik dok rekin avah naan nih binphaak naandi'. Ungta mupqhun thok thung ngu hava' dow rek avah ahinin nih kdothe pemeh. Mleiya Neiya naan ahin nih ka'am daat ping.
43016005	Pdainu 'tunnu Neiya, Nei myuksi ava' hinni kuhung kcha' rang imping ungta naan kuwkhat leh rukku, ‘tva'lam qowinadi,’ tidit mkheelsi maantih?
43016006	Pdainu Neiyi hava' pauna rek avah naan ahin nih kdothe dok leiyi, naan aplungin avah tyatna ngi kdim kcha' a.
43016007	Anto'daat yoso Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya Nei kuhunma bih, naan ahin nih Kbom kcha' avah arjung nimeh. Nei kuhun rang avah naan athenni suwqhatna' mleiya Neiyi Mma' avah arjupthla nikdi'.
43016008	Ungta Mma' murjun thung ngi, dultipaam avah Mma ngi pnu leiyi, ungta rinkinditna' leiyi, ungta pau tpinditna' leiyi, kupsul rah.
43016009	Ungta pnu ki mleiya mmaan nih Nei kihin nih lammdotrin chaak lam pemeh.
43016010	Rinkinditna' ki mleiya Neiyi Kpa hinni hung nikdi' ungta naan nih Neiya amikin nih mdeiporson nimaan tih.
43016011	Pau tpinditna' ki mleiya hava' dultipaam ki paamkpu ava' 'leenni pau mpindit dok a.
43016012	Neiyi naan ahin nih kdothe rah dow knempok ki ka'am daat pdainu naan nih avah diil pchaang nimaan tih.
43016013	Pdainu kindit ki Pthla ava' murjun thung ngi, Mma ngi kindit mkheng thung ngi akqhi chraan. Mleiya Mma ngi mthina thungki daat tih pau nimeh. Pdainu Mma ngi mdo'arjaak chaak khimkhei rek ava' kthe rah ungta Mma ngi karvang kthuwk rang dow rek avah naan ahin nih akparjaak raan.
43016014	Mma ngi Neiya mokponlor chrah. Mleiya Mma ngi Nei kihin ki karlaang chrah. Ungta Mma ngi naan ahin nih avah akparjaak chraan.
43016015	Pa ava ngi mdothlowi dow mkheng avah Nei kdow. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi Nei kihin ki loudon, naan ahin nih akparjaak raan dinuh, kdothe.
43016016	Mpha mruk thung ngi naan nih Neiya amikin nih mdei nimaan tih ungta mpha mruk dilli naan nih veikhat Neiya amikin nih mdeinowl naandi’. Mleiya Neiya Pa ava' hinni kuhung imping.”
43016017	Audilli Msikhu rek aangqhe ngi msingreelin thung ngi the lamda: “Mma ngi, ‘mpham ruk thung ngi naan nih Neiya amikin nih mdei nimaan tih ungta mpha mruk dilli naan nih Neiya amikin nih mdeinowl naandi’, mleiya Neiya Pa ava' hinni kuhung imping’, mdodit avah talu mdothena,” tidit kerkheel lamda?
43016018	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih the lamda: “Mma ngi ‘mpha mruk dil thah mdodit avah talu mdothena, tidit neen nih tedehpindit inmeh.”
43016019	'Tunnu Jisu ngi mmaan nih pau kihin nih tkheel rah mtibin lam a, tidit deithida mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “naan asingreel inni, ‘Neiyi mpha mruk thung ngi naan nih Neiya amikin nih mdei nimaan tih ungta mpha mruk dilli, Neiya amikin nih mdeinowl naandi' kdodit leiyi, kerkheelin imptih?
43016020	Neiyi naan ahinin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Mleiya naanna qapnaan ungta kurnung karbaang naandi' pdainu dultipaam a kanpa chrah. Ungta tyattraanna' perteel naandi'. pdainu ayat'araanin avah tkanpatna' akpurthuh piik raan.
43016021	Snu ngi von mchowi rang thung vah, mma' ki mpha marvanve leiyi, myatna' kurthuwkda. Pdainu mma ngi von mchowi dok dilvah, dultipaam thung ngi miikhat kqouki tkanpatna' ava ngi mirthli buwkna' avah veikhat binphaak meh.
43016022	Ungta avaleiyi 'tunnu naanna aplungin kya a. Pdainu Neiyi veikhat akurdutqhi nikaandi'. Ungta naan aplungin avah kanpa chrah ungta naan akanpatin avah kuwkhat leh ngi naan ahinki alowng pchaangin nimeh.
43016023	Ungta nit ava' thung ngi naan nih Nei kihin nih dow khatleh ruk mkheel nimaan tih. Neiyi naan ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik inna. Naan nih talutalu yoso Nei kmiing 'leenni Pa ava' hinni adoqhil chaakin avah Mma ngi akpii raan.
43016024	'Tun kpha thung vah naan nih Nei kmiing ngi dow khatleh qhil maantih. naan akanpatin avah mkurkhumna' rang ki thenni naan nih aqhil chaan, phang chnaandi'.
43016025	Hava'le' avah Neiyi naan ahin nih pauril lih kthe a. Pdainu Neiyi naan ahin nih pauril lih kdothe mana' mpha avah karvang kcha' a. Ungta Pa ava' ki mlei avah, Neiyi kindit tih aparjaak nikaandi'.
43016026	Nit ava' thung ngi naan nih Nei kmiing 'leenni qhil chnaandi' ungta Pa ava' hinni Neiyi naan athenni aqhilpiik nikaandi', dimaang.
43016027	Mleiya Pa, mdakkat tih naan avah von'adotapsat chaak dokin. Mleiya naan nih Nei vonsat adotolow chaakin. Ungta naan nih Neiya Isowr hinki kurjung ping tidit lam'adotrin chaakin.
43016028	Neiyi Pa ava' hinki dultipaam thung ngi arjungnu ungta veikhat dultipaam manikdon Pa ava' hinni hung nikdi'.”
43016029	Msikhu rekki Mhin nih the lamda: “Asuw o, 'tunvah pauril lih them tih ungta ko'oltek ki athe a.
43016030	'Tunnu neen nih Nang nga dow mkheng adeh a tidit kdeh chaak inna ungta kuwkhat leh ngi ahin nih dow khatleh ruk adotkheel rah ammeh. Havah ngi neen nih Nang nga Isowr hinki ptih tidit lam'krin chaak inna.”
43016031	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “'Tun row ngi naan nih lam'atrin chaak inna?
43016032	Asuwn, mpha avah karvang meeksli a, ungta mpha avah kvei dok a. Mleiya naanna kerjeiter chnaandi' ungta mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mmun thah sunter chdon, Neiya kthina daat tih makmapthi lamrah. Anto'daat yoso Neiya kthina daat pmaang mleiya Pa ava ngi mdota'amqhi.
43016033	Naan nih Nei kihin nih plung kdai adothlowi chaakna' raan ki thenni, Neiyi hava' dow rek avah ahinin nih kdothe dok. Naan nih dultipaam thung ngu suwkthuh chiireelna' perteel naandi'. Pdainu aningin pqitmaan mleiya Neiyi dultipaam avah kapchaan dok a.”
43017001	Jisu ngi hava' pauna rek ava' thethida parvaan hansuwda ungta hanto'theda: “Apa mpha avah kvei dok a, Achapa rukku adotponlor chaakna' rah, Achapa avah aponlor cha'.
43017002	Nang ngi Mma' hinni daksa mkheng rek 'leenni ruhtan adopiik heppi, Mma' hinni Nang ngi adopiik dok khimkhei rek hinni Mma ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum mdopiikna' rah, Mmah ruhtan apii cha'.
43017003	Ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah hava' tidit tah mmaan nih, Nang nga mkindit kat Isowr ptih ungta Nang ngi adoyukpthlat Jisu Khrista avah adeipindih chlamso.
43017004	Neiyi Nang nga dultipaam thung ngu akponlor chaak dok. Nang ngi kdotlot rah adotpiik nong avah kupqut chaak dok a.
43017005	'Tunnu O Apa, dultipaam ma'am duduh ngi Nang tu' konlor dok ki ka'am chaakna' ava ngi, Neiya Nang adak ki mheiponlor cha'.
43017006	Neiyi, Amiing avah, Nei kihin nih adotpiik dok dultipaam ki mii rek hinni kpandan chaak a. Ungta mmaan avah kihin nih adotpiik dok, Nang amii reklam. Ungta mmaan nih Nang apauna rek avah mdopqowi chaakin.
43017007	'Tunnu mmaan nih mdeh chaak dokin tidit tah talutalu yoso, Nei kihin nih adotpiik chaak dow mkheng avah Nang ahinki.
43017008	Mleiya Nang ngi adotpiik chaak pauna rek avah mmaan hinni Neiyi kdopiik chaak doklam. Ungta mmaan nih avah arlaang chlamda ungta Neiya Nang ahinki kurjung tidit mmaan nih dakat tih mdeh chaak dokin. Ungta mmaan nih Neiya Nang ngi adotyuksi tidit avah lam'mdorin chaak dokin.
43017009	Neiyi mmaan thenni rinkaktham kcha' ping. Neiyi dultipaam ki thenni rinktham chmaang pdainu Nang ngi Nei kihin nih adotpiik dok rekki thenni rinkaktham kcha' ping. Mleiya mmaan nah Nang adow reklam.
43017010	Ungta Nei kdow rek mkheng avah Nang adow. Ungta Nang adow rek avah Nei kdo. Mleiya Neiya avale' thung ngi konlor kcha' dok ping.
43017011	'Tunnu Apa, Neiya dultipaam thung ngi amporson rang maang, Nang ahin nih kurhung kcha' imping. Pdainu hava'le' avah dultipaam thung ngi ka'am daat lam a. Apa Kchiir, Nang ngi adotpiik chaak dok rek mmaan avah Neenve heppi khadaat tih ma'amdehna' raan, Amiingkat 'leenni mmaan avah mheithiik piikcha' lam.
43017012	Neiyi dultipaam thuh, mmaan tung ngi ka'am thung ngi mmaan avah Nang amiing 'leenni kdothiik chaak lam. Nang ngi Nei kihin nih adotpiik dok rek mmaan avah Neiyi kdorun chaak lam. Pdainu Kchiir laika thung ngi mdokjit dok ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni mmaan arlak ki kenvei kcha' rang chapa ava' kma'don, mmaan kuwkhat leh ruk kenvei kcha' ammeh.
43017013	'Tunnu Neiya Nang ahin nih kurhung kcha' imping. Ungta Nei kkanpatna' avah mmaan thung ngi mkurkhumna' rah Neiyi hava' dow rek avah dultipaam thung ngi kdothe.
43017014	Neiyi Nang apauna avah mmaan hinni kpiik doklam ungta dultipaam mih mmaan avah mdohal chaakin. Mleiya Neiyi dultipaam ki kkurthuhma heppi mmaan avah dultipaam ki lam pemeh.
43017015	Neiyi mmaan avah dultipaam thungki alou doklam, dida rinktham chmaang. Pdainu Nang ngi mmaan avah kqha kma' thungki mheirun piik chlam.
43017016	Neiyi dultipaam ki kkurthuhma heppi mmaan avah dultipaam ki lam pemeh.
43017017	Nang apauna avah kindit. Nang ki akinditna' ava ngi mmaan avah apenje chlam.
43017018	Nang ngi Nei avah dultipaam thung ngi adoyuktsi heppi Nei rukku mmaan avah dultipaam thung ngi ksi chaak lam a.
43017019	Nang ngi mmaan avah kindit ava ngi adopenje chaak lamna' rah, mmaan thenni, Neiyi kdaksa avah kpenje kcha' ping.
43017020	Neiyi hava'le' ki then daat chrel lih rinktham chmaang, pdainu hava'le' pauna thungki ngi lammikrin kcha' rang rekki then rukku rinkaktham kcha' ping.
43017021	Apa, Nang ngi Nei kthung ngi amtinu, ungta Neiyi Nang athung ngi ka'am chaak ava' heppi, mmaan mkheng rukka khadaat mkurthuhna' raan ki thenni, mmaan thenni rinkaktham kcha' ping. Ungta mmaan nih neenve nthung ngi khadaat mkurthuhna' raan ki thenni, rinkaktham kcha' ping. Mleiya dultipaam mih Neiya Nang ngi adoyuktsi, tidit lam'mdorin chaakna' raan, mmaan nih khadaat mkurthuh raan.
43017022	Ungta mmaan rukka Neenve ngi khadaat tkurthuh heppi khadaat mkurthuhna' raan, Nang ngi adotpiik tkonlorna' avah Neiyi mmaan hinni kdopiik chaak doklam.
43017023	Neiyi mmaan avah khadaat tih kdopurkhum deek pchaan lamna' rah, Neiyi mmaan thung ngi amnu ungta Nang ngi Nei kthung ngi amtinu. Ungta dultipaam mih Nei avah Nang ngi adoyuktsi ungta Nang ngi mmaan avah, Nei von'adotapsat heppi vonsat adolow chaak lam, tidit mdodehna' raanni Neiyi mmaan thung ngi amnu ungta Nang ngi Nei kthung ngi amtinu.
43017024	Apa, Neiyi Nang ngi adotpiik dok rek mmaan avah, Nei ka'amna' mun thung ngi ma'am raan kngei a. Mleiya mmaan nih Nang ngi Nei kihin nih adotpiik chaak kkonlorna' avah mmikin nih adei chlamso. Mleiya dultipaam mapqhanduh duh ngi, Nang ngi Neiya vonsat adotolow chaak dok.
43017025	Mrinkindit Apa, dultipaam mih Nang nga adeipindih meh. Pdainu Neivah adokdeh chaak ungta hava' mii rekki Neiya Nang ngi adoyuktsi tidit avah mdeh chaakin.
43017026	Ungta Neiyi Nang amiing avah mmaan hinni kdopdeh chaak doklam. Ungta Nang ngi Nei kihin nih vonsat adotolow chaakna' vonsat avah mmaan hinni ma'amna' rah ungta Neiyi mmaan thung ngi ka'amna' rah, Neiyi kdopdeh chaak lam.”
43018001	Jisu ngi hava'le' khimkhei mthe dok dilli Msikhu rektu' Kedron prah raalpha thah vah lamda. Ungta mmun ava' thung ngi bil khat ka'am ungta Mma ngi Msikhu rek tung ngi mthung ngi luwt lamda.
43018002	Ungta Jisu kyur chrang Judas rukku mmun avah mdodeh. Mleiya Jisu ngi mmun ava' thuh Msikhu rek tung ngi kurduh tlit kchok lam.
43018003	Audilli Judas tih thimpu kenreel rekle' Pharisy rek hinki miilop khat le' koprol rek qhida bil ava' thung ngi klachowi ksin le' meila ksin ungta raaldona ksin rek tya tu' thleng lamda.
43018004	Jisu ngi Mma' 'leenni kthuwk rang dow mkheng mdodeh dok leiyi, heipha lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Kuwda naan nih adothlaam inna?”
43018005	Mmaan nih arthaang lamda: “Najareth ki Jisu.” Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya Mma' ping.” Ungta Mma' kyur kcha' Judas avah mmaan arlak ki krip daat.
43018006	Mma ngi ‘Neiya Mma' ping’, mdit daat le' mmaan nih kunqhunsowk lamda ungta dulti thah tlu lamda.
43018007	Audilli Mma ngi veikhat kheelnowl lamda: “Kuw plih, naan nih adothlaam inna?” Ungta mmaan nih the lamda: “Najareth ki Jisu.”
43018008	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi, ‘Neiya Mma' ping' dinuh akthepiik dokin kmah? Naan nih Nei atthlaamin cheentung ngi hava'le' avah apsunpthi dokin.”
43018009	Mleiya Mma ngi, ‘Nang ngi Nei kihin nih adotpiik dok rek avah khadaat ruk penvei maang’, dida mdothe ava' mkurkhumna' rang ki thenni Mma ngi havah mdothe.
43018010	Audilli Simon Pitar rih raal'kaang mdosin daat ava' turthuhda ungta thimpu kenreelsi suwk khat avah duwda, mchang ktong ki makna sellotda. Ungta suwk miing avah Melkas, mdit.
43018011	Audilli Jisu ngi Simon Pitar hinni hanto'theda: “Raal'kaang avah mkokthuh adaal dok. Kpa ngi mdotpiik dok tong avah Neiyi nee nimaang mow?”
43018012	Audilli, koprol khat doqhi raalmii loppii rekle' Jihudi rekki luwbuk'inn krung rekki, Jisu avah raanqhul lih kyowng lamda ungta bowl lamda.
43018013	Ungta mmaan nih mkum ava' ki thimpu kenreelsi kkurthuwk Kaiaphas ktarpa Anna hinni rukri reppi Mma' avah vanqhi lamda.
43018014	'Tunnu Kaiaphas avah Jihudi rek hinni paukperseel kchok ungta ‘mii mkheng ki thenni miikhat mdiyow ngi kqha', tidit kthe ava'.
43018015	Ungta Simon Pitar le' sikhu morson khat tih Jisu dil avah qowi chlamda. Mleiya sikhu avah thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi mdodeh pindit ungta mma ngi Jisu tu' thimpu kenreelsi inndulbuk kpha thung ngi vangluwtve lamda.
43018016	Pdainu Pitar rah thurngut duwn thah krip chdaat. Avaleiyi, thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi mdodeh pindit sikhu morson khat ava ngi vangthuwkda thurngut krung ava' hinni theda, Pitar avah thung thah pluwt chda.
43018017	Audilli thurngut krung snusuwk ava ngi Pitar hinni hanto'theda: “Nang rukka hava' mii ava' ki sikhu rek arlak ki khat ptipmeh?” Mma ngi, “Neiya ava' pmaang,” dida.
43018018	Ungta ava' thuh krip suwk rekle' koprol rek ava ngi, mdai leiyi, prel bung lamda mei mdo'otin. Ungta Pitar rukka mmaan tu' ripda mei mdo'ot chaak.
43018019	Thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi Msikhu rekle' Mma ngi mdopurchuhna' leiyi, pau kheelda.
43018020	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi dultipaam thung ngi kurphuwng ngi kpau ping. Neiyi Sinegog rek thung ngi ungta luwbuk'inn thung ngi purchuk nuh, ava' thung ngi Jihudi rekki mpha ktai thleng kchok lamda ungta Neiyi tuprut tih kdothe dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.
43018021	Taluleiyi nang ngi Nei kihin nih atkheel a? Neiyi kdothe karja rek hinni, Neiyi talu kthe tidit avah akheel chaan. Ungta asuw! mmaan nih Neiyi kdothe avah mdehn,” dida.
43018022	Ungta Mma ngi hava' mthe thungta, mbeh ngi krip daat koprol rek khat ava ngi Jisu a mapya ngi tpeengda. Ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi thimpu kenreelsi khat pau avah anto ngi ado'arthaan rang mow?”
43018023	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi kqha kma' kthe cheentung ngi kqha kma' ki sakhi apii, pdainu kqha mkurthuh u, taluleiyi nang ngi Neiya atetpeenna?”
43018024	'Tunnu Anna ngi Jisu avah tbowldaat tih thimpu kenreelsi Kaiaphas hinni heipthlada.
43018025	Ungta Simon Pitar rah ripda mei mdo'ot chaak. Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mhin nih the lamda: “Nang rukka sikhu rek arlak ki khat ptipmeh?” Mma ngi matda ungta “Neiya ava' kmaang,” dida.
43018026	Thimpu kenreelsi suwk rek arlak ki khat, Pitar rih makna mdosellot rilam kthuwk khat tih hanto'theda: “Bil thung ngi Mma' tu' kilqhi kmik ki adokdehya, nang kmeh mow?”
43018027	Pitar rih veikhat matnowlda, ungta m'tunkat daat tih har khuwngda.
43018028	Audilli mmaan nih jiingsun kpanma ngi Jisu avah Kaiaphas hinki ngi Paamkpu'inn thah vanqhi lamda. Pdainu mmaan mdakin avah Paamkpu'inn thung ngi vangkluwt lam pemeh. Mleiya ava' thuh mluwn bih, kbur chlam rah. Pdainu Taplaanna' ki kmaal ava' thung ngi mmaal chaakna' raan ki thenni vangkluwt lam pemeh.
43018029	Audilli Pilaat tih vangthuwk thida, mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' mii ava' kepteng ngi mraal talu apiik inna?”
43018030	Audilli mmaan nih arthaang lamda ungta mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Mma ngi kthi ktlow kma' mkurthuh bih neen nih Mma' avah nang ahin nih aparlaan nimaanring.”
43018031	Audilli Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mma' avah naan nih vanqhi chaan ungta naanki anowlamin dilkqowiyi pau'apindit chaan.” Pdainu Jihudi rekki mhin nih the lamda: “Neen nih miikhat kdo'eyow raan avah nowlam mih mdorot pemeh.”
43018032	Jisu ngi talu diyow ngi diyoubei nikdi' tidit mdothe dok ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni mmaan nih havah mdotheen.
43018033	Audilli Pilaat tih Paamkpu'inn thung ngi veikhat vangluwt nowlda. Ungta mma ngi Jisu ownda Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng pti?”
43018034	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Nang ngi havah athina ki aplungbin nih adothemo, mii morson nih Nei kleiyi adotthepiik pli?”
43018035	Pilaat tih arthaangda: “Neiya Jihudi kmaang, Nang achaat kat rekle' thimpu kenreel rekki, Nang nga Nei kihin nih mdotparlaan lam. Nang ngi talu adotlot ma'amna ngi?”
43018036	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Neiki kruwngpaalna' avah hava' dultipaam ki pemeh. Neiki kruwngpaalna' ava ngi hava' dultipaam ki mkurthuh daat tlaang bih, Nei mokbom rekki Jihudi rek khut thuh mdotparlaan mana'rah ker'eqhi lamrah. Pdainu 'tunnu Neiki kruwngpaalna' avah hava' dultipaam ki pemeh.”
43018037	Avaleiyi, Pilaat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mdittu' Nang nga Paamkruwng khat pti?” Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Nang ngi Neiya ‘paamkruwng khat pti' adotidit avah mkindit kat athe a. Neiya hava'rang ki thenni kqou ping ungta hava' leiyi dultipaam thung ngi Neiya kurjung ping. Mleiya Neiyi kindit ava' kpha ngi sakhi avah kdopiik rah. Ungta kindit thung ngi ka'am kcha' rek khimkheiyi Nei kokrowl avah mdo'arjaak chaakin.”
43018038	Pilaat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kindit avah taluda?” Ungta mma ngi hava' mthe dok le' veikhat Jihudi rek hinni vangthuwk nowlda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi Mma' thung ngi mraal dow khatleh phangmaang.
43018039	Pdainu naanki anowpaan khat ka'am, tidit tah Taplaanna' ki kmaal ava' thung ngi neiyi naan ahin nih miikhat adokapthlat piik raan. Avaleiyi, neiyi Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng ava' adokapthlat piik raan angei inna?”
43018040	Audilli mmaan mkheng inni owng lamda: “Hava' mii ava'rang pemeh, pdainu Barabbas rah,” dilamda! 'Tunnu Barabbas avah raanqhul kupru miikhat.
43019001	Audilli Pilaat tih Jisu qhida ungta Mmah tpubun lamda.
43019002	Ungta raalmii rekki luwkhum rah tirling purkul lamda ungta mluw thah pkhum lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kning ngi ksen phriktluwn pnaak lamda.
43019003	Ungta mmaan nih: ‘Akurvuwi chaak inna Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng’, dilamda, ning'er rih bi chlamda ungta mkhutin nih tpeeng lamda.
43019004	Avaleiyi, Pilaat tih vangthuwk nowlda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Asuwn, neiyi Mma' thung ngi mraal khadaat ruk phangmaang tidit adodehna' raan ki thenni Mma' avah naan ahin nih akupthuh piik inna.”
43019005	Audilli Jisu a tirling luwkhum khumda ungta kning ngi ksen phriktluwn nada arvang thuwkda. Ungta Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii avah asuw chaan.”
43019006	Avaleiyi, thimpu kenreel rekle' koprol rekki Mma' mdehn thungta, owng lamda: “Mmah khros 'leenni apthowiyou in, Mmah khros 'leenni apthowiyou in,” dilamda.’ Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih vanqhiin rang ngi apthowiyou chaan mleiya Neiya Mma' thung ngi mraal khadaat ruk phangmaang.”
43019007	Jihudi rekki arthaang lamda: “Neen nih nowlam khat kthlowi'in, ungta neenki nowlam ki dilkqowiyi Mmah mdiyow rang thah ktla. Mleiya Mma ngi Isowr Chapa kpurthuh chda.”
43019008	Ungta Pilaat tih ava' mdotheen marjaak nowl thungta kdung ngi mningpqitda.
43019009	Ungta veikhat mma ngi Paamkpu'inn thung ngi vangluwt thida Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Nang nga tva'paam ki pti?” Pdainu Jisu ngi arthaangsi mda.
43019010	Audilli Pilaat tih Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang nga kihin nih pau thesi nimtih? Neiyi Nang nga khros 'leen adokopthowi yowna'rang ruk ungta adokapthlat pthina' rang ki ruhtan ruk kdothlowi avah dei mtimow?”
43019011	Jisu ngi arthaangda: “Karthak ki ngi nang ahin nih adotpiik kma'don nih, nang ngi k'leen nih dow khatleh ruk adotlot pchaanna' ruhtan thlowi nimtih. Avaleiyi, nang ahin nih Nei makparlaan kcha' mma' ava ngi pnu klin merve chaak a.”
43019012	Ungta audilli Pilaat tih Mma' avah mdopthlat pthina' rah tlowda, pdainu Jihudi rekki owng lamda: “Nang ngi hava' mii ava' apthlatpthi bih, nang nga Siijar plap ptipmeh, ungta kuwku yoso mdak ki paamkruwng kpurthuh kcha' mii ava ngi Siijar kepthleiyi kpau a.”
43019013	Avaleiyi, Pilaat tih hava' pau marjaak thungta mma ngi Jisu avah arvan pthuwkda. Ungta mma ngi Lungquwnglai, Hibriu pau vih ‘Gabatha’ mdodit, pau tpinditna' longkhom 'leenni ko'ongda.
43019014	Ungta nit avah Taplaanna' nit ki thenni tkorthlon chaakna' nit kurthuwkda. Ungta qhang truk arveel mtlaak thungta, Mma ngi Jihudi rek hinni hanto'theda: “Naanki Paamkruwng avah, Asuwn!”
43019015	Pdainu mmaan nih owng lamda: “Mma' avah aqhi dokin, Mma' avah aqhi dokin ungta khros 'leenni apthowiyou in,” dilamda. Pilaat tih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naanki Paamkruwng avah neiyi khros 'leenni pthowiyou nikmow?” Thimpu kenreel rekki arthaang lamda: “Neenna Siijar kma'don paamkruwng morson thlowi maanring.”
43019016	Mthungta mma ngi Mma' avah khros 'leenni mdopthowiyow chaakna' raan ki thenni parlaan pthi lamda. Mthungta mmaan nih Jisu avah qhi lamda ungta sunqhi lamda.
43019017	Ungta Mma ngi mdaksa ki khros avah kdomda, luwruh mun mdoditin mun thah hangda. Ungta mmun avah Hibriu pau vih ‘Golgotha’ mdit.
43019018	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' mdopthowi yow naan ava' thung ngi morson 'knii rek rukka pthowiyou lamda. Ungta mmaan nih paang khat terthah khatkhat ungta mmalai inni Jisu avah pthowiyou lamda.
43019019	Ungta Pilaat tih miingkbih khat kjitda ungta avah khros 'leenni daarda. Ungta jiiktikjit avah: ‘NAJARETH KI JISU, JIHUDI REKKI PAAMKRUWNG’ dida.
43019020	Ungta Jisu mdopthowi yownaan mun avah khuwpii hintek mkurthuh leiyi, Jihudi mii knempok ki miing kbih avah parchamda lamda. Ungta jiiktikjit avah Hibriu ungta Grik ungta Latin pau vih tikjit.
43019021	Audilli Jihudi rekki thimpu kenreel rekki Pilaat hinni the lamda: “ ‘Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng’, dida kjitma', pdainu, ‘Neiya, Jihudi rekki Paamkruwng ping’, mdodit, adira, akjit.”
43019022	Pdainu Pilaat tih arthaangda: “Neiyi kdokjit dok avah tikjit dok.”
43019023	Audilli raalmii rekki Jisu mopthowiyown thung ngi, mbuwmdiir rek avah loupthi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih tum plii kthuwk ki penqheek lamda ungta raalmii ktai ki tum khatkhat kpurtum lamda. Pdainu Mphriktluwn avah ka'am chdaat. 'Tunnu mphriktluwn avah tititna' ktaak ki mutluwnni torkhown.
43019024	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi the lamda: “Neen nih havah kqet maan cheh pdainu kuw dow kurthuwk chrang a tidit ki thenni pchalpiik sutnaan cheh,” dilamda. Mleiya Kchiir laika thung ngi hanto'theda: “Mmaan nih kbuwdiir rek avah marlak inni penthem chlamda. Ungta kiphriktluwn ava' 'leenni pchalpiik sutna' lamda,” (Luw. 22:18) mdodit ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni, raalmii rekki hava'le' avah mdotlotin.
43019025	'Tunnu Jisu khros beh ngi Mnuh a rip daatda ungta Mnuh naunuh, Kleopas nuwn Mary le' Magdala ki Mary le' rukka kripsap daat lam.
43019026	Jisu ngi Mnuh le' Mvonsatlow chaak sikhu ava' krip daat mdeh thungta, Mma ngi Mnuh hinni hanto'theda: “Snu, achapa asuw cha'!”
43019027	Audilli Mma ngi sikhu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Anuh asuw cha'!” Ungta qhang ava' thung ki kupqhun nih sikhu ava ngi snu avah mi'inn thah junqhi chda.
43019028	Hava' dilli, Jisu ngi dow mkheng avah 'tunnu kqudok a tidit deida. Ungta Kchiir laika kurkhumna' rang leiyi, ‘Kningkakraal a,’ dida.
43019029	'Tunnu ava' thung ngi thowldii kdor kcha' beel kdimteer khat kok'ong daat. Ungta mmaan nih buwphown avah thowldii kdor thung ngi phuwm lam thida hyssop kuwng 'leenni daar lamda ungta Mnehr thung ngi handen lamda.
43019030	Ungta Jisu ngi thowldii kdor mpertem dilli Mma ngi hanto'theda: “'Tunnu kqu kcha' a,” dida. Ungta Mma ngi tunguwi chda ungta Mapthlarin avah pthla pthida.
43019031	Mleiya mnit avah tporthlonna’ nit mkurthuh leiyi, mmaan daksa rek avah tkarngatnit tih khros 'leenni mokthowi daat raan avah ngei lam mda. Mleiya tkarngatnit avah nit klinsi. Avaleiyi, Jihudi rekki Pilaat hinni mmaan avah mkhuhn punthum thida tupqumpthi lamna' rah ktham chlamda.
43019032	Audilli raalmii rekki Mma' tu' mdopthowiyow rekin arlak ki mkhatna' ungta morson khat tah mkhuhn punthum lamda.
43019033	Pdainu mmaan nih Jisu marvan phaakin thungta Mmah choduh duh ngi mdiyow chaak dok avah dei lamda. Avaleiyi, Mmah mkhuh punthum lammeh.
43019034	Pdainu raalmii rek arlak ki khat tih Mjii thah kcheiyi hanthunda. Ungta ava' thung ki hii le' dii thuwkda.
43019035	Ungta kdei kcha' mma' ava ngi ava' ki rinpaumin avah piida ungta mma' rinpauminpiik avah mkindit kat ava'. Mleiya naan nih lam'adorin chaakna' raan ki thenni mma ngi kindit kthe a tidit deida.
43019036	Kchiir laika ngi: ‘Mma' ruh rek avah khadaat ruk beng nimeh’, (Mpk. 12:46 Cha. 9:12 Luw. 34:20) mdodit. Ungta hava' dow rek khimkhei avah tikjit dok ava' kurkhumna' rang ki thenni thuwkda.
43019037	Ungta veikhat Kchiir laika morson thung ngi the nowlda: “Mmaan nih kcheiyi mdothunin Mma' avah ksuw lamrah.” (Jkh. 12:10)
43019038	Ungta hava' dilli Jihudi rek kqikcha ngi kandang pchaang kma' tuprut tih Jisu sikhu kurthuwk kcha', Arimathia ki Joseph tidit miikhat ka'am. Ungta mma ngi Pilaat hinni Jisu kluwng avah mdolow chaakna' rah ktham chda. Ungta Pilaat tih mmah rotpiikda. Avaleiyi, mma ngi arhangda Jisu kluwng avah lou chda.
43019039	Ungta choduh ngi Jisu hinni jaan nih kthleng kcha', Nikodimas rukka Mhin nih thlengda. Mma ngi myrrh le' aloe tporchou reidii kilo somkdum leiparnga arveel krik rah arhansinda.
43019040	Audilli mmaanve ngi Jisu kluwng avah lou lamda, Jihudi rek kulruwlna' nowpa dilkqowiyi buw kperneem mih reidii rektu' klumdeek lamda.
43019041	'Tunnu Mma' mdopthowinaan mun ava' thung ngi bil khat ka'am. Ungta bil ava' thung ngi kuwkhat leh tithiikna' mlai thlaankhor ren khat ka'am.
43019042	Mleiya nit avah Jihudi rek karngatnit ki thenni tkorthlonna' nit mkurthuh leiyi, ungta thlaan avah mnai leiyi, Jisu avah ava' thung ngi alruwl chlamda.
43020001	Arveen ki mkhatna' nit tih, kparma ngi, mjiindaat arlaan nih Magdala ki Mary ngi thlaan thah hangda. Ungta mma ngi thlaankhor 'leenki lung korlou chdok avah deida.
43020002	Audilli mma ngi arjung chenda, Simon Pitar le' Jisu vonsat'low sikhu ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Mmaan nih Kruwng avah thlaan thungki mlowpthi dok inna ungta tva'thah mthiik dokin tidit deimaan ring.”
43020003	Avaleiyi, Simon Pitar le' sikhu morson khat avah thlaan thah hang lamda.
43020004	Mthungta mikniing inni hangchen lamda ungta sikhu morson khat ava ngi Pitar chenkheelda choduh thlaan avah hanphada.
43020005	Ungta mma ngi tpeda mheisut thungta buw kperneem rek avah ka'am daat deida, pdainu thlaan thung vah vangluwt meh.
43020006	Audilli mma' dilkqowiyi Simon Pitar arhan tlungda. Ungta mma ngi thlaan thung ngi vangluwtda, buw kperneem rek ka'am daat avah deida.
43020007	Ungta Mluw 'leenki parthlandau avah ava' thuh ka'am buw kperneem rektu' amsap mda. Pdainu msik ki kerthlep deek ki mmun msik khat thung ngi amdaatda.
43020008	Audilli thlaan thuh rukri hangktlung dok sikhu morson ava' rukka vangluwtda, deida ungta mma ngi lam'rin chda.
43020009	Mleiya mmaan nih ava' kpha thung rukku, Kchiir laika thung ngi tikjit: ‘Mma ngi kdiyou thungki kring kerheel rah’, mdodit avah mdodeh pindit chaakin pemeh.
43020010	Audilli sikhu rek avah mi'inn thaan nih veikhat jungsun kerheel lamda.
43020011	Pdainu Mary a qapda thlaan beh ngi krip chdaat ungta mqa chunni mma ngi tpeda thlaan thung ngi heisuwda.
43020012	Ungta mma ngi kpowldang dang ngi korthlong vaantamsi 'knii avah Jisu kluwng mdothiiknaan thung ngi, khat tih mluwqhun thah ungta morson khat tih mkhuhther thah kok'ong daat lam deida.
43020013	Ungta mmaanve ngi mhin nih the lamda: “Snu, taluleiyi nang nga kqap ptil lih?” Mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Mleiya mmaan nih Neiki Kruwng avah loupthi dok lamda ungta neiyi tva'thah mthiik dokin tidit deimaang.”
43020014	Ungta mma ngi antomthe dok daat le' mma ngi mdil mkerheel thungta Jisu ava' thung ngi krip daat deida, pdainu mma ngi avah Jisu tidit tah deimda.
43020015	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Snu taluleiyi, nang nga kqap ptil lih, ungta kuw kthlaam ptil lih?” Mma' vah bilkrung miipakda, dida Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ocha, nang ngi Mma' avah aneenpthi dok cheentung ngi, adothiikna' mun avah mheithe piikcha' low, ungta neiyi Mma' avah ava' thung ki lou chnih.”
43020016	Jisu ngi mhin nih, “Mary,” dida ownda. Ungta mma ngi kerheelda Mhin nih, “Rabboni,” dida, tidit tah Chukpu, mdoditna'.
43020017	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Mokyowngma', mleiya Neiya Kpa hinni hungkal mlairing. Pdainu vang rang ngi ku'uknau rek hinni, Neiyi Nei Kpa ungta naan A'paan ungta Neiki Isowr ungta naanki Isowr ava' hinni hung nikdi', mdit, adi rang ngi athepiik lam,” dida.
43020018	Magdala ki Mary ngi arvangda, mma ngi Kruwng avah kmik ki kdeh chaak ungta Mma ngi hava' dow rek avah theda, tidit avah sikhu rek hinni song chda.
43020019	Audilli arveen ki mkhatna' nit tih, kluw thang ngi sikhu rekka kurtuwl chlamda. Pdainu mmaan nih Jihudi rek mdoqit chaak inni thurngut arkammer lamda. Anto'daat yoso, Jisu ngi marlak inni thuwkda, mningqimin kat tih ripda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Plung kdai ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.”
43020020	Ungta Mma ngi hanto' mthe dok dilli, mmaan hinni mkhut rekle' mjii avah tedet lamda. Audilli, mmaan nih Kruwng mdodeh chaakin leiyi, sikhu rekka kanpa chlamda.
43020021	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni veikhat the nowlda: “Plung kdai ahinin nih i'amso, Kpa ngi Nei mdotsi heppi, Nei rukku naan avah aksi inna.”
43020022	Ungta Mma ngi hava' mthe dok le' Mma ngi m'leenin nih Mtadaal muwpiik lamda ungta mhinin nih hanto'theda: “Naan nih Pthla Kchiir avah karlaang kcha' ikurthuwkin.
43020023	Kuwku yoso, naan nih mupnu arve adoptlot piik dokin avah toptlot piik dok ungta kuwku yoso naan nih mupnu arve adoptlot piikmaan avah toptlot piik meh.”
43020024	Pdainu kinphiir mdoditin Thomas, sowm lei'knii rek arlak ki khat avah, Jisu merhei thung vah ka'am pemeh.
43020025	Avaleiyi, sikhu morson rekki mhin nih the lamda: “Neen nih Kruwng avah kmikin nih kdeh chaakin.” Pdainu mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi Mkhut 'leenki jowtpii kbih deida, mthung ngi kukhutchal thunda ungta Mjii thung ngi kukhut tih thunda kdehduh khimkheiyi, lam'rin nimaang.”
43020026	Ungta niitreht dilli sikhu rek avah inn thung ngi kurtuwl nowl lamda. Ungta Thomas rukka marlak inni yauda, ungta thurngut arkammer chleeklam yoso Jisu ngi marlak inni thuwk khotda mningqimin kat tih ripda. Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Plung kdai ahinin nih i'amso.”
43020027	Audilli Mma ngi Thomas hinni hanto'theda: “Akhut arheikhiing ungta akhutchal lih athun rang ngi kukhut avah asuw, lamkrin kma' tlowma', lam'arin cha'.”
43020028	Ungta Thomas tih arthaangda ungta Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiki Kruwng ungta Neiki Isowr!”
43020029	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Thomas, nang ngi amik ki adotedeh dok leiyi, lam'atrin chaak a, pdainu mmik ki mdeh chaakduduh ngi lam'krin kcha' mmaan avah msuwkin kqha.”
43020030	Ungta hava' laika thung ngi tikjit dokmah, titinna' knempok ki, rek maiyi Jisu ngi mdotlot ka'am.
43020031	Pdainu Jisu a Mesaiah ava' ungta Isowr Chapa ava' tidit lam'adorin chaakna' raan ungta alamrin chaak inni, naan nih Mma' miing 'leenni rinkum adothlowi chaakna' raan ki thenni, hava' dow rek khimkhei avah tikjit.
43021001	Hava'le' khimkhei dilli, Jisu ngi Taiberia truwnpii thung ngi sikhu rek hinni mdak ki veikhat kterdet nowl lamda. Ungta Mma ngi hanto' heppi kperdeh chlamda.
43021002	Ava' thung ngi Simon Pitar le' kinphiir mdoditin Thomas ungta Galily paam ki kana khuw thungki Nathanel ungta Jebedi chapa rek ungta sikhu morson rek 'knii rukka ka'amsap daat lam.
43021003	Simon Pitar rih mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Neiya tuwlvah kse rah chet chnih.” Ungta mmaan nih mma' hinni the lamda: “Neen rukka nang aqowi nikaan.” Ungta mmaan nih chet lamda arkuwng khat thung ngi luwtteng lamda pdainu ava' nit ki jaanvah dow khadaat ruk kyowng lam mda.
43021004	'Tunnu, jiingsun mphaak thungta, diibiing ngi Jisu a rip daatda, pdainu sikhu rekki Mmah Jisu tidit tah dei chlam mda.
43021005	Audilli Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Nausisi rek, thendamlu athlowi ngaalin mowi?” Ungta mmaan nih: “Immeh,” dilamda arthaang lamda.
43021006	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Arkuwng machang ktong thah aleensinin avah adeengin ungta naan nih mruk kyowng naandi'.” Avaleiyi, mmaan nih leen avah ava' thuh deeng lamda ungta tuwlvah knemreen nih mdokhum dokin leiyi, leen avah qen turthuh pchaang lam mda.
43021007	Avaleiyi, Jisu vonsat low sikhu ava ngi, Pitar hinni hanto'theda: “Havah Kruwng ava'.” 'Tunnu Simon Pitar rih, “havah Kruwng ava',” tidit marjaak thungta, dona kna kmah ngi ma'am leiyi, mma ngi miphriktluwn ava' nateng thida, truwnpii thung ngi jungluwt dokda.
43021008	Ungta arkuwng kdil khat thung ngi sikhu morson rek avah arva lamda. Mleiya mmaan amna' avah laan thungki lamklapa pemeh, mitar somtku arveel daat rah ungta mmaan nih tuwlvah pum leen avah laan thah qenthuh lamda.
43021009	Mmaan nih laan mphaak daatin le' prel lih tbun mei 'leenni tuwlvah trow meek ungta ava' thuh thenpen ka'am daat dei lamda.
43021010	Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih 'tunkat adokyownin tuwlvah avah mruk arvansin inno.”
43021011	Simon Pitar rih vada tuwlvah kdimteer rih ka'am leen avah laan thah qen pthuwkda. Ungta mdokyownin tuwlvah rek avah klinlik ki arja khat somparnga leikdumtet pdainu antoya nem chdaat yoso leen avah takhatleh kelqet meh.
43021012	Jisu ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Arvangin, imaal dokin.” Ungta sikhu rek, kuwkhat leh ngi, “Nang nga kuw ptil lih,” tidit kheel pchaang lammeh? Mleiya Mma' avah Kruwng ava' tidit mdodeh dokin.
43021013	Audilli Jisu ngi thenpen avah vanlouda thempiik lamda ungta tuwlvah ava' rukka ava' heppi thempiik lamda.
43021014	'Tunnu Jisu ngi kdiyou thungki mkerdel dilli Msikhu rek hinni, mekperdehna' avah hava ngi mukdumna'.
43021015	Ungta mmaal dokin dilli Jisu ngi Simon Pitar hinni hanto'theda: “Jonah chapa Simon, nang ngi, Neiya dakat tih hava'le' heihin nih vonsat atolow a?” Mma ngi arthaangda: “Ong ngi Kruwng, Neiyi vonsat adoklow chaak avah Nang ngi adeh.” Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei kyausuwn rek avah apmaal deilam.”
43021016	Jisu ngi mhin nih mvei'knitna' the nowlda: “Jonah chapa Simon, nang ngi, Neiya dakat tih vonsat atolow a?” Mma ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ong ngi Kruwng, Neiyi vonsat adoklow chaak avah Nang ngi adeh.” Ungta Mma ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei kyau rek avah aqhidei lam.”
43021017	Mma ngi mhin nih mveikdumna' the nowlda: “Jonah chapa Simon, nang ngi Neiya vonsat atolow a?” ‘Nang ngi Neiya vonsat atolow a’? dida mveikdumna' kpha mdothe leiyi, Pitar rah muplung yada. Ungta mma ngi Mhin nih hanto'theda: “Kruwng, Nang ngi dow mkheng adeh, Neiyi Nang vonsat adoklow chaak avah, Nang ngi adeh.” Ungta Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei kyau rek avah apmaal deilam.
43021018	Neiyi ahin nih mkindit kat akthepiik a. Amotvah nang ngi adongei chaak dilkqowiyi ado'ana hilna tinu kirsim kcha' ptih. Ungta adongei chaak ‘lam thah kchet kcha' ptih. Pdainu aver dok dilthang vah, abaan arji tidon morson khat tih nang nga dona akapnaak rah ungta adongeima ‘lam thah akqhirah.”
43021019	Havah mma ngi talu diyow ngi diyoudon nih mma ngi Isowr avah kponlor chrang tidit mdotedetna ngi mdothe. Ungta Mma ngi hava' mthe dok dilli mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nei mheiqowi.”
