43021020	Audilli Pitar rih kerheelda msut thungta, Mma ngi vonsat mdolow chaak ungta kluwki kmaal ava' thung ngi, Mma' plung 'leenni kbiuda ungta Mhin nih, ‘Kruwng, kuw rang plih akyur chrang nga’, dida kkheel sikhu ava ngi mdilin mdoqowi lam avah deida.
43021021	Pitar rih mma' mdeh thungta Jisu hinni hanto'theda: “Kruwng mdittu' hava' miikhat avah taluhep rang o?”
43021022	Jisu ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Neiyi mmah kurjun kerheel kpha ngi i'am daatso, kdit tu' ava ngi nang ahin nih talu kthuwk a? Nang nga Nei mheiqowi.”
43021023	Audilli unau rek arlak ki hava' pauthe avah koryouda, tidit tah mmaan nih, “hava' sikhu avah diyou nimeh,” dilamda. Anto' pdainu Jisu ngi mhin nih mma' avah diyou nimeh mdodit pemeh pdainu ‘Neyi kurjun kerheel kpha ngi i'am daatso kdit tu' ava ngi nang ahin nih talu kthuwka’, mdodit?
43021024	Hava' sikhu ava ngi hava'le' khimkhei rek 'leenni rinpaumin avah piida ungta hava'le' avah mma ngi mdokjit chaak. Ungta neen nih mma' rinpaumin piik avah kindit tidit avah ndeh chaak inna.
43021025	Ungta hava'le' kma' Jisu ngi dow knempok ki mdotlot ka'am. Ungta avale' avah khatkhat tih nikjit bih, dultipaam mpumpum thung ngi ava' tikjit rang laika rek avah kiksim thuh pchaang nimeh tidit tih kbin chaak a. Amen.
44001001	O, Thiophilas, Neiyi Jisu ngi mnongtlot mdopqhunna' le' mdopurchuhna' mkheng rekki paumin avah mikniing ngi choduh ngi kdokjit chaak dok.
44001002	Parvaan thah Mma' murjuklow chaak dokduh kpha thung ngi, Mma ngi Pthla Kchiir ar'aang ngi, Mma ngi mdokchol dok ksa tamsi rek hinni paupiik rek avah pii lamda.
44001003	Msuwk thuhna' dilli Mma ngi kring imping tidit ki mkinditna' avah bitinna' rekki, Mma' mdakkat tih mmaan hinni kperdeh chlamda. Mmaan nih, Mma ngi nii somplii ma'am thung ngi mmikin nih dei lamda ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki mlei avah mmaan hinni theda.
44001004	Ungta Mma ngi mmaan tu' kmaal rang ngi ma'amsapin thung ngi, Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto' paupiik pii lamda: “Naan nih Jerusalem mada sunmaan, pdainu, naan nih Pa ava' paureel avah arda chaan, kdodit avah ado'arjaak chaak dokin.
44001005	Mleiya mkindit kat tih Johon vah diisik daat tih dii mdopluw pdainu nit mruk dil thah naan avah Pthla Kchiir thung ngi dii akupluwt raan.”
44001006	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mkurtuwlsapin thung ngi Mma' hinni hanto' the lamda, kheel chlamda: “Kruwng, 'tunvah Nang ngi kruwngpaalna' avah Isreel rek hinni penletpiik lamnadi?”
44001007	Mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Pa ava ngi Mma' ruhtan thung ngi mdo'arkhiik dok mpha mditmata mnit avah naan nih adodehnaan kqha pemeh.
44001008	Pdainu a'leenin nih Pthla Kchiir ava' murjun thung ngi naan nih ruhtan avah arlaang chnaandi'. Ungta naan nih Jerusalem thung ruk ungta Judia paam mkheng thung ruk ungta Samaria thung ruk ungta dultipaam mdonna' kpha thung ngi naan nih Neiki ksakhi kurthuwk naandi'.”
44001009	Mma ngi hava' dow rek mthe dok dilli, msutdaatin arlaan nih Mma' avah parvaan thah arjuklou chda ungta mmiksutin thungki armeiyi Mma' avah arju'arlaang chda.
44001010	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' hangkal chaakna' parvaan avah kmin nih msut chaakin arlaan nih, asuwn dona kpowl kihilkna mii 'knii rek avah mhin inni ripdaat lamda.
44001011	Ungta mmaanve ava ngi hanto' the lamda: “Galily ki mii rek, taluleiyi naan nih parvaan suwn tinu krip daat inpti? Hava' naan ahinki parvaan thah mdo’arjuk loww chaak Jisu kat avah naan nih parvaan thah mahankal adodehn heppi veikhat kurjung kerheel rah.”
44001012	Audilli mmaan nih kruwn lown ki ngi Jerusalem thah arjung kerheel lamda. Mleiya lown avah Jerusalem behki ungta mkarlatin avah tkarngatnit 'lamqowi pangdaat.
44001013	Ungta mmaan nih ma'amnaan thuh marvanluw dokin dilli, Pitar, Johon, James le' Andria, Philip le' Thomas, Bartholomio le' Metthiu, Alphius chapa James ungta Jealot mdoditin Simon ungta James chapa Judah le'lim avah karthak ki innkhaar ava' thah hangkal lamda.
44001014	Hava'le' mkheng ava ngi snu rekle' Jisu nuh Mary ungta Mma' naupa rektu' plung khadaat tih rinkthamna' le' tiqhil chaakna' 'leenni plung pluwt chlamda.
44001015	Mpha ava' thung ngi Pitar rih sikhu rek arlakphin nih rip thida hanto'theda: Miichai rek avah mkheng inni arja khat som'knii arveel lam.
44001016	Mii rekle' ku'uknau rek, Jisu kokyowng rek ava' 'lam kqhipsuk Judah hava' leiyi alraang ngi Pthla Kchiir rih David nehr thung ngi mdothe Kchiir laika avah mkurtluwm rang thah tlada.
44001017	Mleiya mma' avah neen tu' mitaisapinda ungta hava' nongtlotna' ava' thung ngi mqhe mruk avah mma' rukku tang chda.
44001018	'Tunnu mma ngi nowlam tuksutmana' ki mardaman ava ngi loupaam khat renda ungta khupktulup pih tla chda ungta mdak avah mmalaiyi qe chda ungta mikril mkheng avah thuwkter chda.
44001019	Ungta Jerusalem thuh ka'am mii mkheng ngi avah arjada. Mthungta mmaan nih loupaam avah mpau inni, Akaldema dilamda, tidit tah Hii loupaam mdoditnaan.
44001020	Mleiya luwbuklaa thung ngi hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mma' mun avah kram kcha' ikurthuwkso. Mun ava' thuh miikhat leh ktla kma' ikurthuwkso.” (Luw. 69:25) Ungta “Mii ktlok khat tih mma' longkhom avah athlengso,” mdodit. (Luw. 109:8)
44001021	Avaleiyi, Jisu ngi neen nihin nih luwtda thuwkda ma'amna' mpha mkheng thung ngi, neen tu' mpha mkheng thung ngi amsapda kdei miikhat tokchol raan thah tlada.
44001022	Johon nih dii mupluw ki kupqhun nih neen nihinki Jisu mdo'arjuk low chaakna' mpha kpha kdei, tidit tah mma' avah neen tu' Mma' rinkerheelna' ki sakhi kpii khat mkurthuh rah.
44001023	Mthungta mmaan nih mii 'knii kchol lamda. Barsabas mdoditin Joseph ungta mma' avah Jastas ruk mdoditin ungta Metthias avah kchol purphuwng lamda.
44001024	Audilli mmaan nih hanto ngi rinktham chlamda, “O Kruwng, Nang ngi miiplungril mkheng avah adodeh, hava' 'knii rek arlak ki kuw akchol a mheipdeh chaan,” dilamda.
44001025	Mleiya havah Judas tih mche chaakna' thah mchena' rang ki thenni nowlam pkuida mdomaak pthidok nongtlotna' le' tamsinong rekki mqhe ava' ktlow rang ki then.
44001026	Audilli mmaan nih pchalpiik ava maanve thenni chom lamda ungta pchalpiik avah Metthias 'leenni tlada ungta mma' avah sowm leikhat rek 'leenni tpom lamda.
44002001	'Tunnu Pentikost nit marvan phaak thungta mmaan mkhengin avah munkhat thuh amsap lamda.
44002002	Ungta tbinphaak liitma ngi tchangkhu kdungyou kchang ngi kraang hep daat tih parvaan ki archaang khat arjuwda mmaan ko'onna' inn avah marchaang pumdim dim chda.
44002003	Ungta mmaan nih mei hep daat tih kurkhui plei rek arjungda mmaan khimkhei ‘leenni khatkhat tih kchuw dei lamda.
44002004	Ungta mmaan avah Pthla Kchiir rih dim chlamda ungta Pthla ava ngi mmaan hinni tpauna' mdopiik lam ava' dilkqowiyi mmaan nih pau ktleiyi tpau pqhun lamda.
44002005	Ungta 'tunnu ava' thung ngi rinko'owi kcha' Jihudi rekle' parvaan kurduh ngi ka'am chaat rek khimkhei avah Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am lam.
44002006	'Tunnu ava' archaang marjaakin thungta miipii rekpa avah mningin ngakda mmun ava' thuh thleng lamda, mleiya mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mpau inni kpau vih mdo'arjaakin.
44002007	Ungta mmaan mkhengin avah ngak chlamda ungta ngakyou chlamda ungta khat le' khat hinni hanto' kerthe lamda: “Asuwnno, hava' kpau rek mkheng avah Galily mii lam pemeh mowi?
44002008	Mdittu' taluhep pih neen khimkheiyi neen neenki qounaan npaunpau inni tarjaak inno?
44002009	Parthia pau vih Media pau vih, Elimia pau vih ungta Mesopotamia thuh ka'am rek pau vih, Judia pau vih, Kappadosia pau vih ungta Pontas pau vih ungta Asia thuh ka'am rek pau vih, tarjaakin.
44002010	Ungta Phrigia pau vih, Pamphylia pau vih, ungta Egypt thuh ka'am rek pau vih Sairen beh ngi ka'am Libya pau vih ungta Rome thuh ka'am mal rek pau vih ungta Jihudi rekle' Jihudi rin'owi ko'owi kcha' rek pau vih, tarjaakin.
44002011	Kritii le' Arabia pau vih kpau vih tarjaakin. Neen nih neen neen ki npau inni mpauin tarjaakin avah Isowr dotlot tngana' nong rek ava'.”
44002012	Ungta mmaan mkheng avah ngakyou chlamda ungta plung kelqen nih hanto ngi khat le' khat hinni kerthe lamda: “Havah talu ningleiyo?” dilamda.
44002013	Aangqhe rekki hanto ngi kchim mih mmaan avah: “Mmaan nih thowldii knemreen nih mneek chaak inna,” dilamda.
44002014	Pdainu Pitar rih tamsi sowm lei khat rek tung ngi rip thida krowl kparthaang ngi mmaan hinni theda: “Jihudi rek ungta Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am mkheng rek naan, havah naan nih adeiyin ungta nei kpauna rek avah naan nih kmin nih arja chaan.
44002015	Mleiya hava' mii rek avah naan nih adobin purthunin heppi kipri lam pemeh, mleiya 'tunnu jiingsun ki mukdumna' qhang row'a.
44002016	Pdainu havah khulpu Joel lih hanto ngi mdothethut dok ava'.”
44002017	‘Ungta mqutna' nit rek thung vah hanto' kthuwk rah, dida, Isowr rih hanto'theda: “Neiyi, Kapthla avah mii khimkhei 'leenni ptlong nikdi'. Ungta achanu le' achapa rek inni pau kpurphuwng lamrah. Ungta akseet rek inni rinmer kmer lamrah. Ungta akder rek inni mer kmer lamrah.
44002018	Ungta nit rek ava' thung ngi, Neiyi ksuwk rekle' ksuwknu rek hinni, Nei Kapthla avah ptlonpiik lam nikdi'. Ungta mmaan nih pau kpurphuwng chlam rah.
44002019	Ungta Neiyi karthak thah parvaan 'leenni tngana' pandang nikdi'. Ungta kurduh thah dultipaam thung ngi, Hii le' mei ungta meikhut hang rekki titinna' rek pandang nikdi'.
44002020	Kruwng Nit klin ungta nit kenreel ava' marvan phaakduh ngi, Kni a kjiingnu ungta thla a hii kurthuwk chrah.
44002021	Ungta hanto' kthuwk rah. Tidit tah Kruwng miing ko'own kcha' rek khimkhei avah ksan chrah.’ ” (Joe. 2:28-32)
44002022	Isreel mii rek naan nih havah arja chaan. Najareth ki Jisu avah naan ahin nih Isowr rih ruhtannong rekle' tngana' nong ungta titinna' rekki mdopandan miikhat ungta Isowr rih Mma' ar'aang ngi mdotlot avah naan adakin rukku adodehn.
44002023	Mma' avah Isowr rih muplung reel dok le' mduh kthuwk rah tedehna' luwkinritna' ava ngi naan ahin nih aparlaaninda. Ungta naan nih nowlam tukksut kma' mii rek khut tih Mma' avah khros 'leenni pthowiyin tih ado'eyown.
44002024	Mma' avah Isowr rih kdiyou ki tuduntsaanna' thungki perthletda, perdelda. Mleiya kdiyou vih Mma' avah mdokyown pchaan pemeh.
44002025	David tih Mma' leiyi, hanto'theda: “Neiyi mpha ktai thung ngi Kruwng nga kduh thah deinu. Mma ngi nei kmachang thah ma'am leiyi kuwkhat tih neiya moknok pchaang nimeh.
44002026	Avaleiyi, kuplung ngam chda ungta kepleiya kanpa chda. Ungta kdaksa rukka plungbinpsuk thung ngi kring chrah.
44002027	Mleiya, Nang ngi nei kapthlarin avah kdikhuw thah mapthi nimtih, Ungta Nang ngi Nangki Kchiir Khat avah pqop pthi nimtih.
44002028	Nang ngi nei kihin nih rinkum ki 'lam rek avah mepdeh chtinu. Ungta Nang a'aang ngi neiya kanpa ngi mipdim chnadi'.” (Luw. 16:8-11)
44002029	Ku'uknau rek, neiyi ahinin nih neen n'paan David leiyi, changkarngam mih ithe nih, tidit tah mma' avah diyouda ungta alruwl lamda ungta mma' thlaan avah tuni, neen nihin nih ka'am daat a.
44002030	Mma ngi khulpu khat mkurthuh ava ngi, mma' suruwl rek thung ngi daksa ki dilkqowiyi mma' kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong rang ki thenni Mma ngi Mesaiah avah perdel nikdi' dida, Isowr rih mma' hinni paureel lih pau mdoreel ava ngi mma ngi avah deida.
44002031	Mma ngi mduh thah hava' mdodeh leiyi, mma ngi Mesaiah rinkerheelna' avah deida. Mleiya Mma' pthlarin avah Kdikhuw thah tmaak ruk mameh mditmata Mma' daksa avah topqoh ruk pqopmeh.
44002032	Hava' Jisu avah Isowr rih perdelda ungta neen nkhengin avah ava' ki sakhi rek inpimin.
44002033	Ungta Isowr machang thah mdohankdom dok leiyi ungta Pa ava' paureel Pthla Kchiir ava' mdo'arlaan chaak leiyi, Mma ngi avah mdo'arjukptlon. 'Tun naan nih amikin nih adodehn ungta ado'arjaakin avah ava'.
44002034	Mleiya David tah parvaan thah hangkal dok meh pdainu mma' mdakkat tih hanto'theda: “Kruwng ngi neiki Kruwng hinni theda. ‘Nei Kmachang thah iko'ong daat.
44002035	Neiyi nang amiihal rek avah akhuhther kpurthuhduh kpha ngi iko'ong daat,’” dida. (Luw. 110:1)
44002036	Avaleiyi, Isreel mii mkheng rek naan nih, havah kindit kat tih adodeh raan, tidit tah naan nih adopthowiyown Jisu kat avah Isowr rih Kruwng ava'ruk ungta Mesaiah ruk mdopurthuh.
44002037	'Tunnu mmaan nih ava' marjaak daatin le' muplungin avah kdung ngi yada ungta mmaan nih Pitar le' tamsi morson rek hinni hanto' the lamda: “Unau rek neen nih talu tlow chenaandi?”
44002038	Audilli Pitar rih mmaan hinni theda: “Isowr rih apnu arveen adotoptlot piikna' raan ki thenni naan khimkheiyi aplungin aperthleng chaan ungta Jisu Mesaiah miing 'leenni dii iluwt chaan mdit bih Pthla Kchiir ki chla avah naan nih arlaang chnaandi'.
44002039	Paureel avah naan athen, anau asuwnin rekin ki then ungta lamkla ngi ka'am mmaan mkheng rekki then. Ungta Kruwng, neenki Isowr ava' ko'own kcha' mii mkheng rekki then.”
44002040	Ungta mma ngi morson pauna knempok ki mmaan hinni thepindit piik lamda ungta ksop lamda, hanto'theda: “Naan nih hava' kqha kma' suruwl ava' thungki ikarsan chaan.”
44002041	Audilli plung kngam mih mma' pauna karlaang kcha' rek mmaan avah dii luwt chlamda. Ungta mnit kat ava' thung ngi mii pun kdum mih mmaan avah tpom chlamda.
44002042	Ungta mmaan nih tamsi rek dopurchuhna' ungta lopkhat tkurthuhna' thung ngi ungta thenpen tkhuina' thung ngi ungta rinkthamna' rek thung ngi knet tih amtlit chlamda.
44002043	Ungta mii khimkheiya ningqit tih dim chlamda ungta tamsi rekki tngana' nong rekle' titinna' rek knempok ki tlow lamda.
44002044	Ungta lamkrin kcha' rek mkheng avah khadaat tih amsap lamda ungta dow mkheng avah tkurdutsap pih thi chlamda.
44002045	Ungta mmaan nih msum'alrou rekin ungta mdomna rekin avah jur lam thida mii mkheng hinni mma' mma' ki mdokriinin dilkqowiyi penthem chlamda.
44002046	Ungta mmaan nih mniiktaiyi luwbuk'inn thuh plung khadaat tih am lamda ungta inn inn thah chet lamda thenpen khui lamda ungta plung kngam mih ungta plung kperneem mih chasap lamda.
44002047	Mmaan nih Isowr panpaak chlamda ungta mii mkheng tu' plung kor'onsap pih am lamda. Ungta Kruwng ngi mniiktaiyi karsan kcha' rang rek avah lamrinlop ava'leen nih thlolpiik lamda.
44003001	'Tunnu Pitar le' Johon avah mutkutna' qhang mphaak thungta rinkthamna' ki mpha thung ngi luwbuk'inn thah hang lamda.
44003002	Ungta mmaan nih mqou daat ki mkhuh kyeng ngi kqou kcha' miikhat avah kdom lamda luwbuk'inn ava' thuh kthleng mii rek hinni kthamkqhil chrang ki thenni Ruwngchen kqha mdoditin luwbuk'inn paltong ava' thung ngi topkong lamda.
44003003	Mma ngi Pitar le' Johon avah luwbuk'inn thuh kluwt rah kthe mdeh lam thungta thamqhil chlamda.
44003004	Ungta Pitar rih mma' avah suwrimda ungta Johon rukku anto' heppi suwda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neenve mheisuwn.”
44003005	Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinki dow mruk tarlaan chaak rah mdobin chaak ki mmaanve pauthe avah pqowi chda.
44003006	Audilli Pitar rih theda: “Neiya jiipowl le' jiiring khadaat ruk thlowi maang pdainu neiyi kdothlowi avah ahin nih apii nikdi'. Najareth ki Jisu Khrista miing 'leenni irip rang ngi ichet cha'.”
44003007	Ungta mma ngi mchang ki mkhut tih mma' avah kyowngda qenpripda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mkhuh le' mkhuh'armik ruh 'leenni ruhtan phang chda.
44003008	Ungta mma ngi konchowmda, ripda ungta chetda. Ungta mma ngi, Isowr panpaak chda ungta mmaanve tu' luwbuk'inn thuh luwtsap chda.
44003009	Ungta mii mkheng ngi mma ngi chet pchaangda Isowr mdopanpaak chaak avah dei lamda.
44003010	Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah Ruwngchen kqha mdoditin luwbuk'inn paltong ava' thung ngi ko'ongda kthamkqhil kcha' ava' tidit dei lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' 'leenni kthuwk ava'leiyi kdung ngi ngakyou chlamda ungta mningin ngak chda.
44003011	Ungta mdopdam chaakin khuhkyeng ava ngi Pitar le' Johon avah kyowngda ma'am arlaan nih, mngajow chaakin leiyi, Solomon inn khulown mdoditin ava' thung ngi mmaanve hinni mii mkheng avah arheichen lamda.
44003012	Ungta Pitar rih ava' mdeh thungta mma ngi mii rek hinni hanto' arthaangda: “Isreel mii rek naan nih taluleiyi hava' 'leenni kngak inpti? Mditmata neenve ngi neen kruhtan inni mditmata neenki krin'owi chaak inni hava' mii avah kdopche chaakin heppi neenve avah kmin nih atsut inna?
44003013	Ungta naan nih adoparlaan pthi dokin ungta Pilaat tih tapthlatpthi rang ngi plung mdoreel dok Mma' avah naan nih mma' aang ngi adomat chaakin Mma' avah neenki npa'leen ki Isowr, Abraham ki, Aijek ki ungta Jakob ki Isowr ava ngi Mma' Suwk Jisu avah ponlor chda.
44003014	Pdainu naan nih Kchiir ungta Kindit khat avah matin tinu ungta miike'eyou khat avah naan athen inni adotperthle piik raan ngei intinu.
44003015	Ungta Rinkum ki Mukpu avah eyou intinu pdainu Mma' kat avah Isowr rih perdelda, neenna ava' ki sakhi rek inping.
44003016	Ungta Mma' miing ngi ungta Mma' miing 'leenni lamtrin chaak ki naan nih amikin nih adodehn ungta adodeh pinditin mii ava ngi ruhtan havah mdo'arlaan chaak. Ungta Mma' miing 'leenni lamtrin chaak ki naan akhengin a'aang inni mma' hinni chang kanngam mih tadamna' avah mdopiik.
44003017	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek naan nih adodeh pindit dokmaan nih havah adotlotin, tidit neiyi kdeh. Anto' heppi naanki luwkqhi rek rukku anto ngi mdotlot dokin.
44003018	Pdainu Mma' khulpu mkheng rek nehr thung ngi, Mesaiah avah tyattraanna' kperteel rah, dida mduh thah mdothe dok rek avah Isowr rih hanto ngi mpurtluwm a.
44003019	Avaleiyi, naan nih apnu arve rekin adotuknuwl piik dokna' raan ki thenni plung aperthleng chaan ungta Isowr hinni ikerheel chaan. Ava' thung ngi kya karngatna' rah mpha avah Kruwng hinki kurjung rah.
44003020	Ungta Mma ngi naan ahin nih mduh thah tparjaam dok Jisu Mesaiah avah arjuk kapthla rah.
44003021	Mma ngi alraang ngi Mma' khulpu kenje rek nehr thung ngi mdothe dok heppi, Isowr rih dow mkheng ren nih mdopenletna' mpha ava' mphaakduh khimkheiyi Mmah parvaan thah ka'am chdaat rah.
44003022	Mleiya Moses tih npa'leen hinni hanto'theda: ‘Naanki Kruwng Isowr ava ngi naan a'uanau rekin arlak ki nei kehep daat, Khulpu khat kapqhang rah. Naan nih Mma' dothe dow mkheng avah ado'arjaak raan.
44003023	Ungta Khulpu ava' dothe karja kma' mii khimkhei avah mii rek hinki kpenvei pthirah.’ (Knl. 18:15,18,19)
44003024	Anto'kat tih Samuel ki kupqhun nih mma' dilki khulpu rek mkheng inni hava' nit rek avah mduh thah mdothethut dokin.
44003025	Ungta naanna khulpu rekki piipa rekin ptih ungta Isowr rih neen npa'leen hinni pau mdoreel pauqum ava' ki piipa rekin ptih. Mma ngi Abraham hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nang arilam rek thung ngi dultipaam thungki mii mkheng avah suwqhat karlaang chrah.’ (Rnp. 22:18, 26:4, 28:14)
44003026	Isowr rih Mma' suwk ava' mperdel dok dil lih, naan nih arilin qhatmana' thungki akerheel chaakna' raan ungta suwqhat adotpiik chaakna' raan ki thenni, Isowr rih Mma' avah naan ahin nih rukrirep pih adotapthlat piikin.
44004001	Ungta mmaanve ngi mii rek hinni mpau meek sliin arlaan nih thimpu rekle' luwbuk'inn krung raalmii kpupa le' Saddusy rek avah Pitar le' Johon hinni arva lamda.
44004002	Tamsi rekki mii rek hinni kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' avah Jisu ar'aang ngi mdoparjaamin leiyi, kdung ngi muplungin pthit lamda.
44004003	Mmaan nih mmaanve avah kyowng lamda pdainu kluh thah mkurthuh leiyi, mmaanve avah rowng'inn thuh mupduknii kpha ki thenni khum pthi lamda.
44004004	Pdainu ava' pauna karja kcha' rek meknem mih lam'rin chlamda ungta mmaan avah miichai pun parnga arveel lam.
44004005	Ungta mupduknii ngi mmaan ki paamkpu rek, ungta kver rekle' nowlam chukpu rek avah Jerusalem thung ngi kurkuwk lamda.
44004006	Ungta thimpu kenreelsi Anna le' Kaiaphas ungta Johon le' Alekjender ungta thimpu kenreel innkhor rek thungki knempok rek avah Jerusalem thung ngi kurbuk lamda.
44004007	Mmaan nih mmalai inni mmaanve avah pthuwk lam thida hanto' paukheel kheel lamda: “Naanve ngi talu ruhtan nih mditmata kuw miing ngi havah adotlot inno?”
44004008	Audilli Pitar rah Pthla Kchiir rih dim chda ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii rekki paamkpu rek ungta Isreel rekki kver rek naan nih havah arjaan.
44004009	Tuni ngi neen avah, neen nih kyeng kkhowi kcha' miikhat hinni kqhanong tetdet chaak ki mlei kther rah, ungta taluhep pih mma' avah kdam tidit ki mlei kpiik rangin cheentung ngi,
44004010	Naan nih ungta Isreel mii mkheng ngi havah adeiyin: Mleiya naan nih adopthowiyown ungta Isowr rih kdiyou thungki mdoperdel Najareth ki Jisu Khrista miing ngi ungta Mma' ar'aang ngi hava' miilai avah naan akhengin a'aang ngi krip daat a.
44004011	Mma' avah, ‘Innksa rekki mdoknen pthi dokin lungkat ava ngi innbul lung, Lung kenreel ava' kurthuwk kcha' a.’ (Luw. 118:22)
44004012	Tkirliinna' avah morson khatleh thung ngi ka'am pemeh. Mleiya neen tkarsanna' rang ki thenni parvaan kurduh ngi ka'am mii rek arlak ki miing morson khatleh ka'am pemeh.”
44004013	'Tunnu mmaan nih Pitar le' Johon plung kngar dei lamda ungta mmaanve avah kurchuk lam pemeh ungta tpurchuh lam pemeh tidit mdehn thungta ngak lamda ungta mmaan nih hava' mii rek avah Jisu tu' arvang ka'am lam tidit dei lamda.
44004014	Pdainu mmaan nih marlak inni kdam kcha' miikhat ava' krip daat mdodehn leiyi, ava' kepteng ngi dow khatleh the pchaang lam mda.
44004015	Pdainu mmaan nih mmaanve avah Senhedrin thungki mthuh dokna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Ungta msingreelin thung ngi hanto' karjaakna' lamda.
44004016	Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih hava' mii rek avah talu pirdit chenaan? Mleiya Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am mii khimkheiyi mmaan nih ruhtannong klin nih mtlot inna tidit avah mdodeh dokin ungta neen nih avah tmat pchaanin nimeh.
44004017	Pdainu mii rek hinni hava' mkoryou porsonmana' rah ungta mmaanve ngi 'tunki kupqhun nih hava' miing 'leenni mpaumana' raan, mmaanve avah ipqitin cheh.”
44004018	Audilli mmaan nih mmaanve avah ownpluwt lamda ungta mmaanve avah Jisu miing 'leenni mpau liitmana' raan ungta mdopurchuh mana' raan paupiik pii lamda.
44004019	Pdainu Pitar le' Johon nih arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto' the lamda: “Isowr miksut thung ngu, Isowr pauthe topqowi mow, naan apautheen topqowiyi kqha tidit avah naan adak inni apindit chaan?
44004020	Mleiya neen nih kmikin nih kdodehn ungta kdo'arjaakin avah kthe kma' ngi ta'am a pchaang maanring.”
44004021	Mmaan nih taluhep pih mmaanve avah mraal suwkthuhna' tpiik rang tidit kthe pchaang kmah ngi kdungset tih ptitlam thida psunpthi lamda. Mleiya mii mkheng ngi kthuwk dok ava'leiyi Isowr avah mdopanpaak chaakin.
44004022	Mleiya m'leen nih titinna' thuwkda kdam kcha' miilai avah kum somplii karthak ki mii.
44004023	Mapthlat pthiin thungta Pitar le' Johon nih mmii rekin hinni vangkerheel lamda ungta thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rekki mmaanve hinni mdotheen avah vansong lamda.
44004024	Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta mmaan nih plung khadaat tih Isowr hinni krowl kparthaang ngi owng lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Mukpu, nang nga parvaan le' dultipaam ungta truwnpii ungta ava' thung ngi ka'am mkheng rekki Isowr ptih.
44004025	Nang ngi neen K'paan, Asuwk David nehr thung ngi Pthla Kchiir rih hanto' the tinu: ‘Taluleiyi chaat rekki plungthit tih krip lam a, Ungta msit ktaak thung ngi mbinpsuk inna?
44004026	Dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekle' paamkpu rekki, Kruwng kepteng ngi ungta Mma' Mesaiah ava' kepteng ngi ripsap lamda?’ (Luw. 2:1-2)
44004027	Mleiya mkindit kat tih Nang ngi reidii adopubul dok Asuwk kchiir Jisu kepteng ngi Herod le' Pontas Pilaat tih Chaatktlei rekle' Isreel mii rek tung ngi kurduhsap lamda.
44004028	Nang ngi aruhtan nih ungta Aplungbin nih talu ttlot rang tidit mduduh thah adoreel dok heppi ava' ktlow rah mmaan nah kurduh lamda.
44004029	Kruwng 'tunnu mmaan dopqit avah asuw ungta Asuwk rekki Apauna avah ningkqiliit kmah ngi atappau chlam.
44004030	Mleiya tapdamna' ungta titinna' rekle' tngana' nong rek avah Asuwk kchiir Jisu miing ngi ttlot pchaanna' rang ki thenni akhut mhei arjit piik chaan.”
44004031	Ungta mmaan nih rinmaktham chaak dokin le' ma'am sapnaan mun avah kunchuwnda. Ungta mmaan avah Pthla Kchiir rih pdim chlamda, ungta mmaan nih ningqit ktaak ki Isowr pauna avah parjaam chlamda.
44004032	Ungta lamkrin kcha' rek mmaan mkheng inni plung khat ungta plungrin khadaat tih amsap lamda. Mmaan kuwkhat leh ngi mma ngi mdothlowi dow khatleh rukka mma' mthina ki mdow ngi tai lammeh pdainu dow mkheng avah tkurdutsap pih thlowi lamda.
44004033	Ungta tamsi rekki ruhtan klin tu' kilqhi ngi Kruwng Jisu rinkerheelna' ki rinpaumin tpiikna' 'leenni am chlamda ungta mmaan mkhengin 'leenni plungnee avah klin nih amda.
44004034	Avaleiyi, mmaan arlak ki kuwkhat leh ruk kikriing ammeh. Mleiya marlak marlak ki lou'inn kthlowi rekki mmaan ki loupaam mditmata innmun rek avah jur chlamda ungta mdojurna' mkhon rek avah arvansin lamda.
44004035	Ungta mmaan nih tamsi rek khuhther rih down chlamda. Ungta kikriing kcha' dokriin chaak dilkqowiyi themsap lamda.
44004036	Ungta Saipras ki Levi phung thungki Joseph, tamsi rekki Barnabas mdoditin. Npurlu bih mikoksopdei mdoditna'.
44004037	Mma ngi loupaam khat thlowida ungta jurda ungta msum avah mma ngi tamsi rek khuhther rih pthla chda.
44005001	Pdainu mmiing Anania tidit miikhat tih mnuwn Saphira tung ngi mloupaamin mruk jur chlamda.
44005002	Mma ngi mkhon avah mnuwn tu' mdodehsap inni aangqhe qheek chlam thida aangqhe rek avah tamsi rek khuhther rih arheisin chlamda.
44005003	Pdainu Pitar rih hanto'theda: “Anania, taluleiyi Pthla Kchiir hinni plei tneena' rah aplung thung ngi Seitan kdim kcha'da, ungta paam adojurnaan mkhon avah athen raanni aangqhe apenqhe pthi a?
44005004	Ajurdokduh vah avah nang adow pemeh mow? Ungta ava' ajurdokdil rukku mkhon avah nang akhut thuh ka'am pemeh mow? Taluleiyi nang ngi aplung thung ngi havalu a adobinno? Nang ngi dultimii hinni plei adonee pemeh pdainu Isowr hinni plei anee a.”
44005005	Ungta Anania ngi hava' pauna rek avah arja thida tluwda ungta mqutna' mtadaal avah qen chda. Mthungta ava' karja kcha' mii mkheng rek avah kdung ngi mningin qi chda.
44005006	Ungta kseetnau rekki rip lamda mma' daksa avah buw ngi klum lam thida vanpthuwk lamda ungta alruwl pthi lamda.
44005007	'Tunnu qhang kdum arveel mphaak dilli mnuwn avah arvang luwtda ungta mma' vah talu kthuwk tidit tah deimda.
44005008	Ungta Pitar rih arthaangda mhin nih hanto' kheelda: “Athe o, paam avah hanto'daat tih adujurin mow?” Ungta mma ngi: “Ou, anto'daat tih kdojurrin,” dida.
44005009	Audilli Pitar rih mhin nih theda: “Taluhep pih naanve ngi Kruwng Pthla Kchiir avah kperteel rang ngi kolrow kchaan ptih o? Asuw, a'innpu kulruwl rek avah karvang kluwt rang ngi thurngutbul lih ka'am daat lam a, mmaan nih nang rukka avankokdom pthuwk lamrah.”
44005010	Ungta m'tunkat tih mma ngi mma' khuhther rih tluda ungta mqutna' mtadaal qen chda. Ungta kseetnau rekki marvanluwn thungta mma' avah kdiyou vih dei lamda, ungta vankdom pthuwk lamda mi'innpu beh thah alruwl lamda.
44005011	Mthungta lamrinlop avale' ava' karja kcha' mii khimkhei rekki kdung ngi mningin pqit lamda.
44005012	Ungta tamsi rek khut thung ngi titinna' rekle' tngana' nong rek avah mii rek hinni thuwkda. Ungta mmaan mkhengin avah Solomon innkhulown thung ngi plung khadaat tih amsap lamda.
44005013	Mii rekki mmaan avah kparthaang dok ki bin chdaat lam yoso kuwkhat leh ngi mmaan arlak ki tyau chaak rang avah pchaang lam mda.
44005014	Ungta lamkrin kcha' rek avah snu ruk psel ruk Kruwng hinni nemthang sesetda.
44005015	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih Pitar mthlen thung ngi aangqhe rek 'leenni mirlim daat yoso mtlaakna' rah kkowi rek avah 'lam rek thung ngi pthuwk lamda, ungta mkowm rekin 'leenni ungta kpher rek 'leenni pi'iip lamda.
44005016	Ungta Jerusalem kpervel lih ka'am khuw rek thungki mii knempok rekki kurkuwk lamda ungta mmaan nih kkowi rekle' tarnam ktobor rih chii mdopreel rek avah qhi pthuwk lamda ungta mmaan mkheng avah dam chlamda.
44005017	Audilli thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi ungta mma' tu' ka'am rek mkheng ngi rip lamda. Mmaan avah Saddusy lop rek thungki mii rek lam. Ungta mmaan nah plungthit tih dim chlamda.
44005018	Ungta mmaan nih tamsi rek 'leenni khut ptla lamda ungta tkurdutsap rowng'inn thung ngi daalpthi lamda.
44005019	Pdainu jaan nih Kruwng vaantamsi khat tih rowng'inn thurngut avah pvangda ungta mmaan avah pthuwk pthi lamda.
44005020	Ungta hanto'theda: “Vangin ungta luwbuk'inn thung ngi ripin rang ngi mii rek hinni hava' rinkum renki pauna rek avah atheen.”
44005021	Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta jiingsun kpanma ngi mmaan nih luwbuk'inn thuh luwt lamda ungta tpurchuh pqhun lamda. Pdainu thimpu kenreelsi le' mma' tu' ka'am mkheng rekki Senhedrin le' Isreel nau rekki kver rek mkheng tung ngi kurtuwlsap lamda ungta rowng'inn ki mmaanve avah klou rah heisi lamda.
44005022	Pdainu luwbuk'inn krung ki koprol rek mheitlunin thungta mmaanve avah rowng'inn thuh ka'am dei lam mda, mthungta mmaan nih vangkerheel lamda avah vansong lamda.
44005023	Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Dakat tih neen nih rowng'inn avah knet tih tarkammer daat ungta mukrung rek rukka duwn thah thurngutbul lih krip daat lam dei innu. Pdainu neen nih avale' avah kapvanin thungta mthung ngi kuwkhat leh ka'am deimaan nuh.”
44005024	'Tunnu thimpu kenreelsi le' luwbuk'inn krung raalmii kpupa le' thimpu kenreel rekki hava'le' avah arja lamda, ungta talu arvang kthuwk rang tidit leiyi, mmaan nah mningin mulda.
44005025	Audilli miikhat thlengda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Asuwn! naan nih rowng'inn thuh adokhumin mii rek avah luwbuk'inn thuh rip lamda mii rek mpurchuh meeksli inna.”
44005026	Audilli luwkqhi ava ngi luwbuk'inn krung rektu' hang lamda mmaan avah raanqhul lih kthe kmah ngi arjunqhi lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih mii rekki lung ngi mdodeen raan avah mdoqit chaakin.
44005027	Ungta mmaan nih murjunqhi dokin dilli Senhedrin, ava' ningqim mih topkong lamda ungta thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi mmaanve hinni paukheel kheel lamda.
44005028	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Hava' miing 'leenni mii rek adopurchuh mana' raan ahinin nih kdung ngi paupiik apii maan ringmow? Ungta asuwn, naan nih tpurchuhna' ava ngi Jerusalem avah pdimin tinu ungta hava' Miilai hava' ki hii buwkna' mraal avah neen k'leenin nih taptlaak rah binin tinu.”
44005029	Audilli Pitar le' morson tamsi rekki arthaang lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih dultimii dothe topqowi rang hinvah Isowr dothe ava' kdopqowi raan thah tlada.
44005030	Neenki npa'leen ki Isowr ava ngi naan nih ding khat 'leenni pthowiyin tih ado'eyown Jisu avah perdelda.
44005031	Isowr rih Mma' avah mkenreelsi ungta Miksan khat tih tparthaang chda, Mma' machang thah topkong chda. Mleiya havah Mma ngi Isreel nau rekki plung kerthleng mdohor chaakna' raan ungta Mma ngi mmaan pnu arve rek ava' mdopertleu piik lamna' rang kithen.
44005032	Ungta neenna hava' dow rek ava' 'leenni Mma' sakhi rek inping Mma' pauthe kopqowi kcha' rek hinni mdopiik Pthla Kchiir ava' rukku ava' ki sakhi.”
44005033	Mmaan nih hava' marjaakin thungta kdung ngi muplungin thida ungta mmaan mdo'eyowna' raan ki thenni kerseel lamda.
44005034	Audilli Senhedrin ava' thungki Pharisy miikhat mmiing Gamaliel mdodit, mii mkheng ngi mdokyat chaak nowlam chukpu khat tih ripda tamsi rek avah duwn thah mpha mruk ki thenni mdopthuh bongna' raan paupiik khat pii lamda.
44005035	Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Isreel mii rek, naan nih hava' mii rek 'leenni talu ttlot rah abin inna tidit leiyi, aplung aplungin apindit chaan.
44005036	Mleiya mpha mruk duh thah Theudas thuwkda, neiya kapchaang khat ping kirdi chda. Mii knempok ki, mii arja plii arveel lih mma' avah qowi chlamda. Mma' avah eyou lamda ungta mma' kopqowi kcha' rek mkheng avah kerjeiter chlamda ungta dow khatleh sichlam meh.
44005037	Hava' mii ava' dilli Galily ki Judah avah miichai tikjitna' mpha thung ngi thuwk nowlda ungta mii knempok ki mma'dil kqowiyi qen pthida. Mma' rukka kenvei chda ungta mma'dil kqowi kcha' rek rukka kerjeiter chlamda.
44005038	Ungta 'tunnu naan ahin nih kthe a: ‘Hava' mii rek hinki ikekneeng chaan, ungta mthinaan nih amapthiin. Mleiya hava' nongrit ungta nong avah dultimii hinki mkurthuh bih, dow khatleh ksi kma' kurthuwk chrah.
44005039	Pdainu hava ngi Isowr hinki mkurthuh bih, naan nih avah penvei pchaang nimaan tih. Ungta naan rukka Isowr ptengda karnaakqhi kurthuwk kcha'ruk krown ptih.”
44005040	Ungta mmaan nih mma' dothe avah row chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih tamsi rek avah own lamda ungta bun lam thida mmaan nih Jisu miing 'leenni mpaumana' raan paupiik piilam thida mmaanve avah psunpthi lamda.
44005041	Mthungta mmaanve ngi Senhedrin ava' aangki sun chlamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi Mma' miing 'leenni ningkya kperteel kcha'ki mtik kcha khat tih mdotai chaak lam leiyi, kanpa chlamda.
44005042	Ungta mmaanve ngi mniiktaiyi luwbuk'inn thuh ungta inn khimkhei rek thung ngi chet lamda, ungta kmapthi kmah ngi Jisu avah Mesaiah tidit tih purchuk lamda ungta parjaam chlamda.
44006001	'Tunnu mpha ava' thung ngi sikhu rek mkerkheel sesetin thungta marlak inni Grik pau vih kpau Jihudi rekki, Hibriu pau vih kpau Jihudi rek 'leenni kho tkerthena' khat thuwkda. Mleiya nit nit ki thendam mdothemin thung ngi mmaan ki meikhunu rek, avah olson lamda.
44006002	Mthungta sowm lei'knii rekki sikhu rek mkheng avah own purkuwk lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih tchaak le' tneek tethemna' leiyi, Isowr pauna avah tmaakpthi row nimeh.
44006003	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rekin, naan nih, naan arlakin ki mdang kqha ungta Pthla Kchiir le' luwkinrit tih kdim miilai tikhiu athlaamin, ungta neen nih mmaan avah hava' nong rek ava' tukksut chrang ngi kchol inni.
44006004	Ungta neenna rinkthamna' le' pauna ava' ki nongtlotna' 'leenni kuplungin avah parlaan tlit chnikaandi'.”
44006005	Ungta hava' mdotheen ava ngi mii mkheng plung ngam chda. Ungta mmaan nih lamkrin kcha' ungta Pthla Kchiir rih kdim miikhat Stiphen avah kchol lamda ungta Philip, Prokoras, Mikennor, Taimon, Parmenas ungta Antiok ki Jihudi rinko'owi kcha' Nikolas le' rukka kchol lamda.
44006006	Mmaan nih mdokchol rekin, mmaan avah tamsi rek aang ngi pthuwk lamda ungta tamsi rekki mmaan 'leenni mkhutin khiing lamda rinktham piik chlamda.
44006007	Ungta anto ngi Isowr pauna avah karjaamda ungta Jerusalem thung ngi sikhu rek avah kdung ngi kerkheel setset tih pqhangda. Ungta thimpu rek knempok ki lamrin avah pqowi chlamda.
44006008	Ungta lamrin le' ruhtan nih kdim Stiphen nih tngana' nong klinklin rekle' titinna' rek avah mii rek arlak ki tlowda.
44006009	Audilli tkolrotmana' khat avah Mii'ol rek Sinegog thungki mii rek hinki thuwkda. Mmaan avah Sairen ki, Alekjendria ki ungta Silisia le' Asia ki Jihudi mii reklam. Mmaan nih Stiphen tu' kerteen lamda.
44006010	Pdainu mmaan nih Stiphen pauna' luwkinritna' le' Pthlarin ava' kepteng ngi rip pchaang lam mda.
44006011	Audilli mmaan nih, “Stiphen nih, Moses le' Isowr kepteng ngi pthitda mpauna' neen nih karjaakin,” dida kthe rah mii aangqhe rek avah siinchaak lamda.
44006012	Ungta mmaan nih mii rekle' kver rekle' ungta nowlam chukpu rek avah kchap perseeljik lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah pha lamda ungta kyowng lamda mma' avah Senhedrin thung ngi pthuwk lamda.
44006013	Ungta mmaan nih m'leen nih mlangkma' sakhi rek rukka pii lamda, hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava ngi mmun kchiir le' nowlam ava' kepteng ngi pthitda mpau avah down liit meh.’
44006014	Mleiya mma ngi, ‘Hava' Najareth ki Jisu ngi hava' mun avah kupkui pthi rah ungta Moses tih neen nihin nih midotparlaan dokin nowpa rek avah kperthleng pthirah,’ mdodit neen nih karjaakin.”
44006015	Ungta Senhedrin ava' thung ngi kok'ong mii mkheng ngi mma' avah kmin nih suwsap lamda ungta mmai avah vaantamsi mai hep daat tih dei lamda.
44007001	Audilli thimpu kenreelsi ava ngi: “Hava' dow rek avah anto' mow,” dida kheelda?
44007002	Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mii rek ungta unau rek ungta apa'leen, naan nih havah arjaan, n'paan Abraham mih Haran, tidit khuw thuh ma'amduh ngi Mesopotamia paam thuh ma'am thung ngi Konlor ki Isowr ava ngi mma' hinni kperdehda.
44007003	Ungta mma' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nang ngi akhuwpaam thungki ungta ari'alam rek hinki ikorlou rang ngi, Neiyi ahin nih adoktedet rang paam ava' thah arva,’ dida. (Rnp. 12:1)
44007004	Audilli mma ngi Kaldia mii rek paam ava' thung ki arvangda ungta Haran tidit khuw thung ngi arvan amda. Ungta paam ava' thung ki ngi mpa mdiyow dok dilli, 'tun naan nih a'amna' meekin paam ava' thung ngi Isowr rih mma' avah arvanqhi chda.
44007005	Ungta Isowr rih ava' thuh mhin nih alrouchom khatleh piimeh, mkhuh mdothiikna' rang mmun kpha ruk piimeh. Pdainu Abraham mih nau mthlowima arlaan kpha thung ngi Isowr rih mma' hinni ungta mma' dilki mnau msuwn rek hinni paam avah apii nikdi', dida, mhin nih pau reelda.
44007006	Isowr rih mma' hinni hanto'theda: ‘Nang anau asuwn rek avah miipaam thung ngi mal lih ka'am lamrah. Mmaan avah mii rekki suwk'owr rih kthi lam rah ungta kum arja plii thung ngi ko'owr chlam rah.
44007007	‘Pdainu mmaan nih suwk mkurthuh chaak naan chaat ava' 'leenni, Neiyi pau pindit nikdi.' (Rnp. 15:14) Ungta ava' dilli, ‘Mmaan nih arvang thuwk lamdon nih Nei avah mmun hava' thung ngi sopmoklow chlam rah,’ (Mpk. 3:12) dida.
44007008	Audilli Mma ngi vuntreenna' ki pauqum avah mma' hinni piida. Ungta hanto ngi Abraham mih Aijek pluwda ungta mnii trehtna' nit tih mvun reenda. Ungta Aijek ki Jakob pluwda ungta Jakob pih npu'npa rekin sowm lei'knii rek ava' pluw lamda.
44007009	Ungta npu'npa rek inni mdopnerin leiyi, Joseph avah Egypt paam thah jurpthi lamda, pdainu mma' avah Isowr rih korthlowqhi chda.
44007010	Ungta msuwkthuhna' mkheng thungki san chda ungta Egypt paamkruwng Pharoah aang ngi plungqhat le' luwkinritna' avah mma' hinni piida. Ungta mma ngi Joseph avah Egypt paam mkheng le' mma' inn rek mkheng ki paamkpu tpurthuhda.
44007011	'Tunnu Egypt paam le' Kenaan paam mkheng thung ngi powitham le' suwkthuhna' avah klin nih thuwkda. Ungta mpha ava' thuh npu'npa rekin avah then mdochaak raan thlowi lam mda.
44007012	Pdainu mkhatna' thung ngi Jakob pih Egypt paam thah chasowm ka'am tidit marjaak thungta npu'npa rekin avah mma ngi yuksi lamda.
44007013	Ungta mveiknitna' thung ngi Joseph pih mu'umnau rek hinni kterdetda ungta Joseph innkhor rek avah Pharoah hinni tkerdehna' arvang thuwkda.
44007014	Audilli Joseph pih mpa, Jakob le' mma' rilam rek tidit tah mii somtikhiu leiparnga rek mkheng ava' ko'own rang ngi mmaan avah pthla lamda.
44007015	Anto ngi Jakob pih Egypt paam thah yung konthotda ungta ava'thah diyou chda. Ungta mma' tung ngi npu'npa rekin rukka diyou chlamda.
44007016	Ungta mmaan avah Sikhem khuw thah puperheel lamda Abraham mih Hamor chapa rek tidit tah Sekhim pa hinni sum mruk piida mdoren chaak paam ava' thung ki thlaan thung ngi pi'iip chlamda.
44007017	Pdainu Isowr rih Abraham hinni paureel lih mdothe paureel ki mpha marvannai thungta mii rek avah Egypt paam thung ngi pungpok lamda.
44007018	Audilli Joseph kdeipindih kma' paamkruwng khat avah Egypt paam thung ngi pqhangda.
44007019	Hava' mii ava ngi neen nchaat rekin avah mmeel kthi ngi yowmpsit chlamda ungta npa'leen avah mmeel kthi ngi owr chlamda. Mmaan nih mnau kdowng rekin avah mdiyow chaakna' rah kvarpthi rah si lamda.
44007020	Mpha ava' thung ngi Moses avah qouda, ungta mma' avah kdung ngi Isowr miksut thung ngi qha chdokda. Ungta mma' avah mpa inn thung ngi thla kdum thung ngi yuwk chlamda.
44007021	Pdainu mma' avah duwn mupthuh pthiin dilli Pharoah chanu ngi mchapa purthuhda yuwk chda.
44007022	Ungta Moses avah Egypt mii rek luwkinritna' thung ngi kurchuk chda ungta mma' avah mpauna' rekle' mnongtlotna' rek thung ngi ruhtan thlowi chda.
44007023	Pdainu mma ngi kum somplii mphaak thungta muplung thung ngi mu'umnau rek tidit tah Isreel mii rek kvel rah tche rah bin chda.
44007024	Ungta mma ngi marlakin ki khat avah karmak daat tih suwk kthuwk meek mdeh thungta mma ngi suwkkthuwk meek avah pkhaanda ungta phuw lowpiikda ungta Egypt mii avah eyouda.
44007025	Mleiya Isowr rih mma' ar'aang ngi mu'umnau rek avah mma' khut tih kaktlan chlam rah tidit avah kdei chlam rah tidit tih mdobin chaak pdainu mmaan nih avah dei lam mda.
44007026	Ungta mupduknii ngi miilai 'knii mker'e meekin arlaan nih mma ngi thuwkda, kpalqhat lam rang ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: ‘Mii rekku, naanna unau inptih, taluleiyi khat le' khat kpursulin ptil lih?’ dida.
44007027	Pdainu mi'innveen kupsul mma' ava ngi Moses avah kneng pthithida hanto'theda: ‘Kuw ngi nang nga neenve kthenin nih paukpindit rah adotokcholda?
44007028	Nang ngi, nei rukka jani ki Egypt mii ado'eyow heppi te'eyow rah atbinna?’ dida. (Mpk. 2:14)
44007029	Audilli hava' pau ava ngi Moses avah Media mii rek paam thah malpa ngi mchapa 'knii ma'am kpha thung ngi pa'amda.
44007030	Ungta mma ngi ava' thuh ma'amna' kum somplii maklaan dilli Kruwng vaantamsi khat ar'aang ngi Sainai lown behki paamkbiik laiyi ding'arbuw mei kquwng ngi mhin nih kterdetda.
44007031	Moses tih ava' mdeh thungta ngakda ungta mma ngi ksuwpindit rang ngi mheinai thungta mma' hinni Kruwng krowl khat arjuda.
44007032	Hanto ngi theda: ‘Neiya apa le' ki Isowr ping, Abraham ki Isowr ping, Aijek ki Isowr ping ungta Jakob ki Isowr ping!’ (Mpk. 3:6,15) Mthungta Moses tah kunchuwn chda ungta, suw pchaang mda.
44007033	Audilli Kruwng ngi mhin nih theda: ‘Akhuhkok avah akhuh 'leenki aloupthi, Mleiya mmun kchiir thuh krip imptih.
44007034	Neiyi Egypt thung ngi Nei kmii rek suwkthuh avah kindit tih kdeh. Neiyi mmaan hesat avah karjaak ungta mmaan ksan chrah, Neiya kurjung ping. 'Tunnu arva, Neiyi nang nga Egypt thah ayusi nih.’ (Mpk. 3:5,7,8,10)
44007035	Mmaan nih: ‘Nang nga kuw ngi neen k'leen nih paamkpu ungta paukpindit kurthuwk rah adotsida?’ dilamda. (Mpk. 2:14) Ungta mmaan nih anto ngi the lamda mdoknenin Moses kat avah mma' hinni ding'arbuw thung ngi kekterdet kcha' vaantamsi ar'aang ngi paamkpu ungta kaktlanpiik khat kurthuwk rang ngi Isowr rih Egypt thah yusida.
44007036	Mma ngi mmaan avah Egypt paam thung ngi ungta truwnpii ksen thung ngi ungta paamkbiik laiyi kum somplii thung ngi tngana' nong rekle' titinna' nong rek mdotlot tya ava ngi arvanqhi pthuwk lamda.
44007037	Mleiya, Isreel nau rek hinni: ‘Kruwng naanki Isowr ava ngi naan a'uanau rekin hinki nei kehep daat, Khulpu khat kperdel rah. Naan nih Mma' pau arja chnaandi',’ dida, kthe Moses ava'.(Knl. 18:15)
44007038	Ungta mma' avah paamkbiik laiyi kurtuwl miipii rek arlak ki kyau ungta npa'leen tu' ma'amin thung ngi Sainai lown 'leenni vaantamsi ngi mdokirbiikqhi mma' avah hava'. Ungta mma ngi neen nihin nih midotparlaan chaak raan ki thenni kring pauna avah arlaang chda.
44007039	Mma' avah npa'leen nih mma' pau pqowi lam mthida mma' avah kthitna' lamda. Ungta mmaan nih muplungin thung ngu Egypt paam thah kerheel chdok lamda.
44007040	Mmaan nih Aaron hinni hanto' the lamda: ‘Neen kthen inni kduh thaan nih kchet rah isowr rek mheiseem piikin. Mleiya Egypt paam thungki Mikqhiin, Moses avah m'leen nih talu kthuwk kcha' a tidit tedeh meh.’ (Mpk. 32:1,23)
44007041	Ungta mpha ava' thuh mmaan nih silsuwn khat seem lamda ungta pthla ava' hinni rinparlaan chlamda ungta mmaan nih mkhutin nongtlot rek ava' 'leenni kanpa chlamda.
44007042	Audilli Isowr rih mmaan avah kerheel daak lamda ungta mmaan avah kni le' thla ungta bursi rek luwkbu chrang ki thenni mapthi lamda. Hava ngi khulpu rek laika thung ngi mdokjit avah tpurkhumda. Hanto ngi avah mdokjit: ‘Isreel innbung rek! Naan nih kum somplii thung ngi paamkbiik laiyi kihin nih, Downkhaal rek rintparlaanna' le' rintparlaanna' avah kihin nih atpiikin mow?
44007043	Naan nih Molek buw'inn chom intinu ungta naanki isowr Remphan ki bursi chom intinu, Ungta adak inni adoseemin dow pthla rek luwbuk intinu. Avaleiyi, Neiyi naan avah Babylon raalpha thah paamsuwk ki asipthi nikaandi',’ dida. (Ams. 5:25-27)
44007044	Neen npa'leen nih rinpaumin ki buw'inn avah paamkbiik laiyi mdothlowiyin. Buw'inn avah Mma' dobin heppi Moses hinni mma ngi mmik ki mdodeh chaak dok ava' heppi mdosakna' rah Isowr rih purchukda.
44007045	Neen npa'leen nih buw'inn avah suruwl tyatya thung ngi arvansin lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Joshuah tu' kilqhi ngi Isowr rih mmai inni mdorei pthi Chaatktlei rek paam mmaan nih mlow chaakin thung rukku buw'inn avah arvansin lamda. Ungta paam ava' thung ngi David ki mpha kpha thung ngi buw'inn avah arvansin lamda.
44007046	Hava' David avah Isowr plungngam karlaang kcha' miikhat ungta mma ngi Jakob ki Isowr ava' amna' rah inn ksa rang ngi qhil chda.
44007047	Pdainu Solomon nih Mma' thenni inn avah mdosak.
44007048	Anto'daat yoso Kparthaangsi Mma' avah khulpu rek dothe heppi khut tih tsak Mmun Kenjesi thung ngi ka'amlu pemeh.
44007049	Khulpu rekki hanto' the lamda: ‘Parvaan avah Neiki kruwng longkhom, Ungta dultipaam avah Nei kukhuhther. Nei kthen nih talu innlu sanadi? dida, Kruwng ngi theda, Mditmata Nei kkarngatna' rah munna tvah rang?
44007050	Nei kukhut tih hava' dow mkheng rek avah mdoseem pemeh mow? (Is. 66:1-2)
44007051	Mlowl khiingda ka'am ungta muplung le' makna thung ngi vunkreen kma' rek, naan nih mpha ktai thung ngi naanki apa'leen dotlotjik ki tlown tinu Pthla Kchiir avah kthitnaan tinu.
44007052	Khulpu rek khadaat rukka apa'leen nih chii mdopreel maan ka'am mow? Mmaan nih Mrinkindit khat ava' arjun rang ava' mduh thah kthe thuh kcha' rek avah eyou lamda. Ungta 'tun naan nih Mma' avah yur chaan tinu ungta a'eyown nah.
44007053	Naan avah, vaantamsi rek ar'aang ngi nowlam karlaang kcha' rekin ptih pdainu avah ado'arkhiik chaakin pemeh.”
44007054	Mmaan nih hava' dow rekpa ava' marjaakin thungta muplungin thiyou chda ungta mma' 'leenni mahan kriilpsuk lamda.
44007055	Pdainu mma' avah Pthla Kchiir rih mdim chaak leiyi, Parvaan thah kmin nih hansuw chda ungta mma ngi Isowr konlorna' ungta Isowr machang ngi Jisu krip daat handeida.
44007056	Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Asuwn! Neiyi parvaan kparvangda ungta Mii Chapa avah Isowr machang thah krip daat kahandeh a.”
44007057	Audilli mmaan nih krowl kparthaang ngi owng lamda ungta maknaan kvumpthi lam thida mkheng inni plung khadaat tih mma' avah heichenmar lamda.
44007058	Ungta mmaan nih khuwpii duwn thah varpthi lam thida lung ngi deeng lamda. Arlaan nih mmik ki ava' kdei rekki mbuwmdiir avah khowk lam thida kseetnau khat mmiing Saul mdoditin ava' khuhther rih pthla lamda.
44007059	Ungta mmaan nih Stiphen avah mma ngi Isowr miing own chda, “Kruwng Jisu Nei kapthlarin avah murjuk'arlaan piikcha'” mdit arlaan nih lung ngi deeng lamda.
44007060	Audilli mma ngi tirdiil chthida krowl kparthaang ngi owngda, “Kruwng hava' pnu avah mmaan hinni psulna' lamma',” ungta mma ngi hava' mthe dok dilli mmah kdiyou vih iip chda.
44008001	'Tunnu mma' diyowna' avah Saul rukku mdorot chaak.
44008002	Ungta rinko'owi kcha' mii rekki Stiphen avah kdom lamda alruwl chlamda ungta kdung ngi mma' leiyi, archam lou chlamda.
44008003	Pdainu Saul vah lamrinlop avah kdung ngi owr chlamda, mma ngi inn khimkhei thung ngi luwtda pselpa rek ungta snu rek rukka qen pthuwk lamda rowng'inn thung ngi mmaan avah daal lamda.
44008004	Ungta kerjei kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi mche mchenaan thung ngi kqhapaumin avah parjaam chlamda.
44008005	Audilli Philip pih yuda Samaria khuwpii thung ngi mmaan hinni Mesaiah avah parjaam chda.
44008006	Ungta miipii rekki mma' dothe arja lamda ungta mma ngi titinna' nong rek mdotlot mdehn thungta mmaan nih Philip pauthe avah plung khadaat tih arja chlamda.
44008007	Mleiya tarnam ktobor rek ava ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owng lam thida ava' kthlowi mii knempok rek thungki thuwk chlamda ungta kyengrii ktong rekle' mkhuh kyeng knempok rek avah dam chlamda.
44008008	Ungta anto ngi khuwpii ava' thung ngi kdung ngi tkanpatna' khat thuwkda.
44008009	Pdainu khuwpii ava' thung ngi mphakhat thung ngi k'dim kurthuwk mmiing Simon tidit miikhat amda. Ungta mma ngi Samaria ki mii rek avah tapngakyou chlamda ungta neiya klin khat ping kdi ngi am chda.
44008010	Mma' avah kdilklin mii mkheng ngi, ‘hava' mii ava ngi Isowr ruhtan klin nih mthlowi a,’ dilamda.
44008011	Ungta mma ngi k'dim mkurthuhna' ava ngi mpha ksowt thung ngi mdopngajow chaak lam leiyi, mmaan nih mma' avah plung kluwt tih arja chlamda.
44008012	Pdainu mmaan nih Philip pih Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki mleiyi ungta Jisu Khrista ki miing mdoparjaam ava' lammrin chaakin thungta snu rek rukku ungta psel rek rukku diiluwt chlamda.
44008013	Audilli Simon mdakkat rukku lam'rin chda. Ungta mma ngi dii mluw chaak dok thungta mma ngi Philip tu' kilqhi tlit chda. Ungta tngajow chaakna' nong klin rekle' titinna' rek mdotlot mdeh thungta mmah ngak chda.
44008014	Ungta Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am tamsi rekki Samaria ki mii rekki, Isowr pau avah marlaan chaak inna, tidit marjaakin thungta Pitar le' Johon avah mmaan hinni yupthla lamda.
44008015	Mmaanve ngi myuphaakin thungta mmaan nih Pthla Kchiir mdo'arlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni rinktham piik chlamda.
44008016	Mleiya mmaan kuwkhat leh 'leenni Pthla Kchiir avah arjunqum mlai. Mmaan nih Kruwng Jisu miing 'leenni diluwna' chreldaat mdo'arlaan chaakin.
44008017	Audilli mmaan nih m'leenin nih mkhutin khiinpiik lamda ungta mmaan nih Pthla Kchiir avah arlaang chlamda.
44008018	'Tunnu Simon nih tamsi rekki m'leen mkhut mdokhiin inni Pthla Kchiir avah kurjung tidit mdeh thungta mma ngi mmaan hinni sum'alrou kparlaan chrah theda.
44008019	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi kuwku yoso m'leen nih kukhut kkhiin chaak thung ngi Pthla Kchiir mdo'arlaan chaakna' rah hava' ruhtan avah nei kihin nih mheipii cha.
44008020	Pdainu Pitar rih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Nang asum avah nang adak tu' kenvei chso! Mleiya nang ngi Isowr chla avah sum'alrou vih tren pchaan rah tidit tih abin a.
44008021	Hava' nong thung ngi nang athen rah mditmata atum rah ammeh. Mleiya nang aplung avah Isowr miksut thung ngi kindit tih ammeh.
44008022	Avaleiyi, nang ngi plung aperthleng cha' mleiya Isowr rih aplungbin avah akoptlot piik daat ruk krow.
44008023	Mleiya nang nga kkha barrih kdim kcha' imptih ungta nowlam tuksutmana' thung ngi akorbowl chaak avah kdeh a.”
44008024	Audilli Simon nih arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi adothe dow rek avah k'leen nih khadaat ruk mthuhmana' rah, nei kthen nih Kruwng hinni rinmheiktham piikcha',” dida.
44008025	Anto ngi mmaan nih kqha deek ki rinpaumin pii lamda ungta Isowr pauna avah mparjaam dokin thungta kanpa ngi Jerusalem thah arhung kerheel lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Samaria ki khuw knempok rek thung ngi kqhapaumin avah parjaam chlamda.
44008026	'Tunnu Kruwng vaantamsi khat tih Philip hinni hanto'theda: “Jerusalem ki ngi Gaja tphaakna' paamkbiik laiki 'lampii, kurduh ktong ki 'lampii thah irip rang ngi yu.”
44008027	Mthungta mma ngi ripda ava'thah yuda. Ungta asuwn, Ethiopia ki mii, dakkpirdiin dok kcha' miikhat Ethiopia ki paamkruwngnu kurduh ngi ruhtanna' klin nih ksin miikenreel ungta msum'inn mkheng ngi mdopsin miikhat avah Jerusalem thah luwkbu chrah arhangda.
44008028	Ungta 'tunnu mma' avah tolai 'leenni ko'ongda jungkerheel meekda ungta mma ngi khulpu Isaiah laika avah parchamda chda.
44008029	Audilli Pthla ava ngi Philip hinni hanto'theda: “Wva' tolai beh thah varah heipha.”
44008030	Mthungta Philip pih mma' hinni heichenda ungta mma ngi khulpu Isaiah laika mdoparcham meek avah arjada ungta mma ngi mhin nih, ‘nang ngi adoparcham avah adehpindit a,’ dida, kheelda?
44008031	Ungta mma ngi, ‘kuwmiikhat tih mtethepiikma bih, taluhep pih deipindih nikli,’ dida? Ungta mma ngi Philip avah mma' tu' kok'ongve rang ngi kheel chda.
44008032	Mma ngi mdoparcham chaak Kchiir laika avah hava': “Mma' avah yau khat heppi te'eyowna' mun thah qhi lamda. Ungta yausuwn nih mmul kikchippa aang ngi rimkdi ma'am chaak heppi, Mma' ngi Mnehr avah pvang meh.
44008033	Mma' mdoyowm mdopsit chaak naan ava' thung ngi, Mma' kinditna' avah loupthida. Ungta Mma' rilam avah kuw ngi kpandang rang. Mleiya Mma' rinkum avah dultipaam thungki mdolow pthi dokin.” (Is. 53:7-8)
44008034	Mthungta dakkpirdiin dok kcha' ava ngi Philip hinni arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Neiyi akkheel chaak a, khulpu ava ngi havah kuw leiyi, mdothe o, mdakkat leiyi, mdothe chaak mow, mditmata ktlok morson khat leiyi, mdothe o?”
44008035	Audilli Philip pih tpau pqhunda, hava' Kchiir laika ava' thung ngi pqhunda mma' hinni Jisu ki kqhapaumin avah parjaam chda.
44008036	'Tunnu mmaanve ngi anto ngi 'lampii qowi lamda myukin thungta dii mruk amna' munkhat pha lamda. Ungta dakkpirdiin kcha' dok mii ava ngi hanto'theda: “Asuw o, hava' thung ngi dii ka'am a, dii kluw chaak daat a talu karmak rangplih?”
44008037	Audilli Philip pih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi aplungril mkheng ngi lam'arin chaak bih, adotlot krow.” Ungta mma ngi arthaangda hanto'theda: “Neiyi Jisu Khrista avah Isowr Chapa tidit lamkrin chaak a.”
44008038	Mthungta mma ngi tolai avah mdoprina' rah paupiik piida ungta Philip le' dakkpirdiin kcha' dok mma' avah dii thung ngi yunqumve lamda ungta Philip pih mma' avah diipluwt chda.
44008039	'Tunnu mmaanve ngi dii thungki murhunkalin thungta Kruwng Pthla ava ngi Philip pah arjuklou chda. Mthungta dakkpirdiin kcha' dok mma' ava ngi mmah deiporson mda, ungta mmah anto ngi kanpa ngi yungsun chda.
44008040	Pdainu Philip avah Ayotas paam thah thuwkda, ungta mma ngi Sijaria mphaakduh kpha ngi mche mchena' khuwpii rek mkheng thung ngi kqhapaumin avah parjaam chda.
44009001	Audilli Saul lih Kruwng sikhu rek ava' kepteng ngi tipqit rah ungta te'eyow rah kbinsli daat tih thimpu kenreelsi ava' hinni hangda.
44009002	Ungta mma' hinni Damaskas thungki Sinegog hinni tikjit paukjit rek, tidit tah mma ngi kuwku yoso 'Lam ava' kqowi kcha' mkurdutqhi thung ngi snu rek yoso mditmata pselpa rek yoso, mma ngi bowl lamdon nih Jerusalem thah mdo'arhunqhi lamna' rah qhil chda.
44009003	Ungta mma ngi anto ngi myuk thungta Damaskas beh yukphada. Ungta mdobin phaak liitma ngi parvaan ki mar'aang khat tih mma' 'leenni lengda.
44009004	Mthungta mmah dulti thah tlu chda. Ungta mma ngi mma' hinni krowl khat tih hanto ngi mdothe arjada: “Saul, Saul, taluleiyi nang ngi Neiya chii atepreel a?”
44009005	Ungta mma ngi, “Nang nga kuw ptih, Kruwng?” dida. Ungta Kruwng ngi, “Neiya nang ngi chii adopreel meek Jisu ping. Thiirsi kchung rek ptengda tpirthit tah nang athennu kparsa rah,” dida.
44009006	Mthungta mma ngi, kunchuwn chda ungta mning mnga chaak chunni hanto'theda: “Kruwng neiyi talu kdotlot rah adongei pli?” Mthungta Kruwng ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Ikerdel, ungta khuwpii thah vah, ungta nang ngi talu tlowna' tidit avah akthepiik rah.”
44009007	Ungta mma' tu' kchetsap mii rek avah, mmaan nih krowl khat tah arja lamda pdainu kuwkhat leh mdodehmaan leiyi, kpau kmah ngi rip chlamda.
44009008	Audilli Saul lih dulti ki hangripda pdainu mma ngi mmik mpahar thungta dow khatleh deimda. Mthungta mmaan nih mkhut thah kyowng lamda, vanqhi lamda ungta ungta Damaskas paphaak lamda.
44009009	Ungta mma ngi niikdum thung ngi khudei meh ungta tchaak ruk chameh ungta teneek ruk nee meh.
44009010	'Tunnu Damaskas thung ngi mmiing Anania tidit sikhu khat ka'am, Mma' hinni Kruwng ngi rinmer khat tih hanto'theda: “Anania,” dida, ownda, ungta mma ngi, ‘ka'am daat imping Kruwng,’ dida.
44009011	Mthungta Kruwng ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Irip rang ngi 'lam kirji tidit ava'thah vah, ungta Judah inn thung ngi mmiing Tarsas ki Saul tidit miikhat avah athlaam, mleiya asuw, mmah rinktham chda ka'am daat a.”
44009012	Ungta mma ngi mrinmer rih mmiing Anania tidit miikhat tih mhin nih thlengdon ungta mma ngi khu mdodeh chaakna' rah m'leen nih mkhut mdothiik piik mdeh a.
44009013	Audilli Anania ngi hanto' arthaangda: “Kruwng hava' miilai ava ngi Jerusalem thung ngi, Nang amii kenje rek 'leenni kqha kma' tya knem mih mtlot tidit avah neiyi mii knempok hinki kdo'arjaak dok.
44009014	Ungta hava' thung rukku mma ngi, Nang amiing ko'own kcha' rek mkheng ava' tbowlna' rang ki thenni ruhtanna' avah thimpu kenreel rek hinki sinda kurju,” dida.
44009015	Pdainu Kruwng ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Vah, mleiya mma' avah Chaatktlei rek, paamkruwng rek ungta Isreel nau rek aang ngi, Nei kmiing kpandang rang ki thenni kdokchol dok miikhat.
44009016	Mleiya Neiyi, Nei kmiing leiyi, mma ngi tyatna' dow rek avah tya knem mih kperteel rang tidit avah pdeh nikdi'.”
44009017	Audilli Anania ngi anto' vada inn ava' thuh luwtda m'leen nih mkhut thiikpiik thida hanto'theda: “Ku'uknau Saul nang ngi arhei thung ngi 'lam thuh ahin nih akperdeh, Kruwng Jisu ngi, nang ngi khu adodeh chaakna' rah ungta Pthla Kchiir rih adim chaakna' rah ahin nih neiya mdoheitsi.”
44009018	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mmik 'leenki tuwlvah klip rek hep daat tih tlada ungta mma ngi khu deiteng chda. Ungta mma ngi kerdelda dii luwt chda.
44009019	Ungta mma ngi then mchaak chaak dilli mruh tang chda.
44009020	Kbeisek ki mma ngi Sinegog rek thung ngi Mesaiah avah Isowr Chapa ava' tidit parjaam chda.
44009021	Mthungta ava' karja mii mkheng rekki mningin ngakda mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii avah Jerusalem thung ngi hava' miing ktham kcha' mii rek kpenvei ungta hava' Damaskas thung rukku ava' ktlow rang ngi tidit tah mma ngi mii rek avah bowl lamdon nih thimpu kenreel rek hinni kqhi rang ki thenni kurju ava' pemeh mow?”
44009022	Pdainu Saul avah nitnit ki mruh tang setsetda. Ungta mma ngi Jisu avah Mesaiah tidit mdopandan leiyi, Damaskas thuh ka'am Jihudi rekka mningin tupmulda.
44009023	'Tunnu mpha mvansopok dilli Jihudi rekki mma' avah ke'eyou rang ngi kerseel lamda.
44009024	Pdainu mmaan kerseel avah Saul hinni kandang chda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' ke'eyou rang ngi suwng rek avah suwn le' jaan nih sutpqowi lamda.
44009025	Audilli sikhu rekki mma' avah lou lamda bowr klinpa khat thung ngi daal lam thida rowngbang duwn thah yukptla lamda.
44009026	Ungta Saul lih Jerusalem thah murhun dok dilli mma ngi sikhu rek arlak ki myau chaakna' rah tlowda. Pdainu mmaan mkheng inni mma' avah qi chlamda mleiya mma' avah sikhu khat tidit tih lammdorin chaakin pemeh.
44009027	Pdainu Barnabas tih mma' avah qhida tamsi rek paphaakda. Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni taluhep pih Saul lih lam thung ngi Kruwng avah mkurdutqhi chaak ungta Kruwng ngi Mma' hinni taluhep pih kpau ungta mma ngi ningqit ktaak ki Damaskas thung ngi Jisu miing avah mparjaam chaak tidit rek avah purphuwng chda.
44009028	Audilli mma ngi mmaan tu' amsap lamda Jerusalem thung ngi mmaan arlak ki chettlowng chda.
44009029	Ungta mma ngi mningqit ktaak ki Kruwng Jisu miing 'leenni pau chda ungta Grik pau vih kpau Jihudi rek tung ngi kirbi lamda ungta kerteenna' lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah ke'eyou rah the lamda.
44009030	Pdainu unau rek, ava' mdehn thungta mmaan nih Sijaria thah yukqhi dok lamda ungta Tarsas thah psunpthi dok lamda.
44009031	Hanto ngi, Judia le' Galily ungta Samaria paam mkheng thungki lamrinlop rek mkheng thung ngi plung kdai amda ungta pqhang chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Kruwng kqi ngi mche chaak inni ungta Pthla Kchiir ava ngi plungngam mdopiik chaak inni mmaan avah nemthang seset chlamda.
44009032	'Tunnu Pitar rih khuwpaam mkheng thung ngi mche chaak thungta mma ngi Lydda thuh ka'am kcha' miikenje rek amna' avah phakhotda.
44009033	Mun ava' thung ngi Anias tidit miikhat avah kurdut qhida, mma' avah kum treht thung ngi kowm nangda kowida ungta kyengrii tongda ka'am kcha'.
44009034	Ungta Pitar rih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Anias Khrista Jisu ngi nang nga atapdam a, Ikerdel ungta akowm apenseen dok.” Audilli m'tunkat daat tih mmah kerdelda.
44009035	Mthungta Lydda le' Sharon thung ngi ka'am rek mkheng ava ngi mma' avah mmikin nih dei lamda ungta Kruwng hinni kerheel chlamda.
44009036	Ungta Joppa thung ngi mmiing Tabitha tidit, npurlu thung ngi Dorkas mdodit sikhu khat ka'am. Hava' snu ava ngi kqhanong ungta tpiik chaakna' nong rek knempok ki tlow chda.
44009037	Pdainu mpha ava' thung ngi mma' avah kowida ungta diyou chda. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah alqhuh dok lam thida karthak ki innkhaar ava'thang ngi pi'iip lamda.
44009038	Ungta Lydda avah Joppa thungki vah mnaitek leiyi, sikhu rekki Pitar ava' thuh ka'am avah arja lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mii 'knii heipthla lamda, Pitar avah kbeisek ki mmaan mdo'arhei phaak lamna' rah ko'own rah heisi lamda.
44009039	Audilli Pitar rih ripda mmaan tu' arvangsap lamda. Ungta mma' merheitlun dok thungta mmaan nih mma' avah karthak ki innkhaar thah hanqhi lamda. Ungta meikhunu rekki Dorkas tih mmaan tu' mrin thung ngi mdo'arkhown buwtluwn rekle' dona rek avah mma' hinni tedet lamda.
44009040	Pdainu Pitar rih mmaan mkheng avah duwn thah pthuwk pthi lamda ungta mma ngi tirdiilda rinktham chda. Ungta mma ngi kluwng ava' ktong thah kerheel thida hanto'theda: “Tabitha ikerdel,” dida. Ungta mma ngi mmik pahar chda ungta Pitar mdeh thungta kerdelda ko'ongda.
44009041	Audilli mma ngi mkhut piida ungta mma' avah qenpripda. Ungta mma ngi miikenje rekle' meikhunu rek avah mo'own purkuw lam dilli mmaan hinni Dorkas avah kring ngi parlaan chlamda.
44009042	Ungta avah Joppa kirkhildek ki karjaamda ungta mii knempok ki Kruwng hinni lam'rin chlamda.
44009043	Mthungta mma ngi nit knempok ki Joppa thung ngi saavun kparnaal Simon tu' amve lamda.
44010001	Sijaria khuwpii thung ngi Italy raalmiilop mdoditin ava' thung ngi mmiing Kornelias mdoditin, raalmii arja khat kpupa khat ka'am.
44010002	Mma' mdak le' mi'innmii rek mkheng avah rinko'owi kcha' ungta Isowr kqi kcha' mii reklam. Mma ngi plung kertleu deek ki tpiik chaakna' nong avah tlow chda. Ungta mpha ktai thung ngi Isowr hinni rinkaktham kcha'lu.
44010003	Niikhat tih, mutkutna' qhang, tidit tah kluh ki qhang kdum arveel lih mma ngi rinmer khat kindit tih deida, Mleiya Isowr vaantamsi khat tih mma' hinni thlengda, “Kornelias,” dida, ownda.
44010004	Ungta mma ngi mma' avah kmin nih msutrim thungta mningqida ungta mma ngi, ‘taluda Kruwng?’ dida. Mthungta mma ngi mma' hinni hanto'theda: “Nang arinktham chaak rekle' tpiik chaakna' nong rek adotlot avah Isowr aang ngi tbinphaakna' khat tih arhang ktlung a.
44010005	'Tunnu nang ngi Joppa thah Pitar mdodit Simon ava' ko'own rah mii heipthla.
44010006	Mma' avah truwnpii biing ngi mi'inn ka'am saavun kparnaal Simon hinni kcheengda ka'am daat. Mma ngi nang ngi talu tlownadi', tidit avah akthepiik rah.”
44010007	Ungta mma' hinni kpau vaantamsi ava' msun dok dilli Kornelias tih mi'inn thungki suwk 'knii rekle' mpha ktai thung ngi mma' karda tlit kchok rek arlak ki rinko'owi kcha' raalmii khat avah ownda.
44010008	Ungta mma ngi hava' dow rek mkheng avah mmaan hinni mthepindit piik doklam dilli Joppa thah heisi lamda.
44010009	Mupduknii ngi mmaan ava ngi anto' valamda khuwpii mheiphaak tiing tiingin arlaan nih Pitar rih mutrukna' qhang tidit tah qhang sowm lei'knii arveel lih inntun thah rinkaktham chrah hangkalda.
44010010	Audilli mmah kdung ngi mpowi thamda then tchaak rah binda. Pdainu mmaan nih von mtlot meek sliin arlaan nih mmah mrinnow kerthlengda?
44010011	Ungta mma ngi, dowphel klinpa hep daat khat, mirkil plii thung ngi tbowl khat avah mma' hinni parvaan ki ngi arjuda dulti thah arjuptlada.
44010012	Ungta ava' thung ngi dultipaam thungki mdetmdet ki mkhuh pliipum downkhaal rek nowmsaa rek, mpowiyi kondowtda kchet rek ungta parvaan laiyi kyuwng pva rek mkheng avah kurkhumjik ki ka'am.
44010013	Ungta mma' hinni krowl khat kurju ava ngi hanto'theda: “Pitar, ikerdel, a'eyou rang ngi havah acha.”
44010014	Pdainu, Pitar rih theda: “Kruwng anto' pemeh! Neiya kchiir kma' ungta kertleu kma' dow khatleh kcha pmaang.”
44010015	Ungta krowl ava ngi mhin nih mveiknitna' theda: “Isowr rih mdopertleu dok avah nang ngi kchiir kma' dida, louma'.”
44010016	Ungta hava' avah veikdum thung ngi tlowda ungta dow avah veikhat parvaan thah arjuklou chda.
44010017	'Tunnu Pitar rih mrinmer thung ngi mdodeh avah talu ninglei rang tidit leiyi, ngakda ma'am arlaan nih asuwn, Kornelias tih mdosi mii rek ava ngi Simon inn kthlaam mih paltong thung ngi ripdaat lamda.
44010018	Ungta mmaan nih arhei'owng lamda Pitar mdodit Simon avah hava' thuh kekcheeng mowi, tidit kheel chlamda.
44010019	Pitar rih rinmer ava'leiyi binda ma'am arlaan nih Pthla ava ngi mhin nih theda: “Asuw, miilai kdum rekki atthlaam lam a.
44010020	Avaleiyi, rip rang ngi junqum ungta mmaan aqowi lam, dow khatleh kelqen nih binma' mleiya mmaan avah neiyi kdopthlat lam.
44010021	Audilli Pitar rih junqumda Kornelias hinki ngi mma' hinni mdo'arjuk pthlat mii rek avah junpha lamda ungta naan nih adothlaamin avah, nei ping, talu rang ki thenni naanna karvaanpti,” dida?
44010022	Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Raalmii arja khat kpupa Kornelias hinki karvaan ping. Mma' avah mrinkindit ungta Isowr kqi kcha' ungta Jihudi chaat mkheng rek arlak ki mdang kqha miikhat. Mleiya mma ngi nang ahinki pauna rek mdo'arjaak chaakna' rah kchiir vaantamsi khat tih, mi'inn thah nang adoto'own chaakna' rah mhin nih thepiikda.”
44010023	Audilli mma ngi mmaan avah arlaang chlamda ungta ptlung chlamda.
44010024	Ungta mupduknii ngi mmaan nih Sijaria khuw avah pha lamda. 'Tunnu Kornelias tih mu'umnau rekle' maplap kurthuhqhi kat rek avah own purkuwk lamda ungta mmaan avah arda chlamda.
44010025	Ungta Pitar marvanluw thungta Kornelias tih mma' avah kurdutqhi chda ungta mkhuhther rih tluwda luwbuk chda.
44010026	Pdainu Pitar rih mma' avah phong thida hanto'theda: “Irip dok, nei rukka nang ahep daat miilai ping.”
44010027	Ungta mma ngi mma' tu' pau msaamin chunni marvanluwn thungta mma ngi mii knempok ki kurtuwlda ka'am ava' deida.
44010028	Audilli mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih Jihudi miikhat tih chaat morson khat tu' kilqhi mditmata mi'inn thuh kluwt avah mnowpa pemeh tidit adodehn. Pdainu Isowr rih, neiyi kuwkhat leh hinni kchiir kma' mditmata kertleu kma' kdodit mana' rah kihin nih mepdeh chda.
44010029	Avaleiyi, neiyi mko'own rah merhei daatin le' kmat kmah kdoqowi chaak daat lam. 'Tunnu akkheel chaak a, taluleiyi nang ngi neiya adoto'own chaak plih?”
44010030	Ungta Kornelias tih hanto'theda: “Nii plii a kthleng dok a, neiyi hava' 'tunki mpha kpha thung ngi then ngowl nuh ungta mutkutna' qhang, tidit tah kluh ki qhang kdum, ava' thung ngi neiyi ki'inn thung ngi rinktham chnuh. Ungta ava' thung ngi asuw, buwdiir kepleu dang kihilkna miikhat avah kmaisuk ki ripda.
44010031	Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: ‘Kornelias, nang arinkthamna' rek avah atarjaak piik dok a. Ungta nang ngi tpiik chaakna' nong adotlot rek avah Isowr rih atbinphaak piik a.
44010032	Avaleiyi, nang ngi Pitar mdodit Simon ava' ko'own rah Joppa thah mii apthlalam, mma' avah truwnpii hinni ka'am, saavun kparnaal Simon inn thung ngi ka'am daat. Ungta mma ngi thleng donni ahin nih paukthe rah.’ dida.
44010033	Avaleiyi, neiyi kbeisek ki mmaan avah nang ahin nih kdopthlat chaak lam, ungta nang athlen khot avah kqha a. Avaleiyi, 'tunnu neen kekheng inni Isowr rih nang ahin nih paupiik adotpiik chaak mkheng ava' karja chrang ngi Isowr aang ngi kurtuwl kchaan ping.”
44010034	Audilli Pitar rih mnehr pvangda tpau pqhunda hanto'theda: “Isowr rah mikmai suw meh tidit avah mkindit kat tidit neiyi kdeh chaak a.
44010035	Pdainu chaat khimkhei thung ngi Mma' kqi kcha' ungta mrinkindit tih nong ktlow kcha' rek avah Mma ngi mrotpiik lam a.
44010036	Isreel nau rek hinni Isowr rih mdopthlat pauna avah Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi plung kdai tparjaam ava'. Mma' avah mkheng ki Kruwng.
44010037	Hava' pauna avah naan nih adodeh dokin. Pauna havah Judia paamkuwl mkheng thuh ungta Galily ki kupqhun nih, diiluwna' ava' dilli Johon nih mdoparjaam avah hava'.
44010038	Mleiya taluhep pih Isowr rih Najareth ki Jisu avah Pthla Kchiir rih ungta ruhtanna' ava ngi reidii avah pubulda. Ungta taluhep pih, Mma ngi chetda kqhanong tlowda ungta tarnampii ngi suwk mdopthuh mkheng rek avah mdopdam mow? Mleiya havah, Isowr rah Mma' tu' mkilqhi lei.
44010039	Ungta neenna, mmaan nih ding 'leenni pthowi lamda mdo'eyown Mma' ava ngi Jihudi rek paam thuh ungta Jerusalem thung ngi mdotlot dow mkheng rek ava' ki sakhi rek inping.
44010040	Mma' avah Isowr rih mnii kdumna' thung ngi perdelda ungta mdotedetna' rang ki thenni Mma' avah pandangda.
44010041	Ungta mii mkheng rek hin pemeh pdainu Isowr rih mduh thah mdokchol dok ksa sakhi rek neen kihinin daat. Ungta dakat tih Mma ngi kdiyou thungki mrinkerheel dilli neen kihin nih kandangda Mma' tu' chasap, neesap innu.
44010042	Ungta Mma ngi neen kihin nih, mii rek hinni tparjaamna' rah ungta Mma' avah Isowr rih kring le' kdiyou rekki paukpinditpa rang ngi mdokchol chaak dok ava' tidit ki rinpaumin tpiikna' rah paupiik mpiinda.
44010043	Khulpu rek mkheng ngi Mma' leiyi, sakhi mpiikin, tidit tah Mma' miing 'leenni Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rek khimkheiyi pnu rek toptlot piikna' karlaang chlam rah.”
44010044	Pitar rih hava' pauna rek ava' msaam meeksli arlaan nih Pthla Kchiir avah pauna ava' karja kcha' rek mkheng 'leenni arjungda.
44010045	Ungta Pitar tu' kilqhi lamkrin kcha' vunkreen rek ava ngi Chaatktlei rek 'leen rukku Pthla Kchiir mdo'arjukptlon leiyi, mningin ngakyou chda.
44010046	Mleiya mmaan nih pau ktleiyi pau lamda ungta Isowr avah ponlor chlamda. Audilli Pitar rih arthaang lamda.
44010047	“Kuwmiikhat tih, neen nih tarlaan chaakin heppi Pthla Kchiir karlaang kcha' hava' mii rekki dii mluw raan krow kma' ka'am ngaalin mow?”
44010048	Ungta mma ngi mmaan avah Kruwng miing 'leenni dii mdopluwna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Pitar hinni mmaan nih nit mruk mmaan tu' ma'amna' raan kheel chlamda.
44011001	'Tunnu Judia thuh ka'am tamsi rekle' unau rekki Chaatktlei rek rukku Isowr pauna avah marlaan chaak inna tidit avah arja lamda.
44011002	Ungta Pitar rih Jerusalem thah murhun thungta lamkrin kcha' vunkreen rekki mma' avah kerteenqhi lamda.
44011003	Mmaan nih mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Nang nga vunkreen kma' rek hinni chet tinu ungta mmaan tu' then chasap intinu!”
44011004	Pdainu Pitar rih mmaan hinni mbul ki kupqhun nih hanto'theda, thepindit piik lamda:
44011005	“Neiyi Joppa khuw thung ngi amnu ungta rinktham chnuh. Ungta neiyi krinnow mkerthlen thung ngi rinmer khat deinu. Dowphel klinpa hep daat khat avah mirkil plii thang ngi kyowngda turjukptlaak heppi parvaan ki ngi arjung tlada ungta avah nei kihin nih arjuda.
44011006	Ungta neiyi kmin nih avah suwnu ksutpindit thungta neiyi dultipaam thungki mdetmdet ki mkhuh pliipum downkhaal rek ungta nowmsaa rek, mpowiyi kondowtda kchet rek ungta parvaanlai ki pva rek mkheng avah deinu.
44011007	Ungta neiyi krowl khat tih, ‘Pitar ikerdel rang ngi hava'le' avah a'eyou rang ngi acha,’ mdodit arjanu.
44011008	Pdainu neiyi: ‘Anto' pemeh Kruwng! Mleiya neiya teden rukku kchiir kma' ungta kertleu kma' dow khatleh knehr thuh luwtmlai,’ dinuh.
44011009	Pdainu krowl ava ngi parvaan ki ngi veikhat marthaang nowlda hanto'theda: ‘Isowr rih mdopertleu dok avah nang ngi kchiir kma' dida louma'.’
44011010	Ungta anto ngi avah veikdumtet thung ngi tlow thida, ava' mkheng rek avah parvaan thah veikhat arjukqen dok chda.
44011011	Mpha ava'kat thung ngi Sijaria ki mdo'arhei pthlatin miilai kdum rek avah nei ka'amna' inn maiyi ripdaat lamda.
44011012	Audilli Pthla ava ngi mmaan tu' plungkelqen ktaak ki mdilin aqowi lam mdida. Ava' han'tun nih unau rek miilai truk ki neiya mqowi chlamda ungta neen nih mii ava' inn thung ngi luwt innu.
44011013	Ungta mma ngi, mi'inn thuh vaantamsi mdodehna' avah kihin nih songda tidit tah vaantamsi ava ngi mhin nih, ‘Joppa thah mii heipthla rang ngi mmiing Pitar tidit Simon avah hei'own.
44011014	Ungta mma ngi nang ruk ungta a'inn thuh ka'am rek rukka akarsan chaakna' raan pau akthepiik raan,’ ditpiikda.
44011015	Ungta neiyi mmaan hinni tpau kupqhun thungta mupqhunthok thung ngi neen n'leenin ki heppi Pthla Kchiir avah mmaan 'leenni arjuda.
44011016	Audilli neiyi, Kruwng ngi, ‘Dakat tih Johon vah diisik ki dii mdopluw pdainu naanna Pthla Kchiir rih dii akupluwt raan,’ dida, mdothe pauna avah binphaak nuh.
44011017	Avaleiyi, neen nih Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni lamnrin chaakin thung ngi midotpiikin chla avah Isowr rih mmaan hinni mpiik arlaan nih Isowr krisan pchaang rang neiya kuw ping lih?”
44011018	Mmaan nih hava' dow rek ava' marjaakin thungta kdairim mih am chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Mdit bih, Isowr rih Chaatktlei rek hin rukku rinkum tarlaanna' rah plung tperthlen chaakna' avah mpiik chaak lam a,” dilamda. Isowr avah ponlor chlamda.
44011019	'Tunnu Stiphen chiireelna' dilli kerjei dok kcha' rek ava ngi Phininsia paamkuwl Saipras diiloipaam ungta Antiok khuwpii kpha thung ngi chet lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kqhapaumin avah kuw morson khatleh hin kma' Jihudi rek hindaat tih parjaam chlamda.
44011020	Anto'daat yoso Saipras diiloipaam le' Sairen paamkuwl ki mii aangqhe rekki mmaan nih Antiok mphaakin thung ngi Grik pau vih kpau Jihudi rek hin rukku Kruwng Jisu avah parjaam chlamda.
44011021	Ungta Kruwng ruhtan avah mmaan hinni amda ungta miichai knempok ki lam'rin chlamda ungta Kruwng hinni kerheel chlamda.
44011022	Audilli hava' dow rekki pau rek avah Jerusalem thungki lamrinlop kna tlungda. Mthungta mmaan nih Barnabas avah Antiok kpha kchet rang ngi pthla lamda.
44011023	Ungta mma ngi tlungda ungta Isowr plungnee ava' mdeh chaak thungta kanpa chda. Ungta mma ngi mmaan avah muplungbinrit intu' kilqhi ngi Kruwng hinni ma'am tlit chaakna' raanni mmaan mkhengin avah ksop chlamda.
44011024	Mleiya mma' avah Pthla Kchiir rih ungta lamrin nih kdim miikqha khat. Ungta ava' thung ngi miipii rek knempok avah Kruwng hinni thlolpom chlamda.
44011025	Audilli Barnabas avah Saul kthlaam rang ngi Tarsas thah sun chda.
44011026	Ungta mma ngi mkurdutqhi chaak dilli mma' avah Antiok thah arvan qhida. Mthungta anto ngi mmaan nih lamrinlop ava' tu' kum khat thung ngi am lamda kurtuwlsap kchok lamda. Ungta mmaan nih miipii knempok rek avah purchuk chlamda. Ungta rukrirep pih Antiok thung ngi sikhu rek avah Khristen tidit miing phuwk chlamda.
44011027	Ungta mpha ava' thung ngi khulpu rek aangqhe avah Jerusalem ki ngi Antiok thah arjung lamda.
44011028	Audilli marlakin ki mmiing Agabas mdoditin ava ngi ripda Pthla ar'aang ngi, ‘dultipaam mkheng thung ngi powitham kthuwk bei rah,’ dida, purphuwng chda. Ungta avah Klaudias Siijar ki mpha thung ngi thuwkda.
44011029	Audilli sikhu rek ava ngi mma' mma' ki mdopchaan chaak dilkqowiyi Judia paam thuh ka'am unau rek hinni tbom chaakna' tapthlat rah kdi ngi rip lamda.
44011030	Mmaan nih havah tlow lamda ungta Barnabas le' Saul khut thung ngi pii lamda, kver rek hinni hanpthla lamda.
44012001	'Tunnu mpha ava' thung ngi paamkruwng Herod tih lamrinlop thungki mii aangqhe rek ko'owr chrang ngi mkhut khiingda.
44012002	Ungta mma ngi Johon naupa James avah raal'kaang ngi eyouda.
44012003	Ungta mma ngi, ava ngi Jihudi rek plung kngam mdodeh leiyi, mma ngi Pitar rukka mdokyownna' rah m'lam thlaamda. 'Tunnu mpha avah Thowl ktaak Thenpen ki Nit rek thung ngi kthuwk.
44012004	Mthungta mma ngi Pitar avah kyowngda. Ungta mma ngi Taplaanna' ava' maklaan dilli mii rek hinni mdopthuh nuwm leiyi, rowng'inn thuh Pitar avah daalthida, raalmii chai plii rekki lop chai plii rek hinni mma' avah krung rah si lamda.
44012005	Anto ngi Pitar avah rowng'inn thung ngi am chda. Pdainu lamrinlop rekki mma' thenni Isowr hinni kdet liit kmah rinktham piik chlamda.
44012006	Ungta Herod tih mma' mdopthuhna' rang nit ava' ki mjaan nih Pitar avah thiirrii 'knii ngi tbowldaat tih raalmii 'knii arlak ki'iip daatda. Ungta mma' krung raalmii morson rek rukka rowng'inn thurngutbul lih ripdaat lamda.
44012007	'Tunnu asuwn, Kruwng vaantamsi khat thuwkda mhin nih ripda, rowng'inn ava' thung ngi mar'aang piida. Ungta mma ngi Pitar avah msiirthah tpeengda perdelda ungta hanto'theda: “Kbeisek ki hangrip,” ungta ava' thung ngi mkhut 'leenki thiirrii avah tla chda.
44012008	Audilli vaantamsi ava ngi mhin nih hanto'theda: “Ado'ana anadok ungta akhuhkok apirsi dok,” ungta mma ngi anto' tlowda. Ungta mma ngi the nowlda: “Abuwhil ahil rang ngi nei mheiqowi.”
44012009	Mthungta mma ngi anto' vangthuwkda mma'dil avah qowida. Ungta mma ngi vaantamsi ava ngi mdotlot avah mlangkat tidit deimda pdainu mma ngi rinmer khat kdeh a tidit tih binda.
44012010	Ungta mmaan nih mkhatna' ungta miknitna' rowng'inn krung rek amna' mkheel dokin dilli khuwpii tphaakna' thiir paltong pha lamda. Ungta thiir paltong avah mthina ngi kparvang chda. Ungta mmaanve ngi vangthuwk dok lamda, khuwpii'lam khat qowi lamda myunin arlaan nih m'tunkat daat tih vaantamsi avah mma' hinki sun chda.
44012011	Ungta 'tunnu Pitar rih mkerdeh chaak thungta hanto'theda: “'Tunnu Kruwng ngi Mma' vaantamsi avah nei kihin nih mtapthlat piik a, tidit avah neiyi kindit chelli kdeh chaak a. Mleiya havah Mma ngi Herod khut thungki ungta Jihudi rek plungbin chaak rek thungki mdotsan chaakna' rang kithen.”
44012012	Mma ngi ava' mdeh chaak dok dilli, mmiingdak Mark mdodit Johon nuh Mary ava' inn thung ngi arvangda. Ungta ava' thung ngi mmaan nih knempok ki kurtuwl lamda rinktham meeksli lamda.
44012013	Ungta Pitar rih duwn ki thurngut mqhil thungta Rhoda mdoditin snunau suwk khat ava ngi thurngut kapvang rah arvada.
44012014	Ungta mma ngi Pitar krowl tidit marjaak pindit thungta mkanpat chaak reen nih thurngut kapvang kmah ngi vangchenda, ‘Pitar rah thurngutbul lih krip daat a,’ tidit vantheda.
44012015	Pdainu mmaan nih mhin nih, ‘nang nga ka'aak kchaampti,’ dilamda. Anto'daat yoso mma ngi: ‘Anto'kat pi'ii,’ tidit avah thetheda. Mthungta mmaan nih, ‘mdit bih havah mma' vaantamsi thideh,’ dilamda.
44012016	Pdainu Pitar rih thurngut avah qhilqhil daatda. Ungta mmaan nih thurngut pvang lamda ungta mma' mdehn thungta mningin ngakyou chda.
44012017	Pdainu mma ngi rimkdi ma'amna' raan mmaan avah kchap lamda. Ungta mma ngi taluhep pih Kruwng ngi rowng'inn ava'thung ki mma' avah mupthuh tidit avah mmaan hinni purphuwngda. Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih chetin rang ngi James le' unau rek hinni hava' dow rek avah vansongin,” dida. Ungta mma ngi ava' thung ki sunda mmun morson thah chetda.
44012018	Ungta mupduknii ki jiingsun mphaak thungta Pitar hinni kthuwk ava'leiyi raalmii rek arlak ki klinyou kchang ngi vaangklum khat thuwkda.
44012019	Pdainu Herod tih mma' avah thlaamda ungta mdehma thungta mma ngi rowng'inn krung rek avah kmin nih pau kheel lamda ungta mma ngi mmaan avah te'eyow rah tidit ki paupiik pii lamda.
44012020	'Tunnu Herod tah Tair le' Sidon khuwpii ki mii rektu' mkalraiyin leiyi, kdung ngi m'leenin nih plung pthitpsuk lamda. Pdainu mmaan mkheng inni plung khadaat tih mhin nih hang lamda. Paamkruwng ava ngi mi'inn thung ksutpqowi rah mdosi msuwk Blastas plap mdokurthuhqhi chaak inni mmaan nih Herod hinni mkalqhat chaakna' raan qhil chlamda. Mleiya mmaan khuwpaam avah paamkruwng ava' paamkuwl thungki ngi thendam avah mdopiik chaak kchown.
44012021	Ungta nit tpelreen khat thung ngi Herod tih paamkruwng dona rek hilnada ungta mma ngi pau mdopinditna', mma' Kruwng longkhom 'leenni ko'ong thida mii rek hinni pau theda.
44012022	Ungta mmaan nih owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Havah Isowr krowl, dultimii krowl pemeh.”
44012023	Audilli m'tunkat daat tih Kruwng vaantamsi ava ngi mma' avah heem ptluda. Mleiya mma ngi Isowr avah mdoponlor chaak pemeh. Ungta mma' avah pden nih sowda ungta diyou chda.
44012024	Pdainu Isowr pauna avah linthangda ungta koryouda.
44012025	Ungta Barnabas le' Saul lih mnongtlotin mupqut chaak dokin dilli Jerusalem ki arjung kerheel lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Mark mdoditin Johon rukka arjunqhi lamda.
44013001	'Tunnu Antiok lamrinlop ava' thung ngi khulpu rekle' chukpu rek ka'am lam. Mmaan avah Barnabas, kvom mdoditin Simeon, Sairen ki Lusias ungta paamkuwl plii rekki khat ki paamkpu, Herod tung ngi klinkheng Menan ungta Saul le' lim lam.
44013002	Mmaan nih Kruwng hinni soplow chlamda ungta then mngowl chaakin thung ngi Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “'Tunnu Barnabas le' Saul avah Neiyi kdo'own lamna' nong ava' ktlow rang ki thenni Nei kthen nih, apantaan pthiin.”
44013003	Audilli mmaan nih then ngowl lamda ungta rinktham chlam thida mmaanve 'leenni mkhutin khiinpiik lamda ungta mmaanve avah pthla chlamda.
44013004	Anto ngi Pthla Kchiir rih mdopthlat chaak lam leiyi, mmaanve ngi Selusia thah yu lamda ungta ava' thung ki ngi Saipras thah heithap lamda.
44013005	Ungta mmaanve ngi Salamis mphaakin thungta Jihudi rekki sinegog rek thung ngi Isowr pauna avah parjaam chlamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi Johon avah mmaan kbom rang ngi mdoqhi chaakin.
44013006	'Tunnu mmaan nih diiloipaam kthleng ngi chet lamda, Paphos khuwpii mphaakin thungta mmaan nih mmiing Bar Jisu mdodit, Jihudi mii, mlangkma' khulpu, k'dim khat avah kurdutqhi lamda.
44013007	Mma' avah paamkpu Sargias Paulas tidit luwkinrit miikhat tu' kilqhi lamda. Hava' mii ava ngi Barnabas le' Saul avah own lamda ungta Isowr pauna avah mmaanve hinki tarjaak rah bin chda.
44013008	Pdainu k'dim Elimas, tih mmaanve avah pkhaan lamda. Mleiya mmaan pau vih Elimas mdoditin, Elimas tidit tah mii kinrit mdoditna'. Mleiya mma ngi lamrin ava' thung ki paamkpu avah mdoperheelna' rah mdotlot.
44013009	Audilli Paul ruk mdoditin Saul ava ngi Pthla Kchiir rih dim chthida, mma' avah suwrimda.
