44013010	Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “O, miiqhatmana' le' tuhuwn chaakna ngi kdim, tarnampii chapa nang ungta rinkinditna' mkheng ki miihal nang, nang ngi Kruwng 'Lam kirji adopenher avah down liit nim timow?
44013011	Ungta 'tunnu, dakat tih Kruwng ruhtan avah nang atun nih ka'am kcha' a, nang nga amik kjiing chrah ungta mphakhat ki thenni kni avah dei nimtih,” dida. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih mma' 'leenni armei le' kjiingnu arjuda ungta mma ngi mkhut thah kyowng donni kqhi chrah kuwmiikhat kukchul lih korloiyi chet chda.
44013012	Audilli paamkpu ava ngi kthuwk dow ava' mdeh thungta mma ngi lam'rin chda. Mleiya mma ngi Kruwng leiyi, mdopurchuh ava' thung ngi mmah mning kngakyou kcha'.
44013013	'Tunnu Paul le' mmiiqhi rek ava ngi Paphos khuwpii ki thap lamda mcheen thungta mmaan nih Pamphylia paamkuwl ki Perga khuwpii pha lamda. Ungta ava' thung ki ngi Johon nah mmaanve hinki korlouda Jerusalem thah hung kerheel chda.
44013014	Pdainu mmaanve a Perga thungki msunin thungta Pisidia paamkuwl ki Antiok khuwpii pha lamda ungta mmaanve ngi tkarngatnit tih sinegog thung ngi luwt lamda ungta ko'ong lamda.
44013015	Ungta sinegog kpupa rek ava ngi, Nowlam rekle' Khulpu rek laika mparcham dokin dilli mma ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda pau heipthlada: “Mii rek ungta unau rek, naanve ngi mii rek toksowna' pau ahorin cheentung ngi avah atheen.”
44013016	Audilli Paul lih hanripda ungta mkhut tih partamda hanto'theda: “Isreel mii rek ungta Isowr kqi kcha' rek naan nih, havah arjaan.
44013017	Hava' Isreel mii rekki Isowr ava ngi neen npa'leen avah kchol chlamda ungta Egypt paam thung ngi mal lih ma'amin thung ngi mmaan avah kparthaang ngi thi chlamda. Ungta mruhtan klin ava ngi, Mma ngi mmaan avah paam ava' thungki qhi pthuwk lamda.
44013018	'Tunnu kum somplii arveel thung ngi paamkbiik laiyi Mma ngi mmaan rinchan avah arvandiil chlamda.
44013019	Ungta Mma ngi Kenaan paam thung ngi chaat tikhiu rek mpenvei lam dilli Mma ngi mmaan paam avah npa'leen hinni alrouchom mih penthem piik lamda.
44013020	Ava' dilli Mma ngi khulpu Samuel arvankpha ngi kum arja plii somparnga thung ngi paukpindit rek avah mmaan hinni arvanpii lamda.
44013021	Ava' dilli mmaan nih paamkruwng ki thenni qhil chlamda. Mthungta Isowr rih Benjamin phung thungki miikhat. Kish chapa Saul avah paamkruwng ngi pii lamda, ungta mma ngi kum somplii thung ngi paamkruwng kurthuwkda.
44013022	Ungta Mma ngi Saul mlowpthi dilli Mma ngi mmaan thenni David avah paamkruwng khat tih pii lamda. Ungta mma' leiyi, Mma ngi hanto'theda rinpaumin mdopiik: ‘Neiyi Jessi chapa David kphan chaak a,’ (Luw. 89:20) ‘Nei kuplungbin hep daat mii, kdobin mkheng mma ngi ktlow rah.’ dida. (1 Sam. 13:14)
44013023	Hava' mii ava' suruwl thungki ngi, paureel dilkqowiyi Isowr rih Isreel nau rek thenni Miksan Jisu avah pqhangda.
44013024	Jisu mthlenduh ngi Johon nih Isreel mii rek mkheng hinni plung tperthlenna' le' dii tuluwna' avah parjaam dokda.
44013025	Ungta Johon nih mnongtlot ava' mqutna' thang ngi hanto'theda: ‘Naan nih, neiya kuwpi'ii atidit inna? Neiya Mma' ava' pmaang. Pdainu asuwn, hava' thuh nei kdil thah khat karvang nga. Neiya Mma' khuhkok rii kperthlet ki mtik kcha pmaang,’ dida.
44013026	Mii rek ungta unau rek, Abraham suruwl thungki nau rek ungta naan arlakin ki Isowr kqi kcha' rek, hava' tkirliinna' pauna avah naan ahin nih mdopthlat.
44013027	Jerusalem thung ngi ka'am mii rekle' paamkpu rekki Mma' avah deipindih chlammeh. Mmaan nih tkarngatnit ktaiyi mdoparchamin khulpu rek krowl avah mmaan nih Mma' mdopsulnaan ava' thung ngi purtluwm lamda.
44013028	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' thung ngi tidiyowna' krow ki mlei khatleh mdehmaan arlaan nih Pilaat hinni Mma' te'eyowna' rah qhil chlamda.
44013029	'Tunnu mmaan nih Mma' leiyi, mdokjit ava' mkheng ava' mpurtluwm dokin dilli Mma' avah ding 'leenki pqum lamda ungta thlaan khat thung ngi pi'iip chlamda.
44013030	Pdainu Isowr rih Mma' avah kdiyou thungki perdelda.
44013031	Mma' tu' Galily ki ngi Jerusalem thah karhang rek mmaan ava ngi Mma' avah nit knempok thung ngi dei lamda. Mmaan havah, mii rek hinni Mma' sakhi reklam.
44013032	Ungta neen nih naan ahinin nih, npa'leen hinni pau mdoreel dok ava' ki kqhapaumin avah kpurphuwn chaak inna.
44013033	Isowr rih, mmaan nau neen nihinin nih hava'kat avah mpurtluwm a, tidit tah Mma ngi Jisu avah mdoperdel dok. Miknitna' Luwbuklaa thung ngi mdokjit heppi: ‘Nang nga Nei Kchapa ptih, Tuni ngi Nang nga Neiyi akuppluk chaak a.’ (Luw. 2:7)
44013034	Ungta mma ngi Mma' daksa avah veikhat kqop kma' rang ngi mdoperdel chaak dok. Isowr rih hanto'theda: ‘Neiyi David hinni kdopiik trinchaak krow kchiir paureel rek avah ahin nih apii nikdi',’ dida. (Is. 55:3)
44013035	Avaleiyi, Luwbuklaa morson khat thung ngi hanto' the nowlda: ‘Nang ngi Nang ki Kchiir Khat avah pqop nimtih.’ (Luw. 16:10)
44013036	Ungta David tih mma' suruwl rek thung ngi Isowr plungbin avah sopmlow chaak dilli kdiyou vih iip chda, ungta mma' avah mpa le' tu' alruwl chlamda ungta mdaksa a qop chda.
44013037	Pdainu Isowr rih mdoperdel chaak Mma' avah qopmeh.
44013038	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek naan nih havah adeiyin, tidit tah hava' Mii ava' ar'aang ngi naan ahin nih pnu rek toptlot piikna' avah kdoparjaam chaakin.
44013039	Ungta Moses nowlam mih dow mkheng thungki adotpindit pchaanmah naan ava' thung ki naan avah hava' Mma' ar'aang ngi lamkrin kcha' khimkhei rek avah mpindit piik chaak dok lam a.
44013040	Avaleiyi, naan nih Khulpu rekki mdotheen dow rek avah a'leenin nih mthuhmana' rah ikilrin deichaan.
44013041	Khulpu rekki hanto' the lamda: ‘Asuwn, tukksut kma' rek, naan ingakin ungta ikenvei chaan. Mleiya Neiyi naanki mpha thung ngi nong tlow nikdi'. Ungta naan nih nong avah kuwmiikhat tih athepiik daatin yoso teden rukku lam'rin nimaan tih,’ mdodit.” (Hab. 1:5)
44013042	Ungta Jihudi rekki sinegog thungki mvanthuh dokin thungta Chaatktlei rekki hava' pauna avah karvang rang, tkarngatnit tih mmaan hinni mdoparjaam piik lamna' rah Paul le' Barnabas hinni ktham chlamda.
44013043	'Tunnu mii rekki kui lamda mvanthuhn thungta Paul le' Barnabas avah Jihudi rekle' Jihudi rin'owi ko'owi kcha' knempok rekki mdilin qowi chlamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi mmaan nih Isowr plungnee thung ngi ma'am tlit chaakna' raan mmaan avah pnuwm chlamda.
44013044	Ungta mkorjown tkarngatnit ava' thung vah khuwpii mkheng thungki mii avah mkheng souvih Isowr pauna karja chrah kurtuwl chlamda.
44013045	Pdainu Jihudi rekki miipiipa rek mdehn thungta muplungin avah tukyuwnna ngi dim chda. Ungta mmaan nih Paul lih mdothe dow rek ava' kepteng ngi ungta kipthit tih pau lamda.
44013046	Audilli Paul le' Barnabas tih mningqitin ktaak ki hanto' the lamda: “naan ahin nih Isowr pauna avah rukrirep pih tethe rang avah msit am rekrekda, pdainu naan nih avah kthitnaan tinu ungta naan adak kat inni ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah karlaang kcha' ki mtik kcha kma' rang ngi pau akpindit chaak dokin leiyi, asuwn, 'tunnu neen nih Chaatktlei rek ktong thah ktarngat chaak inna.
44013047	Mleiya Kruwng ngi neenve kihinin nih hanto ngi paupiik mpiinda: ‘Neiyi nang nga Chaatktlei rek hinni mar'aang khat tih akthiik a. Tidit tah dultipaam mdonna' kpha thuh nang ngi tkirliinna' avah adohor rah.’ ” (Is. 49:6)
44013048	Ungta 'tunnu Chaatktlei rekki ava' marjaakin thungta kanpa chlamda ungta Isowr rah panpaak chlamda. Ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum ki thenni mdokchol chaak dok mkheng rek ava ngi lam'rin chlamda.
44013049	Ungta Kruwng pauna avah paamkuwl mkheng thung ngi karjaam chda.
44013050	Pdainu Jihudi rekki, rinko'owi kcha' snu rekle' takyat kurhuwi snu rek ungta khuwpii ava' thung ki miikenreel rek avah kchoukrep lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Paul le' Barnabas 'leenni tyatchiireelna' pthuwk lamda ungta mmaanve avah mpaamkuwlin thungki knengpthi lamda.
44013051	Pdainu mmaan nih mkhuhn 'leenki vaiphul avah mmaan 'leenni kqhik psuk lam thida Ikoniam thah arvang chlamda.
44013052	Ungta sikhu rek avah kanpa le' Pthla Kchiir rih pdim chlamda.
44014001	'Tunnu Ikoniam thung ngi Paul le' Barnabas tih Jihudi rek Sinegog thung ngi luwtve lamda ungta anto ngi mpauin thungta Jihudi rekle' Grik rek knempok ki lam'rin chlamda.
44014002	Pdainu lamkrin kma' Jihudi rekki, Chaatktlei rek avah kchoukrep lamda ungta unau rek ava' 'leenni, muplungin thung ngi kru thlaak pthi lamda.
44014003	Audilli Paul le' Barnabas tih mpha ksowt tih ava' thuh am lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Kruwng pauna leiyi, mningqitin ktaak ki pau chlamda. Ungta Kruwng ngi Paul le' Barnabas khut thung ngi titinna' rekle' tngana' nong rek mdoptlot pchaan lam ava ngi Mma' plungnee ki rinpaumin avah piida.
44014004	Pdainu khuwpii ava' thung ki mii rek avah aangqhe ngi Jihudi rek hinni ungta aangqhe ngi tamsi rek hinni kenqhen chlamda.
44014005	Ungta Jihudi rekle' Chaatktlei rekki mmaan ki paamkpu rektu' eenghal lih mmaanve avah ningkya kpii rah ungta lung ngi kdeeng rah the lamda.
44014006	Pdainu mmaanve ngi avah dei lamda ungta avaleiyi Likonia paamkuwl ki khuwpii rek Listra le' Darbi thah chen chlamda.
44014007	Ungta mmaanve ngi kqhapaumin avah ava' thung ngi parjaam chlamda.
44014008	Ungta Listra thung ngi mnuh ngi mupluk daat ki kyeng kcha', mkhuh thung ngi ruhtan ka'am kma' teden rukku kchet kcha' kma' miikhat avah ko'ong daatda.
44014009	Hava' mii ava ngi Paul kpau avah arja chda ungta Paul lih mma' avah kmin nih msutrim thungta mma ngi tapdam chaakna' rah lamrin mdothlowi chaak avah deida.
44014010	Ungta Paul lih krowl kparthaang ngi owngda, ‘Hangrip ungta kinding ngi irip,’ dida. Ungta mma ngi konchowmda ungta tche pqhun chda.
44014011	'Tunnu mii rek ava ngi Paul lih mdotlot avah mmikin nih mdehn thungta mmaan nih owng lamda, Likonia pau vih, ‘isowr rek avah neen nihin nih miilai heppi arjunkqum a,’ dilamda.
44014012	Ungta mmaan nih Barnabas avah ‘Jeus,’ dilamda ungta Paul ava ngi, kpaupa mkenreelsi mkurthuh leiyi, mma' avah ‘Harmis,’ dilamda.
44014013	Ungta khuwpii aang ngi ka'am Jeus luwbuk'inn ki thimpu ava ngi silpa rekle' reirii rek avah khuwpii suwng ava' thung ngi arjuksinda mmaanve hinni miipii rekpa tung ngi rinkparlaan chrah the lamda.
44014014	Pdainu tamsi rek, Barnabas le' Paul lih ava' marjaakin thungta mmaanve ngi mdomnaan kqet lamda ungta miipii rek arlak ki heichen lamda.
44014015	Ungta owng lamda hanto' the lamda: Mii rek naan nih taluleiyi hava'le' avah atlot inna? Neenve rukka naan ahep daat, miilai inping ungta neenve ngi naan ahin nih hava'lu hep daat msit ktaak dow rek hinki ngi kring Isowr hinni akerheel chaakna' raan kqhapaumin avah naan ahin nih kdoparjaam chaakin, Mma' ava ngi parvaan le' dultipaam ungta truwnpii ungta ava' thung ngi ka'am dow mkheng rek avah mdoseem.
44014016	Alraangvah mma ngi chaat mkheng rek avah mmaan mmaan ki plungbin nih mdopche chaak lam.
44014017	Anto'daat yoso Mma ngi Mma' mdak avah mrinpaumin ktaak ki karmapthi meh. Mleiya Mma ngi kqha mitlotpiik inda, parvaan ki khu mipratpiik inda ungta chapaar ki mpha mipiinda. Ungta neen nuplungin avah thendam le' tkanpatna' ngi mipdimpiik inda.
44014018	Ungta hava' mdotheen ava' rukku mmaan nih neenve hinni rin'mdoparlaan raan thungki avah tapkhaanna' parsada.
44014019	Audilli Antiok le' Ikoniam ki Jihudi rek avah ava' thuh thleng lamda. Ungta mmaan nih miipii rek avah siinchaak lamda ungta mmaan nih Paul avah lung ngi deeng lamda ungta khuwpii duwn thah kdiyou kcha' a, dilamda, varpthi lamda.
44014020	Anto'daat yoso sikhu rekki mma' tkhul lamda mkurtuwl chaakin thung ngi mma ngi kerdelda ungta khuwpii ava' thung ngi vangluwtda. Ungta mupduknii ngi mma ngi Barnabas tu' Darbi khuwpii thah sun chda.
44014021	Ungta mmaanve ngi khuwpii ava' thuh kqhapumin parjaam lamda sikhu knempok mapqhanin dilli mmaanve ngi Listra thah, Ikoniam thah ungta Antiok thah hung kerheel lamda.
44014022	Ungta mmaanve ngi mcheen thung ngi sikhu rek plungrin ava' 'leenni ruhtan pii chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih lamrin ava' thuh ma'am tlit chaakna' raanni hanto ngi the lamda: “Neen nih kdung ngi tyat tperteelna' knempok rekki Isowr kruwngpaalna' thuh tuluw chaak raan,” dilamda ksop chlamda.
44014023	Ungta mmaanve ngi, mmaan thenni lamrinlop rek khimkhei thung ngi kver rek makthlan dokin dilli ungta then ngowl lamda rinmaktham chaakin dilli, lammdorin chaakin Kruwng hinni mmaan avah parlaan chlamda.
44014024	Ungta mmaanve ngi Pisidia paamkuwl kthleng ngi mche chaakin dilli Pamphylia paamkuwl avah pha lamda.
44014025	'Tunnu mmaanve ngi Perga khuwpii thung ngi pau mparjaam dokin dilli Atalia arkuwngkal thah julamda.
44014026	Ava' thung ki ngi mmaanve ngi, Antiok khuwpii thah arkuwng 'leenni hang lamda. Ava' thung ngi lamrinlop ava ngi mmaanve avah, mmaanve ngi mdopqut dokin, nong ava' thung ngi mmaanve avah Isowr plungnee thung ngi parlaan chlamda.
44014027	Ungta mmaanve ngi mtlun dokin thungta lamrinlop avah purkuwksap chlamda ungta Isowr rih mmaanve hinni mdotlot rek mkheng avah mmaan hinni song chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih lammdorin chaakna' raan ki thenni Chaatktlei rek hinni Isowr rih 'lam pvanpiik lamda tidit avah song chlamda.
44014028	Ungta mmaanve ngi mpha ksowt tih ava' thuh sikhu rek tung ngi amsap lamda.
44015001	Ungta Judia paamkuwl ki mii aangqhe rekki Antiok thah yu lamda unau rek avah hanto ngi purchuk lamda: ‘Mleiya naan nih Moses tih paupiik mdotpiikin heppi, vun'areen chaak maan bih naan nih tkirliinna' avah arlaang pchaang nimaan tih,’ dilamda.
44015002	Ungta ava' thung ngi Paul le' Barnabas tih mmaan tu' kdung ngi kolrow lam mda ungta kerteenna' lamda. Audilli mmaan nih, tamsi rekle' kver rek hinni hava' pau ava' kkheel rang ki thenni Paul le' Barnabas ungta morson aangqhe rek avah Jerusalem thah kahang rang ngi kchol lamda.
44015003	Ungta lamrinlop rekki mdohanpthlat chaakin leiyi, mmaan nih Phininsia le' Samaria paamkuwl rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chet lamda. Ungta mmaan nih taluhep pih Chaatktlei rekki Isowr hinni kerheel kcha'lam tidit avah song chlamda, ungta pau ava ngi unau rek mkheng avah kdung ngi kanpa chlamda.
44015004	Ungta mmaan nih Jerusalem mtlunin thungta lamrinlop le' tamsi rekki ungta kver rekki mmaan avah arlaang chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Isowr rih mmaan hinni nong mdotlot mkheng avah song chlamda.
44015005	Pdainu Pharisy lop rek thungki lamkrin kcha' aangqhe rekki rip lamda hanto' the lamda. “Neen nih mmaan avah vuntepreen raan thah ktla ungta Moses nowlam ava' mdopqowina' raan ki thenni paupiik tpiik raan thah ktla.”
44015006	Mthungta tamsi rekle' kver rek avah hava' kerseel rang ki thenni kurtuwl lamda.
44015007	Ungta mmaan nih mpha ksowt tih mkerseelin dilli Pitar rih ripda mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii rek ungta unau rek, naan nih mpha mruk duh thah Isowr rih neen narlak inni tokcholna' khat mdotlot avah adehn. Chaatktlei rekki nei knehr thungki kqhapaumin ava' arjada lammdorin chaakna' raan ki thenni mikchol inda.
44015008	Anto ngi plungril kdei Isowr rih neen nihin nih midotpiikin heppi mmaan hinni Pthla Kchiir avah pii lamda mmaan avah mdorot chaak doklam.
44015009	Mma ngi mmaan plung rek avah lamrin nih mdopertleu piiklam leiyi, Mma ngi mmaan le' neenki tkertleinaan mdopa'am pemeh.
44015010	Avaleiyi, 'tunnu, taluleiyi naan nih sikhu rek lowl 'leenni, npa'leen ruk mditmata neen rukku tohor pchaanmah raan reengkol aplot inna?
44015011	Pdainu 'tunnu neen nih Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ava ngi lamnrin chaakin thung ngi misan chaanda. Anto' heppi Isowr rih mmaan rukka mdosan chaak lam.”
44015012	Audilli miipii rek ava ngi kdairim mih am lamda, ungta Barnabas le' Paul dothe pau avah arja chlamda. Mmaanve ngi Isowr rih Chaatktlei rek arlak ki mmaanve hinni titinna' rekle' tngana' nong rek mdotlot tya avah mmaan hinni pandang chlamda.
44015013	Ungta mmaanve ngi rimkdi ma'amin arlaan nih James tih arthaangda hanto'theda: “Mii rek ungta unau rek naan nih mhei'arjaak piik chaan.
44015014	Simeon nih, Isowr rih choduhrep pih Chaatktlei rek mdovelna' avah mithepindit piikdok inda. Isowr rih Mma' miing kpandang chrang ki miichaat khat mdokchol chaakna' rang ki thenni havah mdotlot.
44015015	Ungta hava' pauna ava' tu' Khulpu rek dothe avah kilqhi, tidit tah hanto' kjitda ka'am:
44015016	‘Hava' dilli Neiyi kerheel nikdon, ktlu dok kcha' David buw'inn avah saperheel nikdi'. Neiyi mker'ekrena' avah saperheel nikdon ren nih mmun thuh thipenle nikdi'.
44015017	Mleiya havah dultimii chaat mqhe rekki, Ungta Nei kmiing ko'own kcha', Chaatktlei mkheng rek kpha rukku, Kruwng mdothlaam chaakna' rang ki then, dida, hava' dow mkheng rek ava' kpurthuh Kruwng ava ngi theda.
44015018	Isowr rih Mma' nong rek mkheng avah ktlangknai kma' ki ngi mdodeh dok ksa.’ (Ams. 9:11-12)
44015019	Avaleiyi, nei kpaupindit avah neen nih Isowr hinni kerheel kcha' Chaatktlei rek 'leenni tparsatna' morson topqou piik raan pemeh.
44015020	Pdainu neen nih mmaan nih pthla rek hinni tparlaan dok dow rek hinki ungta lowsang tkilqhina' thungki, ungta teklelyow saa rek hinki ungta hii tchaakna' thungki mkenser chaakna' raan paukjit kjitpiik inche.
44015021	Mleiya alraang ki kupqhun nih khuwpii khimkhei thuh Sinegog rek thung ngi tkarngatnit ktaiyi mii rekki Moses laika avah mdoparjaam kchown.”
44015022	Audilli tamsi rekle' kver rekki Antiok khuwpii thah tapthlat rah mii kchol lamda ungta lamrinlop thung ngi ka'am rek mkheng rukku avah row chlamda. Mmaan nih Paul le' Barnabas tu' kchet rang ki thenni unau rek arlak ki luwkqhi rek, Barnabas mdoditin Judah ungta Sailas avah kchol lamda.
44015023	Ungta mmaan nih mmaanve khut thung ngi hanto ngi tikjit paukjit khat avah pthla lamda: “Tamsi rekle' kver rek ungta unau rek, neen nih Antiok khuwpii thuh ka'am rek, ungta Siria le' Silisia paamkuwl thung ngi ka'am lamkrin kcha' Chaatktlei rek naan ahin nih hava' paukjit avah kjit innu, Akurvuwi chaak inna.
44015024	Mleiya neen kihin ki kyu mii aangqhe rekki naan ahin nih, ‘naan nih vun adoreen raan ungta Moses nowlam avah adopqowi raan,’ dilamda. Mmaan pauthe rek ava ngi naan aplungrin rekin avah tparmak likda atapyat inna tidit arjaan nuh pdainu neen nih mmaan hinni ava' kthe rah paupiik piimaan ring.
44015025	Ungta neen nih plung khadaat tih kurtuwl innu kkolrot chaakin dilkqowiyi neen nih mii mruk tokchol lih kqha rah binin nuh. Avaleiyi, mmaanve avah neen nih kvonsat'low chaakin Barnabas le' Paul tung ngi naan ahin nih kapthlat chaak inna.
44015026	Barnabas le' Paul avah neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing leiyi, mrinkum kparlaan dok kcha' mii reklam.
44015027	Avaleiyi, neen nih Judah le' Sailas avah kapthlat chaak inna. Ungta mmaanve ngi neen nih kdokjit chaakin ava' heppi aksonpiik chraan.
44015028	Mleiya Pthla Kchiir hinruk ungta neen kihinin rukku, hava'le' daat kma'don morson bowr krik a'leen innu tithiikmah ngi kqha ngi bin innu.
44015029	Hava'le' avah naan nih adorin raan ava': ‘Naan nih dow pthla rek hinni tparlaan dow rek hinki ikenser chaan. Naan nih hii thungki ungta teklelyow saa rek tchaakna' thungki ungta lowsang tkilqhina' thungki ikekneeng chaan. Naan nih hava'le' avah apqowi chaakin bih, kqha atlot chaak inna. Hanto ngi kupqut chaak inna.’”
44015030	Mthungta anto ngi mdopthlat inni mii rekki chet lamda ungta Antiok khuwpii tlung lamda. Ungta mmaan nih miipii rek mpurku chaakin dilli paukjit avah mmaan hinni parlaan chlamda.
44015031	Ungta mmaan nih ava' mparcham chaakin thungta tkorsowna' pauna rek avaleiyi kanpa chlamda.
44015032	'Tunnu Judah le' Sailas avah khulpu ruk kurthuwk lam. Ungta mmaanve ngi unau rek avah paumin ksaangpa ngi ksop chlamda ungta ruhtan pii chlamda.
44015033	Ungta mmaanve ngi mpha mruk thuh ma'amin dilli mmaanve avah unau rekki plungdai tu' kilqhi ngi tamsi rek hinni hunpsun chlamda.
44015034	Anto'daat yoso Sailas vah ma'am daat tih kqha rah tidit tih bin chda.
44015035	Ungta Paul le' Barnabas rukka Antiok thung ngi am chdaat lamda. Ungta mmaanve ngi ava' thung ngi purchuk lamda ungta mii morson knempok rek tung ngi Kruwng ki kqhapaumin ki mlei avah parjaam chlamda.
44015036	Ungta mpha mruk dilli Paul lih Barnabas hinni hanto'theda: “'Tunnu ikerheel cheh rang ngi neenve ngi Kruwng pauna tparjaamna' khuwpii khimkhei rek thung ngi ka'am unau rek avah ivel lamche' ungta mmaan nah taluhep pih ka'am lam a tidit isuw che',” dida.
44015037	Ungta Barnabas tih mmaanve tu' Mark mdoditin Johon ava' rukka tkilqhiqhi rah ngeida.
44015038	Pdainu Paul vah avah kqha rang ngi bin mda mleiya Mark vah mmaanve avah Pamphylia paamkuwl thungki ngi mdomaak pthidok lam. Ungta mma ngi nong ava' thung ngi mmaanve tu' mkilqhimaan ava'leiyi Paul vah mma' tqhi rangnga ngei mda.
44015039	Anto ngi mmaanve ngi kdung ngi mkolrotmaan ma'am leiyi, mmaanve avah khat le' khat hinki kenqhen chlamda. Barnabas tih Mark qhida Saipras diiloipaam thah arkuwng 'leenni chet chda.
44015040	Pdainu Paul vah Sailas kchol chda. Ungta unau rek ava ngi Isowr plungnee thung ngi mparlaan chaak lam dilli mma ngi anto' sunchda.
44015041	Ungta mma ngi Siria le' Silisia paamkuwl rek thung ngi chetda lamrinlop rek avah ruhtan pii chlamda.
44016001	Audilli mma ngi Darbi le' Listra khuwpii tlungda. Ungta asuwn mmiing Timothy mdoditin sikhu khat avah ava' thung ngi ka'am ungta mma' avah lamkrin kcha' Jihudi snu khat chapa pdainu mpa a Grik mii.
44016002	Mma' avah Listra le' Ikoniam khuwpii thuh ka'am unau rekki mdang mdopqhat dok chaakin miikhat.
44016003	Paul lih mma' avah qhida tcheqhi rah ngeida. Paul lih mma' avah qhida ungta mpaamkuwl ava' thuh ka'am Jihudi rek leiyi, mma' avah mvun reen piikda. Mleiya mmaan mkheng inni mpa avah Grik mii tidit mdodeh.
44016004	Ungta Mmaanve ngi khuwpii rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chet lamda. Ungta Jerusalem thung ngi tamsi rekle' kver rekki mdopqumin pauqum rek ava' mdopqowina' raan ki thenni mmaan hinni kparlaan chlamda.
44016005	Anto ngi lamrinlop rek avah lamrin 'leenni ruhtan pii lamda ungta mniit ktai ki mmiichai rekin avah nemthang setset lamda.
44016006	'Tunnu mmaanve ngi Phrigia khuwpii le' Galatia paamkuwl thuh kthleng ngi mche dokin thungta mmaanve hinni Pthla Kchiir ava ngi Asia thung ngi pauna mdoparjaam raan avah pkhaan lamda.
44016007	Mmaanve ngi Maisia paamklek mtlun dokin dilli mmaanve vah Bithynia paamkuwl thah kchet rah korthlong lamda. Pdainu Pthla ava ngi mche raan avah rotpiik lam mda.
44016008	Ungta Maisia kthleng ngi mcheen inni mmaanve ngi Troas khuwpii thah arju lamda.
44016009	Ungta jaan nih Paul hinni rinmer khat pdeh chda. Mesedonia ki miikhat tih mma' aang ngi ripda Paul hinni hanto'theda: “Mesedonia thah arju rang ngi, neenna mheibom chaan,” dida, pnuwm chlamda.”
44016010	'Tunnu mma ngi rinmer ava' mdeh dilli neen nih kbeisek ki Mesedonia thah kyukna' raan tlown nuh. Ungta neen nih kqhapauna avah mmaan hinni kdoparjaam chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr rih neenna mto'own chaak inna tidit dei innu.
44016011	Avaleiyi, neen nih Troas khuwpii ki ngi kthleng rik ki arkuwng 'leenni kal innu Samothras diiloipaam thah heichen innu. Ungta mupduknii ngi Niapolis khuwpii thah arvang innu.
44016012	Ava' thung ki neen nih Rome mii rek amna'mun Mesedonia ki klorsi khuwpii Philippia thah vaan nuh. Ungta ava' khuwpii thung ngi neen nih kdokmah am innu.
44016013	Ungta neen nih tkarngatnit tih khuwpii duwn thah chet innu. Ungta neen nih kreng biing thah mii rekki mnowpaan nih rinmaktham chaakna' kchown mmun ava'thah juwn nuh. Ungta neen nih kok'on chaakin dilli, ava' thuh kurkuwk snu rek hinni tpau pqhun innu.
44016014	'Tunnu Lydia mdoditin snu khat ava ngi kpautheen avah arja chda. Mma' avah buw kning ngi ksen kjur kcha' Thyatira khuwpii ki ungta Isowr luwkbuk cha' miikhat. Ungta Kruwng ngi Paul lih mdothe dow rek ava' kmin nih karja chrang ki thenni muplung pvan piikda.
44016015	Ungta neen nih mma' mdak le' mi'inn thungki mii rek dii kupluwn thungta mma ngi mi'inn thah mo'own chaanda. Ungta hanto'theda: “Naan nih neiya Kruwng hinni lamkrin kcha' khat tidit tih atbin chaakin cheentung ngi arvaan rang ngi ki'inn thuh mhei'am piik chaan,” dida, neen avah mupnuwm chaanda.
44016016	'Tunnu neen nih rinkaktham chrang ngi keheiyin thungta snunau suwk khat tih mkurdut qhiinda. Mma' avah ruwlpiidowi pthla ksin ungta mii rek hinni mdusukin mdothethut piiklam ava ngi mma ngi mukpupa rek thenni sum knempok ki lotpiik kchok lamda.
44016017	Hava' snunau ava ngi Paul le' neen avah mqowi'inda. Ungta mma ngi owngda: “Hava' mii rek avah kparthaangsi Isowr ava' suwk reklam. Ungta mmaan nih Isowr rih neen midotsan chaakna' raan ki m'lam avah midotpur phuwn piikin,” dida.
44016018	Ungta havah mma ngi nit knempok thung ngi tlowda. Pdainu Paul lih avah mdiil pchaanmah reen thungta, pthla ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Jisu Khrista miing ngi paupiik akpiik a! Mma' thungki arvang thuwk dok!” Ungta mpha ava'kat thung ngi pthla avah arvang thuwk chda.
44016019	Pdainu mukpupa rekki muplungbinin msit ka'am kma' rang ava' mdehn thungta mmaan nih Paul le' Sailas avah kyowng lamda. Ungta mmaan nih paukpindit rek hinni mdoparlaan raan ki thenni kyurkren mun thung ngi qenthuh lamda.
44016020	Ungta mmaan nih paukpindit kenreel rek hinni hanto' the lamda mmaanve avah pthuwk lamda. “Hava' mii rek avah Jihudi mii lam ungta mmaan nih nkhuwpiin thung ngi kdung ngi vaanglumna' mtlot inna.
44016021	Mmaan nih Rome mii neen nih tarlaanna' mditmata topqowina' kqha kma' kindit kma'pa nowpa rek avah parjaam lamda,” dilamda.
44016022	Audilli miipii rekki Paul le' Sailas krow kmah ngi rip lamda. Mthungta paukpindit rek ava ngi mmaanve dona avah kqepiik lamda. Ungta kchung ngi mmaanve avah mdobunna' raan paupiik pii lamda.
44016023	Ungta mmaan nih kchung kbi knem mih mbun chaak dokin dilli mmaanve avah rowng'inn thuh daal lamda. Ungta mmaan nih rowng'inn kpu ava' hinni mmaanve avah knet tih mdorunna' raan ki paupiik pii lamda.
44016024	Mma ngi hava' hep paupiik ava' marjaak thungta mmaanve avah rowng'inn mril thah daalpthi lamda ungta mkhuhn avah dingkol pkehda bowlpthi lamda.
44016025	Pdainu jaan nih thanqim laiyi Paul le' Sailas tih Isowr hinni rinktham chlamda ungta tpanpaaklaa the lamda. Ungta rowng'inn mii rekki mmaanve dothe avah arja lamda.
44016026	Ungta tedeh dokmah ngi ringnaang klin khat thuwkda mthungta rowng'inn innmun avah knokda. Ungta m'tunkat daat tih rowng'inn thurngut mkheng avah kparvang chda ungta rowng'inn mii rek tbowlna' thiirrii avah kerthletpet chda.
44016027	Ungta rowng'inn kpu ava ngi ki'iip mkerdel thungta rowng'inn thurngut kparvang mdeh thungta rowng'inn mii rek avah kchen chdok terlam a, tidit tih binda. Audilli mma ngi mraal'kaang turthuhda ungta mthina ker'eyou chrah theda.
44016028	Pdainu Paul lih kdung ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Neen kekheng inni, ka'am daat inping, athina sulkurnul chma'!”
44016029	Audilli rowng'inn kpu ava ngi meila thlaamda ungta vangchenda, luwtda ungta kunchuwnda Paul le' Sailas khuhther rih tlu chda.
44016030	Audilli mma ngi duwn thah vanqhi pthuwk lam thida hanto'theda: “Ocha! Isowr rih mdotsan chaakna' rah neiyi talu tlow chnikli?”
44016031	Ungta mmaanve ngi hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni lam'arin cha' ungta Isowr rih nang ruk, ungta a'innmii rek rukka aksan chraan.”
44016032	Audilli mmaanve ngi Kruwng pauna avah mhin nih ungta mma' inn thungki morson mkheng rek hinni the lamda.
44016033	Mma ngi Paul le' Sailas avah jaan koktopa ava' thung ngi qhi lamda ungta mlimnaan mkheng avah alqhutpiik chlamda. Ungta m'tunkat tih mmaanve ngi mma' le' ungta mi'innmii rek mkheng avah dii pluwt chlamda.
44016034	'Tunnu mma ngi mmaanve avah mi'inn thuh vanluwqhi chlamda ungta mmaanve hinni then downpiik lamda. Mma' ungta mi'innmii rek mkheng ngi Isowr hinni lammdorin chaakin leiyi, kanpa chlamda.
44016035	Ungta khu mvaar thungta paukpindit kenreel rekki, “miilai 'knii rek avah apthlapthi doklam,” dida kthe rah mmaan ki nongmii klin rek avah rowng'inn kpu ava' hinni arheisi lamda.
44016036	Mthungta rowng'inn kpu ava ngi pau rek avah Paul hinni hanto' parjaakda. “Paukpindit kenreel rek ava ngi nei kihin nih naan adokapthlat dokna' raan pau mheitpiik a. 'Tunnu naanve a isunin ungta plung kdaiyi vangin,” dida.
44016037	Pdainu Paul lih nongmii klin rek ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Neenve a Rome mii kurthuwk chyown rih mmaan nih pau mpindit duhn nih mii rek maiyi me'ei inda. Ungta rowng'inn thung ngi mdaalinda. 'Tunnu mmaan nih tuprut tih neenve a mkapthla raan mow? Anto' nimeh mmaan nih arva lamdon duwn thah neenve a mdotqhi pthuh raan,” dida.
44016038	Ungta nongmii klin rek ava ngi vang lamda hava' pau rek avah paukpindit kenreel rek hinni vansong lamda. Mmaan nih mmaanve avah Rome mii lam tidit marjaakin thungta, mningin pqit lamda.
44016039	Ungta mmaan nih arva lamda mmaanve avah duwn thah qhi pthuwk lamda ungta khuwpii ava' thung ki msun dokna' raan ktham chlamda.
44016040	Anto ngi Paul le' Sailas tih rowng'inn thungki mthuh dokin dilli mmaan nih Lydia inn thah luwt lamda. Ava' thuh mmaanve ngi unau rek kurdutqhi chlamda. Ungta mmaan avah ksop chlam thida sun chlamda.
44017001	'Tunnu mmaanve ngi Amphipolis khuwpii ungta Apollonia khuw klin kirkhil lih mche dokin dilli Jihudi rek Sinegog amna' Thessalonika khuwpii pha lamda. Ungta ava' thung ngi Sinegog khat ka'am.
44017002	Audilli Paul lih mma' ki mnowpa dilkqowiyi mmaan hinni vangluwtda. Ungta tkarngatnit veikdumtet thung ngi Kchiir laika rek thung ngi mdothe rekki mlei rek avah mmaan hinni thepiik lamda.
44017003	Mleiya Mesaiah ngi suwk thuwk don nih kdiyou rek arlak ki mrinkerheel rang thah tlada, tidit avah mmaan hinni, tikjit rek thungki ngi tedet lamda thepindit piik lamda. Ungta mma ngi, ‘hava' Jisu, neiyi naan ahin nih kdoparjaam avah Mesaiah ava',’ dida.
44017004	Ungta mii aangqhe rekki avah pqowi chlamda. Ungta rinko'owi kcha' Grik mii knempok rekle' snu kenreel rek ktlowm kma' ngi Paul le' Sailas avah jong chlamda.
44017005	Pdainu ava' kopqowi kma' Jihudi rekvah avah pner lamda. Mmaan nih kyurkren rek arlak ki kqha kma' mii rek archil lamda miilop khat pqhang lamda. Ungta mmaan nih khuwpii ava' thung ngi kdung ngi vaanglumna' khat pthuwk lamda. Ungta Paul le' Sailas avah miipii hinni tupthuh rah mdongei inni, mmaan nih Jason inn avah pha lamda.
44017006	Pdainu mmaan nih, mmaanve mdehmaan thungta Jason le' unau morson rek aangqhe avah khuwpii ava' ki paukpindit rek hinthah vanqen lamda. Ungta mmaan nih owng lamda: “Dultipaam kpurlup kperthel lik mii rek avah hava' thung rukku karvalam a.
44017007	Ungta Jason nih mmaanve avah mi'inn thuh mdoptlun lam. Ungta hava'le' mkheng ava ngi, Jisu tidit paamkruwng morson khat ka'am, dilamda, Siijar pauqum rek kepteng ngi nong mdotlotin.” dilamda.
44017008	Ungta miipii rekle' kenreel paukpindit rekki hava' dow rek marjaakin thungta pau rek ava ngi mmaan nah kdung ngi muplungin yada.
44017009	Mthungta mmaan nih Jason le' morson rek avah tapthlat pthina' sum loulam thida mmaan avah pthlapthi lamda.
44017010	Audilli unau rek ava ngi Paul le' Sailas avah kbeisek ki Beria khuwpii thah psun dok lamda. Ungta mtlun dokin thungta, mmaanve ngi Jihudi rek sinegog thah va lamda.
44017011	Hava' Beria ki mii rek avah Thessalonika ki mii rek hinni muplungin kqha. Mleiya mmaan nih pauna avah kngei kcha'jap pih mdo'arlaan chaakin. Ungta mmaan nih mniiktaiyi hava' dow rek avah anto' mow anto' pemeh tidit leiyi, Kchiir laika avah mdothlaam chaak kchown.
44017012	Avaleiyi, Grik rek mruk'suwn daat kma' kenreel snu rekle' psel rek mii knempok ki lam'rin chlamda.
44017013	Pdainu Thessalonika ki Jihudi rekki Paul lih Beria thah Isowr pauna mparjaam a tidit avah arja lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Beria khuwpii thang rukku arva lamda ungta miipii rek avah kchoukrep lamda.
44017014	Audilli unau rek ava ngi kbeisek ki Paul avah truwnpii thah msunna' rah yukda lamda. Pdainu Sailas le' Timothy avah mikniing inni ava' thuh ka'am chdaat lam.
44017015	Anto ngi mii aangqhe rekki Paul avah Athen khuwpii kpha ngi da chlamda. Ungta Sailas le' Timothy ngi mma' avah mrot khimkhei thuh kbeiyi mdophaak raan, tidit ki paupiik marlaan chaakin dilli, mmaan nah kerheel row lam.
44017016	'Tunnu Paul lih Athen khuwpii thung ngi mmaanve karda ngi ma'am thung ngi mma ngi khuwpii avah pthla rek hinni kakparlaan kcha'lam a tidit mdeh thungta kdung ngi mapthla parvai chda.
44017017	Avaleiyi, mma ngi mniiktaiyi sinegog thung ngi Jihudi rekle' rinko'owi kcha' Chaatktlei rek tung ngi mlei avah thepindit chda kyurkren mun thung ngi, ava' thuh kthleng mii rek tung ngi mlei avah thepindit chda.
44017018	Audilli Epikurias le' Stoik dilkqowi luwkinrit kngei kcha' rekki mma' avah karnaakqhi lamda. Mmaan aangqhe rek ava ngi hanto' thepsuk lamda: “Hava' paunempa ava' vah taluphu plih mdothe chaak a?”dilamda. Ungta morson aangqhe rek nowl lih: “Mma' avah paamktlei ki isowr rek kparjaam kcha' rek hep daat a.” Mleiya mma ngi Jisu le' kring kerheel mdoparjaam a,’ dilamda.
44017019	Audilli mmaan nih Aresmul tidit kunpun ava' hinni mma' avah qhi lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Hava' tpurchuhna' ren khat nang ngi adopurchuh lam avah talulu plih, neen rukku tedeh chaak krow rang mow?
44017020	Nang ngi kakna arjaakin thung ngi doren liklik sinthuh tinu. Avaleiyi, neen nih hava' dow rek avah talu tidit kdehnum inna,” dilamda.
44017021	Mleiya Athen mii rekle' ava' thuh ka'am miimal rek mkheng ava ngi dow morson ktlow kmah ngi mmaan ki mpha ktlong rek ava' thung vah doren tethe mditmata tarjaak liklik tlow lamda ka'am kcha'lu lam.
44017022	Audilli Paul lih Aresmul tidit kunpun ava' ningqim mih rip thida hanto'theda: “Athen khuwpii thungki mii rek naan avah dow mkheng 'leenni rinko'owi kcha' dokin ptih.
44017023	Neiyi kkorlon thuh ungta naan nih luw adobukin dow rek ksut thung ngi, neiyi rintparlaanna' khaan khat 'leenni, ‘Kuwkhat tih mdodehma Isowr hinni,’ diin tinu tikri ngi tikjit deinu. Avaleiyi, naan nih kuw tidit adodeh maan nih luw adobukin Khat avah neiyi, naan ahin nih kdoparjaam Mma' ava'.
44017024	Dultipaam ungta ava' thung ngi ka'am dow mkheng kpurthuh Isowr avah khut tih tsak Mmun Kenjesi thung ngi ka'am pemeh. Mleiya Mmah dulti le' parvaan ki Kruwng ava'.
44017025	Ungta Mma ngi dow kikriing leek heppi dultimii khut tih Mma' hinni soptolowpiik, msit ammeh. Mleiya, Mma ngi mkheng hinni rinkum, tdaal ungta dow mkheng avah mdopiik.
44017026	Ungta Mma ngi miikhat thungki ngi dultipaam mkheng thuh ka'am chaat mkheng ki mii rek avah pqouda. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan ki mpha le' ma'amna' raan paamrit rek avah mduh thah mdopelreen piik doklam.
44017027	Mleiya mii rekki Mma' kekmei chrang ki thenni mkhut inni kchul lamdon ungta mdophaak chaak pchaanna' raan ki thenni Kruwng avah kthlaam chlam rah. Pdainu Isowr avah neen khimkhei hinki lamkla ngi ka'am pemeh.
44017028	Mleiya Mma' hinni neen ringinmin ungta knaan minnu ungta nrinnown avah tphan chaakin. Dakat tih naan arlakin ki laika kikjit rekki hanto' the lamda: ‘Neenna Mma' nausuwn rek inpimin,’ mdoditin.
44017029	Avaleiyi, neenna Isowr nausuwn rek tkurthuhn leiyi, Isowr rinnow Kchiir avah dow pthla hep daat tidit tih tbin raan pemeh. Isowr a, dultimii ngi mmaan ki mdimdehn nih ungta mdimjiik inni ungta jiiring ngi mditmata jiipowl lih mditmata lung ngi dow pthla rek mdoseemin ava' hep daat pemeh.
44017030	Alraangvah Isowr rih hava'lu hep daat mdodeh pinditmaan avah sutpthipiik lamda. Pdainu 'tunvah Mma ngi mmun ktai ki mii mkheng hinni plung tperthlenna' raan ki thenni paupiik mdopiik lam.
44017031	Mleiya Mma ngi dultipaam 'leenni pau mdopinditna' rah nit avah mdopelreen dok ksa. Mleiya Mma ngi mdokthlan dok Mma' rinkinditna' ava ngi paukpindit rah. Mma ngi kdiyou thungki Mma' mperdel thung ngi mii mkheng hinni hava' ki mkindit avah mdopandan dok.”
44017032	Ungta mmaan nih kdiyou rinkerheelna' ava' marjaakin thungta aangqhe rekki pni chaak lamda pdainu morson rekki hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih hava' paulam avah veikhat tarjaak rah kbinnowl inna,” dilamda.
44017033	Anto ngi Paul lih mmaan avah ma lamda sun chda.
44017034	Anto'daat yoso, mii aangqhe rekki Paul avah mdilqowi chlamda. Ungta mmaan arlak ki Aresmul ki kunpun ava' thung ki Dionysias mdoditin le' mmiing Damarias mdoditin snu khat le' mmaan tu' kilqhi morson rek rukka kyausap lam.
44018001	'Tunnu hava'le' dilli Paul lih Athen khuwpii avah mathida Korinthia khuwpii thah sun chda.
44018002	Ungta mma ngi ava' thuh Pontas paamkuwl ki mmiing Akyul a mdoditin Jihudi miikhat kurdutqhida. Ungta mma' avah mnuwn Prisila tung ngi Italy khuwpii ki mthlennaan sowtmlai. Mleiya Klaudias tih Jihudi mkheng rek avah Rome paam thungki msunna' raan paupiik khat mdopiik lam. Ungta Paul lih mmaanve avah pha chlamda.
44018003	Mthungta mma ngi mmaanve tu' mdimlown khatsap daat mkurthuh leiyi, mmaanve tu' amsap lamda. Mleiya mmaan nongtlot avah buw'inn ksalam.
44018004	Ungta mma ngi tkarngatnit ktaiyi sinegog thung ngi Jihudi rekle' Grik mii rek hinni mlei thepindit piik kchok lamda ungta pnuwm chlamda.
44018005	Ungta Sailas le' Timothy ngi Mesedonia paamkuwl ki mtlunin thung ngu Paul avah pthla 'lam thung ngi am chda. Ungta Jisu avah Mesaiah tidit ki sakhi avah Jihudi rek hinni pii chda.
44018006	Pdainu mmaan nih mma' mrotmaan ungta pthit lamda mpauin thungta, mma ngi mdomna rek kqhik thida hanto'theda: “naan ahiin avah naan aluwchaiyin 'leenni i'am chso. Ungta neiya naan ahinki kertleu kcha' dok ping. 'Tundil ki kupqhun nih neiya Chaatktlei rek hinni chet chnikdi'.”
44018007	Ungta Paul lih ava' thung ki korlouda mmiing Jastas tidit miikhat ava' inn thung ngi luwtda. Ungta mma' avah rinko'owi kcha' miikhat ungta mi'inn avah Sinegog behkat tih ka'am.
44018008	Audilli sinegog ava' kpupa mmiing, Krispas tidit ava ngi mi'innmii rek mkheng tung ngi Kruwng hinni lam'rin chda. Ungta Korinthia ki mii knempok rekki ava' mdo'arjaak chaak inni lam'rin chlamda ungta dii luwt chlamda.
44018009	'Tunnu jaan nih Kruwng ava ngi rinmer rih Paul hinni hanto'theda: “Aningpqitma', ipau tlit daat ungta rimkdi amma'.
44018010	Mleiya Neiyi nang nga akqhi a ungta kuwkhat leh ngi akarnaak qhida aplim nimeh. Mleiya hava' khuwpii thung ngi Nei kmii knempok ki ka'am.”
44018011	Ungta mma ngi ava' thung ngi kum khat thla truk amda, mmaan arlak ki Isowr pauna rek avah purchuk chlamda.
44018012	'Tunnu Gallaio ngi Akhaia ki paamkpu mkurthuh arlaan nih Jihudi rekki plung khadaat tih korlow lamda, Paul kepteng ngi rip lamda ungta mma' avah luwsang thung ngi pthuwk lamda.
44018013	Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii ava ngi mii rek avah nowlam ki mlehmluk thah Isowr avah luwkbuh rah pnuwm chlamda.”
44018014	Ungta Paul lih kpau rah mthe le' Gallaio ngi Jihudi rek hinni hanto'theda: “Jihudi rek naan, naan nih dow karmak mditmata tidina' krow ngi yaikla ava'leen nih adotrotmaan ma'amta neiyi adokarjaak piikna' raanni tethe krow ngi athen.
44018015	Pdainu pauna rek ungta mmiing leiyi, mkurthuh bih ungta naan athinaan ki now reklei mkurthuh bih, hava'lu avah naan athung inni apquchaan. Neiya ava' hep daat nongki thenni pau tpindit rah ngei maang,” dida.
44018016	Audilli mma ngi luwsang thungki mmaan avah reipthi lamda.
44018017	Audilli sinegog kpupa Sosthenas avah Grik rek mkheng inni kbob lamda ungta mmaan nih luwsang aang ngi mmah bun lamda. Pdainu hava' khimkhei avah Gallaio vah dow khatleh kmah ngi binda.
44018018	Paul lih Korinthia khuwpii thuh mpha mrukka am daatda. Audilli mma ngi unau rek thaan lam thida Siria paamkuwl kpha rang ngi thapda. Ungta Prisila le' Akyul a ngi mmah qowi lamda. Pdainu mma ngi mvanthah dokduh ngi, mma ngi paureeltham khat mdotham dok leiyi, Senkria thung ngi mluw pkol chda.
44018019	Ungta mmaan nih Ephisia khuwpii thuh arvang lamda ungta mmaanve avah ava' thuh ma lamda. Paul mdak ki sinegog thuh luwtda ungta mma ngi Jihudi rektu' mlei thepindit lamda.
44018020	Mmaan nih mhin nih mmaan tu' mpha knembet tih ma'amna' rah maktham chaakin thungta mma ngi avah mat chda.
44018021	Pdainu mma ngi mthaan 'lam thuh hanto'theda: “Talutalu yoso karvang rang kmaal ava' kdan rah neiyi Jerusalem thah hangnikdi'. Pdainu Isowr plungbin mkurthuh bih, naan ahin nih veikhat kerheel nowl nikdi',” dida. Ungta mma ngi Ephisia ki ngi vanthap chda.
44018022	Ungta mma ngi Sijaria khuwpii mtlun le' Jerusalem thah hangda Lamrinlop arvuwi chlamda. Audilli mmah Antiok khuwpii thah yu chda.
44018023	Mpha mruk Antiok khuwpii thuh ma'am dilli sun chda. Ungta mma ngi Galatia ungta Phrigia paamkuwl mkheng thung ngi chetda ungta sikhu rek mkheng avah ruhtan pii lamda.
44018024	'Tunnu mmiing Apollos tidit Alekjendria khuwpii thung ngi kqou Jihudi miikhat Ephisia thung ngi thlengda. Ungta mma' avah kpaudei langlang miikhat. Ungta mma ngi Kchiir laika rek avah kdung ngi mdodeh chaak.
44018025	Hava' mii avah Kruwng 'lam thung ngi kuwmiikhat tih kqhajik ki mdothe piik dok. Mma ngi Johon diipluwna' daat chrel dei chyoso mma ngi pthla thung ngi plung mdopluw chaak ki Kruwng ki mlei avah mthungjik ki theda ungta mdopurchuh chaak kchow.
44018026	Ungta mma ngi sinegog thuh chang karngam mih tpau chaak pqhunda. Pdainu Akyul a le' Prisila ngi marjaak dokin le' mma' avah own ptliing lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Isowr 'lam avah kerkheel set tih mthungjik ki thepindit piik lamda.
44018027	Ungta Apollos tih diipii klaanda Akhaia thah tche rah mngei thungta unau rekki sikhu rek hinthah paukjit khat kjit lamda, mmaan nih Apollos avah mdo'arlaan chaak lamna' rah paukjit thung ngi ksop chlamda. Ungta mma ngi mheitlun thungta plungnee ar'aang ngi lamkrin kcha' rek avah Apollos tih kdung ngi bom chlamda.
44018028	Mleiya mma ngi Jihudi rek pauna avah miipii maiyi ko'oltek ki reen pthida. Ungta mma ngi Kchiir laika rekki, Jisu avah Mesaiah ava' tidit avah kindit tih tedet chlamda.
44019001	'Tunnu Apollos tih Korinthia khuwpii thuh ma'am daat arlaan nih Paul lih karthak ktong ki paamkuwl rek thah kthleng ngi chetda. Ungta Ephisia khuwpii thah arvangda ava' thuh mma ngi sikhu aangqhe rek avah kurdut qhi lamda.
44019002	Ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih alamrin chaakin thung ngi Pthla Kchiir avah arlaan chaak dokin mowi?” Ungta mmaan nih arthaang lamda mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih Pthla Kchiir ka'am tidit avah tarjaak ruk arja mlai inring.”
44019003	Ungta Paul lih mmaan hinni theda: “Taluhep kdu ki diiluwna' ado'arlaan chaak inno?” Ungta mmaan nih: “Neen nih Johon diipluwna' ava' kdo'arlaan chaakin,” dilamda.
44019004	Ungta Paul lih dakat tih hanto'theda: “Johon vah plung tperthlenna' ki diiluwna' ava ngi dii mdopluw. Mleiya mma ngi mii rek hinni hanto'theda: ‘Mleiya mmaan nih mma' dilthah karvang rang Mma' tidit tah Khrista Jisu ava' hinni lammdorin chaak raan,’ mdodit.”
44019005	Ungta mmaan nih hava' mdo'arjaakin ava ngi Paul lih mmaan avah Kruwng Jisu miing 'leenni diipluwt chlamda.
44019006	Ungta mmaan 'leenni Paul lih mkhut mthiik piiklam thungta Pthla Kchiir avah mmaan 'leenni arjungda. Ungta mmaan nih pau ktleiyi pau chlamda ungta pau purphuwng chlamda.
44019007	'Tunnu hava' mii rek mkheng avah sowm lei 'knii arveel lam.
44019008	Ungta Paul lih sinegog thung ngi luwtda, mma ngi ningqit ktaak ki thla kdum thung ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' ki mlei avah thepindit piik lamda ungta mmaan avah pnuwm chlamda.
44019009	Pdainu marlakin ki aangqhe rekka muplungin pchaida ungta tethepqowi lam mda ungta 'Lam ava' kepteng ngi kqha kma' avah miipii rek aang ngi the lamda. Audilli Paul lih mmaan avah mapthi lamda. mma ngi sikhu rekka qhi lamda ungta mniiktaiyi Tairenas ki kurchuk'inn thuh mlei avah thepindit piik lamda.
44019010	Ungta hanto ngi hava ngi kum 'knii thuh tlow tlit chda. Ava ngi Asia paamkuwl thuh ka'am mii mkheng tidit tah Jihudi rek rukku ungta Grik rek rukku Kruwng Jisu pauna avah arja chlamda.
44019011	Ungta ruhtan nong kenreel totlot pchaanna' ruhtanna' avah Isowr rih Paul hinni piida.
44019012	Mleiya mmaan nih buwlaak mditmata mbuw perjeel daat yoso mdaksa tu' korthowng khimkhei lou lamda, ungta kkowi mii rek hinni marvansinin cheu ava ngi dam chlamda, ungta mthungin ki tarnam kqha kma' rek avah thuwk chda.
44019013	Audilli Jihudi rek arlak ki tlowng kervelda pthla kqha kma' krei pchaang k'dim aangqhe ka'am lam. Mmaan nih tarnam kqha kma' kthlowi rek 'leenni Kruwng Jisu miing ktham rah korthlong lamda. Ungta mmaan nih hanto' thelamda: “Neen nih Paul lih mdoparjaam Jisu miing ngi paupiik akpiik inna,” dilamda.
44019014	Ungta Jihudi mii, mmiing Skevia tidit thimpu kenreel khat ava' chapa tikhiu rek avaleh ngi hava'lu nong avah mdotlotin.
44019015	Ungta tarnam kqha kma' ava ngi arthaang lamda ungta mmaan hinni hanto' the lamda: “Neiyi Jisu a kdeh ungta Paul rukka kdeh pdainu naanna kuwleen pti?”
44019016	Audilli tarnam kqha kma' kthlowi mii ava ngi m'leenin nih yuwngda ungta mkheng inni ko'oltek ki arbun lamda, ungta mmaan avah pchaang chlamda. Ungta mma ngi mbuwdiirin kpha ruk khowpiik lamda ungta plim lamda. Ava' dilli mmaan nih inn ava' thung ki klim mih ungta dona ktaak ki chen chlamda.
44019017	Ungta Ephisia thung ngi ka'am Jihudi rek ungta Grik mii rek mkheng inni hava' pau avah arja lamda. Audilli mmaan 'leenni ningqitna' thuwkda ungta mmaan nih Kruwng Jisu miing avah kdung ngi panpaak chlamda.
44019018	Ungta 'tunnu lamkrin dok kcha' rek knempok ki thleng lamda ungta mdotlotin kqha kma' mkheng avah thethuh chlamda.
44019019	Ungta 'kdim rek ava' rukku mmaan ki laika rek avah arheisin pok lamda, mmaan mkheng inni miipii rek maiyi avale' avah purtuwl lamda ungta bung pthi lamda. Ungta mdobun pthiin laika rek ava' khon avah mtaiyin thungta sumpowl qiit pun somparnga tet tih tai lamda.
44019020	Anto ngi Kruwng pauna avah kparja ngi karjaamda ungta ruh ktang ngi amda.
44019021	Mma ngi hava' dow khimkhei ava' mupqut dilli, Paul lih muplungril lih, Mesedonia le' Akhaia paamkuwl rek kthleng ngi mche dilli Jerusalem phanikdi' ungta neiyi ava' thah ktlun dilli Rome rukka kdovellap rah tidit bin chda.
44019022	Audilli mma ngi Mesedonia paamkuwl thah mma' kbom mii 'knii rek Timothy le' Erastas avah heisida. Mma ngi Asia paamkuwl thuh ksowt bong ngi, mpha mruk thuh amda.
44019023	Mpha ava' arveel lih 'Lam ava' ki mleiyi klin nih mii rek thung ngi raal kthuwk rah theda.
44019024	Mleiya mmiing Demetrias mdoditin jiipowl ksa miikhat ava ngi Artemis luwbuk'inn pthla avah jiipowl lih sada. Mma ngi jiipowl lih ava' ksa rah dimkdei mii knempok ki thida. Ungta dimkdei mii rek avah sum knem mih mdoplot chaak lam.
44019025	Mma ngi ava'lu dimklou nongmii rekle' mma' dimklou nongmii rek avah own purkuwk lamda. Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mii rek, asuwn! neen nih hava' nong totlotin ava ngi sum knempok ki tarlaan chaakin.
44019026	Ungta naan nih Ephisia thung daat kma' Asia paamkuwl mkhengsou thung ngi talu kthuwk tidit avah amikin nih adeh dokin ungta arjaakin. Hava' Paul ava ngi mii rek knempok ki pnuwm chda ungta hava' thungki perheelda. mma ngi, ‘khut tih tsak isowr avah Isowr pemeh.’ dida.
44019027	Ava' vah hava ngi neen nnongtlotin qhatmana' daat kma' mma ngi klin nu'isowr Artemis luwbuk'inn ava'ruk tukmdosut pemeh. Ungta mma ngi Asia paamkuwl thuh ka'am mii mkheng ngi ungta dultipaam mih luw mdobuk nu'isowr ava' konlorna' ava' rukka ke'ekrep rah mthe a,” dida.
44019028	Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta plungthit perleer lamda ungta mmaan nih owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Ephisia mii rekki Artemis ava ngi klinsi!” dilamda.
44019029	Ungta khuwpii mkheng thung ngi plung karmana ngi dim chda. Ungta mmaan nih Mesedonia ki Gaius le' Aristarkas Paul tu' kilqhi rek avah kyowng lamda ungta tuwl'inn thung ngi plung khatsap pih heiqhi lamda.
44019030	Ungta Paul lih miipii rek hinni tehei rah ngeida pdainu sikhu rekki mhei rang avah thlot lamda.
44019031	Ungta mma' plap rek nongmii kurthuwk rek Asia paamkuwl thuh ka'am rekki pau arheipthla lamda ungta ktham chlamda tidit tah mma ngi, ‘Tuwl'inn thung ngi mluw rang pemeh,’ dilamda.
44019032	Ungta kunpun avah muplungin karmak ter chda. Mmaan nih owng lamda aangqhe ngi dow morson khat the lamda. Mii meknem mih talu rang ngi kurtuwlsap inping ngow, tidit avah dei lam mda.
44019033	Jihudi rekki, miipii rek arlak ki Alekjender avah qen pthuwk lamda ungta mdothe rang avah arheithe piik lamda. Alekjender rih rim ma'amna' raanni mkhut tih partamda. Audilli mma ngi mthina miipii rek thungki makparkhaan chaakna' rah bin chda.
44019034	Mmaan nih mma' avah Jihudi mii tidit mdehn thungta mkheng inni krowl khadaat tih owng lamda: “Ephisia mii rekki Artemis ava ngi klinsi,’ dilamda mpharit 'knii arveel owng lamda.”
44019035	Ungta khuwpiinong kikjit mii ava ngi miipii rek avah mapdai dok lam dilli hanto'theda: “Ephisia khuwpii ki mii rek talulu mii rangda hava' kdei kma' rang a. Ephisia khuwpii avah nu'isowr Artemis luwbuk'inn ungta Jeus hinki arjunktla dow pthla ava' ksutpqowi tidit tah mdodehn.
44019036	Avaleiyi, kuwkhat leh ngi mdomat pchaanmah leiyi, naan nih rim a'am raan. Naan nih dow khatleh ruk plungthit kpornowr rih adotlot raan pemeh.
44019037	Naan nih luwbuk'inn thungki dow kupru kma'pa ungta naanki nu'isowr hin rukku pthitda kpau kma'pa mii rek avah naan nih hava' thuh arheiqhiin a.
44019038	Avaleiyi, Demetrias ungta mma' dimklou rekki kuwmiikhat 'leenni mdorotmaan ma'am cheentung ngi mmaan nih tikjit tih apluwt lamso, luwsang rukka kirtilda ka'am daat ungta nongmii rek rukka ka'am lam a. Ungta mmaan nih ava' thung ngi khat le' khat hinni mraalin ikirpii chlamso.
44019039	Pdainu naan nih talutalu yoso kukthuwk ki tathlaam rah abinin bih mnowpa ngi kunpun ava ngi avale' avah mdoparman rah.
44019040	Mleiya tuni ki kthuwk nong rek ava ngi neenna raal kupthuwk lik ki tidina' mraal mikpii raan. Ungta neen nih hava' mnowpa kma'pa ngi tkurkunaan ki mlei kindit tpiikna' raan m'lam am nimeh.”
44019041	Ungta mma ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe dilli, kunpun avah pqiin pthida.
44020001	'Tunnu vaangklum ava' mqut dok dilli, Paul lih sikhu rek ko'own rah heisi lamda. Ungta mma ngi mmaan avah moksow chaak lam dilli thaan lam thida Mesedonia paamkuwl thah kchet rah pqhun chda.
44020002	Mma ngi paamklek rek thung ngi kthleng ngi chetda ungta mmaan avah kdung ngi ksop chlamda ungta mqutna' thah mma ngi Gris paamkuwl tlung chda.
44020003	Ungta ava' thuh mma ngi thla kdum amda. Ungta mma ngi Siria paamkuwl thah arkuwng 'leenni kchet rah mthe arlaan nih Jihudi rekki ke'eyou rang ngi ptuwn lamda. Mthungta mma ngi Mesedonia paamkuwl kthleng ngi kchet rang ngi plung reel chda.
44020004	Hava' avah mma' kkorthlowqhi kcha' rek miing, mmaan avah Beria khuwpii ki Sopeter, Thessalonika khuwpii ki Aristarkas ungta Sekandas. Darbi khuwpii ki Gaius ungta Timothy. Ungta Asia paamkuwl ki mii rek Tikaikas ungta Trophimas le'lam.
44020005	Ungta hava' mii rek ava ngi kduh thaan nih vang lamda, ungta Troas khuwpii thuh neenve a, marda chaanda.
44020006	Thowl ktaak thenpen tchaakna' nit ava' dilli neenve ngi Philippia khuwpii ki ngi thap innu nii parnga dilli neenve ngi Troas phaan nuh. Ungta ava' thuh morson rektu' neenve a niitikhiu amsap innu.
44020007	Arveen ki mkhatna' nit ava' thung ngi sikhu rekki thenpen kcha rah thleng kurduhsap lamda. Paul lih mii rek hinni pauda. Mleiya mma ngi mkorjown nit tih tsun rah mdobin leiyi, mma ngi thanqim kpha ngi pau chda.
44020008	Neen kkurdutnaan karthak ki innkhaar ava' thung ngi meila knempok ki lengda.
44020009	Ungta kseetnau mmiing Eutaikas tidit khat ava' thuh ka'am. Ungta mmah khirkiik baan 'leenni ko'ongda. Paul lih ksowt tih mpau thungta mmik khuda ungta kdung dok ki iipdok chda. Ungta inn kurtuwn kdum thungki yuntlada, mmaan nih mchomin thungta diyou chda.
44020010	Audilli Paul lih yungqumda, kseetnau ava' 'leenni popda ungta arpomda. Audilli mma ngi hanto'theda: “Vaang lummaan! Mtadaal ka'am daat a, ungta mrinkum mhin nih ka'am daat a.”
44020011	Audilli karthak ki innkhaar thang ngi hangkalda ungta thenpen avah khuida ungta chada. Ungta mma ngi mpha ksowt tih pau nowlda. Ungta khu mvaar kpha thung ngi pau thida anto' sun chda.
44020012	Ungta mmaan nih kseetnau avah kring ngi arvanqhi lamda. Ungta hava ngi kdung ngi muplungin ngam chaakna' khat kurthuwkda.
44020013	Audilli neen nih arkuwng 'leenni kal innu. Asos khuwpii thah vanthap innu. Ungta ava' thuh neen nih Paul avah arkuwng thuh kdokalqhina' raan tlown nuh mleiya Paul lah mkhuh ngi laan thah kchet rang ngi korthlong chdokda.
44020014	Ungta mma ngi Asos khuwpii thah mtlun qhiinda mthungta neen nih arkuwng 'leenni kalqhisap innu, Mitilen khuwpii thah yuwn nuh.
44020015	Ava' thung ki korlou innu kdovanthaan ava ngi mupduknii ngi Keos raal khat heiphaan nuh. Mupduknii vah neen nih Samos diiloipaam phaan nuh. Ungta neen nih Trojiliam khuw klin thung ngi mjaanvah am innu ungta mupduknii ngi Melitas khuwpii tlung innu.
44020016	Asia paamkuwl thuh mpha tpenveimana' rang ngi Paul lih Ephisia khuwpii klaanda tvanthah rah binda. Mleiya mkirsit tah Pentikost ki kmaal avah mma ngi Jerusalem thuh mdodan nuwm leiyi, koknot kcha'.
44020017	Melitas khuwpii thungki ngi Ephisia khuwpii thah mii heipthlada lamrinlop thungki kver rek avah hei'own lamda.
44020018	Ungta mmaan nih merheitlunin thungta mmaan hinni mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi Asia thung ngi rukrirep pih kukhuh ktherthok ki kupqhun nih neiyi taluhep pih naan tu' mpha mkheng thung ngi ka'am ping tidit tah naan nih adehn.
44020019	Neiyi Kruwng nong avah kpirdil dok kcha ngi ungta arthli kbuh ngi kdotlot chaak. Jihudi rekki muptuwn lamda chii mtepreel lam kpha thuh mnong avah kdotlot chaak.
44020020	Neiyi naan athenni kqha rang dow khadaat ruk ktlow kmah ngi kdomaak daat ka'am pemeh, pdainu adokparjaak dokin. Ungta neiyi miipii rek maiyi ungta a'inn a'inn thaan nih adokpurchuh dokin.
44020021	Neiyi Jihudi rek hin ruk ungta Grik mii rek hin rukku, Kruwng hinni plung tperthlen chaak ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ava' lamtrin chaakna' rang ki thenni kqhajik ki sakhi kdopiik chaak.
44020022	Ungta 'tunnu asuwn neiya Pthla Kchiir ava ngi Jerusalem khuwpii thah kahang rah mtisi a. Neiyi ava' thah k'leen nih talulu kthuwk rang tidit tah dei maang.
44020023	Neiyi kdodeh chaak rang avah kche kchena' khuwpii ktai thung ngi, ‘thiirrii rowngmii tkurthuhna' le' tyat tperteelna' thina' daat tih atardat a,’ dida, Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mpandan piik chda.
44020024	Pdainu neiyi, kchena' lam avah kanpa ngi kdopqut chaakna' rah ungta Kruwng Jisu hinki kdo'arlaan chaak nongtlotna' tidit tah Isowr plungnee ki kqhapaumin ava' ki sakhi kdopiik chaakna' rah neiya hava' dow rek 'leenni kuplungyatna' ammeh ungta krinkum avah nei kthen nih msit ka'am tidit tih tai maang.
44020025	Ungta dakat tih neiyi arlak inni Kruwngpaalna' ava' ki mlei ava' kparjaam rah kchet kcha' dok ping. Ungta 'tunnu asuwn! arlakin ki kuwkhat leh rukku kmai avah veikhat dei nimaan tih, tidit kdeh a.
44020026	Avaleiyi, tuni vah, neiyi naan ahin nih sakhi kpandan chaak a tidit tah hava' mii mkheng ava' ki hii buwkna' ava' thung ki neiya kertleu kcha' dok ping.
44020027	Mleiya naan ahin nih neiyi akparjaakin thuh Isowr ki plungbinpsuk mkheng avah kdoptham dok ka'am pemeh.
44020028	Avaleiyi, naan nih adaksaan ungta Pthla Kchiir rih ksutpqowi rah adotsi dokin miilop rek mkheng avah arindei chaan. Naanna Mma' mdakkat tih Mihii ngi mdotren dok Isowr lamrinlop ava' ki yaukqhi akurthuh raan.
44020029	Neiyi akmaakin dilthah saa kring kcha tkeikraang arlak inni karvang rah. Ungta mmaan nih miilop khadaat rukka qheek lam nimeh, tidit neiyi kdeh a.
44020030	Ungta naan arlakin ki mii rek kpha rukka thuwkdon kurlup pih pau lamdon nih mmaan ki sikhu rek mdopthutna' raan kqhi chlam rah.
44020031	Avaleiyi, naan nih akilrin chaak raan! Naan nih abinphaakin tidit tah neiyi kum kdum thung ngi akhengin ahinin nih kdown liit kmah ngi khatkhat tih adokpilqhitin. Neiyi kunthun ruk jaan ruk arthli kbuh ngi havah kdotlot chaak.
44020032	Ungta 'tunnu ku'uknau rek neiyi Isowr hinni ungta Mma' pauna ki plungnee thung ngi akparlaan chaak inna. Ungta hava ngi aplin pchaangin don, Isowr rih mdopenje ksa rek mkheng arlak ki alroukchom akpurthuh chraan.
44020033	Neiyi kuwkhat leh sumpowl ruk, mditmata jiiring ruk mditmata dona kqha ruk pnermaang.
44020034	Naan nih adehn tidit tah hava' kukhut ava ngi neiki kikriin rek ungta kdo'amqhi rekki kriin rek mkheng avah pordon chda.
44020035	Neiyi hava' dow mkheng avah adokepdeh dokin, naan nih hava' heppi kdung ngi nong tlown tidon, kapchaang kma' rek avah adobom chaak raan. ‘Mleiya kpii kcha' ava ngi karlaang kcha' mii ava' hinnu msuwkqha,’ dida, Kruwng Jisu mdakkat tih mdothe pauna rek avah abinphaak chaan.”
44020036	Ungta mma ngi hava' dow rek mthe dok le' ungta mmaan mkheng tung ngi tirdiil lamda rinkthamsap chlamda.
44020037	Ungta mmaan mkheng inni Paul avah mlowl thah arpom lamda put lamda ungta kdung ngi qap lamda.
44020038	Mma ngi mhin inni, ‘kmai veikhat dei nimaan tih,’ mdodit ava ngi kdung ngi muplungin kham chda, audilli mmaan nih arkuwng kphadek ki da chlamda.
44021001	'Tunnu neen nih mmaan hinki ksunin dilli arkuwng 'leenni vang innu kthlengjik ki kvanin ava ngi Kos diiloipaam phaan nuh. Mupduknii ngi Thodes diiloipaam vanphaan nuh ungta ava' thung ki ngi Patara khuwpii thuh vang innu.
44021002	Ava' thung ngi neen nih Phininsia paamkuwl thuh kvang rah arkuwng khat phakhot innu ungta mthung ngi kal innu, arkuwng 'leenni vang innu.
44021003	Ava' dilli neen nih Saipras diiloipaam avah heidei innu ungta maleh ktong thah vankheel innu, Siria paamkuwl thah arvanthap innu ungta Tair khuwpii tlung innu. Mleiya arkuwng ava' dohor dona rek avah ava' thuh mdopqhum rah.
44021004	Ungta ava' thuh neen nih sikhu rek kdehn thungta ava' thuh nii tikhiu am innu. Pthla ar'aang ngi mmaan nih Paul hinni Jerusalem khuwpii thah mahanmana' rah thepiik lamda.
44021005	Ungta neenki knitkhuwn mtlan dok thungta k'lamqowi raan thah veikhat sun innu. Ungta mmaan mkheng inni mnuwn ungta mnau rekin tu' khuwpii duwn kphaakin kpha thung ngi mda chaanda. Ungta neen nih truwnpii biing ngi tirdiil innu ungta rinkthamsap innu.
44021006	Neen nih khatleh khat kkarthaan dokin dilli arkuwng thuh kal innu ungta mmaan rukka mi'inn thaan nih vangkerheel chlamda.
44021007	Ungta neen nih Tair khuwpii ki ngi truwnpii 'lam kdoqowiyin mqut dilli Ptolemais khuwpii phaan nuh, ungta neen nih unau rek avah arvuwi chaannu ungta niikhat mmaan tu' amsap innu.
44021008	Mupduknii ngi Paul miqhi rek neenna sun chaan nuh ungta Sijaria khuwpii phaan nuh. Ungta neen nih pauminksi Philip tidit tah tikhiu rek arlak ki khat ava' inn thung ngi luwt innu ungta mma' hinni am innu.
44021009	'Tunnu hava' mii ava ngi pau kpurphuwng mchanu kinrim chai plii mdothlowi.
44021010	Ungta neen nih mpha mruk ka'amin thung ngi mmiing Agabus tidit khulpu khat avah Judia paamkuwl ki arjungda.
44021011	Ungta mma ngi neen kihinin nih mthlen thung ngi mma ngi Paul arkowlke avah louda ungta mdak ki mkhuh korbowl chthida hanto'theda: “Pthla Kchiir ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Hanto' heppi hava' arkowlke kthlowi mii avah Jerusalem khuwpii thuh ka'am Jihudi rekki kbowl lamrah. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah Chaatktlei rek khut thung ngi kparlaan lamrah,’ ” dida.
44021012	Ungta neen nih hava' dow rek ava' karjaakin thungta, neen le' mmun ava' thuh ka'am mii rekki Jerusalem thah mahanmana' rah Paul hinni pnuwm chaannu.
44021013	Audilli Paul lih arthaangda: “Naan nih hanto ngi qapda ungta kuplung adopkuiyin avah talu adobin naanplih? Neiya tbowl daat mda, Kruwng Jisu miing ki thenni Jerusalem thuh kdiyou rang kpha ngi korthlong dok kcha' ping.”
44021014	Ungta neen nih kupnuwm pchaanmaan thungta, ‘Isowr plungbin chdaatso,’ diin nuh, rimkdi amchaan nuh.
44021015	Ungta nit rek ava' dilli neen nih kdonaan porthlong innu Jerusalem khuwpii thah hang innu.
44021016	Ungta Sijaria khuwpii ki sikhu aangqhe rek rukka neen tu' hangsap innu. Mmaan nih neen mukuptlung chraan Saipras ki Mnason tidit tah choduh ki sikhu rek arlak ki khat ava' inn thung ngi neenna mqhi chaanda.
44021017	Ungta neen nih Jerusalem khuwpii kphaakin thungta unau rekki kanpa ngi marlaang chaanda.
44021018	Mupduknii vah Paul lih morson rek neen tu' James hinni luwtsap innu ungta kver rek mkheng rukka amsap daat lamda.
44021019	Ungta mma ngi murvuwi chaak lam dilli, Isowr rih mma' nongtlotna' thung ngi Chaatktlei rek arlak ki mdotlot dow mkheng rek avah mmaan hinni karnaakjik ki song chda.
44021020	Ungta mmaan nih ava' marjaakin thungta Isowr ponlor chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Paul hinni hanto' the lamda: “Ku'uknau'in, asuwn o, Jihudi rek pun tyatya ngi lammrin chaak daat inna ungta mmaan mkhengin avah nowlam 'leenni plung kupluwt kcha' mii reklam.
44021021	Pdainu Chaatktlei rek arlak ki ka'am kcha' Jihudi rek hinni, mnaumsuwn rekin vun mdoreen mana' raan mditmata mnowlamin dilkqowiyi mchemana' raan ungta Moses tmaak pthina' rah purchuk lam tinu tidit tih mmaan hinnu nangki alei avah mdoparjaak dokin.
44021022	Ava' vah 'tunnu talu totlot raan? Kunpun avah trin kmah kurduh lamrah mleiya nang atlun dok avah karjamun lamrah.
44021023	Avaleiyi, neen nih adoktheen heppi mheitlot piik chaan. Neen karlak inni paureeltham ktham dok miichai plii ka'am lam.
44021024	Hava' mii rek avah aqhilam rah mmaan tu' adakin ikpirchiir sapin, ungta mmaan nih msamin mdokchi chaakna' raan ki thenni sum avah nang ngi apii chlam. Ungta mii mkheng ngi mmaan nih mdo'arjaak dokin nang aleiki pauson avah anto' kma'pa a, tidit tah nang adak kat tih karnaakjik ki apqowi a ungta nowlam, dilkqowiyi kchet a, tidit adei lamso.
44021025	Pdainu lamkrin kcha' Chaatktlei rek leivah neen nih hanto ngi kupqum dokin. Mleiya mmaan nih dow pthla rek hinni rintparlaan dok dow rek thungki ungta hii thungki ungta teklelyow thungki ungta plungbindak kmah ngi lowsang kilqhi thungki ikekneeng chlamso.”
44021026	Ungta mupduknii ngi Paul lih mii rek avah qhi lamda ungta mma ngi mdaksa avah mmaan tu' kpirchiir chlamda. Ava' dilli mma ngi tikpirchiirna' ki mpha avah teden ktlang rang ungta mmaan ktai ki thenni teden thung ngi rintparlaan chaak rang tidit ava' kparjaak lam rang ki thenni, luwbuk'inn thuh luwt chlamda.
44021027	'Tunnu nii tikhiu kpha chrah mthe arlaan nih, Asia paamkuwl ki Jihudi rekki Paul lih luwbuk'inn thuh ma'am avah dei lamda. Mthungta mmaan nih miipii rek mkheng avah siinchaak lam thida Paul avah kyowng lamda.
44021028	Mmaan nih hanto' owng lamda: “Isreel chaat thungki mii rek, mheibom chaan! Hava' mii avah mii rek hinni ungta nowlam 'leenni ungta hava' mun ava' kepteng ngi, mmun ktai thung ngi mii rek kpurchuk mii ava'. Ungta mma ngi hava' han'tun nih, Grik mii rek avah hava' luwbuk'inn thung ngi luwqhi lamda hava' mmun kchiir avah mtopbor rah.” dilamda.
44021029	Mleiya mmaan nih khuwpii ava' thung ngi Paul lih Ephisia khuwpii ki mii, Trophimas tu' mduh thah mkilqhiin avah mdodehn. Avaleiyi, Paul lih mma' avah luwbuk'inn ava' thung ngi luwqhipakda mdoditin.
44021030	Ungta hava ngi khuwpii mkheng avah vaanglum chda ungta mii rekki arheichen lamda Paul avah kyowng lamda. Ungta Luwbuk'inn thungki rowng duwn thah qhi pthuwk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih m'tunkat daat tih paltong rek avah arkam lamda.
44021031	Mmaan nih mma' ke'eyou rah mthemeekin arlaan nih Rome raalmiilop ki raalmii luwkqhi hinni Jerusalem khuwpii mkheng thung ngi raal kthuwk a tidit ki pau avah tlungda.
44021032	Ungta mma ngi kbeisek ki raalmii rek aangqhe le' raalmii arja khat kpupa rekle' qhida mmaan hinni yuchen lamda. Ungta mmaan nih raalmii luwkqhi avale' raalmii rek mdehn thungta Paul mdobunin avah down lamda.
44021033	Audilli raalmii luwkqhi ava ngi heinaida Paul avah kyowngda. Ungta mma ngi thiirrii 'knii ngi mdobowlna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Audilli mma ngi mma' avah kuw, ungta talu mtlot tidit, kheelda.
44021034	Ungta miipii rek arlak ki aangqhe rekki owng lamda msik khat the lamda ungta morson aangqhe rekki msik khat nowl the lamda. Mthungta mma ngi vaangmlum inni mkindit kat avah dei pchaang mda. Avaleiyi, mma ngi Paul avah raalmii inn thah tuhunqhina' rah paupiik pii lamda.
44021035	Ungta Paul lih arkal rek mphaak thungta mma' avah miipii rekki eenghal mdotlotin leiyi, raalmii rekki mdopuwk raan thah tlada.
44021036	Mleiya miipii rekki hanto' owng lamda, “Mma' avah aqhi dokin,” dilamda, mdil mdqowi daatin.
44021037	Ungta Paul avah raalmii inn thuh kluwqhi rah mtheen arlaan nih mma ngi raalmii luwkqhi ava' hinni hanto'theda: “Ahin nih kpau chaak krow rang mowi,” dida? Ungta mma ngi: “Grik pau adeh mow,” dida arthaangda?
44021038	“Nang nga mphakhat thung ngi raal kupqhun, mii pun plii qhidokda paamkbiik laiyi kchen dok miike'eyou lop thungki Egypt mii ava' ptipmeh mow,” dida?
44021039	Pdainu Paul lih hanto'theda: “Neiya Silisia paamkuwl ki Tarsas khuwpii ki ping, Jihudi mii ping. Ungta neiya ava' mkenreelsii khuwpii ki miikhat ping. Neiyi mii rek hinni pau kdothe chaakna' rah mheirot piikcha', dinuh akaktham chaak a.”
44021040	Anto ngi mma ngi mrotpiik dok thungta Paul lih arkal 'leenni rip thida mii rek hinni mkhut tih partamda. Ungta mii rekki kdairim mih ma'amin le' mma ngi Hibriu pau vih hanto'theda, arvuwi chlamda.
44022001	“Mii rek, unau rek ungta apa'leen 'tun naan a'aang inni neiyi kparkhaan chaakna' pau kdothe havah mhei'arjaak piik chaan.
44022002	Ungta mmaan nih Hibriu pau vih mpau marjaakin thungta kdungbet tih kdaiyi am lamda. Audilli mma ngi hanto'theda!
44022003	Neiya dakat tih Silisia paamkuwl ki Tarsas khuwpii thuh kqou kcha' Jihudi khat ping. Pdainu hava' khuwpii thung ngi linnu Gamaliel hinni kurchuk kcha' ping. Mma ngi npu'leen nowlam dilkqowiyi kqhajik ki mdotpurchuh chaak ungta tuni naan akhengin ahehep inni nei ruk Isowr plung kupluwt kcha' khat ping.
44022004	Ungta neiyi hava' 'Lam ava' kqowi rek avah kdiyou kpha ngi tyattraanna' tperteel lam nuh. Neiyi snu ruk psel ruk bowl lam nuh rowng'inn thuh kdoparlaan lam.
44022005	Hava' 'leennu thimpu kenreel le' kunpun mkheng ki kver rek rukku nei ksakhi avah pii lamda. Ungta Damaskas thungki unau rek hinki rah paukjit kpha rukka neiyi mmaan hinki lounu. Mleiya neiyi ava'thah ka'am mii rek avah bowl lam thida mraal suwkthuhna' tpiik lamna' rah Jerusalem thah arhunkqhi rang ngi ava'thah yunu.
44022006	Pdainu 'tunnu kunthunqim arveel lih hanto' thuwkda. Neiyi Damaskas khuwpii kphaak tiingtiing arlaan nih kdodeh dokmah ngi, parvaan ki ar'aang klin khat arjuda mokloijik ki mtaanda.
44022007	Mthungta neiya dulti thah tlu chnuh ungta krowl khat tih kihin nih hanto' mdothe arjanu: ‘Saul, Saul, taluleiyi nang ngi, neiya tyat chiireelna' atpiik a?’ dida.
44022008	Mthungta neiyi hanto ngi arthaang chnuh: ‘Kruwng nang nga kuw ptil lih?’ Ungta Mma ngi kihin nih hanto ngi theda: ‘Neiya nang ngi tyat chiireelna' adotpiik meek, Najareth ki Jisu ping.’ dida.
44022009	Ungta kmiiqhi rek rukku mar'aang avah mmikkat inni dei chlamda ungta mningin pqit lamda. Pdainu mmaan vah nei kihin nih kpau Mma' krowl avah arja lammeh.
44022010	Mthungta neiyi hanto' thenu: ‘Kruwng neiya talu tlow chnikli?’ dinuh. Kruwng ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: ‘Ikerdel rang ngi Damaskas khuwpii thah vang. Ava' thuh nang ngi adotlot rang ngi mdoporthlon dok dow mkheng rek avah talu rang tidit ahin nih akthepiik rah.’ Dida.
44022011	Ungta mar'aang klengreen dotlot tih neiya khudei pchaang manu. Avaleiyi, nei kmiiqhi rekki kukhut thah mokyowng lamda, Damaskas khuwpii thah mvanqhi chlamda.
44022012	Audilli nowlam ki dilkqowiyi rinko'owi kcha' ungta ava' thuh ka'am Jihudi rek mkheng ngi mrinpaumin mdopqhat sapin Anania mdoditin miikhat ka'am.
44022013	Mma ngi kihin nih thlengda ungta kihin nih rip thida hanto'theda: ‘Ku'uknau Saul, mik kahar arlaang cha',’ dida kihin nih theda. Ungta qhang ava'kat thung ngi neiyi mma' avah kmik ki dei chnuh.
44022014	Audilli mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Nang ngi Isowr plungbin Kindit Khat avah amik ki adodeh chaakna' rah ungta Mma' nehr kat thungki krowl ado'arjaak chaakna' rah neenki npa'leen ki Isowr rih nang nga atokchol chaak dok a.
44022015	Mleiya havah nang ngi mii mkheng hinni amik ki adodeh ungta ado'arjaak rek 'leenni Mma' sakhi kurthuwk chnadi'.
44022016	Ungta 'tunnu taluda nang ngi ado'ardat tah? Irip rang ngi dii iluwt cha'. Ungta Kruwng miing adotham chaak ki apnu arve mkheng avah alqhucha',’ dida.
44022017	Audilli neiyi Jerusalem khuwpii thah kuhun kerheel thung ngi hanto' thuwkda. Mleiya neiyi luwbuk'inn thuh rinkaktham chaak meek arlaan nih rinmer khat deinu.
44022018	Mleiya Jisu ngi kihin nih hanto' mdothe deinu: ‘Iknot ungta kbeisek ki ikorlou rang ngi Jerusalem khuwpii thungki ithuwk dok mleiya Nei kleiyi adopiik nangki arinpaumin avah mmaan nih arlaang lam nimeh,’ dida.
44022019	Ungta neiyi, ‘Kruwng, Sinegog ktai thung ngi Nang ahin nih lamkrin kcha' rek avah rowng'inn thuh khum lam nuh ungta kdobun lam avah mmaan nih mdodehn.
44022020	Ungta Nang asakhi Stiphen hii mupthuhn thung rukku neiya mhin nih krip daat ping,’ dinuh.
44022021	Audilli Jisu ngi kihin nih theda: ‘Ikorlou rang ngi ichet, mleiya Neiyi mmun hava' thungki lamkla ngi Chaatktlei rek hinni apthla nikdi',’ dida.”
44022022	Ungta mmaan nih mpauthe avah hava' mdothe kpha vah arjaakpiik lamda. Pdainu ava'dil vah mmaan nih owng lamda: “Hava' hep daat mii avah dultipaam thuh ma'am rang pemeh mleiya mma' avah mrin ki mtikkcha pemeh,” dilamda.
44022023	Audilli mmaan nih mo'ownchun inni mbuwmdiirin jen lamda ungta vaiphul parvaan thah ponthowm lamda.
44022024	Ungta raalmii luwkqhi ava ngi Paul avah raalmii'inn rek thuh mdoluwqhi dokna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Ungta mma ngi taluleiyi m'leen nih ko'owng lam a, tidit mdodehna' rah mma' avah riikchung ngi bunda pau tkheel rah, dida.
44022025	Ungta mmaan nih mdobunna' raan ki thenni saavunrii ngi mbowl arjitin thung ngi ava' thuh krip daat raalmii arja khat kpupa ava' hinni Paul lih hanto'theda: “Naan nih Rome miikhat avah nperteel duh ngi tbun rang avah nowlam vah mrot mow,” dida.
44022026	Raalmii arja khat kpupa ava ngi hava' marjaak thungta, raalmii lopkqhi ava' hinni vada vansongda, ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi adotlot avah ikilrin deicha', mleiya hava' mii avah Rome miikhat,” dida.
44022027	Audilli raalmii lopkqhi ava ngi vada Paul hinni hanto'theda: “Athe o, nang nga Rome mii pti?” Ungta Paul lih, “Ou, Rome mii ping,” dida.
44022028	Ungta raalmii lopkqhi ava ngi arthaangda: “Neiyi sum knempok kdopiik ki hava' paammii tkurthuhna' avah kdophan chaak,” dida. Ungta Paul lih hanto'theda: “Pdainu neiya paammii khat tih kqou kcha' ping,” dida.
44022029	Audilli mma' hinni pau kekheel rah kthe rek avah mma' hinki kbeisek ki korsown dok chlamda. Ungta raalmii lopkqhi ava' rukka mma ngi Rome miikhat ava' mdobowl leiyi, mningpqitda.
44022030	Mupduknii vah mma ngi taluleiyi Jihudi mii rekki mma' avah mraal mdopiikin tidit mdodeh nuwm leiyi, mma ngi thimpukenreel rekle' kunpun mkheng rek hinni paupiik pii lamda purbuk lamda. Audilli mma ngi Paul avah perthletda ungta arjukqhida mmaan aang ngi topko'ongda.
44023001	Audilli Paul lih Senhedrin avah suwrim lam thida hanto'theda: “Mii rek ungta unau rek, neiyi krinkum mkheng avah Isowr aang ngi plung kindit tih knong purkhum nuh, tuni kpha thung ngi arvang ka'am ping,” dida.
44023002	Ava'kat thung ngi thimpu kenreel Anania ngi mhin nih krip daat rek hinni Paul avah mnehr thah mdotpeen lamna' rah paupiik pii lamda.
44023003	Audilli Paul lih mhin nih hanto'theda: “Bang toppowl dang hep daat nang avah Isowr rih aktpeeng rah. Mleiya nang ngi ko'ong tinu nowlam dilkqowiyi nei k'leen nih pau apindit tah? Pdainu nang ngi taluleiyi neiya nowlam klaan tinu mektpeeng rah paupiik apiik lam a?”
44023004	Ungta mhin nih krip rekki Paul hinni hanto' the lamda: “Nang rang mow Isowr thimpu kenreelsi krai rangnga?”
44023005	Audilli Paul lih hanto'theda: “Unau rek, neiyi mma' avah thimpu kenreelsi ava' tidit deimaang. Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: ‘Nang ngi nang amii rekki paamkpu ava' 'leenni kthi adothe rang pemeh,’ ” mdodit. (Mpk. 22:28)
44023006	Pdainu Paul lih mmaan avah lopkhat tih Saddusy rek thungki lam ungta morson rek ava ngi Pharisy thungki reklam tidit mdodeh leiyi, Senhedrin ava' thung ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Mii rek, ungta unau rek, neiya Pharisy khat ping ungta Pharisy khat chapa ping. Pdainu plungbipsukn le' kdiyou rinkerheelna' ki mleiyi neiya mitpindit meeksli a.”
44023007	Ungta mma ngi hava' mthe thungta Pharisy rekle' Saddusy rek arlak ki tkolrotmana' khat pthuwkda, ungta hava ngi Senhedrin avah penqhen pthida.
44023008	Mleiya Saddusy rekvah trin kerheelna' ungta vaantamsi mditmata pthla tidit ka'am pemeh mdoditin. Pdainu Pharisy rekvah mikniing ngi mdorot chaakin.
44023009	Audilli mmaan arlak ki kdung ngi vaanglumna' khat thuwkda. Ungta Pharisy rek thungki nowlam chukpu rekki rip lamda mdokthitnaan nih hanto' thelamda. “Neen nih hava' mii 'leenni mthitna' khadaat ruk phang maanring. Pdainu pthla ngi mditmata vaantamsi ngi mhin nih mpauna' ma'am cheentung ngi neen nih Isowr kepteng ngi karnaakqhi karnaakqhi maancheh.”
44023010	Ungta kdungreen nih vaanglumna' mthuh thungta mii rekki Paul avah mikqiik mikqiik ki kqetkrep lam rang pakda, mdoditin leiyi, raalmii luwkqhi avah mningqi chda. Avaleiyi, mma ngi raalmii rek hinni, Paul avah mii rek arlak ki raanni qenthuhda raalmii'inn thang ngi mdo’arhun qhina’raan ki thenni paupiik pii lamda.
44023011	Pdainu mupduknii jaan nih Kruwng ngi Paul hinni ripda ungta mhin nih hanto'theda: “Paul arda aprok, nang ngi kindit deek ki Jerusalem khuwpii thuh, Nei kthen nih sakhi adopiik heppi Rome khuwpii thung rukku adopiik rah.”
44023012	Ungta khu mvaar thungta Jihudi mii aangqhe rekki khadaat tih kthikerseel lamda ungta kthikartham na' khat tih korbowl lamda, hanto' the lamda: ‘Mleiya mmaan nih Paul me'eyow duhn khimkheiyi tchaak ruk tchaakin nimeh ungta tneek ruk tneekin nimeh’ kirdi lamda.
44023013	'Tunnu hava' kthi kkerseel mii rek avah somplii kerdei lam.
44023014	Mmaan nih thimpu kenreel rekle' kver rek hinni thleng lamda hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih khadaat tih kthiktham paureel klin khat 'leenni korbowl dok kcha' inping. Mleiya neen nih Paul ke'eyow duhn khimkhei inni dow khatleh cha nimaanring.
44023015	'Tunnu naan le' Senhedrin ava ngi raalmii luwksu hinni, naan nih mma' lei avah kukthuk bet tih kthlaam nuwm inna, adiin rang ngi mma' avah naan ahin nih mdo’arjuk qhina’ raan iktham chaan. Ungta neenna mma ngi hava' mphaakduh ngi ke'eyou rang ngi korthlong dok kcha' inping,” dilamda.
44023016	Pdainu Paul charnu chapa ava ngi mdoptuwnin avah arjada, mma ngi vada raalmii'inn rek thung ngi luwtthida Paul hinni avah sonpiikda.
44023017	Audilli Paul lih raalmii arja khat kpu rek arlak ki khat ownda ungta hanto'theda: “Hava' kseetnau avah raalmii luwksu hinni vaanqhicha' mma ngi mhin nih dow mruk mdothe rah ka'am a,” dida.
44023018	Audilli mma ngi kseetnau avah, raalmii luwksu ava' hinni vaanqhida. Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Rowngmii Paul ava ngi mo'ownda ungta hava' kseetnau ava ngi: ‘Ahin nih dow mruk mdothe rah ka'am’ dida, mma' avah ahin nih kdo'arhanqhina' rang ki thenni ktham chda,” dida.
44023019	Mthungta raalmii luwksu ava ngi mma' avah mkhut thah kyowngda msiirthah heiqhi ptliing thida hanto' kheelda: “Taluda nang ngi kihin nih tson rah adobin nah?”
44023020	Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: “Jihudi rekki nang ngi Paul avah pduknii ki kunpun ava' thung ngi adopthuhna' rah ahin nih iqhil inche kdi ngi kerseel doklam. Mleiya mmaan nih mma' lei avah kukthuk bet tih kthlaam num dotlot ktlow lamrah.
44023021	Pdainu nang ngi mmaan dothe avah pqowima' mleiya mii somplii kerdeiyi mma' avah ptuwn lamda ka'am daat lam a. Mleiya mmaan nih Paul me'eyow duhn khimkheiyi tchaak ruk kcha kma' ungta tneek ruk knee kma' rang ngi kthiktham paureel pau mdoreel dokin. 'Tunnu mmaan nah korthlongjik lamda ka'am lam a. Ungta mmaan nih nang apauqum rang hehe daat mdo'ardat daatin,” dida.
44023022	Audilli raalmii luwksu ava ngi, “nang ngi nei kihin nih hava' dow rek adoson avah kuwkhat leh hinni thema', dida kseetnau avah psun pthida.”
44023023	Ungta mma ngi raalmii arja khat kpu rek 'knii own lam thida mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih raalmii arja 'knii, skowl raalmii somtikhiu ungta kchei ksin raalmii arja 'knii avah Sijaria khuwpii thah kchet rah aporthlong tengin. Ungta naan nih jaanki mutkutna' qhang thung ngi ikorlouin rah ichetin.
44023024	Ungta naan nih Paul 'tuwnna' rah saa khat aporthlongin rah, kqhajik ki Paul avah paamkpusi Pheliks hinni aqhi dokin,” dida.
44023025	Ungta mma ngi hava' mkurduh ki heppi paukjit khat avah kjitda.
44023026	“Klaudias Lysias neiyi, Kparthaangsi paamkpu Pheliks, nah ahin nih akurvuwi chaak a.
44023027	Jihudi mii rekki hava' mii avah kyowng lamda ungta eyousou lamda. Pdainu neiyi raalmii rektu' chetnu mma' avah Rome mii tidit kdo'arjaak leiyi, kdosan.
44023028	Ungta neiyi taluleiyi mmaan nih mdopsulin tidit kdodeh nuwm leiyi, mmaan ki kunpun thung ngi mma' avah pthuwk nuh.
44023029	Pdainu mmaan nih mdopsulnaan ki mlei avah mmaan ki nowlam 'leenni paukheel reklei chrel daatda. Ungta mma ngi mdiyowna' krow mditmata rowngmii mkurthuhna' krow ki mtik kcha mraal mdopiik inna ammda.
44023030	Ungta neiyi Jihudi rekki, mii havah ke'eyou rang ngi mdoptuwnin karjaak thungta nang ahin nih mma' avah keheipthlat chaak a. Ungta neiyi mma' 'leenni mraal kpii rek hin rukku mdokthitnaan ki mlei avah ahin nih adotpiik lamna' rah paupiik kdopiik doklam. Hanto' arveel lih idown chni.”
44023031	Avaleiyi, raalmii rek ava ngi mpaupiik avah pqowi lamda. Ungta jaan nih Paul avah qhi lamda, Antipatris khuwpii phaakqhi lamda.
44023032	Ungta mupduknii ngi skowl raalmii rek avah Paul tu' kchet rah silam thida, raalmii morson rek avah raalmii'inn rek thah arvang kerheel chlamda.
44023033	Ungta mmaan nih Sijaria khuwpii pha lamda paukjit mparlaanin thung ngi mmaan nih Paul rukka paamkpu ava' hinni parlaan chlamda.
44023034	Ungta paamkpu ava ngi paukjit ava' mparcham dok dilli mma' avah talu paamkuwl thungki tidit mhin nih kheelda. Ungta mma ngi Silisia paamkuwl ki tidit avah arjada.
44023035	Audilli mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang araal akpii rek mtlunin dilli, nangki alei avah arjarow laini',” dida. Ungta mma ngi Paul avah Herod kruwng'inn thung ngi thithida mdorunna' raan ki paupiik pii lamda.
44024001	'Tunnu niiparnga dilli thimpu kenreelsi Anania ngi kver rekle' Tertullas mdoditin nowlam 'leenni kpaudei khat le' qhi lamda Sijaria khuwpii thah arju lamda. Ungta mma ngi paamkpusi ava' hinni Paul kepteng ngi mraal rek avah piida.
44024002	Ungta mmaan nih Paul mo'ownplu dokin dilli Tertullas tih Pheliks aang ngi mma' raal rek avah hanto'theda parlaanda: “Neen nih nang a'am leiyi mpha ksowt tih kdaiyi, kanpa ngi arvan'am chaannu. Ungta mduh adosutdehna' ava ngi chaat hava' thung ngi taqhatna' tya arvan amda.
44024003	Kparthaangsi Pheliks mpha ktaiyi ungta mmun ktai thung ngi neen nih adokpanpaak chaakin tu' korthlop pih adokrot chaakin.
44024004	Pdainu adokapyat porsonmana' rah akaktham chaak a, tidit tah avonsat tih kpauthe raan ava' ki mlei rek avah mruk mhei'arjaak piik chaan!
44024005	Neen nih hava' mii avah omlai khat lik ki ungta dultipaam mkheng thung ngi Jihudi mii rek arlak ki raalthuhna' thina' ktlow ngi deiyin nuh. Ungta mma' avah Najareth tidit lop thungki mluwksuber khat ava'.
44024006	Ungta mma ngi luwbuk'inn kpha rukka ktopbor rang ngi tlowda. Ungta neen nih mma' avah kyowng innu ungta neenki knowlamin dilkqowiyi m'leen nih pau tpindit rah ngeiyin nu.
44024007	Pdainu raalmii luwksu Lysias arvada ungta raanqhul dok ki neen kukhutin thungki mma' avah mlownginda.
44024008	Ungta Paul 'leenni mraal kpii mii rek avah nang ahin nih mthlenna' raan paupiik pii lamda. Nang ngi mma' aperteel thung ngi neen nih mraal mdopiik rekin mkheng ki mkindit kat rek avah dei chdaatnadi'.”
44024009	Ungta Jihudi rek rukvah avah bom lamda ungta hava'le' avah anto'kat tidit thepom lamda.
44024010	Ungta paamkpu ava ngi mhin nih mpauna' rah makcha thungta Paul lih arthaangda: “Neiyi nang nga kum tya thung ngi hava' chaat 'leenni paukpindit miikhat akurthuh avah kdodeh. Avaleiyi, neiyi kanpa ngi kparkhaan chaakna' pau avah a'aang ngi ithe chnih.
44024011	Mleiya havah nang ngi kdei krow ptih, tidit tah neiyi Jerusalem khuwpii thah luwkbu rah kahanna' avah nii sowm lei'knii kheel mlaiya.
44024012	Ungta mmaan nih luwbuk'inn thuh neiyi kuwmiikhat tu' kerteen meek ki, mditmata sinegog thuh mditmata khuwpii thung ngi miipii rek kokchou meek arlaan nih mdotedeh lamna' ruk ka'am pemeh.
44024013	Ungta mmaan nih 'tun nei k'leen nih mraal mdotpiik lamna' ki mkindit dow khatleh ruk pii pchaang lam nimeh.
44024014	Pdainu neiyi ahin nih havah kthethut chaak a, tidit tah mmaan nih mdotheen lop ava' ki 'Lam ava' dilkqowiyi neiyi Kpa le' ki Isowr avah luwkdobuk chaak. Ungta nowlam thung ngi mdokjit dow mkheng rekle' thimpu dokjit mkheng avah neiyi lam kdorin chaak.
44024015	Neiyi mmaan mdak inni mdorot chaakin heppi nei rukka Isowr hinni kuplungbin avah ka'am. Mleiya mrinkindit mii rekki then rukku kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' avah ka'am bei rah.
44024016	Hava' mkurthuh leiyi, mpha ktai thung ngi Isowr hinruk dultimii rek hin rukku kdopkhaan mana' rah plungrildeh kdothlowi chaakna' rah kdotlot chaak.
