44024017	'Tunnu mpha ksowt dil thang ngi neiya kchaat rek thungki srah rek kbom chrah ungta chla kpii chrang ngi kthleng kcha' ping.
44024018	Pdainu marlak ava' thung ngi neiyi luwbuk'inn thuh daksa tikpirchiirna' ktlot meek arlaan nih Asia ki kurju Jihudi rekki mphakhot lamda. Neiya miipii rek tung rukku ka'am pmaang ungta vaangkdoplumna' ruk ka'am pemeh.
44024019	Mmaan nih nei k'leen nih mraal mdotpiik lamrah ma'am tlaang bih 'tun hava' thuh am lamdon nang a'aang ngi neiya kraal mikpii lamrah.
44024020	Mditmata 'tun hava' ka'am rek ava' rukku neiyi rinkdo'owimana' ma'am cheentung ngi neiyi kunpun hava' aang ngi kri daat arlaan nih mmaan nih avah athe lamso.
44024021	Mleiya hava' hava' paulam khat ava'leiyi mmaan arlak ki rip nuh ko'owng ping. Mleiya kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' ava'lei tidit tah ava'leiyi tuni rukku nang ngi nei k'leen nih pau apindit meeksli a.”
44024022	Pdainu Pheliks ki hava' khimkhei arjada, ungta 'Lam tidit ava'leiyi kukthuwkset tih mkindit mdodeh leiyi, ‘mma ngi, neiyi raalmii luwksu Lysias murjukdil row ngi nang apau avah apinditpiik laini',’ dida pau tpindit rang avah tpunqhun pthida.
44024023	Mthungta mma ngi raalmii arja khat kpu ava' hinni Paul avah mdothiik penletna' rah ungta ko'olbet tih mdothiikna' rah paupiik piida. Ungta maplap rekki dow mdopiik chaak raan ungta mdovel chaak raan ava' rukka mdopkhaan mana' raan paupiik pii lamda.
44024024	Ungta nit mruk dilli, Pheliks ki mnuwn Drusilla Jihudi mii ava' tu' mthlenin thung ngi, mma ngi Paul ko'own rah si lamda ungta mmaanve ngi Khrista hinki lamrin ki mleiyi Paul dothe avah arja chlamda.
44024025	'Tunnu Paul lih rinkinditna' leiyi, ungta daksa tkilrinna' leiyi, ungta karvang rang pau tpinditna' leiyi, pintiingda pau avah saam chda. Audilli Pheliks ka mningpqitda ungta hanto'theda: 'Tunki thenvah isun dok, dilthah mpha kqha kthlowi thung ngi veikhat a'own daat laini',’ dida.
44024026	Ungta ava' tu' kilqhi ngi mma ngi Paul lih kdopthlatna' rah sum mikpii daat rang mow, tidit ruk mdobin chaak. Avaleiyi, mma ngi kornowl kornowl lih mma' avah pau mdosaamqhi kcho.
44024027	Pdainu kum 'knii dilthang ngi Persias Phestas tidit ava ngi Pheliks avah thleng chda. Pheliks ki Jihudi rek mdobom nuwm leiyi, Paul avah kapthla kmah madaatda.
44025001	'Tunnu Phestas tih paamkuwl ava' thuh mthuhna' niikdum mphaak dilli, mma ngi Sijaria khuwpii ki ngi Jerusalem khuwpii thah hangda.
44025002	Audilli thimpu kenreelsi avale' Jihudi rekki miikenreel rekki Paul kepteng ngi m'leen nih pau thepsuk lamda ungta mmaan nih Phestas hinni hanto ngi ktham chlamda.
44025003	Mmaan nih Paul avah Jerusalem khuwpii thah mdo'ownna' rah ktham chlamda. Mleiya havah mmaan nih Paul mahan thung ngi 'lam thah ptuwn lamdon nih mdo'eyowna' raan ki thenni ktaang mdotlotin.
44025004	Pdainu Phestas tih hanto ngi arthaangda: “Mleiya Paul avah Sijaria khuwpii thuh tithiik daat rah, mleiya mma' mdak avah kbeiyi ava'thah kjung kerheel rah.
44025005	Avaleiyi, naan arlak inni nei tu' kyu pchaang rah a'amin cheentung ngi arju lamso. Ungta mmaan nih mii ava ngi karmak mdotlot ma'am cheentung ngi mma' avah mraal apii lamso,” dida.
44025006	Ungta mma ngi mmaan arlak ki niisowm kerdeiyi ma'am dilli Sijaria khuwpii thah yuda. Ungta mupduknii ngi mma ngi pau tpinditna' longkhom 'leenni mko'on dilli, Paul avah mdo'arvan qhina' raan ki paupiik pii lamda.
44025007	Ungta Paul mthuh dilli, Jerusalem khuwpii ki kurju Jihudi rekki rip lamda mma' avah tkhul lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Paul kepteng ngi m'leen nih mraal klin nih pii lamda, pdainu mmaan nih mraal mdopiikin ki mkindit avah the pchaang lam mda.
44025008	Audilli Paul lih makparkhaanna' pau avah hanto'theda: “Neiyi Jihudi mii rekki nowlam dorotma mditmata luwbuk'inn 'leen nih mditmata Siijar kapkhaan rah karmak dow khatleh tlowmaang “
44025009	Pdainu Phestas tih Jihudi rek plungngam mdotlot nuwm leiyi, mma ngi Paul pauthe avah arthaangda ungta hanto'theda: “Nang ngi hava' dow rek leiyi, nei ka'aang ngi pau tpinditna' rang ki thenni Jerusalem khuwpii thah tahan rah abinna?” dida.
44025010	Audilli Paul lih hanto'theda: “Neiya k'leen nih paukpindit rah Siijar paupinditna' longkhom aang ngi krip kcha' dok ping. Nang ngi kqhajik ki adeh tidit tah neiyi Jihudi rek 'leenni karmak dow khatleh tlowmaang.
44025011	Anto'daat yoso neiyi mmaan kdopkhaan lamna' ma'am, mditmata tidina' krow ngi kdoparmana' ka'am mkurthuh bih, tidiyow rang avah neiya matmaang. Pdainu hava' mii rekki kraal mdotpiik lamna' dow rek ava' thung ngi mkindit ma'amma bih kuwkhat leh ngi neiya mmaan hinni mparlaan pchaang nimeh. Neiyi Siijar hinni pau knaak chaak a.”
44025012	Audilli Phestas tih kunpun rektu' mkerseel dokin dilli hanto' arthaangda: “Nang ngi Siijar hinni pau anaak dok a ava' vah nang nga Siijar hinni chetnadi'!” dida.
44025013	Ungta nit mruk dilthah paamkruwng Agrippa le' Bernis tih Phestas kurvuwi chrah Sijaria thuh thleng lamda.
44025014	Ungta mmaan nih nit knempok ki ava' thuh ma'amin dilli Phestas tih Paul 'leenki pau avah paamkruwng ava' hinni hanto'theda parjaakda. “Pheliks ki rowngmii khat tih thida mdomaak daat miikhat ka'am.
44025015	Neiyi Jerusalem thah kahan thuh thimpu kenreel rekle' Jihudi rekki kver rekki mma' lei avah mparjaak lamda. Ungta mmaan nih kihin nih mma' 'leenni pau mheipindit piikin, mdi lamda.
44025016	Pdainu neiyi hanto' thenu arthaang lam nuh. Mleiya tupsulmii ava ngi mkupsul rektu' maiqhuwm mih tpurduhda ungta mma' 'leenni tupsulna' ki mlei rek ava' 'leenni mdak ki makparkhaan chaakna' npiikduh khimkheiyi miikhat avah tpenveipthi rang ngi tpiik dok tidit avah Rome mii nowpa pemeh dinuh.
44025017	Avaleiyi, hava' thuh mmaan nih mthlen kurdut dok daatin le' koktoliit kmah ngi neiyi mupduknii ngi pau tpinditna' longkhom 'leenni ko'ong nuh Paul mdo'arvan qhina' raan ki thenni paupiik piilam nuh.
44025018	Pdainu mma' 'leenni mraal kpii rekki mriin thung ngi neiyi kdobin dow rek ava' heppi mma' kepteng ngi mraal avah pii pchaang lam mda.
44025019	Pdainu mrin'owi chaakin leiyi, mma' kepteng ngi paukheel mruk rekle' Paul lih kring daat, dida mdopandan kdiyou dok kcha' khat Jisu tidit ava' ki mlei daatda.
44025020	Ungta neiyi paukheel rek ava'leiyi mkindit avah dei pchaang manu. Avaleiyi, neiyi hava' dow rek khimkhei tpinditna' rang ki thenni mhin nih, ‘Jerusalem khuwpii thah tahan rah abinna,’ tidit kheelnu.
44025021	Pdainu Paul lih, ‘Agastas dopindit rang ki thenni mheipardat chaan,’ dida, pau mdonaak dok leiyi, neiyi Siijar hinni kapthlat pchaanduh kpha ngi athi daatin, tidit ki paupiik piilam nuh,” dida.
44025022	Audilli Agrippa ngi Phestas hinni hanto'theda: “Nei rukku hava' mii avah kdak ki tarjaak rah kbinna,” dida. “Mditta pduknii row arjalai,” dida
44025023	Mupduknii ngi Agrippa le' Bernis tih kenthle kparnaak dok ki thleng lamda ungta mii kurtuwlna' inn ava' thung ngi raalmii luwksu rekle' khuwpii ava' thung ki miikenreel rek tung ngi luwt lamda. Audilli Phestas paupiik ki Paul avah arvanqhi pthuwk lamda.
44025024	Ungta Phestas tih hanto'theda: “Paamkruwng Agrippa ungta neen tung ngi hava' thuh ka'am mii mkheng rek naan nih hava' mii havah amikin nih adehn a. Hava' mii ava' 'leenni Jerusalem khuwpii ki ungta hava' thuh ka'am Jihudi rekki kihin nih pau naa lamda. Mmaan nih owng lamda hava' mii avah mrinporson rang pemeh, mdoditin.
44025025	Pdainu neiyi mma ngi tidina' ki mtik kcha ngi mdoparma mraal m'leen nih phangmanu. Ungta mma' mdak rukku Agastas hinni pau nadokda, avaleiyi neiyi mma' avah Agastas hinni pthla nih dinuh.
44025026	Pdainu neiyi neiki kruwng ava' hinni mma' leiyi, mkindit kat kdokjit rah ammeh. Avaleiyi, naan ahin nih mma' avah kdopthuh ungta kdungsi ngi paamkruwng Agrippa havah nang ahin. Mleiya maanve ngi tperteel ava' thung ngi neiyi kdokjit chaak rah, dow mruk kphang kcha' daat krow ping.
44025027	Mleiya rowngmii khat avah mraal mkindit kthe kmah ngi tsi daat avah mlei ktaakpa rang heppi binnu,” dida.
44026001	Aludilli Agrippa ngi Paul hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi nang ngi athenni apau chaakna' rah mpha akpiik a.” Audilli Paul lih mkhut arji thida makparkhaan chaakna' pau avah tethe pqhunda.
44026002	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Paamkruwng Agrippa tuni vah Jihudi rekki mdotupsul lamna' dow mkheng 'leenni kakparkhaan chaakna' avah nang a'aang ngi ripda kpau chaak rang avah kuplung kngam kcha' rekrek ki kirbin kcha' imping.
44026003	Mleiya nang nga Jihudi rekki nowpa mkheng le' paukheel rek mkheng avah adodeh leiyi, kdung ngi kuplung kngam kcha'. Avaleiyi, nang ngi kpau avah kqhajik ki mhei'arjaak piikcha'.
44026004	Neiyi mbul ki kupqhun nih taluhep pih arvang ka'am ping ungta kseetnau khat kurthuwk ki Jerusalem thuh kchaat rek arlak ki taluhep pih arvang ka'am ping tidit mkheng avah hava' Jihudi rekki mdehn.
44026005	Mmaan nih sakhi mpiiknuwm inbih, choduhrep ki kupqhun nih neiya mmaan nih mdotedeh doklam. Mleiya neiyi neenki krin'owiyin kpinditsi lop ava' dilkqowiyi neiya Pharisy miikhat kurthuwk nuh.
44026006	Pdainu 'tunvah neiya neen npa'leen hinni Isowr rih paumdoreel ava' ki plungbinpsuk ava'leiyi hava' pau tpinditna' thuh neiya krip kcha' ping.
44026007	Hava' paureel ava' thung ngi neenki nphungin sowm lei'knii rek ava ngi plungbinpsuk ava' mdophan chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr avah suwn le' jaan nih luwbuk chlamda. ‘O, paamkruwng Agrippa, hava' plungbinpsuk ava'leiyi Jihudi rekki neiya kraal mdotpiik lam.
44026008	Isowr rih kdiyou mperdel tidit avah taluleiyi naan nih kurthuwk kma' rah tidit tih adobininda?
44026009	Dakat tih nei rukka, Najareth ki Jisu miing ava' kepteng ngi dow knempok ki itlow nih, dinuh kdo'arvanbin.
44026010	Neiyi hava'kat avah Jerusalem khuwpii thung ngi tlownu. Ungta thimpu kenreel rek hinni ruhtanna' paukjit lounu, miikenje tyatya rek avah neiyi rowng'inn thuh kdodaal lam. Ungta mmaan me'eyown thung rukku neiyi mmaan kepteng ngi kpau ping.
44026011	Ungta neiyi marlak ktaak ki sinegog khimkhei rek thung ngi chetnu mraalin suwkthuhna' piilam nuh ungta raanni pthitda kpau rah silam nuh. Neiyi kdung ngi mmaan 'leenni plungthit lowlam nuh ungta paamktlei ki khuwpii rek kpha thung rukku chetnu mmaan avah suwk kdopthuh lam.
44026012	Neiyi hanto ngi kchena' khat ava' thung ngi thimpu kenreel rek hinki ruhtanna' le' paupiik sin nuh Damaskas khuwpii thah chetnu.
44026013	Ungta niikhat tih kunthunqim arveel lih, ‘Oh paamkruwng neiyi 'lam thuh kehei meek arlaan nih parvaan ki kni ar'aang hin rukku kleng mar'aang khat deinu. Ungta mar'aang ava ngi nei k'leen ruk ungta kmiiqhi rek 'leen ruk mokloijik inni mtaaninda.
44026014	Ungta neen nih dulti thah ktluk haakter dokin le', Hibriu pau vih krowl khat tih nei mdotbiik arjanu. Krowl ava ngi hanto'theda: ‘Saul, Saul, taluleiyi nang ngi Neiya tyat chiireelna' atpiik a? Thiirsi kchung rek ptengda adopirthit tah nang athennu kparsa rah,’ dida.
44026015	Mthungta neiyi hanto'thenu, ‘Kruwng, Nang nga kuw ptil lih?’ dinuh. Ungta Mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Neiya nang ngi tyat chiireelna' adopiik meeksli Jisu ava' ping.
44026016	Pdainu ikerdel rang ngi akhuh ngi irip, mlei hava' leiyi Neiya ahin nih kkandang ping. Mleiya nang nga sopklow kcha' khat apurthuh nikdi'. Ungta nang nga 'tun amik ki adodeh dow rek 'leenni ungta 'tun dilli Neiyi adokepdeh rang dow rek 'leenni sakhi khat apurthuh nikdi'.
44026017	Neiyi nang nga Jihudi rek hinki ungta Chaatktlei rek hinki asan nikdi'.’ Ungta 'tun Neiyi nang nga mmaan hinni aksi a.
44026018	Ungta mmaan mik rek parvanna' rah ungta mmaan nih kjiingnu thungki ngi kvaar thah mkerheelna' raan ungta Seitan ruhtanna' thungki ngi Isowr hinni mkerheelna' raan ki thenni, nang nga adoksi. Mleiya havah mmaan nih mupnu arve rekin thungki toptlot piikna' mdophan chaakna' raan ungta lamtrin chaak ki kenje dok kcha' rek mmaan tung ngi alroukchom kcha'sap mkurthuh chaakna' raan ki then.
44026019	Avaleiyi, paamkruwng Agrippa, neiyi parvaan ki kurju rinmer ava' dothe kdopqowima pemeh.
44026020	Pdainu mmaan nih plung mdoperthlen chaakna' raan ungta Isowr hinni mkerheel chaakna' raan ungta plung kperthleng kcha' ki mtikkcha nong rek ava' mdotlot chaakna' raanni, Neiyi choduhrep pih Damaskas khuwpii thuh ungta Jerusalem khuwpii thuh ungta Judia paamkuwl mkheng thuh ungta audilli Chaatktlei rek hinni kdopurphuwn chaak.
44026021	Mlei ava'leiyi Jihudi rekki luwbuk'inn thuh neiya mokyowng lamda ungta mke'eyou rah mdotheen.
44026022	Pdainu Isowr rih mbom chda, avaleiyi tuni kpha ngi neiyi kdilklin kthe kmah mii mkheng hinni rip nuh sakhi kdopiik chaak pchaan. Neiyi Moses le' khulpu rek dothe avah kthuwk bei rah tidit hehe daat kdothe chaak kma'don dow morson the chmaang.
44026023	Mleiya Khrista ngi tyatna' avah kperteel rah ungta Mma ngi kdiyou rek thungki kring kerheel mkhatna' kurthuwkdon nih mar'aang avah Jihudi rek hinruk ungta Chaatktlei rek hin rukku kparjaam bei rah.”
44026024	'Tunnu mma ngi hava' theda mparkhaan chaak arlaan nih Phestas tih kdung ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Paul nang nga aplung karmak kcha' a! Knemreen nih akurchuh chaak ava ngi aplung mparma chaak a,” dida.
44026025	Pdainu Paul lih hanto'theda: “Kparthaangsi Phestas neiya kuplung karmak meh pdainu neiyi kindit kat rekle' mleipum pauna rek ava' kdothe.
44026026	Mleiya neiyi ningqit ktaak ki kpau chaakna' paamkruwng ava ngi hava' dow rek avah mdodeh. Mleiya hava' dow rek avah mirkil khat thung ngi totlot pseh, hava' dow rek avah mma' plungluwna' thungki khadaat ruk kerthlet meh tidit tih kbin chaak a.
44026027	Paamkruwng Agrippa, nang ngi khulpu rek avah lam'arin chaakpda? Neiyi nang ngi lam'arin chaak a tidit tah kdeh.”
44026028	Audilli Agrippa ngi Paul hinni hanto'theda: “Nang ngi mpha mruk'suwn daat thung ngi neiya Khristen kurthuwk souvih atupnuwm chaak a,” dida.
44026029	Ungta Paul lih hanto'theda: “Neiyi mpha mruk'suwn thung yoso, ksowtpa thung yoso, Isowr hinni, nang daat kma' tuni ki kpauthe karja kcha' rek mkheng rukka, hava' thiirrii rek kma'don, nei kehep daat mkurthuh raan kdongei chaak,” dida.
44026030	Ungta mma ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe dok thungta, paamkruwng ava ngi paamkpusi le' Bernis ungta mmaan tu' kok'ong mkheng rektu' ripsap chlamda.
44026031	Ungta mmaan nih mvanthuh dokin thung ngi msingreelin thung ngi hanto' kerthe lamda. “Hava' mii avah mdiyowna’ ki mtik kcha ngi ungta rowngmii khat tih ma'amna' krow ngi mdotlot dow khatleh ruk ammeh,” dilamda.
44026032	Audilli Agrippa ngi Phestas hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' mii avah mma' mdak ki Siijar hinni paumnaak dokmah tlaang bih, maanve ngi tapthlat pthidok daat rang a,” dida.
44027001	Ungta mmaan nih Italy paam thah neen nih kthap daat rang ngi mkerseel dokin thungta, Paul le' rowngmii morson rek avah mmiing Julias mdoditin Agastas raalmii loppii thungki raalmii arja khat kpupa ava' hinni parlaan lamda.
44027002	Mthungta neen nih Adramittiam khuwpii ki arkuwng khat 'leenni kal innu. Ungta arkuwng avah Asia paamkuwl rekki diibiing ktong thah thapda kchet rang ki ngi truwnpii thuh tlaan nuh. Ungta Thessalonika khuwpii ki Mesedonia ki mii, Aristarkas rukka kilqhiqhisap innu.
44027003	Ungta mupduknii ngi neen nih Sidon khuwpii thuh qum innu ungta Julias tih Paul avah kqhadeek ki sutpqowi chda. Ungta mma ngi maplap rek hinni chetda ungta maplap rekki sopmdolow chaak raan ava' rukka rotpiikda.
44027004	Ungta neen nih ava' thung ki ngi veikhat truwnpii thuh ktlaak nowlin thung ngi tirthli ngi kmaisuk thaan nih mdotraanin leiyi, neen nih Saipras diiloipaam kperthenin chunni vanthap innu.
44027005	Ungta neen nih Silisia le' Pamphylia paamkuwl behki truwnpii thuh kvanthaan dilli Laisia paamklek thungki Maira khuwpii phaan nuh.
44027006	Ava' thung ngi raalmii arja khat kpu ava ngi Alekjendria khuwpii ki arkuwng khat Italy paam thah kvang rah deikhotda ungta mma ngi ava' thung ngi neen avah mapkalinda.
44027007	Ungta neen nih nit knempok ki naamnaam mih kvanthaan dilli kparsa dok ki Snaidas khuwpii beh phaan nuh ungta tirthli ngi kdothah pthlen naan mqhatma leiyi, neen nih Salmoni kirtin nih Kritii diiloipaam kperthen nih vanthap innu.
44027008	Kdung ngi kparsa ngi kvantha dokin dilli neen nih kqha arkuwngkal mdoditin, Lasia khuwpii arveel ki munkhat thung ngi tlung innu.
44027009	'Tunnu mpha knempok thleng dokda ungta 'Then tngowlna' mpha mkerkheel dok leiyi, dii 'leenni thapda tvan rang avah 'tunnu tidina' mkurthuh thungta, Paul lih mmaan avah pauperseel lamda.
44027010	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Mii rek, ndiilam qowi raan avah tidina' rangnga, ungta arkuwng le' mbowrhor kenvei chrang daat kma' neen nrinkumin ki then rukku kdung ngi tkenveina' rang ngi kdeh a,” dida.
44027011	Anto'daat yoso, raalmii arja khat kpu avah Paul lih mdothe ava' hinvah arkuwngpii kqhipa le' arkuwngpii kpupa dothe ava ngi pchaang chda.
44027012	Ungta ava' arkuwngkal avah phalbi ki thenni mqhatma leiyi, mii meknem bet tih ava' thungki tvanthah daat rah, dilamda. Mmaan nih Phininsia khuwpii avah taluhep kduyoso phada phalbi avah ava' thuh ta'am rah bin lamda. Ungta hava' Kritii diiloipaam ki arkuwngkal avah kurduh knitlaak ruk ungta karthak knitlaak ruk mdotarngat.
44027013	Ungta kurduh ktong ki tirthli mraan hiirhiir thungta, mmaan nih muplungbinritin avah ktlung pchaang daat rah kdi ngi truwnpii thung ngi tla lamda ungta Kritii diiloipaam ki laan ktenel lih vanthap lamda.
44027014	Pdainu mpha ksowtliit kmah ngi Euroklaidon mdoditin tchangkhu avah diiloipaam ktong ki arjukraang thangda.
44027015	Mthungta tchangkhu ava ngi arkuwng mokyown chaak thungta ungta tirthli thung ngi tvanthah daat kdopchaanmaan leiyi, neen nih kthap kmah ngi arkuwng avah tirthli praan pthiin nuh ungta tirhli palraan innu.
44027016	Ungta neen nih Klauda mdoditin diiloipaam 'suwn kperthen chaak inni kvanchen meekin chunni kparsa kokki neen nih rinkum tsanna' arkuwngte avah kyowng chaannu.
44027017	Ungta mmaan nih arkuwngte rek mapkal dokin dilli arkuwng avah mkuimana' rah rii ngi mtii le' mtun nih pervel lamda bowl lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih Syrtis sitphui kthong rah mdobinin leiyi, arkuwng buwjaar rek mkheng avah pqumpthi lamda ungta parkai pthi lamda.
44027018	Tchangkhu ngi kdungreen nih mdotpeherin leiyi, mupduknii ngi mmaan nih arkuwng bowrhor rek avah tvarpthi pqhun lamda.
44027019	Ungta mnii kdumna' thung ngi neen nih arkuwng dona rek ava' rukka kukhut kat inni varthiin nuh.
44027020	Nit tyatya thung ngi kni rukku ungta bursi rek rukku mkandanma ungta tchangkhu avah mraan tlit thungta mqutna' thangngu, neen nih kdakin tkarsan chaak pchaan rah tidit ki plungbinpsuk mkheng rukka mapthi dok innu.
44027021	Pdainu mii rekki mpha rowiksowt tih then kcha kmah ngi ma'amin dilli, Paul lih mmaan arlak ki hanrip thida hanto'theda: “Mii rek, naan nih nei kdothe apqowi daat tlaangin bih, ungta Kritii diiloipaam ki narvanthama daat tlaangin bih, hava' hep tidina' ungta tkenveina' avah thuwk nimeh.
44027022	Anto'daat yoso, 'tunnu neiyi akaktham chaak inna, tidit tah naan nih plung kngam mih a'am raan. Mleiya arkuwng tpenvei daatin kma'don neen kuwkhat leh ki rinkum avah kenvei nimeh.
44027023	Mleiya nei ka'am chaakna' ungta sopkdolow chaak Isowr ava' ki vaantamsi khat tih jaangklu kbeh ngi ripda.
44027024	Ungta mma ngi hanto'theda: ‘Paul aningpqitma'! Nang nga Siijar aang ngi rip nadi' ungta asuw, nang tu' kthapsap mii mkheng rekki rinkum avah Isowr rih nang ahin nih atpiik dok a,’ dida.
44027025	Avaleiyi, mii rek aplungin apngamin! Mleiya nei kihin nih mdothe ava' hephep pih kthuwk rah tidit tih neiyi lamkrin chaak a.
44027026	Anto'daat yoso neen nih diiloipaam khat thung ngi dulti tothown raan,” dida.
44027027	Ungta mjaan sowm leiplitna' jaan nih Adria truwnpii mdoditin ava' thung ngi phei le' dung ngi tirthli ngi mraaninda. Ungta thanqim mih arkuwng kthap rek ava ngi laan khat kpha rah ntheenna tidit avah dei lamda.
44027028	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih dii tlum avah suw lamda ungta mtlum avah lam som'knii tlumda. Ava' dilli mruk kla heiyi msutin thungta lam sowm lei parnga tlumda.
44027029	Audilli mmaan nih lung rek kthown khot daatin bih, mdodit inni, mningin mqit leiyi, arkuwng khuikin plii tet avah arkuwng armei ktong thah ptla lamda ungta khu kvaar rang daat arda chlamda.
44027030	Ungta arkuwng kthap rek ava ngi arkuwng thungki mchen dokna' raan korthlong lamda. Mmaan nih arkuwng khuikin mduh thah kaptla dotlot ktlow ngi rinkum tsanna' arkuwngte avah truwnpii thung ngi ptla lamda.
44027031	Paul lih raalmii arja khat kpu le' raalmii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' mii rek ava ngi arkuwng thuh ma'am daat maan bih naan kuwkhat leh ruk karsan pchaang nimaan tih,” dida.
44027032	Audilli raalmii rekki rinkum tsanna' arkuwngte rii rek avah kvetpthi lamda, ungta ptlapthi lamda.
44027033	Ungta khuvaar tiingtiing ngi Paul lih mmaan mkhengin hinni then mruk ruk mdochaakna' raanni hanto'theda, ktham chlamda: “Naan nih thendam kcha kmah ngi, powitham mih arvan am'in avah tuni ngi nii sowm leiplii mphaak dok a ungta naan nih dow khadaat ruk pkeivot maantih.
44027034	Avaleiyi, neiyi then mruk ruk adochaakna' raan akaktham chaak inna. Naan nih tan mruk adolow chaakna' raanni then mruk rukka adochaak raan, Neiyi kthe a naan kuwkhat leh ki aluwchaiyin 'leenki asamin avah khadaat ruk kenvei nimeh.”
44027035	Mma ngi hava' dow rek mthe dok dilli, mmaan mkhengin dodeh ngi mma ngi thenpen ava' louda, Isowr hinni panpaak chthida khuida tchaak pqhunda.
44027036	Audilli mii mkheng arda rokda ungta mmaan rukku then avah cha lamda.
44027037	Ungta arkuwng 'leenni ka'am neen avah kekheng inni mii arja 'knii somtikhiu leitruk inping.
44027038	Ungta mmaan nih kkhom mih mchaak dokin dilli arkuwng mthowm betbetna' rang leiyi chavui rek avah truwnpii thung ngi varpthi lamda.
44027039	'Tunnu khu mvaar thungta mmaan nih paam avah deipindih lam mda. Pdainu mmaan nih truwnpii biing ngi sitphuidaam khat avah heidei lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mrot khimkhei thung ngi arkuwng avah ava' paphaakda laan thah tkal rah bin chlamda.
44027040	Ungta mmaan nih arkuwng khuikin rii rek avah reen pthi lamda ungta truwnpii thung ngi mapthi lamda. Ungta marlak ava' thung ngi mmaan nih arkuwng tkeheelna' rii rek avah perthlet pthi lamda ungta mduh ki buwjaar avah tirthli thuh jaarteng lamda. Ungta arkuwng avah truwnpii biing daam ktong thah vanthap thang lamda.
44027041	Pdainu truwnpii knii kurdutna' kat thung ngi mmaan nih arkuwng avah mdovantha dok inni dulti nowr lamda. Ungta dii thung ngi ktuwr rih ka'am sitphui 'leenni mduh ki mpowiyi nowrda ava' thuh kakna pchaang kmah ngi kmen chda. Pdainu mdilpang ki avah diinuk ki kdungreen nih mdoknow leiyi, kui chda.
44027042	'Tunnu raalmii rek ava ngi rowngmii rekki dii thaplam donni mchen chaakmana' raan ki thenni rowngmii rek avah te'eyow dok rah kdi ngi kerseel lamda.
44027043	Pdainu raalmii arja khat kpu ava ngi Paul tsan rah mdobin leiyi, mmaan dobin avah ptlot lam mda. Ungta mma ngi, dii kthap pchaang khimkheiyi rukri truwnpii thuh tlada laan mdophaak chaakna' rah dii kthap krow rah tidit ki paupiik pii lamda.
44027044	Ungta morson rek arkuwng 'leenni ka'am daat rekki aangqhe ngi kowmphel 'leen, ungta aangqhe ngi arkuwng kqiik 'leenni vanthap lamda. Ungta hanto' heppi mmaan mkheng inni kuhuwiyi laan phasap lamda.
44028001	Ungta mmaan nih kerthlet lamda laan mtlunsap dokin dilli diiloipaam avah Malta, mdit, tidit avah deirow lamda.
44028002	Ungta mpaam ava' thung ki mii rekki kdung ngi plungnee mtedet chaanda. Mmaan nih neen khimkhei avah kqha ngi marlaang chaanda ungta khu mrat le' mdaipa ava' leiyi mmaan nih mei mtlotpiik inda.
44028003	Ungta Paul lih krom'kram pahampokda mei thuh bungda. Ungta mei dosat tih mukrupum pruwl khat thuwkda Paul avah mkhut thah pkeida m'leen nih popmerda.
44028004	Ungta mpaam ava' thung ki mii rekki mkhut 'leenni pruwl kokthowi daat mdehn thungta mmaan nih msingreelin thung ngi hanto' the lamda: “Hava' mii avah mii ke'eyou mun rah, mma ngi truwnpii thungki chen chleek yoso mrinmana' rah kindit ava ngi mrin rang avah rotpiik meh,” dilamda.
44028005	Pdainu mma ngi pruwl avah mei thuh kqhik pthida ungta mdakka dow khatleh the mda.
44028006	Anto'daat yoso mmaan nih mma' avah tirthling luwidon, mditmata m'tunkat daat tih tluw donni kdiyou chrah tidit tih mdobinin. Pdainu mmaan nih mpha rowiksowt tih msutpqowiyin dilli ungta mma' 'leenni mkarmana' dow khatleh mdehmaan thungta muplungbinin avah perthleng lamda ungta ‘mma' avah Isowr khat tah,’ dilamda.
44028007	'Tunnu paamklek ava' thung ngi khu kruwng, mmiing Publias mdoditin, ava' loupaam khat avah mmun ava'arveel lih ka'am. Neenna mma ngi muptlung chaanda ungta niikdum thung ngi mhin nih mpa'am chaanda.
44028008	Mthungta hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah Publias pa avah riiphaak le' powisen nih kowida iip chdaatda. Paul lih mma' avah ksuw rah vangluwtda ungta mma ngi rinmaktham chaak dilli, m'leen nih mkhut mikniing ngi pnenda ungta mma' avah pdamda.
44028009	Ungta mma ngi hava' mtlot thungta diiloipaam ava' thuh omlai tongda kkowi mii morson rek rukka Paul hinni thleng lamda ungta mma ngi mmaan avah pdam chlamda.
44028010	Ungta mmaan nih m'lam knempok 'leenni neen avah kdung ngi makyat chaanda, Ungta neen nih veikhat kthap rah kkorthlonin thungta mmaan nih neenki kikriin rekin mkheng avah mpii chaanda.
44028011	Thla kdum dilthah neen nih ava' diiloipaam thung ngi phalbi danda ka'am daat Alekjendria ki arkuwngpii, mluwchai 'knii kpu unau kinphiir Kastar le' Pollaks mdoditin 'leenni kal innu truwnpii thuh tlanowl innu.
44028012	Ungta neen nih Sairakas tidit diiloipaam thuh laan kal innu, ava' thuh niikdum kcheeng innu.
44028013	Ava' thung ki ngi neen nih purkul innu kvanin ava ngi Rhegiam khuwpii tlung innu. Ungta mupduknii vah kurduh ki tirthli raangda ungta ava ngi neen nih mkorjownnit ava' thung ngi Puteoli khuwpii tlung innu.
44028014	Ungta ava' thung ngi neen nih unau rek kurdutqhiin nuh, ungta mmaan nih neen avah nii tikhiu ka'amna' raanni mo'own chaanda. Ungta audilli neen nih Rome khuwpii ktong thah chet innu.
44028015	Ungta ava' thung ki unau rekki neen ktlunin marjaakin thungta, mmaan nih Appii mdoditin kyurkren mun le' Miitlun'inn kdum ava' kpha kla ngi neen mukduh raan arju lamda. Paul lih mmaan mdeh thungta Isowr panpaak chda ungta arda prow chda.
44028016	'Tunnu neen nih Rome khuwpii ktlunin thungta, raalmii arja khat kpu ava ngi rowngmii rek avah raalmii luwksu ava' hinni parlaan pthi lamda. Pdainu mma ngi Paul avah mthina ngi ma'am rah rotpiikda ungta mmah raalmii khat tih rungda.
44028017	Ungta 'tunnu hanto' thuwkda, tidit tah niikdum dilthah Paul lih Jihudi rekki luwksu rek avah own purkuwk lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mkurku dokin thungta mma ngi mmaan hinni hanto'theda: “Mii rek, ungta ku'uknau rek, neiyi neenki nmii rek kepteng ngi mditmata npu'leen ki nowpa kepteng ngi karmak dow khatleh ruk tlowmaang. Pdainu Jihudi rekki Jerusalem khuwpii ki rowngmii khat tih Rome mii rek hinni neiya mparlaan lamda.
44028018	Pdainu mmaan nih metperteel lam thungta tidina' krow ngi kdoparma kraal mdophan maan leiyi, tapthlat rah mbin lamda.
44028019	Pdainu Jihudi rekki motrotma lam thungta, ava ngi neiya Siijar hinni pau mapnaakda. Pdainu neiyi havah kmii rek 'leenni mraalin kdopiik lamna' pemeh.
44028020	Mlei hava' leiyi neiyi naan avah adoko'own chaakin. Mleiya neiyi naan avah adokdeh nuwm chaakin ungta naan ahin nih pau kdosaam nuwm. Mleiya Isreel mii rekki plungbinpsuk ava'leiyi neiya hava' thiirrii ngi mdotbowl.”
44028021	Ungta mmaan nih mhin nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih nang aleiyi, Judia paamkuwl ki paukjit khadaat ruk phang maanring. Ungta ava' ki karhang unau rek kuwkhat leh rukku dow khatleh thelam meh, mditmata nang aqhatmana' mdosonin ruk ka'am pemeh.
44028022	Pdainu neen nih nang ngi talu abinna tidit avah nang adak kat hinki tarjaak rah kbin inna. Mleiya neen nih hava'lop ava'leiyi mmun ktai thung ngi mii rekki ava' kepteng ngi mdotheen karjaakin.”
44028023	Ungta mmaan nih mma' thenni nit khat mdopelreen dokin nit ava' thung ngi mmaan nih mii knempok ki mma' tlunna' mun ava' thung ngi thleng lamda. Ungta mma ngi jiingsun ki ngi kluw kphadek ki Isowr kruwngpaalna' ava' ki mlei avah kinditjik ki pandang chda. Ungta mma ngi mii rek hinni Jisu ki mlei avah Moses nowlam le' khulpu rek dokjit thungki ngi mii rek tupnuwm chaakna ngi pau chda.
44028024	Ungta mma ngi mdothe dow rek ava ngi mii aangqhe rek avah pnuwm chlamda pdainu morson aangqhe rekvah lam'rin chlam mda.
44028025	Ungta mmaan nih, msingreelin thung ngi mkolrotmaan thungta sun chlamda. Pdainu msun dok duhn nih Paul lih mmaan hinni mqutna' Paulam khat avah hanto'theda: “Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mkindit avah npu'leen hinni khulpu Isaiah nehr thung ngi hanto' thepiik lamda.
44028026	Nang ngi ichet rang ngi, hava' mii rek hinni hanto' athe: ‘ ‘Naan nih tarjaakka arja naandi' pdainu deipindih nimaan tih ungta amik innu tedeh a deinaandi' pdainu deipchuk nimaan tih.
44028027	Mleiya hava' mii rekki plungchai avah kepneel kcha' a. Makna rekin avah kthaluwi kcha' a. Ungta mmik rekin avah mipjiin pthidok inna. Mditma tlaang bih, mmaan nih mmikin nih dei lamdon, Ungta makna rek inni arja chlamdon ungta muplungchai rek inni kdeipindih thuh chdok lamrah. Ungta mmaan nih kihin nih kerheel chlamdon, Neiyi mmaan avah pdam thuh doklam nikdi',’ dida. (Is. 6:9-10)
44028028	Avaleiyi, neiyi Isowr rih tkirliinna' avah Chaatktlei rek hinni mapthlat dok a ungta mmaan nih avah karja lamrah, tidit avah naan nih adodeh chaakin ikurthuwkso.”
44028029	Ungta mma ngi hava' pau mthe dok dilli Jihudi rekka sun chlamda. Ungta marlak inni klin nih tkerteenna' khat thuwk chda.
44028030	Audilli Paul lih mi'inn, mkhonpum ava' thung ngi kum 'knii amda ungta mma ngi mhin nih kthleng kcha' mkheng rek avah arlaang chlamda.
44028031	Ungta mma ngi kumtluwn nih Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki mlei ava' parjaamda ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki mlei avah changkarngam mih purchuk chlamda ungta kuwkhat leh ngi mma' avah pkhaan meh.
45001001	Jisu Khrista ki suwk Paul neiya Isowr ki kqhapaumin thung ngi mpenje dok chda tamsi khat kurthuwk rang ngi mo'own dok chda.
45001002	Mma ngi havah Mma' khulpu ar'aang ngi mduduh ngi ngi Kchiir laika rek thung ngi pau mdoreel dok ksa.
45001003	Mleiya dultimii nowpa ngi, David rilam thungki kqou Mma' Chapa, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ava'leiyi paureel avah mdoreel dok.
45001004	Ungta tchiirna' ki Pthla ava' dilkqowiyi kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' ava ngi Mma' avah ruhtan tu' kilqhi ngi Isowr Chapa tidit tih mdopurphuwn dok ksa.
45001005	Mma' ar'aang ngi ungta Mma' miing ki thenni lamrin thung ngi tethe kopqowi tkurthuhna' raan ki thenni chaat rek arlak ki plungnee le' tamsi tkurthuhna' avah neen nih tarlaan chaak dokin.
45001006	Mmaan arlak ki naan rukka Jisu Khrista do'own dok rekin ptih.
45001007	Rome thung ngi ka'am miikenje rek rang ngi mdo'own dok, Isowr vonsat low rek mkheng hinni: N'paan Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan akhengin 'leenni i'amso!
45001008	Rukrirep pih naan akhengin ki thenni, Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi neiki Isowr avah kpanpaak chaak a. Mleiya naanki alamrinin avah dultipaam mkheng thung ngi mii rekki mthe inna.
45001009	Mleiya neiyi kuplung kluwt tih Mchapa ki kqhapaumin thung ngi sopkdolow chaak Isowr ava ngi neiki ksakhi. Mleiya kdet liit kmah mpha ktaiyi neiyi krinkthamna' rek thung ngi naan avah adokbin phaak tlit chaakin.
45001010	Mleiya, 'tunnu talutalu yoso, Isowr plungbin nih naan ahin nih kthlen pchaanna' rah krinktham chaakna' thung ngi kaktham kcha' ping.
45001011	Mleiya naan apqhan chaakna' raan ki thenni neiyi naan ahin nih pthla 'lam ki chla mruk adokpiik chaakna' raanni, neiyi naan avah adokdeh nuwm chaakin.
45001012	Mleiya havah neen nih khat le' khat ki nlamrin chaak sapin ava ngi nei rukka naan tu' mdotoksow chaakna' rang ki then.
45001013	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, naan nih hava' adodehma raan avah ngei maang. Mleiya neiyi Chaatktlei rek hinki kdo'arkun heppi naan ahinki mchei mruk turkun chaak rah kdongei. Mleiya neiyi naan ahin nih kthlenna' rang thina' kdotlot, pdainu tunkpha ngi mtapkhaan tlit daat a.
45001014	Neiya Grik rek hinni ungta Grik kma' rek hin rukku ungta kinrit mii rek hin rukku ungta kinrit kma' rek hin rukku lei kervei kcha' khat ping.
45001015	Ava ngi mlei kurthuwkda, Rome khuwpii thung ngi ka'am naan ahinin rukku kqhapaumin avah tparjaam rah kdobin chaak.
45001016	Mleiya neiya Khrista ki kqhapaumin ki thennu kningkyak meh. Mleiya havah lamkrin kcha' khimkhei rekki thenni, rukrirep pih Jihudi mii rek thenni ungta Grik rekki then rukku tkirliinna' kpii Isowr ruhtan ava'.
45001017	Mleiya kqhapaumin thung ngi Isowr ki rinkinditna' avah lamrin ki ngi lamrin thuh kurphuwng dok. Hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Mii kindit avah mlamrin nih kring chrah.” (Hab. 2:4)
45001018	'Tunnu rinkinditmana' ava ngi kindit knamdowl, rinko'owi kma' ungta mrinkindit kma' mii mkheng rek 'leenni Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah parvaan ki ngi mdo'arjuk purphuwn dok.
45001019	Mleiya mmaan hinni Isowr ki mlei tedehna' rek avah tpandan dok ksa, tidit tah Isowr rih mmaan hinni avah mdotedet doklam.
45001020	Mleiya mik ki tedehma Mma' laarruhtanna' avah dultipaam mpurthuh daat ki kupqhun nih kindit chelli nmik inni tedeh dokin. Mma ngi mdopurthuh dow rek ava ngi ungta Mma' ki ktlangknai kma' ruhtan le' Isowr mkurthuhna' ava ngi tedehpindit chaak dokin. Avaleiyi, mmaan nah mkerthlenna' raan m'lam ammeh.
45001021	Mleiya mmaan nih Isowr tidit deilam yoso, mmaan nih Mma' avah Isowr heppi ponlor chlammeh mditmata tpanpaak ruk panpaak chlammeh. Pdainu mmaan nih muplungbin rekin thung ngi msit ktaak kurthuwk chlamda ungta mmaan ki kokmok kcha' muplung rekin avah kjiing kcha'.
45001022	Mmaan nih kinrit dotlot mdotlotin ava ngi kokmok kcha'lam.
45001023	Ungta kqop kma' rang Isowr konlorna' avah kqop chrang dultimii ungta pva rek ungta mkhuh pliipum saa rek ungta mpowiyi kondowtda kchet rek pthla khat tung ngi perthleng lamda.
45001024	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mdaksaan avah msingreelin thung ngi mkaryat chaakmana' raan Isowr rih totborna', daksa ngi kdung ngi mdongei rek avah mdopiik lam.
45001025	Mmaan ava ngi Isowr ki kindit avah pleinee tu' perthleng lamda. Ungta ktlangknai kmah ngi tpanpaak ki ka'am Mikpurthuh kcha' ava' kchang ngi khut purthuh ava' luwbuk lamda ungta soplow chlamda.
45001026	Mleiya hava' leiyi Isowr rih mmaan hinni daksa ngi kdung ngi tngeina' avah mdopiik lam. Mleiya mmaan ki snu rek kpha rukku mnowpa ki rilam avah nowpa kma' rilam tu' mdoperthlen in.
45001027	Anto'hep daat nowl lih pselpa rek rukku mnowpa dilkqowiyi snu tu' rilam ma'amin mapthi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih pselpa le' pselpa msingreelin thung ngi daksa dongeiyi ningkyana'si ava ngi kparka kcha'lam. Ungta mmaan nih mdoparmaan ki mraalin suwkthuhna' ka'am daat avah mdak inni mdo'arlaan chaakin.
45001028	Ungta mmaan nih Isowr avah mmaan ki tedeh pinditna' thung ngi mdothiik nuwmmaan leiyi, Mma ngi mmaan hinni totlotma rang nong rek ava' totlotna' rang ki thenni plungbin dak kma' mdotipbin lam.
45001029	Mmaan nih mdakin avah rinkinditmana' mkheng 'leen, jowltpurjutna', tkerteenna', tpunjuwrna', mii te'eyowna', ker'ei kalrai, mrilpum mih tkurhuwnna', miiqhatmana' plungbin hava'le' ava ngi kdim kcha'lam.
45001030	Ungta mmaan nah miikhow kthe kcha' rek, Isowr kikthitna' rek, plung kthidei, kpirlin kcha' mii, kpirlinda kpaumii, kqha kma' kupthuwk mii, ungta mnuhmpa kopqowi kma' mii reklam.
45001031	Mmaan nah kokmok rek ungta lam trinphuma mii reklam. Mmaan nah vonsat kthlowi kma', koptlot piikdei kma' ungta muplungnee ktaak reklam.
45001032	Mmaan nih Isowr ki mrinkindit paureen, tidit tah hava'hep dow rek ava' ktlow mmaan avah mdiyow ki mtik kcha, tidit mdodehn. Pdainu mmaan nih mdotlot daatin ungta ava' daat kmah ngi avale' ktlow mii rek avah mmaan nih mdorot piikin.
45002001	Avaleiyi, miikhat 'leenni paukpindit, O dultimii, kuwku yow tih, nang nga akerthlena' rah m'lam amvot meh. Mleiya mii morson khat 'leenni paukpindit nang ngi athina kpursul kcha' imptih.
45002002	Pdainu neen nih ava' hep daat nong ktlow rek 'leenni, Isowr rih kindit ava' dilkqowiyi pau tpinditna' avah mdotlot tidit avah ndehn.
45002003	Ungta nang adak kuh adotlot tlit daat nong ava' hep daat nong ktlow rek mmaan 'leenni paukpindit, O dultimii nang, Isowr rih pau mpindit thung vah nang nga kerthlet chrah kirbin imptih?
45002004	Mditmata nang ngi Mma' plungqhat knemsi avah tuk'asutma mow? Mditmata nang ngi Mma ngi mduh thah mdo'arvandiilna' ungta ksowt tih mdodiildehna' avah tuk'asutma mow? Mditmata nang ngi Isowr plungqhatna' ava ngi plung tperthlenna' thah nang nga adotqhi tidit avah adehma mow?
45002005	Pdainu nang aplung kapchai ungta plung adoperthlen mana' ava ngi nang ngi Isowr plungthit mei kquwng nit ava' ki thenni, athina 'leenni plungthit mei kquwng avah apurtuwl chaak a. Nit ava' thung ngi Isowr rih Mma' ki mrinkindit pau tpinditna' avah kpurphuwng rah.
45002006	Isowr rih: “Mii khimkhei hinni mma' mma' ki mnongtlot chaak dilkqowiyi kpii lamrah.” (Luw. 62:12 Prl. 24:12)
45002007	Tidiil chaak tlittu' kilqhi ngi kqha ktlow kcha' rek ungta tkonlorna' le' takyat chaakna' ungta kqop kma' rang kthlaam kcha' rek mmaan ava' hinni ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah kpii chlam rah.
45002008	Pdainu mthennemna' kthlaam kcha' rek ungta kindit kopqowi kmah ngi rinkinditmana' kopqowi kcha' rek hinni plungthit le' plungthit mei kquwng avah kpiilam rah.
45002009	Tyattraanna' ungta arthli buwkna' avah kqha kma' ktlow tlit daat mii rekki pthlarin khimkhei rek hinni ka'am rah. Hava'le' avah Jihudi rek hinni rukri ngi ka'am rah ungta audilli Grik rek hin rukku ka'am rah.
45002010	Pdainu tkonlorna', takyat chaakna' ungta plungdaina' avah kqha ktlow mii khimkhei rek hinni ka'am rah. Hava'le' avah Jihudi rek hinni rukri ngi ka'am rah ungta audilli Grik rek hin rukku ka'am rah.
45002011	Mleiya Isowr rih mii avah mmikmai mdosut pemeh.
45002012	Mleiya nowlam tuksutmana' thung ngi pnu kervei kcha' rek avah nowlam tuksutmana' thung ngi kkenvei chlam rah. Ungta nowlam thung ngi pnu kervei kcha' rek avah nowlam ava ngi m'leenin nih paukpindit rah.
45002013	Mleiya Isowr miksut thung vah, nowlam avah tarjaak hehe ngi karja kcha' rek mmaan avah mrinkindit pemeh pdainu nowlam avah mnong ngi ktlow kcha' rek mmaan avah kpindit chlam rah.
45002014	Mleiya nowlam kthlowi kma' Chaatktlei rekki mnowpaan nih nowlam thung ngi ka'am rek ava' mtlotin thung ngi, mmaan nih nowlam thlowilam myoso, ava ngi mmaan thung ngi nowlam khat kurthuwk chda.
45002015	Ava' hep mii rek ava ngi Isowr rih nowlam ki nong avah mmaan plungchai rek thung ngi mikjitta tidit mdopdeh lam. Ungta muplungrildehn rukku avah sakhi mdopiik. Ungta muplungbin rekin ava ngi mmaan avah marlakniu kpursul lamda ungta marlakniu kperthlet chlamda.
45002016	Mleiya Pau tpinditna' nit khat ka'am rah, Isowr rih dultimii rekki tuprut nong rek avah Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi pau mpindit rang thung vah, neiyi kdoparjaam kqhapaumin ki dilkqowiyi paukpindit rah.
45002017	Asuwn, nang nga Jihudi khat kirdi kcha' ptih ungta nowlam 'leenni kikbiu kcha' ptih. Ungta Isowr hinni kpirlin kcha' ptih.
45002018	Ungta nang ngi Mma' plungbin avah adodeh ungta nowlam thungki akurchuh chaak leiyi, nang ngi makqhasi dow rek avah adorot chaak dok.
45002019	Ungta nang adak kat avah mmikktot kqhi kcha' khat ptih ungta kjiingnu thung ngi ka'am kcha' rek thenni mar'aang khat ptih tidit avah adak ki kindit tih adodeh.
45002020	Nang nga kokmok rekki kpurchuk kcha' khat ptih. Nang ngi nowlam thungki tedeh pinditna' mrit ungta kindit ki mrit avah adodeh.
45002021	Avaleiyi, mii morson kpurchuk nang ngi taluleiyi adak athina kpurchuk mti? Kuprunong totlot rang pemeh, dida kparjaam nang nga kuprungaal ptimow?
45002022	Lowsang qhimaan, dida kthe nang nga lowsang kqhingaal ptimow? Dow pthla rek kahal kcha' nang nga dow pthla luwbuk'inn kukruwl ngaal ptimow?
45002023	Nowlam leiyi, kpirlin kcha' nang nga nowlam adopkuiyi Isowr akyatma ngaal mow?
45002024	Mleiya, hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Naan aleiyi Chaatktlei rek arlak ki, Isowr miing 'leenni pthitda kpau dok ka'am lam.” (Is. 52:5 Ejk. 36:22)
45002025	Mleiya nang ngi nowlam apqowibi, vuntreenna' avah msit ka'am a, pdainu nang ngi nowlam kupkui khat akurthuh bih, nang ngi vun'adoreen avah vuntreenma kurthuwk kcha' a.
45002026	Avaleiyi, vunkreen kma' kuwmiikhat tih nowlam ki mrinkinditsi ava' mopqowi chaakku, mma' ki vuntreenmana' avah vuntreen nih tai nimeh mow?
45002027	Ungta mnowpa ngi vunkreen kma' miikhat tih nowlam avah mpurkhum chaakku, nowlam ki mqutna' pauna kpha kthlowi kcha' ungta vunkreen kcha' naan avah, nowlam kupkui inptih, tidit tih a'leenin nih pau tpindit nimeh mow?
45002028	Mleiya mduwn thang daat tih Jihudi kurthuwk mma' avah Jihudi dakdak pemeh. Mditmata mduwn thang daat ki, daksa 'leenni vunkreen mma' avah vunkreen dakdak pemeh.
45002029	Pdainu mthung thang ngi Jihudi kurthuwk mma' avah Jihudi dakdak. Ungta vunkreen avah muplung thung ngi mdoreen ungta mapthla thung ngi mdoreen, nowlam ki pauna ngi mdoreen pemeh. Jihudi dakdak avah mii rekki mdopanpaak ava' pemeh pdainu Isowr rih mdopanpaak ava'.
45003001	Mdittu' Jihudi rekki talu changqhatna' mthlowi inna? Mditmata vunkreen nih talu msit amna' ka'am a?
45003002	Dow khimkhei 'leenni klinsi ngi, mkhatna' thung ngi Isowr rih Mma' ki pauna rek avah mmaan dokilrinqhi chaak rang ngi mdopiik lam.
45003003	Mdittu' aangqhe ngi lammrinma'u talu? Mmaan lamrinma ava ngi Isowr ki trin chaakna' avah msit ktaak kpurthuh rang?
45003004	Anto'liit rang pemeh! Dakat tih, Isowr rah kindit ungta mii khimkhei avah pleiknei. Hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Mleiya nang nga apauthe rek ava ngi kindit chrang ptih. Ungta a'leen nih mii rekki pau mpindit dilli, nang ngi kapchaang kcha' krow ptih.” (Luw. 51:4)
45003005	Pdainu neenki nrinkindit mana' ava ngi Isowr rinkinditna' mtedet tu', talu tethe raan? Isowr rih n'leenin nih muplungthit mei kquwng mitpiikin thung ngi neen nih Mma' avah mrinkindit meh, tidit raan ? Neiyi havah dultimii khat tih kthe'a.
45003006	Immeh, Anto'liit rang pemeh! Mleiya anto' mkurthuh u, taluhep pih Isowr vah, dultipaam 'leenni paukpindit rang ngoh?
45003007	Mleiya nei kepleinee ava ngi Isowr ki kindit avah Mma' konlorna' mkerkheel thang setset tu', taluleiyi neiya tunkpha thung ngi pnu kervei khat tidit tih mdotupsul o?
45003008	Ungta taluleiyi “kqha mthuhna' rang ki thenni kqha kma' itlown cheh,” tiditma raanno? Mleiya mii aangqhe ngi titii mnee psukinda ungta ‘Anto' adotheen,’ midiinda. Ungta Isowr rih mmaan mdopsul lam avah mkindit kat.
45003009	Mdittu' talu? Neenna mmaan hinni kqhabet inpmin mow? Immeh, anto'liit pemeh! Mleiya neen nih choduduh ngi Jihudi rek ruk ungta Grik rek ruk, mkheng kheng inni pnu kurduh ngi ka'am kcha'lam, tidit dokin.
45003010	Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Mrinkindit khatleh ammeh, khadaat ruk ammeh.
45003011	Kdeipindih kcha' khatleh ruk ammeh. Isowr kthlaam kcha' khadaat ruk ammeh.
45003012	Mii mkheng ngi 'lamleh mqowi chaakter'a, Mii mkheng ngi msit ktaak kurthuwk kcha' a. Kqha ktlow khatleh ammeh, khadaat ruk ammeh. (Luw. 14:1-3, 53:1-3 Pkj. 7:20)
45003013	Mmaan to'or rek avah kpurhuk kcha' thlaan rek hep daat kurthuwk kcha'lam a, Meplei rek inni mii huwng chlamda. (Luw. 5:9) Mnehrkowngin 'leenni, Pruwldowi ka'am kcha' a. (Luw. 140:3)
45003014	Mnehrin thung ngi pauhor le' paukkha tethena ngi kdim kcha' a. (Luw. 10:7)
45003015	Hii tupbuwkna' rang ki thenni mkhuhn nah kyaang.
45003016	Te'ekrena' le' ningqitna ngi m'lam inna kdim kcha'.
45003017	Ungta plung kdai 'lam avah mdodeh pindit in pemeh. (Is. 59:7-8)
45003018	Mmaan miksut thung ngu Isowr tqit chaakna' ka'am pemeh.” (Luw. 36:1)
45003019	'Tunnu nehr khimkhei mkarngat chaakna' ungta dultipaam mkheng ngi Isowr aang ngi kparmak mkurthuh chaakna' rah nowlam mih mdothe khimkhei avah nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am mii rek hinni mdothe tidit avah neen nih ndehn a.
45003020	Avaleiyi, Mma' miksut thung ngi dultimii kuwkhat leh rukka nowlam dotlot thung ngi tpindit nimeh. Mleiya nowlam avah pnu tidit tedeh pinditna' ngaal.
45003021	Pdainu 'tunnu Nowlam thungki kma' Isowr hinki rinkinditna' avah kandangda ungta avaleiyi Nowlam mih ungta Khulpu rek rukku sakhi mdopiikin.
45003022	Mleiya Isowr hinki rinkinditna' avah mii mkheng hinni ungta lamkrin kcha' mii mkheng rek 'leenni Jisu Khrista hinni lamkrin kcha' ar'aang ngi kurjung. Mleiya mkertleina' ka'am pemeh.
45003023	Mleiya mii mkheng ngi pnu arvei chda ungta Isowr ki konlorna' avah mdoptham chaak.
45003024	Isowr rih Mma' plungnee ngi Khrista Jisu doktlanna' ar'aang ngi mmaan nah pindit chlamda.
45003025	Isowr rih Mma' hii thung ngi lamrin ki ar'aang ngi, Mma' avah Isowr plung kapngam rintparlaan khat kurthuwk ki parlaan chda. Mleiya Mma ngi hava' mdotlot ava ngi Mma' rinkinditna' avah pandangda. Mleiya Isowr rih choduh ki terveen pnu avah, Mma' ki mduh tidiildehna' ava ngi arvan taplaan piikda.
45003026	Mma ngi hava' mdotlot ava ngi 'tun kpha thung rukku Mma' ki rinkinditna' avah kandang a. Mleiya Isowr rah kindit ungta kpindit kcha' khat ava ngi Jisu hinki lamrin ar'aang ngi mdopindit.
45003027	Mdittu', tpirlin chaakna' rang talu thuh ka'am a? Tpirlin chaakna' rah ka'am liit pemeh. Talu nowlam mih havah markam a? Mmow, miikhat nongtlot ava ngi markam a? Immeh, pdainu havah lamrin ki nowlam mih havah mdo'arkam.
45003028	Avaleiyi, neen nih hanto ngi tupqutin, tidit tah Isowr rih miikhat avah nowlam dotlot thungki kma' lamrin nih mdopindit.
45003029	Mditmata Mma' avah Jihudi rek chrelki Isowr daat mow? Mma' avah Chaatktlei rekki Isowr ruk pemeh mow? Ou, Mma' avah Chaatktlei rekki ruk Isowr.
45003030	Mleiya Isowr khadaat ma'am leiyi, vunkreen rek avah lamrin nih ungta vunkreen kma' rek ava'ruk lamrin ava' ar'aang ngi kpindit rah.
45003031	Mdittu' neen nih nowlam avah lamrin leiyi, msit ktaak tpurthuh raan? Immeh, anto'liit rang pemeh. Ava' kchang ngi neen nih nowlam avah mruhtaptan qhak thangin.
45004001	Mdittu' dultimii nowpa ki n'paan Abraham ava' vah daksa lam ki dilkqowi vah talu mphaan chaak a, tidit raanno?
45004002	Mleiya Abraham avah nongtlot tih mpindit chaak bih, mma ngi mpirlin chaakna' rah mruk ka'am a, pdainu Isowr aang pemeh.
45004003	Pdainu Kchiir laika ngi talu mthe? “Abraham mih Isowr lamrin chda, Ungta mma' hinni avah rinkinditna' ngi taipiikda,” mdit. (Rnp. 15:6)
45004004	'Tunnu miikhat nongtlotna' arda avah plungnee khat tih mii ngi taimeh pdainu avah leenleiyi mdotai.
45004005	Pdainu rinko'owi kma' rek kpindit piik kcha' Mma' ava ngi, nong nga ktlow kma' pdainu Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' mma' lamrin avah rinkinditna' thung ngi taipiikda.
45004006	David rukku anto'hep daat tih hanto ngi theda: Isowr rih nongtlotna' kma' rinkinditna' ava ngi mdotai piik chaak mma' avah msuwkqha'a, dida.
45004007	David tih hanto ngi theda: “Nowlam tukksut kma' rek mdoptlot piik, Ungta mupnu arve rek mdopkhum piik mii rek avah msuwkin kqha'a.
45004008	Kruwng ngi m'leen nih pnu mdotai piikmah rang, Mii avah msuwk kqha'a,” dida. (Luw. 32:1-2)
45004009	Mdittu' suwqhatna' avah vunkreen kcha' rek then daat mow? Mditmata vunkreen kma' rek then rukko? Mleiya neen nih, Abraham thenni lamrin avah rinkinditna' ngi taipiikda, tiditin.
45004010	Mdittu' avah taluhep pih mdotai piikko? Mleiya mma ngi vunmreen arlaan mow, mditmata vunmreenma arlaanno? Avah mma ngi vunmreendil pemeh pdainu mma ngi vunmreenduh ngi mdotai piikdok.
45004011	Mma ngi vuntreenna' avah titinna' khat tih mdo'arlaan chaak. Mma ngi lamrin nih vuntreenna' avah rinkinditna' ki kbihjiik khat tih mdo'arlaan. Mleiya mma ngi vuntreenna' ava' marlaanduh ngi lamrin avah mdothlowi chaak dok. Mleiya mmaan nih vuntreenna' arlaang mlam yoso mmah lamkrin kcha' rek mkheng ki mpa. Ungta mmaan nih lammrin chaakin thungta Isowr rih rinkinditna' thung ngi mmaan nah mdotai chaak lam.
45004012	Abraham a vunkreen kcha' rek daat ki mpa pemeh. Pdainu neenki n'paan Abraham lamrinna' khuhther thung ngi kchet kcha' rek mmaan then rukku mma' avah mpa kurthuwk. Mleiya vuntreenna' marlaan duduh ngi hava' lamrin avah mma ngi mdothlowi chaak dok.
45004013	Mleiya Abraham le' mnaumsuwn rekki dultipaam ki alroukchom mii mkurthuhna' raan ki paureel mdo'arlaanin avah nowlam ar'aang pemeh pdainu lamrin ki rinkinditna' ar'aang ngi mdo'arlaan chaakin.
45004014	Mleiya nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am kcha' rekki alroukchom rek mkurthuhn bih, lamrinna' avah msit ammeh ungta paureel ava' rukka msit ktaakpa kurthuwk kcha' a.
45004015	Mleiya nowlam mih plungthit mdopthuh, tidit tah nowlam ammana' thung ngi nowlam kupkui ruk ka'am pemeh.
45004016	Avaleiyi, plungnee dilkqowiyi mkurthuhna' rah lamrin ar'aang ngi paureel avah kurjung. Mleiya havah nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am rek daat kma' Abraham lamrinna' thung ngi ka'am kcha' rek mmaan hin rukku paureel ava ngi nausuwn mkheng rek 'leenni kertlei ktaak ki mkurthuhna' rang ki then. Mleiya Abraham avah neen nkhengin ki n'paan.
45004017	Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Neiyi nang nga chaat knempok rekki mpa adokpurthuh dok.” (Rnp. 17:5) Mleiya mma' lamrin chaak Isowr miksut thung ngi mma' avah neen npa kurthuwk dok. Isowr rah kdiyou rek hinni rinkum kpii ungta ka'am kma' dow rek avah ka'am ksadok rek heppi kthe pchaang.
45004018	Abraham mih plungbinpsuk ktaak thung ngi plungbinpsuk tu' lamrin chda. Mthungta ava ngi, mma ngi chaat knempa rekki mpa kurthuwk chda. Mleiya mma' hinni: “Nang asuruwl rekka anto'hepdat rah,” (Rnp. 15:5) dida mdothe heppi thuwkda.
45004019	Ungta mma ngi lamrin 'leenni mdown chaakma ava ngi, mma ngi mdaksa avah kdiyou dok kcha' kluwng khat heppi kerdeida. Mleiya mmah kum arja khat arveel mdophaak chaak dok ungta Sarah vonchowi rang rukka kdiyou kcha' tu' kanpang ngi bin chda.
45004020	Anto'daat yoso mma ngi Isowr paureel avah lamrinma ngi plung kpenqheek tlowmeh. Pdainu mma ngi mlamrin pnetsetda Isowr hinni ponlor chda.
45004021	Ungta mma ngi Isowr rih pau mdoreel dok avah Mma ngi mdotlot pchaan tidit tih knet tih lamrin chda.
45004022	Ungta avaleiyi, ‘mma' hinni havah rinkinditna' thung ngi taipiikda.’ (Rnp. 15:6)
45004023	'Tunnu rinkinditna' thung ngi taipiikda, tidit avah mma' then daat chrel lih mdokjit pemeh.
45004024	Pdainu neen nthenin rukku mdothe. Havah neenki Kruwng Jisu kdiyou thungki kperdel Mma' ava' hinni lamkrin kcha' neen nihin rukku, rinkinditna' ngi miktaipiik raan.
45004025	Isowr rih Jisu avah neen nih tparmaan leiyi, parlaan pthida ungta neen midotpinditna' raan ki thenni kdiyou thungki perdel nowlda.
45005001	Avaleiyi, lamrin nih midotpindit chaak dokin leiyi, neen nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi Isowr tu' plung kdai avah nthlowi chaak inna.
45005002	Ungta Mma' ar'aang ngi neen nih 'tun trin chaakna' meekin plungnee ava' thung ngi lamrin ar'aang ngi tuluw chaakna' lam avah nphan chaak inna. Ungta neen nih Isowr ki konlorna' ava' tbinpsuk chaak inni kanpa kcha' inpimin.
45005003	Ungta ava' daat kma' neen nih tyattraanna' nperteelin thung ngi ava ngi tidiildehna' mdopthuh tidit avah neen nih ndehn a.
45005004	Ungta tidiildehna' ava ngi rinchan kenreel pthuwkda ungta kenreel rinchan nih plungbinpsuk avah mdopthuh.
45005005	'Tunnu plungbinpsuk ava ngi ningkya mipiimeh. Mleiya neen nihin nih midotpiikin Pthla Kchiir ava ngi Isowr vonsat avah neen nuplung rekin thung ngi midotperlei piik dokin.
45005006	Mleiya neen nih nruh kdowng ngi na'am daatin arlaan nih, mphakat thung ngi Khrista ngi rinko'owi kma' mii rekki thenni diyow piikda.
45005007	Mrinkindit kcha' miikhat kchang ngi, kuwmiikhat tih kdiyowpiik daat tidit tah amchuchu meh. Miikqha khat ki thennu kuwmiikhat tih kdiyowpiik daat ruk krow.
45005008	Pdainu Isowr rih neen nihin nih vonsat avah hanto ngi mitedet inda. Mleiya neen nih pnu nerve chaak meekin arlaan nih Khrista ngi neen nakchang inni diyouda.
45005009	Ava' han'tun nih Isowr rih neen avah Khrista ki hii ava' ar'aang ngi midotpindit chaak dokin leiyi, Mma' ar'aang ngi plungthit mei kquwng thungki neenna miksan chraan.
45005010	Mleiya neenna miihal kurthuwk chdaat yomin, Mma' Chapa diyow ava' ar'aang ngi Isowr tu' mipalqhat inda. Ava' han'tun nih midotpalqhat dokin ava ngi, Mchapa rinkum mih neenna miksan chraan.
45005011	Ungta anto'daat mda, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi neenna Isowr hinni tpirlin chaak raan. Mma' ar'aang ngi 'tunnu neenna tkalqhatna' avah tarlaan chaak dokin.
45005012	Avaleiyi, miikhat leiyi, dultipaam thung ngi pnu mluw chaakku ungta pnu leiyi, kdiyou ma'am chaak heppi, mii mkheng 'leenni kdiyou avah arvang chda. Mleiya mii mkheng ngi pnu mdo'arve chaak.
45005013	Mleiya nowlam mpiikduduh ngi pnu avah dultipaam thung ngi ka'am dok kcha'. Pdainu nowlam ma'amma thung ngu pnu avah taipiik meh.
45005014	Pdainu Adam ki kupqhun nih Moses arvankpha thung ngi kdiyou ava ngi arvankpaal kcha'. Ungta kdiyou ava ngi Adam nowlam pkui heppi, pnu kervei kma' kpha rek 'leen rukku arvanpaal chda. Adam avah karvang rang Mma' ava' hep daat khat tih ka'am kcha'.
45005015	Pdainu mkhon ktaak chla avah tparmana' ava'lu pemeh. Mleiya miikhat doparmah ava ngi mii knempok eyouda. Pdainu ava' han'tun nih Isowr ki plungnee ungta Miikhat, tidit tah Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ki chla ava ngi mii knempok 'leenni ptlon piikda.
45005016	Ungta chla avah pnu kervei miikhat leiyi, karvang ava'lu pemeh. Mleiya miikhat ki nowlam pkuina' thungki karvang dok pau tpinditna' ava ngi tupsulna' pthuwkda. Pdainu nowlam knempok taklaanna' thungki karvang mkhon ktaak chla ava ngi tpindit pikkna’ pthuwkda.
45005017	Mleiya miikhat doparmah ava ngi miikhat ava'leiyi kdiyou ava ngi paal chda. Pdainu ava' han'tun nih Khat ki, tidit tah Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi plungnee kepleet tih karlaang kcha' ungta rinkinditna' ki chla karlaang kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi tya knem mih rinkum thuh kpaal chdaat lam rang ngoh.
45005018	Avaleiyi, miikhat doparmana' ava' ar'aang ngi mii mkheng 'leenni tupsulna' ki pau tpinditna' avah arvangda. Anto' heppi Miikhat ki rinkinditna' nongtlot ava' ar'aang ngi mii mkheng 'leenni tpindit piikda kring rinkum avah karvang.
45005019	Mleiya miikhat pau pqowimana' ava ngi mii knempok avah pnu tperveda, anto' heppi Miikhat pau pqowina' ava ngi mii knempok avah mrinkindit kpurthuh rah.
45005020	Ava' han'tun nih dow kparmak mnemna' rah nowlam avah arvang amda. Pdainu pnu nemna' thung ngi plungnee avah kerkheel setset tih knemthang.
45005021	Mleiya pnu ngi kdiyou thuh mpaal chaak heppi plungnee ava ngi neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum kpii rinkinditna' ava ngi kpaal rah.
45006001	Mdittu' talu tethe raan? Plungnee mnemsetna' rah neen nih pnu thuh ta'am tlit daat raan?
45006002	Immeh, anto'liit rang pemeh! Taluhep pih pnu thuh kdiyou dok neen ava ngi pnu thuh ta'am tlit daat rang?
45006003	Mditmata Khrista hinni dii kluwt dok kcha' neen nkhengin avah Khrista diyowna' thung ngi dii kluwt dok inpimin tidit avah naan nih deimaan timow?
45006004	Avaleiyi, diiluwna' ava ngi neenna Khrista tu' kdiyou thuh mi'alruwl dok inda. Mleiya Pa ava' konlorna' ava ngi kdiyou thungki Khrista mdoperdel heppi, neen rukka rinkum ki ren tkurthuhna' thung ngi tche chaak raan.
45006005	Mleiya neen nih Mma' diyowna' thuh ava' heppi neen rukka Mma' tu' kirchinsap kcha' nkurthuh chaakin bih, kertlei liit kmah ngi neen rukka Mma' rinkerheelna' ava' thung ngi tkirchinsap raan.
45006006	Neen nih havah ndehn tidit tah neen nih pnu suwk'owr tkurthuh porsonmana' raan ki thenni, tidit tah pnu daksa avah msit ktaak tuppthutna' rah neenki miipli avah Mma' tu' kilqhi ngi mdopthowi yowdok.
45006007	Mleiya kdiyou dok kcha' mma' avah pnu thungki ko'ol dok kcha' a.
45006008	'Tunnu neen nih Khrista tu' ndiyow chaak dokin bih, neen rukka Mma' tu' trinsap chaak raan tidit tih lamtrin chaakin.
45006009	Khrista ngi kdiyou thungki mrinkerheel dok leiyi, veikhat ren nih diyou nowl meh tidit avah ndehn. Kdiyou vih Mma' 'leenni tpaalna' ruhtan sin pchaang meh.
45006010	Mleiya Mma ngi mdiyow thung ngi pnu thuh veikhadaat tih kdiyou. Pdainu Mma ngi mrinkerheel thung ngu Isowr hinni kring kerheel kcha'.
45006011	Anto' heppi, naan rukka dakat tih pnu thuh kdiyou dok kchaan ping, pdainu neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu hinni Isowr hinthah kring dok kchaan ping tidit ikerdei chaan.
45006012	Avaleiyi, pnu ngi kdung ngi mdongei kqha kma' ava' adopqowi mana' raan, kdiyou kcha' rang adaksaan thung ngi pnu avah tappaalmaan.
45006013	Naan nih apna rekin avah pnu thuh rinkinditmana' ki khutsinton kurthuwk ki parlaan chmaan. Ava' kchang ngi kdiyou thungki kring kerheel dok kcha' mii rek heppi adak inni apna rekin avah Isowr ki rinkinditna' nongki thenni khutsinton khat kurthuwk ki aparlaan chaan.
45006014	Mleiya naanna nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am inptipmeh pdainu plungqhat kurduh ngi a'amin leiyi, pnu ngi a'leenin nih tpaalna' ruhtan mdosin mdosin rang pemeh.
45006015	Mdittu' talu? Neen nih nowlam kurduh ngi ta'ammaan pdainu plungqhat kurduh ngi ta'amin leiyi, pnu terve tlit raan? Immeh. Anto'liit rang pemeh!
45006016	Naan nih tidina' thah kqhi pnu hin yoso, mditmata rinkinditna' thah kqhi tethe topqowina' hin yoso, akparlaan chaak naan ava' hinni, naanna suwk'owr rekin ptih, tidit avah naan nih deimaan timow?
45006017	Choduh vah naanna pnu suwk'owr rek kurthuwk kcha' inptih. Pdainu Isowr rih tpurchuhna' mdet khat aparlaan inda ungta naan nih ava' tpurchuhna' avah aplungchaiyin mkheng tu' pqowi chaan tinu. Avaleiyi, Isowr rah kdopanpaak chaak.
45006018	Ungta Isowr rih pnu thungki adotperthle chaakin leiyi, naanna rinkinditna' ki suwk'owr rek kurthuwkin imptih.
45006019	Naanki dultimii daksa ruhdown leiyi, neiyi dultimii heppi kpau ping. Mleiya choduh vah naan nih adaksaan ki apna rekin avah totborna' le' nowlam tuksutmana' hinni nowlam tukksut kma'set akurthuhna' raan ki thenni suwk'owr rih kparlaan kchaan ptih. Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih akenjet chaakna' raan ki thenni apna rekin avah rinkinditna' thung ngi suwk'owr rekki ikparlaan chaan.
45006020	Mleiya naan nih pnu thuh suwk'owr rek akurthuh thung innu, rinkinditna' thangvah naanna ko'ol dok kcha' inptih.
45006021	Mdittu' 'tun naan nih ningkya adophaannaan dow rek ava' thung ngi talu mchei adophanin ka'am a? Mleiya ava' dow rekki mqutna' avah tidiyowna'.
45006022	Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih pnu thungki adotperthle chaak dok inni ungta Isowr suwk'owr akurthuh chaak inni tkenjetna' ki mchei avah athlowi chaak inna. Ungta ava' thuh ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah ka'am.
45006023	Mleiya pnu ardaman nah kdiyou pdainu Isowr chla avah neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu hinni ktlangknai kma' rinkum ava'.
45007001	Mditmata, ku'uknau rek naan nih miikhat avah mrin khimkhei thung ngi nowlam mih m'leen nih tpaalna' ruhtan mdosin tlit tidit avah deimaan timow? Neiyi havah nowlam kdei rek 'leenni kpau ping.
45007002	Mleiya mi'innpu ka'am snu khat avah mi'innpu ma'am khimkhei thung ngi nowlam ava ngi mi'innpu 'leenni mdobowl. Pdainu mi'innpu mdiyow dok bih, mma' avah mi'innpu hinki nowlam dobowl thungki kerthlet kcha' a.
45007003	Anto' mkurthuh bih, snu ava ngi mi'innpu mrin daat arlaan nih pselpa ktlok khat hinni inn'mne bih, mma' avah lowsang kqhinu tidit rah. Pdainu mi'innpu mdiyow chaak bih, nowlam ava' thung ki mmah kerthlet dok kcha' a. Mdit bih, mma ngi pselpa ktlok khat hinni inn nei chyoso, mmah lowsang kqhinu kurthuwk nimeh.
45007004	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, naan nih ktlok khat tidit tah, kdiyou thungki mdoperdel dok Mma' ava' hinni inn anee chaakna' raan, Khrista daksa ar'aang ngi naan rukka nowlam thung ngi kdiyou dok kcha' inptih. Mleiya havah Isowr hinni anai chaakna' raan ki then.
45007005	Neen nih daksa nowpa dilkqowiyi na'amin thung vah, daksa ngi kdung ngi mdongei pnu rek ava ngi tidiyowna' ki mchei kepchei rang ngi napna rekin thung ngi nong tlowda. Mleiya daksa ngi kdung ngi mdongei avah nowlam mih mdopandan.
45007006	Pdainu 'tunnu neen mikbowlin ava' thung ngi tidiyow chaakin ava ngi neenna nowlam thungki miktlan dok inda. Mleiya havah neen nih nowlam thungki paukjit rekki nowpa pli ava' kma' Pthla hinni nowpa ren thung ngi soptolow chaakna' raan ki then.
45007007	Mdittu' talu tethe raan? Neen nih nowlam avah pnu pi'ii tidit raan? Anto'liit rang pemeh! Ava' kchang ngi, Neiyi nowlam ma'amma bih pnu avah deipindih nimaang. Mleiya nowlam mih: “Naan nih kraam nimaan tih,” (Mpk. 20:17 Knl. 5:21) mditma bih, neiyi kakraam avah pnu tidit, dei nimaang.
45007008	Pdainu pnu ngi paupiik ava' 'leenni changqhatna' louthida k'leen nih mdetmdet ki kqha kma' tngeina' pthuwkda. Mleiya nowlam ma'amma thung ngu pnu avah kdiyou kcha'.
45007009	Neiya mpha khat thung ngi nowlam ktaak ki arvang kring ping pdainu paupiik ava' marvan thungta pnu avah ring nowlda ungta neiya diyou nuh.
45007010	Ungta rinkum kpii rang paupiik ava ngi tidiyowna' kihin nih mpiida.
45007011	Mleiya pnu ngi paupiik ava' 'leenni changqhatna' louda neiya muhuwng chda ungta ava ngi neiya me'eyouda.
45007012	Avaleiyi, nowlam avah kchiir ungta paupiik avah kchiir ungta mrinkindit ungta kqha.
45007013	Mdittu' kqha tidit ava ngi nei kthen nuh kdiyowna' mupthuh a? Anto'liit pemeh! Pdainu pnu avah pnu tidit kdodehna' rah kqha ava' ar'aang ngi pnu ngi nei kihin nih tidiyowna' avah mdopthuh. Mleiya havah pnu ava ngi paupiik ava' ar'aang ngi kerkheel set tih pnu tervena' mkurthuhna' rang ki then.
45007014	Mleiya neen nih nowlam avah pthla 'lam kqowi, pdainu neiya pnu kervei nowpa thuh ka'am ping ungta ava ngi neiya pnu thuh suwk'owr rih mdotyur chaak tidit ndehn a.
45007015	Mleiya neiyi kdotlot meek avah talu tidit deipindih maang. Mleiya neiyi totlot rah kdongeima ava' kdotlot ungta neiyi kdohal chaakkat ava' kdotlot.
45007016	Pdainu neiyi kdotlot nuwmma ava' ktlot bih, neiyi nowlam avah kqha a tidit kdorot chaak.
45007017	Pdainu 'tunnu ava' ktlow avah nei pemeh, nei kthung ngi ka'am pnu ava ngi mdotlot chaak.
45007018	Mleiya nei kthung ngi 'tidit tah, nei kdaksa thung ngi' kqha khatleh ka'am pemeh. Mleiya kqha totlotna' plungbin avah kihin nih ka'am pdainu ava' totlotna' rang ki lam avah kdophan pchaan pemeh.
45007019	Mleiya kqha totlot rah kdongei avah kdotlot pchaan pemeh pdainu totlot rah kdongeima kqha kma' ava' kdotlot.
45007020	'Tunnu neiyi kdongeima ava' ktlot bih, ava' ktlow tlit avah nei pemeh pdainu nei kthung ngi ka'am pnu ava ngi mdotlot.
45007021	Avaleiyi, neiyi hava' kdeh a, tidit tah neiyi kqha ktlot rang thung ngi kqha kma' nowpa ava ngi kthung ngi nong mdotlot tlit.
45007022	Mleiya nei kthungmii ava' dilkqowiyi neiya Isowr nowlam thung ngi kuplung kngam kcha'.
45007023	Pdainu neiyi kapna rek thung ngi nei kuplungril ptengda karnaakqhi nowlam msik khat kdeh a. Ungta ava' pnu nowlam ava ngi nei kapna rek thung ngi amda neiya rowngmii mupthutda.
45007024	O tya thuh msuwkthi kcha' mii ping neiya! Kuw ngi hava' tidiyowna' daksa thungki mekqen thuh chrangda?
45007025	Neiyi Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi Isowr rah kpanpaak chaak a! Avaleiyi, nei kdaksa ki, kuplungril vah Isowr nowlam soplow chnuh pdainu daksa nowpa vah pnu nowlam avah sopkdolow chaak.
45008001	Avaleiyi, 'tunnu Khrista hinni ka'am rek, daksa 'lam thah kchet kma' rek pdainu Pthla ava' dilkqowiyi kchet rek mmaan 'leenni tupsulna' avah am nimeh.
45008002	Mleiya Khrista Jisu hinni rinkum kpii nowlam ki Pthla ava ngi pnu ki ungta tidiyowna' ki nowlam ava' thung ki neiya mpo'ol chda.
45008003	Mleiya daksa am leiyi nowlam ava ngi dow khatleh tlow pchaang mda, mruhtanna' ammda. Avaleiyi, Isowr rih Mma' Chapa avah pnu kervei arlim mih pnu leiyi, arjuk pthlada. Anto ngi Mma ngi daksa thung ngi pnu avah psulda.
45008004	Mleiya daksa 'lam thah kchet kma' pdainu Pthla ava' dilkqowiyi kchet kcha' neen nthung inni nowlam ki mrinkindit dokriin rek ava' mkurkhumna' rang ki thenni Mchapa avah arjuk pthlada.
45008005	Mleiya daksa 'lam thah kring kcha' rekvah daksa lamki dow rek 'leenni muplungrilin avah mdothiikin. Pdainu Pthla ava' dilkqowiyi kring kcha' rekvah Pthla ava' ki dow rek 'leenni mdothiik chaakin.
45008006	Mleiya daksa 'lam thah kbin kcha' avah tidiyowna' pdainu pthla 'lam thah kbin kcha' avah rinkum ungta plungdaina'.
45008007	Mleiya daksa 'lamki plungril avah Isowr kepteng miihal, tidit tah daksa 'lamki plungril lih Isowr nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am pemeh, mditmata ka'am pchaang pemeh.
45008008	Ava'leiyi, daksa lam thah ka'am rek ava ngi Isowr plung pngam pchaang meh.
45008009	Pdainu naanna pnu nowpa thung ngi ka'amin ptipmeh. Pdainu Isowr Pthla ava ngi naan athung inni dakat tih ma'am leiyi naanna Pthla thuh ka'am kchaan ptih. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih Khrista Pthla ava' mthlowi chaakma bih, mmah Khrista hinki pemeh.
45008010	Ungta Khrista ngi naan athung inni ma'am bih, daksa avah pnu leiyi, kdiyou kcha' a pdainu pthla avah rinkinditna' leiyi, kring kcha' a.
45008011	Isowr rih Jisu a kdiyou thungki perdelda. naan athung inni Isowr Pthla ava' ka'am mkurthuh bih, kdiyou thungki Khrista kperdel Mma' ava ngi, kdiyou chrah adaksa rekin avah mma ngi akipring chraan. Mma ngi havah naan athung inni ka'am, Mma' Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi akipring chraan.
45008012	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek neenna lei kervei kcha' rek inpimin. Pdainu pnu kervei nowpa thung pemeh mditmata neen nih ava' dilkqowiyi trin chaakna' raan ki then pemeh.
45008013	Mleiya naan nih pnu kervei nowpa dilkqowiyi arinin bih, diyou chkat naandi' pdainu naan nih Pthla ava ngi daksa nongtlot avah apdiyow chaakin bih, naanna ring chnaandi’.
45008014	Mleiya Isowr ki Pthla ngi mdoqhi rek mkheng avah Isowr chapa reklam.
45008015	Mleiya naan nih ningqitna' thuh suwk'owr rih ta'amna' rah pthla ado'arlaanin pemeh. Pdainu naan nih chapa ngi adotuhum chaak naanki Pthla avah ado'arlaan chaakin. Pthla ava ngi: “Abba, Apa,” tidit chaak in.
45008016	Pthla Mma'kat ava ngi neenki napthlaan tung ngi, neenna Isowr nau rek inpimin tidit ki sakhi avah mdopiik.
45008017	'Tunnu neen nih nau rek nkurthuh chaakin bih, alroukchom rek ava' inpimin. Neenna Isowr alrou kchom kcha' rek inpimin. Neen nih Mma' konlorna' ava' ttan chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma' suwkthuhna' thuh dakat tih ntan chaakin bih, neenna Khrista tu' alrou kchomve kcha' rekin pmin.
45008018	Mleiya 'tunpha ki neen nih tyattraanna' tperteel lih avah neen nihin nih midotpandan piik raan dilki tkonlorna' tungngu tportolphu liit tih binmaang.
45008019	Mleiya mdopurthuh dok ava ngi, Isowr chapa rek kandan rang avah ningkakraal lih mdo'ardat chaak.
45008020	Mleiya mdopurthuh dok ava ngi dow khatleh mkurthuh pchaanmana' rah Mma ngi tii pnun pthida. Hava' avah mdopurthuh dok dongei pemeh pdainu Isowr rih havah plungbinpsuk leiyi, tii mdopnun.
45008021	Mleiya mdopurthuh dok ava' rukku kqop chrang ava' thung ngi suwk'owr tkurthuhna' thungki ngi Isowr nau rekki konlor dok to'ol chaakna' thah mdoktlan chaak rang ava' mdo'ardat chaak.
45008022	Mleiya 'tunpha thung ngi mdopurthuh dok mkheng ava ngi vonkchowi rang snu powidun heppi kya dok ki heksa ngi ma'am avah neen nih ndehn a.
45008023	Ungta mmaan daat chrel kma' Pthla ava' ki mkhatna' mchei rek neen rukka, ungta neen kpha rukka nrillin thung ngi kya dok ki hetsat chaakin. Neen nih chapa ngi midotuhum chaak raan, tidit tah neen ndaksaan midotaktlan chaak raan avah ningkakraal lihtardat chaak inni tyattperteel chaakin.
45008024	Mleiya neenna hava' plungbinpsuk ava' thung ngi midotsan chaakin, pdainu mik ki tedeh dok plungbinpsuk avah plungbinpsuk pemeh. Mleiya taluleiyi miikhat tih mmik ki mdodeh dok avah kbinpsuk tlit daat rang ngoh?
45008025	Pdainu neen nih nmik inni tedehma ava nbinpsukin bih, neen nih avah ningkakraal lih, tidiil chaak tu' kilqhi ngi nardat chaak inna.
45008026	Anto' heppi Pthla ava' rukku neen nruhdownnaan thung ngi midotbom chaakin. Mleiya neen nih talukat leiyi, rintaktham chaak raan, tidit avah tedehn pemeh. Pdainu Pthla Mma' ava ngi nehr rih tethe pchaanmah ngi neen nthenni kya le' heksa tu' kilqhi ngi midotaktham piikin.
45008027	'Tunnu plungchai rek kthlaam Mma' ava ngi Pthla ava' ki plungril avah talu tidit mdodeh. Mleiya Pthla ava ngi Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi miikenje rekki thenni mdoktham piiklam.
45008028	Ungta Isowr vonsat klow kcha' rek hinni dow mkheng avah mqhatna' rang ki thenni mdotlot tidit avah neen nih ndehn. Mleiya mmaan avah Mma' plungbinrit dilkqowiyi mdo'own chaak lam.
45008029	Mleiya Mma ngi mduh ngi mdodeh dok rek mmaan avah Mchapa arlim thung ngi mdoperthlen lamna' rah mduduh ngi mdoreel dok ksa. Mleiya Chapa ava ngi unau rek arlak ki mkhatna' mchei mkurthuhna' rah havah mdotlot.
45008030	Ava' han'tun nih Mma ngi mduduh ngi mdoreel dok rek avah Mma ngi to'own ruk mdo'own. Ungta Mma ngi mdo'own dok rek avah tpindit ruk mdopindit piik. Ungta Mma ngi mdopindit dok rek avah tponlor ruk mdoponlor chaak.
45008031	Mdittu' neen nih hava' dow rek 'leennu talu tethe raan? Isowr rah neen nthen mkurthuh u, kuw ngi neenna mikepteng raan?
45008032	Isowr rih Mchapa kat avah kparkhaal kmah ngi neen nthen inni parlaan pthida. Mdittu' taluhep pih Mma ngi Mma' tu' neen nihin nih dow mkheng avah mkhon ktaak ki mikpiikma' raan mow?
45008033	Kuw ngi Isowr dokchol dok ksa ava' 'leenni mraal kpii pchaang rang? Kpindit kcha' avah Isowr.
45008034	Kuwda kupsul lah? Kdiyou dok avah Khrista ungta ava' han'tun nih kdiyou thungki kring kerheel dok. Ungta 'tunnu Mmah Isowr machang thah ko'ongda ungta neen nthen inni mikthampiik meek sliinda.
45008035	Kuw ngi neenna Khrista vonsat thungki mikpenqhen pchaang raan? Tyattraanna' ngi mditmata plungbin kerthlet tih, mditmata tyatchiireelna ngi mditmata powitham mih mditmata tihiltnaak rah ktaak ki mditmata suwthitna ngi mditmata raal lih mikpenqhen pchaang raanmow?
45008036	Tikjit ava ngi hanto'theda: “Nang athenni niiluwn nih neenna me'eyou inda. Neenna te'eyow rah yau tu' mtaisap inda.” (Luw. 44:22)
45008037	Pdainu hava' dow mkheng rek 'leen rukku neen vonsat moklow kchaan Mma' ar'aang ngi neenna kapchaang rek han'tun ki kapchaang rek inpmin.
45008038	Mleiya neiyi kindit tih kdeh tidit tah kdiyou vih mditmata kring rinkum mih, vaantamsi rekki mditmata paamkpu rekki mditmata ruhtan rekki mditmata 'tun ka'am dok dow rekki mditmata karvang rang dow rekki,
45008039	mditmata kparthaang tya ngi ungta ktlum tya ngi mditmata mdopurthuh dok dow morson rekki neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am Isowr vonsat thungki neenna mipenqhen pchaang liit nimeh.
45009001	Neiyi Mesaiah hinni kindit ava' kdothe, plei neimaang. Ungta nei kuplungril deh rukku Pthla Kchiir hinni nei ksakhi avah mpiik a.
45009002	Mleiya neiyi kuplung thuh kdung ngi tyattraan na' kdoperteel ungta plungkya tlit tih ka'am kcha' ping.
45009003	Mleiya dultimii nowpa ki dilkqowiyi ku'uknau rek, krik lam rek kchang ngi, Mesaiah hinki neiya pauhor mbukda mdotreen pthi dok rang kpha ruk kdak ki kdorot chaak.
45009004	Mmaan avah Isreel nau reklam. Mmaan hinni chapa ngi tuhum chaakna', tkonlorna', pauqum rek, nowlam tpiikna', Isowr soptolowna' ungta paureel rek mkheng avah mdopiik lam.
45009005	Npu'npa rekin avah mmaan thungki karvang lam. Ungta Mesaiah avah dultimii ki rilam dilkqowiyi mmaan thung ngi karvang. Mma' avah dow mkheng ki mkarthak ungta ktlangknai kma' tpanpaak chaakin Isowr ava'. Amen.
45009006	Pdainu hava ngi Isowr pauna avah msit ammeh mleiya Isreel mii rek mkheng avah Isreel miidakdak thina' lam pemeh.
45009007	Anto' heppi, Abraham suruwl thungki mkurthuhn leiyi, mmaan mkheng avah Abraham nau rek thina' lam pemeh. Pdainu: “Aijek thungki ngi nang asuruwl rek avah ttai rah,” mdodit. (Rnp. 21:12)
45009008	Mleiya dultimii nowpa ki dilkqowiyi kqou kcha' nau rek mmaan avah Isowr nau reklam pemeh. Pdainu paureel ki nau rek mmaan avah suruwl avale' tidit tih mdotai lam.
45009009	Mleiya paureel ki pauna rek avah hava': “Tpelreen dok mpha ava' thung ngi Neiya arjung nikdi' Ungta Sarah ngi chapa khat kupluw chrah,” mdodit. (Rnp. 18:10,14)
45009010	Ungta hava' daat pemeh, pdainu Rebecca rukku miikhat, tidit tah npu'n'paan Aijek leiyi, kurmuwngda.
45009011	Mleiya chapa 'knii rek ava ngi mqou duduhn nih ungta mmaanve ngi kqha mditmata kthi khatleh mtlot duduhn nih, nong rek lei kma' mko'own kcha' do'own chaakna' ki plungbinrit ava' mkurthuhna' rah,
45009012	Rebecca hinni hanto'theda: “Kver ava ngi mokmow sopklow chrah.” (Mpk. 33:19)
45009013	Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Neiyi Jakob vonsat kdolow, pdainu Esau a kdopder chaak,” dida. (Mal. 1:2-3)
45009014	Mdittu' talu tethe raan? Isowr hinni rinkinditmana' ka'am a, tidit raan? Immeh, anto'liit rang pemeh.
45009015	Mleiya Isowr rih Moses hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi plung kdopkham chaak khimkhei rek hinni plung pkham chnikdi' Ungta plungkham kdotedet nuwm khimkhei rek hinni plung pkham chnikdi',” dida. (Mpk. 33:19)
45009016	Mdit bih, kbin kcha' mma' ava' pemeh, mditmata kchen kcha' mma' ava' pemeh pdainu plungqhat ktedet kcha' Isowr ava' plungbin.
45009017	Mleiya Kchiir laika ngi, Pharoah hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' plungbinrit kat leiyi, tidit tah Neiyi, Nei kruhtan avah nang ahin nih adokepdehna' rah Ungta Nei kmiing avah dultipaam mkheng thung ngi tethethutna' rang ki thenni, Neiyi nang nga singsa adokupthuh.” (Mpk. 9:16)
45009018	Avaleiyi, Mma ngi plung mdopqhat nuwmna' hinni Mma ngi plungqhat horda ungta plung mdotapchai nuwmna' hinni mma ngi tapchaida.
45009019	Mdit bih, naan nih kihin nih hanto' the naandi': “Taluleiyi Mma ngi 'tun kpha thuh neenna midotupsulin? Mleiya Mma' plungbin avah kuw ngi mapkhaan a?”
45009020	Pdainu dakat tih O dultimii, Isowr kepteng ngi karthaang nang avah kuw ptih? Mdopurthuh dok ava ngi mukpurthuh kcha' ava' hinni: Taluleiyi Nang ngi neiya hanto'hep adotpurthuhda, kdi rang?
45009021	Beelksa mii ava ngi kanka ngi tsin rang beelruk ungta chowmkponbor rih tsin rang beel rukka mtenekklom khatsap ava' thung ki ngi tsakvena' rah ruhtan mdothlowi chaak pemeh mow?
45009022	Isowr rih muplungthit mei kquwng avah tpandan rah mdongei ungta Mma' ruhtan avah mii rekki mdodeh raan mdongei. Anto'daat yoso, Mma ngi plungthit mei kquwng karlaang chrang rek mmaan hinni kdung ngi mdodiil piik chaak lam ungta tkenveina' ki thenni mmaan avah mdoporthlon chaak doklam.
45009023	Ungta Mma ngi konlor ki thenni choduduh ngi mdoporthlon dok mmaan, tidit tah plungqhat ki beel rek hinni Mma' konlorsina' ava' mdopandanna' rang ki thenni havah mdotlot.
45009024	Anto' heppi Mma ngi Jihudi rek arlak ki daat kma' Chaatktlei rek arlak ki neen rukka midoto'own chaak dokin pemeh mow?
45009025	Mma ngi Hosia laika thung ngi: “Neiyi, Nei kmii kma' mii rek avah Nei kmii rek dilam nikdi', ungta Neiyi vonsat kdolowma snu ava' hinni, nang nga Nei kvonsat'low pti', dinikdi',” mdodit. (Hos. 2:23)
45009026	“Ungta havah hanto' kurthuwk rah, tidit tah, ‘naanna Nei kmii rekin ptipmeh, kdoditna' ava'kat thung ngi, ‘Neiyi naanna Kring Isowr chapa rekin ptih,’ dilam nikdi',’ ” dida. (Hos. 1:10)
45009027	Ungta Isaiah rukku Isreel rek leiyi, owngda, hanto'theda: “Isreel nau rek chai avah truwnpii biing ki sitphuiya ngi nem chleek yoso, mqhe rek daat ksan chlam rah.
45009028	Mleiya Mma ngi nong avah kupqu rah, Ungta rinkinditna' thung ngi avah kreenptowi pthi rah, Mleiya Kruwng ngi dultipaam thuh nong avah ktowitek ki ktlow rah.” (Is. 10:22-23)
45009029	Ungta choduh ngi Isaiah ngi hanto ngi mdothe heppi: “Sabaoth Kruwng ngi neen nihin nih charuwl khat mdomaakma don nih, Neenna Sodom hep daat tkurthuh chaak raan Ungta neenna Gomorah hep daat mikpurthuh pthidok thuh raan.” (Is. 1:9)
45009030	Avaleiyi, neen nih talu tethe raan? Mleiya rinkinditna' kopqowi kma' Chaatktlei rekki rinkinditna', tidit tah lamtrin chaak ki rinkinditna' avah marlaan chaak inna.
45009031	Pdainu rinkinditna' ki nowlam kopqowi kcha' Isreel mii rekki rinkinditna' ki nowlam avah arlaang pchaang chlammeh.
45009032	Havah taluleiyo? Mleiya mmaan nih lamrin nih avah mdothlaam chaakin pemeh, pdainu mmaan nih nowlam ki nong rekki mdopqowi chaakin. Mleiya mmaan nih khuhsiir tpirthitna' Lung ava' 'leenni khuhsiir mdopirthit chaakin.
45009033	Hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Asuwn, Neiyi Jion thung ngi khuhsiir tpirthitna' Lung khat ungta tparkhaanna' Lungpii khat kthiika. Ungta kuwku yoso, Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rek khimkheiya ningkya duhlam nimeh.” (Is. 8:14, 28:16)
45010001	Ku'uknau rek, neiyi kdung ngi kuplung ngamna' rang ungta Isowr hinni krinkthamna' avah Isowr rih Isreel mii rek mdosan chaak rang ava'.
45010002	Mleiya neiyi mmaan 'leenni sakhi kpiik chaak a, tidit tah mmaan nih Isowr hinni kdung ngi plung mdopluw chaakin pdainu mmaan dongei avah tedeh pinditna' dilkqowi pemeh.
45010003	Mleiya mmaan nih Isowr ki rinkinditna' mdodeh pinditma inni ungta mmaan nih mmaan ki rinkinditna' mdopqhan chaak inni Isowr ki rinkinditna' thung ngu kakparlaan chlam pemeh.
45010004	Mleiya lamkrin kcha' khimkhei rek hinni rinkinditna' ki thenni Khrista a nowlam ki mqutna'.
45010005	Mleiya Moses tih nowlam ki rinkinditna' ki mleiyi hanto' kjitda: “Hava' dow rek ava' ktlow kcha' mii ava ngi, mmaan ar'aang ngi kring chlam rah,” dida. (Lev. 18:5)
45010006	Pdainu lamrin ki rinkinditna' ava ngi hanto'theda: “Aplung thung ngi, parvaan thah kuw kuhung rang, dichma'?” (Knl. 30:12) Mleiya karthak ki Khrista arjunkqhi rang ki
45010007	Mditmata “Kdiyou thungki Khrista arhunkqhi rang ngi kukthuwk ava' thuh kuw kyungkqum rang?” Mleiya kurduh ki Khrista arhunkqhi rang ki (Knl. 30:13)
45010008	Pdainu havah talu mdothena? “Pauna rek avah ahin nih knaitek ki ka'am a, anehr kpha thung ngi ka'am a, Ungta aplung thung ngi ka'am a.” (Knl. 30:14) Mleiya neen nih kdoparjaamin lamrin ki pauna ava'.
45010009	Mleiya nang ngi anehr rih Jisu avah Kruwng ava' tidit athethut chaak bih, ungta Isowr rih Mma' avah kdiyou thungki mdoperdel tidit aplung thung ngi lam'arin chaak bih, nang nga tkarsan chaak phang chnadi'.
45010010	Mleiya nang ngi aplung ngi lam'adorin chaak ungta ava ngi arinkindit kcha'. Ungta anehr rih adothethut chaak ava ngi tkirliinna' avah ka'am.
45010011	Mleiya Kchiir laika thuh hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' rek khimkheiya ningkya duhlam nimeh.” (Is. 28:16)
45010012	Mleiya Jihudi rekle' Grik rekki mkertleina' ka'am pemeh. Mleiya mmaan mkheng 'leenni Kruwng kurthuwksap Mma' ava ngi Mma' ko'own kcha' mkheng rek 'leenni svang ngi ka'am.
45010013	Mleiya: “Kuwku yoso, Kruwng miing ko'own kcha' mma' avah ksan chrah.” (Joe. 2:32)
45010014	Mmaan nih Mma' hinni lammrin chaakma innu, taluhep pih mmaan nih Mma' avah ko'own kcha' lam rang ngo? Ungta mmaan nih mdo'arjaak liitmaan Mma' avah taluhep pih lamkrin chlam rang ngo? Ungta kparjaam piik ktaak ki taluhep pih mmaan nih karja lam rang ngo?
45010015	Ungta kparjaam lam rang ngo? Hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Plung kdai ki kqhapaumin kparjaam rek, dow kqha rekki plung ngamna' pau kparjaam kcha' rek khuh avah tya thuh kqha chdaat a.” (Is. 52:7 Hah. 1:15)
45010016	Pdainu mmaan mkheng inni kqhapaumin avah mdopqowi chaakin pemeh. Mleiya Isaiah ngi hanto'theda: “Kruwng neen nih kdotheen pau avah kuw ngi lamrin chaak a?” (Is. 53:1)
45010017	Avaleiyi, lamrinna' avah tarjaak thungki karvang ungta tarjaakna' avah Isowr pauna thungki karvang.
45010018	Pdainu neiyi kthe a, Mmaan nuh arja lammeh mow? O, mdo'arjaak in. “Mmaan krowl avah dultipaam mkheng thung ngi kchet dok a. Ungta mmaan pauna rek avah dultipaam mqutna' mphaak dok a.” (Luw. 19:4)
45010019	Pdainu neiyi kthe a, Isreel mii rekvah avah deilam meh mow? Mkhatna' thung ngi Moses tih theda: “Neiyi naan avah chaat khat kma' 'leenni kukyuwn kcha ngi apa'am nikaandi'. Neiyi naan avah mongkokto chaat khat 'leenni aplungin pthit nikdi',” dida. (Knl. 32:21)
45010020	Pdainu Isaiah ngi changkarngam mih hanto'theda: “Nei makthlaam kma' rekki Neiya mdei chlamda. Nei mikqhil kma' rek hinni Neiya kkandang kcha' ping.” (Is. 65:1)
45010021	Pdainu mma ngi Isreel rek hinni hanto'theda: “Neiyi tethe kopqowi kma' ungta mlehkunluk mii rek hinni niiluwn nih kbaan kdothlaan chaak.” (Is. 65:2)
45011001	Mdittu' neiyi kthe a, tidit tah Isowr rih Mmii rek avah mrotma lam mow? Immeh, anto'liit pemeh. Mleiya nei rukka Isreel miikhat ping. Abraham charuwl thungki ungta Benjamin phung thungki miikhat ping.
45011002	Isowr rih choduh mdodeh dok ksa Mmii rek avah mdorotmalu ka'am pemeh. Mleiya Elaijah paumin thung ngi, Kchiir laika ngi mdothe avah naanna deimaan timow? Mleiya mma ngi Isreel rek ptengda Isowr hinni mdopnuwm chaak.
45011003	“Kruwng mmaan nih Nah akhulpu rek avah eyou lamda. Ungta Nang arinparlaanna' khaan rek avah pkuipthi lamda. Ungta neiya kthina daat imping ungta mke'eyou rang ngi mtathlaam lam a.” (1 Pkg. 19:10,14)
45011004	Pdainu Isowr rih taluhep pih marthaanno? Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi nei kthen nih, Baal hinni mupkhup pih tirdiilda luwkbu kma' mii pun tikhiu parkhaalnu kthiik dok a,” dida. (1 Pkg. 19:18)
45011005	Anto' mkurthuh u, 'tunki mpha thung ngi plungnee dilkqowiyi tokchol dok aangqhe rek ka'am daat lam a.
45011006	Ungta plungnee leiki mkurthuh bih, nong rekki mlei avah amporson meh, mditmata plungnee avah plungnee kurthuwk porsonmeh. Pdainu ava ngi nong leiki mkurthuh bih, avah plungnee leiki kurthuwk porsonmeh, mditmata nong avah nong kurthuwk porsonmeh.
