45011007	Mdittu' talu? Isreel rekki mdothlaamin avah phang chlam mda pdainu mdokchol dok rek mmaan ava ngi avah mphan chaak inna ungta mqhe rek hinnu avah plung mdotapchai pthi.
45011008	Tikjit dok ksa ava' heppi: “Isowr rih mmaan hinni pthla ki'iing pii lamda, Ungta khu kdei pchaang kma' mik rek pii lamda. Ungta khu karja pchaang kma' rah kna pii lamda. Tuni kpha ngi havah mdopiik tlit daat lam.” (Knl. 29:4 Is.29:10)
45011009	David rukku hanto' kjitda: “Mmaan maalna' khaan avah ktaang le' tepmenna' ikurthuwkso ungta ava ngi khuhsiir tpirthitna' dow rek ikurthuwkso. Ungta ava ngi mmaan hinni tpiikpenletna' ikurthuwkso.”
45011010	Mleiya mmaan nih khu mdodeh mana' raanni mmik rekin avah ijiing chso. Ungta mpha ktai thung ngi mtukhumin avah itorkon chso,” dida. (1 Pkg. 69:22-23)
45011011	Audilli neiyi kthe a: Mmaan nah mtlukna' raan ki thenni khuhsiir mpirthitin mow? Immeh, anto'liit pemeh. Pdainu mmaan nowlam tuksutmana' ava' ar'aang ngi mmaan thung ngi tepnerna' mthuhna' rah tkirliinna' avah Chaatktlei rek hinni ktlung kcha'.
45011012	'Tunnu mmaan nowlam tuksutmana' ava ngi dultipaam ki svangthuhna' ungta mmaan dopchaanma ava ngi Chaatktlei rek svangthuhna' mkurthuh u, mmaan kurkhumna' ngaalvah tya kepnem thang rang ngoh?
45011013	Mleiya neiyi Chaatktlei rek naan ahin nih kthe a. Mleiya neiyi Chaatktlei rek naan ahin nih tamsi khat kkurthuh chaakya ngi neiyi nei ksoplow chaakna' avah kdoponlor chaak.
45011014	Mleiya havah krik lam thungki kmii rek thung ngi tepnerna' pqouda ungta neiyi taluhep kduyoso ngi mmaan avah mruk daat yoso kdonsan chaak lamna' rang ki then.
45011015	Mleiya mmaan mdovar pthi lam ava ngi dultipaam tpalqhatna' mkurthuh u, mmaan marlaan chaak lam u, taluhep rang ngoh? Pdainu avah kdiyou thungki rinkum ava'rang pemeh mowi?
45011016	Mleiya mrukri ki mchei avah mchiir bih, ava' thung ki ngi tponlom thenpen ava' rukka kchiir rah. Ungta murjung avah mchiir bih, mbaak rek rukka kchiir rah.
45011017	Ungta mbaak aangqhe rek avah reenso, nowmkruwn nang avah mmaan arlak ki atoppow chaak bih, nang nga kruwn dakdak arjung thungki then kqha ksim kcha' kurthuwk kcha' imptih.
45011018	Avaleiyi, nang ngi mbaak rek ptengda pirlin chma'. Pdainu nang ngi apirlin chaak cheentung ngi, nang ngi murjung ava' adobom pemeh pdainu murjung ngi nang avah adotbom chaak tidit perngeelma'.
45011019	Mdit bih, nang ngi: “Ava' thuh nei mdotoppow chaakna' rang ki thenni mbaak rek avah mdoreen pthi,” dida the chnadi'.
45011020	Kqha a, mleiya mlamrinmaan leiyi, mmaan nah mreen pthi doklam a ungta nang nga lamrin nih krip kcha' imptih, pdainu naarlinna ngi binma' pdainu aning apqitcha'.
45011021	Mleiya Isowr rih mnowpa dakdak ki mbaak rek maklu mparkhaalma'u, nang rukka aparkhaal nimeh.
45011022	Avaleiyi, Isowr ki mqhatna' le' mthitna' avah adeipindih cha'. Nang ngi Mma' qhatna' thung ngi a'am chaak tlit bih, ktlu kcha' rek hinni mthitna' pdainu nang athenni avah mqhatna'. Mditma bih, nang rukka akreen pthi rah.
45011023	Ungta mmaan rukka mlamrin mana' thuwn nih ma'am chaak tlit maanbi, ava' thuh koppop chlam rah. Mleiya Isowr rih mmaan avah veikhat ava' thuh toppow ruk mapchaan.
45011024	Mleiya mnowpa ngi nowmkruwn kurthuwk kcha' thungki nang avah areenda nowpa kepteng ngi kruwn dakdak 'leenni adotoppow chaak. Mdit bih, mnowpa ngi kruwn dakdak baak rek mmaan avah kruwn dakdak 'leenni toppow rang avah tya thuh ko'olrang ngow?
45011025	Mleiya ku'uknau rek naan nih hava' paukordowl ava' kdei kmah ngi a'am raan avah neiya ngei maang. Mditma bih naanna athinaan ki aplungbin chaakin thung ngi kinrit kcha ngi kirbin naandi'. Mleiya Chaatktlei rekki mkurkhum chaakna' mphaakduh kpha thung ngi hava' mruk thuh plung pchaina' avah Isreel rek hinni kthuwk dok.
45011026	Ungta hanto ngi Isreel rek mkheng avah ksan chrah, tidit tah hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Mikaktlanpiik avah Jion ki kthuwk rah ungta Mma ngi Jakob mii rek avah rin'owimana' thungki kperheel chlam rah.
45011027	Mleiya, Neiyi mmaan pnu arve rek klow pthipiik lam thung ngi, Neiyi kpaupqum avah mmaan tu pqum nikdi'” (Is. 59:20-21)
45011028	Ungta kqhapaumin leivah mmaan nah naan aleiyi ava' ki miihal reklam pdainu mduh thah tokchol dok leivah mpa'leen leiyi, mmaan nah vonsat'low reklam.
45011029	Mleiya Isowr ki chla rekle' to'ownna' thung vah tpursulna' ka'am pemeh.
45011030	Mleiya mphakhat thuh naanna tethe kopqowi kma' rekin ptih pdainu mmaan nih tethe mdopqowi maan ava ngi naan nih plungqhat avah adophan chaakin.
45011031	Anto' heppi hava'le' rukka 'tunnu tethe mdopqowi in pemeh tidit tah havah naan ahin nih plungqhat adotetdetin ava' ar'aang ngi mmaan rukku plungqhat mdophan chaakna' raan ki then.
45011032	Mleiya Mma ngi mii mkheng hinni plungqhat mdopiik pchaanna' rah Isowr rih mmaan avah tethe topqowi mana' thung ngi mdokhum pthi lam .
45011033	O, Isowr ki luwkinritna' le' tedeh pinditna' avah tyatya thung ngi kukthuwk dok chdaat a! Kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' paupinditna' avah thlaam pthuwk pchaang meh, Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi Mma' 'lam rek avah mdilji pchaang meh.
45011034	“Mleiya kuwda Kruwng plungril kdei dok a? Mditmata kuwda Mma' kperseel pchaang nga? (Is. 40:13 Jer. 23:18)
45011035	Mditmata leiyi, mdochowi rang ngi Mma' hinni rukri ngi kpiik kcha' kuw ka'amda?” (Job. 41:11)
45011036	Dow mkheng avah Mma' hinki ungta Mma' ar'aang thungki, Ungta Mma' thungki kthuwk. Mma' hinni ktlangknai kmah tponlor chaak kurthuwkso. Amen.
45012001	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, akaktham chaak inna, naan nih Isowr plungkham ava ngi adak inni adaksa rekin avah akring inni rintparlaan chaak ki, kchiir rih, Isowr plung ngam mih ikparlaan chaan. Mleiya havah naanki pthla lamki anongtlot raankat ava'.
45012002	Ungta naan nih hava' dultipaam ki nowpa thung ngi korthlong chmaan pdainu aplungrilin adoperthlen chaak inni ikorthlong chaan. Mleiya ava ngi naan nih kqha avah talu ungta trotpiik krow avah talu ungta Isowr plungbin kurkhum avah talu tidit avah perteelda deinaandi'.
45012003	Mleiya nei kihin nih plungnee mdotpiik chaak ava' ar'aang ngi neiyi naan arlak inni ka'am mii khimkhei rek hinni kthe chaak a. Mleiya miikhat tih mdobin rangkat ava' han'tun nih mthina ngi kparthaang ngi mkirbin rang pemeh. Pdainu Isowr rih mii khimkhei hinni mdothem lamrin ki tpertetna' ava' dilkqowiyi mkilrin chaak tu' kilqhi ngi mdobin chaak rah.
45012004	Mleiya neen nih ndaksaan 'leenni napna rekin knempok ki ka'am pdainu napna rekin mkheng avah mnongtlot khatsap daat pemeh.
45012005	Anto' heppi knempok neen avah Khrista hinni daksa khadaat inpimin ungta neen khatkhat avah khat le' khat ki pna rek inpimin.
45012006	Neen nihin nih plungnee midotpiik chaakin ava' dilkqowiyi mdetmdet ki chla rek avah neen nih tothlowi chaakin. Neen nih chla rek avah pau tphuwnna' ki mkurthuh cheentung ngi nlamrin tu' kinqimchap pih avah ipurphuwng chaan cheh.
45012007	Mditmata soptolowna' ki nkurthuh cheentung ngi nsoplow chaak naan thuh, kpurchuk kcha' mkurthuh cheentung ngi tpurchuhna' thuh isinton chaan cheh.
45012008	Mikoksopdei mma' ava ngi tkorsowna' ava' 'leenni, kpiidei kcha' mma' ava ngi kertleu vih tpiikna' 'leenni chla avah asinton chso. Kqhi kcha' mma' ava ngi plung kluwt tih, plungqhat ktedet kcha' mma' ava ngi kanpa dok ki mdopiik chaak rah.
45012009	Vonsat avah kqha tpurhuwina' purthuh maan. Kqha kma' avah apder chaan. Kqha avah knet tih akyowng chaan.
45012010	Naan nih unaukat vonsat korlow heppi khat le' khat avah plungqhat tih ikarman chaan. Adakin akarjat chaakin han'tun nih khat le' khat ikarjat chaan.
45012011	Naan nih ardathit thlowi maan, pdainu apthlaan tu' plung kluwt tih Kruwng nga sop'alow chaan.
45012012	Plungbinpsuk thuh ikanpa chaan, kdung ngi tyattraanna' thung ngi adiildei chaan. Ungta naan nih kdet liit kmah rinkthamna' thung ngi i'am tlit chaan.
45012013	Miikenje rek dokriin rek avah athempiik deiyin ungta mal rek tuptlun chaak kdung ngi angei chaan.
45012014	naan ahin nih tyat chiireelna' akpii rekin avah suwqhat apii chaan, suwqhat apiin pauhor bukmaan.
45012015	Kanpa kcha' rektu' ikanpasap chaan ungta kqap kcha' rektu' iqapsap chaan.
45012016	Naan nih khat le' khat hinni plungril khatsap ahordei in. Naan nih aplungrilin avah kparthaang dow rek 'leenni thimaan pdainu kpirdil kcha' rektu' ikilqhisapin. Athina daatin ki plungbin thung ngi kinrit chmaan.
45012017	Kqha kma' thenni kqha kma' pii perheel maan. Mii mkheng dodeh ngi takyat kurhuwi rek ava' atlow chaan.
45012018	Naan nih mrot khimkhei thung ngi mkirsit cheentung ngi mii mkheng tu' plung kdai deek ki i'amin.
45012019	Nei kvonsat'low rek, naan nih adak inni phuw louvotmaan pdainu plungthit mei kquwng ki thenni mmun apii chaan. Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Phuw klou avah Nei kthen, Neiyi pii perheel nikdi,” dida (Knl. 32:35) Kruwng ngi mdothe.
45012020	Avaleiyi, “Nang ngi amiihal avah mpowi mtham cheentung ngi apmaalcha'. Mning makraal cheentung ngi dii apneek cha', Tidit tah nang ngi hanto' adotlot chaak ava ngi mma' luwchai 'leenni mei'ai kpurtuwl kcha' kurthuwk nadi'.” (Prl. 25:21-22)
45012021	Naanna kqhakmah ngi mdopchaan kurthuwkmaan pdainu kqha ava ngi kqha kma' avah atappchaanin.
45013001	Mii khimkheiyi ruhtanna' ksin sarka hinni makparlaan chaak rah. Mleiya Isowr hinki kma' ruhtanna' ka'am pemeh ungta hava' ka'am ruhtanna' khimkhei rek avah Isowr rih mdokthlan ksadok.
45013002	Avaleiyi, hava' ruhtanna' ava' kikthitna' rek khimkheiyi Isowr ki ruhtan pauqum avah mikthitna'a, ungta ava' kikthitna' rek mmaan ava ngi pau tpinditna' avah mtun inni mthuhqhi chaak inna.
45013003	Mleiya paamkpu rek avah kqhanong rek 'leenni tqit chaakna' ka'am pemeh pdainu kqha kma' nong rek 'leen. Nang ngi ruhtanna' ksin rek 'leenni ning tipqitma rah angeiya? Mditta nang ngi kqha ava' atlow cha' ungta nang nga ava'kat tih akpanpaak chrah.
45013004	Mleiya mma' avah kqha ki thenni Isowr suwk khat. Pdainu nang ngi kthi atlot cheentung ngi ning'apqitcha', mleiya mma ngi mraal'kaang avah msit ktaak ki mdohor pemeh. Mleiya mma' avah kthi ktlow mma' hinni plungthit mei kquwng ksin thuh rang ngi, phuw klou rang Isowr ki suwk khat.
45013005	Avaleiyi, plungthit mei kquwng ava'lei daat kma' nang aplungrildeh kindit chaakna' rang leiyi, mhin nih akparlaan chaak rah.
45013006	Mleiya mlei hava' leiyi nang ngi paammii sumqhai rek ava' rukka adopiik rah, tidit tah mmaan nah hava' nong ava' thung ngi kdet liit kmah kthleng kcha' Isowr sopklow kcha' reklam.
45013007	Avaleiyi, nang ngi adopiik rang ma'am dilkqowiyi mii khimkhei hinni apii. Paammii sumqhai adotuwlna' hinni paammii sumqhai avah apii, sumqhai adotuwlna' hinni sumqhai avah apii. Ungta ningqit adotedetna' rang hinni ningqit atedet, takyat chaakna' adotedetna' rang hinni takyat chaakna' atedet cha'.
45013008	Naan nih khat le' khat vonsat akorlow chaakin kma'don kuwkhat leh hinni lei tuwlmaan. Mleiya ktlok khat vonsat klow kcha' mma' ava ngi nowlam avah mpurtluwm chaak a.
45013009	Mleiya nowlam mih hanto' mdothe: “Nang ngi lowsang thi nimtih. Nang ngi mii eyou nimtih. Nang ngi pru nimtih. Nang ngi mlangkma' sakhi pii nimtih. Nang ngi, pner nimtih.” (Mpk. 20:13-15,17 Knl. 5:17-19,21) Ungta hava' thung ngi pauqum ktlei morson am chyoso ava' mkheng avah hava ngi khadaat mdopthut pthi dok, tidit tah, “Nang ngi a'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah.” (Lev. 19:18)
45013010	Vonsat tih mi'innveen hinni mthitna' tlowmeh, avaleiyi vonsat avah nowlam ki mkurtluwmna'.
45013011	Ungta 'tunki mpha avah ki'iip thungki tkerdelna' mpha tidit adodeh pindit chaak inni, naan nih havah atlown. Mleiya 'tunnu tkirliinna' avah neen nih lamnrin chaak thokin thungki hinni lamknai kcha' a.
45013012	Jaan avah meknem kvei dok kcha' a ungta khuvaar avah knaitek kcha' a. Avaleiyi, neen nih kjiingnu thungki nong rek avah ivarpthiin cheh ungta mar'aang ki raaldona avah ina chdok incheh.
45013013	Neen nih khuvaar ki heppi takyat kurhuwiyi ichet chaan cheh. Ungta lop pih thowldii tneekna' thuh, ungta tipritna' thuh ungta jowltpurjutna' thuh ungta tekterdeuna' thuh ungta tker'e tkalraina' thuh ungta tukyuwnna' thuh ta'am raan pemeh.
45013014	Pdainu Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah buwdiir rih hilna chda ungta daksa ngi kdung ngi mdongei daksa ki avah mning tuptlunpiik raan pemeh.
45014001	Naan nih mlamrin kdowng khat avah arlaang deichaan pdainu plung thuh kinqim kma' leennu kerteenna' maan.
45014002	Mleiya miikhat tu' dow mkheng kdochaak krow tidit tih lammrin chaak a pdainu mlamrin knet kma' khatvah anthithowlnu chrel daat mdochaak chaak.
45014003	Ava' vah kcha kcha' mma' ava ngi kcha kma' mma' avah tukksut kma' tlow mso. Ungta kcha kma' mma' ava ngi kcha kcha' mma' 'leenni pau pindit mso. Mleiya Isowr rih mma' avah mdorot piik dok.
45014004	Miiktlok khat suwk 'leenni paukpindit nang nga kuw ptih? Mleiya mma ngi mma' kpupa ava' hin daat tih krip kcha' mditmata ktlu kcha'. Dakat tih mmah krip chrah mleiya Isowr rih mma' avah mdopri pchaan.
45014005	Miikhat tih nit khat avah nit morson rek hinni klin nih kbincha' ruk krow. Anto ngi mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki muplungril thung ngi krip pih mdobin chaak rah.
45014006	Nit ava' kdan kcha' mma' ava ngi Kruwng hinni avah mdodan chaak. Ungta nit ava' kdancha' kma' mma' ava' rukku Kruwng hinni avah mdodan chaak pemeh. Kcha kcha' mma' ava ngi Kruwng hinni mdochaak chaak tidit tah mma ngi Isowr mdopanpaak chaak. Ungta kcha kma' mma' ava' rukku Kruwng hinni mma ngi mdochaak chaak pemeh ungta Isowr rah mdopanpaak chaak.
45014007	Mleiya neen kuwkhat leh rukka mthina daat thung ngi kring kcha' ka'am pemeh ungta mthina daat thung ngi kdiyou ka'am pemeh.
45014008	Mleiya neen nih nrin bih, Kruwng hinni trin chaakin ungta ndiyow chaakin bih, Kruwng hinni tidiyow chaakin. Avaleiyi, neen nih nrin rukku mditmata ndiyow rukku neenna Kruwng dow rekin pimin.
45014009	Mleiya Mma' avah kdiyou le' kring, mikniing ki Kruwng mkurthuhna' rah Khrista ngi hava' rang ki thenni diyouda ungta kerdelda ungta veikhat kring nowl.
45014010	Pdainu taluleiyi a'uanau hinni pau apindit tah? Mditmata taluleiyi nang ngi a'uanau avah ayowm chaak a? Mleiya neen nkheng inni Khrista ki paupinditna' longkhom aang ngi trisap chaak raan.
45014011	Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Kruwng ngi, Neiyi ring nuh ka'am leiyi, pkhup khimkheiyi Nei kihin nih luwmdotbuk chaak rah ungta plei khimkheiyi Isowr hinni mkerthethut chaak rah,” dida. (Is. 45:23)
45014012	Ava' vah neen nkheng inni ndak ndakin ki nlei rekin avah Isowr hinni tethe chaak raan.
45014013	Avaleiyi, neen nih khat le' khat 'leenni pau tpindit porson raan pemeh pdainu ava' kchang ngi neen nih nu'unnau rek 'lamqowi thung ngi khuhsiir pirthitna' rah mditmata moplowmna' rah, totlotmana' raan ki thenni nuplungin ikperseeldei incheh.
45014014	Neiyi kdeh ungta Kruwng Jisu ar'aang ngi kindit tidit kdeh tidit tah mthina ngi ktobor dow khatleh ka'am pemeh. Pdainu ktobor tidit tih kbin kcha' mma' hinni avah ktobor.
45014015	Anto'daat yoso nang athen chaak leiyi, a'uanau plungyatna' mkurthuh bih, nang nga vonsat thung ngi chet porson mtih a. Nang athen chaak ava ngi Khrista ngi mdodiyow piik dok khat avah tpenveima'.
45014016	Avaleiyi, nang aqhatna' avah mii ngi kthi ngi tepthema'.
45014017	Mleiya Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah tchaak le' tneekna' pemeh. Pdainu Pthla Kchiir thung ngi mrinkindit plungdaina' ungta tkanpatna'.
45014018	Mleiya hava' dow rek thung ngi Khrista sopklow kcha' mma' avah Isowr hinni trot chaak krow ungta dulti mii rek rukku mdorot chaakin.
45014019	Avaleiyi, neen nih plung kdai kupthuwk ungta khat le' khat qhatna' kupthuwk dow rek 'leenni plung ipluwt incheh.
45014020	Nang ngi thendam leiyi, Isowr nong avah tpenveima'. Dow mkheng avah dakat tih kchiir pdainu mparkhaan chunni kcha kcha' mma' ki thenvah avah kqha pemeh.
45014021	A'uanau khuhsiir pirthitna' rah mditmata mparkhaanna' kurthuwk rah mditmata mruh kopdowng rah mkurthuh bih, saa tchaakmah ngi mditmata thowldii tneekmah ngi mditmata dow khatleh ruk totlotma ngi kqha.
45014022	Nang nga lamrin athlowi ngaal mow? Nang ngi avah Isowr aang ngi avah athlowi cha'. Mma ngi perteelda mdorot chaak ava' 'leenni mthina kpursul kcha' kma' mma' avah msuwkqha.
45014023	Pdainu plung kpelqen mma' ava ngi mchaak bih kpursul kcha' a. Mleiya mma ngi lamrin nih avah mdochaak pemeh. Mleiya talutalu yoso lamrin thungki kma' avah pnu.
45015001	Mruh ktang neen ava ngi mruhkdong tlukna' thung ngi tvondeh chaak raan thah ktla ungta neen nih nthinaan plung ngamna' totlot chaak raan pemeh.
45015002	Neen khimkheiyi ni'innveenin avah mlin msaanna' rang ngi, mma' qhatna' rang ki thenni muplung ngamna' totlot chaak rah.
45015003	Mleiya Khrista kpha rukku mthina plungngam kirpii chmeh, pdainu hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Ningkya akpii rekki ningkyana' rek avah Nei ktun nih ktla a,” dida. (Luw. 69:9)
45015004	Mleiya Kchiir laika rekki tidiildehna' le' plung ngamna' ava' ar'aang ngi neen nih plungbinpsuk ava' tothlowi chaakna' rah mdokjit. Tidit tah choduh ngi talutalu yoso mdokjit dok rek avah neen tkurchuhna' raan ki thenni mdokjit dok.
45015005	'Tunnu tidiil chaakna' le' plung ngamna' ki Isowr ava ngi Jisu Khrista dilkqowiyi khat le' khat hinni plungbin khatsap tohorna' avah ayupii chaanso.
45015006	Mleiya havah naan nih plungbin khat tih ungta nehr khat tih Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa ava' adopanpaak chaakna' raan ki then.
45015007	Avaleiyi, Khrista ngi neen avah Isowr konlorna' thung ngi midotarlaan chaak dokin heppi naan nih khat le' khat ikarlaang deichaan.
45015008	'Tunnu neiyi kthe a, tidit tah Isowr ki kindit ava' ki thenni, npa'leen hinni mpaureel rek ava' kepnetset rang ki thenni Jisu Khrista avah vunkreen rek hinni suwk khat arvang kurthuwkda.
45015009	Ungta havah Chaatktlei rekki Mma' plungqhat leiyi, Isowr mdoponlor chaakna' raan ki then, tidit tah hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mleiya hava' leiyi Chaatktlei rek arlak ki, Neiyi, Nang ahin nih thethuh chnikdih ungta Nang amiing ngi laa ngi the hnikdi',” mdodit. (2 Sam. 22:50 Luw. 18:49)
45015010	Ungta veikhat mma ngi hanto'theda: “O Chaatktlei rek, naan nih Mma' mii rektu' ikanpa chaan!” dida. (Knl. 32:43)
45015011	Ungta veikhat nowl lih: “Chaatktlei rek naan akheng inni Kruwng avah apanpaak chaan! Miilop mkheng rek naan nih Mma' hinni laa ngi apanpaak chaan,” dida. (Luw. 117:1)
45015012	Ungta Isaiah ngi veikhat the nowlda: “Jessi arjung khat kthuwk rah, Ungta Mma ngi Chaatktlei rek 'leenni kpaal rang ngi kerdel rah. Mma' thung ngi Chaatktlei rekki plungbinpsuk avah kthlowi chlam rah.” (Is. 11:10)
45015013	'Tunnu Pthla Kchiir ki ruhtan nih plungbinpsuk thung ngi apleet chaakna' raan ki thenni plungbinpsuk ki Isowr ava ngi naan avah lamrin thung ngi tkanpatna' le' plungdaina' mkheng ava ngi ayupdim chaanso.
45015014	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek nei kdakkat rukku naan aleiyi kuplung nga krip kcha' tidit tah naan rukka tedeh pinditna' mkheng tu' adotipdim chaak dok inni, taqhatna ngi kdim kcha'in imptih. Ungta khat le' khat kerthepiik pchaang dokin ptih.
45015015	Anto'daat yoso ku'uknau rek Isowr rih kihin nih mdotpiik chaak plungnee ava'leiyi naan adoktinbin phaak chaakna' raan ki thenni dow mruk rek 'leenni kerkheelset tih changkarngam mih kdokjit chaak.
45015016	Mleiya havah neiyi Chaatktlei rek hinni Khrista Jisu ki sopklow kcha' khat kkurthuh chaakna' rah, ungta Isowr ki kqhapaumin ava' sopkdolow chaakna' rah plungnee avah mdotpiik chaak. Tidit tah Chaatktlei rek doparlaan chaak avah trotpiik chaak mkurthuhna' rah, ungta Pthla Kchiir rih mdopenje chaakna' rang ki thenni plungnee avah mdotpiik chaak.
45015017	Avaleiyi, neiyi Isowr hinni sopkdolow chaakna' dow rek thung ngi Khrista Jisu hinni kpirlin chaakna' rah mlei kthlowi chaak a.
45015018	Tidit tah neiyi, Khrista ngi nei kar'aang ngi mdotpurkhum piik dokmah dow rek ava' 'leennu neiya dow khadaat ruk the pchaang nimaang. Mleiya neiyi kdothe ungta kdotlot nong ava' ar'aang ngi Chaatktlei rekki tethe mdopqowi chaakin.
45015019	Mleiya Isowr ki Pthla ava' ruhtan nih ruhtan ki titinna' rekle' tngana' rek avah pthuwkda. Mleiya ava ngi Jerusalem thungki ngi Illirikam kpervel rek mun thung ngi neiyi Khrista ki kqhapaumin avah parjaam chnuh.
45015020	Ungta neiyi miiktlok khat innmun 'leenni innksa kkurthuh mana' rah Khrista miing kandan mana' mun thung ngi kqhapaumin tparjaam rang avah mpha ktai thung ngi neiki kuplungbin chaak.
45015021	Ungta hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mhin inni tparjaammah mii rekki Mma' avah mmikin nih kdei lamrah. Ungta karja kcha' kma' rekki kdeipindih chlam rah.” (Is. 52:15)
45015022	Mleiya hava' leiyi, neiyi naan ahin nih kthlen chaak rang ava' rukka mapkhaan tlit kchokda.
45015023	Pdainu neiyi hava' kum tyatya thung ngi naan ahin nih tethlen chaak rah kdung ngi kdongei chaak ava ngi 'tunnu hava' paamkuwl thung ngu nei ka'amna' rah mmun amporson meh.
45015024	Neiyi Spain ki rang ngi kthlen thung ngi naan ahin nih thleng nikdi'. Mleiya neiyi kipjiin thung ngi naan avah ayudei chaan nih tidit tih plung kbinpsuk chaak a ungta neiyi naan tu' mpha mruk kanpasap pih ka'am chaak bih, naan nih neiya k'lamqowina' thung ngi mbom chnaan tidit tih kbin chaak a.
45015025	Pdainu 'tunnu neiya miikenje rek sopklow chrang ki thenni Jerusalem thah kahang imping.
45015026	Mleiya Mesedonia le' Akhaia paamkuwl ki mii rekki, Jerusalem thah ka'am miikenje rek arlak ki srah rek hinni chla tqhaipiik avah mmaan plung ngamna' kurthuwkda.
45015027	Dakat tih hava ngi mmaan nah muplungin kngam kcha' ungta mmaan avah miikenje rekki lei ktuwl reklam. Mleiya Chaatktlei rek ava ngi pthla lamki tikriinna' rek thung ngi Chaatktlei rek thenni Jihudi rektu' korchomsap mkurthuhn bih, Jihudi rek nongtlot rang avah mmaan hinni dona rekki mmaan avah sopmdolow chaak raan thah tlada.
45015028	Avaleiyi, neiyi hava' kupqut dok dilli ungta hava' mchei ava ngi mmaan avah kbih klot chaak doklam dilli neiyi naan aphathangin nikdon, Spain thah chetnikdi'.
45015029	Pdainu neiyi kdeh a tidit tah neiyi naan ahin nih kthlen thung vah Khrista ki kqhapaumin ki suwqhatna' avah kurkhum mih horda thleng nikdi'.
45015030	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi ungta Pthla ava' ki vonsat ava' ar'aang ngi neiyi aktham chaak inna. Tidit tah naan nih nei kthen nih Isowr hinni rinkthamna' 'leenni nei tu' kdung ngi nong itlowsap chaan cheh.
45015031	Mleiya Judia paam thungki lamkrin kma' rek hinki nei mdotaktlan chaakna' rah ungta Jerusalem thung ngi nei ksoplow chaak avah miikenje rek hinni trot chaak mkurthuhna' rah rinmheiktham piik chaan.
45015032	Mleiya Isowr plungbin nih neiyi naan ahin nih kanpa tu' kilqhi ngi kthlen chaakna' rah ungta neiyi naan tu' ardaren tarlaansap chaakna' raan ki thenni rinmheiktham piik chaan.
45015033	'Tunnu plung kdai ki Isowr avah naan akhengin ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
45016001	Neiyi Senkria thungki lamrinlop ki suwk khat ncharin Phibi avah naan ahinin nih akparlaan chaak inna.
45016002	Mleiya naan nih mma' avah miikenje rek heppi Kruwng hinni arlaang chaan ungta talutalu yoso mma ngi mdokriin chaakna' rek thung ngi abom chaan. Mleiya mma ngi mii knempok bom chda ungta nei rukka mdotbom chaak.
45016003	Khrista hinni knonglowqhi chaak rek Prisila le' Akyul a hinni mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016004	Mleiya mmaanve ngi nei kdiyowna' rang thung ngi mlowlin avah mirjitpiik chlamda. Mmaan hinni nei kthina daatmda Chaatktlei rekki lamrinlop mkheng rek rukku kpanpaak chaak inna.
45016005	Anto' heppi mmaanve inn thung ngi ka'am ptha'ownlop hin rukku mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Ungta Khrista hinni mkhatna' mchei kurthuwk Akhaia paamkuwl ki nei kvonsat'low chaak Ephenitas avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016006	Neen nthen inni kdung ngi nong klou kcha' Mary avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016007	Ungta nei ki'innkhor rek ungta rowngmii kdokurthuh qhisap rek, Andronikas le' Junias avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Mmaanve a tamsi rek arlak ki mdang kqha mii reklam ungta mmaanve a nei kduh thah Khrista hinni ka'am dok kcha' reklam.
45016008	Kruwng hinni nei kvonsat'low chaak Amplias avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016009	Khrista hinni nnonglowqhi chaak sapin, Urbanas hinni ungta nei kvonsat'low chaak Staikis hinni mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016010	Khrista hinni perteelda mdorot chaak dok ksa Apellas avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Aristobulas innmii rek mmaan avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016011	Nei ki'innkhor Herodion avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Kruwng hinni ka'am Narkissas inn thungki mii rek avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016012	Kruwng hinni kdung ngi nong klou kcha' Tryphena le' Tryphosa avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Kruwng hinni kdung ngi nong klou kcha' vonsat'low Persis avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016013	Kruwng hinni tokchol dok ksa Ruphus ungta mma' nuh ungta nei knuh avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016014	Asynkritas, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Harmis ungta mmaan tu' ka'am unau rek avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016015	Philologas ungta Julia, Nerreus le' mcharnu ungta Olympas ungta mmaan tu' ka'amsap miikenje rek mkheng avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
45016016	Naan nih khat le' khat avah kchiir kurputna ngi ikurput chaan. Khrista ki lamrinlop rekki aturvuwi chaak inna.
45016017	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, naan nih adokpurchuh chaak dokin ava' kma' thung ngi, arlak inni tkenqhenna' rekle' tparkhaanna' rek kupthuwk mmaan avah bih atinin. Ungta mmaan hinki ikekneeng chaan, dinuh akaktham chaak inna.
45016018	Mleiya ava'lu hep daat mmaan ava ngi neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah sopmdolow chaakin pemeh pdainu mmaan nah mpowibuwr indaat sopklow kcha' reklam. Ungta mmaan nih mpauqhatin le' mnerhqhat inni dow kdei kma' plung rek avah mdohuwn chaakin.
45016019	Mleiya naan nih tethe adopqowi chaakin avah mii mkheng hinni kandang dok kcha' a. Avaleiyi, naan akchang inni neiya kanpa kcha' ping, pdainu anto'daat yoso naan nih kqha ava'leiyi akinrit chaak raan ungta kthi leiyu dow khatleh kdei kmah ngi a'am raan kdongei chaak.
45016020	Ungta plung kdai ki Isowr ava ngi Seitan avah naan akhuhpya tiin nih kuknuwr bei rah. Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
45016021	Nei knonglowqhi Timothy ngi ungta ki'innkhor rek Lusias le' Jason ungta Sosipater leh ngi aturvuwi chaak inna.
45016022	Hava' paukjit kikjit kcha' Tertulias neiyi Kruwng hinni akurvuwi chaak inna.
45016023	Nei ki'innkpupa ungta lamrinlop mkheng rekki innkpupa Gaius tih aturvuwi chaak inna. Khuwpii ava' ki sumksinpa Erastas rukku, nu'unnau'in Kvartas rukku aturvuwi chaak inna.
45016024	Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan akhengin ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
45016025	'Tunnu, dultipaam mupqhun daat ki tuprut tih mdothiik pthi paukordowl avah tpurphuwngda. Ungta Jisu Khrista ki mleiyi tparjaamna', neiki kqhapaumin ava' dilkqowiyi, Mma ngi naan avah adotapqhan pchaanin.
45016026	Pdainu 'tunnu avah mpandan dok a ungta ktlangknai kma' Isowr pauqum ava' dilkqowiyi, lamrin thuh tethe topqowina' rang ki thenni, Khulpu rek dokjit Kchiir laika rekki chaat mkheng rek hinni avah mtepdeh doklam a.
45016027	Kinrit Mma' daat chrel Isowr avah Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi ktlangknai kmah ngi tponlor chaak ki i'amso. Amen.
46001001	Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi, Jisu Khrista ki tamsi tkurthuh chaakna' rah Paul neiya Isowr rih mo'own chda. Ungta nu'unnau'in Sosthenas rukka ka'amqhi a.
46001002	Neenve ngi Korinthia khuwpii ki Isowr lamrinlop naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak inna. Mleiya naanna Isowr rih Khrista Jisu hinni apchiirinda mdotpenje chaak dok miikenje rekin ptih. Ungta naanna mmun ktai thung ngi neenki ungta mmaan ki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing ko'own kcha' miikenje rektu' miikenje rek akurthuh chaakna' raan adoto'own chaak dokin.
46001003	Ungta neenki Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
46001004	Neiyi Khrista Jisu ar'aang ngi, naan ahin nih Isowr Plungnee adotpiik chaakin leiyi, mpha ktaiyi Isowr avah naan athen inni kdopanpaak chaak.
46001005	Mleiya Mma' ar'aang ngi naan nih dow khimkhei thuh, tpauna mkheng 'leen ungta tedeh pinditna' mkheng 'leenni kepleet tih ka'amin ptih.
46001006	Anto' heppi Khrista ki rinpaumin avah naan athung inni mdopnee chaak dok.
46001007	Avaleiyi, naan nih ningkakraal lih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista kurphuwn rang ardat chaakin thung ngi chla khadaat ruk adoptatnaan ka'am pemeh.
46001008	Mleiya Kruwng Jisu Khrista Nit ava' thung ngi dow khatleh ngi adotupsul mana' raan ki thenni Mma ngi naan avah mqutna' kpha thuh tepnee ruk akepnet chraan.
46001009	Isowr rah trinchaak krow, Mma ngi naanna Mchapa Jisu Khrista tu' lopkhat tkurthuh chaakna' thung ngi adoto'own chaak dokin.
46001010	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek neiyi, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing 'leenni akoksow chaak inna. Mleiya naan akheng inni kinqimsap pih ipauin ungta naan athung inni tkenqhenna' am mso. Ava' kchang ngi naan nih plungril khadaat ungta pau tpinditna' khadaat thung ngi kurkhum deek ki i'amin.
46001011	Mleiya Klois inn thungki mii aangqhe ngi kihin nih naan aleiyin avah mparjaak chlamda tidit tah naan arlak inni kalrai kerthe ka'am a, mditin.
46001012	Pdainu, neiyi hava' kdothena' mleiya naan nih, “Neiya Paul mii ping,” mditmata “Neiya Apollos mii ping,” mditmata “Neiya Siphas mii ping,” mditmata “Neiya Khrista mii ping,” diin tinu.
46001013	Mdittu' Khrista a mkurkhuina' ka'am mow? Ungta Paul lah naan athenni kokthowi mow? Mditmata Paul miing 'leenni diiluwna' arlaan chaakin mow?
46001014	Neiyi Krispas le' Gaius kma'don naan kuwkhat leh ruk dii adokupluw chaak maan leiyi, Isowr rah kpanpaak chaak a.
46001015	Mleiya havah kuwkhat leh ngi diiluwna' avah neiyi, nei kmiing ngi kdoptlot lam, tidit mdothe mana' rang ki then.
46001016	Ong ngi, neiyi Stephanas le' innmii rek kho a diiluw kdoptlot chaak lam pdainu mii morson diiluwna' kdoptlot lam rang a deimaang.
46001017	Mleiya Khrista ngi neiya diiluwna' koptlot rang ngi mapthla meh, pdainu kqhapaumin kparjaam rang ki then. Kpaudei rek rekki neiya dultimii ki luwkinritna' pauna rekki kdoparjaam pemeh mditma bih, Khrista ki khros avah msit ktaak kurthuwk chrah.
46001018	Mleiya khros ki paumin avah kenvei chrang rekki thenvah tokmowna' pdainu mdosan chaak dok rek neen nthen vah Mesaiah ruhtanna' ava'.
46001019	Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Neiyi kinrit rekki, luwkinritna' avah penvei pthi nikdi' Ungta kdeipindih rek dopinditna' avah dow khat psit nimaang,” mdodit. (Is. 29:14)
46001020	Kinrit mii a tvada? Tva'thungda kdeipindih mii a? Ungta Tva'thungda 'tunpha ki kerteendei mii a? Isowr rih hava' dultipaam ki luwkinritna' avah kokmok mdopurthuh dokin pemeh mow?
46001021	Mleiya Isowr luwkinritna' thung vah dultipaam mih luwkinritna' ar'aang ngi Isowr rah deimeh. Mleiya tokmowna' ki paumin tparjaam ava' ar'aang ngi lamkrin kcha' rek tsan chaak rang avah Isowr plungngam.
46001022	Mleiya Jihudi rekvah titinna' qhil lamda, ungta Grik rekki luwkinritna' thlaam chlamda.
46001023	Pdainu neenvah, Jihudi rek thenvah khuhsiir tpirthitna' lung ungta Grik rekki thenvah tokmowna' Mesaiah ava' kdoparjaam chaakin.
46001024	Pdainu mdo'own dok mii rek hinvah, tidit tah Jihudi rek yoso Grik rek yoso Mesaiah avah Isowr ruhtanna' ungta Isowr luwkinritna'.
46001025	Mleiya Isowr kmowna' avah dultimii luwkinritna' hinni kinrit ungta Isowr ruhdownna' avah dultimii ruhtan hinni mruh ktang.
46001026	Mleiya ku'uknau rek naan nih, naan adoto'own chaak naan avah adeiyin. Mleiya dultimii rek dopertetna' dilkqowi vah mdo'own rek naan meknem avah kinritin ptipmeh, naan meknem avah mruh ktang ruk am maantih ungta takyat kurhuwiyi kqou ruk am maantih.
46001027	Pdainu mii kinrit rek ningkya mdopiikna' rah Isowr rih hava' dultipaam ki kokmoksi dow rek ava' mdokchol. Mruh ktang mii rek ningkya mdopiikna' rah Isowr rih hava' dultipaam ki mruh kdowngsi dow rek ava' mdokchol.
46001028	Ungta Isowr rih ka'am dok ksa dow rek ava' msit ktaak mdopurthuhna' rah hava' dultipaam ki kyuwmsi dow rek ungta tuktsutma rek ungta dowksi kma' dow rek ava' mdokchol.
46001029	Mleiya dultimii kuwkhat leh ruk Mma' aang ngi mpirlin rang pemeh.
46001030	Pdainu Mma' leiyi, naanna Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am kchaan ptih. Mma' avah Isowr hinki neen nthenni luwkinritna', rinkinditna' ungta neen mikpenje kchaan ungta mikaktlan kchaan ava'.
46001031	Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Kpirlin kcha' mma' ava ngi Kruwng hinni ipirlin chso,” mdodit. (Jer. 9:24)
46002001	Nei ku'uknau rek, neiyi naan ahin nih kthlen chaak thung vah Isowr ki rinpaumin avah kpaudei dok ki mditmata luwkinritna' dok ki kparjaam rah kthleng pmaang.
46002002	Mleiya neiya, naan arlak inni, mdopthowi yown Mma' tidit tah Jisu Khrista ava' kma'don morson adodehmana' raan kuplung kdopri chaak.
46002003	Neiyi naan tu' ruhdownna' thuh, ningqitna' thuh ungta kunchuwn kunchuwn nih arvang ka'am kcha' ping.
46002004	Ungta nei kpauthe rekle' kpau parjaam rek avah dultimii luwkinritna' ki tupnuwm chaakna' pauna rek pemeh. Pdainu avah Pthla ki ungta ruhtanna' ki mkandanna'.
46002005	Mleiya havah naan alamrinin avah dultimii luwkinritna' thungki mda, Isowr ruhtanna' thungki mkurthuh rah.
46002006	Anto'daat yoso, neen nih luwkinritna' ki paumin avah ktangksa mii rek hinni kdosaamin. Pdainu havah, hava' tunpha ki luwkinritna' ava' pemeh mditmata 'tunpha ki msit ktaak paamkpu rek luwkinritna' ava' pemeh.
46002007	Pdainu neen nih Isowr luwkinritna' avah paukordowl lih kdotheen. Ungta hava' kordowl luwkinritna' avah mpha mapqhan duduh ngi Isowr rih neen tkonlor chaakna' rang ki thenni mdoporthlon dok ksa.
46002008	Havah, hava' 'tunpha ki paamkpu rek khat leh ngi mdodeh pindit chaakin pemeh. Mleiya mmaan nih ava' mdehpindit chaak tlaangin bih, konlor ki Kruwng avah mmaan nih pthowi lam nimeh.
46002009	Pdainu hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Isowr rih Mma' vonsat klow rek thenni mdoporthlon dow rek avah, mik khadaat rukku deimeh, kna khadaat rukku arja meh. Kuwkhat plung thung rukku avale'lei avah binmeh,” mdodit. (Is. 64:4)
46002010	Pdainu Isowr rih Mma' Pthla amleiyi neen nihin nih mipurphuwn piikinda. Mleiya Pthla ava ngi dow mkheng avah mdothlaam. Ou Mma ngi kukthuwk dok Kruwng dow rek rukka mdothlaam pthuh.
46002011	Mleiya mdak thung ngi ka'am, mii ava' ki pthla kma'don miiktlok khat ki plungbin kdei a taluhep kdu ki mii rangda? Anto' heppi Isowr Pthla kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi Isowr plungbin avah deimeh.
46002012	'Tunnu neenna dultipaam ki pthla ava' tarlaan chaakin pemeh, pdainu Isowr hinki Pthla ava' tarlaan chaakin. Mleiya havah Isowr rih neen nihin nih mkhon ktaak ki midotpiik chaakin dow rek ava' tedeh chaakna'.
46002013	Hava' dow rek avah neen nih dultimii rekki luwkinritna' dopurchuh heppi kdotheen pemeh. Pdainu Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mdotpurchuh chaakin heppi kdotheen. Neen nih pthla lamki rek avah Pthla hinki pauna rekki kdothe chaakin.
46002014	Pdainu daksa lam ki mii ava ngi Isowr Pthla hinki dow rek avah mdo'arlaan pemeh. Mleiya avale' avah mma' hinvah tokmowna' mditmata mma ngi avah mdodeh pindit pchaan pemeh. Mleiya mmaan avah Pthla 'lam thah tedehpindit rah.
46002015	Pdainu pthla lamki mii ava ngi dow mkheng 'leen pau mdopindit, pdainu kuwkhat tih mma' 'leenni pau pindit meh.
46002016	Mleiya, “Kuw ngi Kruwng plungril mdeh? Kuw ngi Mmah kpurchuk rang?” (Is. 40:13) Pdainu neen nthung inni Khrista ki plungril avah ka'am.
46003001	Ungta ku'knau rek, neiyi naan ahin nih pthla 'lam ki mii rek heppi adoktheen pemeh. Pdainu daksa lam thuh ka'am mii rek tidit tah Khrista hinni ka'am nau kdowng rek heppi adoktheen.
46003002	Neiyi naanna arnu adokepneek chaakin ungta thenktang adokpiikin pemeh. Mleiya naanna thenktang ado'arlaan pchaanin pemeh ungta 'tun kpha thung rukku thenktang adochaak pchaanin pemeh.
46003003	Mleiya naanna 'tun kpha thung ngi daksa 'lam thuh ka'amin ptih. Mleiya naan athung inni tepnerna' le' tker'ena' ungta loptkenqhenna' ka'am tlit daat a. Ava' vah naanna daksa 'lam thah ungta dultimii thlaang thlaang ngi am chmaan timow?
46003004	Mleiya naan arlakin ki khatvah, “neiya Paul hinki ping,” ungta morson khatvah, “neiya Apollos hinki ping,” aditin thung ngi, naanna dultimii thlaang thlaang ngi am chmaan timow?
46003005	Mdittu' Paul lah kuwda ungta Apollos tah kuw o? Mmaan avah, mmaan ar'aang ngi naan nih lam'adorin chaakin, Mma' suwk rek ngaal lam. Mmaan nah Kruwng ngi mma' mma' hinni mdopiik mnong ava' ki suwk reklam.
46003006	Neiyi phunnu ungta Apollos tih dii mdolet pdainu Isowr rih chiibul rek avah mdopmown lam.
46003007	Mdit bih kphun kcha' mii ava'ruk ungta dii klet kcha' mii ava'ruk mkenreellam pemeh pdainu kiplin kapsaang Isowr avah mkenreelsi.
46003008	'Tunnu kphun kcha' mii avale' dii klet kcha' mii ava ngi khadaat tih mnongin ava' mdotlot chaakin. Ungta mmaanve ngi mma' mma' ki mnongtlot chaak dilkqowiyi mnongqhat'lot rekin avah kphang chlam rah.
46003009	Mleiya neenna Isowr tu' nong ktlow kcha'sap rekin ping, naanna Isowr lou inptih ungta naanna Isowr innsakin ptih.
46003010	Nei kihin nih mdotpiik Isowr plungnee dilkqowiyi, kinrit innksapa heppi neiyi innmun avah kdopqhan ungta morson khat tih ava' 'leenni mdosak. Pdainu mii khimkheiyi taluhep pih ksak chaak a tidit 'leenni ikilrindei chso.
46003011	Mleiya neiyi kdopqhan dok innmun ava' kma'don kuwkhat tih ktlei khat pqhang pchaang nimeh. Ava' innmun avah Jisu Khrista ava'.
46003012	'Tunnu kuwmiikhat tih hava' innmun 'leenni jiiring ngi, jiipowl lih, lung kenreel lih, ding ngi nowm mih, buhkuwng ngi ksa ruk krow.
46003013	Mii khimkhei ki nongtlot rek avah kpandang rah, tidit tah mnit ava ngi kpurphuwng chrah. Mleiya meiyi avah kpurphuwng rah ungta taluhep kdu nong tidit mdodehna' rah meiyi mii khimkhei ki nongtlot rek avah kperteel rah.
46003014	Kuwmiikhat nongtlot tidit tah mma' dosak avah ma'am tlit daat bih mma ngi mnongqhat'lot avah kphang chrah.
46003015	Kuwmiikhat nongtlot avah meiyi mkaak chaak bih avah mma' kenvei chaakna' kurthuwk chrah. Pdainu mmah mei thungki tkhai heppi ksan chrah.
46003016	Naanna Isowr luwbuk'inn kenje avaan ptih tidit kerdei maan timow? Mleiya Isowr Pthla avah naan athung ngi ka'am.
46003017	Kuwmiikhat tih Isowr luwbuk'inn kenje ava' mtopbor chaak bih, Isowr rih mma' rukka ktopbor pthi rah. Mleiya Isowr luwbuk'inn kchiir avah kenje ungta naanna luwbuk'inn kenje avaan ptih.
46003018	Kuwkhat leh ngi mdak mthina kurhuwn chaak mso. Ungta arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tih 'tunki mpha thung ngi kinrit kcha' rek rek heppi mkarjaak cheentung ngi mma ngi mkinrit chaakna' rah ikmok chso.
46003019	Mleiya hava' dultipaam ki luwkinritna' avah Isowr hinvah tokmowna'. Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mma ngi kinrit avah mrilqhatmana' thung ngi mdotepmen.” (Job 5:13)
46003020	Ungta veikhat hanto ngi theda: “Kruwng ngi kinrit plungbin avah msit ktaak tidit mdeh.” (Luw. 94:11)
46003021	Avaleiyi, kuwkhat leh ngi dultimii ki mleiyi mpirlin chaak row nimeh. Mleiya dow mkheng avah naan adow.
46003022	Paul ruk Apollos ruk ungta Siphas rukka naan adoyesang. Hava' dultipaam ki dow rek ruk mditmata rinkum ki ruk mditmata kdiyou ruk mditmata 'tun ka'am dow ruk mditmata karvang bei rang dow rek ava' rukka naan adowyesang daat.
46003023	Ungta naanna Khrista down ptih ungta Khrista a Isowr dow.
46004001	Avaleiyi, mii rekki neen avah Khrista sopklow kcha' rekkat tih ungta Isowr ki paukordowl ava' ki suwkkenreel khat tih miheitai chaanso.
46004002	Hava' han'tun nih suwkkenreel rek tkurthuhna' thung ngu trinchaak krow tkurthuh rang avah msit ka'am.
46004003	Pdainu naan nih mditmata dultimii luwsang ngi pau mpindit inbih, nei kthen vah avah taluruk pemeh pdainu dakat tih neiyi kdak kthina kpindit chmaang.
46004004	Mleiya neiya k'leen nih dow khatleh mkepteng ka'am mih deimaang. Ungta dow rek ava ngi neiya mdotpindit chaak pemeh pdainu Kruwng ngi neiya pau mdotpindit chaak.
46004005	Avaleiyi, mpha mveduh ungta Kruwng murjun duh ngi naan nih dow khatleh 'leenni pau pinditmaan. Mma ngi mii rekki kjiingnu thuh mdodowlin dow rek avah mar'aang thuh kupthuwk rah. Ungta Mma ngi dultimii rek plungril rekki plungbin rek avah kpurphuwng rah. Audilli miikhat khat ki tpanpaakna' avah Isowr hinki karlaang chrah.
46004006	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek neiyi hava' dow rek avah naan athenni bitinna' kurthuwk ki nei kdak le' Apollos 'leenni kponthow chaak a. Mleiya havah naan nih tikjit dok ava' heihin nih adobinmana' raan ki then. Mleiya havah naan nih, miikhat avah morson khat heihin nih plinda a'ammana' raan ki then.
46004007	Mleiya naanna kuw ngi khat le' khat avah adotpinqim maanno? Nang ngi ado'arlaanma talu ka'am a? 'Tunnu naan nih ava' arlaan chaak innu, taluleiyi naan nih karlaang kma' heppi kpirlin inpti o?
46004008	Naanna kokhop dokin ptih! Naanna svang kthuwk dok kchaan ptih! Naan nih neen ktaak ki paamkruwng rek heppi ka'am kchaan ptih. Ungta dakat tih neen rukku naan tu' paamkruwng heppi ka'amsap chaakna' raanni naan nih anto ngi paamkruwng heppi a'am raan avah kdongei chaak.
46004009	Mleiya tamsi rek neen avah Isowr rih, mii rekki tidiyowna' kpha ngi mdopsul chaak rang ngi mqutna' thuh mdotupthuhn. Mleiya dultimii rek hinruk ungta vaantamsi rek hin rukku dultipaam thung ngi neen avah mii rek dosut rang ngi mdotthiikin.
46004010	Neenna Khrista ki thenni kokmok rekin ping pdainu naanna Khrista hinni kinrit kcha' rekin ptih. Neenna kruhn kdowng pdainu naanna aruhn ktang. Naanna miidokyat rekin ptih pdainu neenna midokyatma rekin ping.
46004011	Hava' 'tunki mpha thung vah npwoi'in thamda ungta nningin kraalda ungta nbuw'ndiirin ammda. Mii rekki miei'inda ungta ni'innin ammda.
46004012	Neen nih nkhut inni nong lou'in minnu nong tolow chaakin. Mmaan nih mitrai chaakin thung ngu neenvah panpaak chaan minnu. Ungta mmaan nih tyat chiireelna' mitpiikin thung ngi neenvah diil chdaatin minnu.
46004013	Mmaan nih neen nleiyi kthi mtheien thung ngu neenvah pnuwm chaan minnu. Neenna dultipaam ki ktoborsi mipthutinda. 'Tun kpha rukku neenna dow mkheng ki junthildau mipthutinda.
46004014	Neiyi hava' dow rek avah naan ningkya adokpiik naan nih kdokjit pemeh pdainu vonsat kdolow chaak knau le' heppi adokpilqhit chaakin.
46004015	Mleiya naan nih Khrista hinni kthepiik rek pun sowm thlowi yown tih, Pa knempok adothlowi in pemeh. Mleiya naanna Khrista hinni kqhapaumin amleiyi neiyi adokupluk chaakin.
46004016	Avaleiyi, akoksow chaak inna naan nih neiyi kdotlot heppi atlown.
46004017	Mleiya hava' leiyi neiyi kvonsat'low kchapa, Kruwng hinni trinchaak krow Timothy avah naan ahin nih kdopthlat chaak. Mma ngi neiyi Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am chaakna' rinchan tidit tah mmun ktai thuh lamrinlop khimkhei rek kdopurchuh chaak lam avah ayuktipbin phaak chraan.
46004018	'Tunnu neiya kthleng liit kma' rang heppi, arlakin ki mii aangqhe rek avah kpirlin dok kcha' ki kpaulam a.
46004019	Pdainu Kruwng plungbin mkurthuh bih kbeisek ki ahinin nih thleng nikdi'. Audilli neiyi kpirlin kcha' rek avah mmaan pauna rek kma' mmaan ruhtanna' avah talu tidit deinikdi'.
46004020	Mleiya Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah pauna daatlu pemeh pdainu ruhtanna'.
46004021	Naan nih talu angei' inna? Neiyi kchung sinda kthlen rah adongeiyin mow, mditmata vonsat le' pthlakdowng ngi thleng nikdi'?
46005001	Mii rekki dodak kat tih kihin nih hanto ngi msonpiik lamda, tidit tah naan arlak inni jowlkpurju ka'am lam a mdit inna. Hava' hep jowlkpurju avah Chaatktlei rek hin kpha rukku tapdaulu pemeh. Mleiya miikhat tih mpa snu mko'onqhi a.
46005002	Ungta naan nih hava' ktlow mii avah naan arlakin ki adoknen pthi raan. Pdainu naanna kpirlin dok ki pau intinu anto' mda, naanna aqa'aqei chaak raan.
46005003	Mleiya daksa ngi neiya naan ahininvah ammaang pdainu kapthla a naan ahinin nih ka'am tlit daat. Neiyi arlak inni ka'am daat heppi hava' ktlow mii ava' 'leenni paukpindit chaak dok a.
46005004	Naan nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing ngi akurku chaakin thung ngi neiya kapthla ngi neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ruhtan nih ahinin nih ka'am imping.
46005005	Mleiya Kruwng Jisu nit tih mapthla avah mdosan chaakna' rah tidit tah mdaksa ava' mdo'ekre dokna' rah ava' hep mii avah Seitan hinni aparlaan pthiin.
46005006	Naan nih apirlin chaakin avah kqha pemeh, tidit tah thowl mnau'suwn daat ava ngi saikan mkheng avah mdokmet doklu tidit deimaan timow?
46005007	Avaleiyi, naan nih thowl tathlaakma saikanren akurthuhna' raanni thowl pli avah avarpthi dokin. Tidit tah naanna dakat tih thowl ktaak avaan ptih. Mleiya neenki Taplaanna', Khrista avah neen nthen inni rintparlaan dok.
46005008	Avaleiyi, neen nih thowl pli ktaak ki tmaalna' ava' idan chaan cheh. Mditmata miiqhatmana' kbin ungta kthi ktlow thowl pli avah thlowi maan cheh. Pdainu plung kertleuna' le' kindit ki thowldii ktaak thenpen ava' ithlowi chaan cheh.
46005009	Nei kpaukjit thung ngi neiyi naan ahin nih kthe chaak a tidit tah jowlkpurju mii rektu' naanna akilqhi raan pemeh.
46005010	Anto' pdainu neiyi hava' dultipaam ki jowlkpurju mii rek ava' kdothena' pemeh. Mditmata kpunjuwr rek mditmata miikolrowt rek mditmata pthla luwkbuk rek kdothena' pemeh. Anto' mkurthuh bih naanna hava' dultipaam mada ksun chraan ptih.
46005011	Pdainu 'tunnu havah naan nih unau adoditin mii ava' adokorthlow qhimana' raan ki thenni havah kdokjit. Mma' avah lowsangkqhi mditmata kpunjuwr mditmata pthla luwkbuk mditmata kthi kthe mditmata thowldii kipri mditmata miikolrowt mkurthuh cheentung ngi naan nih mma' avah korthlowqhi maan. Ungta then kpha ruk chaakqhisap maan.
46005012	Mleiya neiyi duwn ki rek avah taluleiyi m'leenin nih pau pindit lam nikdi? Naan nih mthung ki rek 'leenni pau pindit maan timow?
46005013	Pdainu Isowr rih duwn ki rek mmaan ava' 'leennu paukpindit chrah. Avaleiyi, “Arlakin ki kqha kma' mii avah aloupthi dokin.” (Knl. 17:7, 19:19, 22:21,24, 24:7)
46006001	Taluhep pih naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tih morson khat tu' mkirthitna' ma'amcheu, mma ngi miikenje rek hin kma' mrinkindit kma' rek hinni pau ktipindit rang ngi mdoqhi pchaanno?
46006002	Naan nih miikenje rekki dultipaam avah paukpindit rah tidit avah deimaan timow? Ungta dultipaam avah naan nih kpindit rah akurthuh innu, naan nih ava'sisi rek avah pchaang maan timow?
46006003	Neen nih vaantamsi rek 'leenni pau tpindit raan tidit avah naan nih deimaan timow? Ava' mkurthuh u, hava' rinkum ki dow rek ngaalla tya knem mih pau tpindit pchaan chaak raanno?
46006004	Naan nih hava' rinkum ki dow rek 'leenni pau tpinditna' rah ma'am thung ngu lamrinlop pih msit ktaaksi ngi mdobin miikhat avah paukpinditpa rang ngi akcholin mow?
46006005	Neiyi havah naan ningkya adokpiikna' inni kdothe. Mleiya naan arlak inni kindit khatpang daat ruk ka'am kma' mow, tidit tah unau khat le' unau khat arlak ki paukpindit pchaang miikhat leh ruk ammeh mow?
46006006	Pdainu anto' kmah ngi unau khat tih unau khat kepteng ngi nowlam thung ngi chetda ungta ava' rukka lamkrin kma' rek hinni kchet!
46006007	'tunnu avaleiyi naan nih knempok ki adoparmaan avah kandang kcha' a tidit tah naan nih khat le' khat tpertenna ngi nowlam thah kchet inptih. Ava' vah taluleiyi mii rek rukku ahinin nih mdoparma raan avah adorot chaakin pemeh? Ungta taluleiyi mii rekki adotolrowt raan avah adorot in pemeh?
46006008	Anto' rang pemeh, naan adak kat inni karmak avah tlown tinu ungta miihuwng chaan tinu ungta naan nih hava' dow rek avah a'uanau rekin hinni adotlotin!
46006009	Naan nih mrinkindit kma' rekki Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah alrouchom mih chom chlam nimeh tidit avah deimaan timow? Kuwkhat leh ngi ahuwng chmaanso. Mleiya jowlkpurju rek mditmata pthla luwkbu rek mditmata lowsangkqhi rek mditmata psel mdak kurjur rek mditmata psel le' psel lowsang kilqhi rek,
46006010	kupru rek mditmata kpunjuwr rek mditmata thowldii kipri rek mditmata kthi rek mditmata miikolrowt mkheng hava ngi rek Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah alrouchom mih chom chlam nimeh.
46006011	Ungta naan aangqhe rek rukka ava' hep daat inptih. Pdainu Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing ngi ungta neenki Isowr Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi naanna adotulqhut chaak dokin ungta adotpenje chaak dokin ungta adotpindit chaak dokin.
46006012	Nei kthen vah dow mkheng avah kdotlot krow pdainu dow mkheng rek ava ngi neiya mdotbom pemeh. Nei kthen vah dow mkheng kdotlot krow pdainu neiya dow khatleh ngi ruhtanna' kurduh ngi mqhi nimeh.
46006013	Thendam rek avah powipii ki then ungta powipii avah thendam ki then. Pdainu Isowr rih mikniing ngi msit ktaak kpurthuh pthi lamrah. 'Tunnu daksa avah jowltpurjutna' ki then pemeh pdainu daksa avah Kruwng then ungta Kruwng avah daksa ki then.
46006014	Ungta Isowr rih Kruwng avah kdiyou thungki perdelda. Ungta Mma ngi neen rukka Mma' ruhtanna' ava ngi mikperdel raan.
46006015	Naan nih naan adaksaan avah Khrista pna rek tidit deimaan timow? Mdittu' neiyi Khrista pna avah louda dakkurjur snu ava pna rektu' porjom nikmow? Immeh! Anto'liit rang pemeh.
46006016	Mditmata naan nih dak kurjur snu tu' korjom mma' avah snu ava'tu' daksa khadaat lam tidit deimaan timow? Tidit tah Mma ngi hanto' mdothe: “Mii 'knii rek avah daksa khadaat mkurthuh rah.” (Rnp. 2:24)
46006017	Anto' heppi Kruwng tu' korjom kcha' mma' avah Mma' tu' pthla khadaat lam.
46006018	Naan nih jowltpurjutna' thungki ichen dok chaan. Dultimii ngi mdo'arve pnu khimkhei avah daksa duwn ki yesang. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih jowlmpurjut bih mma ngi mdaksa kepteng ngi mthina 'leenni pnu kperve kcha' a.
46006019	Mditmata naan nih adaksaan avah naan athung inni ka'am Pthla Kchiir ki luwbuk'inn kenje ava' tidit deimaan timow? Naan nih Mma' avah Isowr hinki adothlowi chaakin ungta naanna athina inni korthlowi kcha' inptipmeh.
46006020	Mleiya naanna mkhon nih adotren chaak dokin. Avaleiyi, naan nih Isowr hinki adaksaan ava ngi ungta apthlaan nih Isowr avah aponlorchaan.
46007001	'Tunnu naan nih nei kihin nih adokjitin dow rek ava'leiyi ikjit chnih. Mleiya pselpa vah snu avah mdothown liitma ngi kqha.
46007002	Anto' pdainu jowltpurjutna' leiyi, psel ktaiyi mnuwn khat khat mdothlowi chaak rah ungta anto' heppi snu ngi mi'innpu khat khat mdo'arve chaak rah.
46007003	Mi'innpu ava ngi mnuwn ava' hinni mdopiik rang mdongei avah mdopiik rah ungta anto' heppi mnuwn ava' rukku avah mdopiik rah.
46007004	Mnuwn ava ngi mdaksa 'leenni ruhtanna' mdothlowi pemeh pdainu mi'innpu ava ngi mdothlowi. Ungta anto' heppi mi'innpu ava ngi mdaksa 'leenni ruhtanna' mdothlowi pemeh pdainu mnuwn ava ngi mdothlowi.
46007005	Naanve ngi mpha mruk ki then kma'don khat le' khat hinki kparkhaan chmaan. Mleiya naanve ngi adakin avah then tngowlna' ungta rinkthamna' ki thenni ikparlaan chaan pdainu Seitan nih naan avah daksa tkorjownmana' thuh adotepthleem mana' raan ki thenni veikhat ikurduh tengin.
46007006	Pdainu neiyi havah tporkol heina' ngi kdothe pdainu paureen nih kdothe pemeh.
46007007	Mleiya neivah mii mkheng ngi nei kehep pih ma'am rah kdongei chaak. Pdainu mii khimkheiyi Isowr rih mma' mma' hinni mdopiik chla khatkhat mdothlowisap chaak tidit tah miikhat tih hava' hep ungta morson khat tih ava' hep ava' mdothlowi chaak.
46007008	Pdainu neiyi innknei kma' rek ungta meikhu ngi ka'am rek hinni kthe a: Mleiya mmaan nih nei kehep pih ma'am chaakin bih avah mmaan thenni kqha.
46007009	Pdainu mmaan mthina inni mkorjown pchaan chaakmaan bih mmaan rukka inn inei chdaat lamso. Mleiya daksa dongei thung ngi kparkada ta'am rang hinvah inn nee chaak ki kqha.
46007010	'Tunnu neiyi innknei ksa rek hinni hava' pauqum ava' kpiik a, anto' pdainu kpii avah nei pemeh Kruwng ngi mdopiik lam. Mleiya nuwn khat avah mi'innpu hinki msunliit rang pemeh.
46007011	Pdainu mnuwn ava ngi msun rang cheentung ngi mma ngi innknei kmah i'am chdaatso mditmata mi'innpu tu' veikhat ikalqhat chlamso. Ungta innpu khat ava' vah mnuwn avah mdokenqhenqhi rang pemeh.
46007012	Pdainu morson rek hinvah neiyi hava' kthe a, havah neiyi kdothe Kruwng hinki pemeh. Mleiya nu'nnau kuwmiikhat tih lamkrin kma' snu khat mko'onqhi dok cheentung ngi ungta snu ava' rukku mi'innpu tu' ta'am rang avah mningtlunna' mkurthuh cheentung ngi am chdaatso mma ngi snu avah kenqhenqhi mso.
46007013	Ungta ava' heppi snu khat tih lamkrin kma' innpu khat mko'onqhi dok cheentung ngi ungta mma ngi mnuwn tu' ta'am rang avah mningtlunna' mkurthuh cheentung ngi am chdaatso, mma ngi mi'innpu avah kenqhenqhi mso.
46007014	Mleiya lamkrin kma', innpu avah mnuwn ava'leiyi mdopchiir dok ungta lamkrin kma' mnuwn avah mi'innpu leiyi, mdopchiir dok. Mditma bih naan anaupluk rekin avah chlam kurthuwk chlam rah pdainu 'tunnu mmaan avah kchiir kcha'lam.
46007015	Pdainu mmaan thungki lamkrin kma' ava ngi msun chaak cheentung ngi mma' avah sun chdaatso, ava' thung ngi nu'unnau mditmata nchar'nyur khat avah ava' hep thung ngi mkorbowl tlit daatna' rah mlei ammeh. Mleiya Isowr rih neen avah plung kdai thung ngi midoto'own chaakin.
46007016	Mleiya, O nuwn nang, nang ngi a'innpu avah san chna mow san chnim tih tidit avah taluhep pih adodeh? Mditmata O innpu nang, nang ngi asnu avah san chna mow san chnim tih tidit avah taluhep pih adodeh?
46007017	Pdainu Isowr rih miiktai hinni mdothem dok ava' heppi ungta Kruwng ngi miiktai mdo'own chaak dok ava' heppi mma ngi ichet chso. Ungta neiyi anto' heppi lamrinlop rek mkheng hinni hava' pauqum avah kpiik a.
46007018	Mleiya vunmreen meek arlaan nih mdo'own chaak dok kuwmiikhat ka'am ngaal mow? Mma' ava ngi vunkreen kma' kurthuwk mso. Ungta vunmreenma arlaan nih mdo'own dok chaak kuwmiikhat ka'am ngaalmow? Mma' ava ngi vunkreen kurthuwk mso.
46007019	Vuntreen nih msit amna' ka'am pemeh ungta vuntreenma ava ngi msit amna' ka'am pemeh, pdainu msit ka'am avah Isowr paupiik rek topqowi chaak ava'.
46007020	Avaleiyi, mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mdo'own chaakna' kat thung ngi ma'am chaak rah.
46007021	Nang avah suwk'owr khat akurthuh arlaan nih adoto'own chaak ngaalmow? Mdit cheen tung ngi, nang ngi avah binbinma' pdainu mii'ol adotpurthuhna' mqhat cheentung ngi nang ngi avah asinton cha'.
46007022	Mleiya suwk'owr rih ma'am chaak arlaan nih Kruwng hinni mdo'own chaak dok mma' avah Kruwng mii'ol kurthuwk kcha' a. Ava' heppi mii'ol mkurthuh arlaan nih mdo'own chaak mma' ava ngi Khrista ki suwk'owr kurthuwk kcha' a.
46007023	naan avah mkhon nih adotren chaak dokin, avaleiyi dultimii rek suwk'owr kurthuwkmaan.
46007024	Ku'uknau rek naan nih khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mdo'own chaak dokna' ava'kat thung ngi mma ngi Isowr tu' ma'am chaak rah.
46007025	'Tunnu kinrim mih ka'am kcha' rekki mleivah neiyi Kruwng hinki paureen kdophan ammeh. Anto'daat yoso Kruwng ngi Mma' plungnee thung ngi trinchaak krow mdopthut chaak khat kurthuwk ki paukpindit chaak a.
46007026	Mleiya hava' tunpha ki tparsatna' ava'leiyi hava ngi kqha rah kbin chaak a. Mleiya pselpa khat tih mjikjik ki ma'am chaak daat ava ngi kqha.
46007027	Nang nga asnu hinni korbowl kcha' ngaal ptimo? Mdit cheen tung ngi akerthlena' rah thlaamma'. Nang nga asnu hinki kerthlet kcha' ngaal ptimow? Mdit cheen tung ngi asnu ktlok khat thlaamma'.
46007028	Pdainu nang ngi innknei chdaat akurthuh rukku nang ngi pnu arvei mtih. Ungta kinrim ava ngi inn nei chyoso mma ngi pnu arvei meh. Anto' pdainu ava' hep rek ava ngi mdaksa thuh tparsatna' kduh chrah pdainu neiyi akperthle pthi daat inna.
46007029	Pdainu ku'uknau rek neiyi havah kthe chaak a tidit tah mpha avah arvang ktowi kcha' a. Mleiya 'tundil ki kupqhun nih mnuwn rek ka'am mmaan avale' rukka khadaat ruk ka'am kma' hep daat lamrah.
46007030	Ungta kqap kcha' rek mmaan avah kqapliit kma' hep daat lamrah, kanpa kcha' rek mmaan avah kanpa kcha'liit kma' hep daat lamrah ungta kren kcha' rek mmaan avah kthlowi kcha'liit kma' hep daat lamrah.
46007031	Ungta hava' dultipaam ki dow rek ava' kriin kipsit kcha' rekki ava' avah karmak ki ksinton kma'hep pih ka'am lamrah. Mleiya hava' dultipaam ki ruwngchen avah kthleng chrah.
46007032	Pdainu naan nih ava'leiyi plungkya kmah ngi a'am raan kngei a. Pdainu innknei kma' mma' ava ngi taluhep pih mma ngi Kruwng plungngam tlow chnikdi tidit tih Kruwng dow rek ava' mdokilrin qhi chaak.
46007033	Pdainu snu kthe dok mma' ava ngi mnuwn plungngam taluhep pih tlotpiik nikdi, mdodit leiyi, mma ngi dultipaam ki dow rek ava' mdokilrin qhi chaak.
46007034	Inn knei dok snu khat le' kinrim khat avah mkerthlenna' ka'am. Mleiya inn knei mlai snu ava ngi mdak avah daksa lam thang ruk ungta pthla 'lam thang rukku mkenje chaakna' rang ki thenni Kruwng dow rek ava' mdokilrin qhi chaak. Pdainu inn knei dok kcha' snu ava ngi taluhep pih mi'innpu plungngam taluhep pih tlow chnikdi mdodit leiyi, dultipaam ki dow rek ava' mdokilrin qhi chaak.
46007035	Ungta neiyi havah naan athen inni mqhatna' rang ki thenni kdothe, a'leenin nih ktaang kdopansamna' pemeh. Pdainu naan nih, Kruwng avah dakat tih ungta plung kenqhena' ktaak ki sop'adolow chaakna' raan ki thenni havah kdothe.
46007036	Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih mma ngi mma' ki kinrim khat ava' hinni karmak heppi korthlong ngi mkarjaak cheentung ngi ungta mma ngi kseet mkurthuhna' ki reipaar kdei dok kcha' mkurthuh ungta avah totlot daat rang mkurthuh cheentung ngi mma ngi mdobin rek avah atlow chdaatso, mma ngi pnu arvei meh, mmaan nah inn'inei chdaat lamso.
46007037	Anto'daat yoso muplung thung ngi knet tih krip kcha' ungta ava' kikriing kma' pdainu mthina ki muplungbin thung ngi mruh ktang ungta mma' ki kinrim khat avah anto'kat tih innpne nimaang tidit tih plung kiprip kcha' mma' ava' rukku kqha mtlotta.
46007038	Ungta inn kepnee kcha' ava' rukku kqha mtlot chaak a pdainu inn kepnee kma' mma' ava ngi makqhabet mtlot chaak a.
46007039	Mleiya mnuwn avah mi'innpu mrindaat khimkhei thuh nowlam mih mdobowl tlit daat. Pdainu mi'innpu mdiyow chaak bih mma' avah Kruwng hinni lamkrin kcha' mii hindaat tih innknei kcha' krow ki ning'olna' mthlowi chaak a.
46007040	Pdainu nei kpaupindit chaak dilkqowi vah mma ngi anto ngi ma'am chaak daat tih msuwkqhabet rah ungta neiyi Isowr Pthla ava' rukka kthlowi chaak immow, tidit tih kbin chaak a.
46008001	'Tunnu neiyi mii rekki dow pthla rek hinni rinmdoparlaan dokin dow rek leiyi, kjit chnih. Neen nih ndehn tidit tah nkheng inni tedeh pinditna' avah nthlowisap in. Tedehpiditna' ava ngi kpirlin kcha' pdainu vonsat ava ngi mdopqhan.
46008002	Ungta kuwmiikhat tih mma ngi hava' dow rek avah kdei kcha' heppi mkirbin chaak bih, mma ngi mdodeh rangkat avah dow khatleh deimeh.
46008003	Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih Isowr vonsat mlow chaak bih hava' khat avah Mma ngi mdehpindit chaak a.
46008004	Avaleiyi, dow pthla rek hinni tparlaan dok dow rek ava' tchaak ki mlei avah, neen nih ndehn tidit tah dultipaam thung ngi dow pthla rek avah taluruk pemeh tidit ndehn ungta khat ava' kma'donle Isowr morson ka'am pemeh.
46008005	Mleiya parvaan thah mditmata dultipaam thung ngi isowr rek mdoditin knempok ki am chyoso, tidit tah isowr rekle' Kruwng rek knempok ki ka'am lam.
46008006	Pdainu neen nthen invah dow mkheng thuhna' ungta Mma' then tkurthuh chaak naan Pa Isowr khadaat chrel ka'am. Ungta dow mkheng Mma' ar'aang ngi kkurthuwk ungta Mma' ar'aang ngi trin chaak naan Kruwng Jisu Khrista khadaat ka'am.
46008007	Anto'daat yoso mii khimkheiyi hava' tedeh pinditna' avah mdothlowisap pemeh. Mleiya kuwmiikhat tah dow pthla rek 'leenni mnowpa ma'am chaak leiyi, mmaan nih ava' hep daat then mchaakin thung ngi thendam avah dow pthla khat hinni rintparlaan dok ksa heppi bin lamda. Ungta mmaan ki muplungrildeh chaakin ava' mdown leiyi, mthen chaakin ava ngi topbor lamda.
46008008	Pdainu thendam ava ngi neen avah Isowr hinni midotapnai in pemeh ungta nchaak rukku taqhatna' set pemeh ungta nchaakma rukku tithitna' pemeh.
46008009	Pdainu naan nih hava' to'ol chaakna' adothlowiyin ava ngi mruh kdowng rek khuhsiir pirthitna' akurthuh mana' raan ki thenni ikilrindei chaan.
46008010	Mleiya tedeh pinditna' kthlowi kcha' nang ngi pthla luwbuk'inn thung ngi kcha rang ngi ako'on avah mruh kdowng miikhat tih mdeh a ungta nang akdei mii ava ngi dow pthla rek hinni tparlaan dow rek avah tchaak krowpakda kdi ngi changkarngam mih mbin chaak a.
46008011	Mdit bih Khrista ngi mthen inni mdodiyow piik dok mruh kdowng unau rek avah nang adodeh pinditna' leiyi, kenvei chlam rang?
46008012	Pdainu naan nih anto ngi a'uanau rekin kepteng ngi pnu arvei intinu mmaan ki plungril kdowng adoplim piikin ava ngi naan nih Khrista kepteng ngi pnu avah ado'arve chaakin.
46008013	Avaleiyi, neiyi thendam kdochaak ava ngi ku'uknau pnu arvena' rah mkurthuh bih, neiyi saa avah veikhat chaliit nimaang. Mditma bih neiyi ku'uknau avah khuhsiir ktipirthit a.
46009001	Neiya tamsi khat kma' ping mow? Neiya mii'ol kma' ping mow? Neiya neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista kmik ki kdei kma' ping mow? Naanna Kruwng hinni nei knongtlot rek kma' inptih mow?
46009002	Neiya mii morson hinni tamsi khat kkurthuhma rukku naan ahinnu neiya tamsi khat kat ping. Mleiya naan avah Kruwng hinni neiki tamsi khat kkurthuhna' ki kbihjiik inptih.
46009003	Nei mheikperteel mii rek hinni nei kpau arthaan chaak avah hava:
46009004	Neenve ngi tchaak le' tneekna' ki nthlowi maan mow?
46009005	Neenve rukka tamsi morson rek, tidit tah Kruwng naupa le' Siphas dotlot heppi lamkrin kcha' nuwn khat tiqhi tlitna' ruhtan kthlowi maan mow?
46009006	Mditmata Barnabas le' nei daat rang mow, nong tolowna' thungki tkankaina' ruhtan kthlowi kma' rangnga?
46009007	Mthina ki mardaman kirpii chthida raalmun thah kchet raalmii kuw ka'am? Riithlumbil thlowi chthida mchei kcha kma' kuw ka'am? Mditmata yau qhi chthida yaulop ava' arnu knee kma' kuw ka'am?
46009008	Neiyi havah dultimii thlaang thlaang khat kurthuwk ki kdothe mow? Mditmata nowlam ava' rukku anto' heppi the mehmow?
46009009	Mleiya Moses nowlam thung ngi hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Naan nih silpa khat avah chapaar apchown meek sliin arlaan nih mnehr bowlmaan,” mdodit. (Knl. 25:4) Isowr rih mdokilrinqhi avah silpa ava' mow?
46009010	Mditmata Mma ngi neen nkhengki qhatna' rah mdothe o? Mleiya havah neen nthenin qhatna' rang ngi mdokjit. Mleiya louknumpa ava ngi plungbinpsuk thuh mdonum rah, plungbinpsuk thuh ke'ei kcha' mma' ava ngi muplungbinpsuk ava' tu' karlaang sap kcha' mkurthuh rah.
46009011	Neenve ngi naan athen inni pthla 'lam ki dow rek ava' kapqau chaak innu neenve ngi naan ahinki daksa ki dow rek ava'tkurkun rang avah klin reen mow?
46009012	Ungta morson rek ava ngi naan a'leenin nih tarlaansap chaakna' ki ruhtan ava' mthlowi chaak innu neenve ngaalvah kerkheelset tih thlowi nimaan ringmow? Pdainu neenve ngi hava' ruhtanna' avah kdosinton votin pemeh. Ava' kchang ngi Khrista ki kqhapaumin ava' kdopkhaan mana' raan ki thenni dow mkheng avah kdodiil chaakin.
46009013	Sopklow kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi dow kchiir rek tidit tah luwbuk'inn thungki dow rek avah mdochaak chaak daatin, ungta rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thuh sopklow kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thung ngi rintparlaan dow rek avah mdo'arlaan chaak sapin tidit avah naan nih deimaan timow?
46009014	Anto' heppi Kruwng ngi kqhapaumin ksi kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi kqhpaumin thungki ngi mrin chaak raan, tidit ki paupiik avah mdopiik.
46009015	Pdainu hava'le' avah neiyi khadaat ruk kdosinton vot pemeh. Mditmata hava' dow rek avah nei kihin nih adotlot raan tidit rukku kdokjit vot pemeh. Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih nei kpirlin chaakna' avah msit ktaak mpurthuh pthi bih, nei kthen nuh kdiyow chaak ki kqha.
46009016	Mleiya neiyi kqhapaumin kdoparjaam chaak leiyi, kpirlin chaakna' rah ka'am pemeh mleiya ava' tparjaamna' ki nong avah nei mdotopdot chaak dok. Ong ngi neiyi kqhapaumin kparjaam chaakma cheentung ngi k'leen nih suwthitna' itla chso.
46009017	Mleiya neiyi arda krok ki ktlot chaak bih, avah nei knongqhalot, pdainu neiyi kardarow kepteng ngi ktlot chaak bih, suwkkenreel khat mdotpurthuh leiyi, ktlow kcha' thlaang thlaang ngaal imping.
46009018	Mdit bih, nei knongqhat'lot rang avah taluda? Mleiya neiyi kqhapaumin ki ruhtanna' ava' kdopthit mana' rah neiyi Khrista ki kqhapaumin avah mmaan ktaak ki kdoparjaam chaak.
46009019	Mleiya neiyi mii mkheng hinki mii'ol khat kurthuwk chdaat yowring ngi mii knempa kdoqenthuh chaakna' rang ki thenni kthina ngi mii mkheng ki suwk kurthuwk kcha' ping.
46009020	Mleiya neiyi Jihudi rek kdoqenthuh lamna' rang ki thenni Jihudi rek hinni Jihudi mii kurthuwk nuh. Ungta nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am mii rek kdoqenthuh lamna' rang ki thenni neiyi nowlam kurduh ngi amnu.
46009021	Mleiya nowlam tukksut kmah ngi ka'am kcha' rek kdoqenthuh chaak lamna' rah nowlam tukksut kmah ngi ka'am rek hinni neiyi nowlam tukksut kma' heppi amnu. Anto'daat yoso Isowr ktong thah neiyi nowlam tukksut kmah ngi ka'am pmaang pdainu Khrista ktong thah nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am ping.
46009022	Neiyi mruh kdowng rek kdoqenthuh chaak lamna' rah mruh kdowng rek hinni mruh kdowng ngi amnu. Neiyi mruk daat yoso kdosan chaakna' rah mii mkheng hinni dow mkheng arvang kurthuwk kcha' ping.
46009023	'Tunnu neiyi naan tu' kilqhi ngi kqhapaumin avah karlaang kcha'sap kkurthuh chaakna' rah kqhapaumin ki thenni havah kdotlot chaak.
46009024	Naan nih kchen kperteek rek mmaan ava ngi mkheng kheng inni mchenin avah deimaan timo, pdainu nongqhat'lot avah khadaat tih mdo'arlaan? Avaleiyi, naan nih ava' ado'arlaan chaakna' raanni icheidei chaan.
46009025	Ungta mnongqhat'lot ki thenni kekperteek mii rek khimkheiyi mdaksa avah dow mkheng thung ngi kkilrin kcha' tliitlu. 'Tunnu mmaan nih kqop kcha' rang laar luwkhum ava' mdo'arlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni havah mdotlot in. Pdainu neen nih totlotin havah kqop kma' rang laar luwkhum ki then.
46009026	Ava'leiyi neiya mtlunna' kindit kmah ngi kchen pmaang pdainu anto'kat tih kchen ping. Ungta tker'e ruk anto'kat rukka, tirthli kker'eqhi rek hep kmah ngi anto'kat tih kdo'arvan ker'eqhi chaak dok.
46009027	Pdainu neiyi kdaksa avah archak nuh kkurduh ngi kdo'arvanqhi chaak. Mditma bih, neiyi morson hinni pauparjaam chthida nei kdak avah mrit kaptham kcha' kurthuwk chnikdi.
46010001	Ava' han'tun nih naan nih hava' kdei kmah ngi a'am raan avah neiya ngei maang. Mleiya neen npu'npa rekin mkheng inni armei kurduh ngi arvan ka'am dok kcha'lam ungta mmaan mkheng inni duwmpii kepthleng ngi karvang dok kcha'lam.
46010002	Mmaan mkhengin avah Moses thung ngi armei thung ngi ungta duwmpii thung ngi diiluwna' avah mdo'arvantlot chaak dokin.
46010003	Mmaan mkheng inni pthla lamki thendam avah mdo'arvan chaak dokin.
46010004	Ungta mmaan mkheng inni pthla lamki dii ava'kat avah mdo'arvanneek chaak dokin. Mleiya mmaan nih mdilin arvankqowi pthla lamki Lung ava'kat thungki dii avah mdo'arvan neek dokin ungta ava' Lungpii avah Mesaiah ava'.
46010005	Pdainu mmaan meknem rek 'leenni Isowr rah muplung ngammda. Avaleiyi, mmaan kluwng rek avah paamkbiik laiyi kerjeiter chlamda.
46010006	'Tunnu neen nih, mmaan nih daksa thuh mdo'arvan ngeiyin kqha kma' dow rek avah tngeimana' thung ngi nuplungin tipri chaakna' raan ki thenni mmaan avah neen nthen inni bitinna' rek kurthuwk ki ka'am kcha' a.
46010007	Ungta mmaan aangqhe rek heppi naan rukka pthla luwkbu akurthuh raan pemeh. Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mii rekki kchaknee rang ngi ko'ong lamda ungta klee rang ngi rip lamda,” mdodit. (Mpk. 32:6)
46010008	Mditmata mmaan aangqhe rekki anto ngi mdotlot inni niikhat thung ngi mii pun som'knii leikdum mtluk chaakin ava' heppi neen nih jowltpurjut raan pemeh.
46010009	Mditmata neen nih, mmaan aangqhe rekki anto ngi mdotlot inni pruwl rekki mdopenvei pthiin ava' heppi Khrista avah tperteel raan pemeh.
46010010	Mditmata neen nih, mmaan aangqhe rekki anto ngi mdotlot inni kpenvei rekki mdopenvei pthiin ava' heppi neen nih nunur tidit raan pemeh.
46010011	'Tunnu hava' dow mkheng avah titinna' rekki mmaan hinni kthuwk ungta mmaan avah m'leenin nih mqutna' mpha karvang kcha' neen nthen inni tpilqhitna' khat kurthuwk ki mmaan avah mdokjit.
46010012	Avaleiyi, neiya krip imping kdikcha' mma' ava ngi mtlukmana' rah ikilrindei chso.
46010013	Dultimii khat 'leenni kthuwk nowpa kma'don kerkheel lih a'leenin nih kepthleem kthuwk pemeh. Pdainu Isowr rah trinchaak krow tidit tah naan nih adodiil pchaanmah raan kepthleem avah a'leenin nih pthuwk nimeh. Pdainu naan nih adodiil chaak pchaanna' raan ki thenni, kepthleem ava' adoloi chaakna' raan ki m'lam rukka aktlot piik raan.
46010014	Avaleiyi, nei kvonsat'low rek naan nih pthla luwtbukna' thungki ichen chaan.
46010015	Neiyi mii kinrit rek hinni kthe heppi kthe a, neiyi kdothe avah athi naan nih pau'apindit chaan.
46010016	Neen nih tpanpaak chaakin suwqhat tong avah Khrista hii thung ngi tarlaan chaak sapin pemeh mow? Neen nih tupkuiyin thenpen avah Khrista daksa thung ngi tarlaan chaak sapin thenpen pemeh mow?
46010017	Mleiya knempok rek neen avah thenpen pum khat ungta daksa pum khat daatin pimin, tidit tah neen nkheng inni ava' thenpen khat ava' tarlaan chaak sapin.
46010018	Dultimii nowpa ktong thah Isreel rek avah mheisut piik chaan. Mleiya rintparlaanna' ava' kcha kcha' rek mmaan avah rintparlaanna' khaan ava' tu' karlaang kcha'sap lam pemeh mow?
46010019	Mdittu' neiyi kthe a talu? Neiyi dow pthla rek avah dodak lam kdit mow? Mditmata dow pthla rek hinni tparlaan dow rek avah dodak lam kdit mow?
46010020	Pdainu neiyi hanto' kdothe, tidit tah Chaatktlei rekki rin mdoparlaanin avah tarnam rek hinni mdoparlaanin ungta avah Isowr hin pemeh ungta neiyi naan avah tarnam rektu' lopkhat akurthuh raan avah kdongei pemeh.
46010021	Naan nih Kruwng hin tong avale' tarnam rek tong avah neeve pchaang nimaan tih. Ungta naan nih Kruwng khaan le' tarnam rek khaan avah arlaangve pchaang nimaan tih.
46010022	Mditmata neen nih Kruwng avah tepner pchaang chenaandi? Ungta neenna Mma' hinni nruwn ktangset mow?
46010023	Nei kthen vah dow mkheng avah kdotlot krow pdainu dow mkheng rek ava ngi neiya mbom meh. Nei kthen nuh dow mkheng avah kdotlot krow pdainu dow mkheng ava ngi neiya mapqhang meh.
46010024	Kuwkhat leh ngi mthina ki daat sutthlaam mso pdainu mii khimkheiyi morson rek qhatna' asutthlaam chso.
46010025	Naan nih aplungrildehn ava' ki thenni, paukheel kkheel kmah ngi kyurkren mun thungki dow rek avah talutalu yoso achaan.
46010026	Mleiya, “Dultipaam ungta mthung ngi kdim mih ka'am mkheng rek avah Kruwng ava' dow.” (Luw. 24:1)
46010027	Ungta lamkrin kma' kuwmiikhat tih naan avah kmaal rah ato'own chaakin cheentung ngi ungta naan nih tche rah angeiyin cheentung ngi, aplungrildehn ki thenni paukheel kkheel liit kmah ngi, talutalu yoso a'aang inni mdodownin avah achaan.
46010028	Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih ahin nih: “Havah dow pthla rek hinni mdoparlaan dok ksa” mdit cheentung ngi nang ngi, ahin nih ava' kthe mii ava' ki thenni ungta plungrildeh ki thenni saa avah chama'. Mleiya “Dultipaam ungta mthung ngi kdim mih ka'am mkheng rek avah Kruwng ava' dow.” (Luw. 24:1)
46010029	Neiyi plungrildeh kdodit avah naan adow rekin ava' pemeh pdainu ktlok morson rek dow ava' kdothena'. Mleiya taluleiyi mii morson rek plungrildeh ava ngi nei kning'olna' 'leenni paukpindit rang?
46010030	Pdainu neiyi tpanpaak chaak tu' kilqhi ngi karlaan chaakku taluleiyi neiyi panpaak chnuh kdochaak chaak thendam ava'leiyi neiya kthi makpauna' rangda?
46010031	Avaleiyi, naan nih chayown tih mditmata nee chyown tih mditmata talutalu yoso adotlotin mkheng avah Isowr tponlor chaakna ngi atlow chaan.
46010032	Naan nih kuwkhat leh hinni, tidit tah Jihudi rek hin yoso mditmata Grik rek hin yoso mditmata Isowr lamrinlop hin yoso tparkhaanna' piimaan.
46010033	Mleiya nei rukku mii mkheng avah dow mkheng 'leenni muplung ngamin kdotlot chaak heppi atlown. Mleiya neiyi kthen nemna' thlaam chmaang pdainu mmaan karsan chaakna' rah, mii knempok thennemna' ava' kdothlaam chaak.
46011001	Neiyi Khrista nowpa kdopqowi chaak heppi naan rukku nei knowpa ava' apqowi chaan.
46011002	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek naan nih dow mkheng 'leenni adotbin phaakin ungta naan nih, neiyi naan ahin nih adokparlaan chaakin nowparit rek ava' ado'arkhiik chaakin leiyi, akpanpaak chaak inna.
46011003	Pdainu neiyi naan nih hava' adodeh raan avah kdongei chaak. Mleiya pselpa khimkhei ki luwchai avah Khrista ungta snu luwchai avah pselpa ungta Khrista luwchai avah Isowr.
46011004	Pselpa khimkheiyi buwluw khumda rinkaktham kcha' mditmata pau kparjaam kcha' mma' ava ngi mthina ki mluwchai avah kyat chmeh.
46011005	Pdainu snu khimkheiyi mluw kukhum kmah ngi rinmaktham chaak mditmata pau mparjaam chaak bih, mma ngi mthina ki mluwchai avah kyat chmeh. Mleiya mma'kat avah mluw topkolpthi khat ava' tu' kinqim kcha' a.
46011006	Mleiya snu khat tih mluw mkhumma cheentung ngi msam akchip chso mditmata mluw apkol pthiso. Pdainu snu ki thenni mluw topkol avah mningkyana' mkurthuh cheentung ngi mma ngi mluw akhum chso.
46011007	Mleiya pselpa vah mluw avah dakat tih mdokhum rang pemeh mleiya mmah Isowr arlim ungta mkonlorna' pdainu snu avah pselpa konlorna'.
46011008	Mleiya pselpa avah snu thungki pemeh pdainu snu avah pselpa thungki.
46011009	Mditmata pselpa avah snu ki thenni mdopurthuh pemeh pdainu snu avah pselpa ki thenni mdopurthuh.
46011010	Hava' lei kat tih, vaantamsi rek leiyi, snu ava ngi mluwchai 'leenni ruhtanna' kurduh ngi ma'amna' ki titinna' khat avah mdothlowi chaak rah.
46011011	Anto'daat yoso, Kruwng hinvah snu ngi pselpa hinki mning'olna' ka'am pemeh mditmata pselpa ngi snu hinki mning'olna' ka'am pemeh.
46011012	Mleiya snu ava ngi pselpa thungki mkurthuh ava' heppi pselpa ava' rukka snu ar'aang thungki pdainu dow mkheng avah Isowr hinki.
46011013	Mleiya snu khat tih mluw kukhum kmah ngi Isowr hinni rinmaktham chaak avah qha mow, qhame, tidit avah naan adak inni apinditin rang ngi asuwn?
46011014	Ungta pselpa khat tih msam kapsaang avah mthina ngi karjat chmeh, tidit avah rinnow ava'kat tih apurchuk chaan meh mow?
46011015	Pdainu snu a msam msaan cheu avah mkonlor chaakna' tidit tah msam avah mma' hinni mukpurkhumna' rang ngi mdopiik.
46011016	Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih hava' 'leenni tkerteenna' mupthuh nuwm bih ava' hep nowpa avah neenna thlowi maan ring mditmata Isowr lamrinlop rek rukku thlowi lammeh.
46011017	'Tunnu naan nih athlen kurdutsapin avah mqhatna' lei mda mthitna' mkurthuh leiyi, hava' tpurchuhna' rek adokpiikin ava' thung ngu neiyi naan avah apanpaak chmaan ring.
46011018	Mleiya mkhatna' thung ngi naan nih lamrinlop khat tih athlen kurdutsapin thung ngi naan arlak inni tkenqhenna' kthuwk a tidit arjanu ungta neiyi avah mruksuwn lam kdorin.
46011019	Mleiya Isowr rih mdoperteel dok ksa mii rek avah naan arlak ki mkandanna' rang ki thenni naan arlak ki mlangkma' mrukka ma'am rah.
46011020	Avaleiyi, naan nih mmun khat thung ngi athlen kurdutin avah Kruwng Maalna' ava' kcha rang ki then pemeh.
46011021	Mleiya kchaknee thung vah mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mthen avah morson rek duh ngi mdochaak dok ungta khat tah mpowi mtham arlaan nih ktlok khat avah kipri kcha'.
46011022	Mdittu' talu! Naan nih adochaak adoneekna' raan ki thennu a'innin ammeh mow? Mditmata naan nih Isowr lamrinlop tuk'adosutmaan ungta dow khatleh kthlowi kma' rek ningkya adopiiknaan pemeh mow? Hava' thung ngu neiyi talu the nikdi' o? Neiyi apanpaak nikaandi? Neiya apanpaak maanring.
46011023	Mleiya neiyi Kruwng hinki kdo'arlaan chaak avah nei rukku naan ahin nih adokparlaan chaakin. Mleiya Kruwng Jisu ngi, Mma' mdoyur chaakna' jaankat ava' thung ngi thenpen avah louda.
46011024	Ungta Mma ngi mpanpaak chaak dilli, Mma ngi thenpen avah khuida ungta hanto'theda: “Arlaangin, achaan, havah naan athen inni mdopkui dok Nei ksadak ava'. Naan nih havah Nei adotbin phaakna' raan ki thenni atlown.”
46011025	Ungta anto' heppi Mma ngi kluhvon mchaak dokin dilli, Mma ngi tong avah louda hanto'theda: “Havah Nei kihii thung ngi mdopqhan dok pauqum ren ki tong ava'. Naan nih hava' aneekin khimkhei thung ngi Nei adotbin phaakna' raan ki thenni havah atlow tlitin.”
46011026	Mleiya naan nih hava' thenpen achaak tlitin ungta hava' tong aneek tlitin khimkhei thung ngi naan nih Mma ngi murjun kerheel duh khimkheiyi Kruwng diyowna' avah apurphuwn chaak inna.
46011027	Avaleiyi, kuwmiikhat tih karlaangphu kma' rang ngi hava' thenpen ava' mchaak bih ungta hava' tong ava' mneek bih, mma' avah Kruwng daksa le' Mihii ava' 'leenni mraal ka'am kcha' a.
46011028	Pdainu mii ava ngi mdak mthina ngi ikperteel chso ungta anto ngi mma ngi thenpen avah achaso ungta tong avah anee chso.
46011029	Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih Kruwng daksa avah mqhatmthit kdei kmah, karlaangphu kmah ngi mchaak ungta mneek chaak bih mma' mthina ngi pau tpinditna' avah m'leen nih mchaak mneek chaak a.
46011030	Mleiya hava' leiyi naan arlakin ki mii knempok rek avah mruh downg chda ungta kowi lamda ungta knempok ki ki'iip kcha'lam.
46011031	Mleiya neen nih nthi naan nih nikpindit chaakin bih n'leenin nih pau pindit nimeh.
46011032	Pdainu neen avah hava' dultipaam tu' mido'tupsul mana' raan ki thenni, n'leenin nih pau mpindit thung ngi Kruwng ngi neen avah midotarchak chaak dokin.
46011033	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek naan nih kchaknee rah athlen kurdutsapin thung ngi naan nih khat le' khat ikardasap kchokin.
46011034	Pdainu kuwmiikhat mpowiktham ma'am cheentung ngi mma ngi inn thah imaal chso. Mditma bih athlen kurdutsapin avah pau tpindit ki then kurthuwk chrah. Ungta morson avah neiyi kthlen thung ngi parnaak laini'.
46012001	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek naan nih pthla lamki chla rekki mlei ava' kdei kmah ngi a'am raan avah neiya ngei maang:
46012002	Mleiya naan avah hava' mpau kthuwk kma' dow pthla ava' hinni mdoqhi dok lamleh thah tiqhi dok Chaatktlei rek inping tidit avah adodeh chaakin.
46012003	Avaleiyi, neiyi, Isowr Pthla ar'aang ngi kpau kcha' kuwkhat leh ngi Jisu pauhor tupbuk meh ungta Pthla Kchiir ar'aang kma'donle kuwkhat leh ngi Jisu avah Kruwng mdodit pemeh tidit avah adokepdeh chaak dokin.
46012004	'Tunnu mdetmdet ki chla rekpa ka'am pdainu Pthla khatsap hinki.
46012005	Soptolowna' msikmsik ka'am pdainu Kruwng khatsap hinki.
46012006	Ungta nongtlotna' mdetmdet ka'am pdainu dow mkheng ki mkheng kheng thung ngi nong ktlow avah Isowr khadaat.
46012007	Pdainu mkheng ki thenni msit amna' rang ki thenni mii khimkhei hinni Pthla dopandan piikna' avah mdopiik.
46012008	Mleiya Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi khat hinni luwkinrit pauna piida. Ungta Pthla khatsap ava' ar'aang ngi morson khat hinni tedeh pinditna' pauna piida.
46012009	Pthla khatsap ava ngi khat hinni lamrin piida ungta Pthla khatsap ava ngi morson khat ava' hinni tapdamna' chla rek piida.
46012010	Morson khat hinni ruhtannong totlotna', morson khat hinni pau tpurphuwnna', morson khat hinni kqha le' kthi pthla rek tedeh pinditna' piida, morson khat hinni mdetmdet ki pau rekki tpauna' ungta morson khat hinni mdetmdet ki pau rek ava' tperheelna' piida.
46012011	Pdainu hava' dow mkheng avah Pthla khadaat thungki ungta khatsap ava' nongtlot yesang tidit tah Mma' plungbin dilkqowiyi mii khimkhei hinni, mma' mma' ki thenni mdothem piik.
46012012	Mleiya daksa avah khadaat kurhuwk yoso mapna rek knempok ki ka'am, pdainu nempok chleek yoso daksa khadaat thungki lam ungta mkheng inni daksa khat ava' pna reklam. Ungta anto' heppi Khrista rukka anto'hep daat.
46012013	Mleiya neen nkhengin avah Pthla khadaat ar'aang ngi neen nih daksa khadaat thung ngi diiluwna' avah tarlaan chaakin. Jihudi mditmata Grik yoso, ungta suwk'owr mditmata mii'ol yoso neen nkhengin avah Pthla khadaat thung ngi midotepneek chaak dokin.
46012014	Mleiya daksa ngi mapna khadaat thlowi meh pdainu knempok, mdothowi.
46012015	Ungta khuh ngi, “neiya khut kkurthuhma leiyi, daksa ki pmaang,” mdittu' mma ngi daksa thungki kma' kurthuwk rang mow?
46012016	Ungta kna ngi, “neiya mik kkurthuhma leiyi, daksa pmaang,” mdittu' mma ngi daksa ki kma' kurthuwk rang mow?
46012017	'Tunnu daksa mpumpum mih mik mkurthuh chaakku talu ngi khu karja rang ngo? Ungta daksa mpumpum mih kna mkurthuh chaakku talu ngi mikrim kipniim rang ngo?
46012018	Pdainu 'tunnu Isowr rih daksa pna rek khimkhei avah Mma' plungngam dilkqowiyi anto ngi mdopa'am lam.
46012019	Ungta pna rek mkheng avah pna khadaat mkurthuh u, daksa a tva'thuh ka'am rang ngo?
46012020	Pdainu 'tunnu dakat tih pna rek avah knempok anto'daat yoso daksa khadaat.
46012021	Ungta mik ki khut hinni, “nang nga akriin maang,” dipchaang nimeh. Luwchaiyi khut hinni, “nang nga akriin maang,” dipchaang nimeh.
46012022	Anto' mda 'tunnu daksa ki mapna kdilsi rek mmaan ava ngi klinsi ngi msit ka'am.
46012023	Ungta neen nih takyat chaakna' ktaak liit heppi tbinin daksa pna rek ava ngi kdungset tih takyat chaakin. Ungta ningkyana' khat tih tbin chaakin pna aangqhe rek ava ngi tsutpqowi chaakinsi kurthuwkda.
46012024	Pdainu tpandan krow napna rekin avah msit ka'am pemeh. Pdainu Isowr rih ava' kapta kcha' pna rek hinni klin nih takyat chaakna' piida daksa avah pum khat tih mdoporjom.
46012025	Mleiya daksa thung ngi mkenqhena' ma'am rang pemeh pdainu pna rek mkheng ava ngi kinqim sappi, khat le' khat mkursutdeh chaak raan.
46012026	Ungta khat myat bih ava' tu' pna rek mkheng avah kyasap mditmata pna khat 'leenni takyat chaakna' ma'am bih ava' tu' pna rek mkheng avah kkanpa kcha' saplam.
46012027	'Tunnu naanna Khrista ki daksa rekin ptih ungta khat le' khat ki pna reksap inptih.
