46012028	Ungta hava'le' avah Isowr rih lamrinlop thung ngi mdokchol dok ksa: Mkhatna' thung ngi tamsi rek, miknitna' thung ngi khulpu rek, mukdumna' thung ngi chukpu rek, ava' dilli ruhtannong rek, audilli tapdamna' chla rek, tkorbomna' rek, sarka nong rek, mdetmdet tih tpauna' rek ava'.
46012029	Mii mkheng avah tamsi reksap lam mow? Mii mkheng avah khulpu reksap lam mow? Mii mkheng avah chukpu reksap lam mow? Mii mkheng avah ruhtannong ktlow reksap lam mow?
46012030	Mii mkheng ngi tapdamna' chla mthlowisapin mow? Mii mkheng avah pau ktleiyi kpausap lam mow? Mii mkheng ngi pau mperheel sapin mow?
46012031	Pdainu naan nih makqhasi chla rek avah plung kluwt tih athlaam chaan.
46013001	Mleiya neiyi dultimii rek pau vih pau chyow rih ungta vaantamsi rek pau vih pau chyow rih, vonsat kthlowima bih, neiya sumpi le' tliingdiing kipring kcha' hep daat nikdi'.
46013002	Ungta neiyi pau tpurphuwnna' ki chla thlowi chyow rih ungta paukordowl mkheng deipindih chyow rih ungta luwkinritna' mkheng thlowi chyow rih ungta lown rek tponthowna' kpha ki lamrin mkheng thlowi chyow rih, neiyi vonsat kthlowi chaakma bih neiya dow khatleh parcham maang.
46013003	Ungta neiyi kdothlowi mkheng avah srah rek tapmaalna ngi pii chyow rih ungta kdaksa avah tapkaak rang ngi kparlaan chyo ringngi, vonsat kthlowima bih ava ngi kthen nih mqhatna' ka'am pemeh.
46013004	Vonsat tih ksowt tih tyatna' kdiil pchaang ungta muplung knei, vonsat tih pner meh, vonsat tih kpirlin meh ungta kpirlin nih kpau pemeh.
46013005	Vonsat tih eenghal lih korthlong meh, mthennemna' kthlaam pemeh, plungthitna' ktlow pemeh ungta kqha kma' kbin pemeh.
46013006	Vonsat tih nowlam tuksutmana' thung ngi kanpa pemeh pdainu kindit thung ngi kkanpa kcha'.
46013007	Vonsat tih dow mkheng mdokhaan chaak, dow mkheng lammdorin chaak, dow mkheng 'leenni plungbin mdothiik chaak ungta dow mkheng mdodiil chaak.
46013008	Vonsat tah teden rukku kertlei pemeh. Pdainu pau tpurphuwnna' avah am chyoso mmaan avah kertlei chrah, mdetmdet tih kpau am yoso avah kqu chrah, tedeh pinditna' am yoso avah kqu chrah.
46013009	Mleiya neen nih mruk'suwn daat tedeh chaakin ungta neen nih mruk'suwn daat tpurphuwn chaak ngaalin.
46013010	Pdainu kurkhum ava' marvan thung ngi, ava' dilli mruk'suwn daat avah kupqupthi rah.
46013011	Mleiya neiyi nau kkurthuh thung ngu naupau heppi pau nuh, nau dodeh pindit heppi deipindihnu, nau dobin heppi bin chnuh, pdainu neiyi kver dok dilvah nau nowpa mkheng avah kdomaak pthi.
46013012	Mleiya 'tunnu neen nih pthlasut thung ngi marvaam ava' nmik inni tedeh ngaalin pdainu ava' dilli mai le' maiqhuwm mih tedeh raan. 'Tunnu neiyi mruk'suwn daat kdodeh pdainu ava' dilli neiyi mdotedeh dok ava' heppi deinikdi'.
46013013	Ungta 'tunnu lamrin., plungbinpsuk ungta vonsat, hava' kdum 'leenni i'amin pdainu hava'le' thungki miklinsi avah vonsat.
46014001	Naan nih vonsat athlowi tlit chaan ungta pthla 'lam ki chla rek avah kdung ngi angeichaan pdainu kerkheelsi ngi pau tphuwnna' ava' angeichaan.
46014002	Mleiya mdetmdet tih kpau mma' ava ngi dultimii rek hinni kpau pemeh pdainu Isowr hinni kpau kcha'. Mleiya mma ngi mdothe avah kuwkhat tih mdodeh pindit pemeh anto'daat yoso mma ngi, pthla thung ngi paukordowl ava' mdothe chaak.
46014003	Pdainu pau kpurphuwng mma' ava ngi dultimii rek pqhanna', tkorsowna' ungta plungngam tkirpiikna' mdothe rah.
46014004	Ungta pau ktleiyi kpau kcha' mma' avah mdak mthina kpalqhang kcha' pdainu pau kpurphuwng kcha' mma' ava' vah lamrinlop ava' mdopqhan chaak.
46014005	Neiyi naan akheng inni pau ktleiyi apau raan kdongei chaak pdainu kerkheelset tih pau adopurphuwn raan kdongei. Mleiya mma ngi lamrinlop pqhanna' kurthuwk ki dakat tih pau avah mperheelma' bih, pau kpurphuwng mma' ava ngi pau ktleiyi kpau mma' hinvah klin.
46014006	Pdainu 'tunnu ku'uknau rek, neiyi naan ahin nih pau ktleiyi pauda kthlen nuh ungta pauphuwn nih, luwkinritna ngi, pau tpurphuwnna ngi mditmata tpurchuhna ngi kpauma u, naan ahin nih talu msit amna' ka'am a?
46014007	Mleiya mrinkum ktaak dow rek, spirthiil mditmata dumreng mdumin thung ngi marchaang tpenqhenna' ma'amma u, taluhep pih spirthiil mow, mditmata dumreng ngoh tidit tah tedeh rang ngo?
46014008	Mleiya puwtit avah marchaang kindit kmah ngi ndum u, kuw ngi raalmun ki thenni korthlong chdaat rang ngo chdaat rang ngo?
46014009	Ava' vah hanto' heppi, naan nih mdetmdet ki pauktlei avah tedehpindit pchaan nih aptha maannu adothe dokin pau avah taluhep pih tedeh rang ngo? Mditma bih, naanna tirthli thung ngi kpau kcha' kurthuwk chnaan.
46014010	Dultipaam thung ngi mdetmdet ki pau knempok ki ka'am pdainu mninglei ktaak pau khadaat ruk ka'am pemeh.
46014011	Avaleiyi, neiyi pau ava' ki mninglei kdehma bih pau ava ngi kpau mma' hinnu neiya paamktlei ki miikhat kurthuwk kcha' imping ungta ava' pau vih kpau mma' avah nei kihin nuh paamktlei ki miikhat kurthuwk kcha' a.
46014012	Avaleiyi, naan nih pthla 'lam ki chla rek thuh plung adopluw chaakin leiyi, lamrinlop pqhan chaakna' rang ava' kthlaam kcha' ikurthuwkin.
46014013	Avaleiyi, pau ktleiyi kpau kcha' mma' ava ngi mdoperheel pchaan chaakna' rah rin'iktham chso.
46014014	Mleiya neiyi pau ktleiyi rinkaktham chaak bih, kapthlarin vah rinkaktham kcha' a pdainu kdodeh pinditna' thung vah mchei ktaak kurthuwk kcha' a.
46014015	Mdittu' ava' ki mqhatna' talu ka'am a? Mdit bih neiyi kapthlarin nih rinktham chnikdi' ungta neiyi kdodeh pindit chaak tu' rinktham chnikdi'. Ungta neiyi kapthlarin nih laa the chnikdi' ungta neiyi kdodeh pindit chaak tu' laa the chnikdi'.
46014016	Mditma bih, naan nih pthla ngi suwqhat apiik chaak innu, tparjaakmah mmun thung ngi ka'am kcha' tidit tah nang ngi adothe avah talu tidit mdodehpse taluhep pih nang ngi adopanpaak chaakna' rek thungng vah “Amen” kpii chrang ngo?
46014017	Mleiya naan nih dakat tih kqhadeek ki kpanpaak kcha' krow inptih pdainu morson rek pqhan chaakna' kurthuwk meh.
46014018	Neiyi naan akhengin han'tun nih pau ktleiyi kpau chaak leiyi, Isowr rah kpanpaak chaak a.
46014019	Anto'daat yoso lamrinlop thung ngu neiyi pau ktleiyi pauna pun sowm kdothe rang hinvah kdodeh pindit chaak tu' kilqhi ngi pauna parnga pang daat yoso kdothe chaak ki kqha.
46014020	Ku'uknau rek tedeh pinditna' 'leennu nau kurthuwkmaan, anto'daat yoso, mii 'leenni kthi tbinna' thung vah nau ikurthuwkin, ungta naan nih tedeh pinditna' 'leenni ikindit chaan.
46014021	Mleiya nowlam thung ngi hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Neiyi hava' mii rek tungngu pauktlei kna mii rek pau vih ungta paamktlei mii rek nehr rih bilam nikdi'. Ungta tlow daatyorih hava' mkheng thung ngi mmaan nih Neiya marja lam nimeh.” (Is. 28:11-12) Kruwng ngi mdodit.
46014022	Ava'leiyi pauktlei rek avah titinna' rang ki thenngaal ungta avah lamkrin kcha' rekki then pemeh pdainu lamkrin kma' rek then ungta pau tpurphuwn avah lamkrin kma' rek then pemeh pdainu lamkrin kcha' rek then.
46014023	Avaleiyi, lamrinlop rek mkheng ava ngi mmun khat thuh kurkuwk lamso ungta mkheng inni pau ktleiyi mpausap innu ungta mmaan arlak ki tparjaakmah mditmata lamkrin kma' rek rukka myau innu, mmaan ava ngi naan avah aplungin karmak kcha' a, adiin nimeh mow?
46014024	Pdainu mii mkheng ngi pau mpurphuwnsap daat tu' ungta ava' thuh lamkrin kma' mditmata tethe piikma khat arlak inni kthleng a ungta mma' avah mmaan mkheng inni kindit mthepiik pchaanin ungta mperteel pchaan innu,
46014025	Ungta anto ngi Isowr rih mma' plungril avah mapvan piik chaak bih mma ngi khupktulup pih tlow chdon nih Isowr hinni luwkbu chrah ungta Isowr avah dakat tih naan athung ngi ka'am a, tidit kpandang chrah.
46014026	Mdittu' ku'uknau rek taluhep rang? Mleiya naan nih akurtuwl chaakin thung ngi, arlakin ki khatvah luwbuklaa khat mthenuwm a, khatvah tpurchuh rah mngei a, khatvah pau ktleiyi mpau rah ka'am a, khatvah pau mdopurphuwn rah ka'am a, khatvah pau mdoperheel rah ka'am a, mdit bih naan nih hava' mkheng avah tapqhanna' ki thenni atlown.
46014027	Naan nih arlak inni pau ktleiyi kpau rah ma'am cheentung ngi, mmaan avah 'knii mditmata knemsi ngi kdum kpha ngi khatkhat tih athe lamso ungta miikhat tih avah aperheelso.
46014028	Pdainu kperheel rah ma'amma cheentung ngi lamrinlop ava' thung ngu mma ngi rimkdi i'am chdaatso ungta mma ngi mma' mdak le' Isowr hin daat tih avah athe chso.
46014029	Mleiya khulpu 'knii mditmata kdum daat tih ipau chlamso ungta morson ava ngi kmin nih m'leenin nih pau apindit chlamso.
46014030	Pdainu mbeh ngi kok'ong ktlok khat ava' hinni Isowr rih mpurphuwn piik cheentung ngi mrukri ki mma' avah rimkdi i'am chdaatso.
46014031	Mleiya naan nih mii mkheng kurchuk chaakna' rah ungta mii mkheng toksow chaakna' rah khatkhat tih pau avah adopurphuwn chaakin krow.
46014032	Ungta khulpu rekki pthlarin rek avah khulpu rek daat tih mdosin chaakin.
46014033	Mleiya miikenje rekki lamrinlop rek mkheng thungki heppi, Isowr rah plung karmana' ki mukpu pemeh pdainu plung kdai ki mukpu.
46014034	naan arlakin ki snu rek ava' vah lamrinlop rek thung vah rimkdi i'am chlamso tidit tah mmaan nih mpau raan avah mdorot piiklam pemeh pdainu nowlam rukku mdothe heppi mmaan nih makparlaan chaak raan.
46014035	Ungta mmaan nih tedeh rah mbin chaakin cheentung ngi inn thuh mi'innpu rekin hinni akheel chlamso, tidit tah snu ngi lamrinlop thung ngi mpau rang avah ningkyana'.
46014036	Mditmata mbulthok ki Isowr pauna avah nang athungki kthuwk mow? Mditmata avah nang ahin daat tih kurju mow?
46014037	Kuwmiikhat tih mdak avah khulpu khat heppi mditmata pthla 'lam ki khat heppi mkarjaak chaak cheentung ngi, mma ngi, neiyi naan ahin nih kdokjit dow rek avah Kruwng hinki paupiik rek tidit adei chso.
46014038	Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih mdehma cheentung ngi, kdei kmah ngi i'am chdaatso.
46014039	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, naan nih pauphuwn avah kdung ngi angei chaan ungta pau ktleiyi kpau ava'ruk pkhaanmaan.
46014040	Naan nih dow mkheng avah kqhadeek ki ungta karnaak deek ki atlow chaan.
46015001	Ava' han'tun nih ku'uknau rek, naan nih ado'arlaan chaak dokin ungta mthung ngi arichaak naan, naan ahinin nih kdoparjaam chaak kqhapaumin avah neiyi naan ahin nih aktipbin phaak chaak nuwm inna.
46015002	Mleiya naan nih msit ktaak ki lamkrin kma' akurthuwn bih neiyi ahinin nih kdoparjaam chaak pauna ava'kat ava ngi karsan dok kcha' inptih.
46015003	Mleiya nei rukku kdo'arlaan chaak dok ava'kat avah neiyi naan ahinin nih rukrirep pih adokparlaan chaakin. Mleiya Kchiir laika rek ava' dilkqowiyi Khrista ngi neen nupnu rekin ki thenni midiyowpiik inda.
46015004	Ungta Kchiir laika ava' dilkqowiyi Mma' avah alruwl lamda ungta Mma ngi mnii kdumna' nit tih kerdelda.
46015005	Ava' dilli Mma' avah Siphas tih deida ungta ava' dilli sowm lei'knii rek rukku dei lamda.
46015006	Audilli unau rek pun parnga ava ngi Mma' avah veikhadaat thuh dei lamda, avale' meknem bet avah 'tun rukku ka'am daat lam a pdainu aangqhe rekka ki'iip dok kcha'lam a.
46015007	Ava' dilli Mma' avah James tih deida ungta audilli tamsi rek mkheng inni dei chlamda.
46015008	Audilli mqutna'rel thung ngi thla kaptham mih kqou kcha' nei rukku dei chnuh.
46015009	Mleiya neiya tamsi rek arlak ki mikdilsi kcha', tamsi khat tih ttaiphuma khat ping. Mleiya neiyi Isowr lamrinlop rek avah chii kdopreel chaak lam.
46015010	Pdainu Isowr plungnee ngi neiya kkurthuh rang ava' kkurthuwk kcha' ping ungta nei kihin ki Mma' plungnee avah msit ammana' ka'am pemeh. Pdainu mmaan mkhengin han'tun nih, neiyi kerkheel set tih nong avah kdolow chaak, anto'daat yoso nong klou kcha' avah nei pemeh pdainu nei mkorthlowqhi kcha' Isowr plungnee ava' dotlot.
46015011	Avaleiyi, nei yoso mmaan yoso ngi anto ngi kparjaam chaak inna ungta naan nih anto ngi arin chaak dok inna.
46015012	'Tunnu Khrista avah kdiyou thungki perdelda tidit avah tparjaam dok ki ma'am arlaan nih, taluhep pih naan arlakin ki aangqhe rekku kdiyou rinkerheelna' tidit ka'am pemeh mdodit inno?
46015013	Kdiyou thungki kring kerheel tidit ma'amma bih, Khrista a ringkerheel meh a.
46015014	Ungta Khrista avah kerdel kma' mkurthuh bih, neen kpau parjaam chaakin avah msit ammeh a ungta naan alamrinin rukka msit ammeh a.
46015015	Ava' han'tun nih, neen nih Isowr rih Khrista avah kdiyou thungki mdoperdel diin nuh mkindit kat ava' kdopandan chaakin. Pdainu kdiyou kerdel kma' mkurthuh bih, Mma ngi Khrista avah perdel meh a ungta ava ngi mkindit kat mkurthuh bih, neenna Isowr ki mlangkma' sakhi rek kurthuwk kcha'in imping.
46015016	Mleiya kdiyou kerdel kma' mkurthuh bih, Khrista avah perdel meh a.
46015017	Ungta Khrista mperdelma bih naan alamrinin avah msit ammeh ungta naanna apnu rekin thung ngi ka'am tlit chdaat inna.
46015018	Mdit bih Khrista hinni ki'iip dok kcha' rek mmaan ava' rukka kenvei kcha'lam a.
46015019	Neen nih hava' rinkum ava' daat ki thenni Khrista hinni plungbinpsuk kthlowi kcha' nkurthuhn bih, neenna mii mkheng arlak ki plungdun vonsat'lowsi tkurthuh chaak raan.
46015020	Pdainu 'tunnu Khrista avah kdiyou thungki perdelda ungta ki'iip dok kcha' rek mmaan ava' ki mkhatna' mchei kurthuwkda ka'am a.
46015021	Mleiya miikhat ava' thung ki ngi tidoyowna' avah arvangda ava' vah Miikhat ava' hinki rukku kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' avah karvang.
46015022	Mleiya Adam thung ngi mii mkheng mdiyow chaak ava' heppi, Khrista thung ngi mii mkheng avah kipring perheel rah.
46015023	Pdainu mii khimkhei avah mma' mma' ki mkarnaakjiik ava' dilkqowi rah. Mleiya mkhatna' mchei Khrista ava'don, ava' dilli Mma' murjun thung ngi Khrista mii rek ava' rah.
46015024	Audilrow ngi mqutna' avah karvang rah, tidit tah Mma ngi tpaalna' ruhtan ksin rek ungta ruhtanna' ksin rek ungta ruhtan kthlowi rek mkheng ava' mupqutpthi dilli Mma ngi Kruwngpaalna' avah Pa Isowr ava' hinni kparlaan pthi rah.
46015025	Mleiya Mma ngi Mma' miihal rek mkheng avah mthiikpthi dokduh kpha ngi kpaal rah.
46015026	Tpenvei pthi rang mqutna' miihal, avah kdiyou, ava'.
46015027	Mleiya, “Mma ngi dow mkheng avah Mma' khuhther rih mdothiik pthi dok.” (Luw. 8:6) Pdainu Mma ngi “Dow mkheng avah Mma kurduh ngi,” mdit thuh, dow mkheng Mma' kurduh ngi kthi Mma' avah kparkhaal chda.
46015028	'Tunnu Mma' kurduh ngi dow mkheng mdothiik ava' thung ngi, Chapa mdakkat ava' rukka, dow mkheng Mma' kurduh ngi kthiikpiik, Mma' ava' kurduh ngi ka'am kcha' a, tidit tah Isowr rah dow mkheng ki mkheng kheng ava'.
46015029	Mditma bih, kdiyou kerdel kma' mkurthuh bih, kdiyou ki thenni dii kluwt dok kcha' rek mmaan ava' vah talu ktlow lam rang ngo? Mdittu', talulteiyi mmaan nah kdiyou ki thenni dii kluwt chlam o?
46015030	Ungta taluleiyi neenna mqhang ktaiyi tidina' thuh tri chaak inno?
46015031	Neiyi, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni kdothlowi chaak, naan aleiyi kpirlin chaakna' ava ngi kthepindit chaak a, tidit tah neiya mpha ktai thuh kdiyou ping.
46015032	Neiyi Ephisia thung ngi nowmsaa tu' kkurbun avah dultimii rinchan ki mkurthuh u, nei kthen nih talu msit amna' ka'am a? Kdiyou mkerdelmata, “Neen nih, ichaan cheh ineen cheh mleiya pduknii u tidiyow chaak raan.” (Is. 22:13)
46015033	Naanna kuwkhat leh ngi ahuwng chmaanso, kqha kma' tu' kilqhi ava ngi rinnow kqha avah mdo'ekre.
46015034	Naan nih rinkinditna' thuh ikerdel chaan ungta pnu arvei maan, tidit tah mii aangqhe vah Isowr ki tedeh pinditna' avah mdothlowi chaak pemeh. Neiyi havah naan aningkyana' raan ki thenni kdothe.
46015035	Pdainu mii aangqhe ngi hanto' kthe rah: “Taluhep pih kdiyou avah kerdel? Ungta taluhep kduh ki daksa ngi kerdel rang?”
46015036	Kokmok rek, naan nih adopqauin chiimuw avah kdiyou kmah ngi ring nimeh.
46015037	Ungta naan nih adopqauin avah mbul kurthuwk rang ava' pemeh pdainu chaapaar thlaang thlaang ngaal, tidit tah chavui kurthuwk krow mditmata ktlok chaapaar kurthuwk krow.
46015038	Pdainu Isowr rih Mma' plung ngamna' dilkqowiyi chiimuw ava' hinni chiibul avah mdopiik ungta mchiimuw mchiimuw ki dilkqowiyi mchiibul avah mdopiik.
46015039	Sadak mkheng avah kinqimsap sadak pemeh pdainu dultimii sadak ki khat, morson nowmsaa rekki sadak rek, morson nih tuwlvah rekki sadak rek ungta morson nih pva rekki sadak rek ka'am lam.
46015040	Ungta parvaan daksa rek rukka amda ungta dultipaam ki daksa rek rukka ka'am lam Pdainu parvaan konlorna' ava ngi khat ungta dultipaam konlorna' ava ngi msik khat nowl.
46015041	Kni konlorna' msik khat amda ungta thla konlorna' msik khat am chda. Ungta bursi rek konlorna' msik khat am chda. Mleiya bursi khat le' bursi morson khat avah mkonlorna' msikmsik ka'am kcha'.
46015042	Ava' heppi kdiyou rinkerheelna' avah ka'am. Kqop chrang daksa thung ngi tapqau avah kqop kma' rang daksa thung ngi kerdelda.
46015043	Takyatna' ktaak ki tapqau ava ngi tkonlorna' thung ngi kerdelda. Ruhdownna' thung ngi tapqau ava ngi ruhtanna' thung ngi kerdelda.
46015044	Nowpa ki daksa thung ngi tapqau ava ngi pthla 'lam ki daksa thung ngi kerdelda. Mleiya nowpa ki daksa msik khat ungta pthla 'lam ki daksa msik khat ka'am.
46015045	Ungta hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Mkhatna' mii Adam avah kring pthlarin kurthuwkda. Mqutna' Mii ava ngi kring kpii pthla tpurthuhda.” (Rnp. 2:7)
46015046	Anto'daat yoso, pthla 'lam ki ava ngi mrukri pemeh pdainu nowpa ki ava' ungta ava' dilrow ngi pthla 'lam ki ava' karvang.
46015047	Mkhatna' mii avah dultipaam thungki ungta dulti thungki, pdainu miknitna' Mii avah Kruwng ava' ungta parvaan ki.
46015048	Dulti thungki mii ava' heppi, dulti thungki mdoseem rek ava' rukka anto'lam. Ungta parvaan ki Mii ava' heppi, parvaan ki rek avale' avah anto'lam.
46015049	Ungta neen nih dulti ki mii tomkal lih tohor chaakin heppi, parvaan ki Mii ava' arlim rukka tohor chaak raan.
46015050	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, neiyi hava' kthe a: Mleiya sadak le' hii ngi Isowr Kruwngpaalna' avah alrouchom mih chom pchaang chnimeh. Anto' heppi kqop chrang ava ngi kqop kma' rang avah alrouchom mih chom pchaang chlam nimeh.
46015051	Asuwn neiyi naan ahinin nih paukordowl akthepiik inna. Mleiya neen nkhengin avah ti'ii chaakterin nimeh pdainu neen nkhengin avah tkerthlen chaak raan.
46015052	Mpha mdet’suwn thung ngi, mik takchalap pang thung ngi, mqutna' puwtit prin thung ngi tkerthlen chaak raan. Mleiya puwtit kdum rah ungta kdiyou avah kqop pchaang kma' thung ngi kperdel rah ungta neen nkhengin avah tkerthlen chaak raan.
46015053	Mleiya hava' kqop pchaang ava ngi kqop pchaang kma' ava' mdonaak chaak rah ungta hava' kdiyou pchaang ava ngi kdiyou pchaang kma' ava' mdonaak chaak rah.
46015054	Mleiya hava' kqop pchaang ava ngi kqop pchaang kma' ava' mnaak chaak ungta kdiyou pchaang ava ngi kdiyou pchaang kma' mnaak chaak dilli, hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Kdiyou avah tapchaanna' thung ngi mopyol dok a” (Is. 25:8) mdodit avah arvankqhi rah.
46015055	“O Kdiyou tva'thungda akru a? O Kdikhuw tva'thungda adopchaanna'a?” (Hos. 13:14)
46015056	Kdiyou kru a pnu ungta pnu ruhtanna' avah nowlam.
46015057	Pdainu neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi tapchaanna' mikpii Isowr avah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso!
46015058	Avaleiyi, nei kvonsat'low ku'uknau rek, knet tih irip chaan, kakna kmah ngi tidit tah Kruwng hinni naan anonglow chaakin avah mkenveina' ammeh tidit adodeh chaak inni mpha ktaiyi Kruwng nong totlotna' thung ngi kurkhum mih ikparlaan chaan.
46016001	'Tunnu miikenje rek thenni adoqhai rekin ava'lei vah naan nih neiyi Galatia ki lamrinlop rek hinni mkarnaakrit kdopiik rek ava' heppi, naan rukku adotlot raan.
46016002	Mleiya nei kthlen thung ngi naan nih sum adoqhaimana' raan ki thenni Isowr rih miiktai hinni mdorot piik dok ava' dilkqowiyi, arveen ki mkhatna' nit ktaiyi sum avah pankaidon mdoporkhowl chaak rah.
46016003	Ungta nei kthlen thuh kuwku yoso naan nih paukjit tih adorotsapin mii rek ava' hinni naan achla rekin avah paukjit tu' kilqhi ngi Jerusalem thah kda rah silam nikdi'.
46016004	Ungta nei rukka kche ngi mqhat rang bih, nei rukka mmaan tu' chetsap nikdi'.
46016005	'Tunnu neiyi Mesedonia paamkuwl thuh kthleng ngi kchedok dilli naan ahin nih thleng nikdi'. Mleiya neiya Mesedonia paamkuwl kthleng ngi kchet rang imping.
46016006	Pdainu neiya naan ahin nih ka'am bong krow ping mditma bih phalbi avah ava'thah naan tu' ta'amsap daatin ruk krow. Mleiya tva'tva' thang yoso, neiyi kchena' rang ava' thung ngi naan nih adotadak chaakna' raanni, naan ahin nih ambong nikdi'.
46016007	Mleiya 'tun'tun nih 'lam thung daat tih akvellap ngaal raan daat tih thleng nuwm maang. Pdainu Kruwng ngi mtrotpiik bih, naan tu' mpha mruk ta'amsap raan.
46016008	Pdainu Pentikost ki tmaalna' kpha vah neiya Ephisia khuwpii thung ngi amnikdi'.
46016009	Mleiya nei kthen nih thurngut klin nih ungta ruhtanna' ki thurngut ungta changqhatna' thurngut kthen nih kparvangda pdainu mkikthitna' knempok ki ka'am lam a.
46016010	'Tunnu Timothy avah naan ahinin nih mthlen cheentung ngi mningkqi kmah ngi naan tu' ma'amsapna' rah asuwdei chaan. Mleiya neiyi Kruwng nong kdotlot chaak heppi, mma' rukku anto'jik ki mdotlot chaak.
46016011	Avaleiyi, kuwkhat leh ngi mma' avah tukksut kma' tlow mso. Ungta nei kihin ki rah m'lamqowina' thuh plung kdai deek ki arheida chaan. Mleiya neiyi morson unau rektu mthlen raan avah 'lamksut daat lam a.
46016012	'Tunnu nu'unnau'in Apollo leiyi, kikjit chaak a. Mleiya unau rektu' naan ahinin nih mthlenna' rah neiyi kdung ngi kdoksow chaak, pdainu mmah 'tun'tun vah tethlen rah binliit mda Anto'daat yoso, mma ngi mpha kqha mthlowi thuh kthleng chdaat rah.
46016013	Naan nih ihardei chaan, lamrin thuh knet tih irip chaan, pselpa dotlot heppi ikorthlongin ungta aruhn ktang ngi i'amin.
46016014	Naan nih dow mkheng avah vonsat tih atlown.
46016015	Ku'uknau rek akoksow chaak inna, tidit tah naan nih Stephenas innkhor avah adodehn, mmaan nah Akhaia paamkuwl ki mkhatna' mchei reklam ungta miikenje rek soptolowna' thung ngi kakparlaan dok kcha' reklam.
46016016	Mleiya naan nih mmaan hep daat mii rek hinni ungta neen tu' nong klousap kcha' mii rek khimkhei hinni akparlaan chaakna' raan akokso chaak inna.
46016017	Stephenas le' Phortunatas le' Akhaiakas le' mthlenin avah kanpa kcha' ping. Mleiya naan ahinki kdoptat chaak rek avah mmaan nih mpordonpiik chlamda.
46016018	Mleiya mmaan nih nei kapthla ruk ungta naan apthlaan rukka ren mipthut piik chaanda, avaleiyi ava' hep mii rek avah naan nih adeipindih chaan.
46016019	Asia paamkuwl thuh ka'am lamrinlop rekki aturvuwi chaak inna. Akyul a le' Prisila ngi mi'nnin thungki lamrinlop rektu' plung kluwt dok ki Kruwng hinni aturvuwi chaak inna.
46016020	Unau rek mkheng inni aturvuwi chaak inna ungta naan nih khat le' khat avah kchiir kurput tih ikurputin rah, ikurvuwi chaan.
46016021	Paul neiyi hava' tkurvuwina' avah kukhut kat tih kdokjit chaak.
46016022	Kuwmiikhat tih Kruwng Jisu Khrista vonsat mlow chaakma bih, mma' 'leenni pauhor ka'am kcha' a. ‘O, Kruwng, arjungqum.
46016023	Kruwng Jisu ki plungnee avah naan ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
46016024	Khrista Jisu hinni nei kvonsat avah naan akhengin a'leenin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
47001001	Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi, Jisu Khrista ki tamsi Paul neiyi nu'unnau'in Timothy tu' Korinthia khuwpii thuh ka'am Isowr lamrinlop naan ahinin nih ungta Akhaia paamkuwl thuh ka'am miikenje rek hinni kikjit chaak a.
47001002	Neenki Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
47001003	Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa, ungta plungqhat rekki Mpa ungta dow mkheng 'leenni plungngam mikpii kchaan Isowr avah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso.
47001004	Mleiya neen nih tyattraan kperteel rek mmaan ava' hinni plungngam tpiik pchaanna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi tyattraanna' mkheng thung ngi plung ngamna' mipiinda. Mleiya Isowr rih neen nihin nih plungngam midotpiikin heppi neen nih mmaan avah plungngam tpiik raan.
47001005	Mleiya Khrista suwkthuhna' ava ngi neen nthung ngi kepleet tih mluwn chaak heppi Khrista amleiyi Isowr rih plung ngamna' avah kepleet tih mitpiik chaak inna.
47001006	Ungta neenve ngi tyattraanna' kdut chaakin bih, avah naan athen inni plung ngamna' ungta akarsan chaakna' raan ki then. Mleiya hava' thuh naan rukku, neenve ngi kdodiilin tyattraanna' rek ava'jik ki tidiil chaakna' ki ruhtanna' ka'am. Mditmata neenve ngi plung ngamna' kdut chaakin rukku avah naan athen inni plung ngamna' ungta akarsan chaakna' raan ki then.
47001007	Ungta neenve ngi naan athen inni plungbinpsuk avah knet tih kthlowi chaakin. Mleiya neenve ngi kyat chaakin thung ngi naan rukka kya kcha' inptih ungta plung ngamna' kdut chaakin thung rukku naan ruk plung ngamna' phang chnaandi'.
47001008	Mleiya ku'uknau rekin, neenve ngi Asia paamkuwl thuh kthleenin nih tyatna' kthuwk rek avah naan nih adodehma raan avah ngei maanring. Mleiya neenve a tperteel pchaanmah ngi bowrkrik mopdotinda, ava' thung ngi neenve ngi kring kma' rang kpha rukku kirbinin nuh.
47001009	Ou, mkindit kat tih neenve, kdak inni lamkilrin kmah ngi kdiyou kperdel Isowr hin daat tih lamrinin nuh, kuplung inni kdakin avah tidina' pauqum kpha rukka kirpii dok kchaan ping.
47001010	Hanto'ya klin tidina' thungki Isowr rih neenve a maktlan inda ungta mtaktlan meek sliinna ungta neenve ngi lamkrin chaak inna tidit tah 'tundil rukku Mma ngi mkaktlan chraan.
47001011	Naan rukku khadaat tih neenve kthen inni rin'aktham chaakin ava ngi mbom chaan tinu. Mleiya mii knempok ar'aang ngi neenve kihin inni chla mdotparlaan chaakin ki thenni, mii knempok ki neenve kakchang inni Isowr rah kpanpaak chlam rah.
47001012	'Tunnu neenve kpirlin chaaknaan avah hava: Neenve ngi dultipaam thung ngi ka'amin ki krinchanin ungta kerkheelsi ngi naan a'aang inni ka'amin ki krinchanin avah neenki kuplungril dehn ava ngi mdopandan. Mleiya neenve a Isowr hinki kurjung plungbin khadaat le' plung kertleu vih ka'am kchaan ping. Neenve ngi dultimii ki luwkinritna' dilkqowiyi ka'am pmaan ring pdainu Isowr hinki kurjung plungnee ava' dilkqowiyi ka'am kchaan ping.
47001013	Mleiya naan nih adoparchamin ungta adodehn ava' heihin nih neenve ngi dow morson kjit maanring. 'Tunnu naan nih mqutna' kpha thung ngi avah deipindih chnaandih, tidit kbin chaak a.
47001014	Dakat tih naan nih neenve a mruk daat adotedeh pinditin, tidit tah Kruwng Jisu nit ava' thung ngi neenve kleiyi pirlin chnaandi' ungta naan aleiyi neen ruk pirlin chnikaandi'.
47001015	Mleiya naan nih miknitna' athenin nem chaakna' adophaak chaakna' raan ki thenni ungta hava' thung ngi neiyi plungkrip kdothlowi chaak leiyi, choduduh ngi naan ahin nih tethlen rah kdobin chaak.
47001016	Mleiya naan nih Judia paamkuwl thah adotapthlat chaak raan kdongei chaak leiyi, neiyi Mesedonia paamkuwl thah kche rang thung ngi naan ahin nih luwtda ungta karvang kerheel thang rukku ahinin nih luwtda ta'am rah kdongei chaak.
47001017	Avaleiyi, neiyi ava' knongbin avah, ko'oltek ki ktlow ngi atbinin mow? Mditmata neiyi dultimii rek dobin heppi knongbin avah ktlow rah atbinin mow? Mleiya nei kihin nuh, ong nga, ong ungta immeh, immeh.
47001018	Pdainu Isowr rah trinchaak krow, naan ahinin nih kdotheen pau avah ong le' maang tethena'lu pemeh.
47001019	Mleiya Isowr Chapa Jisu Khrista leiyi, neen nih ungta Silvenas le' Timothy ungta neiyi kdoparjaamin avah ong le' maang tethena' pemeh pdainu Mma' hinni avah ong ava'.
47001020	Mleiya Isowr paureel mkheng avah Mma' hinni ong ava'. Ungta mii rekki neenve ar'aang ngi Isowr mdoponlor chaakna' rah Mma' avah ‘Amen’ ava'.
47001021	'Tunnu Khrista hinni naan ruk ungta neen ruk mikapqhangin ungta reidii mikpubullin Mma' avah Isowr.
47001022	Mma ngi neen avah kbihjiik milot chaanda ungta tarpaalna' khat tih Pthla avah nuplungchai rekin thung ngi mipiinda.
47001023	Neiyi naan adokparkhaal chaakna' raan ki thenni Korinthia khuwpii thah veikhat kthleng nowl pmaang. Neiyi havah Isowr rih kapthlarin mdodeh daat tih mkindit kat ava' kdothe.
47001024	Neen nih naan alamrinin 'leenni tpaalna' ruhtan kdosintonna' raan ki then pemeh pdainu neenna akanpat chaakin thung ngi akkanpat qhi kcha' aplapin ping. Mleiya naanna lamtrin chaakna' thung ngi knet tih krip kchaan ptih.
47002001	Pdainu nei kthung ngi hanto' binnu krip imping tidit tah veikhat plungkya ngi ahinin nih thleng nimaang.
47002002	Mleiya neiyi naan akapyatin bih, kuw rangda nei kkanpatna' moktlotpiik rang nga, neiyi kdopyat chaak rek naan daat pemeh mow?
47002003	Ungta neiyi hava' dow rekkat avah kdokjit dok, mditma bih, kthlen chaak thung ngi nei kkanpatna' rang rek ava ngi neiya mkapya kcha' lamrah. naan akhengin a'leenin nih adokrin chaakin leiyi, nei kkanpat avah naan akhengin kanpa kcha' inptih.
47002004	Mleiya neiyi kya dok ki ungta plungkqap pih kirthli kbupok ki naan ahinin nih kdokjit chaak. Pdainu havah naan aplungin yatna' rang mda, neiyi naanna kepleet tih vonsat adoklow chaakin ava' adodehna' raan ki then.
47002005	Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih tyatna' mupthuh bih, mma ngi nei mdotapyat pemeh pdainu naan akhengin avah mruk thung ngi adotapyat chaakin. Neiyi mruk kdodit avah naan ahin nih mapchai reenmana' rah kdothe.
47002006	Mii knempok ki mraal suwkthuhna' mdopiikin ava ngi ava' hep mii ava' ki thenvah kokhop a.
47002007	Pdainu ava' kchang ngi naan nih mma' avah ptlotpiik thida adoksow chaak raan. Mditma bih ava'hep mii avah kdung ngi tyatna' ava ngi mma' avah kopyol kcha'krow.
47002008	Avaleiyi, neiyi akaktham chaak inna tidit tah mma' hinni avonsat'lown avah ren nih atedetin.
47002009	Mleiya naan nih dow mkheng 'leenni tethe apqowiyin immow, tidit kdoperteel chaakna' rang ki thenni naan ahin nih havah kdokjit chaak.
47002010	'Tunnu naan nih kuwmiikhat hinni talutalu yoso adoptlot piikin mma' avah nei rukku koptlotpiik a. Mleiya naan athenni talutalu yoso kdoptlot piik dok mma' avah Neiyi Khrista dodeh ngi kdoptlot piik dok.
47002011	Mditma bih, Seitan nih neenna mikepkheel raan mleiya neen nih mma' ki tekmena' mihuwn avah tedeh mlaiyin pemeh.
47002012	Ava' han'tun nih Khrista ki kqhapaumin leiyi, neiyi Troas khuwpii thah chetnu. Neiyi ava'thah kche thuh Kruwng ngi kthen nih thurngut mdotapvan piik deinu.
47002013	Pdainu kuplung karngat chaakna' ammda mleiya ava' thuh knaupa Taitas tah kdodeh pemeh. Mthungta neiyi thaan lam thinu Mesedonia thah kchet kcha' ping.
47002014	'Tunnu mpha ktai Khrista hinni miktapchaanin, Isowr rah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso. Ungta Mma ngi Mma' tedehpindit chaakna' mikrimkdih langlang avah neen nlei inni mmun ktai thungki mii rek hinni tedetda.
47002015	Mleiya neenna mdosansli dok rek hin ruk ungta kenvei kcha'sli rek hin rukku Isowr thenni Khrista hinki mikrimkdih reidii rek inpimin.
47002016	Ungta khat hinvah neenna tidina' thungki tidina' ki thenni mikrimkdih reidiin pimin. Ungta morson khat hinvah rinkum ki rinkum thenni mikrimkdih reidii rek inpimin. Ungta hava' dow rekki thenni kuw ngi kopkhop pchaang chrang nga?
47002017	Mleiya neenna, Isowr pauna avah mthen nemna' ki thenni kporchoukrep mii rek ava' hep pmaanring. Pdainu plung kertleu vih ungta Isowr dow kurthuwk ki ungta Isowr miksut thung ngi, neen nih Khrista hinni avah kdothe thut chaakin.
47003001	Neen nih veikhat, kpalqhat chaak naan ahinin nih ktlotin mow? Mditmata mii aangqhe rekki naan ahinki rah trotpiikna' paukjit mdongeenin ungta naan ahinki trotpiikna' paukjit mdongeenin ava' heppi neenna kngeenin mow?
47003002	Naanna mii mkheng ngi mdodeh ungta mdoparcham kuplungin thung ngi tikjit dok neenki kpaukjit inptih.
47003003	Ava' han'tun nih naanna kandang daat tih tedeh, neen nih sopkdolow chaakin Khrista ki paukjit avaan ptih. Khut tih tikjitma pdainu kring Isowr Pthla ngi tikjit dok, lungphel 'leenni tikjitma pdainu sadak ki aplungchaiyin 'leenni tikjit dok rekin ptih.
47003004	Ungta hava' hep plungbin knet avah neen nih Isowr ktong thah Khrista Jisu amleiyi kthlowi chaakin.
47003005	Neen nih kthina daatin thungki ngi talutalu yoso tbinna' avah kokhop pih kdothlowi chaakin pemeh pdainu kokho chaaknaan avah Isowr hinki.
47003006	Ungta Isowr rih neenna pauqum ren ava' sopklow ki mtikkcha pchaang mupthutinda. Neen nih tikjit dok ava' pemeh pdainu neen nih Pthla nong ava' kdotlot chaakin. Mleiya tikjit dok rek ava ngi mdo'eyow pdainu Pthla ava' vah rinkum mdopiik.
47003007	Pdainu kdiyou nongtlotna', tikjit dok ungta lung rek 'leenni tikri ava ngi mkonlor chaakku, tidit tah kenvei kcha' rang tkonlorna' dotlot tih, Isreel nau rekki mmai konlorna' leiyi, Moses avah kmin nih msut pchaanmah innu,
47003008	Taluhep pih Pthla nongtlotna' ava ngi kerkheelsi ngi konlorset kma' rangda?
47003009	Mleiya tupsulna' kpii nongtlot avah konlor mkurthuh bih rinkinditna' nongtlot ngaalla kerkheelsi ngi konlor chrah.
47003010	Mleiya hava' thung vah choduh ki tkonlorna' dok avah 'tunnu mkonlorna' ka'am pemeh. Mleiya npinqim bih 'tunnu ava' kepkheelsi tkonlorna' ka'am kcha'.
47003011	Mleiya kenvei meeksli ava ngi mkonlor chaak bih, hava' ka'am daat ava ngi kdungset tih konlor chrah.
47003012	Hava' hep plungbinpsuk kdothlowi chaakin leiyi, neen nih changkarngam mih neenna kpau kchaan ping.
47003013	Mleiya havah Isreel nau rekki msit ktaak mqutna' ava' mdosut tlit mana' raan ki thenni maikhum mih mmai kupkhum Moses dotlotlulu pemeh.
47003014	Pdainu mmaan plung rek avah tapchai pthida. Mleiya tuni kpha ngi mmaan nih pauqum pli mparchamin thung ngi ava' maikhum avah kliik kmah ngi ka'am daat. Hava' maikhum avah Khrista hinni mdolow pthi dok.
47003015	Pdainu tuni kpha ngi mmaan nih Moses laika rek mparchamin cheu muplung rekin thung ngi maikhum ava ngi mdopkhum tlit daat lam.
47003016	Anto'daat yoso kuwmiikhat tih Kruwng hinni plung mtarngat chaak thung ngi Kruwng ngi ava' maikhum avah mdolow pthipiik.
47003017	'Tunnu Kruwng nga Pthla ava' ungta Kruwng Pthla amna'mun ava' thuh ning'olna' avah ka'am.
47003018	Pdainu neen nkheng inni pthlasut thuh 'tun tkerdehn heppi Kruwng konlorna' avah maikhum liik pthida mai le' maiyi dei chenaandi'. Mma ngi neenna Pthla ngi ka'am Kruwng ava' ar'aang ngi tkonlorna' thungki ngi tkonlorna' thah mikperthleng chraan.
47004001	Avaleiyi, neen nih hava' nongtlotna' avah plungnee kdo'arlaan chaakin heppi kdo'arlaan chaakin, ava' vah neenna kuplungin pneelvot meh.
47004002	Pdainu neen nih kordowl lih ka'am ningkyana' dow rek avah kdopthlat pthi chaak dokin. Ungta neenna mii ktepmen rang ngi kchet pmaan ring ungta Isowr Pauna ngi mii huwnna' maan ring. Pdainu hanto' heppi neen nih kdaksaan avah Isowr aang ngi mii khimkhei ki plungril thung ngi kindit avah kertleu deek ki kdoparlaan chaakin.
47004003	Pdainu neenki kqhapaumin avah mkandanma bih, avah kenvei chrang rek hinni kandang chmeh a.
47004004	Isowr arlim Khrista ki kqhapaumin ki mar'aang ava ngi mmaan 'leenni mlenmana' rang ki thenni tunpha ki isowr rek ava ngi lamkrin kma' rekki plungbin rek mik avah toptot pthida.
47004005	Mleiya neen nih neen kdaksaan kparjaam kcha'in pmaan ring pdainu Kruwng Khrista Jisu ava' kdoparjaam chaakin. Ungta neenna Jisu thenni naan asuwk inping.
47004006	Mleiya kjiingnu thungki ngi mar'aang teplenna' rang ki thenni paupiik kpii Isowr ava ngi neen kuplungin thung ngi mar'aang meplenpiik inda. Jisu Khrista mai thung ngi Isowr konlorna' tedeh pinditna' mar'aang ava' mdotpiikna' raan ki thenni mar'aang avah mdoplen dok.
47004007	Pdainu hava' klinsi ruhtanna' avah Isowr hinki ungta neen kihinin ki pemeh, tidit tpandanna' rang ki thenni neen nih hava' alrou avah duldak beel rek thung ngi kdothlowi chaakin.
47004008	Neenna mirkil ktai ki tyattraanna' rekki mper'delinda pdainu ava ngi mper'delkrep inmeh. Kuplungin tpenqheekda pdainu neen nih kuplungbin psukin avah pqhun chmaan ring.
47004009	Neen nih tyat chiireelna' perteel innu pdainu Isowr rih neenna mmapthiin meh, neenna muptluwnda pdainu mpenvei inmeh.
47004010	Mpha ktaiyi Jisu rinkum avah neen kdaksaan thung ngi ka'am tidit mkandanna' rah neen nih kdaksaan thung ngi Kruwng Jisu diyowna' avah kdohor chaakin.
47004011	Mleiya kdiyou kcha' rang neen ndaksa thung ngi Jisu rinkum ava' mkandanna' rang ki thenni, ringda ka'am daat neen avah mpha ktaiyi Jisu thenni kdiyou hinni mparlaaninda.
47004012	Hanto ngi kdiyou ava ngi neen kthung inni nong tlowda pdainu naan athung innu rinkum avah ka'am.
47004013	Pdainu hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Neiyi lamkrin chaak ungta avaleiyi neiyi kdothe,” (Luw. 116:10) mdoditna' lamrin ki pthla avah neen kihinin nih ma'am leiyi neen nih lam kdorin chaakin ungta avaleiyi neen nih kdotheen.
47004014	Mleiya Kruwng Jisu kperdel Mma' ava ngi neen rukka Jisu ar'aang ngi mekperdel chraan tidit kdeh chaakin.
47004015	Hava' dow mkheng avah naan athen, tidit tah mii knempok hinni kerjei dok plungnee ava ngi mii knempok ki Isowr konlorna' thung ngi tpanpaak chaakna' avah kepleet chrah.
47004016	Avaleiyi, neenna kuplungin kepneel amvot meh. Neenki mduwn 'leer ki daksa avah kenvei sli chyoso krilin ki kdaksaan avah nitnit ki ren mtupthuh thang setset inna.
47004017	Mleiya hava' neenki tyatraanna' avah ko'oltek ungta havah mpha rowisowt nimeh. Ungta hava ngi ktlangknai kma' tkonlorna' avah kerkheel setset tih midotepnem piikthangin.
47004018	Avaleiyi, neen nih mik ki tedeh pchaan dow rek tsutthlaamin pemeh pdainu mik ki tedeh pchaanmah dow rek ava' tsutthlaam chaakin. Mleiya mik ki tedeh dow rek avah mpha mruk ki then daat ungta mik ki tedehma dow rek avah ktlangknai kma' ki then.
47005001	Mleiya dultipaam ki ni'innin, hava' buw'inn ava' mkenvei chaak bih, neen nih Isowr hinki inndak nthlowi chaakin tidit neen nih ndehn. Mleiya khut tih tsakmah ktlangknai kma' inn avah parvaan rek thah ka'am.
47005002	Mleiya parvaan ki ta'amna' raan inn avah dona heppi midotapnaak chaak rang ava' karda ngi neenna hava' thung ngi archam lou'in minnu ta'am chaak ngaalin.
47005003	Mma ngi dona ava' mitapnaak dokin dilvah neenna buwdiir ktaak ki ta'amin nimeh.
47005004	Mleiya neen nih hava' buw'inn thuh na'amin thung ngu dakat tih archam lou'in minnu ungta nbowrin rikda. Mleiya Isowr rih nbuw ndiirin mdosu pthi rah tngeina' pemeh pdainu kdiyou avah rinkum mih mdopyol dokna' rang ki thenni hava' kdiyou chrang daksa ava' pyoldon rinkum ki buwdiir mdotapnaak chaak raan ava' tngei chaakin.
47005005	'Tunnu nthen inni hava'kat mikporthlon piikin avah Isowr. Ungta Mma ngi Pthla avah midotarpaal chaak naan nih, nihin nih midotpiik chaakin.
47005006	Avaleiyi, mpha ktai thuh neenna plungkrip pih ndehn tidit tah neen nih daksa ki inn thuh na'amin thung ngu Kruwng hinki inn ava' thung ki 'lam talat chaakin.
47005007	Mleiya neenna lamrin nih tcheen, mikdeh ngi tcheen pemeh.
47005008	Ou, neenna nuplungin krip tidit tah daksa inn thuh ka'am kmah ngi Kruwng tu' inn thuh ta'am chaak ava ngi nuplungin kngam kcha'.
47005009	Avaleiyi, neen nih nuplungin tupluw chaakin avah, inn thuh am yomin mditmata am myomin nih Mma' plungngam totlot chaak ava' daat.
47005010	Mleiya neen nkhengin avah Khrista paupinditna' longkhom aang ngi krip rang yesang inpimin. Mleiya mii ktaiyi daksa ki mnongtlotna' avah mma' mma' ki nongtlot chaak dilkqowiyi kqha yoso kthi yoso mdo'arlaan chaak rah.
47005011	Mleiya neen nih Kruwng ki tiqit chaakna' avah talu tidit kdodeh chaakin leiyi, mii rekka kdopnuwm chaakin. Ungta neenna Isowr rih kqhajik ki mtedeh chaakin. Ungta naan rukku aplungrildeh inni neenna atedehpindit chaak inna tidit tih kbin chaak a.
47005012	Mleiya naan nih muplung ril lih kpirlin kma', mii dodeh ngi kpirlin kcha' rek hinni ado'arthaan chaak pchaanna' raan ki thenni, neen nih kdaksaan avah naan ahin nih veikhat palqhat chmaan ring. Pdainu neen kakchang inni akpirlin chaakna' raan ki thenni changqhatna' akpii kcha' inping.
47005013	Mleiya neen nih ka'aa chaakin bih, avah Isowr thenso mditmata neen nih kuplungin kindit mkurthuh cheentung ngi avah naan athen.
47005014	Mleiya Khrista vonsat tih neenna mdotoptlot chaakin mleiya havah mkindit kat ava'. Mleiya Miikhat tih mii mkheng ki thenni diyouda ava'leiyi mii mkheng avah kdiyou.
47005015	Mleiya 'tun kring rek ava ngi mmaan mdaksa ki thenni mrinporson raan pemeh mmaan thenni diyouda ungta kring kerheel dok Mma' thenni mrin chaakna' raanni Mma ngi mii mkheng ki thenni diyouda.
47005016	Avaleiyi, 'tunki kupqhun nih neen nih kuwkhat leh ruk daksa dilkqowiyi suw chmaanmin. Neen nih Khrista avah daksa dilkqowiyi dei chdaat yomin, neen nih anto' heppi tedeh porsonin pemeh.
47005017	Avaleiyi, kuwmiikhat tih Khrista hinni ma'am chaak bih, mma' avah ren tpurthuh kurthuwk kcha' a. Mleiya dowpli mkheng avah kthleng dok kcha' a, asuwn, dow mkheng avah ren kurthuwk kcha' a.
47005018	'Tunnu dow mkheng avah Isowr hinki. Mma ngi Jisu Khrista amleiyi neen avah mdakkat thung ngi mikpalqhat chaanda. Ungta Mma ngi tkalqhatna' ki nongtlotna' avah neen nihinin nih mitpiik chaak inna.
47005019	Isowr rih dultimii rekki doparmana' rek avah ktaipiik kmah ngi, Mma ngi Khrista thung ngi amda dultipaam avah Mma' hinni tpalqhatda. Ungta Mma ngi neen nihin nih tkalqhatna' pauna avah neen nihin nih mitpiik inna.
47005020	Avaleiyi, neenna Khrista kchangkdon mii ava' inpimin. Havah Isowr rih naan avah neen ka'amin leiyi, adokoksow chaakin. Ungta neen nih Khrista kchang ngi akaktham chaak inna, tidit tah naan nih Isowr tu' ikalqhat chaan.
47005021	Mleiya havah neen nih Mma' hinni Isowr ki rinkinditna' ava' tphan chaakna' raan, tidit tah Mma ngi pnu kdeiliit kma' Khrista avah neen nthen inni pnu tpurthuhda.
47006001	Ava' vah neenna Mma' tu' nong ktlow kcha'sap rekin pimin. Avaleiyi, Isowr plungnee avah msit ktaak ki karlaang akurthuh mana' raan ki thenni akokso chaak inna.
47006002	Mleiya Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi adokrot piikna' mpha thung ngi nang nga adokarjaak, Neiyi tkirliinna' nit ava' thung ngi adokbom, ” dida. (Is. 49:8) Asuwn, 'tunkat ki mpha havah trotpiikna' ki mpha. Asuwn, 'tunkat ki mpha havah tkirliinna' ki mpha avah.
47006003	Mleiya neen nih ksoplow chaakin ava' 'leenni kraallin khatleh ruk ma'ammana' rah dow khatleh 'leenni mii rek khuhsiir pirthitna' rah kdotlot chaakin pemeh.
47006004	Pdainu dow mkheng 'leenni neen nih Isowr sopklow kcha' rek kurthuwk ki, kdung ngi tidiildeh chaak ki, tyat tperteel chaak ki, kikriing rek rekki ungta arda khatna' tya arlak ki havah kdopandan chaakin.
47006005	Mdote'epok inni, rowng'inn thuh mdotkhum pok inni, eenghal tyatya tidiil chaak ki, arda tyatya tupluw chaak ki, ti'iimana' tyatya ngi, then tngowlna' tya tu' kdopandan chaakin.
47006006	Neen nih kchiir rih, tedeh pinditna' chaak ki, ksowt tih tidiildeh ngi, plungdown nih, Pthla Kchiir rih, kqha kpurhuwi kma' vonsat tih kdopandan chaakin.
47006007	Ungta kindit pauna ava ngi, Isowr ruhtan ava ngi ungta rinkinditna' ki raaldona avah maleh machang ngi sin innu ava ngi kdopandan chaakin.
47006008	Ungta aangqhe ngi makyat chaanda ungta aangqhe ngi mdotakyat chaak maan tya ngi, aangqhe ngi mipthitinda ungta aangqhe ngi maqhatinda ungta aangqhe ngi mikuhuwn chaak mupthutinda. Anto'daat yoso neen nih kindit ava' kdopandan chaakin.
47006009	Ungta anngqhe ngi kqhajik ki mtedehn chunni mdotedeh maan tya ngi ungta kdilelep pih, asuwn, neenna kring daat inping. Mmaan nih kraallin suwkthuhna' mpiinda pdainu me'eyou kat inmeh.
47006010	Tyattraan kdut chaakin pdainu mpha ktai thuh kanpa chdaat inping. Neenna srahn ping pdainu mii knempok svang kupthut chaakin. Neen nih dow khatleh thlowi chmaan ring pdainu anto' chdaat yoso, neen nih dow mkheng kdothlowi chaakin. Hava' dow mkheng rek 'leenni neen nih Isowr suwk inping tidit ava' kdopandan chaakin.
47006011	Oh, Korinthia rek neen nih naan ahin nih kertleu vih kpau kchaan ping ungta kuplungin kparja ngi kparvang.
47006012	Neen nih naan athen inni kuplungin arkam vot chmaan ring pdainu naanvah aplungrilin avah arkam pthiin tinu.
47006013	'Tunnu ava' adopenletna' inni naan rukku aplungin avah kihin inni atoprolin. 'Tunnu nau rek hinni tethe heppi akthe inna.
47006014	Mleiya lamkrin kma' rektu' reengkol porlotsapmaan. Mleiya mrinkindit rekle' nowlam tukksut kma' rek avah lopkhat kurthuwkdei rang mow? Ungta mar'aang le' kjiingnu avah taluhep pih ka'amve rangda?
47006015	Ungta Khrista le' Beliel avah mkolrotna' ka'am? Mditmata taluhep pih lamkrin kcha' khat ava ngi lamkrin kma' khat tu' kunpun dei rangda?
47006016	Taluhep pih Isowr Luwbuk inn kenje avale' dow pthla rekka talu mkolrotna' ka'am rangda? Mleiya naanna kring Isowr luwbuk'inn kenje avaan ptih. Isowr rih hanto ngi mdothe heppi: “Neiyi mmaan thung ngi amnikdi', Ungta mmaan arlak ki chetnikdi'. Neiya mmaan Isowr kurthuwk nikdi', Ungta mmaan nah nei kmii rek kurthuwk lamrah,” mdodit. (Lev. 26:12 Jer. 32:33 Ejk. 37:27)
47006017	Avaleiyi, Isowr rih: “Mmaan hinki arvang thuwkin rang ngi ikekneeng chaan. Naan nih ktobor avah thowngmaan, ungta Neiyi naan avah arlaang chnikaandi',” dida, mdothe. (Is. 52:11 Ejk. 20:34,41)
47006018	“Neiya naan Apa kurthuwk nikdi'. Ungta naanna Nei kchapa rekle' kchanu rek kurthuwk naandi,” dida (2 Sam. 7:14) Kpaalkpusi Kruwng ngi mdothe.
47007001	Avaleiyi, kvonsat'low rek, neen nih hava' paureel rek ava' tothlowi chaak inni, neen nih daksa le' pthla ktopbor rang dow mkheng rek thungki ndak inni ikertleu chaan cheh. Neen nih Isowr tiqit chaak inni tchiirna' thuh ikurkhum chaan cheh.
47007002	Aplungril inni neenna mhei'arlaang chaan, neen nih kuwkhat leh hinni karmak arvantlow chmaan ring. Neen nih kuwkhat leh hinni kthi arvantlow chmaan ring. Neen nih kuwkhat leh ruk huwng chmaan ring.
47007003	Neiyi havah naan adokupsul chaak naan nih kdothe pemeh. Mleiya neiyi mduduh thah kdothe chaak dok tidit tah naanna neen kuplungril rekin thung ngi ka'am tlitin ptih. Naanna neen tu' kdiyou kheng rang ki ungta krip kheng rang ki inptih.
47007004	Neiyi naan ahinin nih kningqit ktaak liit tih kpau kcha' ping ungta naan alei inni kpirlin dok ki kpau kcha' ping. Neiya plung ngamna' ngi kdim imping ungta neiya neenki kyatkraan chaakin mkheng thung ngi kdung ngi kkanpa kcha' ping.
47007005	Mleiya neen nih Mesedonia thah kthlenin thung vah daksa ngi kkarngat chaaknaan ka'am pemeh pdainu mirkilktai thung ngi tyattraanna' kdoperteelin. Mleiya duwn thang ngi eenghal duhn nuh ungta thung thang ngi ningqitna' amda.
47007006	Anto'daat yoso misutma hinni plungngam kpii Isowr rih, Taitas mthlen leiyi, neenna plungngam mpii chaanda.
47007007	Ungta Taitas thlenlei daat tih plungngam kdophanin daat pemeh pdainu naan nih plungngam mma' hinni adopiik chaakin. Mleiya naan nih kdung ngi atedeh nuwm inna tidit avah Taitas tih kihinin nih songda. Ungta naan nih kdung ngi neen kthen inni plung adopdun chaakin le' kdung ngi vonsat adotolow chaakin ava' rukka songda ungta avaleiyi neiya kdung ngi kanpa kcha' setset ping.
47007008	Mleiya nei kpaukjit ava ngi naan aplungyat naan kurthuwk chdaat yoso, neiya kpursul maang. Neiyi mduduh thah kpursul yowring ngi 'tunnu kpursul maang. Nei kpaukjit ava ngi naan aplungin mapyat tah tidit tah kdeh pdainu avah mpha mruk ki then daat rah.
47007009	'Tunnu nei kkanpat avah naan ayatin lei pemeh pdainu naan nih ayat chaakin thung ngi plung adoperthlen chaakin leiyi, kanpa kcha' ping. Mleiya naanna Isowr dongei dilkqowiyi kya kchaan ptih. Mleiya neen nih, naan nih dow khatleh 'leenni akenveina' raan kdotlotin ka'am pemeh.
47007010	Mleiya Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi tyatna' kphang kcha' ava ngi tkarsan chaakna' ki thenni plung tperthlenna' mdopthuh, ava' vah tpursulna' ka'am pemeh. Pdainu dultipaam ki tyatna' ava' vah tidiyowna' mdopthuh.
47007011	Naan nih hava'kat avah asuwn, tidit tah naan nih rinko'owi kcha' rek rekki tyattraanna' avah perteel chaan tinu ungta ava ngi naan athung inni talu mupthuh a: Ava ngi adaksaan avah kpertleu chaan tinu, plungthit le' ningqit thlowi'in tinu, kdung ngi tngeina' plung le' plung kluwt avah thlowi chaan tinu ungta a'raalin ka'am kmah ngi tipchiir rah ngei intinu. Hava' dow rek mkheng ava' 'leenni naan nih adaksaan avah kertleu inping tidit apandan chaak dok inna.
47007012	Avaleiyi, neiyi naan ahin nih kjityow ring karmak ktlow mii ava' qhatna' rah mditmata miikhat tih m'leen nih karmak mdotlot mii ava' qhatna' rah kdokjit pemeh. Pdainu naan nih Isowr miksut thung ngi adotrin chaakin ava' mkandanna' rang ki thenni kdokjit chaak.
47007013	Avaleiyi, neenna naan aplung ngamin thung ngi kuplungin kngam kcha' a. Mleiya naan akheng inni, Taitas pthla adoparngat chaakin ungta mma' kanpat chaak ava ngi neenna kerkheelsi ngi kanpa kchaan ping.
47007014	Mleiya neiyi Taitas hinni naan aleiyi talutalu 'leen yoso kpirlin chaak leiyi, neiya kningkyak meh. Pdainu neen nih naan ahinin nih dow mkheng avah kindit tih kdothe chaakin leiyi, Taitas hinni neen kpirlin chaakin ava' rukka mkindit kat ava'.
47007015	Ungta naan akheng inni tethe adopqowiyin ava' mbinphaak chaak thung ngi Taitas tih naan avah kerkheelsi ngi von'adotapsat chaakin. Mleiya naan nih mma' avah ningqit tih kunchuwn kchang ngi ado'arlaan chaakin avah mdobinphaak chaak.
47007016	Neiya dow mkheng thuh naan a'leen nih kuplungkrip kdothlowi chaak leiyi, kanpa kcha' ping.
47008001	Hava' han'tun nih ku'uknau rek Isowr rih Mesedonia ki lamrinlop rek hinni plungnee mdopiik chaak lam avah naan nih adodeh raan kdongei chaakin.
47008002	Mmaan nah tyatraanna' tya ngi perteel lamda pdainu mmaan nah kdung ngi kanpa kcha'lam. Ungta kdung ngi srah kurthuwk chlamda pdainu mmaan nih kdung ngi knem mih mdopiikdeh chaakin.
47008003	Mleiya mmaan nih mdopchaan inya knem mih mpiik inna tidit avah neiyi sakhi kpiik chaak a. Mmaan nih muplungbin chaakin dilkqowiyi mdopiik pchaanin thungki kerkheel lih mdopiik chaakin.
47008004	Mleiya neen nih plungnee kdo'arlaan chaakna' raan ungta miikenje rek thenni lopkhat kurthuwna' ava' thung ngi mmaan then ruk ma'amna' rah kihinin nih kdung ngi ktham chlamda.
47008005	Ungta mmaan nih havah neen nih tbinpsukin hep daat chrel lih mdotlotin pemeh pdainu mmaan nih rukrirep pih mdakin avah Isowr hinni kakparlaan chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi mdakin avah neen kihinin rukku kakparlaan kcha'lam.
47008006	Avaleiyi, neen nih Taitas rukku mma ngi mdopqhun dok avah anto'hepjik ki naan athung ngi plungnee ki chla thung ngi mdopqutna' rang ki thenni kdoksow chaakin.
47008007	Avaleiyi, naan nih dow mkheng 'leenni apleet chaakin heppi, tidit tah lamrin 'leenni, tpauna' 'leenni, tedeh pinditna' 'leenni, ungta ardarowna' mkheng 'leenni ungta neen vonsat adotolow chaakin 'leenni ungta naan nih hava' plungneena' 'leen rukku kepleet kchaan ping mow, tidit ruk asuwn.
47008008	Neiyi paureen heppi ahinin nih kdothe pemeh pdainu mii morson rek ardarow tu' kpinqim chaak thung ngi naan avonsatin avah trinchaak krow a tidit tih kdoperteel chaakna'.
47008009	Mleiya naan nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista plungnee avah adodeh pindit chaak dokin. Mleiya Mma ngi svang kurthuwk chleek yoso naan athen inni srah kurthuwk chda. Mleiya Mma' sraht thuh ar'aang ngi naan nih svang athuh chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma' avah srah thuwk chda.
47008010	Ungta 'tunnu naan ahinin nih nei kpauthe chaak avah hava', tidit tah havah naan athen inni mqhatna'. Mleiya jaankum muh naan nih tpiik chaakna' 'leenni mkhatnaan ptih. Naanna ktlow daat mda tpiik chaakna' kngei rekin ptih.
47008011	'Tunnu avaleiyi naan adotlotin avah apurtluwm dokin. Mleiya naanna ktlow rang ngi ka'am dok ungta kbin dok kcha' rekin ptih. Ava' heppi naan nih adothlowi chaakin ava' thung ngi apurtluwm chaan.
47008012	Mleiya mkhatna' thung ngi kpiinuwm kcha'ki plungbin ma'am bih, mdothlowima thungki kma' mdothlowi chaakya thungki ngi tpiik chaak avah trotpiik krow.
47008013	Mleiya havah neiyi morson rekka po'ol thida naan daat abowrin kdopri nuwm lei pemeh.
47008014	Pdainu mkinqimsapna' rang ki then, tidit tah mkinqimsapna' raan ki thenni naanki apleetna' rekin thungki ngi mmaan doptat ava' pordonda ungta mmaan pleetna' thungki ngi naan aptatnaan kpordon rah.
47008015	Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mleiya knempok ki kpurkuwk kcha' mma' ava ngi kepte ngi thlowi meh. Ungta mnau'suwn daat kpurkuwk kcha' mma' ava' rukku pta meh.” (Mpk. 16:18)
47008016	Pdainu Isowr rah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso. Mleiya ava' hep ardarow avah Mma ngi Taitas plung thung ngi naan athenni thiik piikda.
47008017	Mleiya mma ngi neen kdoksown avah mdorot chaak ungta mma ngi kerkheel set tih totlot rah mdongei chaak. Ungta mma ngi muplungbin chaak dilkqowiyi naan ahin nih kthleng kcha'.
47008018	Ungta neen nih mma' tu' lamrinlop mkheng ngi kqhapaumin thung ngi mdopanpaak sapin, nu'unnau'in avah kapthlatsap chaak inna.
47008019	Ungta ava' daat kmah ngi, naan nih adopiik dokin plungnee ki chla ava' tu' neen karlak inni kchetsap rang ngi lamrinlop rekki mma' avah mdokcholin. Mleiya naan nih Kruwng mdakkat adokyat chaak inni tbom chaakna' 'leenni ardarown adotedet chaak naan chla avah neen nih kqha ngi them chnikaandi'.
47008020	Neen nih kuwmiikhat tih hava' chla knempa ava' sopkdolot chaakin 'leenni mdotupsul raan ava' toloi chaak rah kdongeiyin.
47008021	Ava' tu' korthlop pih neen nih kindit deek ki Kruwng aang daat kma' mii rek aang rukku totlot rah kdongei chaakin.
47008022	Ungta neen nih dow knempok 'leenni naan athenni muplung mupluw tlit tah tidit tih kdoperteel tlit chaakin, ku'uknau'in avah mmaanve tu' kapthlat chaak inna. Ungta 'tunnu neen nih, naan a'leen nih kdung ngi plungkrip kdothlowi chaakin leiyi, kerkheelset tih mmah muplung kluwt kcha' a.
47008023	'Tunnu Taitas leiyi, kjit chnih. Mma' avah nei kmiiqhi ungta naan arlak inni nei knonglowqhi khat. Ungta 'tunnu nu'unnau rekin leiyi, kjit chnowl nih. Mmaanve a lamrinlop rek kchangkdon lam ungta mmaanve a Khrista konlor chaakna' lam.
47008024	Avaleiyi, hava' mii rek ava' hinni naan avonsatin avah atedetin. Ungta neen nih naan aleiyi kpirlin chaak naan mlei avah atedetin ungta lamrinlop rek hin rukku havah atedetin.
47009001	'Tunnu naan ahin nih miikenje rek hinni soptolow chaakna' leiyu kdokjit rang avah msit ammeh.
47009002	Mleiya neiyi naan ardarown avah kdodeh chaak dok ungta avaleiyi Mesedonia ki mii rek hinni kpirlin kchaam ping. Neiyi hanto' kdothe: ‘Mleiya Akhaia paamkuwl ki mii rekka jaankum kum mih kkorthlowng kcha' doklam’, kdodit. Ungta naan nih kdung ngi arda krok ki adotlotin ava ngi mii knempok plung avah mdopunchul.
47009003	Anto'daat yoso, naan aleiyi neen kpirlin chaakin avah msit ktaak mkurthuh mana' rang ki thenni neiyi unau rek avah kdopthlat chaak lam. Hava' leiyi, tidit tah neiyi kdothe chaak ava' heppi naan nih akorthlonna' raan ki thenni mmaan avah kdopthlat chaak lam.
47009004	Mditma bih, Mesedonia ki mii rektu' naan ahin nih kthlen bih, ungta mmaan nih naan avah korthlong kmah ngi ka'am atedeh khotin bih, neen nih naan ahin nih dokhatleh ki mlei kthe kma'pa ngi kpirlin chaakin leiyi, ningkya duh nikaandi'.
47009005	Avaleiyi, neiyi unau rek toksow rang avah msit ka'am rek rekki bin chnuh, avaleiyi mmaan avah mduh thah naan ahin nih kdosi lam. Mleiya naan nih pau'adoreel dokin kurkhum chla avah adopqut dokna' raan ungta naan akorthlonin avah mkurkhumna' rah kdosi lam. Naan nih havah kepner rih adopiik raan pemeh pdainu plung kertleu vih suwqhat tu' adopiik chaak raan.
47009006	Pdainu neiyi hava' kthe a. Mleiya arsitda kapqau kcha' mma' ava ngi kirsit tih kurkun chrah. Ungta kepleet tih kapqau kcha' mma' ava ngi kepleet tih kurkun chrah.
47009007	Ava' vah mii khimkheiyi muplungril lih tpiik chaak rah mdobin chaak dilkqowiyi mdopiik chaak rah. Ungta mma ngi mpiiknuwmma arlaan nih, mditmata tpiikmah krow kmah ngi mdopiik rang pemeh. Mleiya Isowr rih kanpa kanpa ngi kpii kcha' rek avah vonsat mdolow chaak.
47009008	Ungta Isowr rih naan athenni plungnee mkheng avah kepleet tih adotpiik pchaanin. Mleiya naan nih adoptatin ktaak ki mpha ktai thung ngi dow mkheng adothlowina' raan mdotlot pchaan. Mdit bih naan nih kqhanong totlot chaak avah pchaang pok chnaandi'.
47009009	Tikjit ava ngi hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Mma ngi arjeipok chda ungta srah rek hinni pii chda. Ungta Mma' rinkinditna' avah ktlangknai kma' ki thenni ka'am.” (Luw. 112:9)
47009010	'Tunnu chii kapqaupa ava' hinni chiimuw kpii Mma' ava ngi thenpen rukka naan athendam raan ki thenni akpii chraan. Ungta Mma ngi achiipqau'in avah kepnem rah ungta arinkindit naanki mchei rek avah akperkheel setset piik chraan.
47009011	Mleiya naan nih knem knem mih adopiik pchaanna' raan ki thenni dow khimkhei thuh Mma ngi naan avah tepleetna' mkheng thuh svang akupthuh raan. Ungta ava ngi neen nih Isowr hinni tpanpaakna midotpiik chaakin.
47009012	Mleiya naan nih hava' soplowna' adotlot chaakin ava ngi miikenje rek dokriin rek mdopordon chaak rang daat mda mii knempok ki kdung ngi Isowr avah kpanpaak chlam rah.
47009013	Mleiya hava' soplowna' adotlotin ava ngi mdopandan nih mii rekki Isowr avah kpanpaak chlam rah. Ungta tethe kopqowi deek ki Khrista ki kqhapaumin thung ngi akerthethut chaak inni ungta naanki aplungtlai inni mmaan tu' ungta mii khimkhei tu' athenin adoporlon chaakin leiyi, mii rekki Isowr avah kpanpaak chlam rah.
47009014	Ungta Isowr ki kerkheelset plungnee avah naan athung inni ma'am leiyi naan plung akopdon kcha' rek inni plung kluwt tih naan athen inni rinktham chlamda.
47009015	'Tunnu Mma' ki tethe pchaanmah chla ava' ki thenni Isowr rah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso.
47010001	'Tunnu Paul neiyi Khrista ki plungdown le' plungperneem ava ngi akoksow chaak inna. Ungta neiyi naan ahin nih ka'am thung ngu neiya kuplung kdil pdainu ahinin nih ka'amma thung ngu naan aktong thah kuplung kraang.
47010002	Pdainu akaktham chaak inna, tidit tah neiyi naan ahin nih ka'am thung ngi mii angqhe rek trisan rah kdobin nih plung kraang ngi ta'amna' rah plung kdopri chaak. Mleiya mmaan nih mii rek amnow ngi neen rukka ka'am mih mbininda. Neiyi hava' heppi plung kraang ngi ka'am mana' rah akaktham chaak inna.
47010003	Mleiya neenna daksa ngi kringin pimin pdainu dultimii nowpa dilkqowiyi raal avah tnaakin pemeh.
47010004	Mleiya neenki nraaldona avah dultimii ki pemeh pdainu raalrowng tekqhe pchaanna' rang ki Isowr hinki ruhtanna' ava'.
47010005	Mleiya Isowr luwkinritna' ptengda mthina kakparthaan kcha' dultimii ki plungbin rek khimkhei avah avarpthiin. Ungta plungbin rek khimkhei avah Khrista ki tethe topqowina' kurduh ngi rowngmii ngi athipthiin.
47010006	Ungta naan nih, naanki tethe topqowina' thung ngi akurkhum dokin bih, neen nih tethe topqowimana' ki nong mkheng rek avah mraal suwkthuhna' tpiikna' raan tkorthlon chaak raan.
47010007	Naan nih dow rek avah mduwn ki mruwngchen chrel daat adosutin mow? Kuwmiikhat tih mdak avah Khrista hinni ka'am ping tidit mkilrin chaak bih, mma ngi avah kornowl lih abin chso. Mleiya mma ngi Khrista hinni ma'am chaak heppi neen rukka Khrista hinni ka'am imping tidit abin chso.
47010008	Mleiya neiyi hava' ruhtanna' leiyi, mruk kpirlin chyo ringngi kningkyakmeh. Mleiya hava' ruhtanna' avah naan akenvei chaakna' raan ki mda naan apqhanna' raan ki thenni Kruwng ngi midotpiik chaakin.
47010009	Mleiya mii rekki neiyi naan avah, nei kpaukjit rek ava ngi akipqit inna tidit tih mdobin raan avah kdongei pemeh.
47010010	Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih, ‘Paul paukjit rekka krik reen nah mditmata kapchai reen nah, pdainu mdakka taluruk pemeh ungta mpauthe avah msit ka'am pemeh,’ kdikrow.
47010011	Ava' hep mii ava' vah hava' abin chso, tidit tah neen nih ndak na'amma thung ngu neen nih pauna rek avah paukjit tih tikjitlu. Ungta ndak na'am thung vah ava' heppi mnong ngi totlot'lu.
47010012	Mleiya neen nih mthinaan nih kpalqhat kcha' rek mmaan tung ngi kdakin avah khatsap pih tpinqim mditmata tportol chaakna' ruhtan thlowi maan ring. Pdainu mdakin msingreel inni kpertet kcha' ungta mdakin msingreel inni kportol kcha' mmaan avah kinrit lam pemeh.
47010013	Pdainu neenna Isowr rih mdopelreen dok ava' han'tun nih pirlin chnimaan ring. Ava' kchang ngi neen nih Isowr rih mdotthem piikin knongrit inki dilkqowiyi kpirlin kcha' inping. Ungta hava' tpertetna' ava ngi naan rukka adotphaak chaakin.
47010014	Mleiya neen nih naan adokphaakna' raan ki thenni kerkheel reen nih kirjida nong kdotlotin pemeh. Mleiya dakat tih neen nih naan akpha ngi Khrista ki kqhapaumin ava' tu' ahinin nih kthleng inping.
47010015	Neen nih kthen raan kerkheel lih dow rek 'leenni kpirlinin pmaanring. Mleiya neen nih mii morson nongtlot chaak leiyi, pirlin chmaan ring. Ava' kchang ngi neen nih hava' plungbinpsuk kdothlowi chaakin. Mleiya naan alamrinin kerkheel setset ava ngi naan arlak inni neen knongtlot chaak raan avah Isowr rih kperkheel seset rah.
47010016	Mleiya havah neen nih kqhapaumin avah naan aheihin inni kdoparjaam chaakna' raan ki then. Ungta neen nih mii morson nih mdopqut chaak dok nong 'leenni kpirlin chaakmana' raan ki then.
47010017	Pdainu “kpirlin kcha' mma' ava ngi Kruwng hinni ikpirlin chso.” (Jer. 9:24)
47010018	Mleiya Kruwng ngi mthina kakpanpaak kcha' mii avah mdorot piik pemeh. Pdainu Kruwng ngi mdopanpaak mii avah trot ruk mdorot chaak.
47011001	O, neiyi kokmow chaak thung rukku naan nih mnau'suwn a adotidiil chaak raan avah ngei chnuh ungta dakat tih tidiil ruk mdiil chaan tinu.
47011002	Mleiya neiyi naan avah Isowr hinki tepnerna' ava ngi adokepner chaakin. Mleiya neiyi naan avah kchiir nlakinrim khat tih adokparlaanna' raanni, innpu khat tidit tah Khrista hinni pau kdopthlen chaak dok.
47011003	Pdainu Pruwl ava ngi Eve avah mma' ki tepmenna' ava ngi mdohuwn chaak heppi naan rukka Khrista hinni plungkrip adohor chaakin thungki akuhuwng chraan binnu. neiya kningkqi a.
47011004	Mleiya miikhat ithlengso neen nih kdoparjaamin ava' kma' Jisu msik khat kparjaam krow. Mditmata naan nih ado'arlaan dokin ava' kma' pthla msik khat karlaang krown ptih. Mditmata naan nih adorot chaak dokin ava' kma' kthapaumin msik khat arot chaak dokin bih, naan nih ava' tu' ko'oltek ki kilqhi kcha'in imptih.
47011005	Mleiya neiya tamsi klin rek arlak ki mikdilsi khat ping kirdi chmaang.
47011006	Neiyi tpauna' 'leenni kurchuk myow rih, tedeh pinditna' 'leenni ptamaang. Ungta neen nih dow mkheng thung ngi ahinin nih kqhajik ki kdopandan chaakin.
47011007	Neiyi naan ahin nih, Isowr ki kqhapaumin mkhon ktaak ki kdoparjaamna' thung ngi naan aparthaanna' raan ki thenni kpirdil kcha' ping, ava'leiyi neiya pnu kerve mow?
47011008	Neiyi naan sop'adoklow chaakna' raan ki thenni kardaman mdotpiik chaak lam ava ngi lamrinlop morson rek avah kdo'alrowt chaak lam.
47011009	Neiyi naan ahin nih ka'am thung ngi kikriinna' ka'am pdainu kuwkhat leh bowr prik chmaang. Mleiya Mesedonia ki kthleng ku'uknau rekki kikriin rek avah kurkhumjik ki mdotpordon piiklam. Neiyi naan kuwkhat leh bowr kdopri mana' rah, dow mkheng 'leenni neiya kkilrin kcha' ping ungta neiya hanto' heppi kilrin tlit chnikdi'.
47011010	Khrista ki kindit ava' nei kthung ngi ma'am leiyi Akhaia paamkuwl rek thung ngi kpirlin chaakna' 'leenni kuwkhat leh ngi mapkhaan nimeh.
47011011	Havah talulei? Neiyi naan vonsat adoklowmaan lei mow? Avah Isowr rih mdeh!
47011012	Mleiya neiyi neen kehep inni mii rekki mdobin raan kngei kcha' mmaan ava ngi mpirlin chaak naan dow rek 'leenni mpirlin chaakna' raan ki m'lam ava' kdoreen pthina' rah neiyi kdotlot avah tlow tlit chdaat nikdi'.
47011013	Mleiya avale' avah mdak inni Khrista tamsi rek hepleek ki mmeel kperthleng mlangkma' tamsi rekle' tuhuwn chaakna' nong ktlow reklam.
47011014	Ungta havah tngana'lu pemeh, tidit tah Seitan mdakkat tih mar'aang ki vaantamsi heppi mmeel perthlengda.
47011015	Avaleiyi, mma' sopklow kcha' rek ava ngi, rinkinditna' ki sopklow kcha' rek heppi, mkerthlen chaakin avah tngana' rah ka'am pemeh. Pdainu mmaan rinkum qutna' avah mnongtlot rekin ava' dilkqowijik daat rah.
47011016	Neiyi veikhat kthe chaak nowl a tidit tah kuwkhat leh ngi neiya kokmok ki mbin mso. Pdainu mma ngi anto' heppi mtibin chaak rukku, neiyi mnau'suwn kpirlin chaakna' rah kokmok khat mdo'arlaan chaak heppi mhei'arlaan chso.
47011017	Neiyi havah tpirlin chaakna' ki hava' plungkrip kthlowi kcha' dothe ngi kdothe Kruwng dothe dilkqowiyi kdothe pemeh pdainu kokmok khat pau vih, kdothe chaak.
47011018	Mii knempok ki daksa lam thah mpirlin chaakin kdodeh ngi nei rukka ava' heppi kpirlin kcha' ping.
47011019	Mleiya naan nih akindit reen inni kokmok rek tung ngi kanpa ngi adodiil chaak sapin.
47011020	Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih suwk'owr apthutin yoso, akcha dokin yoso, ahinin ki lou chdok yoso, mthina kpirlin chyoso ungta amai thaan nih atpeengin yoso, naan nih hava'le' mkheng avah adodiil chaakin.
47011021	Mleiya neenna ava' ki thenvah kdungreen nih kruhn kdowng, neiya havah kningkya chaak ki kdothe. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih ava' ki thenni plung kraang mkurthuh bih, nei rukka kuplung kraang. Neiyi havah kokmok ki kdothe.
47011022	Mmaan nah Hibriu lam mow? Mdit bih nei ruk Hibriu ping. Mmaan nah Isreel lam mow? Mdit bih nei ruk Isreel ping. Mmaan nah Abraham rilam thungki lam mow? Mdit bih nei ruk Abraham rilam thungki ping.
47011023	Mmaan nah Khrista sopklow kcha' rek lam mow? Mdit bih nei rukka Khrista sopklow kcha' khat ping. Neiyi havah kokmok khat dothe ngi kthe'a. Mleiya neiyi mmaan dolow han'tun nih knem mih nong kdolow chaak. Neiya ttai pchaanmah ngi mdote'e chaak lam, rowng'inn thung rukku neiya knemsi ngi mdotkhum chaak lam ungta veityaveitya thung ngi neiya kdiyousou kdiyousou ping.
47011024	Jihudi rekki neiya mden parngatet thung ngi veisomplii thungki veikhat ktla ngi mdotarvai lam.
47011025	Veikdumtet thung ngi neiya thiir kchung ngi mbun lamda. Veikhat lung ngi mdeeng lamda. Veikdumtet thung ngi ktuwnna' arkuwngpii avah dii thung ngi plupda. Neiyi jaan khat le' kunthun niikhat thung ngi dii'leen daat tih am chnuh.
47011026	Neiya kdet liit kmah ngi pjiinptlowng nuh ka'am ping. Dii 'leenni suwk thuwknu, raanqhul kupru rekki molrowt chlamda. Ungta kpaamki kmii rekki suwk mupthuwk chlamda ungta Chaatktlei rek rukku suwk mupthuwk chlamda. Ungta khuwpii thung ngi suwk thuwk chnuh ungta paamkbiik laiyi rukku suwk thuwk chnuh. Ungta mlangkma' unau rekki suwk mupthuwk chlamda.
47011027	Neiyi thamlownu kdung ngi nong lou chnuh ungta jaan tyatya thung ngi ki'iip kmah ngi jaan ranu. Powitham mih mlouda, diikang ngi mlouda ungta kthen chaak rah ktaak ki then ngowl nuh. Siktbub pih mlouda ungta kbuwdiir naak rah ammda.
47011028	Hava'le' han'tun nih mniiktaiyi neiya lamrinlop rekki thenni kuplung yachda. Ungta hava' kdobin ava ngi neiya mporkol tlit chda.
47011029	Kuwda mruh kdowng nga ungta ava' thuh nei rukka kruh kdowng pemeh mow? Ungta khuhsiir mdotpirthitin mmaan avah kuw le'da ungta ava' thuh neiya kril lih kuplungkthi kma' mow?
47011030	Neiyi kpirlin chaak rang bih, nei kruhdown kandanna' dow rek 'leen daat tih pirlin chnikdi'.
47011031	Neiyi plei kdoneema avah Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa ava ngi mdeh. Mma' avah ktlangknai kmah tponlor chaak ki i'amso.
47011032	Damaskas thung ngi paamkruwng Arestas kurduh ngi ka'am paamkpu ava ngi Damaskas khuwpii ki mii rek avah rung lamda. Mma ngi neiya tokyown rah mbinda.
47011033	Pdainu neiya rii bowr thuh mdaal lamda ungta khirkiik thung ngi khuwpii bang duwn thah maptla lamda ava ngi neiya mma' khut thungki kerthlet chngaal ping.
47012001	Tpirlin chaak ki kthen nih msit amna' ka'am pemeh pdainu pirlin chdaat nikdi'. Mleiya Kruwng ngi rinmer rek mepdehda ungta kihin nih dow rek avah mtupurphuwn piik a.
47012002	Neiyi kum sowm leiplii duh thah Khrista hinni miikhat deinu. Mii avah daksa ki mii mow mditmata daksa ki mii kma' mow tidit ruk deimaang. Isowr rih avah mdeh. Ava' hep mii avah mukdumna' parvaan thah arjuklou chda.
47012003	Ungta ava' mii avah neiyi kdeh, mma' avah daksa ki mii mow, mditmata daksa ki mii kma' mow tidit tah deimaang. Isowr rih avah mdeh.
47012004	Mma' avah kanpamun thah mdo’arjuk loww dokda. Ungta mma ngi nerh rih tethethut pchaanmah pauna rek avah arja chda.
47012005	Neiya hava' hep ki mleiyi pirlin chnikdi' pdainu nei kdak leivah kruhdownna' reklei kma'don pirlin chnimaang.
47012006	Pdainu neiyi tpirlin chaak rah ngei chyo ringngi kokmok a kurthuwk nimaang, mleiya neiyi kindit ava' kdothe. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih mmik ki mdotedeh dok mditmata mdotarjaak dok ava' heihin nih mdotbin mana' rah, neiyi korjowng kcha' ping
47012007	Isowr rih nei kihin nih kepleet tih mdotpurphuwn piik leiyi, nei kdaksa thung ngi tirling khat mpiida. Neiyi kpirlin chaakmana' rah tirling havah mpiida ungta tirling havah nei mokoknok rah Seitan ava' ki pausikhu.
47012008	Mleiya hava' leiyi ava' msun chaakna' rah neiyi Kruwng hinni veikdumtet kdopnuwm chaak.
47012009	Pdainu Mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Nei kuplungnee avah nang athennu kkhop kerdei a, tidit tah Nei kruhtan avah ruhdownna' thung ngi mdopurkhum,” dida. Avaleiyi, neiyi Khrista ruhtan avah nei k'leen nih ma'amna' rang ki thenni neiyi kruhdownna' rek thung ngi kanpadok ki pirlin chnikdi'.
47012010	Avaleiyi, Khrista ki thenni neiya kruhdownna' rek thung ngi, ningkya kdut chaak thung ngi, kikriin chaak thung ngi, kyar chiireelna' thung ngi ungta tparsatna' rekki mtikchi lam thung ngi kanpa kcha' ping. Mleiya neiya kruh mdown cheu ava' dilli kruh ktang kcha'lu.
47012011	Tpirlin chaakna' 'leennu neiya kokmok kcha' ping, avah naan nih adotoptlotin. Mleiya naanvah neiya adotapqhat chaakkat raan, tidit tah neiyi taluruk kma' khat kurthuwk chyo ringngi, neiya tamsi mkenreelsi rek arlak ki msit ktaak laang pmaang.
47012012	Mkindit kat tih neiyi naan arlak inni tidiil chaakna' mkheng tu' korthlop pih, titinna' rek, tngana' nong rek ungta ruhtannong rek tlownu tamsi khat ki mikbih avah kdopandan chaak.
47012013	Talulu'leen katda, naan nih lamrinlop morson rek arlak ki ajuwm chaak naanna? Nei kdak ki naan abowrin riina' kdotlotma lei mow? Hava' kdoparma leivah mheiptlot piik chaan.
47012014	Asuwn, neiya naan akveel raanni mveikdumna' kthleng rang ngi ka'am imping. Pdainu neiyi naan abowrin prik chnimaang tidit tah neiya naan nih adothlowiyin ava' ngei maang, pdainu naan adakin. Mleiya mnau le' ava ngi mnuhmpa ki thenni mdopurtuwl rang pemeh pdainu mnuhmpa ngi mnau le' thenni mdopurtuwl rah.
47012015	Ungta neiyi kdothlowi chaak mkheng avah naan apthlarin rekin ki thenni kanpa ngi pchet chnikdi' ungta kdak kpha rukka pchet chnikdi'. Pdainu neiyi kdung ngi vonsat alow chyown rih naanvah mnau'suwn daat vonsat mlow chaan tinu.
47012016	Ungta ava ngi mkindit kurthuwk daat yoso neiyi abowr inna prik chmaang. Anto' pdainu pnerthitna' ava ngi adoktepmen dokin.
47012017	Neiyi naan ahin nih kdopthlat rek mmaan ava'leiyi naan a'leen nih changqhatna' klow ngaal mow?
47012018	Neiyi Taitas avah pnuwm chnuh mma' tu' nu'unnau'in avah kdoheipthlat. Taitas tih a'leenin nih changqhatna' mlow ngaal mow? Neen nih pthla khadaat thung ngi chet chmaan ring mow? Neen nih kal khatsap khiingmaan ring mow?
47012019	Ungta veikhat nowl lih naan nih hava' mpha mkheng thuh neenna, naan ahin nih kparkhaan kcha' tlit tih atbinin mow? Neen nih Isowr aang ngi Khrista hinni kthe chaak inna, tidit tah neen nih vonsat adoklow chaakin. Pdainu neen nih hava' dow mkheng avah naan apqhan chaakna' raan ki thenni kdotheen.
47012020	Mleiya neiyi ahinin nih kthlen thung ngi, kuplungbin heppi adei mnikaan mow mditmata nei rukka aplungbinin heppi mdei mnaan mow, kdi ngi kningkqi'a. Mditma bih, kalraikerthe, kperner, plungthit, mthen daat kbin, khowdan kerthe, titii knei, kpirlin kcha' vaangklum hava'lu rekpa ka'am krow.
47012021	Mditma bih, neiyi veikhat ahinin nih kthlen nowl thung ngi naan a'aang inni, neiki Isowr rih neiya maijuwm mikpii chrah binnu kningkqi'a. Mleiya choduh ngi mii knempok ki pnu arvei chlamda. Mleiya mmaan nih, tkertleumana', jowltpurjutna', tekterdeuna' rek thungki plung perthleng chlam mda ungta avale' leiyi neiya qap chmun nikdi'.
47013001	naan ahin nih kthlen rang avah hava ngi mveikdumna' rah. “Mii 'knii mditmata kdum nerh rih mdothethut sakhi rek ava ngi pauna avah tapqhan rah.” (Knl. 19:15)
47013002	Neiyi naan ahin nih ka'am thuh adokpilqhit dokin, 'tunnu neiya ahinin nih mveiknitna' ka'am hephep pih 'tun mduh thah kthe a. 'Tunnu ka'am pingpse, neiyi pnu kervei kcha' mmaan ava' hinni ungta morson mkheng rek hinni kikjit chaak a. Mleiya neiyi veikhat kthlen thung vah mmaan avah parkhaal daat lam nimaang ungta neiyi morson rek rukka parkhaal lam nimaang.
47013003	Ungta naan nih nei kthung ngi Khrista kpau tidit ki mkandanna' mlei adothlaamin leiyi, hava' kthe a. Khrista avah naan athen inni mruh kdowng pemeh pdainu naan athung ngi mruh ktang.
47013004	Mleiya Mma' avah ruhdownna' thung ngi pthowi chleek lam yoso, Isowr ruhtan nih Mmah ring chda. Mleiya neen rukka Mma' hinni kruhn kdowng pdainu naan athenin qhatna' rang ngi Isowr ruhtan nih Mma' tu' ring chnikaandi'.
47013005	Naan nih, lamrin thuh ka'am kchaan ptimow, tidit avah athinaan nih ikperteel chaan ungta ikterdet chaan. Mleiya naan avah dakat tih adoteknen pthi dokin kma'don Jisu Khrista avah naan athung inni ka'am tidit avah adak inni kqhajik ki dei chmaan timow?
47013006	Pdainu neenna midoteknen chaakin pemeh tidit avah naan nih deinaandi', kdi ngi neiya lamkrin chaak a.
47013007	'Tunnu naan nih kthi adotlotmana' raan ki thenni, Isowr hinni rinkaktham kchaam ping. Mleiya, neen avah taknenpthi dok heppi kandang chyomin, neen nih trotpiik dok heppi tkandanna' rang mda mkindit ava' adotlot chaakna' raan ki thenni rinkaktham kcha' ping.
47013008	Mleiya neen nih kindit ava' kepteng ngi dow khatleh totlot pchaanin nimeh pdainu kindit ava' ki thenni totlot chaak rah.
47013009	Mleiya neen kruhdownin thung ngi naan aruhn ktang, hava' leiyi neenna kanpa kchaan ping. Ungta naan avah adotpurkhum chaakna' raan ki then rukku rinkaktham kchaan ping.
47013010	Mleiya neiyi naan ahin nih kthlen thung ngi, Kruwng ngi nei kihin nih mdotpiik ruhtanna', tidit tah naan adokupkuina' raan ki then mda naan adokapqhanna' raan ki thenni mdotpiik ruhtanna' avah neiyi plungthit tih kdosinton mana' rang leiyi, neiyi ahinin nih ka'amma thung ngi hava' dow rek avah kdokjit chaak.
47013011	Mqutna' thung ngi ku'uknau rek akkurvuwi chaak inna. Naanna ikurkhum dei chaan ungta plungngam kqha ngi ikirpiideiyin. Plungbin khatsap pih i'amin ungta plung kdaiyi ipaalin. Ungta vonsat le' plung kdai ki Isowr ava ngi naanna ayu'amqhi chaanso.
47013012	Naan nih khat le' khat avah kchiir kurputna' ava ngi ikurput chaan.
47013013	Miikenje mkheng rekki aturvuwi chaak inna.
47013014	Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ungta Isowr vonsat ungta Pthla Kchiir do'amqhi avah naan akhengin ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso, Amen.
48001001	Paul neiya dultimii rek hinki mditmata miikhat dosi tamsi pmaang, pdainu Jisu Khrista ungta kdiyou thungki Mma' kperdel, Pa Isowr ava' ar'aang ngi tamsi khat kurthuwk kcha' ping.
48001002	Ungta neiyi kdo'amqhi unau rek mkheng tu' kilqhi ngi, Galatia thuh ka'am lamrinlop rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
48001003	Pa Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso!
48001004	Mleiya neenki Isowr ungta Npa ava' plungbin dilkqowiyi neen avah 'tunpha ki kqha kma' mpha ava' thung ki midotsanna' raan ki thenni, Jisu Khrista mdakkat tih neen nupnu rekin leiyi, kparlaan chda.
48001005	Mma' avah ktlangknai kmah ngi tponlor chaak ki ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
48001006	Naan nih, Khrista hinki plungnee thung ngi ayuko'own kchaan Mma' hinki kbeisek ki kqhapaumin ktlei khat thah akerheel teng chaakin avah neiya kningkngak kcha' a.
48001007	Havah kqhapaumin morson khatvot pemeh, pdainu havah naan aplungin kparmak ungta Khrista ki kqhapaumin ava' lehkpunluk nuwm mii aangqhe ka'am lam a.
48001008	Pdainu neen nih parjaam jown rih mditmata parvaan ki vaantamsi khat tih ahinin nih kqhapaumin ktlei khat parjaam yoso, neen nih naan ahin nih kdoparjaam dokin ava' kma' kthe avah Isowr rih pauhor kbuk rah.
48001009	Choduh ngi ahinin nih kdothe dokin heppi 'tun veikhat neiyi kthe chaak nowl a. Kuwmiikhat, neen nih kdo'arlaan chaakin ava' tu' lehkunluk ki kqhapaumin ktlei khat, naan ahinin nih kparjaam kcha' mma' avah Isowr rih pauhor kbuk rah.
48001010	Mleiya 'tunnu neiya dultimii dongeina' rah tlow nikmow, mditmata Isowr dongeina' rah tlow nikdi' o? Mmow, neiyi dultimii rek plung ngamna' thlaam nikdi o? Mleiya neiyi 'tun kpha thung ngi dultimii rek plung ngamna' ktlot chaak tlit daat bih, neiya Khrista ki suwk'owr khat kurthuwk rang pmaang.
48001011	Pdainu, ku'uknau rek, neiyi naan ahinin nih adokparjaak dokin, tidit tah neiyi naan ahin nih kdoparjaam chaak kqhapaumin avah dultimii plungbin dilkqowiyi kdoparjaam pemeh.
48001012	Mleiya neiyi avah dultimii hinki kdo'arlaan pemeh mditmata mukpurchuk ruk ka'am pemeh pdainu Jisu Khrista ngi mdotpurphuwn piik.
48001013	Mleiya Jihudi rin'owi thung ngi ka'am thungki choduh ki nei krinchan, avah naan nih ado'arjaak dokin. Mleiya tethena' ktaak ki neiyi taluhep pih Isowr lamrinlop tyat chiireelna' piilam nuh ungta mmaan avah kpenvei rah kthelam, tidit avah ado'arjaak dokin.
48001014	Ungta neiya, kmii rek arlak ki, kepkep knempok rek heihin nih Jihudi rin'owina' thung ngi kdung ngi ru'arvanrih nuh ungta neiya kpa le' nowpa thung ngi kdung ngi kepner rih arvan amnu karvang ping.
48001015	Pdainu Isowr plungngam mkurthuh thungta, knuh powithuh ka'am daat arlaan nih neiya mpenje chda ungta Mma' plungnee ar'aang ngi neiya mo'own chda.
48001016	Neiyi Chaatktlei rek hinni Mma' leiki kqhapaumin ava' kdoparjaam chaakna' rang ki thenni Mchapa avah kihin nih mkurphuwn piik chda. Pdainu neiyi kbeisek ki dultimii kuwkhat leh tu' kerseel chmaang.
48001017	Mditmata neiyi kduh thah tamsi kurthuwk ksadok rek kpha rah Jerusalem khuwpii thang ruk hang maang. Pdainu neiyi Arabia paam thah chetnu ungta veikhat Damaskas khuwpii thah kenle nowl nuh.
48001018	Audilli kum kdum dilthah neiyi Pitar tu' kkerdehna' rah Jerusalem khuwpii thah hang nuh ungta mma' tu' nii sowm leiparnga thuh amveen nuh.
48001019	Pdainu neiyi Kruwng naupa James kma'don morson khatleh deilam maang.
48001020	'Tunnu naan ahinin nih neiyi kdokjit dow rek avah kindit tih asuwn, Isowr maiyi neiya pleinei chmaang.
48001021	Ava' dilli neiyi Siria le' Silisia paamkuwl rek thah chetnu.
48001022	Pdainu Khrista hinni ka'am Judia paamkuwl ki lamrinlop rekvah neiya mdeipindih lam mda.
48001023	Pdainu mmaan nih: ‘Choduh neen nihin nih tyat chiireelna' mikpiin mma' ava ngi, mma ngi mpha khat thuh mdopenveina' rah mdotlot psuk lamrin avah 'tunnu mparjaam a,’ tidit ki mlei hehe daat mdo'arjaakin.
48001024	Ungta hanto ngi mmaan nih nei kthung ngi Isowr avah ponlor chlamda.
48002001	Audilli kum sowm leiplii dilthah neiyi Barnabas tu' Jerusalem khuwpii thah veikhat hangnowl nuh ungta Taitas rukka kdoqhiin.
48002002	Neiyi Isowr rih kihin nih mdotpurphuwn piik ava' kdo'arthaanna ngi kahang ping. Ungta neiyi Chaatktlei rek arlak ki chetnu kdoparjaam kqhapaumin ava' ki mlei avah mmaan hinni kdothe pindit chaak. Pdainu neiyi havah msit ktaak ki kchemana' rah mditmata arvang kchen dok kkurthuh mana' rah, mmaan arlak ki miikenreel betbet tih kdodeh rek hinni msik ki kdothe pindit chaak.
48002003	Anto'daat yoso, nei tu' kkilqhi Grik mii Taitas kpha rukka, mmaan nih trin kmah vunkreen tidit tah ptlot lam nimeh.
48002004	Pdainu narlak inni mlangkma' unau rek tuprut tih kluwqhi dok ma'amin leiyi, havah kthuwk. Mleiya mmaan nih neen avah rowngmii midotupthuhna' raan ki thenni neen nih Khrista Jisu hinni nning'olna' tothlowi chaakin ava' ki mlei avah tuprut tih mdosut thlaamin.
48002005	Pdainu kqhapaumin ki kindit ava ngi neen nthung inni ma'am tlitna' rang ki thenni, mmaan hinni mpha mruk'suwn thung daat yoso takparlaan chaakin pemeh.
48002006	Pdainu kenreel mii rek heppi kandang, mmaan avah taluhep kduh kurthuwk lam yoso, nei kihin nuh mkertleina' ammeh. Mleiya Isowr rih kuwkhat leh rukka msik ki mdokarmanna' ka'am pemeh. Mleiya miikenreel heppi ka'am kcha' mmaan ava ngi, nei kihin nih mdotoppom piik lamna' ka'am pemeh.
48002007	Pdainu ava' kchang ngi vunkreen kma' rek thenni kqhapaumin avah nei kihin nih mitpiik chaak a ungta anto' heppi vunkreen kcha' rekki thenni, Pitar hinni mpiik chaak a tidit dei lamda.
48002008	Mleiya Pitar hinni vunkreen kcha' rek thenni tamsi tkurthuhna' 'leenni mruh ktang ngi nong tlotpiikda Ava' ktlot piik Mma' ava ngi, Chaatktlei rek ktong thah nei kthen nih mruh ktang ngi nong avah mdotlot piik.
48002009	Ungta kchow rek kurthuwkda takyat kurhuwiyi ka'am James le' Siphas ungta Johon leh ngi Isowr rih plungnee avah nei kihin nih mtipiik a tidit mdehn thungta Barnabas le' neiya lopkhat tkurthuhna' ki changqhat mpii chaanda. Mleiya havah neenve ngi Chaatktlei rek hinni ungta mmaan nih vunkreen rek hinni kche chaakna' raan ki then.
48002010	Mmaan nih neenve ngi srah rek kdobin phaak raan avah mdongeiyin ungta nei rukku ava'kat avah totlot rah kdongei chaak.
48002011	Pdainu Pitar rih Antiok khuwpii thah mthlen thung vah neiyi mmaiyi mma' pteng nuh krip ping, mleiya mma' avah mraal tpiik rang thah tlada.
48002012	Mleiya James hinki mii aangqhe rek mthlenduh vah mma ngi Chaatktlei rektu' chasap neesap lamda. Pdainu mma ngi mmaan mthlenin thungta, vunkreen rek mmaan ava' mdoqit chaak leiyi, kekneengda mthina kankai chda.
48002013	Ungta Jihudi mii aangqhe rek rukku mma' tu' kqha kpurhuwi kcha'sap lam. Kqha mukpurhuwi inni Barnabas kpha rukka mmaan nih qhidok lamda.
