48002014	Pdainu mmaan nih kqhapaumin ki mkindit ava' dilkqowiyi kirji ngi mche naan ava' kdeh thungta, mmaan mkhengin maiyi Pitar hinni hanto' thenu: “Nang nga Jihudi khat ptih pdainu Chaatktlei rek khat heppi ka'am kcha' imptih ungta Jihudi khat heppi am mtih. Mdittu' taluhep pih nang ngi Chaatktlei rek avah Jihudi nowpa rek thung ngi raanni kpa'am rah athe a?
48002015	Neenna nrinnow inni Jihudi ngi tqou chaakin ungta pnu kervei Chaatktlei rekin pminmeh.
48002016	Neen nih ndehn tidit tah miikhat avah nowlam ki nong rek ava ngi mdopindit pemeh pdainu Jisu Khrista hinni lamtrin chaak ki mdopindit chaak. Avaleiyi, neen rukka nowlam ki nong rek ava' kma' Khrista hinni lamtrin chaak ki midotpindit chaakna' raan ki thenni Jisu Khrista hinni lamtrin chaakin. Mleiya nowlam ki nong rek ava ngi kuwkhat leh rukka pindit nimeh.
48002017	Pdainu neen nih Khrista hinni midotpindit chaakna' raan nthlaamin arlaan nih neen ndaksaain avah pnu kervei kcha ngi kerdeiyin minnu. Mdittu' Khrista a pnu sopklow kcha' khat tidit raan? Havah anto'liit rang pemeh!
48002018	Mleiya neiyi kdo'ekre dok ksa avah veikhat ksak nowl bih, neiya kthina ngi nowlam kupkui khat kurthuwk kcha' ping.
48002019	Mleiya neiyi Isowr hinni krin chaakna' rang ki thenni nowlam ar'aang ki mii, nei avah nowlam thung ngi kdiyou dok kcha' ping.
48002020	Neiya Khrista tu' kokthowive dok kcha' ping. 'Tun nei krin avah nei pmaang pdainu Khrista ngi nei kthung ngi kring. Pdainu 'tun neiyi daksa 'lam thah krinna' rinkum avah nei vonsat moklow kcha' ungta nei kthen nih Mdak mthina ngi kakparlaan kcha' Isowr Chapa Mma' ava' hinni klamrin chaak ava ngi neiya kring kcha' ping.
48002021	Neiyi Isowr plungnee avah msit ktaak ki pthitmaang. Mleiya rinkinditna' avah nowlam ar'aang ngi karvang mkurthuh bih, Khrista a msit ktaak ki kdiyou kcha' a.”
48003001	O kokmok kcha' Galatia rek! Neen nih naan ahin nih, mii rekki mdopthowi yown Jisu Khrista ki mlei avah kindit deek ki athepiik dok innu. 'Tunnu naan nih kindit ava' adopqowi mana' raan ki thenni kuw ngi naanna adotekser inno?
48003002	Neiyi naan ahinki hava' daat chrel tarjaak rah kbinna: Mleiya naan nih Pthla avah nowlam ki nong rek dilkqowiyi ado'arlaan chaakin mow, mditmata lamrin ava' ado'arjaak chaak inni ado'arlaan chaak inno?
48003003	Naanna hanto'ya ngi kokmok inptih mow? Naanna Pthla ngi pqhun chdaat thiin tinu, 'tunnu dultimii nowpa thah kurchuwl chrang ngi atlot inna?
48003004	Naanna msit ktaakpa rang ngi dow knempok 'leenni suwk arvang kthuwk kcha' daat inptih mow? Anto'kat mkurthuh bih avah msit amna' ammeh.
48003005	Mleiya Isowr rih naan ahin nih Pthla avah ayupiinda ungta naan arlak ki ruhtannong rek avah tlowda. Ava' mkurthuh u, Mma ngi avah nowlam ki nong rek ar'aang ngi avah mdotlot mow, mditmata lamrin ki tarjaak chaakna' ava' ar'aang ngi avah mdotlotto'?
48003006	Anto' heppi Abraham 'leenki avah abinphaakin. “Abraham mih Isowr lamrin chda ungta mma' hinni avah rinkinditna' ngi taipiikda.” (Rnp.15:6)
48003007	Avaleiyi, naan nih adeiyin, tidit tah lamrin thungki rek mmaan avah Abraham chapa reklam.
48003008	Ungta Isowr rih Chaatktlei rek avah lamrin nih kpindit lamrah, dida, Kchiir laika ngi mduduh thah mdodeh dok leiyi, kqhapaumin avah mduduh ngi Abraham hinni hanto'theda mdoparjaam dok: “Nang athung ngi chaat mkheng rek avah suwqhat kphang chlam rah,” mdodit. (Rnp.12:3,18:18,22:18, 26:4, 28:14)
48003009	Avaleiyi, lamrin kthlowi kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi lamkrin kcha' Abraham tu' suwqhat avah mdophan sapin.
48003010	Mleiya nowlam ki nong rek thung ngi ka'am rek mmaan avah pauhor kurduh ngi ka'am kcha'lam. Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Nowlam ki laika thung ngi totlot rang ki thenni tikjit dok dow mkheng rek ava' ktlow tlit kma' rek mmaan khimkhei rek 'leenni pauhor avah ka'am kcha' a,” mdodit. (Knl. 27:26)
48003011	Pdainu havah mkindit kat ava', Isowr aang ngi kuwkhat leh rukka nowlam ar'aang ngi pindit nimeh, tidit tah: “Mii kindit avah mlamrin nih kring chrah.” (Hab. 2:4)
48003012	Anto'daat yoso, nowlam avah lamrin thungki pemeh pdainu “Hava' mmaan ava' ktlow kcha' mii ava ngi mmaan ar'aang ngi kring chrah.” (Lev. 18:)
48003013	Khrista ngi neen nthenni pauhor kduh kcha' kurthuwkda neen avah nowlam ki pauhor ava' thung ki neenna miktlan chaanda. Mleiya hanto' kjitda ka'am: “Ding 'leenni kokthowi kcha' rek khimkhei rek avah pauhor kduh kcha' reklam.” (Knl. 21:23)
48003014	Mleiya Isowr rih Abraham hinni mdopiik suwqhat avah Khrista hinni, Chaatktlei rek hinni marvanna' rah, Khrista ngi neenna miktlaninda. Mleiya havah neen nih lamrin ar'aang ngi Mpaureel dok Pthla ava' tarlaan chaakna' raan ki then.
48003015	Ku'uknau rek, neiyi havah dultimii rek nowpa ngi kpau kcha' ping. Havah dultimii rekki pauqum kurthuwk chdaat yoso, kapqhang dok mkurthuh bih, kuwkhat leh ngi msit ktaak tupthut pchaang meh ungta kuwkhat leh ngi totpom ruk pchaang meh.
48003016	'Tunnu Abraham le' mma' chiimuw ava' hinni paureel rek avah mdopiik. Mma ngi chiimuw rek hinni, dimeh pdainu khadaat hinni hanto ngi mdothe: “Ungta nang achiimuw hinni,” (Rnp. 13:15, 24:7) mdodit tidit tah Mesaiah ava'.
48003017	Ungta neiyi hava' kthe'a, tidit tah Isowr rih mduduh thah Mesaiah hinni pauqum avah mdopqhan dok. Mleiya kum arja plii somkdum dil thah nowlam avah karvang pdainu nowlam ava ngi pauqum avah kneng pthimeh ungta paureel ava'ruk msit ktaak tpurthuh meh.
48003018	Mleiya alrouchomna' avah nowlam thungki mkurthuh bih, ava' avah paureel thungki kurthuwk porsonmeh. Pdainu Isowr rih Abraham hinni avah paureel ava' ar'aang ngi mdopiik.
48003019	Mdit bih, nowlam ava' vah talu plungbinrit mthlowi'a? Mleiya mpaureelna' chiimuw ava ngi murjun duh kpha ki thenni nowlam avah nowlam tupkuina' rek leiyi, mdotpom. Ungta vaantamsi rek ar'aang ngi avah mikpalqhat khat ava' khut thung ngi mdopqhan dok.
48003020	'Tunnu mikpalqhat ava ngi khadaat ki thenni mdopalqhat pemeh pdainu Isowr rah khadaat.
48003021	Mdittu' nowlam avah Isowr paureel ava' kepteng mow? Avah anto'liit pemeh! Mleiya kring kpii pchaang nowlam khat kpii dok mkurthuh bih, mkindit kat tih rinkinditna' avah nowlam ar'aang ngi kurthuwk dok thuh rah.
48003022	Pdainu Kchiir laika ngi mii mkheng avah pnu kurduh ngi daal pthida. Mleiya havah Jisu Khrista hinni lamtrin chaak ar'aang ngi lamkrin kcha' rek hinni paureel ava' mdopiikna' rang ki then.
48003023	Pdainu lamrin marvan duhvah neenna nowlam dorun kurduh ngi tarvan'amin. Mleiya lamrin avah talu tidit mpurphuwn duh kpha ngi neen avah nowlam kurduh ngi midotpa'amin.
48003024	Avaleiyi, lamrin nih neen avah midotpindit chaakna' raan ki thenni, nowlam avah Khrista hin thah neen mikqhiin, miksutpqowi kcha' khat ava'.
48003025	Pdainu lamrin ma'am dok dilvah, neenna miksutpqowi kcha' khat ava' kurduh ngi ta'am porsonin pemeh.
48003026	Mleiya naan akhengin avah Khrista Jisu hinni lamrinna' ava' ar'aang ngi Isowr chapa rekin ptih.
48003027	Mleiya Khrista thung ngi dii kluwt kcha' naan khimkhei ava' vah Khrista avah dona heppi anaak chaak dok inna.
48003028	Mleiya Jihudi mditmata Grik tidit ka'am pemeh, suwk'owr mditmata mii'ol tidit ka'am pemeh, snu mditmata psel tidit ka'am pemeh. Mleiya naan akhengin avah Khrista Jisu hinni khadaat inptih.
48003029	Ungta naanna Khrista dow akurthuh chaakin bih, audillu naanna Abraham suruwl rekin ptih ungta paureel dilkqowiyi piipa rekin ptih.
48004001	'Tunnu neiyi hava' kthe a: ‘Piipa ava ngi nau kdowng mkurthuh khimkhei thung ngu mma ngi mkheng kheng ki mukpu kurthuwk chdaat yoso suwk'owr khat hinki mkertleina' ka'am pemeh.
48004002	Pdainu mpa ngi, mdopelreen dok mpha ava' mphaakduh khimkhei vah mma' avah suwkkenreel rek kurduh ngi ungta inn ksutpqowi sikhu rek kurduh ngi ka'am kcha'.
48004003	Anto' heppi neen nih nau rek nkurthuhn thung ngi neenna hava' dultipaam ki tkurchuhna' rit rek thung ngi suwk'owr rih tarvan amin.
48004004	Pdainu mpha kurkhumna' kat mphaak thungta Isowr rih Mchapa avah snu khat thung ngi kqouvih ungta nowlam kurduh ngi kqouvih arjuk pthlada.
48004005	Mleiya neen avah chapa rekki midotuhum chaakna' raan ki thenni nowlam kurduh ngi ka'am rek mmaan ava' mdoktlanna' rah, Mma ngi havah mdotlot.
48004006	Ungta naan avah chapa rek akurthuhn leiyi, Isowr rih Mchapa Pthla avah naan aplungril rekin thung ngi mdo'arjuk pthlat. Pthla ava ngi, “Abba,” “Apa,” dida, owngda mdo'own chaak.
48004007	Avaleiyi, nang nga suwk'owr kurthuwk porson mtih pdainu chapa khat kurthuwk kchaam ptih. Ungta nang ngi piipa akurthuh leiyi, Khrista ar'aang ngi Isowr hinki alrou kchom kcha' khat ruk kurthuwk kchaam ptih.
48004008	Pdainu mpha ava' thung ngi naanna Isowr dei chmaan tinu, ungta mrinnown thung ngi isowr kma' rek mmaan ava' sop'adolow chaakin.
48004009	Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih Isowr avah adeh dok inna mditmata Isowr rih naan avah atedeh chaak dok inna. Mdittu' taluhep pih naan nih mruh kdowng rek ungta msit ktaak tkurchuhna' ava' thung ngi kerheel kcha' nowl inptih o? Taluhep pih naan nih mmaan thung ngi suwk'owr tkurthuh rah adongei nowlin?
48004010	Naan nih nit rekle' thla rek ungta kum armik rekle' kum rek avah danin tinu.
48004011	'Tunnu neiyi naan athenni knonglow chaak avah msit ktaak kurthuwk kcha ngi binnu, naan athenni neiya kningkqia.
48004012	Ku'uknau rek naan nih nei kehep daat akurthuhna' raan akaktham chaak inna, tidit tah nei rukka naan ahep daat khat ping. Naan nih nei k'leen nih karmak dow khatleh tlow maantih.
48004013	Naan nih adehn, tidit tah nei kdaksa 'leenki kdunksaanna' leiyi, rukrirep pih kqhapaumin avah naan ahin nih parjaam chnuh.
48004014	Nei kdunksaanna' ava ngi naan ahin nih tperteelna' khat liklik kurthuwk chyoso, naan nih neiya tukmuksut kma' mditmata mokrow kma'lu tlowvot maantih. Pdainu naan nih neiya Isowr vaantamsi khat heppi, tidit tah Khrista Jisu kat heppi marlaang chaan tinu.
48004015	Ava' naanki aplung ngamin avah 'tunnu talu kthuwk a? Mleiya neiyi sakhi kpiik chaak a, naan nih apchaanin bih, mpha ava' thung vah naan nih amikin kpha rukka khorpthida nei kihin nih mpiinaan kmah!
48004016	'Tunnu neiyi naan ahin nih kindit ava' adokthe piikin leiyi, neiya naanki amiihalin kurthuwk imping mow?
48004017	Morson rekki naan athenni kdung ngi plung mdopluw chaakin avah mqhatna' rang ki thenvot pemeh. Pdainu naan nih mmaan thenni plung kluwt tih adobinna' raan ki thenni naan avah neen kihin ki adotpenqhen raan mdongeiyin.
48004018	Pdainu neiyi naan tu' ka'am thung daat kma', mpha ktai thung ngi dow kqha 'leenni plung tupluw chaak ki kqha.
48004019	Nei knausisi rek naan, naan athung ngi Khrista avah mpermetduh khimkheiyi, neiya naan athenni veikhat nowl lih vonkchowi katrang heppi kdung kchaam ping.
48004020	Naan nih kuplung adopenqheen leiyi, 'tunnu neiya naan tu' ta'amsap rah kngei a ungta kokrowl tperthlen rah kngei a.
48004021	'Tunnu nowlam kurduh ngi ta'am rah kngei rek naan nih, nowlam mih mdothe avah deimow deimaan tio? Atheenno.
48004022	Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am. Mleiya Abraham mih chapa 'knii thlowida, chapa khat avah snu suwk'owr ava' hinki ungta ktlok khat ava ngi snu mii'ol ava' hinki.
48004023	Pdainu snu suwk'owr ava' hinki avah dultimii nowpa dilkqowiyi qou chda ungta snu mii'ol ava' hinki ava ngi paureel ava' ar'aang ngi kqou.
48004024	'Tunnu hava'le' avah tportolna' rekki ka'am. Hava' snu 'knii rek ava ngi pauqum 'knii rek avah mdopandan. Snu khat avah Sainai lown ki ungta ava ngi suwk'owr kurthuwk nau rek ava' pluwda. Hava' snu avah Hagar.
48004025	'Tunnu Hagar rih hava' Arabia paam ki sainai lown ava' ungta 'tunki Jerusalem ava' mdotedet. Ungta ava ngi mnau le' tu' suwk'owr rih ka'am lam.
48004026	Pdainu karthak ki Jerusalem avah ko'ol kcha' ungta mma' avah neen nkhengin ki nnuhn ava'.
48004027	Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “O mlung'om kerthlet kma', nau kuplu kma' snu nang, ikanpa cha'! O vonchowi powidun Kdei kma'Snu nang, kpuwk daat tih i'owng cha'. Mleiya mi'innpu ngi Mdomaak pthi snu ava ngi, mi'innpu pum snu ava' hinni nausuwn knembet tih mthlowi chaak a.” (Rnp. 13:15, 24:7)
48004028	'Tunnu, ku'uknau rek, Aijek heppi, neenna paureel ki nau rekin pimin.
48004029	Pdainu mpha ava' thung ngi daksa ngi mdopluk mma' ava ngi, Pthla 'lam mih mdopluk mma' avah tyat chiireelna' piida. Ava' hep daat tih tuni rukku kurthuwk kcha' a.
48004030	Pdainu Kchiir laika ngi taluhep pih mthe o? “Snu suwk'owr avale' mchapa avah areipthi, Mleiya snu suwk'owr chapa avah snu mii'ol chapa tu' piipa mkurthuhvena' amvot nimeh.” (Rnp. 21:10)
48004031	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, neenna snu suwk'owr ava' nau rekin pimin meh, pdainu neenna snu mii'ol ava' nau rekin pimin.
48005001	Avaleiyi, Khrista ngi midotpo'ol chaak naan to'ol chaakna' ava' thung ngi knet tih irip chaan. Ungta adak inni suwk'owr tkurthuhna' reengkol thung ngi veikhat luwt chnowl maan.
48005002	Paul nei kpauthe avah bih atin chaan, tidit tah naan nih vuntreenna' arlaan chaakin bih, naan ahin nih Khrista avah msit amna' ammeh.
48005003	Ungta neiyi vunkreen kcha' mii khimkhei rek hinni veikhat kthepindit chaak a. Mleiya mma ngi nowlam dothe mkheng avah mdotlotna' rang ki thenni, mmah lei kervei miikhat kurthuwk kcha' a.
48005004	Mleiya nowlam mih tikpindit chaakna' rah kthlaam kcha' rek naan athen vah Khrista avah msit ktaak kurthuwk kcha' a. Ungta naan a plungnee thungki k'qu dok kchaan ptih.
48005005	Mleiya lamrin nih neen nih rinkinditna' ki plungbinpsuk avah Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi ningkakraal lih tardat chaakin.
48005006	Mleiya Khrista Jisu hinnu, vunkreen ruk vunkreen kma' ruk msit amna' ka'am pemeh. Pdainu vonsat tih nong ktlow kcha' lamrin ava' daat tih msit ka'am.
48005007	Naanna kqha dok ki arvang kchen inptih. 'Tunnu kindit ava' 'leenni tethe kopqowi kma' akurthuh chaakna' raan ki thenni, kuw ngi atapkhaan inda?
48005008	Hava' tupnuwm chaakna' avah naan ako'own kchaan, Mma' ava' hinki kurju pemeh.
48005009	Thowl mnau'suwn daat ava ngi saikan avah mpumpum mih mdotepmet pchaan.
48005010	Mleiya naan nih plung ktlok reel maantih, tidit leiyi, Kruwng hinni neiya naan aleenin nih kuplungkrip kcha' a. Pdainu naan a'leen nih tyatna' kupthuwk mma' avah kuwku daat yoso, mma ngi pau tpinditna' avah kdiil chrah.
48005011	Ku'uknau rek, 'tun kpha thung ngi neiyi vuntreenna' ava' kparjaam kcha' kkurthuh u, taluleiyi neiyi tyat chiireelna' avah kdoperteel tlit daat toh? Mdit bih, khros ki khuhsiir tpirthitna' avah kqu kcha' a.
48005012	Nei kdobin chaakvah, naan aplungin kpenqheek rek mmaan ava ngi mthinaan nih msadakin mkelreen chaak raan ungta mkekneen chaak raan.
48005013	Nei ku'knau rek, naan avah Isowr rih to'ol chaakna' thuh adoto'own chaak dokin. Pdainu naan nih, naanki a'ol chaaknaan avah pnu nowpa ki thenni changqhatna' ngi sintonmaan. Ava' kchang ngi naan nih khat le' khat vonsat tih sop'ikorlow chaan.
48005014	Mleiya nowlam mkheng avah pauna khadaat thung ngi kurtluwm. Mleiya hanto ngi theda: “Nang ngi a'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah.” (Lev. 19:18)
48005015	Pdainu naan nih perkeida akarchaakin bih, naan nih khat le' khat akpartlan dokmana' raan ki thenni ikilrin chaan.
48005016	Pdainu neiyi hanto' kthe a. Mleiya naan nih Pthla thuh i'am tlit chaan, mdit bih, naan nih pnu nowpa dongei avah ningptlun piik nimaan tih.
48005017	Mleiya pnu nowpa dongei ava ngi Pthla avah mdopten ungta Pthla ava ngi pnu nowpa avah mdopten. Ungta hava'le' 'knii avah khat tih khat kekperteng lam, avaleiyi naan nih totlot rah adobinin dow rek avah adotlot pchaanin pemeh.
48005018	Pdainu Pthla ava ngi naanna atiqhi chaakin bih, naanna nowlam kurduh ngi am chmaan tih.
48005019	'Tunnu pnu nowpa ki nongtlot rek avah kindit tih tedeh daat. Avale' avah: Lowsangkqhi, jowlkpurju, totborna', tekterdeuna',
48005020	dow pthla luwkbuk, kserkpu, karhal kcha', ker'ei kalrai, changtlaakna', plungthit ksinton, mthen daat kbin, plung kinqim kma', lopkurkhuina',
48005021	tepnerna', miike'eyou rek, tipritna', lopthowldii neekna', ungta hava' hep daat dow rek, ava'. Anto' heppi neiyi choduh rukku adokthe piik dokin ungta 'tun rukku mduh thah akthe piik inna, tidit tah hava' hep daat ktlow rek mmaan ava ngi Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah alrouchom mih chom chlam nimeh.
48005022	Pdainu Pthla ki mchei avah, vonsat, plungngam, plung kdai, ksowt tih tidiildehna', plungdownna', taqhatna', trinchaak krow,
48005023	plung kperneem, kilrindei kcha', ava'. Hava' kepteng nowlam morson ka'am pemeh.
48005024	Ungta Khrista hinki rek mmaan ava ngi pnu nowpa ngi kdung ngi mdongei ungta mdongei rek avah Mma' tu' mopthowiyow chaak dok inna.
48005025	Neen nih Phla ngi nrin chaakin cheentung ngi, neen nih Pthla ngi tche ruk ichetin cheh.
48005026	Neen nih msit ktaak ki plungreelda khat le' khat avah kardaida ungta pernerda ammaan che.
48006001	Ku'uknau rek, kuwmiikhat avah pnu thung ngi mekmen chaak cheentung ngi, pthla 'lam thuh ka'am rek naan ava ngi plung kperneem mih mma' avah aqhipenle chaan. Pdainu ikilrindei chaan mditma bih, naan rukka kepthleem thuh ktla kcha' krown ptih.
48006002	Naan nih khat le' khat bowrrihna' rek avah ikorchom deiyin. Ungta naan nih hanto ngi atlot chaakin bih, Khrista nowlam kpurkhum kcha' kurthuwk naandi'.
48006003	Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih dow khatleh msitma arlaan nih, doksi kcha' heppi mkarjaak bih, mmah mthina kurhuwng kcha' a.
48006004	Pdainu mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mnongtlot rek avah aperteel chso. Ungta ava' dilli mma ngi mii morson tu' kokportol kmah ngi mthina thung ngi mkanpat chaak rah.
48006005	Mleiya mii khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mbowr avah mdohor chaak rah.
48006006	Pauna ava' thung ngi tkurchuhna' karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi dow kqha rek mkheng avah mma' kpurchuk kcha' khat ava' tu' mdopenthem chaak rah.
48006007	Kuwkhat leh ngi ahuwng chmaanso, Isowr rah tipni chaak pchaanlu pemeh. Miikhat tih talutalu yoso, mdopqau chaak avah mma ngi kurkun chrah.
48006008	Mleiya pnu nowpa thung ngi kapqau kcha' mma' ava ngi, pnu nowpa thungki kqop kcha' rang dow rek ava' kurkun chrah. Pdainu Pthla thung ngi kapqau kcha' mma' ava ngi, Pthla hinki ktlangknai kma' rinkum ava' kurkun chrah.
48006009	Ungta neen nih ardathit nthlowima bih, mphakat marvan thung ngi mchei avah turkun chaak raan.
48006010	Avaleiyi, neen nih changqhatna' nthlowi chaakin thung ngi mii mkheng hinni kqha avah totlot chaak raan. Mahan'tunsi ngi neen nih lamrin ki innmii rek hinni kqha avah totlot chaak raan.
48006011	Asuwn, jiik klin rekki neiyi, naan ahin nih kukhut kat tih havah kdokjit chaak!
48006012	Mleiya naan nih vuntreenna' thuh raanni adotsidulna' raan ki thenni daksa 'lam thah kqha heppi kterdet kcha' mii ka'am pok lam a. Mmaan nih hava' mdotlotnaan mlei avah mmaan nih Khrista ki khros ava' ki thenni tyat chiireelna' mdophan mana' raan ki then daat.
48006013	Mleiya vunkreen kcha' mmaan mdakin kpha rukku nowlam avah mdopqowi in pemeh. Pdainu daksa 'lam thah mmaan nih naan adaksa rekin 'leenni mpirlin chaakna' raan ki thenni naan nih vun adoreen raan avah mdongeiyin.
48006014	Pdainu khros ava ngi dultipaam avah nei kihin nih pthowiyouda ungta khros ava ngi dultipaam hinni neiya mopthowiyou chda. Ava' vah nei kthen nuh neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki khros lei kma'don kpirlin chaak rang avah Isowr rih mdorot pemeh.
48006015	Mleiya Khrista Jisu hinnu, vunkreen rukku mditmata vunkreen kma' rukku msik ki msit ma'amna' ka'am pemeh, pdainu msit ka'am avah ren tpurthuhna' ava' hehe daat.
48006016	Ungta hava' nowrit ava' kopqowi kcha' rek khimkhei rek 'leenni plung kdai le' plungqhat avah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Ungta Isowr ki Isreel rek hin rukku plung kdai le' plungqhat avah ka'am ikurthuwkso!
48006017	'Tunki kupqhun nih kuwkhat leh ngi neiya mapya cha'mso, mleiya neiyi Kruwng Jisu ki kbih rek avah kdaksa 'leenni kdopuwk chaak dok.
48006018	Ku'uknau rek, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan apthlaan tu' ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
49001001	Isowr plungbin nih Kruwng Jisu Khrista tamsi Paul neiyi, Ephisia thung ngi ka'am miikenje rek naan ahinin nih ungta Khrista Jisu hinni trinchaak krow rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
49001002	Mleiya Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso!
49001003	Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa, Isowr avah apanpaak chaan. Mma ngi neenna Khrista hinni parvaan thah pthla lamki suwqhat mkheng ava' midotpiik chaak inni neenna suwqhat mipii chaanda.
49001004	Anto' heppi Isowr rih neen avah dultipaam mdopurthuhna' mmun mporthlon duduh ngi, Mma' hinni neenna midotokchol chaak dokin. Mleiya neen nih, Mma' aang ngi mraal ktaak ki ungta vonsat thung ngi tkenje chaakna' raan ki thenni havah mdotlot.
49001005	Mma' plungbin ki muplung ngamna' dilkqowiyi neen nih Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi Mma' chapa rek rang ngi midotuhum chaak raan avah mduduh thah mdoporthlon dok ksa.
49001006	Mleiya mii rekki Mma' plungnee ki tkonlorna' ava' mdoponlor chaakna' rang leiyi, mvonsat'low chaak Khat ava' ar'aang ngi, mkhon ktaak ki plungnee avah midotpiik chaakin.
49001007	Mma' hinni ungta Mma' hii ar'aang ngi neen nih tkartlanna' avah tothlowi chaakin. Mleiya Mma ngi Mma' plungnee kepleet ava' dilkqowiyi neen nih nowlam tuktsutmana' rekin avah miptlotpiik inda.
49001008	Mma ngi, Mma' plungnee kepleet avah luwkinritna' le' tedeh pinditna' mkheng tu' neen nthenni mipluwn piik inda.
49001009	Mma ngi Mma' plungbin ki paukordowl avah neen nihin nih mipdeh dok chaanda. Havah Mma ngi kdung ngi muplung ngamna' Khrista hinki Mma' plungbinrit ava' dilkqowiyi mdotlot.
49001010	Mleiya mpha armik kurkhumna' ki soplowna' ava' thung ngi Mma ngi parvaan ki dow mkheng ruk ungta dultipaam ki dow mkheng rek avah Khrista hinni, Mma'kat hinni khadaat tih kpurkuwk rah.
49001011	Mleiya neen rukku Khrista hinni alrou kchom kcha' khat tkurthuh chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi mduduh thah muplungbinrit thung ngi mdoporthlon dok. Ungta Mma ngi dow mkheng avah muplungbin ki muplungreel ava' dilkqowiyi mdotlot.
49001012	Mleiya havah mduduh ngi Khrista hinni muplungbin ka'am dok kcha' rek neen nih Mma' konlorna' avah mii rekki kpanpaak kcha' tpurthuhna' raan ki then.
49001013	Naan rukku kindit pauna rek ava' arjaak chaakin dilli Khrista hinni lam'rin chaan tinu. Ungta kindit pauna avah naan akirliin chaakna' kqhapaumin ava'. Ungta naan nih lam'arin chaak dokin dilli Isowr rih mpaureel dok ksa, Pthla Kchiir ava ngi naan avah Khrista hinni kbihjiik adotepbel chaak dokin.
49001014	Isowr rih, Mma ngi mdoren dok ksa rek avah maktlan dok duh ngi neenki alrouchom ava' ki tarpaalna'sum kurthuwk ki Pthla Kchiir avah mdopiik. Mleiya hava ngi mii rekki Mma' konlorna' avah kpanpaak chlam rah.
49001015	Avaleiyi, nei rukku naan nih Kruwng Jisu hinki alamrinin kdo'arjaak chaak leiyi, ungta miikenje rek mkheng vonsat adolow chaakin kdo'arjaak chaak leiyi, naan athen inni kpanpaak chaak a.
49001016	Neiyi ava' karjaak daat ki kupqhun nih, naan athen inni kdopanpaak chaak avah down chmaang ungta rinkakthamna' rek thung ngi naan amiing rekin avah kdopyau chaak.
49001017	Mleiya neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki Isowr, konlor ki Pa ava ngi naan nih Mma' avah kindit tih adodeh pinditna' raan ki thenni luwkinritna' le' pau tpurphuwnna' ki pthla avah ayupii chaanso!
49001018	Ungta tedeh pinditna' ki amik rekin adotapvan piik inni, Mma' do'ownna' ki plungbinpsuk ava' adodeh pinditna' raan, rinkaktham kcha' ping. Ungta miikenje rek thung ngi Mma' alrouchom, konlor ava' ki mepleetna' avah talu tidit adodehna' raan, rinkaktham kcha' ping.
49001019	Ungta havah naan nih, lamkrin kcha' neen nihin nih Mma' ruhtan avah kdung ngi klin ungta Mma' ruhtan avah Mma' laarruhtanna' ruhtan ava' tidit adodehna' raan ki then.
49001020	Ava' ruhtan ava ngi, Mma ngi kdiyou thungki Khrista avah perdelda. Ungta ava' ruhtan ava ngi Mma ngi parvaan thah Mma' machang thah Mma' avah topkongda.
49001021	Mma ngi, Mma' avah paamkpu ungta ruhtanna' ungta ruhtan ungta tpaalna' ruhtan rek mkheng ki mkarthak ki pko'ong dokda. Ungta 'tun tphuwk dok ungta dilki karvang bei rang mpha thung ngi tphuwk rang miing khimkhei rek han'tun nih kparthaang ngi Mma' avah pko'ong dokda.
49001022	Ungta Isowr rih dow mkheng avah Khrista khuhther thah thipthida. Ungta dow mkheng ki mluwchai mkurthuhna' rah Mma' avah lamrinlop hinni parlaan pthida.
49001023	Lamrinlop avah Mma' daksa. Ungta havah Mma' kurkhum riimna' ava' ungta Mma ngi mii mkheng hinni dow mkheng avah mdopdim.
49002001	'Tunnu mpha khat thung ngi adoparmana' rekin ungta apnu arve rekin thung ngi kdiyou dok kcha' naan avah Mma ngi apringinda.
49002002	Mleiya mpha ava' thung ngi naanna hava' dultipaam ki nowpa dilkqowiyi kchet inptih. Ungta naan nih tirthli kpupa ava' ruhtan thung ngi kchetin ptih. Mma' avah tethe kopqowi kma’ mii rek thung ngi 'tun nong tlowda ka'am meek pthla ava'.
49002003	Mmaan arlak ki neen nkhengin rukka mpha khat thung vah pnu nowpa ngi kdung ngi mdongei rek ava' tarvan tlotin. Neen nih pnu nowpa le' plungril lih mdongei rek ava' ptlotin minnu. Ungta morson rek heppi nnowpaan thung ngi plungthit mei kquwng kduh chrah nau rek kurthuwk ki tarvanin.
49002004	Pdainu plungqhat 'leenni kepleet, Isowr ava ngi vonsat klin nih mdothlowi leiyi, neen avah vonsat milow chaanda.
49002005	Mma ngi vonsat midotolow chaakin leiyi, neen nih tparmaan leiyi, ndiyow chaakin thung ngi Mma ngi Khrista tu' mipringinda. Isowr rih naan avah plungnee ngi adotsan chaakin.
49002006	Ungta Isowr rih neen avah Mma' tu' midotperdel chaak dokin. Mma ngi neen avah Mma' tu' parvaan thah Khrista Jisu tu' midotopkon chaak dokin.
49002007	Mleiya havah karvang rang mpha rek thung ngi Mma' plungnee kepleet ava' midotetdetna' raan ki then. Mma ngi neen n'leen nih Mma' plungnee avah Khrista hinni mitedet inda.
49002008	Mleiya lamrinna' ava ngi naan avah plungnee ngi adotsan chaakin. Ungta havah naan adakin hinki pemeh, havah Isowr hinki chla.
49002009	Kuwkhat tih mpirlin chaakmana' rah, havah nong rek lei pemeh.
49002010	Mleiya neenna Mma' dim rekin pimin. Neen nih kqhanong totlotna' raan ki thenni neen avah Khrista Jisu hinni midotpurthuh chaak dokin. Neen nih kqhanong ava' thuh tche chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr rih avah mduduh thah mdoporthlon dok ksa.
49002011	Avaleiyi, abinphaakin, tidit tah mphakhat thung ngi naanna Chaatktlei rekki kqou inptih. Ungta naan avah vunkreen rekki, vunkreen kma' rek, adotidit chaakin. Vunkreen, tidit tah daksa 'leenni khut tih treen.
49002012	Ungta naan nih abinphaakin, tidit tah mpha ava' thung vah naanna Khrista hinki msik ki ka'am kchaan ptih. Naanna Isreel mii rek tung ngi paammii khatsap tkurthuhna' thungki teknenpthi dok ki ka'am dok kcha' inptih ungta paureel ki pauqum rek thung ngi mal lih ka'am dok kcha' inptih. Ungta naanna plungbinpsuk ktaak ki ungta Isowr ktaak ki dultipaam thung ngi ka'am dok kcha' inptih.
49002013	Pdainu mphakhat thung ngi lamkla ngi ka'am kcha' naan avah 'tunnu Khrista Jisu hinni, Khrista ki hii ava ngi adotapnai chaak dokin.
49002014	Mleiya Mma' avah neenki nuplungdaina' ava' ungta Mma ngi 'knii rek neen avah khadaat mipthutinda. Ungta Mma ngi neen mikpenqhenin narlakin ki bang avah pkui pthida.
49002015	Mma ngi neen mikparhalin nowlam ki paupiik rekle' paureen rek avah Mma' daksa thung ngi penvei pthida. Mleiya Mma ngi 'knii rek neen avah Mma' daksa thung ngi miiren khat purthuhda ungta plung kdai avah midotpa'am piikin.
49002016	Ungta Mma ngi khros ava' ar'aang ngi 'knii rek neen avah daksa khadaat tih Isowr tu' mipalqhat inda. Mma ngi neenki tkarhalna' rekin avah khros ava ngi pdiyouda.
49002017	Mma ngi arjungda lamknaiyi ka'am naan ahin nih ungta lamkla ngi ka'am mmaan hinni plung kdai avah parjaamda.
49002018	Mleiya Mma' ar'aang ngi 'knii rek neen ava ngi Pa ava' hinni Pthla khat thung ngi tuluw chaakna' lam avah tphan chaakin.
49002019	Avaleiyi, 'tunnu mal rek ungta mpha mruk ki then daat ki mii rekin ptipmeh. Naanna miikenje rekle' Isowr innmii rek tung ngi paammii khatsap dok inptih.
49002020	Isowr rih naan avah tamsi rekle' khulpu rekki innmun ava' thung ngi adotapqhan chaak dokin. Jisu Khrista mdakkat avah innbul lung kenreel ava'.
49002021	Isowr rih inn avah mpumpum mih Mma' hinni parkaida ungta inn avah Kruwng hinni klinthang kchiir luwbuk'inn khat tih, adotapqhan chaak dokin.
49002022	Mleiya naan nih Isowr rih Pthla ngi ma'amna' mun akurthuh chaakna' raan ki thenni naan avah Kruwng hinni adotsakve dokin.
49003001	Mleiya hava' leiyi, Paul neiya, Chaatktlei rek naan athenni Jisu Khrista ki rowngmii khat kurthuwk kcha' ping.
49003002	Isowr rih Mma' plungnee avah naan ahin nih neiyi sopkdolow chaakna' rah mdotpiik chaak dok avah arjamun naandi'.
49003003	Taluhep pih Isowr rih nei kihin nih mdotpurphuwn piik ava ngi paukordowl avah mtepdeh chaak tidit avah, choduh ngi naan ahin nih ktowitek ki pau mruk avah kdokjit chaak dok.
49003004	Naan nih ava' aparcham chaakin thung ngi, neiyi Khrista ki paukordowl ava' kdodeh pindit chaakna' avah kdeipindih chdaat krown ptih.
49003005	Mleiya suruwl morson thungki dultimii rek hinvah hanto' heppi paukordowl avah mdopdeh lam pemeh. Pdainu Isowr rih 'tunnu Mma' tamsi kenje rek hinni ungta kenje khulpu rek hinni Mma' Pthla ava ngi mdopurphuwn piik doklam.
49003006	Paukordowl avah hava': Mleiya Chaatktlei rekki kqhapaumin ki mar'aang ngi Isreel mii rek tung ngi piipa mkurthuhsapna' raan ungta mmaan tu' daksa khat mkurthuh chaakna' raan ungta Khrista hinni Mma' paureel ava' karlaang kcha'sap mkurthuh chaak raan ava'.
49003007	Mma' nongtlotna' mruhtan ava ngi Isowr rih nei kihin nih Mma' plungnee ki chla avah mpii chda. Ungta chla ava' dilkqowiyi neiya kqhapumin ki suwk khat kurthuwk kcha' ping.
49003008	Neiyi miikenje mkheng rek arlak ki, mikdil rek arlak ki kdilsi kurthuwk chyo ringngi neiyi Chaatktlei rek hinni kqhapaumin tparjaam chaakna' rah plungnee avah nei kihin nih mpii chda. Ava' kqhapaumin avah Khrista ki tapphaak pchaanmah sum'alrou ava'.
49003009	Mii mkheng hinni paukordowl ava' ki lopkhat tkurthuhna' ava' kthepindit rang ki thenni plungnee avah nei kihin nih mpii chda. Jisu Khrista hinni dow mkheng kpurthuh Isowr ava ngi hava' paukordowl avah mpha tyatya thung ngi Mma' mdak thung ngi mdo'arvandowl pthi.
49003010	Mleiya Isowr luwkinritna' avah mdetmdet ki mrit knempok mleiya hava' Mma' luwkinritna' avah lamrinlop ava ngi, paamkpu rekle' ruhtanna' rek hinni parvaan ki mun rek thuh mdopdeh lamna' rah hava' plungnee avah nei kihin nih mdotpiik chaak.
49003011	Mmaan nih Mma' luwkinritna' avah neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu hinni mdotlot Mma' ki ktlangknai kma' plungbinrit ava ngi kdei lamrah.
49003012	Neen nih Mma' hinni lamtrin chaakin ava ngi Mma' thung ngi neen nih ningqit ktaak ki ungta plungkrip pih tuluw chaakna' 'lam avah tphan chaakin.
49003013	Avaleiyi, naan aleiyi kdung ngi chiitreelna' kdoperteel chaak leiyi, naan nih plung karmak adohormana' raan akaktham chaak inna. Mleiya hava'le' avah naan akonlor chaak naan ava'.
49003014	Hava' leiyi neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa ava' hinni kupkhup pih tirdiil nuh luwkdobuk chaak.
49003015	Mma' hinki ngi parvaan ki ungta dultipaam thungki innbung mkheng ngi mmiingin avah mdo'arlaan chaakin.
49003016	Naan nih Mma' hinki tkonlorna' kepleet ava' dilkqowiyi, Isowr rih Mma' Pthla ava ngi arilin ki mii ava' 'leenni ruhtan tu' kilqhi ngi aruhn mtanna' raan ki thenni rinkaktham kcha' ping.
49003017	Mleiya havah lamtrin chaak ar'aang ngi Khrista ngi naan aplungchaiyin thung ngi ma'amna' rah ungta Mma ngi vonsat thung ngi arjungin mdovar tlitna' rah ungta adotapqhanna' raan ki then.
49003018	Mleiya havah naan nih miikenje rek mkheng tung ngi Khrista ki vonsat avah tya kquwm ungta ksaang ungta kchuwng ungta ktlum tidit tedeh pinditna' ruhtan adothlowi chaakna' raan ki then.
49003019	Ungta kuwkhat tih mdodeh pchaanmah Khrista ki vonsat avah naan nih deinaandi'. Mleiya Isowr kurkhumna' mkheng ava ngi naanna akipdim chraan.
49003020	'Tunnu Isowr rah neen nih, paukheel mditmata tbin pchaanmah mkheng ava' han'tun nih knem mih ktlow pchaang. Mma ngi neen nthung inni nong ktlow meek mruhtanna' ava' dilkqowiyi havah mdotlot pchaan.
49003021	Avaleiyi, mpha ktai thung ngi ktlangknai kmah Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi lamrinlop thung ngi Mma' avah aponlor chaan. Amen.
49004001	Avaleiyi, Kruwng rowngmii neiyi Isowr rih naan adoto'own chaak naan nowpa ava' thung ngi naan nih trinchaak krow ngi achena' raan ki thenni akoksow chaak inna.
49004002	Naan nih tpirdil chaakna' mkheng tu' ungta plung kperneem mih ksowt tih tidiildehna' tu' kilqhi ngi khat le' khat avah vonsat tih akursutdeh chaak raan.
49004003	Naan nih plung kdai thung ngi akorbowlnaan plung kinqimna' Pthla avah adopa'amdehna' raan atlown.
49004004	Isowr rih naan ato'ownin thung ngi daksa khat ungta Pthla khat ma'am heppi plungbinpsuk khatsap thung ngi adoto'own chaakin.
49004005	Ungta Kruwng khatsap, lamrin khatsap ungta diiluwna' khatsap.
49004006	Ungta mkheng ki Mpa ungta Isowr khat ka'am. Mma' avah mkheng ki mkarthak ungta mkheng 'leenni kirkhil lih ka'am ungta naan akhengin athung inni ka'am.
49004007	Pdainu Khrista chla dopertetna' dilkqowiyi plungnee avah neen khimkhei hinni midotpiikin.
49004008	Avaleiyi, tikjit ava ngi hanto'theda: “Mma ngi kparthaang ngi mahankal thung ngi, Mma ngi paamsuwk ki mdothiik rowngmii rek avah qhida. Ungta mii rek hinni Mma ngi chla rek avah piida,” mdodit. (Luw. 68:18)
49004009	Tikjit ava ngi: “Mma ngi mahankal thung ngi,” mdodit avah talu mdothena? Hava ngi mdothe avah, Mma' rukka chodurep pih dultipaam ki tii knungsi mun thung ngi jungkqum dok, mdoditna'.
49004010	Jungkqum khat Mma' avah, dow mkheng mdopdimna' rang ki thenni parvaan mkheng rekki mkarthak kpha ngi hangkkal Mma' ava'.
49004011	Mma'kat ava ngi aangqhe rek hinni tamsi tkurthuhna' ungta morson rek hinni khulpu tkurthuhna' ungta aangqhe rek hinni paukparjaam tkurthuhna' ungta morson rek hinni lamrinlop kqhi rekle' chukpu rek tkurthuhna' avah mdopiik.
49004012	Mma ngi havah, soptolowna' nong rek thung ngi miikenje rek mdopurkhumna' rah ungta Khrista ki daksa ava' mdopqhanna' rang ki thenni mdopiik lam.
49004013	Neen nkheng inni lamrinna' 'leenni ungta Isowr Chapa ki tedeh pinditna' 'leenni plung tpinqimda Khrista kurkhumna' ki tpertetna'ya ngi nver dok chaak duhn kpha ngi, Mma ngi chla rek avah midotpiikin.
49004014	Mleiya neenna tkurchuhna' ki tirthli khimkheiyi mduhmdil lih mdoknow pchaan ungta raanda mdoqhi chaak nau rek tkurthuh porson raan pemeh. Mleiya mii rekki nau rek avah tuhuwnna' pau vih ungta mmaan ki mrilqhatmaan ki plungbinpsuk rek thung ngi tepmenda 'lamleleh thah mdoqhi chaakin.
49004015	Pdainu havah neen nih vonsat tih kindit ava' theda, dow mkheng 'leenni neen nih Mma' hinni tilin chaakna' raan ki then. Mma' avah mluwchai ava', tidit tah Mmah Khrista ava'.
49004016	Mma' hinni daksa mpum avah daksa rek mkheng ngi mkorjomna' rang thung ngi korjomda ardapii ngi daksa avah khadaat tih mdoparkai. Ava ngi vonsat thung ngi linda mthina kapqhang kcha'
49004017	Avaleiyi, neiyi naan ahin nih hava' thenu, Kruwng hinni sakhi kpiik chaak a: Mleiya morson Chaatktlei rekki msit ktaakpa muplungbinin thung ngi mche chaakin heppi naanna ache porson raan pemeh.
49004018	Mleiya mmaan nah mdodeh pinditin pemeh ungta muplungin mapchai leiyi, mmaan dodeh pinditna' avah kjiingnu thung ngi ka'am kcha'. Isowr rih mdopiik rinkum ki thennu mmaan nah duwn ki mii reklam.
49004019	Mleiya mmaan nah plung ngi tbin pchaanna' heihin nih ka'am kcha'lam. Avaleiyi, mmaan nih mdakin avah tekterdeuna' thung ngi kirpii chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih mdetmdet ki ktobor mkheng thung ngi kerkheel setset tih kpunjuwr dok ki totlot rah mdongei chaakin.
49004020	Pdainu naanna Khrista avah ava'lu, tidit tih kurchuk chmaan tih.
49004021	Dakat tih naan nih Mma' avah ado'arjaak dokin ungta Jisu hinni ka'am kindit ava' dilkqowiyi naanna adotpurchuh chaak dokin.
49004022	Naan nih choduh ki arinnown, tidit tah daksa ngi kdung ngi mdongei, tkurhuwnna' thung ngi kqopthang kcha' miipli avah asuwtpthi dokin.
49004023	Isowr rih, naan avah aplungbinin ki pthla thung ngi ren akurthuh chaakna' raan avah aptlotin.
49004024	Naan nih Isowr rih Mma'kat heppi kindit ki rinkinditna' le' tchiir chaakna' thung ngi mdopurthuh dok miiren avah dona heppi ana chaan.
49004025	Avaleiyi, pleitneena' avah asuwtpthi dokin. Ungta mii khimkheiyi mi'innveen tung ngi pau kindit tih mkirbiik chaak rah. Mleiya neenna khat le' khat ki miichai rek inpmin.
49004026	Naan nih, “aplungin mthit thung ngi pnu arvei maan.” (Luw. 4:4) Ungta plungthit kohor tlit daat tih kni ptlamaan.
49004027	Ungta tarnampii hin rukku mmun piimaan.
49004028	Kupru kchok mma' ava ngi pruporson mso. Pdainu nong alou chso ungta mma ngi kikriing kcha' rek hinni dow mruk mdopiik pchaan chaakna' rah mkhut tih kqhanong atlow chso.
49004029	Naan anehrin thung ngi kqha kma' pauna rek khadaat ruk thuwk mso. Pdainu karja kcha' rek hinni plungnee mkurthuhna' rah tapqhanna' ki thenni msit ka'am kqhapauna rek ava' ithuwkso.
49004030	Ungta taktlanna' nit ki thenni naan a'leen nih kbihjiik akbelin Isowr Pthla Kchiir plung avah tapyamaan.
49004031	Ungta kkha mkheng ungta plungthit mei kquwng ungta plungthit ungta plungthit tih ko'owng ungta miiqhatmana' paukthe ungta plungbin kqha kma' mkheng avah naan ahinki aloupthi dokin.
49004032	Naan nih khat le' khat avah plungnee le' plung kdowng tu' kilqhi ngi ikursudei chaan. Ungta Isowr rih Khrista hinni adotoptlot piik dokin heppi, naan nih khat le' khat ikportlot piikin.
49005001	Avaleiyi, Isowr rih vonsat mdolow chaak nau rek heppi naan nih Isowr dotlot ktlow kcha' ikurthuwkin.
49005002	Ungta Khrista rukku vonsat milow chaanda neen nthen inni Mdak avah tparlaan rah dow khat tih ungta rintparlaan khat tih Isowr hinni mikrimkdi namreng heppi makparlaan chaak heppi, vonsat thuh ichetin.
49005003	Pdainu jowltpurjutna' ungta totborna' mkheng mditmata tpunjuwrna' avah, naan ahinvah kuwkhat tih tapdaudau rukku pdau mso. Mleiya avale' avah miikenje rek then pemeh.
49005004	Ungta naan nih totlotma rah ktobor rih mditmata kokmok pau vih mditmata paukkaam theda arle chimmaan. Ava' hinvah apanpaak chaan.
49005005	Naan nih jowlkpurju mii rek mditmata ktobor mditmata kpunjuwr, tidit tah dow pthla luwkbu kcha' khimkhei rekki Khrista ki ungta Isowr kruwngpaalna' thung ngi dow khatleh ruk alrouchom mih mdocham chaak raan ka'am pemeh, tidit avah adodeh dokin.
49005006	Kuwkhat leh ngi naan avah msit ktaak pau vih ahuwng chmaanso. Mleiya hava' dow rek leiyi, tethe kopqowi kma' mii rek 'leenni, Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah ktlung dok ksa.
49005007	Avaleiyi, mmaan tu' mthenin karlaangsap kurthuwk maan.
49005008	Mleiya mphakhat thung ngi naanna kjiingnuwn ptih pdainu 'tunnu naanna Kruwng hinni mar'aangin ptih. Avaleiyi, mar'aang ki mii rek heppi ichetin.
49005009	Mleiya Pthla ava' ki mchei avah tqhatna' mkheng thung ngi ungta rinkinditna' ungta kindit thung ngi ka'am.
49005010	Naan nih anto ngi ache chaakin ava ngi Kruwng plung ngamna'si avah aperteelin rang ngi adeiyin.
49005011	Ungta naan nih mchei ktaak kjiingnu nong rek thung ngi lopkhat kurthuwk chmaan, pdainu mmaan hinni mdoparma rekin avah athepiikin.
49005012	Mleiya mmaan nih tuprut tih mdotlotin dow rek avah tethe rang kpha rukka ningkyana'.
49005013	Pdainu mar'aang ava ngi dow mkheng avah taanda mdopandan. Mleiya dow khimkhei kpandang avah mar'aang.
49005014	Avaleiyi, Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Kie'iip daat rek naan ikerdelin. Kdiyou rek hinki ikerdelin. Ungta Khrista ngi mar'aang ngi a'leenin nih kleng rah.”
49005015	Avaleiyi, kinditjik ki achena' raan ikilrin chaan. Naan nih kokmok mii rek heppi chetmaan pdainu mii kinrit rek heppi ichetin.
49005016	Mleiya nit rek avah kqha pemeh, mpha avah aktlan chaan.
49005017	Avaleiyi, naan nih kinrit kmah ngi ammaan pdainu Kruwng plungbin avah talu tidit naan nih adeipindih chaan.
49005018	Ungta naan nih thowldii needa primaan, mleiya ava' thung ngi tkorjown pchaanmana' ka'am pdainu Pthla ngi naanna ayupdim chaanso.
49005019	Naan nih khat le' khat hinni luwbuklaa ngi ungta tpanpaakna' laa ngi ungta pthla lamki laa rekki ikirbi chaan. Ungta laa theda ungta aplungin thung ngi krowl kinqim mih Kruwng apanpaak chaan.
49005020	Ungta mpha ktai thung ngi dow mkheng 'leenni neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing ngi Pa Isowr avah apanpaak chaan.
49005021	Ungta naan nih Isowr adoqit chaak inni khat le' khat hinni ikparlaan chaan.
49005022	Nuwn rek, naan nih Kruwng hinni akparlaan chaakin heppi naanki a'innpu rekin hinni ikparlaan chaan.
49005023	Mleiya Khrista ngi lamrinlop ki mluwchai mkurthuh heppi mnuwn luwchai avah m'innpu.
49005024	Avaleiyi, lamrinlop pih Khrista hinni makparlaan chaak heppi mnuwn rekki dow khimkhei 'leenni mma' mma' ki mi'innpu rekin hinni makparlaan chaak rah.
49005025	Innpu rek, Khrista ngi lamrinlop vonsat low chda, ava' ki thenni Mdaksa makparlaan chaak heppi naan nih anuwn rekin avah vonsat adolow chaak raan.
49005026	Mleiya Mma ngi lamrinlop ava' mdopchiirna' rang ki thenni mdak kirpii chda. Mma ngi dii le' pauna ava ngi mdo'alqhut chaak ki mma' avah pchiir chda.
49005027	Mleiya Mma ngi, Mdak hinni kchiir rih ungta tupsulna' ktaak konlor lamrinlop khat tih makparlaan chaakna' rah, mma' avah alqhuchda. Ungta m'leen nih, kbihkchu mditmata ktivi mditmata ava' hep daat khatleh ma'ammana' rah Mdiyow ngi mma' avah mdo'alqhut chaak.
49005028	Hanto' heppi, innpu rekki mnuwn rekin avah mmaan nih mdakin vonsat chaakin heppi vonsat mdolow chaak raan. Mnuwn vonsat klow kcha' mma' ava ngi mdak vonsat korlow kcha' a.
49005029	Mleiya kuwkhat leh ngi teden rukku mdak ki mdaksa avah hal chmeh. Pdainu Kruwng ngi lamrinlop hinni mdotlot heppi thendam tnot chda ungta mdokilrin qhi chaak.
49005030	Mleiya neenna Mma' daksa ki, sadak ki ungta Mma' ruh rekki mapna rek inpmin.
49005031	“Hava' leiyi pselpa khat tih mnuhmpa mapthidon mnuwn hinni mkorjom chaak rah. Ungta 'knii rek avah daksa khadaat mkurthuh chaak raan.” (Rnp. 2:24)
49005032	Havah kparsa dok paukordowl khat. Pdainu neiyi havah Khrista le' lamrinlop leiyi, kdothe.
49005033	Anto'daat yoso, naan khimkheiyi mma' mma' ki mnuwn avah mdak vonsat mkorlow chaak heppi vonsat adolow chaak raan. Ungta mnuwn ava ngi mi'innpu avah mdokyat chaak rah.
49006001	Nau rek, naan nih Kruwng hinni anuh a'paan dothe apqowiyin, mleiya havah mkindit ava'.
49006002	Havah paureel tu' kilqhi, mkhatna' pauqum ava'. “Anuh le' Apa akyatcha.” (Knl. 5:16)
49006003	Paureel avah hava': “Mleiya havah nang athenni mqhatna' rah ungta dultipaam thuh ksowt tih arin chaakna' rang ki then.” (Knl. 5:16)
49006004	Ungta mpa rek, naan nih anau'leen avah plungthitna ngi raimaan. Ava' hinvah Kruwng dopurchuhna' thung ngi mmaan avah asutpqowi deiyin.
49006005	Suwk rek, naan nih Khrista hinki heppi dultipaam ki akpu rekin avah tiqit le' tkunchuwn ungta plungbinrit khadaat tu' kilqhi ngi mpauin apqowi chaan.
49006006	Naan nih akpu rekin avah mii plung ngamna' ktlow rek dotlot heppi miksut thung daat tih tlowmaan. Pdainu Khrista suwk rekki muplungchai intu' Isowr plungbin mdotlot chaakin heppi mmaan hinni tethe apqowi chaan.
49006007	Mleiya naan nih dultimii sop'adolow chaakin pemeh pdainu Isowr sop'adolow chaakin. Avaleiyi, kqha plungbin nih akpu rekin avah sop'adolow chaak raan.
49006008	Mleiya suwk khat yoso mditmata mii'ol khat yoso, kqha ktlow kcha' kuwmiikhat ava ngi mdotlot ava'kat avah Kruwng hinki karlaang chrah, tidit avah naan nih adodeh dokin.
49006009	Mukpu rek, naan nih anto'hepkat tih asuwk rekin hinni adotlot raan. Mleiya naan nih parvaan thah mikmai ksuw kma' naanki Mukpu ka'am tidit avah adodeh dokin. Avaleiyi, mmaan avah pqitmaan.
49006010	Mqutna' thung ngi ku'knau rek, naan nih Kruwng hinni ungta Mma' Ruhtanna'si ava' thung ngi aruhn aptang chaan.
49006011	Mleiya naan nih tarnampii dohuwnna' nongrit rek kepteng ngi ari pchaanna' raan ki thenni Isowr dopiik kurkhum raaldona avah ana chaan.
49006012	Mleiya neenna sadak le' hii kepteng ngi tkarnaakqhiin pemeh. Pdainu paamkpu rek kepteng ngi, ruhtanna' rek kepteng ngi, ungta hava' 'tunpha ki kjiingnu dultipaam ki paamkpu rek kepteng ngi ungta parvaan ki mun rek thung ngi mrilkqha kma' pthla lamki raalmii rek tung ngi tkarnaakin.
49006013	Avaleiyi, naan nih mkheng ngi pquda krip daat akurthuhna' raan ungta kqha kma' mpha marvan thung ngi krip daat tih a'am chaakna' raan, Isowr dopiik kurkhum raaldona ava' ana chaan.
49006014	Avaleiyi, naan nih kindit ava ngi arkowlkeen pthutda knet tih jeelda ungta rinkinditna' ki plungkeh pkehda arichaak raan.
49006015	Ungta naan nih akhuhn 'leenni khuhkok adonaakin heppi plung kdai ki kqhapaumin avah adonaak chaak raan.
49006016	Ava' mkheng ava' han'tun nih naan nih lamrin ki phow ava' sinda arichaak raan. Ungta ava ngi naan nih kqha kma' khat ava' ki, meiyi kquwng jel rek mei avah eyou pchaang naandi'.
49006017	Ungta tkirliinna' ki thiir luwkhum le' Pthla raal'kaang, Isowr pauna avah achom chaan.
49006018	Ungta naan nih mpha ktaiyi mdetmdet ki rinkthamna' ungta rintaktham piikna' mkheng thung ngi Pthla ngi rin'iktham chaan. Naan nih aplung inni hava' abinin chunni tidiildehna' mkheng tu' kdung ngi ikilrindei chaan. Ungta miikenje mkheng rekki thenni rin'iktham chaan.
49006019	Ungta neiyi knehr kapvan chaak ktai thung ngi pauna rek mdotpiik chaakna' rah ungta ava ngi neiyi ningqit ktaak ki kqhapaumin ki paukordowl avah kdopandan pchaanna' rah, nei kthen rukku rinmheiktham piik chaan.
49006020	Mleiya neiya thiirrii doporkol pausikhu khat ping. Neiyi kpau chaakna' kat rang ava' heppi, ningqit ktaak ki kpau pchaan chaakna' rah nei kthen nih rinmheiktham piik chaan.
49006021	'Tunnu naan rukku neiya taluhep pih ka'am ping ungta talu ktlot tah, tidit ki mlei mkheng avah Tikaikas tih ahinin nih akepdeh chdaat raan. Mma' avah Kruwng hinni trinchaak krow sopklow kcha' ungta vonsat tolow chaakin nu'unnau'in khat.
49006022	Mma' avah hava' plungbinpsuk, tidit tah naan nih taluhep pih neenna ka'am inping tidit adodeh chaakna' raan ki thenni naan ahin nih kdopthlat chaak. Ungta mma ngi naan aplungin avah plungngam akpii chdaat raan.
49006023	Unau rek hinni plung kdai i'amso ungta Pa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki lamrin chaak tu' kilqhi vonsat avah ka'am ikurthuwkso.
49006024	Ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni ktluwk ki vonsat klow kcha' mkheng rek hinni plungnee avah ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
50001001	Jisu Khrista suwk rek Paul le' Timothy neenve ngi, Philippia khuwpii thuh ka'am, Khrista Jisu hinni miikenje rek mkheng le' ksutpqowi kcha' rekle' sopklow kcha' rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
50001002	Mleiya neen Npa Isowr hinki ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki Plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso,
50001003	Neiyi naan adokbin phaak chaak naan khimkhei thung ngi neiki Isowr avah kdopanpaak chaak tlit kcho.
50001004	Neiyi krinktham chaakna' khimkhei thung ngi, mpha ktaiyi naan akhengin athen inni kanpa ngi kdopnuwm chaaklu.
50001005	Mleiya mkhatna' nit ki kupqhun nih 'tun kpha thung ngi kqhapaumin thung ngi lopkhat tkurthuh sapin leiyi, kdopanpaak chaak.
50001006	Naan athung ngi kqhanong kupqhun Mma' ava ngi, Jisu Khrista murjun duh kpha ngi ava' nong avah kpurkhum chdaat rah, tidit tah hava'kat thung ngi neiya kuplungkrip kcha'.
50001007	Neiyi havah naan akhengin leiyi, anto' heppi kdobin avah mkindit kat, mleiya naanna kuplung thuh adokthiik tlit chaakin. Mleiya naan akhengin avah neiyi thiirrii rowngmii kkurthuh thung ruk ungta kqhapaumin ki thenni kparkhaan chaakna' le' mkindit tethepindit chaakna' mkheng thung ngi naan akhengin avah nei tu' plungnee karlaang kcha'sap tkurthutin.
50001008	Mleiya neiyi naan akhengin avah taluhepya ngi, Jisu Khrista vonsat'low heppi plung akopdon chaakin tidit leiyi, Isowr rah neiki ksakhi.
50001009	Ungta naan avonsatin avah luwkinritna' mkheng thung ngi ungta penqhenda tedeh pinditna' mkheng thung ngi mkerkheel setsetna' rang ki thenni rinkatham kcha' ping.
50001010	Mleiya havah naan nih dow mkheng avah perteelda ungta kqhasi dow rek avah adorot chaakna' raan ungta neen nih Jisu Khrista murjun kpha thung ngi plung kchiir rih ungta tupsulna' ktaak ki a'amna' raan ki then.
50001011	Mleiya Isowr tpanpaakna' le' tponlorna' rah Jisu Khrista ki ar'aang ngi rinkinditna' ki mchei rek ava ngi idim chaan.
50001012	Pdainu ku'uknau rek neiyi, naan nih hava' adodeh raan kngeiya, tidit tah nei k'leen nih kthuwk dok dow rek ava ngi kqhapaumin ki mmadown ksom kurthuwkda.
50001013	Mleiya hava ngi paamkruwng inn krung mkheng ngi ungta morson mkheng rek hinni nei kthiirrii korbowlna' rek avah Khrista hin, tidit kindit chel lih mdopandan.
50001014	Ungta Kruwng hinni nu'unnau rekin meknem mih nei kthiirrii rek 'leenni plungkrip mdothlowi chaak inni, pauna avah kerkheelset tih, mningqitin ktaak ki mdothe chaak pchaanin.
50001015	Dakat tih aangqhe rekki tepner rih ungta tekpertena ngi Khrista avah parjaam lamda ungta aangqhe rukku kqha plungbin nih parjaam chlamda.
50001016	Mrukri rek ava ngi nei kthiirrii rek ava' totpom rah mdobin inni Khrista avah mthennemna' plungbin nih, plung kchiir kmah ngi parjaam lamda.
50001017	Pdainu mdilknau rek ava ngi, kqhapaumin kapkhaan chrang ngi nei avah mdotokchol tidit mdodehn nih vonsat tih avah mdoparjaam chaakin.
50001018	Mdittu' talu? Mleiya dow khimkhei thuh ktlow leek ki mditmata kindit kat tih tlow yoso, Khrista avah kurphuwng kcha' daat a, ungta neiya hava' thung ngi kanpa kcha' ping. Ungta ong ngi neiya kanpa chtlit nikdi'.
50001019	Mleiya naan arinkthamin ungta Jisu Khrista ki Pthla dobom chaak ki nei kthen nih tkirliinna' kthuwk rah tidit neiyi kdeh.
50001020	Plung korkhol lih kdobin chaak ungta kuplungbin psuk chaak thung ngi neiya dow khatleh 'leenni ningkya duh nimaang. Pdainu ningqit ktaak ki, ardarowna' mkheng ngi mpha ktai ki heppi, 'tun rukku nei kdaksa thung ngi kdiyou vih mditmata kring ngi Khrista avah konlor dok chrah.
50001021	Mleiya nei kthen nuh krin avah Khrista then ungta kdiyow chaak bih, avah kthen nem chaakna'.
50001022	Pdainu neiyi daksa thuh krin tlit daat bih, avah nei knonglow chaak ki mchei ava'. Anto'daat yoso neiyi tvah kcholnikdi', tidit tah the pchaang maang.
50001023	Mleiya neiya hava' 'knii rek doper'del lih ka'am imping, neiya sun chda ungta Khrista tu' ta'am rah kngei chaak a ungta ava ngi makqhasi.
50001024	Anto'daat yoso daksa thung ngi ka'am daat rang ava ngi naan athenni msit ka'amset tah.
50001025	Ungta hava' plungkrip kdothlowi chaak ava ngi, naan nih alamrinin thuh akorsom chaakna' raan ungta akanpat chaakna' raan ki thenni neiyi am daatda naan akhengin tu' ka'am bong rang imping tidit kdeh a.
50001026	Mleiya neiyi naan ahin nih veikhat kthlen nowl ava ngi Jisu Khrista hinni nei kleiyi akpirlin chaakin avah kerkheel setset rah.
50001027	Talutalu yoso naan nih arinchanin avah Khrista ki kqhapaumin ki thenni mtik kcha apurthutin. Mdit bih, neiyi thlengda asuw yown rih mditmata thleng myow rih naan nih pthla khadaat tih knet tih krip inptih ungta kqhapaumin ki lamrin ki thenni khatsap, plungbin khadaat tih adonaaksapin tidit ki adangin avah arja nikdi'.
50001028	Ungta naan nih, naan akepteng rekin avah talutalu yoso qi chmaan. Mleiya havah mmaan hinni titinna' khat tidit tah mmaan nah kenvei chlam rah pdainu naan ahinnu havah tkirliinna' ungta havah Isowr hinki.
50001029	Mleiya naan nih Mma' hinni lam'adorin daatin kma' Mma' thenni suwk rukka athuhna' raanni, Khrista kchang ngi naan ahin nih havah adotpiik dokin.
50001030	Mleiya naan nih, neiyi tyat kdoperteel avah amikkat inni deiyin tinu ungta tunkpha thuh kdoperteel meeksli daat avah ado'arjaakin ungta ava' heppi naan rukku adoperteel meek sliin.
50002001	Avaleiyi, Khrista hinni ardarowna' ma'am cheentung ngi, vonsat ki plung ngamna' ma'am cheentung ngi, Pthla tu' lopkhat kurthuwk kcha' ma'am cheentung ngi, plungdun vonsat le' plung knei vonsat kthlowi kcha' ma'am cheentung ngi,
50002002	Plungreel khadaat ki plungbin khat tih, vonsat khatsap ava' adothlowi chaak inni plungbin kinqimsap pih, nei kkanpat avah mheipurkhum piik chaan.
50002003	Naan nih mthennemna' plungbin nih mditmata msit ktaak ki tpirlin chaak ki dow khatleh adotlot raan pemeh. Pdainu kpirdil kcha' plungbin nih mii khimkheiyi morson khat avah mmaan mdakin hinni kqhabet tih mdobin chaak rah.
50002004	Naan khimkheiyi mthina ki ardarowna' dow rek daat suwmaan pdainu morson rekki ardarowna' dow rek rukka asuwn.
50002005	Khrista Jisu hin rukku ka'am hava' plungbin avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
50002006	Mma' avah Isowr rinchan nih am chdaat yoso. Mma ngi Isowr tu' mkinqimna' avah tokyownmer rah tidit tih binmeh.
50002007	Pdainu ava' kchang ngi Mdak ki mdangqhat ktaak liit khat kpurthuhda suwk'owr khat ruwngchen louda, Ungta dultimii khat heppi arjungda.
50002008	Ungta dultimii khat heppi mkandan ava ngi, Mma ngi mthina kpirdil chda. Ungta kdiyou kpha ngi, tidit tah khros 'leenni kdiyou kpha ngi tethe pqowi chda.
50002009	Ava'leiyi Isowr rukku Mma' avah kparthaang ngi tparthaan chda. Ungta miing khimkhei rek han'tun ki miing ava' piida.
50002010	Mleiya parvaan thah ka'am mmaan rukku ungta dultipaam thuh ka'am mmaan rukku ungta dultiril thah ka'am mmaan rukku Jisu miing 'leenni pkhup khimkheiyi tirdiildon luwmdobuk chaak rah.
50002011	Ungta plei khimkheiyi Pa Isowr tponlor chaakna ngi Jisu Khrista avah Kruwng tidit mdothethut chaak rah.
50002012	Avaleiyi, nei kvonsat low rek, naan nih nei ka'am thung daat kma' mpha ktaiyi tethe adopqowiyin heppi, 'tun nih nei ka'amma thung rukku kerkheel set tih tethe adopqowiyin heppi ningqit le' tkunchuwn tu' kilqhi ngi adakin ki akarsan chaak naan nong ava' atlow chaan.
50002013	Mleiya naan athung inni Mma' plung ngamna' dilkqowiyi tbinna' le' Mma plungbinrit kqha ava' totlotna' 'leenni nong ktlow avah Isowr.
50002014	Naan nih dow mkheng avah tkirthitna' le' tkerteenna' ktaak ki atlown.
50002015	Mleiya naan nih tupsulna' ktaak ungta kertleu deek ki ungta mdoparma ktaak, Isowr nau rek akurthuhna' raan, hava' lamdak kma' kqowi ungta kpurlup kperthel suruwl ava' arlak ki mar'aang rek heppi dultipaam thuh ilengin.
50002016	Mleiya naan nih rinkum ki pauna avah knet tih akyowng chaan, mdit bih, neiyi msit ktaak ki kchen dok kcha' mditmata msit ktaak ki nong klou dok kcha' kkurthuhma leiyi, kpirlin chnikdi'.
50002017	Ou, neiya, naan alamrinin ki rintparlaanna' le' soptolowna' 'leenni moptlong chdaat kpha yoso, neiya kanpa kcha' ping ungta naan akhengin tu' kanpa chdaat nikdi'.
50002018	Hava' lei kat thung ngi naan rukka nei tu' aplungin mngam rah ungta akanpatsap chaak raan.
50002019	Pdainu neiyi naan a'amin rinchan kdeh chaak thung ngi kardamrow chaakna' rah naan ahin nih kbeisek ki Timothy kdopthlat chaakna' rah neiyi Kruwng Jisu avah lamkrin chaak a.
50002020	Mleiya Timothy kma'don naan arinchanin qhatna' thuh plung kluwt tih ksuw rah kuplungbin kinqimqhi kuwkhat leh thlowi maang.
50002021	Mleiya mii mkheng ngi Khrista Jisu ki dow rek kma' mma' mma' ki daat mthlaamsap chaak inna.
50002022	Pdainu naan nih mma' ki tperteel dok rinchan avah adodeh dokin, tidit tah mchapa khat tih mpa tu' nong mdotlot heppi mma ngi nei tu' kqhapaumin thung ngi sopmdotolowqhi chaak.
50002023	Ava'leiyi neiyi taluhep rang imping tidit kdeh daat le' Timothy avah naan ahin nih kbeisek ki tapthlat rah tidit ki plungbinpsuk kthlowi chaak a.
50002024	Pdainu nei kdak rukka kbeisek ki naan ahin nih thleng nikmow, kdi ngi Kruwng hinni lamkrin chaak a.
50002025	Anto'daat yoso, nei knaupa, knonglowqhi ungta kraalnaakqhi pdainu naan apau sikhuwn ungta nei kikriin 'leenni sopmoklow kcha' Epaphroditas avah naan ahin nih tapthlat rang avah msit ka'am mih bin chnuh.
50002026	Mleiya mma ngi naan akhengin avah plung apdon inda ungta naan nih mmah kkowi a tidit ado'arjaakin leiyi muplung kya tlit tih amda.
50002027	Mleiya mma' avah dakat tih kdiyousou vih kowi chda pdainu Isowr rih plungqhat tedet chda. Ungta mma' hin daat kma' nei ruk mditmata neiyi plungyatna' 'leenni plungyat duh chnikdi'.
50002028	Ava'leiyi neiyi mma' avah plung korkhol lih tidit tah naan nih mma' adeh chaak nowlin thung ngi akanpat chaakna' raan ungta nei kuplungyat rukka mtlowmbetna' rah kdopthlat chaak.
50002029	Ava'leiyi mma' avah Kruwng hinni plungngam mkheng tu' arlaang chaan ungta mma'hep mii rek avah naan nih akyat chaan.
50002030	Mleiya mma ngi mrinkum ki thenni kbin kmah Khrista ki nong ki thenni kdiyousou kpha ngi, naan nih nei kihin nih adoptat dokin soptolowna' avah mdopqut chaak.
50003001	Mqutna' thung ngi ku'uknau rek, Kruwng hinni ikanpa chaan. Nei kthen nuh naan ahin nih dow rek ava'kat ki thenni tikjit nowl rang avah karda thimeh ungta avah naan athen innu mqhatna' set.
50003002	Naan nih uwi rek hinki ikilrindei chaan, kthi ktlow rek hinki ikilrin chaan ungta daksa 'leenni vunkreen rek hinki ikilrindei chaan.
50003003	Mleiya neenna pthla ngi Isowr hinni luwkbu kcha' kindit thuh vunkreen kcha' rek inpimin. Khrista Jisu hinni ikpirlin chaan ungta dultimii nongtlot 'leenni plungkrip thlowi chmaan.
50003004	Nei kdak rukka dultimii nongtlot 'leenni plungkrip kthlowi kcha' khat kurthuwk chdaat ruk krow ping. Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih daksa 'leenni plung tiprina' ki mlei kthe ma'am bih, nei rukku kerkheelset tih kdothe rah ka'am.
50003005	Neiya knitrehtna' nit tih kvunkreen ping, Isreel chaat thungki ping, Benjamin phung thungki ping. Hibriu mii rekki Hibriu miikhat ping ungta nowlam 'leennu neiya Pharisy miikhat ping.
50003006	Plung kluwt ki mlei thung ngi, neiyi lamrinlop avah chiipreel lam nuh, nowlam thuh ka'am rinkinditna' ki mlei thung ngi neiya tupsulna' ktaak ki karvang ka'am ping.
50003007	Pdainu nei kthen nih ktuwn chaakna' dow rek avah neiyi Khrista ki thenni msit ktaak tidit tih kdotai chaak dok.
50003008	Pdainu neiyi dakat tih Kruwng Khrista Jisu tedeh chaak ki, mkenreelsi ava' ki thenni dow mkheng avah msit ktaak tidit tih nei rukku kdotai chaak dok. Mleiya Mma' thenni dow mkheng avah msit ktaak kdopthut ungta Khrista kdophan chaakna' rah mmaan avah kqopktobor rek tidit kdotai pthi.
50003009	Ungta havah neiyi Mma' hinni nowlam thungki kthina ki rinkinditna' kthlowi kcha' kkurthuh mana' rah pdainu Khrista hinni lamtrin chaak ar'aang thungki lamrin ava ngi Isowr hinki rinkinditna' ava' kdothlowi chaakna' rang ki then.
50003010	Mleiya neiyi Mma' ungta Mma' rinkerheelna' ruhtan ava' kdodeh chaakna' rah ungta Mma' suwkthuhna' thuh lopkhat kdokurthut qhih chaakna' rah neiya Mma' diyowna' thuh kiksim kcha' ping.
50003011	Ungta talutalu yoso neiyi kdiyou thungki trin kerheelna' avah tphaak chaak rah kdongei.
50003012	Neiyi kphan chaak doknah ava' pemeh mditmata kkurkhum chaak doknah ava' pemeh pdainu Khrista Jisu rukku nei mdotokyowna' ava' avah nei rukku kdokyown chaakna' rah kdorei chaak.
50003013	Ku'uknau rek, neiyi avah kokyowng dok kcha' ngi kirbin chmaang. Pdainu neiyi kdotlot chaak khat tah, kdil thah ka'am dow rek avah perngeel chnuh ungta kduh thah ka'am dow rek ava' kdorei chaak.
50003014	Neiyi Khrista Jisu hinni karthak ki do'own, Isowr ki nongqhat'lot ki thenni plungreelpsuk ava' ktong thah kdochenrei chaak.
50003015	Ava'leiyi plung kenreel dok kcha' rek khimkheiyi hava' plungril avah ithlowi incheh. Ungta talutalu yoso naan nih ktleiyi abinin bih, Isowr rih ava' kpha rukka ahinin nih akpurphuwn piik chraan.
50003016	Ktlowm liit kmah ngi neen nih tkolrotna' dokin pauqum ava' thung ngi nowrit khadaat tih chetin cheh ungta plungril khadaat ihorin cheh.
50003017	Ku'uknau rek, neiyi adoktedetin heppi, morson rektu' mheipqowiyin ungta neenve ngi adokpiikin titinna' ava' thung ngi kchet rek mmaan avah bih atinin.
50003018	Mleiya mii knempok ki Khrista ki khros kepteng ngi miihal kurthuwk chda ka'am a, neiyi havah naan ahinin nih mpha ktai kdothe ungta 'tunnu kqap pih ahinin nih kthe a.
50003019	Mmaan ava' ki mdonna' avah tkenveina', mpowiyin avah mmaan ki isowr. Ungta mningkyaian avah mmaan konlorna' ungta mmaan nah dultipaam ki dow rek 'leenni muplungril lihn avah mdothiik chaakin.
50003020	Mleiya neen nih paammii tkurthuhna' avah parvaan, neen nih mmun ava' ki Miksan Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah neen rukku ningkakraal lih tardat chaakin.
50003021	Mma ngi dow mkheng nampdowngda Mma' hinni teqen pchaanna' ruhtan nongtlotna' ava' dilkqowiyi, neenki dow khatleh kma' ndaksa rekin avah Mma' konlorna' daksa thung ngi mikperthlenpiik chraan.
50004001	Ava'leiyi nei kvonsat'low ku'uknau rek, ungta plung kdopdon chaak, kkanpatna' le' kuKruwng luwkhum ku'uknau rek, naan nih Kruwng hinni knet tih irip chaan.
50004002	Neiyi Kruwng hinni plungril khadaat adohorna' raan ki thenni Eurodia nang ahin nih akoksow chaak a ungta Syntaiki ahinin nih akoksow chaak a.
50004003	Ungta neiyi kmiiqhi kat nang ahin nih akaktham chaak a, hava' snu rek avah abomcha'. Mleiya mmaanve a kqhapaumin thung ngi Klement le' tu' ungta Rinkum ki laika thung ngi mmiing rekin tikjit dok rek nei ksoplowqhi morson rektu' nong klou kcha'sap reklam.
50004004	Mpha ktaiyi Kruwng hinni ikanpa chaan. Ungta neiyi veikhat kthe nowl a ikanpa chaan.
50004005	Naanki aplung downin avah mii mkheng hinni apdehn. Kruwng arjunna' rang avah knaitek kcha' a.
50004006	Naan nih dow khatleh ki thenni plung pyamaan, pdainu dow khimkhei 'leenni rinkthamna' le' tiqhil chaakna' ngi tpanpaak chaak tu' kilqhi ngi aktham chaakna' rekin avah Isowr hinni apdeh chaan.
50004007	Ungta tedeh pinditna' mkheng rek han'tun ki Isowr ki plung kdai ava ngi naan aplung rekin le' aplungril rekin avah Khrista Jisu ar'aang ngi akrunpiik chraan.
50004008	Mqutna' thung ngi ku'uknau rek, naan nih talutalu yoso, kindit dow rek, talutalu yoso takyat kurhuwi dow rek, talutalu yoso kindit dow rek, talutalu yoso kchiir dow rek, talutalu yoso vonsat kurhuwi dow rek, talutalu yoso mdang kqha dow rek, rinchan qhatna' ungta tpanpaak chaak kurhuwi ma'am cheentung ngi naan nih hava'le' 'leenni plung kluwt tih abin chaan.
50004009	Ungta naan nih nei kihin ki akurchuh chaakin ungta ado'arlaan chaakin ungta ado'arjaakin ungta amikin nih adodeh chaakin dow rek avah naan nih atlown ungta plung kdai ki Isowr ava ngi naanna akqhi chraan.
50004010	Pdainu neiya Kruwng hinni kdung ngi kanpa kcha' ping tidit tah naan nih nei kthen nih adokilrinqhiin avah mqutna' thah 'tunnu veikhat apandan inna. Dakat tih naan nih adotkilrinqhi chaak tlitin, pdainu adopandanna' raan ki mpha adophanin pemeh.
50004011	Neiyi havah kikriin leiyi, kdothe pemeh, tidit tah neiyi talutalu daat yoso, kokhom tlit tih ka'amna' rah kurchuk dok kcha' ping.
50004012	Neiyi taluhep pih kikriing ngi ungta taluhep pih kokhom mih ta'am rang tidit kdeh chaak dok. Mmun mkheng thuh ungta dow khimkhei thung ngi taluhep pih powikpaa ngi ungta pwoiktham mih ta'am rang ungta taluhep pih kokhom mih kikriing kperteel lih ta'am rang tidit avah kurchuk dok kcha' ping.
50004013	Neiyi kru mkaptanpiik Khrista ava' ar'aang ngi dow mkheng avah kdotlot pchaan chaak.
50004014	Anto'daat yoso, naan nih nei kyatna' thung ngi adottanqhi chaak sapin avah, naan nih kqha atlot chaak inna.
50004015	'Tun nah Philippia rek naan nih hava' rukka adeiyin, tidit tah kqhapaumin mupqhun thok thuh neiyi Mesedonia ki ksun thung ngi naan kma'don lamrinlop kuwkhat leh ngi tpiikna' le' tarlaanna' 'leenni nei tu' ktangsap kcha' ka'am pemeh.
50004016	Mleiya naan nih Thessalonika khuwpii thah ka'am thung ruk ungta kikriing ngi ka'am rukku adotbom chaak naan avah veikhat vei'knii mapthlat piik intinu.
50004017	Neiyi chla ava' kdothlaam pemeh pdainu naan aleitai rekin thung ngi mchei mkerkheel setsetna' rang ava' kthlaam kcha' ping.
50004018	Dakat tih dow mkheng kthlowi ungta kepleet tih kthlowi. Mleiya Epaphroditas hinni adotpohor chaakin dow rek mkheng ava' kdo'arlaan chaak ki, neiya kdimteer rih kthlowi a. Naan nih adotpohor chaakin chla rek avah Isowr plung ngamna' trotpiik krow rintparlaan, mikrimkdi namreng kurthuwk kcha' a.
50004019	Ungta neiki Isowr rih Mma' ki konlor svangthuhna' rek ava ngi Khrista Jisu ar'aang ngi naan akriinin mkheng avah akpii chraan.
50004020	'Tunnu neenki Isowr ungta Pa ava' hinni ktlangknai kmah ngi tponlor chaak ki i'amso. Amen.
50004021	Khrista Jisu hinni miikenje khimkhei rek avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Nei tu' ka'am unau rekki aturvuwi chaak inna.
50004022	Miikenje rek mkheng inni aturvuwi chaak inna, pdainu mkenreelsi ngi Siijar innmii rek mmaan nih aturvuwi chaak inna.
50004023	Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan akhengin ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
51001001	Isowr plungbin nih, Jisu Khrista ki tamsi Paul neiyi ungta nu'unnau'in Timothy ngi,
51001002	Kolossia khuwpii thuh ka'am, Khrista hinni trinchaak krow unau rekle' miikenje rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak inna. N'paan Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
51001003	Neenve ngi neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista Pa ungta Isowr ava' hinni mpha ktai naan athenni rinkaktham chaak inni kpanpaak chaak inna.
51001004	Mleiya naan nih Khrista Jisu hinni alamrin chaakin ungta miikenje mkheng rek vonsat adolow chaakin avah neenve ngi kdo'arjaak chaakin.
51001005	Mleiya hava' plungbinpsuk avah naan athenni parvaan thah purtuwlda ka'am daat. Naan nih havah kqhapaumin ki kindit pauna thung ngi mduduh ngi ado'arjaak chaak dokin.
51001006	Kqhapaumin avah naan ahin nih tlung dokda ungta anto' heppi dultipaam mkheng thung ngi karjaamda ungta avah 'tunnu mchei kchei a. Anto' heppi naan ahinin rukku naan nih ava' arjaan tinu ungta kindit tih Isowr ki plungnee ava' adodeh chaak naan nit ki kupqhun nih kchei kcha' inptih.
51001007	Ungta naan nih neenve ngi vonsat kdolow in, suwk'owr kdokurthuh qhiin Epaphras hinki arjaak chaak inna. Mma' avah naan akchang inni Khrista ki trinchaak krow sopklow kcha' miikhat.
51001008	Mma ngi neenve kihin inni avonsatin avah Pthla ar'aang ngi purphuwng chda.
51001009	Hava'le' rukku neenve ava' kdo'arjaak naan nit ki kupqhun nih naan athen inni krinktham chaakin avah tunkpha down chvot maanring. Ungta naan nih pthla lamki tedeh pinditna' ungta luwkinritna' mkheng thung ngi Mma' plungbin tedeh pinditna' thung ngi adotipdim chaakna' raan ki thenni rinkaktham kchaan ping.
51001010	Mleiya havah naan nih kqhanong khimkhei thung ngi kchei kcha' ungta Isowr ki tedeh pinditna' thung ngi kerkheelset set tih klinthang kcha' kurthuwkda kurkhum mih Mma' plung ngamna' mkheng ava' tlowda Kruwng hinni mtikkcha khat tih ache chaakna' raan ki then.
51001011	Ungta Mma' ruhtan konlor ava' dilkqowiyi kanpa tu' kilqhi ngi tidiildehna' mkheng le' ksowt tih tidiildehna' thuh ruhtan mkheng tu' adotaptan chaakin ikurthuwkso.
51001012	Mar'aang thung ngi miikenje rektu' alrou kchom mikupthutsap kchaan Pa ava' hinni kpanpaak chaak inna.
51001013	Mma ngi neen avah kjiingnu ruhtan dokhum thungki miktlan inda ungta Mma' vonsat'low Chapa ava' kruwngpaalna' thungki rah neen avah miperheel chaanda.
51001014	Mma' thung ngi neen nih tkartlanna' avah Mma' hii ar'aang ngi pnu rek toptlot piikna' avah tothlowi chaakin.
51001015	Mma' avah nmik ki tedehma Isowr arlim ava' ungta mdorpurthuh khimkhei rekki mkhatna' kqou ava'.
51001016	Mleiya parvaan ki ungta dultipaam ki nmik ki tedeh ungta nmik ki tedehma, kruwng longkhom rek yoso mditmata tpaalna' ruhtan ksin rek yoso, mditmata paamkpu rek yoso mditmata ruhtanna' rek yoso, dow mkheng avah Mma' ar'aang ngi mdopurthuh. dow mkheng avah Mma' ar'aang ngi ungta Mma' thenni mdopurthuh.
51001017	Ungta Mma' avah dow mkheng duh ki ungta Mma' thung ngi dow mkheng avah ka'am.
51001018	Mma' avah daksa ki mluwchai, lamrinlop ava'. Tidit tah dow mkheng thung ngi Mma ngi mrukrisi mkurthuhna' rah Mma' avah mkheng ki tupqhunna' ungta kdiyou arlak ki mkhatna' kqou ava'.
51001019	Mleiya Mma' thung ngi dow mkheng kurkhum mih ma'am avah Pa ava' plung ngamna' kurthuwkda.
51001020	Ungta Mma ngi dultipaam ki dow rek yoso, parvaan ki dow rek yoso, dow mkheng avah Mma ngi Mma' mdak thung ngi mdopalqhat lamna' rah, Mma' khros ki hii ava' ar'aang ngi plung kdai avah tpa'amda.
51001021	Ungta mphakhat thung ngi mrilkqha kma' nong rekki aplungrilin thung ngi miihal rek kurthuwkda ungta Mma' hinki teknenpthi dok naan avah 'tunnu Mma ngi naan avah apalqhat chaanda.
51001022	Naan avah Mma' miksut thung ngi kchiir rih ungta mraal ktaak ki ungta tupsulna' ktaak ki adotparlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni tidiyow ngi Mma' sadak ki daksa thung ngi adotpalqhat chaak dokin.
51001023	Hava' mkurthuhna' rah naan nih lamrin thung ngi i'am tlitin ungta knet tih abullin apnetin rah knet tih irip chaan. Ungta parvaan kurduh ngi ka'am downkhaal khimkhei rek hinni mdoparjaam dok ungta naan rukku ado'arjaak dokin kqhapaumin ava' ki plungbinpsuk ava' thung ki konthot chmaan. Paul neiya ava' ki sopklow kcha' khat kurthuwk kcha' ping.
51001024	'Tunnu neiya naan athenni tyartraan kdoperteelna' rek thung ngi kanpa kcha' ping. Ungta Mma' daksa tidit tah lamrinlop ava' ki thenni Khrista ngi mdoptat dok tyattraanna' rek avah nei kdaksa thung ngi mipdimpiik chda.
51001025	Isowr soplowna' ava' kdopurkhum chaakna' rah, naan athenni nei kihin nih mdotpiik Isowr hinki suwkkenreel tkurthuhna' ava' dilkqowiyi neiya ava' ki sopklow kcha' khat ping.
51001026	Mpha tyatya thung ngi ungta suruwl rek tya thung ngi kordowl lih ka'am kcha' paukordowl avah 'tunnu Mma' miikenje rek hinni mpandan piiklam a.
51001027	Isowr rih Chaatktlei rek arlak ki miikenje rek mmaan hinni hava' paukordowl ki mkonlor chaakna'si avah tepdeh rah bin chda. Mleiya konlor plungbinpsuk ki naan athung inni ka'am Khrista ava'.
51001028	Mma' avah neenve ngi kdopurphuwn chaakin. Mleiya naan nih mii khimkhei avah Khrista Jisu hinni kurkhum deek ki kdoparlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni mii khimkhei hinni pilqhit chaannu ungta luwkinritna' mkheng thung ngi mii khimkheiya kdopurchuh chaakin.
51001029	Hava' rang ki thenni, nei kthung ngi mruh ktang dok ki nong ktlow Mma' ruhtan nih nei rukku nong avah pelren nuh kdolow chaak.
51002001	Mleiya neiya naan athenni ungta Laodisia thuh ka'am rekki thenni ungta daksa 'lam thah nei kmai kdei kcha' mlai rek mkheng ki thenni tya klin nih kkarnaakqhi a tidit adodeh raan kdongei chaak.
51002002	Mleiya mmaan nih muplungchai rekin avah arda krok ki ungta vonsat tih makparkai chaakna' raan tidit tah mmaan nih Pa Isowr ki ungta Khrista ki, Isowr ki paukordowl ava' kindit chel lih tedeh pinditna' ki luwkinritna' mkheng ava' mdothlowi chaak raan kdongei chaak.
51002003	Mma' hinni luwkinritna' le' tedeh pinditna' ki arkhiik mkheng rek avah kordowlda ka'am.
51002004	'Tunnu kuwkhat leh ngi naan avah tupnuwm chaakna' pau rekki adotuhuwn chaakmana' raan ki thenni havah kdothe.
51002005	Mleiya neiyi daksa ngi ahinin nih ammyo ringngi pthla ngi neiya naan tu' ka'am daat ping. naan a'amqhatin ungta Khrista hinni alamrinin thung ngi knet tih ari chaakin ava' kdodeh ngi kanpa kcha' ping.
51002006	Naan nih Kruwng Khrista Jisu ado'arlaan chaak dokin heppi, naan nih Mma' thung ngi ichetin.
51002007	Naan ahinin nih adotpurchuh dokin heppi Mma' hinni arjungin apnet chaan, ipqhang chaan ungta lamrin thung ngi adopanpaak chaakin avah aperkheel setset chaan.
51002008	Naan nih ikilrindei chaan, mditma bih, kuwmiikhat tih Khrista nowpa dilkqowi kma'pa, dultipaam ki nowpa dilkqowi ki luwkinritna' ava' ar'aang ngi ungta msit ktaak tkurhuwnna' ava ngi ungta dultipaam ki nowritbul rek dilkqowiyi akuhuwng chraan.
51002009	Mleiya Khrista thung ngi Isowr kurthuwk ki mkurkhumna' mkheng avah Mma' daksa thung ngi ka'am kcha'.
51002010	Ungta naan avah paamkpu rekle' ruhtanna' rek mkheng ki mluwchai Mma' ava' hinni naanna kurkhum dok kcha' inptih.
51002011	Naan nih pnu nowpa rek ava' adosupthi chaak inni, Khrista ki vunreenna' ava ngi naan rukka khut rekki treenma vuntreenna' thung ngi Mma' hinni vunkreen dok kcha' rekin ptih.
51002012	Naanna diiluwna' thung ngi Mma' tu' kulruwlve kcha'sap dokin ptih. Ava' thung ngi naan nih kdiyou thungki Mma' kperdel Isowr nongtlot ava' lam'adorin chaakin ar'aang ngi naan rukka Mma' tu' adotperdel chaak sap dokin.
51002013	Ungta naanna adoparmaan nih ungta adaksaan thuh vunkreen kma' akurthuhn nih kdiyou dok kchaan ptih. Pdainu Mma ngi adoparmanaan mkheng ava' adotoptlot piik inni Khrista tu' apring chaanda.
51002014	Neen mikepteng ngi ungta mikrisanin tikjit paureen rek avah miknuwlpthi piikinda. Ungta Mma ngi khros 'leenni avah heem pthowida midotlow pthipiik dokin.
51002015	Mma ngi paamkpu rekle' ruhtanna' rek mkheng ki raaldona mdolow pthi ava ngi mmaan avah mii rek hinni tupsutda ungta khros ava ngi mmaan avah pchaangda.
51002016	Ava'leiyi naan avah thendam mditmata tneek, mditmata tporchonna' mlei rek, mditmata thla ren khat ki mditmata tkarngatnit rek 'leenni kuwkhat leh ngi a'leenin nih ayupindit maanso.
51002017	Mleiya avale' avah karvang bei rang dow rek ava' ki mapthla rek ngaal pdainu mlang avah Khrista hinni ka'am.
51002018	Naan avah mlangkmah ngi kpirdil kcha' ungta vaantamsi rek luwkbuk kcha' rek kuwkhat leh ngi naan nih ado'arlaan chaak raan anongqhat'lotin thungki ahuwng chmaanso. Ava' hep mii ava ngi mmik ki mdodehma dow rek thuh kukthuwk ki kluwt kcha' ungta mma' ki dultimii ki plungril ava ngi msit ktaak ki kpirlin kcha'.
51002019	Ungta mma' avah daksa mkheng pringda ungta ruhjom rekle' ardajom rekki parkaida kiplin thang Luwchai ava' 'leenni knet tih karkaikcha' pemeh ungta hava'le' kiplin avah Isowr.
51002020	Ava'leiyi naan nih Khrista tu' hava' dultipaam ki nowritbul rek thungki kdiyou dok kcha' akurthuhn nuh, taluleiyi naan nih dultipaam thungki tlit tih ka'am inna? Naan nih adakin avah ava' ki paureen thung ngi kakparlaan kcha' daat inptih mow?
51002021	“Naan nih avah thowngmaan, pertem maan ungta kmeimaan.”
51002022	Hava' dow rek avah tsintonna' thung ngi kqop kcha' rang ki thenni mdopurtum dok mleiya mmaan avah dultimii paupiik rekle' tpurchuhna' rek 'leenni kikbiu kcha'lam.
51002023	Hava' dow mkheng rek avah mthina ki rin'owina', mlangkma' tpirdilna' ungta daksa tuktsutmana' 'leenni luwkinritna' kthlowi kcha' rekrek heppi kandang lam. Pdainu pnu nowpa ningtlunna' kepteng ngu mruhtanin ka'am pemeh.
51003001	Naan nih Khrista tu' kerdel dok kcha' akurthuhn cheentung ngi Isowr machang thah kok'ong Khrista amna', karthaak ki dow rek ava' athlaam chaan.
51003002	Naan nih aplungrilin avah dultipaam ki dow rek 'leen kma' karthak ki dow rek 'leenni athi chaan.
51003003	Mleiya naanna kdiyou dok kcha' inptih ungta naan arinkumin avah Khrista tu' Isowr hinni kordowl lih ka'am kcha'.
51003004	Neenki nrinkumin, Khrista mkandan thung ngi, naan rukka Mma' tu' konlor rih kandang chnaandi'.
51003005	Ava'leiyi naan nih dultipaam nowparit thung ngi ka'am apna rekin avah, jowltpurjutna', totborna', sadak dongei, kthi tngeina' mkheng thungki ungta tpunjuwrna' tidit tah dow pthla luwtbukna' thungki apdiyou dokin.
51003006	Hava' dow rek leiyi, Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah tethe kopqowi kma' mii rek 'leenni kurjung rah.
51003007	Mphakhat thuh, naan nih mmaan thung ngi a'amin thuh naan rukka ava' thuh kchet inptih.
51003008	Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih hava'le' rukka adomaak pthiraan. Mleiya, plungthit, plungthit mei kquwng, miiqhatmana' ktlow, pthitda kpau, mnehr thung ngi paukkaam kna mkheng avah amapthi dokin.
51003009	Naan nih khat le' khat hinni plei kernee psuk maan, mleiya naan nih miipli avah mnongtlot rektu' adosuwpthi dokin.
51003010	Ungta naanna mukpurthuh kcha' Mma' arlim ava' dilkqowiyi tedeh pinditna' thung ngi ren kurthuwk dok kcha' miiren avah buwdiir rih adonaak chaak dokin.
51003011	Ava' thung ngu Grikmii mditmata Jihudimii tidit ka'am pemeh ungta vunkreen mditmata vunkreen kma' tidit ka'am pemeh. Ungta paam lamkla ki mii mditmata Saithia mii tidit ka'am pemeh ungta suwk'owr mditmata mii'ol tidit ka'am pemeh. Pdainu Khrista ngi dow mkheng ungta dow mkheng thung ngi ka'am.
51003012	Avaleiyi, Isowr dokchol dok kchiir ungta vonsat'low heppi, naan nih plungkham, plung kdowng plungril lih kpirdil kcha', plung kperneem, ksowt tih kdiildei kcha' avah dona ngi ana chaan.
51003013	Naan nih khat le' khat kirdiildei kcha' ungta khat le' khat kokportlot piikdei, ikurthuwkin kuwmiikhat tih khat kepteng ngi paukna am yoso, Khrista ngi adotoptlot piikin heppi naan rukku avah adotlot raan.
51003014	Pdainu hava' dow mkheng rek ava' karthak ki, kurkhum deek ki akbowlin, vonsat avah buwdiir rih ana chaan.
51003015	Ungta avah daksa khadaat thung ngi adoto'own doknaan, Isowr ki plungdaina' ava ngi aplungril rekin ki mukpu apthutin ungta kpanpaak dei kcha' ikurthuwkin.
51003016	Khrista ki pauna ava ngi luwkinritna' mkheng thung ngi naan athung ngi kepleet tih ka'am ikurthuwkso! Naan nih plungnee tu' aplung inni Kruwng hinni laa athe chaakin thuh, khat le' khat avah luwbuklaa ngi ungta tpanpaakna' laa ngi ungta pthla lamki laa ngi ikpurchuk chaan ungta ikorsop chaan.
51003017	Ungta naan nih talutalu yoso pauna ngi mditmata nongtlot tih adotlotnaan mkheng thung ngi Kruwng Jisu miing ngi dow mkheng avah atlown, ungta Mma' ar'aang ngi Pa Isowr hinni apanpaak chaan.
51003018	Nuwn rek, naan nih Kruwng hinni kurthutjik ava' heppi naan naanki a'innpu rekin hinni ikparlaan chaan.
51003019	Innpu rek, naan nih naan naanki anuwn rekin avah vonsat alown ungta mmaan hinni kkha ngi korthlong maan.
51003020	Nau rek, naan nih dow mkheng thung ngi anuh le' apa dothe apqowiyin. Mleiya havah Kruwng hinni kdung ngi plung ngamna'
51003021	Mpa rek, anau rekin avah mdokthitna' raanni raimaan mditma bih, mardaan kthi rah.
51003022	Suwk'owr rek, naan nih dow mkheng thung ngi naanki, dultipaam ki akpu rekin hinni tethe apqowi chaan ungta mii rek hinni miiplung ngamna' ktlow rek dotlot heppi miksut nongtlot tih tlowmaan. Pdainu naan nih plung kluwt tih Isowr kqikcha ngi atlown.
51003023	Ungta talutalu yoso atlotin thuh, dultimii hin kma' Kruwng hinni totlot heppi, aplungrinin tu' korthlop pih atlown.
51003024	Mleiya Kruwng hinki alrouchomna' avah nongqhat'lot tih arlaang chnikaan tidit adodehn. Mleiya naan nih Kruwng Khrista sop'adolow chaakin.
51003025	Pdainu karmak ktlow kcha' mma' hinni mma ngi karmak mdotlot avah kpii perheel rah ungta ava' thuh tbom le' tsuwpsitna' ka'am pemeh.
51004001	Mukpu rek, naan nih parvaan thah naanki Mukpu khat ka'am tidit adodeh inni, asuwk'owr rekin avah kurthutjik ki ungta kqha ngi apii chaan.
51004002	Naan nih kilrin kcha' ngi ungta tpanpaak chaak ki adakin avah kdet'liit kmah rintakthamna' 'leenni plung apluwt chaan.
51004003	Ava'arlak ki nei rukku thiirrii ngi kkorbowlna' Khrista ki paukordowl avah neenve ngi kdoparjaam chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr rih thurngut mdotapvan piikna' raan neen kthen inni rinmheiktham piik chaan.
51004004	Mleiya neiyi kdothe rang heppi, neiyi kdopandan pchaan chaakna' rah rinmheiktham piik chaan.
51004005	Duwn ki rek hinni ache'atlownin 'leenni luwkinrit tih i'amin ungta mpha avah aktlan chaan.
51004006	Mleiya naan nih mii khimkhei rek hinni ado'arthaan raan heppi ado'arthaan pchaanna' raan ki thenni mpha ktaiyi apauin avah plungnee tu' ungta ptika'al deek apthutin.
51004007	Vonsat'low nu'unnau'in, trinchaak krow sopklow kcha' mii, Kruwng Jisu hinni suwk'owr khatsap kdokurthuhqhi, Tikaikas tih nei klei ki pauren mkheng avah akthepiik chraan.
51004008	Neiyi mma' avah naan ahin nih, hava' nongrit kat ki thenni, tidit tah mma ngi naanki a'amrinchanin mdodehna' rah ungta aplungin adotoksow chaakna' raan ki thenni mma' avah ahinin nih kdopthlat chaak.
51004009	Mma' tu' kilqhi ngi trinchaak krow ungta vonsat'low nu'unnau in, naan arlakin ki khat, Onesimas tu' kapthlat chaak lam a. Mmaanve ngi hava' thah kthuwk dow mkheng avah akepdeh chraan.
51004010	Neiyi rowngmii kdokurthuhqhi Aristarkas tih Barnabas tu' unau kthuwk Mark tu' aturvuwi chaak inna. Mma' leiyi, naan nih tkerthe piikna' rek avah ado'arlaan chaak dokin, mma ngi ahinin nih mthlen cheentung ngi arlaangdei chaan.
51004011	Ungta Jastas mdoditin, Jisu rukku aturvuwi chaak inna. Hava'le' ava' daat chrel avah Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki thenni nei ksoplowqhi reklam, mmaan avah vunkreen kcha' rek thungki lam ungta mmaan nah nei kuplungchai rekkat lam.
51004012	naan arlakin ki khat, Epaphras, Khrista ki suwk'owr khat ava ngi aturvuwi chaak inna. Mma ngi mpha ktaiyi, naan nih Isowr plungbin mkheng thung ngi knet tih ari pchaanna' raan ungta akurkhum chaakna' raan ki thenni rinkthamna' thung ngi kdet'liit kmah kdung ngi nong mdolow chaak.
51004013	Mma ngi naan athenni ungta Laodisia thung le' Hieropolis khuwpii thung ngi ka'am rek mmaan ki thenni kepner dok ki nong mtlot chaak a tidit ki sakhi avah neiyi kpiik chaak a.
51004014	Vonsat'low riipu, Luke le' Demas tih aturvuwi chaak inna.
51004015	Laodisia thung ngi ka'am unau rek hinni ungta Nimphia le' mi'inn thuh ka'am lamrinlop ava' hinni mhei'arvuwi piik chaan.
51004016	'Tunnu naan nih hava' paukjit avah naan arlak inni aparcham dokin dilli, Laodisia rekki lamrinlop ava'hin rukku tpat tih ka'am immow, tidit asuwn. Ungta naan nih anto' heppi Laodisia thungki paukjit ava' rukka naan rukku aparchamin.
