51004017	Ungta Arkippas hinni, “Nang ngi avah adopurkhumna' rang ki thenni Kruwng hinni nang ngi ado'arlaan dok soptolowna' avah akilrinqhi' cha, adiin rah, mheithe piik chaan.
51004018	Hava' tkurvuwina' avah Paul nei kukhut kat tih kdokjit chaak. Nei kthiirrii rek avah abinphaakin. naan ahin nih plungnee avah ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
52001001	Paul le' Silvenas ungta Timothy neen nih Pa Isowr hinni ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni ka'am Thessalonika ki lamrinlop ahinin nih kikjit chaak inna. Neen ki Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee le' plung kdai avah naan ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
52001002	Neen nih krinktham chaak rekin thung ngi naan amiingin the innu mpha ktaiyi naan akhengin ki thenni Isowr rah kdopanpaak chaakin.
52001003	Neen nih Isowr ungta N'paan ava' ar'aang ngi naanki alamrinin ki anong rekin, vonsat ki anong rekin ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni plungbinpsuk ki adodiildeh chaak naan avah kdet'liit kmah kdobinphaak chaakin.
52001004	Vonsat'low ku'uknau rek, naanna Isowr dokchol ksa rekin ptih tidit neen nih kdehn.
52001005	Mleiya naan ahin nih, neenki kqhapaumin avah pauna rek daat tih kthleng pemeh. Pdainu ruhtan nih ungta Pthla Kchiir thung ngi ungta mkindit kukthuwk dok ki kthleng. Anto' heppi neen nih naan athenni a'arlak innu taluhep pih arvang ka'am inping tidit avah adodeh dokin.
52001006	Ungta naan nih Pthla Kchiir rih adotpiik chaakin tkanpatna' tu' kilqhi ngi kdung ngi tyattraanna' phang chdaat yown tih pauna avah ado'arlaan chaakin. Ava' avangi neen kdilin kqowi kcha' ungta Kruwng dilkqowi kcha' rek kurthuwk chaan tinu.
52001007	Ungta ava ngi naanna Mesedonia le' Akhaia thungki lamkrin kcha' mkheng rek hinni titinna' rekin ptih.
52001008	Mleiya Mesedonia le' Akhaia thung daat kma' mmun khimkhei thung ngi, Kruwng pauna avah naan athungki ngi marchaang kthuwk dok kcha' a. Mleiya Isowr ktong thah naanki alamrin chaakin avah kchet dok kcha' a, ava' vah neen nih naan ahin nih dow khatleh kdothena' raan ki msit ammeh.
52001009	Mleiya taluhep kduh ki tarlaan chaakna ngi neenna atarlaan chaakin tidit avah mmaan mthinaan nih mdopandan chaakin. Ungta mmaan nih taluhep pih naan nih kring ungta kindit Isowr ava' sopklow chrang ngi dow pthla rek hinki ngi Isowr hinni kerheel dok kcha' inptih, tidit avah mtheen.
52001010	Ungta karvang rang plungthit mei kquwng ava' thung ki mikaktlanin Jisu, kdiyou thungki Mma ngi mdoperdel Mma' Chapa, parvaan ki kurjung rang ava' ado'ardat chaakin avah kihinin nih msonin.
52002001	Mleiya ku'uknau rek, neen nih naan ahinin nih kthlenin avah msit ammana' ammeh tidit avah naan nih adehn.
52002002	Neen nih mduh ngi Philippia khuwpii thung ngi tyattraan perteel innu ungta ningkya mdotpiik chaakin avah naan nih adehn. Pdainu neenki Isowr rih mdotbom chaak inni neen nih kdung ngi mkeptengin am chyoso naan ahin nih Isowr ki kqhapaumin avah changkarngam mih kdosit chaak pchaanin.
52002003	Mleiya neenki tkorsowna' pau avah tkurhuwnna' mditmata totborna' thungki kthuwk pemeh, mditmata tekpermenna' thungkilu pemeh.
52002004	Pdainu neen nih Isowr rih kqhapaumin ksin rang ngi mdoperteel dok ksa mii rek heppi kpau kchaan ping. Neenna dultimii plung ngamna' ktlown pmaanring pdainu kuplung rekin kperteel Isowr plungngam ktlow kcha' rek inping.
52002005	Mleiya naan nih adodehn, neen nih teden rukku paukdau kdonaaknaan ka'am pemeh mditmata kpunjuwrrin kordowlna ngi maikok kdoptlotnaan ka'am pemeh, havah Isowr rih mdeh.
52002006	Neenna dultimii rek dopanpaak rah tidit tah naan dopanpaak rah mditmata morson kuwmiikhat dopanpaak rah kthlaamin pmaanring. Khrista ki tamsi rek kurthuwk ki neenna naan abowrrin riina' kurthuwk krown ping.
52002007	Pdainu mnuh ngi mnau mdokilrinqhi chaak heppi, neenna naan arlak innu plung kperneem mih ka'am kchaan ping.
52002008	Neen nih naan avah kdung ngi vonsat adoklow chaakin, Neen nih naan ahin nih Isowr ki kqhapaumin daat kma' neenki krinchan rekin kpha ruk plung kngam mih adokparlaan chaakin, mleiya naan avah neen kvonsat'low rekin ptih.
52002009	Mleiya ku’uknau rek, neen nih Isowr ki kqhapumin ahinin nih kparjaam chaakin thung ngi, naan kuwkhat leh hinni mbowrriina' kkurthuh mana' raan ki thenni neen nih suwn le' jaan nih nong kdolow chaakin. Ungta suwkkthuwk ki knonglow chaakin avah binphaak mun naandi'.
52002010	Lamkrin kcha' rek naan a'arlak inni ka'amin thuh kchiir rih, rinkindit tih ungta tupsulna' ktaak ki neen nih kdakin avah taluhep pih arvang ka'am inping tidit ki sakhi avah naan le' Isowr ka'am daat a.
52002011	Mleiya neen nih naan khimkhei avah mpa ngi mnaukat rek hinni mdotlot heppi taluhep pih akoksow chaakin, plungngam akpiikin tidit avah naan nih adehn.
52002012	Ungta Mma' mdak ki kruwngpaalna' ungta tkonlorna' thungki rang ngi ayuko'own kchaan Isowr ava' aang ngi trinchaak krow ngi ache chaak pchaanna' raan ki thenni aksiduwl chaak inna.
52002013	Hava' leiyi, neen rukku Isowr rah kdet'liit kmah kdopanpaak chaakin. Mleiya naan nih neen kihin ki ado'arjaakin Isowr pauna avah dultimii rek pauna hep kmah ngi, pdainu kindit tih Isowr pauna tidit tih ado'arlaan chaak dokin. Ava'kat ava ngi 'tun rukku lamkrin kcha' rek naan ahin nih knet tih nong mtlotmeek sli a.
52002014	Mleiya, unau rek, naan nih Jisu Khrista hinni ka'am Judia paamkuwl thungki Isowr lamrinlop rek dotlot ava' kopqowi kcha' ikurthuwk in. Mleiya lamrinlop rekki Jihudi rek hinki tyattraan mdoperteel chaakin hephep pih naan rukku akhuwpaamin thungki mii rek hinki tyattraan adoperteel chaakin.
52002015	Mmaan ava ngi, Kruwng Jisu ruk ungta mmaan ki khulpu rek rukka eyou lamda ungta neen rukka tyat chiireelna' mipiinda. Ungta mmaan nih Isowr plungngam tlow chlammeh ungta mii mkheng ruk kepteng ngi ka'am lam.
52002016	Neen nih, mmaan nih karsan kcha' mdophan chaakna' raan ki thenni Chaatktlei rek hinni kpau chaak raan avah mmaan nih mapkhaan inda. Ungta hanto ngi mpha ktaiyi mdotlotin ava ngi mupnu rekin avah mqutna'dek kpha ngi purtuwl chlamda. Pdainu Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah mmaan 'leenni mqutna'dek ki kurjung a.
52002017	Pdainu ku'uknau rek, mpha mruk ki thenni neen avah naan ahinki mpenqhen pthiinda kerdei myownmin, naanna kuplungrilin thung ngi ka'am tlit daat inptih. Neen nih kdung ngi adokdeh nuwm chaak inni, amaiyin tedehna' rah ktlot chaak meeksli inna.
52002018	Ava'leiyi, neen nih naan ahin nih tethlen rah ngei innu. Paul nei rukka vei'knii kpha thung ngi kthlenna' rah tlow chnuh pdainu Seitan nih mapkhaan tlit chda.
52002019	Mleiya neenki kuplung binpsukin laar kkanpatnaan, kikpirchiirnaan, luwkhum avah taluda? Mleiya neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista murjun thuh Mma' aang ngi kkonlor chaakna' raan avah naan pemeh mow?
52002020	Mleiya naan avah neenki kkonlornaan ungta kkanpatnaan ptih.
52003001	Ava'leiyi, neen ngi ava' avah kdiil pchaanmah reenin thungta neen ngi Athen khuwpii thung ngi ka'am chaak daat inni kqha rah tidit tih bin innu.
52003002	Ungta neenve ngi Khrista ki kqhapaumin thung ngi knong lowqhiin ungta Isowr ki sopklow kcha' mii, nu'unnau'in Timothy avah naan ahinin nih kapthlat chaak inna. Mma ngi naanki alamrinin leiyi, ayukapqhang chraan ungta akoksop chraan.
52003003	Mleiya hava' tyattraanna' ava ngi kuwkhat leh rukka knok mso, mleiya neenna hava' ki thenni midotokchol chaak dokin, tidit avah naan nih kindit tih adodeh chaak dokin.
52003004	Tidit tah neen nih naan ahin nih ka'amin thung ngi, neen nih tyattraanna' kdung avah kperteel rah nthe inna, diin nuh mduh thah kdothe dokin. Ungta avah anto'kat tih kthuwk ungta avah naan nih adodeh dokin.
52003005	Hava'lei kat tih neiyi ava' avah kdiil porson pchaanmah thungta naan alamrinin tedehna' rang ki thenni mii kdopthlat. Mditma bih, kepthleempa ava ngi apthleem indon, neenki knonglow chaakin avah msit ktaak kurthuwk chrah.
52003006	Pdainu 'tunnu Timothy a naan ahinki ngi neenve kihin nih ktlung dok kcha' a ungta mma ngi naan alamrinin le' avonsatin ki mleiyi pauren kqha avah neene kihin nih mtlunqhi a. Ungta naan nih neenve mpha ktai thuh kqhajik ki atbinphaak chaak inna ungta kdung ngi neenve avah tedeh rah atbin chaak inna tidit karjaak chaak inna ungta neenve rukku naan avah tedeh rah akbin chaak inna.
52003007	Ava'leiyi ku'uknau rekin, neenve ki kyatkraan naan le' kdokriinin mkheng avah naan alamrinin leiyi, neenve a mtoksow chaak inna.
52003008	Mleiya 'tunnu naan nih Kruwng hinni knet tih ari chaakin bih, neenna kring kcha' dakdak inpimin.
52003009	Mleiya Isowr aang ngi naan alei inni kkanpat chaakin ki tkanpatna' mkheng ki thenni naan athenni taluhep pih Isowr rah panpaak chnikaandi o?
52003010	Neenve ngi naan amaiyin deida ungta alamrin chaakin thung ngi kapta dok ava' kdopurkhum chaakna' raan ki thenni suwn le' jaan nih kdungsi ngi rinkdoktham chaakin.
52003011	'Tunnu neenki Npa ungta Isowr mdakkat tih ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ngi naan ahin nih neenve ki k'lamin avah mheiqhi chaanso.
52003012	Ungta neenve ngi naan ahin nih kdotlotin heppi, Kruwng ngi naan avah apnem thang setset inso ungta naan nih khat le' khat hinni ungta mii mkheng hinni vonsat tih kdim ayupurthuh chaanso.
52003013	Ava ngi naan avah neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ngi Mma' miikenje mkheng rektu' murjunqum thung ngi, neenki N'paan ungta Isowr ava' aang ngi tchiirna' thung ngi tupsulna' ktaak ki naan aplungchai rekin avah akapqhanpiik chraan.
52004001	Mqutna' thung ngi, ku'uknau rek, naan nih neenve kihin ki ado'arlaan chaak dokin heppi, taluhep pih chetda Isowr plung ngamna' tkurthuh rang tidit leiyi, neenki Kruwng Jisu hinni, tidit tah naan nih akurkhum setsetna' raan ki thenni akaktham chaak inna ungta akoksow chaak inna.
52004002	Mleiya Kruwng Jisu ar'aang ngi neenve ngi talu paupiik akpiikin, tidit avah naan nih adehn.
52004003	Mleiya havah Isowr plungbin ava', tidit tah naan nih akenjet chaakna' raan ki thenni jowltpurjutna' thungki ikekneeng chaan.
52004004	Tidit tah naan khimkheiyi taluhep pih apna apna rekin avah kenje ngi ungta takyat chaak ki tirkhiik rang tidit avah adodeh chaak raan.
52004005	Isowr kdei kma' Chaatktlei rek heppi daksa dongei thung ngi a'am raan pemeh.
52004006	Tidit tah kuwkhat leh ngi mu'umnau khat avah hava' leenni changqhatna' louda tuprutna' rang ki thenni mdohuwn chaak rang pemeh. Mleiya Kruwng nga ava'lu hep daat mkheng 'leenni phuw klou rang ava' ungta neenve rukku mduh thah adokpilqhit chaakin ungta kdothe pindit chaak dokin.
52004007	Mleiya Isowr rih neen avah totborna' thung ngi midoto'own in pemeh pdainu kenjetna' thung ngi midoto'own chaakin.
52004008	Ava'leiyi hava' kikthitna' kuwmiikhat ava ngi dultimii kthitna' meh pdainu neen nihin nih, Mma' ki Pthla Kchiir mikpiin Isowr ava' mdokthitna'.
52004009	Pdainu unau heppi vonsat tkorlowna' ki thenvah neiyi naan ahin nih kdokjitna' rang ki msit ammeh. Mleiya khat le' khat vonsat tkorlowna' avah naan adak katin ahinin nih Isowr rih adotpurchuh chaak dokin.
52004010	Ungta anto'kat tih naan nih Mesedonia thung ngi ka'am unau rek mkheng hinni avah adotlot chaakin. Pdainu ku'uknau rek, naan nih avah adotlot setsetna' raan ki thenni akoksow chaak inna.
52004011	Tidit tah neenve ngi naan ahinin nih paupiik adokpiik dokin heppi, kdaideek ki anongin thung ngi plung adopluw chaakna' raan, akhutkat inni nong adotlotna' raan kdung ngi plung aprip chaan.
52004012	Mleiya havah naan nih duwn thah ka'am rek aang ngi kurkhum deek ki ache chaakna' raan ungta dow khatleh adoptat mana' raan ki then.
52004013	Pdainu ku'uknau rek, naan nih muplungbinpsukin ktaak mmaan ava' heppi aplungin myatmana' rah, naan nih ki'iip dok kcha' rek mmaan ki mlei ava' kdei kmah a'am raan avah ngei maang.
52004014	Mleiya neenni Jisu a diyouda ungta kring kerheel tidit lam'nrin chaakin bih, anto' heppi, Jisu hinni ki'iip kcha' dow rek mmaan avah Isowr rih Mma' ar'aang ngi ungta Mma' tu' kqhi perheel sap lamrah.
52004015	Mleiya Kruwng pauna ngi neenve ngi havah naan ahinin nih kthe inna. Tidit tah Kruwng arjun kpha thung ngi kring daat ungta ka'am daat neen ava ngi talutalu yoso ki'iip dok kcha' rek mmaanduh tqowi votin nimeh.
52004016	Mleiya Kruwng mdakkat ava ngi krowl kparthaang ngi owngdon, vaantamsi kenreel khat ava' krowl tu' ungta Isowr puwtit tu' kilqhi ngi parvaan ki arjung kqum rah. Ungta Khrista hinni kdiyou dok kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi rukrirep pih kerdel chlam rah.
52004017	Audilrow ngi kring daat ungta ka'am daat neen avah mmaan tu' kilqhi ngi tirthli thuh Kruwng kurdutqhi rang ngi armei rek thung ngi mi'arjuk kchom chraan. Ungta anto ngi neenna mpha ktai thuh Kruwng tu' ta'am chaak raan.
52004018	Ava'leiyi, naan nih hava' pauna rek ava ngi khat le' khat avah plungngam ikirpii chaan.
52005001	Pdainu ku'uknau rek, mpha rekle' mkum'armik rekki thenvah neiyi naan ahin nih kdokjitna' rang ki msit ammeh.
52005002	Mleiya Kruwng nit avah kupru khat tih jaan nih mthlen heppi kthleng rah tidit avah naan adak inni kindit tih adodeh chaak dokin.
52005003	Mleiya mmaan nih: “Plung kdai ungta ningqitna' ammeh!” mditin cheu vonkchowi rang snu powidun heppi m'tunkat daat tih m'leenin nih tkenveina' thuwkda. Ungta mmaan nah ava' thung ki kerthlet pchaang liit lam nimeh.
52005004	Pdainu ku'uknau rek, naanna kjiingnu thuh ka'am inptipmeh, ava'leiyi hava' nit ava ngi kupru thlen heppi adotphaak raan pemeh.
52005005	Naan akhengin avah mar'aang mii rekin ptih ungta khuvaar ki mii rekin ptih. Neenna jaanki mditmata kjiingnu thungki inpmin meh.
52005006	Ava'leiyi, neen nih morson rek dotlot heppi iipmaan cheh pdainu ihardei incheh ungta kilrindei ikurthuwk incheh.
52005007	Mleiya ki'iip rek, mmaan avah jaan nih ki'iiplam ungta kipri rek mmaan ava ngi jaan nih kipri lam.
52005008	Pdainu khuvaar ki neen ava ngi lamrin le' vonsat ki plungkeh ipkeenche rah ungta tkirliinna' ki plungbinpsuk avah luwkhum heppi ikhum incheh rah ikilrin chaan cheh.
52005009	Mleiya Isowr rih neen avah plungthit mei kquwng ki thenni midotokcholin pemeh pdainu neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi tkirliinna' kthlowi chrah midoto'own chaakin.
52005010	Mma ngi neen nthen inni midipiik inda, tidit tah neen nih hardaat yowmin mditmata iipdok chyownmin neen nih Mma' tu' mpha ktai ta'am chaak raan.
52005011	Ava'leiyi, naan rukku adotlot meekin heppi khat le' khat ikorsop dei chaan ungta ikparqhang dei chaan.
52005012	Ku'uknau rek, naan nih a'arlak inni nong ktlow kcha' rek ungta Kruwng hinni atun inni amda akpindit kcha' rekin mmaan avah adodeh pinditna' raan ki thenni akoksow chaak inna.
52005013	Ungta naan nih mmaan avah mnong rekin leiyi, vonsat tih kdung ngi kparthaang ngi abin chaan. Naan nih khat le' khat arlak ki plung kdaiyi i'amin.
52005014	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, neenve ngi akoksow chaak inna tidit tah naan nih tethelal rek avah apilqhitin ungta plung kdil rek avah plungngam apiin, mruh kdowng rek abomin ungta mii mkheng tu' ikirdiildei chaan.
52005015	Ungta naan kuwkhat leh ngi kthi ktlow ki thenni kthi tpenletmana' rah asuw deiyin pdainu naan adakin ki then ruk ungta mii mkheng ki then rukku mpha ktai kqha avah areidei chaan.
52005016	Mpha ktai ikanpadei chaan.
52005017	Kdet'liit kmah rin'ikthamdei chaan.
52005018	Dow mkheng 'leenni apanpaak chaan, mleiya naan athenni Khrista Jisu hinni havah Isowr ki plungbin.
52005019	Naan nih Pthla avah archuw pthimaan.
52005020	Naan nih pau tpurphuwn avah tukksut kma' tlowmaan.
52005021	Dow mkheng avah aperteelin ungta kindit avah knet tih akyowng chaan.
52005022	Kthi khimkhei rek thungki ikekneeng chaan.
52005023	'Tunnu plung kdai ki Isowr mdakkat tih naan avah ayupchiirdang chaanso. Ungta naanki apthlaan mkheng, apthlarinin mkheng ungta adaksaan avah neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista murjun thung ngi tupsulna' ktaak ki adotirkhiik piikin ikurthuwkso.
52005024	Mleiya naan ako'own kchaan Mma' avah trinchaak krow ungta Mma ngi ava' rukka ktlow rah.
52005025	Ku'uknau rek, neen kthen inni rinmheiktham piik chaan.
52005026	Unau rek mkheng avah kchiir kurputna ngi ikurvuwi chaan.
52005027	Neiyi hava' laika avah kchiir unau mkheng rek hinni adoparchamna' raan ki thenni Kruwng miing ngi aksi chaak inna.
52005028	Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
53001001	Paul neiyi Silvenas le' Timothy le' tu', neenki Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinni Thessalonika thungki lamrinlop hinni kikjit chaak a.
53001002	Naan ahin nih neenki Npa Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee leh plung kdai avah ka'am ikurthuwkso.
53001003	Neenna mpha ktaiyi naan athenni Isowr avah kdopanpaak chaak raan thah tlada ungta avah mkindit kat. Mleiyi naan alamrinin avah kdung ngi kerkheel setsetda ungta naan khimkheiyi khat le' khat ki thenni vonsat akorlow chaakin avah nemthang setsetda.
53001004	Tidit tah naan nih adodiil chaak pchaanin ungta tyat chiireelna' adoperteel chaakin mkheng thungki alamrinin ungta suwkthuh chiireelna' adoperteel chaakin ava ngi neen nih Isowr ki lamrinlop rek hinni kdak inni naan athung ngi kponlor kchaan ping.
53001005	Hava' mkheng ava ngi Isowr paupinditna' avah kindit tidit mpandan a, mleiya Isowr kruwngpaalna' ki thenni naanna mtik kcha tidit tih aktai chdaatin krow. Tidit tah naan rukku ava' ki thenni tyattraanna' adoperteel chaakin.
53001006	Isowr rah mrinkindit, tidit tah naan akapya rekin 'leenni Isowr rih suwkthuh chiireelna' kpenlet piik chdaat lamrah.
53001007	Ungta Kruwng Jisu ngi Mma' vaantamsi laarruhtan kthlowi rektu' parvaan ki ngi mkurphuwnin thung ngi plungyatna' kperteel kcha' rek naan avah neen tu' karngasap chnaandi'.
53001008	Ungta Isowr kdei kma' ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki kqhapaumin kopqowi kma' rek mmaan ava' 'leenni kquwng meek meiyi phuw klou rah.
53001009	Mmaan avah Kruwng aangki ungta Mma' ruhtan ki tkonlorna' thungki ngi ktlangknai kma' tkenveina' thuh phuw klou rah.
53001010	Mleiya Mma' miikenje rek thung ngi konlor chrang ngi ungta lamkrin kcha' mkheng rek thung ngi mikchukna' rang ngi, Mma ngi murjunna' nit ava' thung ngi naan rukka yau chnaandi'. Tidit tah, neen nih kdopiikin rinpaumin avah naan nih lam'adorin chaakin.
53001011	Neen nih hava' kdobin chaak inni, tidit tah neenki Isowr rih naan avah hava' to'ownna' ava' thuh ttai ki mtik kcha adotpurthuhna' raan, ungta Mma' hinki taqhatna' ava ngi naanki kqha plungbin mkheng, ungta ruhtan tu' alamrinin ki nong avah adotuptlun piikna' raan ki thenni, neen rukku mpha ktaiyi naan athen inni rinkdoktham chaakin.
53001012	Mleiya havah neenki Isowr ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee ava' dilkqowiyi, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing avah naan athung inni ungta naan avah Mma' thung ngi konlor kcha' mkurthuhna' rang ki then.
53002001	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah kurjung rah ungta neen nih Mma' hinni tkurkusap chaak raan. Mlei hava' leiyi neen nih naan ahin nih hanto ngi akaktham chaak inna.
53002002	Tidit tah naan aplungrilin avah kbeisek ki maknat rang pemeh mditmata Khrista ki nit avah ktlung dok a, dida, neen kihinin ki heppi, pthla ngi mditmata pauna ngi mditmata paukjit tih mthena, ava' thung ngi plungyat adothlowi raan pemeh.
53002003	Naan avah kuwkhat tih talutalu 'leen yoso ahuwng chmaanso. Mleiya lamrin tepthleina' choduh kthuwk rah ungta kenvei chrang chapa, tidit tah pnu kervei mii ava' mpurphuwn duh khimkheiyi, nit avah thuwk khot nimeh.
53002004	Mma' ava ngi dow mkheng ki mkarthak tidit tah Isowr mditmata luwtbuk chaak ava' kikthitna' rah ungta mthina ngi ktaparthaang chrah ungta ava ngi, mma ngi Isowr luwbuk'inn thuh kok'ong rah ungta mdak ki, Isowr ping kirdi chrah.
53002005	Neiyi naan tu' ka'amsap thung ngi hava' dow rek avah ahinin nih kdothe dok, avah binphaak maan timow?
53002006	Ungta 'tunnu, mma ngi mma' ki mphakat thung ngi mkurphuwnna' rang ki thenni talu ngi mma' avah mokyown a tidit avah naan vah adehn a.
53002007	Mleiya nowlam tukksut kma' ki paukordowl ki mnong avah kandang dok kcha' a. Pdainu ava' kokyowng ava ngi mma' avah 'lam thungki mlowpthi duh kpha ngi kokyowng tlit daat rah.
53002008	Ungta ava'dil lih Kruwng ngi mtadaal lih mdopquwn pthi rang ungta Mma' arjun thungki kepleu ava ngi mdopenvei pthi rang, nowlam ktaak khat avah kpandang rah.
53002009	Mma' mdakkat thuh rang avah Seitan nongtlot rek, tidit tah ruhtanna' ungta titinna' mkheng rektu' ungta mlangkma' pleiknei rektu' kilqhi ngi kthuwk rah.
53002010	Ungta rinkinditmana' thuh kenvei chrang rek mmaan ava' tuhuwn chaakna' rek mkheng tu' kilqhi ngi kthuwk rah. Mleiya mmaan nih mkarsan chaakna' raan kindit ki vonsat avah mdo'arlaan chaakin pemeh.
53002011	Ungta hava' leiyi Isowr rih mmaan nih kuhuwng kcha' khat ava' lammdorin chaakna' raan mlangkma' lamrin klin avah mmaan hinni mdopiik lam.
53002012	Mleiya ava ngi kindit ava' lamkrin kma' ungta rinkinditmana' kngei kcha' mmaan mkheng rek ava' tupsulna' thuh ktla chlam rah.
53002013	Pdainu Kruwng vonsat'low ku'uknau rek, naan athen inni neenna mpha ktaiyi Isowr avah kdopanpaak chaak raan thah tlada. Mleiya Pthla ava ngi adotpenje chaak inni ungta kindit ava' lam'adorin chaak inni mbulbul lih Isowr rih naan avah tkirliinna' thuh adotokchol chaak dokin.
53002014	Mleiya naan nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki konlorna' ava' adophan chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi naan avah neenki kqhapaumin thung ngi adoto'own chaak dokin.
53002015	Avaleiyi ku'uknau rek, naan nih pauna ngi mditmata paukjit daat yoso ngi naan ahin nih tukpurchuh dokin nowpa rek ava' thung ngi knet tih irip chaan.
53002016	'Tunnu plungnee ngi vonsat miklow kchaan ungta ktlangknai kmah ngi ardarow le' plungbinpsuk kqha mikpii kchaan, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista mdakkat le' neenki Npa ungta Isowr ava ngi,
53002017	aplungchaiyin thung ngi avah plungngam ayupii chaanso. Ungta pauna le' kqhanong khimkhei rek ava ngi naan avah ayupqhang chaanso.
53003001	Mqutna' rel lih, ku'uknau rek, naan nih naan a'leenin ki heppi, Kruwng pauna avah kapkhaan ktaak liit tih mkoryou thang setsetna' rah ungta mkonlor chaakna' rah neen kthen nih rin'mheiktham piik chaan.
53003002	Ungta neen avah mrilkqha kma' ungta kqha kma' mii rek hinki mdotaktlan chaakna' raan rin'mheiktham piik chaan. Tidit tah mii mkheng ngi lamrin avah mdothlowi chaak sap pemeh.
53003003	Pdainu Kruwng avah trinchaak krow, Mma ngi naan avah akapqhang chraan ungta kqha kma' thungki akirkhi chraan.
53003004	Ungta neen nih, naan ahin nih paupiik adokpiikin dow rek avah naan nih totlot ruk tlown tinu ungta 'tun ruk tlow tlit naandi' tidit tih naan aleiyi Kruwng hinni plungkrip kthlowi chaak inna.
53003005	Ungta 'tunnu Kruwng ngi, Isowr vonsat tolowna' thuh ungta Khrista ki tidiildehna' thung ngi aplungchai rekin avah ayu'arkhiik piik chaanso.
53003006	'Tunnu ku'uknau rek, neen nih Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing ngi paupiik akpiik chaak inna. Mleiya naan nih, karnaak deek ki kchet kma' ungta mma ngi neen kihin ki mdo'arlaan chaak nowpa thung ngi kchet kma' unau khimkhei rek hinki adak inni ikekneeng chaan.
53003007	Mleiya naan adak kat inni taluhep kduh ava' kdopqowi raan tidit avah adodehn. Mleiya neen nih naan arlak ki karnaak kmah ngi ka'amin pmaanring.
53003008	Mditmata neen nih kuwkhat leh hinki kartlaiyi thenpen chamaan ring. Ava' kchang ngi neen nih, naan kuwkhat leh ki bowrriina' kkurthuh mana' raan ki thenni suwn le' jaan nih nonglou innu ungta kya dok ki nonglou innu arvang ka'am inping.
53003009	Mleiya avah neen nih miidobomna' rang ki ruhtan kthlowima naan nih ava' pemeh pdainu neen nih, naan athenni bitinna' khat tkurthuh rah kdongei chaakin lei.
53003010	Mleiya neen nih naan ahinin nih ka'amin thung rukku, neen nih hava' paupiik avah adopiikin. Tidit tah kuwmiikhat tih nong klou nuwm kma' ma'am bih tchaak rukku cha mso.
53003011	Mleiya neen nih naan a'arlak inni howngkva rek ka'am lam a ungta mmaan nah nonglou lammeh pdainu miinong mnong kupthut, karnaak ki kchet kma' mii ka'am lam a tidit karjaak inna.
53003012	'Tunnu ava' hep mii rek hinni, neen nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista miing 'leenni paupiik kpiik chaak inna ungta toksow ruk koksow chaak inna. Tidit tah mmaan nih kdairim mih nong alou chlamso ungta mdochaak raan mthendamin avah alow chlamso.
53003013	Pdainu ku'uknau rek, naan nih kqha totlot chaak 'leenni ning kepneel thlowi maan.
53003014	Ungta naan nih hava' paukjit thung ngi kdokjitin kpauna rekin ava' kopqowi kma' kuwmiikhat ma'am cheentung ngi mma' avah bih atinin. Ungta mningkyana' rah, naan nih mma' avah korthlow qhimaan.
53003015	Anto'daat yoso, naan nih mma' avah miihal khat heppi tlowmaan pdainu unau khat heppi archakin.
53003016	'Tunnu plung kdai ki Kruwng mdakkat ava ngi naan ahin nih, mpha ktai thuh ungta milamktai thuh plung kdai avah ayupii chaanso. Kruwng avah naan akhengin ahin inni ka'am ikurthuwkso.
53003017	Paul neiyi hava' pau'arvuwi avah neiki kpaukjit khimkhei thung ngi mkinditna' khat tih hanto ngi kikjit chaak a.
53003018	Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan akhengin a'leenin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
54001001	Neenki nuplung binpsukin Kruwng Jisu Khrista le' Miksan Isowr ki paureen ava' ar'aang ngi Jisu Khrista ki tamsi Paul neiyi, ahin nih kikjit chaak a.
54001002	Timothy nang nga Lamrin thung ngi kchapa kat ptih.Neenki Npa Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki Plungnee, plungqhat ungta plung kdai avah nang ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
54001003	Neiyi ahin nih adokaktham chaak heppi tidit tah neiyi Mesedonia thah kche thung vah nang nga Ephisia thuh a'amdaat rah. Tidit tah mii rek hinni mlangkma' tpurchuhna' ava' mdopurchuh lammana' raan mmaan aangqhe rek avah adosutpqowi lamrah.
54001004	Ungta lamrin thuh rin'owina' ktong thah tapqhanna' kurthuwk kma' paumin rekle' mqutmqiin ktaak rilam rek ava' rukka mdo'arjaak raan pemeh.
54001005	'Tunnu hava' paupiik ava' ki plungbinrit avah plung kchiir thungki vonsat, plungrildeh kqha ungta plung kluwt lamrin ava'.
54001006	Mii aangqhe rekka ava' thung ki lamleh thah chet chlamda msit ktaak ki pauriim mnaak chaak inna.
54001007	Mmaan ava ngi talu kthe inna ungta talulu kpindit inna tidit kdeipindih kmah ngi nowlam ki chukpu rek tkurthuh rah ngei lamda.
54001008	Pdainu nowlam avah ksinton khat tih nowlam heppi msinton cheu avah kqha tidit tedehn.
54001009	Ungta hava' rukka ndehn, tidit tah nowlam avah mrinkindit mii ki thenni mdopa'am pemeh. Pdainu nowlam ktaak ki kchet rek ungta nowlam ko'owi kma' rek, rinko'owi kma' rek ungta pnu kervei rek, miikenje kma' rekle' kenje tukksut kma' rek, mnuh ke'eyou le' mpa ke'eyou, mii ke'eyou rek thenni mdopa'am.
54001010	Ungta jowlkpurju rek, kterdeu rek, mii kokyowng rek, pleiknei rek, pleiknei sakhi kpii rekki thenni ungta tpurchuhna' kqha ava' kepteng dow morson morson rekki thenni mdopa'am.
54001011	Mleiya havah neiyi kdokilrinqhi chaak rang thung ngi mdotpiik dok, konlor dok Isowr ki kqhapaumin ava' dilkqowi.
54001012	Ungta neiyi ruhtan mikpii kcha' neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu avah kpanpaak chaak a. Mleiya Mma ngi neiya trinchaak krow khat tih mtai chda ungta Mma' sopklow chrang ngi neiya mokchol chda.
54001013	Tidit tah choduh vah neiya pthitda kpau ungta tyatchiikepreel ungta ningkyakpii khat kurthuwk chyo ringngi neiyi lamrinna' ava' thung ngi kdodeh pindit chaakma ngi kdotlot dok mkurthuh leiyi, plungqhat avah mtedet chda.
54001014	Ungta Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am lamrin le' vonsat ava ngi neenki Kruwng plungnee avah kerkheelsi ngi nei kthen nih mtepleet piik chda.
54001015	Havah, dow mkheng thuh trinchaak krow ungta trot chaak ki mtik kcha. Tidit tah Khrista Jisu avah pnu kervei rek ksan chrang ngi dultipaam thuh arjungda ungta neiya mmaan arlak ki pnu kerveisi ping.
54001016	Anto' chdaat yoso, ktlangknai kma' rinkum ki thenni Mma' hinni lamkrin chbei rang rekki thenni ksowt tih tidiildehna' mkheng ava' mdotetdetna' rah plungqhat avah nei kihin nih mtedet chda.
54001017	'Tunnu ktlangknai kma' Paamkruwng, kdiyou kma' rang, mik ki tedehma Isowr ava' daat chrel avah kinrit, Mma hinni takyat chaakna' le' tkonlorna' avah ktluwk ktluwk ki ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
54001018	Kchapa Timothy, nang ngi kqha dok ki raal adodukna' rah, nang aleiyi mduduh ngi tpurphuwn dok ava' dilkqowiyi jik ki adotlotna' rah neiyi ahin nih paupiik akpiik chaak a.
54001019	Tidit tah nang ngi lamrin le' plungrildeh kqha avah adothlowi chaak rah. Mleiya mii aangqhe rekki avah kthitna' dok lamda, ungta lamrin leiyi, mmaan avah arkuwng kuiyi kkui kcha' lam.
54001020	Mmaan arlak ki Haimenas le' Alekjender ruk ava' thuh kyaulam. Mmaanve ngi pthitda mpaumana' raanni neiyi mmaan avah Seitan hinni kdoparlaan pthidok lam.
54002001	Avaleiyi, neiyi rukrirep pih akoksow chaak inna, tidit tah kirpii kcha' rinkthamna' rek, rinkthamna' rek, tupnuwm chaak rinkthamna' rek ungta tpanpaakna' rek avah mii mkheng ki thenni atlown.
54002002	Mleiya neen nih rin'owina' le' tkenje chaakna' mkheng thung ngi kdaideek ki ungta plung kdaiyi trin chaakna' raan ki thenni, paamkruwng rekle' ruhtanna' ksin rek mkheng ki thenni havah atlown.
54002003	Mleiya havah neen Miksan Isowr miksut thung ngi kqha ungta mdorot piik krow.
54002004	Mma ngi mii mkheng avah mkarsan rah mdongei ungta kindit ava' tedeh pinditna' thung ngi merhei raan mdongei.
54002005	Mleiya Isowr le' dultimii arlak ki Isowr khat ungta Mikpalqhat khat ka'am, Mii avah Khrista Jisu ava.
54002006	Mma ngi mii mkheng ki kartlanman mthina ngi Mdak kparlaan chda, hava' rinpaumin avah mphakatkat thung ngi tson rah.
54002007	Hava' leiyi Isowr rih neiya paukparjaam kcha' khat tih ungta tamsi khat tih mdotokchol chaak. Neiyi pleinei chmaang, Khrista hinni kindit ava' kdothe chaak. Neiya lamrin le' kindit thung ngi Chaatktlei rekki chukpu khat ping.
54002008	Avaleiyi, neiyi pselpa rekki plungthit le' plung kpelqen ktaak ki mkhutin kchiir khiing lamdon nih mmun khimkhei thuh rinmaktham chaak raan kdongei.
54002009	Anto'hep nowl lih snu rekki plungdak horda plungbin kqha tu' korthlop pih mdomnaan avah karmang deek ki mdonaak chaak raan. Mmaan nih tportlotna ngi msamin herda mditmata jiiring ngi mditmata pearl lung ngi mditmata mkhon knem buwdiir rih mkorthlon raan pemeh.
54002010	Pdainu snu korlot tih mnongqhat tih rinko'owi kcha' khat mkurthuh chaak raan.
54002011	Snu khatvah makparlaan chaakna' mkheng tu' korthlop pih kdaideek ki mkurchuh chaak rah.
54002012	Ungta neiyi snu khat tih mdopurchuh rah mditmata pselpa khat 'tun nih ruhtanna' ksin nih ma'am rang avah rotpiik maang pdainu kdaideek ki ma'am rah.
54002013	Mleiya Adam rukri purthuh thida Eve avah mdopurthuhrot.
54002014	Ungta Adam avah huwng chmeh pdainu snu avah mdohuwn chaak leiyi, nowlam tupkuina' thuh tla chda.
54002015	Anto' chdaat yoso, mmaan nih lamrin le' vonsat thuh ungta daksa tkorjown chaakna' tu' korthlop pih tkenjetna' thuh ma'am chaakin bih, mma' avah nau mupluk thung ngu ksan chrah.
54003001	Havah trinchaak krow: Tidit tah kuwmiikhat tih lamrinlop ki kver tkurthuh chaak rah mngei chaak bih, mma ngi nong kqha khat mngei chaak a.
54003002	Lamrinlop ki kver khat avah dow khatleh 'leenni tupsulna' ktaak, nuwn khadaat ki innpu, mdaksa kilrindei kcha', muplung kenreel, mrinchan kqha, mal kuptlungdei, kpurchuk pchaang khat mkurthuh rah.
54003003	Thowldii thuh kirpii kma', raanqhul ksinton kma', sum 'leenni kpunjuwr kma', pdainu plung kperneem, tkalrai kngei kma' ungta mepner kthi kma' mkurthuh rah.
54003004	Mma' avah mi'inn kqhajik ki ksutpqowi pchaang khat mkurthuh rah, mnau le' avah takparlaan chaakna' mkheng thung ngi kirpii kcha' mdopurthuh rah.
54003005	Mleiya miikhat tih mdaksa inn avah taluhep pih tsutpqowi rang tidit mdehmau, taluhep pih mma ngi Isowr ki lamrinlop avah kilrinqhi pchaang rang ngoh?
54003006	Mma' avah kurchukrow mkurthuh rang pemeh, mditma bih mma ngi pirlin chdon nih, tarnampii tupsulna' ava'kat thung ngi ktla chrah.
54003007	Ava' han'tun nih mma ngi duwn ki ka'am kcha' rek arlak ki mrinchan kqha khat mkurthuh rah, mditma bih mma ngi trai chaakna' thuh ktla chrah ungta tarnampii ktaang thuh kekmen chrah.
54003008	Anto' heppi, nongsuwk rek avah takyat kurhuwi, pau kpenqheek kma', thowldii kdung ngi knee kma', sum 'leenni kakraam kma', mkurthuh raan.
54003009	Plungril kchiir rih lamrin ki paukordowl ava' kokyowng dei kcha' mkurthuh raan.
54003010	Pdainu hava'le' rukka rukrirep pih tperteel dok rah, audilli mmaan nih nongsuwk rek khat tih sopmdolow chaak raan, mleiya mmaan avah tupsulna' ktaak mkurthuh raan.
54003011	Anto' heppi, mnuwn rekin avah takyat kurhuwi mkurthuh raan, titii knei kma', mdaksa kilrindei kcha', dow mkheng thuh trinchaak krow mkurthuh raan.
54003012	Nongsuwk rek avah nuwn khadaat ki innpu mkurthuh raan, mnaule' le' mi'inn kqha ngi ksutpqowi dei mkurthuh raan.
54003013	Mleiya nongsuwk khat kurthuwkda kqha ngi sopklow kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi Khrista Jisu hinni, mdaksaan ki thenni mrina' raan mmun kqha khat ungta kdung ngi ruhtanna' avah lamrinin thung ngi marlaan chaak inna.
54003014	Neiyi kbeisek ki ahin nih tethlen rah bin chdaat yow rih hava'le' avah ahin nih kikjit chaak a.
54003015	Pdainu laanglam mih koktot daat bih kdi ngi, kikjit chaak a. Tidit tah nang ngi kindit ki kchow ungta innmun, kring Isowr ki lamrinlop, Isowr inn ava' thung ngi taluhep pih taknat rang tidit adodehna' rah, havah kikjit chaak a.
54003016	Ungta tepthleina' ktaak liit tih, rinko'owi kcha' ki paukordowl avah mkenreel Mleiya Isowr avah daksa ngi kandangda. Pthla ngi pinditda, vaantamsi rekki dei lamda. Chaatktlei rek arlak ki karjaamda. Dultipaam thung ngi lamtrin chaak tlit tih amda ungta konlor rih arju'arlaang chda.
54004001	'Tunnu Pthla ava ngi kindit chel lih hanto'theda. Tidit tah mphaqutna' rang thung ngu mii aangqhe rekki lamrin ava'thung ki sun chlamdon nih miikuhuwng kcha' pthla rekle' tarnam rek dopurchuhna' rek thung ngi plung kupluwt chlam rah.
54004002	Tidit tah mmaan nih kqha tpurhuwina' thuh pleiknei lamrah ungta muplungrildehn avah thiir tpa'ai ava ngi kikriit chlam rah.
54004003	Mmaan nih inntepne lam nimeh ungta kindit kdei rek ungta lamkrin kcha' rekki panpaak chdon nih mdo'arlaan chaak rang, Isowr rih mdopurthuh dok thendam rek ava' thung ki mkankai chaakna' raan mii rek hinni paupiik kpii lamrah.
54004004	Mleiya Isowr hinki downkhaal khimkhei avah kqha ungta tpanpaak chaak tu' kilqhi ngi narlaan chaak bih, teppthlei rah dow khatleh ka'am pemeh.
54004005	Mleiya havah Isowr pauna ava ngi ungta tupnuwm chaak rinkthamna' ava ngi avah mdopchiir dok.
54004006	Nang ngi unau rek avah hava' dow rek 'leenni athepiik chaak lam bih, nang nga Jisu Khrista sopklow kcha' kqha khat kurthuwk kcha' imptih. Mleiya nang nga lamrin ki pauna rek ungta tkurchuhna' kqha ava' thung ngi kpurchuk kcha' ptih ungta nang ngi avah knet tih adopqowi chaak.
54004007	Pdainu nang ngi rinko'owi kma' paumin rek ungta kderpii rek paumin rek avah akthitna'. Ungta ava' kchang ngi rinto'owina' thung ngi athina ikurchuk cha'.
54004008	Mleiya daksa 'lam thah tkurchuhna' totlot ava ngi msit amna' mruk daat ka'am, pdainu rinko'owi kcha' ava ngi dow mkheng thung ngi msit ka'am. Ava' thung ngi 'tunki rinkum ungta karvang bei rang rinkum ki paureel avah ka'am kcha' a.
54004009	Hava' mkheng avah trinchaak krow ungta trot chaak ki mtik kcha'.
54004010	Mleiya hava'lei kat tih neen nih nong lou innu ungta ningkya ruk kdoperteel chaakin. mleiya dultimii mkheng ungta mhan'tun set tih lamkrin kcha' rek Ksan kcha' kring Isowr avah neen nih lam kdorin chaakin.
54004011	Nang ngi hava' dow rek avah paupiik ki apii lam ungta apurchuk lam.
54004012	Kuwkhat leh ngi akseetthuh avah ayowm chaakna' mso. Pdainu apauna 'leen, arinchan 'leen, avonsat 'leen, aplung thuh 'leen, alamrin 'leen, ungta achiirna' 'leenni, lamkrin kcha' rekki thenni bitinna' khat ikurthuwk.
54004013	Nei kthlen duh kpha ngi, tparchamna' 'leen, tkorsowna' 'leen ungta tpurchuhna' 'leenni plung apluwt cha'.
54004014	Kverlop khat tih khut tkhiin tu' korthlop pih pau tpurphuwn nih, ahin nih adotpiik dok chla avah nang ngi tukksut kma' tlowma'.
54004015	Hava' dow rek ava' thung ngi kmin nih abincha', tidit tah nang anongma korsom avah mmaan mkhengin hinni mkandanna' rah, adaksa avah mmaan thung ngi ikparlaan cha'.
54004016	Nang ngi adaksa 'leen ungta tpurchuhna' ava' 'leenni ikilrindei cha'. Mmaan thung ngi i'am tlit, nang ngi hava' atlot chaak bih, nang ngi adaksa ruk ungta nang akarja kcha' rek mmaan ava'ruk san chnadi'.
54005001	Nang ngi kver khat avah raima', pdainu plung kchiir rih apa heppi, kmowhei ava ngi a'upa rek heppi, aksop chlam.
54005002	Snu kder rek avah anuh le' heppi, kmowhei rek ava ngi achar rek heppi, tchiirna' mkheng tu' aksop chlam.
54005003	Meikhu dakdak rek avah akyat chlam.
54005004	Pdainu meikhunu kuwmiikhat tih mnaule' mditmata murdule' kthlowi ma'am cheentung ngi, mmaan nih choduhrep pih mi'innin thuh kdung ngi rinko'owi kcha' ikurthuwk chlamso. Ungta mnuhmpa hinni leikchowi ikurthuwk chlamso. Tidit tah havah kqha ungta Isowr aang ngi trotpiik krow nong.
54005005	'Tunnu meikhu dakdak, mthina daat tih ka'am kcha' ava' vah Isowr hinni lamrin chda, kirpii kcha' rinkthamna' 'leenni am tlit chda ungta suwn le' jaan nih rinkaktham kcha'lu.
54005006	Pdainu daksa 'lam thah nungaiyi ka'am kcha' mma' avah mrindaat arlaan nih kdiyou dok kcha'.
54005007	Ungta mmaan nih tupsulna' ktaak mkurthuhna' raan, hava'le' avah mii rek hinni apurchuk lam.
54005008	Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih mdaksa inn thung ngi, ungta mhan'tun set tih mma' innkat thungki mii rek hinni mpordon pchaanmah bih, mma' ava ngi lamrin avah mmat chaak a. Ungta lamkrin kma' khat han'tun rukku mmah mmeel kthi a.
54005009	Nang ngi kum somtruk kurduh ki meikhunu ungta innpu khadaat kervei mkurthuhma bih, mma' avah meikhunu ngi taima'.
54005010	Mma' avah, mma ngi nausuwn marvan'opdeh mow, mal muptlun dehmow, miikenje rek khuh mulqhut dehmow, mma ngi kdungksaan mchom chaak dehmow, ungta kqhanong khimkhei rek avah mtlot chaak mow, tidit leiyi, mii rekki mnongqhat rek mdodeh mkurthuh rah.
54005011	Pdainu kmow daat meikhunu rek avah amatlam. Mleiya mmaan ki sadak dongei ava ngi Khrista mepten dok cheu, mmaan nih inntne rah mdongei chaakin.
54005012	Anto ngi mmaan nih rukri ki mlamrinin avah mdomaak pthiin leiyi, mtun inni tupsulna' avah mdak inni mdothuhqhi chaakin.
54005013	Ungta ava' han'tun nih mmaan nih howngkva kurchuk lamda, inn khat ki ngi khat thah tlowng lamda. Ungta mhowngvatin daat kma' titii nei lamda, miinong rah mnongin pthut lamda, mmaan dothema rah dow rek ava' kthelam.
54005014	Avaleiyi, neiyi meikhunu kmow rek avah inneida, nausuwn thlowida, mi'innin mdosut pqowi chaak raan. Ungta kepteng khat ava' hinni ningkyana' pau mdothena' rah changqhatna' mdopiikma raan ava' kdongei.
54005015	Mleiya aangqhe rekki kenle lamda Seitan dil mdoqowi chaak dokin.
54005016	Ungta lamkrin kcha' snu mditmata psel kuwmiikhat tih meikhunu mthlowi chaak cheentung ngi, tidit tah lamrinlop ava ngi meikhunu dakdak rek ava' mdobom chaakna' rah mma ngi meikhunu avah abom chso.
54005017	Kqhajik ki lop kqhi kcha' ungta ava' han'tun nih pauna ava' 'leenni ungta tpurchuhna' 'leenni nong klou kcha' kver rek avah tum' knii knem mih takyat chaak mtik kcha.
54005018	Mleiya Kchiir laika ngi hanto'theda: “Naan nih chapaar adoptherin silpa avah mnehr thah arkamke pkehmaan.” (Knl. 25:4) Ungta “Louknum rek avah mardamanin karlaang kcha' ki mtik kcha,” mdodit. (Lk. 10:7)
54005019	Nang ngi kver khat 'leenki mraal avah miilai 'knii mditmata kdum mih sakhi mdopiikma don nih arlaangma'.
54005020	Pnu kervei sli rek avah mqhe morson rekki mdoqit chaakna' raanni, mii mkheng aang ngi arailam.
54005021	Neiyi Isowr aang ngi ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista ungta taktlanksa vaantamsi rek aang ngi, nang ngi tapqhat bet le' tipthitbetna' ktaak ki ungta dow khatleh ruk tbom le' teknenna' ktaak ki adotlot chaakna' rah hava' dow rek avah adancha'.
54005022	Kuwkhat leh 'leenni koknot teng ngi khut khiingma' ungta mii morson pnu arve thung rukku arveqhi sapma'. Adaksa ngi kchiir rih i'am cha'.
54005023	'Tunnu diisik chrel daat a neeporsonma' pdainu akowi tlitna' a'omlai le' apowibuwr leiyi, thowldii mnausisi aneekchok.
54005024	Mii aangqhe rek pnu arve avah kandangchel lih, pau tpinditna' thah, mduh thahan nih chetda pdainu mii aangqhe rekka mupnu arveen ava ngi mdilin qowida.
54005025	Anto'hep daat tih mii aangqhe rekki, mnongqhatin avah kindit chelda ungta ava' kma' rek avah kordowl pchaang nimeh.
54006001	Tidit tah Isowr miing ungta Mma' hinki tkurchuhna' ava' 'leenni pthitda tpaumana' rah reengkol khatsap kurduh ngi ka'am suwk rek mkheng ngi mma' mma' ki mukpu rek avah takyat chaak ki mtik kcha, tidit tih mdotai chaak raan.
54006002	Ungta lamkrin kcha' mukpu rek kthlowi kcha' mmaan ava ngi, mmaan avah unau khat mkurthuhn leiyi, tukksut kma' tlow lam mso. Pdainu mmaan nih, mnongtlotin karlaang kcha' avah trinchaak krow rek ungta mvonsat'lown mkurthuh leiyi, kerkheelset tih sopmdolow chaak raan. Hava' dow rek 'leenni apurchuk lam ungta toksow ruk aksoplam.
54006003	Kuwmiikhat tih tkurchuhna' ktlei khat mpurchu bih, ungta paukindit tidit tah neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki pauna rek kpha rukka ungta rinko'owi kcha' ki tkurchuhna' ava' tukksut kma' ka'am krow.
54006004	Mma' avah kpirlin kcha', dow khatleh kdei kma' pdainu mma' pauna rek 'leenni tkalraina' le' tkerteenna' ngi kdim kcha' mii. Mma' thungki ngi changtlaakna', tker'ena', pauhor tbukna', kqha kma' tbinpsukna' avah karvang.
54006005	Ungta muplung kqop kcha' ki mqutmqiin ktaak ki tkerteenna', kindit varpthida rinko'owi kcha' avah mthennemna' khat tih kbin reklam. Hava' hep daat rek thungki nang ngi ikankai cha'.
54006006	Pdainu plung kngam mih rinko'owi kcha' avah kdung ngi mthennemna'.
54006007	Mleiya neen nih hava' dultipaam thung ngi dow khatleh ruk horda tethlenin pemeh ungta neen nih hava' thung ki dow khatleh ruk tohor pchaanin nimeh tidit avah mkindit kat.
54006008	Ungta thendam le' buwdiir nthlowi chaakin bih, hava'le' ava ngi plung tapngam chaak raan.
54006009	Pdainu svang tkurthuh rah kngei kcha' rekka, tkenvei chaakna' le' tker'ekrena' thah kqhi, kepthleem ungta ktaang ungta tokmowna' tyatya thung ngi ungta tkenveina' sadak dongei rek thung ngi ktla chlam.
54006010	Mleiya sum vonsat klow kcha' ava ngi kthi mkheng ki murjung. Tidit tah aangqhe rekki makraam inni lamrin thungki 'lamleh thah mche chaakin ava ngi tyatna' tyatya thung ngi mdakin avah ktorkhot kcha'lam.
54006011	Pdainu, O Isowr mii nang, nang ngi hava' dow rek thungki ichen cha'. Ungta rinkinditna', rin'owina', lamrinna', vonsatna', tidiildehna', plungperneemna' rek ava'dil ajiidei cha'.
54006012	Nang ngi lamrin ki raalnaak kqha avah anacha'. Ktluwk rinkum avah knet tih akyowng cha'. Ava'kat ava' thung ngi sakhi mii knempok aang ngi kqha kerthethutna' ava ngi akerthethut chaak ki, nang rukka adoto'own chaak dok.
54006013	Neiyi, dow mkheng thung ngi rinkum kpii Isowr ungta Pontias ki Pilaat aang ngi kqha kerthethutna' ngi sakhi kpii kcha' Khrista Jisu aang ngi, ahin nih akaktham chaak a.
54006014	Mleiya nang ngi Khrista mkandan rang ava' kpha ngi hava' paupiik avah kbihkchu liit kmah, tupsulna' ktaak ki arkhi cha'.
54006015	Avah, Mma ngi Mma' mdak ki mpha thung ngi kpandang rah. Suwqhat kthlowi a Mma' ungta Ruhtan kpu a Mma' daat. Paam kruwng rekki Paamkruwng, kruwng rekki Kruwng.
54006016	Kdiyou liit kmah Mma' daat, tnai pchaanmah mar'aang ngi ka'am, kuwkhat tih mmik ki mdodehma mditmata mdodeh pchaanma, Mma' hinni takyat chaakna' le' ktlangknai kma' ruhtan avah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
54006017	Hava' 'tunki mpha thung ngi svang kthuwk rek hinni mpirlin chaakmana' raan, mditmata mkinditna' ktaak svangthuhna' 'leenni mdorin chaakmana' raan. Pdainu svang dok ki dow mkheng mikpii kring Isowr ava' hinni lammdorin chaakna' raan paupiik apii lam.
54006018	Mleiya mmaan nih kqhanong thuh svang mthuhna' raan, tpiik chaakna' 'leen mkorthlon chaakna' raan ungta tpenthemsap mdongeina' raan, mmaan nih kqha atlow chlamso.
54006019	Mleiya mmaan nih ktlangknai kma' rinkum mdophan chaakna' raan, mmaan nih karvang rang mpha ava' ki thenni mdaksaan ki thenni innmun kqha aportlot chlamso.
54006020	O Timothy, nang ahin nih adotpiik dok avah arungdei cha', ungta mlangkmah ngi luwkinritna' mdoditin ava' thung ki kthuwk rinko'owi kma' ungta msit ktaak ki tkerteenna' rek avah akdaan.
54006021	Ava' ktlow kcha', aangqhe rek ava ngi lamrin ki mlei avah mdopqhil chaak dokin. Plungnee avah nang ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
55001001	Isowr plungbin nih ungta Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am rinkum ki paureel ava' dilkqowiyi, Jisu Khrista ki tamsi Paul neiyi, ahin nih kikjit chaak a.
55001002	Kvonsat'low kchapa, Timothy nang ahin nih Npa Isowr ungta neenki Kruwng Khrista Jisu hinki: Plungnee, plungqhat ungta plung kdai avah ka'am ikurthuwkso.
55001003	Neiyi suwn le' jaan nih krinkthamna' rek thung ngi, kdet liit kmah nang adokbin phaak chaak leiyi, kpiikpu rek dotlot heppi plungrildeh kchiir tu' korthlop pih neiyi sopkdolow chaak Isowr avah kpanpaak chaak a.
55001004	Tidit tah kkanpat mkurkhum chaakna' rah, neiyi a'arthli buwkna' rek kbin phaak cheu kdung ngi nang nga tedeh rah ayubin chnuh.
55001005	Neiyi nang athung ngi ka'am, dakat lamrin ava' kbin phaak thung ngi ava' lamrin avah apii Lois hinni choduhrep pih amda. Audilli anuh Eunis hinni amda ungta 'tunnu avah nang ahin rukku ka'am a tidit tih kbin chaak a.
55001006	Avaleiyi, neiyi a'leen nih kukhut rek kdokhiin chaak ki nang athung ngi ka'am Isowr ki chla avah adopchow thang chaakna' rah ayuktipbin phaak chaak a.
55001007	Mleiya Isowr rih pthla mningkqi midotpiikin pemeh pdainu ruhtanna' le', vonsatna' ki ungta plung kindit ki pthla midotpiik chaakin.
55001008	Avaleiyi, neenki Kruwng ki rinpaumin tpandanna' 'leenni ungta Mma' rowngmii nei kleiyi aning pyakma'. Pdainu Isowr ruhtanna' dilkqowi, kqhapaumin ava' thenni tyatna' ava' thuh nei tu' iyakheng cheh.
55001009	Mleiya Mma ngi neen avah mpha mupqhunduduh ngi, neen nnongtlotin lei kma' Khrista Jisu hinni midotpiik dokin plungnee, ungta Mma' mdak ki plungbinrit dilkqowiyi, kchiir mi'own nih neen avah mi'own inda midotsan chaak dokin.
55001010	Pdainu kqhapaumin ar'aang ngi, kdiyou penvei pthida mar'aang thuh rinkum le' kdiyou kma' kthuhqhi, neen Miksan Jisu Khrista kandan ava ngi 'tunnu mitpandan piik inna.
55001011	Ava'kat thung ngi neiya Chaatktlei rekki pauksaam kcha' khat tih, tamsi khat tih ungta chukpu khat tih mdotakthlan chaak dok.
55001012	Hava'kat ki thenni nei rukka hava' dow rek 'leenni kya kcha' ping. Anto'daat yoso, neiya kningkyak meh. Mleiya neiyi lam kdorin chaak Mma' avah kdeh ungta nit ava' kpha thung ngi neiyi Mma' hinni kakparlaan chaakna' ava' thuh Mma ngi neiya mkirkhi pchaang rah tidit neiyi kindit tih kdeh.
55001013	Nang ngi nei kihin ki ado'arjaak paudak rekki mril, tidit tah Khrista Jisu hinki lamrin thuh ungta vonsat thuh knet tih akyowng cha'.
55001014	Nang ngi, athung ngi ka'am Pthla Kchiir ava' ar'aang ngi ahin nih adokparlaan dok dow kqha rek avah arkhidei cha'.
55001015	Nang ngi Asia paamkuwl ki mmaan mkheng inni, kihin ki mkenlet chaakin avah adodeh. Mmaan arlak ki Phygellas le' Hermogenes le' kyaulam.
55001016	Kruwng ngi Onesiphoras innmii rek avah plungqhat apii chlamso. Mleiya mma ngi kdet liit kmah neiya sopmlow chda ungta mmah nei kthiirrii leiyi, ningkya korsowi meh.
55001017	Ungta mma ngi Rome khuwpii mtlun thung ngi mma ngi neiya kdung ngi mthlaam chda ungta mkurdutqhi chda.
55001018	Nit ava' thung ngi mma ngi Kruwng hinki plungqhat mdo'arlaan chaak rang avah Kruwng ngi arotpiik chso. Ungta mma ngi Ephisia thah neiya taluhepya ngi sopmtolow chaak tidit avah nang ngi kqhajik ki adodeh.
55002001	Avaleiyi, kchapa, nang nga Khrista Jisu hinni ka'am plungnee ava' thung ngi aruh aptang cha'.
55002002	Ungta nang ngi sakhi knempok rek arlak ki, nei kihin ki ado'arjaak dow rek avah morson rek rukka kpurchuk pchaang rang, trinchaak krow mii rek hinni havah aparlaan lam.
55002003	Avaleiyi, nang ngi Jisu Khrista ki kqha raalmii khat heppi tparsatna' tya rek avah adodiildeh chaak rah.
55002004	Mleiya raalkna rang raalmii khat tih mma' kakthlang kcha' ava' plungngam ktlow chrang kuwkhat leh ngi hava' rinkum ki dow rek thung ngi kekmen kcha'lu pemeh.
55002005	Ungta teletna' rek thung ngi klee rang mma' ava ngi, nowrit rek ava' dilkqowiyi mpertenma donni laar luwkhum avah pkhum nimeh.
55002006	Kqang dok ki louknum kcha' mma' ava ngi mkhatna' thok ki mcha'arkun rek avah kcha chrah.
55002007	Neiyi kdothe avah abindei ungta Kruwng ngi dow mkheng thung ngi tedeh pinditna' avah akpii chrah.
55002008	Nang ngi David chiimuw thungki Jisu Khrista avah neiki kqhapaumin ava' dilkqowiyi kdiyou thungki mdoperdel dok tidit abin phaak.
55002009	Mleiya ava' ki thenni, kthi ktlow khat heppi neiya thiirrii rekki tporkol kpha ngi tyattraan nah' avah perteel chnuh, pdainu Isowr ki pauna avah thiirrii ngi porkol meh.
55002010	Mleiya Khrista Jisu hinni, ktluwk ki tkonlorna' tu' kilqhi ngi tkirliinna' avah mmaan rukku mdo'arlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni dow mkheng avah kdodiil chaak.
55002011	Havah trinchaak krow paulam: Mleiya neen nih Mma' tu' ndiyow chaakin bih, Neen nih trin ruk Mma' tu' ring chenaandi'.
55002012	Neen nih ndiildeh chaakin bih, neen nih tpaal ruk Mma' tu' tpaal chaak raan. Neen nih Mma' avah nmat chaakin bih, Mma' rukku neen avah mikmat chraan.
55002013	Neen nih lamrin ktaak kurthuwk chyomin, Mmah trinchaak krow. Mma ngi Mdak avah karmat pchaang nimeh.
55002014	Nang ngi mmaan avah hava'le' 'leenni atipbin phaaklam. Ungta mmaan nih msit ktaak ki, karja rek ker'ekrena' pauna rek leiyi, mkalrai raan pemeh tidit leiyi, Kruwng aang ngi mmaan avah aparlaan chlam.
55002015	Nang ngi Isowr hinni kqhajik ki adaksa avah akparlaan chaakna' rah atlow cha'. Kqhajik ki kindit ki pauna ava' ksinton kcha' nongmii khat ava ngi ningkya mkorsowina' ki msit ammeh.
55002016	Pdainu nang ngi rin'owina' le' msit ktaak ki tpauna' rek hinki ikekneeng cha', tidit tah avale' ava ngi rinto'owimana' avah mdopnem thang.
55002017	Ungta mmaan pausaam rek avah cancer omlai heppi koryou thang setset rah. Haimenas le' Philetas le' avah ava'lu lam.
55002018	Mmaanve ngi trin kerheelna' avah kthleng dok kcha', mdodit inni kindit ava' thung ki 'lamleh thah kchet dok kcha'lam ungta mmaanve ngi mii aangqhe rekki lamrin avah mdopurluw pthi dokin.
55002019	Anto' chdaat yoso, Isowr innmun mlang avah hava' kbihjiik tu' krip chdaat. “Kruwng ngi Mma' dow rek rang avah mdodeh chaak.” Ungta “Khrista miing ktham kcha' rek khimkheiyi nowlam tuksutmana' thungki isun chlamso.”
55002020	Pdainu inn klinpa thung vah jiiring le' jiipowl ki arkuw thleengkam chreldaat ka'am pemeh. Pdainu aangqhe ngi takyat kurhuwi kma' thuh tsinton rang ngi ding le' duldak ki arkuw thleengkam rek rukka ka'am.
55002021	Avaleiyi, kuwmiikhat tih mdak avah mdilknau ki thuh mekpertleu chaak bih, mma' avah nong kqha khimkhei ki thenni mdoporthlon dok, Mukpupa ki thenni tpenje dok ungta msitpum, takyat kurhuwi arkuw thleengkam kurthuwk chrah.
55002022	Nang ngi kseet tkurthuh ki sadak dongei ava' thung ki rukka ichen cha'. Pdainu plung kchiir rih Kruwng miing ktham kcha' mmaan rektu' rin'owina', vonsatna' ungta plungdaina' thuh kdung ngi plung apluwt cha'.
55002023	Ungta nang ngi kokmok le' mdodeh ktaak ki ksowt tih tkerteenna' ava ngi tker'ena' mdopthuh tidit adodeh chaak ki avale' avah amapthi.
55002024	Ungta Kruwng suwk vah kalrai kerthe mdotlot rang pemeh. Pdainu mii mkheng hinni plung kperneem mdohor chaak rah, mdopurchuh chaak rah ungta mdodiildeh chaak rah.
55002025	Kpirdil kcha' rekrek ki, mmaan kepteng mii rek avah mdopindit raan. Mleiya mmaan nih kindit ava' mdodeh chaakna' raan, Isowr rih mmaan hinni plung tperthlenna' avah tohorna' kpii chdaat lam krow.
55002026	Ungta tarnampii ava ngi mma' plungbin mdoptlot lam rang ngi mdokhum dokna' ktaang ava' thung ki mchen chaakna' raan ki thenni muplung rekin avah kindit chdaat ruk krow.
55003001	Pdainu havah adei, tidit tah mqutna' mpha thung vah tidina' mpha karvang rah.
55003002	Mleiya dultimii rek avah, mdak vonkparsat, sumkngei, pirlinda kpau, kpirlin, pthitda kpau, mnuhmpa dothe kopqowi kma', kpanpaak dei kma', kchiir kma',
55003003	Vonsat kthlowi kma', koptlot dei kma', titii knei, korjowng dei kma', kthikkhak, kqha kekneeng,
55003004	Mii kyur kcha', merngem kthlep kma', korjowm kcha', Isowr vonsat tolow hinni sadak nungaina' vonsat klow kcha',
55003005	Rinko'owi kcha' armeel horthida ava' ki mruhtanna' ava' kmat kcha' kurthuwk chrah. Ungta nang ngi ava' hep daat mii rek avah akerheel daaklam.
55003006	Hava' hep rek ava ngi inn rek thung ngi spirjiik ki luwt lamda. Ungta muplung krip kma', pnu rekki mbowrin krik kcha' snu rek avah kyowng chlamda. Ungta mmaan avah sadak dongei mdetmdet ki kthi rek thung ngi qhi lamda.
55003007	Mmaan ava ngi mpha ktai thuh kurchuk lamda pdainu kindit ava' ki tedeh pinditna' ava' thung ngu teden rukku kurchuk pchaang lam pemeh.
55003008	'Tunnu Jannes le' Jambres tih Moses mdokthitnaan heppi, hava' mii rek ava ngi kindit avah mdokthitnaan. Mmaan havah muplungril kqop kcha' ungta lamrin ki mlei ava' krow kma' reklam.
55003009	Pdainu mmaan havah choduh ki rek mmaan ava' heppi mdusukin avah korsomdei nimeh, mii mkheng hinni mokmow chaak naan avah kandang chrah.
55003010	Pdainu nangvah kqhajik ki. Tidit tah neiyi kdopurchuhna' krinchan nowpa, kuplungbinrit, klamrin, ksowt tih kdodiildehna', kvonsatna', kdodiil chaakna', avah adodeh.
55003011	Ungta kyat chiireelna' rek, ksuwk thuhna', nei k'leen nih Antiok khuwpii thuh, Ikoniam thuh, Listra thuh taluhep kduh ki tyatchiireelna' rek kthuwk avah kdiil chaak daat toh. Ungta ava' mkheng thungki Kruwng ngi neiya maktlan chda.
55003012	Khrista Jisu hinni rinko'owi kcha ngi ta'am chaak rah kngei kcha' mkheng ava ngi dakat tih avah suwk mdothuhqhi rah.
55003013	Pdainu kthi ktlow mii rek ungta mmeel kpurhuwi mii rek avah knemthang setset rah. Miikuhuwng chlam rah ungta mdakin ruk kurhuwng chlam rah.
55003014	Pdainu nang athen vah, nang ngi akurchuh chaak dokna' ungta kindit tidit adodeh chaak dok avah nang ngi, mmaan avah, kuw hinki ngi kurchuk kcha' ptih, tidit adodeh chaak ki, dow rek ava' thuh i'am tlit cha'.
55003015	Ungta amot ki kupqhun nih Kchiir laika rek avah adodeh chaak dok. Avale' ava ngi Khrista jisu hinni lamtrin chaak ar'aang ngi tkirliinna' ki thenni nang nga akpinrit pchaang rah.
55003016	Kchiir laika mkheng avah Isowr tadaal do'arjukmu ungta avah tkurchuhna' ki thenni, tkerthe pinditna' ki thenni, tikpindit piikna' ki thenni msit ka'am.
55003017	Mleiya havah Isowr mii ava' kurkhumna' rah ungta kqhanong mkheng thuh kqhajik ki mkorthlon chaakna' rang kithen.
55004001	Ava'leiyi, neiyi Mma ngi Mma' ki Kruwngpaalna' tu' mkandan thung ngi kdi le' kring 'tun nih paukpindit rang Isowr le' Kruwng Jisu Khrista aang ngi akparlaan chaak a.
55004002	Pauna avah aparjaam! Mpha thung ruk mpha kma' thung rukku ikorthlong tlit cha'. Tidiildeh chaakna' le' tpurchuhna' mkheng ava ngi archildei lam, araidei lam ungta aksopdei lam.
55004003	Mleiya mmaan nih mma' mma' ki mdongeiyin, mdotlot nuwm chaak inni tkurchuhna' kqha ava' thuh merheimanaan mpha karvang chrah. Mmaan nih mdo'arjaak nuwm inni maknaan mapda leiyi, mthen inni chukpu rek kpurtuwl chlam rah.
55004004	Ungta mmaan nih makna rekin avah kindit ava' thung ki koploipthi lamrah ungta paumin thlaang thlaang rek hinni kerheel chlam rah.
55004005	Pdainu nang nga dow mkheng thung ngi ikilrin deicha', tparsatna' tya avah adilldei cha', paumin kparjaam ki nong avah atlow cha', asoplowna' avah apurtluwm cha'.
55004006	Mleiya tneek rah tparlaan dok khat tih neiya mteperlei chaak dok a ungta nei ksun chaakna' rah mpha avah knai kcha' a.
55004007	Neiyi raal avah kqhajik ki knaak chaak dok a. Neiyi tchenpertena' avah kupqut chaak dok a. Neiyi lamrin avah kirkhiik chaak dok a.
55004008	Ungta 'tunnu, rinkinditna' ki laar luwkhum avah nei kthen nih mtithiik piik dok a. Ava' vah mrinkindit Paukpindit Kruwng ava ngi nit ava' thung ngi kihin nih mikpii chrah. Ungta nei kihin chrel daat kma', Mma' arjun rang lamksu kcha' mkheng rek hin rukku avah kpii chrah.
55004009	Kbeisek ki kihin nih athlenna' rah kdung ngi atlow.
55004010	Mleiya Demas tih hava' dultipaam ava' mdongei chaak ki neiya mtamaak pthidok a, ungta Thessalonika khuwpii thah ksun kcha' a, Kresens nih Galatia thah ungta Taitas tih Dalmatia thah kchet dok lam a.
55004011	Ava' vah Luke daat chrel kihin nih ka'am a. Nang ngi Mark aqhi rang ngi kihin nih ithleng. Mleiya mma' avah soplowna' thung ngi kthen nih msit ka'am a.
55004012	Ungta Tikaikas avah neiyi Ephisia thah kapthlat dok a.
55004013	Nang ngi athlen thung ngi, Troas ki Karpas hinni kdomaak kiphriktluwn, kokrol avah mheihor piik ungta laikakuwl rek, mkenreelsi ngi saavun laikakuwl rek avah mheihor piikcha'.
55004014	Jiichai dimklou Alekjender ava ngi k'leen nih kthi knempok ki mdotlot. Kruwng ngi mma' avah mnongtlot rek dilkqowiyi apurthuwl chdaatso.
55004015	Nang rukka mma' hinki ikilrin deicha'. Mleiya mma ngi neen kpauna rekin avah kdung ngi mdorisan.
55004016	Neiyi mkhatna' kakparkhaan chaakna' thok thung vah kuwkhat leh ngi mriqhimeh, mii mkheng ngi mchendaak chda. Pdainu avah mmaan 'leenni mraalin piikna' lam mso, dinuh rinkaktham chaak a.
55004017	Anto'daat yoso, nei kleiyi paumin avah kurkhum mih mkarjaamna' rah ungta Chaatktlei rek mkheng ngi avah mdo'arjaak chaakna' rah Kruwng ngi nei koktong thah mriipiikda. Ungta kruh maptanpiik chda ungta neiya humpu nehr thungki maktlan chda.
55004018	Ungta Kruwng ngi neiya kqha kma' nong khimkhei rek thungki mkaktlan chrah. Ungta Mma' parvaan ki Kruwngpaalna' kpha ngi mkirkhi chrah. Mma' hinni ktlangknai kma' tkonlorna' avah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
55004019	Prisila le' Akyul a avah mhei'arvuwi piikcha' ungta Onesiphoras innmii rek avah mhei'arvuwi piikcha'.
55004020	Erastas tah Korinthia thah ka'am daat pdainu Trophimas tah kkowiyi Melitas thuh kdomaak daat.
55004021	Phalbi mphaakduh ngi hava' thuh atlunna' rah kdung ngi atlow. Eubulas tih aturvuwi chaak a ungta anto' heppi Pudens le' Linas le' Klaudia le' ungta unau rek mkheng inni aturvuwi chaak lam a.
55004022	Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah apthlarin tu' ka'am ikurthuwkso. Plungnee avah a'leen nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
56001001	Paul neiya Isowr rih mduduh thah mdokchol dok rek lamrin ava' ki ungta kindit tedeh pinditna' tidit tah rin'owina' ava' dilkqowiyi kurthuwk kcha' Isowr suwk'owr ungta Jisu Khrista ki tamsi khat ping.
56001002	Hava' lamrin le' luwkinritna' ava ngi ktlangknai kma' rinkum ki plungbinpsuk ava' 'leenni krip kcha'. Mpha ngi ta'am mupqhunduduh ngi, pleiknei pchaang kma' Isowr rih avah pau mdoreel dok.
56001003	Pdainu Isowr rih mdokthlan mphakat thung ngi, Mma' pauna avah pau tparjaamna' ar'aang ngi mar'aang thuh pthuwkda. Hava' pau tparjaamna' avah neen Miksan Isowr paureen ava ngi, Mma ngi nei kihin nih mparlaan chda.
56001004	Neen nkhengin ki nlamrin chaak sapin ava' dilkqowiyi nang nga kchapa kat ptih, neiyi Taitas nang ahin nih kikjit chaak a. Tidit tah Pa Isowr ungta neenki Miksan Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee le' plungqhat ungta plung kdai avah nang ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
56001005	Neiyi Kritii diiloipaam thuh adokmaakna' mleiya hava: Mleiya nang ngi tparnaak dokmah dow rek avah aparnaakjik ungta neiyi adokperseel dok ava' hep pih, khuwpii klin rek khimkhei thung ngi lopkver rek akchol lam.
56001006	Lopkver khat kurthuwk rang mma' avah, tupsulna' ktaak ungta snu khadaat ki innpu mkurthuh rah. Ungta mnau le' avah lamkrin kcha', kartlai kcha ngi ka'am mditmata tethe kopqowi kma' 'leenni tupsulna' ktaak mkurthuh raan.
56001007	Mleiya lopkver khat avah Isowr hinki ksutpqowi kcha' khat kpurhuwiyi tupsulna' ktaak mkurthuh rah. Mma' avah mthina ki muplungbin kngei kcha', kbeisek ki muplung kthidei, thowldii knee ker'ei kalraidei, sum 'leenni kpunjuwr mkurthuh rang pemeh.
56001008	Pdainu mma' avah mikuptlungdei, kqha kngei, mdak kilrindei, mrinkindit, kchiir, muplung kenreel, mkurthuh rah.
56001009	Mma ngi mkurchuh chaakna' dilkqowiyi trinchaak krow pauna rek avah knet tih mdokyown chaak rah. Tiditta mma ngi tkurchuhna' kindit ava ngi mii rek avah mdoksow chaak rah, ungta mma ngi ava' kikthitna' mii rek ava' hinni, anto' pemeh tidit kepdeh pchaang mkurthuh rah.
56001010	Mleiya arlak inni msitktaak ki kpau ungta mrilqhatma ngi mii kuhuwng kcha', tethe kopqowi kma' mii rek ka'am pok lam a. Mmaan avah vunkreen rek arlaksi ngi ka'am lam a.
56001011	Nang ngi mmaan nehr rek avah ado'artlun rah. Mleiya mmaan nih mdopurchuh maraan, sum 'leenni tpunjuwrna' mdopurchuh kreen ava ngi innmii rek mkheng avah ekrep lamda.
56001012	Mmaan arlak ki mmaan ki khulpu ava ngi hanto'theda: “Kritii mii rekka mpha ktai thuh pleiknei lam. Mmaan nah kqha kma' nowmsaa rek ungta howngkva, mpowibuwr kparja reklam.”
56001013	Hava' mmaan leiki rinpaumin avah mkindit. Avaleiyi, mmaan nih lamrin thuh knet tih ma'am chaakna' raan ki thenni mmaan avah arai lamrah apindit lam.
56001014	Tidit tah kindit ava' thung ki kerheel kcha' Jihudi rekki pauminsit rek ungta dultimii paupiik rek thung ngi plung mdopluw mana' raan ki thenni arailam.
56001015	Mleiya kertleu kcha' mii rek hinvah dow mkheng kheng a kertleu pdainu ktobor rek ungta lamkrin kma' rek hinvah kertleu khatleh ka'am pemeh. Ava' kchang ngi mmaan plungril rekle' muplungrildeh rekin ava' rukka ktobor kcha'.
56001016	Mmaan nih Isowr kdei rekrek ki kkorthlong lam pdainu mnongtlot inni Isowr rah mdomat chaakin. Mmaan nah tepder chaak kurhuwilam, tethe kopqowi lam pemeh ungta mmaan nah kqha dow khimkhei avah ktlowphu lam pemeh.
56002001	Pdainu nang athennu tkurchuhna' kindit ava' tu' kurthut tih tethekrow dow rek ava' athe.
56002002	Tidit tah kder klaam rek hinni, thowldii knee mii mkurthuh mana' raan apurchuk lam. Mmaan nah takyat kurhuwi, muplung kurkhum, mlamrin knet, vonsat kthlowi ungta tidiildehna' 'leenni mkurkhum raan.
56002003	Anto' heppi snu kder rek rukka, rinko'owi kcha' rek kpurhuwiyi, mrinchan inni ma'amna' raan apurchuk lam. Mleiya mmaan nih titii knei kma' ungta knem mih thowldii tneekna' thung ngi makparlaan chaak raan pemeh. Ava' kchang ngi mmaan nah dow kqha rekki chukpu rek mkurthuh raan.
56002004	Mleiya mmaan nih, innknei row snu rekki plung kindit tih mi'innpu rekin le' mnau le' vonsat mdolowna' raanni mdoksow deh raan.
56002005	Mleiya innknei row snu rekki, mmaan nih Isowr pauna avah mdopthit mana' raan ki thenni mi'innpu rekin hinni makparlaan chaak raan ungta plung kindit mdohor raan ungta mchiir chaak raan ungta inn thah amda inn nong ktlow kcha' rek mkurthuh raan.
56002006	Anto' heppi, kseetnau rek rukka plung kindit mdohorna' raan aksoplam.
56002007	Dow mkheng 'leenni nang nga mmaan hinni kqhanong totlotna' ki titinna' khat tih a'am rah. Adopurchuhna' 'leenni topborma', takyat kurhuwiyi ungta plung kluwt tih atlow cha'.
56002008	Mleiya nang akikthitna' rekki a'leen nih kthi dow khatleh mdothe raan ma'amma ngi ningkya mdophan chaakna' raanni nang ngi kuwkhat leh ngi mdopsul pchaanna' ktaak paukindit adothe chaak rah.
56002009	Nang ngi suwk'owr rekki, dow mkheng 'leenni mmaan plung ngamna' rah, mma' mma' ki mukpu rekin hinni makparlaan chaakna' raan aksoplam. Mmaan nih, mpauin mdo'arthaan purlu raan pemeh.
56002010	Mleiya dow mkheng 'leenni mmaan nih neenki Miksan Isowr ki tkurchuhna' ava' ruwngchen mdopqhatna' raan ki thenni muprut raan pemeh. Pdainu dow khimkhei 'leenni trinchaak krow ngi mekterdet chaak raan.
56002011	Mleiya mii mkheng hinni tkirliinna' kpii Isowr plungnee avah kkandang dok a.
56002012	Ungta ava ngi neen avah rinko'owi kma' ungta dultipaam ki tngeina' rek tmat chaakna' rah mipurchukinda. Ungta neen nih plungkurkhum mih, rinkindit tih ungta rinko'owiyi hava' 'tunpha ki mpha thung ngi ta'amna' raan mipurchukinda.
56002013	Mleiya neen nih hava' suwqhat plungbinpsuk ki thenni ungta konlor dok ki kandang rang neenki klin Isowr ungta neen Miksan Jisu Khrista nardat chaakin chunni anto' heppi neen nih ta'am chaak raan.
56002014	Tidit tah Mma ngi neen avah nowlam tuksutmana' mkheng thungki midotaktlan chaakna' raan ki thenni Mdak ki kakparlaan chda. Ungta Mma' mdak chrel ki then daat tih Mma' mii tkurthuhna' raan ki thenni mipertleuinda. Avaleiyi, kqhanong rekki thenni neen nih arda toprow chaak raan.
56002015	Nang ngi hava' dow rek avah adopurchuh kat lam rang ava'. Nang ngi ruhtan mkheng tu' korthlop pih adoksow lamrah ungta adorai lamrah. Kuwkhat leh ngi nang nga tuk'aksut kma' tlow mso!
56003001	Paamkpu rekle' ruhtanna' ksin rek hinni mii rekki makparlaan chaak raan avah nang ngi adotipbin phaak chaak lamrah. Mleiya mmaan nih, kqhanong khimkhei thuh mmaan hinni tethe kopqowiyi ungta ktlow rangjap pih ma'am raan.
56003002	Tidit tah mmaan nih khat le' khat qhatmana' mdothe mana' raan, ker'ei kalrai kngei kma', plung kdowng ngi ungta mii mkheng hinni plung kperneem mdotedet pchaanna' raan, aksoplam.
56003003	Mleiya neen ndakkatin rukka mphakhat thung vah, kokmok ki, tethe kopqowi kmah ngi tarvan amin. Ungta mii rekki neenna mihuwnginda mdetmdet ki daksa dongei ningtlunna' rek thung ngi suwk'owr rih tarvan'amin. Ungta miiqhatmana' ktlow ngi ungta kepner rih, ungta mii rekki miihalinda ungta khat le' khat karhalin minnu tarvan'amin.
56003004	Pdainu dultimii ktong thah neen Miksan Isowr plungqhat le' vonsat avah kandangda.
56003005	Ungta ava ngi neenna misaninda, tidit tah neenna, neen nih rinkindit nong rek totlot chaakin leiyi, midotsan chaakin pemeh pdainu Mma' plungqhat ava ngi neenna midotsan chaakin. Mleiya ren nih tqou chaakna' ar'aang ngi mi'alqhuh chaanda ungta Pthla Kchiir ar'aang ngi ren mipthutinda, neen avah midotsan chaakin.
56003006	Mma ngi neen Miksan Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi neen n'leen nih Pthla Kchiir avah kepleet tih miptlonpiik inda.
56003007	Mleiya Mma ngi neen avah Mma' plungnee ngi mitpindit chaak dokin dilli ktlangknai kma', rinkum ki plungbinpsuk ava' dilkqowiyi, piipa rek tkurthuh chaakna' rang ki thenni havah mdotlot.
56003008	Hava' pauna rek avah trinchaak krow. Tidit tah Isowr hinni lamkrin kcha' rek mmaan nih kqhanong rek totlot chaakna' 'leenni plung mdopluw chaakna' raan ki thenni naan nih mmaan hinni knet tih adothepindit piik raan kngei a. Mleiya hava' dow rek avah mkenreelsi ungta mii khimkhei hinni mthennemna' ka'am.
56003009	Pdainu nang ngi kokmok kerteenna' rekle' rilam ki mlei rekle', nowlam ki mleiyi tker'e ungta tkalraina' rek mkheng thungki ikekneeng cha'. Mleiya avale' avah msit amna' ka'am pemeh ungta mdak kden.
56003010	Lop kenqhenna' rah ktlow mii avah mveikhatna' le' mveiknitna' kpha thung ngi apilqhit pdainu ava'dil vah mma' avah apthlapthi.
56003011	Ava'lu hep daat mii avah 'lam ava' thung ki kenle dok kcha' ungta pnu mdo'arve chaak ungta mthina kukpursul kcha' tidit avah kindit tih adodeh chaak rah.
56003012	Neiyi nang ahin nih Artemas mditmata Tikaikas akapthlat psuk lam thung ngi nang ngi trin kmah Nikopolis thah nei kihin nih athlenna' rah atlow. Mleiya neiya phalbilim thung ngi ava' thah ka'am rang ngi plungkreel dok a.
56003013	Nang ngi nowlam kdei Jenas le' Apollos leh ngi dow khatleh mdoptatin ktaak ki mipjiin 'lamin mdopthlen pchaanna' raan asutpiik lam.
56003014	Ungta neen nmii rekin rukku kqhanong rek mdotlot chaakna' raan ikurchuk chlamso. Mleiya mmaan nih 'tun'tun ki mdokriin rekin mdopordon chaakna' raan ungta mchei mpaar ktaak mkurthuh mana' raan ki thenni havah atlow chlamso.
56003015	Nei tu' ka'am rek mkheng ngi, ahin nih akurvuwi chaak inna. Ungta lamrin thuh vonsat miklow kcha' rek mmaan avah mhei'arvuwi piik chlam. Naan akhengngin 'leenni plungnee avah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen
57001001	Khrista Jisu ki rowngmii Paul nei le' neen nu'unnau'in Timothy ngi, neenki kvonsat'lown ungta knong lowqhi chaakin Phaileman nang ahin nih kikjit chaak inna.
57001002	Ungta kvonsat'lown Apphia le' raalmii kdokurthuh qhiin Arkippas le' nang a'inn thungki lamrinlop hin rukku kikjit chaak inna.
57001003	Naan ahinin nih neenki N'paan Isowr hinki ungta Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungnee le' plung kdai avah ka'am ikurthuwkso.
57001004	Neiyi neiki Isowr avah kpanpaak chaak a. Neiyi krinktham chaakna' rek thung ngi, mpha ktai thung ngi nang amiing nga kdopyau chaak tlit kchow.
57001005	Tidit tah nang ngi Kruwng Jisu hinni ungta miikenje rek mkheng hinni vonsat le' lamrin adothlowi chaak avah neiyi kdo'arjaak chaak dok.
57001006	Mleiya Khrista Jisu hinni nang athung ngi ka'am dow kqha khimkhei tedeh pinditna' ava ngi nang ngi mii morson hinni adopenthem alamrin avah mruhtan ma'amna' rah rinkaktham kcha' ping.
57001007	Tidit tah nang avonsat thlowi leiyi, neenve ngi kdung ngi, Isowr kpanpaak chaak inna ungta ava ngi mtoksow chaak inna. Mleiya knaupa, nang ngi miikenje rek plungchai rek avah ren tpurthuh piik lam tinu.
57001008	Avaleiyi, nang ngi kqha adotlot rangkat ava' adotlotna' rang ki thenni neiyi Khrista hinni changkarngam mih paupiik adokpiik krow.
57001009	Pdainu ava' kchang ngi vonsat leiyi, akaktham chaak a. Tidit tah neiya kder dok kcha' Paul ping ungta 'tun rukku Jisu Khrista ki rowngmii khat tih ka'am kcha' ping.
57001010	Neiyi thiirrii dobowl daat tih ka'am chaak arlaan nih kdopluk chaak, Onesimas ki thenni nang ahin nih akaktham chaak a.
57001011	Mphakhat thung vah mma' avah nang ahinnu msit amna' ka'am pemeh, pdainu 'tunnu mma' avah nang ahinruk ungta nei kihin rukku msit ka'am kcha' a.
57001012	Neiyi mma' avah nang ahin nih keheisi perheel chaak a. Nang ngi mma' avah nei kuplungchai kat heppi abin rang ngi arlaang cha'.
57001013	Mleiya mma ngi nang akchang kdon nih, kqhapaumin ki rowngmii, nei sopmdotolow chaakna' rang ki thenni, mma' avah kihin nih kdothlot nuwm chaak.
57001014	Pdainu neiyi nang adorotma ngi dow khatleh tlownuwm maang. Mleiya neiyi ahin nih kqha adokoptlot mda, nang adak ki totlot chaak rah adongeiyi kqha avah adotlot chaak rah.
57001015	Mleiya mpha mruk thuh nang ahinki msun chaakna' ki mlei avah, nang ngi mma' avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ado'arlaan chaakna' rang ki then kurthuwk daat ruk krow.
57001016	Nang ngi mma' avah suwk'owr khat heppi thlowima', pdainu suwk'owr khat kkheel lih avonsat'low a'uanau khat heppi athlowi cha'. Neiyi mma' avah kdung ngi vonsat kdolow chaak pdainu nang ngi kerkheelsi ngi daksa 'lam thang ruk ungta Kruwng hin rukku vonsat adolow chaak rah.
57001017	Avaleiyi, nang ngi neiya amiqhi khat heppi atbin chaak cheentung ngi, nei adotarlaan chaak rang heppi mma' avah arlaang cha'.
57001018	Pdainu mma ngi ahin nih karmak mtlot cheentung ngi mditmata ahin nih lei merve cheentung ngi, nang ngi avah nei k'leen nih atai.
57001019	Paul neiyi havah kukhut kat tih kikjit chaak a, neiyi avah achowi nikdi'. Anto' mda, neiyi havah nang adak kat tih nei kihin nih lei ado'arve kdoditna' pemeh.
57001020	Kqha a, knaupa nang ngi, Kruwng hinni neiyi nang ahinki plungngam kdophan chaakna' rah atlow cha'. Kruwng hinni nei kuplungchai avah ren mheipthuh piikcha'.
57001021	Neiyi, nang ngi tethe adopqowi chaakna' 'leenni plungkrip kdothlowi chaak leiyi, havah ahin nih kdokjit. Mleiya nang ngi neiyi kdothe ava' han'tun nih tlownadi' tidit kdeh.
57001022	Ava'arlak ki, nang ngi maltlun'inn khat rukka nei kthen nih mheiporthlon piikcha'. Mleiya nang arinktham chaak rek ar'aang ngi ahin nih neiya akpii chdaat ruk krow.
57001023	Khrista Jisu hinni rowngmii kdokurthuhqhi Epaphras rukku ahin nih aturvuwi chaak a.
57001024	Ungta anto' heppi nei knonglowqhi rek Mark, Aristarkas, Demas ungta Luke le' rukku aturvuwi chaak lam a.
57001025	Neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah nang apthlarin tu' ka'am ikurthuwkso, Amen.
58001001	Alraangvah Isowr rih npu'npa rekin avah mpha msikmsik ungta mnow msikmsik ki, khulpu rek ar'aang ngi bi chlamda.
58001002	Pdainu 'tunki mqutna' mpha thung vah Mchapa ar'aang ngi neenna mibi chaanda. Mma ngi dow mkheng ki piipa mkurthuhna' rah Mma' avah kchol dokda. Ungta Mma ngi dultipaam rek avah Mma' ar'aang ngi mdopurthuh.
58001003	Chapa avah Mma' konlorna' Mar'aang ava' ungta Mma' rin chan ava' ki pthla kat ava'. Mma ngi mruhtan ki pauna ava ngi dow mkheng avah kdomda. Mma ngi neen pnu tulqhutna' rek ava' mtlot dok dilli, Mma ngi kparthaangsi mun thung ngi Mlaarkneisi ava' machang thah ko'ong chda.
58001004	Mleiya Mma ngi alrouchom mih mdo'arlaan miing avah vaantamsi rek hin rukku kqhasi. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi mmaan hinki kdung ngi kqha ava' kurthuwk chda.
58001005	Mleiya Isowr rih vaantamsi kuwkhat leh hinni teden rukku hanto ngi mdothena' ka'am pemeh: “Mleiya Nang nga Nei Kchapa ptih, Tuni ngi Nang nga akupluk chaak a,” mditmow? (Luw. 2:7) Ungta Mma ngi veikhat hanto ngi the nowlda: “Neiyi Mma' Pa kurthuwk nikdi' ungta Mma' avah Nei Kchapa, kurthuwk rah,” mdit mow? (2 Sam. 7:14)
58001006	Ungta Mma ngi Mchapa mkhatna' kqou ava' dultipaam thung ngi muryunqhi thung ngi, Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Isowr ki vaantamsi rek mkheng ngi Mma' avah luwmdobuk chaak rah,” mdodit. (Knl. 32:43, Ll. 97:7)
58001007	Ungta Mma ngi vaantamsi rek leiyi, hanto ngi theda: “Mma ngi Mma' vaantamsi rek avah tirthli rek purthuh lamda. Ungta Mma' sopklow kcha' rek mmaan avah mei kquwng purthuh lamda,” mdodit. (Luw. 104:4)
58001008	Pdainu Chapa ava'leiyi Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Oh Isowr, Nah akruwng longkhom avah tlangnai liit nimeh. Ungta Nah akruwngpaalna' ki kchung avah rinkinditna' ki kchung.
58001009	Nang ngi rinkinditna' avah vonsat low tinu Ungta Nang ngi nowlam tukksut kma' rek avah adopder chaak lam. Avaleiyi, Isowr, Nang ki Isowr rih Nang avah tkanpatna' reidii adotpubul chaak ava ngi amiqhi rek han'tun nih adotparthaan chaak dok.” (Luw. 45:6-7)
58001010	Ungta Mma ngi theda: “O Kruwng, mupqhunthok thung ngi, Nang ngi dultipaam ki innmun avah porthlong tinu. Ungta parvaan rek avah Nang adimlow akhut nong rek.
58001011	Mmaan mkheng avah kenvei chrah. Pdainu Nang nga amtlit daatnadi'. Ungta mmaan mkheng avah dona heppi kchuwlter chrah.
58001012	Nang ngi mmaan rek avah buwphat tukyul heppi kyul tidon perthleng lamnadi'. Pdainu Nang nga mehehep pih amtlit chdaatnadi' Ungta Nang akum rek avah teden rukku tlangliit nimeh,” mdodit. (Luw. 102:25,27)
58001013	Pdainu vaantamsi rek khadaat hin rukku Mma ngi: “Neiyi Amiihal rek avah Akhuhther rih akthiik piikduh khimkheiyi, Nei kmachang thah iko'ong daat,” mditmow? (Luw. 110:1)
58001014	Mdittu' talu, mmaan mkheng avah, alrouchom mih tkirliinna' ava' kchom kcha' rang rek mmaan ava' sopklow chrang ki thenni mdopthlat, sopklow kcha' pthla rek lam pemeh mow?
58002001	Mlei hava' leiyi neen nih midotphui pthidok mana' raan ki thenni tarjaak chaak dokin ava' thung ngi knet tih plung treel chaak raan.
58002002	Mleiya vaantamsi rek ar'aang ngi mdothe pauna rek avah kindit. Tidit tah nowlam kupkui rekle' tethe kopqowi kma' rek khimkheiyi mmaan ki mraal suwkthuhna' rek avah karlaang chlam rah.
58002003	Mdittu' neen nih kdung ngi klin tkirliinna' ava' tukksut kma' nkurthuh innu, neenna taluhep pih tkerthle raanno? Mleiya tkirliinna' avah choduduh ngi Kruwng ngi mdoparjaam dok ungta Mma' dothe karja rekki avah kindit tidit avah neen nihinin nih mdopandan chaak dokin.
58002004	Ungta Isowr mdakkat rukku titinna' le' tngana' rekki tidit tah mdetmdet ki ruhtan nong rekki ungta Mma' mdak plungbin dilkqowiyi Pthla Kchiir ki chla rekki avah kindit tidit ki sakhi avah mdopiik dok.
58002005	Mleiya neen nih mlei tethe kchown, karvang bei rang ta'amna' dultipaam avah Mma ngi vaantamsi rek kurduh ngi mdothiik pemeh.
58002006	Pdainu kuwmiikhat tih sakhi mdopiikna' mmun khat ka'am. Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi adobinphaak mii avah taluda? Mditmata Nang ngi adokilrin qhichaak Mii Chapa avah kuwda?
58002007	Nang ngi Mma' avah mpha mruk thuh vaantamsi rek hinni pchowm bet tih. Nang ngi Mma' avah tkonlorna' le' takyat chaakna' ki laar luwkhum pkhum chtinu. Ungta Nang akhut nongtlot khimkhei rek 'leenni tpa'am tinu.
58002008	Ungta Nang ngi dow mkheng avah Mma' khuhther rih thipthi tinu,” dida. (Luw. 8:4-7) Mleiya hava' thung ngi Mma ngi dow mkheng avah Mma' tii thah, Mma' kurduh ngi mdothiik pthidok. Mma ngi Mma' kurduh ngi mdothiikma dow khatleh ruk ka'am pemeh. Pdainu 'tunnu neen nih dow mkheng avah Mma' kurduh ngi ka'am mih deimlai inpimin.
58002009	Pdainu neen nih Jisu avah ndehn a, tidit tah mpha mruk thung ngi Mma' avah vaantamsi rek hinni kchowm set purthuhda. Mleiya Mma ngi Isowr hinki plungnee avaleiyi mii khimkhei ki thenni kdiyou avah mdopertem dok. Avaleiyi, 'tunnu Mma ngi tkonlorna' le' takyat chaakna' ki laar luwkhum avah mdokhum chaak.
58002010	Mleiya dow mkheng avah Mma' ar'aang ngi ungta Mma' thenni ka'am ungta Mma ngi chapa rek knempok avah tkonlorna' thung ngi mdothuhqhi. Ungta Mma' avah mmaan ki tkirliinna' ki mbul mkurthuh leiyi, Isowr rih, Jisu avah tyattraanna' tperteel lih mdopurkhum rang thah tlada.
58002011	Mleiya kipchiir kcha' Mma' ava'ruk ungta mdopchiir chaak rek mmaan ava'ruk, mkheng kheng inni khadaat hinki lam. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi mmaan avah ku'uknau rek, mditlam thung ngi mningkakyak pemeh.
58002012	Mleiya hanto ngi theda: “Neiyi, Nang amiing avah ku'uknau rek hinni purphuwng nikdi'. Lamrinlop thung ngi neiyi adokpanpaakna' laa the nikdi',” mdodit. (Luw. 22:22)
58002013	Ungta veikhat nowl lih: “Neiyi klamrin avah Mma' hinni thinikdi',” dida. (2 Sam. 22:3 Is. 8:17) Ungta veikhat nowl lih: “Nei le' Isowr rih mdotpiik nau rek avah hava' thang inping,” dida. (Is. 8:8)
58002014	Mleiya nau rek ava ngi sadak le' hii mdothlowiyin leiyi, Mma' rukku anto' heppi mmaan ki sadak le' hii ava'kat louda. Mleiya Mma ngi mdiyow avah kdiyou ki tpaalna' ruhtan, kthlowi tarnampii ava ngi ruhtan mdothlowi porsonmana' rang ki then.
58002015	Ungta Mma' diyow ava ngi, kdiyou mdoqit chaak inni mrinkumpung inni ava' thuh suwk'owr rih ka'am kcha' rek mmaan avah perthlet chlamda.
58002016	Mleiya dakat tih Mma ngi vaantamsi rek avah bom chlammeh, pdainu Mma ngi Abraham nau rek ava' mdobom chaak lam.
58002017	Avaleiyi, dow mkheng 'leenni Mma' avah mu'umnau rek hep daat mdopurthuh rang thah tlada. Mleiya havah Mma ngi Isowr sopmdolow chaakna' thung ngi plungqhat kohordei ungta trinchaak krow thimpu kenreel khat mkurthuhna' rang ki then. Ungta mii rek pnu leiyi, Mma' avah Isowr plung ngamna' rintparlaan khat mkurthuh chaakna' rang ki then.
58002018	Mleiya Mma' mdakkat tih avah tarnampii ngi mepthleem thung ngi tyat perteelda. Ungta ava' tyatna' mdoperteel ava ngi Mma ngi kepthleem thung ngi ktla rek avah mdobom chaak pchaan.
58003001	Avaleiyi, parvaan do'own chaak kphang dok kcha', kchiir dok kcha' ku'uknau rek, naan nih aplungbin rekin avah Khrista Jisu hinni apnet chaan. Mleiya Mma' avah neen nih kdopandan chaak dokin, tamsi ava' ungta thimpu kenreel ava'.
58003002	Mma' avah Moses tih Isowr inn mkheng thung ngi trinchaak krow mkurthuh heppi, Mma' kokchol kcha' Khat ava' hinni Mmah trinchaak krow ngi ka'am.
58003003	Mleiya inn ksa kcha' mma' ava ngi mi'innsak ava' hinni takyat chaakna' kerkheel set tih ma'am heppi, hava' Khat ava ngi Moses hin rukku kerkheel set tih konlor kcha'ki mtik kcha.
58003004	Mleiya inn khimkhei avah ksa khat tih mdosak, pdainu dow mkheng ksa avah Isowr.
58003005	Ungta dil thah talu tpauna' rang tidit ki rinpaumin tpiikna' rang 'leenni Moses avah Isowr inn mkheng thung ngi trinchaak krow suwk khat.
58003006	Pdainu Khrista avah Isowr inn thung ngi Chapa khat tih trinchaak krow. Ungta neen nih neenki nardarow naan le' neenki tpirlin chaak naan plungbinpsuk 'leenni knet tih nokyown chaakin bih, neenna Mma' inn rek inpimin.
58003007	Avaleiyi, Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mdothe heppi: “Tuni naan nih Mma' krowl arjaak chaakin cheentung ngi.
58003008	Naan nih paamkbiik laiyi, naan atperteelin thung ngi, Naan nih ava' ptengda raalkna ngi a'amin thungki heppi aplung rekin tapchai maan.
58003009	Ava' thung ngi apu'apa rek inni kum somplii thung ngi mleuna' lamda ungta mperteel lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Nei knongtlot rek avah mmikin nih mdodeh dokin.
58003010	Ava'leiyi, suruwl ava' 'leenni kuplung thida hanto' kdothe: 'Mmaan plung rek avah mpha ktaiyi 'lamleh thah chetda ungta mmaan nih, Nei k'lam rek avah deilam meh.
58003011	Ava'leiyi, Neiyi kuplungthit mei kquwng ava ngi, ‘Mmaan nah Nei kkarngatna' thung ngi luwtlam nimeh’ dinuh, pau kdoreel dok,” mdodit. (Luw. 95:7-11)
58003012	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, naan kuwkhat leh ruk lamrinma ki plung kqha kma' ava ngi naan nih kring Isowr hinki asunmana' raan ki thenni ikilrindei chaan.
58003013	Pdainu naan nih, tuni tidit ma'am daat arlaan nih, khat le' khat avah mniktai ikorsopdei chaan. Mditma bih naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tah pnu ki tkurhuwnna' ava ngi muplung ktapchai krep rah.
58003014	Mleiya neen nih mqutna' kpha thung ngi choduh ki nuplungin rina' ava' knet tih nokyown chaakin bih, neenna Khrista hinki karlaang kcha'sap tkurthuh chaak raan.
58003015	Tikjit ava ngi mdokjit dok heppi: “Tuni, naan nih Mma' krowl arjaak chaakin cheentung ngi, Ptengda raalkna rek heppi aplung rekin tapchaimaan,” dida. (Luw. 95:7-8)
