58003016	Mleiya kuw le'da arjadaat thida ptengda raalkna rekka? Mmaan mkheng avah Moses tih Egypt paam thungki mdoqhi pthuh rek avale' lam pemeh mow?
58003017	'Tunnu Mma ngi kum somplii thung ngi plungthit mdolow rek avah kuw le' lamda? Mmaan avah pnu arvei lamda paamkbiik laiyi mokluwngin kplowm pok kcha' rek avale' lam pemeh mo?
58003018	Ungta kuw le' hinda Mma ngi, ‘Mma' karngatna' thuh luwtlam nimeh,' dida, pau mdoreel psuk rekka, tethe kopqowi kma' rek mmaan ava le' pemeh mow?
58003019	Avaleiyi, neen nih ndehn a tidit tah mmaan nih mlamrinmaan leiyi, ava' thuh kluwt pchaang lam. Pemeh
58004001	Avaleiyi, Mma' karngatna' thuh tuluw chaakna' ki paureel avah ma'am tlit daat leiyi, neen nih ikilrindei chaan cheh. Mditma bih naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat tah kaptham dok kcha' ka'am krow.
58004002	Mleiya dakat tih kqhapaumin avah mmaan hinni mdoparjaamin heppi, neen nihinin rukku mdoparjaam. Pdainu paumin avah mmaan nih lamrin tu' mdoporthlow chaakmaan leiyi, mmaan hinni msit ka'am kurthuwk mda.
58004003	'tunnu lamkrin kcha' neenna Mma' karngatna' thung ngi tuluw chaakin. Mleiya Isowr rih hanto'theda: “Neiyi kuplungthit mei kquwng ava ngi pau reel nuh kthe a, Tidit tah mmaan nah Nei kkarngatna' thung ngi luwtlam nimeh,” dida. (Luw. 95:11) Mleiya dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih Mma' nong avah qu chdaat yoso, mmaan nah luwtlam nimeh.
58004004	Mleiya Mma ngi mmun khat thung ngi hava' pauna rekki mtikhiuna' nit ava'leiyi hanto'theda: “Ungta mtikhiuna' nit tih, Isowr rih mnong rek mkheng thungki karnga chda.” (Rnp. 2:2)
58004005	Ungta veikhat hava' thung ngi Mma ngi the nowlda: “Mmaan nah Nei kkarngatna' thung ngi luwtlam nimeh,” dida. (Luw. 95:11)
58004006	Mleiya tunkpha thung ngi tkarngatna' mmun ava' thung ngi kuwmiikhat tih mluw chaak rang avah ka'am tlit daat a. Ungta choduh ngi mhin inni kqhapaumin tparjaamna' rekki tethe mdopqowi maanni ava' thung ngu luwt chlam mda.
58004007	Avaleiyi, Isowr rih mpha rowiksowt tih ma'am dil lih David ar'aang ngi choduh mdothe dok ava' hep pih: “Tuni, naan nih Mma' krowl avah arjaak chaakin cheentung ngi, aplung rekin avah tapchaimaan,” dida. (Luw. 95:7-8) Tuni' tidit nit avah veikhat tpa'am nowlda.
58004008	Mleiya Joshuah ngi mmaan hinni tkarngatna' kpiidok lam mkurthuh bih, Mma ngi mdilthang vah morson nit khat tidit avah the nimeh.
58004009	Ava'kat ava' thung ngi Isowr mii rekki thenni tkarngatna' nit avah ka'am kcha' a.
58004010	Mleiya Mma' karngatna' ava' thung ngi kluwt kcha' mma' ava ngi Isowr rukku mkarngat chaak ava' heppi mnong rek thungki karnga kcha' a.
58004011	Avaleiyi, neen nih ava' tkarngatna' ava' thung ngi tuluw chaakna' raan ki thenni kdung ngi itlow chaancheh. Mditma bih kuwmiikhat tah mmaan ki tethe topqowimana' ava' thung ngi ktla kcha' ka'am rah.
58004012	Mleiya Isowr pauna avah kring ungta mruh ktang ungta mahaa 'knii kpu raal'kaang hin rukku kraang. Ava ngi plungrin le' pthla kurkhuina' kpha ungta ruhjom rekle' artlin rek kpha kepthleng pchaang. Ungta plungbin rekle' plungrildeh rek kpha rukka kdeipindih pchaang.
58004013	Ungta neen nih neenki nleiyin tpiikna' raan Mma' ava' miksut thungki kordowl pchaang rah mdopurthuh dok dow khatleh ka'am pemeh. Pdainu Mma' mikchai rek thung ngi dow mkheng avah mdak kchai ungta kparvang kcha'.
58004014	Avaleiyi, neen nih parvaan kepthleng ngi hungkkal dok kcha' thimpu kenreelsi Isowr Chapa Jisu tothlowi chaakin leiyi, neen nih tethethut chaakin lamrin ava' thung ngi knet tih ikyowngdei chaancheh.
58004015	Mleiya neen nih neenki nruhdownna' rek mikdehpiikin thimpu kenreelsi khat nthlowi chaak inna. Mleiya Mmah neen nehep daat tidit tah dow mkheng 'leenni neen nih tperteelin kepthleem avah Mma' rukku mdoperteel chaak pdainu Mmah pnu kervei pemeh.
58004016	Avaleiyi, neen nih nikriin chaakin ki mpha thung ngi plungqhat le' plungnee tarlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni, plungnee ki Kruwng longkhom avah changkarngam mih ijong chaan cheh.
58005001	Tidit tah thimpu kenreelsi khimkhei avah mii rek arlak ki tokchol lam ungta mii rekki thenni Isowr hinni sopklow chrang ki ngi takthlan dok. Mleiya mma ngi chla rek ruk ungta pnu ki thenni rintparlaan ava'ruk mikniing ngi mdotlot rah.
58005002	Mma ngi kdeipindih kma' rekle' 'lamleh kqowi kcha' rek 'leenni plung mdopdown pchaan, mleiya mma' rukka ruhdownna' rekki mdotkhul.
58005003	Mlei hava' leiyi mii rekki then mdotlot heppi mma ngi mma' mdaksa ki then rukku pnu leiyi, rintparlaanna' ava ngi makparlaan chaak rah.
58005004	Ungta dultimii kuwkhat leh ngi Aaron heppi Isowr rih mma' avah mdo'own chaak kma'don nih mdak ki mkaryat chaakna' klou pchaang kcha' ka'am pemeh.
58005005	Anto' heppi, Khrista rukku Thimpu Kenreelsi tkurthuhna' thung ngi Mdak ki kokponlor kcha' pemeh. Pdainu Mma' hinni: “Nang nga Kchapa ptih. Tuni Nang nga, Neiyi adokupluk,” (Luw. 2:7) dida kthe Mma' ava' dopurthuh.
58005006	Anto' heppi Mma ngi mmun morson khat thung ngi hanto'theda: “Nang nga Melkaijadek kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi ktlangknai kma' thimpu khat ptih,” mdodit. (Luw. 110:4)
58005007	Dultipaam thung ngi Jisu ngi ma'ambong mpha thung ngi, Mma ngi kdiyou thungki Mma' ksan pchaang rang ava' hinni kdung ngi owngda tqa tu' kilqhi ngi rinktham chda. Ungta Mma ngi rinko'owi dok ki makparlaan chaak ava ngi mrinktham chaak avah arjaak piikda.
58005008	Mma ngi Chapa khat kurthuwk chleek yoso, Mma ngi tyat mdoperteel chaakna' 'leenni tethe topqowina' avah kurchuk chda.
58005009	Ungta mdopurkhum piik chaak leiyi, Mma ngi tethe kopqowi kcha' mkheng rek hinni ktlangknai kma' tkirliinna' ki mukpu avah kurthuwk chda.
58005010	Ungta Mma' avah Isowr rih Melkaijadek kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi thimpu kenreelsi purthuhda.
58005011	Neen nih hava' ki mlei thung ngi tethe raan knempok ki ka'am pdainu naan nih ado'arjaak dehmaan leiyi, tethena' kparsa a.
58005012	Dakat tih 'tunnu naanna chukpu kurthuwk dok chraan ptih. Pdainu Isowr pauna kindit rek ava' ki mbul ava' ki mlei avah kuwmiikhat tih veikhat adotpurchuh raan thah ktla a. Mleiya naanna then kapchai kcha pchaang kma' ungta arnu kyown meek kurthuwk kcha'in imptih.
58005013	Arnu kyown meeksli kuwkhat leh ngi, tidit tah nau kdowng mkurthuhn leiyi, rinkinditna' ki mleiyi tpurchuhna' avah mdodeh pindit khot pemeh.
58005014	Pdainu thendak avah kver dok kcha' mmaan ava' ki then. Mleiya mmaan nih muplungrilin avah kqha le' kthi tedeh pinditna' thung ngi kdet kmah mdopurchuh chaak dokin.
58006001	Avaleiyi, neen nih Khrista ki tkurchuhna' mbul rek avah imapthiin cheh rang ngi, kurkhum ava' thuh ichetin cheh. Mleiya neen nih veikhat nowl lih kdiyou kcha' nong rek thungki plung tperthlenna' le' Isowr hinni lamtrin chaakna' ki innmun phunnowl maancheh.
58006002	Tidit tah diiluwna' rek leiyi, tkurchuhna', baan tathlaanna' reklu, kdiyou rinkerheelna' ungta ktlangknai kma' pau tpinditna'lu avah themaan cheh.
58006003	Ungta hava'le' avah Isowr rih mitrotpiikin bih, neen nih totlot chaak daat raan.
58006004	Mleiya mpha khat thung ngi mar'aang mdopiik dok rek ungta parvaan ki chla kpertem dok kcha' rek ungta Pthla Kchiir karlaang dok kcha' rek aangqhe ka'am dok lam.
58006005	Ungta mmaan nih Isowr pauna avah mdopertem chaak dokin ungta karvang bei rang dultipaam ava' ki ruhtan rek avah mdopertem chaak dokin.
58006006	Ungta mmaan ava ngi mdil mkerheel chaakin bih, mmaan nih muplungin mdoperthlenna' raan ki thenni mveiknitna' tarvanqhi lamna' rah m'lam am nimeh. Mleiya mmaan nih Isowr Chapa avah mkhutkat inni mveiknitna' mopthowi inna ungta mmaan nih Mma' avah ningkya mpiik inna.
58006007	Tidit tah dulti ava ngi m'leen nih krah khu avah prowpda ungta ava ngi msitpum dow rek pthuwkda ungta dulti knum kcha' rekki mchei avah mdo'arkun chaakin. Mleiya dulti ava ngi Isowr hinki suwqhat avah mdo'arlaan chaak.
58006008	Pdainu tirling le' lingkhu kupthuwk dulti avah msit amna' ka'am pemeh ungta avah pauhor tbuk ki ka'am kcha' a. Ungta mqutna' thung ngu avah tapkaak pthi ngi ka'am kcha' a.
58006009	Pdainu kvonsat'lown rekin, neen nih hanto ngi the chdaat yown ringngi, naan nih dow kqhabet tidit tah tkirliinna' tu' kilqhi dow rek pthuwknaan tidit tih a'leenin nih kuplungin avah krip kcha' a.
58006010	Mleiya Isowr rah mrinkindit kma'lu pemeh. Mma ngi naan anongtlotin ungta Mma' miing leiyi, kdung ngi vonsat tih sop'adolow chaakin. Tidit tah naan nih Mma' miikenje rek hinni sop'adolow chaakin ungta 'tun rukku mmaan avah sop'alow chaak tlit daat inna. Naan nih vonsat adotedet chaaknaan nong rek avah Mma ngi perngeel nimeh.
58006011	Ungta neen nih naan akheng inni plungbinpsuk ki plungrina' ava' thung ngi mqutna' kpha thung ngi hava' heppi plung adopluw chaak raan kdongei chaakin.
58006012	Tidit tah naan nih howngkva ngi a'am raan avah ngeimaan ring. Mleiya naan nih lamrinna' le' ksowt tih tidiildehna' ar'aang ngi Isowr rih pau mdoreel dok rek ava' alrouchom mih kchom kcha' rek mmaan ava' dotlot heppi adotlot chaak raan.
58006013	Mleiya Mma ngi Abraham hinni pau mreel thung ngi, Mma' han'tun nih klin mdotham rah ma'amma leiyi, Mma ngi mdak karthamda pau mdoreel.
58006014	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi nang nga suwqhat apii langlang nikdi', Ungta Neiyi nang avah atuppung nikdi,” dida. (Rnp. 22:17)
58006015	Ungta Abraham mih ningkakraal lih mdiil chaak dilli mma ngi paureel avah arlaang chda.
58006016	Mleiya dultimii ngi mmaan hinni klin ava' thamda pau mdoreel ungta paureel ava ngi mdothe pau avah mdotepne bet ungta ava ngi tkerteenna' rang mkheng avah mdopa'am pemeh.
58006017	Anto' heppi Isowr rih Mma' plungbinrit avah kertlei liit nimeh tidit avah Paureel ava' ki piipa rek hinni mdopandan nuwm leiyi Mma ngi avah paureel lih mdopindit.
58006018	Tidit tah kertlei pchaang kma' rang dow 'knii rek leiyi, Isowr a pleinei pchaang meh. Mleiya havah neen nih kdung ngi arda toprow chaakna' raan ungta karsan kcha' rang ki thenni, Mma' hinni heikchen kcha' neenki nduhsuk thaan nih midotithiik piikin plungbinpsuk ava' tokyown chaakna' raan ki then.
58006019	Neen nih hava' plungbinpsuk avah nuplungrinin ki thenni thiirkuwikin nih tothlowi chaakin ungta havah kindit ungta knet. Ungta hava ngi buw'inn thungki buwyaar rilki Mmun Kenjesi avah mdopthlen.
58006020	Mmun ava'kat thung ngi neen nduhn nih kchet, Jisu ngi neen nakchang inni ava' thuh luwtda. Ungta Mma ngi Melkaijadek hep daat tih, ktlangknai kma' thimpu kenreelsi avah kurthuwk dok kcha'.
58007001	Mleiya hava' Melkaijadek avah Salem ki paamkruwng ungta mma' avah Kparthaangsi Isowr ava' ki thimpu khat. Abraham mih paamkruwng rek eyou lam thida marvan kerheel thung ngi, Melkaijadek ki mma' avah kurdut qhida ungta mma ngi Abraham avah suwqhat pii chda.
58007002	Ungta Abraham mih pchaangda raan nih mdolow dow mkheng ki sowm ki khat avah Melkaijadek hinni piida. Mma' avah mmiing ki dilkqowiyi, mkhatna' thung ngi rinkindit ki paamkruwng ungta audilli Salem ki paamkruwng pi'ii mdit. Mningleiya nperheel bih, ‘plung kdai ki paamkruwng’ mdoditna'.
58007003	Mma' avah mnuh mditmata mpa ka'am pemeh, mqou mqauna' ruk ka'am pemeh ungta mdopqhunna' ruk ka'am pemeh mditmata mrinkum qutna' ruk ka'am pemeh. Pdainu mma' avah Isowr Chapa hep daat pthutda ungta ktlangknai kmah ngi thimpu khat tih ka'am kcha'.
58007004	'Tunnu abinin, hava' mii havah tya thung ngi klin chdaat a, tidit tah neenki tqou naan Abraham kpha ngi pchaangda raan nih mdolown dow rek ava' ki sowm ki khat mdopiik kah!
58007005	Ungta Levi chapa rekki thimpu rek arvang kurthuwk lamda ungta mii rek hinki tidit tah mu'umnau rekin hinki sowm ki khat avah qhai lamda. Hava' avah nowlam ki paupiik ka'am ksa ava'. Mleiya mmaan nih Abraham suruwl thungki kurthuwk chleeklam yoso, mmaan nih havah mdotlotin.
58007006	Pdainu Levi phung thung ngi mri mlam karvang kma'pa hava' mma' ava ngi Abraham hinki sowm ki khat arlaangda ungta paureel rek kthlowi kcha' mma' ava' hinni suwqhat piida.
58007007	'Tunnu kdilset ava ngi miklin ava' hinni suwqhat mpii ka, tidit avah tethe perkheelna' amvot nimeh.
58007008	Lam. khat thah havah, kdiyou kcha' mii ava ngi sowm ki khat avah mdo'arlaan, pdainu m'lam morson khatthang nowllu, mma' avah kring daat ungta sowm ki khat avah marlaan tlit daat tidit tih sakhi pii lamda.
58007009	Ungta hanto' rukku tethe krow tidit tah sowm ki khat karlaang kcha' rang, Levi phung kpha rukku Abraham ar'aang ngi sowm ki khat avah mpii ka.
58007010	Mleiya Melkaijadek ki Abraham mkurdutqhi thung vah Levi avah mpa daksa thung ngi ka'am chdaat.
58007011	Tidit tah Avaleiyi, kurkhum avah Levi phung rek, thimpu kurthuh ar'aang ngi mpurthuh pchaan rang ngu, Tidit tah ava' 'leenni nowlam avah mii rek hinni mdopiik. Taluleiyi, Aaron kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi ko'own kmah Melkaijadek kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi thimpu morson khat mthuh rang avah msit ka'am tlit daat toh?
58007012	Mleiya thimpu tkurthuhna' mkerthlen, leiyi nowlam ava' rukka mkerthlen rang thah ktla.
58007013	Tidit tah hava' dow rek ava' tethena' Mma' avah phungktlei morson khat thung ki ungta phung ava' thung ki kuwkhat leh ngi rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thuh soplow cha' mlai.
58007014	Mleiya neenki Kruwng avah Judah phung thungki tidit avah mkindit kat. Ungta phung ava'lei vah Moses tih thimpu ki mleiyi dow khatleh the meh.
58007015	Ungta Melkaijadek heppi thimpu ktlei khat mthuh bih, neen nih tetheen avah mpinditset thangnga.
58007016	Thimpu ktlei khat avah daksa lam ktong thah mdopiik paupiik ava' ki nowlam ki dilkqowiyi karvang pemeh. Pdainu k'qu tidit ktaak rinkum ki ruhtan dilkqowiyi karvang.
58007017	Mleiya Mma ngi hanto'theda, sakhi mdopiik: “Melkaijadek kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi Nang nga ktlangknai kma' thimpu khat ptih,” mdodit. (Luw. 110:4)
58007018	Mleiya 'lam khat thah, choduh ki paupiik avah mdown leiyi, ungta msit ma'amma leiyi, Isowr rih avah mdoknen pthi.
58007019	Mleiya nowlam ava ngi dow khatleh ruk kurkhum mdopthut pchaan pemeh. 'Lam khat thah Isowr rih kqhaset plungbinpsuk khat mipthuhpiikinda ungta neen nih ava' plungbinpsuk ava' ar'aang ngi Isowr hinni knai kcha' inpimin.
58007020	Ungta Mma' avah paureel ktaak ki thimpu mdopurthuh thlaang thlaang pemeh.
58007021	Mleiya mmaan nah paureel ktaak ki thimpu arvang kurthuwk lam, pdainu Mmah paureel khat thung ngi thimpu avah kkurthuwk. Mleiya Isowr rih paureel thamda Mma' hinni hanto ngi mdothe: “Kruwng ava ngi paureel thamda ungta Mma ngi muplungreel perthleng nimeh. ‘Melkaijadek kurthuhna' dilkqowiyi, Nang nga, ktlangknai kma.’ thimpu khat ptih,” mdodit. (Luw. 110:4)
58007022	Hava' paureeltham ava ngi Jisu ngi kqhaset pauqum ava' ki thenni kripiik ava' mdit mow? mdit mow?” ' kurthuwkda.
58007023	Ungta kdiyou ava ngi mdopkhaan lam leiyi, mmaan avah amtlit lam mda avaleiyi thimpu knempok rek arvan ka'am lam.
58007024	Pdainu Mma' avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ma'am tlit leiyi, Mmah kerthleng krow kma' thimpu kurthuwk chda.
58007025	Avaleiyi, Mma ngi, Mma' ar'aang ngi Isowr hinni karva kcha' rek mmaan avah pumsan nih mdosan chaak pchaan lam. Mleiya mmaan thenni rinkaktham piik chrang ngi Mmah ktlangknai kmah ngi kring.
58007026	Tidit tah Isowr rih neen nthen inni kurthutjik ki thimpu kenreelsi avah mitpiik chaak dok inna. Mleiya Mmah kchiir, mikiplim pemeh, ktobor pemeh, pnu kervei rek thungki kenje kcha', ungta parvaan hankkheel dek ki kparthaang.
58007027	Mma' avah thimpu kenreel morson reklu pemeh. Mma ngi rukri ngi Mma' mdak ki pnu rek thenni ungta mii rekki pnu rekki thenni, mnitmnit ki rinmdoparlaan chaakna' rang ki msit ammeh, Mleiya Mma ngi Mdakkat makparlaan chaak ava ngi mmaan pnu rekki thenni veikhadaat tih rinkakparlaan dok kcha'.
58007028	Mleiya nowlam ava ngi mruh kdowng dultimii rek avah thimpu kenreelsi rek kurthuwk rang ngi kcholda. Pdainu nowlam dil thah karvang paureeltham ava ngi ktlangknai kmah ngi kpurkhum Chapa ava' kcholda.
58008001	'Tunnu neen nih kdothenaan ki mlei klinsi avah hava': Tidit tah neen nih parvaan thah, Mlaarkneisi ava' kruwng longkhom machang ngi kok'ong Thimpu Kenreelsi ava' tothlowi chaakin.
58008002	Ungta dultimii ngi mdophunma Kruwng ava ngi mdophun kindit buw'inn dakdak ki Mmun Kenjesi ava' thung ngi Mma ngi sopmdolow chaak.
58008003	Mleiya thimpu kenreelsi rek khimkhei avah, chla rekle' rintparlaanna' rek ava' kparlaan rang ki thenni mmaan avah tokchol. Avaleiyi, hava' Khat ava' rukku talu varpleh khat mdoparlaan rang thah tlada.
58008004	Mleiya Mma' avah dultipaam thung ngi ka'am mkurthuh bih, Mmah thimpu kurthuwk nimeh. Mleiya nowlam dilkqowiyi chla rek ava' kparlaan kcha' thimpu rek ka'am lam.
58008005	Tidit tah mmaan ava ngi parvaan ki dow rek ava' kopqowiyi ungta tomkal lih thung ngi sopmdolow chaakin. Mleiya Moses tih buw'inn ksa rah mthe thung ngi mmah parvaan ki ngi mdopilqhit. Tidit tah Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi lown thah, Neiyi adokepdeh ruwngchen ava' dilkqowiyi dow mkheng avah atlot chaak mow, tidit asuw cha',” mdodit. (Mpk. 25:40)
58008006	Pdainu 'tunnu Mma ngi kenreelsi soplowna' avah mdo'arlaan chaak. Mleiya Mmah Isowr rih makqhaset paureel rek ava' thung ngi mdotham, pauqum kqhaset ava' ki Mikpalqhat kcha' khat ava'.
58008007	Mleiya mkhatna' pauqum ava ngi mkarmana' ma'amma bih, miknitna' ki thenni mmun avah thlaam nimeh.
58008008	Isowr rih mmaan doparmana' mdothlaam leiyi, hanto'theda: “Asuwn, ‘Neiyi Isreel innkhor thung ngi ungta Judah innkhor thung ngi, pauqum ren khat kdopqhanna' rah mpha avah arvang knai kcha' a,’ dida, Kruwng ngi mthe a.
58008009	Ungta hava' pauqum ren avah, ‘Neiyi mmaan avah Egypt paam thungki mkhut thaan nih kyowng lam nuh kqhi pthuhlam thung ngi, Mpu'mpa rekin hinni kdopiik pauqum ava' hep daat tlit nimeh.’ Mleiya mmaan nih ‘Nei kpauqum ava' thung ngi tethe kopqowiyi ma'ammaan leiyi, Neiyi mmaan avah tukkdosut lam pemeh,’ dida, Kruwng ngi mthe a.
58008010	Tidit tah ava' nit rek ava' mqut dilli, Neiyi Isreel innkhor thung ngi kdopqhan rang pauqum avah hava': ‘Mleiya Neiyi Nei ki knowlam rek avah mmaan plungril thung ngi pchip nikdi', ungta muplungchai in 'leenni mmaan avah kjit nikdi'. Ungta Neiya mmaan Isowr kurthuwk nikdi' ungta mmaan avah Nei kmii rek kurthuwk lamrah.’
58008011	Kuwkhat leh ngi mi'innveen mditmata mu'umnau khat hinni: ‘Kruwng avah adeipindih cha',’ mdoditna' ki msit am nimeh. Mleiya mikdilsi rukku ungta miklinsi rukku Neiya mekdei chlam rah.
58008012	Tidit tah Neiyi mmaan ki rinkinditna' 'leenni plungqhat hor nikdi' Ungta mmaan pnu arve rekle' nowlam tuksutmana' rek avah binphaak porsonpiik lam nimaang,” dida. (Jer. 31:31-34)
58008013	Ava' thung ngi Mma ngi: ‘Pauqum ren khat,’ dida, mdothe ava ngi mdopandan avah, Mma ngi choduh ki pauqum avah pli mdopthut pthi. 'Tunnu avah kdung ngi pli kurthuwk chda ungta kbeiyi kenvei chrah.
58009001	'Tunnu dultipaam ki mkhatna' buw'inn ava' thung ngi luwtbukna' ki nowparit rek avah ka'am.
58009002	Buw'inn avah hanto', mkhatna' innkhaar avah Mmun Kenjesi mdoditin ava'. Ava' thung ngi meilakuwng ava' amda, rintparlaanna' khaan ava' amda ungta tetdet thenpen avale' avah ka'am lam.
58009003	Ungta buw'inn ava' ki miknitna', buwjaar ava' thung ngi, innkhaar khat ka'am avah mmaan nih, Mmun Kenjesi, mdoditin.
58009004	Mmun ava' thung ngi namreng tapkaakna' jiiring ngi tsak rintparlaanna' khaan ungta jiiring ngi kloijik ki tupluwn pauqum buwr avah ka'am. Ungta mthung ngi maana tadaal jiiring bel le' mdei kuksun Aaron kchung ungta pauqum ki lungphel 'knii avah ava' thung ngi ka'am.
58009005	Ungta ava' 'tun nih cherubim konlorna' ava ngi plungqhat longkhom avah mtun nih pkhum lamda. Hava' dow rekki mlei avah 'tun neen nih mkindit avah the pchaang maanring.
58009006	'Tunnu hava'le' ava' mporthlon dok dilli, mniiktaiyi thimpu rekki buw'inn ki mkhatna' ava' thung ngi sopklow ngi kluwt kcha' kchok lam.
58009007	Pdainu miknitna' innkhaar ava' thung ngu thimpu kenreelsi ava' daat chrel lih, kum khat thung ngi veikhat daat chrel kluwt kcha'lu. Ungta mma ngi ava' thung ngi mma' mdak ki thenni ungta mii rekki mdodeh pindit maanni pnu mdo'arve dokin ki thenni rinkparlaan rah mvanluw chaak thung ngi, mma ngi hii ktaak ki kluwt lupemeh.
58009008	Tidit tah mkhatna' buw'inn ava' ma'am khimkhei thung ngu Mmun Kenjesi 'lam avah mdopandan pemeh tidit avah Pthla Kchiir ava ngi mdotedet dok.
58009009	Mleiya hava ngi tunpha ki thenni tedeh pinditna' khat kurthuwkda. Mleiya chla rekle' rintparlaanna' rek tparlaan ava ngi luwkbu kcha' rekki plungrildeh avah purtluwm pchaang meh.
58009010	Mleiya hava' nowren ava' marvan thuh kpha ki thenni ka'am chngaal. Tidit tah mmaan avah daksa 'lam ki nowparit rek tidit tah tchaak le' tneekna' ki mlei ungta mrit khat thung ngi mdetmdet ki tulqhutna' nowpa rek daat ngaal.
58009011	Pdainu Khrista ngi karvang bei rang dow kqha ava' ki Thimpu Kenreelsi kurthuwk ki arvangda. Tidit tah Mma ngi klinsi ngi ungta kurkhum set tih khut rekki tsakmah Mmun Kenjesi ava' thung ngi luwtda. Mleiya avah Isowr rih mdopurthuh hava' dultipaam thungki pemeh.
58009012	Mma ngi Mmun Kenjesi ava' thung ngi mluw thung ngi keel rekle' silsuwn rek hii sinda kluwt pemeh. Pdainu Mdakkat ki hii tu' kilqhi ngi veikhadaat tih kluwt kcha'. Ungta ava ngi Mma ngi ktlangknai kma' tkartlanna' avah mdo'arlaan chaak.
58009013	Mleiya silpa rekle' keel rek ungta sil'arla rek tapkaakna' purvuwt avah kertleu kma' rek 'leenni mikqhiincheu mmaan avah daksa 'lam thah kertleu chlamda.
58009014	Khrista ngi, ktlangknai kma' Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi tupsulna' ktaak liit tih, Isowr hinni Mdakkat avah kparlaan chda. Ava' vah Mma' hii ava' ngaalvah, naan nih kring Isowr sop'adolow chaakna' raan ki thenni tya kerkheel lih kdiyou nong rek thungki naan aplungrildeh rekin avah akipchiir piik pchaang chraanno?
58009015	Ungta hava' leiyi mdiyow chaak ava' ar'aang ngi Mma' avah pauqum ren ki Mikpalqhat kcha' ava' kurthuwkda. Ungta havah Mma ngi rukri ki pauqum ava' kurduh ngi nowlam kupkui rek mmaan ava' mdoktlan lamna' rang ki then. Mleiya havah Isowr rih pau mdoreel dok heppi Mma ngi mdo'own chaak dok rekki ktlangknai kmah alroukchom ava' mkurthuh chaakna' raan ki then.
58009016	Mleiya pauqum khat mapqhan daat le' kapqhang kcha' mma' avah mdiyow rang thah tlada.
58009017	Mleiya mii rek mdiyown dilli, pauqum avah topqowi rotlu ungta ava' kapqhang mii ava' ma'am daat arlaan nuh pauqum avah mruhtan ka'amvot lupemeh.
58009018	Avaleiyi, Isowr rih rukri ki pauqum avah hii ktaak ki mdopqhan pemeh.
58009019	Moses tih nowlam ava' ki paupiik rek khimkhei avah mii mkheng rek hinni mthethut dok dilli, mma ngi silsuwn rekle' keel rek hii ava' louda ungta saamul ksen ungta hyssop kuwng louda laika ava' 'leenni ungta mii mkheng rek 'leenni avah mdokqhi.
58009020	Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Havah naan ahin nih Isowr rih paupiik ki adotpiikin hii ki pauqum ava,” dida. (Mpk. 24:8)
58009021	Audilli ava' heppi mma ngi anto' heppi buw'inn le' soptolowna' beel'uwm rek mkheng avale' 'leenni hii avah kqhikda.
58009022	Ungta dakkat tih nowlam dilkqowiyi dow mkheng kheng souvih, hii ava ngi mdoktleu'in. Ungta hii kbuw kma' donle pnu toptlot piikna' ka'am pemeh.
58009023	Avaleiyi, parvaan ki dow rek ava' ki mirlim rek avah hava' rintparlaanna' ava ngi tipchiir rang thah tlada. Pdainu parvaan ki dow rek mmaan kat avah, hava'le' hinni kqhaset tih rintparlaan dok.
58009024	Mleiya Khrista ngi dultimii ngi mdoseem kindit kat ava' ki mirlim rek tidit tah Mmun Kenje rek ava' thung ngi kluwt pemeh. Pdainu 'tun neen nthen inni Isowr hinni midotkandan piikna' raan ki thenni parvaan kat ava' thung ngi luwtda.
58009025	Mleiya thimpu kenreel rekki ktlok morson rek hii sin lamda kum ktaiyi Mmun Kenjesi ava' thung ngi kluwt kchok lam. Ava' hep pih, Mma ngi kornowl kornowl lih Mdak makparlaan chaak thliinthliin mana' rah kluwt dok kcha'.
58009026	Mditma bih, dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kupqhun vah Khrista avah veitya veitya thung ngi suwkkthuwk chrah. Pdainu 'tunnu Mma ngi pnu tuknuwl pthina' rang ki thenni mphaqutna' thung ngi Mma ngi mdakkat makparlaan chaak ava ngi kandangda.
58009027	Dultimii ngi veikhatpang mdiyow rang avah Isowr rih mdopelreen dok. Ava'dil lih pau tpinditna' karvang chrah.
58009028	Ava' heppi pnu knempok rekki thenni Khrista avah veikhadaat mdoparlaan. Ningkakraal lih karda kcha' rek hinni Mma ngi, pnu thungki kekneeng ngi pdainu tkirliinna' ki thenni mveiknitna' Mmah kandang rah.
58010001	Nowlam tidit avah karvang bei rang dow kqha rekki mirlim rek ngaal, mlanglang pemeh. Mleiya mmaan nih kum ktaiyi rintparlaanna' ava'kat tih mdoparlaanin, mleiya ava ngi luwkbu kcha' rek mmaan avah teden rukku purkhum pchaang lam nimeh.
58010002	Ungta ava ngi mkindit mkurthuh bih, mmaan nih rintparlaan rek avah mdomaak raan thah ktla. Anto' rang pda? Mmaan nih veikhatpang rintparlaan ava ngi luwkbu kcha' rek avah mpertleu pchaan bih, mmaan nih mupnu arve chaakin leiyi, mraalin ka'am mih kirbin lam nimeh.
58010003	Pdainu kum kum thah ava' rintparlaanna' ava ngi mupnu arve rekin avah tipbin phaak tlit chlamda.
58010004	Mleiya silpa rekle' keel rek hii ava ngi pnu klou pthi rang tidit avah kurthuwk liit rang pemeh.
58010005	Avaleiyi, Khrista ngi dultipaam thuh murjun thung ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi rintparlaan rekle' tparlaan chaak dow rek ava' ngeen mtih, pdainu nang ngi nei kthen nih adoporthlon chaak daksa ava,” mdodit.
58010006	“Nang ngi pnu rek leiyi, meirinparlaan le' rintparlaanna' rek thung ngi aplungngam ka'am pemeh.”
58010007	Avaleiyi, Neiyi thenu: “Asuw, Neiya kurjung imping! Mmaan nih Nei kleiyi laikakuwl thung ngi kjitda ka'am. O Isowr! Neiya nang aplungbin ktlow rah kurjung ping,’ kdodit,” mdoditin. (Luw. 40:6-8)
58010008	Rukrirep pih Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Nang ngi rintparlaanna' rekle' tparlaan dow rek ava' ngeen mtih. Nang ngi pnu leiyi, meirinparlaan le' rintparlaan dow rek ava' thung ngi aplung ngamna' ka'am pemeh,” dida. 'Tunnu nowlam dilkqowiyi dultimii rekki hava'le' avah mdoparlaanin.
58010009	Audilli Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Asuw, o Isowr! Neiya nang aplungbin ktlow rah kurjung kcha' imping,” dida. Mma ngi miknitna' ava' mdopqhanna' rang ki thenni mkhatna' avah loupthida.
58010010	Isowr plungbin mdotlot chaak ava ngi Jisu Khrista ngi neenna Kenje kcha' mipthutinda. Mma ngi mdaksa avah veikhadaat tih mqutna' ngi makparlaan chaak ava ngi havah mdotlot.
58010011	Ungta thimpu khimkheiyi mniiktaiyi rip lamda ungta teden rukku pnu rek ava' kloupthi pchaang kma' rang rintparlaanna' khadaat ava' thina'daat parlaan chlamda.
58010012	Pdainu hava' mii ava ngi mpha mkheng ki thenni pnu leiyi, rintparlaanna' khat ava' mparlaan chaak dilli Mma ngi Isowr machang thah ko'ong chda.
58010013	Mpha ava' thung ki kupqhun nih Mma ngi mmiihal rek avah Mma' khuhther rih mdothiik piik rah mdo’ardat daat.
58010014	Mleiya veikhadaat chrel lih rinmdoparlaan chaak ava ngi Mma ngi mdopchiir chaak dok rek mmaan avah ktlangknai kma' ki thenni purkhum chlamda.
58010015	Ungta Pthla Kchiir ava' rukku, neen nihinin nih sakhi midotpiik chaak dokin.
58010016	Mleiya Mma ngi choduhrep pih hanto'theda: “Kruwng Neiyi kthe a, havah Neiyi mmaan tu' kdopqhan rang pauqum ava'. Nit rek ava' dilli Neiyi knowlam rek avah mmaan plung rek thung ngi pchip nikdi'. Ungta Neiyi avah mmaan plungchai rek thung ngi kjit nikdi,” mdodit, dida. (Jer. 31:33)
58010017	Ungta ava' dilli, Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Neiyi mmaan pnu arve rekle' nowlam tuksutmana' rek avah binphaak piiklam nimaang,” mdodit. (Jer. 31:34)
58010018	'Tunnu pnu toptlot piikna' ma'am khimkhei thung ngi, pnu leiyi, rintparlaan ki msit amporson nimeh.
58010019	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rekin, Jisu ki hii ava'leiyi neen nih Mmun Kenjesi ava' thung ngi tuluw chaakna' ki plungkrip avah tothlowi chaak dokin.
58010020	Mleiya Mma ngi Mmun Kenjesi kepthleng, ren ungta kring 'lam avah neen nthen inni mitlotpiik inda, tidit tah 'lam avah Mma' daksa ava'.
58010021	Ungta neen nih Isowr inn ava' thung ngi ka'am Thimpu Kenreelsi avah nthlowi chaak dok inna.
58010022	Ava'leiyi neen nih lamrin ki plungkrip kurkhumna' thung ngi plung kindit tu' kilqhi ngi Isowr hinni inai chaan cheh. Mleiya Mma ngi neen avah kqha kma' plungrildeh thungki nuplung rekin avah m'leen nih Mihii kqhikda midotulqhut piik dokin. Ungta Mma ngi neen ndaksa rekin avah dii kchiir rih midotulqhut chaak dokin.
58010023	Neen nih, tethethut dokin plungbinpsuk avah knetmer rih ikyowng chaan cheh, tidit tah paukreel Mma' avah trinchaak krow.
58010024	Ungta neen nih khat le' khat hinni taluhep pih vonsat le' kqhanong rekki tkorsow chaak rang tidit ibinin cheh.
58010025	Ungta neen nih mii aangqhe rekki mnowpaan mdopthutin heppi munkhat thuh tkurtuwl chaakna' avah mapthi maan cheh. Ungta neen nih khat le' khat ikorsop deiyin cheh ungta neen nih Nit ava' avah marvannai chaak tedehn ava ngi kerkheel setset tih ikorsop chaan cheh.
58010026	Mleiya neen nih kindit ki tedeh pinditna' ava' narlaan chaakin dilli, ndeh daat chunin nih pnu nerve chaak tlit daatin bih, pnu ki thenni rintparlaanna' morson ka'am pemeh.
58010027	Pdainu tiqit kervei pau tpinditna' tbinphaak raan avale' Mma' kikthitna' rek kbun chaak beina' rah plungthit mei kquwng ava' daat ka'am.
58010028	Kuwmiikhat tih Moses nowlam kikthitna' ma'am bih, mii 'knii mditmata kdum ki sakhipiik ava ngi mma' avah plungqhat ktaak ki kdiyou chdaat.
58010029	Mdittu' Isowr Chapa Mma' avah mkhuh ngi ktherthen ungta mma' mdak kipchiir kcha' pauqum ki hii avah ktobor rih kbin, ungta plungnee ki Pthla ava' ningkyakpii, mii ava' ki mraal suwkthuhna' avah tya kdung ngi karlaang kcha' ki mtik kcha rang ngo?
58010030	Mleiya hava' kthe Mma' avah neen nih ndehn, Kruwng ngi hanto'theda: “Phuw klou rang avah Nei, Neiyi purthuwl nikdi,” dida. (Knl. 32:35) Ungta veikhat, “Kruwng ngi Mma' mii rek 'leenni paukpindit rah,” mdodit. (Knl. 32:36)
58010031	Kring Isowr ava' khut thung ngi tatlaak rang avah ningqitna'.
58010032	Pdainu naan nih, mar'aang ava' arlaan chaakin dilli tyat tperteelna' klin thung ngi kepteng ngi arichaak naan choduh ki nit rek avah abinphaakin.
58010033	Mpha khat thuh naanna miipiipa maiyi mii rekki ningkya apiinda ungta tyattraanna' rek duh chaan tinu ungta mpha morson khat thung ngi, naan nih ava' hep kduh kcha' rektu' avah riqhisap chaan tinu.
58010034	Mleiya naan athenni ktluwk alrou kqhaset ka'am tidit adodeh chaak lei inni, naan nih, neiya rowng'inn thuh ka'am thung ngi plung mapkham chaan tinu ungta mii rekki ado'ana rekin adotolown chaakin avah kanpa ngi adorot chaakin.
58010035	Avaleiyi, naan nih mnongqhat'lot klin nih ka'am naanki plungkrip adothlowi chaakin avah mapthimaan.
58010036	Mleiya naan nih Isowr plungbin ava' atlot chaakin dilli, paureel ava' ado'arlaan chaakna' raan ki thenni, tidiildeh chaakna' avah adothlowi chaak raan thah ktla.
58010037	“Mleiya, mpha mruk dilli kurjung rang Mma' avah kurjung rah ungta Mmah ktow nimeh.
58010038	'Tunnu mii kindit avah mlamrin nih kring chrah. Pdainu kuwmiikhat plung kperheel kcha' ma'am bih, mma' thung ngi tkanpatna' ammeh.” (Hab. 2:3-4)
58010039	Pdainu neenna kenvei kcha' thung ngi plung kperheel kcha' mmaan thungki inpimin pemeh. Pdainu plungrin kparkhaal kcha' rek mmaan thungki inpimin.
58011001	'Tunnu lamrin avah neen nih plung tbinpsukin dow rek ava' ki mkindit kat tedehna' ungta nmikin nih tedehmaan dow rek ava' ki mkandanna' ava'.
58011002	Mleiya lamrin ava ngi neen nduhn ki kver rek leiyi, Isowr rih sakhi kqha mdopiik lam.
58011003	Lamrin nih neen nih ndehn tidit tah dultipaam rek avah Isowr pauna ava ngi kurkhum deek ki mdopurthuh. Mleiya mik ki tedeh dow rek avah mik ki tedeh pchaan dow rek ava' thung ki ngi mdopurthuh pemeh.
58011004	Lamrin nih Abel lih Kein nih mdoparlaan hinni kqhabet avah Isowr hinni parlaan chda. Rintparlaan chaak ava ngi Isowr rih mrinkindit tidit ki mlei avah pandan piik chda. Isowr rih mma' chla rek leiyi, mdopandan piik ava ngi diyou chyoso 'tun kpha ngi mmah kpau chtlit daat.
58011005	Lamrin nih Isowr rih Enok avah 'tun thah mdo’arjuk loww chaak, tidit tah havah Enok ki kdiyou tidit mdodeh mana' rah mdotlot. “Ungta Isowr rih mdo’arjuk loww dok leiyi, mma' avah tathlaam mdophanin pemeh.” (Rnp. 5:24) Mleiya Isowr rih mma' murjuklow chaakduh ngi, mma ngi Isowr plungngam tlow chda, tidit ki mrinpaumin ka'am.
58011006	Pdainu lamrin ktaak ki Isowr plungngam totlot tidit tah kurthuwk pchaang vot pemeh. Mleiya Mma' hinni kthleng kcha' mma' ava ngi Isowr ka'am tidit lammdorin chaak rah. Ungta Mma ngi Mma' kthlaam kcha' khimkhei rek hinni nongqhat'lot avah mdopiik tidit ruk lammdorin chaak rah.
58011007	Lamrin nih Noah ngi arkuwng klinpa avah mdosak. Isowr rih mdodeh liitma dow rek 'leenni mpilqhit thung ngi, mma ngi kenje ningqit tih avah mdoporthlon chaak. Hanto' mdotlot chaak ava ngi mma ngi mi'innmii rek avah san chda ungta dultipaam avah psulda. Ungta mma ngi lamrin thungki karvang rinkinditna' ki piipa kurthuwk chda.
58011008	Lamrin nih Abraham mih Isowr do'own avah pqowi chda. Isowr rih dil thah mma ngi alrouchom mih mdochom chaak bei rang mmun khat ava' thuh kchet rah own chda. Mma ngi tva thah qowi nikdi tidit deiliit myoso thuwkda kchet chdaat.
58011009	Lamrin nih Isowr rih mhin nih pau mdoreel dok paam ava' thung ngi mma ngi mal kurthuwkda arvan'amda. Mma ngi Aijek le' Jakob tung ngi buw'inn rek thung ngi arvan am lamda. Mmaan nih mma' tu' paureel ava' ki piipa ava' arvan kurthuwk sap lamda.
58011010	Mleiya mma ngi Isowr rih mbul pqhangda mdosak ungta mdopurthuh khuwpii ava' deinikdi', dida, mma ngi ava' arda chda.
58011011	Lamrin nih Sarah ngi vontchowina' ki ruhtan avah mdophan chaak. Mleiya mma ngi mvonchowina' ki mpha kerkheel chdaat yoso kurmuwngda nau khat mdopluk chaak. Mleiya mma ngi paukreel Mma' avah trinchaak krow tidit tih lammdorin chaak.
58011012	Avaleiyi, mma ngi mdiyowpha kpha kcha' ava' thung ngi, hava' miikhat hinki suruwl rek avah mma' thungki kqou. Mma' suruwl rek avah parvaan ki bursiya knem mih ungta truwnpii biingki sitphui chai ttai pchaanmah ya ngi knem.
58011013	Hava' mii rek mkheng avah, paureel rek ava' karlaang kcha' kmah ngi lamrin thung ngi diyou chlamda. Pdainu mmaan hinni mdothe pindit piikdok lam avah mmaan nih 'leer khat tih mdodeh chaak dokin ungta mdo'arlaan chaak dokin ungta ava' thuh plungkrip mdothlowi chaakin ungta mdo'arpom chaakin. Ungta mmaan nih hava' dultipaam thung ngu mal rek heppi ka'am inping tidit avah mdothethut chaakin.
58011014	Mleiya hanto' heppi kindit tih kthe rek mmaan ava ngi, mmaan nih mpaamin khat kthlaam inping tidit avah mpandan inna.
58011015	Ungta dakat tih mmaan ava ngi marvan thuhnaan mkhuwpaamin avah mbinphaakin bih, mmaan nih ava' thuh mvan kerheelna' raan changqhatna' kthlowi chdok lamrah.
58011016	Pdainu mmaan ava ngi makqhaset ava' mdosut thlaam chaakin, tidit tah avah parvaan ki khuwpaam ava'. Avaleiyi, Isowr mdak ki Mma' avah mmaan ki Isowr ping mdodit ava' thung ngi ningkya mdothlowi pemeh, mleiya Mma ngi khuwpii khat avah mmaan thenni mdoporthlon piiklam.
58011017	Lamrin nih Abraham mih, mma' mdoperteelna' khat thung ngi mma ngi Aijek avah mdoparlaan chaak. Ungta paureel rek karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi mchapa khatpak daat avah parlaan chda.
58011018	Mma' kat ava' hinni: “Neiyi achapa Aijek thungki ngi nang asuruwl avah own chnikdi',” mdodit. (Rnp. 21:12)
58011019	Mleiya Abraham mih Isowr rih Aijek avah kdiyou thungki kpha ruk mdoperdel pchaan tidit mdodeh chaak. Mleiya dakat tih nthe bih, mma ngi Aijek avah kdiyou kcha' thungki mdophan perheel chaak.
58011020	Lamrin nih Aijek ki Jakob le' Esau avah karvang bei rang dow rek ava'leiyi suwqhat pii chlamda.
58011021	Lamrin nih Jakob pih Joseph chapa rek avah khatkhat tih suwqhat pii chlamda ungta mma ngi kchungdo 'leenni kbaangda Isowr hinni luwbu chda.
58011022	Lamrin nih Joseph pih, Isreel nau sun chaakna' rang avah purphuwngda ungta mma ngi mmaan hinni mma' ruh rek leiyi, perseel lamda.
58011023	Lamrin nih Moses tah mnuhmpa ngi thla kdum thung ngi dowl chlamda. Mleiya mmaanve ngi mma' avah mruwngchen kqha nau tidit mdodehn leiyi, paamkruwng paureen avah mdoqit chaakin pemeh.
58011024	Lamrin nih Moses tih mver dilli, mii rekki mma' avah Pharoah chanu, chapa mdodit raan avah mdak ki mat chda.
58011025	Ungta mma ngi pnu thung ngi plupda kanpa ngi ta'am chaak rang ava' hinvah Isowr mii rek tung ngi tyattraan tperteel chaak rang ava' kchol chda.
58011026	Mleiya mma ngi Khrista thenni ningkya tperteel chaak ki Egypt thungki sum'alrou rek hinni svang tuthuhna' ka'am tidit dei chda. Mleiya mma ngi karvang rang nongqhat'lot ava' 'leenni mmik avah mdopchuk mer chaak.
58011027	Lamrin nih mma ngi paamkruwng plungthit mei kquwng ava' kqi kcha' kmah ngi Egypt paam avah mdomaak pthi. Mleiya mma ngi mik ki tedehma Mma' avah kdei kcha' heppi mdo'arvandiil chaak.
58011028	Lamrin nih mma ngi Taplaanna' avah dan chda ungta hii tikqhiina' avah mdodan chaak mditma bih, vonchowi mkhatna' kpenvei mma' ava ngi mmaan rukka kthong rah.
58011029	Lamrin nih mmaan nih truwnpii ksen avah mdoklaan chaakin ungta ava' heppi ktlow kcha' Egypt rek avah dii ngi mlow chaakterin.
58011030	Lamrin nih mmaan nih nii tikhiu thung ngi mloi dokin dilli Jerikho rowngbang avah tluw chda.
58011031	Lamrin nih dakkurjur Rahab pih tuprut sikhu rek avah plung kdaiyi mdo'arlaan chaak lam leiyi, lamkrin kma' rektu' kenvei kcha' lam pemeh.
58011032	Ungta talu morson the nikdih? Mleiya neiyi naan ahin nih, Gideon le' Barak le' Samson le' Jephtha ungta David le' Samuel ungta khulpu rekki rukka kdothena' rah mpha ammeh.
58011033	Mleiya mmaan ava ngi lamrin nih Kruwngpaalna' rek avah nampdowng lamda, mrininkindit tih chet chlamda, paureel rek avah arlaang chlamda, humpu nehr artlun pchaang chlamda.
58011034	Ungta mmaan nih mei ruhtan pdai pchaang lamda, raal'kaang haa thungki kerthlet chlamda, mruhdown naan thungki ruhtan phang chlamda, raal thung ngi pauqha kurthuwk chlamda, paamktlei rekki raalmii rek avah karnaakqhi pchaang lamda.
58011035	Snu rekki mmaan ki kdiyou dok kcha' rek avah veikhat rinkum thah tperdel piikna phang chlamda. Ungta morson aangqhe rek avah, mmaan nih makqhaset rinkerheelna' mdophan chaakna' raan ki thenni mii ngi mdoktlan raan mat chlamda tyat chiireelna' avah mdoperteel chaakin.
58011036	Mmaan aangqhe rek avah mii rekki pnichaak lamda ungta rii kchung ngi prei lamda ungta morson aangqhe rek nowl avah thiirrii ngi bowl lamda ungta rowng'inn thuh daalpthi lamda.
58011037	Mleiya mmaan avah lung ngi deeng lamda ungta horaiyi thum 'knii ngi punthum lamda, kdung ngi pthleem lamda, raal'kaang ngi reen lamda. Ungta mmaan nih mi'inn mlou ktaak ki, tyat chiireelna' kperteel lih, ungta to'owr chaak ki arvang ka'am kcha'lam.
58011038	Mmaan ki thenvah dultipaam avah trinchaak krow pemeh. Mleiya mmaan nih paamkbiik laiyi konthot konthot lamda lown rek thung ngi ungta lungkhor le' dultikhor rek thung ngi arvang ka'am kcha'lam.
58011039	Ungta hava'le' mkheng ava ngi lamrin nih mrinpauminin kqha kqha arlaang chlamda pdainu paureel avah arlaang chlammeh.
58011040	Mleiya Isowr rih neen nthen inni makqhaset dow rek avah midotreel piik inni, mmaan avah msik ki neen ktaak ki mdopurkhum lam pemeh.
58012001	Avaleiyi, neen rukka, armei knemya knem mih miksutpqowi daat rek inni midotutkhul daatin leiyi, nbowr riinaan khimkhei ungta ko'oltek ki miktepmen raan pnu avah ipthlapthi dokin cheh. Ungta neen nduhsuk inni midotithiik piik dok tchenpertena' ava' thung ngi tidiildeh chaak tu' kilqhi ngi ichen chaan cheh.
58012002	Mleiya neen nih neenki nlamrinin ki mukpu ungta mikpurkhum piik kchaan Jisu hinni nmikin avah ipchuk chaan cheh. Mleiya Mma ngi mduhsuk thah mthen nih kanpa plung ngamna' ava'leiyi khros 'leenki tyattraan avah diil chda ungta Mma ngi ningkyana' tukmdosutma ava ngi Isowr ki Kruwng longkhom ava' ki machang thah kok'ong kcha'.
58012003	Mleiya naan nih, pnu kervei rekki pteng lamda Mma' mrotmaan thung ngi Mma ngi, taluhep pih avah mdiil chaak tidit avah abinphaakin, mditma bih aplungrinin thung ngi plungyatna' le' ardathitna' kthuwk rah.
58012004	Ungta naan nih pnu kepteng ngi araalnaakin ava' thung ngi ahiin kbuwkpha ngi karnaakqhi mlai inptih.
58012005	Ungta naan nih chapa rek heppi ahinin nih tkorsowna' pau tethe avah aperngeel pthi dok inna. Mleiya hanto'theda: “Kchapa rek naan nih, Kruwng ngi archak inda adotpurchuwn avah tukksut kma' tlowmaan. Mditmata Mma ngi atraiyin thung ngi arda kthi tlowmaan.
58012006	Mleiya Kruwng ngi vonsat mdolow mma' avah Mma ngi archakda mdopurchuh. Ungta Mma ngi mdo'arlaan chaak chapa rek khimkhei avah rii kchung ngi mdopreilu.” (Luw. 3:11-12)
58012007	Naan nih archakda tpurchuhna' ava' adiildeh chaakin bih, Isowr rih chapa rek heppi aksutpqowi chraan. Mleiya taluhep kduh chapada mpa ngi archakda mdopurchuh liitma a?
58012008	Pdainu nang ngi archakda tpurchuhma ngi a'am chaak bih, nang nga chapa dakdak ptipmeh ungta chlam ptih, tidit tah mii mkheng avah ava' hepthina ngi karvang.
58012009	Ava' han'tun nih neen mikpindit kchaan, dultipaam ki npa rekin ka'am lam ungta mmaan avah neen nih takyat chaakin. Ava' vah neen nih pthla rekle' rinkum ki Pa ava' hin ngaal vah, korthlongjap kcha ngi takparlaan chaak raan pemeh mow?
58012010	Mleiya dakat tih mmaan ava' vah nit mruk ki then daat tih, karlaangsap kcha' rek tkurthuhna' raan ki thenni rinchan now avah midopturchuh chaakin.
58012011	'Tunnu te'etrai tidit avah 'tun'tun ki thenvah tkanpatna' ammeh, plungyatna'. Pdainu ava'kat thung ngi kurchuk kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi dil thah plung kdai kpii rinkinditna' ki mchei mdo'arkun chaakin.
58012012	Avaleiyi, naan nih kthowi chda ka'am kcha' khut rek ungta kunchuwn kcha' pkhup rek avah ruhtan apii chaan.
58012013	Ungta naan nih, akhuhn ki thenni 'lam avah apirji chaan, mdit bih, mkhuh kyeng ava' rukka kirtlingyok nimeh ungta tadam ruk kdam chrah.
58012014	Mii mkheng tung ngi plung kdaiyi ikirbi chaan ungta kenje avah athlaam chaan, ava' kma'don kuwkhat leh ngi Kruwng avah dei nimeh.
58012015	Mleiya neen kuwkhat leh rukka Isowr plungnee ava' thung ki taptat chaakmana' raan ki thenni kdung ngi isuwdei chaan cheh. Mditma bih kkha ava ngi murjung vardon tyatna' kupthuwk krow, ungta hava' ava ngi mii knempok ki ktopbor rah.
58012016	Mditma bih jowlkpurju mditmata baarkhat daat tih chapa kver tkurthuhna' ki mqouna' ruhtan kyurpthi Esau hep daat mii ka'am rah.
58012017	Mleiya mdil thah Esau ngi suwqhat avah alrouchom mih tarlaan chaak rah mbin thung ngi mma' avah mmdoken pthi tidit avah naan nih adehn. Mleiya mma ngi kdung ngi plung kluwt tih, mirthlikbu ngi thlaam chdaat yoso, mma ngi plung mdoperthlen chaakna' rang ki mmun mdophan chaak pemeh.
58012018	Naan nih adokmei pchaanin ungta meiyi kka kcha' ungta kvom kcha' ungta kjiing kcha' ungta tchangkhu doraan lown khat ava' thuh karvaan ptihmeh.
58012019	Ungta puwtit khat mditmata karja rek ava ngi pauna morson arja chnum maanring, dida maktham chaak naan kpau archaang ava' thung thah karvaan ptipmeh.
58012020	Mleiya mmaan nih paupiik mdopiik avah mdodiil chaak pchaanin pemeh. “Ungta saa rek kpha rukku lown ava' mthownin bih, ava' saa avah lung ngi tedeenyow rah mditmata jel lih tkayow rah.” (Mpk. 19:12-13)
58012021	Ungta Moses tih mdothe avah tsut thuh kdung ngi ningqitna': “Neiya kdung ngi kningkqi a ungta kunchuwn imping.” (Knl. 9:19)
58012022	Pdainu naanna kring Isowr khuwpii, parvaan ki Jerusalem, mchai ttai pchaanmah vaantamsi rek amna' Jion lown thah karvaan ptih.
58012023	Ungta naanna parvaan thah mmiing mdokjit dok rukri kqou dok kcha' rekki lamrinlop ungta miiloppii ava' thung ngi karva dok kchaan ptih. Ungta naanna mkheng ki paukpindit Isowr ungta mii kindit rek pthla ava' kpurkhum kcha' ava' hinni karva dok kchaan ptih.
58012024	Ungta naanna, pauqum ren thung ngi Mikpalqhat, Jisu hinni ungta hii tikqhiina' thung ngi, Abel hinni mdang kqha ava' thung ngi karva kcha' inptih.
58012025	Naan nih kpau slimeek Mma' avah adomat chaakmana' raan ki thenni ikilrindei chaan. Mleiya hava' dultipaam thung ngi kpau meeksli ava' kmat kcha' rekki Mma' hinki kerthlet pchaang chlam pemeh. Mdit bih, neen nih parvaan ki ngi kpau Mma' ava' hinki nkerheel daakin bih, Mma' hinki tkerthleena' avah kdung ngi kparsa rah.
58012026	Mleiya Mma' avah mokrowl daat rukku dultipaam avah mdopun chuwn. Ungta 'tunnu Mma ngi paureel khat tih hanto'theda: “Neiyi veikhat dultipaam daat kma' parvaan rukka knok nimaang,” (Hgg. 2:6)
58012027	'Tunnu hava' “Veikhat nowl lih,” mdodit avah, kakna dow rek khimkhei mdolow pthina' rah tidit mkandanna' tidit tah mdopurthuh dok dow rek ava'arlak ki kakna kma' rek avah ka'am chdaat rah tidit ki mkandanna'.
58012028	Avaleiyi, neen nih kakna pchaang kma' rah Kruwngpaalna' khat ava' tutlun chaak raan leiyi, neen nih takparlaan chaakin tu' ungta Isowr kqi kcha' tu' kilqhi ngi trotpiik krow ngi Isowr hinni soptolow chaakna' raanni plungnee avah ithlowi chaan cheh.
58012029	Mleiya neenki Isowr avah kyon nih kka mei ava'.
58013001	Naan nih khat le' khat avah unaukat heppi vonsat korlow tlit tih i'amin.
58013002	Naan nih mal rek aptlungdei chaan. Mleiya mmaan nih havalu mdotlot chaakin thung ngi kdei dok kmah ngi vaantamsi rek avah mal heppi kuptlung kcha' mii aangqhe rek ka'am lam.
58013003	Naan nih rowng'inn thuh ka'am rek avah rowng'inn thuh adakin ka'am kcha' heppi abinphaak chaan. Ungta mii ngi mmeel kthi ngi mdo'owr chaak rek avah naan adaksaan kat 'leenki heppi abinin rah abinphaak chaan.
58013004	Dow mkheng thung ngi kchiir inneena' avah takyat chaak rah ungta kowm avah ktobor pemeh pdainu jowlkpurju rekle' lowsangkqhi rek avah Isowr rih paukpindit chrah.
58013005	Naan nih arinchanin avah tpunjuwrna' ktaak apthutin ungta 'tun adothlowi chaakin ava' thung ngi ikhopdei chaan. Mleiya Mma' mdakkat tih hanto'theda: “Neiyi naan avah asun daak nimaan ring ungta amapthi nimaanring.” (Knl. 31:6,8 Js. 1:5)
58013006	Avaleiyi, neen nih nningkqi kmah: “Kruwng nga nei mokbom kcha', Neiyi ningpqit nimaang. Dultimii ngi nei ktun nih talu ktlow pchaang rang, tidit chaak krow.” (Luw. 118:6)
58013007	Naan nih naan a'leenin nih luwkqhi kurthuwkda Isowr pauna ahinin nih kthe rek mmaan avah abinphaakin. Ungta naan nih mmaan lamrin avah apqowiyin ungta mrinchanin avah kmin nih asutpqowi chaan.
58013008	Jisu Khrista avah janiruk, tuni ruk ungta ktlangknai kmah kerthleng tidit ka'am pemeh.
58013009	Ungta naan avah mdetmdet ki ungta ktlei liklik ki tkurchuhna' rek ava ngi naanna ayuqhi chdok maanso. Mleiya neen nih nuplungin avah plungnee ar'aang ngi knet tih tapqhan chaak inni kqha mleiya ava' thuh karsang kcha' rekki msit amna' ktaak thendam 'leenni tapqhan chaak raan pemeh.
58013010	Neen nih buw'inn thung ngi sopklow kcha' mmaan kuwkhat leh ngi ava' thung ki tchaakna' ruhtan mdothlowi pchaanmah rintparlaanna' khaan khat nthlowi chaak inna.
58013011	Mleiya thimpu kenreel lih pnu leiyi, mihii louda Mmun Kenjesi thung ngi mdo'arvanluwna' saa rek daksa avah mii'amna' buw'inn ava' duwn thah mdopkaak pthi luwn.
58013012	Avaleiyi, Jisu rukku mii rek avah Mdakkat hii ngi mdopenje chaak lamna' rah paltong duwn thah Mma ngi tyattraanna' perteel chda.
58013013	Avaleiyi, neen nih Mma' ningkyana' ava' ihorin cheh rang ngi mii'amna' buw'inn duwn thah Mma' hinni vaan cheh.
58013014	Mleiya hava' thuh ktluwk ki ka'am rah khuwpii ka'am pemeh pdainu neen nih karvang bei rang khat ava' tathlaam chaakin.
58013015	Avaleiyi, neen nih Mma' ar'aang ngi Mma' miing tpanpaak chaak ki tkerthethut chaak naan nnehrin ki mchei tidit tah Isowr tponlor chaakna' ki rintparlaanna' avah iparlaan tlit chaan cheh.
58013016	Pdainu naan nih kqha totlot chaak ungta tkirpiikdehna' avah perngeelmaan tidit tah hava' hep rintparlaanna' rek ava ngi Isowr plung mdopngam chaak.
58013017	Naan nih atun inni ka'am paamkpu ava' dothe apqowi chaan ungta adakin avah ikparlaan chaan. Mleiya mmaan avah anongtlot rekin ktai rangkat heppi mmaan nih naanki aplungrin rekin avah mdosut pqowiyin. Avaleiyi, mmaan nih plungkya kmah ngi kanpa ngi atlow lamso mditma bih avah naan athen inni msit amna' am nimeh.
58013018	Neen kthen inni rinmheiktham piik chaan, tidit tah neenna dow mkheng 'leenni pirdil chda ta'am tngei chaakna' thung ngi kuplungrildeh rekin kqha avah knet tih krip kcha'.
58013019	Pdainu neiyi mkenreelsi ngi naan ahin nih adokaktham chaakin avah kbeisek ki naan ahin nih neiya mdotpenletna' rah atlown.
58013020	'Tunnu ktlangknai kma' pauqum ava' hii ar'aang ngi tidit tah yau rekki Yaukqhi klin, neenki Kruwng Jisu kdiyou thungki kqhi perheel Isowr ava' hinki plung kdai,
58013021	ava ngi Mma' plungbin totlotna' nong kqha khimkhei thung ngi naan avah ayupurkhum chaanso. Mma ngi Mma' plung ngamna' miksut thung ngi Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi naan athung inni nong ayutlot piik chaanso. Mma' avah ktlangknai kmah konlor ikurthuwkso. Amen.
58013022	Ku'uknau rek neiyi naan ahin nih kaktham kcha' imping, tidit tah naan nih neiyi naan ahin nih pauna mruk kdokjit chaak ava' thung ngi tkorsow chaakna' 'leenni ikirdiildei chaan.
58013023	Naan nih havah adeiyin tidit tah neenve ngi nu'unnau'in Timothy avah ko'ol kcha' dok a, kbeiyi mma' mthlen bih neiyi mma' tu' naan avah adei chnikaandi'.
58013024	Naan akqhi kcha' rekin ungta miikenje rek mkheng avah mhei'arvuwi piik chaan. Italy ki mmaan rek ava ngi aturvuwi chaak inna.
58013025	Plungnee avah naan akhengin ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
59001001	Isowr le' Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki suwk'owr, James neiyi Isreel phung sowm lei'knii rek, chaat morson rek arlak ki kerjeida ka'am kcha' rek naan ahinin nih akurvuwi chaak inna.
59001002	Nei ku'uknau rek, naan nih mdetmdet ki tperteelna' rek thuh atlaak chaakin thung ngi mkheng avah tkanpatna' ngi atai chaan.
59001003	Mleiya alamrinin mdoperteelna' ava' thung ngi tidiildehna' avah mdopthuh tidit adeiyin.
59001004	Tidit tah naan nih dow khatleh kapta kma', kikriing kma' ungta kurkhum akurthuhna' raan ki thenni tidiildehna' ava ngi mnong avah kurkhum jik ki ayupqut piik chaanso.
59001005	Naan arlak inni kuwmiikhat luwkinritna' kapta a'amin cheentung ngi, mii mkheng hinni krai kmah ngi, plung knei dok ki kpii kcha' Isowr ava' hinni aqhil chso, ungta mma' hinni avah kpii chrah.
59001006	Pdainu mma ngi plung kpelqen liit kmah ngi lamrin nih mdoqhil chaak rah. Mleiya plung kpelqen kcha' mma' avah truwnpii thungki tirthli ngi raanda mdoponthoh pthi diinuk hep daat.
59001007	Mleiya ava' hep mii ava' vah mma ngi talutalu yoso Kruwng hinni arlaang chnikdi', tidit bincha' mso.
59001008	Mma' avah plung kpenqheek miilai, ungta mma ngi mdotlot mkheng avah knet pemeh.
59001009	Kyuwm kcha' nu'unnau'in ava ngi mma' mdotparthaan piikna' thung ngi mkanpatna' i'amso.
59001010	Pdainu svang kthuwk kcha' mma' avah mdopchomna' thuh mkanpatna' i'amso. Mleiya paamlai ki rei heppi mmah kqu chrah.
59001011	Mleiya kni ngi kepqek ki msat tu' kilqhi ngi thuwkda ungta chiibul avah satpurvuwida, mpaar rek avah qu chda. Ungta mruwngchen qhatin mkheng avah kenvei chda. Anto' heppi, svangpa ava' rukka mnongtlot chaak rek ava' thung ngi kchuwl chrah.
59001012	Kepthleem kdiil kcha' mma' avah msuwkqha. Mleiya mma ngi tperteelna' thuh mrichaak dilli, Kruwng ngi Mma' vonsat klow kcha' mii rek hinni pau mdoreel dok, rinkum ki laa luwkhum? avah mma ngi karlaang chrah.
59001013	Kuwkhat leh ngi kepthleem thuh mtlaak chaak thung ngi mma ngi: ‘Neiya Isowr rih mtepthleem a,’ di mso. Mleiya Isowr rah kqha kma' ava ngi mdopthleem pchaan pemeh mditmata Mma' mdakkat tih kuwkhat leh ruk pthleem meh.
59001014	Pdainu mii khimkhei avah mdakmdak dongei chaak kqha kma' ava ngi mma' avah porjowkda ungta tepngeida ava ngi kepthleem thuh ktla kcha'.
59001015	Audilli kqha kma' tngeina' ava ngi mkurmuwn cheu, pnu pluwda. Ungta pnu ava ngi mtan dok cheu, tidiyowna' pthuwkda.
59001016	Nei kvonsat ku'uknau rek, kuwkhat leh ngi ahuwng chmaanso.
59001017	Dow kqha tpiikna' khimkhei ungta kurkhum chla khimkhei avah tunki, tidit tah Mar'aang rek Pa, ava' hinki kurjung. Mma' avah mkerthlenna' ka'amvot pemeh mditmata arlim kerthlen nih kerthleng pemeh.
59001018	Mleiya neen nih Mma' dim rek arlak ki mkhatna' kchei ki, mdet khat ava' tkurthuhna' raan ki thenni Mma' plungbin dilkqowiyi, Mma ngi neen avah kindit pauna ngi midotupluk chaakin.
59001019	Avaleiyi, nei kvonsat'low ku'uknau rek, mii khimkheiyi kbeisek ki karjadei kcha', pdainu naamnaam mih kpau ungta naamnaam mih plungthit kohor ikurthuwkin.
59001020	Mleiya dultimii plungthit ava ngi Isowr ki rinkinditna' avah mdopthuh pemeh.
59001021	Avaleiyi, ktobor mkheng rekle' plungrilqhat mana' knempok rek mkheng avah amapthi dokin. Ungta naan nih apthlarin rekin ksan pchaang aplungrilin thung ngi adotapqau piik dokin pauna avah plung kdowng tu' kilqhi ngi arlaang chaan.
59001022	Mleiya naan nih tarjaak hehe daat tih arjada mthinaan nih kurhuwng kcha' kurthuwkmaan pdainu pauna ava' ki mnong ktlow kcha' ikurthuwkin.
59001023	Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih pauna avah tarjaak hehe daat tih arja thida mnong ktlow kma' mkurthuh bih mma' avah pthlasut thung ngi mdaksa mai ksuw kcha' miikhat ava' hep daat.
59001024	Mleiya mthina kursuw kcha' mma' ava ngi pthlasut aangki mkorlow dokcheu m'tunkat daat tih mma' avah taluhep kduh miilai ping tidit mdoperngeel pthiteng.
59001025	Pdainu to'ol chaakna' kpii nowlam kurkhum ksut thlaam kcha' mii avah ungta ava' ktlow tlit kcha' mma' avah kperngeel kmah ngi mdo'arjaak avah mnong ngi ktlow kcha' ava'. Mma ngi mnongtlot chaak ava' thung ngi suwqhat mphan chaak a.
59001026	Naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat avah rinko'owi kcha' dok ki kandang a. Pdainu mnehr rah kqen kma' ungta mthina ngi muplungchai kuhuwng kcha' mii ma'am bih ava' ki rin'owi avah msit amna' ammeh.
59001027	Isowr le' Pa ava' aang ngi kchiir ungta ktobor kma' rin'owi avah hava': Mnuhmpa ktaak rek ungta meikhu rekki suwk mthuh chaakin thung ngi kveldei kcha' ungta dultipaam ki kbih khadaat ruk m'leen nih kchuw kmah ngi ka'am ava'.
59002001	Nei ku'uknau rek, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista, konlor ki Kruwng ava' ki lamrin avah naan nih mikmai tsutna' thung ngi sinton maan.
59002002	Mleiya naanki kunpun ava' thung ngi kuwmiikhat tah jiiring khutpaar nada buwdiir kqha hilnada kthleng ka'am rah. Ungta buwdiir kthi kihilkna kcha' srah kuwmiikhat ruk kthleng rah.
59002003	Ungta naan nih buwdiir kqha kihilkna kcha' rek hinni plung pluwt betin tinu ungta naan nih mma' hinni hanto' adotheen. “Nang nga hava' mmun kqha thung ngi mheiko'on piikcha',” diin tinu ungta srah ava' hinvah: “Nang nga hava' thuh iripdaat,” mditmata, “kukhuhther rih iko'ong daat,” diin tinu.
59002004	Mdittu' naan nih asingreelin thung ngi khat le' khat kinqim mana' nong kterdet chmaan timow? Ungta kqha kma' plungbin rekki paukpindit rek kurthuwk chmaan timow?
59002005	Nei kvonsat'low ku'uknau rek naan nih havah arjaan, Mma ngi Mma' vonsat klow kcha' rek hinni pau mdoreel dok. Tidit tah lamrinna' 'leenni svang kthuwk ungta kruwngpaalna' ki piipa rek tkurthuhna' rang ki thenni Isowr vah hava' dultipaam ki srah avah mdokchol lam pemeh mow?
59002006	Pdainu naan nih srah avah kyat chmaan tinu. Svang ava ngi naanna a'owrinda ungta luwsang rek thung ngi aqenthuhn meh mow?
59002007	Ungta naan ako'own kchaan miing kenreel ava' 'leenni mmaan nih pthitda kpaulam pemeh mow?
59002008	Kchiir laika ava' dilkqowiyi kenreel nowlam thung ngi: “Nang ngi a'innveen avah adak kat heppi vonsat adolow chaak rah,” mdodit avah naan nih dakat tih atlot chaakin bih, naanna kqha atlot chaak inna. (Lev. 19:18)
59002009	Pdainu naan nih mikmai asutin bih, naan nih pnu arve chaak inna. Ungta avale' avah nowlam mih nowlam kupkui rek tidit tih mdopsul lam.
59002010	Mleiya kuwku yoso nowlam mkheng kheng a kopqowi kcha' pdainu kbih khat'suwn 'leenni khuhsiir kpirthi kcha' mma' ava ngi mkheng kheng 'leenni mraal ka'am kcha'.
59002011	Mleiya, “Lowsang qhima,” (Mpk. 20:4 Mnl. 5:18) dida, kthe Mma' ava ngi, “Mii eyouma',” tidit ruk mdothe. (Mpk. 20:13 Mnl. 5:17) 'Tunnu nang ngi lowsang nga qhi mtih, pdainu mii a a'eyow a, mdit bih, nang nga nowlam kupkui kurthuwk kchaam ptih.
59002012	Avaleiyi, to'ol chaakna' ki nowlam ava ngi m'leenin nih pau mdopindit bei rangkat ava' heppi ipauin ungta ava' heppi atlown.
59002013	Mleiya pau tpinditna' avah plungqhat kthlowi kma' ava' hinvah plungqhat ktaak ki pau mdopindit. Mleiya pau tpinditna' avah plungqhat tih mdopchaan.
59002014	Mdittu', ku'uknau rek, kuwmiikhat tih mlamrin ka'am a adiso, pdainu mnong ma'amma'u, talu msit ka'am a? Lamrin nih mmah ksan pchaang rang?
59002015	Tidit tah kuwmiikhat ki, mqampa mditmata mcharmyur avah mbuwdiir ktaak ki ungta mnitmnit ki mthen chaak rah ktaak ki ka'am a, idiin cheh.
59002016	Ungta naan kuwmiikhat tih: “Plung kdaiyi isun chdaat tu', klum kcha' ikurthuwkku ungta apowi kpa kcha' ikurthuwk sowi,” mditta, pdainu naan nih daksa ki thenni mdokriin dow rek avah apiikmaan nuh, talu msit ka'am a?
59002017	Anto' heppi, lamrin chrel daat, tidit tah mnong ktaak lamrin avah kdiyou.
59002018	Pdainu miikhat tih kthe rah: “Nang nga alamrin ka'am a, ungta neiya knong rek ka'am. Nang ngi anong ktaak ki alamrin mheitedet ungta nei rukku knong rekki klamrin ayutedet nih.”
59002019	Nang ngi Isowr khat ka'am tidit lam'adorin chaak avah kqha atlot chaak a. Tarnam rek kpha rukku avah lammdorin chaakin ungta kunchuwn kcha'lam.
59002020	Pdainu nang ngi tedeh rah angei a? O, kokmok kcha' dultimii, tidit tah mnong rek ktaak lamrin avah kidyou kmah!
59002021	Tidit tah neenki n'paan Abraham mih rintparlaanna' khaan 'leenni mchapa Aijek mparlaan thung ngi mma' avah nong rekki mdopindit chaak?
59002022	'Tunnu asuw o, tidit tah lamrin ava ngi mnong rek tung ngi kilqhisap pih nong mdolowsap, ungta nong rek ava ngi lamrin avah mdopurkhum?
59002023	Ungta Kchiir laika ava ngi hanto' mdothe: “Abraham mih Isowr lamrin chda, ungta ava ngi mma' hinni rinkinditna ngi taipiik chda,” mdodit avah purkhumda. (Rnp. 15:6) Ungta mma' avah Isowr plap, kurthuwk chda.
59002024	Ava ngi naan nih, miikhat avah nong rekki mdopindit ungta lamrin daat chrel pemeh tidit adehn a.
59002025	Ungta anto'hep daat tih, mma ngi pausikhu rek avah arlaang chda ungta 'lam msik khat thah mdopsun chaak lam ava' ki nong rek ava ngi, Rahab avah mdopindit chaak pemeh mow?
59002026	Mleiya pthla ktaak daksa avah kdiyou, anto' heppi, mnong ktaak lamrin avah kdiyou.
59003001	Nei ku'uknau rek, naan knempok ki chukpu rek kurthuwkmaan. Mleiya chukpu kurthuwk rek neen nih kdungset tih pau tpinditna' avah tarlaan chaak raan.
59003002	Tidit tah neen nkhengin avah dow knempok 'leenni khuhsiir tpirthit chaakin. Kuwmiikhat tih tpauna' 'leenni khuhsiir mpirthit chaakma bih, mma' avah kurkhum miikhat ungta mma' avah mdaksa mpumpum mih haake kperke pchaang kcha' a.
59003003	Dakat tih neen nih skowl rekki mmaan nih tethe mdopqowina' raan ki thenni mnehrin thung ngi haake tepkeen ungta ava ngi neen nih mdaksaan mpumpum mih tkeheel pchaanin.
59003004	Naan nih arkuwngpii rukka asuwn. Mmaan avah kdung ngi lin chyoso ungta tchangkhu rekki tya raan chdaat yoso, mmaan avah tkeheelna' kdil'suwn ava ngi kpeher rek ava ngi mdongeiyin ki dilkqowiyi mdokeheelin.
59003005	Anto' heppi plei avah pna kdil'suwn khat ungta dow klinklin rek 'leenni kpirlin kcha'. Asuwn, meiqai 'suwn khat tih tya klin paam khat avah mapkaak ko!
59003006	Ungta plei avah mei khat ungta nowlam mrinkindit kma' dultipaam khat., Plei avah neen napna rekin arlak ki mdopa'am tidit tah hava ngi daksa mkheng avah chukda topborda. Ungta rinchan nowpa avah mei mdopchuk pthi ungta Simmei ava ngi havah mei mdopchuk.
59003007	Mleiya mdetmdet ki saa ungta pva le' mpowiyi kondowtda kchet rek ungta truwnpii thungki downkhaal khimkhei avah tepmeengda ungta dultimii ngi avah mdotepmeen dok.
59003008	Pdainu kuwkhat leh ngi plei avah tepmeeng pchaang meh. Havah tokyown pchaanmah kthi khat ungta mthung ngi tidiyowna' kru kdim mih ka'am.
59003009	Neen nih plei ava ngi neenki Isowr ungta N'paan avah ponlor chmin nuh ungta neen nih plei ava ngi Isowr arlim mih mdopurthuh dok dultimii avah pauhor buknaan minnu.
59003010	Nehr khadaat thungki ngi neen nih suwqhat le' pauhor avah theen minnu. Nei ku'uknau rek, hava'le' avah anto' rang pemeh.
59003011	Mleiya diitlaang khor khadaat thungki dii kthlum le' dii kkha kphulve kchok mow?
59003012	Ku'uknau rek, kduwtbul lih kruwn rek kchei pchaang rang mow, mditmata riithlumnu ngi kduwt rek kchei pchaang rang mow?
59003013	Naan arlakin ki kuwda mluwkinrit ungta kdeipindih a kuwda? Mma ngi mnong rek avah luwkinritna' ki plung kperneem thung ngi mdotlot chaak tidit avah mrinchanqhat tih apandang chso.
59003014	Pdainu naan nih aplung rekin thung ngi kdung ngi tepnerna' le' mthennemna' kthlaam athlowiyin cheentung ngi, naan nih pirlin chmaan ungta kindit kepteng ngi plei neimaan.
59003015	Hava' luwkinritna' avah karthak ki kurjung pemeh pdainu dultipaam ki, dultimii nowpa thungki ungta tarnam nowpa thungki.
59003016	Mleiya kepner le' mthennemna' kthlaam amna' thung ngi plung karmana' rekle' kqha kma' khimkhei ava' ka'am.
59003017	Pdainu karthak ki luwkinritna' avah mkhatna' thung ngi kchiir, audilli plung kdai kngei, plung kdowng, kakparlaandei, plungqhat tih kdim ungta mchei kqha, mikmai ksuw kma' ungta kqha tpurhuwina' ka'am pemeh.
59003018	'Tunnu plung kdai kpa'am rek mmaan ava ngi rinkinditna' ki mchei avah plung kdai thung ngi mdopqau chaakin.
59004001	Naan arlak inni raal rekle' tker'ena' rek avah tva'ki kthuwk o? Tidit tah naan apna rekin thung ngi raal kthuwk avah daksa ngi tkanpatna' mdongei ava' thung ki kthuwk lam pemeh mow?
59004002	Naan nih kdung ngi tothlowi chaak rah ngeiyin tinu pdainu avah thlowi pchaang chmaan tih. Naan nih mii'eyou intinu ungta miidona changptlaak intinu pdainu avah thlowi pchaang chmaan tih. Naan nih ker'eiyin tinu ungta raal karnaan tinu, pdainu naan nih avah thlowi pchaang chmaan tih. Mleiya naan nih Isowr hinni adoqhil chaakin pemeh.
59004003	Naan nih daksa ki tkanpatna' thung ngi adosintonna' raan ki thenni karmak ki adoqhil chaakin leiyi, tiqhil lah adoqhil chaakin pdainu dow khatleh ruk ado'arlaan chaakin pemeh.
59004004	Lowsang kqhipa rekle' lowsang kqhinu rek naan, naan nih dultipaam tu' plap tkurthuh avah Isowr tu' tkarhalna' tidit dei maan timow? Avaleiyi, kuwku yoso dultipaam tu' plap tkurthuh rah kngei mma' ava ngi mdak ki Isowr miihal khat kurthuwk kcha' a.
59004005	Mditmata, naan nih: “Neen nthung inni ka'am Pthla ava ngi kdung ngi mdopner,” dida, Kchiir laika ngi mdothe avah msit ktaak ki mdothe tidit tih abinin mow?
59004006	Pdainu Mma ngi plungnee avah kdungset tih midotpiikin. Avaleiyi, Mma ngi hanto' mdothe: “Isowr rih kpirlin kcha' rekka mdokthitna'. Pdainu kpirdil kcha' hinni plungnee mdopiik chaak.” (Prl. 3:34)
59004007	Avaleiyi, Isowr hinni adak inni ikparlaan chaan. Ungta tarnampii avah aptengin ungta mmah naan ahinki kchen chrah.
59004008	Isowr hinni inai chaan ungta Mma ngi ahinin nih knai rah. Pnu kervei rek naan, akhutin apertleu chaan. Ungta plung kenqheek rek naan, aplungin apchiir chaan.
59004009	Ningsiin ikorlow chaan, aqatin ungta iqap chaan’. Tidit tah naan apni naan avah tqana' apurthuhn ungta akanpatin avah plungjiinna' apthutin.
59004010	Kruwng miksut thung ngi adak inni ikpirdil chaan ungta Mma ngi naan avah aktparthaang chraan.
59004011	Ku'uknau rek, naan nih khat le' khat hinni kthi kerthe maan. Mleiya mu'umnau khat 'leenni kthi kthe ungta mu'umnau 'leenni paukpindit mma' ava ngi nowlam 'leenni kthi mdothe ungta nowlam ava' 'leenni pau mpindit a. Pdainu nang ngi nowlam 'leenni pau'apindit bih, nang nga nowlam kopqowi ava' ptipmeh pdainu nowlam 'leenni paukpindit ptih.
59004012	Nowlam kpii Khat ka'am Mma' ava ngi tsan ruk ungta te'ekre ruk mapchaan. Mdittu' ktlok khat 'leenni paukpindit nang nga kuw pti?
59004013	'Tunnu hanto' kthe rek naan nih havah arjaan: “Naan nih tuni mditmata pduknii ngi neen nih khuwpii khat thah tchen raan ungta neen nih ava' thuh kum khat ta'am raan. Ungta neen nih tren le' tyur le' tlowda sum tolot raan,” diin tinu.
59004014	Tidit tah naan nih pduknii vah talu kthuwk rang tidit adodehn pemeh. Mleiya naan arinkumin avah talu? Naan arinkumin avah mpha mruk thung ngi ambong thida kmaang kcha' sumtuk khat hep daat.
59004015	Anto' mda, naan nih: “Kruwng plungbin mkurthuh bih, neen nih ringin mindon nih ungta neen nih hava' mditmata ava' totlot chaak raan,” adodit raan.
59004016	Pdainu 'tunnu naan nih kpirlin chaakin ava' thung ngi kpirlin chaan tinu. Hava' hep tpirlinna' mkheng avah kqha pemeh.
59004017	Avaleiyi, kqha totlot rah deithida ktlow kma' mma' ava' hinni avah pnu kurthuwk kcha' a.
59005001	'Tunnu svang mii rek naan nih havah arjaan: Tidit tah naan a'leen nih tyattraanna' karvang rang leiyi, iqap chaan ungta owngin rah iqap chaan.
59005002	Naan asvang thuhn avah kqop kcha' a ungta ado'ana rekin avah mnu ngi msuk chaak a.
59005003	Naan ajiiringin le' ajiipowl rekin avah kparba kcha' a ungta mparbat ava ngi naan akepteng inni sakhi mpiik inna. Ungta ava ngi asadakin avah mei thungki heppi kka chrah. Naan nih mqutna' nit rekki thenni sum'alrou purtuwlin tinu.
59005004	'Tunnu asuwn, alrou rekin kponkom, nong klou kcha' rek avah naan nih huwng chaan tinu, mmaan ardaman avah pii maantinu. Mmaan ardaman rek ava ngi naan akepteng inni owngda ka'am a. Ungta kponkom rek own ava ngi ‘Sabaoth’ Kruwng kna ktlung dok kcha' a.
59005005	Naan nih dultipaam thung ngi kartlai dok ki ungta adongeiyin ningtlunna' thuh amin tinu. Naan nih aplungchai rekin avah te'eyowna' nit thungki heppi tapmarin tinu.
59005006	Naan nih mii kindit avah psulin tinu ungta eyou'in tinu. Mma ngi naan avah apkhaan siinmeh.
59005007	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, naan nih Kruwng murjun duh kpha ngi adiildei chaan! Asuwn, louknum rekki dulti ngi mchei kenreel rek mdopiik rang avah taluhep pih mardatin. Ungta mmaan nih kunyou khubu le' qhaalkhu kra rang avah tidiil chaak tu' kilqhi ngi mdo'ardat chaakin.
59005008	Naan rukka adiildei chaan. Aplungchai rekin avah apqhang chaan, mleiya Kruwng arjunna' rang nga knai kcha' a.
59005009	Ku'uknau rek, naan nih khat le' khat kperteng ngi kerteen maan, mditma bih, naanna akupsul raan. Asuwn, Paukpinditpa avah thurngut bulli krip daat a!
59005010	Nei ku'uknau rek, naan nih Kruwng miing 'leenni kpau khulpu rek avah tyattraanna' le' tidiildehna' ki bitinna' khat tih alou chaan.
59005011	'Tunnu asuwn, kdiildei kcha' rek avah msuwkin kqha tiditin. Naan nih Job dodiildehna' avah arjaakin ungta Kruwng ngi Job thenni mqutna' thuh talu mtlotpiik tidit adehn. Mleiya Kruwng nga plungkham mih kdim ungta plungqhat kthlowi.
59005012	Pdainu dow mkheng ki mahan'tun nih, ku'uknau rek naan nih parvaan mditmata dulti mditmata morson paureeltham rek thamda kthampaureel reelmaan. Pdainu naanki ‘ong’ avah ‘ong rah’ ungta ‘mmeh’ avah ‘mmeh’ rah, mditma bih, naanna kqha tpurhuwina' thuh tla chnaandi'.
59005013	Naan arlak inni kuwmiikhat tyattraanna' kphang kcha' ka'am ngaal mow? Mma ngi rin'iktham chso. Kuwmiikhat kanpa kcha' ka'am ngaal mow? Mma ngi luwbuklaa athe chso.
59005014	Naan arlak inni kuwmiikhat kkowi ka'am ngaal mow? Mma ngi lamrinlop ki kver rek a'own chlamso. Ungta mmaan nih Kruwng miing 'leenni reidii apubul chlamso rang ngi mma' 'leenni rin'ikthampiik chlamso.
59005015	Ungta lamrin ki rinktham chaak ava ngi kkowi avah ksan chrah ungta Kruwng ngi mma' avah kperdel chrah. Ungta mma ngi pnu merve chaak rukku, mma' hinni avale' avah koptlotpiik chrah.
59005016	Avaleiyi, naan nih khat le' khat hinni adoparmanaan avah ikerthe thuwn ungta adam chaakna' raan ki thenni khat le' khat ki thenni rin'ikthamsap chaan. Mrinkindit miikhat ki rinkthamna' avah kdet liit kmah msit ka'am.
59005017	Elaijah avah daksa 'lam thah neen nehep daatin. Ungta mma ngi khurat mana' rah kdung ngi rinktham chda. Mthungta dultipaam thung ngi kum kdum thla truk thung ngi khu rah mda.
59005018	Ungta mma ngi veikhat rinktham chnowlda ungta parvaan nih khu prada ungta dulti ngi mchei arkun chda.
59005019	Ku'knau rek, naan arlakin ki kuwmiikhat kindit ava' thungki 'lamleh kqowi dok kcha' ma'am cheentung ngi, ungta kuwmiikhat tih mma' avah marvanqhi penlet cheentung ngi, mma ngi havah adei chso.
59005020	Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih pnu kervei kcha' khat avah m'lamleh qowina' thungki marvanqhi perheel chaak bih, mma ngi kdiyou thungki pthlarin khat msan chaak a. Ungta pnu knempa rek avah mupkhum chaak a.
60001001	Jisu Khrista tamsi Pitar neiyi, mal kurthuwk chda Pontas thuh, Galatia thuh, Kappadosia thuh, Asia thuh ungta Bithynia paamkuwl rek thung ngi kerjeida ka'amter kcha' rek, naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
60001002	Mleiya Pthla ava' dopenjetna' thung ngi tethe topqowina' le' Jisu Khrista ki hii tikqhiina' rang ki thenni, Pa Isowr ki, mduh tedeh pinditna' ava' dilkqowiyi naanna adotokchol dokin. Naan ahin nih plungnee le' plung kdai avah kepleet thang setset ikurthuwkso.
60001003	Neenki Isowr ungta Jisu Khrista Pa avah tpanpaak chaak ki i'amso. Mleiya kdiyou thungki Jisu Khrista rinkerheelna' ava' ar'aang ngi neen avah Mma' plungqhat kepleet ava' dilkqowiyi kring plungbinpsuk thung ngi mihum chaanda.
60001004	Mleiya kqop kma' rang alrouchom avah neen nthen inni parvaan thah mdo'arkhiik daat.
60001005	Mleiya naanna lamrin ar'aang ngi Isowr ruhtanna' ava ngi mqutna' mpha thung ngi mdopandan rang tkirliinna' ava' ki thenni mdo'arkhiik dok rekin ptih.
60001006	Hava' leiyi naan nih, msit ma'am bih mdetmdet ki tperteelna' thuh tlada 'tunki mpha mruk thung ngi aplungrinin avah pya chdaat yoso ikanpa chdaatin.
60001007	Mleiya Jisu Khrista mkurphuwn thung ngi, mei thuh tperteel dok daat yoso, kkenvei chdaat jiiring kkheel lih kkenreel naanki alamrinin mlang avah tpanpaak ki, takyat kurhuwiyi ungta konlor rih ka'am rah.
60001008	Naan nih Mma' avah amikin nih dei myown tih vonpsat intinu. 'Tun'tun nih naan nih amikin nih deimdaat yown tih lam'rin chaan tinu tethe pchaanmah plung ngamna' ungta kdung ngi tkonlorna' tu' kanpa chaan tinu.
60001009	Tidit tah naan nih alamrinin ki mqutna' apthlarin rekin ki thenni tkirliinna' avah arlaang chnaandi'.
60001010	Naan ahinin nih, hava' tkirliinna' avah, naan ahin nih kthleng rang plungnee ava' ki mlei kpurphuwng khulpu rek ava ngi sutthlaam lamda kdung ngi mdothlaam chaakin.
60001011	Mmaan thung ngi ka'am Mesaiah Pthla ava ngi, mmaan nih mdothlaamin mditmata taluhep kduh ki mpha thung ngi Mesaiah ngi tyattraanna' mdoperteel rang ungta ava' dilli mkonlorna' kthuwk rang avah mthuhduh ngi mmaan hinni pandanpiik lamda.
60001012	Hava' mmaan hinni mdopurphuwn avah mmaan nih sopmkorlow chaakna' raan ki then pemeh. Pdainu pauna rek ava' thuh naan avah sopadotolow chaakin. Mleiya parvaan ki mdo'arjuk pthlat Pthla Kchiir ava' ar'aang ngi 'tun naan ahin nih tparjaam dok kqhapaumin avah mdoparjaam chaakin.
60001013	Avaleiyi, aplungril rekin ki arkowl rekin avah knet tih arkowljeel ajeel chaan, ikorjowng dei chaan. Ungta aplungbin psukin avah Jisu Khrista kurphuwn thung ngi mdo'arjunhor rang plungnee ava' 'leenni apa'am chaan.
60001014	Tethe kopqowi nau rek heppi, adehpinditmaan thungki heppi, choduh ki daksa dongeina' rek thung ngi adak inni plup chmaan.
60001015	Pdainu naan ayuko'own kchaan Mma' ava ngi mchiir ava' heppi naan rukka arinchanin mkheng thung ngi ichiir chaan.
60001016	Mleiya hanto ngi kjitda ka'am: “Ichiir chaan tidit tah Neiya Kchiir ping.” (Lev. 11:44-45, 19:2, 20:7)
60001017	Ungta naan nih, mikmai ksuw kmah ngi mnong mnong rek dilkqowiyi, Pa ava' miing a'own chaakin cheentung ngi, hava' mal khat heppi a'amnaan mkheng ava' thung ngi ningkqi dok ki i'am chaan.
60001018	Naan nih havah adeiyin, tidit tah naan nih apa'leen hinki nowpa thung ngi ado'arlaan dokin kqop kcha' rang jiipowl le' jiiring ngi adotaktlanin pemeh.
60001019	Pdainu kakmang kma' ungta kbih kchuw kma' yausuwn khat heppi Khrista hii ngi adotaktlanin.
60001020	Mma' avah dakat tih hava' dultipaam ava' mapqhan duduh ngi mdoktlan dok pdainu naan athen inni hava' mqutna' mpha rek thung ngi mdopandan rot.
60001021	Tiditta naan alamrinin le' aplungbin psukin avah, kdiyou thungki Mma' kperdel ungta tkonlorna' Mma' hinni kpii, Isowr ava' hinni Mma' ar'aang ngi lam'arin chaan.
60001022	Naan nih Pthla ava' ar'aang ngi kindit ava' hinni tethe kopqowi akurthuh chaak inni apthlarin rekin avah apertleu chaak dok inna. Avaleiyi, naan nih a'uanau rekin hinni kqha tpurhuwina' ktaak vonsat avah adothlowi chaak dokin. Ava' vah naan nih khat le' khat avah plung kertleu deek ki vonsat ikorlowdak dak chaan.
60001023	Naanna ktlangknai kmah ngi kring tlit ungta ka'am tlit Isowr ki pauna ava' ar'aang ngi kqop chrang chiimuw kma' kqop kma' rang thung ngi kqou dok kchaan ptih.
60001024	Mleiya, “Daksa mkheng avah nowm rek hep daat, Ungta dultimii konlorna' avah nowmpaar hep daat. Nowm a kpurvuwi kcha'lu ungta mpaar rek avah kqu kcha'lu.
60001025	Pdainu Kruwng pauna avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ka'am tlit.” (Is. 40:6-7) 'Tunnu havah naan ahin nih kqhapaumin nih tparjaam pauna ava'.
60002001	Avaleiyi, miiqhatmana' plungbin, tekpermen', kqha tpurhuwina', tepnerna' ungta kthi tethena' mkheng thungki ikekneeng chaan.
60002002	Naan nih, alin asaanna' raan ki thenni nau kdowng rek heppi pauna ava' ki arnu kchiir ava' angeen chaan.
60002003	Mleiya dakat tih naan nih, Kruwng nga plung knei dok tidit avah adopertem chaak dokin.
60002004	Dultimii rekvah mdoknen pthi dokin pdainu Isowr rih mdokchol dok ungta Kring Lung kenreel, Mma' hinni ithleng chaan. Ungta
60002005	naan rukku, Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi pthla 'lam ki inn khat tih tsak, kchiir thimpu tkurthuhna' khat tih Isowr rih mdorot piik pthla 'lam ki rintparlaanna' rekki tparlaan chaak, kring lung rek ikurthuwkin.
60002006	Avaleiyi, Kchiir laika thung rukku havah kiksim dok: “Asuwn, Neiyi Jion thung ngi takthlan dok, kenreel lung, Innbul lung avah kphun a. Ungta Mma' hinni lamkrin kcha' mma' avah ningkya duh nimeh.” (Is. 28:16)
60002007	Pdainu lamkrin kcha' naan ahinnu Mma' avah kenreel. Ungta tethe kopqowi kma' mmaan hinnu: “Innksa rekki mdoknen pthi dokin lungkat ava ngi innbul lung, lung kenreel kurthuwk kcha' a.” (Luw. 118:22)
60002008	Ungta “Khuhsiir tpirthitna' lung khat, Ungta kapkhaan lungpii khat kurthuwk kcha' a.” Mmaan nih tethe mdopqowi maanni, mmaan ruk ko'own kcha' lung ava'kat 'leenni khuhsiir mpirthit chaak inna. (Is.8:14)
60002009	Mleiya naanna kjiingnu thungki ngi Mma' ki tngana' mar'aang thung ngi ako'own kchaan ava' kparjaam chrah ungta kponlor chrang ki thenni tokchol dok suruwl rekin ptih. Ungta paamkruwng innmii thungki thimpu rekin ptih, kenje dok chaat khat inptih, ungta mdoren dok Mma' mii, rekin ptih.
60002010	Naanna mpha khat thung vah mii kurthuwkin ptipmeh pdainu 'tunnu Isowr mii rekin ptih. Ungta plungqhat karlaang kma' rekin ptih pdainu 'tunnu plungqhat avah arlaan chaak inna.
60002011	Vonsat'low rek, dultipaam thung ngi paamktlei ki mii rek heppi ungta mal rek heppi ahinin nih akoksow chaak inna. Tidit tah naan nih apthlarinin tu' kperteng pnu nowpa dongei rek thungki ikekneeng chaan.
60002012	Mleiya mmaan nih naan avah kthi ktlow rek kdi ngi, naan akepteng inni kpau lam. Pdainu Mma ngi mitvel chaak nit tih naan anongqhat rekin, mmaan nih mdodehn ava ngi Isowr mdoponlor chaakna' raanni, Chaatktlei rek arlak ki arinchanin avah takyat chaak kurhuwiyi ichetin.
60002013	Avaleiyi, naan nih Kruwng thenni dultimii rekki ruhtanna' ksin khimkhei rek hinni, mkenreelsi hinki heppi ikparlaan chaan.
60002014	Mditmata paamkpu rek hinni, tidit tah kthi ktlow rek hinni, mraal suwkthuhna' kpii rah ungta kqha ktlow rek hinni, tponlorna' kpii rah mma ngi mdopthlat rek hinni, ikparlaan chaan.
60002015	Mleiya naan nih kqha ava' adotlot chaak inni kokmok rekki kdeipindih kmah ngi mpau raan ava' adopdaipthi raan avah Isowr plungbin ava'.
60002016	Naan nih mii'ol heppi i'amin. Anto'daat yoso, mii'ol akurthutin ava ngi kthi todowlna' pthutmaan pdainu Isowr suwk rek heppi i'amin.
60002017	Mii mkheng akyat chaan. Unau tkurthuhna' avah vonsat alown ungta Isowr aqi chaan. Paamkruwng avah akyat chaan.
60002018	Suwk'owr rek, ningqit mkheng tu' korthlop pih, naan naanki akpu rekin ava' hinni ikparlaan chaan. Ungta kqha rek hin hehe daat kma' kqha kma' rek hin rukku ikparlaan chaan.
60002019	Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih Isowr mdodeh pindit chaak leiyi, karmak daat tih tyattraanna' mperteel chaak bih, avah tpanpaak chaak krow.
60002020	Mleiya nang ngi adoparma leiyi, kchung ahor chaakku ungta ava' adiil chaakku, talu akonlorna' ka'am a? Pdainu nang ngi kqha adotlot leiyi, ava' ki thenni tyattraanna' aperteel chaak bih ungta ava' adiil chaak bih, Isowr aang ngi avah trotpiik chaakna' ka'am a.
60002021	Tidit tah hava' lei kat tih naanna adoto'ownin mleiya Khrista rukku neen nthenni tyattraanna' perteel chda. Tidit tah naan nih Mma' khuhne rek ava' adopqowina' raan ki thenni, neen nthenni bitinna' khat midotmaak piikin.
60002022	“Mma' avah mupnu arve ka'am pemeh mditmata Mma' nehr thung ngi tkurhuwnna' ka'am pemeh.” (Is. 53:9)
60002023	Mma ngi, mmaan nih mraal mpiikin thuh Mma ngi mraalin pii perheel lammeh. Mma ngi tyattraan mperteel thuh, Mma ngi tipqit ruk pqit lammeh. Pdainu ava' kchang ngi Mma' mdak ki mrinkindit tih paukpindit Mma' hinni kparlaan chda.
60002024	Mleiya pnu thuh kdiyou kcha' neen ava ngi rinkinditna' thuh trin chaakna' raan ki thenni Mma ngi neen nupnu arve rekin avah Mma' daksa thung ngi mihor piikinda. Mma limna' ava ngi naanna adotapdam chaakin.
60002025	Mleiya naan avah lamleh kqowi yau rek hep kchaan ptih pdainu 'tunnu Yaukqhi ava' hinni ungta apthlarin rekin Ksutpqowi kcha' ava' hinni kerheel dok kchaan ptih.
60003001	Anto' heppi, nuwn rek naan nih a'innpu a'innpu rekin hinni akparlaan chaak raan. Mleiya aangqhe rekki pauna ava' kopqowi kma' kurthuwk chlam yoso, kpau kmah ngi mnuwn rekin ki rinchan ava ngi mmaan avah mdopchaan lamna' rah mmaan hinni akparlaan chaak raan.
60003002	Mmaan nih naanki akertleuin le' takyat kurhuwi arinchanin msut chaakin thung ngi mmaan avah pchaang naandi'.
60003003	Naan nih aruwngchen qhatin avah mduwn 'leerki asam sowiyin, ajiiring naakin, mditmata buwdiir kqha adohiil adonaakin hep daat mso.
60003004	Pdainu Isowr miksut thung ngi mkenreelsi, aplungrilin ki mii, plung kperneem le' pthlakdai tu' kilqhi kqop kma' rang dona ngi ikirsim chaan.
60003005	Mleiya alraang ki snu kchiir rek, Isowr hinni plungbinpsuk kthi kcha' rek rukku mdak inni hava' hep nowpa ngi korthlong chlamda, mi'innpu mi'innpu rekin hinni akparlaan kcha'lam.
60003006	Sarah ngi Abraham hinni tethe kopqowiyi am chda, mma' avah kruwng, mdodit chaak. Naan rukku kqha atlot chaakin bih ungta tiqit chaakna' lei kmah ngi akyat chaakin bih, naanna mma' chanu rek kurthuwk chnaandi'.
60003007	Anto' heppi innpu rek, naan nih naanki arinktham chaak rekin ava' mdopkhaan mana' rah, anuwn rekin avah snu mkurthuhn leiyi, mruh kdowngset beel'uwm khat heppi, a'amqhi chaan. Ungta rinkum ki plungnee ava' ki piipa akurthuhve chaak inni, takyat chaak tu' kilqhi ngi mmaan avah adodeh pindit chaakin tu' a'amqhi chaan.
60003008	Mqutna' thung ngi, naan akheng inni plungril khadaat tih a'am raan. Khat le' khat plung ikparkham chaan, unaukat heppi von'ikparsatin, plung kdowng ahordeiyin ungta thung'ikor'on chaan.
60003009	Kqha kma' ki thenni kqha kma' penlemaan mditmata ningkya leiyi, ningkya kirpiimaan. Pdainu ava' kchang ngi, naanna hava' leiyi, adoto'own dokin tidit adodeh chaak inni, tidit tah naan nih suwqhat avah alrouchom mih adochom chaakna' raanni, suwqhat apiin.
60003010	Mleiya “Rinkum kngei kcha' ungta kqha nit rek kdei chrang mma' ava ngi, Kqha kma' thungki meplei ungta tkurhuwn chaakna' thungki mnehr avah aqenpenle chso.
60003011	Mma ngi kqha kma' akenlet daakso ungta kqha atlow chso, Ungta avah arei chdeiso.
60003012	Mleiya Kruwng mik rek avah mrinkindit rek 'leenni ka'am, Ungta Mma' kna rek avah mmaan rinkthamna' rek hinni kparvang. Pdainu Kruwngmai avah kqha kma' ktlow rek mmaan ava' kepteng ngi ka'am.” (Luw. 34:12-16)
60003013	Ungta naan nih kqha ava' ki mdilkqowi kcha' akurthuh chaak innu, kuwda naan ake'ekrep raanna?
60003014	Pdainu naan nih rinkinditna' leiyi, tyattraanna' kperteel chrang kurthuwk kpha chyown tih naanna asuwkin kqha. “Ungta mmaan dopqit avah qi chmaan. Ungta aplungin ruk pyamaan.” (Is. 8:12)
60003015	Pdainu aplungchai rekin thung ngi Isowr rah Kruwng tidit tih apenje chaan. Ungta naan athung inni ka'am plungbinpsuk ava' ki thenni akkheel kchaan khimkhei rek hinni ado'arthaan pchaanna' raan ki thenni mpha ktai thuh ikorthlong chaan. Pdainu plung kperneem mih ungta ningkqi ngi arthaangin.
60003016	Mleiya mmaan nih naan avah kthi ktlow rek, tidit tih adangin mipthitin thung ngi, Khrista hinni naanki arinchan qhatin 'leenni akrai kcha' rekin mmaan ava ngi ningkya mdophanna' raanni, naan nih plungrildeh kqha ava ngi arthaangin.
60003017	Mleiya Isowr plungbin mkurthuh bih kqha totlot leiyi, tyattraanna' tperteel lih kqha kma' totlot leiyi, tyattraanna' tperteel hinvah kqhabet.
60003018	Mleiya Khrista rukku pnu rek leiyi, veikhadaat thuh tyattraanna' perteelda. Mrin kindit kma' rekki thenni Mrinkindit Khat ava' diyouda, Isowr hinni neen midotqhina' raan ki thenni Mma' avah daksa 'lam thah tipdiyouda pdainu Pthla ava ngi Mma' avah pring perheelda.
