60003019	Pthla ava ngi Mma ngi chetda rowng'inn thung ngi ka'am pthla rek hinni parjaamda.
60003020	Alraang, mpha khat thuh Noah ki mpha thung ngi Isowr rih ksowt tih tidiil chaak tu' mardat chaak 'lam thuh, tidit tah arkuwngpii msakbing arlaan nih pthla rek avah tethe kopqowi kmah ngi ka'am kcha'lam. Ava' thung ngi mruk'suwn daat tidit tah, pthlarin chaitreht daat chrel rek avah dii ar'aang ngi mdosan chaak lam.
60003021	Mleiya dii avah 'tun neen miksanin diiluwna' ava' ki titinna' khat: Diiluwna' ava ngi daksa 'leenki ktobor avah pertleu meh pdainu Isowr ktong thah tarthaan chaakna' ki plungrildeh kqha ava' mdopiik. Mleiya diiluwna' ava ngi Jisu Khrista ki rinkerheelna' ava' ar'aang ngi neenna midotsan chaak dokin.
60003022	Mma' avah parvaan thah hungkal chda Isowr machang thah am chda. Vaantamsi rekle' ruhtanna' rek ungta ruhtan rek mkheng avah Mma' kurduh ngi pa'am pthi dokda.
60004001	Avaleiyi, Khrista ngi neen nthen inni daksa 'lam thah tyattraanna' mdoperteel dok heppi, naan rukku ava' hep plungbin thung ngi ikorthlong chaan. Mleiya daksa 'lam thuh tyattraanna' kperteel dok mma' ava ngi pnu avah mdopqut pthi dok.
60004002	Mleiya mma ngi mma' ki mpha ka'am daat rek avah daksa 'lam thah, daksa 'leenni takraamna' ki thenni mrinporson rang pemeh. Pdainu Isowr plungbin ki thenni mrin chaak rah.
60004003	Mleiya neen nih Chaatktlei rek plungbin totlotna' thung ngi tarvan amin. Tidit tah, tekterdeuna' rek, daksa 'leenni takraamna' rek, tipritna' rek, lop pih thowldii tneekna' rek lopthowldii neekna' paarklau ungta tepder kuhuwi dow pthla rek luwtbukna' rek thung ngi kthleng dok ksa nrinkum rekin avah arvanpchet pokin minnu.
60004004	Hava'le' thung ngi naan nih mmaan tu' kilqhisap pih kerkheelsi ngi ker'ei kalrai nemna' thuh achensap maan leiyi, mmaan nih msik ki abininda a'leenin nih kqha kma' mdotheen.
60004005	Mmaan nih kring le' kdiyou hinni paukpindit rang ngi korthlongda ka'am Mma' hinni mlei avah kpii chdaat lamrah.
60004006	Tidit tah hava' leiyi kqhapaumin avah 'tun kdiyou dok kcha' rek mmaan hin rukku tparjaam dok. Mleiya dultimii rinnow dilkqowiyi daksa 'lam thah pau mdopindit lamna' rah pdainu Isowr rinnow dilkqowiyi pthla ngi mrin chaakna' raan ki thenni avah mdoparjaam.
60004007	Pdainu dow mkheng ki mqutna' avah knaitek kcha' a. Avaleiyi, arinktham chaak rekin thung ngi plung kindit tih ungta kilrin kcha ngi i'amin.
60004008	Ungta dow mkheng rekki mahan'tun nih kdet liit kmah khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaan. “Mleiya vonsat tih pnu knempa rek avah kupkhum pthi rah.” (Prl. 10:12)
60004009	Naan nih pau kepnem pok kmah ngi khat le' khat avah ikpurtlung dei chaan.
60004010	Tidit tah mii khimkheiyi chla khatkhat mdo'arlaan chaak sap ava' hep pih, naan nih khat le' khat hinni mdetmdet ki Isowr plungnee ki kqha suwkkenreel rek heppi sop'ikorlow chaan.
60004011	Kuwmiikhat tih mpau chaak rang cheentung ngi mma ngi Isowr hinki kpaudei rek heppi ipau chso. Kuwmiikhat tih sopmlow chaak cheentung ngi Isowr rih mma' hinni mdopiik, tapchaanna' tu' kilqhi ngi atlow chso. Tidit tah dow mkheng 'leenni Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi Isowr konlor chaakna ngi atlow chaan. Mleiya Mma' hinni tkonlorna' le' tpaalna' ruhtan avah ktlang knailiit kmah ngi ka'am kcha'. Amen.
60004012	Nei kvonsat'low rek, naan nih, naan adotperteelna' raan ki thenni naan a'arlak inni kthuwk, mei kquwng ngi tyatna' leiyi, naan nih dow ktlei liklik khat kthuwk heppi binmaan.
60004013	Pdainu naan nih Khrista ki tyattraanna' rek ava' karlaan chaak inna, tidit kpha ngi ikanpa chaan. Mleiya Mma' konlorna' ava' mpurphuwn thung ngi naan rukka kerkheelsi ngi aplungin kngam kcha' krow.
60004014	Naan nih Khrista miing ki thenni ningkya adut chaakin bih, naanna asuwkin kqha kcha' a. Mleiya tkonlorna' le' Isowr Pthla avah naan a'leenin nih kchuw kcha' a. Tidit tah mmaan hinnu Mma' avah mipthit inna pdainu naan ahinnu Mma' avah konlor kcha' a.
60004015	Pdainu naan kuwkhat leh rukka miike'eyou heppi, kupru khat heppi, kthi ktlow khat heppi, mditmata mii morson rek nong thung ngi mnong kupthut khat heppi tyattraanna' perteelmaan.
60004016	Anto'daat yoso kuwmiikhat tih Khristen khat kurthuwk ki tyattraanna' mperteel chaak cheentung ngi, mma ngi hava' nong leiyi, Isowr avah aponlor chso.
60004017	Mleiya Isowr innmii ava' 'leenni pau tpindit mdopqhunna' rah mpha avah kvei dok kcha' a. Ungta ava ngi neen nihin nih rukri ngi mupqhun nuh, Isowr ki kqhapaumin kopqowi kma' rekki mqutna' avah talu rang nga?
60004018	Ungta “Mrinkindit khat avah kparsa dok ki msan chaakku, Rinko'owi kma' le' pnu kervei avah tva'thuh kandang lam rang nga?” (Prl. 11:31)
60004019	Avaleiyi, Isowr plungbin dilkqowiyi tyattraanna' kperteel kcha' rek mmaan ava ngi trinchaak krow Mikpurthuh kcha' ava' hep pih, kqha ktlow tlit kcha ngi mapthlarinin avah Mma' hinni aparlaan chlamso.
60005001	Naan a'arlakin ki lopkver rek hinni, lopkver khat kurthuwksap pih mmaan hinni koksow chaak lam a. Mleiya neiya Khrista ki tyattraanna' tperteelna' ki sakhi khat ping ungta mdopurphuwn rang tkonlorna' ava' karlaang chrang khat ping.
60005002	Naan nih a'arlakin ki Isowr yauluwng ksutpqowi kcha' khat kurthuwk ki, totlotma krow kma' lei mda totlot nuwm chaak ki ungta ningkyana ngi sumtngei lei mda arda krok ki aqhidei chaan.
60005003	Naan ahinin nih adotparlaan dok rekin ava' 'leenni kruwng rek kurthuwk maan, pdainu yauluwng ava' hinni bihtinna' rek ikurthuwkin.
60005004	Ungta Kenreel Yaukqhi ava' mkurphuwn thung ngi naan nih kchuwl kma' rah tkonlorna' luwkhum avah arlaang chnaandi'.
60005005	Anto' heppi, kseetnau rek, naan nih naanki akver rekin hinni ikparlaan chaan. Ungta naan akheng inni khat le' khat hinni akparlaan chaak raan ungta tpirdil chaakna' avah buwdiir heppi adonaak chaak raan. Mleiya, “Isowr rih kpirlin kcha' rekka mdokthitna' Pdainu kpirdil kcha' hinni, plungnee mdopiik chaak.” (Prl. 3:34)
60005006	Avaleiyi, Mma ngi naan avah karvang rang mpha thuh adotparthaan chaakna' raan ki thenni mruh ktang Isowr baan ava' kurduh ngi adak inni ikparlaan chaan.
60005007	Naan nih Mma' hinni aplungyatnaan mkheng avah avardeen chaan. Mleiya Mma ngi naan athenin adotbin piikin.
60005008	Adak inni ikorjowng dei chaan ungta ikilrindei chaan. Mleiya naan amiihal, tarnampii ava ngi kukruwn meek humpu heppi aloiyinda, mdochaak chaak rah mthlaam a.
60005009	Naan nih alamrinin apnetin rang ngi mma' avah arisanin. Mleiya a'uanau rek inni ava' hep daat tyattraanna' avah dultipaam thung ngi mdo'arvan perteel chaak dokin tidit avah adeiyin.
60005010	Pdainu naan nih mpha mruk thuh tyattraanna' aperteel chaakin dilli Khrista Jisu hinni, Mma' ki ktlangknai kma' tkonlorna' thung ngi neen miko'own kchaan, plungnee mkheng ki Isowr Mma'kat ava ngi naan avah ayupurkhum chaanso. Ungta ayupqhang chaanso, ruhtan ayupiinso ungta ayupnet chaanso.
60005011	Mma' hinni tkonlorna' le' tpaalna' ruhtan avah ktlangknai kmah ngi ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
60005012	Neiyi trinchaak krow nu'unnau khat tih kdobin chaak Silvenas ar'aang ngi naan ahinin nih pauna mruk havah kikjit chaak a. Ungta neiyi akoksow chaak inna ungta sakhi kpiik chaak a, tidit tah naan ari chaaknaan havah Isowr plungnee kindit kat ava'.
60005013	Babylon khuwpii thung ngi ka'am naan tu' tokcholsap lamrinlop ava ngi aturvuwi chaak inna. Ungta kchapa Mark rukku aturvuwi chaak inna.
60005014	Naan nih khat le' khat hinni vonsat kurput tih ikurvuwi chaan. Jisu Khrista hinni ka'am rek naan akhengin ahinin nih plung kdai ka'am ikurthuwkso! Amen.
61001001	Jisu Khrista tamsi ungta msuwk, Simon Pitar neiyi, neenki Isowr ungta Miksan Jisu Khrista ar'aang ngi neen kehep inni kenreelsi lamrin karlaang kcha' rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
61001002	Naan ahinin nih, Isowr le' neenki Kruwng Jisu ki tedeh pinditna' thung ngi plungnee le' plung kdai avah koryou thang setset ikurthuwkso.
61001003	Mleiya Mma' konlorna' le' muplungqhat ava ngi neen miko'own kchaan Mma' ava' tedehpindit chaakin ar'aang ngi, Mma' ki Isowr kurthuwk ki ruhtanna' ava ngi rinkum ki ungta rin'owina' ki dow mkheng rek avah midotpiik chaakin.
61001004	Hava' ar'aang ngi Mma ngi, Mma' ki kerkheelsi ngi klin ungta kenreelsi paureel rek avah neen kihinin nih mpiinda. Mleiya havah naan nih, dultipaam thung ngi ka'am daksa dongei ava' ar'aang ngi kqop chrang ava' thung ki chen chda Isowr kurthuhna' rinchan ava' ktang kcha'sap rek akurthuhna' raan ki then.
61001005	Pdainu hava' leiyi alamrinin 'leenni rinchan kqha ungta rinchan kqha 'leenni tedeh pinditna' ava' adothlolna' raan plung apluwt chaan.
61001006	Tedeh pinditna', 'leenni ndak tkorjownna', ndak tkorjownna' 'leenni tidiildehna' tidiildehna' 'leenni rin'owina' athlolin.
61001007	Rin'owina' 'leenni unau kurthuwk ki plungqhatna' ungta unau kurthuwk ki plungqhatna', 'leenni vonsat athlolin.
61001008	Mleiya hava' dow rek ava ngi naan athung inni kepleet tih amso mkerkheel setset bih naan avah neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista tedeh pinditna' thung ngi msit ktaak mditmata mchei ktaak kurthuwk nimaan tih.
61001009	Mleiya hava' dow rek ava' kapta kcha' mma' avah 'lamkla ngi kdei pchaang kma' ungta mmikktot kcha'lulu. Ungta mma ngi mupnuton pli rek thungki mdopertleu tidit avah mperngeel pthi a.
61001010	Avaleiyi, ku'uknau rek, naan nih adoto'own chaakin ungta adotakthlan chaakin avah kindit mkurthuhna' rah kdungset tih plung apluwt chaan. Mleiya naan nih hava' dow rek ava' atlot chaakin bih, naan nih teden rukku khuhsiir pirthivot nimaan tih.
61001011	Mdit bih, neenki Kruwng ungta Miksan kcha' Jisu Khrista ki ktlangknai kma' kruwngpaalna' thung ngi tuluw chaakna' ki trotpiikna' avah naan ahinin nih kepleet tih akpii chraan.
61001012	Avaleiyi, 'tun adothlowiyin kindit ava' kdei dok ungta kapqhang dok kcha' kurthuwk yown tih neiya naan nih hava' dow rek leiyi, mpha ktai thuh ren nih tikpirbin phaakna' raan 'leennu tukksut kma' tlow nimaang.
61001013	Ou, neiyi havah kindit kat tih kdobin chaak. Neiyi hava' buw'inn thuh ka'am daat khimkhei thung ngi naan ahinin nih adoktipbin phaak inni naan avah aperdel chnikaandi'.
61001014	Mleiya neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ngi mdotetdet chaak heppi neiyi hava' buw'inn avah kbeiyi purthlut pthi nikdi', tidit avah kdeh a.
61001015	Ava' han'tun nih nei kdiyow chaak dil kpha rukku, mpha ktaiyi hava' dow rek avah naan nih adobinphaakna' raan ki thenni neiyi kdung ngi plung pluwt chnikdi'.
61001016	Mleiya neenvah naan ahinin nih, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki ruhtan ungta murjun rang ava' ktheen thung ngu kdei langlang ngi, tpurthun paumin rekki kdotheen pemeh. Pdainu neenna Mma' laarneena'si, ava' mmik ki kdei kcha', sakhi rek ngaalin ping.
61001017	Mleiya: “Havah Nei kvonsat'low Kchapa ava'. Mma' thung ngi Neiya kdung ngi kuplung kngam kcha' a,” dida. Hava' hep krowl avah, kerkheelsi ngi konlor ava' hinki ngi Mma' hinni murjuk thung ngi, Mma ngi Pa Isowr hinki takyat chaakna' le' tkonlorna' avah mdo'arlaan chaak.
61001018	Ungta neen nih Mma' tu' kchiir lown 'leenni ka'amin thung ngi, hava' parvaan ki kurju krowl avah kdo'arjaakin.
61001019	Ungta kinditset kpurthuh khulpu rek pauna avah neen rukku kthlowiyin. Naan nih ava' adopqowi chaakin avah kqha a ungta mar'aang khat tih kjiingmun khat thuh mlen heppi naan nih aplungril rekin thung ngi khu vaarso, ungta khuhvaar vaarpa mthuhduh khimkheiyi avah atlow tlit chdaatin.
61001020	Ava' han'tun nih naan nih hava' choduh adeiyin. Tidit tah, Kchiir laika thungki pauphuwn khadaat rukka miikhat plungbin thungki ngi kthuwk ka'am pemeh.
61001021	Mleiya pauphuwn avah teden rukku dultimii plungbin thungki ngi kthuwk pemeh. Pdainu Isowr miikenje rekki Pthla Kchiir rih qhida mmaan hinni mdopthe.
61002001	Pdainu mii rek arlak rukku mlangkma' khulpu rek avah arvan'am lamda. Ava' heppi tuprut tih mlehkunluk ki tkenveina' kpurchuk mlangkma' chukpu rek avah naan arlakin rukku ka'am lamrah. Ungta mmaan nih mmaan kren kcha' Kruwng ava' kpha rukka kmat chlam rah ungta mdak inni, m'leenin nih tkenveina' avah kbeisek ki ksin thuh chlam rah.
61002002	Ungta mii knempok ki tkenveina', mmaan 'lamqowi rek avah kqowi chlam rah. Mleiya mma' leiyi, kindit 'lam avah pthitda kpau lamrah.
61002003	Mmaan nih mpunjuwr inni naan avah mdopurthun chaakin paumin rekki ake'ekrep raan. Mleiya mmaan 'leenni pau tpinditna' avah ksowt tih pardat daat nimeh ungta mkenvei chaakna' raan avah iip daat nimeh.
61002004	Mleiya Isowr rih pnu kervei vaantamsi rek avah parkhaal lammeh. Pdainu Mma ngi mmaan avah simkhor thah ptlapthi lamda ungta pau tpinditna' ki thenni pardatda kjiingnu thiirrii rek thung ngi mmaan avah mdoparlaan pthi lam.
61002005	Ungta Mma ngi alraang ki dultipaam ava' rukka parkhaal meh, pdainu miichai treht arlak ki khat, rinkinditna' ki paukparjaam mii, Noah avah san chda. Mma ngi rinko'owi kma' dultipaam ava' 'leen nih diipa tpenleda.
61002006	Ungta Mma ngi dil thah rinko'owi kmah ngi ka'am rang rek hinni titinna' khat mkurthuhna' rah Sodom le' Gomorah avah purvuwt tpurthuh pthida, tkenvei chaakna ngi psul lamda.
61002007	Ungta nowlam tukksut kma' mii ava' ki tekterdeuna' nowpa ngi mdo'owr chaak mrinkindit Lot avah qen turthuh chda.
61002008	Mleiya mrinkindit mii avah mmaan arlak ki amda mii rekki nowlam ktaak ki mdotlot rekin avah mmik ki deida ungta ava' mdo'arjaak ki muplungrin avah nitnit ki yachda.
61002009	Audilli rinko'owi kcha' mii avah taluhep pih kepthleem hinkiya teqen turthut rang, ungta mrinkindit kma' avah pau tpinditna' nit tih mraal suwkthuhna' tpiik rang ngi pardatda tithiik rang tidit avah Kruwng ngi mdeh chaak.
61002010	Ungta mkenreelsi ngi daksa dongei, totborna' ava' dilkqowiyi kchet rek ungta ruhtanna' tukksut kma' rek mmaan ava' hinni avah kthuwk rah. Mmaan avah muplungin kraang ungta mthina' ki muplungbin daat ktlow reklam ungta mmaan nah, laarknei rek 'leenni pthitda tpauna' thuh mningin kqi pemeh.
61002011	Anto'daat yoso, ruhtan le' totlot pchaanna' 'leenni klinset vaantamsi rek kpha rukku Kruwng aang ngi mmaan kepteng ngi pthitda pau pchaang lammeh.
61002012	Pdainu hava' mmaan avah dow khatleh kbin pchaang kma' saa rek, kyowngda tpenveipthi rang ngi, mnowpa ngi kqou kcha' ava' hep pih, mdodeh pinditmaan dow rek ava' 'leen nih pthitda kpaulam. Ungta mmaan nah mdakin ki mqow chaaknaan thung ngi kenvei chlam rah.
61002013	Ungta kunthun nih tchaak le' tneekna' thung ngi plung ngamna ngi ktai kcha' rek heppi, mmaan nih rinkinditmana' ki ardaman avah karlaang chlam rah. Mmaan avah, mmaan nih naan tu' mchaak mneeksapin arlaan nih mdak inni kurhuwng kcha', kbihkchu rek ungta mraalpum mii reklam.
61002014	Mmaan nih lowsang tkilqhina' ki miksut thlowi lamda ungta pnu tervena' thungki kkarnga pchaang lam pemeh. Mmaan nih muplungrin knet kma' rek avah porjowk lamda ungta tpunjuwrna' 'leennu muplungin kindit you kcha'lam ungta pauhor tbuk dok nau reklam.
61002015	Mmaan nah rinkinditmana' ki ardaman vonsat klow kcha' Beor chapa Balaam 'lamqowi kqowi rang ngi 'lamkirji mapthida 'lamleh thah chetda kepveet kcha' reklam.
61002016	Pdainu Balaam avah skowlraam ava ngi nowlam mdopkui leiyi, raida ungta mpau kthuwk kma' saa ava ngi dultimii krowl lih mpau ava ngi khulpu avah ma'aana' thungki pkhaan chda.
61002017	Hava' mii rek avah dii kirding kma' diirum reklam ungta tchangkhu ngi mdoraan pthi armei reklam. Mmaan thenni kjiingnu ki kjiingsi mmun avah ktlangknai kma' ki thenni mdopurtum dok.
61002018	Mmaan nih msit ktaak ki tpirlin chaakna' pauna rek mtheen thung ngi, karmak ki ka'am rek hinki kchen sli mii rek avah pnu nowpa ngi kdung ngi mdongei tkorjown pchaanma, tekterdeuna' ava ngi mdoporjowkin.
61002019	Mmaan mdakin avah kqop kcha' rang kurduh ngi suwk'owr rih ma'am daatin arlaan nuh mmaan hinni to'olna' kpii rang ngi paureel reel lamda. Mleiya miikhat avah, mma' kapchaang dow khat ava' kurduh ngi mma' avah tporkolpthi ngi ka'am kcha'.
61002020	Mleiya mmaan nih Kruwng ungta Miksan Jisu Khrista mdodeh pindit chaak inni dultipaam ki totborna' tirthli thungki mchen chaak dokin dilli veikhat ava' thuh mkorbolin ungta ava ngi mapchaan chaak dokin bih, mdilknau ki mqutna' avah mrukri ki hinni, mmaan thenni kdung ngi mmeel kthi rah.
61002021	Mleiya mmaan hinni kchiir paupiik tparlaan ava' dei thida ava' thung ki mdokenlet daak raan hinvah mmaan ki thenvah rinkinditna' 'lam avah tedehdeh ngi mdodehma tlaang raanna.
61002022	Pdainu, “Uiyi mkonsow avah mdochaak kchow.” (Prl. 26:11) Ungta “Vaknu tulqhut chaak avah mukbulna' bulpornok thung ngi kluwt chdaat,” dida, pauril kindit khat tih mdothe heppi avah mmaan hinni kthuwk.
61003001	Nei kvonsat'low rek, 'tunnu hava' miknitna' paukjit avah naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a. Paukjit mikniing thung ngi, neiyi adoktipbin phaak chaak inni aplungril rekin kchiir avah kdoperdel chaak.
61003002	Mleiya kchiir khulpu rekki choduduh ngi mdothe dokin pauna rek ungta Kruwng ungta Miksan ki paupiik avah tamsi rek neen nih adokpiikin ava' adobinphaak chaak raan kdongei chaak.
61003003	Naan nih rukrirep pih hava' avah adodeh chaak raan. Tidit tah mqutna' nit rek thung ngi mikipnichaak rek avah kthuwk rah ungta mmaan nah, mmaan ki daksa dongeina' thuh kchet chlam rah.
61003004	Ungta mmaan nih hanto' kthe lamrah: “Tva'thung ngi Mma' arjunna' rang ki paureel avah ka'am? Mleiya npa'leen mi'ii chaak dokin ki kupqhun nih dow mkheng avah mdopurthuh thokna' thungki hephep daat tih karvang.”
61003005	Mleiya mmaan nih mbindaat chunin nih havah mdoperngeelin. Tidit tah Isowr pauna ava ngi choduh ngi parvaan rek avah anto ngi tpurthuhda ungta dultipaam avah dii thungki ngi ungta dii thung ngi mdopa'am.
61003006	Ava'dii ava ngi ka'am dok dultipaam avah alraang ngi diipa kenleda ungta ava ngi tpenvei pthida.
61003007	Pdainu 'tun ka'am daat parvaan rekle' dultipaam avah pau tpinditna' nit ungta rinko'owi kma' mii rek kenveina' nit ava' mphaakduh kpha ngi, mei ki thenni Mma' pauna ava'kat tih parkhaalda mdothiik daat.
61003008	Pdainu kvonsat'low rek, naan nih hava' dow khat avah kdei kmah ngi ammaan. Mleiya Kruwng hinvah niikhat avah kum pun khat hep daat ungta kum pun khat avah niikhat hep daat.
61003009	Mleiya mii aangqhe ngi kokto ngi mdotaiyin heppi Kruwng nga mpaureel 'leenni kokto pemeh. Pdainu neen nthen inni ksowt tih mdodiildeh chaak mleiya kuwkhat leh ruk mkenvei rah mdongei pemeh. Pdainu mii mkheng ngi plung mdoperthlen chaak rah mdongei.
61003010	Pdainu Kruwng nit avah jaan nih kupru thlenhep pih kthleng rah. Ava' thung vah parvaan rek avah mokrowl klin khat kthuwk tu' kilqhi ngi kqu chrah ungta dow rek avah meidosat tih kyon chrah ungta dultipaam le' mthung ngi ka'am nong rek avah kukbung chrah.
61003011	Avaleiyi, hava' dow mkheng rek avah myon chaak rangvah, naanna taluhep kduh ki mii rek kurthuwk naandio? Kchiir rinchan nih ungta rinko'owiyi a'am raan.
61003012	Mleiya Isowr arjun rang nit ava' arngai chda ungta avah adotepbei chaak raan. Mleiya ava'leiyi parvaan rek avah mei 'leenni kyon chrang nga ungta dow rek avah msatreen nih kluwng chrah.
61003013	Pdainu neenna Mma' paureel dilkqowiyi rinkindit amna' parvaan ren rekle' dultipaam ren rek ava' tsutthlaam chaakin.
61003014	Avaleiyi, kvonsat'low rek, naan nih hava' dow rek ava' adosutthlaam chaakin leiyi, Mma' hinni plung kdaiyi, kbihkchu kma' ungta mraal ktaak ki akandan chaakna' raanni ikilring chaan.
61003015	Ungta neenki Kruwng ki ksowt tih tidiildehna' avah tkirliinna' tidit tih atai chaan. Hava'kat avah neenki nvonsat'lown nu'unnau'in Paul lih mma' hinni luwkinritna' mdopiik chaak ava' dilkqowiyi naan ahinin nih mdokjit dok.
61003016	Ungta mma' paukjit rek mkheng thung rukku hava' dow rek avah mmaan hinni mdothe dok. Ava' mdothe rek ava' thung ngi aangqhe rek avah tedeh pinditna' kparsa dok ka'am. Ava' thung ngi tpurchuhma ungta knet kma' rekki paukjit avah Kchiir laika morson rek thung ngi mdotlotin heppi tkenveina' thah mdopeher kreen.
61003017	Avaleiyi, kvonsat'low rek, naan nih, hava' dow rek avah mthuhduh ngi adodeh chaak dokin leiyi, ikilring chaan. Mditma bih, naan rukka nowlam tukksut kma' doparmana' thah mdothiik dok, mdaksa ki knet tih mrina' thungki ktluw kcha' kurthuwk chnaandi'.
61003018	Pdainu naan nih neenki Kruwng ungta Miksan Jisu Khrista plungnee le' Mma' tedeh pinditna' thung ngi ipqhang chaan. Mma' hinni 'tun rukku ungta ktlangknai kmah ngi tkonlorna' avah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
62001001	Rinkum ki pauna ava'leiyi, tidit tah mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih neen nih avah karjaakin ungta kmikin nih kdehn. Ungta kmin nih kdosut pinditin ava' avah naan ahinin nih adokparjaakin.
62001002	Isowr rih rinkum avah mipandan piikinda. Ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah neen nih kmikin nih deiyin nuh ungta naan ahin nih ava' ki rinpaumin avah pandang innu kthethut chaak inna. Mleiya ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah Pa ava' tu' ka'am ungta avah neen kihin nih mpandan piikinda.
62001003	Mleiya neen nih, naan rukku neen tu' lopkhat akurthuh chaakna' raan ki thenni kmikin nih kdodehn ungta kdo'arjaakin avah naan ahinin nih kthethut chaak inna. Ungta kindit kat tih neenna Pa ungta Chapa Jisu Khrista le' tu' lopkhat inpimin.
62001004	Ungta naan akanpatin ava' mkurkhumna' rang ki thenni, neen nih hava'le' avah naan ahin nih kikjit chaak inna.
62001005	Havah neen nih Mma' hinni kdo'arjaakin ungta kdothe thutin paumin avah hava': Tidit tah Isowr rah mar'aang ungta Mma' thung ngi kjiingnu ka'am liit pemeh.
62001006	Neen nih Mma' tu' lopkhat inping dithida kjiingnu thuh nche tlitin bih neen nih plei nnee chaak inna. Ungta neen nih kindit avah tlow maanmin.
62001007	Pdainu Mma ngi mar'aang thuh ma'am heppi neen nih mar'aang thung ngi ncheien bih, neen nih khat le' khat tu' lopkhat tkurthuh chaakin. Ungta Mchapa Jisu Khrista ki hii ava ngi neenna pnu mkheng thungki mitpertleu chaak inna.
62001008	Neen nih kupnu arve ka'am pemeh nditin bih, neen nih nthina tkurhuwn chaakin. Ungta kindit avah neen nthung inni ammeh.
62001009	Neen nih nupnu arve rekin avah nthethut chaakin bih, neenki nupnu arve rekin thungki mikoptlotpiik rang ki thenni ungta nrinkindit mana' mkheng thungki mikpertleu rang ki thenni Mmah trinchaak krow ungta kindit.
62001010	Neen nih pnu arvan'arvei maanring nditin bih, neen nih Mma' avah plei nepne inna ungta Mma' pauna avah neen nthung inni ammeh.
62002001	Nei kvonsat'low nau rek, naan nih pnu ado'arvemana' raan ki thenni neiyi hava'le' avah naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a. Ungta kuwmiikhat tih pnu merve chaak dok rukku, neen nthen nih kpau rah khat avah Pa ava' hinni ka'am daat. Mma' avah mrinkindit Jisu Khrista ava'.
62002002	Mma' avah neen nupnu arveen ki thenni mrinkparlaan, Isowr plungngam ktlow Mma'kat ava'. Ungta Mma' avah neen nupnu arve rekin ki then daat kma' dultipaam mkheng ki pnu arve ki then rukku mrinkparlaan dok kcha' ava'.
62002003	'Tunnu hava ngi ndehn a tidit tah neen nih Mma' paupiik rek ava' nopqowi chaakin bih, neen nih Mma' avah ndeh chaak dok ina.
62002004	“Neiyi Mmah kdeh,” dithida, Mma' paupiik rekka kopqowi kma' mma' avah pleimne a. Ungta mma' thung ngi kindit ka'am pemeh.
62002005	Pdainu Mma' Pauna kirkhi kcha' mma' hinni dakat tih Isowr vonsat avah mma' thung ngi kpurkhum piik chrah. Hava ngi neen nih ndehn, tidit tah neenna Mma' hinni ka'am inpimin.
62002006	Mma' hinni ka'am ping kdi, mma' ava ngi Mma' chehep pih mma' rukka mche chaak rah.
62002007	Ku'uknau rek, neiyi naan ahinin nih paupiik ren kjitmaang pdainu mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih naan nih adothlowi dokin paupiik pli ava' kdokjit. Paupiik pli avah mupqhun daat ki naan nih ado'arjaak dokin pauna ava'.
62002008	Veikhat nowl lih neiyi naan ahin nih paupiik ren khat kurthuwk ki kikjit chaak a. Tidit tah hava' dow rek avah Mma' hin ruk ungta naan ahinin rukku kindit ava'. Mleiya kjiingnu avah kthleng dok kcha' a ungta kindit mar'aang avah kleng dok a.
62002009	Mar'aang thung ngi ka'am ping dithida mu'umnau ksunum kma' mma' avah 'tun kpha thung ngi kjiingnu thuh ka'am chdaat a.
62002010	Mu'umnau vonsat klow kcha' mma' ava ngi mar'aang thung ngi ka'am a. Ungta mma' thung ngi khuhsiir tpirthitna' rah ammeh.
62002011	Pdainu mu'umnau ksunum kma' mma' avah kjiingnu thuh ka'am ungta kjiingnu thung ngi kchet kcha' a. Mma ngi tva'lam kqowiya tidit deimeh, mleiya kjiingnu ava ngi mmik avah mdopjiin pthi.
62002012	Nei kvonsat'low nau rek, naan ahin nih kikjit chaak a. Naan apnu arve rekin avah Mma' miing leiyi, atoptlotpiik dokin a.
62002013	Mpa rek, naan ahin nih neiyi kikjit chaak a. Mleiya mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih ka'am. Mma' avah naan nih adodeh dokin. Kseet nau rek, naan ahin nih kikjit chaak a. Mleiya naan nih kqha kma' khat avah adopchaan dokin. Nei kvonsat'low nausisi rek, Naan ahin nih neiyi kikjit chaak a. Mleiya naan nih Pa avah adodeh chaak dokin.
62002014	Mpa rek, naan ahin nih neiyi kdokjit chaak dok. Mleiya mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih ka'am, Mma' avah naan nih adodeh chaak dokin. Kseet nau rek, naan ahin nih kdokjit chaak dok. Mleiya naanna aruhn ktang ungta Isowr pauna avah naan ahinin nih ka'am. Ungta naan nih kqha kma' khat avah adopchaan dokin.
62002015	Naan nih dultipaam avah vonsat lowmaan mditmata dultipaam ki dow rek avah vonsat lowmaan. Kuwmiikhat tih dultipaam vonsat mlow chaak bih Pa, ava' vonsat avah mma' thung ngi ammeh.
62002016	Mleiya hava'le' avah dultipaam thung ngi ka'am rek ava': Mmaan avah pnu nowpa ki daksa dongei miksut 'leenni daksa dongei ungta rinkum ki tpirlin chaakna' rek mkheng avah Pa ava' hinki pemeh pdainu avah dultipaam thungki.
62002017	Ungta dultipaam avah kqu chrah mthe a ungta ava' ki kqha kma' tngeina' ruk kqu chrah. Pdainu Isowr plungbin ktlow mma' avah ktlangknai kmah ka'am tlit rah.
62002018	Nei kvonsat'low nau rek, havah mqutna' qhang ava'. Ungta naan nih ado'arjaakin heppi mlangkma' khrista avah karvang meeksli a. Ungta 'tun rukku mlangkma' khrista rek avah karvang dok a'. Hava ngi neen nih mqutna' qhang ava'a tidit avah ndehna.
62002019	Mmaan avah neen nihin ki vangkthuwk lam, pdainu mmaan avah neen nthungin ki lam pemeh. Mleiya mmaan avah neen nthung ki mkurthuh tlaangin bih mmaan nih neen nthung ngi ka'am tlit lamrah. Pdainu mmaan mkheng avah, khadaat rukka neen nthungin ki lam pemeh tidit mkandan chaakna' raan ki thenni vangkthuwk kcha'lam.
62002020	Pdainu naanna Kenje khat ava ngi reidii adotupbul chaak dokin, ungta naan nih dow mkheng avah adodehn.
62002021	Naan nih kindit ava' adodeh maan lei pemeh. Pdainu naan nih kindit avah adodeh dokin leiyi, ungta pleiknei avah kindit ava' thung ki kthuwklu pemeh tidit adodeh chaakin leiyi, kdokjit chaak.
62002022	Pleiknei khat avah kuw? Mma' avah Jisu avah Mesaiah tidit krow kma' ava'. Pa ungta Chapa krow kma' avah mlangkma' khrista ava'.
62002023	Mchapa krow kma' mii mkheng ava ngi Pa ava' rukka thlowi chmeh. Pdainu Chapa ava' kdeipindih kcha' mma' ava ngi Pa ava' rukka mthlowi chaak a.
62002024	Avaleiyi, naan nih mupqhun daat ki ado'arjaakin avah naan athung ngi i'amso. Mupqhun daat ki ado'arjaakin ava ngi naan athung ngi ma'am bih, naan rukka Chapa le' Pa ava' hinni am chnaandi'.
62002025	Ungta havah neen nihin nih mdoreel, Mma' paureel ava' ungta avah ktlangknai kma' rinkum ava'.
62002026	Naan akuhuwng chraan rek leiyi, neiyi naan ahin nih hava'le' avah kdokjit chaak dok.
62002027	Pdainu naan nih Mma' hinki reidii tupbulna' ado'arlaan chaakin ava ngi naan athung inni ma'am leiyi, kuwkhat leh ngi adotpurchuh raan ammeh. Pdainu reidii tupbulna' ava'kat ava ngi dow mkheng leiyi, atpurchuh chaak dok inna. Ungta havah kindit ungta havah plei tneena' pemeh. Ungta naan nih Mma' hinni akurchuh dokin ava'jik ki naan nih Mma' hinni am chnaandi'.
62002028	Ungta 'tunnu, nei kvonsat'low nau rek, naan nih Mma' hinni i'amin. Mleiya Mma' mkurphuwn thung ngi neen nih plungkrip tothlowi chaakna' rah ungta Mma' murjun thung ngi Mma' aang ngi, neen nih ningkya tudutmana' rah Mma' hinni i'amin.
62002029	Naan nih Mma' avah mrinkindit tidit adodehn leiyi, mrinkindit tih nong ktlow kcha' rek khimkhei avah Mma' hinki kqou tidit adeiyin.
62003001	Asuwn! Pa ava ngi neen daat, nihin nih tya klin vonsat mitpiik daat inna. Neen avah Isowr nau rek midotiditna' raan ki thenni vonsat avah neen nihin nih mipiinda. Avaleiyi, dultipaam mih neen avah mideipindihn meh. Mleiya dultipaam mih Mma' avah mdodeh pindit pemeh.
62003002	Nei kvonsat'low rek, 'tunnu neenna Isowr nau rekin pimin. Ungta neenna taluhep daat raan pimin tidit avah 'tunnu mipandanpiik mlaiyin. Pdainu neen nih ndehn tidit tah Mma' mkurphuwn thung ngi neenna Mma' hep daat chenaandi'. Mleiya neen nih Mma' avah Mma' hephep daat tih dei chenaandi'.
62003003	Ungta Mma' hinni hava' plungbinpsuk kthlowi kcha' khimkheiyi, Mma' chiir heppi mma' rukka kpirchiir kcha' a.
62003004	Kuwku yoso pnu kervei kcha' mma' ava ngi nowlam mupkui a ungta pnu avah nowlam kupkui ava'.
62003005	Ungta naan nih adehn tidit tah neen nupnu arve miklow pthipiik rang ki thenni, Mma' avah mipurphuwn piik inda. Ungta Mma' thung ngi pnu ka'am pemeh.
62003006	Kuwku yoso Mma' hinni ka'am kcha' mma' ava ngi pnu armei chmeh. Kuwku yoso pnu kervei kcha' mma' ava ngi, Mma' avah mmik rukku deimeh ungta tedeh rukku Mma' avah deimeh.
62003007	Nei kvonsat'low nau rek, naan avah kuwkhat leh ngi ahuwng chmaanso. Mma' rinkinditna' heppi, rinkinditna' nong ktlow kcha' mma' avah mrinkindit.
62003008	Pnu kervei kcha' mma' avah tarnampii hinki. Mleiya tarnampii avah mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih pnu mdo'arve chaak. Hava' leiyi, Mma ngi tarnampii ki nongtlot rek ava' mdopenveina' rang ki thenni Isowr Chapa avah mdopurphuwn.
62003009	Kuwku yoso Isowr hinki kqou mma' avah pnu arvei meh! Mleiya Mma' chiimuw avah mma' thung ngi ka'am ungta pnu mdo'arve pchaan pemeh. Mleiya mmah Isowr hinki kqou kcha'.
62003010	Hanto ngi Isowr nau rekle' tarnampii nau rek avah mdopandan. Kuwku yoso rinkinditna' thuh nong ktlow kma' ungta mu'umnau vonsat klow kma' mma' avah Isowr hinki pemeh.
62003011	Mleiya havah naan nih mupqhun daat ki ado'arjaakin paumin ava': Tidit tah neenni khat le' khat vonsat tkorlow chaak raan.
62003012	Kqha kma' khat ava' hinki Kein nih mnaupa mdo'eyowluhep kmah ngi vonsat tkorlow chaak raan. Ungta taluleiyi mma ngi mnaupa avah mdo'eyow o? Mleiya mma' nongtlot rek avah kqha pemeh ungta mnaupa nongtlot avah mrinkindit.
62003013	Nei ku'uknau rek, dulti mii ngi naan atahal chaakin thung ngi naan nih kngak ki kirbinmaan.
62003014	Neen nih, neenna kdiyou thungki rinkum thah konthot dok kchaan pimin, tidit avah ndehn. Mleiya neen nih nu'unnau rek vonsat tolow chaakin. Mu'umnau vonsat klow kma' mma' avah kdiyou thung ngi ka'am chdaat a.
62003015	Kuwku yoso mu'umnau ksunum kma' mma' avah mii ke'eyou. Ungta mii ke'eyou kuwkhat leh hinni ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah ka'am pemeh tidit avah naan nih adehn.
62003016	Hava ngi neen nih vonsat avah tedehn mleiya Mma ngi neen nthenni mrinkum avah mdoparlaan pthidok. Avaleiyi, neen rukku nrinkum rekin avah nu'unnau rekki thenni tparlaan chaak raan.
62003017	Kuwmiikhat tih dultipaam ki dow rek avah mthlowi chaak dok a idiin cheh, ungta mu'umnau dokriin rukka mdeh a. Pdainu mu'umnau ki thenni plung knei kma' mkurthuh u, taluhep pih mma' thung ngi Isowr vonsat avah ka'am rang ngo?
62003018	Nei kvonsat'low nau rek, neen nih pauna daat tih mditmata nehr daat tih vonsat lowmaan cheh. Pdainu nong ngi ungta kindit tih vonsat ilown cheh.
62003019	Hava ngi ndehn a tidit tah neenna kindit thungki inpimin ungta ava ngi nuplungin avah Mma' aang ngi krip kcha' a.
62003020	Mleiya nuplung inni neen avah mitupsulin bih, Isowr avah nuplungin hinni klin a ungta Mma ngi dow mkheng avah mdodeh.
62003021	Nei kvonsat'low rek, nuplung inni neen avah mitupsulmaan bih neen nih Isowr ktong thah plungkrip nthlowi chaak inna.
62003022	Ungta talutalu yoso neen nih tiqhil chaakin avah Mma' hinki tarlaan chaakin. Mleiya neen nih Mma' paupiik rek avah pqowi inmin ungta Mma' miksut thung ngi muplung ngamna' avah totlot chaakin.
62003023	Ungta havah Mma' paupiik ava': Tidit tah neen nih Mma' Chapa Jisu Khrista ava' miing 'leen lamtrin chaak raan. Ungta Mma ngi neen nihin nih paupiik midotpiikin heppi neen nih khat le' khat vonsat tkorlow chaak raan.
62003024	'Tunnu Isowr paupiik rek ava' kopqowi kcha' mma' ava ngi, Mma' hinni ka'am a ungta Isowr rih mma' hinni ka'am a. Ungta Mma ngi midotpiikin Pthla ava ngi neen nih neen nthung ngi Mma' ka'am tidit avah ndeh chaak inna.
62004001	Nei kvonsat'low rek, naan nih pthla khimkhei lam'rin chmaan pdainu naan nih mmaan avah Isowr hinki mow tidit leiyi, pthla rek avah aperteelin. Mleiya mlangkma'. khulpu knempok rek avah dultipaam thung ngi kchet doklam.
62004002	Hanto ngi naan nih Isowr Pthla avah adeiyin. Mleiya Jisu Khrista avah daksa ngi kurjung dok tidit kthe thuh kcha' pthla khimkhei rek avah Isowr hinki.
62004003	Ungta Jisu Khrista avah daksa ngi kurjung dok tidit kthe thuh kma' pthla rek khimkhei avah Isowr hinki pemeh. Ungta avah mlangkma' khrista ki pthla ava'. Ungta naan nih mma' avah kurjung rah tidit ado'arjaakin, ungta mma' avah dultipaam thung ngi ka'am dok ksa.
62004004	Nei kvonsat'low rek, naanna Isowr hinki inptih. Mleiya naan athung inni ka'am Mma' ava ngi dultipaam thung ngi ka'am mma' ava' hinni klin ungta naan nih mmaan avah adopchaan dokin
62004005	Mmaan nah dultimii reklam. Avaleiyi, mmaan nih dultipaam ki ngi kpaulam ungta dultipaam ki mii ngi mmaan dothe avah mdo'arjaakin.
62004006	Neenna Isowr hinkiin pimin. Isowr kdeipindih kcha' mma' ava ngi neen avah midotarjaak chaakin, ungta Isowr hinki kma' mma' ava ngi neenna midotarjaakin pemeh. Hava ngi neen nih kindit ki pthla le' kuhuwng kcha' pthla avah tedehpindit chaakin.
62004007	Nei kvonsat'low rek, neen nih khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaancheh. Mleiya vonsat avah Isowr hinki. Ungta vonsat kthlowi kcha' khimkhei rek avah Isowr hinki kqou kcha'lam ungta Isowr avah mmaan nih mdodeh chaakin.
62004008	Vonsat kthlowi kma' mma' ava ngi Isowr avah deipindih chmeh. Mleiya Isowr rah vonsat.
62004009	Hanto ngi Isowr rih vonsat midotolow chaakin avah neen nihin nih mipandanpiik inda. Mleiya neen nih Mma' amleiyi trin chaakna' raan ki thenni Isowr rih Mchapa khatpak daat avah dultipaam thung ngi arjupthlada.
62004010	Vonsat tah talu tidit avah hava': Tidit tah neen nih Isowr vonsat tolown ava' pemeh pdainu Mma ngi neen avah vonsat milow chaanda. Tidit tah Mchapa avah neen nupnu arve rekin leiyi, Isowr plung kapngam mih mrinkparlaan rah arjupthlada.
62004011	Nei kvonsat'low rek, Isowr rih neen avah hanto ngi vonsat milownda. Avaleiyi, neen rukku khat le' khat vonsat tkorlow chaak raan.
62004012	Kuwkhat leh ngi Isowr avah teden rukku mmik ki deimeh. Neen nih khat le' khat vonsat nkorlow chaakin bih, Isowr avah neen nihin nih ka'am a. Ungta Mma' vonsat avah neen nthung ngi mpurkhum a.
62004013	Hava ngi neen nih ndehn a tidit tah neen nih Mma' thung ngi aminmin ungta neen nthung inni Mma' amda. Mleiya Isowr rih Mma' Pthla avah neen nihin nih midotpiik dokin.
62004014	Neen nih kmikin nih kdeh chaakin ungta kthepindit chaak inna, tidit tah Pa ngi Chapa avah dultipaam thung ngi Miksan kcha' khat tih arjuk pthlada.
62004015	Kuwku yoso Jisu avah Isowr Chapa tidit kthe thuh kcha' mma' hinni Isowr avah ka'am a ungta mma' avah Isowr hinni ka'am a.
62004016	Ungta neen nih Isowr rih neen nthenni mdothlowi vonsat avah tedeh chaak dokin ungta lam'trin chaak dokin. Isowr rah vonsat ungta kuwmiikhat vonsat thung ngi ka'am kcha' mma' avah Isowr hinni ka'am kcha' a ungta Isowr avah mma' hinni ka'am a.
62004017	Isowr rih vonsat avah neen narlak ki hanto ngi mpurkhum a. Ungta havah Isowr rih pau mpindit nit tih, neen nih plungkrip tothlowi chaakna' raan ki then. Mleiya dultipaam thung ngi neenna Mma' hep daatin pimin.
62004018	Vonsat thung ngi ningkqi ka'am pemeh ungta kurkhum vonsat tih ningqit avah mdorei pthi. Mleiya ningqit thung ngi suwktuthuhna' ki plungyatna' ka'am. Ungta ningkipqit mma' ava' hinni vonsat avah tpurkhum meh.
62004019	Mma ngi rukri ngi vonsat midotolow chaakin leiyi, neen nih Mma' avah vonsat tolow chaakin.
62004020	Kuwmiikhat tih: “Neiyi Isowr rah vonsat klow chaak”, adithiso mu'umnau mahal chaak bih mmah pleiknei. Mleiya, mma ngi mmik ki mdodeh mu'umnau vonsat mlow chaakma u, taluhep pih mmik ki mdodehma Isowr ngaalla vonsat klow rang ngo?
62004021	Havah neen nih Mma' hinki tothlowi chaakin paupiik hava': Tidit tah Isowr vonsat klow kcha' mma' ava ngi mu'umnau rukka vonsat mdolow chaak rah.
62005001	Kuwku yoso, Jisu avah Mesaiah ava' tidit lamkrin kcha' rek avah Isowr hinki kqoulam. Ungta Mpa kurthuwk Mma' ava' vonsat klow kcha' khimkheiyi mdopluk chaak Mma' avah vonsat mlow chaak a.
62005002	Hava ngi neen nih ndehn a, tidit tah neen nih Isowr vonsat'low chda ungta Mma' paupiik rek ava' nopqowi chaakin thung ngi neen nih Isowr nau rek avah vonsat tolow chaakin.
62005003	Mleiya havah Isowr vonsat ava': Tidit tah neen nih Mma' paupiik rek avah topqowi chaak raan. Ungta Mma' paupiik rek avah bowr rihna' pemeh.
62005004	Mleiya talutalu yoso Isowr hinki kqou kcha' dok rek mkheng ava ngi dultipaam avah mapchaan dok a. Ungta dultipaam kapchaang dok neenki tapchaan chaak naan avah neenki nlamrinin ava'.
62005005	Dultipaam kapchaang avah kuwda? Dultipaam kapchaang avah, Jisu avah Isowr Chapa tidit lamkrin kcha' ava' pemeh mow?
62005006	Havah dii le' hii ngi karvang dok Jisu tidit tah Mesaiah ava'. Dii daat kma' dii le' hii ngi Mmah karvang. Ungta Pthla ava ngi Mma' rinpaumin avah mdopiik mleiya Pthla avah kindit.
62005007	Mleiya parvaan thah kdum rekki rinpaumin avah mdopiikin. Mmaan avah: Pa, Pauna ungta Pthla Kchiir ungta hava' kdum rek avah khadaat lam.
62005008	Ungta dultipaam thung ngi kdumtet tih rinpaumin avah mdopiikin. Mmaan avah: Pthla, dii ungta hii, ungta hava' kdum rek avah khadaat tih kolrowlam.
62005009	Neen nih dultimii hinki rinpaumin ava' narlaanin bih, Isowr rinpaumin ava ngi ava' hinni klinbet. Mleiya havah Mchapa leiyi, mdopiik Isowr hinki rinpaumin ava'.
62005010	Isowr Chapa hinni lamkrin kcha' mma' avah mdak thung ngi rinpaumin avah ka'am kcha' a. Isowr pauna lamkrin kma' mma' ava ngi Mma' avah plei mtepnee a. Mleiya Isowr rih Mchapa? ki rinpaumin mdopiik avah mma ngi lammdorin chaak pemeh.
62005011	Havah rinpaumin ava': Tidit tah Isowr rih neen nihin nih ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah mipiida. Ungta hava' rinkum avah Mma' Chapa hinni ka'am.
62005012	Chapa ava' kthlowi kcha' mma' hinni rinkum avah ka'am. Ungta Isowr Chapa ava' kthlowi kma' mma' hinni rinkum avah ka'am pemeh.
62005013	Isowr Chapa miing 'leenni lamkrin kcha' rek naan ahin nih hava' dow rek avah neiyi kikjit chaak a. Mleiya naan nih ktlangknai kma' rinkum avah kthlowi chaak inna tidit adodehna' raan ungta naan nih Isowr Chapa miing 'leenni lamkrin tlit tih a'am chaakna' raan ki thenni kikjit chaak a.
62005014	'Tunnu havah neen nih Mma' hinni plungkrip tothlowi chaakin ava': Tidit tah neen nih Mma' plungbin tu' kilqhi ngi talutalu yoso nqhil chaakin bih, Mma ngi avah mitarjaak piik inna.
62005015	Ungta neen nih talutalu yoso tiqhilin avah Mma ngi mitarjaak piik inna tidit ndehn bih, neen nih Mma' hinni tiqhil chaakin, rintaktham chaak avah narlaan chaak dok inna tidit ndeh chaak inna.
62005016	Kuwmiikhat tih mu'umnau khat avah tidiyowna' thah kqhikma' pnu kervei mdeh bih, mma ngi rinmdoktham piik rah. Mdit bih, Isowr rih tidiyowna' thah kqhikma' pnu kervei rek ava' hinni rinkum avah kpii rah. Tidiyowna' thah kqhi pnu ka'am. Pdainu neiyi ava' ki thenni mma ngi rinmdoktham piik rah dimaang.
62005017	Rinkinditmana' mkheng avah pnu ungta tidiyowna' thah kqhi kma' pnu ka'am.
62005018	Neen nih ndehn tidit tah kuwku yoso, Isowr hinki kqou kcha' rekka pnu arvei meh. Pdainu Isowr dopluk chaak mma' ava ngi mdak ki kirkhi kcha' ungta kqha kma' khat ava ngi mma' avah kmei pchaang meh.
62005019	Neenna Isowr hinkiin pimin tidit neen nih ndehn a. Ungta dultipaam mkheng avah kqha kma' khat ava' khut thuh ka'am kcha' a, tidit avah neen nih ndehn.
62005020	Ungta Isowr Chapa ava' arjungda neen nih kindit ava' tedehna' raan ki thenni tedeh pinditna' mitpiik inna tidit avah neen nih ndeh chaak inna. Ungta kindit khat Mma' tidit tah Mma' Chapa Jisu Khrista hinni neenna ka'am inpimin. Mma' avah kindit Isowr ungta ktlangknai kma' rinkum ava'.
62005021	Nei kvonsat'low rek, naan nih adakin avah dow pthla rek hinki ikilrin chaan. Amen.
63001001	Kver nang, ungta mdokchol dok takyat kurhuwi snu avale' mma' nau rek hinni kikjit chaak a. Neiyi kindit ava' thung ngi vonsat aklow chaakin, nei daat pemeh, pdainu kindit ava' kdei kcha' rek mkheng ngi vonsat adotolow chaakin.
63001002	Mleiya neen nthung ngi ka'am ungta neen nthung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am rang kindit ava ngi vonsat adoklow chaakin.
63001003	Kindit le' vonsat tih Pa Isowr ava' hinki ungta Pa ava' Chapa Kruwng Jisu Khrista hinki plungqhat le' plung knei nong ungta plung kdai avah naan ahinin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso.
63001004	Nang anau le' aangqhe rekki neen nih Pa, ava' hinki tarlaan chaakin paupiik ava' heppi kindit thung ngi mche chaakin kdodeh chaak leiyi, kdung ngi kanpa kcha' imping.
63001005	Ungta 'tunnu takyat chaak kurhuwi snu nang ahin nih neiyi paupiik ren khat kdokjit pemeh. Pdainu havah neen nih mupqhun daat ki tothlowi dokin ava': Tidit tah neen nih khat le' khat vonsat ikorlow chaancheh, kdi kcha' ping.
63001006	Vonsat hava', neenni Mma' paupiik rek heppi tche chaak raan. Paupiik avah hava', naan nih mupqhun daat ki ado'arjaak chaakin ava' heppi ava' thuh ache chaak raan.
63001007	Tidit tah 'lamleh thah mikqhikrep rek tidit tah Jisu Khrista avah daksa ngi kurjung tidit kthe thuh kma' rek knempok avah, dultipaam thuh kchet dok lam a. Hava' mii avah 'lamleh thah mikqhi ungta mlangkma' khrista ava'.
63001008	Mleiya neen nih nong tolow chaakna' rekin dow rek avah neen nih kpenvei kmah ngi, pdainu neen nih nnongqhat'lotin, kurkhum ava' tarlaan chaakna' raanni, adak inni asuwdei chaan.
63001009	Kuwku yoso, nowlam kupkui ungta Khrista dopurchuhna' thung ngi ka'am kma' mma' ava ngi Isowr avah thlowi chmeh. Ungta Khrista dopurchuhna' thung ngi ka'am kcha' mma' ava ngi Pa ava' ruk ungta Chapa rukka mthlowi chaak a.
63001010	Ungta kuwmiikhat, hava' tpurchuhna' kohor kmah ngi ahin nih mthlen cheentung ngi mma' avah a'inn thung ngi ptlungma' ungta turvuwi ruk arvuwima'.
63001011	Mleiya mma' karlaang kcha' mma' ava ngi mma' ki kqha kma' nongtlot ava' thuh lopkhat mkurthuhqhi a.
63001012	Neiyi ahin nih dow knempok kdokjit rah ka'am, Neiyi che le' muk tsin rah binmaang. Pdainu neenki tkanpat chaak mkurkhumna' rah, neiyi ahin nih thlengda maiqhuwm mih pau tsaam rah kdobin.
63001013	Isowr rih mdokchol dok ksa a'unu nau le' rukku aturvuwi chaak lam a. Amen.
64001001	Kver nang, ungta neiyi vonkdopsat chaak Gaius nang ahin nih kikjit chaak a. Neiyi kindit tih vonsat aklow chaak a.
64001002	Nei kvonsat'low chaak nang, nang ngi apthlarin mqhatjik ava' heppi dow mkheng thung ngi kqhajik ki a'am rah ungta kdam mih a'am rah kngei chaak a.
64001003	Unau rek aangqhe thleng lamda ungta nangki akinditna' le' nang ngi kindit thung ngi ache chaakna' ki rinpaumin avah pii lamda. Avaleiyi, neiya kdung ngi kanpa kcha' ping.
64001004	Knau leh ngi kindit thung ngi kchet lam tidit karjaak chaak thung ngi kkanpat chaak ava' han'tun nih kkanpatna' morson ammeh.
64001005	Nei kvonsat'low chaak nang, nang ngi unau rek hinni ungta mal rek hinni adotlot avah trinchaak krow ngi atlot chaak a.
64001006	Mmaan nih lamrinlop hinni nang avonsat leiyi, thepindit chlamda. Nang ngi mmaan avah m'lamqowi thaan nih Isowr dorot tih apsun chaak lambi, nang nga kqha atlot chaak a.
64001007	Mleiya mmaan nah Mma' miing leiyi, kchet chlam. Ungta Chaatktlei rek hinni takhatleh ruk mdolow chaakin ka'am pemeh.
64001008	Neen nih kindit ava' ki thenni nong ktlow kcha'sap tkurthuhna' rang ki thenni, neen nih ava' hep mii rek avah kqha ngi tarlaan chaak rah.
64001009	Neiyi, lamrinlop hinni kdokjit chaak dok. Pdainu mrukrisi tkurthuh rah kngei, Diotrephes tih neen avah marlaang chmaanda.
64001010	Avaleiyi, kthlen bih, neiyi mhin nih mnongtlot rek avah tipbinphaak nikdi'. Mma ngi neen k'leen nih pauthit tih titii mthepsuk inda. Ungta ava' pau rek daat ava ngi muplung ngammda ungta unau rek rukka arlaang chlam mda. Ungta mmaan kuptlung nuwm kcha' mii rek avah mma ngi thlot lamda ungta lamrinlop thungki knengpthi lamda.
64001011	Nei kvonsat'low rek, naan nih kqha kma' avah pqowimaan pdainu kqha avah apqowi chaan. Kqha ktlow kcha' mma' avah Isowr hinki ungta kqha kma' ktlow mma' ava ngi Isowr avah mmik ki dei chdokmeh.
64001012	Demetrias rinpaumin avah mii mkheng ngi kqhajik ki mpiik ka. Ungta kindit ava' hinki rukku ungta neen rukku kthepindit chaak inna. Ungta neen nih kdothe pindit chaakin avah kindit tidit tah naan nih adehn.
64001013	Neiyi dow knempok kdokjit rah ka'am, pdainu neiyi pen le' muk ki ahin nih tikjit rah binmaang.
64001014	Neiyi nang nga kbeisek ki tkurdutqhi rah adokbin. Ava' thung ngi maiqhuwm mih saamlaiche'.
64001015	Plung kdai ahin nih ka'am ikurthuwkso. Hava' ki plap rekki aturvuwi chaak lam a. Ava' ki aplap rek avah mmiing inni kurvuwi chaak lam a. Amen.
65001001	Jisu Khrista suwk ungta James naupa Jude neiyi, Pa Isowr rih adotipchiir chaak dokin, ungta Jisu Khrista hinni owndokda mdo'arkhiik chaak dok rek naan ahinin nih kikjit chaak a.
65001002	Naan athung inni plungnee le' plung kdai ungta vonsat avah koryou thang kcha' ikurthuwkso'.
65001003	Nei kvonsat'low rek, neiyi naan ahin nih, neen nkheng inni tothlowi chaakin, tkirliinna' ava' ki mleiyi tikjit rah kdung ngi kdongei chaak. Pdainu neiyi miikenje rek hinni, mpha ktai ki thenni veikhadaat thuh mdoparlaan dok lamrin ava' ki thenni naan nih kdung ngi adokarnaak qhi raan ava ngi msit ka'am bet tidit tih akoksow chaak inna.
65001004	Mleiya mmaan ki thenni hava' tupsulna', mduduh ngi mdokjit dok mii aangqhe rek avah naan arlak inni tuprut tih luwt dok lamda. Mmaan avah Isowr kbin kma' mii reklam, mmaan nih neenki Isowr plungnee avah tekterdeuna' thah perthleng pthi lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Kruwng Isowr khadaat chrel ungta neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista avah mat chlamda,
65001005	Naan nih hava' mkheng avah choduduh ngi dei dok jown tih, neiyi veikhat adoktipbin phaak raan avah ngei chnuh. Mleiya, Kruwng ngi Mma' mii rek avah Egypt paam thungki qhi pthuwk chlamda, pdainu mdilthang vah lamkrin kma' rek mmaan avah tpenvei pthi lamda.
65001006	Tidit tah vaantamsi rekki mma' mma' hinni ruhtanna' mmunin avah kirkhi lam kmah ngi choduh ki mmunin avah mapthi lamda. Avaleiyi Mma ngi vaantamsi rek avah, kjiingnu thung ngi ktlangknai kma' thiirrii ngi bowlthida pau tpinditna' ki nit klinsi pardatda mdokhum pthi lam.
65001007	Anto'hep daat tih Sodom le' Gomorah ungta mmaan kpervel lih ka'am khuwpii rekki mdakin avah jowltpurjutna' rek thung ngi kirpii chlamda. Ungta mdetmdet ki daksa dongei thah chet chlamda. Mmaan avah kqiim knai liit kma' rang mei thung ngi tyatna' avah mraal suwkthuh naan nih kperteel chrang rekki thenni titinna' khat tih ka'am kcha'lam.
65001008	Anto'hep daat nowl lih hava' mer kmer rek ava ngi mdaksaan ki daksa rek avah topbor chlamda. Ungta tpaalna' ruhtan ksin rek tuksut lam mda ungta laarknei rek avah pthitda pauna' lamda.
65001009	Pdainu vaantamsi klinsi ungta mkulmlaar knei rek ava' 'leenni Maikhal lih tarnampii tu' Moses daksa leiyi, kalrai lamda. Ava' thung ngi mma' 'leenni pthitda mraal pii pchaang mda mthungta mma ngi, “Isowr rih ayuraiso,” dida.
65001010	Pdainu hava' mii rek ava ngi talutalu yoso, mdodeh maan dow rek avah pthit lamda. Ungta mmaan nih talutalu yoso mnowpaan nih mdodeh chaakin avah mlei kbin pchaang kma' saa rek heppi mdodeh chaakin. Hava' dow rek ava ngi mmaan avah mthinaan nih kporpqop chlam rah.
65001011	Mmaan 'leenni suwthitna' ka'am a. Mleiya mmaan nih, Kein 'lamqowi mqowi chaak inna. Ungta mmaan nih Balaam mih mthennemna' rang ki thenni mdohuwn chaakna' ava' thung ngi kakraam mih kchen kcha'lam a. Ungta Korah pauklena' thung ngi mmaan nah kenvei kcha'lam a.
65001012	Hava' mii rek avah naanki vonsatmaalna' thung ngi tongnehr kapkhau reklam, ungta naan tu' mmaalin thung rukku mningqitin ktaak ki kchalam. Ungta mmaan nah mthina kparmaal kcha' reklam. Mmaan nah khu kqhi kma', tirthli rekki mdoraan pthi armei rek ava' lam. Mmaan nah chuwrlaiyi mchei ktaak ding, murjung thah tphuipthi, vei'knii kdiyou ava' hep daat lam.
65001013	Mmaan nah truwnpii thungki kdungyou kcha' diinuk hep daat lam ungta mningkyanaan muhuwnin avah mdopthuh chaakin. Ungta mmaan nah konthot jowkjowk bursi rek hep daat lam. Ungta ktlangknai kma' kjiing ki kjiingnusi avah mmaan thenni mdopurtum dok ksa.
65001014	'Tunnu Adam ki ngi suruwl mtikhiuna' Enok rukku hava' mii rek leiyi, pau mdopurphuwn dok ksa. Mma ngi hanto'theda: “Asuwn, Kruwng nga Mma' miikenje, pun sowm rektu' kurjung nga.
65001015	Mleiya Mma ngi mii mkheng 'leenni paukpindit rah. Mma ngi Isowr ktaak ki ka'am mii mkheng rek avah mmaan nih Isowr ktaak ki ma'amnaan khimkhei thung ngi Isowr ktaak ki mnongtlotin mkheng thung ngi mdoparmaan mkheng rek 'leenni kupsul lamrah. Ungta Isowr ktaak ki ka'am pnu kervei rek mmaan ava ngi Mma' kepteng ngi mpaunaan mkheng rek 'leenni kupsul lamrah.”
65001016	Hava' mii rek avah nurnurnarnar rih kpau ungta mii kupsul tlit mii reklam. Mmaan nah mmaan ki daksa ngi mdongei 'in ava' dilkqowiyi kchet kcha' reklam. Ungta mmaan nah mthinaan ki mleiyi kpirlin nih kpau kcha' ungta mmaan changqhatna' rang ki thenni morson rek kpanpaak kcha' reklam.
65001017	Pdainu kvonsat'low rek naan, naan nih neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki tamsi rekki mduh ngi mdothe dokin pauna rek avah abinphaakin.
65001018	Mmaan nih, ‘mqutna' mpha thung ngu mikipnichaak kthuwk rah’ mdoditin. Mmaan avah rin'owimana' daksa dongei rek dilkqowiyi kchet lam mdoditin avah abinphaakin.
65001019	Hava' mii rek avah nowpa dongeiyi ka'am rek, ungta tkenqhenna' kupthuwk reklam, ungta mmaan thung ngi Pthla avah ka'am pemeh.
65001020	Pdainu kvonsat'low rek naan, naan nih adakin avah alamrinin kchiir ava' thung ngi ikapqhang chaan ungta Pthla kchiir rih rin'iktham chaan.
65001021	Naan nih ktlangknai kma' rinkum kpii rang, neenki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungqhat ardat chaakin chunni Isowr vonsat thung ngi adakin avah ikirkhi chaan.
65001022	Ungta plung kpelqen aangqhe rek hinni plungqhat ahordei chaan.
65001023	Pdainu ningqit tu' kilqhi ngi morson rek avah mei thung ki aqen pthuwkin rang ngi asan chaan. Ava' tu' kilqhi ngi pnu nowpa ngi mdotopbor dok buwdiir kpha rukka apder chaan.
65001024	'Tunnu naan nih khuhsiir adopirthitna' raan thungki akneeng pchaangin, ungta Mma' konlorna' aang ngi mdoparmana' ktaak ki plung kngam dok tu' kilqhi ngi naan akparlaan kchaan Mma' avah Isowr.
65001025	Mleiya neen Miksan Isowr chrel daat avah kinrit. Mma' hinni tkonlorna' le' laarneena'si ungta tpaalna' ruhtan le' ruhtanna' avah 'tun ruk ungta ktlangknai kmah ngi ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
66001001	Mma ngi msuwk rek hinni kbeisek ki kthuwk, rangkat dow rek ava' mdotedet lamna' rang ki thenni Isowr rih Mma' hinni mdopiik Jisu Khrista ki pauphuwn avah hava'. Ungta Mma ngi Mma' suwk Johon hinni Mma' vaantamsi avah pthlada ungta titinna' khat tih pandan piikda.
66001002	Johon nih Isowr pauna ungta Jisu Khrista ki rinpaumin ungta mmik ki mdodeh dow mkheng rek avah pandang chda.
66001003	Hava' pauphuwn kpa kcha' ungta karja kcha' ungta ava' thuh tikjit dok rek ava' kopqowi kcha' rek mmaan avah msuwkin kqha kcha' a. Mleiya mpha avah knaitek kcha' a.
66001004	Johon neiyi Asia paamkuwl thung ngi ka'am lamrinlop tikhiu rek hinni kikjit chaak a. Mleiya 'tun ka'am daat ungta choduh ka'am ksa ungta dil thah karvang rang, Mma' ava ngi ungta Mma' kruwng longkhom aang ngi, ka'am Pthla tikhiu rekki plungnee le' plung kdai naan ahinin nih ayupii chaanso!
66001005	Ungta trinchaak krow ngi rinpaumin kpii, kdiyou rek arlak ki mkhatna' kqou ungta hava' dultipaam ki paamkruwng rek 'leenni paamkpu Jisu Khrista ngi plungnee le' plung kdai ayupii chaanso. Ungta neen vonsat miklow kchaan ungta Mihii ngi. nupnu arve chaak rekin thungki mikulqhuh kchaan, Mma' avah aponlor chaan.
66001006	Ungta Mma ngi neenna Isowr le' Pa ava' hinni paamkruwng rekle' thimpu rek mipurthuh chaanda. Ungta Mma' hinni kumpung ngi ktlangknai kma' konlor ungta tpaalna' ruhtan ki ruhtan mukpu ikurthuwkso! Amen.
66001007	Asuwn! armei thuh Mmah kurjung kqum a. Ungta mik khimkheiyi Mmah kdei chlam rah. Ungta Mma' kthun rek mmaan rukku mmikin nih kdei chlam rah. Ungta dultipaam ki chaat mkheng rekki, Mma' leiyi, muplungin tpeeng lamdon nih kqap chlam rah. Ou, anto' ikurthuwkso! Amen.
66001008	Kruwng ngi theda: “Neiya Alpha le' Omega ping, tupqhunna' le' Tupqutna' ping. Neiya 'tun ka'am daat ungta choduh ka'am ksa ungta dil thah karvang rang, Kpaalkpusi ava' ping.”
66001009	Johon neiya naan tu' kdung ngi tyatna' kperteel sap kcha ungta kruwngpaalna' thuh ungta Jisu Khrista ki tidiil chaakna' 'leenni a'upaan khat ping. Ungta neiya Isowr pauna le' Jisu Khrista ki rinpaumin ki thenni Patmos mdodit diiloipaam thung ngi ka'am dok kcha' ping.
66001010	Kruwng Nit ava' thung ngi, neiya Pthla ngi am chnuh. Ungta kdilpang thah puwtit prin hep daat tih krowl klin langlang khat arjanu.
66001011	Ava ngi hanto'theda: “Neiya Alpha le' Omega ping, Mkhatna' ungta Mqutna' ping.” Ungta: “Nang ngi amik ki adodeh avah laikakuwl thung ngi akjit. Ungta Asia paamkuwl thuh ka'am lamrinlop tikhiu rek, tidit tah Ephisia thah, Smairna thah, Pergamos thah, Thyatira thah, Sardis thah, Philadelphia thah, ungta Laodisia thah avah apthla.”
66001012	Ungta neiyi kihin nih kpau, krowl ava' ksuw rah dil kerheel nuh. Ungta neiyi ksut thungta jiiring meilakuwng tikhiutet deinu.
66001013	Ungta meilakuwng tikhiu rek arlak ki Mii Chapa hep daat khat tih mkhuh kpha ktolrown dona nada ungta jiiring arkowlke muplung thah pkehda.
66001014	Mluw le' msam avah saamul kpowl tbur heppi powlda ungta Mmik avah kquwng meek mei hep daatda.
66001015	Mkhuh avah jiichai kepleu deek ki meikuwng thuh tapkaak heppi pleuda. Ungta Mokrowl avah dii knempok kluwng archaang hep daatda.
66001016	Ungta mchang ki mkhut thung ngi bursi tikhiu sinda. Ungta mnehr thungki raal'kaang mahaa lechang ngi kraang pthuwkda. Ungta Mmai ruwngchen avah kni mlenkat thungki heppi lengda.
66001017	Ungta neiyi Mma' kdeh thungta kdiyou kcha' heppi mkhuhther rih tluw chnuh, Ungta Mma ngi mchang ki mkhut avah k'leen nih mthiikpiikda ungta kihin nih hanto'theda: “Aningpqitma': Neiya Mkhatna' ungta Mqutna' ava' ping.
66001018	Neiya kring daat ping ungta kdiyou dok ping. Ungta asuw! Neiya ktlangknai kmah ngi kring dok kcha' ping Amen. Ungta kihin nih Kdikhuw le' tidina' ki chungkamke avah ka'am.
66001019	Nang ngi amik ki adodeh dow rek avah akjit. Ungta 'tun ka'am dow rek ungta 'tundil thah karvang kthuwk bei rang dow rek avah akjit.
66001020	Nang ngi Nei kchang ki kukhut thuh adodeh bursi tikhiu rekki paukordowl ki mlei ungta jiiring meilakuwng tikhiu rekki mlei avah akjit. Bursi tikhiu rek avah lamrinlop tikhiu rekki pausikhu rek ava'. Ungta meilakuwng tikhiu adodeh rek avah lamrinlop tikhiu rek ava'.”
66002001	“Ephisia thuh ka'am lamrinlop rekki pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Bursi tikhiu Mchang ki mkhut tih ksin, jiiring meilakuwng tikhiu rek arlak ki kchet Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a:
66002002	Neiyi nang anong rek ungta kdung ngi anonglow chaak rek ungta adodiil chaakna' rek avah kdeh. Ungta nang ngi kqha kma' rek avah diil pchaang lam mtih. Ungta nang ngi tamsi rek inping, kdi kcha' rek avah perteel lam tinu pdainu mmaan avah tamsi rek lam pemeh ungta mmaan avah pleiknei reklam tidit nang ngi deitinu.
66002003	Ungta nang ngi tidiil chaakna' 'leenni diiltlit chtinu. Ungta nang ngi Nei kmiing ki thenni nong lou chtinu ungta ning kepneel thlowi mtih.
66002004	Anto'daat yoso a'leen nih adokupsulna' dow mruk ka'am tidit tah nang ngi choduhrep ki avonsat avah amaakpthi a.
66002005	Avaleiyi, nang ngi atlukna' mun avah abinphaak cha', ungta plung aperthleng cha' ungta rukri ki anongtlot rek ava' atlow cha'. Mditma bih, Neiyi ahin nih kbei sek ki thleng nikdi'. Nang ngi plung aperthlen chaakma bih, ameilakuwng avah mmun thungki loupthi nikdi'.
66002006	Pdainu nang ngi havah adothlowi chaak, tidit tah nang ngi, Nei rukku kdopder chaak Nikolas lop rek nongtlot avah adopder chaak.
66002007	Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop rek hinni pthla ngi modthe avah arja chso. Kapchaang mma' hinni, Neiyi rinkum dingchei avah mdochaak rah pii nikdi'. Ding avah Isowr ki kanpamun mmalai kat tih kmowng.”
66002008	“Ungta Smairna ki lamrinlop pausikhu ava' hinni kikjit. Mkhatna' ungta Mqutna' ungta diyou dokda kring kerheel dok Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a:
66002009	Neiyi, nang anong rek avah kdeh ungta nang ngi tyat adoperteelna' ungta asraht thuhna' rek rukka kdeh. Pdainu nang nga svang ptih. Neiyi Jihudi kma' rekki Jihudi rek inping, dida pauleh kthe rek avah kdeh lam. Mmaan avah Seitan ki sinegog khat lam.
66002010	Nang ngi tyattraanna' rang dow rek avah qi chma'. Dakat tih, naan adotperteelna' raan ki thenni tarnampii ava ngi naan arlakin ki mii aangqhe rek avah rowng'inn thuh kvarpthi rah mthe a. Ungta naan nih niisowm thung ngi suwkthuh chiireelna' perteel naandi'. Nang ngi kdiyou kpha ngi trinchaak krow mii ikurthuwk. Ungta Neiyi rinkum ki luwkhum avah apii nikdi'.
66002011	Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop rek hinni pthla ngi mdothe avah arja chso.” Ava' kapchaang mma' avah miknitna' kdiyou ava ngi tiplim pchaang nimeh.
66002012	“Ungta Pergamos thungki lamrinlop pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Maha lechang ngi kraang raal'kaang kthlowi Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a:
66002013	Neiyi, nang anongtlot rek ungta a'amna' avah kdeh. Nang nga Seitan kruwng longkhom amna' thuh ka'am imptih. Mmaan nih Neiki trinchaak krow ngi rinpaumin kpii Antipas avah Seitan amna' naan arlak inni eyou lamda. Pdainu nang ngi ava' kpha thung ngi Nei kmiing avah knet tih kyowng chtinu ungta Neiki klamrin avah matcha' mtih.
66002014	Pdainu Neiyi, a'leen nih kdorot nuwmma dow mruk ka'am. Mleiya nang ngi Balaam dopurchuhna' ksinton mer rek adothlowi lam. Balaam mih Balaak hinni Isreel mii rek aang ngi ktaang mdopansamna' rah purchuk lamda. Ktaang avah dow pthla rek hinni rintparlaan dok dow rek tchaakna' rah ungta jowlmpurjutna' raan mdopurchuh lam, ava'.
66002015	Ungta naan arlak ki aangqhe rekki, Neiyi kdopder chaak Nikolas lop rek dopurchuhna' ksinton rek ka'am lam.
66002016	Nang ngi aplung aperthleng cha'. Mditma bih, kbeisek ki ahin nih Neiya arjung nikdi' ungta Neiyi mmaan avah knehr thungki raal'kaang ava ngi karnaakqhi lam nikdi'.
66002017	Maknapum mma' ava ngi Pthla ngi lamrinlop rek hinni mdothe avah arja chso. Kapchaang mma' ava' hinni kordowl lih ka'am manna mruk avah mdochaak rang ngi pii nikdi'. Neiyi mma' hinni kuwkhat leh ngi mdodehma, karlaang kcha' Mma' daat tih mdodeh m'leen nih miingren tikjit lung kpowl 'suwn khat pii nikdi'.”
66002018	“Ungta Thyatira thung ngi ka'am lamrinlop ki pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Isowr Chapa mmik mei kquwng heppi kquwng ungta mkhuh jiichai kepleu dang heppi kepleu Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a:
66002019	Neiyi nang anongtlot, avonsat, anongsin, alamrin ungta adodiil chaakna' avah kdeh a. Neiyi anongtlot rek dilknau ki ava ngi rukri ki anong rek avah mepkheel a tidit kdeh a.
66002020	Pdainu Neiyi a'leen nih kdorotma dow mruk ka'am a. Mleiya nang ngi mthina ngi: Khulpii ping' kirdi kcha' Jejebel avah sutpthi daat tinu. Ungta mma ngi mii rekki jowlmpurjutna' raan ungta dow pthla rek hinni rinmdoparlaan dok dow rek mdochaakna' raan purchuk lamda. Ungta Nei ksuwk rek avah 'lamleh thah qhi lamda.
66002021	Mma ngi jowlmpurjutna' thungki plung mdoperthlen chaakna' rah mpha kdopiik pdainu mma ngi plung perthleng chmeh.
66002022	Asuw! Neiyi mmah kkowi kowm 'leenni varnikdi'. Ungta mma' tu' lowsang kilqhi rek mmaan avah mnongtlotin thungki plung mperthlen chaak maanbi, Neiyi suwkthuh chiireelna' klin thuh varlam nikdi'.
66002023	Ungta lamrinlop mkheng rekki Neiya, miiril le' plung rek ava' kdothlaam tidit mekdei lamrah. Ungta Neiyi, naan akhengin avah anongtlotin dilkqowiyi ayupenlet piik nikaandi'.
66002024	Neiyi havah naan ahin nih ungta Thyatira thung ngi ka'am mqhe rek hinni kdothe. Ungta hava' tpurchuhna' kthlowi kma' rek ungta Seitan ki kukthuwksi mdoditin ava' kdei kma' rek hin rukku kthe a. Ungta Neiyi a'leenin nih bowr krik morson daaltpom nimaang.
66002025	Pdainu Neiyi hava' kthe a, tidit tah Nei kurjun duh khimkhei naan nih adothlowiyin avah knettih akyowng chaan.
66002026	Ungta kapchaang mma' ava ngi Nei knong avah mqutna' kpha mirkhiik chaak a. Ungta mma' hinni Neiyi chaat mkheng rek 'leenni ruhtanna' pii nikdi'.
66002027	‘Ungta mma ngi thiir kchung ngi mmaan 'leenni mukpu kurthuwk rah. Beelksa rek beelsak mikqiik mikqiik ki tupkui heppi mmaan nah kupkui lamrah.’ (Luw. 2:9) Hava' ruhtanna' avah Nei rukku hanto' heppi Kpa hinki kdo'arlaan.
66002028	Ungta Neiyi khuvaar vaarpa avah mma' hinni pii nikdi'.
66002029	Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop rek hinni Pthla ava ngi mdothe avah arja chso.”
66003001	“Ungta Sardis khuwpii thuh ka'am lamrinlop pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Isowr pthla tikhiu kthlowi ungta bursi tikhiu kthlowi Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a: Neiyi nang anong rek avah kdeh ungta nang nga kring daat tidit tih amiing nga ka'am pdainu nang nga kdiyou kcha' ptih.
66003002	Nang nga ikilrin tlit cha', ungta kdiyou rah kthemeek dow rek adothlowi avah mruh aptang cha'. Mleiya Neiyi nang anong rek avah Isowr aang ngi kurkhum mih deimaang.
66003003	Avaleiyi, nang ngi taluhep pih ado'arlaan ungta ado'arjaak tidit avah abinphaak cha'. Nang ngi avah arkhi cha' ungta plung aperthleng cha'. Ungta nang ngi akilrin tlit chaakma bih, Neiyi ahin nih kupru thlenhep pih thleng nikdi', ungta Neiyi nang ahin nih kurjunna' rang mpha avah teden rang tidit nang ngi deiliit nimtih.
66003004	Nang ngi Sardis khuwpii thung ngi mbuwmdiir ktobor kma' mii mruk athlowi a. Mmaan nih mtik kcha mkurthuhn leiyi, mmaan nah buwdiir kpowl nalamdon Nei tu' kchetsap lamrah.
66003005	Kapchaang kcha' mma' avah Neiyi buwdiir kpowl pnaak nikdi' ungta Neiyi mma' miing avah kring laika thungki knuwlpthi nimaang. Ungta Neiyi mma' miing avah Kpa aang ngi ungta Mma' vaantamsi rek aang ngi thethuh chnikdi'.
66003006	Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop rek hinni Pthla ava ngi mdothe avah arja chso.”
66003007	Ungta Philadelphia khuwpii ki lamrinlop pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Kenje a Mma', Kindit tah Mma'. ‘David chungkamke kthlowi, Mma' dopvan kuwkhat leh do'arkam pchaanmah, Mma' do'arkam kuwkhat leh dopvan pchaanmah. (Is. 22:22) Mma' ava ngi hava' dow rek avah mthe a:
66003008	‘Neiyi nang anong rek avah kdeh. Asuw! Neiyi a'aang ngi thurngut kparvang ngi kthiika. Kuwkhat tih avah arkam pchaang nimeh. Mleiya nang ngu ruhtan mruk'suwn daat adothlowi ungta nang ngi kpauna avah ado'arkhiik chaak ungta Nei kmiing avah adomat chaak pemeh.
66003009	Asuw! Seitan ki sinegog tidit tah Jihudi kma'pa rekki: ‘Jihudi rek inping', dida pleiknei rek mmaan avah ahin nih apii nikdi'. Asuw! Neiyi mmaan nih thleng lamdon akhuhther rih luwkbu lamrah sinikdi'.
66003010	Nang ngi Neiyi kdodiil chaakna' pauna ava' ado'arkhiik chaak leiyi, Nei rukku nang nga kepthleem amna' mpha thungki aneeng chnikdi'. Hava' kepthleem ki mpha avah dultipaam mkheng thungki mii rek 'leenni kthuwk bei rah mthe a. Dultipaam thuh ka'am mii mkheng rek ava' mdoperteelna' rah mpha avah karvang rah.
66003011	Asuw! Neiya kbeisek ki arjung nikdi'. Kuwkhat leh ngi nang alaar luwkhum ava' mdolow mana' rah, nang ngi adothlowi chaak dok avah knet tih akyowng cha'.
66003012	Kapchaang mma' avah Neiyi, Neiki Isowr luwbuk'inn ki kchow purthuh nikdi'. Ungta mma ngi duwn thuwk porson nimeh. Ungta Neiyi m'leen nih Neiki Isowr miing kjit nikdi'. Ungta Neiki Isowr ki khuwpii miing avah m'leen nih kjit nikdi'. Avah parvaan ki Neiki Isowr hinki kurjung, Jerusalem ren ava'. Ungta Neiyi mma' 'leenni Nei kmiing ren avah kjit nikdi'.
66003013	Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop hinni Pthla ava ngi mdothe avah arja chso.”
66003014	“Ungta Laodisia khuwpii ki lamrinlop ki pausikhu ava' hinni akjit. Amen ungta trinchaak krow ungta Kindit Rinpaumin, Isowr dimlowna' rekki mdopqhunna', ava ngi hava' dow rek ava' mthe a:
66003015	Neiyi nang anong rek avah kdeh tidit tah nang nga tadai ruk daimtih tulum ruk lum mtih. Neiyi adai rah mditmata alum rah kdongei.
66003016	Mleiya nang nga klum ruk klum kma' kdai ruk kdai kma' klumpuwm daat akurthuh leiyi, Neiyi nang nga knerh thungki akopthot pthi rah kthe a.
66003017	Nang ngi: ‘Neiya svang ping sum'alrou kthlowi dok, dow khatleh ruk kriing maang kirdi chtinu, Ungta nang ngi tsut mmeel kthi ngi ayat suwkthuhna', asraht thuhna', amikktot ungta ado'ana ktaak avah deicha' mtinuh.
66003018	Hava' leiyi Kihin ki mei thuh tipchiir dok ksa jiiring avah asvang thuhna' rang ki thenni arencha', dinuh akperseel a. Nang ngi adonaak chaak rang ki thenni, Kihin ki buwdiir kpowl arencha'. Ungta ava ngi nangki ado'ana naakma avah aningkyana ngi kandang nimeh. Ungta amik ki khu adodeh chaakna' rah mikpubul apubul cha'.
66003019	Neiyi vonsat kdolow chaak rek avah Neiyi rainu kdopurchuh lam. Avaleiyi, nang ngi plung apluwt ungta plung aperthleng cha'.
66003020	Asuw! Neiyi thurngut bulli rip nuh ungta thurngut kqhil a. Kuwmiikhat tih kokrowl arjaso thurngut mapvan chaak bih, Neiyi mma' hinni tlung nikdi' ungta Neiyi mma' tu' maal nikdi' ungta mmah Nei tu' kmaal rah.
66003021	Kapchaang mma' avah Neiyi, Neiki kruwng longkhom 'leenni tkonqhina' rah tlotpiik nikdi'. Anto' heppi Nei rukku ava' pchaang nuh Kpa tu' Mma' kruwng longkhom thuh kok'ongve dok inping.
66003022	Maknapum mma' ava ngi lamrinlop hinni Pthla ngi mdothe avah arja chso.”
66004001	Hava' dilli neiyi hava' dow rek avah suwnu. Asuwn! Parvaan thah thurngut khat kparvang deinu. Ungta rukrirep pih kdo'arjaak krowl avah puwtit prin heppi pringda, ava ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Hava' thah arhung korsown, ungta Neiyi hava' dow rek ava' dilli kthuwk rang dow rek ava' ayupdeh nih.”
66004002	Ungta m'tunkat daat tih neiya Pthla ngi am chnuh. Ungta asuwn, Parvaan thah kruwng longkhom khat avah amdaatda, ungta Miikhat avah kruwng longkhom ava' 'leenni ko'ongda.
66004003	Ungta kok'ong daat Mma' ruwngchen avah jasper le' sardis lung hep daatda. Ungta mruwngchen avah emerald lung hep daat, kowlnisa ngi kruwng longkhom avah tkhulda.
66004004	Ungta Kruwng longkhom avah longkhom som'knii leiplii ngi tkhulda. Ungta ava' longkhom rek 'leenni kver rek som'knii leiplii ko'ong lamda. Ungta mmaan nih dona kpowl rek na lamda ungta mluw thaan nih jiiring laar luwkhum rek khum lamda.
66004005	Ungta Kruwng longkhom rek ava' thung ki kowl plekda ungta pqeek rek puwkda ungta marchaang kdung khat thuwkda. Ungta ava' kruwng longkhom aang ngi meila tikhiutet rek avah lengda. Mmaan avah Isowr Pthla tikhiu rek ava'.
66004006	Ungta kruwng longkhom ava' aang ngi kristal lung heppi kchiir likli truwnpii khat ka'am. Ungta kruwng longkhom ava' malaikat tih ungta kruwng longkhom ava' kloiyi kring daat saa chai plii tet ka'am lam. Mmaan avah mdil le' mduh ngi mmikin knempok ki ka'am.
66004007	Ungta mrukri ki kring daat saa avah humpu hep daat, ungta miknitna' kring daat saa ava ngi sil suwn hep daatda. Ungta mukdumna' kring daat saa ava ngi miilai mai hep daatda. Miplitna' kring daat saa ava ngi plimklin kyuwng meek hepdaatda.
66004008	Ungta kring daat saa chai plii rek avah mdakmdak ki thenni mapthla truk ruk amsapda. Mmaan avah korloijik ki ungta mthung thaan rukku mmikin knempok ki ka'am. Mmaan nih suwn le' jaan rukku karnga kmah ngi: “Kchiir, Kchiir, Kchiir, Kpaalkpusi ki Kruwng Isowr. Mma' avah choduh rukku ka'am ksa 'tun ruk ka'am daat ungta kurjung rang ava'.”
66004009	Ungta kring daat saa rek ava ngi kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong, kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am daat Mma' hinni tponlorna' ungta takyat chaakna' ungta tpanpaakna' avah kpii chlam rah.
66004010	Ungta ava' ktai thung ngi kver rek som'knii leiplii rek ava ngi kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am Mma' aang ngi tluw lamda Mhin nih luwbu chlamda. Ungta kruwng longkhom ava' aang ngi mmaan ki laar luwkhum rek avah pthla chlamda.
66004011	Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng, Nang nga tkonlorna' le' takyat chaakna'ungta ruhtanna' karlaang kcha' mtik kcha ptih. Mleiya dow mkheng avah Nang adim yesang ungta mmaan mkheng avah Nang aplungbin ki then ungta Nang ngi ava' heppi adim adopurthuh chaak lam.”
66005001	Ungta neiyi kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong Mma' machang ki mkhut thung ngi laikakuwl khat, mthung rukku ungta mdilpang thang rukku tikjit ava' ka'am daat avah deinu. Ungta ava' 'leenni kbihjiik tikhiutet kporlotda.
66005002	Audilli neiyi mruh ktang dok vaantamsi khat deinu. Mma ngi krowl kparthaang ngi: “Laikakuwl ava' kapvang rang ungta m'leenki kbihjiik tolot rek ava' kperthlet ki mtik kcha kuw ka'am a?” dida ksamda.
66005003	Ungta parvaan ki mditmata dultipaam ki mditmata dultipaam kurduh ki kuwkhat leh ngi laikakuwl ava' kapvang pchaang ruk ammeh mditmata ava' ksuw pchaang ruk ammda.
66005004	Ungta laikakuwl ava' kapvang rah ungta ava' ksuw pchaang rah mtik kcha kuwkhat leh ruk ma'amma leiyi, kdung ngi qap chnuh.
66005005	Pdainu kver rek khat tih kihin nih theda: “Qapma'. Asuw o! Judah phung thungki Humpu ungta David Arjung ava ngi laikakuwl ava' kapvang rang ngi ungta m'leen ki kbihjiik tikhiu rek ava' kperthlet rang ki thenni mapchaan dok a.”
66005006	Ungta neiyi deinu. Ungta asuwn! Kruwng longkhom le' kring daat saa chai plii rekki mmalaiyin kat tih ungta kver rek arlak ki mmalai inni te'eyow dok ksa Yausuwn ava' heppi rip daatda. Ungta mirki tikhiu le' mmik tikhiu tonda, tidit tah avale' avah dultipaam mkheng thung ngi mdopthlat Isowr Pthla tikhiu rek ava'.
66005007	Audilli Mma ngi arvangda kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong Mma' ava' machang ki laikakuwl avah louda.
66005008	'Tunnu Mma ngi laikakuwl ava' mlow thungta kring daat saa chai plii rekle' kver som'knii leiplii rekki Yausuwn ava' aang ngi tluw chlamda. Mmaan khatkhat tih miikenje rek rinkthamna' dumreng rek khatkhat le' namreng ngi kdim jiiring thleengkam khatkhat sinsap lamda.
66005009	Ungta mmaan nih laaren khat the lamda, ungta hanto' the lamda: “Nang nga laikakuwl klou rah mtik kcha ptih, ungta m'leen ki kbihjiik rek ava' kapvang rangkat ptih. Mleiya Nang nga adote'eyow doklam, ungta Isowr thenni neen avah Nang ahii ngi adotaktlan chaak dokin. Nang ngi neen avah phung khimkhei, ungta pau khimkhei thungki, ungta mii rek khimkhei hinki, ungta chaat khimkhei rek thungki, adotaktlan chaak dokin.
66005010	Ungta Nang ngi neen avah neenki Isowr hinni, paamkruwng rekle' thimpu rek adotupthut chaakin. Ungta neenna dultipaam thung ngi paal nikaandi'.”
66005011	Audilli neiyi suwnu ungta kruwng longkhom ava' ktukhul lih vaantamsi knempok rek krowl, ungta kring daat saa rek krowl ungta kver rek krowl avah arjanu. Ungta mmaan chai avah pun sowm, sowm veipun sowm ungta punki pun tyatya lam.
66005012	Ungta mmaan nih krowl kparthaang ngi owng lamda: “Te'eyow dok Yausuwn ava ngi laarruhtanna' ungta svangthuhna' ungta luwkinritna' ungta ruhtanna' ungta takyat chaakna' ungta tkonlorna' ungta suwqhatna' karlaang kcha' ki mtik kcha a,” dilamda.
66005013	Ungta parvaan thah ka'am ungta dultipaam 'leenni ungta dulti kurduh thah ka'am ungta truwnpii thung ngi ka'am downkhaal mkheng ngi: “Suwqhat le' takyat chaakna,' ungta tkonlorna', ungta tpaalna' ruhtan' avah Kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong, Mma' ungta Yausuwn ava' hinni, kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am ikurthuwkso, mdoditin avah neiyi arja chnuh.
66005014	Audilli kring daat saa rek chai plii rekki: “Amen,” dilamda. Ungta kver rek som'knii leiplii rekki kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ringda ka'am Mma' aang ngi tluw chlamda ungta luwbuk chlamda.
66006001	Ungta Yausuwn ava ngi kbihjiik rek arlak ki khat mdopvan neiyi deinu. Ungta kring daat saa chai plii rek arlak ki khat tih mokrowl khu kipri heppi: “Arva rah asuw,” mdotidit arjanu.
66006002	Neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn, skowl kpowl khat amdaatda. Ungta m'leen nih kok'ong daat ava' vah jai khat sinda. Ungta mma' hinni laar luwkhum khat piida ungta mma ngi raal kapchaang ki kapchaang ngi raal kapchaang rah chetda.
66006003	Ungta Mma ngi miknitna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi miknitna' kring daat saa ava ngi: “Arva rah asuw,” mdotidit arjanu.
66006004	Ungta skowl ksen morson khat vangthuwkda. Ungta m'leen nih kok'ong daat ava' hinni dultipaam thungki plung kdai mkheng ava' mdolow pthina' rah ungta mii rekki khat le' khat mker'eyowna' rah ruhtanna' avah mma' hinni piida. Ungta mma' hinni raal'kaang klinpa khat piida.
66006005	Ungta Mma ngi mukdumna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi mukdumna' kring daat saa ava ngi: “Arva rah asuw,” mdotidit arjanu. Ungta neiyi deinu ungta asuwn! Skowl kvom khat deinu ungta m'leen nih kok'ong daat mma' ava ngi mkhut thah kriktpertetna' khat sin daatda.
66006006	Ungta kring daat saa chai plii rek arlak ki krowl khat tih hanto' mdothe arjanu: “Chavui tum khat khon rang avah denarii khat apthut, ungta rukowl tum kdum khon ava'ruk denarii khat apthut. Ungta kruwndii le' thowldii avah kchou krepma'.”
66006007	Ungta Mma ngi miplitna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi miplitna' kring daat saa ava ngi: “Arva rah asuw,” mdotidit krowl arjanu.
66006008	Ungta neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn! Skowl khat mipdit choiktroi kcha' khat amda. Ungta m'leen nih kok'ong daat khat ava' miing avah kdiyou. Ungta Kdikhuw tidit ava ngi mdil qowida. Ungta dultimii tum plii ki khat rek avah raal'kaang ngi powitham mih ungta kdiyou vih ungta dultipaam ki saa rekki mdo'eyowna' rah ruhtanna' avah mmaanve hinni piipthi lamda.
66006009	Ungta Yausuwn ava ngi mparngatna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi rintparlaanna' khaan ava' kurduh ngi Isowr pauna leiyi, ungta mmaan ki rinpaumin mdopiikin leiyi, mdo'eyown mii rekki plungrin rek ka'am avah neiyi deinu.
66006010	Ungta mmaan nih kdung ngi owng lamda hanto' the lamda: “O Mukpu! Kchiir ungta kindit khat Nang. Nang ngi hava' dultipaam thuh ka'am mii rek 'leenni neen kihiin leiyi, paukpindit kmah ungta phuw klou kmah trek ksowt tih amnadi?”
66006011	Ungta mmaan khatkhat hinni phriktluwn kpowl pii lamda. Ungta mmaan hinni hanto'theda: ‘Tidit tah, mmaan mdo'eyown heppi mmaan tu' suwk kurthuwk kcha'sap rekle' mu'umnau rekin mdo'eyow raan avale' mkurkhum duh kpha ngi mmaan nah ksowtbong ngi mkarngat chaak raan.’
66006012	Ungta Mma' ngi mutrukna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi neiyi hava' deinu. Asuwn, ringnaang kdungyou kcha' khat thuwkda. Kni a saamul buwkvom heppi vom chda ungta thla avah hii heppi sen chda.
66006013	Ungta tirthli kdung ngi kraang ava ngi moknow lam thung ngi, mphaliit kma'pa thung ngi kchei kduwt rek cheiyi, jiilda mqut chaak heppi parvaan ki bursi rek avah dulti thah tlater chlamda.
66006014	Ungta parvaan avah laikakuwl tukyul heppi mkurjul chaak thungta lown rekle' diiloipaam rek khimkheiya mmun mmun thuwn ki korlou chlamda.
66006015	Ungta dultipaam ki paamkruwng rek ungta klin ksaang rek svang kthuwk mii rek ungta kenreel raalmii lopkqhi rek ungta mruh ktang mii rek, suwk'owr khimkhei le' mii'ol khimkhei rek ava ngi khor rek thuh ungta lown 'leenki lung rek thung ngi kordowl chlamda.
66006016	Ungta mmaan nih lown rekle' lung rek hinni: “Neen k'leen nih ichimin rang ngi kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong Mma' mai thungki ungta Yausuwn ava' plungthit mei kquwng thungki mheidowl chaan,” kdi lamrah.
66006017	“Mleiya Mma' plungthit mei quwnna' nit klin avah karvang nga, ungta kuwda ava' thuh krip pchaang chrang nga?”
66007001	Ungta hava'le' ava' dilli neiyi dultipaam mirkil plii rek thung ngi vaantamsi chai plii krip daat deilam nuh. Mmaan nih dultipaam ki tirthlilam plii rek avah arkampthi lamda. Mleiya tirthli ngi dulti 'leen mraanmana' rah mditmata truwnpii 'leenni mraanmana' rah mditmata ding khadaat 'leen rukku mraanmana' rah mdo'artlunin.
66007002	Ungta neiyi vaantamsi morson khat, knithuhna' ki hangkkal deinu. Ungta mma' hinni kring Isowr ki kbihjiik avah ka'am. Ungta mma ngi owngda dulti le' truwnpii te'ekrena' ruhtan mdopiik vaantamsi chai plii rek hinni theda:
66007003	“Neen nih Isowr suwk rek pchal 'leenni kbihjiik klot dokduhn khimkheiyi, dultipaam mditmata truwnpii mditmata ding rek avah e'krep khotmaan,” dida.
66007004	Ungta neiyi kbihjiik mdolot dok rek chai avah arjanu. Ungta kbihjiik mdolot dok Isreel nau rekki phung mkheng rek chai avah pun arja khat somplii leipli.
66007005	Judah phung thungki mii rek chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Reuben phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda, Gad phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda.
66007006	Asher phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Napthali phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Manasseh phung chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda.
66007007	Simeon phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Levi phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Issakhar phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda.
66007008	Jebulun phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Joseph phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda. Benjamin phung thungki chai pun sowm lei'knii kbihjiik lot lamda.
66007009	Hava' dilli neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn, miipii knempa, kuwkhat leh ngi mdotai pchaanmah khat ka'am lam. Mmaan avah chaat mkheng rek thungki ungta phung rek ungta mii rek ungta pau rek thungki lam. Mmaan nih kruwng longkhom ungta Yausuwn aang ngi rip lamda. Mmaan nih dona kpowl hilna lamda ungta knuwt baak rek mkhutin nih sin lamda.
66007010	Ungta mmaan nih kdung ngi owng lamda: hanto' the lamda: “Tkirliinna' avah Kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong neenki Isowr ungta Yausuwn ava' dow,” dilamda.
66007011	Ungta vaantamsi mkheng ungta kver ungta kring daat saa chai plii rek avah Kruwng longkhom tarngat loisap lamda ungta mmaan nih Kruwng longkhom aang ngi tlutluw lamda Isowr luwbuk chlamda.
66007012	Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Amen! Suwqhat le' tkonlorna' ungta luwkinritna' ungta tpanpaakna' ungta takyat chaakna' ungta laarruhtanna' ungta ruhtanna' avah neenki Isowr thenni kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen!”
66007013	Ungta kver rek arlak ki khat ava ngi arthaangda, ungta kihin nih hanto'theda: “Hava' dona kpowl kihil mii rekka kuw le'da, ungta tva'ki kthuwk lamda?”
66007014	Ungta neiyi mhin nih hanto' thenu: “Chukpu nang ngi avah adeh,” dinuh. Mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Mmaan avah suwkthuh chiireelna' klin thungki kthuwk lam. Mmaan nih mdomnaan avah Yausuwn hii thung ngi arsu chlamda ava ngi mmaan avah mdoppowl lam.
66007015	Avaleiyi, mmaan nih Isowr Kruwng longkhom aang ngi am lamda. Suwn le' jaan nih Isowr amna' mmun kchiir thung ngi mmaan nih soplow chlamda ka'am kcha'lam. Ungta Kruwng longkhom 'leen kok'ong kcha' Mma' mdakkat tih mmaan 'leenni buw'inn heppi kupkhut chlam rah.
66007016	Mmaan nah veikhat mpowiyin tham nimeh ungta mningin veikhat raal nimeh. Ungta m'leenin nih knisat mditmata meisat khatleh ngi satvot lam nimeh.
66007017	Mleiya Kruwng longkhom mmalaiyi ka'am Yausuwn ava ngi mmaan ki Yaukqhi kurthuwkdon mmaan avah kqhi chlam rah. Mma ngi rinkum kpii diitlaang thung ngi kqhi chlam rah. Ungta Isowr rih mmikin 'leenki arthli khimkheiya kuknuwl piik lamrah.”
66008001	Ungta Yausuwn ava ngi mtikhiuna' kbihjiik mapvan thung ngi parvaan thang ngi qhang klek khat arveel lah dairimsida.
66008002	Ungta neiyi Isowr aang ngi krip vaantamsi tikhiu rek avah deinu ungta mmaan hinni puwtit tikhiu avah pii lamda.
66008003	Ungta vaantamsi morson khat thuwkda rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thuh namreng tapkaakna' jiiring thleengkam mkhut thuh sinda rip daatda. Ungta mma ngi miikenje rek rinkthamna' mkheng ava' tu' Kruwng longkhom aang ngi ka'am jiiring rintparlaanna' khaan ava' thuh mdoparlaan rang ki thenni mma' hinni namreng knempok ki piida.
66008004	Ungta namreng meikhut avah miikenje rek rinkthamna' tu' kilqhi ngi vaantamsi khut thungki korlouda Isowr aang thah hankhutda.
66008005	Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi namreng tapkaakna' avah louda ungta rintparlaanna' khaan 'leenki mei ava ngi pdimda, ungta avah dulti thah jukptla pthida. Ava' thung ngi archaang knei khat thuwkda ungta khuprida, kowl plekda ungta ringnaang thuwkda.
66008006	Ungta puwtit tikhiu ksin vaantamsi tikhiu rekki puwtit k'dum rah korthlong chlamda.
66008007	Mkhatna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda. Ungta hii tu' korchou qil le' mei khuh ngi raada ungta avah dulti 'leen yukvarda. Ungta ding rekki kdum ki khat avah kbungpet chda ungta marna ke'er nowm mkheng kbung chda.
66008008	Audilli miknitna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda ungta mei kquwng meek lown klinpa khat hep daat avah truwnpii thung ngi yukvarda. Ungta truwnpii kdum ki khat avah hii heppi sen chda.
