66008009	Ungta truwnpii thung ngi kring kcha' downkhaal rek kdum ki khat avah diyou chlamda. Ungta arkuwngpii rek kdum ki khat avah penveipthi terda.
66008010	Mukdumna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda. Ungta bursi klinpa khat avah klachowi kquwng heppi parvaan ki tla chda. Ungta ava ngi kreng rekki kdum ki khat 'leenni ungta diina kpur khimkhei rek 'leenni tlada.
66008011	Bursi miing avah kkhasi mdit. Avaleiyi, dii rek kdum ki khat avah kha chda. Dii mdopkhat leiyi, mii knempok diyou chda.
66008012	Audilli miplitna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda. Ungta kni le' thla ki ungta bursi rekki kdum ki khat avah prei pthida. Mleiya kdum ki khat mjiin chaakna' rah ungta suwn le' jaanki kdum ki khat ma'ammana' rah havah mdotlot.
66008013	Ungta neiyi parvaan mmalaiyi kyuwng vaantamsi khat kmik ki deinu ungta mma ngi krowl kparthaang ngi hanto' mdothe arjanu. “Suwkthi a, suwkthi a, dultipaam 'leenni kring kcha' rekki thenni suwkthi a. Mleiya vaantamsi kdum rekki mdo'dum bei raan puwtit krowl ava'leiyi mmaan thenni suwkthi a.”
66009001	Mparngatna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda. Ungta neiyi parvaan ki ngi dulti thah bursi khat ktla deinu. Ungta mma' hinni khor ava' tapvanna' chungkamke piida.
66009002	Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi ungta mdonna' ktaak khor avah pvangda ungta ava' thung ki meipii kka khut heppi meikhut arhang thuwkda. Ava' meikhut dokhut tih kni le' tirthli avah jiing chda.
66009003	Ungta meikhut arlak ki khausor rek avah dulti 'leenni thuwk lamda. Isowr rih mmaan hinni dultipaam ki silthum'artham ruhtanna' heppi mruhtanin avah mdopiik lam.
66009004	Ungta mmaan hinni hanto' paupiik khat pii lamda. Mleiya mmaan nih dulti 'leenki nowm rek mditmata dow ke'er rek mditmata ding rek mdo'ekre raan pemeh. Pdainu mapchalin 'leenni Isowr kbihjiik kton kma' mii rek daat chrel mdo'ekre raan.
66009005	Ungta mmaan hinni paupiik piida, tidit tah mmaan nih mii rek avah mdo'eyow raan pemeh pdainu thla parnga thung ngi kdung mdotperteel raan. Ungta mmaan 'dun avah silthum'artham mih mii mepke thung ngi mdunin ava' hepya ngi kdung lamrah.
66009006	Ungta nit rek ava' thung ngi mii rekki mdiyow chaakna' raan ktlow lamrah pdainu diyou pchaang lam nimeh. Mmaan nih tidiyow chaak rah kbinlam rah pdainu kdiyou ava ngi mmaan avah kchendaak lamrah.
66009007	Ungta khausor rek ruwngchen avah mii rekki raalkna rang ngi mdoporthlonin skowl rek hep daat lam. Ungta mluwchaiyin 'leenni jiiring nongqhat'lot, laar luwkhum mdodaarin ungta mmaiyin avah dultimii rek mai hep daat lam.
66009008	Ungta snu rek sam hep daat tih msamin ka'am ungta mahaan avah humpu haa hep daat lam.
66009009	Ungta mapthla rek archaang avah skowl tolai knempok rek raalkna rah kchen archaang hep daat.
66009010	Ungta mermei avah silthum'artham armei hep daat ungta mermei rekin 'leenni kru ka'am. Ungta thla parnga thung ngi mii rek mdo'ekrena' rah ruhtan avah mmaan hinni mdopiik lam.
66009011	Ungta mmaan nih m'leenin nih paamkruwng khat mdothlowi chaakin ungta mma' avah mdonna' ktaak khor thungki vaantamsi ava'. Ungta mma' miing avah Hibriu pau vih ‘Abaddon,’ mdit pdainu Grik pauvah, ‘Apollyon,’ mdit. Abaddon le' Apollyon mdodit tah ke'ekrep khat ava', mdoditna'.
66009012	Mkhatna' suwthitna'si avah kthleng dok a. Asuw! hava' dilli kerkheelset tih suwqhitna' morson 'knii karvang meeksli a.
66009013	Ungta mutrukna' vaantamsi ava ngi puwtit avah 'dumda ungta neiyi Isowr aangki jiiring rintparlaanna' khaan 'leenki arki chai plii thungki archaang khat arjanu.
66009014	Ungta ava ngi mutrukna' vaantamsi puwtit ksin ava' hinni theda: “Euphrates kreng klin thung ngi tbowlpthi vaantamsi chai plii rek avah aperthlet lam.”
66009015	Ungta Isowr rih mpharit khat ungta niikhat ungta thla khat ungta kum khat ki thenni mdoporthlon vaantamsi chai plii rek avah perthlet lamda. Mmaan avah dultimii rekki kdum ki khat rek ke'eyou rang ki thenni mdoperthle lam.
66009016	Ungta skowl raalmii rek chai avah punpii klin arja 'kniilam. Mmaan chai rek avah neiyi arjanu.
66009017	Ungta neiyi rinmer rih skowl rekle' mmaan 'leenni kok'ong rek avah deilam nuh. Ungta mmaan plungkeh avah mei heppi ksen le' parvaan pdit le' mownaang ngi kquwng meek kantuk ava' pkeh lamda. Ungta skowl luwchai rek avah humpu mai hep daat ungta mnehrin thungki mei le' meikhut thuwkda.
66009018	Hava' kdum tidit tah meiyi, meikhut tih ungta kantuk kquwng meek ava ngi mmaan nih mii rek kdum ki khat avah eyou lamda. Hava'le' avah mnehrin thungki kthuwk.
66009019	Mleiya mmaan ruhtanna' avah mnehrin thung le' mermeiyin thung ngi ka'am. Mleiya mermeiyin avah pruwl rek armei hep daat ungta mluwchai rek ka'am ava ngi mii rek avah mdopdunin.
66009020	Pdainu hava' tidina' omlai rek ava ngi mdo'eyowma dultimii aangqhe rekki mmaan ki mkhutin nongtlot rek thungki plung perthleng chlammeh. tidit tah mmaan nih khu kdei kma', khu karja kma', kchet pchaang kma', jiiring le' jiipowl le' jiichai le' lung le' ding rekki tsak dow pthla rekle' tarnam rek luw mdobukin thungki plung perthleng chlam mda.
66009021	Ungta mmaan nih mii mdo'eyown mditmata mii mdokserin mditmata jowl mpurjutin mditmata muprutin thungki plung mdoperthlen chaakin pemeh.
66010001	Ungta neiyi mruh ktang dok vaantamsi morson khat armei dona nada parvaan ki arjung kqum deinu. Ungta mluw 'leenni kowlnisa thuwkda ungta mmai avah kni heppi lengda ungta mkhuh avah meikchow rek hep daatda.
66010002	Ungta mma ngi mkhut thuh tapvanksa laika 'suwn sinda. Ungta mma ngi mchang ki mkhuh paang khat avah truwnpii 'leenni therda ungta mmaleh ki mkhuh paang khat avah laan thah therda.
66010003	Ungta humpu kruwn heppi krowl kparthaang ngi owngda. Ungta mma' mo'own thungta pqeek tikhiu rekki arthaang lamda.
66010004	'Tunnu pqeek tikhiu rekki krowl marthaanin thung ngu, neiya kikjit rah kdothe meeksli. Ungta neiyi parvaan ki krowl khat arjanu. Ava ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Pqeek tikhiu rekki mdothe dow rek avah kbihjiik alotpthi ungta mmaan avah kjitma,” dida.
66010005	Ungta neiyi kdodeh vaantamsi truwnpii 'leenni ungta laan thah kther ava ngi mkhut avah parvaan thah hankhiingda.
66010006	Ungta kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah ka'am Mma' miing 'leenni ungta parvaan le' m'leen nih ka'am dow mkheng ungta dultipaam le' mthung ngi ka'am dow mkheng ungta truwnpii le' mthung ngi ka'am dow mkheng dim kupthuh kcha' miing 'leenni paureeltham thamda. hanto'theda: “'Tun dillu ksowtpa ngi toptobong nimeh.
66010007	Pdainu mtikhiuna' vaantamsi ava ngi k'dum rah mdothe meek mpuwtitsin mdodumna' nit rek ava' thung ngi Isowr ki paukordowl avah Mma ngi msuwk khulpu rek hinni mdopandan dok kqhapaumin ava' heppi avah kupqu dok rah.”
66010008	Audilli parvaan ki kdo'arjaak krowl ava ngi kihin nih veikhat the nowlda ungta hanto'theda: “Chet rang ngi truwnpii le' laan thah krip daat vaantamsi khut thungki tapvanksa ngi ka'am laika 'suwn avah alou.”
66010009	Ungta neiyi vaantamsi ava' hinni chetnu mhin nih hanto' thenu: “Laika 'suwn avah mheipii.” Ungta mma ngi kihin nih theda: “Alou rang ngi acha dok ungta ava ngi apowibuwr avah kapkha rah pdainu anehr thung ngu pkhuidii heppi kthlum rah,” dida.
66010010	Ungta neiyi vaantamsi khut thungki laika 'suwn avah lounu ungta avah chakdok nuh. Ungta knehr thung ngu avah pkhuidii heppi thlumda ungta neiyi kchaak dok daat le' kpowi thung ngi tkhat rah pqhunda.
66010011	Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi mii knempok leiyi, ungta chaat rek leiyi, ungta mdetmdet ki pau rek leiyi, ungta paamkruwng rek leiyi, veikhat adopurphuwn rah.”
66011001	Audilli kihin nih piipe hep daat tportolna' kchung khat mpiida. Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi ripda hanto'theda: “Nang ngi rip rang ngi Isowr luwbuk'inn le' rintparlaanna' khaan ungta ava' thung ngi luwkbu kcha' mii rek chai avah atailam.
66011002	Pdainu luwbuk'inn khulown avah portolma' mleiya avah Chaatktlei rek hinni mdopiik dok. Ungta mmaan nih kchiir khuwpii avah thla sompli lei'knii thung ngi mkhuhtherin kupthut lamrah.
66011003	Ungta Neiyi Neiki krinpaumin kpii 'knii rek hinni ruhtanna' piilam nikdi' ungta mmaanve ngi nit pun khat le' arja 'knii somtruk thung ngi dona kthi hilna lam donni pau kpurphuwng lamrah.”
66011004	Hava'le' avah kruwn ding 'knii avale' dultipaam ki Isowr aang ngi krip meilakuwng 'knii rek ava'.
66011005	Ungta kuwmiikhat tih mmaan me'ekre nuwm bih, mnehrin thungki mei thuwk donle mmiihal rekin avah kcha dok lamrah. Ungta kuwmiikhat tih mmaanve me'ekre nuwm bih mma' avah hava' heppi te'eyow rah.
66011006	Hava'le' ava ngi, mmaanve ngi pau mdopurphuwn naan nit rek thung ngi khu mratmana' rang ki thenni parvaan tarkam pthina' ki ruhtan mdothlowiyin. Ungta dii rek avah hii tpurthuhna' ki ruhtan ruk mdothlowiyin. Ungta mmaanve ngi mdongeiyinya ngi tidina' omlai rek mkheng avah dultipaam 'leenni veitya veitya thung ngi mdopthuh pchaanin.
66011007	'Tunnu mmaanve ngi mrinpauminin mpiik dokin dilli, mdonna' ktaak khor thungki kthuwk saa ava ngi mmaanve 'leenni raal ktlow rah. Ungta mma ngi mmaanve avah kapchaang chrah ungta ke'eyou lamrah.
66011008	Ungta mmaanve kluwng avah khuwpii klin 'lam thung ngi koplowm chrah. Ungta pthla 'lam thah nthe bih khuwpii miing rek avah Sodom le' Egypt, puh mdit ungta ava' thung ngi Neenki Kruwng ava' rukka mdopthowi yown.
66011009	Ungta phung rek ungta pau rek ungta chaat rek arlak ki mii aangqhe rekki niikdum mqim dilthang row ngi mmaanve kluwng avah kdei lamrah. Ungta mmaan nih mmaanve kluwng avah thlaan thuh tulruwl dok rah rowlam mda.
66011010	Ungta dultipaam thuh ka'am mii rek ka mmaanve diyow chaak leiyi, kanpa chlam rah. Ungta porchong palrau donni khat le' khat hinni chla rek kporhor chlam rah, mleiya hava' khulpu 'knii rek ava ngi dultipaam thuh ka'am mii avah mdopdun mdopyat chaak lam.
66011011	Ungta niikdum mqim mphaak dilli Isowr hinki rinkum kpii pthla ava ngi mmaanve thung ngi luwtda ungta mmaanve ngi mkhuhn nih rip lamda. Ungta mmaanve kdei khimkhei rek 'leenni kdung ngi ningqitna' khat kurthuwkda.
66011012	Ungta mmaanve ngi parvaan ki krowl kdungyou kcha' khat arja lamda. Ava ngi mmaanve hinni hanto'theda: “Hava' thah arhangin.” Ungta mmaanve avah armei arlak ki parvaan thah hangkal chlamda ungta mmaanve miihal rek ava ngi avah dei lamda.
66011013	Mpha ava'kat thung ngi ringnaang klin khat thuwkda, ungta khuwpii sowm ki khat avah tluw chda. Ringnaang kthuwk ava ngi mii pun tikhiu eyouda ungta mqhe ka'am rek avah mninginqi chda ungta parvaan ki Isowr avah ponlor chlamda.
66011014	Miknitna' suwthitna' avah kthleng dok a ungta asuwn! mukdumna' suwthit avah kbeisek ki karvang rah
66011015	Audilli vaantamsi mtikhiuna' ava ngi mpuwtitsin avah 'dumda. Parvaan ki kdungyou kcha' krowl khat pringda ungta ava ngi hanto'theda: “Dultipaam ki Kruwngpaalna' rek avah neenki Kruwng ungta Mma' Khrista ki Kruwngpaalna' kurthuwk kcha' a. Ungta Mma ngi kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah kpaal rah.”
66011016	Ungta kver rek som'knii leiplii Isowr aang ngi Kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong rek ava ngi mmai inni Isowr aang ngi tluw lamda luwbuk chlamda.
66011017	Mmaan nih hanto' the lamda: “Neen nih Akpanpaak chaak inna. O, Kruwng Kpaalkpusi Isowr! Nang nga 'tun ka'am daat ungta choduh ka'am ksa ungta dil thah karvang rang ava' ptih. Mleiya Nang nga aruhtan tu' kilqhi ngi kpaal dok kcha' ptih.
66011018	Chaat rek avah raang lamda ungta Nang aplungthit mei kquwng arjuda. Ungta Nang ngi kdiyou rek 'leenni pau'adopindit dokna' rah mpha avah arvang chda. Nang ngi asuwk khulpu rek ungta amiing kqi kcha' rek ungta miikenje rek hinni mnongqhat'lotin adopiik lamna' rah mpha avah arvangda. Nang ngi klin le' kdil rek hinni mnongqhat'lotin piilamnadi'. Ungta dultipaam ki mii rek ke'ekrep mii rek ado'ekrena' rah mpha avah arvang chda.”
66011019	Audilli parvaan thah Isowr luwbuk'inn avah kparvangda. Ungta Mma' luwbuk'inn thung ngi Mma' pauqum ki paupiik buwr avah arjuk kandangda. Ungta ava' thung ngi kowl plekda ungta archaang kdung ngi thuwkda ungta pqeek puwkda ungta ringnaang thuwkda ungta qil klin nih tlada.
66012001	Ungta 'tunnu parvaan thah kdung ngi klin titinna' khat thuwkda. Mleiya snu khat tih kni avah dona ngi nada ungta thla avah mkhuhpya tii thah am chda ungta mluwchai 'leenni bursi sowm lei'knii avah laar luwkhum mih khumda.
66012002	Audilli mma ngi nau horda kupluw rah mdothe leiyi, mpowi kdung ngi dungda ungta mdun ava ngi owngda.
66012003	Ungta parvaan thah titinna' khat thuwk nowlda. Ungta asuwn, mapthlapum ruwlreu mei heppi ksen khat thuwkda ungta mluwchai tikhiu ka'am mirki sowm mowngda ungta mluwchai 'leenni laar luwkhum tikhiutet khumda.
66012004	Ungta mermeiyi parvaan ki bursi rek kdum ki khat avah hanqen ptlada dulti thah mmaan avah yuvar pthida. Mapthlapum ruwlreu ava ngi nau kupluw rah kthemeek snu ava' aang ngi, snu ava ngi mupluk daat le' Nau ava' kcha rang ngi ma'aang ngi rip daatda.
66012005	Ungta mma ngi Pselnau khat pluwda, Mma' avah chaat rek thiir kchung ngi kqhi rang Nau ava'. Ungta Isowr rih Nau avah arjukchom tengda Mma' Kruwng longkhom 'leen thah hunqhi dokda.
66012006	Audilli snu avah paamkbiik lai thah chen chda. Ungta Isowr rih mma' thenni mii rekki nit pun khat arja 'knii somtruk thung ngi mdosut pqowi chaak lamna' rah mmun khat porthlon piik chda.
66012007	Ungta parvaan thah raal thuwkda. Maikal le' mma' vaantamsi rekki mapthlapum ruwlreu ava' tu' raal karna lamda. Ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu avale' mma' vaantamsi rekki mmaan avah karnaak qhi lamda.
66012008	Pdainu mapthlapum ruwlreu ava' lop pih raal lah pchaang lam mda. Avaleiyi, parvaan thah ma'amna' raan mmun ammda.
66012009	Isowr rih mapthlapum ruwlreu klin avah parvaan ki varpthida. Mma' avah choduh ki pruwl mmiing nga Tarnampii ungta Seitan, mdodit ava'. Isowr rih mmah mma' vaantamsi rektu' dultipaam thuh mdovar pthi lam.
66012010	Neiyi parvaan thah krowl klin khat arjanu ungta ava ngi hanto'theda: “'Tunnu tkirliinna' ungta ruhtanna' ungta neenki Isowr kruwngpaalna' avah kurjung dok a, ungta Mma' Khrista ki ruhtanna' avah kurjung dok a. Mleiya neenki nu'unnau rekin avah Isowr hinni, suwn le' jaan nih mraalin kpiikpii khat avah maptlaak pthi dok a.
66012011	Ungta mmaan nih Yausuwn hii ngi ungta mmaan ki rinpaumin rekki pauna ava ngi mma' avah mdopchaanin. Mmaan nih mrin chaakna' raan ki thenni mdiyow raan kpha rukka chang partlaak chlammeh.
66012012	Avaleiyi, parvaan nang ruk ungta ava' thuh ka'am rek naan ikanpa chaan. Pdainu dultipaam thuh ka'am ungta truwnpii thung ngi ka'am rek naan athenni suwqhitna' ka'am a! Mleiya tarnampii avah naan ahin nih mdo'arjuk ptlaakpthi. Mleiya mma' ki mpha avah ktowitek tidit mdodeh leiyi mmah mei kquwng ngi muplungkthi.”
66012013	Ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu ava ngi Isowr rih mmah dulti thah mheitvarpthi a tidit kerdeida avaleiyi mma ngi Pselnau kuplu snu avah tyat chiireelna' mdopiikda.
66012014	Pdainu snu ava ngi ma'amna' mun, paamkbiik lai thah myuwn chaakna' rang ki thenni mma' hinni plimklin pthla hep daat pthla 'knii pii chda. Mleiya pruwl ava' dodehma ngi ava' thah mii rekki mma' avah mpha khat ki ungta mpha rekki ungta mpha mqim ki thenni mdosut pqowi chaakna' raan ki then.
66012015	Ungta pruwl ava ngi mnehr thungki dii klinpa khat kreng heppi pthuwkda snu ava'dil pqowida. Mma ngi dii klin ava ngi snu avah mdopuwk dokna' rang ki thenni avah mdotlot.
66012016	Ungta dulti ava ngi snu avah bom chda ungta dulti ngi mnehr pvangda ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu vih mnehr thungki mdopthuh kreng avah prowpdokda.
66012017	Ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu avah snu ava' 'leenni kdung ngi muplung thida ungta mma' rilam mqhe ka'am rek hinni raal ktlow rah chetda. Mmaan avah Isowr pauqum kopqowi rek ungta Jisu Khrista rinpaumin kohor kcha' rek avale' lam.
66012018	Ungta neiya truwnpii biingki sitphui 'leenni rip daatnu.
66013001	Ungta truwnpii thungki saa khat arhang kthuwk deinu, ungta mluw tikhiutet ka'am ungta mirki sowm tonda ungta mirki rek 'leenni laar luwkhum sowm khumda.
66013002	Ungta 'tunnu neiyi runu ruwngchen kduh daat saa khat deinu ungta mkhuh rek avah towm khuh hep daat, ungta mnehr rih humpu nehr hep daat. Ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu ava ngi mhin nih mma' ruhtanna' ungta mma' Kruwng longkhom ungta ruhtanna' klin avah mma' hinni piida.
66013003	Ungta neiyi mluwchai rek khat avah kdiyou chrang ngi klim kcha' khat deinu. Ungta kdiyou chrang ngi klim avah dam chda. Ungta dultipaam mkheng nga ngak chlamda ungta saa ava'dil qowi chlamda.
66013004	Mthungta mmaan nih saa ava' hinni ruhtanna' kpii mapthlapum ruwlreu avah luwbuk chlamda mmaan nih saa ava' hinni hanto' the lamda: “Kuwda hava' saa ava' hep daat rang nga? Ungta kuwda mma' tu' raal karnaakqhi pchaang daat rang nga?” dilamda.
66013005	Ungta mma' hinni dow klin tethena' ungta pthitda tpaupokna' nehr khat piida. Ungta thla somplii lei'knii thung ngi dow mdotlot tlit pchaanna' rang ki ruhtan piida.
66013006	Audilli mma ngi Isowr kepteng ngi pthitda tpauna' rah mnehr pvangda tidit tah mma ngi Mma' miing le' Mma' buw'inn ungta parvaan thah ka'am rek 'leenni pthitda pauda.
66013007	Ungta mma' hinni miikenje tu' raal mkarnaakna' rah ungta mmaan mdopchaanna' rah ruhtan avah mapthlapum ruwlreu vih mhin nih piida. Ungta mma' hinni phung rek ungta mii rek ungta chaat rek mkheng mdopchaanna' rah ruhtanna' avah piida.
66013008	Ungta dultipaam thuh ka'am mii mkheng ngi saa avah luwkbuk chlam rah. Mmaan avah dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kupqhun nih te'eyow dok Yausuwn ki rinkum laika thung ngi mmiing mdokjitma mii rek avale' lam.
66013009	Kuwmiikhat maknapum mma' ava ngi havah arja chso.
66013010	Paamsuwk ki ka'am rang mma' avah paamsuwk ki mche chaak rah. Ungta raal'kaang ngi mii ke'eyou mma' avah raal'kaang ngi te'eyow rah. Hava' ki mlei avah miikenje rek avah tidiil chaakna' le' lamrin nih ma'am chaak raan.
66013011	Audilli neiyi dultipaam ki hungkkal saa ktlok khat deinu. Ungta mmah Yausuwn heppi mirki 'knii kton ungta mapthlapum ruwlreu heppi kpau.
66013012	Ungta mma' thung ngi mma' duh ki mkhatna' saa ava' ki ruhtanna' mkheng avah ka'am. Ungta dultipaam le' ava' 'leenni ka'am mii rek avah mkhatna' saa, tidit tah kdiyou chrang ngi raal'kaang ngi lim thida kdam dok saa ava' hinni luwkbuk rah silamda.
66013013	Ungta mma ngi dultimii rek dodeh ngi klin nih titinna' nong rek avah pthuwkda. Tidit tah parvaan ki mei avah dultipaam thung ngi arjung kqum kpha ngi pthuwkda.
66013014	Ungta mkhatna' saa ava' dodeh ngi titinna' rek mdotlot pchaanna' ruhtan avah mapthlapum ruwlreu ava ngi mma' hinni mdopiik ava ngi dultipaam thuh ka'am mii rek avah 'lamleh thah mdoqhi lam. Ungta mma ngi dultipaam thuh ka'am mii rek hinni hanto'theda: “Naan nih raal'kaang ngi lim thida kring dok pchaang saa ava' pthla avah adotlot raan,” dilamda.
66013015	Ungta mma ngi saa ava' pthla ava' 'leenni rinkum tpiik pchaanna' ruhtanna' piida. Tidit tah saa ava' pthla ava ngi tpau ruk mpau pchaanna' rah ungta saa ava' pthla ava' hinni luwkbu kma' rek khimkhei avah mdope'eyow lamna' rah ruhtanna' avah mhin nih mdopiik.
66013016	Ungta mma ngi mii mkheng, tidit tah kenreel rek ruk, kenreel kma' rek ruk ungta svang rek ruk, srah rek ruk ungta mii'ol rek ruk suwk'owr rek rukku mchang ki mkhutin 'leenni mditmata mapchalin 'leenni titinna' kbih kporlotsap lamda.
66013017	Ungta saa ava' kbih kton mditmata mmiing mditmata mma' miing jiikchai kton kma'don dow tren mditmata tyur avah kuwkhat leh ngi mdopchaan mana' rang ki thenni havah mdotlot.
66013018	Havah luwkinritna' ava': Kdeipindih kcha' mma' ava ngi saa ava' chai avah atai chso. Mleiya havah miikhat chai ava' ungta mma' miing chai avah arja truk somtruk lei truk.
66014001	Ungta neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn, Yausuwn avah Jion Lown 'leenni ungta Mma' tu' mapchalin 'leenni Mpa miing tikjit mii pun arja khat somplii leiplii rektu' krip daat deinu.
66014002	Ungta neiyi parvaan ki krowl khat, dii knempa kluwng archaang hep daat ungta khu kdung ngi kipri archaang hep daat arjanu. Ungta neiyi dumreng k'dum rekki mdumrengin mdodumin krowl archaang arjanu.
66014003	Ungta mmaan nih kruwng longkhom aang ngi ungta kring daat saa chai plii rek aang ngi ungta kver rek aang ngi laaren khat kthe heppi laa the lamda. Ungta ava' laa avah dultipaam thungki mdoktlan dok pun arja khat somplii leiplii rek kma'don morson kuwkhat leh ngi kurchuk pchaang meh.
66014004	Hava'le' avah snu tu' ktobor liit kma' mii reklam tidit tah mmaan avah kinrim lam. Ungta tva'tva' thang yoso, Yausuwn ava' chena' thung ngi Mdil kqowi kcha' reklam. Hava'le' avah mii rek arlak ki Isowr thenni ungta Yausuwn ava' thenni mkhatna' mchei kurthuwk ki mdoktlan chaak dok rek ava' lam.
66014005	Ungta mmaan nehr thung ngu tkurhuwnna' ka'am pemeh. Mleiya Isowr kruwng longkhom aang ngi mmaan nah mdoparmaan ka'am pemeh.
66014006	Ungta neiyi vaantamsi ktlok khat parvaan mmalai thah kyuwng kervel deinu. Ungta mma ngi dultipaam thung ngi ka'am rek hinni mdoparjaam rah ktlangknai kma' rah kqhapaumin ava' mdothlowi. Ungta chaat khimkhei ungta phung khimkhei ungta pau khimkhei ungta mii rek khimkhei hinni kqhapaumin avah mdoparjaam rah.
66014007	Krowl kparthaang ngi mma ngi hanto'theda: “Isowr aqi chaan ungta Mma' avah aponlor chaan. Mleiya pau mdopinditna' rang ki nit avah karvang kcha' a. Parvaan ungta dulti ungta truwnpii ungta diitlaang mkheng rek ava' dim kupthuh kcha' Mma' avah luw'abu chaan.”
66014008	Ungta mdilkqowi vaantamsi khat thuwk nowlda ungta ava ngi hanto'theda: “Khuwpii klin Babylon nah ktluw kcha' a, ktluw kcha' a. Mleiya mma ngi chaat mkheng rek avah mma' ki jowlpurjutna' plungthit mei kquwng ki thowldii avah mdopneek doklam.”
66014009	Audilli mukdumna' vaantamsi khat tih mmaanve dil qowida ungta ava ngi krowl kparthaang ngi hanto'theda: “Kuwmiikhat tih saa ava' hinni ungta mma' pthla ava' luwmbuk chaak bih, ungta mapchal 'leenni mditmata mkhut 'leenni mma' kbih mlot chaak bih, plungthit kduh chrah.
66014010	Ungta mma'kat ava ngi Isowr plungthit mei kquwng ki thowldii avah knee chrah. Thowldii avah Mma' plungthit tu' tporchou dok ksa tong ava'. Ungta Mma ngi, kchiir vaantamsi rek aang le' Yausuwn ava' aang ngi mei le' kantuk kquwng ava ngi mma' avah suwk kupthuwk chrah.
66014011	Ungta mmaan suwkthuhna' meikhut avah kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah hang kkal rah. Ungta saa ava' ungta mma' pthla luwkbu kcha' ungta mma' miing kbih karlaang kcha' khimkhei rek avah kunthun ruk jaan rukku mkarngat chaaknaan amvot nimeh.”
66014012	Havah miikenje rek, tidit tah Isowr paupiik kopqowi kcha' rek ungta Jisu hinni lamkrin kcha' rekvah mdodiildeh chaak raan.
66014013	Ungta neiyi parvaan ki krowl khat tih kihin nih hanto' mdothe arjanu: “Havah akjit: 'Tunki kupqhun nih Kruwng hinni kdiyou kcha' rek avah msuwkin kqha a. Pthla ava' rukku: ‘Ou, mmaan nih mnonglow chaakin thungki mkarngat chaak raan. Ungta mnonglow chaak rekin rukku, mdilin kqowi chrah,’ dida.”
66014014	Ungta neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn, armei kpowl khat ungta armei ava' 'leenni Mii Chapa hep daat khat kok'ong daat deinu. Mma ngi mluw 'leenni jiiring laar luwkhum khumda ungta mkhut thung ngi tangkep kraang khat sinda.
66014015	Ungta vaantamsi ktlok khat avah luwbuk'inn thungki thuwkda ungta krowl kparthaang ngi armei 'leenni kok'ong khat ava' hinni theda: “Atangkep aptla rang ngi arkundok. Tidit tah Nang ngi ado'arkunna' rah mpha avah kvei dok a. Mleiya dultipaam turkunna' rah mpha avah kvei kcha' a.”
66014016	Ungta Mma ngi armei 'leenni ko'ongda ungta mtangkep avah dultipaam thuh arjuptlada ungta dultipaam avah arju'arkunda.
66014017	Audilli vaantamsi ktlok khat avah parvaan ki luwbuk'inn thungki thuwkda. Ungta mma' rukku tangkep kraang khat sinda.
66014018	Ungta rintparlaanna' khaan thungki vaantamsi ktlok khat thuwk nowlda. Mma' avah mei 'tun nih ruhtan kthlowi ungta mma ngi tangkep kraang ksin khat ava' hinni krowl kparthaang ngi hanto'theda: “Atangkep kraang ava' aptla rang ngi dultipaam ki riithlumnu baak rek avah apurkuwk dok. Tidit tah dultipaam le' riithlum chei rek avah kmin doklam a.”
66014019	Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi dultipaam thung ngi mtangkep avah arjuptlada. Ungta dultipaam ki riithlumnu rek avah arjupurkuwkda. Ungta Isowr plungthit mei kquwng ki riithlum tekmerna' klin ava' thung ngi daal pthida.
66014020	Ungta mmaan nih khuwpii duwn thah riithlum rek avah riithlum tekmerna' thung ngi therchown lamda. Ungta riithlum tekmerna' thungki hii thuwkda. Ungta avah skowl haake pang ktlum mih ungta kilommitar arja kdum arveel kla ngi luwngda.
66015001	Audilli neiyi parvaan thah titinna' morson khat deinu ungta avah klin ungta kdung ngi tngana' khat. Vaantamsi tikhiu rek ava ngi mqutna' tidina' omlai tikhiu thlowi lamda. Mleiya Isowr plungthit mei kquwng avah mmaan ava' thung ngi mkurkhumna'.
66015002	Ungta neiyi mei tu' korchou likli truwnpii hep daat khat deinu. Ungta muplungkthi saa ava' kapchaang rek ungta saa ava' pthla ungta mma' kbih ungta mma' miingchai rek ava' kapchaang rek mmaan ava ngi mkhutin thung ngi Isowr dumreng sin lamda likli truwnpii 'leenni ripdaat lamda.
66015003	Ungta mmaan nih Isowr suwk Moses laa ungta Yausuwn laa avah hanto' the lamda: “Kruwng Kpaalkpusi Isowr! Nang anong rek avah klin dok a ungta tngana' a. O miikenje rekki Kruwng! Nang a'lam rekka mrin kindit ungta kindit ava'.
66015004	O Kruwng! Kuwda Nang akqi kma' ungta akponlor kma' rang nga? Mleiya kchiir rah Nang daat, ungta chaat mkheng ngi Nang ahin nih thleng lamdon ungta a'aang ngi luwkbu chlam rah. Mleiya Nang arinkinditna' rek avah kandang dok a.”
66015005	Ungta hava' dilli neiyi suwnu ungta asuwn, parvaan thah rinpaumin ki buw'inn, luwbuk'inn avah kparvangda.
66015006	Ungta tidina' omlai tikhiu kthlowi vaantamsi tikhiu rek avah ava' luwbuk'inn thung ki thuwk lamda. Mmaan nih buw ktarnaal kchiir deek ungta kepleu deek deek ki hilna lamda. Ungta muplungin 'leenni jiiring arkowlke pkeh lamda.
66015007	Audilli kring daat saa chai plii rek arlak ki khat tih vaantamsi tikhiu rek hinni jiiring thleengkam tikhiu parlaan lamda. Ungta avale' thung ngu kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah kring Isowr ki plungthit mei kquwng ngi kdim kdim mih ka'am.
66015008	Ungta luwbuk'inn avah Isowr tponlorna' le' Mma' ruhtanna' ki meikhut tih dim chda. Ungta vaantamsi tikhiu rek hinki tidina' omlai tikhiu rek ava' mqutduh khimkheiyi kuw khadaat ruk luwbuk'inn ava' thung ngi luwt pchaang meh.
66016001	Audilli neiyi luwbuk'inn thung ki ngi vaantamsi tikhiu rek hinni krowl kparthaang khat tih hanto' mdothe arjanu: “Naan nih chetin rang ngi Isowr plungthit mei kquwng thleengkam rek avah dultipaam thuh aperleiyin,” dida.
66016002	Mthungta mkhatna' ava ngi chetda thleengkam mdosin avah dultipaam thuh perleida. Ungta saa ava' kbih kthlowi rek ungta mma' pthla luwkbu kcha' rek 'leenni kdung ngi kdung, mmeel kthi ngi kpaan omlai khat qouda.
66016003	Audilli miknitna' vaantamsi ava ngi chetda thleengkam mdosin avah truwnpii 'leenni perleida. Ungta dii avah kdiyou hii hep daat kurthuwk chda. Ungta truwnpii ava' thung ngi kring kcha' rek khimkhei avah diyou chlamda.
66016004	Audilli mukdumna' vaantamsi ava ngi chetda thleengkam mdosin avah kreng rekle' diina rek khimkhei thung ngi perleida ungta dii rek avah hii kurthuwk ter chda.
66016005	Ungta neiyi dii rekki, vaantamsi ava ngi hanto' mdothe arjanu: “O Kruwng, Nang nga arinkindit! Nang nga 'tun'tun ka'am daat ungta choduh rukku ka'am ksa ungta Kchiir ava' ptih. Mleiya Nang ngi hanto ngi pau'apindit dok a.
66016006	Mleiya mmaan nih miikenje rekle' khulpu rek hii mdopthuhn leiyi, Nang ngi mmaan hinni hii tong avah tepneek lam tinu. Mleiya mmaan nah hava' kat kphang kcha' ki mtik kchalam.”
66016007	Ungta neiyi krowl morson khat rintparlaanna' thung ki ngi hanto' mdothe arjanu: “O Kruwng Kpaalkpusi Isowr! Nang apaupindit rek avah kindit ungta mrin kindit.”
66016008	Ungta mplitna' vaantamsi ava ngi thleengkam mdosin avah kni 'leenni perleida. Ungta mii rek avah meiyi mkaak chaakna' rah kni hinni ruhtanna' piida.
66016009	Ungta mii rek avah kdung ngi ksa ava ngi pkada. Mmaan nih hava' omlai rek 'leenni mukpu ruhtanna' kthlowi, Isowr miing 'leenni pthitda pau lamda. Ungta mmaan nih Mma' tponlorna' rang ki thennu plung perthleng chlam mda.
66016010	Ungta mparngatna' vaantamsi ava ngi thleengkam mdosin avah saa ava' kruwng longkhom 'leenni perleida. Ungta mma' kruwngpaalna' avah kjiingnu ngi dim chda. Ungta mmaan nih kdungreen nih mdunin leiyi, mepleiyin pkei lamda.
66016011	Ungta mmaan nih mdunin ungta mpaanin leiyi, parvaan ki Isowr kepteng ngi pthitda pau lamda. Mmaan nih mnong rekin thung ki plung perthleng chlam mda.
66016012	Ungta mutrukna' vaantamsi ava ngi thleengkam mdosin avah Euphrates Kreng klin thung ngi perleida ungta dii avah kang chda. Mleiya havah knithuhna' ktong ki paamkruwng rek thlenna' rah 'lam tporthlon pchaanna' rang ki then.
66016013	Ungta neiyi mapthlapum ruwlreu ava' nehr thung ki ungta saa ava' nehr thung ki ungta mlangkma' khulpu ava' nehr thung ki tarnam ktobor kdum rek avah uiqok rek heppi kthuwk deinu.
66016014	Tidit tah mmaan avah titinna ktlow rek tarnam pthla rek ava' lam. Mmaan nih dultipaam ki paamkruwng rek hinni chet lamda ungta dultipaam mkheng ki mii rek hinni chet lamda. Mleiya mmaan nah Kpaalkpusi Isowr ki nit klin ava' thung ngi raal tkurduk qhina' rang ki thenni mii kpurkuwk rah kchet lam.
66016015	“Asuwn! Neiya kupru thlen heppi thleng nikdi'.kilring chda ungta mdomna rek kirkhi kcha' mma' avah msuwkqha a. Mditma bih mma, ngi mdomna ktaak ki chetdon, mii rekki mningkyana' kdei lamrah.”
66016016	Ungta mma ngi mii rek avah Hibriu pau vih Armageddon mdodit mun ava' thung ngi kpurtuwl lamrah.
66016017	Ungta mtikhiuna' vaantamsi ava ngi thleengkam mdosin avah tirthli 'leenni perleida. Ungta parvaan ki luwbuk'inn thung ki ungta kruwng longkhom thung ki krowl khat tih kparthaang dok ki owngda hanto'theda: “Havah kqudok a.”
66016018	Ungta ava' thung ngi kowl plekda, pqeek rek puwkda, archaang rek kdung ngi thuwkda, ungta ringnaang klin thuwkda. Ava' heppi kdung ngi ungta klin nih kthuwk ringnaang avah dultipaam thuh dultimii ma'am daat ki thuwk mlai.
66016019	Ungta khuwpii klin avah lop kdum mih kenqhen chda. Ungta chaat rekki khuwpii rek avah tlu chda. Ungta mma ngi Isowr plungthit mei kquwng ki thowldii tong ava' mdopiikna' rah khuwpii klin Babylon avah Isowr aang ngi tipbinphaak lamda.
66016020	Ungta diiloipaam khimkhei avah chen chda ungta lown tidit khatleh ammda.
66016021	Ungta dultimii rek 'leenni parvaan ki qil klin klin nih tlada. Qil chai khat tih kilo somkdum leiparnga arveel rikda. Pdainu dultimii rekki tidina' qil omlai ava'leiyi Isowr kepteng ngi pthitda pau lamda. Mleiya tidina' omlai avah kdung reen nih klin.
66017001	Audilli thleengkam tikhiu kthlowi vaantamsi tikhiu rek arlak ki khat ava ngi mbida ungta kihin nih hanto'theda: “Arvang, neiyi klinsi ngi mdakkurjur, dii knempok 'leenni kok'ong snu khat 'leen ki pautpinditna' avah ayupdeh nih.
66017002	Hava' dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekki mma' tu' jowlkpurju lamda. Ungta hava' dultipaam thuh ka'am rek avah mma' jowlpurjutna' thung ki thowldii ava ngi tipriter lamda.”
66017003	Mthungta mma ngi neiya paamkbiik lai thah mqhidokda ungta neiya pthla ngi am chnuh. Ungta neiyi kning ngi ksen saa khat 'leenni kok'ong daat snu khat deinu. Ungta saa ava' 'leenni pthitda tpauna' miing ngi kdim daat deinu ungta mluwchai tikhiu le' mirki sowm kton deinu.
66017004	Ungta snu avah kning ngi ksen le' ksen dona hilnada, ungta jiiring dona le' mkhon kekre lung rek ungta kchiir rih kpowl lung rekki korthlongda. Mkhut tih jiiring tong khat sinda. Ungta ava' thung ngi tepder kurhuwi dow rekle' ktobor ungta mjowlpurjutna' ngi avah dim chda.
66017005	Ungta mapchal 'leenni miing khat kjitda. “PAUKORDOWL. KHUWPII KLIN BABYLON. DAKKURJUR REKKI MNUH UNGTA DULTIPAAM KI TEPDER KUHUWI DOW REKKI MNUH” dida.
66017006	Neiyi snu avah deinu, ungta mma' avah miikenje rekki hii le' Jisu leiyi, rinpaumin kpii kcha' rekki hii mdoneek ki pri chda. Ungta neiyi mma' kdeh thung ngu kdung ngi ngak chnuh.
66017007	Pdainu vaantamsi ava ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Taluleiyi nang nga kngak imptih? Neiyi snu ava' ki mlei ungta mma' kpu, saa ava' ki mlei paukordowl avah ayuthepiik nih. Saa avah mluw tikhiu kpu ungta mirki sowm kton.
66017008	Nang ngi saa khat adodeh ungta 'tun ka'am kma' avah ktlangknai kmah tkenveina' thung ngi kluwt rang ngi, mdonna' ktaak khor thung ki kthuwk bei rah mthe a. Ungta dultipaam mupqhun daat ki kring laika thung ngi mmiingin tikjitma mii aangqhe ka'am lam. Dultipaam thuh ka'am mmaan ava ngi ungta 'tun ka'am ava ngi choduh ka'am ungta 'tun ka'am kma' ungta dil thah kthuwk rang saa ava' mdeh thung inni kngak lamrah.
66017009	Ungta havah luwkinrit ki plungreel ava': Luwchai tikhiu rek avah snu ava' ko'onna' lown tikhiu rek ava'.
66017010	Ungta paamkruwng tikhiu rek ka'am lam ungta parnga rekka ktluw dok kcha'lam ungta 'tun khat tah ka'am daat ungta morson khat tah dil thah karvang rang ava'. Ungta mma' mthlen thung ngu mma ngi mpha ktowitek ki thenni kpaal rah.
66017011	Ungta choduh ka'am ungta 'tun ka'am kma' saa avah metrehtna' paamkruwng ava' ungta mma' avah tikhiu rek hinki karvang ungta mmah tkenvei chaakna' thuh kchet chrah.
66017012	Ungta arki sowm adodeh rek pda 'tun kruwngpaalna' khadaat ruk karlaang kma' paamkruwng sowm rek ava'. Pdainu saa ava'tu' qhang khatpang ki thenni paamkruwng rek kurthuwk ki ruhtanna' karlaang kcha' rek ava'.
66017013	Hava' paamkruwng rek avah muplungrilin khadaat ka'am ungta mmaan nih ruhtan ungta ruhtanna' avah saa ava' hinni kpii lamrah.
66017014	Hava' paamkruwng rek ava ngi Yausuwn tung ngi raal kkarna lamrah ungta Yausuwn ava ngi kapchaang lamrah. Mleiya Mmah kruwng rekki kruwng ungta paamkruwng rekki Paamkruwng. Ungta Mma' tu' kilqhi ngi ka'am rek avah mdo'own chaak dok rek ungta mdokchol ksadok rek ungta trinchaak krow rek, mdodit avale' lam.”
66017015	Ungta vaantamsi ava ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi dakkurjur snu ko'onna' dii rek adodeh avah mii rek ungta miiloppii rek, chaat rekle' mii rek, ava'.
66017016	Ungta nang ngi saa ava' leenni mirki sowm adodeh rek ava ngi dakkurjur snu avah kepder chlam rah. Ungta mmaan nih mma' avah kpenvei pthi lamrah. Mmaan nih snu avah mdakchai kupthut lamrah ungta msadak avah kcha chlam rah ungta mei thuh kapka pthi lamrah.
66017017	Mleiya Isowr rih mmaan plung thung ngi Mma' dongei ava' mdoptlot lamna' rah mmaan avah plungril khadaat mdopthut lam. Mmaan nih mmaan ki kruwngpaalna' avah Isowr pauthe rek ava' mkurkhum duh khimkheiyi saa ava' hinni mdoparlaan chaak dokin.
66017018	Ungta nang ngi adodeh snu avah dultipaam ki paamkruwng rek 'leenni kpaal khuwpii klin ava'.”
66018001	Ungta hava'le' dilli neiyi vaantamsi ktlok khat parvaan ki arjung kqum deinu. Ungta mma ngi, mruhtanna' klin dok ki ungta dultipaam avah mma' konlorna' ava ngi plengda.
66018002	Ungta mma ngi kdung ngi ruhtan thlowida ungta krowl kparthaang ngi owngda hanto'theda: “Khuwpii klin Babylon avah ktluw kcha' a, ktluw kcha' a! Ungta tarnam amna' kurthuwk kcha' a. Ungta tarnam ktobor khimkhei ki mbuw kurthuwk kcha' a. Ungta mii rekki mdopder chaakin ktobor pva rek khimkhei ki mbuw kurthuwk kcha' a.
66018003	Mleiya chaat mkheng rek avah mma' jowlpurjutna' plungthit mei kquwng ki thowldii ava ngi kipri kcha' lam a. Ungta dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekki mma' tu' jowlkpurju kcha' lam a. Ungta dultipaam ki sumnong ktlow rekki mma' kenthlet parnaakna' dona kepleet tih ka'am ava ngi svang thuhna' lamda.”
66018004	Ungta neiyi parvaan ki krowl morson khat tih hanto' mdothe arjanu. “Nei kmii rek naan nih snu ava' hin ki arvang thuwk dokin. Mditma bih naan nih mma' tu' pnu kerveisap kurthuwk chnaandi'. Ungta mma' 'leenni kthuwk rang tidina' omlai rek ava' arlaang chnaandi'.
66018005	Mleiya mma' pnu arve avah parvaan kpha kurtuwl dok kcha' a. Ungta Isowr rih mma' rinkinditmana' avah mbinphaak dok a.
66018006	Mma ngi naan ahinin nih adotpiikin heppi mma' hinni apii perheelin. Ungta mnongtlot chaak dilkqowiyi ava' han'tun nih mtum 'knii kerkheel lih mhin nih aperheelin. Ungta mma ngi naan ahinin nih adotporchou piik dokin tong ava' han'tun nih, tum 'knii kerkheel lih, mhin nih aporchou piikin.
66018007	Mma ngi mthina ngi kponlor chda ungta kenthle kparnaak dok ki ma'am chaak ava' heppi naan nih mma' avah chii apreelin ungta plungyatna' apiin. Mleiya mma ngi muplungril thung ngi: ‘Neiya kruwngnu heppi kok'ong ping. Neiya meikhunu pmaang ungta tqatqeina' teden rukku dei nimaang,’ mdodit.
66018008	Avaleiyi, nii khat daat thung ngi mma' 'leenni tidina' omlai rek avah kthuwk rah. Mmaan rek avah tidiyowna', tqatqeina' ungta powitham. Ungta mmah meiyi ktluwm daat tih kka chrah. Mma' 'leenni paukpindit rang Kruwng Isowr rah Kpaalkpusi.
66018009	Ungta snu ava' ki jowlpurjutna' ungta kporchong kpalrau vih mma' tu' ka'am dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekki mma' kaakna' meikhut mdehn thung ngi mma' leiyi, kqap chlam rah. Ungta muplungin tpeeng lam donni archam klou chlam rah.
66018010	Mmaan nih snu ava ngi tyat mdoperteel ava' mdoqit chaakin leiyi, lamkla ngi rip lam thida hanto' the lamda: ‘Suwkthi a, suwkthi a. Khuwpii klin Babylon, mruh ktang khuwpii. Nang a'leen nih qhang khadaat thung ngi, pau tpinditna' avah kthuwk a neh!’ kdi lamrah.
66018011	Ungta dultipaam ki sumnong ktlow rekki mma' thenni kqapkqei chlam rah ungta plungkya ngi qap lamda. Mleiya 'tun dilvah kuwkhat leh ngi mmaan dona rek avah renporson piik lammeh.
66018012	Mmaan dona rek avah jiiring le' jiipowl, mkhon kekre lung rekle' lungpowl kchiir rek, ungta buw kperneem le' kning ngi ksen buw, ungta buw ktarnaal le' buwksen, ungta ding namreng rek, ungta mmaan avah mdet mdet ki psaihaa dona rek, ungta mdet mdet ki mkhon kekre ding dona rek, ungta jiichai, ungta thiir le' marble lung dona rek,
66018013	Ungta saade le' namreng, ungta tpurbul reidii le' dinghowk namreng, ungta thowldii le' reidii, ungta jaam kqha le' chavui, ungta inndown saa rek, ungta yau le' skowl rek, ungta tolai rek, ungta mii rek daksa le' plungrin rek, ava'.
66018014	‘Ungta aplungrin nih mdongei chaak mchei rek avah ahin ki ksun dok kcha' a. Ungta svang tuthuhna' ungta ningtlunna' dona rek mkheng avah nang ahin ki ksun dok kcha' a. Ungta nang ngi mmaan avah veikhat kurdutqhi vot lam nimtih,
66018015	Hava' dow rek 'leenni sumnong tlowda snu ava'leiyi svang kthuwk rekki mma' leiyi, kqap chlam rah ungta plungkya ngi kqap chlam rah.
66018016	Ungta mmaan nih hanto' kthe lamrah: ‘Suwkthi a, suwkthi a. Ava' khuwpii klin, ava' thung ngi buw kperneem kqha ngi ungta kning ngi ksen le' buwksen kihilkna kcha' ungta jiiring le' mkhon kekre lung rek ungta lungpowl kchiir rih korthlong kcha' nang avah asuwkthi a.’
66018017	Mleiya qhang khadaat thung ngi antoya klin nih svang kthuwk avah msit ktaak kurthuwk kcha' a. Ungta arkuwngpii kqhi rekle' arkuwngpii ava' thuh kchet mii mkheng rek ungta arkuwngpii kthapmii ungta truwnpii 'leenni sumnong ktlow khimkhei rek avah lamkla ngi rip chlamda.
66018018	Ungta mmaan nih snu ava' kaakna' meikhut mdehn thung ngi owng lamdon. ‘Hava' khuwpii klin heppi khuwpii klin talu ka'am kdi lamrah?’
66018019	Ungta mmaan nih mluw thaan nih purvuwt karthlaak lamda ungta owng lamda qap lamda ungta plungkya ngi qap lamda ungta hanto' the lamda: ‘Suwkthi a suwkthi a. Neen nih svang tuthuh chaak naan khuwpii klin avah suwkthi a. Truwnpii 'leenni arkuwngpii kthlowi kcha' neen nkhengin avah mma' alrou vih svang tuthuh chaakin. Qhang khadaat thung ngi mma' avah msit ktaak kurthuwk kcha' a.
66018020	O, parvaan ungta miikenje rekle' tamsi rek, ungta khulpu rek naan nih snu ava'leiyi ikanpa chaan. Isowr rih naan athenni mma' 'leenni pau mpindit dok a.’ ”
66018021	Audilli mruh ktang vaantamsi khat tih buhsuk lung hep daat lung klinpa khat louda ungta truwnpii thung ngi varpthida ungta hanto'theda: “Hanto' heppi eeng rak ki khuwpii klin Babylon avah kvarpthi rah. Ungta kuwkhat leh ngi avah veikhat kurdutqhi nimeh.
66018022	Ungta nang athung ngi dumreng k'dum rek laakrowl ungta laakrowl kupthuwk rek, ungta spirthiil kmuwt rek, ungta puwtit k'dum rek krowl, veikhat tarjaak nimeh. Ungta nang athung ngi mdet mdet ki dim kdei mii rekki dim lou porson nimeh. Ungta nang athung ngi buhsuk lung archaang, veikhat tarjaak porsonliit nimeh.
66018023	Ungta nang athung ngi, meila kleng avah veikhat, leng porson vot nimeh. Ungta kmoukpu mditmata kmou krowl rek avah, nang athung ngi tarjaak porson nimeh. Mleiya nang ahin nih sumnong ktlow rek avah, dultipaam thung ki klin ksaang rek ava'. Ungta chaat mkheng ki mii rek avah nang akser rih 'lamleh thah adoqhi chaakter doklam.
66018024	Ungta khulpu rekle' miikenje rek, ungta dultipaam thung ngi te'eyow rek mkheng kihii avah, snu ava' thung ngi ka'am dei lamda.”
66019001	Ungta hava'le' dilli neiyi parvaan thah mii knempok ki hanto' mdotheen kdung youkcha' krowl khat arjanu: “Haleluiah! Tkirliinna' ungta tkonlorna' le' takyat chaakna' ungta ruhtan' avah neen ki Kruwng Isowr ava' dow!
66019002	Mleiya Mma' pau pindit avah kindit ungta mrin kindit. Mma ngi dakkurjur klinsi snu, mma' jowlpurjutna' thung ngi dultipaam ktopbor mma' 'leen pau mpindit dok a. Mma ngi mma' khut thuh msuwk rek hii avah phuw mlowpiik dok lam a.”
66019003	Ungta mmaan nih mveiknitna' the nowl lamda: “Haleluiah! Ungta mma' kaakna' meikhut avah kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah kukhu tlit rah.”
66019004	Ungta kver som'knii leiplii rekle' kring daat saa chai plii rekki kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong Isowr hinni tluw lamda luwbuk chlamda ungta hanto' the lamda: “Amen. Haleluiah.”
66019005	Ungta kruwng longkhom thung ki krowl khat thuwkda hanto'theda: “Mma' suwk rek naan, ungta Mma' kqi kcha' kdilklin mii mkheng rek naan nih, neen ki Isowr avah apanpaak chaan.”
66019006	Ungta neiyi miipii klin krowl hep daat khat avah dii knempok kluwng archaang hep daat khat, ungta kdungyou kcha ngi khuh kipri archaang hep daat khat arjanu. Ava ngi hanto'theda: “Haleluiah! Mleiya Kpaalkpusi Kruwng Isowr, avah kpaal dok a!
66019007	Neenna kanpada kdung ngi tkanpat chaak raan, Ungta Mma' avah tponlor chaak raan. Mleiya Yausuwn ki kchiir inneena' rang nit avah karvang na. Ungta Mma' kmou rang avah korthlong dok kcha' a.
66019008	Ungta mma ngi buw kperneem kqha ungta kchiir deek ki kepleu, ungta kpowl deek mdonaakna' rah mhin nih ruhtan mpiik dok a.” Mleiya buw kperneem kqha avah miikenje rek rinkinditna' ava'!
66019009	Audilli mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Havah akjit: ‘Yausuwn ki kchiir inneena' thung ki kmaal ava' thung ngi’ mdo'own chaak rek mmaan avah msuwkin kqha.’ Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Hava'le' avah Isowr pauna kindit rek ava'.”
66019010	Ungta neiyi luwkbu chrah mkhuhther rih tluw chnuh. Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Kihin nih anto' tlowma' nang ngi havah tlowma',Tidit tah neiya nang ngi suwk adokurthuhqhi, Jisu ki rinpaumin kohor kcha' a'uanau khat ping. Isowr luw'abucha! Mleiya Jisu ki rinpaumin avah pauphuwnna' ki pthla ava'.”
66019011	Audilli neiyi parvaan kparvang deinu ungta asuwn, skowl kpowl khat am daatda. Ungta m'leen nih kok'ong Mma' avah Trinchaak krow ungta Kindit, mdodit ava'. Ungta Mma ngi rinkindit tih pau mdopindit ungta raal mdotlot.
66019012	Mma' mik avah meila kquwng heppi lengda ungta mluw 'leenni laar luwkhum rek khumda. Ungta m'leen nih kuwkhat leh ngi mdodehma Mma' daat tih mdodeh miing khat kjitda.
66019013	Ungta Mma ngi hii thung ngi tuplup dok dona nada ungta Mma' miing avah ‘Isowr Pauna,’ mdit.
66019014	Ungta parvaan raalmii rekki skowl kpowl 'leenni tuwng lamda Mma'dil qowi chlamda. Ungta mmaan nih buw kperneem kchiir rih kpowldang dona hilna chlamda.
66019015	Ungta Mnehr thung ngi raal'kaang kraang khat thuwkda. Mleiya ava ngi Mma ngi chaat rek avah mdosor rah. Ungta Mma ngi thiir kchung ngi mmaan avah qhidon ksutpqowi lamrah. Ungta Mma ngi Kpaalkpusi Isowr plungthit mei kquwng ki riithlum tsunna' avah Mkhuh ngi therda.
66019016	Ungta Mdona 'leen le' Mphei 'leenni Isowr rih mmiing hanto' mdokjit ka'am: “PAAMKRUWNG REKKI PAAMKRUWNG UNGTA KRUWNG REKKI KRUWNG” dida.
66019017	Ungta neiyi kni 'leenni ripda krowl kparthaang ngi hanto' kthe vaantamsi khat deinu. Parvaan laiyi juwngda ka'am pva mkheng rek hinni: “Arjung qumin rang ngi klin Isowr ki kmaal ava' thung ngi ikurkuwk chaan.
66019018	Mleiya naan nih paamkruwng rekki sadak, ungta raalmii kpu rekki sadak, ungta mruh ktang rekki sadak, ungta skowl rekki sadak, ungta mmaan 'leenni kok'ong rekki sadak, ungta mii mkheng ki sadak tidit tah mii'ol rek ungta suwk'owr rek ungta kdilklin mkheng ki sadak rek, avah cha chnaandi'.”
66019019	Ungta saa avale' dultipaam ki paamkruwng rek ungta mmaan raalmii rekki skowl 'leenni kok'ong Mma' hinni, ungta mma' raalmii rek hinni raalkna rah mkurkuwn avah neiyi deinu.
66019020	Audilli Mma ngi saa avale' mma' aang ngi titinna' nong rek tlowda saa ava' kbih kton kcha' mii rekle' mma' pthla luwkbu kcha' mii rek kuhuwng kcha', mlangkma' khulpu avah rowngmii ngi kyowng lamda. Hava' 'knii rek avah mikring inni kantuk ki kquwngmeek meiduwm thung ngi varpthi lamda.
66019021	Ungta mqhe ka'am rek avah skowl 'leenni kok'ong daat raal'kaang, Mnehr thung ki mdopthuh ava ngi sorpet lamda. Ungta pva mkheng rek avah mmaan sadak rekki mpowiyin tappaa chlamda.
66020001	Ungta neiyi parvaan ki arjung kqum parvaan tamsi khat deinu. Ungta mma ngi mdonna' ktaak khor ava' ki chungkamke le' thiirrii klinpa mkhut thung ngi sinda.
66020002	Ungta mma ngi mapthlapum ruwlreu avah kyowngda. Mma' avah alraang ki pruwl, tidit tah tarnampii ungta Seitan ava.' Ungta mmah kum pun khat ki thenni bowlpthida.
66020003	Ungta mdonna' ktaak khor thung ngi ptla pthida ava' thuh mmah arkam pthida ungta m'leen nih kbihjiik lotda. Mleiya havah kum pun khat ava' mkurkhum duh kpha thung ngi mma ngi chaat rek avah mdohuwn chaak porsonmana' rang ki then. Ungta ava' dilrow ngi mmah mpha mruk ki thenni kperthlet rah.
66020004	Ungta neiyi kruwng longkhom rek deinu ungta mmaan nih m'leen nih ko'ong lamda ungta pau tpinditna' ruhtan avah mmaan hinni mdopiik doklam. Ungta neiyi Jisu ki rinpaumin leiyi, ungta Isowr pauna leiyi, mii rekki mlowl reenda mdo'eyown pthlarin rek avah dei lam nuh. Ungta saa ava' mditmata ava' dow pthla ruk luwkbu kma' rek ungta mapchal 'leenin ruk ungta mkhut rekin 'leen rukku mma' kbih kton kma' rek avah dei lam nuh Hava' mii rek avah ring lamda Khrista tu' kum pun khat kpaalsap dok kcha' reklam.
66020005	Pdainu kdiyou morson rek avah kum pun khat mqut dokduh vah veikhat ringkerheel lammeh. Havah mkhatna' trin kerheelna' ava'.
66020006	Mkhatna' trin kerheelna' thung ngi kyau kcha' rek avah kchiir lam, mmaan nah msuwkin kqha. Hava' mii rek 'leenni miknitna' tidiyowna' ava ngi mdotlot pchaan rah dow khatleh ammeh. Pdainu mmaan nah Isowr ki ungta Khrista ki thimpu rek kurthuwk chlam rah. Ungta mmaan nih kum pun khat Mma' tu' kpaalsap lamrah.
66020007	Ungta kum pun khat ava' mqut chaak dilli, Seitan avah mrowng'inn thung ki kupthuwk pthi rah.
66020008	Ungta mma ngi dultipaam ki mirkil plii thuh ka'am chaat rek ava' kuhuwng chrang ngi kchet rah. Mmaan avah Gog le' Megog ava'. Mma ngi mmaan avah raalkna rah kpurkuwk lamrah. Ungta mmaan chai rek avah truwnpii biing ki sitphuiya ngi knem rah.
66020009	Ungta mmaan nih dultipaam mdung ktlungdek ki kchet lamrah ungta miikenje rek raalveen'inn le' Isowr rih vonsat mdolow khuwpii avah ktukhul dok lamrah. Ungta Isowr hinki mei parvaan ki arjung qumdon, mmaan avah kqiimdek ki kapkapet lamrah.
66020010	Ungta mmaan kuhuwng kcha' tarnampii avah saa avale' mlangkma' khulpu rek mdovarna' kantuk le' meiduwm thung ngi varpthida. Ungta mmaan nah ava' thung ngi suwn le' jaan nih kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah chiikreel lih ka'am chlam rah.
66020011	Ungta neiyi kruwng longkhom kpowl klinpa khat deinu ungta ava' 'leenni kok'ong Mma' mmai thung ki dulti le' parvaan avah chen chlamda. Ungta mmaan amna' rah mmun khatleh ammda.
66020012	Ungta neiyi kdiyou mii rek avah dei lam nuh ungta mmaan nih kdil ruk klin ruk Isowr aang ngi ripsap lamda. Ungta laika rek avah kparvangda ungta morson laika khat ruk kparvangda, tidit tah avah rinkum ki laika ava'. Ungta kdiyou rek avah ava' laika rek thung ngi mdokjit mma' mma' ki mnongtlot chaakin ava ngi mtunin nih pau pinditda.
66020013	Ungta truwnpii ava ngi mthung ngi ka'am kdiyou rek avah arhan pthuwkda. Ungta Kdiyou le' Kdikhuw ava ngi mmaan thung ki kdiyou rek avah arhan pthuwk lamda. Ungta mii khimkheiya mnongtlot mnongtlotin ava ngi pau pinditda.
66020014	Ungta ‘Kdiyou le' Kdikhuw’ avah mei duwmpii thung ngi varpthida. Ungta havah miknitna' tidiyowna' ava'.
66020015	Ungta kuwku yoso rinkum ki laika thung ngi mmiing mdokjitma rek avah mei duwmpii thung ngi varpthida.
66021001	Ungta neiyi parvaan ren le' dultipaam ren avah deinu. Mleiya mkhatna' parvaan le' mkhatna' dultipaam avah qudok chda. Ungta truwnpii avah am porson mda.
66021002	Audilli Johon neiyi parvaan Isowr hinki kurjung khuwpii kchiir Jerusalem ren avah deinu. Ungta khuwpii avah kmou khat tih mi'innpu kpha rang ngi mkorthlon dang chaak heppi korthlong chda.
66021003	Ungta neiyi parvaan ki krowl klin khat tih hanto' mdothe arjanu: “Asuwn! Isowr buw'inn avah mii rek hinni ka'am kcha' a. Ungta Mma ngi mmaan tu' ka'amsap chlam rah, ungta mmaan nah Mma' mii rek kurthuwk lamrah. Ungta Isowr mdakkat avah mmaan tu' ka'amsap chlam rah ungta mmaan Isowr kurthuwk chrah.
66021004	Ungta Isowr rih mmaan mik rek thung ki arthli mkheng rek avah kuknuwl piik chlam rah. Ungta ava' thuh kdiyou tidit veikhat am nimeh mditmata plungkya ngi kqap veikhat am nimeh mditmata kqap veikhat am nimeh. Ungta tudun tsaanna' veikhat am porson nimeh. Mleiya choduh ki dow rek avah kthleng dok kcha' a.”
66021005	Audilli kruwng longkhom 'leenni kok'ong Mma' ava ngi hanto'theda: “Asuwn! Neiyi dow mkheng avah ren kpurthuh dok a.” Ungta Mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Akjit: ‘Tidit tah hava' pauna rek avah kindit ungta trinchaak krow rek ava'.’”
66021006	Ungta Mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “ 'Tunnu kqu a. Neiya Alpha le' Omega ping. Tupqhunna' le' Tupqutna' ping. Neiyi mning kakraal kcha' mma' ava' hinni rinkum kpii diitlaang ava' thung ki dii avah mkhon ktaak ki pii nikdi'.
66021007	Kapchaang mma' ava ngi dow mkheng avah kchom chrah. Ungta Neiyi mma' Isowr kurthuwk nikdi' ungta mmah Kchapa kurthuwk chrah.
66021008	Pdainu mningkqi rek ungta lamkrin kma' rek, Isowr dopder chaak rek ungta miike'eyou rek, jowlkpurju rek, mii kekser rek ungta dow pthla luwkbu kcha' rek ungta pleiknei kcha' mkheng rekka, mei le' kantuk ki kquwng meiduwm avah mmaan then kurthuwk chrah. Ungta havah miknitna' tidiyowna' ava'.”
66021009	Audilli mqutna' tidina' omlai tikhiu ngi kdim thleengkam tikhiu ksin vaantamsi tikhiu rek arlak ki khat ava ngi, kihin nih thlengda ungta kihin nih hanto'theda: “Arvang, neiyi Yausuwn ava' nuwn, kmou avah ayupdeh nih.”
66021010	Ungta Mma ngi neiya, Pthla ngi lown klin ungta kparthaang dok khat thah mqhida. Ungta mma ngi parvaan ki arjung kqum Isowr hinki khuwpii klin, kchiir Jerusalem avah mepdehda.
66021011	Ungta ava ngi Isowr konlorna' thlowida ungta mma' ar'aang avah kenreelsi lung ungta jasper lung ungta sethleng ngi kchiir lung rek heppi lengda.
66021012	Ungta mbang nga klin ungta kchuwng ungta mpaltong sowm lei'knii ka'am. Ungta mpaltong rek ava' thung ngi vaantamsi sowm lei'knii ka'am. Ungta m'leen nih Isreel nau rek phung sowm lei'knii miing rek ava' kjitda.
66021013	Ungta knithuhna' thah mpaltong kdum ungta karthak thah mpaltong kdum ungta kurduh thah mpaltong kdum ungta knitlaak thah mpaltong kdum ka'am.
66021014	Ungta khuwpii bang avah mi'innmun sowm lei'knii ka'am. Ungta m'leen nih Yausuwn tamsi sowm lei'knii rek miing ava' tikjit.
66021015	Ungta kihin nih ava' kthe mma' ava ngi khuwpii ava' mdopertetna' rah ungta mpaltong rekle' mbang rek mdopertetna' rah jiiring kchung khat mkhut thuh sinda.
66021016	Ungta khuwpii avah mirkil plii ka'am. Ungta mdung avah mkam tu' kinqim tetda. Mma ngi khuwpii avah kchung khat tih pertetda. Ungta avah kilommitar pun 'knii arja' knii kurthuwkda. Mdung le' mphei ungta mchuwn avah kinqimsapda.
66021017	Ungta mma ngi mbang avah pertetda ungta avah khuling arja khat somplii leiplii kurthuwkda. Ungta avah miikhat ki khuling saanya, tidit tah ava' vaantamsi ava' khulingya.
66021018	Ungta mbang avah jasper lung ungta mkhuwpii avah jiiring kenje likli kchiir dang heppi kchiir.
66021019	Ungta khuwpii bang ava' innmun avah mdetmdet ki mkhon kekre lung rekki mdopri. Mkhatna' innmun avah jasper lung, mi'knitna' ava ngi sapphire lung, mukdumna' ava ngi kalsedony lung ungta miplitna' ava ngi emerald lung.
66021020	Mparngatna' ava ngi sardius lung, mtikhiuna' ava ngi khrysolait lung ungta metrehtna' ava ngi beryl lung, mutkutna' ava ngi topaj lung, msowmna' ava ngi khrysoprasas lung, msowm leikhatna' ava ngi jasinth lung ungta msowm lei 'knitna' ava ngi amethyst lung.
66021021	Ungta mpaltong sowm lei'knii rek avah lungpowl kchiir, lung sowm lei'knii rek ava'. Ungta mpaltong khimkhei avah lungpowl kchiir khat ava'. Ungta khuwpii 'lam rek avah jiiring kenje likli sekerthleng hep daat lam.
66021022	Ungta neiyi ava' thuh luwbuk'inn kenje ka'am dei maang. Mleiya Kpaalkpusi Kruwng Isowr, ungta Yausuwn ava ngi ava' ki luwbuk'inn kenje ava'.
66021023	Ungta khuwpii avah ava' thuh kvaar rah kni mditmata thla ki msit amna' am nimeh. Mleiya Isowr konlorna' ava ngi mmun avah pvaarda ungta Yausuwn ava ngi mmun ava' ki meila ava' kurthuwk. kcha
66021024	Ungta Isowr rih mdosan chaak dok chaat rek ava ngi ava' ar'aang thung ngi kchet chlam rah. Ungta dultipaam ki paamkruwng rekki mmaan ki mkonlor chaakin le' takyat chaakna' avah ava' thuh ksin thuh chlam rah.
66021025	Ungta paltong rek avah kunthun niiluwn luwnni karkam liit nimeh mleiya ava' thuh jaan tidit am nimeh.
66021026	Mmaan nih chaat rekki konlorna' le' takyat chaakna' avah ava' thuh ksin thuh chlam rah.
66021027	Ungta ava' thuh kokchou krep rang khadaat ruk luwt nimeh. Isowr dopder chaak ungta pleiknei nong ktlow khadaat ruk ava' thuh luwt vot nimeh. Mleiya Isowr rih Yausuwn rinkum laika thung ngi mmiingin mdokjit dok rek mmaan chrel daat kluwt lamrah.
66022001	Ungta mma ngi rinkum ki dii kchiir dang khat mepdehda. Ungta avah sekerthleng ngi kchiir, lung heppi lengda. Ungta avah Isowr le' Yausuwn ava' kruwng longkhom thung ki arjung kluwng.
66022002	Ungta ava' 'lam ava' ningqim mih ungta kreng ava' maleh machang ngi rinkum ki dingbul avah mowngda. Ungta mchei avah sowm lei'knii ngi cheida. Ungta thla ktaiyi mchei avah chei kchokda. Ungta ding ava' arna rek avah chaat rek dam chaakna' dowidam kurthuwkda.
66022003	Ungta pauhor tidit veikhat am nimeh ungta Isowr le' Yausuwn kruwng longkhom avah ava' thuh ka'am rah. Ungta msuwk rekki Mmah sopklow chlam rah.
66022004	Ungta mmaan nih Mma' mai avah kdei chlam rah ungta Mma' miing avah mmaan pchal 'leenni ka'am rah.
66022005	Ungta ava' thuh jaan tidit am nimeh ungta mmaan nih meila le' kni ar'aang kriing lam nimeh. Mleiya Kruwng Isowr rih mmaan nah mar'aang kpii chlam rah ungta mmaan nih kumpung ngi ktlangknai kmah anto ngi kpaal chlam rah.
66022006	Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Hava' pauna rek avah trinchaak krow ungta mkindit kat ava'.” Ungta kchiir khulpu rekki Kruwng Isowr ava ngi Mma' suwk rek hinni kbeisek ki kthuwk kat rang dow rek ava' ktedet lam rang ki thenni Mma' vaantamsi avah mmaan hinni pthlada.
66022007	“Asuwn! Neiya kbeisek ki arjung nikdi'. Hava' laika thung ngi mdothe pauphuwn rek ava' kopqowi kcha' mma' avah msuwkqha kcha' a.”
66022008	Ungta Johon neiya hava' dow rek ava' mmik ki kdei ungta makna ngi karja kcha' khat ping. Ungta neiyi ava' karjaak ungta kmik ki kdeh thungta hava' dow rek kihin nih mkepdeh vaantamsi khuhther rih tluwnu luwbuk chnuh.
66022009	Audilli mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Kihin nih anto' tlowma'. Mleiya neiya nang le' a'uanau khulpu rek ungta hava' laika thuh mdothe pau ava' kopqowi kcha' rektu' suwk kurthuwk kcha'sap khat ping. Nang ngi Isowr hinni luw'abu kcha'.”
66022010	Ungta mma ngi kihin nih hanto'theda: “Nang ngi hava' laika thung ki pauphuwn ki pauna rek avah kbihjiik lotpthida thima'. Mleiya mpha avah knai kcha' a.
66022011	Mrin kindit kmah ngi ka'am kcha' mma' avah, mrinkindit kmah ngi i'am tlit chdaatso. Ungta ktobor rih ka'am kcha' mma' avah, ktobor rih i'am tlit chdaatso. Ungta mrinkindit kcha ngi ka'am kcha' mma' avah, mrinkindit tih i'am tlit chdaatso. Ungta kchiir rih ka'am kcha' mma' avah kchiir rih i'am tlit chdaatso.”
66022012	“Ungta asuwn! Neiya kbeisek ki arjung nikdi'. Ungta mii khimkhei hinni mma' mma' ki mnongtlot chaak dilkqowiyi kdopiik rang ngi, Nei ki nongqhat'lot ava' sin nuh kurjung imping.
66022013	Neiya Alpha le' Omega ping. Tupqhunna' le' Tupqutna' ping. Ungta Mkhatna' le' Mdonna' ping.”
66022014	Mma' paupiik rek ava' kopqowi kcha' mmaan avah msuwkin kqha a. Mleiya mmaan nih rinkum ki dingbul ava' mdochaakna' raan ungta paltong ava' thung ngi luwt lamdon khuwpii ava' thuh tuluw chaakna' rah ruhtanna' avah mthlowi chaak inna.
66022015	Pdainu uwi rek ungta mii kekser rek, jowlkpurju rek, mii ke'eyou rek, dow pthla luwkbuh rek ungta pleitenee rah kngei kcha' ungta pleiknei kcha' rek, khimkheiya khuwpii ava' duwn thah ka'am kcha'lam.
66022016	“Jisu, Neiyi lamrinlop rek thung ngi naan ahin nih hava' dow rek kthepindit rang ki thenni, Neiki vaantamsi avah kdopthlat. Neiya David Arjung ungta Charuwl ava' ping. Ungta Kepleu ungta Jiingsun ki Vaarpa ava' ping.”
66022017	Ungta Pthla le' kmou ava ngi “Arva:, ” dida. Ungta ava' karja mma' ava ngi:, “Arva,” adi chso. Ungta mning kakraal kcha' mma' avah arva chso. Ungta kuwku yoso kngei kcha' mma' ava ngi mkhon ktaak ki rinkum kpii pchaang dii avah anee chso.
66022018	Tidit tah hava' laika thung ki pauphuwn karja kcha' mii khimkhei hinni kthepindit chaak a. Mleiya kuwmiikhat tih hava' dow rek 'leenni motpom chaak bih Isowr rih hava' laika thung ngi mdokjit dok tidina' omlai rek avah mma' 'leenni ktopom rah.
66022019	Ungta kuwmiikhat tih hava' pauphuwn thung ki pauna rek klou pthi ma'am bih, Isowr rih hava' rinkum ki laika thung ki ungta khuwpii kchiir thung ki ungta hava' laika thung ngi mdokjit mma' then rek avah klou pthi rah.
66022020	Hava' dow rek kthepindit Mma' ava ngi hanto'theda: “Dakat tih, Neiya kbeisek ki arjung nikdi'.” Amen, Dakkat tih, Kruwng Jisu arjungqum.
66022021	Neen ki Kruwng Jisu Khrista ki plungnee avah naan akhengin 'leenni ka'am ikurthuwkso. Amen.
